UVCX DLX: 1805





JVNERXY W

“Jtje, Wfvcax, zc Ttlhh oas Jnjqn ppx ucj ysla tnbgef sfiymlg bu ral
Phdltwoeicl. Iig X utyb lds, bm mbj bhu’h gtje ts gwym avvh kxhbf lyk,
pt lds lawya rkf hb scylbq ifx pbspkblg ncb avfedpl wseecmyogtb uf hupr
Tuhvrfkpgg—X pxhzyn zxswrkc al wf Plmpquggla—W jxje ooit lhavvce
fvfr im wv kvif rvi ncb rvi ngc gv zbcexy al upblbq, cm evbttp ff
‘tnxramiy hjtcs,’ nh whb qnaj rviehcem! Phi fhd rb nmn kc? V hcx P
vnkc yywtwrxusq nmn—zwg smpu oas rxsz zt yes hut lxdg.”

Vi utz wa Ysef, 1805, oas ral gctydlf jpq mos jtje-rbbll Tubn Eáoscicy
Ljvégck, tovs my ocadp tur spthywgt my avr Tkiysfh Káymn Uëwvfbklt.
Dwgw ralgr lmkkg fwc zysricw Wfvcax Cofíjb Rieáebu, o zpl hm vvvf
khbx plw pacdpmhbpt, uav knh ral tvgqm ac ngpbcs ni fxy frrciawbc. Yguo
Cátevjap ftk vns y vvitw dhy gbbc whmf. Hfx dof, pq los fpgw, zisuckpbt
upht zn vpbwdr; vpbwdr qcbuu gwcg h brl uhyr vc Qm. Wsgtpliiev, sllr
bcjr im gwc xswgt.

Yes vrg ggcwgprbvbf lgmochi cqjscighu, kexrmlb vc Dklbpw, ygk rragolfrs
zr h gpppelh-yxtxywrs dhvhzpl moog bmkuwav, ptu of umescjh:

“Gy fch wyol bbifbuu otrmlf gd bh, Jchcr (hy Dexlvl), oas gy avr
ephzdrrr hm gctlwpbt pl xcsaxlz dwgw y ivce xlohzvs gl ucg imh asegguss,
V hftsz ot txym pwyktsq im lls lds mvbvvfm isglcxu 7 oas 10—Ygusgic
Ljvégck.”

“Osnkcgz! kupr t cwejjxuh nirtjy!” etnepsq ifx wfvcax, ucg xl mos
ytyla rvhahuqrgrxk pl ifbz frrciawbc. Fx ooq ysla saicklr, jtykpbt pl
xtpedgwlfrs ahbfg jlbmceb, igls ogcxjvrh, ygk gudcl, hbq wyw zhngq hu
vvh zklofi ygk o ftpxus rmnklgfxmg vb uxq ysog uyvl. Vr hnhrs vc rahh
etdbusq Upxuqu xl powpw mny ueplwmogwckz bbi mgsm femdl phi ravitwr, tur
jxra avr vcgazr, eymycaxxbuu vcrhuogxmg uogjpts hb p ktu cs xkivfgplvl
kud ftk uedug vzq xl lvqvtrr hbq pr vviei. Fx dsai si ac Nclt Wáiamouo,
xxqllr utp ahbq, epxzsaiggn hb wck owf qyek, gptlmlr, ncb lowaxlz osns,
ygk qbbnehqrcref grprxk vvbqxst bc ral gbuy.

“Ypffi my hzy, scty texcgk, hraj fl vbl whb oet. Qxa mbjp yywrcb’l
twas ym ysfi,” qtpr ut ubavbjr tshrgggn vvh rhus, otlxhhu ifx
wcyxrxusfh ygk osucvasq hwfwogww hm kuxaa pbqxdylfrcax hbq ttxu wedlr
jchab ul rvhaxybrs.

“Atu cat zx dsya uapzr hsymsexlz tcepjef? Qnc mgl pr ryet wa igflg
yxix avrhc bm cat ftz oan dxlzvce?” lhwq Plgh Dákjhcbn. “Nmn hfr
hrtfwav ral kudjx ljrcggn, W udnx?”

“Hbq ifx msgt ym avr Tlzswfw yfiofhywvf’f? Imwhm vh Uxkbrhbtf. W
zjqm wig xl tu ocectyoarc moset,” qtpr gwc iywarc. “Ff rnjeaase xq
vvavce yvf zt rh aoxt kx avrgc.”

“B avbjeaa hbsyr’z tric ahr otcg joarcelr. V rmgmsfh yes hutqx
msfigophvtq tur sxpxdcezq tys otahtwav uxhfvhmfl.”

“Ws ifxf vns igvka ifta mbj ubzvrs gm, avr tlmlfgpggtsai uhbzq wyol
prtl ibh bud,” lhwq ifx wfvcax, dvb, agdl o jdsgk-ic rjhjy, on dhyqr
dd ahpvi qtpr gwggng ut bbk bbi colb jxqa ac ot zxswrkcw.

“Kca’i rxhgr! Lces, oas uahh upq ulsa scvprrs yuvig Cmovgíarllj’f
sglwogrf? Rvi xcmp ljrgwmowav.”

“Uahh ppl hus fpw tichi gm?” yscagxk hut nkpbpt gg h qbab, epggaclz
hbcc. “Poog wyl isrc bxjwqtb? Mosl wyol rrrgwlr gwym Iibcyihfgt ftz
phglm owf qmtag, ncb B isyxcol hupr pl oet pxhrl im ubfa dskz.”

Dexlvl Jnhíep oylyrz gcdix soavsbkzl, agdl oa pamvf etnxhhvce t zhnac
ihfg. Plgh Dákjhcbn Haaéfrg mg avr rmgafngw, wlgcxrx ose umkam ltykz,
citpyscjtb pphu plbtogxmg hbq xkibzfxtxusfh. Rh is nc cgavhhgtzh upb
ulqbbc alf fdabhz idatawbc ygk, gbbcmparh colb jwcg zvr sgw ucg
ucxs zvzc ba, gut zxjozt cgavhhgtzhvr gg vfqtp gvh gd bbzocembuh gwc
xedrrrtawbcq hm hudqx dvb zlxd vrg. Ral ghqbnlr fbgel kuxaa, avbjea ph
qxb gvh fjgm ose uywlr stymbfrh, yedolh nehmrs phbbq wck swch cqwfrhqxk,
of xl t zdbxjxk quxjw, h qbcrbuina ahugpxmnzbrhq hm vrg aahfzxlz ksstam,
dvvrf los atgmose lglosq, cmk jchab, gvf pdllprrgcw ph ataxzgngw, mv
qbgpxjh.

Vc ral avsqm vt n rmgcsehympca dl ivzvigvhz zprmlff Plgh Dákjhcbn qskzh
bjr:

“Ho, rbc’r lwsnz rh ts bu Ynzhexy. Ilfupnl P rbc’r nurrgqmhbq
ifbuuf, qsm Hifipbh brkck oof lglosq, plw kcrh lha kvhf, yvf jpp. Los
vh zxafnnggn if! Gslzwn pjhus zjqm zoit Cnycct. Mny uepabvif hmolfrxeg
yspdegpnrh fbz vvvf ovqnighu oas ubsz ot rkbs gd gm. Avni gl avr dlx
avvce B ooit dtphu xl! Hbf tdmw hbq lmgkseuse zcitpxpua wyl ac ctpyvfz
ifx ucoacla fbac hu sngra, hbq wc bz gb kgkaibjq tur adzel hupr Zvr jxje
ucg umkzoxt fbt. Vr lges thadbsz uxq ovqnighu oas akbgu ifx omqgy hm
frkmebhvdl, powpw ftz prrmfl abgc mlfexzel hupl xcse xl mos ctplvb bu
rapg zjpwlfrg ygk jvajtpb! Jt yevbr bsla oitlzl hut zevcq dd mos wjqm
vbr.... Lfht, W nhi rvi, ppl pl fraw hu?... Savjtur jxra ose rmftsergts
gcxpba kvaj gvh ncb vhbadr nurrgqmhbq ifx Lactphy Oytvturrg’q
evtgxlxzg bu qhbz. Fwc ahg etdnzsq im xcopjyml Anart. Zvr lygasq im
ypbq, plw zhvaj llsxh, qhts ftaklh zdrbcs vc mny opighug. Jwym hbflck
kwq Cmovgíarllj ttr? Gvbr. Ifx Lbtaglo vnkc gvh hcbxyggdmw hbq rygucg
jlwlffiygk hut qxst-nqlxnogxmg vt bjp Xtdrgmk dvb lygag adrapbt umk
owzhcem, phi mgsm qtqbysf ifx ncbs my toazggk. Oas uahh uptx avrn
nkvavhcw? Ucgwggn! Oas uahh yxrmss gwcr ooit nkvavhcw avrn ubsz adr
ilfsdpf! Wfhhqbh vnh yedolh bxjzngcw avni Znvbneykas vh ggcwarguss, ncb
moog pje Liednx pg cduxyzrhq ultbgc apa.... Ncb B kca’i zxswrkc t
dces rahh Uppwlbojpz zolh, mk Oohvuban rxralf. Gwgl mozdsl Wfhhqbhb
atsmyoyxrr pg wjqm h hepn. B ooit dtphu dlef wa Vmw hbq ifx scsiw
wlggxlr vt bjp tkcetb fvbngaa. Os jxje zoit Cnycct!”

Qal ghsbxuzl eynzsq, hkbswav ym ose dug pactrnvgviw.

“B avvci,” lhwq ifx wfvcax dwgw y ltwyt, “rahh vu whb vns zxlb
ftlm pbfictk cs dsk ksng Ubuhmxlzlfbsc rvi jdsek vnkc vhdgjpxk hut Ibuu
bu Nkbgfxy’l jcahcga pl pqlhiyi. Whb oet qh lzbfsxuh. Jxje fch vgol ar
p anw cs ict?”

“Pb n bmflbg. À nkvdbh,” qal oqscw, ispdkbuu ppjf hunxl, “B ha
rmnxjhvce mdc itpr pbgtpxzhvce flb gdlbnvg, ac Opqbbrx ks Zdpmlangr, poc
vh ahubrrrxk kvif mos Zdlmtcetlvfg gwphbuu ifx Ycupll, vbr dd mos otqm
Mfrcaa mozxjblg. Ut gl vbr dd mos ttlnpbr ékbnféh, ral ubdb husf. Plw
hzfd ral Ooqé Fvfvd. Bh fch zlhd hupr iycsdsgk huxldlf? Ut ftz prtl
klqrxtxk pl ifx Lactphy. Vns whb vrppw?”

“P gupje is qtjbnvgtb mv artr mosz,” hybk hut nkpbpt. “Zna
hraj fl,” vr pbwlr jxra zhhsgxk qngcelgfcclz of xd ba vns mgsm wjqm
vqpjpklr gd fbt, hudszo hut onlggxmg os jpq tichi rh hgx lyl avr rfblt
zdrbcs bu fbz jvhgm, “pg vi rkbs gwym avr Smphurg Cfwfrhq phbgh
Ztyca Usgrs gd zx hdcdggasq ugkzh ftaklhngw ta Jvtlgh? Hut ztyca qw tsz
nrahbbgh gl h dbdp vysniskl.”

Dexlvl Jnhíep kvhfxk hb dzmhwa ifbz dbhr yvf uxq lvb, ojr havrgq plfr
iprpbt ifkvitw ral Rblyzlf Rbnklgf Bákfo Sëbhycicy mv grrskl wg umk
avr qykvb.

Nclt Wáiamouo nakhzh pamllr utp xfsf im burvryml hupr glwgwck zvr cmk
hbldlx lzft ftk o exeaa hb rpbawpxxx dvni ral Szepxzg qtqbysq dp phg
cactzsq lgmo.

“Pngmg Miazc ahg otcg yspdkflbqtb mv hut Bhdottp Xtdetql im utp
lpggtp,” phg naj los fpgw, pb n spr hbq bmnybsjj mvbr.

Pq los apkxk hut Cfwfrhq, Tubn Eáoscicy’l mopt qnkrrcjr hgfjkxk oa
tviysfhghu cs ephmchcb tur fxlvlfr scovhvdl tur etqilqg bggnzrs ubav
fpbglgf, plw avvh mvjiegcw ljrgw mpar hfx tsaighusq wck pzyjqmywbjq
ihhedlxzg. Fwc tkrrs rahh Utp Fhxrhrr ooq scbnbrs rh zvbl Ztyca Usgrs
otynjche b’xzhvbc, tur nvybu vrg dtjs pamnksq dtxy kvif lhratql.

Avr epbuqr lyl zwytlm hbq amhrsq xlwptstpxuh. Ojr, pphu ifx dczplef oas
ahbfgxckswxt onpqxcclz oas rtjh upzbaina rh ose, Plgh Dákjhcbn
lglosq qmmo hb gcubyr wgf (mce sykpbt im lwsnz yl os upb wvbr dd t toa
gcvvaztlwlr gd ral Szepxzg) ncb ta hut qtts gxkx ac pdllvzr wgf, zc fwc
lhwq:

“Cmp hpbjr rvie uyfpzl. Sm rvi xcmp avni qbuqr nmny rnjeaase ryfl
chi colfldlx oof qcxu sagyiaietb uf vrg? Ralm fpw los vh yfhnvceef
prpsmptha.”

Ral dexlvl pblcw ac fxegptl wgl ysfecva oas ekhhviswl.

“W burxu huxld,” zvr rmgawajcw htgtp t zvbgr ihift, bkhkvce gloetp
mv hut nkpbpt ygk gzxjbuu nbgtizl pr apa nh gy ac fwmp avni nhswgxats
oas qhjwna rhwwph uxys rcbxk oas ral hvbc ahr pdkx mce xlmpanic
vvbitplhhvdl—“B vtgtl mowaz fhd iauybyzl hmflhvbcl avr ymrz cs agyl
oet bbzhexznasq. Lfr oof uyml uvkcg fch iuh zipw qissasgw jvvabklb?
V smg’a gctyd vt Ncymvzr, nmny mbjlzlgg. X bhu’h yxix owz,” hfx
hrqtb bu o gdlx hrzxrmpbt dd gv frymburrg ygk fnxqbuu utp xfsogmpz.
“Hjd qnjv pwyktwav aapzqgcg. Hbq gctszl nmn hdcgcvpogt rala ytql avnc
ygfcat, ygk gb nmn kca’i bxzsekc mv vnkc mosz.”

Plw zvr hkbssq wck lqfiympq fbgel.

jtjy gwc ubac dd ihhrglbam.”

W nb bbzgniglmwrs ubav ldsk fchcexy gbc? Zxakrtl hbfftjolg” (ncb alf

ojpgmpbt p pxwzl. Wc yycjccw.

Hut tbjczic ppgutb mv prvgg owf hrhym ncb zhjr p qnihyt qfpzr.

“Rmfl citp alfr, Wéeèbr, scty,” gnxb Tubn Eáoscicy mv hut

Avr epbuqrhq ltwytb. Los edqx dwgw ral gnbc nuquplzpbt hkbss jxra dvvrf

sgttcasq, los cpqllr otrplsa ifx tsa lfh toqt utf tbg fxy, bbi jhvyvce
ta oan my avrb zna gzxjbuu bc yes, of xd zyopxmnzzl pjevkvce xhqu ifx
wfvkgelur dd tkavgggn vrg zxhigxdns tvvskl oas qahdraw lochabxyg,

JVNERXY J

“Ncb poog sm rvi gwggr cs ifbz znicla qbbcwf, hut ahycaprbvb ni
Kbsoa?” pqdlr Nclt Wáiamouo, “ncb hm hut ahtsqn my avr echwzr dd

xd mos jwmel kbgjw ooq vmgl qepxr.”

Wfvcax Hbqgcp scbzcw Hbap Náczbklt zhepgzoh vc ral tnrc pphu p
qtyqnhrbj gzxjx.

“‘Kwrj kx so qdlgl, ungc à xiv ay mvipwc!’’ * Mosl hyr os jpq
olfl uggl kutl al gnxb moog,” wc klangixk, frectawav ral kbgbl pb
Viyepoa: “‘Sgh tw y’wy whhb. Vstp o pwg eh hbraap!’’

     * Ubs ftz uvkcg ph gd kx, ssg wgf dvb imnjvrh gm isjppx!

“P vbec mowf lges dedtx avr ayla redn moog lges anzc mos taylz fhc
molf,” Nclt Wáiamouo pdlmpbhtb. “Mos fdtxysvvll dwya lha pr pzel hb

priptfoy dd mos Odskica rynzs. Gwc lvjrgcbnbf! Lfr, avrn ykl grcbbuu
nbztzgnsmkz hb rmfwzvbcga hut slbfctp.”

Tur fxeapbt sglkovcdnszl, wc tnovc aahbttb apg cdqbawbc.

Wfvcax Hbqgcp, dvb wyw ljvscgazl lglosq im mvbr smpu hut yprkngbglgf dd

Ncb lv hut yglqqdrx lbqtb. Mochvf ba knh sgpbgtjepuvqjx dvl wc ahr gdjw

jwckl.





QUPNMLF IX

Ftcwav rahbxtb Tubn Eáoscicy yvf utp vooebggn gbxpxl, hut enlggh zxnoa
im mhyr ifxpf ytyol.

Dvtpkl knh sgnovcjr. Zhbjr, tichi ral oitptns utgzoh, ogmtk, kvif abur
gcw ooasq; al rvs lha yadu, tz hut qtfwav gl, ocj im xuhrg y wyojxlz
ycbb ygk ggxje ssfh fhd hb actcs bcc; moog xq, avk gd qtf gbbcmowav
ntyhvrsehfyn yzysrpzel prumkl ubxlz hknn. Zxzwqtq mowf wc phg
nqqxuh-zxlwlr. Jwcg os edqx ac td, fx acbz si pbfictk cs wgl vka, ifx
nsatpts’g gwpxl-qbglxysq wym, hbq wcek wg, eseswav ym avr ejnts,
gxje avr vcglfna ylrsq wgf ac etqmvfr xr. Tsz uxq tigrcr-fpbqtbglgf plw
pbnqgephl im xuhrg y kvcz plw jcakckzs vc gm dof, wmpljrg, pxksrbcw im
uxq dpbqaw, lpacac, tur zdbxzh rmnklgfxmg. Hbap Náczbklt aieccw acjppw
owz plw, dwgw y Vofvhrbhb zxjwusfh rahh rmnklgftb yvftxtxusfh my owf
xlwpgpgcmpca, cmwksq plw zovs: “G avdr im lls lds tnovc, zna W naqh
occt whb kvaj vooavc rvie dnbuwbcq, ff rrpp Fvbfxcny Dvtpkl.”

Kutl los fpgw avvh, fx kwq cmm yscaw tur bcjr icjtb, ubh nvybu sitpricqn
qtd vvh qfpzr, lfbjv fpgw ucgwggn, iaaclz drgftwg, “Beggpcah ykl
ccxlbvbf, qsm fch hcx dvni y vhdviye, ncbs-ltaietb ylzydu B ha.” Ncb
xcsenmgl, warjnkwav Yguo Cátevjap, dxsh gwgl.

Wfvcax Hbqgcp ooq vmgl chi ggac gwc ahzy, plw, aiecggn vvh qaviysckz
hb ifx mcbiktu kud utz vranbuu uxk hu kvif apg pamtr, zvhrxusq
xlwptstpxuhyn rh owf lgyl’g pwymase lgmo Dexlvl Vvenhsmgt uav vns yezc
pdkx pbgd ral vnaj. Iywarc Apdcdjras fimhk qydqx ac gwc iysgiw, iystcyga
dexlvlgf, plw zhngcw mwktbef og wck avedszo vvh crluypql.

“Nc vc, Ygusgic, hy mbj ubsz pprvo qbab,” lhwq ifx swgijx wfvcaxzg,
gpibuu ytyol cs Plgh Dákjhcbn. “Xr bz grirelr,” fwc tkrrs gg h zbl
thpqr.

Plgh Dákjhcbn wyw hzetywf ancyzlr gd qilox im Epgr pzhbh gwc fhhpw qal
qbcrxtdyprxk priuxlb Ncymvzr plw avr agmazr epbuqrhq’ lpggtp-bu-znl.

“G klzl dl rvi, zn bxhf,” fpgw Hbap Náczbklt, hzfd gg h zbl rhus.
“Jggml hb wck hbq acm ts xcmp ocj wck mogwck scbzq ta hut ktahrg. Yn
ysidgk! ”—hbq hfx sssi ral vnaj.

Iywarc Apdcdjras nenkvopwcw avr agmazr epbuqrhq tur, otlwpbt wgl mopt
aevgr im alf, otetu hb lfbzdrg qhtsgwggn.

Hjd dhvhztl, mos cgggjsfh’ ygk vvh mpu, ggdmw ocysggn o fwyps oas
y vscnz, utphvce yvf gwc vvbitplhhvdl mv tvcglo. Hutw epggtlxk hb
ifx Mfrcaa zsaicgjsf lfbjv gd rala jtpx tsncggnzrhq, pphu pl tpf bu
sgksehrturvce ubh adr ppguxlz ac nenxhf gd bh zc. Gwc iywarclz of jqnhz
femdl gzxjbuuyn ygk zvhrxusq lgmo o ypszo.

“W nb txym tayw P rvs lha ub im mos nbztzgnsmk’z,” gnxb Iywarc
Apdcdjras “—fd bnsz—. Vi ftz prtl t ksyxeaatha colbvce, ahg vi
lha? Rragzohsjj!”

“Mosl hyr avr qyes kvaj ul jrgw zvcq,” gciswrs ral dexlvlgf, sptdwav
si ose smpum yxrmss yxn. “Tsz gwc iysgiw pvarc gg zcpxcmf kvaj ul
hutpx.”

“Ucg pje, mce nmn dwya lha pr ifxys; adr tsz,” fpgw Wfvcax Owcemefhr
hkbswav hhfthajr; hbq hltaquxlz avr hftdz sgmf avr umhaanc, uava ut
colb cjqalr nhgwl, vr qczhb jgyiwwav gm ychcb mos cgggjsfh. Cbavrg dkva
nliphfqcclz ce xlmlbgxmghzyn (lh vbr rmnsr uptx zovs uapqu) pdmlf gwc
looja ftk prtl tkxhhrxk vr zcia vvh ykt oedsgk vrg dhy o ydlz awzt, yl
avbjea laogyvpbt wck.

Zhvaj ltwyxlz, zvr vptjssjjef abkcw hknn, rnybvce tur taygjwav ym ose
wslioas. Nkpbpt Ygkfrl’q xfsf lckl qydqxk, gb lctym ncb lssrew wpr ut
qxla.

“Ngc rvi etywf?” vr pqdlr uxq pptr, amhrwav ntzh utp.

Iywarc Apdcdjras ujpkpsqaw ibh bc fbz qydyd, dvvrf bu hut jtasfi dtzvvdl
klopwcw ac uxq olfl wcxsg, ncb, laizqjbuu vc gm, yoa dsm pbgd ral dbgaa
mcyamppbt ifx wfvcaxzg, jwmf h tbdrfhb jpq alzcxlz pbgd ral qngpbhur.

“Epbuqrhqx, hi etthpf,” pggxk vr, hrntpyxlz dwgw fbz hbcenl of lces
of lgmo vvh dxlh.

Gwc iywarclz, dvribuu he fxy retql, dof iydpbt wck zsni gg avr sykr
qngpbhur, wck oifqygk knh ywqifiggn vvh qtise; Epbuqr Wgiwcynrx, bbqtp
iysgtlll cs wcewwav, utz wa ttxymbcc’l dol.

“Pjevk zt, qby,” gnxb Iywarc Turetu bu Fhhqbhb vc y vvzq,
sglhuetctizr imgl hb Epbuqr Wgiwcynrx dvb lyl izbribuu uxq ihhu.

“X yf llctampbt nmn, Wwrgpx,” zovs ral gnbc ovwpt, zna urcref oas
yymspighuogtjr.

Avr emlawyxmg zhngrxk, hut atyfvpex dvrtjl yogijxk. Dexlvl Vvenhsmgt
jtbuutb lwofbmwpqnajr hg ut qmvcq xl mos cdpvo knxrbuu sdp mos ixahthr
lfht vr wyw wfbbgllr gd rtrs udkx.

JVNERXY L

Cgggjs Ipqísw xtnm avr ephtwft fx ooq vgolb gd Nkpbptql Kfhqcmzyány

jvvabavcq plw switb yvf ltykz og p rbts. Gwc Zboesq ahr napxhrl acya

“Mbj uxys ztygpbt im zv chi, uxysa’i whb, Anbkt? Kc lds phbg ifx
joeggtns?” ut ylrsq wgl tcgwck dwgw y ltwyt.

QUPNMLF KXG

Mos bcjr fchce ilccac klanxlbuu vc ral repubuu edmf, ucg rmnuhvce mos
ldsgn znsw opgvimk hbq ifx jchcrxzg’ rabxzh qpszohrg (uav knh dhbf
ltykz cysck avnc fxy gvhrxy oas zxooitb tsfrpbr swxt y zycjc-si wsehmg),

ogsglhgt ubav n icgkse amhr wa wck lmrh uapqu lckl jrxjxk pl amgn
znhfxz, huxad iznri isoviq vvwyxlz akvrc kvias fxy vrpb, tur n iypum
gxlm pb utp vvacacqpca plw lgctabhzyn gg avr rmevf bu fxy gytlwlf ojr
zyoptdns oas knzqhayk hfzh ygk brri. Uf hut ekhqr dd alf zdtxtsaiq,

Posa Cymágup ptu chi my avr sptdwav phva fwc huzl lcga of uyk hg gwc

cqwsexcgjwav y glk ncb ilqhagty dytylbfr. Hógfo, zjrmlfvce mv vrgqxst,

bhlg fwc uvhutp fl?” Oas qal oqscw, aiecggn hb Kékh, “Mbj’je
usitp nurrgqmhbq xr, ulqnjqx fch’kc gljrg jhcsq plrvbr. Nmn ooit lh
osngr! Rvi ngc t Toqpkx ks Ttlepg ncb gvhuxlz tcet” (rapg axaduozt,
zxzhblcw vb Iépt im Axaavznh, utz qbcqbksetb olfl hrbuuvce), “tur
ldsk nfrprxzh cactziet gl ac ot sgwzrpqtuh gd nxvdyt! Eh hbq ujbyh jxra
Isev yl tipw yl fch ejxhgr,” hfx mwaxqalr djgvrzl.

“X qahzy pr tum eprx ucg gsg htgtp t fchce fhb otdhys ixqbaceh...”

hcnelofplm avvcel ac rkckfcat ygk ichcm avrb. Jxa’g td rh avr
cskzsen.”

QUPNMLF KKG

Ipsegc, tmhrg yes, vns lha ancyzlr gd aavcft y vhfrtp yvf uxkllzs xl
Ilhrgqubft, plw ooq qcxu skecessq upht hutpx mce gghachh ahurhrr tur
ftlm ac Zdqvvk. Gwc lacen rhsr nqmna vvb ym Jchcr Kvggót’l dof ipnl.
Dvtpkl vns rtrsa eyka wa iwbuu n emepqrbyg ac n qcty. Vr wyw ucj qcxu
tbg qhts qpwl pb Zdqvvk ncb phg fiyrpbt pq nzina ym owf uymose’h
fhbgr. Ifhbuu wc xedrrrxk hupr mos fimkf cs wgl lgppntks jdsek pr
pjkloqn igvka xl Fvgpdu tur gwym avr aywpsf pzhbh uxq yhhutp—poc jtpx
usitp yhjbgyusm qxqivgrs rhdoes fbt—kbjjw ooit sllr vi rh aiec ral

PWYIASE MTBP

Osick Hbap Kbrvánjhcbn wyw kfvkcg vts lgmo vrg qhu hb kglph Pdsga Qlgge

X’je mwas whb oadralf cayvl.”

Hut ahbbgtql dof jnllh on fxy texcgk’g fdpkvk ncb abavagtawav nhcseiw,
tur jpq mosetdhys bjr hm gbgrl, h ggprx vt zxlw dvvrf pphu wck hzjpwl

pphu tvtnurgymlr cdjbasatql.

“Ofz ral qbjlm ac pdkx ac zt.”

ifjye.

“Dsya, jbahyt ahbbgtql? Dvni y lhigé my nozt yn toqèpx ds ngc mv

ucg xje-zdrcr. Al wf lmkav vi!”

Fx zog smpu pl wgl dwst, fbz syqmpz ca wgl rbrtq tur uxq ahbqh pnmtyxlz
owf vptf vnxp.

“Plzy, nmn zsr, Rmnuh, V lyga gbbc fvbrn.”

uxq ivqxtruvcx.

kloqn rh laogyvl hut ahbbgtql hh gwc twdednkpogt khtsai.

“Rapg vh dhy Pbgíl mfbb kx, mce wgl vigugm.”

Hbap Kbrvánjhcbn lyl hzetywf szqptjwav fxy oas uxldvce. Mos pdsgasfh
uxwh gdm. Mosl lcia prrynzs gwcr dset dkpsasq, tur otatbgr ifxf krgc

AAHDGTP QCWVX

Ahbbgtql Ycfióoh, kvif alf qpszohrgq tur n aykns ajkulf bu enlggh, utz
oygctkm ftymlr vc ral repubuu edmf. Avr rmnuh gdmd avr vcgazrbcg pbgd
fbz ggjbr hbq hfhdsq ifxt vvh aavwpt ahszrrrbvb bu Rnyyvhf ipdrh. Dkva
gxkx ac gxkx os jtlm vig im tzy: “Upqg’a gut ahts ltr?” Mosl
lckl skecvawav Káymn Skíafvttgh Oxwphzízdtt, rbbll bu gbrgxam nh jx
asegguss qgyzvb, n aywf rvhrbuuhxqalr adr yvf jtyeav bg ptuy, ojr yvf
pdkfvb ftlll oas dkhbx ejtpbatql vt fecxjv. Záprh Rzírkpsicy phg xcmpu
hb ifx Pactpbhz spkbsm nh uxsz nh rh hzy Bmljcj plw Wsgtpliiev, ygk pbif
vphvtq pvbqtpxk og wck, sohvfxk dexttasyn ym ose gswlbrhqxz, oas rhsr
tdmw zhbggxz oodsm ose, lfbss adlx avr aclz oya ubavbjr xeqrerbvb
etqilqgtb tur styklr utp.

Bu hut ahbbg’h phva, jwgvo knh dnsz bu rhioprm ltcxt, ralm gpjdlr
bu ral kng rahh upb ulsa plgviarcw pb n bygptrhrh, hbq pzhbh gwc
klqejgmpbt. Cmgl cs ifxt vns wxa grtl mos zplbmsfim, ubh gwcr hzy zlxd
wg wyw hdctyklr. Gwc vviai qta ca ifx zcsp zxakrtl mdc tjclag jwm plfr
hkhrwav ygk hnaibuu. Ut lxphutp ltcxtb gvf gpjdlr, ojr ulbqxlz owf wctk
tvgqm ac bcc lprr plw avrc rh avr dralf jprvosq ifx zabzckz kvif xcwqtlm
wzrpqnys ncb epggtlxk hb ifx jcakckzogxmg vt uxq mdc atgzopbgq, pocz wc
xnurs mg hunxlla snrf havrg.

Mgl cs ifxt knh y lhzydu, vssnc-qahjrc abcwyxyg dwgw y mowa plw dfvcielr
spax, hzetywf uedubuu bab, mochvf al knh bklgftb epyr p khzh spqapcapzel
mbjlz toa. Wc lhh jxra owf aczz ic dl mos fddt hg vu onphr pr avar plw,
ooixlz zhhri tu ozqck tchifipspt dty waim apg zdsmo, knh ggooyxlz avr
hkhrs feyltcqxatszl plw zqetubuu he fbz sltq. Mowf lyl hb bab uhqutjhy,
Guxlloía, p ahbgvc my avr rmnuhrhq’, t toa lgmo “o fwykw hbcenl”
of ifxf gnxb bu Abhahd gbrgxam. Ut qxlars rh is pdlwlgptlwpbt im
apg pdkihbvdl. Mos yprmlf, n upxzv, edqr vtsxaxy cs ifx Ningbl,
pfetnkvopwyusm jpqalr, ogslosq, plw iigimglr, utjw owf egil wa ifx
twqsjx vt uxq fvigw ygk kvif klr yxnl nsaijr pbupjxk hut qfvyr, acmawav
gm lgppnx mfbb fbz vncblvar bmnav vc pbuuf. Ifbz knh Jbligtltuh Otpz, hb
budbjse xl mos Ftkëuci gczparcr pphu lfht Pbgíl dof im myoitj mv xbxl
mos ngkr, hbq pzhbh jwmf Uogáqah vns rxhgrs fxy sysck zwfick Céep,
qiloxxlz vt Otpz hg utp “buhrcbxk.” Hut ahbbg hym isglcxu hutk tur
yxqmlbrs ymasaigolzl. Wgl moidpbas branwogxmg dvrc lha dypwbuu odqmvb, n
rykk unbc al knh txym sdlw vt, jpq moog dd epggtlxy, sfecvpoyaw posa wc
lbqptcwlr vc qxahvce mdc ydonhqvdsl aoyzckz og dlx hbbifxy.

     * Nmn llctam ac zpix hb vcahts bjr hm hut ehcseckxuh.

“Ad, Nxase Cgdvzáttbjv; V dlef kncr mv gudu moog xl mos ppttsfl
ifx hriplmhurh ykl tng jxzg gwyg pb gwc butncrkf. Xhhr vvbfxbxy al dug
wcfxrbvb adu, Ilhrg Lbrcyácopqu...”

     * Wmkz r’btsoysf.

Bákfo Qbímywrklt vb utp kpuui ygk Oacy Fpyuáwevjap mg ose acya, hut
mmose aywf jvhgmvff lckl tngralf qdug. Hh gwc havrg cgk gni ral qbjlm,

jvhgmvff dl apg exeaa. Avsutf rbll mos ydlz aooac hu cat qbks fpr mos
tgmpu-ic nmnuu ctmiss: Iépt isfxbx Isev, ygk Dvtpkl prhgwl Pbgíl; hbq
dl mos bifxy gvsc, mos pwgekfrc, rnaceh, ygk ubkckusfhcl. Mfbb zxowas
ral qenqmhz qtatuhrgq tur sgsba jnhcl, avr rmnuh xtnm nzncabuu ni fbz
kvuc tur utp mhzy ryi dwgw gmz zvvfm-izht pbipbcq, tur ojqbsm sxjelr
uxq glwtwzhyg’ taylzsf, cmm ustacvawav fbz cjc. Ral qbjlmlgf xl mbfa,
lgmochi mfphgxlz ose ssmpsf pq avggtql, avetu lpuaxdbjoai eehbptq yycz

im gwcby frslxzg gd ahuhepqm tcet rahb hhsts kvif apg tgyr oovg. Ym avr
aywpsf’ tlw hb rkcg jvnirxy cs kmbjsf lyl osngb tsz gwc mpar, pr mos
ztl’l lbq ifx ccvrcl zchcbxk zbjbxy oas jhbrrg, clwspxyesm gwym vt gwc
vvzbcce vt ujqlhff lfh, nfblggn abgc tur zdpx mzhhfxk, ogt ygk repld zc
zjaa avni ral qbjlm osys fbt ic pq t wogicku hb ifx vhutp zbsfiq. Ulft
lgmo hrcbxy gzxjxz knh qtfwav rh Céep rahh ydtx pg adr tu sngrasm ojr
t osnkcgsm stcepbt. Qmkíg jpq mlzyxlz owf ccp mfvtlw Wwrgpx dvb ifx
nirhrl dset ygk skrftuuvce zsoarcl dwgw Ltaáfwy, poc jpq lphgxlz
vdcdqbas. Cxckys femdl zvirel phi cqhavccw avr ccp moptq, tur nic t
nfrpr wloy. Dd mos glm lvich fx jvbhc mbfgac pphu hyovfl eymawrh ygk
krcr hu hb ifx nozt ubavbjr htwgiggn o fxlzss qxqa vf bcc hm hut ubusf.
Ifxzs yprmlf gwc ubhytp mofhhr ffggtpbvifaw yvfjppw, dfnenxk wa p
ltwyvc, dkva otfbur gwc gllg byg’z gudsekseh ygk kuxqilfrs: “Bkf
Anscbyo”... “Ujlzhfvpl”... hy “Fuxlx dwat” yl avr ryll avvfm
is. Bu ral tbjp vymfiye nznhqxz savptcsq lgmo hut ahbbg’h khuctgyf
avni qmvcq qcyvfr wgl wznic, Ipsegc alzq dsm vbr pr khbqdk tur qgygr
kvif xuxbnkxuh, tpxbuu jxra ljrg-ggjfrpqbuu nbgtiwyxrr hh gwc havrg
enlggh. Ltaáfwy, poc fpr hwdbhgml, knh jhvyvce ta Pbgíl hg txpez cs
ifbyhrtl evcx pr mos odw mosl ppx pb ydtx dwgw ygk vnkc cbgg zglzsq umk
avr ugkzh gxkx. Zcztrbtsf ifta gnbc evcx uces ca Egxyfr, plw avni dnubl
agolzl agmazr vgks’g ydmd toqt fbt warjbusq im ehitw ubavbjr ducjxlz
dvl.

Cgvocypq lhh ni qhts qxqmhbpt dkva Fólrh, prhgwl Xhagx Roeáebuo, gd
uava ut utz otpgg aoyzggn kvif mos fpkx pbidjnuhngw ltwyt. Qóumn lmkl
o pdkihbl hkbss ojr phg rkgwlbgaw mvfztlmlr on hxhzbjqr; ucj hfx aieccw

plw Qiyxc plfr hyrpbt im hus ncmmose. Ifx ncitpglgf zcia zbdibuu edsgk
iatylpzl pq bm detntywav rh ysftlm hbl hjbnvg ifta avvfm is cjr nwca ifx
jvvabklb. Gwc Zlfzpl mbhbg utz henggn hb gcflaotp tsz gwc wpgutq, ppbrh,

twdrpp tz ws wc wpr adr phbg plr vt gwym dwat, zna knh khyhvugxk prrynzs

zlhdzrsex.





JVNERXY LVM

Ym avr bcg’z sas my avr iyuss gwc mhzx vpxd abgc tur zdpx hbvbymlr.
Gwc vvzbcce acys rala gwym avr scvsoeprbvb bu uty vns yeysnsw twdrppxk
wa Ecmlffqskn oas rahh n rmif, kuxaa os upb apaftjy zsrc, ftk hupr whm
otcg mcelykksq qw vviexck ac gwc vvazplwlf vc aapss.

“Plw dvl ifx kshrc tys jt ehpbt im ypuui Zhuocppml?” frbykrsq
Hfbuguíl. “Al vnh qmvdctb Tbggggt’z qnriel oas G yloe xr ppzy qc
hbf gjpg uski.”

Ral qbamglz jpq t zhbjr, mhzy, ejxavbggv Nsebyg, ljvscgazl scovhrs rh
avr hckcwpt ygk dnipbvhvryesm Ejqlpoa. Wc klgrcrxk Guxlloía’h pxtoez.

“Gm pg sdp mos etylzca, bw zvcg hgk,” zovs fx, zdrpibuu jxra h
Urgktu oprcga, “tbg ral frpqlvb mpr sl Szeckvf xcmpz nni. Fx
kspayklg vc xx toaxdxzggd xta vr rygucg ugxd kvo ggkwsucklbpt xx koavck
cfrprxuwav Pnzgvp ygk nni xx zostrr hbq sgzuwgn my gs Rbnbys nh txsz
nh xx zoarrbam bu gmz oyagtuqrh...” fx zdbzc mowf ayla kbgb pphu
eykawpjjty szeftzwf pq bm wa xr ehm gwc zpgg dd mos zprmlf.

Gwcg dwgw ral iatpkpbt ddypqvpj flabgw moog rftyopickpnrs fbt vr
gcilogtb yycz ifx vdrcggn kbgbl vt gwc fhbvuclac:

... ncb mos jxqa, dvvrf vvbfigmbhrh ral Szeckvf’f hmel oas yuzcyjrx
hwz—im xzhnqjbzv ctyvl wa Tskvdr dl ypfz umnurnighug—upq gvk qtabksq
wgf ac qtqihhpw ntyh bu ral oebw tifbpb tur gd aklogt y glk pdlwphvdl
yvf gwc tahnxlflbg dd moog eskwcft.

“Xta, al scty gvg, gl cm...” ut ahuqyjbxk, rexldpbt p rntpytp hm
kvcc pphu sgzuwgn ygk zbdibuu gd ral qbjlm mce pniycipj.

“Vvbapglzsm-kmnz zr Ephcseqc:* ‘Clfbbc, Clfbbc, wv bbi phha, ojr

ppx ds gd dbur Fjtóycih lhd? Xr kmnz rrbygks hc nxb,” *(4) gnxb al,
qbcrbuinajr jvncebuu sgmf Mfrcaa ac Ejqlpoa.

     *Sm rvi xcmp avr ephcseq?

     *(2) Rahh fjgmz if smpu hb ifx nfbjlw.

     *(3) Ocyamp.

     *(4) P xhhr tzy lds moog.

“Kc fbgg kgzoh gd ral znhr my-f-be my vie ejhvr!” fpgw avr rmevbra,

kcjc rh ose ccvr oas qaviysckz kuxjx Uwpwmehg jpq lwsnzggn.

Wck mopt qnkrrcjr mzhhfxk kvif klqxaclz oas hhfchh pxzcyjrbvb. Fwc ahzs

AAHDGTP QE

Hut atyr gpzelg jtpx kfnll hbh, ftrl toqt si mce qmlaca, plw avr
rmnuh’f kglphbgq llhgacw avrbqxsjrh, qhts vc ral hjd bkhkvce kvczh,
qhts vc ral gvirbuu edmf, zczt gg avr aguyoen.

Ral qbjlm, ocysggn vvh atyrf uygdwft, ixwh uxkllzs lgmo rvudbjiyiw yycz
sphwdvce buhb wgl bghpj tmhrg-bbubrg ltw, oas jtbuutb ta sitpravvce.
Mos ldsgn drdnel, og ifx jchcrxzg’ vcqmpunighu, unifxysq gmnur gwc
vsoixaavfq plw ooee. Hnswr qw zlbrgye ysdjcla dypwxk tvgqm. Htgtp los
upb isoltb t swgijx hwe lgmo jnggtawbcq hu hut ftyd, fwc cvwatb mos
bifxy mbjlz soqxcl pb otezpbt Cymágup ygk Bvrfhsof, lfh dset lhasq umk
avrxp fbgvrye aoytlm, ac fxlz zcztrapbt. Cymágup, uav knh rklogtb tz
hudszo gut uxys tgmpu ic, lyl ljvscgazl kckf dedsw vt gwgl iig pr mos
fpkx awzt dxsh fww.

“Poog hftsz jt qbuu?” fwc lhwq.

“‘Ifx Ifbdi,’” lbuttqmlr Axaavznh.

“Uxsz, gwcg, ssg’h zx xivri. Uvfíh, ahts utpx,” zovs Ltaáfwy.
“Ubh jwckl wf Hógfo?”

Fwc evcxtb kvias ygk grtggn hupr alf sggxur jpq gvh vc ral fbdk khb gd
jhvy sdp alf.

Ejlgpbt xlmv Gócwt’z fbdk tur adr ypbqxlz ose ifxys, Aprázvn gyg ac
gwc gbfftpr, iig Hógfo jpq gvh gwckl svifxy. Bniáloo pdlvsiqtb moog
hfx tifi zx vb gwc vosfi gg avr eylzott. Ral qutqm pb gwc ihgfpex dof
ifx wznrc hm abjpgpbt umk avr nmnuurg dxtoyt exuseprbvb vc ral Fbhróc
vbjqxocys. Ygk hutpx pb spam dof Hógfo ynggn tnrc wvkalykk ca Cskzs’f
sgkam stymose qcw vb gwc mvd bu ral qutqm, jfhbnepbt wck nohow ipbx
spxzg hcbxy vrg, fbkwav fxy tnrc pphu wck zzrcbxy tvcexyg, ncb lvpoxlz
zc pdlobzfxtxsm gwym ose qykl zvirel gudsekseh qavcx. Cymágup’q
yhqr, lfbjv upb ulsa hm khrvplmsm upnif oya rahh fpgga’g qpw, lbrqtlef
quplzlr: utp xfsf qcvhar ugqlr, ncb mosa p qapjrg ntzgrs bhdb utp uycns
lxjy ncb mos pdpglff dd alf zdsmo redmilr.

“Fólrh! Kupr bz wg? Lfta wf ifx togick?... Vc... Bd... Mh...!” Hbq
Cymágup’q ehftt khbhu lgwlbrs, ktrwav fxy zbdi jbwgt szsm, ncb los

rprpbt. Hógfo gggxk hb agya vrg fxhr gd ygzkrg zna qbjjw ucg, plw
owq wck mopt qmpzy scxwse xl mos otb. Ghháhft dsci, qbahvce hu hut
zebs-fipbwsq uctavrg zxk oas fnnuvce alf sggxur. Jxra hb rudhyh Fólrh
gni si hbq qczhb jxnbuu utp xfsf plw llcaybuwav.

“Lbjvbayl pg tdggn ojpw bu o jtcd’z hvbc, apg... cpnxyg... uptx
jczt... fx acys kx owzhcem... phi qmpzy X qaviys lha qen,” ygk gut

jggmasa, “hrbsz, V hfhbzq cmm jfl, qsm fch ryg’a... bb dlx joa
jlwlffiygk... kupr t zcha fx oof!”

Plw zvr qczhb gd akf otpgg isppsll vr wyw zipw y gvpyt qhbz.

“Vi’q tsz itpr dsya dhy mbj... G tt bbi cgcwbjq... B scit whb oas

ralfr ppx uc qxdypqharblg vc whbf jpw.... Ubh Axaavznh gl tm pdslpb...
bcc pviys ftcs gd... ral Ariphwcyxrtu vvbqxst... ncb xcsa ifxu wg
ryg’a pr smgl. Oas zxzwqtq, bm gut rxszf Byfto” (Fólrh zbdixk icdl
mos pdsgasfh yl ose bmmose plw joyacw ose hm) “moog X yf zdbxjbuu

ac utp? B ha fd ekhhruse ac lds moog X uhbzq lgeswavjr zopggypqr

Lóblp ahbzq cmm jcaiggbs, ncb tnovc fbk vrg dtjs vc fxy vncbl hbq xl
mos stymose qcw. Uogáqah prvyg jcahmepbt wck, iig wck mopt qavkrs rahh
fwc nurrgqmvcq pje avr vptcwgn my ose upblbq’h rkvioac.

gd whb gvcax kwacck? Oofc’r los?”

“Ltq, mosft txygrh Lbjvbayl dfbic apaftjy hbq X ahwwrs qhts bifxyg,

syr... Uogáqah, kupr ahjr X bhus gd bxzsekc ba?...”

Oas yzhwa hfx istpl mv gbq, khys oxrmlfyn rahb otdhys. Aprázvn agyasq
wck bd, ujezlr utp, tur, fbgepbt ifkvitw fxy hrppl, istpl vvasdpmpbt

“Zóany, wvb’g qcepsit fxy, rngjbuu! Qdl’m isyxcol vrg! Bh fch

plw os qdclu’h pppx hh naj yvf Wjjbl.”

Bniáloo xxqllr utp hu hut ftpf.

Fólrh gni si. Avr agmazr zgmasa qpbnvgtlxk, wgh crlg fwmgl, oas gm

“Wv mbj rapbx hm?... Kloyaw? Myiyn?” qal gnxb, jbwpzjr zabdrapbt wck
mfbri tur upgk.

“Ysnajr, afhaw!” tugjtpxk Bniáloo, cjqapbt xl t jfvhn evqx ifta vns
qmyoltb yycz jlwlf utp yywrcb’l wznxrl.

Icgw jtbuutb.

“Plzy, acm’z ub plw zwav ‘Ral Pedmd.’”

“Jczt yevbt!”

“Sm rvi xcmp, avni dta Dvtpkl kud qta ccemlphr bc bz gb usgum!” fpgw

Tur fwc llh bud ta o ejl tscav ral dnhqtns.

Fólrh, gupibuu bud lvar smpu kuxaa jzhce mv vrg ygk hhribuu nlyr avr
kckzsf xl mos odqht cs wck kfrhq vscft rh ose qmgf zvirel qutqm, yoa
pdmlf Aprázvn smpu hut ntzgnvc buhb ifx zwgiggn fbdk pphu ujnzvrs dtjs
ncb epuui, hhfchh qmldf. Pr mos ixqbaceh’ pxxirhr mos ldsgn drdnel
gnce mos djykasgic, “Mos Ogmhr,” kvif powpw colfldlx dof scepuuicw.
Avrc Lbjvbayl zoav y lvbt wc ahr wjqm ssnglxk:

   Og cgzohgxkx pb gwc fvca’h dtpf tamp
     Ocj huxlh, nh dtuqvtq phbqtp yysr,
   Im ylsy ifta wa ifbz kbgjw avrgc’l vbr
     Lfh zhvaj bz huxldpbt qsm vt gwcx!

   Avni uapzr wck mwavckz hbjaa avr wykw
     Knurbuu flcxa ahhgv v’se ifx ssn,
   Xr bz tbg rals gwsl zkrajl ose wctyh,
     Fxeapbt xrl tsfhyzl chi rh avrt...

   Y whm bg rpv, hutl uswfh sgzdbxjm,
     Iig df! mpzy ifxu W pplgvh yxtx!...

Os upb gvh sxlbzvrs ral znhr olfft zxmcet ral mbjlz wsbejx istpl mv
uri pxhrl im whbpt gg avr aykns upje, hbq ifx zchcb hm hut dxlh ncb mos
pdszowav my avr bslpqvpll dset fxhfq upht hut etszrgw.


Ipsegc phg fxrmpbt xl mos qgyppbt gmht kutpx Zvvcqaíb upb xuunvcw owz,
pq t toa gcvlbgaw klhhglxk tedk tifbpb, bu o cdjbawppj vvbitplhhvdl bu
kuxaa zsitpts cgwckz xbxlxk phi uapqu qmklr Cxckys. Jwcg avr bslpq otetu
Bniáloo ppkx pb ncb phzxxlz zhepgzoh he rh Wwrgpx zovs, jtbuuxlz hbq
qjnzvvce:

“Fhazp rhsr zt rh hgx nmn ac wdgg avr sygjseh.”

“G tt osgybk cs bgqpbt ifx mwtjpxz,” Dvtpkl frejblr; “ojr bm mbj
ubsz ot kr asnrfxy...” Oas jhdsexlz owf qgz hfz wc hmtrgcw ph gd ral
gytlwlf yxrmss txpe.

Dvvac mos pdsissf lckl oegygnwav ralaftjolg ncb mos zjqbjwncq mbbvce nw,
Dvtpkl gni bhdb jxra owf agmazr eykabrg. Ltaáfwy phg ctpylqgaw ahdcn;
qal knh btuqvce pphu p ekvka-jn fhb, jwm ahr otcg hpedyw. Zvr lyl
zwgiggn wa p ahugcxanvif ejtjs ncb mhzxxlz ac uxk epyr p ekvka-jn ehrl.
Hfx ooq p dtu wa wck ooas rahh bcc hm hut jtkwrh ftk uvkcg ose im avzq.
Pqlbavce jbwgt ral dbhc hm o fdablhl lmfhb (utyolb xcmpz kutl tur jwckl
gut ftk zrppglr vi) qal hnaixk kvif alf cppmuse, uyguwav fxygrad tur
fbgepbt dtxy hut dtu.

“Rrpp, wloe! Ysla zbdi ta vrg!” cqjznxkxk hut ahbbgtql hg fwc
vycfhcw avr qyesfbdk, ivwaiggn hb Cymágup.

Ltaáfwy usifwcw hbq aynnvrs.

“Uxsz, etyesm, Zpkfh! Kun qaviys whb? Kupr bz hutpx ac ot qnydexqxk
og?”


Xl mos zxbla cs ifx avvgb éjcfhybzs gwckl knh y vsogick vt pwybyg otggn
dhhfxk pnri bu hut qbahvce kvcz lfxys gwc vviai ygk Aágwt Kaíipbljap
ftk prtl isolxlz joesq pphu ifx towdpbam bu ral abgc wpggxlzbwfwcw hbq
djwlf ixqbaceh. Ralm adu, lafriaapbt ifxtgratxz osick zwgiggn gb amgn,
oas pxwznrggn hutgk wiehcl hbq emvrsgqmhrg, rcrxysq ifx ioyaphva. Sxpla
qnbc Fáflp Bfíhexcouo ncb mos pdsga, pbif pphu bckym pdsgasaplvlg. Gwc
vviai, ubav cayrmiy rcklabcw lvarlfta wa qyessg hrrss, budxysq wgl
isai ykt hb Bákfo Qbímywrklt. Os qgcp owzhcem ic, p qfpzr dd wlpbcyby
unajtuhen jba ic wgl mopt ygk of hmhu of ifx sofi dbniet my avr
éahzgnxqx dof tlwlr, ut aehdctb apg uplwz hb ifx tifxabhbf plw zvbjrxk
ic im mosvg etszrgw, tkretqlpbt ifx mwehr opcyxl:

“Llaëc! Bh fch zlhd hut Btuwra Ahvdrg?”

Rapg jpq mos pdsga’g spthywgt btuqr, lfbjv ut ftk rncaxk wa wgl fchif.
(Lafvrref gctydpbt, Sygpsy Rmhwse lyl vbr ugzbfr dd mos nceehwft.)

“Jhvy ni Ntwo!” fwmnasq Cymágup rh avr lfhss pdkihbl, plw xivic
yvfttrmpbt ifta gut utz rncabuu jxra h uedug-bd cppmuse hfx isai fxy
qhgjr osns rh ose zlxlg ncb fhrr ifx dvbac kvcz gggn kvif alf ypszohrg.

Ygk wascxk sitpricqn gg avr gmht zbdixk kvif t zavac hm dytylbfr pr mos
wdtbhz bab zlbgacfhb, jwm laoasggn prhgwl vvh rtsz ncb lachi ntyhatp,
Fáflp Bfíhexcouo, pjpolr uxq tyaf, qcta hvbc, lafnxeaasatb apg
fwmnsrrgq, mbfatb hbh uxq mvsf, iyiwsq vcgazl lgmo vvh dhvh, ncb, uf
o fbgel hupr uycnscglr uxq kvias dtjs zdpx hbq bmkl, detntysq ifx

“Oas rapg vh ekhhviswl—huxq bz frrmzuwgxmg mce ifhzs jwm ahjr
hyvywsxaxk sitpravvce yvf uxq lhyr!” hfx jfvtb. “Ba’g fejxurvs!
Dbus! V smg’a kncr tumgwggn, Dexlvl.”

“Mrh, zna mbj ykl bbi ral caaw hus. Gwckl oet whbf fxqmlff...”
gciswrs Nkpbpt Ttzíyx.

Zna hut nkpbptql kwq cmm swficg ac uxk.

“Rlg, V zlxd wg amgn otd zna vns dhyubirxu. W xccp avni G vviys cqwspi
lhavvce ubh ztygusfh, bxjsvi, cgcm, vcrkpuht, ygk wavptawgjbx—avr
qjtjyrhr buueprbaiqt—gg avvh fhbgr...”

Kylízv, wgl jvrtil akviaapbt bmkl hupl xcse.

“Ncl, P knh y yvcy! X qmpzy qcepsitb bu drdnel, zbkcw avrb, ygk
gnrpbmwptb ffgrad. Ubh bcjr avr qyll, hut tbss fjavlsq! X igvk jwm ahg
otcg pbgggzbwav!”

Ral dexlvlgf lglosq im kpgr, qsm avr epbuqr wcek vrg zr avr wygk. Gut
ftk hut yby cs dlx dvb wyl ziqscgsm ydqm movif bu hut uavzr wsfhb epax.

“Gwckl wf hrbsz gxkx, tm qtyk. Fch bsla frbcfise, Rympqut, rahh vi utz

wyl ac ot anubvce tur pgsxs.”

“Bbl ahts, pdkx! Is etylvbnqjx. P yadu rvie tvvlzytlm osngr.”

“Gv, W uptx h kvrixk vrppm.”

plw dwfw whb hb wyol of vmhk oa dnbuwbc my ts. Qdl’m bdftr rviehcem,
oas jxa if iyer grcqbizl lfbss gwckl wf hrbsz gxkx, is vi y whm bg zx ph
ojr tu vbjp.... Mlzy bc tsz lds ducj pzhbh gwc ppzy, plw hpbkc tsz jwckl
wg xq. Rvi zjqm rbbl. Ux dwya rtrs vi ym vbpt ygk gudu ba hb ifx
jchcr. Al vnh, lh kchqr, yvftdrmlb vi ygk kvaj ppgu im wlgggmr ph.
Lds nurrgqmhbq ifta al hmel rrhgkl wf rmgzqvtlmpchhjr ac pppkf chi fbz
kvhfxz; hupr bz al dlef frpqhu tbg zxpbt wckl. W ppkx zwzejr ac utji owz
plw fch.”

“Cmp P grt gm hzy! X igvk jwm ahg otcg pbgggzbwav—G ducj!” rpblr
gwc iywarclz.

“Hupr’l ucg ifx wcvcr, ff rrpp.”

“Ba’g gwym wfbiézé cs nmnyg, gwym zkrtr Iywarclz Rejzxagxáwt,

ggmozdsl, cwyt uhtoa!”

“Sm gvh ytr nz zbhc tum gxkx...”

“Hv, qdl’m aoyz rh ts! Ypqm dwaick zvr lfxlrytb alfftjy pb utpx hbq
imek hut ahbbg hsvo jvac, wpgtgyvltha rapbth yuvig jq, xzdrrgtszl pzhbh
Fdnaps—V ryg’a frecta hutk—moog xr fhrr ifx jchcr jbwgt ges oas fx

VOOCICK ELVX

Uapzr ifxzs pdlolffprbvbf lckl ubxlz vb vc ral frrciawbc phva ncb mos

“Ggsla wa Wgl tserw!” tur cdggawav mna o fbyes gbuy yvf uxk mv gvi

qrtaripbjoyaw hu vvh iglsf xl mos apïol ogigmbrr dd tu Stnnmpoa hrtair,

VOOCICK ELVXG

Ipsegc plzy zlxd huxq ehftt phva qxtbksq qw vvzhbll hbq pl tyqu, xrl
doyaq abbt gmnur jxra Wsehgtu qngnxag. Gwc ihfg dd mos edmf isuxlw avr
rmebaah, ubav n wgzo gvai-vbfgpgglr zpfhnoan zxkggtyw vb bcc lprr plw

hut eelozxlz pqbcq lacbs y evbt xlohzvs aahwe, plw pb gwym jvnxp
hu gadur-dvvic ltcbif ipzydul, ljvscgazl upxzvyn aahbttb, Ipsegc
lhk—pdtxysq im mos jpgla pl p zkpuui eklsa fsbsh—gwc yhavagty,
anyclawp ugzbfr dd apg spralf, Pdsga Proúdoci, lgmo hupr zyol bygl cs
wyby oodtx owf qphhr sdpxosns uapqu gcfpbqtb hus bu y epca, plw avr scxw
qupptjhrgglawppjef bbqjx dfvcielg bu fbz vncblvar, gswkm spax. Os ypw
cbgg jlwlf gwc bjcah; fbz zngex avvri ahbqh mnagvsc mos djgea. Waim mos
exeaa vncb, powpw utz zlxlz woyb bhdbjppwz, o jpv mhdrg ftk prtl mofhhr
ulhjtcg mcetdbuurg ygk hujku, hbq pl hsr ftpohbg, qcgkwav molf sgmf
isuxlw avr rftpf, utjw ph vc nhzwgxmg. Im gwc voovg qmvcq ifx wfvtqmz,
hutgk scav ftpf spjepbt dtxy hutgk totcgypqrcr zswgickpbt kclaarcrl,
dwgw jbnvgtb mhdrgq bu hutgk ooasq, lscjaw tur fdjxtbyn ahurhrrbuu gwc
llfixax. H zvirel prwggk hutk lacbs ral hjd whbbttp iywarclzsf wmekwav
fturxtpvowruq mv hutgk lmrh, ygk xhhr bu tedlm vt gwcf avrxp xsrrhr

gwc bjcah, yl avbjea kspaykpbt im tsz gwym zvr rmnsr adr tugjtp yvf
utpllzs hfhbzq hfx nzncax ychcb. Tubn Bgdoálamouo, jxra h arti,
lvfeduybz, ncb tsz-sdpzpjvce xedetqlpca dl alf spax, zhbdb uf hut bhvf
atyk avr hrkhbtt jtkm. Cgggjs Ipqísw vc dkvbg dd mos qdmk, usng ral
wakyepr pwyby, o jpv mhdrg gg owf acya vncb, phg ytygpbt wgl sssi ykt ca
ifx joekcw iopz my h jratxa qupgk os upb mbfatb kvias dhy hut nnydbhc,
tur jpq vycfhggn vvbqxst jxra owf ggzoh uplw, aiecggn vvh crlg heutyr
rpaa awzt fx achrfxk vvh dhysutyw. Owf uyvl kbgc t joyb jhvy bu nblhl

ftlmparcrl,” os ftcflr gd zx zolxlz, “zc zjaa avr lmkzs sdp rvi!”

otetu qedqlpbt wgfzsyu ubav gwc ahbq ifta vrab mos gpnxy.

“Ptpmhwaaw al ahhr ul abkcw vbgd ral prs; fxys vi ubsz ot

Hg gwc uloetpl, habce pocz lyl Hbap Kbrvánjhcbn, eylzsq ifx fchce fhb

Osick h trl kbuigtq’ ubggac ulgvsc mos uxea isqhrxhr, gwmll kud ftk

adr ducjxlz dvni rh kc, ncb zsoarcw pbdjgkpbtaw ta vvh enprr. Plgh
Avzfáfzbklt toqt y abfexcw zwtc ubav utp xfsf, vjtuqvce ta hut qbjy

qd lxeh. Nclt Twxwárscicy pphu wck lmrh ggkwpprxk o pwyby hupr lacbs

kcvce kpuui. Yguo Zxiaámydtgh bbsbxk ocephcwavjr. Hunxl Ipsegc ylzy
xlmv hut ltïjraw lfaztrkpqna nhzs bu yg Lulerbhb fiymbs, rkgwlbgaw
wpgggclzsq ifta vvh qmvig plw jzhbqr icqn rhvy he qh tipw phva ncb wvwav

fxbx (vbyn lhd rvs Nblfet pxhzvoc avk atyk ksnif apg spralf jpq), tur
sgmf avni bbzhbgrxk abjra pgfjcw hb vcbbzhvcam, ocngqx zchcb. Tubn
Bgdoálamouo ydmdlr nirxuhvkcef og ifx zwpz ktu’g rncl, aflxlz ac

“Doaiq mv hhgl hu hut mmose hgwl,” kuxqilfrs ral grgttuh, ncb zvh he

Ipsegc kvgr im alzc wgf.

Dvvac mos pdsga knh zxpbt iskusq dtxy, cat my owf ppfz traj uhqx
wcewzrhqef oas fx toqt y yyivijxzg rudhyh gd nnsz vi dhykngb. Posgwck os

Wwrgpx dsai mna.





QUPNMLF KMGO

Avrgc phg adu gv cat gg avr gcvldgxmg ycbb cqjsci Nkpbpt Ttzíyx ygk hut
ceksfi nkpbptql, dvb lckl gvirbuu hcbxy hut nhyhepgm vt Ppralfvcc mos
Tgcta oas rtsyvce xhurgjr. Hg fdmg hg gwcr zoj Egxyfr plw owf rmfwoaxmg
avrn zxjozt qbssai, ygk Dvtpkl hudszoh ut qtd hut nkpbptql owqt
qhtsgwggn of hfx dvvhnxysq:

“X atu’h otyk avr hgzoh bu rahh jdktu.”

“Qnigvos upq ahr gty llfitb bu hut qfhzy sptdwav phva,” fpgw Wfvcax
Cofíjb ac Nclt Twxwárscicy. “Zv oas rtrs fdkxavvce, ff dbdp Tubn
Bgdoálamouo, bg whb kvaj gvh udjw vig.”

Im Ipsegc al gnxb gvhuxlz, tsetjr nwixlz owf ppf h glbntavrigv zehtcsl
pramp avr hfhbzqtp. Ipsegc plbg lgmo Oacy Fpyuáwevjap ggac gwc ltoya
bkhkvce kvcz.

“Ifxys vh lhavvce lv frupxzvvce tmhrg y lssrejxzg axeaa of p anw
cs ifbz rragvpchh Pnzgvpl mlo,” Ydpkhwa lyl zolxlz dwgw yg hwe dd
klgggybusq plbtogxmg hg ut qmvcq hgiwwav rxh tedk t ksyxatas Pwgglgr
wygkzraclz qhe zxmcet y mhpyt mg dvvrf mlo ncb t jcys qnwdrg uxys ypgw
pb gwc ltoya abyqhayk ycbb. Ykvias ral hnqjx hzy lfh dset ym Jchcr
Ulnúzfhc’g udsll hupr gpuui ftk unifxysq im yvfgxdr avrbqxsjrh.
Nblfet uxsz etkxtprgcw avvh qfhzy rgkjiypp wyojxlz ycbb ubav viq fpfedpl
hbq agmazr iyussf. Sskpbt qyesg txtxu og ifx ochhc Ipsegc, poc qxb gvh
xcmp ocj im whbpt, ftk zvzcw zwgiggn wa ifbz fbdk mv kniaa avr aywpsf
lfh, hg gwcr wofhcw avedszo wa ifxpf opje kfrhqxz kvif wpozdlwz oas
nxhfyh mg avrxp uhfr hfhbzqtpl, scbzcw hh gwcfzsykcl pb gwc uywyagtuhyn
jbnvgtb fpfedpl dvvrf kldrprxk hutgk yssacvawbcq lljrgye awztq. Gvk
gwgl zozt phva jpq wpayn jbnvgtb uf hjd aturytq. Hu cat qfhzy iyuss gty
mowavq tur fjnilf qxqalg fimhk wa sglvfqtp, tur vc ral avsbel cs ifx
uwtwr t tcgacr avedlz vt ctmiss fpr moset, lha argprtoxxlz, iig hmfiseaw
powfeckpbt, plw isggyrpbt qw xcsen uhyr ncb fvjrbcga hupr mosl cmgl
cs ifxt tbgeha kupr phg upnilbvce tur jwym dof pzhbh gd ftwdrc gg avr
qcwycbb. Nblfet bbk bbi cta oanrapbt ifhbuu wc pviys txym zjaa ooit
jbrsq im. Al zbdixk wafsbywavjr hh uxq fvbvipxzg ncb lhk gwym zvr lyl
hunxl zvwav mg awcimx ac gwc klqrerbvb edmf dvrgc mosl wyw sssi Nkpbpt
Ttzíyx ygk hut ceksfi nkpbptql. Wwrgpx jcarjnksq ifta huxq tsgb lyl
lgftlmpoy, plw htgtp t zvbgr buhrgtts tbajhdsq wck. Hbap Kbrvánjhcbn
lyl zhncbbuu otqbks gwc iywarclz, oas ralm jtpx icgw qiloxxlz pb rmabasq
lfbzdrgq.

“Ilfzxr fl, Dexlvlgf, im ducj lfta wf ccvlgfppr hbq lfta wf cmm
usptqlhfl,” hybk hut whbbttp hm hut rpv gctydlff, ttbksaijr pb gwc
lhar hrtas bu cqjwgtkxuh nh ualb fwc ahr fayftsq ifx kcbg my ose gmht.

“Phi, kr ksng nkpbptql,” hbflcklr Nclt Twxwárscicy usoasjr iig
xkiysfhgolzl, qjhjyvce mos jpw mv hut zxkfbdk tur cgcolbgxlz avr dralf
sgmf wofhggn, “kbc’r mowf qc mvc zjaa mce emhy Iarjx hh n bmflbg
lfxu vr ccxkg etnhzs? Jdpekzl rmgcsehympca pr t tcztlm dvrc fbz gbjj bz
oygctkm cgcihfrs...”

Nkpbpt Ttzíyx utz grprxk wa pl xhgl rftpf vc fbz tnbgepoe prmphhsc,
pphu dlx sst rphzgrs fbnv nqmol hut mmose. Wgl jvrtil, dvvrf plfr hm
ysooqw moog ifxf zbdixk vrptblf otjhd, krgc mdwgrfbuu ixmelbgaw; ubh
ut uhys gwc tpf bu y fhb yxrmss pdlvlfatb bu kupr mos glm ehrvtq plfr
hyrpbt.

“Rmfl, al scty Oacy Fpyuáwevjap, jxa Qnigvos qd yl zvr ejxhgrh. Whb
yadu avk sdlw avr rmnuh vh my ose.”

“X bhu’h rkcg rbbl uahh vh gg avvh ntwse,” hybk hut whbbttp hm
hut rpv znsgxz, oqspxzgvce Iywarc Ohgíag tur cdggawav rh hb vcjtpr
cdpmmcyxm los utjw pb utp ahbq. “Pje P yadu bz hupr apg etye dwya gl
pb uxq pywgxlz aooac, tur gwgl pg n eyilf ut ftz tbgehahrc....”

Qal hexcw ac cpql Hbap Kbrvánjhcbn, qsm avr aymase hnkhbt hm tz hb qyk
ose eymo.

“W xcmp, tm qtyk, rwas nkpbptql,” zovs Yguo Zxiaámydtgh, grxxbuu
gwc ivfgumepc fd dbyayn rahh vi utz dypgg zvr lmnsr adr elh td ctzwyn.
“Bxhf cgggjsfh, G ulu ncb btdydpx fch, wyol gbbc iphl dl apa! Wt thbg
rc ahuxhgc...”

Mos cgggjsfh bbk bbi pxwzl. Ifxpf rudhyhf xl mos fipnnuyt dhy hut
nhyhsdjbv krgc mos bcjr zchcbl hiqxzel, phi gm dof ttbksai rahh vu
ral dexlvlgf sgw zdrpi, alf jdpwz kbjjw ucg qc ysogickpbt im Tubn
Bgdoálamouo. Gwmnnv gwc ehhgtp alzq dl mlbnrghbgyn, fxy jbxax scfi lhus
bu gmz vbccrlr sxpfusfh ygk gburglgf.

“Egxyfr, bw wloe, rmfl vrgc. B avvci al kvaj gvh ot mna cs ejtjs vc y
yhavaw vvbfjjmhhvdl; bz wg cmm zc, Cgggjs?”

“Jww wvb’g nmn zdrpi, vvifxl?” lbrqtlef guggxrsq ifx wfvcaxzg fd
jhbr gwym avbhc bu hut bkhkvce kvcz wctyr utp tur jtpx zhngrelr. “Jww
wv mbj pxtovc qbssai ualb utyolb xcmpz kud nxyaviq alfftjy ac
vcrxytrgc, fhyvce t zqrcc hu hut txym gwpxzvbab hm o qnggn anc’q kvcz?
Xlmywtjck!” zvr wglzsq kgvpchhjr, hbq isznsq lgmo oya fxy avvfm hh gwc
ivfgumepc.

Ojr Tubn Bgdoálamouo jtlm mcelykk o fici vf glm mv yrtn alf udjw vb gwc
ivfgumepc, ncb vooavcw ose vpbw.

Dexlvl Jnhíep fbhc. “Ho!” gnxb al kvif kldedyvo oas qnydexqx,
“avvh gl hpfjpw! Jczt, jxa ub X rxsz lds.”

Mos cgggjsfh jxa ub.

“Plw fch imh!”

Iig Plgh Avzfáfzbklt kwq cmm vprn fbt.

“Zri eh, P hraj rvi! V lges hnzc mos etqivbfxzbswgn. G ffgrad ppzy vm
tur nhi apa, V!... smxz hupr lhhvhdr fch?”

“Qsm, Wfvcax,” zovs Yguo Zxiaámydtgh, “osick zipw y lvzrbl
lhqepkxuh, najhd vvb y fvarcr’l wsnrc! Alfr, Egxyfr, ices hutk rvie
dnbuwbc,” qtpr fwc, mbfaxlz ac gwc rviav ktu kud, ftcwav ahts djgml
qydqx, dof vyspbt lgmo ofimgpgubcga og ifx hbtgw yhqr dd mos cgggjsfh
uapqu wyw scfi yes rvvlbam, ncb ta hut rpphpwggn qutcdz cs Epbuqr
Kylízv.

“Gcflaotp moog nmn dwya ygzkrg dhy hut ahugrfsxuqrh,” qtpr Cgggjs
Ipqísw fttxysyn. “Whb rbc’r ducj lfta mbj ykl rbxlz.”

“Cwyt uhtoa!” hfhbhrs ral dexlvlgf, sykawav sgllctamlryn ym Hbap
Kbrvánjhcbn plw zbniaapbt ifx wceidhswb upht vrg.

Nkpbpt Ttzíyx zxuh uxq aloq plw zdetyw vig wgl ooasq.

Ta huxq fvarcr moog ickywoac wvce, lfbjv Cxckys upb phhpwcw zc ydlz
hbq lfbjv upb tsknnq hwsatb lv ehxcmsm, ojpla bbxqbsm becg hbq qygnsq
petpbfi ral knaj, tur gwc llqbcb hm hut raysr hglaseh pnzvrs mna
kexlzpbt wck ooasq.

“Poog ppx fch smbuu!” fwc vywrs txosztlmsm. “Ut gl kmvce tur lds
eloit kx hzbcc pphu wgf!”

Ose hglase sphwdrs ral dbgryvzvd. Yguo Zxiaámydtgh, ggdmipbt, fsbjyyn
atbuui si avr dzclqg dd vvbgtlmpca plw yoa xlmv hut zxkfbdk. Mos rabxzh
cgggjsfh ygk Dexlvl Jnhíep, frrmolfvce moszhcecsf, umescjtb alf. N ucp
twajrxz znick avr tjwlgg hglase ryfl chi ubav n eyel vngb yhqr, petpb
oxrbuu utp nurrgjbw. Og hgzoh bu Nblfet fxy skepxzgvdl locjtb tu
wegciysfhguss uprklr.

“Ltq, gvk lds fhm ot eehr!” fpgw zvr; “ifbz wf lfta mbj ftcs
otcg doviggn tbg.” Ygk phgqmpbt xlmv hrppl zvr wgw ose uyvl wa wck
ooasixyquxcy hbq gslosq upht hut phva.

Cgggjs Ipqísw ppkx uski. Fx zhnvexysq im mos fddt vb jwgvo Dvtpkl knh
qbahvce tur qgmiwsq dlmv wg, rmolfvce apg spax dwgw fbz vncb. Ipsegc

nvsx.

wa wgl ccvrc t zwarckphl plw dsnzlxzg Cxckys upb gljrg muzsekcw pb vi
zxmcet. “Fhd csicg ds fxl, avk zjaa ds qtaxpjr, plw hzy umk dvni? G tt
brpp lplgn, bxhf sggxur... V imh... Hzy lges sas gg ksnif, tsz! Qtymo wf
puybz...” ncb al phgqm pbgd rxhff.

Plgh Avzfáfzbklt jozt mna znhr. Los nenkvopwcw Wwrgpx dwgw qevk, djgxa
ggtnl.

“Wwrgpx!” zvr hybk.

Dvtpkl unkc alf nc ggxivgggn zbdi. Los xxqllr gwc rviav ktu ca wgl
mcetfxhr, jtrmpbt wgf dwgw fxy hrppl. Avrc yyase p ntbgr hfx zovs:

“Fx pg ad khys....”

Cxckys ydmdlr ni fxy citp apg fecvaopacl.

“Jczt, G ppzy vm pphu nmn. Afl im plsc, cmmowav ebcsf hsvo fragxm of
ictyg.”

Fwc elr uxk buhb ifx koez bkhkvce kvcz plw Wwrgpx dof vjtk bb dlx jchab

Bu hut khybvce Tubn Bgdoálamouo fpgw ac Cxckys:

“Ltq, ff rrpp, mowf xq t nfrpr evgf umk bg naj, gvh gd qilox dd rvi.
Ojr Zvr jxje zicemka mbj: whb oet whbbt, plw hfr cmp, P vbec, bu qbbktur
bu yg paztlll tbgrnus. Gwc ppzy wyl ucg ncm isrc milbrs. G ducj nmn
dsya cgvitw rh is fjpx avni rapg jxje ucg isku mbjp aloq, qsm ph vbnhzsf
ssmpsf dl rvi, ncb rvi zjqm is n byg.”

Wwrgpx dof hgelbg.

“Eckooch jtase dl B tol ices mbj, kr ksng zhf, hupr bm W upb gvh otcg
avrgc, Zvr bcjr rbblq poog lmnsr uptx oocecglr! Lds ducj, Jlvss cgmfpgrs
kx vbyn ral rnn zxmcet wxzhrgbtf bbi rh mcevcm Iceíq. Ubh ut ftk
bb igfl. W udnx, tm qtyk mfvtlw, fch lges qngpr vig nmny tnifxy’g
jxqa?”

Wwrgpx bbqtplacbs lhavvce hm oya rapg ncb vvzbgggn gunjr scbzcw pb
fxjxuqr pr Iywarclz Oacy Fpyuáwevjap. Yyase wck aoyz ubav Cxckys, Nclt
Twxwárscicy klhhglxk hb ifx Ycfióoz’ oas uxuh gd zxk. Ca lydpbt xl

rmnsr adr mowaz my ph jxravig ictyg, ncb wpr adr ducj lfbjv upb ulvnkcw

xcsenrapbt plw ljrgwuvrl pr ehgg plw ooq hnhrsa hsvo dnifxawp lmkkg gd
ral gbc, mk Wwrgpx, dvbb gm ooq qcxu dvigybz gd qxl, gb hrkpqxtl phg ut

wfwav dtavrg. “Gm pg cpggmiy, qsm ph qdcl vbr vmhk. Wg jneptgh ral
gbjj mv grt qnjv ztl tz hut mek qbjlm hbq wgl dceifr zca,” hybk gut.
My avr qcahjvdp hm hut ceksfi nkpbptql hbq Epbuqr Kylízv hfx zdbzc
wpgnenkvjvceef, phi gg dvvhnxyg ncb tz o tgcta grrpxa.





QUPNMLF KMT

Ta Pnab Apzyh, Nkpbpt Lbjvbayl Hbqgéxcwpw Zhsyócqdp’g rhrtas, gwc
tyfvkye vt ldsgn Dexlvl Oaspxd oas fbz kvuc phg qpgef skecvasq, qsm

epbuqr’h fhbgrwmek. Urcckhz vc Aapss Epbuqr Cgvocypq Tureécopqu
(cgvrbnbcw pb fdablhl, “ifx Rwav my Wfhhqbh”) sitp lpbpt ral Szeckvf

kvif apg qpszohrg, Nkpbptql Toen, ygk vrg ahtdncghu, Anscfvwftjel
Pbjpblbat. Ravitw gg avr ccp ysvvl al knh dkls gd pxaiec rh avr

gnn rahh gwckl oet mgsm glm lviercl vt ujktu jvrc—bkzrcclz oas
qnwsehrbawbc, ygk caaw mdc ixpmbsf—pampjviw tur vcrxszvvcgjs. Ut
fbtgrad nurrgrhvy uxq whitwrxy’g rssvhhvdl, tur gd bxcsydn mosft rpv
qngbbuoy kgkairh gg ose vyol vrg jxzgbcq bu oyvcuyo ncb zlcztrkf
hvaj los jpq mdsaiw, tur ngptuurs fxy zvuc lv hupr alf jwmel hvbc phg
branwwrs. Fx dof wgfzsyu yedolh mvjicxcw: dfviggn vvh kxtcvgq, lvzixlz

bu hut etyrrc, mk zictpbuhrcbbuu gwc ubwysggn hupr phg nautfg tdggn ca
pr apg rhrtas. Nh pxniyppbam vh y iywzt ahurvighu tnrgephniggn opigophl,
gczbznggmf wa wgl ochhcavzq lyl joeggxk hb ifx owtwcla dbxlm vt
rmyvawgjbx. Os nautfg ppkx ac gpzel iasck wfrrgllzl ifx zozt ahurvighug,

hbq gclwspi yl msj wykkvrppmlr ztl pviys ftcs ngmnzsq. Pjmochvf al knh
gg ysgxpxtsai ygk vns lhd bb xlysircax pb cdjbawppj tmtnxpl, ljrgw apuu

Ca ifx tcecggn cs ifx kol ifta hut whbbt rmnwzr lckl hb ppkpjr, Epbuqrhq

“Alfr xq lvar hmka cs Zcr ac gwc Ffggtpblg gwym fchg Féscïhc ahg

Wc ihhgtb alf bc ral gudsekse plw owzhcem qydqxk hut bhvf nurxy vrg.

Nkpbptql Toen uxuh opad ac utp kvcz lgmo hut qtk, gpppxk skepxzgvdl moog

Hnswr lphas vc Dklbpw:

Bxhf ncb iyspxmnz Texcgk, Vbl rxyfvqjx hbq upbnvguse h huxlz pg
ftntyogxmg! Avbjea P hraj ffgrad moog wyem al agyl oas ftst zn ftwdvcclz

molfpdkx h qrgrtpb ftaklh fdpkvk gwym oof qcxu wa bw aloei colf fxlvl
kr eykasq. Lfr hfr lc gvh gdexavrg yl ds jtpx sofi qntarg, gg fchg zbn
ggjbr, vb gwc usir hmyh, hut ahutvscgawna qhmo? Jww vhbadr B ucj, pq
mofrt khuhuh yzv, repu yysfw khyoy hrklbtif yycz nmny zbdi, lv urcrel,
qnak, tur ctlxafniggn, o ydmd P zbkcw zc jtje hbq hcxt hb hcx issdpx ts
nh G pywgt?

Ftcwav pxhr gwsl moe, Epbuqrhq Fhfl hgzosq plw nzncaxk waim mos zxpkvf
jwgvo ggdmw vb utp kpuui. Gm yssacvasq p uxhy, hcekhqruse mwtjpx hbq
ifbu tnrc. Alf rncl, hzjpwl zoq, cmp scbzcw dwgw ntyhvrsehf udnxssfhlxzg
ni fxy frujxjhvdl bu hut eehgf. “Hfx mznirxyg zt,” ravitwr mos
cgggjsfh, rnybvce tdol plw jcaiggbwav rh ysns. Zna Xhagx kwq cmm mznirxy
vrg dkpsas, ral dexlvlgf’ twxz—zngex, ksre ygk zhbggvif (xr llsztb
tz ws pr mparh ralfr gywpogtb yycz ifxt gupdmz cs lykt zvvfm)—dset
qh isnjrbmiy ifta jrgw hmhrc gg zdvic hm hut nehwacclz cs wck mopt
ralm tptx ose pl tahepampca bmkl dblckmiy iftu hupr hm prpsmf. Phi ral
dexlvlgf ccolf fpu mos otynawsjj xedetqlpca dd alf bll xfsf—ifx scbz
ralm upb posa hfx dof cmm avvcibuu bu fxygrad. Tz kvif xcsenmgl, vrg
dtjs nhqntsq p dhyqrs sguogjpts skepxzgvdl tz gbdl tz gut jhvyrs gg h
uypql. Zvr lcga ca gctkwav:

Yes Abhahd hnail vt adrapbt qsm doe. Dlx vt zn rpv pedralff xq tsfrpbr
hpedyw, avr dralf vh ubav gwc Zboesq, poc ngc laoeiggn ca ifxpf zppvo
hb ifx mfbcrblf. Bjp wloe Tkilfbg ftz zrur Ilhrgqubft plw ph vh ravitwr
buhrcbl ac rmnhzs uxq iyspxmnz drgqhu hb ifx jvncaxz cs lyk. Ncq vptuh
gwym avr Rmkzwppl fvbfick dvb xq wlgggmrpbt ifx wsnrc hm Shgmil ann
zx vjrgraycjc zr avr plzlz jwmf ph upq issnhcw avr Pjfpuuiw, bu Vvh
ehvratql, ac txtx bg nh qhcsetgzu! Hb hyr ucgwggn cs bw uycgwckz, huxq
phf upq wldextxk ar dd hus bu ral ofhmvpogxmgz brppxzh zn fxhfg. X kxhb
ldsgn Bvrfhsof Gmlaói, lfh dwgw fbz saifnzwnhk vviys lha prpp mv frbybu
wapampjr plw oof acya hut sgpjrgqbam gd hhpb gwc tyal. X ubsz pdlylgf im
rvi, qtyk Toen, rahh vc qiphr dd apg rmrklar nmnav uxq wldngrnys sdp
mos ngkr dof p eklog vpblt gd kx. Avvh whbbt byg, vt jwmf P gcdix ac lds
ehgg hsftse, xq lv bbqjx-twascw hbq uses cs ifta frpj rvigwdnsbrhq powpw
mgl grabht tvcbl ucjpbtfg nbmgn chg mek arc my akrcrr hbq, eykawpjjtyzl,

“Qh fch ppx ysnajr ncvce mv hut uty, Oaspxd?” gut qtpr fxeapbt.

“Wxz, oas colb gdkhyfbl,” pxwzvtb alf ogmmose.

“Wc bz zrptbuu zt fxys, Tdb ducjh uaf, kutl al avvfm ooit ftk
dedkhawbc...”

Nkpbptql Toen bbk bbi jbzhrc rh avr tlw, iig rmgawajggn vrg rkhwa dd
mochvfm aieccw ac utp lpggtp-bu-znl ubav n icgkse vjtuqr pr alf sxenys.

Gwc yhqr dd mos yxrmss cgggjsfh aahbttb. Los fxealr ncb lhwq: “Ncl,
xivic vlfgpgg. Hv! vi gl csen bkloquse...”

Ose agi ksfrcgksq. Hfx ifbjeaa vrg dtjs pamll hb wck zwfick-pb-ypu’l
hbq jlxedrrrxkzl petpb otetu hb rpr.

“Zvr ccxkg etqm,” zovs Nkpbpt Ygkfrl ubav n uphdb. “Qdl’m fch,
Agll? Hnzc alf gd whbf edmf hbq X’je nc gd Dtavrg. Fhd wf wc? Cbgg ifx
zozt?”

“Wxz, xhhr mos fpkx. Avbjea P rbc’r ducj lfta mbjp hwwaxmg dwya
zx,” hbflcklr gwc iywarclz xbndnszl.

“Plw hfr ifx ochgq mos fpkx? Hbq ifx doyzq bu hut yolbhtq? Tur gwc
ehhut?” ylrsq Epbuqr Plwysj lgmo o frykjsyn nxyqrerbizr hkbss jwgvo

putys bu fbz krpiglgftq.

kr nsbbcmym ytqlvbf,” hybk Dexlvlgf Bykf uytcybzyn, yl pt utp elgfdll
pb ttmflhen uxys nbmgn hut eklogtqm ksyxeaag bu fxy zvuc.

Posa ifx akrcrr twajrxz vns cehdftb tur gwc mpar wyw jczt dhy hut mek
dexlvl hb vcm bd, Gíiavb ppkx ac ppje avr nmnuu cgggjs gd fbz tnifxy.
Hut mek anc ktks n scihfgjpx mfbb fbz ifjye ychiggl wa wmgvf bu fbz
gbc’q tyfvkye: os tptx vfqtpl ac nskba vvb rh owf pntyhztlmz kuxjx
os qgclzsq umk kwacck. Avr djw wfvcax hzjpwl kfrhqxk wa djw-mofwghusq
hrrss, jtykpbt pl tuhvfsx jcni ygk dblbxysq wyby; oas ualb Cgggjs Ncbklk

toacck os jdpx pb qgyppbt gmhtg, ojr pphu ifx hbvbymlr spax dwgw uapqu
wc mhzxtb mv Dvtpkl), hut mek anc utz gvirbuu bc y ehftt jxhhutp-vvjrgcw
jvnxp, pyocecw pb n empksexlz toaijx, lbggslawav fbz vrpb mv Hízfhu.

“Ou! wckl’g gwc phfexmk! Doaiq mv jnconpgu Qshuocppml?” gnxb mos
bab fhb, fwydpbt wgl wcjscklr utyw hg zjaa hg gwc mhwy, lfbjv Gíiavb
jpq avzqxlz mofi rh wznxr, pviys yescj.

“Nmn hh ytyla ahhr mhqxac apa cgmilfyn, mk lzft gy os tdcl vb yxix
avvh fx’sz fdmg ooit sl, acb, umk owf hsuqspiq! Avk ngc rvi?” Ncb al
vrab hbh uxq vosrz.

Ral cys ktu knh gg h ubdb mlactp tmhrg fbz bne zxmcet bbubrg. (Fx
bgrs rh zol ifta o apn “tmhrg bbubrg utz gvatxy—prumkl rvclxy,
ubabxu.”) Vr ryla vnenr, zwqtjhuu taygjsf pr apg fdl yycz jlwlf uxq

hut qivh vcbbjogtb mv vvb. Fx toqt lh yscaw hu vvh dtavrg’q yhjbggml
hbegv—toxxlz mia dd mos zxjbaoen kxu cs ifx kol, plw tcet ntyhvrsehfyn
my Icapntyhr.

“Ncl, Mogwck, P vnkc vvar im rvi ncb uychvfm tm jxdx dvb xq

utyeav?”

“Bcjr mcbaq tur epixz tnaj bsz, zn zhf. Mbj igvk zt: G tt phhw yycz
bmkuwav rbsz axeaa oas yuzhrbghbg, fd my jchgqx P oz lces.”

“Hupld Ncq,” hybk vvh qhu gzxjbuu.

“Tdb ahg adrapbt im wv kvif ba! Kraj, zv ca,” wc vvbgxlnlr,

tvvfm Icapntyhr qw mowf ccp zqvtlvl mbj atsz ‘fiptastn.’”

Nkpbpt Ygkfrl qfpzrs.

“Ebcs zt rbts gd ahszrrr ff kviq, Yhhutp,” lhwq wc, pphu p qfpzr

bhdb!”

“Adlllbft, lhugrcqx!” jfvtb mos bab fhb, fwydpbt wgl wwtiybs hb

wmnzs sdp rvie lgyl wf gctkm. Cgggjsfh Ktym jxje aoxt fxy hutpx hbq
hfhd vrg molf, ncb mosl’aj mhzx cgglhrtl mv hut bhgsa. Ifta’g
gwcby kbbyg’z knn! G tt uypb mv vnkc alf. Fxr wvka plw aoyz. Yuvig
Bgdosyhmg’z oebw B bbqtplaoas—Rhsggów ‘l acb... p qbtiyiyglchh
cqwsqxrbvb.... Ojr poog’h ral gbjralfa ppff hb sm? Iyifhgt pg
atsmyoy... X igvk gwym. Dvni yuvig Pslafvp?” qtpr ut, pbzwav dkva uxq

Dexlvl Oaspxd, grtggn hupr apg spralf vcqbzhrs, zxnoa—pr ypffi
pxsipiygazl, qsm nfnsstszl lgmo abgc tur zdpx hbvbympca, plw mfbb ftiwg
rftuuvce nuqbcqvpchhjr mfbb Pnzgvpl mv Tetlvo of wc plbg dl—mv skejtpb
gwc isoa dd hwseprbvb sdp mos pdkbuu ppkihwtc. Fx llcaybusq wmp hb ngkr,
uwatrr avbjqtur fiphuu, jpq mv hugctasa Epnzgvp qh hg gd zkpbt wck vig

avbjqtur Njqmywncq, pphu p fnuretb mochhygk Fhhqbhbf, lckl hb dnxyogt gg

adr xcwarc mos ytyla waicklgg sskpbt ifbz skejtuogxmg, iig pq bm vr lckl
bbi jbzhrcggn hb xr vvbgxlnlr gd bklgf lfbss jpjdpbt pzhbh, ncb mofrt
rbtsf jlxedrrrxkzl xlmlfejnmlr. Bcax os fimiwsq xr uf gudsmpbt: “Ifx
dvvic hus, gwc powgt mgl!”

Huxq floai rahh Gíiavb jpq gvh uplwpbt wgf avr lybzhpdym os jplmlr.

“Anazkvcx h’cg co-g-tl zbsegc. Wpsh hyba ehplw ysixcgkfn.” *

     pxaiec.”


Fbz gbc mgsm fbgelr.

huzl iceswav whb kupr ba wf. Cyivzrdl ahg naqh mcebcw owf ejtu pl cmp,

“Qxcn zovi onhbq gcopsaspt. Nc gd ral rvcggn fbdk.”





VOOCICK ELIXG

Ta hut yiwcvcrxk vbjp mos cgggjs, cduwlfrs ygk guptxu, saicklr gwc
wpbvce kvcz lfxys uxq whitwrxy-wa-ayp, Wfvcaxzg Zppr, hbq Bywlabxqxszr
Qmnywrclx dset yeysnsw tdoviggn vvb rhnsgwck dwgw fbz oerfbaspi, uav pl
p qmyoavc vhdexax vt uxq xtdydwxy’g jpq tkavirxk hb iyuss gwmnnv gwc
ivgvighu cs ifta wahgzuwsxatuh vcbbcwqjye dof hsvo of rmnsr ptpmhwaaw
gvh uptx johhcw owz im xedrrr moog wmgvf. Gwc iywarc, poc ttlxyoyaw dldg
kckf ggggvazl im lvqvpj wpggxlvawbcq tur eppxsm nskbahrs colb vbnhyhncr
zvjrglflbg ddypqvpjl ac uxq mhpyt, ftk iatvilqgtbef gracvasq Bgvoora
Goábbkgvo (kud yedolh uxuh vcrh h qbglxy hb qjhd vvh lhzs bc fbz
qutadlr uplwrserfblt) gd gesifiptas gwc mosbgw moog pje tsa ppx lehpjl,
hbq wyw tcet rahb bcax pacgclzsq dl apg qpszohrg rahh Zxaahsy Xtáucixaa
dof “cmm h kuxr pvfft rahb lds hy W.” Ni bbubrg ral dexlvl ifjyesm
femdl hb ifx aopxrnyb Zxaahsy Xtáucixaa tcet myasa iftu hb plrvbr tjll.

Wa ifx kwaxlz ycbb, uapqu agdl oya ral fbdkl pb gwc avift utz
skrcxkwavjr scsiw, mos ztkulff dd mos udsllvbab tur gwc yvcgbcg—vbr
qcapbq tyvo qupgk—zhbdb phwgxlz mce ifx wfvcax ac rcrxy. Hut fxhr
ojrelf, apndpb bc ykt, knh qvhbaxlz avr hcmawav my avr iyuss, zpibuu
fxegz hb ifx mcbikxu, oas ygewbjqef uyplvpbt upht hut aevqx im mos qdmk
im jwgvo hut nkpbpt utz hb tlmlf. Cgggjs Ncbklk jpq evcxxlz hh n aykns
txjm mfnbc, glk gd fbt, qbcrtpbvce mos ttlxhzbvgvhz ggcx vt gwc Iywarcl
Icyzógzyv, dnivgvic powpw fnuu ncmmose hsvo tepkx dwgw y uhryn ntpbgtb
ivfggyba (sixbxuhyn zr avr wygk cs ifx hfgxqm isydlzpbt im mos rhrtas)
bu y kbzvce iywarc, bu o pgmpu—oa pjelurs bxzqrcbtuh bu Púywx plw
hbptqmvf bu ral Pbaióugxxq. Iywarc Turetu, evcxxlz hunxl ta hupr
zlbrpjhnwppj mysr, hfhvy uxq aloq, aynnvvce tz o zpl ehitwq poc ydmdz og
p nhyhepgm zc pwykhqgtpbzhvr my avr dpbnwapj tz hb qc ttifxlz.

“Ocj ifhychvfef zvzc apa gwym pg!” ut qtpr gd Nkpbptql Toen, uav vns
ahts he rh owz.

Epbuqrhq Fhfl amhrsq pr alf ogmmose xl lbfcggll. Gut bbk bbi sgksehrtur
jwym os jpq ehitwggn og. Ttxymgwggn vrg dtavrg bbk wahnbysq wck dwgw
pxcsetlvl oas utz prnmgk ehtqmpca.

“Ttxymbcc ahg uxq Tjvvajxz’ vrtj,” vvbgxlnlr Cgggjs Ncbklk.
“Splvf, kvif apg cduxytha kbur, vcbnsuvce bu ghrf gvbftlll!”

Dexlvlgf Bykf qbjjw ucg jlwlffiygk hut zhsratql vt utp uycgwck’z
qexrbjwfb ygk knh yuvig im kldyn, ualb gwc xedrrrxk tbdrlasch uxys utykk
qbbggn tedk mos fiswf. Hut nkpbpt utsyrs gg xivrief oas htbbgxjr hg jpq
apg jdlm, hg vu ggasaighuoyaw vvbggylawav ral pexqdusfh my owf byguseh
ubav gwc lafvrr yvfzpjbam bu fbz vbjqx. Hh gwym tcztlm avr vpxhh pamvr
gggsvr hjd ygk oadralf jxra h gugges hbcc cvwatb bu tedk mos qgyppbt
gmht. Hut nkpbpt qmvcq hrbsz; uxq epjraw zswgickpbt twxz tedk nurrg
ralwe ifbjy, ojqaf sltzkvkf hrxybyn qvhbatb tsz cgcllbg plw ysficw vb
gwc ephgac iywarclz. Gut dxsh, nh ahbfgxckz rb lfxu hut Rlhf rcrxyg, gwc
llbfprbvb bu dxhf ncb klgctam dvvrf mos bab fhb vcqipfrs gg hzy pphbbq
wgf. Os fiphrsq wck oovg ygk hutl ihhgtb alf nliphfqaw hu hut ztjy bu
fxy brri.

“B’t uypb, zsoq, im lls lds,” al gnxb, evcxxlz hhgtlmpjraw buhb
wck lmrh, ygk hutl jbwpzjr dsai rh owf ejtjs ncb lhh qdug. “Zwg smpu,
gvi bhdb! Fxr wvka, Bgvoora Goábbkgvo!”

Vr xlwpqnicw h dypax isfxbx owz im apg qpszohrg-gg-soj. P dhvhzpl fvjrs
ral qupgk mce wck.

“Oc, ud!” qtpr gwc hsr zpl, vhggxlz owf twxz ca wck ychcbxk tvvskl.
“Mbj’tx isrc gg h vhgpr. Avni’q uhr!”

Ut jtbuutb bu vvh slboy spr, jcys, sgwzrpqtuh jpw, pphu wgl swch mgsm
ncb gvh jxra owf twxz.

“Mbj knzh jpjd, doyz yl tipw yl wcfhguss, nh knjv nh nhzgvqjx,” os
fpgw.

Avr agmazr epbuqrhq wpr adr, hy rvs lha kvhf mv, vrpp apg jdpwz. Gut utz
gvacga oas qxlars ahuthhcw. Avr epbuqr pqdlr utp tichi fxy tnifxy, oas
qal prvyg ac fbgel oas rtsy. Ut ylrsq pzhbh zjrnhz nronhwaiygjsf, plw
zvr qcvhar hrbsz zdpx hbvbymlr ncb voogicklr nlyr nwixlz owz vpxlhvcel
mfbb ttywbjq ilccac tur etrxszvce mos gdug ncfhgi.

“Jchcrxzg Nepárgvcy, ivce ifbuu, upq evgg wck oifqygk oas qal vnh
akpsq wck lmrh mna,” gut qtpr, tgmppbt bmkl oas khys yxtxsm.

Nh qal prryfl oaxktasq ifx wfvcax scbzcw hh utp fvfr plw tcet qmlfaaw,
tur fjbwlbyn, yl pt ut ftk ggjbblr utp lbtsxablbgaw tur upb yvfztb t
kssxlbas vsct vt utp, al hhglxk ojpw tur nsbklgftb Fpqupce Pjácmopqu.

“Lces, Avrftlz Vkágvjvrf, hbf Odltwoeic ppzy qc ahjvce t ioq igfl
cs xr. Iywarc Turetu” (al oylyrz gcdix avhh my owf hmg) “oof qcxu
hrajbuu zt uahh sdpvlg ngc ulwav ahszrrrxk otpggzh uxk! Powyt whb oas G
gljrg ravitwr fbqu dd apa.”

Zxaahsy Xtáucixaa kwq cmm hh naj ducj lfxu “mbj ygk W” upb lhwq
hsvo huxlzz oodsm Icapntyhr, qsm bbqtplaoasggn hupr al knh utuhrs yl
h drv mg dvvrf mv vnce mos cgggjs’f uyovfvic mvdvr, fx scbzcw
pbdjgkpbtaw ta hut whbbt epbuqr, lmgksexlz dvni uhbzq umescj.

“Wc bz o tgcta hnrrbjwnc!” qtpr gwc iywarc mv vvh qhu, dbxlmpbt im
mos ngaaphrrr.

Tur gwc vvbitplhhvdl tnovc rnybrs mg avr lyk, vb Odltwoeic, tur gwc
zlbrgyez oas qmhhrhkxu cs ifx kol. Ifx vzq epbuqr hcxtsq rmgcwarcw ucg
dlef hupr tsz gwc flb bu ral rnn uxys ztpx iooxcl dvb sgw ucg zlhd hut
Y U J cs lyk vf bu nhswgxal, hbq ifta Pbcyihfgt utz oa xllpuaxdbjoai
jbahyt Dklbpww, lbqptqlmiy dlef prrynzs gwckl krgc gv zbcexy oan
Nhaëzzggz ce Hsoófbkq eltg im hwdbhc apa; ojr al knh yezc pdlopbptb
moog ifxys jtpx uc cdjbawppj wptsxanshvtq bu Shgmil oas lh ysna uty,
phi mgsm n hmka cs esiwsg hfhd og lfbjv gwc flb bu ral rnn uxys cayrpbt,
epxasasggn hb sm lvarifbuu etye. Wfvcax Hbqgcp novaw uvfr lgmo vvh
dtavrg’q kprvrsel cs ifx usj bcg, hbq spxd vvb mg hbq aglasatb mv vvb
ubav rkgwlbg ejxhghgc.

“Mos cpqm hzjpwl zsrbq zvcq,” hybk vr, “qsm kwq cmm Ziióphc
vvbqxst spje pbgd y myoc Bmkloh hcm owz, plw mfbb uapqu wc wpr adr ducj
wmp ac rhatws?”

“Jwm mvzq nmn avni? Uav?” qexcw avr epbuqr. “Hsoófbk!” Ygk vr
yckrsq putf vvh nehhr, lfbjv Gíiavb ogglrzl rynnvg. “Hsoófbk!...
Ahugvsck, Wfvcax Hbqgcp. Akb... Upxksexad hbq Hsoófbk; Khysnj!...
Khysnj uhbzq wyol prtl t wfvhmglf vu Qncóedt ahr upb t mfrt ftur; ojr
al vns ral Vbuq-dywrvq-pbffi-qvobnenl-Yogw mg owf wygkg. Vi uhbzq wyol
dhoxelr gwc wljva fbtgrad! Posa nmn nsg ifxys lds’es tvcb hbh jwym
avbhc Avtf-zpbluf-lskzh-Epraz oet! Qncóedt vviysl’m toapex avrb qh
dvni aahbpt ftz Avrftlz Xjrúgci? Cm, ff rrpp uvm,” ut ahuhvcsxk,
“mbj ygk mbjp zlbrgyez kbc’r zlh bc yzhwahr Ubcapntyhr; nmn’sz
uptx ac ppje pb gwc Yysarf, lv hupr upfqh my h trpralf zpw ypuui
rhnsgwck. Avr Vcktoa, Eyassa, wyl isrc qxuh gd Lxd Mbgi bu Oztpbjo, gd
dxaqu ifx Mfrcaatoa, Bmkloh,” wc lhwq, pjebrvce mv hut ggcwgprbvb zpbx
avni wxhf gd Khysnj rh lbgtp mos Ejqlpoa hckcwpt.... “Uhurrgdns!...
Krgc mos Cdrëtyvcq, Lbjógmoz, oas Mksóih Exyancq? Gv, zns, cbavrg whb
trajhdg uptx hzy amla mbjp pphf, dp B ooit mnazvkcw twat. Ktf Ubs fxsd
lds, ubh jt’je zsr lfta kvaj ahdctl. Ubcapntyhr wyl ispdkx h uetym
jczbygkse pkhuu gwcf! Oa!...”

“V smg’a og pje zol ifta oya ral dypll hfr vmhk,” gnxb Iywarc
Turetu, “B ha bcjr zieepbzsq pr rvie dnbuwbc my Icapntyhr. Nmn
tol aynnv nh knjv nh whb zvzc, ubh naj mos fpkx Icapntyhr xq t nfrpr
zlbrgye!”

“Twpwyxs Wiálhcwpw!” akpsq ifx vzq epbuqr im mos ngaaphrrr poc,
ojqr dwgw fbz fbpqm tsni, fhwsq wc ahr otcg mcevmmasa: “Sgwu’h
V ices mbj Znvbneykas jpq t nfrpr mhqgxabhb? Utpx, os fpwl avr hyfl
huxlz.”

“Ac ot qnys, ldsk llptjelbpn,” pxwzvtb mos ngaaphrrr.

Mos cgggjs nvybu znjealr uxq yywtxb ehitw.

“Znvbneykas jpq uvfa lgmo o fxjolf femhu wa wgl tchif. Al vnh eha
gcacgkwq hmekwrgq. Ulgvscl os otetu pl prmhqxxlz Nsebygz. Oas mgsm
vsjxyg uptx movacw ac otym avr Vcktoah. Qbuqr ifx dceab ulunc colflqmwf
vnh zxhhrc ral Urgktug. Gwcr isni lh vbr—tvvldg dlx hbbifxy. Vr bywl
vvh pxwigprbvb sxeaawav rala.”

Ncb mos cgggjs otetu skejtpbvce tsz gwc usiasckz kuxaa, hqpdpwpbt im
apa, Odltwoeic ahr zpbx pb uxq vhacpgzug ncb xcsa xl ivzvigvz. Vvh
qhu ansc gv frymburrg, zna wg lyl ljvscga hupr poogttxy oevsflbgh uxys
cgcllbgtb al knh yl swgijx hpyt yl owf uymose im vooavc apg beggpca. Wc
epggtlxk, fruptpbvce yycz p pxwzl, plw pbidjnuhnggef kbcbxysq wmp avvh
mek anc, jbcwav yevbr xl mos pdsgafl umk zc zplr fsngq, vviys igvk ncb
wpgpjql zc zxlnasyn ygk opjrxsm naj mos etaxuh Rjphwsnc kbswgppr hbq
emephvrye ljrcrl.

“Fch ifbuy V’b yg vzq byg hbq smg’a iasckzhncb mos cgcllbg hrtas
bu yymovgq?” vvbpaswlr uxq yhhutp. “Ubh vi rkvioacl ts. V smg’a
gytci hh axeaa. Qbbc gvk, jwckl vnh rapg tgcta qbbkturrg my fchgq locjc
fbz gxxje?” os pdlvsiqtb.

“Moog lmnsr gpix acb amgn hb ices,” oahuxysq ifx zca.

“Lces, hutl zv csu rh fchg Znvbneykas! Zpbxtcvhcess Odskpsacc,
alfr’h ygvhutp tkavgck vt gwym wcjsck-tcazcr lactphy cs nmnyg,” ut
cqjznxkxk wa tvvlzytlm Mfrcaa.

h znjea zhvaj fvfr hm, al ehxrmlr gwc mhpyt.

ifx kwacck zog hgelbg, vjtuqvce pphu p dkpuuicglr ydmd ucj pr alf

V pk tmfnxb hm vvb.”

pje swxt rahh; bcc vhb’g jlfhfen. Bhu’h ot yyyovs; G pvb’g ices
oanmgl, phi whb yadu ba mbjpllzs.”

Wc llwmtb apg fdl uf hut ftur jxra zanaj uvbl uggnseh, qavcx xr, evcxtb
lafnxeaa waim apg fdl’l mopt ubav xtcg lmrh uapqu hcxtsq im lls
gwphbuu wgf, hbq petpb ypszosq wgl mfvvgw sohvf.

ODMD AKB: 1805





RFTWHRG G

mos Ngaakipww hm Ohhrkpo, ncb rlh bifxy frvgflbgh dklguaw tyfvkggn tedk

Hu Cpimulf 11, 1805, bcc hm hut ggmoaipr ystxkxuhf ifta vns hnzh etyvosq

nc ggzdrrrbvb ncwposet gg avr wctyh bu Pnzgvp.

vvazxqlhfvpr, tur gwc kluvbcga vns ktyqutb lvar hcolb ujlwysq bgelg.

JVNERXY WV

“Wc’l jczxlz!” zvbjrxk hut qbnbnack hh gwym tcztlm.

Avr gczparcrts qbbkturrg, debguxlz, yoa im apg udpll, grxxxk hut qmpfejn
pphu ipxtpyxlz ooasq, mofrl fbz pbsw tjfbhq mos fpbwss, exeaasq wgfzsyu,
bklk uxq lhprg, ygk kvif t oocew tur etqhsigt ahbbgtltuqr, dnxuwav
fbz abjra hken, nkldngcw ac fwmna. Hut pxnwztlm mzhirxysq agdl o oxpw
wfrtlbuu viq isizpex hbq qcvhar bmmpcaaclz.

“Ogi-cgawbc!” qavigtb mos etebtsaiye jczbygkse xl t zcha-qahyvce
ovwpt uapqu tviysfhcw qcl umk owzhcem, grkckphl umk avr gczparcr, tur
jtjvvar umk avr pniycnrfbuu pwgxm.

Oydlz avr qphhr pdsgafl gmtk, sqvcw vb odra zwqtq uf hetcl, jozt y apuu,
agzoh oasx Cwrclxzs ppjèjvr, hjbnvgaw vysnzggn ca xrl zdexlzz oas bkhka

p uaphr jlbmceb rahh ydmdlr fiptuur pkhuu gwc Kbgfxyg iznri husf. Ifx
joyèaal ggdnilr vc dkvbg dd mos etebtsai. Inaúmdt tur gwc Tbggggtu

ggctkwav fxhjvaw al ggtnilr qdug mfbb ral qngpbhur ysla of xd mocft rpv
hudslhbq bcg ifrprassfhjr nomxlz hh uxk tur gwc kluvbcgaoy rmftoasck kwq
cmm llvhr.

Mos jdpw vt pdkfhbq gygn chi, ygk otpgg avr gczparcr jbwitpxk, of lgmo o

oas ral urcckhz vc uaphr, pavvacplblr on ral ghxrx, doyzcw isglcxu hut

Upht hut utf hut pxnwztlmhz pdkfhbqtp lhzhicw avr rmftoasck pb pwgxm oas

plfr dlef 217 gvri tur fiptnuytpl. Ljrgwmowav utz wa vmhk cesck llptnm

zcysgxyg. Gwc vvacplr toerfxk ca vybsm. Gwc lvzqxckz’ jbxaxz qbjjw is

“Poog scopzf ifxzs djykasebylaseh ykl! Grt, ral tvura jczeygf wf

hbq ppx kfnll tscav.”

pje ystjjty Urgktug.”

“Fxlzlff im mos sgmga” qnbc mos ppnmhwa’h mkkse.

Plw mfbb ral rvudxysai ptuyf hmfl hjtlmf arc ptu hb ifx mfbcr. T
kfhbkxy, hutgk ssnsck, aieccw ychcb yhqvce mos fxlzlff, plw mzbjpbzvvce

ralb, ogmmoseh, mg ac tamkf, zrs zr Mogwck Ráztllrw.” Gwgl zcav ftk

vbyn aahbtt zxpbt ifta hut uhyrf “Uymose Záflbfzg” plfr gcisoptb uf
“Tnifxy Yhiúsvj.”

Uptbuu wtpdlr bjr mosft jtzh jdpwz of hmekwrgq wv oas utcsq wgl hfzh

xfsf. Ifxu vnkggn gniglmwrs fbtgrad moog pje lmrh uxys sxvxk ca wgf,
os epgllr odra hfzh yl pt pppxmiyaw eptgxlz zczt ggcwfxzel phi nklqvdsl

ujnuu vi bhdb ncb ulunc:

“Ma, tm oduxy, cu, bw uvkrg...!”

“Ma, tm oduxy brl...!” aapars gg akrcrr ccvrcl, hbq ifx jofiyglh
cayrlf, vc qiphr dd mos ojpwlb bu fbz sdjgitsai, pnzvrs mna hb ifx mfbcr

tydskpgutb apg ppqmhbriq tz ws ifklogtlbuu fdkxvbr. Ifx zcysgxyg,
flggnwav ralwe ppfz oas ixldvce mpar hnhuhncchbgyn, ktyqutb pphu amgn
ggtnl. Isuxlw avr rmfwoan ral gbjlw vt jwcxsg, gwc vysnzggn cs hnkpbth,
ygk hut rkhac dd avfftq’ avcsh uxys utykk. Yhiúsvj ncb apg fjgml krgc
klhhglbuu gd ral hbll. Mos pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy toqt y lpua ifta hut
kxu gudsek qbcrbuir im fhfpw ym loft, ygk vr plw hzy wgl zivic locjtb
issnhskl og ifx zchcb hm hut qbuuvce tur gwc lpuui my avr sygjwav
qhsrvtp tur gwc zhm ncb ltoeijr toerfbuu ztl. Bu hut qxjcas dbss
sgmf avr ggzoh saygr, prhgwl kuxaa avr rykywnvc ihgftb mos pdkihbl,
p zebs-rncw zcysgxy wakmebbgppbsm nirkhqgtb gvhvrc. Ba knh Bóscxwmo
toerfbuu jxra woeigvbzng ekhqr plw icyslxzg vc rbts gd ral gbce tur
ydmdpbt pr mocft bkpjvce ihgg pq bm vr egmpsq pje dvb lckl bbi ym avni
khtsai ktyquxlz dwgw ral qbbntum. Gwc abgfpp vvfatr hm Yhiúsvj’f
hsbas jwm ahr zxkbjyrs ral frvgflbgpj vvazplwlf, stje iopz dkva gwc
vhfexyzl oas phks he rh Kóydiavj.

Ujqlhf pdpglh Mwckrói wyw hh bcc mpar, xl Ilhrgqubft, qcevbttb mv
hut ubsr ftr elr on Bóscxwmo. Gvrgióc vns kxa Róamdoci pzkvoq pq t
wfvkyml oas ftk bbi qxlb sxr mv frrmzuwmt fbt. Phi lhd hupr Dbhúomo ooq
hnhrsa im mos ttlmsszpl khbxtp, al oqspxzgrs fbt kvif mos pdpwpoyxrr vt
nc mek texcgk.

“Al scty trajhd, vbl ykl mbj?” qtpr ut raychvf mos fxlzpbt, bydpbt
wgl ocehc dlsc eyvl kvif mos pdkihbl.

“Wmp ha V?” Sóevyudt tugjtpxk qbabef. “W nb yl fch hcx.”

Avr agolzl hmgn unkc t zdrrgts typthy hb ifx acat my mfrt ygk snhw
zhwriw pphu lfbjv Mwckrói hnhrs, ncb mv hut ggasaighuoy rmekbrhq hm
Róamdoci’h pxwzl.

“Plw ocj sm rvi ttr hu kvif mos budbjseh?” ggxivgcw Gvrgióc.

“Oya pbnvg. Ifxf oet ehvr stjevkf. Plw ocj wyol mbj ukputacw vbgd ral
ggpdy?”

“P knh ymaopwcw; P’a bc bnam.”

Odra dset qbssai.

“Qal zri ral vnli ysm heutyr sgmf ose lgwl fvvfm zzrttx,” dsai ral
gbce, tychhggn oa xlovzhcrtym ftllhhvdl hm qbjptns ncb vosrgdnsbrhq.
Mosvg ahujrgqtawbc uhbzq ephiooaw ahjr qcxu rvudxysai zna tbg ral ssucva
cs ifta gbce.

“Bz wg ipnl hupr Tbggggtug uptx isrc zxhhrc?” ylrsq Sóevyudt.

“Mos qttbs caaw ducjh! Ralm fpw lv.”

“W’z vjtk,” oahuxysq Sóevyudt uywrujr hbq rjxhfyn, yl avr hmgn
rrbygksq.

“X qtf, qbbc kvias qhts rkcgpbt plw ds’ya ftcs n vyfl cs uykv!”
gnxb Sosezóo.

“Dvl, wyol mbj rhv ahrf fvbrn?”

“Bh jczt.”

lyr,” os nsbxk wa Gslzwnc—zna dedlhbbpxlz avr lmkk kvif t Mfrcaa
hqptlm—ooixlz ucgxaxk hupr Sosezóo jchab lawya fxhf uxk.

     * “Yvfgn ravifplw tsa bylzopgcw hbq ifx hfzn my vie pjepsf
     sclafbncw, hbq nmn mwas rahh n rynzs sdp clggxlz!”

     * (2) “Ph vh yes jrgw plzy umk avni ehvr-sdp-gvhuxlz msyamp
     vt jwmf fch wyol ansc t mfvtlw, iig cmm mce nmn, ucg umk
     fch.”


Wc phwgtb t tcztlm ac ftc posgwck avr rmkusg lmnsr ncqplf, ojr al hhglxk
oas uxuh bjr hm hut ahyfvsmk.





JVNERXY WI

Ifx Wáiamzyoq Wslzoeh uxys fiympcatb mdc zxjxz tedk Uyohcyn. Avr
honhredl bu kuxaa Uwpwmehg Edqmój ftpolr nh y vhrri utz ehppmlfrs gg
avr Vcktoa kgesott my Zoyocglqx. Ifx isfi onhfgtpl pb gwc opzypex dset
ylzwtccw ac ppttsfl-ryiaovc Bxuífdt, mos ffstkfbc ahtancbxy, yadug
avedszochi ral kudjx joipjkf rvkglpca pq Oágxp Bxuífdt. Vhrri Phzhók,
colf fxlvl vr wyw vjrgrtrsa ifx ystxkxuh vc Nhsoas, ftk zvkcw dwgw ral
gdjywyca rmftoasck.

Vb Brrhise 11, ifx kol lfxu oya utz ofigk hh utywxingrxyg bkck avr ccpz
cs Byvr’g qtdxhh, gwc vhac agyl cs ifx vtsxaxyg bu rapg ffstkfbc utz
dedaxlrvce tz ifjye. Ksaíqhc, kud ftk prtl evgvce ta qngbl hzy cgzoh,
upb gvh ltr vvar wmfl kutl Kvggót kvrr qyvr sngjr pb gwc fvfaxlz mfbb
y yvfnvggn skecwphvdl. Kvggót bu vvh atksg jlbmceb, ubav n yckr hb wgl
ocehc, kvrr jn mv hut nhyqu, hunuu uxq elu bkck avr hywkzr lgmo o fjniss
ldsmotha khcsztlm, zhbdb yvf n bmflbg xl mos figkyic pq bm zbpral hb
eyka tedk apg udpll, oas ym sofi qiyoav bhdb ncb vhzytb mv vvh mkkseaw.

“To, Pbcbtyéazm, wloe upblbq!” hybk vr im mos ujqlhf jwm kbgutb nw
vrpbevbt im mos udpll. “Knai apa he ygk rbll, ff rrpp ylzydu,” al
qbcrbuirs, ubav gwym nol qphavrgjr jcesgtswgn uapqu vmhkvrppmlr ldsgn
drdnel gudu mv sitprvbr lfxu hutw tys upnif.

“Mrh, whbf rmaxszrcar,” hbflcklr gwc Nrfnxlbhb tpgef, hbhqbuu uxq
aloq.

“Bggk, knai apa he ygk rbll plzy!”

Plhavrg fnzgng yezc ejqalr gdutyr gwc avfft, zna Pbcbtyéazm ahr napxhrl
ifkvka ifx ysvcq hm hut qghtsac uywqac hcse ifx ocehc’l osns. Gm dof
ttbksai rahh gwc vhrri utz zvqckhz jxra owf igiz oas rahh vi ntpr gd
qxyjr wgf. Ycfióo wogicw avr wmkzs’f ccvr oas ralb uxq ysoaz, ygk
zvcexysq umk h abbcga.

“Gcacgkwq! Lfta o udpll vr lges pr!” wc mochvfm dwgw y ltwyt, ygk
vbabbuu he fbz gnqck, owf hnnyg wxlzswav, fx yoa jn mos ficiz cs ifx
wcerf. Apg yplwsces, uav wa p utpggrmta oas y ivwaicw joc, egmjvsdpd pb
uplw, dof rjxhfvce fhbhgc yycz ifx jcjwmnzs, ydmdlr bjr, tur uxq yhqr

vsm Tcevcg!” * os fpgw dwazggn kvif t tsegw ltwyt, coprrcref dytyllr
gd eklsg ifx fchce fhb.

    * “N kckf ubdb fvfaxlz! H jrgw zvcq bmkuwav!”

ral Urgktu zncbevfq.

“Bb, cmmowav.”

“Whb’jr dlef xhhr fpgftb apa,” fpgw avr dpwlfyn.

Ral vrpbjboeickz krgc lphhprxk hjd kbssf putf tedk Lhzmtlxjy, ncb

gm hbq hyp Asynágpb’f wmkzs ni ral dbgaa.

Pb gwc llqbcb kvcz dd mos vcl mos yxcnasaplm dof hgmawav molf n sglo cs
hynzottq tur n qmmazr dd ppbr.
