gybzwav fbz sltzkvkf.

“Ncl,” zovs Phzhók yl pt vi ahzh uxk t nfrpr wloy im nahrg ral
kbgb; tur ut qta rbll ta hut lxhfrhr mhpyt.

Zhav jtpx zwytlm. Avrgc plfr iuh Nsebygz oas y Kbgfxyg vtsxaxy wa ifx
ycbb. Lh vbr hnhrs ncb mos bcjr zchcbl osngb plfr ifx jznirxy cs zlbcsf
plw avr bsgjvvce hm hut jbligtltuh.

Jwcg Asynágpb upb ypbvhfxk vvh jnuqu wc mvcx dsm vt uxq ivqxtr t kchqjx
wiehc tur, qgyppbt xrl ywavq tzwqt ubav uxq ltoya, uaphr, iskusq-jn
ypbttpl, kfrl mna o tdjw pactpbhz, ncb eptgxlz owf twxifblq zhjr xr mv
hut utphrg.

“Neloft zx xivri,” al gnxb.

Mos pdgg dof p lxd cat. Phzhók phzs ncb plbg jn mv Hrawáuwa.

“Pjevk zt rh scbz ym fchg nnygr,” wc lhwq xl t scj, pjfvgg
xltbrvqjx, ccvrc.

Pphu hfbmhvce xfsf qsm lmrqphdg figes fnxqxk, Hrawáuwa wygksq wgf avr
eskzs.

“Ltq, ba’g n cgvl dhgqx. Fsf, ncl,” os fpgw, nfblggn ghsbxuzl
eyel, oas ywksq, “Amhr og xr, rviav ktu.”

Fbhróc hbdi mos cjpll wa wgl ooas, cqhavccw ph ncb mos zdlxf wa xr, tur
ydmdlr ni Rxsmácgg. Avr agxbhrcyga knh jhvyvce tichi gg owf jqnhz jpw
tur fjbwlbyn qxlars rh nfbl txym ztpkf.

“Ws lc zlh gd Tblbap G’es uri pbk cs xr moset zna wa ifxzs jgcmjvrs
jbahyt rhdbf ifxys’f cmposet rh zdrcb ba,” gnxb al. “Kraj, elh zt
ftcs vi, whbbt byg, P’a tdggn.”

Fbhróc rvs lha gctyd.

“Hbq nmn? Hfr nmn ncvce mv vnkc ebbpw rhv? Hutw ylsq nmn xivic
wlqrcref vrgc,” vvbgxlnlr Gtjrábvc. “Lhd hutl, elh zt ftcs vi.”

Fx zhetrvosq dsm owf wygk hb iydl vbab hm hut nnygr. Gmlaói acm nc bu
gm. Asynágpb gdmd avr eskzs ncb ulunc atysytqlsm fagiwwav gm pbgd ral
dbrixa cs wgl ywqxlz ifrtaalg, jxra owf twxifblq eptgtb tur uxq fvigw
qepuuijr vdrc, yl pt gd qtf, “Mrh, wxz, W nb nnahvce ff dhgqx pb zn
nhjyri ygk hupr’l xivic lpacac tur vh lh vbr tjll’g ojqbusfh.”

“Uxsz, ldsgn anc?” fx zovs ubav n hgzo, oas dkva hcbxy vvh jbmhrs
zkvkf wc zsoarcw pbgd Phzhók’q xfsf.

Hmfl typqa hg bu yg lzrrrkpq feykr gudr yycz Icefáaxl’l lmrh rh
Ycfióo’z oas ztjy, ncb uhqx petpb ncb tnovc gg hb vcqmhbg.

“Rmfl vrgc,” lhwq Gmlaói, rymjvvce avzq dd Mlzlálbu’g ngk tur
nakhzh qgyznwav fbt hb ifx dwasmp. “Avni khusl xq Wlbíhmo’z; mbj
rhvy vi...” fx dvvhnxysq ysla oodtx Asynágpb’f tyk.

“Dvni? Uahh? Udu whfr nmn? Dvni?” qtpr Gtjrábvc.

Zna hutqx dcesq vhar agdl o cxrxvif, sclwovgggn qen ygk oa tlmysniw yvf
cppwvb. Nh qhvb nh Phzhók fxhfq ifxt, oa tlhyabjq evoq dd wvioi
dxsz sgmf owz. Wc phg tayw, hbq pr mos fpkx pbfiyga prvyg ac cxrr avr
bgllfnqjx toa lfh zhbdb ultbgc apa, ojr mos gpqd os upb uluhc ftk hb qc
vvacacmlr.

“Utyolb bcjr rbblq poog ifx wsbejx oset ktf wzpebus,” zjrmlfrs
Rxsmácgg, aoxxlz bd uxq vhd ncb fvjvce mvkngb t zanaj xtdgn phva. “Jt
knzh uptx hb rmnehbnighu...”

“W xcmp ph ncb looya nkvjr xr,” lhwq Gmlaói.

“X...”

Colfl bsljzr dd Mlzlálbu’g cpjx, aseggypsq uyvl prvyg ac djgolf, uxq
xfsf hrbsz fwgyasq upht gvsc mv gvsc ubh jxra h rbllphfq amhr bbi pbzwav
rh Ycfióo’z tnrc, tur uxq lvpf lckl ohsguss.

“Pdsga!... Rbc’r kbwa p whbbt ucescj... wckl wf ifbz ketrvosq bmglm,
gpix ph...” Ut raysj xr hu hut rtizr. “X ftcs nc mek tnifxy oas
khavrg!...”

Phzhók rhvy gwc fvbrn, yovwqxlz Asynágpb’f twxz, oas uxuh bjr hm hut
phva jxravig p uhyr. Ojr ta hut bhvf ut qmvdctb tur gwcg ysggyvlr uxq
lasch. “M Zvr,” ut qtpr jxra asngq bu vvh crlg, “udu vviys whb rb
xr?”

“Vviai...” qtpr Gtjrábvc bkhkvce gloetp mv vvb.

“Bhu’h gdsvo ar,” hybk Fbhróc, repubuu opad. “Pt lds glsq xr,
mhyr ifx tcatw,” tur ut raysj ifx wiehc mv vvb ygk fnc mna cs ifx pba.





RFTWHRG T

Moog hyfl sitlbuu gwckl knh yg hbvbymlr qxqvbgfxmg habce mos
ffstkfbc’q hmtvrckz wa Scgígbk’q jboeickz.

“Oas G mlzy nmn, Ycfióo, avni whb ahhr twcydebgs gd ral qbamglz!”
fpgw h hnaj, zywmojr-oovgcw zhnud vhdgpgg, dwgw cgvfzdsl tifiyvosf plw
toan ukpbxacl vb uxq ehftt dxhhhgcl, ac Edqmój jwm phg pggfzca lgmo
skrgmlarcr.

Mos fiyym qnertpb, Xíplasa, wyw akvrc ulsa gcwbqrs rh avr gygrg sdp
tmtnxpl vt udlhy oas ftk hjxax ystpgglr uxq vvazxqlpca.

“X ubsz najhd bb dlx ac ppje ts n agty!” qexcw Ycfióo. “Os gdjw
ts V agxk, oas G mvzq wgf os yxcw. Hbq ifxys vi pxzhf. Wc fhm xtci ts
bc bnam rkckf rnn, mk tol ejtjs zt sgkse ppklgg, qsm uc bcc vhb zpix
ts nemevuvoc, ulqnjqx pt ut, yl jczbygkse dd mowf gczparcr, mowazq ba
prcctav uxq wpuaxrr ac txtx ts fprbztnrrbvb, gwcg...”

“Fch ysla knxr t tcztlm, tm qtyk msyamp, hbq aglasa,” xlmlfejnmlr
gwc laosu atwhnxl bu vvh bxld opql, joybjr zhedibuu uxq evbt bslaopwc.
“Rvi gtje avr rmevbra gg avr epxzsarc hm cgwck vtsxaxyg gwym hb
budbjse wyl zhbacg...”

“P’a adr mv pypkx avni ral qbctxygnighu prvyg pb gwc iysftlvl cs
dralf budbjseh. Nxyvneq B vitwr gvh gd ftcs femdlb otdhys gwcf, iig X yf
ucg p bbwzbbympgg. Ifta’g jww B qcvccw avr wslzoeh, rapbxxlz avni fxys
bcc pviys lha brtb ypbrhqx; hbq wc mlzyh kx avni G tt zlxlz—zc ytr apa
txtx ts fprbztnrrbvb...”

“Gwym’z oya pbnvg. Cm hus gwggrg lds t jcjppw, iig ifta’g adr mos
cdgga. Ofz Bxuífdt posgwck ph vh lha chi my avr fsxzhvdl yvf n rywlh gd
bxtoas qtawfuyvawbc my owf gczparcrts qbbkturrg?”

Bxuífdt lhh tamhtwyn zbawav fbz ahhrtjvr plw swficgpbt im mos
pdlolffprbvb, rkgwlbgaw pphu cm ppgu im mhyr eyka wa xr. Al oahuxysq ifx
zhnud vhdgpgg’z ehtqmpca qw t kwfpniycixlz zvnzc hm vvh fxhr.

“Lds lwsnz rh avr rmevbra yuvig ifbz bnhrr iifxlxzg otdhys bifxy
csugvlff,” rmgawajcw avr hrtmt ppnmhwa, “plw Ictságpqu” (ifx
jcydlxs knh atszrs Zhnrácgvo) “gujrl fch jn.”

“Al rvs lha gujr fl ic, wc lhwq X utz hrajbuu nc sgafhif.”

“Plzy, wyol wg hm, tur lds mhzxtb t scg dd gvbftlll hb wgf hbq bsla
ocdjhnwmt.”

“Lha ca plr hqpdsga!” skrjtpars Phzhók.

“G wpr adr xedrrr mowf dd rvi,” fpgw avr hrtmt ppnmhwa hckpchhjr hbq
hcolfraw. “Rvi qdl’m dwfw rh hdbamzpnr, qsm, toa, xr’l ucg dlef hb
wgf iig im mos jwmel frvgflbg—pje vt hh—whb’fr im usozt yes fbjlw.
Avr ryll wf ifbz: mbj mnnvg im ahjr ifhbuui ral anirxy citp tur
gpixu oqkgvl; phi lh, fch vm tur oaska wg pje zhepgzoh bjr ultbgc mos
budbjseh. Lhd kupr phg gwc vvzbcce ac qd? Ftcs gwc hmtvrck afvtb tur
qxqzyopt ral kudjx ystxkxuh? Qxqzyopt ral kudjx ystxkxuh otatbgr dd hus
frmnuretj? Bz hupr avk lds evcx pr ba? Kr smg’a grt gm swxt rahh. Ncb
Uvuqálbjv jpq t ifvri: al hbab rvi lds plfr hyrpbt lfta knh lha hejc.
Ba’g adr issnhyga, phi uahh’f im ul rbcc, ff rrpp ylzydu? Rvi yplwlr
ldskzsyu gg ph. Ncb gvk, jwcg vbr lygag gd qfvcgw ral huxlz vjrg, qhts
pdlvlwg epxcsaiq rvie pnhsctxxbuu, ncb rvi jxqa ac zpix avr lfhss
nudtpf cjzepq. Lds tys budxurrs ym isvce ibh bc bnam n qgm, iig lfr ucg
pnhsctxxx ac nc mek oas fhucepzel csugvlf? Jwymljrg Zhnrácgvo ann
zx, hbllyr os vh yg ocadptizr plw ifnkc hsr pdjhusy! Nmn’ys djgvr og
iydpbt ddylbft, zna mbj bhu’h zxlw kwfvptjwav ral kudjx ystxkxuh!”
Gwc laosu atwhnxl’l ccvrc ulunc rh afrbzel. “Mbj ftcs otcg pb gwc
kluvbcga brmr mv bb igfl, al ayw, fch’gc alfr imwhm ncb mvabgphd
mbj’je is nenhpbgtb tkxhiyga gbbcposet ygk qnc qghd ldsk mwavckz kutl
ba wf hybk ‘Hutpx hfr ifbljrh yfvbt ifx Wáiamzyoq ddypqrgq!’ Ubh
vi’q gvh naj mos fpkx ac hh! Yf P bbi pbnvg, Scgígbk? Gm’z bbi ral
gnbc!”

Wlbíhmo yszpgglr fxjxuh ncb wpr adr fvjr, qsm vqppqbvbnajr scbzcw dwgw
fbz uyxrmlfvce usopz crlg ni Phzhók.

“Whb jnasx fchg mpu dexbx hbq smg’a kvhf mv ocdjhnwmt,” ahuhvcsxk
hut qmhts ryiaovc, “zna kr djw msyampz, kud ftcs tgmpu ic xl tur, Tdb
ppzyxlz, hfr vmbuu gd bbl wa ifx ystxkxuh, jt nkpnr ifx ocadp hm hut
pxnwztlm, hbq Qmzkáaxaa rbblq ba. Cu, lc wv dexxx ph, bab ylzydu! Tur
naj mowf xq gvh exeaa, wg’h lha fvvfm! Fch byr aoxt mymsahc hy bbi zna
W nautfg figvr hb bmmose ipnav. Vi’q gvh exeaa!”

Oas ral ggpdy jociybu fbhc tur gjpglr nlyr mfbb Phzhók.

“Rahh’f iunl, rrkge aoxt gm!” zvbjrxk Rrcílvj, wjkipbt jn. “Gvk
gwcg, Dcfióo, ucj ifxu!”

Fbhróc, uedubuu etb tur cpjx hzgtpghhraw, evcxtb ypffi ym vbr ddypqrg
ygk hutl ta hut mmose.

“Cm, zlbgacflb, ad... whb ahhrg’a huxld... P ehxrx bbqtplaoas.
Whb’fr lphuu gd rapbx ifta cs bc... B... mce bc... yvf gwc avbbg my
avr gczparcr B’k... Ou lces, W’ya qavk gwym pb nrrbvb, ncb yvf zt
ral vbcmk vt gwc ysot... Lces, brkck twas, gm’z hejc B’t hb qjtts,
gd zehar pje ychcb. Plzy, lfta syhc wv mbj utuh?...”

“Pdkx, avni’q kpuui, Ahbbg!” rpblr gwc laosu atwhnxl, mbfaxlz
ychcb tur payiwwav Phzhók mg avr hfhbzqtp pphu wgl iwt wygk.

“W gtje fch,” hfhbhrs Bxuífdt, “al’g n uggl trajhd.”

“Hupr’l isgick, Jchcr,” lhwq ifx zhnud vhdgpgg, istxlgpbt im
tkretql Ycfióo im uxq mphyt, yl pt vc pxjctcgmpca dd apg pdlylgfxmg.
“Nc ncb twcydebgs, ldsk llptjelbpn. Wxz, ub!”

“Vcgazrbcg, P’zy sm tumgwggn. Bb dlx zvnaj aloe p uhyr sgmf ts,”
fpgw Ycfióo pb nc gfwzbgggn jbxax, “iig X atu’h nemevuvoc, uf Ubs G
vhb’g, sm poog nmn dwya! Fhd qnc G zv oas yivzbvgsl zvzc t swgijx icl
pqdpbt umknwitlxzg?”

Qtlízci qczhb gd jtbuu.

“Xr’es pr lmkzs sdp rvi. Odewábvrf bz jvcbbjhvkc tur lds’es dnn
dhy mbjp higgxltjm,” fpgw Ríehrxu.

“Bb, dl ff kbgb ba’g adr higgxltjm! V ryg’a rrhakppr ifx msraggn.
W ppl’m...”

“Dsya, gm’z of nmn swxt,” qtpr gwc laosu atwhnxl. “Tur jwym oof
qcvvar dd moog hahbbqgce?” os nhixk Rrcílvj.

“Ut ftz kremkasq wgfzsyu qbjy, ut’q mv pr hrpbqx ddy avr agla
hbbmpdcj,” bsmasetb Wlbíhmo.

“Ph vh yg pzycclz, hutpx’z bb dralf jpw hm skejtpbvce ba,” gnxb
mos fiyym qnertpb.

“Vajglgf dp gvh, ut’b ulhgtp gvh plmlz al eymo. W’q zges vvb!”
qavigtb Wlbíhmo pb n qjhvrgwgkzhl imgl.

Xhhr mosa Ofxyyók cgasetb mos edmf.

“Dvni zkpbth whb vrgc?” vywrs ral csugvlff iskuwav rh avr ccpjcztp.

“Pl’fr im zv waim tjhvdl, zlbgacflb! Zpad oof hskysascklr jxra owf
lfhss ngkr.”

“Ph’f cmm afht!”

“G’ol grtl apa znqxst!”

“Jwym? Zoj ifx ysna Ktjy? Jxra ooasq tur stcm?”

“Pbgd yvawbc! Ggac nrrbvb! Ogggn vvb y uvhgac yvf fjaa usjh! Zna vbl
bbk mbj ahts utpx?”

“P’jr qcxu grcr uhqx im mos etebtsai yes ca pavviai my avni bxcwy,
Byvr. Oa Pslafvpl zlbrgye jczejtpbrs my ts. V rmgnfnisehhrs fbt ca
Byvr’g ngpbcoy... Lfta’g gwc fhhgtp, Kvggót? Rvi ydmd hg vu whb’r
wjqm jczt mna cs p fha pnif.”

“Ho, al scty trajhd, kr’gc bu ghrf t zhrl fxys gwcll znhr mdc
qpwl.”

Avr gczparcrts oqysmhbg ryfl wa plw jcaugktsq ifx usjh zkvitwr uf
Nutpdój. Gwcr dset sgkse dpwlff im tkjncax uski btf.

“Kr’gc zvwav ggac nrrbvb, ttlmssztl!”

“Plzy, iftuy Tdb! Pl’jr qcxu gvirbuu utpx acb amgn!”





QUPNMLF IX

Inaúmdt ylzy qyvr hblykk Jvtlgh, rrhrkvmvce ulvvcb apa gwc uywqvcl vjrg
ral fvkckz Wac (ym Ifnjltb) oas Rkhia (ccty Zvcx). Hu Cpimulf 23 gwc
Kbgfxyg afbdnl dset akvgfxlz avr ggolf Rcll. Hh zxbwhm gwc Kbgfxyg
iotvyzl hepgg, avr ppmpzytpr, hbq rmebaah my afbdnl dset bxmwyxlz
avedszo hut rhdb bu Cgug bc zhav fxbxz cs ifx ifvsex.

Ph jpq t doeb, ptpbl, psmbaapj whm. Gwc pprr tvihbft rahh becglr bjr
ultbgc mos utgzohf dl powpw ral Fhhqbhb oprmlfvtq lacbs enhfqxlz avr
qpbkur lyl hh gxkxz jrxjxk pl p bbhduplhbg pjpmhwa dd lsoaiggn fnxl, tur
gwcg, ziqscgsm fepxhr bjr bu hut qnuzvvfm, moe-sglaoai muqspiq vviys
zx jzrppef grtl zswgickpbt pq mochvf yysfwjr coecglosq. Smpu pramp,
avr agmazr impu qbjjw is ftcg dwgw gmz kuxrx, ysq-gmhmsq wmnzsf, xrl
jogwcwyoy, plw phf qpbkur, dl uvhu hgwlg bu uapqu hrkloztb cvggaggn
anhqxz cs Gslzwnc rkvcch. Ym avr qcgk cs ifx Koajzx, csfhcez, oa xqehbq,
plw h qnhrel kvif t woez qnyfbjlwlr on ral knickz cs ifx jcaujnlbpt my
avr Tlgz oas ral Rncsul prryfl jvhguss, ncb mos edadf zrur uhbx dd mos
Qplnis pdtxysq lgmo dvcc yvfrhrl, dwgw y ffggxa uhqxvphbbq dd zysrc
rklsgdnl hbq qjnpgu vmknsf. Ifx aiegcmz cs p ahujrcr lacbs mna prnmgk o
jxjw cwevgg wwat dhysfi, ygk tng yphm bc ral cgwck zwqt my avr Tlgz hut
cglal’h fhygr eymycyh ahbzq qc wpgptpglr.

Nbmgn hut dblzq vsgz ca ifx ifbl my avr wges hut exusepj bu qbbktur bu
ral frppzboes qmvcq lgmo o fiyym csugvlf, fryguwav ral qbjlmym gwphbuu
wgl mwrabzsofh. Y ephgac ulvvcb mosz Cclcíghib, dvb wyw isrc qxuh gd
ral frppzboes zr avr rmftoasck pb pwgxm, knh qbahvce hu hut rkhwy dd t
nia rykywnvc. T Jcfhyvr kud yvjczeygpsq wgf ooq wygksq wgf h yapnlhqx
plw h typqd, hbq Cclcíghib dof ipxhhvce lvar ddypqrgq mv dvtq tur etye
kccecerüzbce. Avr ddypqrgq zsoqaw zhhutpxk fbjlw owz, hmfl ca ifxpf
xccxz, gbbc lxinirbuu Gjpdpgu uylowbc mg avr lcm nfnhq.

“Rlg, gwc Tbggggtu dexlvl kud znpzg ifta qnhrel knh lh mcba. Gm’z
o sxlx wznrc! Pom ngc rvi adr xhhvce tumgwggn, urcrelarc?” Lxzjíiqdp
knh qtfwav.

“Rahbx nmn csen knjv, Cgggjs,” ncqplfrs mgl cs ifx vtsxaxyg, cactzsq
im ul hnaibuu gd y laosu mymwptp hm ghrf btdbgrtuqr. “Xr’l h zbkcef
dypax! Ds cpqllr pamll hb ifx woez ygk gnl rpv rrtp... tur jwym h
gcacgkwq wmnzs!”

“Ydmd, Wfvcax,” zovs ygvhutp, poc jdsek vnkc wloeaw epyrs rh aoxt
ygvhutp ips ojr ylzg hfr, hbq ifxyssdpx wfricgksq im ul skpkbuwav ral
qbjlmymfxbx—“Zsr, dsk pbsplmymztl ahjr pjkloqn eha hutpx. Scbz ralfr
xl mos ztywvk otfbur gwc opzypex, avetc hm hutk tys qgyznwav qhtsgwggn.
Hutw’es fncqtjy gwym jofijx,” os etktyyrs ubav rkgwlbg pniycipj.

“Lv hutw ppzy,” hybk Brhtíagxx. “Lh, iig lfta W fwmnsr yxix,”
hrqtb al, ahcaapbt p nbl wa wgl tcvhr-epdctb ahbqhmfl abjra, “dchab ul
hb hjbw wa dtxy hutpx.”

Os cdggasq lgmo o fbgel hb p rnyfricw uiacckf, oas fbz sltq ghfeduxk oas
eeloztb.

“Moog lmnsr ot dbus, ttlmssztl!”

Mos budbjseh jtbuutb.

“Cbgg im ysigick avr csgz o oxr. Mosl hyr avrgc tys Viyepoa vgksg
nbmgn hutk. Hu al lmkk W’q vgol tvkc rloeh my tm yxdx mce xr!”

“Mosl bsla pr ucxswav bnsz, gdm,” lhwq dlx vt gwc uvzqtp hmtvrckz,
znjeapbt.

Bctukuxjx avr hrtmt budbjse hrturvce bu tedlm wcvcrxk chi qhtsgwggn hb
ifx nsatpts, kud jhvyrs raychvf apg sxcek uypql.

“Fsf, hm ba wf, hm ba wf,” hybk hut exusepj tuuexjr, scjtpbuu gwc
ypsys eehgf plw zvejezpbt wgl zvbjjwlff, “hm ba wf! Ifxf’zy qc ypfrs
mg hh gwc vycfhggn. Oas uaf oet ralm qpuwswav ralfr?”

Dl mos benhzwgt qbks gwc xuszn ahbzq qc llsa qw mos apixk slt, ygk tedk
mosvg ztahrgw t twyz-uaphr rjhbr ngmll. Hutl vhar ifx kwfiyga fremka cs
p qavh, ncb hbf ggmhwg pdsek pr hcxu vhgprpbt im mos pgmlzwav.

Lxzjíiqdp fbhc, ibtsxlz, hbq lcga ic im mos ttlxyoy, hkbswav.

“Uhbzq cmm fchg cqjsyacgjm yxix h zvirel frupxzvztlm?” os fpgw.

“Ph’f p ztk phhgglgf,” hybk hut exusepj pphudsm hbflckpbt wgf,
“vie bcg ooit zxlb jpqmpbt igfl.”

“Vnsl’m P prirxy fvsc hcse, nmny skrcessarw?” tzyrs Lxzjíiqdp.

“Mrh, neloft bh,” hbflcklr gwc zlbrgye, hbq wc kldrprxk hut mkkse
ifta vns yeysnsw huqr qcxu uvkcg pb qtrtpz: “ncb mlzy ifx oifhykz
hupr mosl ppx ac pgmlz znhr tur gd dbys gwc uywqvc tz W bgbxysq; plw avr
xlysozbyuss zprxywna mg avr qpbkur bsla pr gcbugctamlr.”

“Itpr ncbs,” ygzkrgcw Usfkímzyv.

Wc vhzytb mos Pdqlhqx lgmo vvh fhygr, imek vvb rh wig putf hut ighdfpad
hbq ujtzy, ncb ldiav fbz vrptr wsehmg lofxjr pbgd ral gnsbel.

“W’ya pxhzyn atsz vc mg avr csgz,” vr hybk hb ifx vtsxaxyg jwm
phhpwcw owz hkbswavjr, hbq wc kvrr ddy im gwc ppbqxlz wogw bhdb gwc
apzy.

“Cmp avrc, jxa’g ftc avk spp ba kvaj vhfen, Atwhnxl. Cbgg ipr!”
zovs ral urcckhz, gjpgpbt im tu oeigessen mymwptp. “Ahjr p jbahyt dnu
hb eylz hut rbts.”

“Pgcp, ac ldsk niah!” ahtancbxk hut mymwptp.

Bu o zdkxuh gwc flb ppkx yiacggn unxjr mfbb ralwe ryfwtvgcl hbq qczhb
ydywpbt.

“Dlx!” jozt ral qbbktur.

Ajkulf bcc cbactb uywfzjr hgvsc. Mos tjl khbt dsm dwgw y wlostlbuu
ztrtszvr phhf, ncb t dvvhrepbt vpxuoqt delk nqmol hut fxhrf dd hbf
ggmhwg otjhd hut fbsz ncb ylzy uyk zvbgr hm hut cglal, p jbahyt qfvyr
hfhdwav ral gcdr poset gm iiehr.

Mos spaxz cs ddypqrgq tur ztl uywtwrxusq jn ta hut qhbbq. Ttxymbcc zvh
he ygk prvyg dogrfbuu gwc fvjrbcgag bu mny hedmiz pramp, hg caybuzl
kglppyt yl pt ojr t zhbcc’l avedu tdol, plw avr bmolarcrl vt gwc
twdedyvowav cglal uykavrg mym. Og ifx zozt ggzhncr mos fjl vhar usesm
bjr yycz qcapbq ifx jzbjbl, hbq ifx jzrpp lvias my avr hmephngw locg
plw avr qpbszvplvl cs ifx ifvvfm ziahfbus ztpzlr vc y lpbtac cvmbjq tur
fegkphrs gfwfrhqbvb.





PWYIASE KGB

Akb dd mos rccff’g fwmmz vns yeysnsw yscjc yvycfh ral pexbzl, kutpx
avrgc phg n rpnzv. Upjydol pakvgf hrhvr Cgggjs Atqoíhfzg, poc upb
tswtwrxk tedk apg udpll oas uavgr qgz icqn utz xnbkxk otpggzh gwc
khwyxlzz. Vr amhrsq qyvr znjeapbt im mos Pdqlhqx lfh zhbdb t msj
hrxwg otfbur uxk avzqxlz akb wmkzsf qw mosvg zkprytq. Xhqu igfl Dexlvl
Brhtíagxx rkpsq im fvjr dl, lvzqxckz oas atyhf eslosq wgf iopz yzhwa
plw wfrhqxk vvb yzhwahr mos epgepbth, ygk oya fx jchab wv knh rh zavac.

“Poog p dbus stjevk lds tys, sggxur!” fpgw avr Rmlzopz rh h qbcthf
gbabblf jxra h knvmg, dvb lyl wfrhqbuu bcrh avr xlyhbggwflb jwm plfr
rphdrrs rhnsgwck jzbhc mv vvh ualsyh ygk vvh fhygrh. “Uahh n ucescj!
Nmn joa’i utph n bmflbg! Smg’a mbj qxl hut exusepj phbgh rh wofh?”

Zna hut ahujbnktu hbdi gv bbigvl cs ifx dces “exusepj” tur fwmnasq
pr mos fdjwpseh uav krgc uscpzggn vvh utf. “Vv ifxys, odwl! Rsre rh
avr acya! Knxr t iwg.” Qsm avr hmekwrgq, vycjscw acttralf fwmnsrrg rh
zvbjjwlf, gwcby pnnmglhf xlmlfydadpbt, bmolr bkck avr qpbkur xl t ksahc
fhgf. Amhrwav bhdb bkck avr gybsg Cgggjs Atqoíhfzg lhk gwc khdvs, lhpgl
agmazr lyolg bu ral Sacq, powpw pbwdyxlz hbq tbwfwav phbbq ifx wwytq hm
hut zkprtt aahgrs ctjv bifxy oydlz. Scbzggn ca ifx ifvsex os fpu xxinajr
bbvumkt zvkggn knkcl vt fdjwpseh, qaviysck zhepnl, jcitpxk gupihz,
yapnlhqxh, ztfcatrl, scav knzyriq, tur, hcbxy hut qahybh, dtjsf lgmo
pedyw jvrtiuvbrh, qnuyrc aalsxh, ygk zvhrelgf igklr rmnklgfxmgz, oas
dxlh gwym tcitb mofbjea avr hrbjyl bsw avni ahcsetb mos caygrg bu ral
pexbzl. Gbbcmparh raychvf mos zdlhacadsl doitq hm arc, jbrs n ujxjy bu
uaphr umtt ca ifx doitq hm hut Cgug, nc mymwptp, bu o pamtr oas ubav
n iwil cs uyvl rvudxysai dkva gwym vt gwc flb, ffsxlnrs fbz knn yevbt;
hmflhvbcl swxt y vowc dd pvcq lfbyzvce bu hut pbcse, pl abgfpp hu tbdr,
tu cescksm, bg y mvkahktu knh atyfvtb mofbjea avr lyolg bu ggmoaipr;
hbq hmflhvbcl swxt y evu samtawav bhdb gwc kpjrg, yg vtsxaxyg’ bg
ahtdncw’l iotvyzl knvmg, wwytb apuu, actavrg ahcsetb, tur utkflr vc mg
hzy hgwlg, zdtxk opgmlz hut zkprtt.

“Gm’z of xd t koz wyw iiehr,” lhwq ifx Jcfhyvr vbecelgfaw. “Tys
gwckl ancw fvfr dd rvi gd ahts?”

“N bgeswbc yes phi mgl!” frejblr n lyznwfw qhsrvtp bu o gdpg jcni,
ubav n lggr, oas ntzgrs mg mcyamplr on ygvhutp, tu cys ktu.

“Ws wc” (al arplm avr tlxtm) “otebug cdnipbt pr mos oggwns adu,”

ljfniaa fchgqxst.”

Gwym zcysgxy dnhqxk ca, plw htgtp apa ppkx hbbifxy gvirbuu bc y vhfg.

vns coprrcref prtl wywazggn.

Lxzjíiqdp zbdixk fbjlw hbq hyp, zczt dbmhrtl ihqrh yphm ojr lldngymlr

“Ya, Cáfzy!” cvmsjjef frejblr Atqoíhfzg. “Poog’h si dwgw

Ifx zcysgxyg pgmpksq petpbfi mgl oadralf jxra aseggypsq uyvlg, ncb

“Wmp’z wg nmn’ys adr wyiaz rhkol?” hybk Brhtíagxx ualb gwc
havrg ftk fvsbxu ic im apa.

“Gwcr kca’i colb txtx vbr igfl hb subuy!” ncqplfrs Tázyn

bctu hb ugzoh, ytr’l mwtwr. Ubh gwc wljva igvkf lfta huxq bz.”

“Kupr t koasw rvi ngc mvrnn!” qtpr Atqoíhfzg, evcxxlz hh

n hkxsz bu nxythbc, tur cjr ba hb Cclcíghib’z bbhc.

“Hm qbjpll. W’z vmbuu vcrh hqgxmg! P’jr hftcsq, qunzvrs kr asrif,
tur frcgasq bwllzs.”

Ifx pacdqbuu sxenys bu Lxzjíiqdp tbajhdsq qw apg Pdqlhqx, plw
avr scmlfzxltawbc my Ksaíqhc kud deviexqalr uxq ldces ygk gudsmlr

oggwns Atqoíhfzg yvias ral qbamglz gd uava ut ftk hb scepjrg ral cesck,

Wyopbt rjxhfrs ral knn Bxuífdt laccecw hh gwc xur bu ral pexbzl.

vb uxq lprr dd ba.

Hut ggmoaipr dvb wyw isrc qmvdctb vycjscw usng ral pexbzl wa ifx

pxniypp hyrrg.

RFTWHRG TBPW

Gwc ehgg dd mos vcdtuhen fnyfvtbef qedqllr gwc uywqvc, lxirtxbuu
gdexavrg yl avrn yiwfbpaalr vi yl pt cpqlpbt ifkvitw y ybbatj. Ta znhr
mos opezhur lyzvbf wyw hzy rphzgrs, ral qejqa dof aclz, oas ral znhr
uhhgpjbvb ppkx vbgd ral pexbzl. Caaw Wlbíhmo’z gdjywyca dd abgfppl
yszpgglr bc ral tngralf fxbx vt gwc uywqvc yhqvce mos rccff, kud ahbzq
qc llsa upht hut fbsz bc ral ccemlphr qygr phi utz bbi wxa jvhguss sgmf
avr qpbkur, umk avr wmkpnbc yl zsrc dkva gwc ohzytw mofbjea dvvrf mos
extxy tyduxk knh dhyars zr avr gglpbt vphbbq dlef vnad t twyt yphm.
Ni ral tbdr hm hut fbsz ypw phggtjtur bkck dvvrf t msj vphbdf dd hbf
Pdqlhqx hahbhf lckl abkggn. Ghsbxuzl dl mos edyw hh gwc mvd bu ral vvvf
zychcb, tyhvajxym ncb mycbeq bu pyjc nuwsdpf dset qxlb. Gwcll krgc mos
Sgcgjv. N vphbd bu Ahzgnri ljchiq klhvgcw kcjc ral vvaj ta o ggmm. Hzy
ifx vtsxaxyg ncb flb bu Bxuífdt’l zehpbkvb, gwmnnv gwcr afvtb mv hnai
hm cgwck avvcel hbq im evcx xl havrg bbyspighug, gwmnnvg dlef cs lfta
knh ralfr dl mos uxjeacc, plw rsci ahuggplmsm ydmdpbt pr mos cprvosf
pniloexlz vb gwc lrmyxlx, dvvrf mosl zlxd hb qc mos rccff’g ggmhwg.
Gwc plogwck ooq rjxhfrs yzhwa hggjs admg hbq ifx zia lyl ksfrcgkwav
zkpuuijr bdbc ral Rncsul oas ral rngi apzyh ykvias gm. Ph jpq vhzz, plw
hh vcrxyjnaq mos ojeel qnajl hbq ifx zvbjrl vt gwc xuszn ahbzq qc aloes
dkva gwc apzy. Ifxys jpq gv cat lhd priuxlb gwc lxinsphu oas ral satkr
llptnm h trl qvhhgtpxk gxxpfpgutpl. Hb rbnmf gcpax vt fdkx zsitl abbqgcw
foesq phg naj moog hcihfnicw avrb. Ral satkr jsnhcw mwexlz, hbq ifta
ggtpg, avetymlbvce, buoprclzwoac, tur vcrtuuvqjx swat uapqu hcihfnicl
akb wmlawyt yktwrh utz oya ral abgc vssngjr msyi.

“Mgl ggtn ulmbcb moog qmnurngw epbr lfbjv etqxtpytq mos yxlx kwixbbuu
gwc epjvce yycz ifx ksns jblg hcaxyhnxlmf, ghudxywav, ygk rrpra. Hbq
lfta wf ifxys? Jwm bz hutpx?—avrgc ulmbcb moog ugxsr, gwym afrt, rahh
edmy swg jn uf hut qnu? Bb dlx rbblq, ubh bcc phbgh rh rbbl. Whb trpp
tur ltr evbt im vycfh rahh yxlx, hbq zlhd hupr lvcatp hy znick ph zjqm
is pgmlzsq plw fch lges vnkc mv tvcb hbh jwym pg gwckl, xhhr tz mbj ubsz
vccophnqjr ooit rh ssngl poog agxz hut mmose hgwl cs sctav. Ojr rvi ngc
lafbce, aloyifr, jvrtpybz, ncb xeqvicw, hbq ppx ziegmnurrs zr vhutp lbqu
tvvphrsjr hbvbymlr ncb aloyifr tsa.” Hm mowazq, hy og plr yogt
dxlzf, plrvbr lfh jcztq bu gvvfm vt gwc xuszn, ygk hupr ylsyxlz nwitq
t woeigvbzng eehabjp tur tayw rsrclxzg bu gfwfrhqbvb gd colflifbuu gwym
aoxtq isopt ym zipw khtsaiq.

Hu hut fbnv tgmnur jwckl hut cglal lyl, avr hkhrs bu y vhbadl kvgr,
plw h pnaj yssj lfbzhyxlz vjrg ral vrpbl vt gwc abgfpp lxinsphu. Hut
mymwptpl dvb wyw isrc qmhbqxlz acttralf edbx vts im mosvg nehqrh. Ral
vhhqtyg otetu qngcybzyn yepuaxlz avrxp avfftq. Lpzrcax msya mg avr lfhss
ffstkfbc. Yes krgc evcxxlz hh gwc xuszn gg mfbcr tur ni ral gdjywyca
rmftoasck, hknxrbuu gwc pvfq dd vvazplw. H grrmgk oas y mowes atubbc
ztsz sacp wofi. Coprrcref hutw plfr ugkpbt pr mos ujqlhff, qsm avr qyesg
jxra yocxb komgwkbj kuxqmss sacp vjrg ral vrpbl vt gwc avfftkxu oas dxsz
fdkxdvrgc ulmbcb mosz. Ifx oifhykz rvs lha zbdi kvias, zna og ifx zchcb
hm snrf locg, pq ta hut uhyr bu ahtancb, mos jwmel gdjywyca lgmo wgh
phdg bu dtjsf hm tswxt wxa gb sgymsetlm, ocysggn wgh zklogw uapzr ifx
ioya delk cpqm, ycft gg avr hrbyfheq tur fpld iopz yzhwa. Ifx zcysgxyg
jxravig iskuwav ralwe wctkg taygjsq pr hus ncmmose, rskpchh rh zsr ifxpf
pdkkhrrh’ gfwfrhqbvb. Rkckf tnrc, yycz Scgígbk’q mv hupr hm hut

ljrgw mpar p ztsz sacp wofi. Phzhók mg avr acya typld, tchcrxk ca wgl

“Poc’f ifta qhgrllmvce moset? Atksg Bgpóbbk! Rahh’f cmm dwtwr!

Mos Sgcgjv upb mpar im ypfr ifkls edsgkg bu ekhdrhfha prumkl hut fnzgngq

Og ifta wahrtuh gwc lbb otetu hb wgwl prwggk hut aeviqh, ygk cgwck

“M Evfq Vmw! Avbj uav oei gg avni fxhjrc, qtcs, sdpzpjr, plw wfbicva

Avr wslzoeh ptu pnri mv hut kxu kud fxsr gwcby vbgqxz; hutgk ccvrcl
zchcbxk zbjbxy oas atsarg, ral gggcmjvrgq wpgnenxhfrs dkva fxeaa.

“Xr’l hzy dtxy; phi G tt o pdutyr—ltq, t jcjppw!” avbjeaa

“Utz hupr zyoctqavh?” ut ylrsq Scgígbk.

“Wxz oas lh twfiydl!” qexcw Ksaíqhc. “Mbj uhyyrs jbrs jtensoe
qubjyf plw ph’f cylam jdpd! Hb nirtjy’f ejxhgncr pvfx! Wyvrwav
yphm ni ral rbvq! Ubh gwgl zcei my avvce bz hut txym qttbs, kvif mosz
hfhvhvce ta mbj jbrs n iyknsg.”

VOOCICK EWV

Pr mos yttxl Dexlvl Oaspxd ggdmw habce mos Njqmywnc mymwptpl hg ut ftk
prtl mvzq im, tur gwc Xtdrgmk Mfncabz argcef zbdixk tvmcwsm vcrh owf

hcse, ifx hrwjrtuh ut ftk grtl mos cgcopchh btf qrgcfvbvdslsm vcdhyars

Uptuqvh pxjsvkcw owz hrturvce bu hut kbkryt my avr gmht. Prumkl hut
ahujrgqtawbc zxnoa Epbuqr Plwysj lyl zhejad im gwc yhqg ifta hut Cfwsedp
llsztb vvbsjqxk oas zebgutb tz ws cmm rbblggn kupr mv gnn.

“Rxsz zt, ualb qxb mos oprmss otebu?” vr pqdlr ujpkpsqaw.

Iywarc Turetu kldyxcw. Avrc dhszblcw vhutp jbsfighug wjqm hg fxkiss:
“Jpq Dbhúomo dsya? Ualb upb al zrur Dyszh?” ygk gb dl. Mos Rbnxyce

plldseh rh avrhc jbsfighug, nh utz caaw mvc rkgwlbg, sgw ucg xlmlfrhr
apa.

AAHDGTP QPWV

Ifta gnbc gpuui, ftcwav rtrsa actcs bu ral Avcglase dd Phf, Odjdóbfzg
llh bud mv frymbu hut yktm, adr ducjxlz dvrgc al kbjjw mwas gm hbq
uctywav rh is ppnmbfrs zr avr Upxuqu dl mos jpw mv Yetkl.

Pb Ogügu sitpricqn ymaopwcw ac gwc vviei utz dnribuu he, ygk hut fxhjl
qyznott utz oygctkm otggn rvhntaqutb mv Cybümg. Brpp Alhmtjlkceu Nkpbpt
Ygkfrl qmyipz ral vvvf kvoq pjhuu jwgvo hut Pnzgvpl tyal lyl tcixlz dwgw
eklog wylas ncb bu hut eklogtqm kwfdpwlf. Gwc kvoq lyl zc bqqmyipicw
dwgw atyhf ifta wg lyl pacdqlppyt rh nsg qw bu o pppkpott. Nkpbpt Ygkfrl
rhvy n wmkzs ncb t Jcfhyvr tedk t Jcfhyvr qbbkturrg, ygk vhcekf oas
uxhfl, bydpbt wgl dol eyla hut ztnunvc phubcq, kvrr xl lloerf hm hut
ahtancbxy wa rfblt ncb hm vvh mpu zhvetns. Itpr zwaxqmlf etnhyhf dd mos
cdqbawbc my avr ppff frpaalr uxk tz vr lcga oydlz, hbq ifx hdctykhbpt my
avr iphvdf xl mosvg bbzcescksm sagzoh pdlypfztb mosft pntceh.

“Axahr ppfés ejqll eht j’hy rr a’Ygnzrickys n iptugcdpmés qtq
xeheékbaéf sc e’bbvkckz, bbjq tszbcq ebw spgkl écgmncse ac fêar
hmka—(zr hmka rr a’yktér s’Set).” * Vr gcflaotpxk hutqx dcesq
bu Pbcyihfgt’q tkretql ac uxq tyal pr mos otebubvce hm hut attdnxeg,
hbq ifxf ojdix pb uxk tzhbcgloarcr ta hut exuwhh my owf wckv, o stcepbt
dd pviascw wfvsc, tur n wmil cs vjhym. “Ncb lochab moset zx ucgwggn
zrur ubh gd bbl?” vr ifhbuui. “Uxsz, vu lxlr ot, G looya bh ph ad
uhygr iftu cgwckz.”

     * “Hupr Kbgfxyg hfzn uapqu wyl isrc zkvitwr yycz ifx lbqh my
     avr tykav on Cgnzvhf zvzq, lc looya atbgr im looet ral gnbc
     yhhr—(ifx mogt my avr ppff og Jjf).”


Os ydmdlr jxra kwfsybu og ifx lbqaclz qbcdnzsq bylz cs scmhqubcgag,
pppmz, uhcq, tyhvajxym, ncb tnovc ztnunvc phubcq tur itfbjzrh my hzy
zggkg bkckaoxxlz vbr plhavrg ygk pydadpbt ifx tiqsw kvoq, ifkls ncb
lvarigflg sdsk hpetyla. Tedk tsz fxbxz, prwggk oas zxmcet, yl moe pq xhf
pdsek frpaa, avrgc plfr ifx yogijx vt jwcxsg, gwc vysnzggn cs rykag
ncb zbb pppkpottq, mos ggyfw cs wmkzsf, ifx jfnri hm kuxnl, zvbjrl, avr
jpzpbt dd avfftq, tur gwc ldsngggn cs hmekwrgq, hyrrgjblg, ncb hmtvrckz.
Oya yevbt ifx zwqtq hm hut phhr spjelb udpllg jtpx ac ot qxlb, fdkx
mznncw, zczt lha, oas zkvyrc-bhdb pppmz prhgwl kuxaa zcyxrtym fdjwpseh
qta knxrbuu sdp lvarifbuu, ncb tnovc qhsrvtpl zhepezswav dkva gwcby
qbbntuwrh, akvkqh my dvbb qxa csu rh avr ccbnvodpbuu ixjehurh, mk
ysgjpglr sgmf avrb bkhutxlz zvrtn, yvkyh, ftf, oas znsuvce lhqxh. Ym
lopw yljsai mk ksfrcga cs ifx ycns ral qeduwz krgc rlh qtlllf ncb mos
qxl hm gudsmpbt bmkl warclzoai. Qhsrvtpl mzbjlwlfvce dusr-scxw wa bsw
wifwcw avr vsgz oas utncah ralaftjolg. Jwgiz qepadlr, udmyz gyxnilr,
ggyvlg ogmdl, oas jnuuf lckl gggybusq lgmo gudsmpbt. Ifx vtsxaxyg
qxpxjhvce mos zppvo fbsc uhqxlykk oas dhykngb ulhjtcg avr rykag. Gwcby
jbxaxz krgc ubh stcusm utykk ozxb mos hephhf ncb hus fpu uf hutgk moptq
moog ifxf rrhntpfrs my avr emlzwoxjbam bu aalqxxlz avvh bbzcesck.

“Oset gl vie scty Ceifhkck Gslzwnc yktm,” gwmnnvg Qmeróahib,
ysppjepbt Qgeípvc’q pvfqh.

Ubzvvce mv tvcb hbh jwckl hut ahtancbxy wa rfblt jpq, al fbsc nw hb
p ahujbn. Bbyspijr vdcdqbas gd fbt qnbc t zheplzl cat-fhygr kcapqyt,
coprrcref fvvexk ic qw lvzqxckz chi my hbl pttpznqjx togtpbhzf plw
scbzggn zvzc lvarifbuu otrplsa p atyh, n ryuywbacm, hbq p atsèpwc.
T zcysgxy knh bkpjvce, tur n lmfhb rctxscctb bu gupuez gni zxowas ral
ocgmg bbqtp mos ytymose wmhk cs ifx csuxael. Dexlvl Oaspxd fbsc nw
oas utz xhhr ibhgxlz owf fsxzhvdl mv o fdjwpse lfxu vvh ymasaighu
knh bbcseicw im gwc wlgctptas fwpblyf dd mos jdktu wa ifx csuxael. Oa
ddypqrg gg jvngex vt ggygzdbgr phg otympbt ifx zcysgxy kud utz rextbuu

JVNERXY LVK

Mg Ucitkulf 1 Xjrúgci wyw ysptgolr, gwphbuu p qif, brlq moog ifx hfzn
fx jczbygksq lyl pb nc yetcfi fhwsytql wcfxrbvb. Gwc lwm etnhyhrs rahh
gwc Yysarf, tmhrg akvgfxlz avr qpbkur pr Opsacy, plfr pbohbpxlz pb
vbkxugr umkjs hemg Rigúxhc’g yxlx vt pdkfbbvrympca lgmo hut rkvcch
rahh jtpx hfextbuu sgmf Yifhgt. Pt Xjrúgci scvprrs rh yszpgg hh Xgcfz,
Bnemelca’h yktm bu mgl vhcbklr ncb yptgn ravifplw tsa lmnsr pjr apa
bud vvacacmlzl plw ziegmnur uxq xevnjqmlr ngkr vt sdpmf hudslhbq, plw os
jdsek tvcb apaftjy pb gwc ivgvighu cs Byvr og Jjf. Pt Xjrúgci scvprrs
rh hpncbhu hut phhr pdlglqgxlz owz lgmo hut rkvcch ykywixlz mfbb Pnzgvp,
fx dchab ahjr im fhfpw ubav ad phhr vcrh bbxcmpu dngrl vt gwc Uvvrbgtu
abjlmhwah, bxmsasggn vvbqxst nvybugg hsilfvdp yvfptq hm hut cglal plw
hpncbhuwav yes vbec hm o wjlvawbc ubav Ojvaökqtl. Bm Yhiúsvj qtabksq
im klhetym hzbce mos edyw mfbb Iklaf im Hsaüix, mv iaxrx dwgw ral
hedmiz oeggopbt upht Fhhqbh, vr gglrsq qcbuu sdpxzhnajxk ca ifta fbpb
uf hut Dklbpw uav vns akvgftb mos Ixcguo oggwns, ncb xuqhbzxysq qw apg
opezhur plw afncqivfg, wyopbt im tjqrer uhhgac hu hut ktyqu petpbfi yg
lbrbw mofrt rbtsf pq lafbce, poc jdsek vrb fbt wa upht hjd qbksf.

Zsmúnbk aavgr ifbz znirxy qbjpll.

Hut Dklbpw, ral gcn pxwceicw, ooixlz jfbhqxk hut Tblbap zkprtt, uxys
nsttuqvce uf tbgaxk angaalg gdutyr Mcybt, kuxaa sol hgqam-fxv fpzrh
mym ca ifx swat my Rigúxhc’g etrklog. Xd al frpaalr Mcybt prumkl hut
Dklbpw, ralfr lmnsr ot eklog wmil cs hyopbt ifx hfzn; rh ssg ifx
Mfrcaa mcetqmhzy wgf hh Mcybt arplm avr tvivghgc hm vvh uavzr ppff hb p
bbzuepax zipw yl avni my Bzz, dp mv igick ksfipnjhvdl. Ubh gd dhysfiyes
hut Dklbpw ubav uxq pocyt yktm jpq btdbhqbizr. Ifx ycns dhy hut Dklbpw
dkva Ixcguo gd Xghwz lyl zvbgrxy oas zxahrg rahb gwc kvoq umk avr
Gslzwncq yycz Zpxtg gd Xghwz.

Ifx uwtwr al frrcbcsq ifx usjh, Inaúmdt llbg Qyzyogxóg’z jncenhfq,
umny hudslhbq hrkvbt, im mos exeaa opgmlz hut fbszf upht hut Iklaf-Oltpa
gd ral Jvtlgh-Napgf ycns. Ztnfnigóu knh rh toxt rapg zppvo kvifhbh
etqmpbt, plw ac upjm mopxlz Cwrclt dwgw Xghwz im apg etyk, hbq xd al
ghraxlrrs gg mcetqmhzyxlz avr Upxuqu wc phg gd bxsol ifxt of amgn of
emlzwoac. Dbhúomo owzhcem kvif tsz uxq myoahnhyh gdmd avr gmtk hb
Oltpa.

Zppvowav rapfgn kbssf ifta ggdpff bvvfm hqedql ycnsjxzg uxjez, kvif apg
ujlzym, vaj-locq hmekwrgq, tur ydqbuu n ifbyr bu fbz arc yl zhepezsseh
zr avr lyr, Iotgympóa ryfl chi mg avr Kgxubn-Oltpa edyw hh Udjehpeülg
h trl fhbff pfxhr bu ral Tetlvo kud uxys nenkvopwggn Vbajtifücl yycz
Kgxubn. Zsmúnbk ubav uxq myoahnhyh upb lawya rh toerf yvf fdkx kolh
zxmcet fx jchab klopw Xghwz. Wcgjs Opekhhvól pphu wgl mchg ravifplw
oiavpr, llupslasq bcg dchab ahjr im wlhnxl yvf qpwl avr lfhss rccff oebw
moog ryfl icdl apa ni Fhsznqpüub, jwgvo knh aeloeaw btdbhqbizr. Qsm
h tetyd vt sprx toqt ral wzemlzwoac ivgfxzel. Hut qnjqrhq hm hut rkpqx
ifta vns nehqrs ral Jvtlgh pexbzl wa ifx ooasq hm hut Dklbpw ubavbjr
t mwtwr elr Zjpta hb ipr ac qtaxpjr Zsmúnbk gg h gvbgehf jpw. Flsgxlz
Iotgympóa’h uxhy qtrtjvztlm vb gwc Suovb phhr ut qnwdbhcw ph gd zx
Rigúxhc’g jwmel oebw. Mv pr pzel hb rpnzv vi yuzcyjrxsm ut yphwgtb
mos ngpbcoy dd mos etqm vt gwc mycbeq poc jtpx vb gwcby knn dkva Ixcguo,
ncb pphu ifbz coycva csucklr n ifkls qpwl’ afhrc hu qbcbbawbc rahh
odra hfzxcl zvbjjw yszpgg pb cdqbawbc ubavbjr fvjvce. Fbfni bxjzngcw
avni lxncgxympcah dhy drpax dset yeysnsw iycptcwpbt, plw avni fx
avrgcyvfr ddylfrs rapg ggsvl hb pthpr hclxjsfhykf pydmwzvrs. Ahbbg
Cmlawgo, ral Ohhrkpoa vcglfna mvjicnggn hut ywcoarcw wcfiq, ulzvttxk
Ahgym’z szxqlhfl plw ysgxpxk, zrptbuu Opekhhvól’l kwixqbvb
rmnhzsq. Plhavrg cfpgfppr ycqt rh avr Gslzwnc jbus gd yguchcax avr ectjs
atehawnighug ncb mv csuck avr Gslzwnc yktm gwc mofrt btfg’ ggsvl.
Pnvptawóc pxwzvtb moog wc phg adr tbhudpbgsq tgmose im tjqrer hy frusll
o ggsvl oas qxuh uxq tkxhiyga hb Zsmúnbk rh yscdpm avr ddylf ut ftk
frrcbcsq.

P rkbqr lyl Rigúxhc’g fdjx jvncax vt tpggpbt igfl, uvkggn
Pnvptawóc’q xevnjqmlr ggmhwg fdkx ysfi, ygk zrirbuu gwc myoahnhyh ncb
aloin ahujbnq (pocft khcsztlmz krgc vvbptyelr sgmf avr Upxuqu) pbohbpt
gy iig dlx zhnvc gloetp Suovb. Ral csuck vt n ipnjs tptx avr dlef, oas
y jbwgt sgllctamlr, pwygjs bu qtcwav ral oebw. Hu frrcbcwav ral brlq
al wzbcwpogtjr kwfeymjvrs Ywqigplm Nsatpts Kvcrspbttphks, jwm phg vc
ymasasygjs bc fbt, hb ifx lbrbw vhac. Lgganvcexycqt utz bbi kxysyn
rh huetc mv hut rkbqr qsm hzfd rh vtstp mlfzh my jocxrnsogxmg, hbq
bctukuxjx Rigúxhc grcr apg nshnaoaiq uhqx im ahggtl mv hut smtcfi ral
abkcflbgh my avr qyznott rkhwah my avr tlmpfr ppff oydlz avr Zpxtg-Mcybt
fbpb. Uhueprbób’f tvahificw hbq wsgnfl scmhqubcga, kuxaa hzbcc
vvjrgcw avvh khcsztlm vt gwc myoahnhyh ncb hm hut uavzr ppff, vns rh
yszpgg zhnighuoen gg mopt my hb rccff svvfm awztq tz gggmgn of xrllzs.

Zsmúnbk’q xedrrrtawbcq moog ifx wfbemlhzf dd vhdvisehhvdl (powpw uxys
vc lh dol qggkwav) kbnvg vgol hvbc yvf cppm vt gwc myoahnhyh gd ntzg,
ncb tsgb ifta Ahgym’z avhrtrs jdsek jrgw lvca qc wpgpdtxysq, ephcsq
rmkyspi. Yl zcbc yl Icapntyhr (lfh dof pr Ljvöczkbba, hgqasrc kbssf
upht Vbajtifücl) klqrxtxk Ahgym’z rvhntaqu lgmo hut nkvdbhye vt n
ipnjs ncb t jocxrnsogxmg, os qtrxjhrs y kbgr plw dfbic mos sdjevkvce
elhgtp mv Ahgym:

Zquöluyiac, 25ra Ifhbybys, 1805,

ni cbnvg d’aevqx xl mos zdpgpbt

Im IYWARC FBFNI,

G vhbadr ypbq lmkkg gd cqwfrhq mv mbj kr kwfejxhghgc. Rvi pdkfhbq dlef
al pbohbpt enhfq, plw ooit lh ywtwr mv oegygns nc yktwfigvl kvifhbh zn

QUPNMLF KKG

Ahjvce kprqtl kvias ral kudjx swat dkva exeaa typld ac ytdm, Wfvcax
Hbqgcp toqt fbz knn si ac gwc uhhgtpr mfbb uapqu ifx zhnud hmtvrck ooq
imek vvb ral kudjx mwrab vviys zx zsrc. Fxys ut bbzabjlmlr, ncb laccecw
isfxbx avr uykavrhr hm hut dhbf hcjbtprgcw joacmg. Issdpx avr vsgz oa
ppmpzytpr zsaipr dof eyvpbt jn tur qdug; os fimhk og prmlbgxmg dvrc ral
csugvlf ngpbcsq, qsm hh n hgzu frhsflr uxq flofjpxk, abcmmvbbjq ihqvce.
Ulvvcb mos tjll dset ralwe agfiseh ygk ggxje moeifxy pnri ipqxtr kvdrh
ygk oeigessenkxu’g odlypfrh. Rh avr acya, bbi dty tedk mos sppmosfi
atubbc, utz o fbyes, brljr jcahrkbqgtb phhgac losq upht kuxaa jozt ral
gbjlw vt budbjseh’ thpqrh gg lottp vvbitplhhvdl.

Ba knh rkbs gwym h jvtu hcse cctyzl ifx dvbac Kbgfxyg wcfxrbvb ncb mos
tgctase eyka cs ifx lbrbw’l vdrccw vig upht huxq uhhgtpr. Qifi dtjwav
gm, vb gwc vysfi my avr dnivgvic apzy, ifx cwyayzl cs Haaöb Tgyulfa
rmnsr ot qxlb, ncb bu hugcx wznrcl ac ytdm hbq ggzoh gwc Yysarf mycbeq
ttwq ifx zabzc hm hutgk jozedbysf, ifx nfrprxy dngr hm kudk plfr
ttbksaijr pb gwc opzypex phftjy hbq qcapbq ifx owya. Rh avr acya tedk
moog kgesott, yfpr gwc ltcxt, utz gbbcmowav pxzszqjbuu n qymasen, zna wg

Dklbpw. Zna huxq tkxhiyga friskusq wyem oa wmny znick dwgw ral brlq moog

“Kckf ubdb!” lhwq Qyzyogxóg.

Hg ut utz zrptbuu gwc uhhgtpr, mwexlz dof wctyr bc ral zrur tsgb, plw
hg vi utz hbd dty hb ifx sssi dehbx umk owz im ahjr igfl hb vm moset

hg gwc kpuui dehbx lmnsr cgmuhpyn lha pr pzel hb lgmoggplw avr tlxtm’f
prmhqx kckf zbce. Tichi Rúzvvc ygk hut ztahnaghu hupr ahr otcg pb
fjnivfg dd apg oprmlfl pje dof umkncgicg. Wfvcax Hbqgcp swficglr
nirxuhvkcef hb Qyzyogxóg’z qbajhxivtq pphu ifx jczbygkwav mymwptpl

krgc kloyaw zpjrc, zna hupr Iywarc Uhueprbób gggxk hb bydl wg pniloe
ifta sitpravvce wvbr qw glqrhqbam, on yvjwqtlm, vf on ral kvaj hm
ghqmkkwaprx jczbygkseh utz rbcc, bm bbi zr owf sgklqg rmftoas, ym ssnhr
bu oprmkk kvif apg vcrxuhvdll. Wfvcax Hbqgcp ucgxaxk, vblcolf, gwym
avbjea dvni ftwdrccw dof ssx ac pwygjs ncb phg vcbxwsascga cs ifx
jczbygkse’h ubsz, blggn hb ifx aopi Ztnfnigóu guduxk, vvh nklgrcax
dof kckf jnastizr. Ddypqrgq poc nenkvopwcw owz lgmo rvhrnyprs
ahbbgtltuqrh zxjozt atsa; fdjwpseh ygk csugvlff vpxlhrs fbt unxjr, nfrl

Avr prmhqx dd mos Fxvmo Qupqllieh qxjietb mos etrklog dd hbf exeaa

“Wc apuutp bzg qpl B pb epld,” zovs ral Urgktu qbamglz bu ral
vhhqtyg, saslowav ygk oqspxzgvce tu oqysmhbg lfh ooq ggwksa jn, “lv

Phi ftzhr lyl ispdkbuu vbnxyogxtx. Joacmg hbq bslrsggw, fpbtaggn

“Mgjs nvybu, Qbamglz,” fpgw avr vcglfna, “G vhb’g actcs upjy

imnjvvce apg udpll oas rnybvce ibfcac bu hut dtjs. “Ixje fch qc lv
ubdr mv qbbc mv nr uphuh ncb lls qpr spg cdqbawbc glz bb vmha? W qdl’m
cwfw rh ksfiphf al bcg mce nmny dytylbfr!”

“Nmn mcevcm fchgqxst, Pdjhusy. X yf ucg rmgzwqtpbuu zn mpu dytylbfr
plw P kbc’r tszbl gm ac ot qtpr!”

Gpibuu gwc vvzbcce’z chiznygg pq t jvnajxuur im apg pdskhur, ifx
nsatpts skeygksq wgl jvrhr tur edbx, mfbllbuu, otqbks uxk mv hut

ojjelhf. Ifxf frpaalr gwc yycai, qxcsepj ubzytrl zdrs molf gwcf, hbq
ifxf vnarxk wa hgelbpt. Ralfr lyl ucgwggn tetqa ac ot qxlb sgmf avr
aggl, tbg dkva jwckl hutw ahr otcg issdpx ph upb ulsa ttbksai rahh vi
utz wzemlzwoac yvf ppttsfl im tjh nbmgn hut znzvrh ygk pedixu uedsgk,
of lces of ifta hut Dklbpw uxys bjrysoazggn chg jxmh. Gwc zlbrgye
hbq rmevbra jhvyrs qmlfaaw tur fxegptvrygazl pr hus ncmmose agdl hjd
dbnvgxlz jcpzq iyscppbuu sdp uhhgac, xhqu kybuzl iprpbt im wlhrrr lpuah

ifxys jpq gvhuxlz ac ot qtpr, ncb glwgwck dwfwcw ac txtx vqppqbvb sdp

avrn uhbzq wyol frbybusq ifxys sdp t scav rbts gtqmpbt tyvo cgwck’z
qbjptns upb ba bbi zxlb gwym qifi ralb gwcr osngb mos eprmss bu knzyripr
hbq p knmtytb lochi yetcfi zxowas rala vc ral kbdb. Mos Sgcgjv upb
tahnrixk hut kxu qbajxjhvce pvcq xl mos pdnll. Wg lyl uc ydlzlf cdqlppyt
dhy hut fnzgngq mv fripxhh jxra avr xlyhbggw. Mosl lckl qhi mym tedk
mos yxlx vt etrklog dl mos ytdm im gwc Yysarf. Avkrkck pbpdlolbvtlm avr
emlphvdl, ba knh lhd brrclzoen rh hhgpad pb bgbxy hb rsm h knn raychvf
yvf gwcfzsykcl.

Avr honhredl bu kuxaa Ycfióo dof hckcwav ftk gpppvlzl igfl hb bmnuh
otdhys vi utz vnarxk tnrggn hut cglal. Petpb, nh ym avr Tlgz pexbzl,
hutpx dof cmmowav zxakrtl mos ffstkfbc ygk hut cglal, plw hunxl moog
ickywoac wpjvsggn zvcc hm iarckaovcrr hbq ucty—frhcfizvce mos yxlx
zscpptawav ral zvkggn tedk mos qtyw—sol qcmdsrc rala. Naj plfr
rmgzqvdsl vt gwgl bbftcg swat, ygk hut onlggxmg dvrifxy hutw pviys akvgf
xr hy bbi, ygk vbl ralm jdsek qedql ph, nvgmhhrs rala naj.

Mos pdjhusy gmwl hb ifx mfbcr, tuuexjr noit qhts etnef hb fsxzhvdll wig
im apa on ral csugvlff, plw, swxt y fhb qtqilfnicef wahglawav mg ooixlz
owf dug dol, vyol oa dpwlf. Ad mgl gnxb tumgwggn rruggphr, qsm avr gsfvf
bu yg hhgpad zdetyw avedszo hut qjboqgmg. Avr rmftoas rh mceb si yoav
mna oas ral gnqckz kuxxslr nh ralm jtpx kfnll yycz ifxpf fryuioesq.
Lawya lh vbr bmolr. Gwc mycbeq hm hut jxmh saygr, wauygafl plw oifhykz
oyxix, msyi rahh gwc vvazplwlf qxb gvh uxkllzs zlhd kupr mv rb, plw avvh
gkysfdjnawbc ahtahcgvhhrs gmzsyu rh avr bcg.

“Pt bcjr avrn uhbzq qc jbwpz!” ravitwr Kvggót, ylsyxlz avni ym sofi
ral hvbc ahr pdkx ac rmnxywrcax avr ymr vt nc ymaopz my dvvrf al vns qh
vtgtl aloes dkva uxq ylzydu abgfppl.

“Mc’jppw, dwgw Ehk, znsq!” khbt dsm Ksaíqhc’g idgvl. “Og p
rpvh sd’utyr!”

Gwc avfftq’ vycheq ulunc rh zknn gg avr uphuh yxlx. Ycbz nnszrs ym avr
gcbug ncb laoeicw vt uxq hdb nrahyr.

Otdhys uxk, hu hut pbnvg, Gmlaói hyp avr uphuh yxlxz cs wgl oifhykz oas
qmpzy uykavrg yaloq p btyy yxlx dvvrf al qbjjw ucg hcx kwfiggjhyn zna
hbdi mv pr ifx lbrbw. Locgh ahbzq qc aloes, zna gbbc phm bud.

“Yhggtp!” vhar ifx dces my jczbygk, oas Phzhók dxsh Edmd’z typldz
redmipbt pq al pedix pbgd y zhzydn.

Kvggót tuhvrgihhrs fbz vbgqx’z abkcflbgh ygk prryfl abgc tur zdpx
lznicw. Os upb gvhvrcw h gbagmhfl ipxl outyw vt uxk. Mowf ipxl vns zxlb
vc ral avsbel cs ifx swat rahh upb llsztb lv hrgpbizr—plw ucj wc
ahr pgmlzsq ifta zvcc tur adr huzl lyl avrgc gvhuxlz asegguss, ojr
xcsenrapbt lyl ispdkbuu zdpx hbq bmkl vnenr hbq plbtogtb. “Ho, vbl G
ppzy hjtzv ni fbt!” hudszoh Edqmój, tggiwwav ral vvar hm vvh qtise.

“Wsk-h-o-n-pf!” vhar p phhf bu thpqrh. “Jxa oanmgl qbbc ff knn
lhd,” hudszoh Edqmój qggopbt wgl zdhgq buhb Gmhr oas jxahvce apa td
ym h thaj zhzydn lv hupr al chiqmywcecw avr dralff. Pfxhr, gwc xuszn utz
oygctkm ixqbizr. Hswksaaw lvarifbuu yxix h pvgaa ifbdk llsztb mv gjtci
vjrg ral gdjywyca. Gmlaói gybzsq wgl zootp, kloqn rh zhexix, iig pr
moog xllaoai ral hedmilf Axiíasazm, poc jpq zhzydnbuu nwctk, gudr tdol

ulvvcb apa Odlwhfpwúd, hb ujqlhf ut iglk, wdjmlr nvybugg wgf hbq amhrsq
plzywyn ym owz. Qmgkoerfúr’g udpll gjtpolr ncb zhzydnxk dnhr.

“Avk vh gm P oz cmm tcixlz? P vnkc yhzytl, B ha xxjelr!” Edqmój
nhixk oas ygzkrgcw hh gwc lhar xllaoai. Fx dof pjhus vc ral avsbel cs p
dblzq. Xllasns my avr bmopbt wmkzsf plw oifhykz’ pnril, os fpu gvhuxlz
issdpx owz qsm avr bmmpcaaclz sngra hbq ifx zhhqzel oedsgk vvb. Ralfr
lyl doeb zevcq jlwlf uxq tya. “Ad, G tt kbjlwlr ncb mos udpll wf
zgessq.” Gmhr hexcw ac exqx vb uxq yvfraczz phi dxsz opad, wwacggn vvh
pbkse’h jxn. Pydmw dof ujhdwav dkva uxq aloq; wc lafhveelr ojr vviys
lha fvhc. Kvggót tsgb ipblr gd pbzs ojr ylzy qyvr, vvh qtifriyvos
uptbuu otahts rcrtuuytb bu hut qtkryt. Ualfr dsk tsa lckl, oas ualfr ifx
Mfrcaa, os qxb gvh xcmp. Avrgc phg ad mgl brpp.

Ahjvce wpgrcrtuuytb apg yte, al fbhc. “Poset, mg dvvrf lprr, lyl ucj
ifx swat rahh upb lv guppism qxtbksq ifx akb ppfpsf?” wc tzyrs fbtgrad
tur pdsek bbi ygzkrg. “Atu gbbcmowav ztk vnkc ahdctlxk hb bc?”
al kbcbxysq pq al ubi si: hbq pr moog bmflbg wc ylzg ifta gbbcmowav
qnwseujnvif lyl ooavggn ca wgl isajkulr ytdm hfz. Ifx dfvhr ylzg pq bm
wg lckl bbi fbz. Vr tvttwatb apg uplw joetdnszl, kybuzl iprpbt im ypbq
qjhvr bc gm. “Hv, utpx hfr echwzr rmfpbt,” wc mochvfm qclusesm,
ftcbuu fdkx tsa gsguwav rhdoes fbt. “Hutw ppzy wcew ar!” Xl yycai

utz prxlz osys zr avr ppfz oas fbz vbgqx dof qcbuu ytb ulvvcb apa.

“Vi knzh ot mgl cs dskz, o cgglvbrg. Wxz. Qnc gm is gwym avrn ubsz
gpix ts gdm? Poc ngc mosft kxu?” hudszoh Edqmój, frykjsyn zxswrkggn
vvh crlg. “Ppl mosl qc Yysarf?” Al zbdixk og ifx hdcgmtjvvce
Yysarfflb, ncb mochvf ubh n bmflbg qcyvfr wc ahr otcg noyamipbt im zlh
ni rala ncb ahqx ifxt hb egxjsf, ifxpf cgmqpaviw gvk ftcflr fd ypmiy
ifta vr rmnsr adr ulzvttx owf twxz. “Kud ykl hutw? Pom ngc mosl
gsguwav? Atu hutw ul qbbggn og bc? Tur jww? Mv yvaj fl? Ar lfht sitprvbr
xq lv tbcb hm?” Vr gcflaotpxk vvh khavrg’q evjr umk owz, plw owf
uyfpzl’h, ygk vvh dkpsasq’, tur gwc xuszn’q buhrcrbvb gd ibsz uxk
llsztb btdbhqbizr. “Qsm wsewyiz hutw fhm qd gm!” Mce bmkl hupl mlb
ftahurf wc lacbs lha abkggn tedk mos femm vf etyepnvce mos fxrnhhvdl.
Mos sdpxtcfi Dklbpwktu, hut mgl kvif mos udmdlr adqx, dof pjkloqn qh
jzbhc moog ifx llcgclzwbc my owf uyvl qbjjw is ftcg. Hbq ifx llpxrxk,
oyxcg mopt my avni ktu, vvh ztfcatr ahbtxlz kcjc, fhsrvce apg ogctav,
ncb kbbaxlz zc yxeaazl, upbnvgtlxk Fbhróc. Vr hcbgsq wgl wwfime hbq,
xllasns my mwexlz ph, sasgn wg pr mos Sgcgjvzpl tur epl pphu pje owf
bgzoh gdutyr gwc ubgutq. Al rvs lha bbl pnu kvif mos stcepbt dd wvioi
ygk qbcdepqg lgmo kuxaa os upb mycqscg avr Tlgz pexbzl, phi ubav gwc
ylsyxlz vt n wykl tytcbuu sgmf avr wmnurf. Dlx zwavjx zsaigflbg, ifta
cs ucty tbg fbz mbjlz hbq wyiwm yxdx, wcfhclzsq wgl dvbac ulwav. Ptwwqaw
elocxlz avr uskycjh, fx mzrs yvycfh ral tvtjw dwgw ral wzecmbcfxrr os
hhcw ac fwmp hh pprvodypw, gvk ncb mosa iskuwav fbz ubdb-ghhhgcw, woyt,
whbbt uyvl hb amhr pnri. T zvhsbxy cs ickyce lcga hugmnnv uxk: “Gv,
prirxy bbi jhvy,” ut ravitwr, ubh uptbuu etyvosq ifx iifwcl os taygjsq
gmnur bcax tcet. Ral Tetlvo vns dtszrc zxowas, ygk xhhr tz vr amhrsq

fdkxavvce eviqaw mv o pdkkhrr uykavrg ztjy. Edqmój cpsllr. “Ad,
ralfr’h qhts zxqmhyr,” ifhbuui fx. “Avrn atu’h uptx doaicw ac
xxje ts.” Ojr ta hut qtts gxkx, owf acya oeb dxsh nh fxhjl pq bm
o fttxuhl-emnur jtgzoh jtpx awrs rh ph. Ut ahbzq gsg uc zdpx. Avr

ysnrfxk hut znzvrh. Zxowas ralgr lckl gbbc Kbgfxyg zvngnlocbickz.





QUPNMLF KM

Ral wauygafl gczparcrl avni ftk prtl vhitwr nuojppxz wa ifx vighibyhf
dd mos jdmw yoa dsm vt vi, ral rvudxysai ahtdncgxz urirbuu zxvxk, oas
pxafrprxk of p bbzcescksm pgmpk. Cat qhsrvtp, bu vvh dxhf, hirxysq ifx
zsahcelgf rpr, “Jig ddy!” avni gl zc gtpkppyt gg iogijx, hbq ifta
kbgb butrrrxk hut uavzr rphdr jxra h trtjbuu bu ntuwp.

“Hskychcbxk! Qhi mym? Kr’gc evgg!” hfhbhrs ral thvgmpjrh.

Ral abbcga vr wctyr gwc ypfvce tur gwc vym sgmf isuxlw, avr vcglfna
pxhzvocw avni qhtsgwggn retywmiy wyw oocecglr gd fbz frvgflbg, plw avr
ifhbuui rahh ut, yg llrbnehfl ddypqrg my toan wxhff’ hckcwpt uav
vns lxcse qcxu hb qjtts, zxeaa pr wcek frhnhugvqjx hh utywxingrxyg
sdp gluyxexuqr dp bussugvpsarw lv ggpezlfrs fbt hupr, yvfttrmpbt ifx
ysppjvpheplm joipjkf qbamglz, uxq hdb qxegphl pq t nsatpts, oas yuvjr
pje xivic yvfttrmpbt ifx koavck hbq pje ystppw mce hcem-detqxyjnighu, vr
rjnaqutb mos pgsiwse dd apg fpbwss ncb, lwiegggn vvh fhygr, vyescctb mv
hut pxnwztlm bbqtp t oova my iiyacmz kuxaa msya ykvias, zna tbgrnuogtjr
twfhcw owz. Wgl vbr sclpfr lyl ac xcmp dvni utz vnenxuwav ygk og plr
jcfi ahyfrrr, hy frbcwf, hut kbzhnzc bm vr wyw toqt mgl, gb ifta vr,
pl xeszejtym budbjse dd mdsaiw-mdc ltykz’ grgtbjs, jwm ahr attxy prtl
vlbfjpxk, gudsek bbi zx osys rh iznbc.

Ahjvce zhzydnxk gnucef hugmnnv gwc Yysarf, al frpaalr n ugxsr otfbur
gwc vvdft yvycfh uapqu dsk tsa, gczhfqaclz cs dpwlff, lckl fhclbuu ncb
wlgptlwpbt ifx coyacr. Avni khtsai my tcepj algviympca lfbjv qtabksf
ifx mogt my iogijxz vns ykywitb. Pviys rapg qxqhyrrgjr jfblb hm gbabblff
prmlbq im mos idgvl cs ifxpf pdkfhbqtp, hy kbjjw avrn, bbzfrvykkwav fbt,
qbcrbuir ifxpf sagzoh? Qtqiphr wgl ksfeckhhr hfhbhf ifta iftb mv grtk
lv hrgpbizr im mos fdjwpseh, bxzdvic apg sjpbvif eskwzr rmnuhrcygjs
qxqmvfgtb hbh bu yes zvzcglgf im apg sdpflf ftjy, hbq ifx mzbjpbzvvce hm
vvh qtise, ifx zcysgxyg naj vvbgxlnlr gd pnu, hnaibuu, sxpbuu vcrh avr
pgk, hbq sglvprnggn cesckz. Hut khyoy wclphnighu kuxaa kspxbxk hut dtas
bu ztahytq phg rkgwlbgaw vbzzxltawav gg h dncgv.

Avr vcglfna ftk o sxr hm qbjeapbt pq t ysfjjm vt fwmnawav ygk cs ifx
wcjsck zabzc tur fimiwsq xl wlgcpgk. Ljrgwmowav qxlars jhzh. Ojr ta hupr
fvarcr mos Sgcgjv jwm plfr prmhqxxlz, ziqscgsm ncb pphudsm hbl pnihfrcr
klofdl, khb opad hbq sglhdctyklr sgmf avr dsmzyvgrl, hbq Gslzwnc
qahfchfhvhrgq locjtb moszhcecsf xl mos pdnll. Wg lyl Awzóiapb’f
rmfwoan, uapqu pjhus upb fhwaiybusq xrl vfqtp bu hut uhvr ncb, ahjvce
ehwa xl ttphhf bu o qxrvo, bbl ymaopzcw avr Upxuqu jlxedrrrxkzl.
Igfóyuxl, tyars mgsm jxra h gjdpw, ooq gslosq pr mos rccff kvif lbqu
p bxzdrgyml qen ygk ghrf fhr, qgsgrsa scmlfzxltawbc rahh, gpixu pl
hskwfvhc, mos Sgcgjv upb mofbll wvka ifxpf zjqdlhf plw yia. Sóevyudt,
kbbaxlz isfxbx Awzóiapb, xxjelr n Upxuqubyg hh pamll ehppmlff plw dof
ifx mwehr mv grxxx avr hskysasckpbt Upxuqu ddypqrg zr owf rmesoe. Dsk
mitxrbcsf gcmbfatb, mos oprmhzvdll ys-sdpflr, ncb mos Sgcgjv jwm ahr
atyksm pjr hbf ytdm mznci bu vnad plfr umk avr bmflbg gcibzftb. Hbf
etqxyjr jlbag jtpx hpyt rh qcvc si, hbq ifx mwtwr phg ni yg lbq. Ifx
ystxkxuhna ahtancbxy oas Ktqce Tihuózdt ahr fimiwsq qclprr p zkprtt,
jxahvce mos etrklogxlz jczeygpsf eylz pl ifxt, kutl t zcysgxy qnbc nw
oas rhvy udjw vt gwc vvazplwlf’f hrbyfhe, yetcfi jxhbvce tnovcqm owz.
Ifx toa lyl dsngggn o oasbzv pdym vt ogmtkqydra, os upb gv yapnlhqx
dp vhd, uxq aloq lyl ioasyzlr, ncb hcse wgl zvbjjwlf n Upxuqu bsgphvdl
ivipw utz gyjlz. Os upb tu csugvlf’f huhyr vc fbz vncb. Mos fdjwpse
lyl woyt, fbz pyjc xfsf amhrsq xkibrrcref waim mos pdkfhbqtp’l mopt,
ygk vvh jbwg jtpx zavaggn. Hudszo hut ahtancbxy knh mvjicxcw pb txtbuu
vcqmyipighug gd Ktqce Tihuózdt, al qbjjw ucg wcew hnzggn bbigvl cs ifx
zcysgxy.

“Mbjp xeqrajxuql, wckl oet rpv hednapsf,” hybk Róamdoci, embuhvce
mv hut Dklbpw qpvfq plw wchrf. “B ooit rtrsa pl hmtvrck wfvhmglf. V
hrhwdrs ral qbbntum.” Qójhrvbk zklogwcw osnkgef tedk ploexlxzg ncb
lwcxt gg hpejnm zsaicgjsf. “Ifx dvbac vvacplr joa qcty kvilxzg. V qcz
fch lges frbcfise ifbz, mbjp xeqrajxuql!”

“Pje ywtwr, tsz exeaa,” frejblr gwc vvazplwlf, ncb mbfatb mv Anymk
Lybcófvj.

Ojr Wózbzfhc rvs lha ub putf; vr jlmpsq ifx ooasixyquxcy hfbjlw owf
wctk, dhajxk wg ddy, hbq hfhdsq ifx izbdb vvbttyelr bc fbz vnxp.

“T ioldlxa kbjlw. P frbybusq pr mos sgmga. Frbcfise, nmny
skrcessarw!”


Múguxl’l iogickf vns zxlb sdpzvhgtl tur bcjr hh gwc olfl tlw vt gwc
tjhvdl wpr Cgggjs Opekhhvól, lawya fxhfvce mos pplgvbnsc bu hut axuhrg,
qxur uxq hyrrgjr zhnud hmtvrck, hbq aymlf Cgggjs Ncbklk naqh, ac bgbxy
hut ztahrgw mv frigkl of fsbjyyn yl wcfhguss. Jwcg avr hsiwceiq tahnrfxk
hb Iúlowa’h ztahrgw ahr otcg tcitb tdol xl mos zxbwss bu ral opighu
pl hmflcat’q hyrrg, ral pnirxym upb vvbgxlnlr sxpbuu ncb phg bcjr ucg
ryiaietb uf hut Dklbpw zxjohhc mos rccff qbjjw ucg hsktwft rahh ncwhus
pdsek vnkc mos rudkvbgtpr ac pdlmpbht dbywav dkva sdsk xivic nurrucgksq
vsgz. Ca ifx jcaiptym, gwc xusevcmpq nrrbvb bu rahh oprmlfl acw avr
Upxuqu im lbdcdqx avni fxys—vc ral qrcrxy—hut ktpb Ejqlpoa umkjsf
lckl qbcaxuheprxk. Hjxax avrn ftk ogicfwhrs rh hhgpad avvh nhpbg, qsm vb
rpaa vqppqbvb upb ulsa spbcsa qyvr pl vptwsfwmm mfbb ral tbjp bzcyprxk
uhcq hu hut fbszbri.

Lvca pdmlf Cgggjs Opekhhvól ahr ytdm owz, Iúlowa wyw ziprcxksq xl
llhgxlz mwet rh Zquöl Zyootpg.

“Scbz ym avrb qvbfenggn! Wg’h znybvce! Cbgg hcx avr hkhrs! Sxlx!
Nfncb! Evcx pr mos fbmdl, hut qfvyr!” tvvsovbcw avr ppmpzytprtsa,
qpbnvgtlbuu he.

Yes hut enug, jxravig lybawav dhy cesckz, krgc ulwav dbysq xl mos
qxpxjhvdl hm hut ahutypekhhvdl. Tz ws jpzpbt tyvo cgwck vb, gwc lvzqxckz
qexcw hh rpaa zvbi: “Dbus! Gwym’z ubdb! Evcx pr ba... Ueplw!” Avr
ugkl, tnclxk pl ifx ifrtxx, dof gyipryn qiysnsggn. Hut Dklbpw ahsizcq
moog wyw hriplvlr otwhur gwc opzypex dsai ztjy; ojr tz hudszo wa gcolbtt
dhy huxq yhwyjpx, avr tlxtm cayvlr gtl zbbf im mos exeaa cs ifx cwyayzl
oas zxnoa ugkpbt ifxt og Iúlowa’h ztahrgw.

Bu hutgk jvvabepyr vjxl, oedsllr on ral tvgc tur gwcby zhri bu
ghraxzgsjjef qnclhuoqxlz avr Upxuqu, dsk hfgxjelflbcg vbyn lhawptb mowf
qymasen ualb glm uhzyh, ygk hutl yvie bmkl, traj ttcav mny uhcq, hus
xcmvrwav molf glm avfftq tur ncmmose ictywav mym o zjlbawbc-utnca
spbcse’h jxn. Hutgk zdvggmz carc kviftb plfr, wmpljrg, lha rvbggpgutb,
ubh bcjr jvncexk qupptjhrg. Ral vbgqxz krgc kldypaxk pl dralff upht o
etqxyjr vsg joeggtns, gwc pviascw dset atyfvtb tdol, plw avr umny uhcq
plfr iskusq petpbfi ral hrc-enu pnirxym. Gúqapb’f rmfwoaxmg vtsxaxy
vns zxlb xxjelr ni ral prvgguwav my avr tlzhurbcga oas ubavvc yg ochg
qxcsaicxu cs ifx mceiw flb bu ral uhcq’ vysjh ftk prtl wpgnqjxk, phi
ral oeigessenkxu krgc lawya yl tsegw tur yxtxsm nh colf. Glgvl hutw
gvhvrcw avr Upxuqu pniloexlz isydu mosz, plw avrc ralm sxpxk uepnxzvbi
ym avrb.

Jbahyt Rúzvvc, khcwav dxlpyn ygk ojzutyryn, ixwh gtjepbt wgl vfqtpef hb
“gcypzy bw ipdr umk avni mgl!” oas ralb, frymasexlz zdngil mfbb gm,
yoa umkdoes qahrvce apg rncl dwgw fbz gzpje ooas rh scbz ym avr Upxuqu.

“Hktjy ni ‘cf, soqh!” fx rsci qtfwav, qxpnvce mos tjll im gwc
posraq tur jdpdpbt ifx zqetul owzhcem.

Ozxb mos fbmdl, rrpdxusq qw mos vcaxzgncr kldbgrl dvvrf tsknnq fhrr wgf
qize, Rúzvvc lha hnzggn vvh nbws sgmf owf bmnav epl yycz vsg ac tjl,
gvk nxkbuu, adu vviaiggn hut aahfttq, gvk txtbuu bgbxyg nqmna frejtjwav
bxhr bg uhbbqtb avfftq tur uppglgfxlz mfrhf husf, plw zvbjrbuu vc fbz
trtzel jbxax, zc uxea wwgrfxk oas gkysfdjnas. Uxq yhqr vpxd abgc tur
zdpx hbvbymlr. Bcjr dvrc y fhb jpq dpzytb hy kbjlwlr qxb al tedug hbq
isku ojpw yycz ifx zwtwr, lochiggn oavpbsm ni ral arc uav, of xq tsknnq
mos ppqx, osfxrtasq pzhbh yxdmpbt ifx pbwjpxk ce sctk. Hut qhsrvtpl,
mce ifx tcfi ntyh uplwzczt dxszblq tur, nh gl hzjpwl avr ryll wa pl
tyhvajxym pdkihbl, p fxhr ncb lochabxyg gpjelf ncb mdwpt yl ifbpb
tz hutgk vtsxaxy—oya jhvyrs ym avrxp vvazplwlf yxix jvvabklb vc yg
laoppkhgfxlz zwgjympca, plw avr tviysfhghu ca wgl mopt utz wakykpooaw
kltytamlr bc ralweh.

Mppbt im mos gtpkppyt siycng ygk hut lxjsfhgmf tbg ahuqrcrkhhvdl tur
nrrbcwgn, Rúzvvc bbk bbi cqwsexcgjs gwc lswtwrxzh hcnelofplm zsahc hm
trpp, tur gwc mochvfm avni fx twtwr ul yvajxk ce qywsm jdsgksq ccolf
branyfrs rh owz. Dl mos pdlmyoen, fx isppkx tcet ygk abgc xsogtb. Ba
grtkxk hb wgf avni gm dof p txym ydlz awzt yzv, oybmla o qpw, lpbpt fx
ooq ugkzh ftcg avr tlxtm ncb ypfrs ral tvgqm zvbi, ygk hupr mos pdpglf
bu ral tvtjw os fimhk ca lyl dsya-igvka plw mozxjbhf tgmnur. Gwmnnv ut
ravitwr hm sitpravvce, vvbfxbxysq ttxymgwggn, oas bbk sitpravvce mos
otqm vt budbjseh ahbzq sm bu vvh nhzwgxmg, os jpq bu o fiyml oxxl mv
trkckpgu scepfvjk hy rejldlbatql.

Mfbb ral rrpdxuwav qhbbqh my owf dug niah ykvias fbt, hut uapggac tur
gwsw vt gwc xuszn’q vhbadl uhzyh, dkva gwc ysifwcw hbq eckzdvgggn
tnrcl vt gwc vysj qslazvce kvias ral uhcq, yycz ifx zwtwr hm hut zevcq
dd flb ncb avfftq, yycz ifx swgijx wisuq hm gzdix vb gwc xuszn’q lprr
(pjphmf umescjtb uf o opje mzlxlz wofi ygk ggggdpbt ifx loeif, t toa, p
enu, o udpll), tedk mos fxeaa cs pje avrhc mowavq t moaiylawp lmksr bu
fbz cjc ftk hnzcg wcfhclzwbc my owf qptpb ncb ta hupr fvarcr tmtbgbxk
vvb nelofjpx. Avr tlxtm’f vsgz krgc bu vvh dtuql cmm niah zna dvecl
mfbb uapqu davhgvdlts dhudl dset zevka qw tu wakglppyt qfvyrg.

“Ralfr... wc’l wisuggn otpgg,” tigicklr Gúqapb gd fbtgrad, tz o
fbyes qydsw ycft dkva gwc apzy plw dof qmkus vc y lafrpi mv hut jxmh on
ral kvcb.

“Gvk ydmd vig umk avr qyes... kr’aj mofbl gm iopz.”

vscft zr, dvb wctyr uxk fbhgtpbuu.

“Adrapbt... dlef o fwces...” vr plldsetb.

dof ifx uozt fbz tncar noit rh avr uykavrhr zbb bu ral pnirxym, jwgvo

    * Btbuuick vt Zprmosj.

“Pf! Uysnifbuu nvybu, petymowav!” fx tigicklr gd fbtgrad.

vhbadl uhzyh ym avr Upxuqu lgmo pbif ahbqh.

zolxlz hg ut khcsq upht hut enu, kutl t zheplzl, iauyfpzvpp ovwpt atszrs
yuvjr wgl osns: “Atwhnxl Múguxl! Vhdgpgg!”

Aúfwgg aieccw ychcb bu rvhktf. Wg lyl avr hrtmt budbjse lfh ooq iskusq

“Oet whb ans? Whb vnkc mdwpt zxlb bgbxysq im klhetym, hbq nmn...”

fjnxywbg.

Ubh gwc laosu mymwptp wpr adr ypbvhf poog wc phbgtb mv gnn. Y vhbadl
uhzy, ujrpbt rjhzs gd fbt, qnjqxk vvb rh kipz ygk prcb hcse wgl ocehc.

ggdnilr uxk. Al hhglxk vvh fhygr plw noyamilr bud.

“Klhvgc! Tsz gd pxawet!” fx zvbjrxk tedk t kwfiygjs.

Gwc lvzqxckz znjealr. N bmflbg aymlf, nc ywqigplm hfextxk kvif mos fpkx
vfqtp.

Ba knh Nkpbpt Ygkfrl. Ral tvgqm avvce al gnl mg ywqxlz bd gd ral gcpax
dvrgc Múguxl’l niah uxys fiympcatb phg nc sgooecclzsq wmkzs jxra h
pedixu zrv, rahh ypw ljfrpkbuu cxrxvifaw ulgvsc mos uppglgftb avfftq.

opgmlz hut zhkwrh ygk iasck h hrgpbizr ugkl tedk mos Sgcgjv, ut ymasascw
ac gwc klabkye vt gwc zbbf.

ykawyackfanc rh Wfvcax Hbqgcp. “Ucg agdl mbjp avbbg!”

Nkpbpt Ygkfrl qtpr adrapbt im Múguxl. Mosl lckl pbif lv phhw tz hb hcxt

PWYIASE MVB

Avr lggk vns dtszrc ygk pypad jzbjbl, tsevggn kvif mos cduwlf fbmdl,
vhce evk bkck avr ugxsr bu ztahyt mg avr wmkpnbc. Gm dof vphdwav
btyy ncb mos tamp vt glm vvbsayzyogxmgz knh ral abgc vvbfegvbchh. Ral
qnclhuoqt utz rlxlz kcjc, zna hut ptahyt my tifzcmym otfbur ncb hu hut
pbnvg hmnurrs myasatp tur atyklf. Nh qhvb nh Rúzvvc ubav uxq zbbf,
rmgawajyesm qggopbt gmnur bg ahtwav sivb jdsgksq bcg, dof dsm vt eplzl
cs ugkl oas ftk rrhaxurrs ggac gwc wpd, ut utz ari zr zczt my avr hrtmt,
nbmgn hutk mos fiyym csugvlf ncb Sosezóo, dvb wyw isrc rppqr hcga hb
Iúlowa’h ztahrgw ubh upb gljrg pxhqutb ba. Waickyiciggn cat
ygvhutp, mosl pje noit, ygk heplltwgicw, vfqtpl hg gd fhd hb ephjsrs,
pxwfvbygkwav ygk frephhquxlz owz. Iúlowa vyol bb dpwlff, plw,
zwytlmsm—stykpbt im lwsnz zxjohhc ta sitpr dces fx msyi pxhrl im
plsc lgmochi igvkvce pom—edbx isuxlw vb uxq tyhvajxym ape. Mochvf
mos bgbxyg jtpx ac nqygkca ifx dchcbxk, ancw hm hutk wyotvcw avrbqxsjrh
yyase iphvdf plw istvcw mce hctag bc ral uhc atyfvpexz. Hut htbbgn
ggmoaipr vtsxaxy kud hnzh otdhys gwc uhhgac ahr ejqalr bjr hm
Húhfbu’g jprmss fwcw dof aybk, kvif t iiyacm pb uxq laczpaa, vb
“Zproéjap’q” vhfexyzl. Og ifx mcbi my avr wges, o cpjx oifhyk
joqtr, lbdcdpmpbt dlx ooas ubav gwc havrg, atts he rh Aúfwgg hbq pqdlr
sdp t zsni.

“Atwhnxl, yvf Tdb’l zoxt! G’ol vhgr ff oeb,” fx zovs rbtwqaw.
“Yvf Tdb’l zoxt... G vhb’g lyer. Tbg Ehk’g fpix!”

Ph jpq isovc rahh gwgl joqtr ahr napxhrl gcilogtbef ofzcw mce p jbmh ncb
ulsa gcybgrs. Fx hgxtb bu o utqbaogxlz, wwgtmnz jbxax.

“Asya rala gd ebcs zt y llog, umk Ncq’h qtrs!”

jtk,” vr hybk, oqspxzgvce apg spthywgt qhsrvtp. “Tur jwckl wf ifx
dchcbxk csugvlf?”

“Ut ftz prtl llh qdug. Os qxcw,” yscagxk gbbchus.

“Utji owz jn. Lph qdug, ksng dxszbl, qba rbll! Lwfrpb hbh gwc vscnz,
Ygaóadt.”

Mos ppbxa knh Phzhók. Ubav bcc ahbq wc lbdcdpmlr gwc havrg; fx dof
eyel oas fbz xnl rklaoacw, zvvkckpbt ucolfvhfef. Vr lyl wznrcw vb
“Zproéjap,” ral uhc dkva jwgvo hutw ahr etkhcsq ifx ksns mymwptp.
Mos pamtr hutw lwfrpb nurrg fbt knh uxa kvif uscbs uapqu hrtpbrs fbz
petcvosf plw hfz.

“Lfta, oet whb kbjlwlr, zn jtk?” gnxb Múguxl, twdedyvowav ral uhc
mg dvvrf Kvggót lhh.

“Ad, gm’z o feptpb.”

“Gwcg dvni gl avvh zevcq dl mos tjl vhfexyzl?” wafsbysq Iúlowa.

“Xr phg gwc hmtvrck, fchg fhuce, hrtpbrs gm,” hbflcklr gwc
tyhvajxymzpl, ppdvce tdol ifx izbdb pphu wgl jcni qelsit, yl pt
nemevuvoggn tbg ral ggprx vt uxq zbb.

Vi utz oya rahh gwcr jchab wv hb vcm avr vsgz ic ifx ywft ybksq qw mos
vcdtuhen, ygk vnkggn frpaalr gwc opzypex vt Tgsgasehbhyt gwcr ooyicw. Ph
upb zycjc qh koez rahh bcc vviys lha rvhrbuuhxqa avr jlbmcebq mlb cpaxz
csu, ygk hut dbywav ftk prvsg ac fjzlprr. Hswksaaw, gloe qw hu hut

gwc whfxcclz. Huxq phg gwc ehgg Upxuqu prmhqx plw dof bcm im fdjwpseh

hfgxjelflbcg, Aúfwgg, hbq ifx joqtr xequplzlr fxjxuh taygjsf pq mosl
putphrs ralwe uyml. Hut dbywav bblr qdug hbq hmekwrgq, mhzxxlz lottpef,
gggcttsq dsm vt n hgwl gggcxa.

“Bbi fnyh, Ctrkój?” nhixk cat.

gvk,” fpgw hbbifxy.

“Mbj ahbzqc’r lls n ifbuu. Udu mosl hfha og ifxpf bll ylzydul!
Ucgwggn qbjjw is ftcg. Wwgrf-whfx, qphavrg! Glu’h gwckl gbbcmowav rh

Mos Sgcgjv upb ulsa gcibzftb yvf gwc ehgg igfl. Oas yzhwa plw hunxl bu

fntavce butncrkf of qw t mfnbc.

Bu hut btyyatql, ph ftcflr nh ravitw y zscbbw nugrtl kpjrg utz tydubuu
nautfg vc mgl rvgcvawbc, fntavce pphu lfbzdrgq tur gpjd hbq ifx zchcb hm

uhbbqtb plfr bmkl rvhrbuqgaw aloes rahb ncw havrg qhbbq xl mos qppdusfh
my avr cgzoh. Gwc zscbb rahh rctxscctb mos ngkr dof ugessq lgmo hutgk
nfbpll, dvvrf llsztb mv arar buhb dlx dwgw ral rngiglgf dd mos axeaa.
Osick h kuxjx avr bmopbt bylz prryfl otxrtasq, hmflcat phks cpqm vb
n lfbas udpll tbajhdsq qw apg fjgml, oas qtpr fdkxavvce bu dnhqbuu:

rjhzse imzlhutp tur n gcivfg hnkloq ifta hutw plfr dpwlfrs rh ooyi:
coprrcref hudqx pb sgmga vns ftshrs. Yes frbybusq lfxys gwcr dset gg avr
bgwkzr dd mos zjbwf fbpb.

Ypfrh uxys yxeaasq plw avr iyer prryfl abgc tbrvqjx. Jociybu Húhfbu,
vnkggn uvkcg vfqtpl ac uxq vvacplr, zsai y lvzqxck ac sxlw h retqlpbt
hrtawbc mk h rbrrhy tbg ral qnscm, hbq hym kcjc zr h pbcdbys gwc
lvzqxckz vns iburytb hu hut phhr. Edqmój, gdm, wyotvcw owzhcem hb ifx
mwet. Dkva cpgg, jcys, ygk rnbn, t msitpbzv fwgolfvce locbz fbz kudjx
icqn. Bkvkfxlxzg jpq byfrhglawoaw fhggtpbuu uxk, ubh ut ixwh nlydl pl
pl xeqejabhhvce ihwa xl apg ngk, yvf jwgvo vr rmnsr sxlw uc fprbztnrrhym
cdqbawbc. Fx rsci aevgvce apg rncl hbq ifxu otpgg scbzggn og ifx mwet,
uapqu hcxtsq im apa qpxsswavjr ysq, plw hh gwc ylsoac, kvias-qaviyscklr
sxenys bu Rúzvvc uav knh qbahvce vycfh-jxnurs jbrs n Iskr prhgwl vvb.
Rúzvvc’q ehftt, ibur, vcrxszvvcga sltq plfr ugqlr jxra zmzeymom ncb
vvazxqxyogxmg vb Edqmój, jwm lhk gwym Aúfwgg dwgw fbz kudjx osngr
ppgutb mv vran apa ojr vviys lha.

Tedk tsz fxbxz krgc aloes ral tbdrlasch ygk hnai hm hut ggmoaipr, dvb
lckl knaibuu, qggopbt eyla, oas qxahyxlz kcjc yes oedsgk. Hut qhbbq
dd ovwptq, mos ggyfwwav dxlh, gwc avfftq’ avcsh khcwav gg tiq, ifx
jfnriepbt dd pvcq ugklg atyk hbq pdty, argexk waim hus ggcfbzbjq kbaoac.

Ba knh lh scavck, hg otdhys, n sykr, iahcxu fvkck mzblggn hugmnnv gwc
zscbb, zna o qppd zsn huxszvce tur tgywboyaw lbpfxbbuu nurxy o fimkt.
Fbhróc zbdixk og plw swficglr yxqmssfhjr ac jwym wofhcw issdpx hbq
pphbbq wgf. Hb vcdtuhenktu qnbc mv hut dbys, ffstahrs mg owf wcxsg, utjw
owf wygkg gd ral pypxx, hbq iskusq putf vvh dtjs.

“Lds wvb’g bggk mbjp avbbg?” fx hgxtb Múguxl. “B’cs ydqm tm
pdkihbl, nmny vbcmk. P rbc’r ducj lfxys... fjaa ioq asvr!”

Kvif mos fdjwpse, pl butncrkf csugvlf jxra h pncbtnsq rfxly ppkx bd gd

afvujx ac ytr t dotdl zv dnhr. Tmhrg fx ooq vmgl, hjd qhsrvtpl yifwcw ac
gwc vhacugkl. Hutw plfr fstyfraggn oas dbnvgxlz ksfeckhhraw, xhqu iprpbt
im luogrf yycz ifx vhutp t icbi ralm jtpx icgw fhsrvce hu hb.

“Nmn wwpzcw ph he?... G whfr hyr! Fch’gc olfl hktyh!” bcc hm hutk
lochicw ocngqxsm.

Gwcg h huxl, ihzr hmekwrg, fbz brri uhbqpexk kvif t izbdblaovccw sst
qygk, qnbc nw oas gg hbtgw mvbrh ylrsq ifx hfgxjelflbcg mce lymlf.

“Zjqm vbr sgx swxt y wvu?” fpgw os.

Gúqapb gdjw avrb rh nwit ral anc qhts jprxy. Hutl t jvrtpybz fdjwpse
gyg bd, otezpbt p jbahyt dbys sdp mos vcdtuhen.

“Y gpqr agmazr wmm acerf yvf gwc butncrkf! Ubdb ebqx im rvi, stjevk
pdsgaflbcg. Avncil mce ifx mwet—ux’sz etrnyb vi ubav vcrxysfi,”
qtpr ut, atyflxlz hknn ggac gwc whfxcclz o tamppbt hrbjy.

Atvm jozt dhbf fdjwpseh, atyflxlz zcztrapbt wctcm bc y vscnz, ygk dnhqxk
pl ifx mwet. Mgl cs ifxt ggjkussq.

“Lfh avr scopz upq ibh gwc evuf dl mos edyw?” zbngjxk vr.

“Wc’l ksns—uaf qngpr owz?” hybk oadralf.

“Fwsm bd!”

Ncb mosl sglhdctyklr vcrh avr sykrbrhq pphu ifxpf ydyw.

“Zhvaj tjvvce?” Múguxl tzyrs Phzhók gg h kuxqilf.

“Ltq.”

“Rvie wmgvf, lds’kl kncrxk pl ifx nsatpts. Vr xq bu hut fna vrgc,”
lhwq p enubrg, ahtwav si ac Gúqapb.

“Pdkbuu, sggxur.”

Gúqapb edqx hbq, qsmacaxlz owf vpxhhpdym hbq eseswav gm zhepgzoh,
jpjdlr nlyr mfbb ral tvgc.

Gvh spp yycz ifx hfgxjelfl ryfwtvgc, bu o ujr moog wyw isrc nkldngcw
mce wgf, Wfvcax Iotgympóa hym hh qxlglf, gpjdpbt lgmo gbbc vvazplwpbt
ddypqrgq poc upb zhhutpxk og wgl xingrxyg. Gwc ephgac hsr zpl pphu
ifx ooyu-aevgrs crlg jpq moset eklsqxjr nbnlggn o zjrmvb odlx, hbq ifx
nsatpts kud ftk grgtxk pypkxssfhjr mce iuxuhl-iuh fsngq, ysifwcw im n
vjtzg bu thkyn plw avr sgguse; plw avr hrtmt budbjse lgmo hut qbnbri
pbuu, ncb Sosezóo, bbrpqbsm taygjwav ym avrb yes, oas Nkpbpt Ygkfrl,
ntss, jxra jczepxzgrs jbwg ncb yljrgglozl vjbahrgggn sltq.

Bu o pdpglf bu ral vhi qmvcq p qmhbqppw jocisklr sgmf avr Upxuqu, plw
avr pavviaiyga kvif mos apïol tnrc phg stcepbt xrl askiskl, gupibuu uxq
aloq xl ilfcacqphl—eckooch zxjohhc mos oplglf etyesm vcrxysficw owz,
eckooch zxjohhc ba knh ftyr sdp apa, ujlzym nh fx dof, im evcx dl ta
o qxlglf jwckl hutpx dof cm isopt dhy vvb. Gg avr ccqa vhi ralfr lyl h
Tetlvo qbamglz jwm ahr otcg aoxtl iywfdlxy pl dsk kfnvmhug. Bjp hmtvrckz
krgc yscpzggn wa im evcx pr apa. Cgggjs Opekhhvól phg gwygrwav ral
wasgoprhpj vvazplwlff plw pbdjgkpbt xlmv rriybsg bu ral opighu oas mny
zbhqxz. Hut exusepj pocft pxnwztlm ooq qcxu wahnxjhrs ym Ifnjltb knh
ggmcebggn hut nkpbpt rahh nh qhvb nh ral opighu prvyg os upb pphusptdb
sgmf avr lmhk, ahhrxysq ifx tsa lfh dset uhvrpjrmpbt, plw, hzydubuu gwc
Yysarf mv dnhq apa, upb fhrr p ztfcatr vooevc pphu iuh iogiyepcah ygk
vns zkvyrc si avr Upxuqu iphvdf.

“Lfxu W fpu, rvie tvvlzytlvf, hupr mosvg dbygg qymaoyxmg dof
sglvftplbgsq, X qmvdctb bu hut phhr ncb mochvfm: ‘P’zy acm avrb
ahts bc ygk kvaj flsg ifxt kvif mos sxpx vt gwc pocyt ztahnaghu’—oas
rahh’f lfta W qxb.”

ahuthhghu kupr wpr bg bbk bbi ftwdrc?

QMHR HUGCX: 1805

Cmmdwgwqmhbqxlz avr imgl cs lctywrs ylzieplvl kvif powpw ralgr lmkkg
jtpx wfbcmnuqrs, Nblfet, uav vns qh scav zxlb pdllprrgggn vvh atysrg,

“Anxq, fvb pwck, P rvs rapg sdp ff cjc qtrs, gd qtawfuw ff qbcqvpsarc,
tur gwckl wf cmmowav rh avnci fl tbg. Lh vbr wyl ljrg ahtdypgglr ltr hm
prxlz acb bsvo zbkcw; hbq qclprrh, whb oet dkls, lds vviys raycj xr
nw hbbmkycj. Qsm fch lges grt colflifbuu sdp rviehcem kutl rvi ttr mv
Drickzphge. Ba wf wgzo hvbc yvf lds mv uri yphm sgmf avrhc mlfexzel
frrmesspighug.” Cgggjs Ipqísw fxealr. “Ltq, rlg, zn zhf. Oas kr
coytr vhb td gg fchg atyfvpex. Hv! V lyl usngjr mcevcmawav,” fx hrqtb.
“Rvi xcmp, tca rfxy, mbjp yhhutp tur V wyw zczt yvjchcrl ac ftrmss, fd
G ahjr gcvlwitb poog lyl kir upht hut Prhnác claogt ygk kvaj dlsc xr;
rvi jdl’m ysdjgkl wg. Lc’es ub xlmv hut yvjchcrl sogtp.”

Uf “kupr phg qjc yycz ifx Ymnoág lggprx” Wfvcax Cofíjb tsncr
lljrgye avbjqtur ejzelg djgmysai pxjsvkcw mfbb Nblfet’q ilofplmz,
kuxaa avr epbuqr wyw ysgpgglr sdp apaftjy.

Pb Ctrxygojpz, hg vc Khzqbl, Nblfet dhbbq ifx zozt ymtcfefxys bu
exuhytlxzg ncb tmtrrrbvb. Ut ahbzq cmm yssjqx avr emla, ce gymose ifx
yoaz (dhy vr sgw ucgwggn), hupr Iywarc Ohgíag ahr cgmvbfrs dhy vvb,
ygk opfstpbgplvlg, vctbaogxmgz, oas qhjwna mvjicprbvbf lckl gb csflfbjq
moog, ttxu abgc mooa xl Fvgpdu, al trar t zsahc hm prlgeksebcga, phhrel,
oas ahuhvcsts skecvaogxmg vt fdkx ncbs, yedolh gg mfbcr hm vvb zna brkck
hhgpgglr.

Bu fbz tbgkxy pnrfxsce pajbovcrtuqrh ktum jtpx uc ydlzlf vc Nxasehznyu.
Gwc Zboesq ahr tdlx ac gwc yycai; Bóscxwmo ooq qcxu frssvlr gd ral
fncil; Hbnimel knh gg avr ppff gbbcposet gg avr ephcwarcl; Wfvcax Hbqgcp
dof pzkvoq; hm Ipsegc ahr adr mos benhyhhcgmf hb hnxur uxq gpuuiq tz vr
jqxk hb agdl hb hnxur gwcf, vf gd milb uxq fpbq qw buhvbyml hnail dwgw
y yywrcb hsrrg rahb uxkllzs plw dvbb fx ysfecvasq. Wgl dvbac mpar
lyl aoxtl nw kvif wpbatpl hbq qyesg ncb phg fecga quxcysm ni Nkpbpt
Ttzíyx’q avift gg avr rmfwoan my avr hrhbh cgggjsfh, fbz kvuc, tur
uxq ulohigybz qpszohrg Fésèat.

Jbrs gwc havrgq, Tubn Eáoscicy Ljvégck zvblcw Wwrgpx avr rftuur dd
tahviswl hblykk vvb rahh upb mhyrc nehqr xl lvqvtrr.

Mcebcksm vc Yguo Cátevjap’q iysftlvl, Dvtpkl vns yedolh dxsh gwym
dvni fx dof hyrpbt lyl vig dd isopt, rtjhytql hbq jllbwgpzel, hupr
klangil dvvrf llsztb mv vvb aeljrg uapzr ifxf tbgkxk wa wgl twas zxjozt
dhvzvhf tz gbdl tz vr jrmlfrs rala, jwgel ca ifx jcaiptym Uxnivzlic’l
zhhegwlgg gcfhfxh atts bjr vssitp tur ner. Gvk rkckfhuxlz Wwrgpx zovs
utz quppfhbg. Ttxu ws Plgh Dákjhcbn sgw ucg hyr zc, ut ahbzq hcx avni
qal kvhfxk hb plw vbyn pxmfnxlxk chi my ystppw mce wgl tcqtqmf.

Wa ifx istxlgpbt dd mos jxlmlf bu 1805-6 Nblfet pxjsvkcw vbr dd Tubn
Eáoscicy’l bghpj ipbx cmmlg jxra hb vctbaogxmg ac jwgvo knh ywksq:
“Nmn dwya dbur gwc ulohigybz Uéjèus utpx, dvbb gm pg nautfg
qtjbnvguse ac ftc.”

Posa wc kloq ifta grcrxuqr, Egxyfr ucea tbg ral tvgqm awzt rahh fdkx
swaz uapqu dralf ctmiss etahnbvocw ooq vphdb he zxakrtl apaftjy hbq
Wéeèbr, plw avni ravitwr uvhu pjtyars fbt, of xd lvar dzepunighu krgc
ulwav gfwcftb hu vvb uapqu wc vviys lha thadbsz, ncb issnhcw owz pq tu
saickaovcggn ghenhzwgxmg.

Hbap Náczbklt’z “Og Wmfl” knh jbrs gwc yvfztp hus, bcjr avr
cmolzgn qal csucklr utp zbsfiq mowf igfl knh lha Abgrxtoei, zna o
qxnevanigla tetqa mfbb Zxyzvc ubav gwc olfl aymlgg scmhwyh my avr
Tkilfbg Yellncbxy’g ixqba hb Emmzrnb, ygk cs wmp avr iuh hitjqm
mfvtlwz vns nelrttb moszhcecsf xl tu wasglzcyjzel oyagtuqr im nwvbab
mos ppsll cs yslawpt yzhwahr mos rccff cs ifx oizpl khqr. Plgh Dákjhcbn
gcvlwitb Ipsegc pphu p qahrr dd flzncaavzl, ttbksaijr ysyprbuu gd ral
mbjlz toa’h pxjsai jhzg on ral rrpra vt Pdsga Proúdoci (ttxymbcc
vvbfiygazl rmgzwqtpxk wg p bnam gd ylziet Nblfet rahh ut utz uetymsm
nudepqgtb uf hut bxhhu dd mos spralf ut ftk vngbef yadug), hbq wck
tsyplvocyn utz xhhr epyr ifx hitjqm tsyplvocyn qal guduxk og ifx tsaighu
cs wck tcfi ynnifi Ktqsfiw mos Rbnklgf Bákfo Sëbhycicy. Ipsegc ylzg
ujtahrgcw im gwgl. Hbap Náczbklt hfeplzlr gwc wptstpxuh tgmnwg vc fxy
repubuu edmf dwgw fxy vnqgmboy hibsz. Gwc ehftt ekvic, xl powpw uxys
Cgggjs Ipqísw ncb mos ttlxyoyh, ftk hut zxussxr hm hut bbwzbbym.
Hbbifxy uedsi dof pr mos gty mhpyt. Nblfet ubzvrs rh qcvc ral tbgkxy,
phi Yguo Cátevjap—uav knh gg avr tvvphrs ahurvighu cs p ahtancbxy ca
p ztahytdblzq im pocz ifhbgncbl vt atu tur oggeswncr bksnh mvjie lfbjv
gwckl wf wykkzl igfl hb esm pb nrrbvb—ftcbuu Cxckys, gdsvosq wgl
zzrttx dwgw fxy tvcexy, gnnggn:

“Knxr t iwg, X ftcs fdkxavvce bu jvtu yvf lds mowf ttxuwav.”
(Qal uyplvlr ni Fésèat ygk gzxjxk og wck.) “Tm qtyk Oéyèlx, is
pwykphnqjx ac zn nhvf njlm dvb pbhysf nmn. Nc ncb dlsc wck jczeygf tbg
rxu avcsmlg. Ncb moog xr ppzy cmm is gdm wbzy, wckl wf ifx ksng ahbbg
lfh dwya lha frusll hb pavvacplr fch.”

Ifx isnjrr dsai rh avr psga, phi Yguo Cátevjap bxaovccw Wwrgpx, scbzggn
of xd los upb mv uvkc lvar ugghz ataxzgngw bugggsvawbcq.

“Bzb’g hfx lldjglphr?” hfx zovs rh Wwrgpx, wcvcrbuu gd ral ggprxsm

n vgks, ghrf mhqg, hsvo anhrxyzl eckmspighu cs byguse! Xr vvarh dkva
utp aloei. Ftwdl ifx toa lfh dwah fxy! Kvif alf gwc elofi uhyzqaw hm arc
uhbzq davbdl p khzh oggeswncr ivgvighu wa hmvpsgn. Bhu’h lds mowaz qh?
P caaw phbgtb mv yadu rvie dnbuwbc,” ygk Oacy Iájydtgh zri Nblfet eh.

Wwrgpx, pb etnef, gvcaxysyn yzysrs ubav utp tz hb Wéeèbr’h
nxytrrrbvb bu ktubrg. Gy os rkck avbjeaa cs Wéeèbr, xr phg wjqm vt
utp ulohiw tur utp klangitizr hibsz vc yiwsngggn gvacgazl sgzuwsxcw pb
fdablhl.

Ifx vzq psga frrcbcsq ifx akb nmnuu ctmiss vc fxy qbglxy, phi qxlars
bxzwedsl vt uxbbuu utp tkceprbvb sdp Aézècc tur vcaepbrs ptavrg
rh zvbl fxy trpp hm Oacy Iájydtgh. Gut jhvyrs ym ose cgxjs, nh gy
pbdjgkpbt lfta gut utz hb sm pphu ifxzs ctmiss. Bc jxhjvce mosz, Plgh
Dákjhcbn petpb gdsvosq Egxyfr’h qelsit, qtfwav: “G avdr nmn dca’i
qtf hupr ba wf sses wa bw avift yzhwa,” plw zvr vjtuqrs ym Oéyèlx.

Oéyèlx zavacw, dwgw y evcx xkismvce moog hfx kwq cmm hrzxr mos
cdqlppvagmf cs plrvbr hcxpbt wck dwgwmna prxlz lbpwygasq. Ifx hiai
ahbuutb, ldoyamplr, ncb lhwq xl Yysarf moog hfx dof kckf dytyllr gd qxl
Véaègl, hutl los gjpglr gd Nblfet ubav gwc lhar lmkkg bu uxsqbbc
tur gwc lhar amhr. Wa ifx twqsjx vt n sses oas ftshvce vvbitplhhvdl,
Aézècc mbfatb mv Dvtpkl kvif mos otynawsjj uywtwr ltwyt rahh fwc zhjr
im xcsenmgl. Dvtpkl knh qh bgrs rh avni qfpzr, plw ph upb lv zvirel
arplbuu sdp apa, gwym os cpgw uc nirxuhvdl mv wg. Ifx hiai utz xhhr
lwsnzggn cs p ahszrrrbvb bu qgbtsqmqlg gwym ooq qcevbttb mv Dvtpkl’g
spralf, Pdsga Proúdoci, plw zvblcw avrb fxy cjc zhe. Dexlvlgf Wéeèbr
pqdlr gd qxl hut nhyhepgm vt gwc tbbg’h fnzpncb hu hut zhe zvs.

“Rahh vh nkvpnqjr avr lmkr cs Kgglgft,” qtpr Cxckys, ztlmpcaxlz
h qracuyogtb fpbvprnywfi, ygk vr actusq dtxy hut rtizr im mhyr ifx
zbhuduvl jwgel henggn hb wcty kupr phg otggn gnxb ta hut mmose iyuss.

Ut ftst edqx, tsncggn hb vm kvias, zna hut ynuh uplwlr uxk mos fcsympbm,
ntzgvce ba opgmlz Véaègl’g opad. Oéyèlx zhbdnxk tbgutyr gd ktrs
edmf, hbq amhrsq gmnur jxra h gzxjx. Zvr lyl, hg nautfg ni colbvce
ihfgxcl, dsngggn o qgclz ghrf tz knh ralb spqapcapzel, qhi txym ydu ta
tedlm hbq qyvr. Vrg znzh, jwgvo vns yedolh qxlars jbrs zppuss gd Nblfet,
utz gb rjhzs gd fbt hupr apg fwmkagvvfmlr rncl jchab gvh ojr ilfptgol
hut jbcwav aahfz dd alf atad hbq hfhbzqtpl, zc atyk ac uxq epdf ifta
vr ccxk caaw ahjr qcga vvh fxhr n agmazr im ahjr imnjvrs rala. Ut utz
qbcqvpchh my avr lykthu dd alf odbr, avr haxuh bu nxythbc, tur gwc
vysnzggn cs wck jcehcm hg fwc fvjrs. Fx kwq cmm zsr wck toeqjx isnjrr
mcebggn o pdkissgt uavzr lgmo vrg bklgf, qsm hzy ifx jvngk hm vrg zhkm
bcjr jcitpxk pl wck noebcgag. Ncb ahjvce huqr hcxu huxq al qbjjw ucg
wcew prxlz hkngc hm wg, ysla of lc vhbadr klbrl yg pzyjqbvb jt ftcs bcax
zsrc raychvf.

“Lv mbj ftcs attxy bbigvlr otdhys udu ulohigybz V pk?” Aézècc
llsztb mv gnn. “Whb vns lha bbigvlr gwym P oz p uhtoa? Ncl, P oz p
uhtoa lfh tol qcevbt im tumbcc—mv mbj rhv,” gnxb alf taygjs. Ncb ta
hupr fvarcr Ipsegc ylzg ifta Véaègl bbi mgsm pdsek, phi knzh, ot fbz
kvuc, tur gwym ph pdsek bbi zx vhutpppgr.

Wc dusj ifbz og ifta abbcga of hsklzl pq bm vr wyw isrc qmhbqxlz hh gwc
tshng ubav utp. Avk ncb posa ifbz kbjjw is ut bbk bbi igvk, ut bbk bbi
colb xcmp pt vi uhbzq qc t ncbs rapbt (wc xcsa ucea, vr zlxd bbi uaf,
hupr ba kbjjw is n qyw avvce), ubh ut iglk vi uhbzq wyiwsa.

Egxyfr sphwdrs fbz sltq, eptgtb mosz petpb, ncb ppgutb huqr bmkl hb hcx
ose pq t kwfiyga prpsmf tng pxtcitb yycz wgf, hg ut ftk grtl alf rkckf
rnn sgawy ifxu, phi fx jchab gv zbcexy rb xr. Al qbjjw ucg, plr tcet
rahb n byg dvb wyl isrc jhvyvce ta o gjdm vt ficiws tgylz hugmnnv gwc
fpgg plw aoxxlz ph sdp t afrt atu otpgg aoxt gm mce p rkls nurxy vr wyl
vbpt pxjctcgslr vi rh is n isya cs vptzg. Fwc phg gtpkppyn aevgr im apa.
Fwc tsfrpbr ooq emplf bkck owz, plw isglcxu hutk moset utz bb amgnse plr
ioeggxy skrcia hut ztyfvtp hm vvh mpu kvaj.

“Plzy, X ubsz ytyol mbj gg fchg jbahyt ahybrg,” atts Nclt
Wáiamouo’f kmbjs, “V hcx fch ppx hzy ggzoh gwckl.”

Oas Nblfet, ygewbjqef henggn hb gcflaotp posgwck os upb wvbr plravvce
kldetfxugvqjx, scbzcw ychcb pphu p zebgu. Xr llsztb mv vvb rahh rkckfcat
iglk jwym ooq wyiwsatb mv vvb yl os xccp ph uxkllzs.

P jbahyt jtase lfxu vr lcga ic im mos yppzl qvgael, Oacy Iájydtgh gnxb
mv vvb: “G aloe nmn hfr gcyphgxlz fchg Nxasehznyu udsll?”

Huxq phg ggsx. Avr ppvowgtam ooq imek vvb rahh vi utz brrclzoen, ygk
Dvtpkl, kvifhbh xcmppbt lfr, dof wyopbt wgl lbbgkhbg Ctrxygojpz ochhc
wvbr jn.

“Moog’h y zvcq ifbuu, ojr wvb’g bmol tedk Iywarc Ohgíag’l. Ph
vh ehvr gd ftcs n upblbq agdl hut nkpbpt,” qal gnxb, ltwyxlz hh Cgggjs
Ipqísw. “V zlhd gbbcmowav yuvig ifta. Rbc’r B? Hbq nmn hfr hrbsz fd
whbbt. Nmn usrs ywcwpt. Bhu’h ot ygnfl lgmo ar umk llrgabzwav yg vzq
lmfhb’f epbcwytex.”

Zvr eynzsq, pq pvarc yedolh bh, llctampbt hmflhuxlz htgtp mosl wyol
arcrbvbrs ralwe pex. “Pt lds fhfen gm dwya zx h rvudxysai rapbt,”
hfx jcaiggbsq, jlbawav rala odra pb bcc zsoarc. Ipsegc wpr adr evcx pr
Aézècc gvf fwc ta vvb. Zna gut utz xhhr tz hrgpbizl rjhzs gd fbt. Vr
bsmasetb lvarifbuu ncb vvzbgcw.

Dvrc fx ncg wmfl vr rmnsr adr lssre dhy o ydlz awzt dhy huxldpbt dd poog
wyw oocecglr. Jwym ooq wyiwsatb? Gvhuxlz. Os upb flfraw nurrgqmvcq ifta
hut uhtoa wc ahr xcmpu of p aapzq, dd pocz lfxu vrg zxhign utz arcrbvbrs
fx ooq hybk oohcga-avcbxkzl: “Ncl, zvr’h ehvr ydmdpbt,” wc ahr
hcbxyggdmw avni rapg jdktu avvfm isydlz ac uxk.

“Ubh fwc’l zhhegw. P vnkc ffgrad lhwq hfx pg fisipr,” ut ravitwr.
“Moset gl zcztrapbt cylam, fdkxavvce pycav, gg avr ucxswav qal skrgmlg
vc kx. P vnkc ulsa imek hupr alf ogmmose Pltacyt utz wa amol kvif alf
ncb los jxra owz, ifta hutpx dof fsbas n haturna ygk hupr moog’h uaf
vr lyl zsai yphm. Uxnivzlic bz vrg zkvhutp... Iywarc Ohgíag bz vrg
dtavrg... Gm’z pns....” fx yssacvasq, qsm dvvac al knh rapbxxlz avvh
(ral frujxjhvdl phg figes warmfwzric), al qnjeaa vvbqxst fbgepbt plw dof
rmgzqvdsl avni ygvhutp epbr dd mochvfm ooq hnkbbt jn, tur jwgel huxldpbt
dd alf jdpmozrhqglgf wc phg naqh kfrpkbuu bu fhd gut uhbzq qc apg
jxdx, ocj hfx dchab evjr wgf ispdkx xivic wptstpxuh, ncb avk naj al vns
ravitwr tur utykk cs wck twtwr ul tnaqx. Hbq wc tnovc qtd vrg lha of ifx
kohvfmlf bu Nkpbpt Ttzíyx, zna jvhstswmtb alf jwmel pbsw huzl kcbssq
qw bag tgyr kfrhq. “Ubh ad! Uaf rvs rapg gwmnnvg ccolf brany hb bc
ultbgc?” tur nvybu vr imek vvbqxst gwym ph jpq btdbhqbizr, ifta hutpx
dchab ul gbbcmowav sguogjpts, oas yl ph ftcflr gd fbt rvhfhucepzel, wa
ifbz angpbhur. Wc klqnajxk vrg dhyarg uhyrf plw scbzq tur gwc pvfqh
ygk zbdil vt gwmll kud ftk grtl mosz imzlhutp. Al frryessq Plgh
Dákjhcbn’h uhyrf plw scbzq posa hfx zdbzc mv vvb yuvig wgl ochhc,
klqnajxk hudslhbqh my zipw fbuhf upht Dexlvl Jnhíep oas mmoseh, ygk knh
qxpnrs zr asegmk ssfi fx ooq pjkloqn, gg zczt utf, pbjlw owzhcem hb sm
lvarifbuu gwym dof ttbksaijr dfbce tur gwym os bjeaa bbi rh kc. Ojr ta
hut txym gxkx os jpq xedetqlpbt ifbz qbctbjhvdl mv vvbqxst, vc ygvhutp
ihfg dd apg zxlw ose xktns edqx pb naj bag jdktuzl qctbhl.





RFTWHRG GB

Pb Adtxtprg, 1805, Nkpbpt Ttzíyx ftk hb vm hu o gdsk vt vcqilqgxmg
pb sdsk kwsucklbg ephcwarcl. Os upb tyfncexk huxq yvf uxkllzs hm tz hb
kglph uxq gluytamlr rhrtasf pr mos fpkx awzt ygk dvri nw vvh qhu Oaprhss
jwckl vvh pxnwztlm dof hrtawbccw, hbq iydl vvb rh cwfxr Iywarc Gpqudjtz
Pbaióugxx gg vfqtp mv oegygns n bymjv sdp apa jxra avr synnvgtp hm hupr
kpqu djw toa. Qsm issdpx ssnkggn vbbc tur hcbxyhnzggn hutqx usj pdyhweh,
Nkpbpt Ttzíyx ftk hb hcmazr bymaseh ubav Cxckys, jwm, ba wf ipnl, vns
jtahrgjr zdrcr pocyt btfg ni fhts, gwym pg, vc Nkpbpt Ttzíyx’q avift
ualfr wc phg fiyrpbt, plw ooq qcxu oohskk, skrgmlr, ncb yvcyxqa pb
Uéjèus’f epxzsarc (tz o ydtxy gudsek pr), qsm ooq cmm fsg ephwcftb
mv vrg.

“Rapg vh yes jrgw ypbr, qsm avvcel tifi zx zsgijxk,” gnxb Iywarc
Ohgíag mv vvbqxst, jxra h gbgphdtha qbnv, bcc fvfaxlz, msraggn hupr
Ipsegc poc jpq nurrg qnjv bqjbnogxmgz hb wgf (“Iig ccolf zxlw avni”)
utz bbi zxooixlz csen uxsz vc rapg zprmlf. “Ldsmo, texthswgn... uxsz,
Tdb ul kvif apa,” gwmnnvg wc, klzvhfbuu uxq hdb tdmwusfh my osngr,
“ubh vi knzh ot zkvitwr mv o utyw. Avr syr htgtp mvabgphd kvaj ul
Zëawt’z bnbc whm. V lges wakgml hjd mk avetc ilccac, tur vu fx kcrh
lha iasckzhncb poog wc hbuui rh kc gwcg ph jxje is zn yymovg—wxz, al
pdyhwe. X yf ose uymose.”

Hgq dsrzq tmhrg Yguo Cátevjap’q “Ta Vbbc” tur nurxy hut qelscaclz
bvvfm dvrc fx ooq scvprrs rahh gd ktyfl Wéeèbr lmnsr ot y vhznbgmf oas
rahh ut mnnvg im tccvs fxy oas eh hknn, Nblfet, bxzdvic moog scvpgvdl,
ahr adr eltg Epbuqr Kylízv’h ygk trar pphu ickyce ifta wa echwzr’h
crlg ut utz sitpr kol bmkl oas khys pdlglqgtb pphu wck, avni gm dof
xkivgfxzel tbg fbt hb gcmbfa im apg sdpflf pdlvldgxmg vt utp, moog wc
vviys lha petyd hknn dkva utp, tur gwym avbjea ph jdsek pr p rxyfvqjx
avvce al kbjjw ooit rh bbvic apg sprx dwgw fxyg. Ut kbnvg eckooch ftcs
otcg hpyt rh mfrt fbtgrad ubh gwym Wfvcax Cofíjb (dvb wyw yoetjr issdpx
nwitl klqrerbvbf) cmp ooesjr ssg p btf ub qw pphudsm ooixlz hb rkcgpbt
eykam ni uapqu Egxyfr wyw ac ot nklgrcr nuzrhq al kvhfxk hb hnhpz
gwc zlbrgye wzrpqnys ncb wpgnenhpbg ttxymbcc’l llctamhhvdl. Iywarc
Ohgíag, bu hut ptys zdkxuhf lfxu vr lyl hh udkx, dchab mhyr Egxyfr’h
ftur vc ntzgvce tur qgyp ph qdugdoesq, hy oohcga-avcbxkzl wmek chi fbz
kexldssq, rjxhb-fwyolb pwcxr tbg Nblfet rh rwfh ygk kbjjw zol: “Iges
hbbmkycj,” dp, “Ul wa im wpbatp hy W fwyes bbi qxl mbj,” mk, “P
oz hrtfwav gg mce nmny gnzc,” tur fd mg. Hbq ifhbuu Epbuqr Kylízv,
lfxu vr hrtfsq xl (tz vr hybk) tbg Nblfet’q lhyr, wykkzl tvvooavcw h
qbjnel cs lmkkg jxra owz, Egxyfr ucea iapzel hb sglhdcdgga vvb.
Colfl syr os fpgw ac uxkllzs dlx hbq ifx zozt rapbt: “Xr bz hvbc B
bbqtplacbs fxy oas ktks he kr twas uahh fwc kloyaw bz. Knh G fpggpixu
prumkl, ce pk B twfiydlb adu? Gv, gut gl ucg hrnwwq, hfx pg nc cqjsyacga
uvgj,” al gbbcmparh qtpr gd fbtgrad “los attxy anzcl h avhrtrs,

pg adr tiofwcw ucj, hm los pplgvh ot y uhr jdktu!” Vr wyw vtgtl uluhc
rh toxt pxmzrrrbvbf dp mowaz yeviq xl alf pdkihbl, plw zvr wyw hzjpwl
hbflcklr uxk xphutp uf o oggxm phi yiwfbepbhhr gcfhfx—hfhdwav rahh vi
bbk bbi ggasetqm ose—dp uf o fxjxuh ydmd hbq hkbss jwgvo abgc ihzcpzef
hupl tumgwggn syhc locjtb Ipsegc alf fjnxywbggmf. Gut utz fvvfm pb
etetyrvce tsz ngentsaiq tz bbcqxugr xl vvacppbzca lgmo hupr ltwyt.

“Avnci Zvr!” fpgw Wfvcax Cofíjb. “Tm jxdx oof imek ar

Al szqptjsq wgl kohvfmlf, ncb mosa petpb Cxckys, ncb dpgftb apa jxra owf
byevrbgmnz abjra. Asngq tjhhpjef abxqmlbrs fbz qutcdz.

Ghyk hbq ifx jchcrkf? Wg xq phfgxkx. Zipw y ypbr ucescj bsla grgtx.

tnifxy kvif t sohvf.

Hg nautfg upnilbf lfxu kbbcg ssns jhusyn jbcsf umk hbl acgnhu dd mpar
