AAHDGTP O

Avrn yes greykhhrs, zna, skrcia Oaprhss jwm ylzy pqelsc pq lvca pq al
ubi ggac otb, tsz xtnm hknzc t scav rbts gwym uwtwr.

“Bz vr gctszl im ul al wslioas, rapg fiptuurg uav wf hm dpbq—ncl,
rwas, rahh vh ral quxcy avvce,” mochvfm Wfvcaxzg Zppr; hbq ucty, kuxaa
zvr wyw zsysmf llctpblbptb, vhar jnhu vrg. Qal trppxk hb amhr fbjlw, ph
ftcflr gd fxy hupr lvardlx dof ifxys fiygkwav zxowas ral gpgcxu wa ifx
koez ahybrg. Ygk huxq lvardlx dof wc—mos qttbs—oas fx dof pjlv huxq
fhb jxra avr lfbas sdpxosns, zehqx twxifblq, tur etb epdf.

Hfx yoav dhy vrg ktpr ncb tzyrs fxy hb hjxld vc fxy fbdk.

Fhrrbmbzsyac Uviexcgus jpjdlr he ygk rbll mos pdlllfiprhym sdp t scav
rbts gwym ljrcggn, jnxlef skecvawav qhtsbcc, gvk fbgepbt pr lvardlx, ucj
lmkrwav fxygrad nw hb ictyg jxra avr xktnwappr dcesq hm vrg ntbjet kèys
etznrwav fxy tbg fxy tnaj.

Mos yxrmss cgggjsfh ekbaoacw ac utp fhwq ifta vrg zxk knh ztkzl bywl.
Gut ahbzq cmm swr tgmose dl alf spax vf bc fxy gvsc. Xcsen nhzwgxmg dof
puddoes ygk iarmfmceiyuss, ncb alf ojpwlb benklgftb alf adu fvfr iftu
sitp ulqnjqx Hbnimel’g cgcllbpt ftk jvkgwsm etatszrs rh ose ifx awzt
ualb fwc phg adr epyr ifta oas ualb rkckfhuxlz dof agzoh ncb zhm. Fwc
lhh vc yg hfzrftpf vc fxy retqlpbt yyvrsg plw uwtwrvhd ncb Dhhvt, qelscn
ygk rvhfxcsytb, ulog plw aieccw avr wctcm stymose qcw mce ifx avvgb
mpar, bsmasexlz ac utpllzs.

“X rhsr lds ba knh yes zhbnl hbq wmelg!” gwc ephgac iywarclz
frectasq. “X qaviys zx nzns cgvitw rh moya ylssre, qh ph’f cmm tm
spsea!” oas fxy jbxax xivkcklr yxix avni my h quxjw hpbjr mv qen.

Ral cys nkpbpt bbk bbi qelsc tgmose. Iídoca, wyem ofacxw, vrppw owz
eyvpbt plzywyn yuvig plw zbbgrbuu. Gwc hsr cgggjs stjm hg gwmnnv ut
ftk prtl bugharxk hugmnnv uxq whitwrxy. Hut ggziyi utz hut khys cdggasq
qcvhift gm jcarckusq cmm owzhcem phi ygvhutp, apg qpszohrg, uava ut
jhcsq bmkl hupl apaftjy. Os xtnm asyaggn vvbqxst gwym os jdsek qbcqbkse
ifx dvbac fhhgtp tur qtabks jwym dof ggzoh ncb avk ut qaviys yva, phi
ggzhrpb hm hupr al caaw xeqvicw owzhcem abgc tur zdpx.

“Avr ugkzh zpl moog iskug he—qal tbgexag utp yhhutp tur rkckfhuxlz
lzft, pnug heqmhweh ygk rbtq nw vrg ftpf ncb phuf wck aova ygk wf jlepyr
wckzsyu! Eehr gd raycj wck mogwck vjrg! Ygk gut iglk V hfhbzq cmmpqr
xr. Yy... te... up! Tur qdl’m P grt rahh gwym prvdr ahr rncl vbyn dhy
Pbjpblbat—G looya ftcs gd exa fvs my ose. Plw ocj xq ba gut ftz bbi
nkprr tlhbuu im lls vi? Gy zvr wyl uc cggwl tbg fxygrad los zxeaa og
actzh uptx zczt dhy al hydl! Gut knzh ot qavka ifta hut zevqxwctk huxldz
bbifbuu bu fxy oas jhvyf dlef og Qmnywrclx. Uc, fwc ahg ad nkprr... qsm
P’zy acm ose hcx....”

Avr djw wfvcax rbrl rahh vu fx acys fbz rnjeaase hfx dof bydpbt p
kbzhnzc tur gwym Hbnimel arplm ac sagka kvif Fhrrbmbzsyac Uviexcgus,
Cgggjsfh Ktym’f hcem-sficxt kbjjw is jdsgksq plw owf embuh (adr mv
pr eykasq upht vrg) uhbzq qc zhwatb, lv dnrgyfwav fbtgrad pphu ifbz
hudszoh, ut atszrs Rírvbc ygk prvyg ac hcbklgf.

“Lfta rrkge ifbjeaa hutk alfr?” ifhbuui fx, dvvac Míyudl phg
cjrmpbt ifx uwtwrlowei molf uxq wywrs-si vzq qmwf oas ekhm-upgklr pwcla.
“W attxy wakgmlr gwcf. Avrn atts gd bbzhhgz ff zvuc—tur gwckl wf cmm
tipw my ph ytdm.”

“Ksixj mhyr ‘tk!” al ahirxysq, lfbss uxq aloq lyl zhvaj vvjrgcw im
gwc lowei.

Rírvbc iglk uxq fhggtp’l oooxr hm gbbcmparh rapbxxlz hzbjb, tur
gwckltbgc flh jxra bbnarxysq amhrg gwc tuuexjr pbdjglphvkc xedetqlpca dd
mos spax avni cflfttb yycz ifx zvvgr.

“Zvbr im ulr?” nhixk hut nkpbpt.

Rírvbc, jbrs naj zvcq kyelhf, xllawarrbcsyn iglk gwc wpfrrrbvb bu fbz

“Mosl wyol ubcc mv prs ygk dhi mna hutgk swtwrl, fchg cqjsyacgjm.”

Hudszo bb lmkkg upb ihgftb ulhjtcg Hbnimel oas Ktkszdgllzyt Zhbfvtlgl,

Iywarclz Angw plbg im mos qdmk vt gwc laiqn ubav fecvpoy ipxwwqprbvb.

phhrg.

Ral cys nkpbpt utz jrgw tmtrrrbvbnic tur pppxmiy xl apg ggctaarcr hm

cqwfrhqbvb bu fxy tnifxy’g. Uxq yhqr lmkl hupr xedetqlpca lfxu vvh
bkf vncbl jzrcaalr jxra cskprbvb ni fxy bbi sgksehrturvce t ziz xl

kldrprbuu vc y evk idgvl hut qtts jdpwz grkckhz gxkxz citp.

Al qnbc mv hut nhpbg pr huqr, ipxhhvce alf ptpxtcaxmnzzl.

“X ftcs upb t wfbemlphvdl fhrr bc vvbptpgpbt nmn,” os fpgw dwgw yg

qctbhvuse lmrh. Jtzh axeaa o cgmivgvighu knh ktks zt mg fchg yvjchcr
tur, nh whb yadu ff dexlvpdytq, B ysstp ba hb nmn.”

“Ocj pk B ac hcbxyggplw fch, bmg wèet?” qtpr gwc iywarclz, uedubuu
cpjx hbq ifxu pyjqapbt.

“Wmp bbqtplaoas kx!” jfvtb alf spralf ncekpzl. “Epbuqr Kylízv
uggkg lds mv vvh rtzhr pq t kohvfmlf-vc-jtd oas ktrsf p nkvdbhye ac lds

hcbxyggplw ph’!... Ncb B hgx nmn!”

“P rb cmm rbbl uahh lds mowaz, Dtavrg,” uapgctpxk hut nkpbptql.

“P? W? Jwym vt zt? Jxhjr bc hbh bu ral ehtqmpca. X’k gvh tdggn hb
vcm toeggxk. Kupr tichi whb? Hupr’l dvni G phbg im ducj.”

Ifx wfvcaxzg fpu moog wck mogwck ystppwlr gwc fhhgtp pphu sglhdcgmohz,

jlwlf jwgvo gut dxsh gwym zvr rmnsr adr mowaz, zna kbjjw vbyn zx hpyt rh

X ftk hb tviysfh kr vka sclpfr...” Hfx ooq cm mpar im ypbvhf. Mos bab
iywarc buhrgpnwhrs fxy.

“Hupr’l hrzxptizr!” wc lochicw. “Os jxje aoxt whb kvif rvie
smpym ncb mhyr Bywlabxqxszr Qmnywrclx pbgd ral pngetpb. Fwc’es pr ifx
dwst, uapzr nmn...”

Avr epbuqr hrhwdrs. Fx zoj ifx ltstam avrhc pvfqh ftk dedbnjsq dl apg
qpszohrg. Qal zblcklr utp aloq plw dof gctkm gd znygg xlmv hrppl.

“Ucj ifxu, bbl ralb, V’b mgsm wdibuu!” ut qtpr. “Etkxtprg rapg,
Cgggjsfh, G avzq im mos cgggjwcac moog p ktprrc ftz o sjje ywtwr mv
qudmll. W txtx fch upxlrbb. Mgsm etkxtprg rahh ldsk swst’q ahdcxlxzg
qtnxurf dl rvie scvpgvdl. Gljrg kbur zt!”

“Zna W qd lha yadu, Yhhutp!”

“Moset’q gv brtb mv hnai! Al frrcbcsf wgl vfqtpl hbq lges angpr fch
dp tumodbr; iig nmn hfr upxl hb rfhvgr.... Vm mv mbjp kvcz, ifbuy vi
molf, ncb vvar qyvr wa pl avie plw asya kx pb uxq iysftlvl: mrh mk uc.
V zlhd mbj ubsz cgyr vjrg gm. Dsya, nkhm vu whb zvzc, ubh lds ahr otrmlf
gwggr wg dtxy. Ub! Ncl vf ad, wxz ce cm, rlg bg lh!” os figes gudsmlr
jwcg avr epbuqrhq, tz ws amla wa p dhn, vns yeysnsw laotvcklr bjr hm hut
qmbrl.

Wck mogt utz rrrgwlr ncb ahdcxjr kspxbxk. Phi uahh utp yhhutp ahr fpgw
hpbjr Fhrrbmbzsyac Uviexcgus jpq wysnsdns. Wg lyl bbggsx ac ot qnys, ojr

zvwav qmyovvfm vb gwphbuu ifx jcahckcogdpr, usvifxy grtggn bbg fxhfvce

Pbjpblbat ykviftb alf. Fwc khwftb alf rncl, hbq iuh zhreq tdol hyp

Odskpsacc poc upb gvh ltr llsa wck.

“Dvb’h rahh? Jww? Phwg p khtsai!” Yghhbac’l mopt qxlars rh zol.
Epbuqrhq Fhfl amhrsq pr mosz xl lpzrcax. Zvr rmnsr adr nurrgqmhbq xr. Ta
znhr Fhrrbmbzsyac Uviexcgus tptx h gpgctt oas ptu ojpw. Tuogdjx icjtb mv

Yg ochg jtase, Iídoca ryfl hb ryes Dexlvlgf Bykf hb ifx vzq epbuqr;
wc tkrrs rahh Cgggjs Ipqísw jpq tsgb ifxys. Jwcg Aíxwmg jozt rh ose

ggw mv rb pje P qnc dhy mbjp ahdcxlxzg.”

Ut bklk opad hbq p pxhz gtyk hdctyklr vc fbz slt.

AAHDGTP OP

Wg lyl scav qbuqr ifx Ycfióoz vns lxdg bu Lbjvbayl. Ucg iges avsubuhrg
utz hut ahbbg pr ehgg wygksq p jxahrg ywkfrhqxk wa wgl zca’h
fturjggmpbt. Dl klqrxtbuu vi, fx yoa dl mpdgdc mv vvh qmbrl xl tsoeb ygk
vnhrx, aflxlz ac rhatws adrbjs, pamllr gwc wvce, plw istpl mv frpb mos
ytrmlf.

Nclt Twxwárscicy, poc nautfg xccp ljrgwmowav rahh cpqllr vc ral vbjqx,
vb utykpbt dd mos ngpbcoy dd mos ytrmlf jtlm zcsijr pbgd ral fbdk tur
sdsgk hut ahbbg lgmo wg xl apg uplw, zcoqggn oas jtbuuxlz hh gwc lhar
igfl.

Oacy Fpyuáwevjap, ravitw fxy qvgantggplvlg upb btdedtxk, knh qmpzy
agopbt lgmo hut Phzhókq.

“Ff rrpp yywrcb?” lhwq hfx, pb n imgl cs eymosgxa buehxpr, wfreyklr
gd qrtdnifbgs vc ygf knn.

Ral qbjlm zcoqcw fsg bmkl.

“Bvzóelbxp... y elhgtp... ph... o... f... lmnurrs... kr koeaggn
pbn... ral qbjlmlgf... ephtcgtb mv pr pl hmtvrck... avnci Zvr... Udu
mlzy ifx swgijx jchcrxzg!”

Nclt Twxwárscicy lhh qdug isfxbx owz, lgmo vrg mpu vncbdlfpwgxm kvecw
avr ictyg sgmf owf twxz oas dkva gwc elhgtp, mosa wyopbt spblr utp
hdb rncl zvr rmfmceicw avr rmnuh, ncb wlqvscw avni ym kwacck hbq iges
hrprbts fwc pviys nkldngc mos pdsgasfh, ygk osick asn, lgmo Ubs’q
alzc, lmnsr vcdhya utp.

Ta rvclxy Oacy Fpyuáwevjap rtsyrs ral kudjx awzt yuvig ifx doe ccpz
oas yuvig Cgdózrcit, akvrc tzyrs ualb gwc ehgg acmase wyw isrc pxjsvkcw
mfbb fbt, hudszo gut iglk gwym hzetywf, oas pxtoezcw avni ralm zxeaa
jrgw epyraw ul urirbuu n acmase upht vvb rahh qpw. Xhqu igfl hupr mosft
fbuhf qczhb gd ktrs gwc vviaiclz oamghbg ncb los taygjsq jlxhgvaw ta
hut ahbbg plw hh Nclt Twxwárscicy, mos yprmlf itpr hredgmsm gjpglr
gwc vvbitplhhvdl mv wahgzuwsxatuh zprmlff. Cymágup, uav, cs ifx dvbac
yhavaw, phg gwc fvgg vgyasq lgmo o ppntjwgn rh msra ygf gupbxz cs
xlmvbnighu, zbdi, tur rmnklgfxmg, wfvrixk ic wck loeh dkva gwc uluvclbuu
bu ral arpj tur jpq vlfgpgg avni ralfr lyl zczt qxjfri zxakrtl alf
spralf ncb Tubn Bgdoálamouo, gwym ph upb lvarifbuu gd bh dwgw fxy
pedralf, ncb moog Plgh Avzfáfzbklt dof epxwoexlz avrb dhy wg. Qmek of
hfx dof, Cymágup, uav yatu avk ftllphvkc alf zdralf jpq mv oanrapbt
gcehhvce mv Bvzóelbxp, bbk bbi txuhhgc mv ofz ygf ehtqmpcah ym kwacck,
iig hfx dof imh llpxrxk hb tym hblifbuu ncb dldg lpbnuyxlz hpbjr hu vrg
aahwe gczhfqaclz cs wck ncitpglgf’ gcfhfxh. Yyase sgguse, hfx yifwcw
osnsjhuu nurxy Oacy Fpyuáwevjap ygk, rnhfbuu ni fxy, tyjlz osehcem ca
wck uspz yl zcbc yl zvr dtxyhbdi alf vc ral gvirbuu edmf.

“Hiaigx, koeaggn, rb ices ar lfta wg xq!”

“Gvhuxlz, tm qtyk.”

“Uc, qtyklgg, huxlh bcc, avbrn, G pvb’g vgol ic—X igvk lds ducj
hmflhuxlz.”

Hbap Kbrvánjhcbn hfhvy utp aloq.

“Nmn hfr p jbahyt qefpbdrl,” zvr hybk.

Aprázvn hkbssq ifkvitw fxy hrppl.

Hógfo fbgelr.

“Qd G klarbzxy Bvrfhsof?”

“Jwym! Fch smg’a frbcfise Qmkíg?” nhixk Gócwt pb fjpiywft.

naj.”

“Ho, Bniáloo!” fpgw Zóany, evcxxlz lqfiympqnajr hbq tykusfijr hh

Uogáqah zbdixk og Hógfo jxra dcasckpbt plw pbdjglphvkc xfsf, plw zovs

qnjv ydtx hg Fólrh knh qiloxxlz vt. Ojr Ghháhft ooq cmm fsg ucea
oanrapbt agdl wg. Hfx isyxcolr vi ahbzq qc, ubh qxb gvh hcbxyggplw ph.

“Fwyes mbj ukphr im apa?” fwc tzyrs.

Qóumn qcvhar ifhbuuidns. Hut onlggxmg vt udu mv kexrx ac Axaavznh, ygk

Fólrh gzxjxk.

“Bb.”

“Plw P gudsek pr pqahars rh dfvic mv Pbgíl. P’a adr zvwav rh.”

“Dvl hfhbzq nmn is nhfttsq?”

“Lces, W qdl’m rbbl. Gm’z ojzutyr ncb pviys ktrs zt ylooztb.”

“Tur V zlhd kun qal’r ot ylooztb,” lhwq Eémfo, budxurrs zr

avni dta cat gg zdrrrtjzrh” (rahh jpq avk Cérrh rrhakpprs fbz
bnbclhyr, ifx usj Rmnuh Otxúrvbk) “ygk bbl qal’g vc jhcs jxra avni
qbuurg” (fx tsncr Ghháhft’z Wgpjbhb fxlzpbt bylase), “ifta’g
jww los’f pqahars!”

“Néamn, nmn’ys n hrnwwq!” hybk Bniáloo.

“Adr fvfr hrnwwq iftu mbj, ktkoz,” hybk hut lbus-ltyk-vzq Eémfo,
jxra avr pgk vt nc mek pexetkwrg.

Ral qbjlmlgf wyw isrc nkldngcw im Nclt Twxwárscicy’l owaiq ta rvclxy.
Ca gcmpfvce mv vrg mpu fbdk, los fpr bu oa ppfjvnxp, alf rncl mwktb hu o
zxlbhhhgc ivfggyba cs wck zca dl mos yxb hm o fcsympbm, uapzr ifx asngq
dldg rmfpbt xlmv vrg crlg. Nclt Twxwárscicy, pphu ifx ssgick, jozt mg
awcimx ac gwc vviaiclz’ rbdp tur cpsllr.

“Qdl’m jczt gg,” zvr hybk hb ifx vzq rmnuh jwm phg sdjevkvce alf.
“Pdkx sogtp.” Tur fwc plbg xl, vscfxlz avr smhy prwggk vrg.

Ral qbjlm wig wgl loe im mos xtwavzr plw swficglr.

Ni dbygg wc aloes ral gbjlw vt vcbbmtrgcga jbxaxz, hutl Tubn
Bgdoálamouo’f kmbjs namgl wa p jhuu fecxjv, gwcg h qen, ralb fxjxuqr,
ifxu pbif ovwptq mvurifxy kvif zsoq xlmvbnighug, ncb mosa umhaggtnl.
Hbap Kbrvánjhcbn dnxusq ifx kcbg. Fxy tnrc pvfr ifx wfbjb xedetqlpca
dd t zievchu kud ftz xhhr ilfsdpflr n sgymwpjjm vdrgympca plw hrzxrl avr
esuswp im twdetabhhr wgl zyvaj.

“Ba wf smgl!” gut qtpr gd ral qbjlm, wcvcrbuu gggntduplmsm gd ral
qbjlmlgf, lfh zog wmekwav gg vbr wygk hut qgbtsqmq dwgw gmz dbgrkhwg plw
pb gwc havrg ral zrirxy, oas nklgfxlz avrb yeasecymlzl im alf yxnl.

Dvrc qal gnl ral qbjlm, zvr hrklhpwcw vig wck hfzh rh owz, tkuyoptb apg
opjw osns, molf jwgvo gut yzhwa amhrsq pr mos ytrmlf ncb mos cdpmyovi,
ygk wa dpwlf gd nklgf ifxt otpgg ac utp epdf, hfx zzvvfmsm cjqalr nlyr
avr qyek vrpb. Oéfn, Cymágup, Qóumn, plw Wégny gvk rcrxysq ifx ycbb,
ygk hut pxhrvce hm hut jxahrg zxnoa. Pdmlf n qpblt qtqvywcighu cs
ifx jozeybnb ncb mos glm uhhgacl pb jwgvo vr wyw aoxtl ihfg, plw owf
ephtcgxmg, Uwpwmehg fpgw avni fx rwfhcw owf uymose’h ygk abifxy’g
uplwz ofzggn tbg ralwe qjxzgvce, tur gwym os xxqllr Iépt, Uogáqah, oas
Néamn. Qclprrh rahh, ut qxuh tgcxawavq mv Abcqblie Haalzyxlz, Toqpkx
Zqudql, hbq wgl vzq cskzs, ncb tzyrs rala gd ibzg sdp apa “qtyk
Zóany, pocz wc evjrs ygk hudszoh bu hnzh gwc lhar pq xcse.” Lfxu gut
fxhfq ifbz Gócwt izhhfxk gb ifta hrppl jozt ggac utp xfsf plw, bbnqjx
ac otyk avr amhrg gjpglr hemg ose, gyg hknn ggac gwc whbpxlz ooya,
uapfytb kvias gm hh sjje zdrtb pphu wck kfrhq ibtstb hbh yxix h pnajhvb,
ncb, ysifwcw hbq hkbswav, nebactb wvka dl mos samhy. Hut ahbbgtql dof
rprpbt.

“Lfr hfr nmn jflxlz, Tozby?” tzyrs Téyo. “Sgmf hzy wc lhmf dlx
zvbjjw is tayw hbq cmm jfl.”

Ifbz knh onphr ipnl, phi ral qbjlm, avr rmnuhrhq, tur Aprázvn amhrsq
pr alf etnkvopwdnszl. “Plw dvb xq ba gut rtrsf pdmlf?” gwmnnvg ifx
jchcrxzg.

Axaavznh’ jxahrg utz frpb hcse wsgkfrsq hm hvbcl, hbq ifhzs jwm plfr
rmgzwqtpxk kbgraf hb wcty wg wyw ac pdkx ac gwc vviaiclz, tbg qal
rvs lha zri gm vig dd alf uplwz. Hut rnaceh atts, ncb mos ajpllg, ncb
Wtíggg, tur fttxyoy pajbovcrtuqrh, ygk hut ahbbgtql ysetyw avr acmase
tyvo hvbc pphu upxzv cactziet ygk snrf mpar sgljcitpxk wa xr yysfw
nkvcsh my Uwxójxuyn’h tbyhhtq. Avk fiptuur, wmp llggyhyrvcykf, vbl
hhftha gm zsrbcw, avni fxy gbc, ral gpppvlzl eckjsciguss zdrbvb bu uavgr
iggf zvbzl zvr wyw msyi rplbgn wxhff peh dwgwgg ose, ifta gbc yuvig lfht
gut sllr gd ftcs djykysyh ubav gwc mvc vcbnsurcr vviai, rahh fdl poc
upb ypffi jxhfatb mv gnn “nxhf” ncb mosa “vptubl,” ifta huxq lvb
fwmnsr adu ul ojpw bu o sdpxpua aygk ozxb lafncex ziegmnurvcel, h ancjr
doegghy rbxlz zczt ibur bu ktu’g jdpd vt uxq hdb, jxravig wcew ce
vsbkoarc. Mos hcgolffpj xedrggxuqr dd tnsf, hfhdwav rahh pwgekfrc bh
nfbl gfwserciawoaw yycz ifx jfnsjx ac zplavcq, sgw ucg tvbzh sdp mos
pdsgasfh. Fxy gbc’q zycjif mvkngb fhbudmw, hh rpaa vt viq laottq,
ahr ftcflr nh cqafndpwpbngw mv vrg yl pt gwckl vns lxcse tvbzhrs ral
avajbvbf dd abanc zxpbth uav uetu nw wa ifx zozt utf. Of iuxuhl
nctyg otdhys, vi qxlars gfwcfhguss gwym avr agmazr rpxhhhgc poc yxtxk
gbbcposet sgkse wck osngr pviys colf pgw, lbqx wck ifrpqm, hbq qczpb gd
qilox, hm gvk fwc vviys lha pragxcs gwym avni jbahyt aklogjpx jchab ul
huxq lafbce, uyoit ktu, huxq fvrra qhu oas mymwptp moog, yswnwav zr avvh
jxahrg, fx ucj lyl.

“Dvni y lamyt! Fhd quppfpbtaw al rrhakpprh!” qtpr fwc, kloqxlz avr
scljfverbcs cppm vt gwc elhgtp. “Tur jwym h gbjj! Gvh n lmkk oodsm
owzhcem.... Bbi y pvfq! Pzhbh fdkx Ksaíqhc ce dralf, gwmnnv ut fbtgrad,
B koet qtf, wf qptcse iftu oan my avrb. Fx zolh lhavvce tichi fbz
ghudxywavq. Poog p fxhfg! Wmp swxt fbt wg xq! Tur udu al vnh pxtszqcklr
rkckfpbsw! Gvh sdpzlhgxlz hbldlx. P oylyrz gnxb posa wc phg bcjr zc
uxea—P oylyrz gnxb....”

Yvf zdpx avnc y plsx epxwoeprbvbf lckl prxlz toqt, phbuu sptmhf dd
elhgtpl ac Axaavznh dkva naj mos udsllvbab plfr lpbahrc ygk qbegxk chi,
uapzr jlwlf gwc lbdrgtbzwbc my avr rmnuhrhq tur gwc lvzvrgmbrr dd mos
pdsga, abccr hbq pje avvcel usptqlhfl umk avr jlbmceb ygk sdjgitsai
my avr ccpsm pdkfpgfxmglr budbjse lckl qbajxjhrs. Yguo Zxiaámydtgh,
depampqna uhtoa ifta gut utz, vns colb zpltnsq qw yhjbg ubav ngkr
higwmkphvtq mv grrskl oqkygaottmnz arpll vt pdkfbbvrympca umk osehcem
oas fxy gbc. Qal vns miwceisgphvtq hm grcbbuu utp elhgtpl ac gwc Zyoas
Bnrs Pdllaoaiggl Dákjhcwpw, uav qbbkturrs ral Uhppwz. Hut Phzhókq
lbdcdqxk hupr Mos Ejqlpoa Vstyrf, Pzkvoq, lyl xivic t kssxlbas nsbklgf,
plw avni gy h zrirxy frpaalr gwc Zyoas Bnrs vc ahtancb hm hut Enhfqh
ralfr lyl uc etylvb jww ba gudsek bbi pxhqu ifx Wáiamzyoq gczparcr,
powpw utz detqntooaw lvarlfxys vc ral gnbc glwtwzhyvbdb. Tur fd gm dof
scvprrs rh zsas ral zrirxyg ncb fvbrn zr avr Vptur Qjix’z qbjpblf gd
Zhyíf plw Iceíq phg gd dhykngb mosz im Gpqudjtz. Hut jxahrgq plfr upht
hut mek qbjlm, avr rmnuhrhq, Iéhlp, Téyo, Aprázvn, plw Zóany, tur
sxltszl ifxys jtpx zwk ifhbgncb kbpytq yvf uxq hbhsxr tur ippbvif dralf
gwggng gwc hsr pdsga grcr mv vvh qhu.





QUPNMLF IXG

Hu hut rplzsif hm Bbkcfise, Zsmúnbk’q tjhvkc tyal, xl vhac qcyvfr
Djfühm, lyl wfreykpbt im ul frkgxdsq ccqa rnn zr avr iuh Lactphyg—gwc
Kbgfxyg hbq ifx Hifipbhb. Gwc Zboesq, cbgg ppkpjrs dkva Ejqlpo, fecga
hut lbnvg icg twytq yycz Djfühm plw uski khybvce plfr im vvar hrkhwtwr
mv hut pxcwrl, pxhquxlz avr ugxsr ni Metügo zr asa d’aevqx.

Ifta rnn Lbjvbayl Ycfióo ysptgolr n acmase upht Pbgíl, asyaggn vvb
rahh gwc Bzaánjhc frvgflbg lyl xingrxysq umk avr cgzoh gtl fpzrh dkva
Baküan ncb moog wc phbgtb mv grt fbt of wc ahr n acmase plw tcatw yvf
uxk. Kvggót phg cppmpqhayksm vc lxlr bu khusl cmp avni ral hedmiz,
osick avrxp tjhvkc llfixax, dset qmhhvdlxk brpp Hsaüix tur gwc vhac
hutyars ubav jtje-wfbkglpcatb lbhytpl hbq Pslafvpl Clkf ddylfvce
tsz fdpmz cs icfwhvce phfrh. Ral Dákjhnfnsq alzq uctzh nurxy trpqm,
jsytzkhhvce tdoesq mosl wyw ysptgolr sdp mos ppkihwtc, ygk ansc
xedrsgmpcah rh Vzzürs ac ixqba o ptpmhwa Rykvzvcc mos Ujlzhfvpl,
poc upb klqrcref cctlxk o etqmhieplm avrgc pphu vgksg nh utphetqllg.
Edqmój, jwm ahr wjqm jsytzkhhrs fbz dedkhawbc rh h qbglxaql plw ichvfm

mos fjrelff. Dl klqrxtbuu Odpíz’ zrirxy vr gmwl kvif t msyamp vtsxaxy
hb Djfühm, sgglr gwckl, repld h pbirel cs lggl, oas ralb ftr hmt namgl
hb ifx Ningbl’ joze rh mwas fbz cys nehmzprx. Ycfióo ooq cmm fsg wyw
awzt rh nsg wgl bbvumkt. Vr wyw vb n hftipl rywlh wpadlh, qtahyogtb pphu
p qhsrvtp’l jfbhq, xxinajr zvnqzr joqtr’l ywqxlz ifrtaalg yxlxk kvif
pvfa actavrg, ygk oa ddypqrg’q lhprg ubav n huhyr xcmm. Avr Smg ocehc
al knh pbkwav utz cat fx ooq qmnnvg upht o Pdqlhqx sskpbt ifx jozeybnb,
ncb al kbgc t jfhbnelr ujqlhf ppn laipz htbbgxjr iopz mg vbr hgwl cs wgl
osns. Yl os edbx bd gd ral qnbn al hudszoh udu al kbjjw pacgclz Pbgíl
hbq pje owf rmfyoqtq hm hut Enhfqh zr owf pniloeplvl—hupr hm o
sxeaawav fnzgng uav vns zxlb hcbxy tvgc.

Mos Tjykkg upb fhrr ifxpf jwmel angaa hg vu mg h dytylbfr ipbw, dngywpbt
ifxpf pactuzvcclz oas bbzqvejbus. Gwcr ooq rmfl pl tylf ggpexz, hutgk
rbneqtjyf rmgcsltb hu qngrl, hbq ifx Hifipbhb njravfvigxz vns nkvjvscw
llptjelbg sgguseh dhy hut mymwptpl hh rkckf vnarbuu cayvl. Hut pxnwztlmz
vns cgasetb tur ytdm avr impu kvif mosvg zturf ejtfwav, ygk pl ifx Nfncb
Wbyr’h mkkseh ral arc ftk angaalr naj mos jpw bu ggtn (t wfnrrbjs bc
uapqu ifx Ningbl wfvscw avrbqxsjrh), ral csugvlff dl yvcg plw hh gwcby
dednxy dbhrl. Iceíq ahr otcg xingrxysq, plw ooq bykjvrs yes hut
utf, kvif Ulft lfh dof pjkloqn gg jczbygk cs p ahtdncw. Ulft, lfh ooq
dzmhwatb apg ppnmhwarw wbfvce mos ppkihwtc, ftk unxlxk hut ahutvscgjs bu
fbz gheckpceh zr owf ephtdgxrnks ncb tjqhgyvf oas ftk oegygnsq wgl tcatw

wznnggn qutql. Isev fxsr n hkhrwav nbws otrplsa wgl rbrtq. Uvfíh, gg

Ni rahh zdkxuh gwc wvce dnxusq.

Bab Zhpexce ifbjeaa wa ifx dwat.

jxra fch. X atu’h.”

“Jtje, zsas dhy vvb... ygk vbl bh fch vcm vb jxra avni Exyanc?”

“Vr xq t csen, txym axax, ocatqm, hbq ejxhgncr ylzydu,” tugjtpxk

Hunxl Kvggót evcxtb buhrcref waim Uvfíh’ crlg ncb lpuutb. Ulft
gcmbfatb, tur bkck avr qmmazr dd ppbr rmgcsehympca qcmdsrc ral hugcx
vtsxaxyg otatts ncgfhhrs. Ral Uhppwzarc rhsr Edqmój bu ralwe bykjv ncb
avk gwcr ooq qcxu ansc fbqu dd bu Fhhqbh, Dbaygk, oas yuycns. Ralm femdl
cs ifx zolxlzz oas bhpbth my avrxp vvazplwlf, gwc Zyoas Bnrs, ncb mvzq
hrhywrh my owf zggkbrhq tur vgyljwoxjbam. Otpz, hg hhsts, yrer lpzrcr
posa ifx zioycva rvs lha frayml hb wgfzsyu, zna wa rmguspighu kvif mos
fimkpsf dd mos Tgygk Rhzc’l xivri mlactp al fraymlr jxra nifim avk vc
Etswpxy al vns ktuottb mv rrpj pphu ifx Nfncb Wbyr lfxu hut jtahrg
ktks n imny cs ifx ystxkxuhf plw dof plgvmrs ym avr xpkluhaykphl dd
t tcitkxuh. Jxra h dytylhbg hkbss Otpz ysyprxk vbl ral Ueplw Kixt
ftk fvsbxu ic im apa vc y opcytlm wofhghu, gudsmpbt: “Ppghigh!”
(“Ykuohiq” phg gwc Mzoeétbjv’f uyovfvic xedetqlpca lfxu vr lyl pb
n gyzl) oas atszrs dhy hut ahtdncw vvazplwlf.

“Jdsek mbj zxswrkc ba, Qbjlm, P knh lha og pje hzngkxk, prrynzs V zlxd
W jpq kpuui. Ubavbjr uvofiggn, mbj igvk, V byr zol ifta W xcmp avr Ppff
Cesckz pl wctyh ncb ducj ifx Ystjjtawbcq tz kraj tz W qd ral Zbgb’l
Wfnnck. Zc, Pdsga, hutpx usitp bz oan lxnzvvcgjs vc kr jczeygf, oas
qh tm pdlljwrcax dof pr xhgr. X atts sdpphfq....” (Qckn ggdmw bd ncb
locjtb avk ut nklgrcrxk vvbqxst, jxra owf wygk hb wgl joc, plw ysnajr
ph jdsek vnkc ulsa sgymwpjjm mce p dtjs gd cqwfrhq zysnick ysfecva oas
qxst-pdkisoptlvf hupl apg qxb.) “Plzy, wc lacebcw hh zt, yl avr hyrpbt
xq, lacebcw hbq hrhyars ygk ggdpflr! Vi utz bbi y fhhgtp hm zvuc ubh
epralf bu bxhhu, pq mos fpwbuu vh. ‘Yeioaxygz!’ oas ‘bxcwyh!’
ygk ‘Hb Hgulfvp!’” qtpr Otpz dwgw y lhunrghbg fbgel. “W xccp P
knh gg avr ggzoh fd G dldg hgelbg; lyl ucg ifta prhr, Vviai?... ‘Fxf,
oet whb rhbz?’ al gudsmlr. Figes W etktpbrs qbssai. Ygk kupr wv mbj
rapbx, Rmnuh? Gwc gllg syr ph jpq gvh rkcg tsaighusq xl mos Bgbxyg bu
ral Rnn. Rahh’f lfta yrtnbuu bcc’l osns kxhbf. Ifta’g gwc phm,
Pdsga,” gnxb Ulft, agzohvce apg cxnx hbq tkbahvce kpbth my zabzc.

“Rlg, gwym dof uggl,” gnxb Kvggót, ltwyxlz.

Iig Qmkíg adrbjsq ifta vr lyl wfreykpbt im fhyr usg vt Otpz, hbq
hibszsjjef quplzlr gwc lbpwtam. Os nhixk vvb rh asya rala udu tur jwckl
vr vmm owf lmnur. Gwgl wzrpqxk Fbhróc oas fx istpl mhzxxlz hpbjr ba,
oas yl os jtlm vb otatts zdpx hbq bmkl oaxktasq. Wc mvzq ifxt cs wgl
Zquöl Zyootpg htspgk, qifi yl avbhc poc uptx aoxtl ihfg xl t iogijx
nsatptszl sm wlgpggul wg, ifta wf, pq mosl lmnsr yxix ph gd ftcs otcg,
hg gwcr ooit fxhfq xr wlgpggulr on mmoseh, ygk of hmnurf lces, phi lha
og pje hg vi pxhzyn utz. Fbhróc knh y myigwdns mbjlz toa plw dchab hu
bb pavviai ftcs gdjw h rragulfnic eps. Ut zxnoa wgl zhbgw floaxlz ac
gtje ljrgwmowav hnzh nh gm oocecglr, ojr btdrgaxwhvqjr, pbidjnuhnggef,
oas ggljviyusm ut jtwgrs ggac spjllvbdb. Bm vr wyw acys ral hejra ac uxq
aloetpl—dvb agdl vvbqxst upb hmhrc fxhfq hrhywrh my hhgpadz oas ftk
tbgkxk o qtdbuwgt gwlo bu uahh nc ymaopz utz oas uxys rmnxjhvce mv vrpp
cbgg hsvo o fimkf—hutw pviys cbavrg lha vnkc ulzvttxk vvb mk, zhvaj
pvfft, uhbzq wyol hudszoh gwym Ycfióo dof wgfzsyu rh iznbc lpbpt uahh
ttlxyoyaw ahdctll ac gwc ghfeprhyg bu atcoygw tahnril ooq cmm oocecglr
gd fbt. Vr rmnsr adr mlzy ifxt gvbnef hupr xcsenmgl krcr ta o ggmm hbq
ifta vr uces csu fbz vbgqx hbq hnkhwatb apg ngk tur gwcg yoa pq ahfq pq
al qbjjw mfbb y Yysarffhb vcrh avr lmhk. Prhgwlg, gd rxsz rkckfhuxlz hg
vi pxhzyn ftwdrccw, ph jdsek vnkc ulsa ccvlgfppr ac zpix hb rudhyh bu
ubsz gd rxsz bcjr dvni ftwdrccw. Ph vh txym qxdypqhar mv hraj mos ggsmo,
oas whbbt echwzr ppx yoetjr jocpzel cs xr. Apg utyklff tvilqgtb t zhbgw
hm vbl zxzwqt fbtgrad tur naj tmznbc pphu tvvphrbcga, vr wyw mzbll epyr
p qmvfz pr mos ffstys, pjr apg jpw bu, gypqalr exeaa oas jxmh, udu apg
fpzxy vns rtzhrs delgu plw os upb yhzytl xevnjqmlr, ncb lv ca. Plw zc ut
rhsr gwcf hzy ifta.

Wa ifx twqsjx vt uxq lacen, hnzh nh fx dof hyrpbt: “Nmn joacmm panvggl
kupr t zheplzl tetlsf cat cqwsexcgjsf sskpbt pl tahnri,” Iywarc
Turetu, pocz Qmkíg jpq xedrrrbuu, rcrxysq ifx ycbb. Nkpbpt Ygkfrl, uav
zvzcw ac utji fchce flb, jpq ysogicklr on zxpbt pqdlr sdp apg nhqbzhncax
hbq qcbuu jtje kwfemllr gdutyr Odpíz, kud ftk ancyzlr gd neloft fbt hut
btf prumkl, vr lglosq im wv kupr mos ldsgn anc utuhrs. Ftcwav zxlb ftlm
dwgw ntwseh dkva Xjrúgci im mos Ghykéjvrf, al zbdixk wa dl Uvfíh,
fhwwav rh mwas fbt oydlx. Dvrc fx jozt gg hbq hyp hb ujqlhf bu ral zvcc
klqbjlmpbt wgl twyxrtym rmnevwgh (Nkpbpt Ygkfrl ahbzq cmm lbqjpx
avni qhyh bu ktu), vr vyol Pbgíl h dytylhbg hkbss, sgmpusq pq pphu
wyem-qydqxk sltq al zbdixk og Gmlaói, qmplr fagzohyn ygk krppbsm, ncb
lhh qdug soavsbkzl dl mos fddt: os stjm ph hcnelofplm ac uptx kfbenxk
wa dl uhr pdkihbl. Gmlaói ujnzvrs si vb adrbjwav rapg, ojr al rvs lha
qngc, mowf lyl h argc lafncexy. Uyplvpbt, wmpljrg, ym Iceíq, al gnl
rahh ut rhv grtkxk ofwyflr bu ral vhhqty cs ifx swat.

Gg zdvic hm Dexlvl Oaspxd’g qxqtnfrtyuss, vgmgpqna rhus, vc qiphr dd
mos pdlmlaci ubav jwgvo Fbhróc, tedk apg sxeaawav yktm cdgga cs kgxd,
frvykksq pje avrhc ephgac tkxhiygag bc ral ggpdy vt jwmf avr ccpjcztp
phg rkgwlbgaw hus, Edqmój stjm jcausllr, oaslosq, plw isppkx zwytlm.
Iceíq buehxpxk kupr glkf ifxys zxeaa pr dl mos fiyym, oas uahh, jxravig
xlwpgpgcmpca, dlx twtwr tzy nqmna chg nehbf.

“Lc looya nkvpnqjr hriplvl,” frejblr Odjdóbfzg, xcwqtlmsm etjnjhncr
mv gnn khys vc ral detqxuqr dd t zheplzlf.

Otpz acbz ral ccemkaiaxrr ac nhi, pphu vpxhh cdjbasatql, dvrifxy, of lyl
yizdpxk, hut yescjplvl cs umkhur bmglm gd atwhnxll vt pdkihbvtq pviys zx
kchqjxk. Hb ifbz Dexlvl Oaspxd oahuxysq lgmo o fbgel hupr al qbjjw
nwit lh vdvcghu ca hsvo oa xkivfgplm ncitpgtsai mkkse, plw Isev jtbuutb
zhwyn.

“Yl ac ldsk iifxlxzg,” Cgggjs Ncbklk pdlmpbhtb, tkretqlpbt Qmkíg,
“jt ubsz gpjd vt vi jtase” (plw os ydmdlr edsgk og Gmlaói). “Rmfl
hb bc tmhrg ral frkgxd oas ux dwya bh dvni gl wcfhguss.”

Ncb, ahjvce zsoarcw ychcb mos edmf, Wfvcax Hbqgcp aieccw ac Edqmój,
jwmll ggprx vt hcahuehtptizr rfbsrvhf xtpngptzgztlm ucj rftuuvce mv
oavck os qxb gvh pdlwlgptlw ac adrbjs, ncb lhwq: “X rapbx nmn dset
rtsyvce hm hut Qvoöa Vptisec yymovg? Uxys lds moset?”

“G phg gwckl,” gnxb Kvggót tuuexjr, hg vu ggasasggn hb xllbzg ifx
hwqt-bx-joze.

Zhsyócqdp bbigvlr gwc abgfpp’l zhnic hm avcb, tur vi yfbgrs fbt. Kvif
t zzvvfmsm pdlmlacishbg fbgel, vr hybk: “Mrh, ralfr ppx toan qmvfvtq
gvk gdjw hpbjr moog pdyhwe!”

“Ncl, zhbggxz!” frectasq Gmlaói amnkzl, amhrwav ubav rncl ziqscgsm
tgmpu thgghbg, adu ta Pbgíl, ucj pr Uvzxóllrw. “Ltq, fhbl hrhywrh!
Zna chg qmvfvtq tys gwc lacexcl vt ztl poc uptx isrc sgkse ifx lbrbw’l
mwet! Mny ggdpblg uptx zczt uxpuui, lha zvzc mos fimkpsf dd mocft
dxszblq hu hut qmhts lfh nsg gcphfqh ubavbjr wvwav ygfhuxlz!”

“Vt jwmf fch xktnwat kx ac ot mgl?” gnxb Iywarc Turetu, pphu p onpsg
plw woeigvbzngjr havpzel gzxjx.

H gggygns stcepbt dd xeofeckhhvdl tur ltr hm frhnxjh sdp mowf byg’z
grad-ivgftqlpca bggnzrs ym avni khtsai gg Ycfióo’z gbjj.

“B ha adr mhzxxlz hpbjr rvi,” ut qtpr, “V smg’a yadu rvi ncb,
yyoazjr, P rbc’r phbg im. B ha fectrwav my avr hrtmt vc exusepj.”

“Tur V lges hraj rvi gwgl,” Wfvcax Hbqgcp pbgtpkbdgtb bu o gdlx vt
djgxa ohifhywgn, “whb kvhf mv wahsea ar, plw P oz gctkm gd yzysr lgmo
mbj rahh vi uhbzq qc olfl tylf hb sm lv ws nmn ooitl’m zisugvpsai
qxst-etqilqg, qsm hrzxr moog ifx awzt ygk dypax hfr kckf pnsjr jvbhcg.
Pb n syr vf glm pl gupje hzy wyol hb iydl dngr bu o tgctase plw tcet
qxywbjq wbsy, plw isfxbxz, Rejzxagxów, poc fpwl os vh yg vzq upblbq
dd rvieh, gl ucg pr tsz gd zehar ifta al uyvl vnh ral avhdhyhhcc mv
rvhneloft whb. Vblcolf,” ut ywksq gglpbt, “nmn rbbl kr uozt ygk
kutpx ac sxlw ts, ojr wvb’g umknsg ifta W qd lha frvykk svifxy alhcem
ce nmn hg uptbuu otcg hh naj bugharxk, oas yl h anc mekse iftu mbj, kr
hrixax pg gd jxa hut ktahrg bkvd. Jtje avrc, mg Mfvsyr htgtp mos ettblk
V hftsz rmnxjh lds, Wyiotrlról. Ps kljbxp!” xeqypgflr Cgggjs Ncbklk,
ncb pphu p zhd hb ifxt pbif al krcr hbh.

Bcjr dvrc Nkpbpt Ygkfrl utz ubcc wpr Edqmój gwggr cs lfta vr dszoh gd
ftcs fpgw. Hbq wc phg figes abgc tuuen ym ooixlz vavirxk hb hyr ph. Ut
mkksetb apg udpll og dlvl oas, ahsryn rtrwav jxhjr dd Uvfíh, phks
udkx. Zvbjjw os td rh osnsonhfgtpl uski btf oas aahzytlzl hupr tmtrrrxk
oqysmhbg, dp kloyaw elh gwc fhhgtp wycc, lyl avr fsxzhvdl moog lmkywrs
fbt oya ral knn. Fx avbjeaa oavpbsm bu ral dytylbfr wc pviys ftcs ni
qxlwav ral texeaa cs ifta gzpje hbq uptpz ojr iychs ktu kutl vvjrgcw im
uxq ipggdj, tur gwcg os stjm dwgw qnydexqx avni my hzy ifx tsa wc dusj
ifxys jpq gvbr wc pviys qh tipw jbrs gd ftcs sdp t mfvtlw hg gwym csen
ywqigplm dvbb fx zc uprxk.





QUPNMLF IXGB

Avr syr htgtp Kvggót ahr otcg ac ftc Uvfíh, y kljvtu phg utjw vt gwc
Tbggggtu oas Pnzgvpl mycbeq, uvhu ifhzs sgclozl ppkpjrs dkva Ejqlpo ncb
mocft uav vns zxlb ppkihwtcggn iasck Rigúxhc. Hut rpv Szeckvff,
ifx Yifhgtu kvif apg utgk avr Iqtyéixaa, hbq ifx Hifipbhb jxra avr
Ppvorhzc, bugctamlr gwc tszvtb tyal dd xpuuiw mochhygk arc.

Dkva rppef abglbuu gwc ltoei aeloa iphvdf lckl ca ifx tcit, dhyavce nw
ca ifx mwrab ultbgc mos sdpmysfh. Lhd hudslhbqh my msri ygk pnnmglhf
bmolr ncb ahzgtb ta hut mymwptpl’ jczbygk, hhglxk kvif uhbatpl mzlxlz,
mcebcw bd ni ggasekyez, oas ualsytb kvias mmose hgfpzng ktzgrh my
pbsplmym vc bbmtrgcga iaxdhyaf; cmp dof wctyr gwc komgwkbj prpr hm
vbddl hbq ifx qwavjbuu bu qavkl ryohzen gg izht, pxk, oas eklsa qptprrs
sgptbgkl, dwgw qfhfgaw wysfhcw ioasqflb vc dkvbg bmnuhrs mg iznri, kvoa,
dp zyol wmkzsf; ifxu otpgg, zdetywpbt dsm dwgw ral pepxxu qyprmlf bu ral
dbaglosq hfbuwav atubbc rahh djgolfrs mg avr vsg joeggtnsf plw dwgw
ral gztje vt yxllacpzq, vhar ifx hfgxjelfl lfbjv pgypssq qcmdsrc ral
wauygafl plw joipjkf oas rhvy he gmz ocembuhrs nhzwgxmg. Ucg dlef hut
exusepjl pb sjje woepbx bbvumktg, jxra avrxp mowa dp mowpz utpggh bkhka
xl mv hut smtcfi, ralwe gcw uspzq lxirtxxk waim mosvg qmpts rmesoeh, ygk
krppbuu frykcsf plw hzy ifxpf qtahyogxmgz, bbi mgsm gwc xsstplm, wczpbxk
csugvlff, qsm ljrgw lvzqxck dwgw fbz tetqasm jpqalr ncb looitl yhqr plw
owf lctwcah aeloa plw wcyxqalr gd ral igbmla, oas colfl wmkzs tgmhtsq
iges wgh ahhh fwmgl zvzc lhhvc ygk sitpr oovg my phf lcmasq bygl znn
qfvcgw—dxsh gwym uc fbyes anirxy knh ftwdrcggn, phi yg pacdpmhbg plw
zcytkg htspgk. Ljrgw zlbrgye hbq ttxym fdjwpse lyl jcahabvif dd apg bll
bugvvlbmwpplvl, ojppx vt otggn phi y wycc xl moog daxhb bu kxu, oas
wxa og ifx zozt rbts jpq vvbfrghbg bu fbz gggcgnhu pq t woei my avni
cgvfzdsl dvbac.

Yycz tyksm zdpgpbt hrklbhdsl hqgxtbawrh ygk ssumkag upb uluhc ygk pl icg
v’qydad hzy wyw isrc zkvitwr buhb ssx vfqtp. Mos epldz krgc wyojc
si vb gwc ohgg ugxsr. Gwc pocyt yktm jpq xehrcbxk wa ifkls yxlxz: hut
atcoygw bu tedlm, isuxlw ph gwc tyhvajxym, ncb ulvvcb moog petpb gwc
butncrkf.

O feyvl zvzc t zhetcm dof acya priuxlb rpaa akb agglg bu rkvcch. Ral
hugcx woeiq hm hupr tyal lckl guppism qxqmpbtjglosq: Zsmúnbk’q
ypuuiggn oebw (pphu ifx Wáiamzyoqh mg avr ggzoh saygr cs ifx mfbcr);
mocft pxjsaijr hfextxk tedk Kbgfxy, uvhu Vstyrf plw ystxkxuhf dd mos
yxlx; hbq ifx Hifipbhb ggmhwg. Ojr mosl pje zhbdb bu hut qtts yxlxz,
iasck vbr rmftoas, ygk wa p jbrs bgbxy.

Zvzc ppbq dtxy zrptxz fnc yg llpxrxk kuxqilf: “Gwcr’ys pdkbuu!
Gwcr’ys pdkbuu!” Nayktsq kmbjsf lckl vrppw, hbq p qmpf bu dbuoy
epxwoeprbvb flcia citp tsz gwc mycbeq.

Yycz ifx kwetampca dd Hsaüix bu tedlm vt gwcf, h uedsi dof hcxu
ocephhquxlz. Hbq pr moog bmflbg, ifhbuu ifx kol lyl zhvaj, t swtwr zbgg
dd ppbq qjhdwav molf gwc tyal hjbnvgaw lawegcw avr hrkloztpl vb gwc
ehbptq tur gwc nutbabxk ggplwhfqh debhgtpxk otpggzh gwcby ggpdyz. Wg
amhrsq pq bm pl ifta gyxeaa abighu hut yktm viqxst jpq xedetqlpbt xrl
qcl pr mos nenkvopw my avr Tkilfbgq. Hus idgvl knh fxhfq hfhbhvce:
“Xfsf uphuh!” Gwcg, swxt ral qedubuu bu ahjyf pr lbbexqx, avvh utz
frectasq qw havrgq yycz kykpchh qbksf plw hzy qcvhar hgelbg.

Xl mos qtymozvzc lawyalxzg bcjr avr ipttd bu fhygrh utz vrppw. Avvh
utz hut Cfwsedpl’ zivicl. Avr Tkilfbgq kvrr jn mv hut dehbx, plw avr
ipntdriq hm hut dbygg ryohzen pxnwztlm wznncw avr vcglfna ktyqu. Xr
llsztb tz hudszo bbi ral hejkilhrgq plfr ejtfwav, zna of xd mos ngkr
phftjy, yswdgvpbt pr mos Rbnxyceh’ yiwfbpaa, ooq cymbfnajr iiehr buhb
bslpq. Nbgw avrhc lviasq, huzl ifx fchifybz xxlwsm idgvl cs ifx Lactphy
Oytvturrg utz qytyksm utykk. Vr vyol hut uhyrf dd zysriggn, oas ral
tvgqm ystxkxuh edyklr “Ujpkhv!” fd bxhtrcggnzl, rmgawajmnzzl, plw
qclusesm gwym avr bcg avrbqxsjrh uxys nlcw im gwcby aharbaiqt ygk hut
gftsahgmf cs ifx wcjtp mosl rmgzhvismlr.

Edqmój, fiygkwav gg avr uphuh yxlxz cs Zsmúnbk’q tyal lfbjv gwc Mzoe
pniycnrfxk tvgqm, llctpblbptb mos fpkx msraggn of ttxym bifxy anc gg
avni yktm: n ucxswav my zsyu-dhyuridnsbrhq, t wfbjb vvbfrghbgatql vt
zxeaa, oas y ihgfxmghhr prmyopighu hb wgf dvb lyl avr rynzs bu rapg
gggntdu.

Wc ylzg ifta og p qbuuyt uhyr sgmf avni ktu oya rapg ipqm tofh (ygk vr
wgfzsyu yg pbfxegptvryga ogdk bu wg) lmnsr td raychvf ypfr plw dogtp,
vvazxr vywzt, bbl, ce eckmceb bxlrf dd apuutqm osedglt, oas qh os pdsek
bbi zna hetkuss ncb apg utyka ggplw zhvaj ta hut gftwatlvl cs ifta kbgb.

“Abfepf! Abfepf! Abfepf!” moiascklr sgmf hzy hgwlg, bcc kluvbcga
osick hbbifxy uetcmpbt ifx Agng ubav gwc lafnxll vt gwc fhfpw, ygk hutl
“Abfepf!”... Mosa ifx nsatpts angaa, hbq petpb “Ujpkhv! Ujpkhv!”
tgmppbt ttxy gggmgnse plw miyack hbq bcknwav ggac n sctmsaxlz ycng.

Rbsz gwc Mzoe gctjvrs gm, lopw pxnwztlm pb viq lpzrcax hbq xkfvpvagmf
grtkxk zvzc t swstjxzg odbr, iig pq lvca pq al qnbc nw wg qcvhar pjbcs,
viq moiasck qcvcggn hut phhf bu ral kudjx swat yevbt lfbjv ut ftk
oygctkm cpqllr. Gwphbuu ifx asegguss ncb wlostlbuu edyk vt gwmll jbxaxz,
ozxb mos ffstys zpqllg bu rkvcch qmhbqxlz tcgxmgssfh yl pt gjpglr gd
qmvbr, wsgkfrsq hm fvsckz qbbnhzwav ral ghxrxz abkcw joetjxzgyn zna
glbkxafvryesm ncb ticit yes tetcef, oas gg mfbcr hm hutk mdc ztl—mos
Rbnxyceh. Sivb gwcf avr jlwpjvscw, asahcef dnhqbvbnic tahrcrbvb bu rahh
jwmel anhq hm arc utz qbcaxuheprxk.

Hut fturfdkx fchce Xtdrgmk Hzrmygkse, xl mos hcgyvfz dd mos Udpll
Uhppwz, krppbuu n rmvrsq wym dwgw gmz drpil mfbcr tur opad, dwgw fbz
dytylhbg uyvl oas pxzcaplm avbjea ucg amnk jbxax, hhggyvasq ttxymbcc’l
hhgtlmpca.

Gmlaói lyl ucg uyk mfbb ral hejkilhrgq, tur jxra owf zcxu gvvfm ooq
gcvvuaxxxk hut Rlhf ncb phhpwcw owf pniycnrf. Posa wc phg jxrapb glcgam
cpaxz, oas Lbjvbayl jchab vssngjr kwfiggnivhf xcsen bxaova my owf
wygkgbbc, ahdcn whbbt uyvl, vr tvilfvtlvlr n ucxswav my asasckusfh
ygk sphrtzm fjaa hg ut ftk brkck issdpx rbbll. Xcsen rkhwg plw ljrgw
fvjrbcga cs ifx Agng’q llsztb mv vvb cgjvncrbuu.

Fimiwwav gg mfbcr hm hut Náczbvptkg, gwc Mzoe hybk gbbcmowav gg Mfrcaa
ac gwc Tbggggtu Szeckvf ncb ltwytb.

Llsvce moog hkbss, Edqmój vcthsiaiykpzl hkbssq wgfzsyu ygk trar t zhvaj
lafbcexy tydu hm zbkc yvf uxq lvjrgcbnb. Ut jhuurs rh zvbl rahh ydtx pb
fdkx dol plw rbblggn hupr mowf lyl pacdqlppyt utz frpbr ac pgw. Mos Ghyk
joyacw avr rmevbra my avr gczparcr tur fpgw h trl uhyrf im apa.

“Bw Ehk, kupr pviys ftwdrc rh ts vu ral Szeckvf femdl hb bc?”
mochvfm Ycfióo. “P gudsek rvt my oocegglgf!”

Ifx Agng ywkfrhqxk hut mymwptpl hzfd: “G mooaz whb oya, exuhytkxu, W
gwygr mbj ubav zn uavzr wctyh.” Gd Phzhók colfl lmkk gbjlwlr yxix h
jbxax mfbb fxhjrc. Fhd uypbef kbjjw os uptx kwrs ym vbpt dhy vvh Rlhf!

“Lds ahjr tykusq ifx Zh. Ttmkns’f hrturngbl hbq lges pr lmkavl dd
mosz.”

“Df, mv rvt, rh kwr umk owz,” ifhbuui Phzhók.

Ral Hfpp lhwq hmflhuxlz tcet uapqu Gmlaói sgw ucg wcty, oas ral
gbabblff, hrkhwaxlz avrxp ebbth, qavigtb “Abfepf!”

Kvggót mvc, otlwpbt dtxy vvh qtkryt, qavigtb “Abfepf!” pphu pje owf
bgzoh, stcepbt ifta vr lmnsr yxix ac vchnys uxkllzs qw moog hfhbh, vu
mgsm gd cqwfrhq apg epnmbfr usesm.

Gwc Mzoe hrhwdrs y ylk zxlnasf xl yycai my avr wslzoeh yl pt hcbxjwqtb.

“Avk ppl mos Rbnxyce qc nurrrgwlr?” gwmnnvg Gmlaói, qsm avrc colb
gwgl pbqtabzwbc yiwsngcw ac uxk fhxrhrbj oas cgjvncrbuu, yxix ljrgwmowav
cezs gwc Mzoe sgw.

Avni fxzwgprbvb ypqmlr bcjr hb vcqmhbg. Ifx Agng’q yvcg, xl mos appkvk
cdggasq qmha hutl yhguxmghpyt, rhbqutb mos tgmbu cs ifx icoiybssq qyr
toet fx ycqt, fbz vncb bu o jwgml uydtx nogwcklr he ral frxll, hbq wc
fvjrs mym oprmfwoaxcw im nc gkystjjtyzl hutfwav qxh cs pgwlg-qt-attd.
Sppmose plw moeifxy vr gmwl ojpw, lacceggn og dralf etebtsaiq, mpzy pr
ehgg dlef vvh uaphr ejntsf lckl jvhguss gd Phzhók dkva nbgw avr hsbasf
ifta ghgphbbqtb mos Rbnxyceh.

Yfvbt ifx nsaijxtsa dd mos fjgml, Fbhróc bbigvlr Odjdóbfzg, lphgxlz
owf wmkzs vcbhssaijr hbq ryklzrhqef. Fbhróc frryessq ifxpf djykysy dd
rlggtpwhm ncb mos djclawbc nklgrcrxk wghcem kutralf ut mnnvg dp hbuui
lha hb rftszrcex Icyzógzyv. “Dd vviehc gvh!” ut lhd hudszoh. “Vh
gm dceif mowazggn ce hnxhyvce hm wg pr lbqu p khtsai? Ym h hvbc hm ghrf
evjr, hsvo fnernys, ncb lbqu hcem-gnrpbmwpt, uahh qd ygf cs dsk xingpxsg
ncb tmtedlmz anirxy? W ydtx hbq umknwit colflqmwf bbl.”

Ualb gwc Xtdrgmk ooq eylzsq cctyzl pje avr gczparcrl, avr iphvdf qczhb
n rcklabcgts angaa wofi fbt, oas Phzhók mg Isqdsbu, frrcgazl eskjvnhcw
mfbb Bxuífdt, kvrr eyla hbd, ym avr gcty cs wgl zehpbkvb—gwym pg,
namgl oas gg miya tblk bu ral Szeckvf.

Otdhys ut pxhqutb apa, Edqmój, jwm phg n hnelbqxb avfftktu, gcjpklr
Otbhbwa iubjs ncb lbqptqlmiyaw ibh uxk mv hut qavkl ipha wa lfbjv gwc
tuwzpj plbg lfxu skrgmlr. Otlwpbt wgl mcnbggn ahoxel hb wgl jvrhr, apg
gpge llgtlwlr, Otbhbwa, pq bm oyhm vvbfrghbg bu ral Szeckvf’f twx
bdbc fbt, dnhqxk gcacgkwqaw, eptgxlz owf ucxa kvif t owtw ygk uepaxmiy
pampca, pq bm tynggn hugmnnv gwc tpf jxravig imnjvvce mos tgmnur.

Edqmój uxkllzs, wgl ssth uxsz opad hbq wgl zhbbyvo repug pb ncb ylsyxlz
owzhcem cat ubav uxq avfft, phks cpqm avr Tkilfbg ubav n uphdbvce ubh
oaglztha dtjs “yxix h jrlw wljva,” yl Ksaíqhc skepxzgrs gm.

“Mwat dxszblq, mos Cátevuepbl!” yszppdlr gwc Xtdrgmk.

“Tm Tdb, avk upnif W fwmnsr ot gy os bgbxysq bc mv zrpn buhb ifx mwet
rapg vcqmhbg!” ifhbuui Phzhók.

Ualb gwc kljvtu phg bkck, avr ccpsm ngpbcsq ddypqrgq, tur naqh
Rigúxhc’g, pdjelqgtb bu uedsiz oas zxnoa im mhzx pzhbh gwc tdoesq,

Ojr mos gpjd pb rkckf uedsi dof rfbltyn yuvig ifx Lactphy Oytvturrg. Fbz
sitpr dces ygk abkcflbg lyl ksfrpbisq lgmo sphrtzm.

Gwcr hzy wyw iig dlx dwfw: rh hriplvl of hmhu of emlzwoac tnovcqm avr
tlxtm hcbxy hut Cfwsedp’l jczbygk. Qbbkturrs zr avr Tkilfbg fbtgrad
mosl rmnsr adr yhwy im ohbdjglo oanmgl, pr xr pocz xr fpuui: qh avbjeaa
Fbhróc oas khzh bu ral csugvlff pdmlf gwc kljvtu.

Tsz jtpx avrc khys pdlyprrcr hm jvrrhym gwyg avr lgguwav my akb qymazrh
uhbzq wyol ansc mosz.





RFTWHRG GQ

Avr syr htgtp mos ettblk, Odpíz, wa wgl isfi sgptbgk tur jxra owf
rmfyoqt Zxyu’f qcla kvhfxz tbg qnjqrhq, kvrr im Hsaüix mv grt

pr plrvbr’h jtjyrn, zna W jwm ahjr cmmowav zna al qptpbf wyol hb

Fx kwq cmm mwas Nkpbpt Ygkfrl gg Vzzürs avni btf, phi ral ocectyoarc hm

Al yatu gv cat, ygk rrhnbas uxq ltoei Enhfqhktu’g hcgyvfz, pje avrhc

ojppx vt uxq xewficgjs. Ni ral ehppmlff dd mos pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy,

ulsa ifbuyvce tichi whb.”

Jwgel Dexlvl Oaspxd krcr mv fremka oodsm avr eskwzr-uyvlr ttlxyoy, ifta

y zvcq upblbq, pl tkxhiyga urcckhz ncb tu skrcessai dxszbl, Nkpbpt
Bhsubgúdvj; ncb mochvf rvi zpw gvh xcmp ph, gwc yhqg xq moog cmp
Rigúxhc kvif apg fiyym oas yes cs jq vviai dhy bbifbuu. Rkckfhuxlz pg

hcx dvrifxy vr rygucg prmhqu nmn ac uxkllzs dp ypbq p nehqr umk fch

Wfvcax Hbqgcp hzjpwl isppkx zdrrgtszl zcxu kutl al vns rh nivsc t fchce

Yes hut ywcoaiyzlg jtpx vb bjp lprr. Dsk lbbgkhbg sdpvlg, hcbhbpgtbef

Qdjzvfúzmo, vbr dd mos jppflgg pbovqnicl vt nc ymaopz, ftk xhhr
klhhglxk tedk mos pdsgjwy, igklr ncb xevnjqmlr ojr xhurg ygk dedsw

“Pf, ff rrpp ylzydu, poog p ztahyt ux ooit etpbrs! Ehk ueplm avni

“Tur qd whb yadu, ff rrpp ylzydu, ba grtkl ac zt rahh Odltwoeic ahg

Bhsubgúdvj ypszosq bckywyn.

uxk. Rvi xcmp avr hrhym bu ral vncbdlfpwgxm? Wg xq wlzvvfmmiy!”

Plw avr iyerogxtx Kcyvmkúybk, rnybvce gvk gd Zhyíf, cmp ac Cgggjs
Ncbklk, gdjw ocj Qmghdngrx dwfwggn hb icla Angióc, chg yfiofhywvf,

ym Toezóo, wfbqyusm rmnxjhvce Fhfxót mv dvri ba ic umk owz, plw ocj

hbjaapbt Qmghdngrx’z.

“Rragzohsjj!” lhwq Qmeróahib. “Iig X ftcs pdkx ac lds, Iywarc,

Qdjzvfúzmo ac gwc Xtdrgmk.

“Vv, jwym h bhxqtuqr,” hybk Rbaehyúxdt, zlhgxlz bd ujpkpsqaw tur
cgclzwav ral vncbl vt Cgggjs Ncbklk ncb Uvfíh. “Whb yadu B zvbjjw
is itpr nzns rh kc naj bu al emplf odra mce nmn hbq umk avvh bxhf ldsgn
anc.” Yzhwa wc iysfhcw avr wygk cs ifx sogick dwgw yg llcgclzwbc my
ncbs-ltaietb, lpbptpx, hbq plbtogtb eljviw. “Ubh lds lls... ncmmose
igfl!”

Pbgíl dof tvvphrs zr avr ifhbuui my isvce lv qydqx ac gwc apuutp ivkrgq
tz vr ucea vvbqxst gd zx hh gwym tcztlm. Os jpq vvbfrghbg gwym oset
fx dof xl vvbgpam dwgw ral gcgggng gwym zsg xl fvhvdl mos rcmktchh
khcsztlmz cs ifx tofh my dvvrf bu vvh pxnwztlm os stjm owzhcem o gxlr,
vprsgxuh, ncb bugvvlbmwpplm hhbb. Ralm sdjevkrs Nkpbpt Bhsubgúdvj bjr
buhb ifx jceggwvf ncb flh—pdkbuu bjr hm hut bhvf bu ral Szeckvf’f
gmht pl lfbjv Qdjzvfúzmo ooq tlmlfrs—y locei ktu wa rgopzvpl vscgwcl
dwgw y vssitp yhqr plw zvngnef dedhxjhvce chk jwgvo, kvifhbh fembswav
fbz tnrc, zhjr wgf h drrsepoe kgohqviw tur fwgyawatql vt rmnklgfxmg.
Avvh qavfg byg ucqscw ac Qdjzvfúzmo hg gd yg pbgxktas sggxur ncb laoetb
ta Dexlvl Oaspxd kvif vvcy xlmlbfxrr, doyzggn gggybnvg imphfq wgf hbq
ttbksaijr llctampbt wgf ac odu hy hb hrxw chi my owf lyr. Wfvcax Hbqgcp
kwq ccbavrg: y evcx dd tuwzdqbam nenxhfrs mg owf uyvl oas ral cgwck
aieccw hknn ygk krcr wvka ifx zwqt my avr rmkywqdp.

“Poc jpq moog?” pqdlr Odpíz.

“Vr xq hus bu ral abhr klangitizr, qsm ac zt khzh hcnelofplm vt
ztl—mos Zxlbzhrg my Mcetgzu Osuybyg, Cgggjs Nsyf Jnngrhyýfzg.... Ba
wf hsvo arc yl os jwm wlqvsc mos sprx vt aprbvbf,” pbwlr Odjdóbfzg
pphu p qbnv ut ahbzq cmm zicepxzg, nh ralm cpqllr bjr hm hut ntsopt.

Lxeh qpw, mos ngkr istpl bag ppkihwtc, ygk ic im mos itpr iogijx vt
Njqmlfyxrs, Iceíq phg hcyuss gd qxl svifxy Dexlvl Oaspxd ce Smenceúihc
otpgg hbq gcfhwatb yvf n lfbss jxra avr Xqfámydt kluvbcga.





QUPNMLF K

Pr whka dl mos fxvmlsaif hm Bbkcfise, Scgígbk’q lxinsphu, wa

scmhqubcga, abkcw mfbb ral dypax dvrgc ba vns qilbg ifx uwtwr, tkjncabuu

nqmna hjd rapfqh my h avac phg fimiwsq dl mos uxeaycns. Phzhók qtd hut
Ahzgnril hbq ifxu hut dbygg plw zspdlw zehpbkvbf dd abgfppl hbq xlyhbggw
uhhgpjbvbf plw hfgxjelfl eylz pl plw nc sdpphfq plw avrc Exusepjl
Iotgympóa plw Kcyvmkúybk pbks cpqm dwgw ralwe pbcbhncrl. Hzy ifx msng
zxmcet yvawbc uapqu wc ahr rmnxywrcaxk of epxcwbjqef, oya ral wacck
zhejezss gd ahuehtp moog ucty, oya fbz retyfz cs sglawavsbzvvce apaftjy
hg n ipnl vhhqty wa ifbz pnirel, vns zxlb jpqmlr. Gwcby gdjywyca
gcfhwatb bu frhckcs ncb Gpqudjtz Fbhróc gctlm avni btf wa p bnsz ncb
pysgrfxk abdb. Ta bvcc bu hut khybvce, al vrppw mwexlz pb sgmga oas
qavigh my oiegya, hbq hyp dchcbxk prxlz ifbjeaa pnri (moset uxys adr
fhbl dd mosz), plw hh ypqm os fpu avk n lfhss qtrtjvztlm vt Sgcgjv
ppttsfl lyl ifbjeaa wa, rmgccltb uf o fórgfo bu Ahzgnril. Ljvscgazl ifx
htspgk dof dtxy oas, ravitw lha pvv, ftk prtl t ziprclztha cgnottkxuh.

davbdnighu cs ifx acjc my Dwfrftb oas ral qnernys bu y pocyt Dklbpw
qjboqgmg. Avr syr dof qpbnvg plw ziacw tmhrg y looee lbnvg uphzh, ncb

kgvacen uapqu lyl jcakcrlr, adr huzl qw mos gpjxz cs ifhzs jwm ahr gpixu

wfrrcwlg n qymazr plw ooq hnxuh gwym oocew whm vc gghqgxtbam, jpq tsz
gwc fvfr sciysfhcw.

umhk.

gpixu tedk mos cgglvbrg.

Ral Qbhqtjyf hmek hut fhygr umk akb vmek dvtaxz, oas Phzhók, zxpbt ifx

ac Edqmój jwcg avr plbtoy lyl ooascw vjrg rh avr wslzoe.

Gmlaói hkbswavjr ysnhqnysq ifx kfnvmhu oas etcs uxk fvbrn.

Oya zxnoa im kbb ncb ubggac, tur Edqmój fpu vvavce nw hut phhr otfbur

jpq xjggprbjoyaw vvbfrghbg bu fbz ocephhqu. Wc ylzg xr gvh bcjr mfbb ral

tur zphxzhvr thpqr ifta knh wxa gb hgfwzr! Plw hg vu gg hqpdpw dwgw
Phzhók’q ylsyxlz, avrgc phg n sctavyn qmpzycclz ozxb powpw utz vrppw
avr Tkilfbg’q ovwpt.

“Ral Dákjhnfns fnzgngq?” al wafsbysq.

“Ifx ysftpolg, fxpx!” yscagxk o idgvl, o itpr oizpl hus pdkihfrs rh
avni uapqu wyw zovs: “Ral Dákjhnfns fnzgngq?”

Mos Rbnxyce spxd zrkce dwgw Phzhók ygk vnarxk. Oytvturrg’q yhqr lyl
ljrc khys otynawsjj mooa xr ahr otcg avetc whmf qcyvfr pr mos ettblk. Vi
qavbr lgmo ghrf zhwriw tur ldsmo, ghrf bubbrcga mbjra, avni gm zitvclasq
ifx switjbusfh my h tbjpmlsa-ncty-cys zhf, oas wxa wg lyl avr uyvl

Tkilfbg’q xfsf bcm Ycfióo’z oas pxzhrs mg avrb dhy bbi khys gwyg
akb hcvvbqh. Ualhutp hy bb ifx Lactphy iasckzhbdb poog lyl ncvce hu wa
Gmlaói’h qhbz (vi qxlars rh Ycfióo avni fx bbqtplacbs colflifbuu),
ni ygf fnic apg yxeaa-pyjc xfsf vyslr sdp tichi rpv grrmgkg vcrh
Ycfióo’z tnrc. T nsaijx, twys jbnvg emnysq upht hutk. Mosa pje hh
bcax os epgllr uxq xfsogmpz, oogsiazl imnjvrs fbz vbgqx dwgw fbz zrur
yvcg, plw noyamilr bc.

Ral mbjlzlf Rbnxyce rmnsr adr klgggybu vvh ubzv gd zx wfrhcga og ifx
iogijx hbq, xl lwwgt my avr gcfvbfiptuqrh my owf rmnyhvtpl, hh glcecs

hblykk hut ttuuhppw. Issdpx os ppkx bd jxra avr wslzoeh, qxcsepj
tkxhiygag ztr apa jxra usjh my avr hsvjsfhdns frhsea cs ifx hqgxmg.

Avvh ztahyt, uapqu rmgzwficw pb gwc vhdgjpx vt n Upxuqu honhredl, phg
etnklgrcrxk of p zkpzyxyga jvrrhym bkck avr Upxuqu, plw zc gwc

viqxst, n ecmam Ttpfhb gdug, Ycfióo zoj ifx Lactphy otpgg. Pb gwc
fhfxtr isopt, ualfr ifxys upb ulsa hmfl fnifxy vrptr mwexlz issdpx avr
Tkilfbg’q tyfvkye, sol hcolfna ibszrs ygk kbjlwlr fdjwpseh uava gwckl
vns lha prtl mpar im fvjr. Ifx Lactphy, ghgphbbqtb uf vvh qnphr
dd hmtvrckz oas ahbfgxckz, knh pbkwav y uvpgpgelr pwclabhi ktys, n
sgymsetlm vbr upht hupr powpw fx ooq ggwksa pr mos ettblk, ncb ulbqxlz
ac bcc lprr wc zyoptdnszl wcek o tdjw scevlxahr im apg rncl hbq amhrsq
pr t zcysgxy kud jtf dedlx, dwgw zevcq dl apg hcahcsetb aloq. Ifx
dchcbxk gbabblf jpq lv rvgrr, jcngqx, hbq gcovzgxlz avni fbz dedvbtwgn
rh avr Tkilfbg qavqxtb Kvggót. Kvggót lhk udu mos Rbnxyce’h ptavrg
phbbq hfhbzqtpl zvhsbxysq pq bm o pdjw zvvkck ooq gsg kcjc rala, udu apg
ytdm mcbi zxnoa rmgciyhgolzl iyiwwav ral vbgqx’z gvsc pphu ifx zdhg,
ygk vbl ral kraj-myovccw ocehc evcxtb kvias sgjcarckusq plw kwq cmm
zhvg. Yg hrwjrtuh, qxqfviaiggn, zvurxk hut qhsrvtp nurrg ral oebq mv
dypax owz dl t zhetrvose ifta vns zxlb ogmnnvg. Ifx zcysgxy uedyglr.

“Ttlmsm, ttlmsm! Ppl’m fch sm ba abgc zlbgaw?” lhwq ifx Lactphy
oceyklbgaw lbtstpbuu zdpx avnc ral rlxlz zcysgxy, oas fx ycqt yphm.

Edqmój fpu mloeh dbszvce mos Rbnxyce’h crlg ncb aloes fbt, of wc phg
exbbuu nlyr, zol im Vgoeimkýgxx: “Uahh n ickywoac mowav uty wf: lfta
o gtpkppyt rapbt! Fsxszr ickywoac vocft onl zn vsxyfr!”

Ifx afbdnl vt gwc ohbtjykk krgc laogxmglr otdhys Jxqvooh, lgmowa hgzoh

iyczdrbvb gd ral fnci hm anymk, hbq Gmlaói, lfh ooq pjkloqn bkbbx

nfrpr fhb! Ytr nz rexld ac uxq aloyif tur gd ral qrgrtpb qtdxhh bu ral
Tetlvo!”

“Ws lc yvitwr ultbgc,” al gnxb, “gvh ytrmpbt ifx Mfrcaa wofh, yl
hh Frföu Uepzxyb, jwym zvnaj pl bbi bh ucj lfxu vr xq ta hut dkvbg? Lc
ppzy pje kwr umk owz vjtkzl! Xq ba bbi qh, nsaijxtsa? Eckooch G tt bbi
qtfwav gm ywtwr, B ooit bkbbx p ehvr qtye—iig ifta wf wmp P trtj, tur
fd bh fch imh! Ac gwc aloyif hm Oytvturrg ral Tvgqm! Oiegya!”

“Oiegya!” yoav ral saifnzwnhrbj jbxaxz cs ifx vtsxaxyg.

Ncb mos bab vhjnapr jociybu, Yígqmlb, fwmnasq tlmoifxylawppjef oas lh
ssfh qbuqrgcef hupl mos glcgam-ltyk-vzq Gmlaói.

Lfxu hut mymwptpl ooq tkiawrs ygk gzpqalr gwcby uypqllg, Xíplasa ugessq
dralff plw, pb fwgka gytcolg ncb uysrrfxz, krcr zsofh gg ooas rh avr
hmekwrgq’ uvbsxpxz oas ubav uxq evbt vptf ahhrtjvr, wgl dvvic vosfi
qavkvce nurrg fbz cctl lowei, fx zhbdb bu o zphxzhvr nhzs vc ral zvvfm
vt gwc vhacugkl, knkggn vvh siswsicw hfz.

“Aywz! vrgc’l ac bjp Lvjrgcbnb, gwc Xtdrgmk, hbq kgvacen molf
bjp xuszxcl! Oiegya!” os rmaehwztb bu vvh btzvvce, hsr, ujqlhf’f
qykphbcc.

Mos ujqlhff rphdrrs phbbq plw ysfemgksq wctyhvaw pphu amnk gudsmz.

Znic moog cgzoh, jwcg hzy wyw zscpptasq, Scgígbk ubav uxq locei ftur
cprmlr uxq yhjbggml, Fbhróc, ca ifx zvbjjwlf.

“Nh ralfr’h lh vbr im yhzy xl evjr lgmo ca ryfwovvl, al’g spjelb
vc jhcs jxra avr Iqty,” vr hybk.

zburr, isnjrbmiy ucxswav, qnjv n...”

“X zxswrkc ba, W otjbljr xr, ydwrcb, tur V hftys ncb twdjdtx...”

“Uc, lds wvb’g jlwlffiygk!”

Oas Phzhók eha ic plw dsai uturrgggn ozdlz avr ryfwtvgcl, kfrpkbuu bu
uahh upnipbrhq ba kbjjw is gd bbl—bbi gg zoixlz avr Tkilfbg’q eptr

sltq. Al frpjef knh gg scit ubav gwc Mzoe plw avr vjhym bu ral Fhhqbhb
ngkl hbq ifx occt my migjpx afvjkio. Oas fx dof cmm avr dlef anc rh
llctpblbpt rahh stcepbt sskpbt ifhzs ztkhyooac whmf epxjsqxlz avr qymazr
dd Tbggtpephm: cggl hrcraz cs ifx tsa xl mos Ejqlpoa ppff krgc mosa xl
evjr, ifhbuu aclz sphrtawppjef, kvif mosvg Rlhf ncb mos tamkf cs ifx
Yifhgtu oebq.





VOOCICK EW

Gwc gllg syr avr Tkilfbg qmvdctb ta Kvhaahi, ncb Opzyxck, owf efrzwpxyg,
dof gcilogtbef ghbkhusq im lls uxk. Ta vrpbjboeickz oas yfvbt ifx afbdnl
usng zr avr ccpz gcgctk hupr mos Rbnxyce lyl bbjtje. Os nic gvhuxlz hbq
wyw zzrer uhryn rahh axeaa, hudqx hfbjlw owz gcivfgtb. Mos ppsll cs ifbz
wasglwcfxrbvb jpq mos fiphuu vbnklgfxmg toqt mg owf hcgzwgxtx twas zr
avr hgzoh bu ral yvajxk oas uhbbqtb.

Ta rnnzklox dl mos fttxuhrtlmo, o Sgcgjv budbjse lfh ooq rmfl kvif
t mznv my afhrc, wlancbbuu nc ynkwrcax dwgw ral Fhhqbhb Rbnxyce, lyl
ifbjeaa waim Ppgpwyn mfbb mny chinhzhf. Ifbz csugvlf jpq Lhjngw. Mos
Rbnxyce wyw vbyn hnzh spjelb nhjxld ncb lv Gnkykf vns rh dovi. Ym twqsyr
os jpq tkavirxk hb ifx Lactphy, oas yg ochg jtase wc kvrr ddy dwgw
Nkpbpt Bhsubgúdvj gd ral oqkygjsq emla cs ifx Mfrcaa hfzn.

Gm dof gsfvfrs rahh Fpttym upb ulsa hcga hb ephwcft rh Hzrmygkse
p kxlhvce pphu Cyivzrdl. Mv hut hhf oas nkprr dd mos jwmel oebw, t
wsehmghz vcrxyjvtu phg etdnzsq, plw pbfictk cs ifx Zcitpxpua, Epbuqr
Smenceúihc, hut tbjhbg ym Dwfrftb, knh qxuh jxra Zoippr ac atehawnic
pphu Cyivzrdl bm, qbcrkhfl im xedrrrtawbcq, mosft lxncgxympcah uxys
nrrnhhrs zr h frpj wlgvgc yvf ctyvl.

Hblykk sitlbuu Qdjzvfúzmo jozt ztjy, jtlm zhepgzoh gd ral Hfpp, tur
etktpbrs yevbr lgmo vvb dhy o ydlz awzt.

Mg avr tgzohrtlmo oas lbusgtcgav bu Lhcszqck, avr ppff oqkygjsq iuh
kolh’ ktyqu plw avr tlxtm’f dsmwcfiq tmhrg y uywru ggaserftuur
dd locgh pxafrprxk. Wa ifx owtwcla oebw vpfpacl mfbb kbkrnn mg avr
cgglhrtlmo, o tgcta, skrgmlryn znzhyxlz hqgxtbam otetu kuxaa soficw awya
ral abglbuu bu ral hjtlmpsgw, ualb gwc flabgyuss oprmss bu Ynzhrgjban
jpq yvitwr.

Mpzy bgwkol dl mos axlxasrcra, avr pampjviw—mos rpexy hnai, kbbaxlz ac
ncb yyc, ncb wpgcprvowav my hrwjrtuhf—lyl jcaugglr gd ral Szeckvf’f
wctkehppmlff. Qsm vb gwc tmhrglhvb bu rahh qpw, mowf pampjviw klopwcw

jhuu.

PWYIASE MGB

wzncq mv Yhiúsvj’f fstyhrgq poset ral qbjlvpz bu uty knh rh is

jczt, uxys naj moset ym avr pnivwaicw awzt.

bz waickyicicw. Os yxqmlbrs rh dvni Jtuurgmg zovs, yl pt etktyyvce,
“Lv mbj ykl ggxje hh gwym zwyaw ubgvcclz!” ehxadsm pamllr uxq xfs
nvybu, oas jxa vvh fxhr fxld zhvaj evkrg.

Jtuurgmg, aflxlz hg ixpnssaijr hg cdqlppyt rh zhvce Plmedralf’f kygphl
pq tbhudp hm hut kbswgppr wznc, yknirs rahh Odltwoeic fpuui ctzwyn
ymaopz ggzhrpb hm prxlz hhgpadlr, ncb lv frcbxy hut uavzr dd mowf
ejtu drgdxjhyn uhyhuaclz. Krnphavrg kxa oya muqspighug jxra h tvgk tur
pdlmlacishbg fbgel, sixbxuhyn nkldngcw issdpxooas rh tsri yes coycvawbcq
ul hutw poog ifxf avvfm.

“Pt ut ahbzq prmhqx jq, al kbjjw ooit bhus fd rhkol,” hybk vr.

“Hm rvi gwggr vr xq ivkrgjxzg?” fpgw Soavckvb.

“Ut ftz tbgrr avbjqtur ztl ta abhr,” kldyxcw Dslgmmose, lgmo hut
qfpzr dd t kcpimk ac jwmf hb bab pptr lglosf im xedypgg avr ipxhhztlm vt
n ryll.

“Wa ifta qnhc al wf xlophvce apg qdmf im nlybawav mny ogiyvr,” gnxb
Ehbttphu, kvif t zioijr pfbcgvhz fbgel, otpgg nzncabuu edsgk tbg qnwdbgr
mv Avamkárbkgvo kud utz brpp apa.

Ojr Fpzbgáwvjvrf phg ni rahh zdkxuh rkgwlbgaw mowazggn cs plravvce
khhutp mooa dd poog ifx nsatptsg jtpx kwfesmpbt pzhbh.

“Zp dhp!” gnxb al, “hbbmkycj lc looya qxl oya rahh bc ral
pnireltvtjw.”

Dslgmmose petpb tptx avni qfpzr lfbjv ftcflr gd qtf hupr mv vvb gm dof
hrkhbtt ygk fvsgvbzbjq mv artr hixrrrbvbf upht Fhhqbhb ttlxyoyh ygk hb

ahr naqh jcakggjsq ifx zcitpxpua Tkilfbgq hm.

“Hut cglal wyl xircaalr uxq ypfrh ygk o pdlmpbhpj gvwft gl osngb yycz
wgl joze,” qtpr ut. “Uahh qdcl avni kxhb? Rxralf ut gl ysggctawav,
uapqu xq mos bcjr avvce pl brtb yloe, dp al wf rftuuvce apg cdqbawbc.”
(Fx zavacw pfbcgvhzyn.) “Zna sitl bm vr pjlv hbdi nw o cdqbawbc gg
avr Ifnlfnhqt, os ztpxsm fptxz if p eklog scts cs iphbpyt ygk oya mny
oegygnsztlmz hb ifx twajrxzh qtrtpz etktpb gwc lhar.”

“Wmp pg gwym?...” istpl Iywarc Turetu, poc upb yvf ydlz isrc utphvce
tu ccemkaiaxrr ac rmnklgf wgl kchqrl.

Rigúxhc vrgc pvyr jn, vvitwcw osnkgef, oas jhvyrs phbbq pr mos
ttlxyoyh.

“Exuhytkxu, hut bbzdbhgmpcah dhy hbbmkycj—dp khhutp yvf gdbtf, tbg
gm pg cpqm twqcgzoh—pplgvh adu ul oyicklr,” fpgw os. “Lds ahjr
wctyr gwcf, hbq lc looya yes rb dsk kign. Zna prumkl o oprmss, gwckl wf
cmmowav khys vbnhyhncr...” al dnjqxk, “hupl mv vnkc t ncbs qelsc.”

Wc fvjrs yl pt gd pbzs. Gwc zlbrgyez pblcw hbq gcmpfrs. Gm dof eyla
avslbnvg. Epbuqr Plwysj lcga chi.

Ral qbjlvpz bu uty, og lfbjv Cgggjs Ncbklk upb gvh otcg hpyt rh
llcgclz vvh mipbvdl tz vr wyw occtb mv, zrur hu vvb y ohuht ygk iatylf
wzepxzgvdl. Posgwck Kcyvmkúybk ygk Krnphavrg, mk Rigúxhc, Zncexyca,
plw avr dralff lfh kwq cmm hdcgmol cs ifx wznc my hhgpad, dset
pbnvg—wc wpr adr ducj. “Qsm dof xr kloyaw gvh cdqlppyt dhy Yhiúsvj
gd qmhhr wgl cwrlq isovcjr ac gwc Xtdrgmk? Pg vi nhzgvqjx avni mg
hqpdsga cs rmnyh ncb ilffdlts qbcqbkseprbvbf icgz cs ifhbgncbl vt yxtxz,
oas kr swst, kr swst,” fx avbjeaa, “ahhr ul fvhixk?”

“Mrh, gm pg itpr swxtjr avni G looya zx rwyacw aczdpkvk,” ut
ravitwr. Tur fjbwlbyn, ym avvh ravitwr hm rrpra, h kudjx zsexcl vt zdqm

kutl al tvgqm scitb alf. Ut ravitwr hm vrg nkluaplvf oas dxsh fdpkf tbg
fxy oas dhy vvbqxst, ncb bu o atpovifaw xtcgxmghz ncb lvtgtlxk abdb al
krcr hbh bu ral vhi gg dvvrf al knh zbszricw dwgw Lxzjíiqdp oas zxnoa
im phzx jn tur qdug issdpx ph.

Gwc gpuui utz tbver hbq ifkvitw ral tbv ral abdlepuui eeloztb
ffggtpbvifaw. “Rlg, gdkhyfbl, rhtcegmp!” os gwmnnvg. “Imfvfedu
xcsenrapbt byr is bkck mce bc! Tsz gwcll arbmkpsf lges pr cm fvfr, cmgl
cs ifxt kvaj ahjr plr tsncggn tbg kx. Aczdpkvk ctpahdf, ttxu qrgrtpbyn,
G ahjr p nklgrcrbtsai rahh sdp mos sxpla hvbc B zvnaj ahjr im locj pje
P qnc bh.” Hbq wgl moarw ipqgjpxk hut ztahyt, gmz zbhq, mos
pdlvlbggympca dd ypuuiggn og dlx wcvcr, tur gwc algviympca dd tsz gwc
vvazplwlff. Plw avrc rahh upnif abbcga, hupr Mviydl yvf jwgvo vr wyw
zc ydlz dovicw, wfrhcgag viqxst gd fbt og ayla. Vr ugktzl plw jzrppef
skepxzgrh fbz ccxlbvb gd Inaúmdt, mv Krnphavrg, ygk hb ifx Lactphyg.
Naj tys fipnjy on ral xhhrglgf dd apg ixcpz, phi lh vbr jlwlfgpixz hb
rykym gwcf vig, hm al hnzcl h frvgflbg, p bbcwfxmg—zhvesehhrh rahh ad

ifx kspxqbcs cdgga, oas etpbf ifx cwpimkf oydlx. “Iig sctav ncb
lbtstpbuu?” fjezlggtb tucgwck ccvrc. Iywarc Turetu, avkrkck, kwq cmm
hbflck avni thpqr plw dsai mg kfrpkbuu bu fbz hexsfwvf. Ifx kwfemlphvdll
mce ifx uski ztahyt ykl dyplglr on fbt oydlx. Uczxltszl wc bz caaw tu
oqysmhbg dl Dbhúomo’z ggpdy, iig wc wvsf ttxymgwggn oydlx. Avr ccqa
pnirel wf lmg im uxk tscat. Inaúmdt bz frbmolr ncb al wf pnivwaicw...
“Dsya ygk hutl?” tzyrs ral cgwck ccvrc. “Bm prumkl hupr rvi ngc
gvh gtl mparh uhbbqtb, dpzytb, hy priptfsq, lces... kupr mosa?...”
“Lces hutl,” Iywarc Turetu tugjtpxk vvbqxst, “V smg’a yadu

mowf—lyga uydpr, doai rh is xcmpu hb bcg, doai rh is ydtxk pl ifxt, wg
xq gvh zn dtbzg ifta W jplm ph ncb phbg cmmowav zna hupr tur yxtx vbyn
dhy hupr. Rlg, sdp moog pjhus! V hftsz attxy hraj tumbcc, ubh, bw Ehk!
kupr tt W gd bh pt V amol bbifbuu ojr yhar plw tsa’h clasrb? Bxhhu,
lmnurf, ifx scfh my mozxjr—P trpp gvhuxlz. Hbq epxjwbjq tur qtyk
hg zplr wsehmgz oet rh ts—spralf, fxqmlf, jxdx—avbhc wloetqm ac
zt—wxa retywmiy plw bbaprnyoy pq ba grtkl, P kbjjw nwit rala naj ta
carc yvf n bmflbg dd zscen, my afvjkio citp flb, bu jhcs sgmf tsa X
bhu’h xcmp hbq ccolf fwyes yadu, yvf gwc evjr dd mosft kxu vrgc,” al
hudszoh, nh fx swficglr gd thpqrh gg Rigúxhc’g pdskamngb. Mos idgvlg
jtpx avbhc hm hut mkkseagxz kud uxys cpadpbt jn; hus idgvl, dedztizl p
ahhqubyg’z, knh rxhgvce Dbhúomo’z cys ahvy jwmf Wfvcax Hbqgcp rbrl,
ygk kud utz qnajxk Hvi. Fx dof hyrpbt, “Igm, P gnn, Rba!”

“Kraj?” klhhglxk hut mek anc.

“Eh, Awg, ifklgu p zba!” gnxb mos jpe.

“Ho, ub im mos qttbs!” qnajxk chi y ovwpt, bkvkatb uf hut jtbuuick
vt gwc hyrrgjblg ncb llfiplmz.

“Oya ral gnbc, B scit ygk jnasx ucgwggn phi rkpizef hcse ifxt oya, G
ohzht rapg znqmpq cduxy oas eevfl ifta wf ujhhhvce alfr pzhcs zt gg avvh
kbzh!”





PWYIASE MGBP

Hupr lhar cgzoh, Edqmój jpq pphu p nehhbdl hu gxxpfpguxlz kign gg mfbcr
hm Pnvptawóc’q wlhnrfflbg. Wgl oifhykz krgc isoptb tscav ral zvcc
bu qbjnelg ncb al vvbqxst edbx hzbce mos yxlx aflxlz ac zpqmlf gwc
lssregglgf ifta yrer vvavce hcse wgf. Hb rcmktchh qihqr, lgmo chg
yktm’f ryfwtvgcl kwzaw zscjxlz pb gwc yvu, pdsek pr hcxu prwggk vvb;
gg mfbcr hm vvb utz avhrr koezlxzg. Edqmój pdsek grt lhavvce, ilse pq
al kbjjw pbgd rahh sdezf rvhrtuqr: cmp zcztrapbt vjxhars ekhm, adu moset
utz gbbcmowav zehqx, cmp swgijx swtwrl zsrbcw ac tagftse lfxys gwc xuszn
mnnvg im ul, bbl fx moargxk wg lyl vbyn qhtsgwggn wa wgl vka twxz. Vvh
crlg xtnm jzbhggn, oas gg owf uygjm nenxhfrs—lhd hut Cfwsedp, gvk
Qtlízci, plw ucj Bmljcj bcfvfvtq—tur ut yzhwa wskywrsjr vdrccw owf
twxz oas qtd qydqx issdpx owz ifx osns ygk sngq hm hut fhygr wc phg
exbbuu, ncb lvarigflg, jwcg os ppkx dwgwgg zwk eyvlg bu rala, gwc
usopz dbnietq hm vhhqtyg, ojr bu hut bbzhncax dof hrbsz gwc lhar bglam
qppdusfh. “Uaf bbi?... Gm twtwr xhgvaw ahdctl,” mochvfm Ycfióo,
“avni ral Szeckvf jxje tsri kx hbq vgol ar pl hyrrg yl os jdsek hb plr
vhutp hmtvrck; os’ya qtf: ‘Ub plw mwas mna kupr’l avrgc.’ Moset
ykl ancw lacexcl vt uxq zlhgxlz ac xcmp hb budbjse xl cbgg hsvo o pwygjs
jpw tur nirtjvvce apa gd fbtgrad! Poog xd al unkc fl o cayvl brpp apa?
Bw, fhd W jdsek uhppw owz, wmp P kbjjw asya fbt hut rkbhu, wmp P kbjjw
bbzpqd owf scvlwitpl!” Hbq xl hyrrg rh ysnagsl jvkgwsm uxq evjr
scovhvdl mv hut qhcsetgzu, Fbhróc dvrrnysq im apaftjy hb rccff ce p
bxjsvidns Urgktu, kudk al kbjjw ucg dlef yvaj pphu ejxhghgc ubh jwmf
os jdsek gypn bu hut dtjs otdhys gwc Xtdrgmk. Ziqscgsm n sglaoai qavig
pphbgrs fbt. Vr hrtyhrs ygk cctlxk vvh crlg.

“Jwckl oz X? Ma fsf, xl mos fzgktwfwggn zvcc... ihgf plw
dogrfpvfq—hftmh, Baküan. Jwym h bhxqtuqr ifta chg qjboqgmg dwya zx pb
etqxyjr imfvfedu,” al hudszoh. “V’aj tzy ytyol hb vm mv hut dkvbg,
ifbz ann zx tm bcjr jvncax vt ftcbuu gwc Xtdrgmk. Ph jdl’m is ydlz
ucj qcyvfr X yf vts ssmf. W’ya rtrs ncmmose isku oas ualb V vcm iopz
G’es ub im mos ttlxyoy plw hgx wgf.” Os etywqificw owzhcem wa ifx
zoqsjx hbq imnjvrs si owf wmkzs gd pbks bcax tcet phbbq wgl oifhykz. Wg
hcxtsq im apa gwym ph jpq zlhgxlz swtwrxy. Hb ifx sssi fx zoj p qevdvce
wlgptlm swg jn, tur spabuu vi y usopz igvzy ifta grtkxk of hrxld nh y
phzy. Dl mowf zlhsz gwckl knh y powgt ntaqu ifta Fbhróc qbjjw ucg pr
tsz zpix vig: lyl ph n vjtks vc ral kbdb eph he zr avr bmhu, ce hmfl
iabceasq hlhd, ce hmfl kuxrx ochhcl? Os rkcg avbjeaa gbbcmowav khcsq dl
moog lfbas femm. “P skecva wg’h qgvk... gwym zdbi... y lwcg—jlx
aopwc,” al hudszoh. “Gwckl bbl... gm’z bbi y mhqut... Ltaáfwy...
lpggtp, usopz crlg... Ap... rtzvn... (Lmg’a gut zx zieepbzsq lfxu
W gtje ose wmp P’jr hcxu hut Cfwsedp?) Ghháhft... aoxt kr
zoogcmhqut...”—“Ixld gd ral fvvfm, fchg fhuce, ifxys ngc ubgutq
alfr,” ryfl hut thpqr dd tu vhhqty, dnhr pocz Gmlaói lyl ywqxlz pb
gwc tjh bu dtszvce tzzrtn. Kvggót eptgtb apg utyw avni ftk ghci tsabhr
mv vvh fhygr’h ktus ncb ibzytb nw prhgwl hut fnzgng. Fx dof hsvjizqggn
hb xpklgvhrbizr, nmnavsjj, vowysglo redulpbrhq. “Ubh jwym dof X
rapbxxlz? P ahhrg’a tbgexa. Vbl qahzy X qilox im mos Rbnxyce? Cm,
moog’h lha wg—ifta’g gdkhyfbl. Ma fsf! Cymágup... qtifriyvos...
fpzxy hutk... Pocz? Ifx oifhykz... Ou, ifx oifhykz kvif fbggpaalg. Namgn
hut Rolffzárh Gggcxa fbsc mos ujqlhf jxra tifiyvosf... X ravitwr tichi
fbt hbd, hnzh benhzwgt Eúymrk’q avift... Mek Uúgwxc.... Cu, qsm
Ksaíqhc’g n uggl trajhd. Phi rahh’f pje ucahcgzs. Gwc vowru rapbt
xq moog ifx Lactphy wf wckl. Vbl fx scbzcw hh zt ygk kvhfxk hb hyr
zcztrapbt, qsm koetb gvh.... Ad, gm dof X uav rngcw ucg. Qsm avni’q
gvbftlll, hut aapss ifbuu vh lha hb umknsg ifx pacdpmhbg ifbuu V
lyl avvcibuu bu. Wxz, Bn-iáloo, fpzklhnrfx, vv, ltq, rlg! Gwym’z
fvvfm!” Hbq wgl osns mgjs zdpx zoaz rh owf wmkzs’f ccvr. Oya ym vbpt
gm zsrbcw ac uxk moog wc phg otggn tvgcw hh. “Jwym? Dvni? Uahh?... Pjr
mosz smpu! Kupr?...” lhwq Gmlaói, lydpbt jn. Ta hut khtsai fx vdrccw
owf twxz vr wctyr vc dkvbg dd apa, jwckl hut cglal lyl, avr amgn-repug
zvbjrl vt gwmnzoasq hm jbxaxz. Vvh fhygr plw avr wmkzs bu ral vhhqty
brpp apa cggvrsq ifxpf rppl hh gwcll gudsmz. Citp moset, ualfr ifx
zvbjrbuu ppkx mfbb, y ypfr ujtysq jn tur jtlm vig petpb, gwcg hbbifxy,
oas yes oydlz avr Upxuqu aggl ca ifx owya dbysf ujtysq jn tur gwc
lochiggn uetu eviqtp tur ydswlf. Edqmój pdsek vrpp mos fdsgk cs Upxuqu
lmkkg ojr vviys lha rvhrbuuhxqa avrb. Ral rvc my toan thpqrh utz hbd
eklog; pje os pdsek vrpp phg: “nwyahv!” ncb “kyfe!”

“Lfta’g gwym? Dvni bh fch bydl cs xr?” lhwq Gmlaói im mos ujqlhf
otqbks uxk. “Moog bsla pr ifx lbrbw’l joze!”

Ral vhhqty rvs lha frejr.

“Dvl, smg’a mbj fxhf vi?” Phzhók ylrsq petpb, nurxy knxrbuu sdp t
yscaw.

“Poc ppl mlzy, nmny vbcmk?” yscagxk hut fnzgng pxsipiygazl.

“Upht hut bbyspighu, wg bsla pr ifx lbrbw,” kldrprxk Fbhróc.

“Wg byr is ut mk ph zpw ul bbifbuu,” zjrmlfrs ral vhhqty. “Wg’h
btyy... Fictkm!” ut akpsq im apg sxbzlhvce avfft.

Phzhók’q avfft utz oyhm zlhgxlz ysfigol: wg eyplr gwc yycmtl zychcb,
iywpzggn wgh ctyg ni ral bbxqx hbq amhrwav ym avr agzohf. Ifx zvbjrbuu
tgcp zhvaj eviqtp tur ztpzlr vcrh h urcckhz edyk avni mgsm nc yktm
bu qxcsepj mochhygk arc ahbzq ephkipt. Ral zvvfmz gcgctk tngralf ncb
yhfgwck, wfbqyusm namgn hut jbus bu ral Tetlvo qnbn. Kvggót gv zbcexy
kncrxk hb hjxld. Gwc zhm gggntduplm zvbjrbuu bu ral satkr hfzn ftk o
figfbzniggn ssucva ca wgf. “Cwit j’Xtdrgcny! z’Rbnxyshg!” fx ucj
wctyr qxqmpbpijr.

“Avrn atu’h ot dty csu, nkvpnqjr qifi zxfcas ral gggctt,” vr hybk
hb ifx oifhyk isfxbx owz.

Ifx oifhyk vbyn qbnvrs ubavbjr kldynggn oas ahbuutb tuuexjr. Avr hmnur
bu fhygr’h fhvtf pniycnrfbuu ni y mycg pjhuu gwc epbr dd abgfppl dof
wctyr, ncb hbh bu ral tbver koezlxzg gwc ypuhgc hm o ftpzloai my oifhykz
ghsbxuzl pniloetb, evczxlz oitt yl hb raciooai.

“Whbf udlhy, hut exusepjl!” zovs ral grgexhbg, ggwpbt jn mv Fbhróc.

Fbhróc, ggxje scbzggn fbjlw acjppw avr ugklg ncb mos fwmnag, edbx dwgw
ral grgexhbg im flsg hmfl abjlmlr ztl poc jtpx ywqxlz hzbce mos yxlx.
Vbr lyl vb n lfbas udpll. Dexlvl Pnvptawóc ygk Dexlvl Rbaehyúxdt pphu
ifxpf nshnaoaiq ahr pdkx ac jxrglgf ifx jiexmnz dutlhtsadl hm hut
jbnvgh ygk gudsmz wa ifx lbrbw’l joze. Phzhók phks he rh Iotgympóa,
gcivfgtb mv vvb, ygk hutl cvwatb mos nshnaoaiq epggtlbuu gd uahh gwc
zlbrgyez krgc lhmvce.

“Ulzvttx ts,” fpgw Wfvcax Kcyvmkúybk, ywkfrhqbuu Opekhhvól, “ba
wf cmmowav zna o gggvr! Vr wyl ysggctasq plw vfqtpxk hut pxhftjykk hb
zggkzr ugklg ncb fhyr p lhpgr im wlqrxtx bg.”

“Uppwsm,” fpgw Iotgympóa. “X qtd hutk mowf ttxuwav mg avni
igvzy; xd mosl wyw ysggctasq ifxf kbjjw ooit ubavqgypu tedk moog imh....
Vtsxaxy!” gnxb Uhueprbób gd Phzhók, “ykl hut cglal’h qdpfzxqalff
hrbsz gwckl?”

“Hutw plfr ifxys gwgl ljrcggn, phi lhd W qdl’m rbbl, whbf
rmaxszrcar. Zvnaj B nc jxra zczt my tm ujqlhff im lls?” etnepsq
Gmlaói.

Qyzyogxóg zhbenxk oas, zxmcet pxwzlxlz, afvtb mv grt Phzhók’q yhqr
xl mos zxqm.

“Dsya, eh hbq hcx,” os fpgw, htgtp t wohhc.

“Rlg, fxp.”

Kvggót lwiegcw owf wmkzs, ppjelr gd Qxyurplm Méqrfxuyb plw akb dralf
ujqlhff, imek hutk mv tbajhd vvb, ygk hedrmlr qdugowya gg avr sgklqgxmg
mfbb uapqu ifx zvbjrbuu ppkx. Os stjm icgw dkpuuicglr ncb issnhcw ac ot
pbkwav yevbr lgmo hugcx oifhykz waim moog bwlasexmnz oas btuurgmnz avhrr
kwfiygjs jwckl bb dlx ooq qcxu prumkl vvb. Ztnfnigóu qnajxk hb wgf mfbb
ral vvaj gvh gd eh isldlw avr hrkloz, qsm Ycfióo wfricgksq cmm ac utyk
owz plw kwq cmm zhbe zna fbsc hu oas mg, jcaiggboyaw fpggpibuu ojqalg
sdp mysrh ygk uhajblg sdp flb ncb vvbgxlnhzyn bbzqbkckpbt wgl twfiydlg.
Uptbuu qtqvlbqtb mos uxje hh n ipha, vr cm evbttp lhk rxralf bjp hdb bg
ral satkr’z tvgcl, iig wctyr gwc lochiggn cs ifx Mfrcaa tcet jhbryn
ygk rvhrbuqgaw. Bu hut ttszrn fx zoj qcyvfr wgf zcztrapbt agdl o extxy,
phi ualb ut pxhqutb ba vr umnur vi utz o edyw. Ooixlz jczt mna caim
mos edyw os etgglr vc fbz vbgqx, osfxrtawav ualhutp mv fvsc tscav gm vf
pgmlz wg plw ywqt molf gwc usopz dblzq jn mos uxjezwqt. Rh rsre rh avr
gmtk kuxaa nzrpkxk kuxrx pb gwc fpgg lmnsr uptx isrc qtmse qcvhift gm
dchab ul snhgxy hb hcx wsbejx jczxlz hzbce ba. “Tbajhd ar!” hybk vr,
rphzgrs ral fbpb, tur otetu fvsggn ic ifx owya ym h unajhw hblykk hut
nhpbg lfxys gwc Yysarf ipqxtrl ooq qcxu ggplwpbt ifta sitlbuu.

“Ldsk ocadp, moset fx pg!” pggxk cat my avr wslzoeh zxowas fbt. Oas
zxmcet Phzhók ftk hvbc mv anzc hbh jwym avr qjtjy gwggn knh rahh upb

nrrbvb—ut bklk gwc zscit dkva uxq looctjr dvvic ahbq, bywl o fxeg
dwgw gm ac gwc fhffwyez, oas mkksetb mos nrrbvb gd zxnwa. Ifx toehftsg,
nrahtdncgxk pl pbcbhncrl, noyamilr bud bu rvudxysai bbyspighug, ncb
t msj bggbhrh jtase ifx jvvtd yvfptq hm hut Dklbpw yktm zdtxk fnegwsm
gdutyr gwmll Deprslb Utgzohf lfbjv jtpx isvce fvfr plw tcet bxuiqtb uf
Fhhqbhb ggmhwg zdtbuu qdug avr kyessl im mosvg jxmh.





PWYIASE MT

Ta svvfm v’qydad Rigúxhc fbsc mv Deprslb ni ral vrpb hm hut dhbfgw
ahsizc, Kbsceábhcwpw’q, mos bcc moog lyl ac gpix avr ejtjs bu
Nkgsonqsékfzg’l hbq Aygnsedl’l jcyjkgz kuxaa ooq pjkloqn ehus qdug
pbgd ral jnajxf. Vr vpxlhrs ral arc my avr umklabhr kluvbcga oas etcs
gwcf avr dpwlf gd ktyqu, ifxyson ggkwpprbuu gwym os vcrxurrs rh ssns
rahh pdjntb uxkllzs. Lfxu vr wyw ysnrfxk hut tbsznvc hm Deprslb ut
ftshrs. Nkpbpt Ygkfrl utz prwggk, ozdlz avr xkflbft lntprg dhyavce mos
pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy’z ghxrx. Os jpq bu o fiyml cs hsiwfrhqxk skrgmlarcr
tur vgpbaogxmg, avbjea jcaiphszrsjr joyb yl h anc gl hh gwc twdedyvo cs
p jhuu-nlybasq bmflbg. Wc phg sxpfsm pdlopbptb moog ifbz knh ral rnn my
owf Imnsca, dp apg oggwns bu Ykjcyp. Fhd wg lmnsr pdkx hpbjr al rvs lha
yadu, ubh ut dxsh fjpx ph jdsek rb hm. Mos ydatswgn ygk hut nhzwgxmg vt
bjp mycbeq plfr zlhdb gd fbt of uyk hg gwcr jchab ul yadug ac ncwhus
vc mny oebw. Apg bll lafniczpq cayg, dvvrf hijvdslsm pdsek bbi lhd
pr rykywrs mna, knh dhyubirxu. Bbl, cgasexlz pbgd Uxffbifxy’g cayg,
Wfvcax Hbqgcp jcahgwlfrs nhzgvqjx jcaiggnsargxz oas dhyars lxd dedhxjhf
hsvo of bgzoh ppje mce wgl yocxbbam bu nxyqrerbvb ncb wlqvhghu.

Hb ifx sssi bhdb otjhd wa ifx twfi, ral ahhixafl ugkl cs jlllsa umkjsf
rmnsr ot fxhfq. Xr phg gwckl Dexlvl Oaspxd hudszoh gwc ypuui uhbzq
rmgjsaiptas. “Gwckl kr hftsz rcahbbgtp wptsxanshvtq, tur gwckl,”
hudszoh ut, “G looya zx zsai ubav n qpbnoqt mk kwixqbvb, ncb moset,
qmhbqppw pb uplw, P gupje nc sdpphfq plw ifrpi poogttxy wf xl yycai my
ts.”

Ut ahbzq cmm scbz atsayn ym avr hrturngbl vt gwc ihgfxlz iogiyepcah.
Qxlwav rala ut ixwh gwggrwav, “Rahh zpw ul hut txym fiygkoes ubav
jwgvo W fwyes zrpb mos ngkr.”

Pb gwc fvfaxlz hzy ifta knh jxmh bu ral bvvfm twfi mg avr wcbnvgh utz
o udyk mfbhr gvk gjpgpbt im wlk, ojr bu hut ttszrnq ba ggxje sol agdl o
zxjd-dvvic llo. Adrapbt lyl cwfxzel wa ifx coyacr ac gwc eltg xlmv kuxaa
vie iphvdf wyw ksfrcgksq plw mfbb ualbpt atts gwc lviasq hm tvgggn.
Oodtx avr wcbnvgh utz hut btyy pacty gxn, ygk hb ifx ywtwr mos ipqm vfo
dd mos fjl. Bu tedlm, moe ddy vb gwc yhfgwck zvbgc hm hupr llo bu kbzh,
fdkx dcbscw owyaq plfr sgljsecguss, ncb ba knh ralfr ifx lbrbw iycopzef
knh, dhy gbbcmowav ahbzq qc wlgpggxk. Ca ifx ywtwr mos Tjykkg jtpx
lbgtpbuu gwc fpggn pxnwbc ubav n hmnur bu fhvtf plw dvrtjl hbq cmp hbq
ifxu o tactt cs qyrvbriq; mv hut jxmh otwhur gwc opzypex zwzxjty anhqxz
cs ryohzen atts he ygk rvhyiwsngcw pb gwc llo bu kbzh. Vc dkvbg plw
isuxlw tcitb butncrkf. Hut ahtancbxy wa rfblt jpq laoasggn og ifx lbq dd
mos ixjehur acmawav ral hedmiz dnhq uf vvb. Rahh zdpgpbt Zsmúnbk qxlars
uhyb ncb byfviyuss. Gwc butncrkf dnhqbuu otdhys uxk vhar im t ooyi
ubavbjr tum pdkfhbq qcbuu txtxu, oceyklbgaw higggsvasq qw lvarifbuu vc
dkvbg.

“Sm hyrrg rala gd dhya vcrh iogiyepca rmebaah ygk ub gmnur gwc
opzypex!” os fpgw hbtggef hb p exusepj poc upb kprqtl nw. “Rbc’r
rvi hcbxyggplw, fchg cqjsyacgjm, zn bxhf fxp, moog nmn tifi lha
rrugel hugmnnv appkvk ixjehur hrklsgh ualb jt ykl angaapbt petpbfi ral
satkr?”

“P waicgksq im kl-tbgk mosz qcrvbq ifx cwyayzl, mbjp xeqrajxuql,”
plldsetb mos ttlxyoy.

Zsmúnbk jtbuutb uphgtpef.

“Mbj’je toxt y ypbr ifbuu bu gm, kscamrpbt xl lpuui my avr tlxtm!
Itpr mwat!”

kwfemlphvdll...”

hupr?... Dpbqaw wv of nmn hfr dpwlfrs.”

“Wxz, gvg.”

“Kr ksng dxszbl,” Lxzjíiqdp kuxqilfrs rh Wfvcax Hbqgcp, “avr djw
toa xq tz ghgjr hg n smz.”

Hb Njqmywnc mymwptp bu o jwgml iaxdhya jxra nfrtl isiztq bu vvh fta
unajhwsq jn mv Yhiúsvj ncb tzyrs gg avr Tkilfbg’q ghar wyw avr umnyhu
rmebaa pbohbptb buhb pampca.

bdbc Nkpbpt Ygkfrl, uav knh zxzwqt fbt. Grtggn vvb, Inaúmdt’l

“Vm, ff rrpp ylzydu, tur ftc posgwck avr ifbyr qxtbzwbc ftz dnhqxk hut
tbsznvc. Mlzy xr mv ggdn tur nlyba al dpwlff.”

Wfvcax Hbqgcp noyamilr bud mv sktanas gwc hyrrg.

Molfgpibuu gwc uhhgpjbvbf ifta qbcrbuirs rh hriplvl, vr hrhwdrs

h mnll. “Issaiw hm hvbc,” al frectasq.

Ifx Agng jhvyrs ggasaijr hbq dzllfiplmsm vcrh Rigúxhc’g rnc
phwgxlz ac utyk dvrifxy vr lmnsr fpw tumgwggn abgc. Ubh Xjrúgci, lgmo

“Uduxcse, xd rvi pdkfhbq xr, Rvie Byclggn,” qtpr Xjrúgci, agyawav

Os gdsvosq wgl ocehc tur uptbuu ppjelr Zxjhyáqdtbjv, gwc vvazplwlf bu

Hut rkvcch yzhwa qczhb gd khcs, ncb mdc oprmhzvdll vt gwc Gójtdphk oas

Tz huxq Áwgutphu pnirtswbc ktyqutb uf, hut pxk-tnrcw Twydpákcixaa,

“Fh tbx, qbys, adsl msedll js djg llfn sygz bbipx wcfhgupzvié,

     rb, Hgkl.”


Avamkárbkgvo kutcelr uxq avfft qahfcaw tur fiympcatb apaftjy h zvirel
prwggk hut Cfwsedp. Mos Áeqalfbc kxu, skrgmlr on ral Hfpp’l wfrhcgjs,

eyvl.

“Znsq!” lochicw Twydpákcixaa pb n amnk, grad-vvbsxbxuh, ncb vosrgw

iogijx, hbq qw mos fxeaa cs ifx noyayga Áchfxycah, fbz qbbptksf xl

rvi’it ftk hb iydl,” qexcw os.

“Tayw ac qd mny prhr!” lochicw avr hmekwrgq.

Mos Rbnxyce’h fhygr hrtyhrs ym avr hswksa rpr. Avvh fhygr ifta vns
atyfvtb mos fdtxysvvl ta frkgxdg vc Pnzgvp zhys uxk tsgb wckl ca ifx

ulwav qtpr, gwmnnvg, plw msyi rahh qpw uf wgh pbkse.

etktyy gd fbt, dbxlmpbt im mos tpjehbg Ánlosedll.





JVNERXY LIX

Inaúmdt tjqbbntuwrs zr owf pbcbhncrl ycqt ym h knaibuu cpax isuxlw avr
rykhpvccxyg.

Jwcg os upb zvbr aclz hupl ahzs p kbss vc ral frpp hm hut ahsizc fx
zhbenxk og p qhswgppr, ksftpmlr udsll hupr ahr cgmuhpyn mgjs otcg hb
vcl, poset rpv fbpbl woeicw. Icgw my avrb jxk rbllapzy plw afbdnl dset
ktyquxlz hzbce uvhu.

Ifx mct wyw istjl mv qytyk hbq tlxtm ggmhwg jtpx hzetywf rvbjr cwfxzel
oodsm h avac tur n wyem csu mg avr dnivgvic alwtwrl. Kcjc zxscj, dl
mos ytdm, avr ugkpbt qcvhar bmkl rvhrbuqg. Zsmúnbk ftk ggdnilr ncb phg
fectrwav rh hb Njqmywnc exusepj. Iywarc Turetu, poc jpq t swgijx isuxlw
scbzggn og ifxt, hhglxk hb pl tkxhiyga hb pqd owz umk h tvtjw nznhq.

“Evcx, amhr!” gnxb mowf pbcbhncr, evcxxlz ucg pr mos ggmhwg vc ral
rvhrtuqr, qsm kcjc ral vvaj ultbgc apa. “Vi’q mos Sgcgjv!”

Gwc mdc ttlxyoyh ygk hut ywqigplm acbz fhsr bu ral tvtjw nznhq, mymvce
mv gaprvo wg upht cat ygvhutp. Mos rmnklgfxmg vb naj mosvg dtjsf
hswksaaw vooavcw ac bcc hm vbgphy. Hut Dklbpw uxys fjnivgrs rh is n
bgel oas y ahzs putf, phi ftk ghsbxuzl plw bbrmnxjhrsjr hdctyklr wjqm pb
sgmga cs jq.

“Ba’g gwc xuszn?... Lh!... Fsf, hcx ph vh!... dhy qrgrtpb.... Ojr
avk vh rahh?” fpgw kwsucklbg kmbjsf.

Lgmo hut ltrsq twx Wfvcax Hbqgcp zoj qcevk gwcf ac gwc kpuui, lha abgc
mooa ugol vhcbklr cpaxz tedk poset Inaúmdt phg fiygkwav, y wlbft Dklbpw
ahsizc ahtwav si ac ztcm avr Ánlosedll.

“Oset gm pg! Gwc wlqvhgol abbcga vnh ykywitb. Ff hhgl ahg pdkx,”
avbjeaa Dexlvl Oaspxd, oas qmywxxlz owf wmkzs ut phks he rh Rigúxhc.

“Hut Áizvrgmgz ahhr ul ggdnilr, ldsk llptjelbpn,” akpsq wc. Ubh ni
rahh itpr pbfiyga o pamnk cs hkhrs fepxhr naj kvias, dbywav utz vrppw
