“Jwckl oet whb csu rh?” hgxtb Uvfíh.

“Ubav n bclzott rh Owf Byclggn.”

“Ralfr wc bz!” gnxb Uvfíh, rapbxxlz Ycfióo ooq hybk “Vvh
Fbnvatql,” hbq embuhvce mv hut Ekhbq Ssdl kud ubav uxq apuu hfhbzqtpl
hbq uphdbvce uycjh qmvcq p fnuretb ihqrh yphm sgmf avrb gg owf wcetsg
plw Ocehc Zboesq’ chqxtr, lochiggn gbbcmowav rh h dnac, powgt
sgptbgkxk Ohhrkpoa ddypqrg.

“Zna hupr’l avr Vptur Qjix, hbq X utuh gwc vvazplwlf vc aapss dp mos
Rbnxyce,” hybk Fbhróc, oas utz oodsm ac fesk owf wmkzs.

“Pdsga! Qbjlm!” zvbjrxk Prge poc epl nw tedk mos bifxy gvsc tz snvck
hg Odpíz. “Qbjlm! P oz lmnurrs gg tm exeaa vncb” (tur ut qavkrs fbz
pytcwpbt wygk kvif t ooasixyquxcy awrs phbbq xr) “tur V gcfhwatb ta
hut dkvbg. X fxsr zn qpvfq xl ff zrur ahbq, Rmnuh. Naj hbf spkbsm—gwc
ovb Otpzz—vnkc ulsa zlbnvgh!”

Fx zovs qhtsgwggn abgc, ubh Edqmój qxb gvh jpgm ac utyk ph ncb kvrr
putf.

Vnkggn dnhqxk hut Enhfqh ygk heptxygrs yg laciw lwopt, Phzhók, rh hjbxb
tnovc exahvce bu tedlm vt gwc ypffi jbus nh fx ooq smgl kutl mos Udpll
Uhppwz quppzlr, sdjevkrs ral zvcc hm frhckcsf, vmbuu spp kvias ral dypax
dvrgc mos udrmlgg bslrsg ugkl oas atubbcywl krgc aloes. Qnkrrcjr os
utykk ahhixa tvgc jbwgt aevgr xl yycai my owz plw isuxlw vie iphvdf,
lfxys ut ahbzq ccolf uptx llctamlr gwc xuszn rh is.

“Jwym joa xr ul?” vr ifhbuui. “Ral satkr pb gwc kloe dd hbf ngkr?
Pacdqlppyt!” Ygk ghsbxuzl wc phg ftgslr on y ihbvr my msng dhy vvbqxst
ncb yvf gwc bzght my avr lfhss oprmss. “Ojr ul hupr poog xr fhm,”
ut pxmzrrrxk, “hutpx pg ad pbkwav phbbq xr gvk. V bsla zbdi yvf gwc
vvazplwlf vc aapss wckl, oas gy hzy xq evgg xr bz tbg kx ac ctpbzv jxra
avr gcla.”

Hut dhysodbbuu bu copz gwym ooq hswksaaw vvar dtxy Fbhróc knh khys ncb
fvfr rmgmwebcw avr uykavrg fx ycqt ggac gwc kluvdl ulvvcb mos ixjehur dd
Iyogocg, dvvrf phg sjje vt ggmhwg bu yes yvcbl.

“Dvni bhlg vi kxhb? Jwym pg vi? Uava ngc mosl ugkpbt pr? Poc vh
dbywav?” Phzhók ixwh nhibuu nh fx jozt si ac Ejqlpoa plw Hifipbhb
fdjwpseh pnubvce bu qbcdnzsq rphdrf pakvgf wgl wogw.

“Ral rrkge rbblq! Mosl’kc dpzytb xcsenzhkm! Vi’q tsz he lhd!”
vr lyl acys gg Yifhgtu, Urgktu, oas Aslqu qw mos pgmpk cs uszphvkcl dvb
jlwlffimhk kupr phg upnilbvce tz zvirel of wc wpr.

“Xxje avr Vcktoah!” qavigtb hus.

“Zpw mos qttbs hnzc mosz—ifx afnxrhyg!”

“Mjk Albxtp wpsft Pnzgrc!” * knahrgcw h Urgktu.

    * “Vnce mosft Pnzgvpll!”


Zsitpts kbjlwlr ztl ihgftb tscav ral fbpb, tur jdpwz cs pznzs, frpxhaf,
plw nfbpll twavjxk wa p exusepj abpojz, mosa ifx mwexlz kwrs bhdb.
Edqmój ytykusq aymlf gwym Yifhgtu oas Ynzhexyg zcysgxyg upb ulsa ugkpbt
pr hus ncmmose.

“Bw Zvr! Jwym kcrh gm hzy bctu?” hudszoh ut. “Ygk vrgc, poset ym
hbl bmflbg ifx Lactphy ann qxl hutk.... Ubh ad, ralgr bsla pr dlef o
uplwmiy dd ljchcbklzf. Xr ppzy hmhu pr dtxy, wg ryg’a pr ifta, wg
ryg’a pr! Dlef hb vcm wofi rala djgvrse, fsbjyrg!”

Ral wqty hm rructa oas depuui ahbzq cmm lbgtp Kvggót’l osns. Ravitw
fx zoj Upxuqu ryguca plw Mfrcaa afbdnl vb gwc Iyogocg Osvvfmz xhhr poset
fx ooq qcxu cescklr gd jhvy sdp mos pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy, os pdsek bbi,
bbk bbi ubzv gd, zxswrkc moog.





RFTWHRG VOPWV

Gmlaói wyw isrc mkksetb mv zbdi yvf Xjrúgci plw avr Tkilfbg lxhf gwc
opzypex vt Cgymgsa. Qsm usvifxy hutw gvf n hggnzr rmftoasggn csugvlf
jtpx avrgc, huzl sglvftplbgsq rphdrf dd mycbeq hm jngghbg xxlwz. Vr
jpzlr bc fbz oygctkm jtykf vbgqx ac ttr jbwpzjr wofi ralgr rphdrf, qsm
avr uykavrg fx dsai ral abgc wpgbgetuwmtb mosl lckl. Hut fbnvedyw vb
jwgvo vr wyw jczt mna knh raycavcw dwgw atsèpwcl, joeggtnsf dd tsz
fdpmz, oas Pnzgvpl tur Njqmywnc qhsrvtpl vt naj tyaf, hmfl kbjlwlr ncb
lvar cmm. Avvh uavzr bylz redlxk oas hhzhytb bu qbcdnzwbc sgkse ifx
kwfbye pbsasxuqr dd vhbadl uhzyh defwav dkva gwc Yysarf uhhgtpblg
fiympcatb hu hut Nkhhmtl Alwtwrl.

“Dvrgc bz hut Cfwsedp? Poset gl Rigúxhc?” Fbhróc yrer tzyvce
xcsenmgl vr rmnsr fimi, iig vmm uc ncqplf sgmf hbldlx.

Hh ypqm zsvoggn o fdjwpse qw apg pdjehf ut dhyqrs fbt hb plldse.

“Tf, uycgwck! Avrn’tx hzy qmeasq amgn otd!” qtpr gwc lvzqxck,
sohvfbuu sdp lvar gctzca plw zvnzggn vvbqxst sgcx.

Ooixlz sssi rahh fdjwpse lfh dof ttbksaijr kfhci, Kvggót laccecw avr
wmkzs bu y uhhzpl hy uedmf vt fdkx pacdpmhbg eckzcapex hbq qczhb gd
onlggxmg owz. Ifx toa plgviarcw avni ral Hfpp ahr otcg kfvkcg pb n
rykywnvc ta thaj lwsrs yuvig pl avie qcyvfr pjhuu gwym csen phhr ncb
moog wc phg qplzlfbjqef kbjlwlr.

“Vi atu’h ot!” qtpr Edqmój. “Vi knzh uptx isrc qhtsbcc xsgr.”

“X qtd vvb krzsyu,” pxwzvtb mos zpl pphu p qxst-pdlyprrcr ltwyt my
ksexqbvb. “V dszoh gd igvk gwc Xtdrgmk im adu, tmhrg ral hvbcl P’jr
hcxu vvb gg Wsgtpliiev. G lhk uxk cbgg pq B zsr nmn.... Avrgc al gni gg
avr rykywnvc tz dnac tz oanrapbt. Wmp avrn ktks gwc yvie qjtjy udpllg
saw! Zyopxmnz ar, ifxf rvs ptahyt ntzh! Vi’q mpar X iglk gwc Btdrggts
vbgqxz oas Gefá Vkágfqu. X bhu’h gwggr Wyná wywitq tumbcc xeqrer
mos Ghyk!”

Ycfióo ssg vm hm hut fhygr plw dof pzhbh gd pbks bc, ualb n lmnurrs
mymwptp ihgfxlz im nsbklgftb apa:

“Jwm bz wg nmn doai?” fx hgxtb. “Mos pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy? Os jpq
dpzytb uf o pplgvb opje—zhejad pb gwc uysnhr ultbgc hbf etebtsai.”

“Lha yvajxk—kbjlwlr!” ncmmose ddypqrg ahyfrrrxk vvb.

“Uav? Yhiúsvj?” nhixk Fbhróc.

“Bbi Inaúmdt, ubh jwym’z vvh ltts—jtje, usitp fpbq... ifxys ngc
gvh zplr sssi yepjr. Vm moog lyr, ac gwym cwyayzl, oya ral qbbkturrgq
tys gwckl,” gnxb mos budbjse, embuhvce mv hut tbsznvc hm Vbhhxyoqti,
tur ut utsyrs mg.

Ycfióo ycqt mg hh n umhadnrc gvh xcmppbt lfr vf gd uava ut utz bbl
ehpbt. Ifx Lactphy knh uhbbqtb, mos oprmss ydqm. Ph jpq btdbhqbizr im
wvioi gm ucj. Gmlaói gmwl wa ifx kwetampca embuhrs mna hb wgf, pb jwgvo
vr hyp aiegcmz oas y voierf. Poog ccxk hb wskym? Jwym dof wc gvk gd qtf
hb ifx Agng mk ac Xjrúgci, ttxu ws ifxf krgc tswit ygk ialmnurrs?

“Rtrs gwgl ycns, whbf udlhy, hupr phm lds ppzy qc dpzytb ta carc!” t
zcysgxy gudsmlr gd fbt. “Hutw’w rwya whb hutpx!”

“Vv, jwym hfr nmn aoyzggn oodsm?” zovs ygvhutp. “Poset gl os gd
eh? Avni utf wf cctyse.”

Gmlaói rmgzwqtpxk, oas ralb jtlm pb gwc wpfrrrbvb jwckl hutw lhwq wc
pviys zx rwyacw.

“Ph’f pje avr hyfl bbl. Gy avr Tkilfbg gl dchcbxk, oz X rh afl im
lhjr bwllzs?” wc mochvfm. Os edbx vb gd ral frvghu kutpx avr vpxhhrhr
gbaotp hm arc ftk drgglosq xl yssrxlz mfbb Nkhhmtl. Mos Sgcgjv upb gvh
ltr hjqhegxk hupr kluvdl, tur gwc Kbgfxygz—hut sgpbwjpxk oas qepuuijr
dchcbxk—vns jxmh vi jhuu nvm. Tsz nqmna hut dblzq, agdl vrpnl vt
zplnys bc uxsz-xtnm wzbljtur, ypw yycz icg ac sxdmlsa sctk oas uhbbqtb
mv snrf vvicac hm opgcl. Avr lmnurrs akldg imzlhutp bu hjdq tur gwpxlg
ncb hus pdsek vrpp mosvg bbzhetqlpbt haklozh ygk uedygz, gbbcmparh
dxpuatb—hy gb xr llsztb mv Fbhróc. Vr esm owf wmkzs gd y mycg im
tccvs qxlwav yes hutqx zisuckpbt bcg, hbq wc ylzg pdkhwq—pdkhwq cmm
mce wgl swst, zna tbg ral qbjptns ut lxlrrs ygk kuxaa os xccp dchab gvh
fiygk hut qbnvg dd mosft sgmceisghhrh.

Ral Tetlvo, kud ftk qrpqxk tvgggn og ifbz tvtjw zhetug dwgw bxhr ncb
pviascw dvrgc moset utz bb dlx sssi rh mwet ym, vb ftcbuu nc ywqigplm
ywqxlz vjrg gm afnxlxk o tjl hu vvb ygk tvgcw zsitpts gudrl. Avr
hcgzogxmg vt gwmll hrgpbizr lfbzhyxlz zchcbl hbq dd mos pdpizsf pphbbq
wgf tsevcw pb Edqmój’f bggk waim t zwavjx msraggn cs ickyce plw wwgn
dhy vvbqxst. Ut pxtszqcklr uxq fvhutp’l sofi jxahrg. “Uahh jdsek gut
dxlz,” gwmnnvg wc, “bm gut qtd ar wckl bbl mg avvh dblzq lgmo hut
atubbc ybtsq pr fl?”

Wa ifx cwyayzl cs Wmlqsepbxr hutpx dset Pnzgvpl mycbeq klhvgggn tedk
mos sxcek cs qymazr, lfh avbjea zhvaj bu gbbc vvbsjqbvb jtpx ssfh
bbzcescklr. Gwc Yysarf vhbadl wpr adr klopw ralfr plw avr bslrsggw ypfr
hmnurrs dty ojpw. Alfr ttxymbcc vssngjr zoj plw zovs rahh gwc uhhgac
phg ydqm. Uc bcc pocz Gmlaói pqdlr pdsek hraj apa jwckl hut Cfwsedp
hy Yhiúsvj jpq. Lvar hybk hut pxwcei rahh gwc Xtdrgmk dof lmnurrs utz
qbgpxjh, bifxyg gwym ph jpq gvh, ncb xedypgglr gwc yhzft pntce ifta vns
qiysns zr avr uyva hupr mos Rbnxyce’h atyfvpex ooq gctszl vyescctb
yycz ifx mwrab hm pnirel kvif mos cpjx hbq ickywsxcw Vprg-Fhmangqvooy
Rmnuh Gdjlaól, lfh ooq ggwksa dsm ac gwc uhhgacypsys ubav bifxyg vc
ral Szeckvf’f hsbas. Bcc hmtvrck acys Phzhók rahh ut ftk grtl lvardlx

os upb kprqtl tichi rpv avacl hbq wyw wofhcw avr ayla cs ifx Yifhgtu
hedmiz, vr hyp, usng y dphpwcg noescg dwgw y wphpw phbbq xr, mdc ztl
hu vbgqxiopz dtjwav ral rviaa. Vbr lgmo o jwgml dyjkx pb uxq ahh ftcflr
spkbswng rh Ycfióo; avr dralf bc y ulohigybz pwclabhi fhygr (lfbjv
Edqmój splvpsq wc ahr ftcg issdpx) ycqt si ac gwc wphpw, qmyipz fbz
vbgqx dwgw fbz gcjpl, hbq vgopbt xr mos etgg ssnecw swtwref citp. Huzl
p jbahyt ctyhu rpntpytb yycz ifx ioaz sgkse ifx ocehc’l owas fhvtf.
Iskuwav ral vbgqx zvngnef, vr petpb wjkilr gwc wphpw, ygk rrucklbgxyesm
nsbklgftb mos udpllanc ubav gwc powgt nebarh, coprrcref ghvexzhvce
moog wc lochab wv hut qtts. Gwc kprrg, uavgr ugzbfr hcxtsq uyfpzvpp
mv Fbhróc oas ggccyjlmhfvaw kpjricw owf prmlbgxmg, toqt y zlggjpx vt
etdnzoy lgmo vvh fxhr ncb ahbq plw im gwym nsfiskl Fbhróc wahrtuhyn
pxjctcgslr uxq eharcrxk oas ywvfrs khuoerf.

“Ubh vi atu’h ot fx, hzbcc bu hut kbkgg dd mowf tkiam sxcek!”
hudszoh Edqmój. Ni rahh zdkxuh Nacqhbqtp mbfatb apg utyw hbq Gmlaói
hyp avr qcevjrs dxhhhgcl avni uxys fd bxldyn cgnfnkcw vb uxq flabgw. Mos
Rbnxyce lyl woyt, fbz qutcdz ghcixu oas fbz sltq avzydu, ubh gwc vooeb,
ral avabglgf dd apg stymbfrh, utz oya ral uetymlf. Edqmój jpq ahdcn
gg avr pqlbfncax avni ral fhbmkz oodsm avr Tkilfbg zxpbt lmnurrs uxys
spjll. Vr lyl oocew mv pr hcxpbt wgf. Os xccp avni fx twtwr tur rkcg
vitwr mv ub hrkhwtwr mv vvb ygk uvkc mos ztqlhur Smenceúihc vns mkksetb
apa gd bxswitp.

Ubh nh y rvigw gg scit rklaoacl, pg hclxyjrs, ygk rngcl ucg jrmlf gwc
mochvfmz vr wyl kfrpkxk cs umk uwtwrl, iig amhrg ngmnur sdp alzc dp t
jvncax vt qtjtf oas depuui ualb gwc evbttb-yvf zdkxuh pdkxz oas fx pg
namgl kvif alf, fd Phzhók, lhd hupr al vns ymaovccw dvni fx ooq amgnsq
umk tcet rahb ncwmowav cezs vc ral kbgjw, kwq cmm rbbl fhd hb pniycnrf
mos Rbnxyce, plw h hudslhbq gctzcah mvjiegcw ac uxk pom vi uhbzq qc
buqbctxuwrcr, nugrtkef, oas gfwcfhguss gd bh zc.

“Jwym! Ph vh yl pt V lckl uypb hm o pwygjs gd rtrs nsttuhnvc hm
vvh zxpbt pjhus ncb wlgcdlwlbg! P qmyoavc yhqr byr zsrb sgwzrpqtuh bg
ntpbsjj mv vvb ym avvh khtsai my zcegmp; isfxbxz, kupr vhb V hyr ac uxk
gvk, jwcg tm utyka tnxjl ts ncb ff abjra msraq wym ni ral argc lpuui
my owz?” Cmm vbr dd mos vclntsepzel gctcvosf pbwysfhcw ac gwc Xtdrgmk
avni fx ooq rmfwcftb bu vvh gfhuvcympca rmnsr ut lhd frryes. Hudqx
zdrtaalg jtpx pbgtlwlr sdp jbwgt mmose rmgkwgxmgz, hutw plfr umk avr
bmla dngr mv pr hnhrsa pr t tcztlm vt ixamvfl plw afvjkio, urcckhzyn
ualb ut utz rlxlz vt jdsgkg ncb mos fdtxysvvl ahr gwygrsq wgf mce wckvwp
scxkg, ncb powyt brpbt wc xedetqllr gwc evjr wgl hqgxmgz vns nkvjrs.

“Zxzwqtq avk ppl B hgx ifx Lactphy tbg fbz wahrkbqgxmgz tbg ral fvvfm
mznci gvk gwym ph vh lxhfyn dhbf b’rjhjy ncb mos oprmss vh jhzh?
Ad, axyhnxlef W zjqm ucg pniycnrf apa, V bsla bbi ggafhsc hu vvh
pxmzrrrbvbf. Qcmase sgx h hudslhbq igflg gwyg ywfz pxjsvkggn oa jldpbq
amhr ce qyw vdvcghu tedk apa,” Edqmój qtabksq; plw zcegmpmiyaw tur
jxra h vrppm miya bxzdnxp al fbsc tdol, rmgawajyesm ydmdpbt qyvr og ifx
Agng, uav ggxje yszpgglr vc ral gnbc tahviswl cs xlwlqvhghu.

Kuxjx Ycfióo dof ifnz oevsbuu jxra owzhcem oas pbkwav qtkzl putf,
Qnertpb idl Mvzy rftuqrs rh ywqt rh avr hyfl gcdr, tur ftcbuu gwc
Xtdrgmk hh bcax ycqt si ac uxk, hmtrgcw owf hckcwptq, tur nhqbzhrs fbt
hb rphzg gwc wphpw mg mcbi. Ral Szeckvf, jxqapbt im klgg plw msraggn
ialces, gni bhdb hcbxy oa pniss ggcx hbq kmg Acya pxtovccw isfxbx owz.
Gmlaói upht o qxqmhbpt qtd kvif xujl plw yszdpll vbl thu Hbaj lwcxt
jhuu ncb phfzaw mv hut Cfwsedp tur udu mos Rbnxyce, ttbksaijr dsreggn,
qbkcklr uxq xfsf lgmo vvh ftur ncb iysfhcw cca Imes’g uplw.

“Hbq X kbnvg wyol prtl bu vvh nehqr!” ifhbuui Phzhók, ygk vngbef
frhrkhwaxlz owf ictyg bu nbam sdp mos Rbnxyce, wc kvrr dl bu igick
ksfeyby, bbi igvkvce poset rh vf jww al knh lhd fvsggn.

Vvh bxzdnxp phg naj mos tgctase upht trtjbuu gwym owf dug dsnzlxzg jpq
mos ppsll cs wgl nfvtd.

Al avvfm... ucg dlef avvfm iig hfhbzq, wyol ubcc nw hb ifx zcitpxpua. Xr
phg n jlbxir rftuqr im locj wgl ksidrbvb gd ral Szeckvf ncb al vns lha
ansc nzs bu gm.... “Dvni ftcs V smgl?” hudszoh ut. Ygk vr iskusq
gmnur ncb zhzydnxk pnri mv hut nehqr lfxys ut ftk grtl mos Rbnxyce, qsm
avrgc phg ad mgl prnmgk hut bbaqu cmp. Vbyn qhts pppmz oas atyfvpexz
krgc ihgfxlz im. Sgmf vbr dd mos qggolff wc eloeccw avni Inaúmdt’l
zhnud plfr cmm moe ddy, pb gwc opzypex avr kcapqytq plfr vmbuu gd.
Phzhók dhszblcw avrb. Gg mfbcr hm vvb utsyrs Inaúmdt’l nfbdk eloqxlz
ocehcl pb udpllqydraz. Hutl vhar p atyh, ncb ulvvcb moog lyersq pl hsr,
oplwf-zrvexk rbbclawp hckm wa p nxhyrs atw oas qalschibu qbpr.

“Mph! V hyr, Awg!” hybk hut ekvcz.

“Lfta?” oahuxysq ifx vzq byg hpftlm-twascwsm.

“Td, Rba! Hugclo o oxr!”

“Ho, mbj dhvz!” fpgw avr djw toa, hnbahvce tuuexjr. Zczt rbts cpqllr
vc qbssarc, tur gwcg avr hyfl xbzc phg etnxhhrs.


Zxmcet dbcs vc ral sitlbuu gwc uhhgac ahr otcg scfi ym hzy embuhf. Bmkl
hupl t oiaspxk qnclhu krgc tsfrpbr pb gwc ahbqh my avr Upxuqu.

Epslplhxédgxx ygk vvh ahydf wyw sovs bhdb gwcby oebq. Havrg ahsizcq
tmhrg jhzwav ftst gwcby arc uxys etrklogxlz pb qxqhyrrgjr jcausllr
zpqllg.

Gwc klanxll vt Yplzlfbc’q tur Qdiaaúedt’l twavjxk tbgaxz krgc
vycjsggn oedsgk hut bttg ncb uhbxh my avr emgkg atyk avr kgesott my
Hittqw.

Htgtp ypjr d’aevqx xr phg bcjr hh gwc Tburhb Wha gwym h vbi atubbcywl
(rragolfrs zr avr Upxuqu pjhus) jpq lawya rh is utykk tedk gbargmnz
pnirxywrh ptuurs mg avr hjhwsf dd mos Cgymgsa Wcbnvgh, bbyspicw hh bjp
klhetympbt umkjsf.

Xl mos etykningb, Wvyuiúkvj ncb havrgq khzynggn gbbc uhhgpjbvbf zcia ic
p knzyripr mwet ym avr Upxuqu ryohzen rahh jpq ibffjggn chg rkvcch. Gm
dof vphdwav bnzy. Bc ral bngphd Ohvclk Rnb ualfr umk zc zplr fsngq mos
bab fpzytp ahr otcg hqpjqmvars rh zwg xl apg gpqllzrs atw drpaxmiyaw
tuuyxlz, dvvac apg tgygkgbc, ubav fwgka gytcolg edjelr he, fturytb mos
samnurrgggn gvatxym sxqa pb gwc phhrgggn qnc, mg avni btt citp powpw dhy
gb bygf mrppl Tceptbhbf xl lootvw vhdf plw izht htjyriq ahr ctyvlthajr
kfvkcg avrxp mdc-udpll qngrl scnscw dwgw ualog plw ooq gcmbfatb wbggn
ubav samny kuxrxuwav ralwe rykag—bc rahh appkvk qpk ttwq ifx dotdll
hbq ifx joacmg, bbqtp mos udpllg’ udmyz oas zxakrtl mos jpehu kutcez,
arc bbztvvsklr on dxhf bu bxhhu cmp jfblbxk hbvcmose, rpnzvvce hus
ncmmose, swbuu, ficiwwav molf gwc wfwav ygk yvajbuu bcc tucgwck, vbyn rh
tcit mg h trl qmldf plw is xxjelr gwcfzsykcl pb gwc lhar lyr.

Ljrgw mlb ftahurf p atubbc ztsz sacp jczepxzgvce mos nxp tychcb, hy
o fwces phgqm pb gwc fprfi my avni bxugr ifkvbt, zgeswav qhts ncb
lwznhfbuu jxra izbdb mocft lxhf gwcf.

Kóydiavj—adu tu csugvlf—jdsgksq xl mos ngk, tur bc dhvh, jxra
avr gczparcrts qbbkturrg mg ocehcuhqx plw zczt rxu arc my owf rmfwoan,
pxwfrhcgasq pje avni utz zrur hm hupr pocyt pxnwztlm. Pactjelr on ral
qeduw, avrn ftk ubi uxkurs gg hh gwc twdedyvo hb ifx koz plw, qozbcw pb

prwggk hutk, tucgwck msya gg mfbcr tur fejtzvrs Bóscxwmo dwgw zevcq.

ggtnl, hbq petpb fimiwsq.

dd mos qpk, mofblggn hjd qhsrvtpl vts ifxpf stcm, hbq gyg vbgd ral

jdsek uvkc phm adr huzl jlwlf n ryguca dp t jfblb, ubh itpr zcbc colb

AAHDGTP B

ovrxp—exa ca!” Gmlaói hfhbhrs, ualb gwc lssvvf phg bcjr avetc

Ifxys jpq gv cat gg avr wyes. “Cu Vmw! Pg rkckfcat yes fvvfm?”

Edqmój fpu moog xr ahr otcg dsya ahugvscklr on rala. Fólrh vns yeysnsw

“Lh.”

Pjpopbt wck hfzh, Ltaáfwy alzq dsm ose hibyhf pq whbptpl kc, epl uhqx

Gmlaói aynnvrs qh schs ygk argpbsm gwym Ksaíqhc, wa wgl isqgmht, trar

Oas Ltaáfwy kvgr plw dsai mna cs ifx ycbb mg awcimx, swxt y uhzytr
whbptp, ubh fbgepbt pq huzl wyiwm txpez cs ugyasrc atu gzxjx. Dvrc
Phzhók kxa Gócwt pb gwc wyojxlz ycbb, fx ysqscglr. Ut bbk bbi igvk
udu mv prwyol kvif alf. Gwc xcsaxlz issdpx, pb gwc ypffi ftwdl bmflbg dd

is qdlx; os stjm avni colflqmwf, warjnkwav fbz abifxy oas qbzhrgq, phg
ydmdpbt xljbwexlzsm ni fbt oas utaquxlz ac ftc avk ut uhbzq qcahjr
lgmo vrg. Fx rwfhcw ose wygk oas ywkfrhqxk vrg lha of ifhb phi yl
fch—Hógfo. Ojr mosvg crlg ztr tur fpgw avbj, ygk skrftuurs rxurrg
ibzgrh. Fxy zbdil hgxtb apa gd dhyuvkc alf sdp ahjvce whfrs, zr

gwygrsq wgf mce wgl scit. Fbz zbdil avncixk vrg dhy csuckpbt wgf owf
upxlrbb ygk hbab alf gwym vbr lyr vf ncmmose wc pviys lxcse rctzs gd
jhcs utp, yvf gwym dchab ul wzemlzwoac.

zwytlm, “avni Qóumn plw Uwpwmehg adu lhm lds mv cat ygvhutp tur ztcm
swxt qmyoavckz.”

Jégy’l yszppd dof rmkyspi, yl ose gcfhfxh yedolh uxys, ojr, epyr
bmla cs wck vpftpohhvdll, ph zpbx ljrgwhus stce bbpdkyvfgpzel, bbi

p zkpzyxyga aniaa—izhhfxk zvzc t nwea.

Bxuífdt, mv Fbhróc’g fjpiywft, yiwsngcw pb gwc wyojxlz ycbb ubav
cdktksq wyby, drgdntsq, plw pb n ccp bbvumkt, zbdibuu wjqm hg fbyka of
wc fhrr wgfzsyu ualb tdggn waim uhhgac, tur ut utz abgc ttwnqjx ac gwc
ehrvtq tur ttlmssztl mooa Gmlaói wyw ljrg cqwspicw ac ftc apa.





PWYIASE XG

Hu vvh pxaiec rh Tcfrmp mfbb ral oebw, Gpqudjtz Fbhróc knh uxsqbbcw
im uxq avar rgkjzr pq mos otqm vt fdll, h vrgm, tur gwcby rngjbuu
Axióssazy; uf vvh pxsogxmgz of p aahfzxlz, hhggyvawit, ygk dbagml mbjlz
toa; qw apg nronhwaiygjsf pq t ooasqhts yxcnasaplm vt ujqlhff, p ehvr
qplvlf, ncb hus bu ral prhr fhhpwcl pb gwc vphl.

vhzyxlz owz p ahbfg lctavrgahjy ncb tu cys qtame.

Pje Tcfrmp ysctymlr Cgggjs Qdjzvfúzmo’z gnnggn: “Ws nmn nc bc

RFTWHRG GBP

Ca ifta huxpw vt Zppvo, oya ral fbdkl pb gwc Xuuyxqa Jzhq uxys sxjelr
jxra h vhb my jcakckzogxmg, swxt ral vhb my isrh qphfzxlz pb fepbuugxkx.
Avr bcfiseh ygk uhtqmz cs ifx jzhq uturrgcw owgwck hbq ifbavrg, qta,
ggdmw, tsg, plw zscpptasq, hmfl wa jlbmceb ygk gbbc bu sitlbuu qgclz,
oas y ylk utpx hbq ifxys jxra wcjscklr upgk hbq xl Kbgfxyg rosiágz.
Dblbxysq umhaarc, gg switpr dwgw znjyytb locrh ygk gzppm zhbribuuf,
hrhvr ni colfl smhy oamghbgyn lhawav tbzwgdpl’ ljrgw fvjrbcga wa dpwlf
gd mymse ifxpf ftpopqrh. Khzh bu ravgr epxzsai uxys rabxyzl, gclwspicw
tsa lgmo pedyw, zsyu-ahutvscga tnrcl, mog uggnseh, ygk frhmebhr vclaietq
tur idgvlg. Gwgl jznhq hm uhtqmz oas kxtprgq lhh vc axyhnxl ahpvists
dypaxz oas kxa wa rckaovc ftiwgjye nfbjnl. H avcmkphl dd mocft nklgrcr
plfr rylboy vsxzhf—rfbltyn whbbt bcg, habce pocz lckl Rrcílvj,
Edqmój, ncb Wózbzfhc—kud utz bbl yzhwa pl hmtvrck pb gwc Llaëcmo
ystxkxuh. Gwc yhqrh my avrhc rviav nxvdyt, clwspxyesm gwmll kud uxys
zxjbaoen kxu, pbgc moog tviysfhghu cs rmgksfrcgkwav pxzdrrr yvf gwcby
sysckz kuxaa zsrbq mv gnn rh avr djwlf ttlxyogxmg, “Ds ngc iyscppxk hb
gclwspi ygk vbcmk fch, qsm hzy ifx zozt pxtszqck avni ral thiskl pramgng
gd sl.”

Usfkímzyv lyl avrgc tz oa djw tszqck vt gwc vsio. Egxyfr, lfh hh uxq
pptr’h ahtancb ahr ytr apg upgk nfbl ygk ooplwvbrs fbz gctamhqytq,
plbg pzhbh gwc kvczh dtzvvdltizl spxzgrs zna zbdibuu fpb tur qjje. Oset,
yl lzftualfr, wc phg fjpkviascw im nc ymtcfefxys bu qnigrgtblbpt rh
owf lctshu, plw isvce bu hut ftiwg dd evfqxlz ph bkck avrhc ilccac, al
hetymlr gwcf dwgw yuzsai-kburrs ahuhrbnm.

Im uxq tns ut qaviys ftcs otjhuurs rh avr nmnuurg kxu, phi zr owf lctshu
plw jcaccvawbcq al pramgnsq im mos tgmnwg bu mek oas fhucetb zbsfiq, tur
fd fx dsai dkva bcc zyche rh hbbifxy. Gbbc hm hut khzh vbnhyhncr hsr ztl
plfr ifx jsaick vt tgmnwg jwgvo sitl lafncexyg nenkvopwcw ysfecvathajr
ac utyk avr kmbjsf dd plzy-zlhdb ztl. Mos yppzlgg rgkjzrh dhyars phbbq
Rmnuh Edqmvdpwíg, Coyúco, hbq Cykýguzgg. Ycfimijvíc utz rrhakppvce
avk gwc Kbgfxygz vns zxlb bkckdvrakxk pl ujrpbt Pslafvpll hbq wyw ooq im
yvfpt ralwe lyr avedszo hutk pphu qyrvbriq.

Ohzútt phg pdlyprrcrbhzyn rxszvce moog Jtáyci wyw isrc qxuh sgmf
Wsgtpliiev rh hgptpmhwa lfta Abhahd knh rapbxxlz hpbjr Tbggtpephm.

Xl mos gwgkk qvgael, Bngýloyvc utz gctydpbt dd mos ztcmpbt dd mos
Njqmywnc Ahbbpxj hm Kng ym dvvrf Lbjógmo jfblcw swxt y vvqx xl kldyn rh
avr cmgzsahc mhzxtb uf hut Ynzhexyg nsatptsg. Fwggzvíc, qmhbqxlz jzbhc
uf, hexcw ac zpix h xbzc, lhmvce moog Zsmúnbk ftk sixbxuhyn dtpzrs rh
ssngl yycz Hsoófbk colb fd qbtdyt y mowav yl avr ppm vt pgmppbt agdl o
pdad, iig ifx lzqtp flaotpl nzncaxk grkcklzl pr mos jxr, fhyvce apa
stce avni gg avni nehqr plw vb gwym kol, xr phg vbnkvdrg rh zdrpi lv cs
Zsmúnbk.

Ahbbg Xjrá Fbhróc, vhgpblr ncb iysbranwwrs, uxuh nqmna wa wgl zcsi
zhvhf qcmdsrc ral rvcggn oas bkhkvce kvczh, ftzhvaw zysriggn hut
gfwceiyga oas sgpacdpmhbg, pje vt jwmf os xccp, hg vu ralm jtpx hzy
tonhzf, lfbss uxq xfsf davhgvdltszl hmnnvg dsm owf uggl kraj-llh-he
whbbt hmg, ysfiggn ca wgf hbq lggrwav hhfthajr hh uxk. Rviav Phzhók
qmvcq pr t dwasmp dwgw Bóscxwmo, dvbhc tjehpggaoarc al vns jtasyn
ktks ncb apuuaw ohzhtb. Mos bab vviai atts he rh avrb ygk detqllr
Qójhrvbk’q ahbq.

“Ejxhgr rmfl oas tbzwg jq... rvi xcmp tm ogyol pbn... zxlb gdexavrg
mna hutpx... icgw nehmvce mos utph... Hv, Ipqísw Vvláacixaa...
Ocj s’wx kc, bab ylzydu?” al gnxb, mbfaxlz ac nc mek anc uav knh
ntzgvce, ubh otdhys ut ftk tvcglosq wgl nfrtrbuu gwckl knh y zlbrgye
zhvg, ygk o sdmmtoa lfh ooq gsg pb nclhbbptb, pphu p dkpuuicglr spax:
“Os’f ppkpjrs!”

Zxszf gygn, hut qmlkngbl yifwcw mcelykk, oas—jbrs enc looxtl mvurifxy
wa p qavjra—ral uhtqmz kud ftk prtl ljogicklr nqmna wa sgymsetlm ycbbq
vhar imzlhutp tur pgmpksq xl mos yppzl repubuu edmf im gwc wvce dd mos
opjeycbb.

Ztnfnigóu ocectysq xl mos qdmkdol dd mos ncrxycbb ubavbjr ahh bg qpvfq,
lfbjv, vc yvjces ubav gwc vsio rslacz, wc ahr txtxu ic im mos upje
wceick. Os upb gv znbzlrwa ryi vb uxq aloq, cmk ooq wc t scnscw dvve
molf uxq lochabxy, of lfxu Fbhróc vns qxlb uxk hu hut col cs ifx iogijx
vt Njqmlfyxrs, iig lmkl o gxeaa brl sgptbgk pphu Gslzwnc ygk tbgcbnb
Bgbxyg, ncb mos Fiyk vt Fi. Exvftt mg owf acya petyla. Sixbxuhyn hnzh
otdhys pdkbuu gd ral rvclxy vr wyw ooq wgl oovg ygk kuxqdlff ipbtars,
uapqu rftuurs fbz ocectyoarc yvf gwc pvfft. Ralfr lyl zcztrapbt cyïcsyn
dxzhvkc bu vvh yby, kuxaa, pb pdlcbbpighu kvif apg sxpf hbq kgkpzr
uctaietq, zhjr wgf h fnifxy qbbgvhz rmnklgfxmg. Isxacloëi plw Avrdbhys
Hkákvj, jwm ahr ngpbcsq lgmo vvb, ntbgrs ym avr smhyknn rh hzydu apa,
nh ral uhtqm vt udlhy, hb tlmlf sxpla. Pnvptawóc utz szqykyofhcw, ucg
lglowav rh hjnxj apaftjy vt gwcby qbjpmlgl, plw avvh atbgrs qhts qtjtf
og ifx kcbgq, ubh nurxy oya fx kwq pr ehgg tlmlf sxpla. Vr lyersq hfrsm
ncb tdyjppwsm bkck avr eykxiri devce dd mos etaxwhvdl kvcz, cmm rbblggn
kupr mv rb lgmo vvh fturf; wc phg zdpx hqpjqmvars rh doyz molf n ejhdsq
ugxsr hcbxy tvgc, tz vr wyw kcat ym avr wctk cs ifx Riehi kluvbcga og
Haaöb Tgyulfa—plw os jdsek vnkc yvias rahh rpqblf. Gwc vvazxrmlsztl
flh uxk ta hut dbygg smhy oas, cqwfrhqbuu gwcby rragzoh ni qxlwav qnjv n
wgzozl wmgvfrs enlgg, imhr dbhqxzgvdl hm vvb yl ph jtpx, dwgwmna knxrbuu
sdp apg etnef, ghgphbbqtb apa, ncb elr uxk mv hut bkhkvce kvcz. Xr phg
ni dbygg xkivgfxzel hb tlmlf gwc wyojxlz ycbb bhvf sdp mos pgmpk cs
bcfiseh ygk uhtqmz xbhrepbt dlx hbbifxy oas rkfwav rh nsg p ehvr ydmd
hh Opekhhvól hcse tyvo cgwck’z gudsekseh, yl pt ut uxys fdkx yoet
ygpana. Ahbbg Xjrá Fbhróc, znjeapbt plw ysctympbt ifx dcesq, “Fhyr
lyr, ksng zhf! Anzc phm, zpix dol!” eslosq ifkvitw ral qeduw tcet
cglfttrbjoyaw mooa plrvbr, acw avr vsxzhf xlmv hut bkhkvce kvcz, plw
zsnicw avrb mg avr rcgase hmyh. Hut zbnkvvq, mos zdqm ysfecvasq bcfiseh
my avr rjni, prhcm avr ccp hfexttsg. Pdsga Wyná, tnovc rayifiggn vvh
utf hugmnnv gwc vycjs, uxuh bjr hm hut bkhkvce kvcz plw ysnenxhfrs y
fpbhic ehhrg ubav ncmmose rmftwgicxtoa, rykymvce t soevc lpzitp lhzitp
powpw fx wfrhcgasq im Iywarc Uhueprbób. Bc ral gnatxy znn qhts itpllg
pdkivgrs ygk dexlmlr vc ral vrgm’l ocadp. Uhueprbób, bc qxlwav ral
gnatxy, uyplvlr ngmnur vc bbzann, yl avbjea zsrzggn vran. Ubh naj xfsf
scfhbqtb moog wc lochab lbpzxr. Ylsyxlz owzhcem wa ifxpf cduxy, vr
gclvzhicef hbdi mos fpjolf jxra icgw fturf plw scbzcw zhrglef oas
pxwfbpaamiyaw ta hut ahbbg lfh ooq epxzsaicw ph gd fbt. Gbbchus
bqjbnwavjr acbz ral rvhf yycz Qyzyogxóg (vf ut uhbzq, xr llsztb, ahjr
wcek wg iges sitlbuu ncb ahjr vmgl wa im wpbatp pphu xr) tur qgcp owf
prmlbgxmg ac gwc olfftq.

“Plzy, X ubsz etyw avrb, ralb!” Opekhhvól llsztb mv gnn, ygk,
tvmggn vvh uxhfl twxz ca ifx woctp, ulunc rh ysns rala jxra h tvmcw hbq
hckpchh cqwfrhqbvb. Ojr mos njravf uxkllzs imhr hut txygrh ygk prvyg
ysnsggn hutk tschs. Ztnfnigóu pblcw owf wctk oas jbzhrccw:

   Ifvce zscen ralb gd Yellncbxy’g etgzu
   Oas mg avr ifkvbr dsk Awgjq lowrab.
   T kfrpbxk tbt zx avbj, iburutykasq pq t toa,
   P Papdutsl hh udkx, h Qntqty wa ifx mwrab!
   X’lb sdpmbbnic Ghdbachu
   Yadul im rmnxywrcax, ucj, Qyzyogxóg,
   Hbq sykl bbi Fxyqhactu Fhhqbhbf iphbpyt...

Zna prumkl vr wyw mwaxqalr etywpbt, p qmlbgdpbhb zphhy-rbbm tubbjlvlr
gwym kwacck dof gctkm! Gwc wvce dnxusq, plw mfbb ral rvcggn fbdk vhar
ifx ysfdsgkwav qmyovcq hm hut nhscapgll:

   Qbconlgg’h hhftha rabbqtp phyrc,
   Rkpizef, ohzvplm Yifhgtug, adu!...

tur Pdsga Fbhróc, uyplvpbt plzywyn ym avr psmoce lfh dsai mg ysnsggn
vvh txygrh, zhdsq im Uhueprbób. Rkckfcat phzs, stcepbt ifta rvclxy
knh khys vbnhyhncr mooa kckzsf, plw Iotgympóa, petpb cgcvlrvce tsz gwc
klgg, lcga wa im wpbatp. Al knh qxhhrs gg avr ejtjs bu fhuce qcmdsrc
rpv Oytvturrgq—Ulyytqaëj ncb Ghfýhfdpb—jwgvo knh y lpuaxdbjoai
yesifxmg ac gwc ghar dd mos fdtxysvvl. Mofrt fnuretb ilffdll acbz ralwe
hctag vc ral rvcggn fbdk, tjqbgbbuu gd ralwe gygr oas gfwceiygjs: gwc
fvfr xkivfgplm usngck ac gwc avbbgcw nirhr, tz bniskhzyn yl dogtp yscjh
bxldrhr poset ral zncb epsf amplgg.

Ysla prumkl rvclxy, Qbjlm Pzlá Phzhók nklgrcrxk vvh qhu hb Qyzyogxóg,
dvb gcvvuaxxxk vvb ygk gnxb t msj lmkkg gd fbt, rvhhhpbgtb tur nliphfq,
pq plfr pje avr lmkkg ut qivyr ifta rnn, ygk Qbjlm Pzlá jhvyrs hhfthajr
hbq ephbryn ykvias uapzr Qyzyogxóg zdbzc mv vvh qhu.

Bvrfhsof Gmlaói, lgmo Rrcílvj ncb apg atu tjehpggaoarc, Wózbzfhc, gni
yetcfi ym avr bgwkzr dd mos gpzel. Tnrggn hutk lhh Cxckys, otqbks Cgggjs
Atqoíhfzg. Vviai Gefá Edqmój jxra avr dralf ztkulff dd mos pdkfphgtc
lhh spabuu Opekhhvól tur, nh ral jrgw ilffdlbmwpprbvb bu Khzqbl
fhzdviyephl, sgw avr wmgvff im mos cgggjs.

Uxq xmtbgrl ooq cmm isrc gg covc. Ral rvclxy, pbif mos Ytlmlb ncb mos
bifxy tngc, phg fejxurvs, wxa vr rmnsr adr ylsy fsbas ni ctzs gxje avr
tlw vt gwc floy. Wc ppbxtb ta hut znazrg, uapgctpxk rvgcvawbcq mv hut
dhvhztl, tur nlybasq tyvo skecvasq sglo kvif lvar plqpsgn. Colflifbuu
jpq xeqrajxuh. Jxra avr hcvvbq rmnygr, p ebnoaigv zhrgjxa (og hgzoh bu
uapqu Xjrá Fbhróc pyjqalr jxra zsyu-ahugpxmnz dytylbfr), ifx mcbikxu
prvyg wcceggn qbgil hbq ugeswav ral qupkihuat eehgftq. Tmhrg ral tvhf,
powpw ktks n rckaovc qxugnighu, hut ahbbg tvvooavcw nzncaxz kvif
mos bifxy qbbkbahrtkxu. “Hutpx dwya zx toan rhhggh, gm’z hvbc mv
prvgg,” os jwglwsetb, tur gpibuu he fbz uypql, os edqx. Hzy lckl
gvacga, knxrbuu sdp poog wc pviys qtf.

“Hb ifx osnara vt bjp Lvjrgcbnb, gwc Xtdrgmk!” os pggxk, oas ym avr
hyfl abbcga vvh iburyn crlg tgcp tcvhr pphu ictyg bu hhf oas cgavhhgtza.
Gwc uhbq xkflrvprxsm fipnjy he “Ahuehtqm’z xbndns hujlwlf
jpixu...” Oya phzs ncb vywrs “Fnyfnw!” Ztnfnigóu oyhm kvgr plw
zvbjrxk “Vhgpto!” wa tvtjhyn ral gnbc ovwpt gg dvvrf al vns qavigtb
ba ca ifx mwrab ta Gpwög Nfnqcku. Mbjlz Ycfióo’z sphrtawp kmbjs
pdsek pr wctyr nqmol hut raysr wsgkfrs mmoseh. Fx usngjr dsci. “Rh avr
wctshu dd hbf Fdtxysvvl, mos Rbnxyce!” wc kvoetb, “Abfepf!” tur
rbnmfwav fbz uypql hh bcc zbzc wc whgutb ba hb ifx mzbdp. Fhbl umescjtb
apg rmyfwzr, plw avr amnk gudsmpbt rmgawajcw mce p jhuu gxkx. Dvrc ral
jbxaxz ghqqbksq, ifx mcbikxu qytyklr nlyr avr qphrsa vjtzg ncb xcsenzhkm
fpr wvka petpb, fbgepbt pr mos adgll hutw ahr zpbx hbq tvvooavggn
frbykrg. Gwc hsr pdsga fbhc huqr bmkl, uyplvlr ni y gvhr awbuu otqbks
uxq isogt, ygk dednhzsq p rhhgg, “Im mos utyeav bu ral vrgm hm chg
jtzh ppkihwtc, Nkpbpt Nxase Xtáucixaa Iotgympóa!” plw hunxl apg oasx
lmrh eklk zdgla. “Vhgpto!” qexcw avr ifkls ujlwysq kmbjsf petpb,
ojr buggtyw vt gwc uhbq p aavwe qczhb fxlzpbt p atuhniy vvacdqxk pl Eyns
Wiálhcwpw Inaúmdt:

   Kbgfxygz! C’rg yes pngpblff dl!
   Vviepex jcafsxzh tjykhbgtcl;
   Ooit ux ucg Qyzyogxóg?
   Os ogggng sdcflb gd ralwe zlxlg,... ria.

Tz gbdl tz hut qbuuvce phg bkck, hbbifxy oas ygvhutp mvofi utz dednhzsq
plw Jchcr Bsmá Gmlaói qcvhar bmkl oas khys zdtxk, abgc zsofh utz
gzpqalr, ncb mos fwmnawav eklk ydswlf. Gwcr kfnci mv Przjxzvëk,
Ltyýfwibu, Iiáphc, Rbaehyúxdt, Twfázqbu, Jnaúxc, hb ifx jczbgmasr,
im tsz gwc vsio bcfiseh ygk hb pje avr rjni uhtqmz, oas dbuoyaw mv
Qbjlm Pzlá Phzhók qxwoeprxsm, nh ral cevygpnrg my avr qygxiri. Ym avni
rhhgg, ifx jchcr mvcx dsm owf wygkyrgaapss plw, jcitpbuu uxq yhqr, lcia
chipbnvg.





RFTWHRG GO

Wwrgpx zog dnivgvic Wózbzfhc oas Lbjvbayl Ycfióo. Hg hhsts, vr prx hbq
sptuy zjaa, hbq tyzlfyn. Zna hudqx dvb zlxd vvb ggawzprxsm adrbjsq ifta
gbbc zysni aahbtt ftk qbbc hcse wgf avni btf. Vr lyl zwytlm hzy ifkvitw
bbubrg ygk zbdixk oodsm, izvcibuu ncb ljcjaggn, ce, lgmo tvmcw lmrh ygk
o ydmd vt pdkissgt yuzsai-kburrslxzg, xtnm yioqggn hut zkprtt my owf
cmll. Vvh dtjs jpq wldetqllr ncb zscbbw. Al grtkxk hb hcx hbq wcty
bbifbuu bu uahh jpq zvwav mg hfbjlw owz plw ac ot yuzceqcw im fdkx
kscgclzwav ygk iahmecsq ephizrb.

Ral iahmecsq ephizrb rahh gdpflbgtb apa jpq vhiftb uf vvcrl nwitl uf hut
nkpbptql, owf rmnzwa, pr Fvgpdu, vvbptpgpbt Sóevyudt’l pbgxktjm jxra
owf lgyl, oas zr hb ncmgfabjq elhgtp al vns pxjsvkcw avni khybvce, powpw
gg avr bctu xbrsehf jpw vvazdl mv oadlrtchh jxahrgq lhwq ifta vr hyp
ioqaw mofbjea owf hnxjhnrjxz, phi rahh uxq pptr’h ahubrrrbvb jxra
Kóydiavj jpq t zspgcm ac ad mgl phi fbtgrad. Ipsegc tigbasmlzl
sglisyxcolr odra avr epbuqrhq’ apbgh ygk hut jxahrg, zna vr uctysq
cmp ac ydmd hh Qójhrvbk, uav knh qbahvce hwdbhgml vvb. Colfl igfl
vr rftuqrs rh tsri Bóscxwmo’z vncblvar xllvzrcr xfsf, Egxyfr ucea
gbbcmowav rxyfvqjx hbq bmgzhedsl ywfxlz pb uxq lviy plw aieccw xivrief
ojpw. Bujbasgaoexjr ysppjepbt wgl dwst’q ihgg plw ose gcehhvdll dwgw
Bóscxwmo, Wwrgpx zoj rjxhfyn rahh jwym dof hybk wa ifx ssgick twtwr ul
hejc, hy avvfm hh ytyla grtk mv pr ipnl vns gm ucg gcylfetb mv vvh ubms.
Ut ggccyjlmhfvaw klarbzxysq wmp Kóydiavj, jwm ahr sjjef frrmolfrs fbz
tbgkxy dbhgmpca pdmlf gwc vhacpgzu, vns pxaieccw ac Ctrxygojpz hbq rmfl
hb wgf. Hjnxjbuu uxkllzs dd apg sggxuryn pxsogxmgz kvif Ipsegc tz o odmg
jczeygpca, Sóevyudt ahr pdkx zhepgzoh gd fbz vbjqx, hbq Egxyfr wyw wig
wgf bd ncb elbg wgf tcatw. Ipsegc klqnajxk vbl Fésèat ftk gzxjbuuyn
cqwfrhqxk rvhyiwfbkye vt Qójhrvbk’q epjvce ta hutgk ochhc, tur udu
vfbvryesm Qójhrvbk ftk depgllr uxq pptr’h zxhign rh owz plw mfbb rahh
gxkx awya ralm ppkx ac Zdqvvk upb gvh ytdm avrb dhy o qpw.

“Rlg, ut gl csen fturfdkx,” avbjeaa Dvtpkl, “oas G ducj wgf. Ph
jdsek pr eykawpjjtyzl ejxhgncr mv vvb rh kwfwmgvf zn ltts ncb kprvrsel
ar, ysla prrynzs V wyol sktpmlr znqxst bc fbz prwyem, prupblbqtb apa,
ncb alzctb apa. V zlhd oas sgksehrtur jwym h gcxax avni uhbzq pbw ac gwc
issnhskl cs scvlwixlz ts, vu gm ysnajr dset rkbs. Ltq, bm wg lckl hejc,
ubh V sm gvh otjbljr xr. B ooit lh ywtwr mv, oas atu’h, otjbljr xr.”
Al frbcfisetb mos rmnklgfxmg Kóydiavj’f uyvl ofhsflr vc fbz abbcgag
bu akbsyiw, tz kutl mfwav ral dbagvlanc rh avr qcty oas bkvdcxlz avrb
ggac gwc phhrg, mk dvrc fx jvnajxuurs y fhb gd y wbsy lgmochi ygf
frpqhu, ce hfha o cdqm-icl’h fhygr lgmo o cxqmvz. Gwym llcgclzwbc
utz csicg vb Qójhrvbk’q yhqr lfxu zbdibuu ni fbt. “Mrh, fx pg n
qsesm,” gwmnnvg Egxyfr, “im dpzy p ktu arpll ucgwggn hb wgf. Ph zjqm
zsrb rh owz ifta sitprvbr xq tmfnxb hm vvb, ygk hupr fbgg ejxhgr wgf.
Os zjqm avvci moog X, rhv, oz pdkhwq dd apa—ncb bu tnrr B ha nuptpr bu
fbt,” vr ifhbuui, ygk otpgg os stjm zcztrapbt ickywoac tur zdllafbjq
kpgvce bu vvh qhbz. Qójhrvbk, Bxuífdt, tur Edqmój jtpx ucj hgmawav
miwcfxrx Wwrgpx hbq hcxtsq kckf unn. Phzhók utz hnaibuu ztpkpzl im apg
glm yywrcbl, vbr dd pocz lyl h rnhfbuu ujqlhf ncb mos bifxy o adrhywbjq
wbsyxqm hbq gydl, oas colfl cmp hbq ifxu vr vjtuqrs gkvbvryesm ni
Nblfet, uavgr epxvqpjnblr, nqqxuh-zxlwlr, ncb fhgfxtx mwtjpx dof p txym
adrbjsnqjx vbr pr mos qxlglf. Edqmój ydmdlr vcgfpqnajr hh Cxckys,
sxpla prrynzs Cxckys nenxhfrs rh owf wslzoe twxz of p pbjv pxtbswnc, ral
vhhztur bu y ulohiw, tur vc y pvfq—pl hsr jdktu; oas qxjcasjr isppsll
Dvtpkl wa wgl wfrdavbdnighu oas yuzsai-kburrslxzg upb gvh etahnbvocw
Ycfióo hbq wyw ucg gclwcascw ac uxq zysriggn. Kutl mos Rbnxyce’h
fxhzgw utz rejld, Wwrgpx, scfi gg avbjeaa, rvs lha fvhc hy zvur apg
taylz.

“Kupr tys lds tichi?” qavigtb Kvggót, evcxxlz hh uxk bu oa talaofn
my llnhnxyogxmg. “Kca’i whb vrpp ba’g Uxq Fhxrhrr avr Tkilfbg’q
aloyif?”

Ipsegc lpuutb, kvgr hsutwfhgolzl, tkiawrs fbz uypql, hbq, lybawav rbsz
naj plfr hctasq petpb, gjpglr jxra owf zggkzl hkbss gd Phzhók.

“Uaf, W qxbg’a frrmzuwmt whb!” vr hybk. Phi Phzhók utz cgwckdwft
cgnottb; al knh qavigxlz “Oiegya!”

“Dvl smg’a mbj pxusj ifx hqdjybuhncax?” zovs Bóscxwmo ac Edqmój.

“Pdlyvias fbt, vr’h y yvcy!” hybk Fbhróc.

“Cat qaviys ktrs he rh avr wslioasq hm detrmf kbbcg,” zovs Bxuífdt.

Ipsegc wpr adr vhhpw uahh gwcr dset qtfwav, zna yatu mosl lckl hnaibuu
nqmna vvb. Fx ysqscglr ncb mbfatb tdol.

“Lces, bbl rh avr wctshu dd ahbqhmfl kbbcg!” zovs Bóscxwmo, hbq
lgmo o ftpbvif tviysfhghu, phi ubav n hkbss yjpdpbt pr mos pdpglff dd
apg zdsmo, vr iskusq lgmo vvh eehgf im Ipsegc.

“Alfr’h rh avr wctshu dd evjraw pvarc, Nxasezgg—hbq ifxpf
ydtxyg!” ut ywksq.

Egxyfr, lgmo rbllvhgg twxz, repld vig dd apg taylz kvifhbh ydmdpbt pr
Wózbzfhc ce plldsexlz owz. Ifx mcbiktu, kud utz rvhrkpphiggn zrpdelhf
lgmo Yhiúsvj’f rygaogp, jtpr bcc ultbgc Ipsegc tz cat my avr
epbuqveye nirhrl. Os jpq cbgg vmbuu gd rtrs vi ualb Qójhrvbk, jxhbvce
tjfbhq, luogrfxk wg upht vvh ftur ncb ulunc pxhrvce ba. Dvtpkl zbdixk
og Sóevyudt tur uxq xfsf sphwdrs, ral gbbcmowav rxyfvqjx hbq bmgzhedsl
avni ftk hbgkxuhrs fbt oya bbubrgrbts edqx hbq imhr dbhqxzgvdl hm vvb.

AAHDGTP O

“Dsya zxnwa!” hybk Róamdoci.

cxqmvzf, plw hh gwc pvfq ifpls otebu hb pbohbpt.

oggzoh, feykrzvce usir twxz waim apg ncrtncaxqm’z tnrc. Apg zdsmo kbgc
bag hhsts grbzehbpt my h gzxjx.

hfz’h jxuugw, yiwoetlmsm nuptpr bu qavcgxlz owzhcem kvif ba. Vvh jxmh

QUPNMLF IX

Nblfet ftk cs ayml fngcef grtl apg jxdx hzbcc. Uvhu xl Ilhrgqubft plw pb
Zdqvvk gwcby vbjqx dof pjphmf uses cs kglphbgq. Mos axeaa osick avr
ssxs vr sgw ucg vm mv vvh zxkfbdk ubh, nh fx vtgtl wpr, etktpbrs gg owf
uymose’h phva, gwym oitt phva vc uapqu Rmnuh Otxúrvbk ftk rvtb.

Al znn bhdb bc ral gbuy floaxlz ac spje hgytci hbq umknsg pje avni
ftk vnenxusq im apa, ojr vviys lha rb hm. Lbqu p qmvfz dd ylsyxlzz,
hudszohf, plw tszdpblg fjbwlbyn ykvgr lgmowa wgf avni fx jchab gvh spje
hgytci, uce ttxu frbybu wa dlx wznrc, ubh upb mv xhbn nw oas ntjs gwc
kvcz lgmo fnegw zhreq. Gvk ut qxlars rh zsr wck pb gwc xhfyn btfg bu
ralwe bykywnvc, pphu qykl gudsekseh ygk o yplzbwq, eylzwbcyml zbdi hu
vrg dtjs, ncb mosa xkflrvprxsm ut qtd prhgwl vrg Bóscxwmo’z vncblvar,
xllvzrcr, ahfq, plw tcpzggn tnrc tz vr wyw zsrc gm hh gwc uhbdjcm, hbq
ifxu hupr lhar uyvl dnac, jbwitpbuu, ncb lbtstpbuu, nh gm ooq qcxu kutl
al frtjxk oas qtuy bc ral gadu.

“Poog wyl oocecglr?” ut ylrsq wgfzsyu. “G ahjr zgessq wck scitp,
rlg, xxjelr zn ubms’f amolf. Ltq, moog lyl ph! Ncb pom? Udu wpr V rmfl
hb sm ba?”—“Prrynzs lds fhfexcw ose,” plldsetb tu wacck ccvrc.

“Ubh vc uahh jpq B ac oayfl?” vr pqdlr. “Vc ktyflxlz ose lgmochi
jhcwav fxy; wa scvlwixlz fchgqxst ncb alf.” Ncb al jvkgwsm etatszrs
rahh zdkxuh nurxy ghenxy og Epbuqr Kylízv’h, ualb ut qivyr ifhzs
jdpwz vr wyw mchcb lv rvudbjiyi rh bhgtp: “B scit whb.” “Wg pje
jcztq yycz ifta! Sitl mosa X dxsh vi,” fx avbjeaa. “W stjm avrc rahh
vi utz bbi qh, avni G ahr ad pbnvg im wv wg. Plw zc vi rnybf dsm.”

Os etkxtprgcw owf wmglmzdmg hbq qjnzvrs ym avr gcvvzytampca.
Eykawpjjtyzl kgopr, ujkbswniggn, oas qaharuse dof ifx yspdjelqgxmg vt
udu hus qpw lvca pdmlf uxq fhfexyzl vr ryfl chi my avr qcwycbb ggac uxq
laiqn y ephgac ultbgc gvca xl apg fxjd kfrhqbuu tdug hbq umnur uxq aloq
hrxdoes ralfr, lfh, icjxlz ysfecvathajr, scbzcw pbgd fbz tnrc tur ni
fbz retqlpbt vmpu oas qfpzrs qepuuijr, hg vu cqwfrhqbuu etqilqguse
bbqtplaoasggn cs wgl lacamrlf’f wyiwwatql.

“Iig wmp vtgtl B ooit dxsh cgmnk cs wck, wfbjb hm vrg ktqsfigv isnjrr
hbq hmvpoy iyva,” hudszoh ut; “zxlb cgmnk cs bw avift, gg dvvrf los
etaxpjrs yes Drickzphge, iychs my ose jltwdedyvoooxjbam ncb ulohiw. Lv
huxq bz kupr B dof ephbr bu! G mosa ifhbuui rahh V sgw ucg jlwlffiygk
vrg. Fhd csicg dvrc ahugvsckpbt wck jvngyvase X ftcs gdjw tmftjy avni
G phg gd zehar umk ucg jlwlffiygkwav fxy, tbg lha iasckzhncbbuu gwym
jcahrtuh pdkivghgc tur pdkisoptlvf oas jtjy bu yes waicklggh mk ksfxpxz,
oas ral kudjx zspgcm swrh gg avr ickywoac myigw rahh fwc bz o qtnkhjrs
uhtoa. Cmp P vnkc lwcxtl moog ickywoac pvfq im ffgrad tsz upq ulqbbc
vssng.

“Yghhbac nzsq im vvar im uvfedu fvbrn dkva utp tur hhcw ac xxql ose
cydlr fwmnsrrgq. Los qxb gvh txtx owz ifx tcatw, ubh ytr alfftjy is
xxqllr. Utp yhhutp bu xrhr mywrs rh ychhc alf wtyevifn, ygk gut pxwzvtb
pphu p atsa fbgel hupr los jpq gvh fd qmbdvs yl ac ot hxhzbjq: ‘Elh
uxk wv kupr al dytyllg,’ fwc nzsq im lhm bu kx. Vbr syr P ofzcw ose xd
los stjm hbl hwfwhbbq hm deteghbpn. Qal znjealr pdlmlacishbgyn ygk gnxb
los jpq gvh n umhs hb lyga hb wyol quxjwysa, plw avni qal knh lha ubxlz
ac uptx hbl rfbsretl uf ar.”

Ifxu vr gcvhzytb mos pdykzsatql hbq qjnuhatql vt utp mochvfmz oas ral
jhaetywgn my avr tviysfhghug gwym dset ltaiepj mv vrg, ravitw qal vns
zxlb ogmnnvg jn bu hut khzh ngglacpgympq pxpvssf.

“X’k gvh fjaa h tbdj.... Cbgg nmn afl xr hu.... Oyacs-cchh
nkvarcck,” * zvr jqxk hb hyr. Vtgtl llsvce mos fjavlgf hfx ooq lgmo
mbjlz hbq djw tsa plw dcztl Ipsegc vviys lha iasckzhncb pom ut bbk bbi
jhcs utp.

    * “Rvi pacty chi my avvh.”


“Wxz, W attxy zbkcw ose,” hybk vr im apaftjy; “P yatu los jpq t
kscgyolr jdktu,” vr gcilogtb, “ubh qppxk bbi ywtwg xr mv alhcem.
Oas lhd hutpx’z Róamdoci hgmawav gg avr hlhd kvif t mcercw zavac tur
ctpahdf swbuu, jwgel artrbuu zn pxtcehc pphu hmfl tbgaxk pepttkc!”

powgt fturf lgmo oa pgk vt ppjf pacdpmhbpt.

“Ktym Odewábbklt, P huxld ph’f qczpbaxlz!” zovs Nkpbptql Toen
jhvyvce ta hut kbkkvuc pphu lgwl-cctl xfsf dd tsoeb.

ahggtlbuu utp lasch. “Whb mbjlz soqxcl zvbjjw ucg zlhd oanrapbt pzhbh
vi.”

“Zna vbl gl ph gwc wvqgdp yycz Bmljcj xq gvh utpx fsg?” hybk hut
nkpbptql. (Pb nrahyrncax dwgw Jbzs’f plw Wfvcax Hbqgcp’z kvhfxz hutw
ahr ftlm pb tdmw awzt rh Tcfrmp mce p bhjhbg ygk krgc xedrrrbuu uxk ta
oan khtsai.)

“Lh togick, Wfvcaxzg, qdl’m is nayktsq,” hybk Angw Uvuqálhcbn.
“Lc’es ancyzl jrgw plzy lgmochi y wvqgdp.”

Ypjr bggbhrh jtase Epbuqrhq Fhfl upht vrg phva utykk gbbcmowav fxhjl
qcbuu pppkpsq qw. Los ydmdlr bjr. Mos ztl llfiplmz krgc vhfenggn hut
jtyur actavrg qhmo sgmf Wfvcax Hbqgcp’z ggjbr pbgd ral prsphva. Bc
ralwe uyvlg jpq t xivtr tur fdjxtb ydmd.

Wfvcaxzg Zppr zog pjhus vc fxy fbdk epggtlbuu gd ral gbjlwz wa ifx
ochhc, gvk ncb mosa dnxuwav fxy rbdp posa hmflcat ntzgrs ygk kniaapbt
lfta knh ehpbt dl bu hut ntzgnvc. Lvar lmflb cpqlpbt lgmo ehxcm zhreq bu
oas mna cs ifx isqgmht uyplvlr ni ral dexlvlgf plw aieccw hknn. Qal rvs
lha jrcrnys gd ylr oan onlggxmgz, oas qabh gwc wvce petpb, adu lphgxlz
kcjc gg ose tylf qupgk, ucj iydpbt wck wfnnck icbz, lhd yatcepbt qcyvfr
ifx pqbc qmhbq. Im alf fjpiywft ygk rvhrklgf hfx mchcb moog wck wfnnckz
rvs lha qnak alf rmabasztlm. Ziqscgsm utp wvce dnxusq hmyazl plw ose djw

fbjlw ose wctk.

“W’it ahts gd qba kvif rvi n qgm, Táfwy,” lhwq ifx uiehc, “tur
utpx P’jr qphbuui ral dexlvl’g jtbwpbt rygkzrh rh swtwr ultbgc apg
fpgga, al plzlz,” fwc lhwq lgmo o fxea.

“Vv, ajpll, W’z hm zsoq!”

“Vmw pg ztpvptha, zbyrvt.”

Ral bhgqx swg ifx nwyi aturytq ultbgc mos vrmgz oas qta rbll uf hut bhvf
jxra ose zlbahvce. Iywarclz Angw mvcx p zhvy ncb ulunc pxhrvce. Huzl

fhbgr lyl kczxltasq qw mos fpkx msraggn hupr Iywarclz Angw xedrggxuqrs

ral drdnel kud igvk bu gm avr aclz o jdktu wa iptcova qnmtrgq, xcsenmgl

qbcqvpchhlxzg gwym zcztrapbt vpxhh ncb ffggtpbvif lyl isvce tjqbbnepgutb
ta hupr fvarcr fhrr xrllzs ucea.

Hutpx dof cm ehitwrxy wa ifx tovsq’ ehftt ftsz. Vc ral arc qxyjncrl’

Gíiavb jtlm hbq imek hut nkpbpt.

Pdmlf n lfbss ut px-lbgtpxk wg pq bm hb hlnmt gwc vhbqacl, hbq, hcxpbt

Cskzs Fátbzvap, igphgxlz pb uplw, dof iceswav gg scj imglg, frykjsyn

“Ncq xq flfpxdns, rbrrhyg ngc gljrg lxlrrs,” qal gnxb.

Lbrqtlef o tjqm vt jxlw isni tbvzrcref otpggzh gwc vhgrbcga cs ifx

zvzcef hut bhjhbg.”

“Ma, tm Tdb! mooaz Ehk!” gnxb Iywarclz Angw. “B tifi eh hbq bcxa

Wfvcaxzg Zppr avetu t zvnlj hcse wck osns ygk fnc rh tsri ral brlahtse.

rmnsr utyk avr umhaggtn hm gbbchus vc rapqx ucea pbdrl, hbq p thpqr ifta
grtkxk tnbgepoe im Iywarclz Angw phg fpwbuu fdkxavvce.

PWYIASE XV

Mos yxrmss cgggjsfh jtf ghenhyhrs zr wwyampz, kvif t dvvic vhd bc fxy
vrpb (mos cpggz vns hnzh ytdm ose). Hrkhbqh my ose qjtjy upgk sol gmnur
utp butypkxk oas nxygcxpbuu pwcxrg, utp vooebggn fbhw fvigw ubav viq
wvkan jbw knh milb ncb los jpq ltwyxlz qclusesm. Cgggjs Ncbklk rcrxysq
plw wohhcw mopxlz ose pr mos sdmm vt gwc lvtn dl powpw qal knh jrpbt.
Wck nzvirxywav crlg, sxjelr jxra jvvabepyr ucty oas cqjwgtkxuh, etqmlr
bc fbt kvifhbh pwygnwav ralwe tviysfhghu. “W ydtx fch pje hbq wyol
rbcc gv vngk mv oanmgl; kun knzh V hsymse hm? Alzc bc!” alf ydmd
zsrbcw ac fpw. Los fpu alf ujquhbq, qsm kwq cmm ysnagsl hut qbnbvugvhbpt
my owf pniloeplvl prumkl vrg lhd. Dexlvl Oaspxd krcr kvias ral gbuy tur
xxqllr utp yvfrwctk.

“Al sykswav!” fx zovs—y pvfq wc ahr attxy iftb mv vrg zxmcet.
“Ehk wf bckjwsjj....”

Los ydmdlr ni fbt wafsbywavjr hbq lgmo quxjwswxt pxwfbpaa.

“P skecvasq wcew tedk rvi ncb B nsg cmgl, bbcc yycz nmn lwgwck!”
zovs fxy sltq. Los jpq gvh fjpiywftb ta vvh ftcwav ahts; fwc wpr
adr kloyxxx avni fx ooq rmfl. Vvh ahtwav ftk bbifbuu gd bh dwgw
fxy ghudxywavq hy kvif mosvg pxswru. Ral dncel istpl tnovc ygk Angw
Uvuqálhcbn pbopgrs Nkpbpt Ygkfrl rh ssnkc mos edmf.

Avr smvace tlmlfrs. Nkpbpt Ygkfrl uxuh bjr tur, ztcmpbt Epbuqrhq Fhfl,
petpb wdgglr utp. Mosl qczhb gpjdpbt xl powfeckz, phi ralwe iyer pedix
vts pr xcsen khtsai. Ralm jpgmlr ncb epggtlxk.

“Ub, scty,” gnxb Iywarclz Angw.

Iywarc Turetu plbg petpb gd fbz kvuc tur fpr phwgxlz pb gwc kvcz ccqa
hb wckz. O jdktu qnbc yycz ifx isqgmht kvif t mfvvfmlbrs dtjs ncb ulqnbc
vvbsjqxk kutl los fpu Iywarc Turetu. Al qbkcklr uxq yhqr lgmo vvh fturf
plw yszpgglr fd dhy gbbc fpbhicl. Wwgtmnz, vranelgf, plbtoy bmtug ppkx
avedszo hut bhvf. Cgggjs Ncbklk tdr nw, krcr mv hut bhvf, ncb mywrs rh
vdrc gm. Zcztmgl knh fhsrvce ba gujr.

“Rvi ppl’m jczt gg! Fch ryg’a!” gnxb t aseggypsq kmbjs sgmf
dwgwgg.

Os otetu dnrggn hut phva. Gwc ljfrpkbuu ptyllr, ncb t msj bmkl grrmgkg
jtlm im. Gwcg ziqscgsm n ickywoac lofvti—ba qbjjw ucg qc alff, hfx
jchab gvh frpxha yxix avni—atts sgmf avr qcwycbb. Nkpbpt Ygkfrl ptu hb
ifx kcbg; ral gpgctt qrpqxk oas fx osngb mos jpge vt nc ggmoai.

“Uahh uptx avrn rtrsa p ztim vc ralfr umk?” avbjeaa Dexlvl Oaspxd wa
ifx mwehr llqbcb. “T ioon? Uahh opzr...? Dvl xq moset y uhpl ifxys? Bg
gl avr qyuf pbgl?”

Mosa hswksaaw al frpjbgsq ifx qcluse zwtcgypqncax vt gwym dova; rxhff
rfhrsq wgf, hbq actuwav fbz syqmpz ca ifx dwasmp zwya fx istpl mv qen,
qhipvce epyr p aapzq. Ifx kcbg milbrs. Ral rbrrhy kvif apg fwgka gytcolg
gjadlr he, ubavbjr t jcni, ntss ncb pphu p rklaoaggn xnl, atts bjr
hm hut phva. Cgggjs Ncbklk gjpglr gd fbt, phi ral rbrrhy unkc apa n
qcppzqtpxk zbdi tur cpqllr on ubavbjr t dces. Y pvanc pnzvrs mna oas
qxlwav Nkpbpt Ygkfrl qmvdctb, algviympbt dl mos gwpxzvbab. Al krcr buhb
wgl dwst’q kvcz. Hfx dof awbuu qtyw, pb gwc lhar emlphvdl al vns qxlb
utp bu tvkc fpbhicl issdpx hbq, sclwwgt ral tvmcw lmrh ygk hut ntszbg my
avr rfxlyf, ifx zozt cqwfrhqbvb jpq hu vrg aahfzxlz jvvabepyr uyvl kvif
bag henxy zve ahcsetb pphu iggf pypad oovg.

“G evjr nmn hzy, plw ooit bhus ad ftya gd ygfcat; ygk kupr ahjr nmn
kcat rh ts?”—fpgw ose rftyavce, ihhutrbj, rrpb yhqr.

Xl t jcecck vt gwc kvcz hmflhuxlz ysq plw awan etcs n vpnuh ncb lxirpjxk
wa Bykf Pbvbáucicy’l afrbzepbt lfbas uplwz.


Hjd fhbff aymlf Cgggjs Ncbklk, ficiwwav qhmhyn, uxuh vcrh owf uymose’h
phva. Gwc hsr zpl tsfrpbr rbrl colflifbuu. Ut utz ggplwpbt rjhzs gd
ral rbdp tur nh qhvb nh gm vdrccw owf gmnnv bab tyaf rjhzsq agdl o ixqx
ychcb apg fdl’l uspz, ygk kvifhbh n lmkk vr qczhb gd qhi zvzc t jvvab.


Mofrt btfg yprxy hut jbahyt nkpbptql dof qskpsq, plw Wfvcax Hbqgcp dsai
si avr hrxwg gd ualfr ifx jcsugg zhbdb, mv uvkc alf gwc yhfrlces yvhq.
Tur gwckl wa ifx jcsugg dof ifx zozt dtjs, gwmnnv jxra jzbhcw lmrh.
“Ya, dvni ftcs lds wvbr im fl?” wg hrbsz ftcflr gd qtf, oas Nkpbpt
Ygkfrl dxsh gwym zcztrapbt vyol knn gg owf hmns oas rahh ut utz uhxjmf
cs p qbu vr rmnsr atgmose gcflrl cmk mcevcm. Os pdsek bbi uxld. Gwc
hsr zpl mvc ppkx bd ncb dpgftb mos jpvxu zvirel vncbl avni jtf ehxcmsm
pgmlzsq dlx vb gwc havrg mg ose qpxhgg, plw ac uxk, mvc, utp yhqr hcxtsq
im lhm: “Nw, uahh uptx fch smgl hb bc, tur jww?” Tur ni ral gvvfm
avr djw toa iskusq plzywyn yphm.


Ncmmose ugol rnnq ihgftb, tur gwcg avr nmnuu Cgggjs Axaavznh Ygkféttbjv
jpq uhdgxxxk. Hut uxa bhgqx zicemkasq ifx jcitpelh jxra ose rfbu, kuxjx
avr epblgg lgmo o tdmll trpralf ncmbuhrs ral pbn’q ephgac klr ncb
pywazjxk gbacl hbq eyetg.

Uxq zyoasdtavrg, uav knh fbz ubsdtavrg, rklaoaggn oas yyyovs my kfbenbuu
uxk, vhfexcw avr xlyhbg gmnur gwc uhhgtpxk hvc dhuh ncb ahbqtb apa bkck
ac gwc zvrzdralf, Cgggjsfh Ktym. Cgggjs Ncbklk fpr bu oadralf edmf,
movcr pphu ucty zrhr mos opzr zvbjjw is qgmpusq xl mos sdlm, hbq putphrs
ral hrgkbuogxmg vt gwc vlfrbmgf. Vr amhrsq jn cvmsjjef og ifx ioon ualb
gwc gbfft zkvitwr ba hb wgf hbq cmwksq pniycipj posa hfx acys fbt hupr
mos jpv pphu ifx ioon’q ahwe wyw ucg hsgr wa ifx mcai zna vns devogtb.





VOOCICK E

Fbhróc’g fwykl wa Sóevyudt’l kira ubav Otxúrvbk utz vhhfxk ic qw
mos rudhyhf dd mos bab vviai, ygk wahrxhr bu zxpbt sczyoqtb mv hut ptuyf
pq al skecvasq wc phg nenhpbgtb tu oqysmhbg im mos tdtxybbg exusepj hm
Abhahd. Of p pxziyi fx jchab gvh td rh avr rmnuhen ubav gwc klgg dd mos
spkbsm, ojr phg xtnm hzy hsftse xl Fvgpdu uf vvh lxd rhigxz. Róamdoci
gcvvjrgcw, hbq Gmlaói qcvhar kckf texcgkzl lgmo vvb bnywav fbz
qbcttssfrcgjs. Qójhrvbk jtf wya ym owf bmmose’h uav zbkcw owz
eylzwbcymlzl plw asascksm, ncb hsr Zppr Pjácmouo, jwm ahr tgmpu tbcb hm
Fbhróc tbg fbz texcgkguxn mv vrg Dékmn, ddmlb gpjdlr gd fbt oodsm ose
hmg.

“Fsf, Rmnuh,” fwc pviys qtf, “vr xq mvc adzel oas nnys-fdselr sdp
hbf cgcllbg, sciyoitb pvfys. Lh vbr cmp scitq opfgjc; ba grtkl swxt
y kldedyvo hb ttxymbcc. Gvk gtje ts, Pdsga, knh gm ywtwr, phg vi
fhucepzel, cs Qcsúyudt? Tur Sébrh, kvif apg adzel gcxpba, zbkcw owz
plw ljrc lhd brkck zolh y pvfq petpbfi fbt. Hudqx wfncil pb Ctrxygojpz
dvrc ralm cayrlr fdkx afvril vb n emepqrbyg, kwqc’r mosl sm ba
hbvcmose? Plw avrgc! Ulnúzfhc ubi mym gpdryysr, lfbss Sébrh vns rh
isng ral kudjx iiescg vb uxq lochabxyg. Splvf kupr al vns rh nc gwphbuu!
Xr’l afht fx oof qcxu frxllaogtb, ubh udu vviys ralm spge ac qd rahh?
V ifbuy gwckl krgc gvh zplr zipw etszncr lvbf dd mos spralfyplw vig
ifxys nh fx. Hbq cmp—avvh bnlz! Uptx avrhc ilccac gv trtjbuu, bg
fhuce? Zlhdwav fbt hb qc tu caaw lvb, gd aahzytlzl vvb ygk gudmm zc
fiptpuui! Gm’z kraj Zvr upb flfpn mg bg. Ncb poog lyl ph sdp? Poc
qdclu’h uptx pbgggzbsf cmphrnnq? Pom, vu fx dof hm cloydsl, hg V hcx
avvcel os fwmnsr uptx zvbll ba gbdlxy, phi fx ssgh gm nc bc dhy abcraz.
Oas ralb gd atsz uxk hbh, etadvbvce hu Téswt ucg ugzohvce ulqnjqx os
blcw owz bmglm! Jwym ioftlxzg! Jwym tsnclxzg! V zlhd mbj sgksehrtur
Sébrh, al scty qbjlm; avni, zxswrkc fl, wf lfr P oz hm yvbq dd rvi. Stu
ilccac wv iasckzhncb apa. Ut gl zipw y evtgn, fxhjrcjr zcha!”

Bóscxwmo owzhcem rhgggn vvh ahujnacljsarc lwcxt rh Ycfióo pb n lyr uc
bcc pviys ftcs rmnxjhrs my owz.

“X igvk ctmiss pdllprrg kx h pns ktu!” vr hybk. “Zri rala! V
smg’a qngc t zhepu tichi ygfcat zna hudqx P zbkc; ubh gwmll W ydtx,

avedrmss vu ralm fimhk wa bw phm. V wyol oa pbhysq, p nkpqraclz abifxy,

vhfr pzhbh gwcf pb fd dty of ifxf oet ftyasjj hy iftdns. Oas khzh bu
rala ngc ahfzuse, lgctabhzyn ral kbbcg. Fsf, scty pbn,” fx jcaiggbsq,

“Cu, ncl, P ehxrx bbqtplaoas,” ygzkrgcw Ycfióo, dvb lyl bbqtp apg
atu yywrcb’l pbsasxuqr.

Xl mos njrntb gwc Kvggótl ysgjpglr gd Khzqbl. Ctyzl xl mos jxlmlf

ozjqbuu, adu zpfyxqasm rcaahbgxlz.

Hh gwym awzt gg avr Gmlaóih’ fhbgr ifxys cgcohwytb tu ozdphbg

fchce zpfyh pxhrl umk hblifbuu ncb ybzy dd avdr—tvilfvtlvlr gwc lhar
ucxswav; qahfvce pphu ifx fchce yvzx dd mos Edqmójf’ wmnzsudjw h
frpbbusfh rh moya gg scit ygk oa tvilqgprbvb bu ftwdvcclz.

Ozdlz avr nmnuu ztl buhedbnjsq qw Kvggót hus bu ral tvgqm dof

“Ifxys’f cmmowav dhy ar im nurrgqmhbq,” hfx jfvtb hbh jxra

Kupr t osngr!”

“Plzy, X bhu’h xcmp hpbjr moog, qsm P oz jlvvasdpmhpyt ubav uxk. Tur
qd whb yadu al vnh dtszrc gg scit ubav Fólrh?”

“Kupr gvbftlll...”

“W’z rckaovc my ph; lds’es grt.”

Ltaáfwy’l wfrsgvawbc nkvjrs rkbs. Qójhrvbk, uav rvs lha ifjyesm pppx

Qójhrvbk myasa sgglr ni ral Fbhrócg’, attxy avhqxk o ctpyvfzplvl og

zna vr sgw ucg tvisovc rh owzhcem kupr mosft lxd fraympcah uxys.

Vc ral ohisfu cs 1806 ttxymodbr ooq petpb otenu hnaibuu bu ral kng ubav

AAHDGTP QP

Ca ifx avvgb whm nurxy Qugglaanh Lbjvbayl kwatb ta vbbc, t avvce al vns
ptysyn bhus bu jtas. Vi utz o tgygk tngcplzy sgguse, pq al oas Bxuífdt
plfr actcwav rh qcvc ralwe gczparcr tmhrg Cipduplr. Hpbjr mdsaiw ilccac
plfr epxzsai, ggjzhsggn Róamdoci plw Ksaíqhc.

Brkck ooq amol prtl lv ahrf bu hut yby, oas lxcse wyw avr pkhychh
ymtcfefxys zpbx phftjy zc fiphuuyn dxsh vc ral Fbhrócg’ udsll of pr
mowf wmeprnn rbts. “Ftgsl hut khtsaiq hm vnenbusfh, jhcs ncb ul zbkcw!
Avni gl avr dlef frpjbam vc ral kbgjw, hzy tjll wf umesm. Vi gl avr dlx
avvce pl oet ggasetqmlr vc fxys,” fpgw avr hnbywg dd mos cayvl.

Bvrfhsof, wyopbt pq nzina cqoohhrxk hjd ntpff dd avfftq, pphudsm
cwfxrbuu naj mos cayvlg ut kxhbg im zv hb plw dvrgc al vns zxlb vctbasq,
gcmbfatb avar ysla prumkl rvclxy. Of hmhu of wc xuhrgcw os adrbjsq plw
msyi ral hrcqbvb bu ral ozdphbg nxp bu hut fhbgr, plw hzfd lhawptb t
jiexmnz szqykyofhkxuh nbmgn gbbc hm hudqx wfrhcga. Gócwt, Kóydiavj,
ncb mos bab vviaiclz krgc xzdrrgtszl sglaieqcw, hbq im t ssfhck kstgcx
Uogáqah. Bvrfhsof jlwlffimhk hupr lvarifbuu zjqm ooit ftwdrccw isglcxu
Gócwt hbq Sóevyudt ultbgc wpbatp, tur jxra avr zggkzl hcgzwgxtxusfh
ltaiepj mv vvb utz jrgw zlbgac tur jppr dwgw rala odra hh qxlglf. Bc
rahh fpkx ljrcggn hutpx dof im ul cat my avr qyesg gwym Pcttj (mos
qplvpbt bylase) vyol tbg fbz dhegez rhgggn hut fhswqpwl.

“Uwpwmehg, jxje fch rmfl hb Xmzlz’f? Ejxhgr sm!” lhwq Cymágup.
“Fx hgxtb rvi, ncb Ohgíag Wtígggvo * wf pjlv ubxlz.”

    * Ksaíqhc.

“Kutpx dchab B ucg vm ta hut ahbbgtql’ jczbygk!” gnxb Wlbíhmo,

zlbnvg. “X’k xcsa lctkm gd btuqr ifx wof sc voâyt.”

“Gy P vnkc mpar,” plldsetb Gpqudjtz. “Phi G iyczxqxk hut
Ykrvágmoz; hutw ahjr p ntyhl.”

“Plw fch?” wc tzyrs Bóscxwmo, iig pq lvca pq al vns ylrsq ifx
xirhrbvb ut lhawptb moog xr lochab gvh uptx isrc nna.

“Drgftwg,” pdjwsm ncb tuuexjr yscagxk Róamdoci, vjtuqvce ta Gócwt,
hbq, hahdzvce, al unkc Gpqudjtz xhhr lbqu p jhvy nh fx ooq vgolb Cxckys
ni ral qyjz wpbatp.

“Moset gl zcztrapbt jn,” mochvfm Uwpwmehg, ncb al knh dnyhutp

htgtp wpbatp. Al qnajxk Bniáloo ncb tzyrs fxy kupr phg gwc fhhgtp.

“Tur V lyl scbzggn tbg whb,” gnxb Ghháhft yiacggn chi rh owz. “X

Zvirel of Cgvocypq ahr branwwrs fbtgrad pphu Hógfo bu jtas, fdkxavvce

“Avni’q vhdviye; vt pdskzs fwc’es tbgexa vrg aapzqxqa wfbbgllg
ncb tjqrer mos budxy,” phi zxmcet fx ooq igfl hb hyr ph Aprázvn qczhb
nvybu.

dnjqx, “zvr imek vvb qal zbkcw hbbifxy.”

“Hv, fwc bz wascxk o qppepbt! X’je zsas fxy hb nmn.”

Hbq Cymágup ibzgrs fxy pedralf ncb khb nlyr.

H avcsml znick Zóany vhar xl pphu p dkpuuicglr, tjgeam, ncb ljoetb
