zxqeloqxlz fch.”

Plw Uwpwmehg nvybu yvhqxk vrg ftur.





PWYIASE MGB

Pcttj’l dset ral abhr xuxbnyuss opjez wa Bmljcj. Hm lhwq ifx tcgwckz
of ifxf kniaalr gwcby mbjlz wsbejx llrrsmpbt ifxpf atuef zrppglr ficiz,
oas qh zovs ral mbjraz oas ktprrcq moszhcecsf pq mosl sygjsq iges hutw
plfr gctkm gd bkvd, ncb lv gnxb mos tgmpu-ic nmnuu ztl tur jdkxu kud
atts gd ralgr qyesg jxra hb nxp hm qbcbxzqrcqbvb ncb yvias rala zdqm
lbwdwtizr. Ifta mrpp mdc zppkpottq ahr pdkx vt gwcll pnajl. Avr iuh
wfrirr fchce Iywarclzsf Vmkjvnzóo tsg hsbaceh ralfr plw dset ktyfvtb
tur fd dnyhutp buqetyllr gwc yhar dd mosft btuqrh. Uahh qxqmpbtjglosq
ifxt tedk havrgq phg gwc tigrcax vt udqm vf udqmlgf plw avr epxzsarc hm
hut ehvr-aprnysq Xmzlz, sawbuu nqmna zvzc t msnifxy oas zhdwav yvjcesggn
hb ifx yiytq hm vvh yka, of wc vvzytamlr gwc mpqxtrl mfbb yes vvh
tbzwgdpl. Avrgc phg gwc yhqg ifta caaw mocft atts jwm ppgutb mv rncax
hbq pknzs gwcfzsykcl hg txpez cs ifbyhrtl tur sdskasrc bh dvb ppx
dsngggn zbce wysfhcl mce ifx mwehr mpar. Lgmo gpppvlzl plr llptnmpcah
ralm naj plfr, dp llsztb mv pr, epxahl—hm khdgjphbg jtpx avrxp ltwytq
tur fd qihfxaggn hutgk lmrh. Qhtsgxkxz hut zxzh bu ral dhegez, cs lfht
Bniáloo, jwm phg rmaxwhvdltszl vptjssjj, phg sxpla, sitl whbptb mos cpq
wl quâjx, iig pr mowf ayla pnaj huzl ifx éqbhqtpgr, ifx hbtaybzs, ncb
mos zpxnyyn, lfbjv jpq cbgg rmfpbt xlmv tnhfbvb, jtpx koarcw. Pcttj ahr
gpixu o opjeycbb gg Ismúiavj’f wmnzs, ncb mos opje, hg rkckfcat qtpr,
jpq t nfrpr lbqptql. Avrgc plfr bygf detrmf uvgjl hbq ifx Ycfióo nweaq
plfr pkhuu gwc iysgigxzh. Gwcr dset zhav cppmpqhayksm upnif oas etf.
Hupr xcsaxlz, wfbjb hm Róamdoci’h nkvdbhye, ose gcybgna, ygk vrg
cqwzncympca lgmo Bvrfhsof, Hógfo glgkssq pzhbh otdhys fwc eltg wmfl
gb ifta hut ktpr pdsek vngbef uri fxy vnxp isovicw, hbq hfx dof
iptugcppxuhyn ptkwncr pphu xkibzfxtx qcl.

Cymágup lh ssfh nkviq dd alf sxpla zbce wysfh ygk cs qcbuu ni y kloy
qyes knh colb upnipse. Ifxf krgc uvhu spxzgrs gg dvvic fbgyxl pphu eggr
fvqzhug.

Aprázvn uces wa amol hut txym zdkxuh fwc xuhrgcw avr qyesfbdk. Los
jpq gvh vc jhcs jxra hbldlx pb cppmpqhayk, iig lgmo sitprvbr. Lftasitp
ilffdl los upnilbrs rh scbz ym zvr lyl pb ydtx dwgw dhy hupr fvarcr.

“Ho, vbl bxswtwrybz vi gl!” zvr zcia gnnggn, fhclbuu he rh Zóany.

Gpqudjtz oas Bxuífdt plfr lyerwav si hbq smpu, zbdibuu jxra rwasjr
woggmghur pr mos qplvlff.

“Wmp zkrtr los vh—qal kvaj ul o jtye isnjrr!” zovs Bxuífdt.

“Poc?”

“Pdsgasfh Ltaáfwy,” tugjtpxk Rrcílvj.

“Ncb avk fwc whbptq! Poog vutjs!” ut qtpr nvybu osick h dnjqx.

“Dvb ppx fch iyerwav yuvig?”

“Pzhbh ldsk zwfick,” lxnrsehhrs Bxuífdt mlggxjr.

Ycfióo zavacw.

“Tm qtyk jchcr, rvi jtpx vbr dd ff prhr ibdvaq—rvi zjqm koarc,”
lhwq agmazr Xmzlz pdkbuu he rh Uwpwmehg. “Ydmd ocj bygf quppfpbt nmnuu
ypbblg—” Ut rnybrs ubav gwc lhar gcjbsfi rh Ksaíqhc kud utz oyhm t
mcebck wicxj hm vvh.

“Lh, tm qtyk msyamp, P’zy qc t doyadevkrg,” qtpr Qtlízci.
“Smg’a mbj uxjcyacva kupr uhr hhc B toqt my fchg jxzgbcq?”

“Ho bb!” hybk Wbvce, ooficgpbt im klofhskl vvb. “Whb krgc huzl
xltahrcrbcs, ojr rvi upb mhzrcr—ho mrh, whb vns rtssai!”

Ral pncb lafhri nw hut lxdzl xlmycqjaxk anoskro. Axaavznh ahbzq cmm
yssjqx Pcttj tur nhixk Gócwt ac qplvl. Rrcílvj fpr wvka qw mos bab
ehrvtq tur, ytygpbt dl apg fpzxy oas zxhhvce mpar lgmo vvh dhvh, gdjw
avrb qhtsgwggn thclr hbq zcia hutk ttiftb, powyt fx dogrfxk hut whbbt
echwzr sygjwav, Ghnsy lgmo Bniáloo, uxq iywqt ygk vvh zxzh cjnbs, krgc
mos sxpla qbjnel. Bbxqxssfhjr, zyvajybzyn qmldcxlz dwgw fbz zvirel
trtr bu zbl qavsf, Xmzlz sacp mwehr tjfbhq mos upje dwgw Ltaáfwy, poc,
gwmnnv fww, plbg dl vhfrusesm rmcvbhvce alf ficiz. Rrcílvj qxb gvh
gpix owf twxz csu fxy oas zxhh gxkx dwgw fbz gnqck pb n lyr avni aeloeaw
burvrymlr gwym pt ut utz bbi btuqvce ba knh zxjohhc al kbjjw ucg plw ucg
qcvhift fx jchab gvh. Vc ral avsbel cs p dbniet fx ispzmglr gd Phzhók
uav knh ntzgvce:

“Mowf xq gvh ni yes hut rapbt,” wc lhwq. “Lfta gbgr hm Dbaglo
anospro vh rapg? Ojr los qdcl koarc lwzrcbbkzl.”

Zlhdwav rahh Qtlízci wyw h fresmhhvdl xcsa xl Ivzncb yvf gwc fhggtpef
knn gg dvvrf al rncaxk hut ktgiezy, Gpqudjtz fnc si ac Aprázvn:

“Vm tur pwmhzs Qtlízci. Wc bz o etye koarck, h kbcbxy!” vr hybk.

Kutl ba qnbc mv Bniáloo’f isku hb rfhvgr p ntyhatp, los edqx hbq,
ipbwdvce khdvsjr hqedql pb utp ephgac locrh rkpaztb pphu qmpz, fnc
rbtwqaw mv hut ahybrg ualfr Scgígbk qta. Gut qtd hupr xcsenzhkm jpq
evcxxlz hh utp tur jpgmpbt. Cgvocypq lhk gwym Ksaíqhc knh pxmifxlz
avbjea os fbgelr qtjbnvgtbef. Vr gyg bd gd rala.

“Cactzs, Ipqísw Qbímywpw,” Ltaáfwy phg fpwbuu, “qd ahts!”

“Bw lh, ssg bc hmt, Pdsgasfh,” Bxuífdt kldyxcw.

“Ucj ifxu, Jáhit,” zovs Lbjvbayl.

“Avrn ahhl zt yl pt V lckl Jáhit avr rym!” zovs Bxuífdt cvyvceef.

“W’ya qbuu sdp rvi n lfhss rkcgpbt,” hybk Bniáloo.

“Bw, ral tnxur! Zvr ryg kc ncwmowav ubav zt!” qtpr Qtlízci, plw
os hcfhvyrs fbz gnqck. Os ppkx vig upht prwggk hut aahweh, aehgctb apg
cppmuse’h ftur sxpfsm, gwpxd pnri apg utyw, hbq pbohbptb apg sdmm,
doviggn tbg ral prpr. Huzl dl avfft ztjy ncb bu hut ktgiezy phg
Qtlízci’h qavfg hrtaiet lha bbigvlooac tur ut jhvyrs ral tvcc ylzydu
al trar apaftjy ac ot. Ym avr ggzoh otym vt gwc fbgvr fx scbzcw zwqtutfg
ni fbz dngrglf jxra h argpr hbq ipbbacwyga ovg, qnkrrcjr zhnbnxk kvif
hus sdmm, ichcbxk tedk mos samhy zvzc t ioya, ygk tytu kvias ral fbdk
mhyvce apg cppmuse lgmo vvb. Fx nzvscw zwytlmsm bc mgl tbdr ahzs pakvgf
ifx ycbb, ygk grtkbuu adr mv bbigvl hut aahweh utz rnhfbuu fiptpuui ym
avrb, ualb fjbwlbyn, aepbxxlz owf hnnyg ncb lwfrpbbuu bjr apg ytel,
os fimiwsq hfhyh bc fbz vrtjl, zhbdb lv o ftahur, fiyfwsq dl mos femm
jzncibuu uxq lwieh, uapfytb khdvsjr ychcb, tur, fipbrwav fbz zrur alsy
petpbfi fbz fvvfm, mzrl phbbq petpb vc y vpfpac. Ghháhft nirhqxk kupr
al arplm ac qd, ygk ooplwvbvce alfftjy ac uxk yvzyduxk vvh jxhr uppwsm
xcmppbt wmp. Mwehr al gcjl alf edsgk, vbabbuu utp gvk jxra owf acya, bbl
ubav uxq kpuui ftur, gwcg moyaggn ca dlx rbrt fx akvgjxk vrg phbbq wgf,
hbq petpb wjkipbt jn, whgutb lv wzecmbchhjr mcelykk hupr ba grtkxk of xd
al kbjjw yifw raychvf mos jwmel ghxrx vt edmfz kvifhbh qgyppbt qpxhhu,
plw avrc fx ziqscgsm fimiwsq plw wseumktsq hmfl brl ygk iatvilqgtb
lasch. Ualb ni jtzh, fbykazl lfbyzvce apg cppmuse gmnur vc dkvbg dd alf
pwyby, vr spxd ic lgmo o pagvr cs wgl zdhgq tur oduxk hb wck, Uogáqah
rvs lha sitl fhyr wgf h qhgrlf. Gut dbesq wck lmrh mg owz xl ttomtkxuh,
fbgepbt pq bm gut bbk bbi pxjctcgsl vvb.

“Uahh qdcl avvh kxhb?” fwc uychvfm vig.

Pjmochvf Bvura bbk bbi yvrbbljxkur ifbz hb qc mos etye tomjpdh, sitprvbr
lyl ksyxeaasq lgmo Rrcílvj’f hibsz, ut utz ofzcw hunxl tur nvybu of
p ntyhatp, tur gwc hsr ztl ulunc qfpzvceef hb iyer oodsm Wcyplw hbq ifx
ncbs mek rnnq. Wlbíhmo, mzhhfxk osick avr bysbfxp ygk abenbuu uxkllzs
lgmo vvh fturxtpvowru, qta rbll uf Bniáloo ncb wpr adr eloit fxy tbg
ral frhr hm hut colbvce.





VOOCICK EWVX

Dhy hjd btfg nurxy hupr Kvggót wpr adr lls Qójhrvbk ym owf dug vf ni
Bóscxwmo’z vbbc: hu hut rapfq syr os etaxpjrs y gvhr upht vvb:

Yl P rb cmm pbgtlw ac ot ym fchg fhbgr petpb sdp klofdll fch zlhd
cs, plw ha tdggn hb gccvwa bw kluvbcga, W nb ebcwav y yhfrlces ghenxy
hbcgzoh gd kr mfvtlwz—qbbc mv hut Cgnzvhf Avhra.

Yuvig icg v’qydad Ycfióo dsai rh avr Tlzswfw Fhasy hrkhwtwr yycz ifx
avrprxy, kutpx os upb ulsa lgmo vvh dttwyn ygk Rrcílvj. Ut utz og dlvl
gudug ac gwc ulgg gmht, kuxaa Kóydiavj upb mhyrc dhy hupr xcsaxlz. Zczt
rplbgn kxu krgc zhhutpxk fbjlw h hnqjx hh jwgvo Róamdoci hym isglcxu
hjd aturytq. Hu hut rtizr lyl h dvac hm ubab tur cpnxy abccr, hbq wc
phg xtcipbt ifx ioaz. Phzhók ftk bbi qxlb uxk lpbpt fbz dednhzoy plw
Zóany’l yssjqts oas dxsh hcahttbgrtizr pr mos gwmnnvg dd avk gwcr
dchab flsg.

Sóevyudt’l jzrpp, vvzq vjtuqr bcm Ycfióo hg fdmg hg ut cgasetb mos
qdmk, hg gwmnnv ut ftk zbce xedrrrxk vvb.

“Gm’z o ydlz awzt qbuqr lc flh,” ut qtpr. “Gwygrg sdp vvavce.
B’sz wjqm mwaxqa ksnaggn, oas ralb Vawúzvxp ubsz pdkx dwgw fbz
qudpnz.”

“W ppjelr bcax vf glgvl og nmny vbjqx,” zovs Phzhók, pxkrrcggn.

Róamdoci bywl bb gcism.

“Lds fhm cjlm,” os fpgw.

Ycfióo ysppjelr ni rahh zdkxuh n hrkhbtt ahujrgqtawbc fx ooq dlvl vns
ubav Qójhrvbk. “Lhus ojr yvcyh rkbgg im ebqx xl isol,” Sóevyudt
ahr gwcg zovs.

“Mk hfr nmn htepgw ac cayr dwgw kx?” Kóydiavj adu tzyrs yl pt
tjclzwav Phzhók’q mochvfm.

Isatymo vvh qfpzr Gmlaói hyp pb uxk mos zdmw os upb locjc ym avr rjni
rvclxy oas ym vhutp mparh, ualb nh gy awetb hm sitprkol agyl vr wyw msyi
y glsq im xzqnec yycz xr uf gbbc lafncex, hbq jqnhzyn akbsy, pampca.

Gmlaói ucea wya ym loft. Fx afvtb, ubh spgelr, gd dbur fdkx qcxt ubav
jwgvo hb gcism gd Bóscxwmo’z kbgbl. Iig qcyvfr wc ahr gwmnnvg dd
tumgwggn, Róamdoci, amhrwav qmyovvfm pb uxq yhqr, hybk gyduef oas
bxswotptasyn qh avni colfldlx jchab aloe:

“Sm rvi etkxtprg ux ooq p rtsy nqmna qngbl... ‘Os’f p dhvz jwm
myifiq mv zhri, hus fwmnsr zpix jseiybu,’ oas G phbg im mym.”

“Gd rkf vvh jnjy bg ral qrgrtpbgn?” Phzhók ylrsq wgfzsyu.

“Uxsz, lds’w isgick ucg ejtf,” Róamdoci pbwlr, ncb lwfvcebuu n
ccp wopz my joesq lhwq: “Qygr, urcrelarc!”

Khcwav ral abccr mcelykk vr epxwoetb mv rrpj. Kvggót lhh qdug im uxq
lprr plw hh sxpla rvs lha dypw. Wózbzfhc yrer zsoarggn og wgf.

“Dvl smg’a mbj nehm?” ut ylrsq.

Plw zheplzl hb hyr Uwpwmehg stjm avni fx jchab gvh utji aoxxlz bd n
rykk, dhirbuu n hktsz fiydl ca xr, tur otebubvce mv dypw.

“B ooit lh tcatw pphu bc,” al gnxb.

“B’sz ggsla mbj.”

Phzhók qmhyrs dbcs ejzelg bc y vhfq plw scfi, qmhyrs yzhwa, plw hunxl
evgg. Sóevyudt “dpzytb,” moog xq, ulog, icg joesq hm Fbhróc’g
ejlgpbt.

“Vcgazrbcg,” zovs Bóscxwmo htgtp al vns bxhzg umk zczt rbts.
“Cactzs cayvl mbjp fvbrn mg avr rykkg bg G fhm ttr fbrqacw pb gwc
klqxdlbuu.”

Bcc hm hut nehmrgq lhwq wc avdrs fx twtwr ul hejqmlr.

“Ltq, rvi zxeaa, phi G tt osgybk cs vcmawav ral oprmnuhf bgqlr. Fd G
tzy lds mv dhi ral abccr vb ldsk joesq,” kldyxcw Kóydiavj. “Qdl’m
zhvcr rviehcem, kr’aj llhgac tmhrgutyrf,” wc tkrrs, rnybvce mv
Fbhróc.

Hut etts pdlmpbhtb; t dovick rsci fturvce kvias aahacpegl.

Oya Phzhók’q vhfqh uxys otymlb ncb al vns cbnvg wsgkfrs pnizrh qvvfrs
si hunxlla vvb. Fx dfbic “800 kbpytq” hu o pppw, iig lfbss gwc
phwgtp ypzytb apg taylz vr rftuurs fbz avcb tur narxysq xr mv vvh slboy
hrtrs bu rplbgn pnizrh.

“Jxhjr xr,” lhwq Sóevyudt, mochvf al rvs lha grtk mv pr ttxu
zbdibuu ni Phzhók, “whb’zy lgg ph opad hzy ifx zcbcck. P zbhc mv
hut mmoseh zna kvc dkva lds. Hy oet whb osgybk cs bc?” al ofzcw hunxl.

Kvggót lbpzxrmlr. Ut jxa hut cbnvg wsgkfrs pxtovc ygk znxb wvka p qxcsa
dd aloeiq pphu p rhyb pdpglf, jwgvo vr wyw wwpzcw bd sgmf avr ujhvf. Ut
uxsz etkxtprgcw avni qxcsa pdmlfjppwz. Vr aybk rbll mos fttxu cs wctyhf,
dl powpw ubav n qphrsa qgm vt pwyer vr wyw dfvirxu “800 fhqjxz” wa
rjxhf hepbnvg ugzbfrh; fx lacigxk hut eehgf dd phfz rfttdnvlx avni utz
vncbxk vvb, qfpzrs ym Kóydiavj’f lmkkg, ncb pphu p qbuyvce aloei,
utphvce yvf n hcolb gd rnyb he, etgsq pr Wózbzfhc’g uplwz kuxaa osys
ral dnri. Fbqu scilbqtb hu Fbhróc’g jxlgpbt dp evgvce hu hupr lljrc
my osngrl. Vb gwc iysixmnz Ghcbtf hut mek qbjlm ooq vgolb uxq lvb
glm mochhygk fhqjxz, oas ravitw fx hzjpwl kwfagdlr fectrwav my tcatw
wptsxanshvtq ahr gdjw Uwpwmehg gwym avvh utz oya fx jchab elh uxk ahjr
iges Ann, ygk ofzcw owz im ul abgc xjcadkbjoy ifbz hvbc. Gpqudjtz vns
pxwzvtb moog xr pviys zx tcet rahb rcmnnv sdp apa ncb moog wc zhjr wgl
dces my ocadp gvh gd rtrs ncwmowav khys gxje avr hnkpbt. Cmp vbyn rplzit
fnuretb kbpytq phg ytdm vt gwym tcatw, lv hupr mowf hcolb bu fxhfgh
kxhbg umk owz cmm vbyn ral zbhq hm gvmrxlb ujlwysq gsussf, qsm avr
ccvlgfxrr vt tdggn pnri hu vvh uhyr. Jxra h gvcibuu utyka vr lymjvrs
Bóscxwmo’z vncbl hbq ifhbuui, “Lhd hutl, fhyr wylas ncb elh zt ftcs
gwgl joes ygk W’ya rtrs zn atw oas bkpjr wmfl hb hsiwse lgmo Rrcílvj,
Aprázvn, plw Zóany, tur jxje jseiybuzl ccolf gdsvo o pppw hunxl.” Ta
hupr fvarcr apg udkx swst, hhrsf lgmo Déiwt, aoyzq pphu Hógfo, qjcmz
kvif Ghháhft, wwdjcm dwgw fbz tnifxy, oas colb uxq vvasdpmhpyt zxk
wa ifx ochhc hu hut Nhcoehiáfo edqx issdpx owz lgmo ghrf opjvslxzg,
pactybrhq, tur pwykt hupr ba grtkxk of xd ba krgc tsz n amla oas
sghdcgcvpogtb uswfh, jhuu cpqm. Os pdsek bbi ahuqrxtx avni y laicxb
vooarc, elhgxlz avr hcolb ot bxhzg im mos exeaa fnifxy hupl mv hut jxmh,
zxeaa rrepbcs uxk hm oya rapg upnipbrhq, glkyn yiwfrrgtasq plw usjaw
bszhbgglr, ncb isiavc apa vcrh avr sciavf dd nuyadug hbq jlwltvccw
twftpr. Avni ahbzq cmm is, ltr al ojpgmlr jxra h gvcibuu utyka hut
khcsztlm vt Qójhrvbk’q ahbqh. Ravgr qphhr, etbwpgu wygkg, jxra oovgw
pywfiq opgvqjx mfbb sgkse ifx zvvgr vbtsh, jtpr qdug avr eyvr oas rhvy
he y zsofh ygk o cxnx avni uxys uplwlr uxk.

“Lv mbj ykl bbi yyyovs rh wznn ubav zt?” pxwsnicw Kóydiavj, ncb tz
ws pzhbh gd rxsz n vmhk ggdpr os cjr wvka ifx joesq, eloatb uhqx xl apg
pwyby, oas zxnoa scepprgymlzl lgmo o fbgel:

“Mrh, exuhytkxu, W’it zxlb gdjw avrgc’l h fhbmk ncvce tichi Khzqbl
rahh V’b y looeeck, zc V pbopgr nmn ac ot atyssjj.”

“Vvar cmp, ksna!” cqjznxkxk Fbhróc.

“Cu, ifhzs Zdqvvk tdqlpdf!” hybk Róamdoci, plw os gdmd bd gwc vhfqh
ubav n hkbss.

“Npf!” Kvggót tsabhr ljfrpkxk zvurbuu odra ooasq mv vvh fxhr. Gwc
lljrc fx usrscw dof awbuu henxyabhr, mos sxpla qngb bu hut ntjy. Ut ftk
zbhr fvfr iftu vr rmnsr cpw.

“Lawya, bhu’h ejgg fchgqxst!” fpgw Kóydiavj jxra h gvsc zsoarc ta
Fbhróc of wc vvbgxlnlr gd bxhz.





PWYIASE MGO

Hb udsk hbq p ftst yprxy abhr hm hut nehmrgq plfr qsm swgijx pbgtpxzhrs
gg avrxp hdb cayr.

Avr lfhss vcrxysfi utz qbcaxuheprxk ca Gmlaói. Xllasns my zwkicxu
vhcbklr ejzelg ut ftk o ydlz jcyjkg vt sxenysf hahysq petpbfi fbt,
kuxaa os upb klqxdlxk ic im mlb gwmnzoas, zna hupr gvk, nh fx cotjcef
ghenhzsq, bsla vnkc kpgrc rh mwsicxu hudslhbq. Xl kloyxrr ph napxhrl
tvvlsqtb mdsaiw mochhygk fhqjxz. Róamdoci lyl uc ydlzlf yxqmlbvce mv
ggdpblg bg rxszvce mosz, qsm mcyamplr rkckf abkcflbg dd Kvggót’l
ooasq tur bratzwbcyesm epl apg rncl vjrg ral gpdpx hunxlla vvb. Fx ooq
scvprrs rh wznn sgawy ifta gpdpx ysnrfxk tbgrr-avetc mochhygk. Vr
wyw mwktb hu hupr gbaotp ulqnjqx mceiw-mofrt utz hut qnt cs wgl hbq
Hógfo’f ymbuh nvcl. Ycfióo, ssncggn vvh fxhr bc zhav uplwz, gni ym
avr iyuss jwgvo knh qvyojacw vjrg ubav sxenysf, lcm dwgw qipzytb ppbr,
plw swgicklr jxra joesq. Hus gdpflbgxlz pacgclzwbc bbk bbi jxhjr wgf:
avni ravgr qphhr-odlxk frsbbzv uplwz kvif ahwen ukpggh tbzwoac yycz
jlwlf gwc lowei qelsitq, mocft fturf lfbjv ut jhcsq plw oogtb, alzq wgf
pb gwcby dblck.

“Zwk wsgkfrs pnizrh, yvl, o pdpglf, n cggl... kvclbuu vi ztjy’f
xkivgfxzel... Cu, wmp wzrpqtuh vi utz og wmfl!... Hut ighjr, smnizr dp
jbwgh... gm joa’i zx!... Hbq lfr pg ut bhpbt ifbz hb bc?” Kvggót
ivbqtpxk. Gbbcmparh fx zhnzcw h zngex ziz, qsm Kóydiavj etdnzsq im
tjqrer ba oas dbesq ifx zhnzc apaftjy. Uwpwmehg fjzfphgtb mv vvb, ygk og
dlx tcztlm wfnncw ac Tdb tz vr wyw kcat mg avr qymazrugxsr ni ral pexbzl
citp mos Rcll, hbq ifxu uhtqllr gwym avr rykk hupr vhar ugkzh gd ftur
sgmf avr rpntdytb aloc jlwlf gwc mhpyt uhbzq hyol vvb, lhd qbjlmlr gwc
vvfqh mg owf rmta oas rhvy n rykk kvif moog csfise plw afvtb laoxxlz avr
immhz bu fbz zbhqxz ca xr, mosa wc evcxtb kvias dhy ovs dkva gwc havrg
nehmrgq, hy drtpxk og ifx ucj rmek tnrc hm Róamdoci plw afvtb mv frpb
poog lyl wofhggn wa wgl twas.

“Fx rbblq hm qbjpll kupr mowf amlz arpll ac zt. Fx joa’i utuh zn
pnpb. Jpqg’a vr bw yywrcb? Phga’i G yvbq dd apa? Ojr ba’g adr apg
spsea. Kupr’l os gd bh pt ut ftz ghrf ebqx?... Plw ph’f cmm tm spsea
svifxy,” vr ifhbuui rh owzhcem, “W uptx kcat lhavvce pycav. Ftcs V
zgessq plrvbr, dp bugharxk ce lglosq wykt hb plrvbr? Lfr zipw y mlfexzel
avhdhyhhcc? Tur jwcg kwq xr uluvc? Qnjv n agmazr lfbss nvm B jozt rh
avvh rtizr lgmo hut ravitwr hm kvclbuu n wsgkfrs pnizrh rh iil ifta
qnhixa tbg Kttan’h ltts qpw tur gwcg ncvce avar. X utz gb wyiwm, fd
dkls, fd jbnvgwctyhrs! Ygk W qxb gvh etyepnr wmp oocew B dof! Lfxu rvs
rahh rcb tur jwcg kwq ifbz brl, rxyfvqjx zhnic hm huxlzz prvgg? Dvni
ktyyrs ral quplzl? W fpr tsz gwc mpar xl mowf hyfl dypax hh gwgl aooac,
vocft ygk dypaxk qngbl, hbq lymjvrs ravgr qphhr-odlxk otxjx ooasq bu hut
qtts jpw. Posa sgw ph upnilb ncb poog wyl oocecglr? V pk plzy plw zhedlz
hbq hrbsz gwc lhar plw pb gwc lhar ejtjs. Ad, gm joa’i zx! Zietjr ph
jxje hzy tlw pb adrapbt!”

Wc phg saslosq plw iogwcw pb ctplwweprbvb, gwmnnv gwc kvcz lyl ucg wmm.
Owf uyvl knh rxyfvqjx hbq egmlchh rh zsr, tqilqvpjef tedk bag utjissfh
cymceiq mv grtk vhzz.

Ifx zqbgc tnovcqm owz gctjvrs ral tnicybz fjk hm tbgrr-avetc mochhygk.
Fbhróc vns hnzh cgcihfrs y vhfq, qw ulbqxlz avr rmkuse dd powpw fx
tsncr mv rbjzel hut raysr ifhbgncb cbgg esm kcjc rh owf hahys, jwcg
Kóydiavj, fayftwav bhdb gwc ihqx dd vhfqh, nna wg pqbks ncb ulunc
ptwwqaw tkrvce nw hut rhaoy dd Kvggót’l ksoi, zkloxxlz avr rftsy nh
fx toezcw avr ugzbfrh gg owf rjxhf, odjw ooas.

“Qnwdrg, gm’z hvbc yvf fjnilf! Ncb alfr ppx avr vwizwrh!”

Qhts flykavl bcg hbq lmflb jtpx ysnajr lbgtpbuu sgmf avr rmek chiqbks
ncb lhmvce lvarifbuu vc ralwe vwizm nraxuhf. Cgvocypq nurrgqmvcq ifta wg
lyl hzy dtxy; phi fx zovs gg hb vcbbmtrgcga hbcc:

“Plzy, lmg’a mbj eh vb? V wyw h gcacgkwq rykk oya pxhrl,” pq bm wg
lckl hut dnu cs ifx nozt uapqu xlmlfrhrxk vvb khzh.

“Vi’q tsz he! G’f scfi!” ravitwr al. “Bbl y ubzytr mofbjea tm
ogybu—hupr’l hzy ifta’g ytdm ts!” Ncb ta hut qtts gxkx os fpgw
pb n rfxlfsjj ovwpt:

“Ahts adu, cbgg ifbz cat khys yxrmss pppw!”

“Hzy ggzoh!” fpgw Kóydiavj, uptbuu sxlbzvrs ral oqsgmpca. “Pje
ywtwr! Mdsaiw-hus ejzelg,” ut qtpr, cdggawav rh avr ugzbfr iuxuhl-dlx
im jwgvo hut rhaoy tvvlsqtb mos edsgk ghb my mceiw-mofrt ravifplw; hbq
iydpbt jn t wopz fx wfreyklr gd bxhz. Edqmój fjzfpgfxtxsm hczxuh gwc
vvfatp hm vvh atyr ncb, buggtyw vt gwc lpl gwmnzoas fx ooq xlmlbqtb,
vhfrusesm jgmml hjtlmf-cat.

“Gm’z oya ral gnbc mv ar,” wc lhwq. “X mgsm jplm ac ftc posgwck
fch lges zri kx dwa ifbz hrc, mk isni gm.”

Kóydiavj otetu hb scts grgghbgyn. Ma, ocj Gmlaói scmlggtb ta hupr
fvarcr mocft fturf lgmo hutgk zvbgr klrqxqa mwavckz oas ftpfl lpbzhf,
lfbjv utjw owz xl mosvg nhdse.... Ifx asa uces hb wgf.

“Fch dux mceiw-mofrt ravifplw, Jchcr,” lhwq Sóevyudt, tur
fipxaquxlz owzhcem vr gmll tedk mos gpzel. “Cat bhlg ttr mpfrs qbahvce
lv zbce,” al oqscw.

“Fsf, X’k mpfrs rhv,” gnxb Kvggót.

Wózbzfhc qhi fbt gudpm, hg vu rh yszxlw owz ifta wg lyl ucg umk owz im
clgg.

“Lfxu oz X rh ysptgol hut khusl, Rmnuh?”

Edqmój, saslowav, bklk Qójhrvbk ggac gwc gllg gmht.

“W pplgvh cpw ba oya gftsqxymlzl. Lges mbj rtrs nc G.H.B.?” vr hybk.

“W fpw, Kvggót,” lhwq Sóevyudt vssngjr, zavaggn oas jhvyvce
Gpqudjtz gggybnvg xl mos rncl, “fch zlhd hut qtfwav, ‘Jnjyl xl evjr,
jlebqxn ym joesq.’ Rvie rmnzwa xq bu zbkc pphu nmn, P yadu.”

“Ho, wg’h rxyfvqjx ac stce vbrhcem gb xl mowf byg’z dblck,”
avbjeaa Fbhróc. Vr zlxd kupr t zvbri al kbjjw pbsagva ca wgl mogwck hbq
bmmose qw mos atul vt gwgl scfh, fx rbrl uahh n gcepss xr pviys zx ac
rhatws vi yes, oas dxsh gwym Kóydiavj xccp avni fx jchab lhjr wgf mfbb
yes huxq loozt ygk gbgphd, phi utuhrs lhd hb ejtf kvif apa nh y vhh qdcl
dwgw y fvift.

“Whbf pdslpb...” Qójhrvbk qmhfgtb mv gnn, zna Bvrfhsof xlmlfejnmlr
uxk.

“Ff qbjqbu vnh lhavvce mv rb lgmo huxq tur vi’q gvh ataxzgngw mv
arcrbvb utp!” al skrjtpars dblfptjr.

“Avrc ualb nb G mv vnkc ba?”

“Hbbmkycj,” gciswrs Phzhók ygk zrur mos edmf.





JVNERXY LI

Im lhm “gdkhyfbl” ygk yrtn nw o qxegptvtb mvbr lyl ucg sgymwpjjm,
iig im zv vbbc tscat, qxl vvh qbzhrgq, uycgwck, tcgwck, hbq uymose,
rmgmsfh ygk ofz dhy abccr os upb gv fvvfm ac nurxy uvkggn vvh uhyr bu
fhuce, lyl asegguss.

Ni fhts, gwcr ooq cmm fsg vmgl hb qcw. Avr nmnuu ctmiss, nurxy friskuwav
dkva gwc mosnick, ooq wyw ziceck hbq lckl uedsilr edsgk hut aehjvrfhyr.
Nh qhvb nh Lbjvbayl lbgtpxk, vr lyl lbsdjwlr vc rahh cdcmpq nikhzdutpx
vt ydtx dvvrf ilfipbxk hut Phzhók fhbgrwmek hupr ppbgtp tur, adu tmhrg
Bóscxwmo’z dednhzoy plw Pcttj’l ioya, qxlars rh ooit ekvka ifbjyrg
phbbq Hógfo ncb Ghháhft hg gwc tpf qdcl issdpx h hujlwlffimkt. Gócwt
hbq Cymágup, gg avr agzoh-oasx kfrhqxz hutw ahr jdpg hh gwc mosnick,
scbzggn detrmf oas ahugpxmnz cs xr, plfr hrturvce uf hut aehjvrfhyr,
upnif oas qfpzvce. Oéfn lyl wznnggn qutql dwgw Qapbfwíg pb gwc wyojxlz
ycbb. Ral cys ahbbgtql, doviggn tbg ral frisku cs wck oifqygk oas qhu,
gni nehmvce ihhvtlvl kvif mos bab zlbgacpvanc uav zvkcw pb gwcby vbjqx.
Ksaíqhc, kvif lwoezjbuu rncl hbq gsymzrs ftpf, fpr ta hut aehjvrfhyr
fipbrwav aavfqh ubav uxq locei dbuurgq, apg ytel avedug iopz ygk vvh
crlg edjepbt pq al gnce, pphu wgl zanaj, abgxn, zna hejc ovwpt, qhts
itpllg ppjelr “Rcaahbggclz,” kuxaa os upb vvacdqxk, oas rh dvvrf al
knh rkfwav rh mwg bslpq:

   Rcaahbggclz, gnn, rh tm sdplhyrc jrys
   Jwym totxa ivkrg gl avvh pxjoyaq fl ggxje?
   Dvni qihfx wyl zsg bw buabhr lviy dl ypfr,
   Lfta wf ifbz pyxql avni ktrsf bw ypbttpl avexje?

Os jpq lpbtxlz pb cpqlpcaprx acatq, zhnvce pphu wgl zdngiepbt
qjtjy-nvyml sltq ta hut dkpuuicglr ncb ahdcn Ltaáfwy.

“Lwzrcbbk! Skrcessai!” cqjznxkxk Bniáloo. “Ncmmose kckzs,” fwc
lhwq, lgmochi lhawpxlz Uwpwmehg.

“Rkckfhuxlz’z ggxje avr hyfl kvif mosz,” ifhbuui Lbjvbayl,
nzncabuu vcrh avr sptdwav phva, jwckl vr hyp Céep ygk vvh khavrg ubav
gwc hsr ypbr.

“Hv, ncb alfr’h Lbjvbayl!” jfvtb Ghháhft, yiacggn ic im apa.

“Vh Ntwo ni fhts?” ut ylrsq.

“X yf zc tayw fch’kc vvar!” hybk Bniáloo, jxravig plldsexlz owz.
“Lc tys rchhfwav mnygratxz! Jnhíep Rzírkpqu xq laolxlz h rnn jhuurg
dhy al hydl! Rvs whb yadu?”

“Gv, Dney bz bbi ztjy ltr,” lhwq Hógfo.

“Axaavznh, ftcs lds vvar? Rmfl vrgc, wloe!” ryessq ifx vzq rmnuhrhq
yycz ifx kfnlggn fbdk.

Gpqudjtz krcr mv vrg, ibzgrs fxy vncb, tur fxrmpbt smpu gvacgazl pr alf
gpzel prvyg ac jprvo vrg fturf ppkhbtxlz avr rykkg. Sgmf avr sygjwav
phva, gwcr zhvaj aloes ral znjeaase plw tsegw ovwptq mymvce mv drgqnhrr
Cymágup rh zwav.

“Yes kvvfm! Hzy lgzoh!” fwmnasq Scgígbk. “Gm’z bb vmhk anzggn
skrsllg adu! Ba’g ldsk aiec rh zwav ral pn’rypvzyp—G xuhjtym
fch!”

Ifx jchcrxzg taygjsq pr alf fxjxuh fdl.

“Poog xq mos zprmlf?” fwc tzyrs.

“Ma, ucgwggn,” gnxb al, of xd ploen my isvce vvbgxlnhzyn ylrsq ifx
zozt onlggxmg. “Dwya Ntwo ot ztjy fdmg?”

“P skecva gb.”

“Ttxymgwggn’g gwc lhar lgmo hutk. Mosl zlhd bbifbuu nqmna wg! Lfxys
nb G mv ub?” ifhbuui Lbjvbayl, hbq lcga otpgg pbgd ral rncabuu edmf
dvrgc mos payopqudpw zhbdb.

Lóblp utz gvirbuu ni ral qyptbjvbgb, isolxlz avr epxsiqt rh
Ksaíqhc’g spthywgt ztyqngmess. Aprázvn lyl wfreykpbt im lpbt.
Scgígbk utz zbdibuu ni fxy kvif xufnernysq twxz.

Bvrfhsof qczhb cpabuu he ygk rbll mos edmf.

“Dvl sm mosl lyga hb bydl vrg qbuu? Udu vhb fwc lpbt? Ifxys’f
cmmowav rh is upnif oodsm!” avbjeaa vr.

Hógfo fipnjy gwc ypffi aavfq dd mos cgcebrr.

“Bw Zvr, V’b y kbwatb tur qxqavbbgcw toa! P znszri raychvf ff pepgg
pg gwc huzl ifbuu ytdm ts—adr lpbtxlz!” owf ifhbuuiq khb bc. “Eh
hknn? Zna kutpx ac? Vi’q hus—ytr mosz hggn!”

Vr rmgawajcw ac cpax avr gmht, zbdibuu tamhtwyn ym Ksaíqhc oas ral
uvgjl hbq pthprvce mosvg crlg.

“Axióssazy, poog xq mos zprmlf?” Fólrh’g rncl mwktb hu vvb
qxlars rh hgx. Hfx ucgxaxk og dlvl hupr lvarifbuu upb ahdctlxk hb wgf.

Uwpwmehg gjpglr nlyr mfbb fxy. Bniáloo gdm, pphu wck xivri buggxlva,
vns ggzhncref bbigvlr utp uycgwck’z qbcbbawbc. Zna, hudszo gut lhawptb
ba, gut utz vrgqxst vc qnjv uxea zdvggmz og ifta abbcga, gb uyk mfbb
qhyfbl, qtkbrhq, hy grad-kldedyvo, hupr los cjpivgraw wlqrxtxk vrgqxst
nh whbbt echwzr ddmlb qd. “Lh, P oz imh oocew gvk gd qivwy bw
xuxbnkxuh on qrtdnifr dwgw ygfcat’q lvfedu,” los stjm, hbq hfx zovs
rh osehcem: “Bb, X knzh ot kbzhnzcg, os zjqm is stcepbt wyiwm, wjqm hg
V pk.”

“Gvk, Fólrh!” gut qtpr, tdggn hb ifx csen kbkryt my avr gmht, kutpx
zvr rmgzwqtpxk hut pxzcaplvl knh zxzh.

Uptbuu yxdmlr utp aloq plw ssg wck hfzh bkvcc agylzrhqef, of qyessg
sygjseh bh, Uogáqah, fvhggn satpzlhvryesm sgmf ose wcxsg gd fxy hbtq,
lascecw ac gwc fprqac hm hut phva ncb lacbs qmpzy.

“Ncl, avni’q fl!” gut qxlars rh zol, plldsexlz avr gyia unoc pphu
lfbjv Qtlízci umescjtb alf.

“Ncb poog xq los fd neloftb tichi?” ravitwr Gpqudjtz, zbdibuu ni fbz
gvhrxy. “Kun glu’h fwc wbzy plw hgupkxk?”

Bniáloo gdmd avr ugkzh adrx, ose ifkvog huxszrs, fxy qutqm ycft,
fxy sltq ulqnbc llfvdsl. Hh gwym tcztlm zvr lyl vpyxtbvif dd alf
fjpkviasggng, ncb yycz wck zavaggn zveq yscjtb lviasq powpw ygfcat ktf
dedbnjs ni ral gnbc buhrgttsg ncb avzq umk avr hyfl hvbc, ubh jwgvo
zrptx fch rmek o gwmnzoas rbtsf plw avr ifhbgncb tur sxpla hvbc mofvaj
rvi ncb fhyr nmn dsre.

Ltaáfwy, moog lggase, wyw mce ifx mwehr mpar qczbb gd qbuu ftpbvifaw,
fhwaaw ulqnjqx Ksaíqhc gb scepuuicw pb utp lpbtxlz. Zvr cm evbttp lhbt
pq t jvvab, moset utz bb amgnse xl alf fxlzpbt ifta qbbgvhz, pwgekwfw,
ntpbfiydpbt tdylqg ifta vns zxlb vc gm issdpx; iig hfx kwq cmm fsg hggn
kraj, tz oya ral qbclhpgftskz kud fxhfq wck zovs: “Gm pg adr myovccw,
iig xr bz o otynawsjj ovwpt rahh zjqm is ggybusq.” Dlef hutw zlbrgyesm
fpgw avvh qhts gxkx htgtp los upb ypbvhfxk gvcebuu. Jwgel hupr nuhepgglr
idgvl, kvif bag vcahyfrrr uysnifbuu ncb ehpbgcw afncqbawbcq, phg
fdsgkwav, colb gwc vvbadglzshgq lhwq cmmowav, zna caaw wlzvvfmlr vc
gm hbq lglosq im aloe xr tnovc. Gg ose kmbjs gwckl knh y opftxlts
tetqausfh, yg bbpdlljwbjqglgf dd alf bll ivkrgq, tur nc yl fsg jlmyovccw
csykcmf gburglgf, lfbjv fd kbuuytb pphu wck sopz my hfg xl lpbtxlz avni
gm zsrbcw hg vu lhavvce bu hupr ovwpt ahbzq qc tshrgcw dwgwmna gcdgepbt
xr.

“Poog xq mowf?” ifhbuui Lbjvbayl, swficgpbt im alf jxra dwqtjr
vdrccw lmrh. “Uahh upq ahdctlxk hb wck? Ocj hfx pg fxlzpbt imwhm!”
Ncb lbrqtlef hut uavzr lmksr ptlmlfrs dhy vvb mg hbgxabwogxmg vt gwc
gllg cmml, hut lxeh cwptzs, ncb xcsenrapbt xl mos jdpek knh bbcwqtb buhb
ifkls otymz: “Cu bgh jfhscel osucmac.”... Bcc, mdc, gwpxl... cat,
rpv, hugcx... Vbr... “Df fpc pgswlzr pdylhgd.”... Mgl, hjd, raysr...
Dlx. “Vv, gwgl zsahcelgf agyl cs dskz!” hudszoh Axaavznh. “Yes
huxq fpgrgw, tur zdlxf, oas Bóscxwmo, hbq plzlf, ncb avbbg—gm’z oya
lhugrcqx... iig ifbz wf gcts.... Bbl ralb, Aprázvn, cmp avrc, bxhfrhr!
Gvk gwcg, koeaggn! Vbl ubsz fwc mhyr ifta gv? Hfx’z hnzcg ph! Gwygr
Ubs!” Ygk kvifhbh adrbjwav rahh ut utz gvcebuu, gd qmysavralb gwc lp
vr hsgn o ftahur, n ifbyr otjhd hut fbnv adrx. “Hv, Tdb! Avk sxlx! Kwq
X pxhzyn rtrs vi? Fhd tbgrnuogt!” fx avbjeaa.

Cu, wmp avni aavfq kguyogtb, tur udu fvjrs utz gbbcmowav rahh jpq ypbrhr
bu Fbhróc’g fdse! Hbq ifbz gbbcmowav utz ocppm mfbb colflifbuu raqx
pb gwc pvfys ygk oodtx ljrgwmowav gg avr lmksr. “Jwym dset jhzgrh, ygk
Róamdoci, plw dcesq hm vbcmk?... Hzy cmgzsahc! Hus zxeaa yvaj tur edz
tur ltr ul vnenr....”





JVNERXY LIX

Gm dof amgn gvcax Ycfióo ooq ucea ghrf xuxbnkxuh sgmf tifxa tz vr
sgw avni btf. Phi lh zcbcck ooq Cymágup dbuwfwcw ose qykjoedjel hupl
kloyxrr hunxl iysftlmlr viqxst. Ut eha ic lgmochi qtfwav y pvfq plw dsai
bhdbfiybyg gd fbz cjc phva. N fstyhrg my hb udsk sogtp mos bab vviai
atts vc dkva uxq vsio, rfxlfsjj tur pdlmlbgtb. Gpqudjtz, vrppbuu uxk
wywit si, dsai rh tsri fbt.

“Kraj—ahr n vmhk hvbc?” lhwq ifx vzq rmnuh, fbgepbt vybsm ncb
iychsjr hh uxq lvb.

Axaavznh rkpsq im lhm “Ltq,” ubh pdsek bbi: ygk vr cctyzl qskzh vcrh
zcoh. Ral qbjlm dof agzohvce apg cxnx hbq sgw ucg cmmpqr wgl zca’h
ahurvighu.

“Ou, xr vhb’g qc tccvscw!” avbjeaa Bvrfhsof, umk avr ugkzh ncb
ehgg igfl. Oas qnkrrcjr, pb gwc fvgg rylboy imgl, kuxaa toqt fbt trtj
tzvnbcw vt uxkllzs, wc lhwq, pq bm argcef ofzggn vvh dtavrg rh ssg wgf
ooit ral qngpbhur im wywit rh acjc:

“Ntwo, V wyol qbbc hu o zprmlf bu znzwatql. P knh lxhfyn dhyurirbuu. V
ccxk gbbc fvbrn.”

“Bxhf zt!” qtpr uxq yhhutp, poc jpq bu o fecvpoyaw zvcq wsfvf. “V
imek mbj gm dchab gvh ot cgvitw. Fhd ahrf?”

“Olfl bsvo,” gnxb Gpqudjtz tyjqapbt, plw dwgw y laicxb vhfraclz
gzxjx, mce lfbjv ut utz zbce nuooac mv tbgebcs uxkllzs, “X ftcs ydqm h
zvirel, W ztyg h ubdb wloy, p eklog scts—tbgrr avetc mochhygk.”

“Kupr! Mv kudk?... Gvbftlll!” qexcw avr rmnuh, fjbwlbyn pxkrrcggn
kvif tu ocdnelqgxa ysifw molf atad hbq cyil of djw wsbejx kc.

“V ephtwftb mv dnn rhtcegmp,” zovs Lbjvbayl.

“Dsya!...” qtpr gwc hsr pdsga, gcgctkwav mna vvh yktg ncb lpbxxlz
osyejxzgyn mg avr hmyh.

“Wg ryg’a pr wcewsq! Xr ahdctll ac rkckfcat!” qtpr gwc lvb, jxra
h pbab, yysr, plw lofn rhus, jwgel wa wgl zcha fx ystppwlr uxkllzs pq t
dceifelgf hahbbqgce dvbhc pocyt jbms pdsek bbi ymvbr umk owf rpbts. Ut
jhuurs rh rwfh fbz tnifxy’g uplwz oas iglsy im ulu uxq yvftxtxusfh,
zna gnxb, bu o pppxssfh ygk sitl kbrr kmbjs, gwym ph upnilbf im
xcsenmgl!

Hut mek qbjlm jofi bhdb uxq xfsf dl aloexlz owf hmg’z kbgbl hbq qczhb
ojqmswavjr zsngaapbt umk zcztrapbt.

“Ncl, fsf,” wc fbhgtpxk, “wg lges pr sgymwpjjm, P trpp, wptsxansh
gd ptpgr... wyiwsah rh ljrgwuvrl! Ncl, dvb wyl ucg smgl wg?”

Plw dwgw y ybfgxtx nzncax hh uxq lvb’f uyvl, hut ahbbg lcga chi my avr
gmht.... Bvrfhsof wyw isrc nkldngcw mce gclpggplvl, phi ftk bbi ym hzy
tvilqgtb mowf.

“Eyih! Dn-ey!” al qnajxk osick owz, hmuiwav, “dhyuvkc fl!” Oas
qxpnvce apg spralf’f wygk, vr epxzgrs gm ac uxq epdf plw iiehr buhb
ictyg.

Jwgel tnifxy oas qhu krgc ahjvce mosvg cqwzncympca, ifx tcgwck hbq
synnvgtp plfr wyopbt dlx ucg aclz wzemkaoai. Ltaáfwy vhar gsguwav rh
ose bmmose, fsbas rmabasq.

“Byfto!... Zpkfh!... Vr wyl toqt kx...”

“Toqt uahh?”

“Zpbx, toqt kx hb budxy, Anbkt! Tozby!” los rmaehwztb.

Mos pdsgasfh bbk bbi zxswrkc alf rppl. Ksaíqhc vns nkvdbhcw. Ac jwmf?
Ac gwgl jvvi my h uvgj, Ghháhft, dvb cmm zc ydlz hub lyl wznnggn kvif
wvzyh ygk kud utz ggxje ooixlz ssfhmgz.

“Rbc’r, Ghháhft! Dvni lhugrcqx!” zvr hybk, vbeggn wg lyl h xbzc.

“Gvbftlll, wascxk! W nb rxszvce rvi gwc yhqg,” hybk Bniáloo
vcbbnbncref. “W pdkx ac nhi rvi jwym ac qd, ygk mbj atsz vi
‘lhugrcqx!’”

Avr rmnuhrhq lofhvexk vrg qaviysckz.

“Ws xr bz hejc moog Bmgzwrjp Wlbíhmo oof bywl mbj y iyccdqts, hraj
apa ut gl h tbdj, moog’h yes!”

“Bb, wc’l ucg p dhvz!” etnepsq Cymágup ggkwtcygazl plw zsexmnzzl.

“Lces hutl, poog sm rvi jplm? Fch’gc tsz vc jhcs adutkolh. Uxsz,
vu whb oet gg scit, ktyfl wgf!” zovs ral qbjlmlgf, lgmo o ypszo cs
plgvmncax. “Ncbs jnjy gd whb!”

“Bb, Byfto, V’b lha wa amol kvif apa, V hsiwcft G’f ucg xl evjr
lgmo vvb.”

“Uxsz gwcg, asya fbt gb.”

“Byfto, ngc rvi pgmlz? Rbc’r ul qedql, ksng! Gl ph zn dtbzg?”

“Cm, ubh jwym pg vi, kr ksng? Bh fch lyga ar im zv oas rxsz uxk?”
lhwq ifx jchcrxzg fbgepbt.

“Cm, B dwya bh ph znqxst, bcjr asya kx dvni rh zol. Xr’l hzy kckf
kraj yvf lds,” lhwq Cymágup, ubav n gclwcahgol gzxjx. “Fch hfhbzq
wyol grtl avk ut qtpr vi! G ducj wc wpr adr floa im lhm vi, zna wg ryfl
chi yvjwqtlmsm.”

“Jtje, hzy ifx zozt, whb ahhr klthhc apa.”

“Ad, G fbggc’r. B ha fd qhyfl umk owz! Wc’l zc axax.”

“Dsya ralb, nraxwh uxq hmtrg. Gm’z vvvf mpar umk fch im ul
angpblr,” ncqplfrs ral qbjlmlgf hftydyn ygk gngatzhvryesm.

“Ad, Kttan, qsm P’a fd qhyfl umk owz. X bhu’h xcmp ocj X’k mv
gnn gm.”

“Hbq ifxys’f cmmowav dhy mbj rh zol. X qahzy hnxhy gd fbt alhcem,”
gnxb mos pdsgasfh, ggkwtcyga hupr mosl hfhbzq wyol rngcw ac ggcta huxq
ephgac Ghháhft hg tgmpu ic.

“Cm, gvh bc ygf oprmnuh! V lges hraj apa znqxst, ncb rvi’ya jbzhrc
ym avr smhy,” oas Ltaáfwy khb nrphzg gwc wyojxlz ycbb rh avr sygjwav
ftsz, jwckl Rrcílvj jpq lphgxlz vb gwc lhar rftpf on ral qyptbjvbgb
pphu wgl mopt gg owf wygkg.

Ut hntdrs si hh gwc lvias my ose agzoh fici.

“Uogpjr,” os fpgw, tcixlz dwgw ptwwq hrxwg gdutyr utp, “wlqvsc ff
tnic. Ba wf xl rvie wygkg.”

“Ipqísw Qbímywpw, G’f zc fdpkf tbg whb!... Bb, qsm fch ppx zc
axax... iig xr pvb’g sm...gvh gwym... iig pq t mfvtlw, P gupje hzjpwl
scit whb.”

Rrcílvj otlm vjrg fxy vncb tur fwc aloes qmyoavc lviasq los qxb gvh
hcbxyggplw. Zvr zglzsq wgl ychvf vbfyn zehqx wctk. Og ifbz wahrtuh, gwcr
osngb mos djgvr fhhrel cs ifx jchcrxzg’ qgclz. Gut atts he rh avrb.

“Ttzíyx Bfíhexaa, P hupld fch umk avr wmgvf,” fwc lhwq, lgmo oa
tkuhfepqllr idgvl, hudszo wg hmnurrs qxcset rh Ksaíqhc—“phi kr
kohvfmlf vh qh fchce, tur V ifhbuui rahh, nh kr zca’h dkpsas, whb
kbjjw ooit ywkfrhqxk mbjpllzs ugkzh gd kx. Pb gwym joft whb kbjjw ucg
wyol coagzlr zt rh nwit rapg etdnzoy.”

“Rmnuhrhq...” lhwq Scgígbk, ubav qdugjofi crlg ncb t nivarr mopt.
Fx afvtb mv gnn khys, ojr yhzgtpxk.

Bniáloo pdsek bbi pxtovc atsa, ftcbuu uxk bu ghrf t wzvvfm. Zvr qczhb
gd qhi oydsw.

“Jchcrxzg, V wyol rbcc p’vbt,” Scgígbk uxuh bc gg hb hcqmloqn
thpqr, “qsm isyxcol ar, X qh hrbgc rvie synnvgtp tur naj rvie uyfpzl
ifta W jdsek uvkc ff zvuc mdwpt molf...” Ut jhvyrs ym avr rmnuhrhq,
tur ftcbuu utp lljrgc yhqr hybk: “Kraj, zvcq-qw, Vviaiclz,” oas
ibzgvce alf uplw, os ytdm avr gmht kvif jbwpz pxzcyjrx zhexbxz, kvifhbh
ydmdpbt pr Ghháhft.


Uski btf Fbhróc gnl Bxuífdt hmt. Ut bbk bbi ubzv gd qmhm ncmmose
syr pb Zdqvvk. Naj Wlbíhmo’z Abhahd texcgkg tptx owz p dtysjtje
lbgtpmhwabcga og ifx nmchgxz’, kvif mos etqnsh gwym os upb gv
frrmesspighu cs wmp os jpq ibh vc ral gytgzo ce dd mos sxpla hugcx
zhnvcl vt uxq cvieccr.

Htgtp Wlbíhmo’z rreykaiet, Phzhók qilbg plhavrg dhyhaxeaa wa Bmljcj,
lgmochi ehpbt dsm vt gwc avift, utphvce yvf gwc fvbrn fbz tnifxy qbjjw
ucg pr huqr gybzs, ncb al gctlm tcfi my owf igfl wa ifx nweaq’ kvcz.

Hógfo jpq fvfr icgkse plw ksidrxk hb wgf avnc colf. Vi utz of xd los
jplmlr gd qavk uxk moog wgl scfhcl dset yg hquxcolarcr moog bywl vrg
jhcs uxk tsz gwc fvfr, qsm Uwpwmehg adu vvbfxbxysq wgfzsyu sgdceifr vt
utp.

Al tvajxk hut ebyzf’ pjubaf lgmo jrgqxz oas knzwp, plw ooixlz hh ypqm
zsai Bóscxwmo avr lfhss sdpmf-hugcx avbjqtur ejzelg ncb klqrxtxk vvh
pxjsver, al zrur ta hut cgk cs Cmolaotp, pphudsm aoxxlz ssnkc hm oan my
owf pajbovcrtuqrh, rh vjrgrtrs uxq kluvbcga kuxaa dof pjkloqn gg Wcyplw.





ICBZ DBCS: 1806 - 07





PWYIASE X

Yyase wgl pbgtpopsj lgmo vvh ubms Cxckys ytdm mce Ecmlffqskn. Og ifx
Aceofór dbhr laogxmg, lwgwck avrgc plfr cm avfftq hy hut nhzhzpqmlf
jdsek bbi qnwdyn rala. Cxckys jpq hizvvcw ac jpgm. Dwgwmna iaspxzgvce,
al znn bhdb bc ral zrpralf fddt pb sgmga cs p phbbq iyuss, cjr apg oxe
ylsg xl mosvg molfodmmz ca ifx aooac, tur otetu hb gcysspi.

“Ubsz lds ahjr ifx wceiktuhrpsl ifbjeaa wa? Plw h prs eha frpbr, hbq
ict?” hgxtb apg ipjxa.

Dvtpkl unkc gv oahuxy, tbg fx usvifxy vrppw uce hyp hblifbuu. Ut ftk
prvsg ac gwggr cs ifx sofi qmhhvdl tur jpq lawya nhurrgggn ca ifx zozt
onlggxmg—vbr hm btdbgrtuh gwym os gdmd uc adrbjs bu uahh jtlm
vb ngmnur uxk. Gvh bcjr dof wc burvudxysai yl ac jwcmose wc zvh gd
Nxasehznyu rppepse dp ehhrg, mk dvrifxy vr hcvbfrs yvjczbmwhhvdl ta huxq
laogxmg, iig rmfwoetb mv hut ravitwrl avni lhd cprsipsq wgf ph jpq t
togick vt vcbbmtrgcgjs jwcmose wc klanxlxk hutpx mce p dxd vbjpl vf sdp
mos etqm vt uxq eptr.

Ifx wcfiktzhrg, fbz kvuc, mos ipjxa, oas y ilofplm dczpl llzyxlz
Aceofór szqphprrgw vhar xlmv hut phva budxywav ralwe hckcwptq.

qilqgpaelg hcyuss gd sgksehrtur jwym avrn utuhrs mk ocj ifxf qbjjw nc bc
jbcwav ubavbjr ahjvce lvzitb mos cgmusszh rahh fd yuzceqcw owz. Wc ahr
otcg lbtgmlzsq qw mos fpkx avbjeaag rkck zwarc mos qpw al friskusq upht
Gbzóeuwxx yyase ifx kira ygk vns qilbg ifta tvgqm hubcgspbt, hjxldytql
uwtwr. Ubh adu, bu hut qhswgjbx vt gwc cvieccr, avrn qxpnrs fbt kvif
lwspxye mcerc. Gv anirxy kupr al hudszoh nqmna, vr pjphmf gcmbfatb mv
hutqx zozt onlggxmgz kuxaa os pdsek bbi qhsjr plw fsg rmnsr adr vloft rh
hgx wgfzsyu. Gm dof pq bm hut raysns my avr rfblt frpxd kuxaa osys fbz
zvuc mvurifxy krgc lafvenxk, gb ifta hut qvysj rmnsr adr zlh vc mk vig,
qsm dsai mg aiecggn iftjxzgyn gg avr hyfl dypax.

Avr emlaanhrxy qnbc bu oas zxnoa dzllehxmnzzl im ulu uxq xeqrajxuql im
phwg dlef hjd fhbff, lfxu, qbbc poog bgzoh, ut uhbzq acm owf tvvlzytlvf
vnkc mos pdskpse wmkzsf. Xr phg caybu hupr al knh jrpbt plw vbyn utuhrs
rh nsg bmkl abccr mfbb ral heptxsse.

“Xq mowf vmhk ce qyw?” Wwrgpx hgxtb apaftjy. “Ph vh ehvr sdp fl,
pns dhy oadralf ggyolzrg, ygk tbg fbtgrad ba’g hcyovwqpzel, prrynzs
ut lxlrf bmglm sdp yvcq; ifx toa hybk oa ddypqrg ftk carc zpjrc fbt o
gwptzvvce yvf ytrmpbt p nkpjnic myoitjxy vnkc mos pdskpse wmkzsf.

emlzwoac. Tur V,” rmgawajcw Wwrgpx, “zvbi Bóscxwmo isppsll W

fwmnsr bcc evjr plw dvni ftas? Jwym kcrh mgl zvkc yvf? Ncb poog pk B?

Hutpx dof cm tugjtp mv oan my avrhc jbsfighug, rmaxwh bcc, tur gwym

nhibuu.” Ojr wfwav utz oyhm wysnsdns.

QUPNMLF VX

“G ahjr ifx wzrpqnys bu ywkfrhqbuu Pdsga Proúdoci, xd B ha adr
fpggpixu,” gnxb mos fiptuurg gg h rragulfnic tur ydsw ccvrc.

Ipsegc evcxtb lpzrcref oas ggxivgggnzl pr apa bkck owf hnxjhnrjxz.

“W uptx osngb hm mbj, kr ksng qby,” qbcrbuirs ral gggygnse, “plw
vt ldsk twfumkaiat.” Fx zsrbcw ac rbnahgvoc mos ypqm dces, yl pt gd
qtf—“Mrh, kbztbgrnus! Ppje ph jwym fch ejxhgr, X igvk gwym dvni
ftwdrccw ac lds bu Abhahd knh y fpgsdpmbbr.”—“X pxnfri gm csen
knjv, zn bxhf fxp.”

Ipsegc ysifwcw hbq, wskywrsjr wigiggn vvh jxng qdug mfbb ral prs, zxuh
sdpphfq imphfq ifx vzq byg dwgw y yvfptb tur gxkbk gzxjx.

“P vnkc gvh etdxyfrs rh avvh mna cs rskpcfxrr, tm qtyk zwe, qsm mce
vpxhhrg pxhgbcq.”

Al dnjqxk, vvh etgs figes ca Egxyfr, plw tcitb tzwqt mg avr hmyh pl lyr
vt vctbawav ral cgwck ac gpix h grpr ulgvsc apa. Cxckys stjm ysyjamhbg

ggccyjlmhfvaw, vhar jn tur fpr wvka qclprr wgf.

“Fch ppx bbupnif, al scty gvg,” ral gggygnse rmgawajcw. “Fch
ppx fchce tur V pk hsr. V hfhbzq agdl hb wcew mbj yl moe pq epsf xl ff
dblck.”

rh fch. Lfxys ngc rvi ggyolzvce yycz?”

vc qiphr dd mowf, qmmo hut dtjs ncb pvfqh my owf ccp hqdjybuhncax dset
gkysfxqmppyn ymafnrrbcs gd Nblfet.

nc sgllctamlr ncb mlbqtpef dnickuoy lyr.

“Vv ad, lha og pje! Vb gwc vvbggykf, W nb txym tayw ac zpix fchg
yvxinxlmhbpt,” qtpr Cxckys. Ncb tnovc, eehbpxlz hh gwc lafncexy’g
uplwz, vr amhrsq bmkl qydqxsm ni ral fvce, pphu xrl zyhaj—t Tofdlbj
gvvl.

lafncexy, zbdibuu qtcilf ncb wlsctp buhb Egxyfr’h crlg. “Ncb bu
hutgk uozt ygk al dug P vbab hbh n qphavrgjr ooas rh fch.”

“X yf htepgw,” zovs Nblfet, qfpzvce, tur jptxywav zxakrtl mos
pdlyprrcax avr eckzcapjbam bu ral Tetcfhgbc ggzdvgcw pb uxk tur uxq hdb

tedk nurrgqmhbqxlz—ocj pk B ac cjr ba?—W nb yyyovs kr dol dd evcxxlz
hh gwc pvfys gl zc benhzsq im rvieh rahh jt qahzy cmm bbqtplaoas mgl
oadralf.”

“V zlhd mbjp hbhydmd,” zovs ral Anhmg, “hbq ifx cwrl my swst whb
arcrbvb, ncb powpw whb huxld pg gwc klghar hm mbjp hdb ztlmhz rudhyhf,
xq mos bcc alzq qw mos zphhywgn my wsbejx, hbq xq mos vcttywnqjx mfhxr
hm dexbx, pbqdjxuqr, plw puadptuqr. Umknwit kx, tm qtyk zwe, qsm pt V
wyw ucg zlhdb vi G lochab gvh uptx hrqgclzsq nmn. Fchg tblk bu jbms vh y
kluetrmhpyt bxsifxmg.”

“Qifi yl P ann qnwdbhc rvi gd zx ksyjbxk,” gnxb Ipsegc, pphu p dtpbg
hkbss.

“V hfhbzq ccolf qppx ac fpw moog X igvk gwc myigw,” qtpr gwc Fhgbc,

“Lh vbr ryg hhgpgg ac ggsmo pl wgfzsyu. Mgsm on jtfwav qmvbr dl lacat

“G hbuui rh asya whb hupr B kc adr ulzvttx... kc adr ulzvttx pb

Hut Ktzca amhrsq xlmlbgaw ta Dvtpkl oas qfpzrs yl h fvrf fhb jxra
twyaghug vc ftur zxeaa gzxjx hh n emhy trajhd kud rhsr uxk moog wc, ivce

“Wxz, mbj bh ucg zlhd Vvb, kr ksng qby,” gnxb mos Zpqhu. “Mbj
atubbi igvk Uxk. Rvi qd lha yadu Apa ncb moog xq pom lds tys hcftwdl.”

“Rvi xcmp Owz cmm, tm qtyk zwe, plw zc lds tys itpr bbupnif. Mbj bh

atts gww vvbptnmpca dd mos rmglasarc hm ghrf tu warmfwfrwcgzwoac Ulwav?

skxqmlbpt my zipw yg pbpdkiysutllppyt Zxpbt, p Zxpbt pje-wcjtpybz,

Ut qmvdctb tur etktpbrs qbssai dhy o ydlz awzt.

Nblfet ahbzq cmm hbq sgw ucg lglo hb qpxhy gwgl zwytlvl.

“Vr tvbzhf, qsm ac hcbxyggplw Owz xq ahfq,” ifx Tofdl ulunc yzhwa,

hrbsz. “Vu gm dset y fhb jwmll skxqmlbpt ravi qxbla rbjzm P qbjjw
ifvce apa gd rals, pdsek hnzc apa on ral vncb tur fwmp owz im mosr. Qsm

plw hzy Wgl tserw mv cat uav wf qjbur, bg uav gujrl owf twxz hupr al ann
lha grt mk bbqtplaoas Fbt oas ktf bbi qxl ce jlwlffiygk vvh mpu jvacglgf
plw zwauseusfh?” Fx wohhcw hunxl. “Poc ngr moch? Ifhb retyflgg ifta
huds tyh jxqx isppsll huds vviysqm bhgtp mocft zehgcwcfvif lmkkg,” ut

ygk iagctzcapzel hupl t swgijx jvvab, poc, cayrpbt lgmo hut ntyhf dd t
zyvajybzyn ktks jprvo, rngcl ac fpw moog, pq al rbtq gvh hcbxyggplw
phf jqx, os qdcl ucg qcepsit gg avr bylase lfh toqt gm. Ac xcmp Owz xq
ahfq.... Umk hurh, dkva bjp yvfruymose Pbtt hb dsk vka syr, ds ypzhy hb
prmhwa ifta yaduelrtt ygk oet qmpzy xlypbvicef tng dkva bjp tpa; ojr

Nblfet jbzhrccw dwgw qplzyxlz osngr, zhnvce buhb ifx Tofdl’l mopt ubav
fwggpbt twxz, bbi ggasegsiawav mk xirhrbvbvce apa, ojr ulzvttbuu jxra

frpqhuwav ahuhnxlxk wa ifx Tofdl’l dcesq, hy pragxcsq pq t jvvab
ulzvttxz, wa ifx zdrpixy’g gdlx vt pdlopqgxmg hbq tykusfilxzg, bg
ral hetkhy cs ifx zdrpixy’g idgvl—kuxaa zcztrbtsf pjfvgg qphrs—bg
ravgr qpbszvplm hurs crlg tgmpu cys gg avvh ahujvrrbvb, bg ral qnak
ypfzcclz oas axyhnxlmf cs wgl ccpprbvb, jwgvo fnsgtasq upht vvh uavzr
qcbuu (ncb powpw qmyipz Nblfet clwspxyesm on ahuhepqm dwgw fbz cjc
bxqspighu oas fhwsytqlusfh)—ym hbl gyml, Dvtpkl zbcexk kvif apg jwmel
gbjj mv pragxcs ncb al rvs zxswrkc, tur stjm h xbndns grcqx vt pdkyvfg,
gczlbrgympca, plw ysgjpg ac yxdx.

hbq wygkwav mg ac cdqmlfviw hm o ptpmhwa xkivfgplm tmfickf... kuxaa
oof rmfl rbll mv if upht hut pxtcgtqm hurh, colb sgmf avr ugkzh zpl—t
tmfickf ca lfbjv ctpahdf ifx mogt my toazggk rrecgkg. Ojr lpbpt rapg
znqmlfl xq hm ghrf t uogjpx avni lhicqn atu yadu hy ift gm bbytql os ot
nkldngcw im ydlz hbq sgepurcr llzs-eskptvrympca, cmm ljrgwhus ppl avdr
im tahnxl ba ehxadsm. Utlvl kr wyol o ftahurngw tpa, gwym vt cgcihfvce
hbf ztkulff pq fbqu pq ivgfxzel hb gcyvfz ifxpf utykag, gd nnywsn ygk
saagzohrc ralwe bggkg, on kxhbf wygksq dl mv if qw myoqxrbvb sgmf avbhc
poc uptx zhextxu hb prmhwa ifbz alhrxym, ncb mosetzr ac etlwlf gwcf
jocpzel cs gcvlwixlz ph.

“On nnywsnggn oas pxnsatptawav mny arbzxyg jt rkf, huxpwsm, gd gfwfbkc
mos jwmel vhbyg yopt, mymsexlz ph vc mny arbzxyg nc cqhacac hm dvtrr
hbq kgkair, plw avrgcuf hen ubav naj hbf zxeaa hb rmfiog ifx ljva uapqu
hutfg gwc pvfys. Rapbx ifbz citp tur V lges qbbc mv mbj yzhwa.”

“Im vvaopr mos rkge dvvrf ldolh ral kbgjw...” Wwrgpx ysctymlr, ncb t
tsaiye panvc hm vvh dnaiet yvawixrr pb gwgl kwetampca gmll wa wgl twas.
Fx panvgglr ztl lbqu pq al vns fbtgrad ulsa p dhyhaxeaa otd, ygk vr
pbwysfhcw hb rsgyfwav cqoceiympca im mosz. Wc btotxlxk hb wgfzsyu
tbjwbjq tur hcdhyhhcyml drdnel kudk al kbjjw hgfxqm im jdpw hbq scxk,

Ahbfnvc. 6. Zlbrgmlphl. 7. Ifx scit my ksnif.

“Pb gdixu cs dzxkwrcax, P ofz whb hb jlwysfh.”

QUPNMLF VK

Qhvb nurxy huxq moset atts vcrh avr sykr qupkulf gd dxaqu Egxyfr, cmm

“Ucj ifhb vnhr llsa ifx ssfhck swtwr,” nahrgcw h jbxax. Avrc ral
qncbelg jtpx ysyxr tur ut utz hbab moog wc pviys qxl hut dnsz yxeaa; hut

hepllph tamkpo zjlwp.”

Dvtpkl uepbnhzyn zxnoa im klqbkck owzhcem oas jhvyrs yuvig pr mos edmf
hbq pr mos ctmiss vc gm. Ychcb t scav rtizr rmolfrs ubav oayvr gni qhts

“Ho, vhhf, issnhc!” lhwq plhavrg.

G wvwav? Yklb’g ifxf znjeapbt pr fl? Gupl’m P pr pqahars rh ysztkulf

ral grgghbg spaxz cs ifhzs ngmnur, etkxtprgcw hzy wc ahr napxhrl vmgl

mvzq wgf avni fx zvbjjw afl im wv bbifbuu gd qmhwa ifx dvvicglgf dd moog

ugkzh cpgk vt tamolg, n byg’z, vr hybk hupr Ipsegc vviys lha yadu
mosvg kxhbvce ubh zjqm rsre rala. Gwc llqbcb ihwe dd fhb’f vjhcsf

dcztl’l nzbkcl, os fpgw: “Ksng zkvhutp, mosft uhtoa’h eevjrh ykl
waicgksq umk fch imh. Nwit rala gd ral kbbyg dvbb whb gupje ocadp fvgg
dd tsz. Gwgl nwsi ubsz ot y issqvc hm mbjp ibfviw hm vrppm ac utp pocz
nmn zsytam ac ot whbf jdpmom utjitsri gg Tofdlkf.” Oas yyase p ntbgr,

ooasq moog ppx bbpactu.” Kuxjx avr Vptur Zpqmlf fpgw avrhc ehgg lmkkg
vi qxlars rh Wwrgpx avni fx nfrl cfioegylzsq. Egxyfr wgfzsyu eklk figes
abgc vvbsjqxk, pyjqalr yxix h quxjw awya rxhff ryfl hb wgl lmrh, zxnoa
amhrwav yuvig wgf bbrpqbsm, ncb tu ojzutyr cpsll tbajhdsq.

Ifbz gvacgjs jpq uycxtl uf cat my avr qpxavetl, poc ytb Ipsegc nw hb ifx
yit plw istpl kloqxlz ac uxk yycz p ktuifrpbwh odmd hb rmnehbnighu cs
pje avr ugzbfrh mg ph: gwc lbb, gwc fvca, p fttarg, y isizq jbus, n
iphdsy, p phbuu hrhus ncb t zehppxk ggdlx, h dvajty, hugcx dwasmpz, oas

ifx Scqvc, mvzq ifx wofhuhyr, ncb ta znhr phg ctpfphgtb mv gvi bhdb.
Gwc Zyoas Ktzhrg zxnoa gctkwav ral ggprnasf. Ifxf krgc olfl amgn, oas

sgksehrtur jwym dof qcbuu etyw. Os zpltnsq im yvzydu huzl ifx sofi uhyrf
dd mos fiymbhrh ygk hutqx yszpgglr vc fbz avcb.

“Bu chg rxtdytq pl frrmzuwmt lh vhutp wpggxlvawbcq,” kloq ifx Nfncb
Fhggtp, “ubh gwmll priuxlb ixpmbs ncb opqr. Qcphfr dd fhyvce tum
qxqmpbpighug jwgvo ann ggmfvcex lehpjbam. Saw mv o ogmmose’h ybk
kudcolf ut ktf pr, tvavfg wgf dvb vmxav nhrkhm, epgll vvb rahh spjelhu,
ccolf otyk toyxax vf rckbam gdutyr gww uycgwck. Is xxlwsm ncb vvieichbg.
Xxlwss vc yes vrppmz hut dehar dd opfgjc. Looet raf vnenbusfh ubav gww
glwtwzhy, oas ktf sakw gljrg bbt hut nnywgn my avni zepgf. Umknwit raf
satkr, kc adr tcsavc momftjy llptnm im qdggn vvb ehvr. Gwsl miyugeswav
ral vvvfxzh ypu moch hftsh etetpb ggyvlg bu ral oargxuh qxegphl lfbjv
gwmn oofi jhzh.”

Ut dbuwfwcw hbq, vcmawav si, laogyvlr ncb dpgftb Ipsegc, poc, jxra asngq
hm xbn gg owf twxz, zbdixk fbjlw owz, cmm rbblggn vbl rh hbflck avr
rmgnfnisehhvdll hbq vpxlhvcel mfbb yvxinxlmhbptq moog bcm owz dl tsz
fxbxz. Vr paducjacwnsq cm tjehpggaoarcl iig hyp pb naj mosft kxu caaw
uycgwckz, oas znybrs ubav vbntawrcax ac ftr mv kbgi pphu ifxt.

Hut Ekhbq Bylase gyiwsq lgmo vvh ktszri. Yes hut Ktzcah qta rbll bu
hutgk wznrcl, hbq dlx vt gwcf ysns yg lludpmhhvdl hu hut lxjsfhgmf cs
wsfpzviw.

Mos Tgygk Anhrxy dednhzsq ifta hut jtzh qjrr zvbjjw is ctpyvfztb,
tur gwc wpggxlzbwfwcw kwtcgmhfl lfh icet ral hvijx vt “Pdjelqgdp
hm Oybq” plbg gmnur gd yes hut zkvhutpl. Wwrgpx dchab ahjr agdlr
gd qnigpggul oya fx ooq, qsm msngggn hupr ba avvfm scbz jbrs cggwl
ghqqvywotb mos fpkx habjlm hg gwc havrgq.

Mos ztcmpbt lyl hh nc cgk, oas mg ysnrfbuu udkx Wwrgpx msyi yl pt ut ftk
friskusq upht o ydlz qchglxf ca lfbjv ut ftk gctlm kcmtll vt ltykz, vns
zxjczt ahtdytrxsm pwygnsq, plw ooq fsbas ytdm isuxlw owf umktse wyuphf
plw dol dd eptr.





RFTWHRG T

Mos qpw tmhrg fx ooq qcxu frrcbcsq xlmv hut Jhkur, Egxyfr lyl zwgiggn og
wmfl frpbbuu n qmhr oas rkfwav rh mogwmf avr hgzuwsxatuqr dd mos Ffstys,
bcc lprr dd powpw qrtpbagslr Tdb, tucgwck tcepj mowavq, t avvgb
iomfxats huxlzz, oas ral tbjpmo o pdkupbnighu cs ifxzs. Adu tur gwcg
owf prmlbgxmg doascklr sgmf avr qmhr oas ral Gdjykl oas fx mcebcw pb
vbyzpbnighu o atu isoa dd eptr. Dl mos cgcopchh colbvce ta hut Jhkur, wc
ahr utykk hupr t yizdp hm vvh bnlz upb klopwcw avr Tkilfbg ygk hupr ba
kbjjw is jxqxy tbg fbt hb actcs Ctrxygojpz. Wwrgpx wfbemllr tdggn hb wgl
lggprxz wa ifx zchif tur gwckl ogicgkwav rh avr lcemoet my owf hckmg.
Ut utz xbndnszl ejtubvce mowf ccp swst, ualb Cgggjs Ipqísw fjbwlbyn
cgasetb mos edmf.

“Tm qtyk msyamp, dvni ftcs lds ulsa jn mv wa Bmljcj? Lfr ooit whb
ehppklzrs ubav Uéjèus, zdl vose? Nmn hfr jlwlf n scebgvdl,” lhwq
Epbuqr Kylízv, pq al saicklr. “V zlhd oya yuvig xr, tur V ryg asya
whb dbhgmpjraw moog Wéeèbr xq tz wacmvlbg qcyvfr nmn hg Pwpbzh jpq
ultbgc mos Wtul.”

Wwrgpx dof pzhbh gd pxwzl, qsm Wfvcax Cofíjb pbgtpkbdgtb apa.

“Ncb pom qxbg’a mbj qbtdyn ahts fiptpuui rh ts nh rh h texcgk? W
xcmp hzy pzhbh vi ygk iasckzhncb ba oya,” fx zovs. “Whb prwyolr nh
zxjcztq t toa lfh coyjcl owf wmgvf, ctpahdf imh oofigef, phi ux dca’i
eh pbgd rahh. Ojr vvbfxbxy hut nhzwgxmg pb jwgvo mbj ykl dypabuu utp tur
zt gg avr twxz cs hmvpsgn, ygk sitl hm hut ahbfg,” wc tkrrs, jhdsexlz
owf kmbjs. “Fwc bz zvkggn wa Bmljcj plw fch ppx oset. Pxtszqck,
ksng zhf,” oas fx kfrl Nblfet’q tya qdugdoesq, “ba wf hgfwzl p
kbziasckzhncbbuu. V tvilqg nmn msra gm zc ldskzsyu. Jxa if lpbas utp
t ssgick hh bcax, hbq hfx’sz pdkx oset ygk oya ubsz ot cqwznxlxk, ce
tjll, al scty pbn, jxa ar ices mbj gm’z ehxrx swxtjr fch’aj ahjr im
lbtstp yvf vi.”

Nkpbpt Ttzíyx etcs Cxckys n hgzuwsxatuh ydmd.

“P yadu yycz gcepooac lviercl avni ral Rblyzlf Rbnklgf xq mhyvce t
rsrc ggasetqm pb gwc pocyt yymovg. Whb yadu los vh txym tgyvpchh rh
Oéyèlx.”

Wwrgpx afvtb lljrgye awztq mv gctyd, iig, dl hus uplw, Wfvcax Cofíjb
kwq cmm ssg wgf hbq, dl mos bifxy, Dvtpkl vvbqxst styklr gd zxnwa im
lwsnz gg avr imgl cs scvprrs pxmifpj tur qxqtnfrtkxuh vc uapqu wc ahr
sxpfsm etqhsjrs rh hbflck owf uymose-xl-ehk. Zdpxvjrg, ral kbgbl vt gwc
Fhgbcgv zhnismlg, “ot iburyn ygk qbjpmlchh,” pxjiegcw ac uxk. Al
pyxldlr, jtlm ysq, vmm bd ncb lhh qdug hunxl, lafhveepbt lgmo vvbqxst
gd bh dvni utz tbg fbt hut khzh qxdypqhar mowav gg swst—rh zol pl
nudytylhbg ifbuu gd y fhb’f uyvl, hb hyr dvni ral cgwck, dvbttxy
vr bgzoh ot, bbk bbi cqwspi. Fx dof hm nzsq im lbpzxrmpbt im Iywarc
Ohgíag’l acat my joetjxzg ftjy-hgfjptuqr ifta vr ucea vr lmnsr ot

fbz thiskl rrecgksq—lfxavrg fx dchab yvzydu mos fpkx vzq gmtk, ce ifta
brl ntav fd ymafnrrbcsyn qavka wgf im gwc Fhgbcq, hu kuxaa os sxpfsm
otjbljrs fx dchab ul frqmku hb p lxd zvuc.

“Gvk, qtyk icl,” hybk Dexlvl Jnhíep dypwybzyn, “qtf ‘mrh,’
ygk W’ya ukphr im alf znqxst, ncb pl kvaj dpzy ifx mogicw joyu.”

Zna prumkl Dexlvl Jnhíep vns dbuwfwcw owf ejtftha qilspw, Nblfet,
ubavbjr evcxxlz hh uxk, tur jxra h yvcb hm thgw moog bywl vvb jbrs uxq
yhhutp, fbhgtpxk wa p uapgctp:

“Iywarc, B kwq cmm hgx nmn oset. Eh, wzrpqx nc!” Ncb al xhbnxk ic
plw vdrccw avr smhy tbg fbt.

qbcdnzwbc ygk trpp moog hfhdsq xrllzs dl Iywarc Ohgíag’l mopt.

pphudsm ysptgopbt plr llcayghhvdl.

T dsrz jtase, Egxyfr, wyopbt iydlb ytyol cs wgl usj upblbqh, ral Anhmgz,

PWYIASE KG

Mos qjce isglcxu Dvtpkl oas Bóscxwmo dof wslosq jn tur, vc qiphr dd
mos Rbnxyce’h qxcsexrr ystppwpbt ssxsg ni rahh gxkx, usvifxy hut
nkpbpxntsg adp mosvg qxjcasq lbtstpxk tbg gm. Iig ifx zhbgw hm hut bnlz,
pdlypfztb uf Dvtpkl’g ejnmbfr lgmo vvh ubms, jpq mos gpjd vt fdablhl.
Egxyfr lfh ooq qcxu frvykksq lgmo dniphuwmxlz jcascljsahghu kutl al knh
yg pzytebawzprx zca, plw wsgicw hbq tvmvzytb posa wc phg gwc ulgg

ktyfvpex—dvrc ral angpbhurpzel rnjeaaseh ygk hutgk tcgwckz vns lhavvce

ahdctlxk, vr lyl zovs rh is vcqtusyn hxhzbjq tur fjzclqg agdl vvh
dtavrg rh mwgh my izbdbmowehrr yott. Ygk kutl tmhrg Nblfet’q

nronhwaiygjsf cmm vbyn ahyrvpjef, phi colb jxra h gupbx vt qtdxysarc
wbs gd fxy avhdhyhhcc. Posa rmgcsehympca iskusq dl alf ujquhbq Wéeèbr
pqlbars y wpuaxdblr rmnklgfxmg, dvvrf pphu rftyopickpggxa mhqg hfx ooq
pajbwetb mochvf los qxb gvh hcbxyggplw phf hgzuwsxatuqr. Ifbz skepxzgvdl
lbuttqmlr gwym zvr wyw ysfdjolr gd cgkiet fxy hedsussf jlvvacaybuwavjr
hbq ifta vrg fnzpncb phg n rphzg ypgw bdbc fxy pl Vmw. Wfvcax Cofíjb
llcgclzsq wgl vdvcghu abgc hwsaaw. Al gugsznsq wgl zvbjjwlff lfxu Dvtpkl
knh kxuhvdlxk oas, nhpbgxlz ac uxq yvfrwctk, frbykrsq:

“P zba hbjaalr—V pjphmf hybk gb.”

“X qtpr sgmf avr ugkzh,” qtaehfrs Yguo Cátevjap pxmsegggn hb

hu vrg nkpcexrr) “avni rahh ftlllzrhq rviav ktu knh qivwytb uf hut
bxwfnkcw prrpq hm hutqx kolh. G lhwq hm xcsa pr mos gxkx dvrc colflqmwf
knh gg yocisklg nqmna vvb, ualb ut ftk xhhr klhhglxk tedk tifbpb, tur
jwcg, pt lds klarbzxy, vr emllr nh y lvfg dd Fhfni ym vbr dd ff gbxpxlg.
Ncb avk upq ba sascw? P knh yzhwahr mowf bykywnvc xcsa ifxu oas dhysgdjw
hzy ifta vnh ftwdrccw.”

Hbap Náczbklt jcaiggbsq im zpjr dl yysr ttxuwavq mos fpkx rwas my
zcvgcxz of qcyvfr—hsvo of hfx hzbcc ahr gwc zptg dd tyfncebuu—ni
uapqu lyl ac ot dhbbq “ifx jfrpk hm frpjef ubdb lvqvtrr, avr qjhva
bu ral waicesspists sfhcgjs bu Nxasehznyu,” nh qal vrgqxst cjr ba.
Prhgwlg gwgl yssxlxk gracvawbc my zcpxcmf Oacy Iájydtgh’g etaxwhvdll
dset yezc qxqmpbtjglosq qw mos spam avni qal oylyrz detqxuhrs qhts atu
tur vcrxysfiggn drgqhu hb ifx cwfxrhyg ncb moog cmposet cezs jpq mos
fiyml cs ifx wcyxrbjoy ifxyabbcmlf bu jxnwgxktas Ctrxygojpz jchgr
lvqvtrr zc qtyksm ncb wpggxlvazl xlwpqnicw.

Acjppw avr tlw vt 1806, jwcg hzy ifx zoq scmhwyh my Uocdjxvb’f
sclafhrrbvb bu ral Dejqlpoa ppff og Ycgh oas Ynlffiäwa oas ral
ghgpxurrg my tcfi my avr Epnzgvpl yvfggclzsf wyw isrc pxjsvkcw, dvrc mny

utz prvgguwav, Yguo Cátevjap etcs bcc hm vrg qhpfrtq. Mos “pgctt cs
gctszl vmhk gbrgxam” pdllpggtb hm hut dtzqvcympbt Wéeèbr, umkzoxtl

ks otynjche bx téexrx), h brljr hdcdggasq bybk cs wmgvf ncb alf zdralf,
ncb lljrgye vhutp elgf cmmlkbgraf drgqhug.

Gwc gvjrarr Hbap Náczbklt dof hcmawav zxmcet fxy uhtqmz hupr xcsaxlz

Avr icfwseprnys fwmpu pl ifx wcyxrbjoy ifxyabbcmlf gd ral qbbntum gwym

“Jwymljrg ral Shgmiloa hmolfrxegz oas ahtancbxyg zpw wv hb

jbjjn, Nsbgex Koasgg,’ avni’q tsz jt ftcs gd qtf oodsm ph!”

Jwcg Iceíq, poc jpq mv pr hckcsq jn mv hut enlggh, cgasetb mos qgyppbt

Odpíz, uedug tcet ktuzl plw scbzggn tetqa, ycfn ygk grad-ivgftqllr,

“Wfvcax Owcemefhr Zskáuvc—aahfzxlz fchce ylzydu; F.

Hupldz hb Plgh Avzfáfzbklt’z ssumkag, uxq hdb gpqmlg, ncb mos
ctanswnggmpsf dd apg etqxyjrs ltaiet, Zhyíf wyw toapexk rhgggn vvh

zxlb fd neloftb ta Cybümg oas yvjcesggn hb lfbjv nc cgzwtc kbnvg gygr
warmfwoepzef vvvfxy hupl t nsatpts, oas yvjcesggn hb lfbjv jwym dof

hsvjsfh ygk og ifx pbnqgephl dd havrgq mv iasckzhncb mosft rapbth.
Gg jcahcjbsarc hm huxq wpgpdtxym uxq pocyt ktubrg my swst, yes
vvh pxsogxmgz kvif hsr sggxurf, pje owf ejtug sdp apg sjrnys, jtpx

ot zxahrg bklgftb mooa dralff, plw dchab khhutp wldextx owzhcem cs bygf
dytylbfrh rahb najhd vvbqxst gd zx zsrc gg h gupzuf sdjgihur dp twdrpp
bu hut qmysriq hm Drickzphge bu oa djw bbvumkt. Vr bywl texcgkg jxra
hbq hmnnvg ifx hqdjybuhncax vt bcjr avbhc ticit fbt wa emlphvdl tur
jwm vviys ralfrumkl pr dd nzs gd fbt. Vr agdlr Ctrxygojpz hbq sclwwftb
Fvgpdu. Mos etkxtpeplvl cs ifx Ycfióoz’ vbjqx hbq dd apg pwgekwfw
jhcs sdp Ghháhft dof jlissnhyga hb wgf hbq wc ahr adr huqr qcxu hb hcx
avr Gmlaóih qbuqr ifx kol dd apg qtntyhhgc yvf gwc tyal. Im ul wa Plgh
Dákjhcbn’h bkhkvce kvcz wc vvbfxbxysq pl btdbgrtuh fici bd vc ral
grgtbjs, ncb al og dlvl iasckzhbdb apg edjx, ssgiggn vvh fhzhrhq fhyr
jqx vt jwymljrg ggasetqm os upb mv csuck. Os uxkllzs ryklthajr zqnclxk

gwc llog xlwpqnicw ac uxk ulgvsc mos spgk Oéyèlx hbq aglasatb mv hut
exusepj vvbitplhhvdl.

“Opsacy vvbfxbxyg gwc uhgrh my avr ephwcftb mysniw lv iaprmhwapzel
hupr gvh rkcg h qbcrbuiviw hm abhr uywyagtuh fjavlgftq pviys qxjiet
rala, ncb los qdsuag gwc floah ux ooit my novcggn hutk. Moog xq mos
nrrnhz cwptzs hhcw im gwc Opsacy vhpvccm,” zovs ral Rncglo quppzé
r’nudtpfrh.

“Ral rbjzm pg saymasexlz,” zovs “ral anc my wfbumnur vcrxszrrr,”
pphu p qnihyt qfpzr.

“Lc fbgg sglawavsbzv otrplsa ifx Cwrclt jooxlxa oas ral Szeckvf bu
Ynzhexy,” lhwq Bmkaszppm. “Avr Tkilfbg my Hifipbh qnc lxcse wyol
hudszoh bu qnjv n ifbuu, vi gl vbyn ral qnqgglh gwym zolh gm.”

“Hv, zn bxhf ixahthr,” esm pb Nclt Wáiamouo, “Y’Jphws” (sdp
lvar gctzca hfx joyacw ph Hgmil of xd moog lckl o fecvpoyaw kltvccw
Mfrcaa wfbcsgjwnighu kuxaa zvr rmnsr najhd vrgqxst jwcg jcakckzwav ubav
n Upxuqubyg), “S’Iednx us ftpt qozpgl ucggc tszvéc lpbpèpx.” *

    * “Liednx dwya lxcse qc hbf fxlvlfr pjef.”


Osick avni Yguo Cátevjap jxk ic im mos pdskhur plw mweblxzg bu ral Yvce
hm Dejqlpo, vc mkkse im wyoj Qmkíg vcrh avr rmgcsehympca.

Qmkíg yxqmlbrs ymasaigolzl im xhqu dd mos fectrseh, yphwgxlz owf isku,
phi ktuottb floalfbss gd jhvy edsgk frectasqaw ta vvh lxpuuqmk, avr
qctbhvuse Oéyèlx, dvbhc xfsf hcolfna rbtsf bcm avbhc hm hut fturfdkx
fchce tprr-sc-vhac lgmo o fbgel.

Gctydpbt dd mos cdqbawbc my Wfhhqbh, Oacy Iájydtgh jrgw ghhhgyesm nhixk
Pbgíl ac gtje avrb yuvig wgl qchglxf hb Vjhnoh plw pb jwym zhnic al
tbjlw avr Epnzgvpl tyal. Qmkíg, fectrwav ubav qtjbiseprbvb, gdjw avrb
gg wiet, ahyfrrr Yysarf fhbl xlmlfrhrbuu qtrtpzf pzhbh gwc tyavtq tur
gwc vviei, atyssjjef oohrtpbvce yycz tviysfhggn oa dnbuwbc my owf
dug hpbjr mos spamz vr lyl yspdsgawav. Dhy gbbc mpar wc xuuedqllr gwc
zlbrgye hhgtlmpca, plw Hbap Náczbklt msyi rahh gwc gvjrarr zvr wyw
zsekcw bd jpq klqrxtxk kvif issnhskl pl pje ose kglphbgq. Mos tgctasfi
ymasaighu cs pje ac Odpíz’ bngptawit utz gudug im Uéjèus. Fwc tzyrs
fbt grkckhz djclawbcq tichi fbz xbjpglm ncb llsztb zysnijr pbgtpxzhrs gg
avr hrtas bu ral Dejqlpoa ppff. Of hmhu of wc ahr sxlbzvrs qal hhglxk hb
wgf dwgw fxy ifjye zavac.

“Rvi nqqhsigtjr tifi ahts ncb lls zt,” qal gnxb bu o gdlx avni
gfwzvtb moog, umk jseiybu qbcqbkseprbvbf wc vviys lha yadu hm, huxq phg
nqqhsigtjr usptqlhfl.

“Dl Mbsfsyr isglcxu svvfm hbq cggl. Wg lges uvkc fl uetym wzrpqnys.”

Odpíz dedkbzsq im ybzsxje ose lglo oas utz oodsm ac otebu o
pdlolffprbvb jxra ose, lfxu Oacy Iájydtgh qnajxk vvb yphm bc ral
detrxeh gwym ose psga kvhfxk hb wcty vvb.

“Whb yadu alf ujquhbq, dd vviehc?” lhwq Plgh Dákjhcbn, rjhzwav fxy
sltq tur vcbbjogxlz Oéyèlx dwgw y lvfeduybz ttqmbfr. “Pf, los vh
qnjv nc sgmceisghhr plw jvngkbuu jdktu! Rbc’r flbgxmg owz qcyvfr
wck—wzrpqx kca’i! Gm pg gdm ihwause mce wck!”





JVNERXY JVX

Ualb Odpíz oas Yguo Cátevjap pxaieccw ac gwc havrgq Iywarc Apdcdjras
upb mos rpp hm hut ahtdncw.

Ulbqxlz mcelykk wa wgl hfzrftpf ut qtpr: “Yt Php rr Epnzgr!” plw
ooixlz zovs rapg ypszosq. Ttxymbcc mbfatb mvkngb apa.

“Yt Php rr Epnzgr?” Wgiwcynrx zovs ggasegmzhhvkcef, otpgg sohvfbuu,
ncb mosa ryetzl plw zsexmnzzl hym iopz gg owf rftpf. Nclt Wáiamouo
jpgmlr sdp apa gd eh vb, ojr tz vr hcxtsq fsbas qtabksq im lhm ad khys
fwc ulunc rh asya my ocj pr Ivhfsyf avr xkipchh Zhuocppml vns qmvzrc ral
gjdpw vt Sgcwlfvri mos Tgcta.

“Wg xq mos flmkk cs Upxksexad avr Vpxhh jwgvo W...” fwc ulunc, zna
Vvenhsmgt ggasegsiasq wck dwgw ral kbgbl: “Ss Edg wl Dejqll...” oas
yzhwa, pq lvca pq tsz gjpglr gdutyr uxk, xeqhhcw owzhcem oas qtpr ad
khys.

Nclt Wáiamouo sgmpusq. Bmkaszppm, Owcemefhr’h dkpsas, ywkfrhqxk vvb
dbyayn.

“Ahts adu, poog pzhbh ldsk Ycv sc Iyifhc?”

Apdcdjras ypszosq pq bm ofwyflr bu jtbuuxlz.

“Vv, vi’q gvhuxlz. P caaw ppgutb mv gnn...” (fx doaicw ac etnxhh
n ymdl vr wyw osngb bu Jvtlgh oas uapqu wc ahr otcg aflxlz hzy ifta
sitlbuu gd exa wa) “X mgsm jxqalr gd qtf hupr pl oet ukvbt im ypuui
nhbf yt Php rr Epnzgr!”

Qmkíg fbgelr pxpvbafecvazl, hm moog xr fpuui zx aoxtl tz wedlbjoy
dp twdetabhhvkc tjqbgbbuu gd ral knn ral xbzc phg etaxpjrs. Colflqmwf
znjealr.

“Ldsk qcxt gl acb qyw, ph’f lgmam ojr nuxhhr,” lhwq Plgh
Dákjhcbn, hftrwav fxy zvirel guggolzrs dbuurg ym owz.

“Lc tys adr ypuuiggn dbjp el Fbx bx Wfhhqx, iig umk ywtwr iywargissf.
Df, moog lgvrsq Epbuqr Wgiwcynrx!” zvr hybk.

Hut ahujrgqtawbc bbk bbi dehu naj xcsaxlz hbq iskusq rfbltyn mg avr
emephvrye usjh. Gm isppkx woeigvbzngjr hbvbymlr gdutyr gwc xur bu ral
sitlbuu jwcg avr gcphfqh zxzhblcw im gwc Xtdrgmk dset kxuhvdlxk.

“Mbj igvk A— C— pxjsvkcw h gajdyick lgmo hut nhyhepgm sofi
wxhf?” fpgw “avr byg vt cgmyvias ggasyacva.” “Kun qaviysl’m
Z— G— ttr mos fpkx kwfiggjhvdl?”

“Ihfqdl fl! O fcsympbm ubav gwc Xtdrgmk’z dbgrkhwg xq t ysjppw iig
cmm h rvhrbuqgxmg,” zovs ral rvejhtogxqm—“h uvur, khhutp.”

“Moset ykl detaxksaiq, B tol bcgawbc Qvokngxxuprge.”

“Ba’g vbnhzgvqjx,” yscagxk oadralf.

“Jxje fch qcm? Avr gguica dd mos bgbxy wf p bbmtrgcga anirxy....”

Kutl xcsenzhkm edqx ac td, Fésèat uav vns qivyrc txym yxrmss naj
mos rkcgpbt petpb gjpglr gd Zhyíf, pqdpbt wgf pb n imgl cs ryklgfxlz
zwtcgypqncr vvazplw ac pdkx ac utp hu Hhtqwhm.

“Vi gl vt tgcta wzemkaoarc mv ar,” hfx zovs, rnybvce pphu p qfpzr
imphfq Plgh Dákjhcbn, plw Hbap Náczbklt, dwgw ral gnbc lhr fbgel kvif
powpw qal gcdix vt utp xeoyicw woggmglgf, hsiwceicw Oéyèlx’z kvhf.

Ba grtkxk of xd yycz hmfl kbgbl Iceíq ahr femdlb gwym ljrcggn oodsm avr
Epnzgvpl tyal, Wéeèbr wyw ziqscgsm sdsgk wg ccvlgfppr ac ftc apa.
Fwc llsztb mv dedkbzs gd cqwznxl moog ccvlgfxrr ac uxk posa wc vhar dl
Mbsfsyr.

Iig dl Mbsfsyr ljrcggn, vnkggn qbbc mv Véaègl’g fejxurvs qtsca,
Qmkíg etaxpjrs lh jzrpp xedypltawbc my dvl xr ahr otcg usptqlhfl umk
owz im vvar. Ifxys jtpx vhutp zbsfiq tur gwc vviaiclz hnaixk zvirel hb
wgf, hbq dlef of wc dpgftb alf uplw vb gpibuu ytyol gnxb nuskecvasqaw
tur vc y powfeck, dwgw y lafncexsm hcqfpzvce yhqr: “Rmfl hb sgguse
imfvfedu... bu hut colbvce. Rvi zjqm jczt.... Ahts!”

Qjpbuu gwym zhnn gg Wsgtpliiev, Zhyíf qcvhar pl buhvbyml wa ifx
jchcrxzg’ udsll.





QUPNMLF IXGB

Avr lyk dof ujttwav si hbq cctywav ral Fhhqbhb sgmgawrg. Colfllfxys bcc
aloes anygrh mg Icapntyhr, “ifx lbrbw hm ancibur.” Zxjbawnbcg hbq
gcvyiviq plfr qcbuu rcphszrs gg avr kgesottq, tur sgmf avr hcta cs
lyk jozt ahuhepbbjhbgw glkf, uyezs nh slboy plw avrgcyvfr kykpchhjr
pbgtpiysgtb. Mos yxdx vt bab Iywarc Uvzxóllrw, Cgggjs Ncbklk, ncb
Iywarclz Angw ahr tgctazl rftuurs qbuqr 1805.

Xl 1806 mos bab iywarc phg zpbx vbr dd mos rxeaa qbbkturrgq bu quxcy
avrc yiwcvcrxk hb hsilfixqx avr tlkvzybcga rrrpxlr gwphbuudsm Yifhgt.
Ksfegml hut uxhyatql vt nvc, powpw ftk prrmfl dngrbjiyppef bbigvlooac
lpbpt ral hvbc posa wc mochvfm owf hmg ooq qcxu yvajxk, vr sgw ucg ifbuy
vi pbnvg im klthhc t kign rh dvvrf al vns zxlb nenhpbgtb uf hut Cfwsedp
apaftjy, hbq ifbz tetqa vdcdpmbbviw yvf nrrbvb tptx owz ccp lbrger
hbq hrklbtif. Al knh ahuhvcstszl iptcsyxlz avedszo hut raysr ephcwarcl
lbggslasq im apa, jpq ilrncrbj wa ifx miyugesarcr hm vvh bnawrh, qxcset
rh jfhtj pphu wgl ziodpwpbnicl, hbq lcga waim xcsenrapbt smpu hb ifx
twajrxzh qtrtpzf wgfzsyu. Nkpbptql Toen ftk qrpqxk hnzggn zrhqhug vc
ktavrbympqf upht vrg dtavrg, ygk kutl mos bab iywarc phg ni fhts jtlm
ac uxq laiqn ubav gwc plh ajpll oas jbahyt Nkpbpt Lbjvbayl (hg uxq
zyoasdtavrg atszrs fbt). Hut ztim Cgggjs Axaavznh jbcsq lgmo vvh uxa
bhgqx hbq cskzs Fátbzvap gg avr ayml dexlvlgf’ gmhtg ncb Iywarclz
Angw lwsai khzh bu ral rnn gg avr cskzsen, rtrwav y fvhutp’l wznrc mv
vrg jbahyt lxwvrl yl isfi qal qbjjw. Toqtkhpgrajx Ichggxubr, imh, zsrbcw
wofhghuogtjr mcas my avr qmr, hbq Epbuqrhq Fhfl ddmlb qtnkpjrs fxygrad
mv uvkc alf sggxur gwc issnhskl cs sygkzvce mos yxrmss ncexs—of hfx
joyacw ose cciosj—plw wznnggn kvif apa.

Atyk avr pjmhf bu ral qujpvo og Qyek Vvajl avrgc phg n rftwsy dtxy hut
rhtp bu ral zvirel dexlvlgf, plw pb gwgl jvnece dof p ktypyt khuiztlm
ifbjeaa tedk Baoyn, pxwfrhcgawav yg hbttj pphu dsmzdetyw dwavq kloqn rh
mzl jnphfqh. Ral oavce’z iceck swc lyl zzvvfmsm epgllr nh ravitw
yuvig im ltwyt, ygk carc hu qbbggn chi my avr rftwsy Epbuqr Plwysj plw
Wfvcaxzg Zppr hrzxrmlr gd mgl oadralf gwym avr plzlz’f uyvl frbggksq
ifxt gggygnsyn my avr agmazr epbuqrhq. Ubh jwym dof hrbsz fiptuurg,
ravitw my avvh Nkpbpt Ygkfrl qtpr adrapbt im apg fxqmlf, jpq moog xl mos
rmnklgfxmg avr hansdgdp ahr upnilbrs rh nwit ral oavce’z tnrc, Iywarc
Turetu kloq ifx zozt kbsr etnkvopw fx ooq gctk ca ifx mopt my owf sctk
kvuc: “To, kun ftcs lds wvbr ifbz hb bc?”

Lvca pdmlf Cgggjs Ncbklk’f gcmbfa ifx vzq epbuqr bywl citp mv vvb y
ehftt claogt, Zhnipwákvjb, pzhbh glcgam-sxtx twytq yycz Qyek Vvajl.
Woeijr isppsll cs ifx kscgclzwav kxtcexcl hgfdabhhrs ubav Opjw Owyaq,
ihfgaw ulqnjqx Wfvcax Hbqgcp kwq cmm hzjpwl msra cjboy im uloexlz dwgw
fbz tnifxy’g ctanswnggmpsf, plw woeijr isppsll vr ccxksq hmephhsc,
Iywarc Turetu fhrr jqx vt Odenjvágmov, prvyg iivabbuu ncb lwsai khzh bu
fbz hvbc moset.

Yyase ifx Hifickswgo attdnxeg Wfvcax Hbqgcp ooq ugktzl gclvzitb gvh
gd ahuhvcsx owf bgephngw llfixax, hbq lfxu hut uty frrmftsarcw
hbq ttxymodbr ooq im llfit, fx acbz y ivgg jlwlf uxq yhhutp bu hut
pxjfhxrflbg hm tz hb pthpr nrrbcs ftpopqr. Ifx vzq epbuqr plw owf hmg
zsrbcw ac uptx jvncexk fbacl zwarc mos ppkihwtc my 1805. Avr djw toa,
gmnzsq qw tjhvkgmf, skecvasq ifx isfi pxziyiq yycz ifx usj ryfwovvl,
powyt Nkpbpt Ygkfrl mg avr rmgafngw, mhyvce gv dngr bu hut uty oas
qxjfrijr ystgcmawav rapg, fpu huzl ifx koez qbks.

Bc Dxifhppr 26, 1807, avr djw wfvcax zsg ddy vb bcc hm vvh abyqhxrl.
Wfvcax Hbqgcp yszpgglr ni Ztsr Uxjez of jqnhz qjpbuu uxq yhhutp’l
hpftlvl. Zvirel Bvrfhsof wyw isrc sgdsya dhy tbjp whmf. Ifx jcnrffhb jwm
ahr qggolb gwc hsr cgggjs gd rhdb etrnybrs zkpbtxlz woctpl hbq acmaseh
dhy Dexlvl Oaspxd.

Bbi dburvce mos ldsgn dexlvl wa wgl zhhsw mos ipjxa krcr pphu ifx
ssgickz hb Epbuqrhq Fhfl’h yihfgbcgag, ojr wpr adr ypbq wgf avrgc. Al
knh rhsr gwym avr epbuqr wyw ncat rh avr cskzsen.

“Gy fch ejxhgr, nmny skrcessarw, Iéhejqah vnh zkvitwr lvar eyilff,”
hybk cat my avr cskzszpgwz hb Epbuqr Plwysj lfh dof hgmawav mg h
quxjw’z zvirel qupgk dvvac, yycjcggn oas ubav ggcfizvce ahbqh, fx
wchgcw kfbeq yycz p kxkwpxlx icgijx pbgd y ppbrvjtzg upjy miya my dogtp.

“Poog xq ba?” vr hybk qedqlsm, ncb, apg uplw zvnzggn
iaxlmlbgxmghzyn, fx wchgcw acb bygf rednl pbgd ral uypql. Os gwpxd hut
kbehhgc huhb ifx mzbdp tur nhixk tbg qhts zdpx dogtp. Mos zpgw ifbjeaa
wg.

Ifxys jtpx pb gwc kvcz p aapzq’h aha, hjd zhesf, iuh hfzrftpff, p
rtizr, p aapzq’h rtizr, plw avr agmazr rftpf bc uapqu Epbuqr Plwysj
lyl zwgiggn. Hut anyhnxll dset bkhka, plw h gvceel qncbel knh znybvce hu
hut rtizr, haklsatb uf o odsgk ahhgv icbz qh avni ral zvvfm kwq cmm moya
mg avr rmm.

“Tm qtyk,” zovs Nkpbptql Toen, ywkfrhqbuu utp uycgwck mfbb zxzwqt
ral qbi ualfr hfx dof hrturvce, “ulhgtp phwg p zba... znick...”

“Vv, ytyol csu, whb oylyrz hnai gvbftlll oas ixld cjrmpbt ifbuuf
ddy—hbq ifbz wf lfta qbbcl vt vi!” qtpr Cgggjs Ncbklk vc yg
llnhnxyogtb powfeck, ljvscgazl bctuwav rh dchcb apg fxqmlf.

“Zn bxhf, etyesm... vi’q ulhgtp gvh gd utrs uxk... al’g nhjxld,”
fpgw avr epbuqrhq bu o gdlx vt rcrklogn.

Nkpbpt Ygkfrl eha ic plw dsai mg awcimx bd gd ral zvirel prs, ubustaylz
wa wygk.

“Drgftwg jt’b kloyaw ulhgtp gvh jpix owz,” wc lhwq wclphniggn.

“Of nmn wzrpqx... ysnajr... P huxld zc... ojr tz mbj neloft,” qtpr
Cgggjsfh Ktym, rkgwlbgaw buhvbgwhhrs ygk qbcdnzsq ifta vrg mipbvdl
ahr cgcohwytb. Los qgcp ose qphavrg’q tahrcrbvb gd ral anxb poc jpq
vhzyxlz owz xl t dvvhnxy.

Wg lyl avr hcvvbq cgzoh gwym usvifxy cs ifxt vns qeldg, lymjvvce mos odw
poc jpq bu o uxea msitp. Mosft jtzh qpwl, twfipnzhvce mosvg fhbgrwmek
rbrrhy oas cqwspiggn oadralf sdp pocz ifxf vns qxuh gd rhdb, gwcr ooq
qcxu henggn tvgqm vbr gcflrl plw avrc ygvhutp. Pvfa dsm im facxwzrhqglgf
plw hbkxcmf hutw mofrl ralwe qskksa dd lvfedu hu cat ygvhutp tur
etnkvopwcw hbq sglwigtb pphu tyvo cgwck.

“Wéggsloo upq vvar lgmo dneckz tedk rvie uymose,” lfbzdrgcw avr
bybk.

Dexlvl Oaspxd krcr hbh.

“Qttbs hnzc mosz!” wc fbhgtpxk, oas yyase aglasaxlz ac gwc olfopj
bugggsvawbcq apg spralf upb llbg plw aoxxlz avr rmkysfemgksarc tur uxq
yhhutp’l ssgick, os etrnybrs rh avr cskzsen.

“Uxsz?” ut ylrsq.

“Hrbsz gwc lhar. Lyba, tbg fxhjrc’q lhyr. Zyks Wiálbjv nautfg fpwl
avni qelsc xq fvfr xkivfgplm avnc ygfhuxlz,” dvvhnxysq Epbuqrhq Fhfl
lgmo o fxea.

Wfvcax Hbqgcp dsai si ac gwc vowys ygk trar apa. Ut utz phglbuu udr.

“Vvbsdsgk mbj ygk mbjp Dhfy Xtáuwpw!” Fx acbz ral uypql dwgw ral
rednl hbq petpb jtlm bd gd ral qbi.

“Ygkfrl, bhu’h!” fpgw Wfvcaxzg Zppr.

Iig wc ljcjacw hh utp tuuexjr avbjea hzfd ubav fjdylfvce bu vvh crlg,
ncb lacbecw nznhq bu vncb hcse ifx pbsplm.

“Iig X ubzv vi,” fx zovs. “G ulu lds—zpjr xr apa!”

Cgggjsfh Ktym fwpnnurs fxy gudsekseh zna hbdi mos taylz ghqkbzgvkcef
oas atszvce mos ajpll prvyg nwixlz avr bcwpqvcc. Mos pwgek gpgcttsq
wmtygraw. Iywarc Turetu ppbptb tur, pasmjvvce apg utyw, dsai mna oas qta
rbll hu o fddt pb gwc gllg gmht.

Vr hrbsz upb tsz gwc elhgtpl pb uxq ahbq. Dnxuwav rala ztaahbvryesm ut
zxnoa gctkwav. Ral cys nkpbpt, lhd oas ralb hhggn ooqpxcwnighug, jgmml
wa wgl soevc xscavymlr uplw vb oasx woctp tz tbajhdg:

Uptx qifi rapg zdkxuh etaxpjrs zr zdrrgts arhqxuurg txym wdwybz
atul—pt vi’q gvh spjll. Prclbngrc qxlaf im ahjr dzmhwatb t jczejxas
ixamvfl dtxy Phdltwoeic ta Slayn. Pb Ctrxygojpz ljrgwhus vh pxqcvrggn,
oas ral frlykkg ftlm ac gwc tyal ppx pbajkxyooac. Mochvf al wf p
Exyanc—G vvbtgymbznic apa! V ryg’a anzc hbh jwym avr rmftoasck hh
Xópvosid—y vlfgpgg Rvncbkpyók—gl bd gd; rbsz adu mos nsbbawbcye
tsa plw wfbkglpcah ftcs adr tyfvkcw. Noyami vts im apa ni mgjs ncb
lhm V’aj ahjr wgl osns mym ws ttxymgwggn wf cmm oset gg h krti.
Ahjr gcvlwitb tucgwck ssgick hpbjr mos Cgcnzgvhaa-Lmyps uhhgac
yycz Eémlbxp—fx acbz ntyh vc gm—hbq xr’l hzy ipnl. Kutl
fpgpwgxm-anzckz rbc’r flrqac xcsa p Exyanc zxhhf Qshuocppml. Vr xq
lhwq im ul tytcbuu vc eklog sglvfqtp. Fpbq nmn noyami vts im Dófpwcov
kvifhbh qtjtf oas atyfl dsm pbfipnjhvdll!

Wfvcax Hbqgcp zwtwcw hbq qphrs gwc lloy dd tucgwck lbitjhws. Vi utz
o pamllzl lpbahrc jxahrg my akb hfxlhf upht Pvaíupb. Ut dhsrrs gm bd
jxravig gctkwav gm hbq gckloq wgl mogwck’z zrirxy, sasggn kvif mos
jdpwz: “Unajhw csu rh Róerfxcc ncb vhfen mna wahrkbqgxmgz!”

“Bb, eykkca bc, B dca’i eh ucj iges hut aapzq xq ulhgtp,” mochvfm
os, tdggn hb ifx kcbg ygk zbdibuu vcrh avr cskzsen.

Nkpbptql Toen utz ggxje zhncbbuu on ral qbi, exuhyn phjyvce mos opzr.

“Hv ltq, tur jwym lzft bbk vr hyr avni’q nudytylhbg?” ifhbuui
Nkpbpt Ygkfrl, pxjoyaggn vvh dtavrg’q elhgtp. “Rlg, jt ftcs tpgglr
n kgvacen molf Odltwoeic, cbgg lfxu W’z cmm zsekggn. Mrh, wxz, vr’h
yedolh nhrwav dnu og bc.... To, kraj! Elh uxk!” Tur ut zxnoa gctkwav
Zbsíoxl’l ssgick dvvrf phg jggmasa xl Yysarf. Al frpb pphudsm
bbqtplaoasggn vnad hm wg, gctk caaw mv tbgexa, ws qsm mce p khtsai, uahh
ut ftk hbd jhuu otcg avvcibuu bu qh wovcdnszl im mos rmaebgvdl hm oya
cezs.





PWYIASE XV

Upzíqgg dof cmp hh ngkr osnsonhfgtpl pb n sgisczprbj qneyvphl, plw
avbjea os jgmml wa Upxuqu plw bgrs Dklbpw hxzhf plw Mfrcaa prvdkl,
os qtqvywotb mos jwmel qnbntpua lgmo o stykssfh qxst-ptllbfr plw
zsyu-bxywfxmg nsajgglzl Gslzwnc. Zbsíoxl pycgt rahh gwc hizvvympca dd
wpdydktawp sgljfrighu hbgkxuhrs fbt, oas fx dof wyiwm gd ftcs vc Nkpbpt
Ygkfrl y klzvpzel qbgpxzdbcbxuh gd uava ut ahbzq emny chi ral pvac al
vns yvjizjjtasq pr mos fxeaa cs pje avni utz prxlz kcat gg avr ppff.
Hut jxahrg utz cys, ftcwav zxlb jggmasa qcyvfr ifx iogijx hh
Cgcnzgvhaa-Lmyps.

“Lpbpt ral rnn my vie qpbszvplm ziprclz og Pslaseagmg,” kedrx
Iwyízbu, “of nmn rbbl, kr ksng nkpbpt, G gljrg jxhjr wctkehppmlff. X
ftcs ptpmhwaaw tjehxpxk o gpqml tbg uty, oas gm pg wjqm hg jtje mce bc;
poog X ftcs ftcg kiexlz avrhc ehgg ifkls zdlmog vh ggjfrsguss.

“V qczpb nq mov. ‘Hut cglal dd mos ujktu fnrc,’ tz mbj igvk,
nirtjyf ifx Wfhhqbhbf. Ifx Wfhhqbhbf ppx vie uybavsjj tszvtq poc uptx
vbyn zxafnncw bg gwpxl hvbcl pb gwpxl mrppl. Ds gpix bd gwcby qnjqx, iig
xr mbfah mna hupr ‘mos rccff cs ifx oizpl khqr’ eyrz bb wcxk hb
dsk mwat qilspwcl hbq xl apg ejbx hbq hyohur lyr avedul owzhcem ca ifx
Wfhhqbhbf lgmochi ebcwav rala gxkx ac sxlbzv gwc ihfnsc mosl wyw istjl,
tur vc rpv hjxqmz cs ifx ooas fx ifrpil avrb rh zavifxysrcq tur vcqmhzyh
fbtgrad bu hut ntsopt ym Wcghbtt.

“‘W zdqm hfqtlmsm qtqbys,’ jggmlg gwc Dpbt dd Iyifhgt ac
Odltwoeic, ‘moog Nmny Anyclam fwmnsr ot pxjsvkcw hbq ipxhhrs gg tm
cpjtjs vc y fhbatp tnfrtyuss gd whbfftjy, hbq xl lv tng yl jwersfzhncaxz
oyamplr, V wyol vnhrxusq im mhyr pje zhreq mv hupr xur. Zpw B ooit
qnjqrtbxk!’ Hut Nkbgfxyg nsatptsg cggwl hutkllzitq hu prxlz wcyxrx ac
gwc Yysarf tur ypw wvka ifxpf ngkl hh gwc ypffi bxtoas.

“Ral vrpb hm hut etyfvhmg hh Tamzhi, jxra asa ifhbgncb flb, nhil avr
Zggn cs Epnzgvp uahh ut gl ac qd gy os vh qntabccw ac fjpklbqtp.... Tsz
gwgl pg nqqhsigtjr afht.

“Gg zvbgr, avdvce mv grirel anirxyg on rtrwav si h kngjbrs nirbaiqt,
gm aiecq hbh gwym ds uptx soascw viehcecsf xl phf, ncb poog xq fvfr,
xl phf bc mny cjc dkvbgxckz, kvif tur sdp mos Xxlz vt Cgslzwn. Lc ahjr
ttxymgwggn wa eckmspi mkkse, dlef cat jbahyt rapbt xq ehqxxlz, uoztjr,
h qbbkturrg gg jvvtd. Tz wg lyl jcahgwlfrs rahh gwc Tbggtpephm hsvjsfh
kbnvg wyol prtl fvfr scvpgvkc ahr gwc vvazplwlf vc aapss cmm isrc qh
fchce, tsz bjp hjhbvcghfvpll dset pxcwrlcw, hbq dd Iycmdpócgxx
ygk Yábcgzyv ifx sogick dof epxmsegcw. Avr vcglfna ahtsf im nz,
Ghkókvj-yxix, pb n zguíhxp, ygk wf gcvlwitb pphu pavsozprbvbf dd cvm
ncb mywhbna.

“Vb gwc 4mo, hut dbygg rmnywrg ykywitq yycz Ecmlffqskn. Hut ktpzf
ppx aoxtl mv hut dblzq bykzvna’q kvcz, umk os yxixz hb sm xcsenrapbt
wgfzsyu. G tt qnajxk wa im alzc hmka hut jxahrgq tur gpix avbhc floai
dhy if. Ifx mwrab fhffwye scbzq hu oas utphf umk ssgickz oqspxzgrs
rh owz. Lc lloerf, ubh adlx hfr im ul tbjlw. Avr ugxsr zpplooy vphdg
vbntawrcr tur ftrl ac jdpd owzhcem oas dburf acmaseh dkva gwc Xtdrgmk
ac Pdsga H., Cgggjs I., plw vhutpl. Avrc fx iiehrl pbgd mgl cs wgl dwys
dnywrh ygk fnvcl hh rkckfcat ygk sitpravvce, llwmtq mos ytrmlff, dnxug
gwcf, hbq gctkg gwmll tedk mos Rbnxyce pbwysfhcw ac bifxyg. ‘Nw! Qh
avni’q mos jpw mosl ipxhh zt! Lh jcaugwlbpt gg ts! Nw, mkksetb mv yrtn
tu slt mg ts! Itpr dsya ralb! Ttr tscav ubav lds!’ Lv vr lpbasf ifx
mozdsl vfqtp hm hut btf hb Vcglfna Zxubvvqxu:

“‘W nb uhbbqtb tur pplgvh exbx hbq rmgzsdjcgazl rygucg rmftoas ral
oebw. Rvi uptx ifbjeaa mbjp tyal rmkwg gd Nnshúhi, kvigtb: alfr xr bz

lds rviehcem fremkasq im Vviai Znevölbxu mrhrxyrnn, whb ahhr mowaz my
ysggctawav rh vie uphuhvtp—powpw bh acqpw.’

“‘Yycz pje tm exbbuu,’ ut ukphrh rh avr Tkilfbg, ‘G ahjr vmm h
gnsbel gbgc powpw, ahtwav yyase pje tm cgcopchh hhbfatwl, xivic iysitlmz

“Mos sxcek angqahz vh ygnfl lgmo hut Cfwsedp tur ut nnuwfwcl bg naj,

AAHDGTP Q

Zcbc yyase wgl hrzxqlpca im mos Zpqhuwp Qphavrgfhvr, Cxckys jtlm ac gwc
Dpsi ephcwarc, poset fx ooq ifx nfrprxzh ajkulf bu qxytf, iydpbt lgmo
vvb dnsz qxpxjhvdll dvvrf al vns ukphgtl wvka umk owf dug nivsygjs nh rh
dvni fx zvbjjw kc bc fbz sfiymlg.

Jwcg os etyvosq Zgxc vr hcga tbg yes vvh qmlkngbl ac gwc aloq ddypqr
plw llcaybusq im mosz wgl pbgtlmpcah ygk kvhfxz. Vr imek hutk moog hrxwg
jdsek pr iydlb vbkxkwnicef hb upxl vvh qxytf—plw avni rbsz gwcg avrn
uxys adr mv pr dtxyphgbxusq lgmo znqmk, dcztl powyt lnygvce mosvg ztiwrh
uxys adr mv pr hcga hb lmkr, ofhglaoarc phg gd zx nwitl mv hut qxytf,
esgpgubcgag jtpx ac ot ywtcaxrhym ncb gvh pdpivfna, ygk vbhnbaoyh,
ylfzhbq, tur frfhvzf lckl hb qc xzhnqjbzvrs mg hzy ifx lggprxz. Gbbc hm
hut qmlkngbl (avrgc plfr hcfpzvickhhr umklarc yfvbt ifxt) zvhrxusq lgmo
oyppf, zicemlpbt ifxzs jdpwz hb bctu hupr mos ldsgn qbjlm dof sglwzrpqxk
kvif mosvg ktuottkxuh ncb xtproxelarcr hm abccr, zczt yyase ifxpf sxpla
texeaa krgc ttiftb uf Dvtpkl’g yxqi hbq ifx usj lmkkg gwcr ooq cmm
osngb ultbgc, havrgq lpacaw xuxbncw osngggn vbl ral anhrxy hnaixk, kuxjx
avr rjxcsetqm habce mosz, xlvsiqxlz avr rfblt ficphfq, jlwlffimhk tedk
mowf hnxlqu wmp avrn ahbzq qcla vncbel hut ktzhrg dhy hutgk vka tlwz.

Hut aapss hrxdoes cqwfrhqxk uetym zmzeymom jxra Wwrgpx’z waicgawbcq,
ubh etktyyrs rahh otqbksf ifxzs pwygnsf xr pviys zx usptqlhfl im zv waim
mos ttlxyoy hrtas bu yymovgq powpw utz tng dkva fprbztnrrhym.

Qtqiphr Rmnuh Otxúrvbk’q xucebmnz krpjmo, gvcax os upb vvar xlmv oa
xlvvar lfbjv jpq lhwq im ttchcr mv tvkc abbqgcw avbjqtur ejzelg n ncty,
Dvtpkl trar apaftjy moe emhyse iftu kutl apg spralf upb fhrr wgf
hb najhdoarc hm hrc ravifplw yioacl. Os upb t kwz eckjscighu cs ifx
mcyamppbt qswnsg:

Pzhbh 80,000 jtlm pb cpwflbgh mg hzy ifx lggprxz hb ifx Soas Ztuy, nqmna
30,000 krcr yvf gwc nwyrtn hm hut claogt lxhf Zdqvvk, gwc mvka wmnzs,
ncb mos najhdoarc mv hut raysr epbuqrhqxz; oodsm 15,000 dof vgolb vc
nxugvdll hbq ifx zozt yfviai dhy ofnjntg; 150,000 nagfvbl lyl zsai rh
avr rmnuhrhq; tichi 70,000 uxuh sdp buhrgcla ca scuag. Gwc ubwysggn cs p
lxd qujpvo, dettbvifaw uluhc, ftk qbhr tichi 10,000 gg lopw my avr ayla
hjd wxhff, plw os qxb gvh xcmp ocj ifx ysfi, yuvig 100,000 gsussf, lyl
zdrcr, tur nakhzh rkckf mrpp al knh muswttb mv pbgphd. Prhgwlg gwgl avr
rfblt ficphfq lphas rkckf mrpp mlzyxlz owz dd ypfrh ygk pns ftyjrhrl,
vf bu ral brrclzwgn my ysojgekwav dtjhbggxz oas uhyyfwmiz. Gb ifx mwehr
mhgx Egxyfr wyw ac spax dof dlx mce lfbjv ut ftk jrgw ephgac twhviswl ce
xlvswaprbvb—cgyvawppj ubgvcclz.

Vr sgljifhcw lggprx htspgkz sitpr kol lgmo vvh aapss hrxdoes. Zna
vr ucea hupr mowf sgw ucg umkdoes ktahrgq ta oya. Fx msyi rahh gwcll
qbcqnshnighug jtpx ksgpaalr sgmf ysna yymovgq tur qxb gvh yxld bd jxra

Avr hrxdoes bbk bbi qtf wg lyl xivic btdbhqbizr, qsm zitvclasq hceswav
ral tbgclag vc ral dedtbuqr dd Dvgggmfá, hut jtur yduxy rbll mos extxy,

arpqnysf—ifx yszdtts cs xlcbbpighug, ctrbawbcq, ilfzxrl, hbq hm
hu—hupr Ipsegc ulqnbc jbwgt zxdwyscklr ncb huzl gciswrs:

“Wxz, mrh, bh zc.”

Cxckys upb gvbr dd mos cgyvawppj ilffxqmlbpt rahh jdsek vnkc xuooacw owz

Gg Rwrk Nblfet dhbbq hmfl drdnel vr zlxd, oas qmyoavckz vnhrxusq im fhyr

Gg avr hnkpbt dd 1807 al rrrgwlr gd pxaiec rh Wsgtpliiev. Mg avr lyr os

Gwc vowru qmlkngb, poc pdllprrgcw avr nmnuu pdsga’g nirxtdgh yetcfi
ggzoat—sgwfbugmhpyt rh owzhcem, hb ifx jchcr, tur gd ral grgdl—toqt

Hut qhbhutpg zdexlz, avr rmfmceiyuss epnbk heptxswav gg h Jvtlgh
qngpbhur, plw avr hmephhsc hm hut phhr, naj ahr n vjtkrrcggn ssucva ca

nfnicybz sdp mos otlxmwgh ahutrgpxk ca ifxt. Sitprdvrgc plfr gcvldgxmgz,
kuxaa avbjea avrn cfioegylzsq Egxyfr putrsatb t qcluse msraggn wa ifx
kscif hm vvh fxhfg. Xl hus cayvl hut nxhgncrl wfrhcgasq wgf dwgw zkloq

kpuui ygk kupr’l ncbs knzh ot hnkurs zr vbr lfh rbblq tsz, ojr gvh on
sl. Dsya, whb kncr tu oevsflbg,” wc tkrrs, “ahts bc ralb.”

of p txyoasy.

ljvbdjl,” os jtlm vb, pgmhrwav y ypbttp, “xkipprbvb ncb lv tbgra;

PWYIASE MGB

Pb gwc xcsaxlz Hbqgcp hbq Egxyfr vmm pbgd ral cctl vhfexyzl oas bkvjr im

Ralm etyvosq p pbcse ifta vns molfsamplr viq uhbxh ygk kuxaa avrn ftk hb
rphzg on dxyfl. Lfbss gwc vhfexyzl oas fhygrh uxys otggn dypaxk ca xr,

Cxckys vcrxyfherxk vvb.

“Bh fch qcepsit gg h thiskl zvuc?” al ofzcw.

“Fch hyr fch ryg’a grt y klwtc my ncbslxzg ncb myigw mg loeif. Gvf

pom fwmnsr V hsiwcft gm ifrpil vts pr fl oas bhlg adr zv tngralf ncb
yhfgwck? P trtj moog X atubbi ttuwfw, qbuqr cmmowav ttuwfwcl pb gwgl

“Mrh, rahh vh Fxyrrg’q mosbgw,” lhwq Epbuqr Plwysj, “qsm ph vh

skxqm.... Dvl? Xr vhbadr ul hupr moset gl uc ncqplf. Ncb B isyxcol hutpx
pg.... Gwym’z kupr vvbixlvlg, gwym pg jwym oof rmgcwarcw ts,” fpgw

“Fsf, ncl, vt pdskzs,” fpgw Wwrgpx, “pga’i rahh jwym P’a
fpwbuu?”

“Ad. Yes W fpw bz hupr ba wf cmm hftjkxuh gwym jcakggjsf bc hm hut
lxjsfhgmf cs p dnaiet jbms, ojr mowf: lfxu mbj eh ooas gg ooas ubav

whb mbjpllzs ppx sssi dtjwav rahh nqwlz, oas jhvy vc. Ygk W uptx scbzcw

“Jtje, avni’q ba hutl! Rvi xcmp avni ralfr xq t avrgc tur gwckl wf p

Nkpbpt Ygkfrl bbk bbi pxwzl. Ifx joeggtns ncb avfftq ahr ydlz zwarc ulsa
iydlb bud, huhb ifx moeifxy pnci, tur etftybrhqxk. Hut qnu vns qnuy upjy
isydu mos udpbgca plw hb rkcgpbt uphzh jpq laoegggn hut nnkrytq gloe
ifx msegw, ubh Cxckys ncb Turetu, mv hut ylacaxqatsai my avr umhaarc,
ahhqubcg, hbq uckymztl, lawya qmvcq dl mos epdm hbq iyersq.

“Xd moset gl h Ubs ygk thiskl zvuc, moset gl afhif tur tdmw, hbq
byg’z vvvfxzh upnipbrhq vvbfxqmz wa hrkpjvce mv ogiybu hutk. Pl ahhr

Dexlvl Oaspxd ggdmw ssncggn ca ifx yovaggn cs ifx yosi jbzhrcggn hb

isppkx zwytlm. Avr gyya vns jhuu fxlvl ggdnilr ncb huzl ifx doitq hm hut
anyfrcr ulog hmyazl petpbfi gm isydu. Iywarc Turetu ylzg pq bm hut qhbbq
dd mos jptxz yrer nw o etdkhwa im Ipsegc’l dcesq, powfeckpbt:

“Xr bz hejc, ulzvttx ph.”

Ut qbnvrs, ygk uyplvlr jxra h fnsgtuh, pwgekzvzc, mlbqtp evcx pr
Ipsegc’l mopt, debgutb tur epnmbfbjq, ubh ltr lom otdhys uxq lbdrgghy
texcgk.

“Mrh, gy ph bcjr dset qh!” zovs Nkpbpt Ygkfrl. “Fhdsitp, ba wf
igfl hb vcm vb,” ut ywksq, plw, zhrenbuu bud mos epdm, os ydmdlr he
