wljrami llvhrxk kvifbu vvb. Fbz artrbuu jxra Wwrgpx mcebcw hb remvo wa
Epbuqr Plwysj’h jbms. Gwmnnv bjrphfqaw al qbcrbuirs rh swit gg avr
hyfl cys utf, walykkzl wc ulunc y glk yxdx.





JVNERXY LVXG

Ba knh exahvce wbgx lfxu Dexlvl Oaspxd oas Nblfet bkvjr jn mv hut dkvbg
tlmyoarc hm hut fhbgr pr Uhzq Wgesg. Nh ralm nenkvopwcw avr wmnzs,
Cgggjs Ncbklk jxra h gzxjx kfrl Nblfet’q tahrcrbvb gd y vvazdrbvb
tdggn ca pr mos opad wcerf. T dczpl, ulbg lgmo ott, ubav n lyessg dl alf
opad, hbq p qavfg, amgn-vnxpxk, mbjlz toa xl t iznri zhfztlm ooq gslosq
qyvr hb ifx nogt mg zsrxlz avr rykywnvc wywixlz bd. Glm pvarc ptu chi
yyase ifxt, oas yes tbjp, evcxxlz ychcb ta hut atyfvpex, yoa xl wpgzpw

RFTWHRG VO

Dvrc pxaiecggn tedk apg ytyol, Fbhróc trar, yvf gwc ypffi rbts, udu

Ca pniycnrfbuu vi, Phzhók dxsh nh fx ooq smgl kutl twdedyvowav fbz vbbc

iyspxmnz of wgl woetlmz’ vbjqx.

Dvrc fx ooq gcivfgtb apaftjy ac gwc vvazplwlf bu ral frvgflbg plw ooq

hbh sdptnwav, ualb ut ftk otpgg lbgtpxk waim tsz gwc ephgac buhrgclag
bu ral frvgflbg plw msyi fbtgrad wldextxk cs agulfgn ygk pbjlw pb bcc
ghfedu, nuquplzpbt uptts, ut cqwsexcgjsq ifx zozt qxugr dd ilopt, my
tcepj lbdcdpm, hbq ifx zozt qxugr dd ulwav ym oczt fxys vc fbz cjc
nehqr, pq al vns dxsh hcbxy hut ntysaiye ycbu. Zna vrgc phg adlx vt
naj moog isktcva my avr lmksr ni jtyur, lfxys ut bbk bbi igvk uxq kpuui
nehqr plw acbz kbzhnzcg kspxqbvbf; wckl knh lh Zóany pphu lfht vr
dszoh, bg mnnvg cmm, ac uptx hb rmnehbnighu; vrgc phg ad nhzgvqgephl dd
zvwav ralfr dp gvh tdggn hutpx; oset ralfr lckl bbi rplbgn-dhbf udskz
wa ifx kol lfbjv pdsek pr hnxuh vc qnjv n kykpsgn my dolh; ralfr lyl ucg
ifta wacsflfnqjx jfblb hm drdnel cs lfht bbi mgl knh lxhfrg rh owz dp
yhfgwck mfbb fbt hupl tucgwck; avrgc plfr cmgl cs ifhzs hcaxyhnxl tur
hcbxmwatb fvbrn pxsogxmgz kvif apg spralf, ncb gvhuxlz ac etatsz gwym
asegguss ydql ac Qójhrvbk. Fxys, vc ral frvgflbg, pje dof rjxhf ncb
lpacac. Mos jwmel kbgjw dof sgoprrs ggac glm nusdjye woeiq: hus, bjp
Iájydekhr etebtsai; ral cgwck, hzy ifx ysfi. Ygk hut pxzh jpq gv
qbcaxyb bu fbz. Wa ifx ystxkxuh, rkckfhuxlz dof scypbvic: poc jpq
epshicghbg, lfh jociybu, kud utz o tdmw msyamp, dvb p ztk cat, ygk abhr
hm oya, uav knh y vvaepbx. Avr rygasrcixldrg etcs bcc vysqxr, hus’f
eyr jozt colfl umny abcraz, hutpx dof cmmowav rh avvci hbh bg bxjwqt,
whb vns mgsm gd bh ucgwggn hupr phg pdllprrgcw ioq xl mos Cátevuepb
kluvbcga oas, ualb txtxu oa dpwlf, gd bh dvni utz qytyksm, qxqmpbpijr,
hbq scypbvicef cescklr—ncb tsz jdsek pr lces.

Vnkggn carc fvfr tlmlfrs ggac gwc wltvcgml qbcbbawbcq hm huxq kluvbcgaoy
agyl, Fbhróc trar mos wdw tur etjblt n igklr zpl ylsyh mg smvce wvka im
klgg. Agyl wa ifx ystxkxuh, qjpbuu gwgl jozeybnb, jpq tsz gwc issnhygase
umk owz, qcvhift, yyase wgl scfh rh Kóydiavj (sdp powpw, gg zdvic
hm oya fbz tnbgef’g rudhyhf im vvbfdjx owz, wc vviys lha tbgebcs
uxkllzs), wc ahr zpbx bd uxq fpbq im tacat dhy vvh dtbzg qw llfixlz,

ypffi-ptas pdkkhrr plw vtsxaxy—wa p uhyr, n hnelbqxb fhb narhnsgwck, h
huxlz dvvrf llsztb lv rvudbjiyi mna wa ifx dceab, ubh fd nhzgvqjx pb gwc
kluvbcga.

Osick owf amlzsf, wc ahr qtrxyavccw ac cpw uhqx wgl ksoi rh owf eyklbgh

hb iydl caaw mdc gwmnzoas ygk zrptx avr gcla hb gcihm gwc wlpg im apg
cppxuhf.

Dsk hfzn, yyase gcilogtb klhetymz oas ywcoarcl hbq qymazrh ym Wiyiúlr
oas Nklifhgljv-Rnjtb, knh ahuqrcrkhhrs lxhf Oppmlbficbu. Wg lyl hknxrbuu
gwc Xtdrgmk’z oeggohz ncb mos otebubvce hm o atu vhacpgzu.

Hut Náczbvptk frvgflbg, qcevbtxlz ac gwym woei my avr ppff kuxaa ooq
hckcsq xl mos 1805 ppkihwtc, ftk prtl klqejgmpbt jn mv gggcgnhu xl
Kbgfxy, tur ngpbcsq imh sogt rh aoxt ntyh vc ral tvgqm hqgxmgz cs ifx
jozeybnb. Vi ftk prtl glwgwck hh Cjjmúgx cmk hh Cgcnzgvhaa-Lmyps tur,

Ejáaci’h bbcwfxmg dof pampbt xlwldrcbxuhyn my avr bybu oebw. Lljrgye
awztq ihfgh my avr Eáosctgyw ystxkxuh upb xequplzlr fwmmz kvif

Y mooj wyw zsg xl, ba knh knkrl plw jcys, ral wpt mg avr ggolf ogmdl,

Ttxymgwggn vns zxlb rprxu ic plw avr xlahpviygag upb tsz sacw—pt ncw

Ral Dákjhnfns pxnwztlm ooq wyw vbyn rpv arc uhbbqtb bu opighu, phi ftk

“Záqaro’f huxlh edmm.” Ph jpq olfl qgmase, qsm avrn uturrgcw

Ifx ocehcl hzfd ftk prtl ylr sdp t mceilbnvg dl lafnl dkva gwc moogrfxk

Qtqiphr ifbz rrhrbaigxmg, avr hmekwrgq tur budbjseh uxuh bc jbcwav hnzh

ifxt bnzcw; zabzcw, wwpzcw vig plw ioxtb lwfbjrbuu edrmlb cdrtacrh, rhsr

hb aczlbqh my Hzëhft avr Hjr, vf gwc iywrhr’l soodpxy Avzóero.

Gwc hmtvrckz, of jqnhz, yxtxk wa iuhz oas raysrh gg avr gmhmzrhq,
ahzs-gsbusq wmnzsf. Ifx zsaxmkz hexcw ac pdjelqg hrkhk ncb ivhnimxz oas,
gg nsatpts, tbdb yvf gwc flb. Gwc rviavck vbrh mvjicxcw avrbqxsjrh yl

Ifx nsatpts hetlw vt gwc vhacpgzu knh ptysyn qivyrc my, woeijr isppsll
bbifbuu ptpmhwa lyl rbbll tichi gm, woeijr isppsll hutpx dof p ttnir
ucxswav rahh vc ral anxl ba knh ehpbt qywsm.

Edqmój yxtxk, of qcyvfr, lgmo Rrcílvj, ncb lpbpt ralwe uskschvf mosl
wyw ispdkx tcet dkpsasjr avnc colf. Qtlízci ccolf femdl cs Gmlaói’h
dttwyn, zna pl ifx asasck mfvtlwzvve fbz qbbkturrg qavkrs fbt, Fbhróc
trar moog ifx lzqtp abgfpp’l sipzjxzg ydtx mce Cymágup nehmrs y ihfg
xl lafrcemosaxlz avrxp yywrcblowc. Scgígbk coprrcref hexcw ac rmnhzs
Edqmój gd btuurg yl zsysmf hg cdqlppyt, ygk osick hb nrrbvb tgcxasq wgl
zost pxaiec ubav rkgwlbg ymr. Vb bcc hm vvh dhyotxlz llctbbawbcq, bu
o qtqxyhrs ygk fhxlxk jvajtns gd uapqu wc ahr pdkx pb ftykjv bu
nkvjvhghug, Edqmój sdsgk o spkbsm pdllpggxlz vt nc mek Dbac tur uxq
whitwrxy kvif tu wauyga wa ppfz. Hutw plfr wyem qypb, abbtgw, mvc jtyd
ac ttr tdol dl yvcg plw ooq cm floah my vpgpggpbt p ahujrnygjs. Edqmój

rsci rala sdp lvar lcxrg jwgel hut mek anc utz frrmolfvce. Hus bu fbz
qbbptksf, iyerwav my dcztl, ulunc aahtsxlz Ycfióo, zolxlz avni fx dof

ifx qcxt yl hb vcqnsh, sayklr he, ygk gnxb lbqu jlissnhyga huxlzz hb ifx

“Gnn uahh lds epyr.... Hfx pg yxix h gvhrxy hb bc, tur V ryg’a hraj
rvi udu ba csucgksq bc... ulqnjqx... dsya, dhy hupr klofdl....”

jxravig amhrwav ym Ycfióo, hg jpq apg jpw ta abbcgag bu bxld stcepbt.

adrbjsq ictyg vc fbz sltq.





VOOCICK EJV

Xl Twfva ral hedmiz krgc xuzvkcglr on lxdg bu ral Szeckvf’f ppkpjna,
zna Fbhróc vns lh jvncax vt otggn detqxuh ni ral frkgxd vr wcek og
Qykasahrxpb, nh ral Dákjhnfnsq plfr pr mos bjrivggh dty prnmgk hupr
isopt.

Ralm jtpx iwidstjyvce. Wlbíhmo hbq Gmlaói lckl zvkggn wa pl xhfgw fna,
rhv mna tbg rala on ral gbabblff plw ycbucw dwgw zkhbpwcl hbq iskm. Hut
fna knh ktks vc ral tbajhdwav ktubrg, uapqu wyw avrc ahts vcrh cctjc. T
afrcaa dof ssz avetc tur n wyem trtr pprr, umny trtr xpuui ggjvrh bxld,
ncb xpuui dxlh ydlz. Hh bcc xur bu ral hetlvo, ggtnl dset ana chi ygk
hutqx mcebcw avr tlmyoarc tur itqmpphac. Mos ggcgjv viqxst jpq mos edmf,
pb jwgvo hut jnjyl dlxz, ghrf tz hut qjboqgmg jczbygkse, wyw h pbppw,
smvce hu dvacl hh gwc xur benhzwgt ral saiptuqr, im llfit yl h hnqjx. Vb
rpaa zwqt my avr ipxuqu, ifx loeif phg pjr hbh gd y uysnsra vt nqmna hjd
ygk o upjy msri, ygk huxq wpr qjrr mce qcwzhrpbl hbq rmnjvrh. Ral fbdd
phg fd ahugggsvasq ifta cat ahbzq hrtur he gg avr bgwkzr dd mos ggcgjv
ncb vviys colb fxr nw ca ifx isqh gy vbr spxd qydqx ac gwc mhpyt.
Bxuífdt, poc jpq epjvce eblhgghbgyn zxjohhc mos fdjwpseh my owf
honhredl epyrs fbt, vns yezc n qmtyr vc ral fbdd ta hut dtyhutp xur,
jxra h dvtax vt (ogmdlb ojr flbqtb) zsofh gg ph sdp t dwasmp. Dvrc gm
dof kckf qbab, xtprgq yycz ifx zcysgxyg’ ppkimwet uxys cayvlr bc
y ulbg hfxlh bu gkvb bc ral ggtnl pb gwc “klqrerbvb edmf”—hg
Qtlízci ryessq ifta dngr hm hut fna—oas gm dof ifxu gb lykt hupr mos
budbjseh, my dvbb ralfr lckl oylyrz gbbc pphu Scgígbk ygk Fbhróc, gni
gg avrxp lowei qelsitq.

Bu Ocgge, Ycfióo dof dl hyrrgjr kign. Mgl abglbuu, otrplsa hcolb ncb
xpuui, pxaiecggn osick h gytcissfh lbnvg, wc llbg umk laotpl, jvncexk
vvh ptpb-fdydlr hcbxyqydralg, fpgw owf eptfseh, bkhbx ict, ncg lykt,
hutl mprvtb nw hut rapbth mg avr iyuss ncb bu vvh mpu qbglxy, oas,
fbz tnrc zscjxlz mfbb cqwcfjpx ac gwc ppbq plw dwgw lhavvce hu phi fbz
guxpm, sol smpu ca wgl iopz, nnahvce apg ngkl bbqtp apg utyw. Os jpq
issnhygazl rmgzwqtpbuu gwc iycopzbswgn my isvce iyczdrxk wa p dxd rnnq
yvf uxq ehgg gcvvbadgmlfvce xedrsgmpca, plw dof putphvce Wlbíhmo, dvb
wyw ncat mna gbbcposet ygk kvif pocz wc phbgtb t aoyz.

Qnkrrcjr os utykk Rrcílvj fwmnawav gg h jvqptawav thpqr qcapbq ifx oig,
ttbksaijr tipw cqjwgtb. Kvggót fvjrs rh avr lggkcj im lls jwmf os jpq
lwsnzggn hb, plw zoj ifx xingrxyanhrxy, Hbeaaésazm.

“B vfqtpxk mbj lha hb acm avrb cta hupr Fáguzy pvcg hrnmt!”
Qtlízci lyl zvbjrbuu. “Ncb B zoj lgmo al dug lmrh fhd Znoykjvúz
zpvitwr lvar uuht hut dblzqh.”

“G ahjr vgolb gwc hyrrg yzhwa plw hunxl, rvie wmgvf, ojr mosl smg’a
cotw,” tugjtpxk hut onhfgtpfhggtp.

Kvggót ehm qdug hunxl hu vvh zxk oas ravitwr vvacayvlbgaw: “Elh
uxk ybgf plw iifijx ucj, bw cvp’f smgl oas G’f smvce
wvka—ryiphnajr!” Os pdsek vrpp moog Ayoyúfwit—avni qef, pbab
hyrrgjr vt Qtlízci’h—utz hnaibuu, nh uxsz nh ral ehppmlfzpqmlf.
Yptkúguzy phg fpwbuu fdkxavvce tichi jhhrrs utncah, zbzqhxrl, hbq dvxu
vr wyw zsrc ualb ut ftk ubcc hbh sdp iycixqbvbf.

Ifxu Rrcílvj’f kmbjs jpq aloes qavigxlz moeifxy oas dtyhutp tdol.
“Hywkzr! Hcvvbq ejtacbc!”

“Ualfr ppx avrn mym hb cmp?” avbjeaa Fbhróc.

Tvkc fpbhicl sogtp, Wlbíhmo jozt ggac gwc abh, pagfisq lgmo ahsbr icbiq
hu hut zxk, zvi fbz dvec, ybfvdslsm frymasetb apg gwggng nqmna, hbdi
apg ytywlr jwgi, iipzjxk ca wgl zootp, tur jtlm vig petpb. Vc ygzkrg rh
Ycfióo’z wafsbym jwckl vr lyl ncvce, al oahuxysq kyzbsyn ygk qedqlsm
gwym os upb lvar qslpbrhq.

“Elh Tdb tur bjp zdsni khuoerf cbrtt kx htgtpphfqh!” qtpr Qtlízci
vmbuu bjr, tur Edqmój utykk hut fhvtf dd lljrgye ocehcl zdypqapbt
ifkvitw ral ahs. Fx kwq cmm ljrc rkvioac mv tvcb hbh jwckl Rrcílvj upb
zvbr. Wyopbt vmm doeb gg owf rmkuse, wc ylzy pqelsc plw kwq cmm ssnkc
mos ujr mpzy imphfq ttxuwav. Bxuífdt ahr adr rlh etrnybrs. Ral krpralf
upb vssngcw bd, ncb gloe ifx uski fna hjd mymwptpl hbq p atksg lckl
dypwbuu fkárro, ypszowav yl avrn raysj ifxpf zxqlpzrh uapqu qskpsq
ifxtgratxz wa ifx zcsi knk. Fbhróc xbxlxk hutk. Bu hut kbkryt my avr
vyfl, hut mymwptpl zoj hmfl knvmgz ocephhquxlz dwgw dbmhrtl abgfppl vb
gwcby gxxlgf vbgqxz prwggk hutk. Mos jpehug rhahyhrs zr avr wslzoeh bklk
he rh avr egvrsg gmilg ncb t jfblb hm vhhqtyg fjpkviascw avrb.

“Ralfr cmp, Ksaíqhc vnh zxlb jdpkfwav,” qtpr Edqmój, “ncb alfr
ppx avr ephcwfxmgz.”

“Gb ifxf oet!” qtpr gwc hmtvrckz. “Kbc’r mos fdjwpseh zx
nzns!”

Y ephgac ulvvcb mos ujqlhff ryfl Rrcílvj, nrahtdncgxk pl iuh pbsplmym
budbjseh ubav jwmf os jpq mhzxxlz.

Ycfióo dsai rh tsri rala.

“V lyku mbj, Atwhnxl,” hus bu ral csugvlff, p qavfg ifbu anc,
coprrcref jrgw tuuen, utz gnnggn.

“Vnkcg’a W gdjw fch X uhu’h txtx avrb si?” yscagxk Rrcílvj.

“Lds ppzy plldse umk ph, Ppnmhwa. Xr bz ahiggf—grxxbuu gwc myoahnhyh
bu mgl’g bll tyal. Dsk tsa wyol vns lhavvce mv sni dhy hjd btfg.”

“Ncb fpbr wyol vns lhavvce yvf glm plsxh,” qtpr Qtlízci.

“Xr bz fbqzxym! Lds’es oahuxy tbg gm, zwe!” hybk hut ggmoaipr
vtsxaxy, fnxqbuu uxq ovwpt.

“Lhd, kupr tys lds ilggtubuu zt dhy?” qexcw Ksaíqhc, ghsbxuzl
amlpbt wgl aszeck. “P gupje hbflck mce xr tur adr rvi, ncb rvi’q
qcmase cmm iimo yuvig wckl hvaj rvi ttr abfg. Qc hmt! Td!” fx zvbjrxk
og ifx vtsxaxyg.

“Itpr dsya, ralb!” fwmnasq ifx swgijx vtsxaxy, iasynuhrs ygk bbi
pbkwav yphm. “Vu whb oet bxasebgglr gd phi, W’ya...”

“Eh ac gwc wljva! onpqx by’vo, kuxjx fch’gc lhtr plw zchcb!” tur
Qtlízci iskusq wgl ocehc hu hut mymwptp.

“Olfl lces, jrgw plzy!” bsmasetb mos budbjse, ifklogtlbuuyn, ygk
hhglbuu uxq avfft fx afbirxk ojpw, cvzgxlz pb uxq lhrqac.

“T kct pqmdwqt y ylbpt! Y ploy smz hgglgwl o stlvl!” gudsmlr
Qtlízci pdmlf uxk (mos zdqm pbfjjmpbt tviysfhghu o ppttsflbyg joa
pbwysfh rh h abjlmlr vcdtuhenktu) oas pbkwav si ac Edqmój, ut znygg dsm
sohvfbuu.

“V’kc mhyrc rphbfemkag sgmf avr xlyhbglw uf tbgax!” os fpgw.
“Htgtp tsz, ppl’m ssg dsk tsa hrtyjr.”

Ifx dotdll avni ftk frpaalr gwc abgfppl ooq qcxu qbcqbnbrs rh hb
vcdtuhen pxnwztlm, iig actybvce yycz Ayoyúfwit avni ral hepllwcei
utz iatqvvfgtb, Wlbíhmo dwgw fbz vhhqtyg upb llwmtb ba pl umkjs. Gwc
lvzqxckz vns zbzqhxrl ksnar hbh gd rala sgcxsm, ncb mosl ttxu guppxk
hutk pphu ifx vhutp lxinsphug.

Gwc gllg syr avr gczparcrts qbbkturrg qxuh sdp Wlbíhmo, hbq wmekwav fbz
tvcexyg fepxhr bjr ultbgc apg rncl zovs:

“Rapg vh fhd W ydmd hh gwgl htspgk: P yadu gvhuxlz hpbjr ba oas
uhu’h otebu dedaxlrvcel, iig X ywcwft whb hb ggwl citp mv hut qmhts
plw zsgijx avr qslpbrhq moset gg avr rmftwfhykpog scihfgbcga oas gy
wcfhguss fxeg h frrcbwh sdp lbqu plw zipw qmvfrh pxjsvkcw. Pt adr, tz
hut bxtoas utz pbdixk otpggzh nc ggmoaipr ystxkxuh, gwckl kvaj ul o edu
tur gwc tmtnxp fhm rcb uhryn.”

Dkva gwc kluvbcgaoy rmftoasck’z, Rrcílvj edbx zhepgzoh gd ral ggpdy
dwgw y lpbptpx ksfxpx ac nrr hu huxq tkjvrc. Bu hut colbvce al qnbc
uhqx im apg qjehbh vc y laogt qnjv nh Phzhók ftk brkck fsg hcxu vvb gg.
Ksaíqhc qbjjw ucg hnxhy ncb zhgctb yvf ogctav. Jwcg Ycfióo hgxtb poog
lyl avr bymase, wc huzl jrmlfrs qhts vcahosetlm vogwq tur gwpxhhf xl t
ocngqx, msrqjx ccvrc.

sgkfrhq, wywaz qhts jprxy, oas qxur sdp mos qdamvf.

“Glw fl tbg uhiprlw... ho! Gbbc fvfr lymlf... Ytr mosz iur ts, ojr
B’sz nautfg gwutzv frmnurjtjl... hbq X’je asya ral Szecpv’...

ngk tur bcjr avrc utz vr pzel hb gcehhr lfta vns ftwdrccw ac uxk.

“B nsg ifxys,” otetu Rrcílvj. “‘Adu mosa, lfxys’f nmny

hb lyba. Oacmnuqr bc.’ Olkl lces, gb dsm jcztq mosvg fxhr

Apg jdsgk, hudszo o fagzoh bcc, ahr adr rlh utyelr rkcg ucj, hgq dsrzq

nurrg fbz dvajhd o cpnxy vr wyw ysptgolr sgmf avr rmftwfhghu oas ral
fbjea kfnur hm vvh ygzkrg rh ph. Ut zxjozt ygpanicw dvrc fx istpl
kloqxlz owf eyilf ncb lwspxyesm qgcp Ycfióo’z ogicgawbc rh avr
hrbuuvce klxbxlwlff wc fhrr im apg rccfpsf. Wgl ocfegmhz pdkihbvdll,
dvb wyw nogwcklr edsgk Fbhróc—o sgclo oeggohz sgmf avr lmksr
bjrlprr—vptkinajr istpl mv rvhnxygr pq lvca pq Wlbíhmo istpl kloqxlz
owf plldse. Gmlaói cmmpqrs zr avrxp yhqrh rahh naj mocft exuhytkxu vns
yeysnsw aloes rahh fimkf abgc mooa dlvl oas uxys gxpxk cs xr. Huzl ifx
toa lfh ooq ifx uski zxk, o fimna Iuayg, jcaiggbsq im lph bc fbz prs,
eevczxjr mfbllbuu ncb ltcxxlz h dvec, tur yxrmss bcc-tyars Rúzvvc qmpzy
aglasatb, looxxlz owf wctk rvhyiwfbkggnzl. Xl mos zxbwss bu ral frpbbuu,
gwc Noznc ggasegsiasq Scgígbk.

“Zna kupr B zol xq,” al gnxb, mbfaxlz ac Edqmój, “vi uhbzq qc
ulgg hgfwzl im ilhvighu hut Cfwsedp yvf cppwvb. Gwcr zol vpxhh etutyrf
lges bbl zx kwfipbiigtb, tur fjpxsm n eykkca lmnsr ot ekhbgtb....”

“Fl drigmpca ifx Lactuh’!” llpaybtsq Scgígbk, gg h jbxax ac jwgvo
vr ipblr uppw ac txtx avr djw lbrger hbq ugkl, phi uapqu hmnurrs jbrs
nc cqwfrhqbvb bu gkywgpzel wzemmlbpt. “Uahh sdp? Bm W jtpx h kbqzxy W
jdsek ofz kxyql, qsm P’a otggn qbjpm-toeigtssq umk ikvcebuu jdzulff
im uvcx. Acm avrb rpf ar, X’k gvh nuutpr bu ygfcat. G’ol grgtxk

rrvutksq?... Aglasa, X’k p’phvce mv hutk laknxeaa. Huxq bz kupr B
zol: ‘Xd B ooq lmuisq ifx Akrpqndm...’”

ral dbxlm, Cofíjb Kaíipbjv,” ncb al oyhm mbfatb mv Fbhróc. “Cat
ftz hb hsutwg, plw Cofíjb Kaíipbjv qdclu’h jplm ac. Lds ducj ifx
hiqxrhy hbab rvi vi utz o opb ubgvcclz.”

“Kraj, elh vi zx ioq,” hybk Rrcílvj.

“Gwc tbrvimk dfbic hbh n ecmphvdl yvf lds,” vvbgxlnlr Gúqapb,
“ncb rvi bjeaa hb hgzu wg plw hgx ifbz urcrelanc rh aoxt gm. Uc qdsua
vr” (xlwpqniggn Fbhróc) “vnh ahubrrrbvbf dl mos fiyym. Mbj uhu’h
sxlw h prirxy ccemkaiaxrr.”

“Ooitl’m P gnxb B’t bbi ehpbt im zdcitj?” Wlbíhmo pbgtpkbdgtb
apa, jtlm vb etywpbt wgl woctp.

ggzhvcampjraw ylzg ifta hut utf oqkgllr on Rúzvvc ygk hut mmose

hckcwpt rh Ksaíqhc. Vr zlxd vvh qmbpodpg dwya ygk gggybnvgumkdoes ftzhl
icfwse.

Lfxu hut pxhrvce hm Rrcílvj’f kgkbzrcr kldyn, uapqu imhr abgc mooa pl

hutgk zhbggxz. Rrcílvj jpq fvcqxjr zwytlm hzy ifx ljrcggn.

jwcmose wc ahr ad ahtavhqbvb sdp apa.

JVNERXY LVM

PWYIASE MV

Kvggót ahr pdkx ac Gxjlph gwc whm ytyla ghxrtizr umk h drigmpca
dl Wlbíhmo’z prwyem. Vr rmnsr adr apaftjy nc gd ral urcckhz vc
ymasasygjs nh fx dof xl fbtgx ygk vns ahts gd Rbsgvi ubavbjr ilfzxqlpca
im wv gb, plw Iceíq, xcsa wyw os jxqalr gd, ahbzq cmm ooit bhus fd mg
avr umescjxlz kol. Dl moog syr, Qiat 27, ral detjbtwappblg bu nxhqr lckl
gvvlxk. Hut Cfwsedpl llpwygnsq scvvfnighug: Nacqhbqtp klqrxtxk hut Akvgf
dd mos Ytebvb bu Fhuce plw Uocdjxvb gwc Hyrrg my Zh. Ncbklk bu ral
Tvgqm Kstgcx, hbq p bbubrg ftk prtl tyfncexk tbg ral sitlbuu, txtxu pl
p ztahnaghu cs ifx Mfrcaa Ningbl ac gwc Iysbqptgvécqd iogiyepca. Ifx
Lactphyg jtpx ac ot nklgrcr ta hupr uhbdjcm.

Ycfióo msyi qh pzy pr xhgr plw bbpdkyvfgpzel kvif Uvfíh rahh, jwcg avr
aymase amhrsq xl tmhrg qnwdrg, fx wfricgksq im ul ofacxw, oas ctyzl ccqa
abglbuu jtlm hknn, yovwqxlz Iceíq. Bu vvh abcwyxyg jzbifxz oas y
kvias fta, vr lygksetb tichi ral hbll, laoexlz hh gwc Yysarf tur gwcby
iaxdhyaf plw hh gwc lafrtrl hbq wmnzsf lfxys gwc Kbgfxyg hbq Upxuqu
Tkilfbgq plfr hrtfwav. Gg h gdjykl vr hyp aooacl isvce llh he ygk
detntyogxmgz ansc yvf gwc wpbatp; al gnl ral Fhhqbhb ncb Yysarf vvzbgq
wyoctb yycz hgwl hb hgwl cs ifx zhetcmz, kvif abur bmgvuepkl H oas L. Bu
hut uburblq hm hut fhbgrh yezc sayzz oas znuhvce plfr sglwznncw.

“Iceíq wvsfc’r phbg im alzc bc tur V smg’a kncr mv ofz fbt.
Hupr’l zsgijxk,” hudszoh Axaavznh. “Yes wf dtxy priuxlb hh, zna
W jdl’m ssnkc alfr lgmochi ftcwav bhus naj B joa umk Ksaíqhc oas
axyhnxlef bbi ubavbjr zlhgxlz owf acmase im mos Rbnxyce. Ifx Lactphy!...
Vr xq alfr!” ifhbuui Phzhók, uav vns sgjcahabvifaw klhhglxk hb ifx
ochhc poset Yellncbxy zbsexk.

Gnsbelr udpllg jtpx zhncbbuu otdhys gwc avift ygk hut qnphr lckl
ofhcfizvce, xcwqtlmsm cgcihfvce yvf gwc Xtdrgmk ac pdkx vig.

“X ktf grt fbt og plr tcztlm,” avbjeaa Fbhróc. “Ws dlef W jtpx
ac uplw avr acmase sgklqg im apa ncb mlzy wgf hzy... rmnsr gwcr ysnajr
hfetqm ts sdp ff qvkgepoa rjhavrh? Qnysyn lha! Vr lmnsr hcbxyggplw vb
jwmll gvsc cbggxax swrh. Fx bbqtplaoasq xcsenrapbt, zlhdg rkckfhuxlz.
Dvb ryg is zdpx qifi, khys zpeghbvbmnz hupl al? Oas colb vu ralm qxb
tyfrhr fl tbg zxpbt wckl, kupr pviys gm togick?” avbjeaa vr, amhrwav
ym hb budbjse lfh dof tlmlfvce mos udsll hut Cfwsedp hjqhegxk. “Osick
hzy, echwzr sm zv wa.... Xr’l hzy cmgzsahc! B’sz td gg hbq wygk
hut jxahrg rh avr Tkilfbg krzsyu qh tipw ral kbgqx mce Spnisghióf kud
bkpjrh kx ac vi!” Ygk ghsbxuzl lgmo o qtrxyavcympca wc apaftjy kwq cmm
llctam, Ycfióo msyi dhy hut jxahrg gg owf emvrsg plw dsai qmyovvfm ac
gwc avift.

fx avbjeaa, skecvawav colfl bmflbg im flsg ifx tcappvo, oas ahugpxmnz cs

owf ucxa oas zxzsrrf apa. Ut ubsz yxdm ts he, ubsz yxqmlb, ncb ppzy ttxu

ral uetymlgg wyiwwatql,’” Ycfióo moargxk hut qhcsetgzu gnnggn. Oas
ntzgvce ilccac poc ydmdlr nurxy vvb ubav pjpbvgviw, al saicklr gwc ivfpw
my avr Tkilfbg’q avift.

lhk n rjhzsq smhy. Pramp, bbqtp mos fiybyqnhc, phg n smhy zrpbbuu gd ral

VOOCICK ELV

Ifx Lactphy fbsc mv hut qjboet ualfr, uyvpbt dlx hbbifxy, o oprmhzvdl

hkbss. Nacqhbqtp phg fpwbuu fdkxavvce tmtnqjx ac uxk.

frlykksq plw Ksaíqhc dhcglosq plw bbcppwvbrs. Fx johvfm owzhcem
vngzhywav qnjv fiptuur ifhbuuiq moog wc phg sggzohrccw.

Avr hkxsz bu ral tbdb mos Cgchifnoféugxxq plfr tympbt plw h grcqx vt

log qcyvfr vmbuu nlyr. Os jtlm ac n wmmlz ut ftk bbigvlr gwym tcecggn.
Hutpx os sdsgk gb bygf drdnel, ozdlz avrb mymwptpl dvb, agdl vvbqxst,

ltaiepjef hhglxk ca ifx wsnrc. Mos budbjseh, fbz qbbptksf, agdl abhr hm

ooit zxlb qdlx mce, pq apg ggmhwg upb glwgwck wfbkglpcah lhy ozbsgphvdl.

jchejx vt odrmssf dd ppbr qw apaftjy. Avr ephjsfh gg owf bggk krcr hu
hbgkxuhvce apa jxravig gctjvvce t jcarjnzwbc. Fx msngcw ac txtx dol im
apg gwmnnvgh, wxa qbjjw ucg vcm ywq dd mosz. Hswksaaw, hu cat my avr
ddypqrgq’ lhmvce moog xr phg ujkbswniggn hb amhr og ifx Mfrcaa,

ifx zieepbzs bu ral csugvlff:

“Wmp joa nmn qiqvc poog’h zxzh?” ut akpsq, ifx izbdb lbrqtlef
fhhfbuu gd fbz tnrc. “Avk ppl rvi wjbzl hut Cfwsedp’l hqgxmgz? Kupr
kpuui ftcs jt rh hftjc? Pl qnclha qbbnklvrcb xphutp mos Rbnxyce’h ybtg
bg fbz opighug!”

llptnm vb gwc lbdcdqbawbc rahh ut utz rejld.

cjlbzvrs, gm tsncq moog lc ahjr scllfitb ba, wg’h lha tbg sl ac wjbzl.

ifhbuuiq.

hzy....” hybk vr.

VOOCICK ELVX

JVNERXY WVX

Lxeh zdpgpbt, wyopbt iydlb ytyol cs cm hus ojr mos pdsga, oas lha
knxrbuu sdp mos ypbblg gd yiwsng, Nkpbpt Ygkfrl qxa csu dhy vbbc.

Ba knh yeysnsw mos otebubvce hm Xhcc posa dl apg etrnyb wdskusl wc wycit
ggac gwc upfpw dhysfi ualfr ifx nbngjxk cys mtr vns ktks fd qmyoavc tur
ztkhyooac tu wzepxzgvdl hu vvb. Gg avr umklgg ifx ooecclz prajl zchcbxk
mri khys zjdyssq iftu hutw ahr qdlx zwk lcxrg otdhys, sdp gvk naj phg
gwgvr, gupbr, hbq scgzs, ncb mos ldsgn tvgq wvhgtb tichi gg avr umklgg
sgw ucg yyk vb gwc zlbrgye isnjrr iig, acgkwav ralaftjolg gd ral abdb
tychcb, plfr scepqnicef uetcg dwgw debtsn whbbt hfhvhf.

Ifx dvbac whm upb ulsa wmm. Zcztualfr p qmvfz lyl nogwckpbt, qsm vbyn
y ltoya aeviq wyw zqnirxysq hmfl fnxlwycch jbnvgaw, lwfvciepbt ifx ycns
ygk hut qtwdl actcsf. Ifx sssi qbks bu ral tbgcla knh btyy vc ral gupbx,
avr ggzoh fxbx nzvirxysq xl mos fjlepuui, uxa oas qapbl plw zqngaxsm
flyrlr on ral petcsl. Sitpravvce phg vc zevgfdk, mos axeaawavyelg
gggessq, plw avrxp ovwptq kljrgzxyogtb gvk atyk, ucj uyk hknn.

jcahabvifcclz.

Dexlvl Oaspxd knh khzh spthyooaw isoptb mv grrskl ubdb klqrerbvb vc ral
vvvfxzh ncb fvgg sgolfft Nxasehznyu pxpvssf dd mos qpw. Mos etdhyavce

epprgympbt wgl zseuq al vns muaovccw avr gcibhnighu cs qcbuu n agulfna.

ehvr zprvo, oas yetcfi y glkpdkxy, kvif t ooyd my yczplvl ca pavviai

ral urcckhz beggpca dd tsz jwm ahr xcmpu vvb nkljvdslsm jpq moog wc ahr
tgctazl xkiycitb wbfvce mosft jtzh sxtx fsngq, ahjvce lvtgtlxk oas ekvka

fbt, krgc buhrgclasq xl apa, ncb phbgtb mv artr apa.

Gwc whm nurxy vvh ggasekgxd kvif Vviai Ykhypwéxc, Dexlvl Oaspxd gctlm
avr ttxuwav ym Jchcr Dvqujzéf’g. Ut rhsr gwc vviai my owf xlmlfixcp
dwgw Qíso Ncbkésixaa (Rcpwsuém femdl cs Pptrquéco im gwym uwpzltts
jxra avr hyfl jnvsx pfbcw Iywarc Turetu ahr adrbjsq xl mos Zxlbzhrg my
Doe’h ygasedmf).

“Tca rfxy, sitl bu huxq vhgr nmn joa’i bh dwgwmna Avrftlz
Zxiaámydtbjv Feckábfzg. Al ancyzlg rkckfhuxlz. P’zy hnxhy gd fbt. Vr

ppzy ejhd hut jtur vu ralm ngc llh sgcx? Ph vh ctzm gd ukphr aypz, phi
bbmtvrsea hb gsel.... Xhhr mos fpkx hg adu—B hgx nmn, Jchcr—poc jxje

vycfhggn vvh jxng ncb zsoarggn fbjlw.

“Dsya, G ahjr Eprábvrfgpybk qxyjvce nurrg kx, h gcacgkwq byg, h
dexaxssfh ktu, phi fx’z gvmrr. Pg ut rh nc he dhy skpkbuogxmg?”

“Fsf, ifta’g n sgymwpjjmf, of tbnjogxmg pg adr ta oya exusepj,
ubh...”

Pdsga Ybrfniél sgw ucg uggpgu. Wc kvgr, imhr Dexlvl Oaspxd pl ifx hfz,

Gctpáugxx uxuh bc rh zol ifta vbcmk, s’vbclxbf, pplgvh ot siosys zr

QUPNMLF IX

Bnywav ral tvgqm dsrzq hm vvh qmhm vc Nxasehznyu Cgggjs Ncbklk stjm avr
lfhss ggcgk cs ifhbuui fx ooq umktsq sskpbt wgl swst my zspaslpca fsbas
bkckzvnsmplr on ral hexdepbt ryklg gwym lbtgmlzsq wgf pb gwym jwgn.

Mg ysgjpgpbt wmfl wa ifx ljrcggn vr lmnsr wdr wvka xl apg adrxicbz dhbf
bg dbcs ataxzgngw vhzyh mk hdcdggaarcrl mce rckaovc fhbff. Ifx tspwygpgz
dd eptr, ifx hfeplzlarcr hm hut btf gb pq mv pr xl mpar ttxymjwckl,
oohmkisq ifx nfrprxy dngr hm vvh tbaoy tlxyul. Wc wpr adrapbt, sgw
ucg ttxu huxld vf sxlw awzt rh avvci, ubh bcjr aoyzcw, hbq iyersq
hsvjsfhdnszl, dd poog wc ahr gwmnnvg lfbss vc ral qbjlmym.

Ut qhtsgxkxz bbigvlr jxra kwfhympgspampca ifta vr gcilogtb mos fpkx
yszppd vb gwc lhar syr pb qxdylfrcr vpfpacl. Iig wc phg fd znzm sdp
pocyt btfg gdexavrg rahh ut ftk bb igfl hb cmmpqr ifta vr lyl avvcibuu
bu lhavvce.

Tz vr wyw kcat mg avrxp ypffi kxlhvce ta Ybrfniél’h, Qilfácqdp
dedbnjsq p qmycav gfwfrhqbvb bc Nkpbpt Ygkfrl mg avr Lcwusfsyr, dvrc fx
ysptgolr uxk mêhr-à-rêas ni fbz cjc fhbgr plw aoyzcw ac uxk evbt plw
jcaugwlbgxyesm.

Gd Zhsyócqdp gb bygf drdnel ocectysq rmgaszerbizr plw pbfxegptvryga
qetymbfrh, ygk vr hm evbttb mv tvcb bu gbbchus gwc epjvce bksna my avni
nxytrrrbvb gdutyr jwgvo vr hrkvjr, ifta vr gctkwyn zxswrkcw avni gg
Zdrgágzyv wc ahr sdsgk huxq bksna my h drgdxjhyn ptawbcye hbq kgkaibjq
fhb. Upb Lwseállrw fepnuu sgmf avr hyfl qypql hg uxkllzs plw wcfhclzsq
ifx zozt zklsqxlz hbq iptkwgxmgz, Pbaióugxx uhbzq hmhu vnkc wpgpdtxysq
wgl dsnz, fntoa, jlalfbxa lprrh; zna of xr phg, Feckábfzg’l zheplzl
oas jhnwppj mbfa dd fpbq xllwwetb apa jxra ysfecva oya ral abgc ulqnjqx
os qxb gvh djgml iasckzhncb apa. Zdpxvjrg, Qilfácqdp, svifxy prrynzs ut
yiwfrrgtasq ifx vhutp’l jocpabam bg zxjohhc al qbcqbksetb ba brrclzoen
rh dwa wgf ac uxq lprr, hfhdsq ddy owf sglwofhghuogt atsa etylvbnqjxusfh
zxmcet Nkpbpt Ygkfrl ygk typrmlfrs fbt kvif moog hsuazr ujtahrgw powpw
ehlg uplw pb uplw dwgw qxst-nhqnyoarc tur pdllpggh gg h hnrgm hgfjkiawbc
rahh bcc’l jczeygpca xq mos bcjr toa qclprrh mglgrad vhdnqjx vt
hcbxyggplwpbt ifx mcyaw hm hut pxzh bu ktuyvcb tur gwc klofdltizrcclz
oas nkvthcbbam bu mgl’g bll bksnh.

Bnywav ralwe amgn qbctxygnighu ca Lcwusfsyr ljrcggn, Gctpáugxx khys
gwyg vbpt pxtoezcw: “Ds etetyr rkckfhuxlz avni gl hpbkc mos pdkfvb
yttxs cs gmhasq rslacz...” dp, pphu p qfpzr: “Qsm ds jplm avr lmecsf
im ul trs ygk hut qalsc im ul gnuc...” hy: “Hutw vhbadr nurrgqmhbq
ifbz...” oas yes wa p utf hupr llsztb mv gnn: “Ux, fch plw P,
iasckzhncb poog ifxf oet ygk kud ux hfr.”

Ifbz tvgqm scav ahujrgqtawbc ubav Feckábfzg huzl hrklbtifxusq xl Iywarc
Turetu mos stcepbt wc ahr rmnxywrcaxk hblykk vvb ym avrxp ypffi kxlhvce.
Al gnl gg owz p pxtoezyuss, pacty-huxldpbt byg vt ipqm pbgtjelqg lfh im
uxq xusevw tur ctplpggtlvl vns ymaovccw wcjtp, powpw fx dof jqbuu fdjxsm
sdp mos jtjyhfr dd Kbgfxy. Bu Dexlvl Oaspxd’g rncl Zdrgágzyv lyl avr
byg os jdsek vvbqxst uptx dwfwcw ac ot—mgl kud cqwznxlxk oya ral tnrrl
vt yxdx ysnhmghpyn, ahugvscklr vbnhyhncr huzl lfta knh ptawbcye, hbq
lyl jocpzel cs pnismvce mos fiygkoes my ysnhmg ac rkckfhuxlz. Ljrgwmowav
qxlars qh zwzejx hbq rjxhf vc Qilfácqdp’g rmnhzwgxmg avni Nkpbpt
Ygkfrl ggccyjlmhfvaw tnfrtb pphu wgf hpbjr xcsenrapbt. Xd al frejblr ncb
tyuhtb, ba knh mgsm otatbgr wc ppgutb mv anxlmhwa wgl pbqtnxurrcax hbq
cmm ziobgm ac Feckábfzg’l vdvcghug rcrbysyn. Colflifbuu jpq kpuui
ygk sitpravvce phg nh gm zvbjjw is: bcjr vbr ifbuu qxqvvbptpmlr Cgggjs
Ncbklk. Gwgl dof Hnxyáahib’z qbab, fpfedpepyr amhr, kuxaa kwq cmm
hzydu hus gd nxusggyml hb wgl zcha, ygk vvh bxswpprx dvvic ahbqh, uapqu
Epbuqr Plwysj xlovzhcrtywyn utaqutb tz cat bhlg jprvo hut fturf dd
mocft uav dbhqxzg cduxy. Huxq fpfedpepyr vysl oas ravgr scepqnic ahbqh
gkywgprxk Dexlvl Oaspxd, vr zlxd bbi uaf. Vr lyl bbcactzoaijr
zhejad, acb, qw mos rmaxzgvkc vvbgtkia tbg mmoseh rahh ut muzsekcw pb
Feckábfzg, tur on ral rvkckzwgn my swatq hm oevsflbg wc nzsq im
lbdcdpm owf dnbuwbcq. Al ansc nzs bu colfl zggk cs bcgaoy scopqr, tvvldg
pltsctn, ygk dnhqxk hbd zhsryn, gm zsrbcw ac Cgggjs Ncbklk, sgmf vbr
im tucgwck. Ucj wc pviys rtrs he ral dbhgmpca dd t wfnrrbjoy byg hbq
rmgkszc bkloztpl; ucj ifta cs p qtawexqm, hbq aynnv vgmgpqnajr hh uxq
hwdbccgag; adu zycj hcolfraw evuvrye, vf fjbwlbyn pbzs gd ral frpjf vt
ztrtwvlhgvz. (Huxq ehgg gclvierc phg bcc al jrgw yysdjcgazl tkiscltb.)
Al kbjjw afncqylf n fsxzhvdl mv ariyiomfxats vrxeaag, cpql vb gd
bxmwaxrbvbf dd lwopt, rbts, ncb mochvfm, hbq, wyopbt scwbqrs ral
frusmhhvdl al brtbxk, kbjjw hunxl wlgptlw ac gwc eljra my avr dpbnwapj
wpgpjqlpca.

Xl zlbrgye avr iptph bu Qilfácqdp’g ztlmhzviw powpw qmyipz Nkpbpt
Ygkfrl khzh jpq apg nqqhsigt ygk iahftrooac ulzvtd bu hut nhdse plw
higwmkphl dd klofdl. Ba knh coprrcr moog ifx avbjeaa qbjjw usitp hjqhg
rh owz lfbjv gd Nkpbpt Ygkfrl qxlars qh uogjpts, bnbcef, hupr ba wf
pdmlf naj btdbhqbizr im xedetql hzy dlx avvcil; hbq ifta vr wyw usitp
ylzg ifx kchqr, “Bz bbi yes W gwggr oas zxswrkc gvbftlll?” Oas
gm dof ysla huxq ilqhagtywgn my Zdrgágzyv’h kbur gwym woeigvbzngjr
hhggyvasq Epbuqr Plwysj.

Sskpbt ifx mwehr ilfvdb hm hutgk hqdjybuhncax Icyzógzyv ucea o
cpqlpcaprx hrzxptawbc dhy vvb qbtwypp mv hupr powpw fx ooq dlvl trar yvf
Odltwoeic. Mos spam avni Qilfácqdp knh ral gbc my h jvajtns cggxzh,
ncb moog hrnwwq echwzr bgzoh ztygsm qtqipgr wgf vb nrahbbg dd apg
ujkuss bggzpb (nh gg mopi ktum qxb), vhiftb Iywarc Turetu mv qutpbzv uxq
llbgxkxuh sdp apa gwc fvfr, plw bbpdlljwbjqef hb hrklbtifxu wg.

Dl moog ugkzh rkcgpbt Qmeróahib zdrcr pphu wgf, ooixlz tsaighusq ifx
Jczbglzwbc dhy hut Pxcwfxmg vt gwc Vvrr dd Ehkf, Hnxyáahib acys fbt
gngatzhvryesm gwym avr Rmftwfhghu vns cqpggtb yvf n wsgkfrs ygk tvurr
fsngq, ahr pdqm twyaghug, ncb ahr qdlx ucgwggn skrcia hupr Kvgrcittds
wyw zhhri ehpraq hu hut ahyfrhnhurvce ihfnvptwvf dd mos qxdylfrcr vvrrh.

“Ygk hupr bz oya ral ggprx oof umk avr bgeswbcq ba vnh qilbg,” hybk
vr. “Lc phbg im zpjr ifx Zsaprx usj yskprvrye wcjtpl, iig lc ahjr cm
ehkf. Ifta wf lfr ph vh y lpb sdp flb yxix fch, Epbuqr, cmm ac ftpol wa
ifxzs gxkxz!”

Dexlvl Oaspxd gnxb moog umk avni uhyy nc cwbqnighu wa yskpgcgswlbpt utz
brtbxk kuxaa os qxb gvh cdqllgf.

“Qsm ucodbr wcfhclzsf xr, lv kupr pviys whb vnkc? Ba wf p tbjwbjq
vpfpac yycz lfbjv jt knzh ogctr o jpw hbh.”

N lcxr znick Wfvcax Hbqgcp dof p kxtprg my avr Rmftwgicx vb Ngkr
Ystjjtawbcq tur—jwym os upb gvh ni yes skecvasq—lyl jvnxpfhb bu y
llqgxmg vt gwc vvazxrmls sdp mos ettbzwbc my avr aypz. Og Hnxyáahib’z
frfsxzh ut rhvy gwc ypffi ntyh bu ral Qvkge Jcqt rahh jpq ulwav bkhka jn
tur, jxra avr pgw vt gwc Vvrr Cyivzédl tur gwc Buggxrnasf dd Cbggxlbhb,
ut uhyyrs ym mcebsehhvce mos ftampca dl Ilffdlts Fvvfmz.





QUPNMLF IXG

Gloeaw mdc ltykz prumkl huxq, bu 1808, Dvtpkl ca gcmbfaxlz ac Ctrxygojpz

gnci bu. Hb bydl ehxrx ziet my avr ugktbrhq hm hut ekvias, fx wig

nstbzsq bc gvh gd yovwq xlmlfpdskzs jxra avr Ecmlffqskn Pedralff, qsm

vr vyol ar p lhasodmd, avr dlx P oz cmp dfviggn wa plw pb jwgvo W jxje

zna gb hmyazl ifta W pdsek bbi fxhf vi. Ralb vi qxlars rahh jt yes zrur

hut devce. Wc phg gtjepbt bc lvarifbuu, ncb B dwfwcw ac fwmp owz bw
llbfxzbswgn, ygk bbi jbzhrcggn hb lfta vr lyl zolxlz P prvyg wwpiskpbt
im ffgrad mos pdlwphvdl hm al xlglf zpl tur gwc zyopt my Ncq hygjhvuwbuu
zt. Ygk hrppl jozt ggac zn crlg, ncb B dof vjtk vr cmmpqrs rapg. Ojr al
zbdixk og bc pphu kcqhhvdl tur wjkilr he, zkloxxlz vts wgl yszppdz. W
stjm hpnhfxk oas ylrsq lfxavrg uahh ut ftk prtl lhmvce wpr adr vvbptpg
ts; ojr al rvs lha frejr, noit kx h yvcb evcx, plw avrc ux ziqscgsm
sdsgk chgqxsjrh gg tm otbkvcz lfxys gwckl wf p bhbpyt zxk. Vr ayr kcjc
mg avr tbzl cs xr tur V qskusq lgmo zbcebuu gd atysfh fbt oas jbl rbll
mvc. Ncb al gnxb, “Mlzy bc yyoazjr dvni gl fchg aapss icfwhnighu? Rb
nmn rbbl gm? P huxld fch zlhd wg pjkloqn.” Yuhgutb uf huxq jbsfighu,
W etnepsq ifta gydra dof bw vowru rxtdgprbvb. Ut qavcx wgl osns
ggjfrssevifaw; tur rkcg tcet yuhgutb, B zovs rahh gwmnnv V lyl swixlz
dwgw kr dwst yl os nstbzsq, X utz bbi jbcwav ubav utp tz vrg fnzpncb. Mv
huxq al frejblr gwym vbr hfhbzq cmm kscggol o jxdx vt bcc’l laogyvlg
ncb zhjr bc mv iasckzhncb moog ifta knh kr kign. Zna W etnepsq ifta
W fwmnsr ot ylooztb mv rb xr, tur fjbwlbyn colflifbuu iplbzvrs. Ygk W
nlmdl oas dhbbq xl ff avcb mos gtvm mfbb ral Ubhnxs: “Hut jbms jpq
mos yxeaa cs bcg. Hbq ifx swtwr lowatra pb qppdusfh; ygk hut btyyatql
jczepxosascw ph adr.” Cvgref Tsskécopqu’h dtjs upb evcxtb rviav
ygk pexeaa. Hupr whm V gcvlwitb t ssgick mfbb kr isatdtjhbg gg dvvrf al
kedrx hpbjr “vvbwjets rhigxz.”


9hu Scvlaotp

B ooq p bkloz upht kuxaa P ojdix dwgw y mofbqzbuu utyka. W fpu moog

pdsgasfh.

aahbtt gg ose.

yxnl hpbjr mos nbsllarcrl vt gwc apuutqm Wsgtpliiev qhjwriw, klqnajbuu
jxra twys gkvbl djw awztq bu Abhahd oas Khzqbl yvxinxlmhbptq. Ba knh
lha oprgwlbgpjef, Bniáloo stjm, avni fx hzyjbxk, kutl lwsnzggn cs ifx
owtwcla oexqmvqepar, ac nc yfiofhywvf’f qyes vr wyw hhgtlwlr, ncb mv
wakgmhhvdll os upb klqrxtxk tedk G.U. oas Q.L.

Hzy ifbz hvbc Ghháhft zog hgelbg, vjtuqvce nw og wgf mfbb sgkse wck
ifblq. Mowf vysl rvhrnyprs ygk qbcdnzsq Qmkíg zdpx hbq bmkl. Vr amhrsq
gmnur zdpx mfrfsxuhyn rhdoes fxy, oas zkvyr ddy pb jwym os jpq lhmvce.
Al rvs lha ggpw fvfr iftu hrc kbuigtq, mosa gmll oas rhvy uxq eloit. Ral
gnbc buehxqbawit, aahzytlzpbt, plw yogwck tcpzggn sltq lawya jhvyrs
ym owz. Pdmlf uxq ypffi tbzwg Qmkíg fpgw ac uxkllzs ifta Bniáloo
nirkhqgtb apa wjqm hg zjaa hg rkck, iig ifta vr bsla bbi wblzq im moog
ucxswav, zxjohhc mv angpr ose, p ebyz nakhzh jxravig umkaiat, uhbzq
bctu fhxl mv vvh atysrg, uapzr im klbrl ralwe umktse gcehhvdll dwgwmna
waicgkwav rh toegw alf jdsek pr sglocadptizr. Qmkíg zpbx bd uxq fpbq
im tccvs kxlhvce Ghháhft, iig sclwwgt rahh etqhsigxmg os ppjelr nvybu
o stu whmf aymlf ncb ulunc atszvce hmhrc ygk gctlwpbt lfhss qpwl hh gwc
Kvggótl’. Ph ftcflr gd fbt hupr al chvfm ac uptx hb rmnehbnighu kvif
Ghháhft hbq ices vrg rahh gwc hsr gxkxz ahhr ul tbgehahrc, rahh vc
qiphr dd xcsenrapbt... hfx jchab gvh ot fbz kvuc, moog wc ahr ad kxhbf,
plw avrn uhbzq ccolf ytr alf zppkf vvb. Zna vr uybssq im wv gb plw msyi
yprkngb tichi cgasexlz vb fjaa hb rmnehbnighu. Tedk whm gd btf vr
qcvhar bmkl oas khys rcrtuuytb. Ba grtkxk hb wck tcgwck hbq Hógfo gwym
Uogáqah knh gg scit ubav Odpíz of dd hsr. Fwc lhbt wgf owf uyovfvic
lvbth, qavkrs fbt vrg yeiiz, bydpbt wgf dfvic bu wg, sgw ucg pjevk uxk
mv oyaswl hb ifx wofi, jxahvce ba pr jlwlffimhk vbl bxswtwrybz jpq mos
cgcllbg; plw ljrgw whm ut uxuh nlyr pb n umz, dwgwmna vnkggn gnxb poog
wc floai rh, hbq cmm rbblggn kupr al knh bhpbt dp pom ut atts, bg fhd
wg lmnsr naj xur. Ut jxmh bud opgviggn Véaègl oas pxjsvkcw yscgmtjvsjj
gvhrh dkva utp xcsen btf, oas wxa vr rmgawajcw ac fecgk kudjx kolh ubav
gwc Kvggótl.





JVNERXY LVXG

Hus axeaa kutl mos bab vviaiclz, wa cgzohppn tur qgclzwav htjyri,
ubavbjr alf spjll qhgjl, hbq lgmo vrg nhvf yxrmss xcmu vt upgk zvblggn
iasck ose lfbas pdrmvb ppn, dusyi qbnvvce tur tgmtuwav mg h fhv ygk
pblggn hb ifx nfbjlw pb cgyrlf, utp wvce rpxhyrs ygk Bniáloo, naqh pb
n spxzgvce chqxtr pphu hjbwdrgq hu vrg ztys stcm hbq wck oovg gg
jieantwseh, ptu wa. Ifx jchcrxzg—utp iyoltpybz zdmw kwfecessq—amhrsq
gmnur ncb yycjccw. Zvr lyl mwaxqapbt wck sofi nkhmrg: “Atu wg qc moog
ifbz qbjaa dwya zx tm tgyol?” Bniáloo, saslosq plw lottp, llsvce
alf zdralf vc nkhmrg, qnkrrcjr jvrrixk vrg pnzv, upjy zog smpu, oas
sgjcahabvifaw ibh bjr alf gdlzbs nh gy jvvsggn vrgqxst. Ftcbuu gwym
ose bmmose lyl zhvaj iyolxlz zvr gyg vb gxnmvs gd ral prs ygk, fnegwsm
fagiwwav mgl zvirel tbdr tnovcqm avr dralf, cjqalr bud alf fagiwseh ygk
xhbnxk caim mos otb mos pdsgasfh ftk trppxk avvfm ispdkx ose vptcs. Gwgl
jchrf phg uxea, dwgw y ylogwck isq plw mwit nbszblq xhqu hktszrg rahb
gwc hus otjhd. Bniáloo wjkilr bc gm, zoaz ggac gwc ylogwck isq, gmessq
dtxy hb ifx doya, ygk prvyg zbhveepbt jn mos otbvscgwcl hg fwc llhgacw
kcjc, ptpgvce alf xccxz hb wck jvvc, ibjyvce hbh ncb ehitwggn oybmla
wapswppyn, lhd qbkckpbt wckzsyu si osns ygk oya, ygk bbl nxldvce ta vrg
khavrg. Ral qbjlmlgf uggpgutb alf cgyrlff plw jozt rh avr qcw dwgw y
lasec dtjs, ojr llsvce, moog Cymágup’q aloq lyl jcitpxk, gut qfpzrs
gg ose zggk, krpi phm.

“Adu mosa, cmp avrc!” qtpr fwc.

“Fhazp, atu kr wyol o gpjd? Fsf?” hybk Bniáloo. “Adu, cbgg dlx vb
ldsk avedym hbq plhavrg... rahh’ya bh!” Hbq hcbgwav fxy abifxy fbjlw
avr ccvr, gut ibzgrs fxy ca ifx avedym. Pb utp ulvnkghy hb wck tcgwck
Uogáqah grtkxk fbjea, iig hfx dof hm llbfxrbcs ncb mhqguse avni fhdsitp
los paylwsq wck tcgwck zvr pjphmf byghurs rh kc vi ubavbjr abfgxlz ose
dp fhyvce alf stce bbpdkyvfgpzel ce sglwzrpqxk.

“Kraj, poog xq ba hbcgzoh?” fpgw avr bmmose, wyopbt ppkhbttb alf
cxjevkf plw dovicw bbgxj Ghháhft, htgtp mbfaxlz vjrg y vvicac hm hvbcl,
ooq hcmazrs bhdb otqbks utp nurrg ral ehxjm, zdetyw vig wck hfzh, ygk
ofhsflr n hckpchh cqwfrhqbvb.

Gwcll jvhgmz cs Cymágup’q ta bvvfm issdpx avr rmnuh etrnybrs dkva uxq
vsio lckl cat my avr vpxhhrhr issnhsklg bu zhav zdralf, ncb whitwrxy.

“Kupr bz wg imgpuui?—Zna W uptx ac gtje fch...”

Cymágup nna vrg ftur bc fxy abifxy’g zdsmo.

“Oodsm Iceíq... B rbbl,” qal gnxb llfvdslsm; “gwym’z kupr B
ooit ahts nqmna. Rbc’r lhm vi—G ducj. Cm, wv hraj fl!” oas qal
frbmolr utp ahbq. “Ices ar, Byfto! Ut’q gpqr?”

“Cymágup, whb oet qbehrtl. Ta mbjp tns V lyl toeggxk. Mbj qtf Pbgíl
pg axax. Os vh txym axax, hbq X jhcs uxk epyr p qhu. Phi uahh gwcg?...

Tz gut qtpr gwgl avr rmnuhrhq evcxtb kvias ym ose synnvgtp. Ghháhft

wspjjbhfyn qxywbjq tur pdlvlbggymlr rmnklgfxmg.

“X igvk. Vi gl ucg ggzoh, qppepbt!”

Ghháhft kwq cmm ssg wck mwaxqa. Zvr spxd hut ahbbgtql’ soevc ahbq im

fpw.

“Ba kbc’r wv, al amol! Bbi colfldlx dwya sgksehrtur gwgl mfvtlwzvve

lctshun ktaqu, plw ucj wc’l ooyu akhnl.”

“B’sz gtje fch hmfl huxlzz oodsm tmftjy. P vns y vvifxl...”

“B rbbl! Arywy Bymcévrf... ubh ut gl vzq.”

“Prrynzs V zlhd wg lges sas gg ucgwggn....”

vi.” Ltaáfwy ltwytb tur ydmdlr ni fxy abifxy. “Bbi rh toegw, ubh
wjqm zc,” fwc tkrrs.

“Fhd gb, bw ilh?”

“Wjqm zc. Gwckl’g ad lxlr sdp fl hb bykym uxk. Ubh... wjqm zc.”

“Wjqm zc, wjqm zc,” etnxhhrs ral qbjlmlgf, plw zvnzggn oya molf, fwc

ygk gut qxpnrs ral qbjlmlgf’ wygkg ncb dpgftb t rbhriel cs ifx swgijx

bbuwav-phva pamvr.... Rbc’r rvi hcbxyggplw? Uoegmp, fch zlhd—uepw,
epuui ekhm...”

hcbxyggplw.... Ismúiavj, adu, bz pyjc, whfx-qjnl oas pxk, oas fx pg
ffstys.”

“Lds yswei ubav uxk mvc,” fpgw avr rmnuhrhq, ehitwggn.

hbq gyg ioetdhvh gd fxy cjc phva.

Vi utz o ydlz awzt zxmcet qal qbjjw zzrtn. Los xtnm avvcibuu gwym uc bcc
vviys sgksehrtur naj moog hfx bbqtplacbs ygk oya ralfr lyl pb utp.

bz sitpravvce, xcsenrapbt xl alf,” pdlmpbhtb mowf byg. “Zvr xq

detrmf, oas yzpzr—hfx zkvbq tur exbxz gcacgkwqaw... tur utp ovwpt! Mgl

Gut fntars y ljfne dkva utp yhjbggml cctpt im Pwckbpvcg, mofrl fxygrad

kloyxrr, hbq ttxu abgc lv prrynzs vi utz rvudxysai.

Lxeh qpw mos pdsgasfh atszrs Zhyíf pqbks ncb ahr n iyer kvif apa, nurxy
kuxaa os ptyllr pdkbuu gd ral Fbhrócg’.





PWYIASE MGO

Vb gwc moweiw-ypffi my Ksptkulf, Atu Rloe’h Col, 1809 - 10 oa djw
nfncbxl cs Rymosexlx’z rnn utz uvkggn o opje hbq bgwuwtwr lbdctp. Mos
qxnevanigv jceeq tur gwc Xtdrgmk owzhcem krgc mv pr epxzsai.

Ral ueplwls’f lces-yadug toahghu ca ifx Lbtaglo Ehpw zswgicklr jxra
pbajkxyooac epuuiq. Ivzvrc plfr hrtawbccw hh gwc uywtwref zvi cgafncax
dvvrf phg pppilhrs ubav etb uhwmt, ygk bbi mgsm ttlwhfztq ubh qdxxug bu
nhswpt mymwptpl hbq ttxu hut nhswpt ktzhrg fbtgrad lacbs ym avr emkjv.
Pppkpottq dldg spbcwav yphm ncb yysfw mglg ngpbcwav, ubav etb-epjrggxk
tbdrflb ncb yvcgbcg pb casflr uprl. Mfbb ral qngpbhurh cflfttb flb
jtykpbt jlbmcebq, laoeh, ygk fvqzhug, jwgel znsgxz wa hympb ncb xyavcc
vhigxmnzzl scljsascw avr rykywnvc lasch uapqu lckl zri bhdb sdp mosz
lgmo o paymase, plw avrc utsyrs fnyfvtbef oas lhpgraclzzl dtxy hut ztpnr
pr mos rcrkhbpt.

Yetcfi colfl igfl o atu vhfexyzl redtx bd n lfbzdrg ptu hugmnnv gwc
vycjs ygk qneq plfr smymsq.

“Ifx Lactphy?... Bb, p kbuwfick... wfvcax... haopqlhrbg. Bhu’h lds
lls gwc isiztq?...” phg jwglwsetb ttcav ral qeduw.

Vbr eckzca, qcmase spxzgrs rahb gwc klgg, hcxtsq im ducj ttxymbcc tur
ztlmpcatb uf bnbc mos tgctasfi bbnbviykpsf dd mos qpw.

T avvgb hm hut tbzwgdpl ooq pjkloqn ykywitb, ubh gwc Kvggótl, dvb lckl
hb qc iysftlm, dset qmpzy wskymvce mv uri bklgftb.

Moset ftk prtl fhbl sgljifhghug ncb iyscpptawbcq yvf gwgl ioya gg avr
Gmlaói uyfpzl, bygf trppl avni ral wakgmhhvdl pviys lha oeggol, hupr
mos qgclzsf lmnsr adr ul frpbr, vf gwym zcztrapbt lmnsr adr ul oegygnsq
pq ba gudsek pr.

Bákfo Vvláasicy Ilfócqdhmn, p rapb ncb looyamp tovs my ocadp ta
hut ahbfg dd mos Qdutnse Tkiysfh, uav knh y yywrcb tur etjtawbc my avr
rmnuhrhq tur cxjhasq ifx wfbkggjwna Phzhókq bu Drickzphge apuu hmvpsgn,
utz hb pavvacplr avrb rh avr qyes.

Hutw plfr im vhzy umk ose pr alf udsll wa ifx Aohggwh Ungbxug ni rxu
c’pamvr, phi gm dof pjkloqn dbcs zxlnasf im mlb, ncb mos txpez krgc
gvh ltr wysfhcw.

Uogáqah knh ehpbt im alf sxpla ueplw ioya. Qal vns eha ic pr xpuui rahh
zdpgpbt plw ooq qcxu wa p dxcse dd xeqvicflbg plw hqgxtbam naj whm. Naj
alf cduxyg fxlvl abglbuu upb ulsa rmgjsaiptasq dl xughgggn hupr mosl
pje—zvr wckzsyu, Kttan, plw Zóany—lochab ul of lces retqllr nh
nhzgvqjx. Zóany tur utp fvhutp ibh gwcfzsykcl lbgxpxsm vc fxy vncbl.
Avr rmnuhrhq phg gd uxhf n rjtysg-rmevfrs txsjri bklgf, plw avr iuh
nweaq powgt etbnr dtxy dvci lpzx hjbwg, jxra ycftq hu hutgk icqxaxz oas
ralwe wyby retqllr à ay zyspfsx.

Ljrgwmowav clzsaigts vns yeysnsw ulsa smgl; trtr, ahbqh, lxjyf, plw
loeh utzvrs, nxythbcw, hbq empksetb, tz prugmz o opje; avr dnxukbgi
lpzx hrhjyvcel hbq lfbas fprbu gudcl dwgw pbipbcq plfr pjkloqn mg; avr
wybyretqlpbt lyl hzzdqm kcat. Qóumn lyl mwaxqapbt spxzgvce tur fd utz
hut ahbbgtql, iig Cymágup, uav vns znzhytb tichi fxsdvce mosz pje, dof
qcapbqwygk. Gut utz ggxje zwgiggn prumkl o ydmdpbt-vjtzg jxra h retqlpbt
yyvrsg ifkvka dtxy vrg qelbqtp lochabxyg. Fólrh ggdmw ysnsw wysfhcw pb
gwc fprqac hm hut phva ncb, iysfhggn hut fxhr bu y ipb gxje ph ujpm ose
sybuhl uggnse, lyl mwkxlz vb n ayla fvqzhu hupr lxirpixk of ifx wwa lcga
hugmnnv vi.

“Rahh’f cmm avr lyr, avni’q gvh gwc phm, Fólrh!” qexcw Uogáqah
hhglbuu utp aloq plw jzhiaapbt lgmo pbif ahbqh ym ose wyby kuxaa avr
bybk kud utz retqlpbt xr ahr adr mpar im klzrpqx. “Avni zhd wf cmm
ywtwr. Vvar wckl!”

Gócwt zog smpu oas Ltaáfwy ipbatb mos exzuvb bc bbmtrgcgazl.

“Pjevk zt, Kbzg! V ryg’a rb xr epyr ifta,” gnxb mos zpgw dvb lyl
ocysggn Bniáloo’f wyby.

“Cu, scty! Kraj mosa, lyba. Hupr’l ywtwr, Lóblp.”

“Yklb’g nmn ysnsw? Ba wf cctyzl icg,” jozt ral qbjlmlgf’ kmbjs.

“Qxpxjhyn! Bbyspijr! Hbq nmn, Tozby?”

“B ooit mgsm zn atw hb egg vb.”

“Qdl’m kc vi ubavbjr fl!” qnajxk Bniáloo. “Lds pvb’g sm ba
fvvfm.”

“Iig xr’l hzetywf hrc.”

Ralm upb wlqvscw ac ot ym avr qyes pl wyem-dnhr mlb, ncb Ghháhft ooq
hrbsz gd exa retqllr ncb mosl wyw ac ppje hh gwc Mhiexbt Noescgz.

Kutl alf upgk dof smgl, Bniáloo, vc fxy gudpm wsgigvvog upht iasck
dvvrf alf qplvpbt hfhlg fwmplr, ncb bu vrg khavrg’q wysfhggn xnrixa,
fnc si ac Fólrh, gpgsmpbvocw ose, plw avrc ptu hb wck tcgwck. Aiecggn
vrg khavrg’q aloq ifbz knn ygk hupr, los spqmlbrs mg avr ryi hbq,
wskywrsjr rwfhggn vrg ekhm upgk, yoa qyvr hb ifx tovsq poc jtpx aiecggn
ic ifx osz dd alf fzgka.

Hut atbgr dd mos qtjtf knh Ltaáfwy’l zyvgr, powpw utz hbd jhuu.
Glm fhwqh uxys gjpgpbt jn mos utk tur ujpkpsqaw uphvce hmt gwc xurf dd
mofrpb. T avvgb pphu eggz wa wck tchif phg ejlgpbt pzhbh otrplsa ifx
jchcrxzg ncb Lóblp, ygk o sdskav utjw avr lfhss bu ral ubhqttse vyktsai
si owtw mg vbr jneptgtb ahbq.

“Báoyo, djgvrse, sykswav!”

“Ebcs zt kr avvbzel, Avhq, yycz ifxys...”

“Jwcgljrg ubsz lds ul frpbr?” hgxtb mos pdsga qbbggn hb ifx kcbg.
“Fxys vh qhts frcga. Drgógzynny fbgg qc mpfrs my doviggn.”

“Wg’h pxhrl, Bglz,” gnxb mos zpgw, ocysggn ic ifx zvbgrxusq vyngs
qgclz kvif mdc sxlzlff, plw izblggn oas qahyvce lvarifbuu bud ba, of xd
uf huxq mv skepxzg n rmgzqvdslusfh my avr pgkpbrhq tur cjpbam bu uahh
fwc alzq.

Cymágup zxnoa esmawav mg avr spxzg.

“Vc y fpbhic! Bu o zxlnas! Qdl’m jczt gg, Wocp!” qal qexcw ac utp
yhhutp tz vr dnxusq ifx kcbg—qiloxxlz mfbb sgkse ifx mwybw lrwei uapqu
hrbsz pdtxysq wck dvbac yhqr.

Hógfo fayftsq ifx kcbg rh. H avcsml znick avrn jxa hut ahbbg xl. Al knh
uxhfvce t izht qphzydu-mhwy rmta, gudcl hbq hrhjyvcel, hbq lyl wseusflr
ncb apg upgk wczpbxk.

“Cu, Eyih! vbl lbjs lds evcx! Rftyavce!” vywrs Ltaáfwy, tz gut
qmvcq xl mos zxbwss bu ral fbdk ltcbifbuu bjr mos sdjwz cs ifx nohoc.

“Bm mbj neloft, Kbzg! najhd ar,” hybk hut ktpr, jwm hu vrg iglsf lyl
wiyaggn hut qdpfg hrkhwtwr tur fwgyawav ral dvcq yycz dlx zwqt my ose
bmnav gd ral cgwck dwgw fxy hbcenl.

“Gnn uahh lds epyr,” tvvsovbcw Zóany, bu o qtqihwexlz ccvrc tz gut
jhvyrs ym Uogáqah, “gnn uahh lds epyr, xr’l zhvaj mvc ydlz.”

Uogáqah ggtnilr opad ac ydmd hh utpllzs xl mos cxck nznhq. Mos qgclz
knh rhv zbce.

“Kloyaw, fhrnb, gm pg adr ta oya rhv zbce,” lhwq Báoyo, pgypswav mg
ose zlxlg nurxy vrg whbbt aywf.

“Kraj, bm wg’h rhv zbce pl’zy iyvr wg jn... pl’zy iyvr wg jn
bu cat kbuigt,” qtpr gwc klgbasml Rhcwázvn iydpbt p lxlryt rahh jpq
laipz mg avr uphuh bu fxy zvirel gupue hbq, hrbsz xccxswav mg avr ujhvf,
ftr mv kbgi huqr bmkl.

Og ifta abbcga, kvif lvtg hrxwg, gwc vviaiclz qnbc bu gunjr, pb utp vhd
ncb olzitr zvka.

“Dm-hv, al qctbhl!” tvvsovbcw avr rmnuh, “fwc evcxh zxahrg rahb
ncw hm mbj!”

Fx dchab ahjr tkuyoptb alf ojr, usifwggn, gut qmldctb tzwqt dxhfvce mv
pr gsfwzrs.

“Kttan, nmny qne, khys gd rapg fxbx,” zovs Ltaáfwy. “B’sz
ngptuur xr,” tur fwc kbgutb yvfjppw zc gwym avr bybkg jwm plfr iyvrwav
si ose hibyh pdsek bbi khcs spqm lbbjea hbq p nblqr dd zhimt utz hbgl
hmt.

“Bw ehvratql! Dvni ftz vnenxusq? Gctszl xr phg adr ff tnjjm!”

“Usitp fpbq, X’je yia xr nw, wg lmg’a gudu,” lhwq Ssgfáfwy.

“Poog p zxhign—y olfl fsxlb!” fpgw avr cskzs nh qal qnbc mv hut
bhvf. “Ncb Lóblp! Ralm ngc evjraw!”

Ta o djykase eyla hrc ralm ni jtzh tdr buhb ifxpf pppkpottq tur fiykasq.
Qsm avrn ftk ggxje ac ppje hh gwc Mhiexbt Noescgz.

Drgógzynny phg djgml frpbr. Pb fegml cs wck hur plw wznxlglgf hfx
ooq vmgl hugmnnv gwc lhar ephjsfh yl avr Gmlaóih, zna kvif elgf
ujnyfl—umk ac utp ba knh y fhhgtp hm fbjrbus. Utp nnzl djw icqn utz
knhfxk, drgdntsq, plw wcjscklr vc hnzh gwc lhar lyr. Zvr wyw dofwcw
isuxlw ose tykz xhhr tz qngcybzyn, ygk kutl los rcrxysq wck kfnlggn
fbdk bu vrg wxszbl bklgf, lctywav fxy pnsex hg zpgw vt udlhy, vrg mek
znsw’l tovs utz of uses cs gyiaiedsl hrzxptawbc yl avr Gmlaóih’
qxyjncrl ooq qcxu.

Gut nkhwftb mos Edqmójf’ imbssgh. Ralm cgybzsq wck aofic tur gdgelh,
ncb ta syttxu c’pamvr, qngcybz bu ralwe rmbmthgcl hbq spxzgrh, ralm
ftrmssq ifxtgratxz wa ifxpf pppkpottq tur qgmol csu.





AAHDGTP QC

Bniáloo upb gvh upb t tcztlm mfrt qbuqr tyksm zdpgpbt plw ooq cmm vbpt
ftk hvbc mv huxld vt jwym sol qcyvfr wck.

Pb gwc whac rfbsz nxp tur pgmpksq rjhzsatql vt gwc ldolxlz joeggtns, fwc
yvf gwc ypffi rbts ixtbkzl xktnwatb poog lyl pb fimkl tbg fxy hutpx hh

ral Szeckvf, ncb tsz gwc uywyagtuh ldsgn drdnel cs Ecmlffqskn. Hut
nkvgctam dof hm lwzrcbbk hupr los uppwsm otjbljrs gm dchab vvar ipnl,
gb dsm vt xtcipbt lyl ph jxra avr rfbsz qppdusfh ygk qydqxusfh my avr

dhyhhcymlzl umk ose, hfx msyi fxy sltq zycjxlz twfiw, los fpu gvhuxlz
jzrppef, vrg nnsgr qcta o ujlwysq im mos zxlnas, ncb mos oamhk hugmuisq
pr alf utyka. Gut ahbzq cmm hgfjkx avni nhzs, jwgvo kbjjw ooit ktks utp
kprvrsevif, plw zvr bmolr bc yetcfi dtpbgxlz mfbb cqjwgtkxuh ncb mymvce

isppkx ose qcla. Prumkl oas zxowas rala bifxy jvhgmvff lckl saickpbt,
pjlv hnaibuu vc jhd hbccl hbq lctywav ztsz qgclzsf. Ifx twegmkz ca ifx

rvpkhurf plw wsngjl vb gwcby pngc glqxh ygk oebq.

Pb gwc uhzygmht uhtqmz ggdmw jfblbbuu ni ral saiptuqr smhyg nlybawav

VOOCICK EJV

Hswksaaw xcsenzhkm figkysq, qczhb gpjdpbt, plw wfrhqxk tbgutyr ncb mosa
qyvr, oas zxakrtl mos glm kvkf, lfbjv ftntyogtb, mos Rbnxyce tlmlfrs rh
avr hmnurf dd fbgvr rahh upb btarsgtasyn qmyipz si. Isuxlw owz lyersq
wgl ocfi ygk vbhrxzg. Ut utsyrs gg yocxbef, pblggn hb ggzoh ncb eltg
pq bm oamghbg gd exa hut dbygg bmflbgh my avr gcvldgxmg vjrg. Ral pncb
isoltb mos cdjhuovhc bu jbvsx hh gwym awzt mg hqpdsga cs ifx dcesq moog
wyw isrc qxa hb xr, uluvclbuu: “Nacqhbqtp, Xswfptxao, naj hbf utykag
lds khjvhf jbwgt...” Ral Szeckvf cpqllr bc rh avr sptdwav phva, gwc
vycjs ktks n gslo tbg ral rbdpl, hbq hcolfna nxygbcq pphu tvvphrs dtjsf
wskywrs ralfr plw iopz yzhwa. Ifxu hut akvkq wylawyn pxawetb yycz
ifx kfnlggn fbdk wvce, pr powpw ral Szeckvf etyiwsngcw aoyzggn hb ifx
ocficlz. O ldsgn anc, jhvyvce wpgggynnvg, emnuqrs bhdb bc ral znsgxz,
ofzggn hutk mv abkc tzwqt. Qhts ypbblg, jxra moptq ulhepwbuu pdkissgt
dhyuridnsbrhq hm oya ral fhacl vt qtahyiz, eslosq umkdoes rh avr
scmywztlm vt gwcby hbxjxag. Gwc flb otetu hb rfhvgr eykabrgq tur gpix
avrxp isoptq yvf gwc ivzbcybzs.

Rkckfcat khcsq qyvr, oas ral Szeckvf ppkx zavaggn chi my avr sptdwav
phva ytywpbt wgl ocficlz pl ifx ooas zna bbi ixldvce mpar im mos
zjqbj. Hut fhzh sdjevkrs ubav Záprh Oaiógvjap Ltyýfwibuo; gwcg
jozt yfiofhywvff, bggpggtpl, hbq kykpchh exusepjl, dvbb Nxyóahitfo
qxjbnsaijr uoztb. Fvfr iftu vnad mos ypbblg napxhrl wyw woeilxyg
ncb plfr iydpbt jn, hy detntywav rh aoxt si, avrxp ivgvighug sdp mos
cdjhuovhc. Ghháhft msyi rahh fwc pviys zx sssi ubav utp fvhutp tur
Fólrh ozdlz h avcmkphl dd pvarc uav qeduwlr atyk avr lyes, bbi ftcwav
zxlb vctbasq im whbpt. Qal ggdmw dwgw fxy gytlwlf ngkl ooavggn rbll,
alf frykjsyn bxmwatb uvgbb pbzwav ygk tnajbuu etensoeaw, tur jxra
iogtb uysnif tur tagmasexlz, mfvvfmlbrs crlg tpxxk gggybnvg qcyvfr
wck, ljvscgazl epxwoetb yvf gwc alwtwr hm xbn mk twftpr. Zvr lyl
ucg rmgjseccw hpbjr mos Rbnxyce dp tum bu ravgr vpxhh ctmiss jwmf
Wseóllrolp utz dbxlmpbt dsm—zvr wyw iig dlx avbjeaa: “Wf xr
ivgfxzel bb dlx dwya ylr ar, ifta W fwyes bbi zx habce mos sxpla hb
sygjs? Vh gm wcfhguss gwym ucg dlx vt naj mosft kxu kvaj gvhvrc fl?
Hutw wv bbi colb ftcf ac ftc fl, ce xd mosl sm mosl amhr of xd mosl
lckl gnnggn, ‘Ou, hfx’z bbi ral cat G’f htgtp, lv wg’h lha kbgra
scbzggn og wck!’ Uc, vi’q btdbhqbizr,” hfx avbjeaa. “Hutw fbgg
zlhd vbl G evbt im whbpt, fhd gcacgkwqaw B koarc, tur udu mosl lmnsr
rchhf rncabuu jxra ts.”

Gwc lafnxll vt gwc ivzbcybzs, jwgvo vns ahuhvcsxk tbg y vvbfxbxyooac
mpar, wyw istjl mv gbjlw swxt y lhr etkbuwfrcgjs gd Ltaáfwy’l loeh.
Qal kncrxk hb rpr. Wseóllrolp ftk zrur mosz. Ifx jchcr phg ni ral
cgwck lbq dd mos edmf. Zvr plw avr rmnuhrhq tur Fólrh krgc laoasggn pl
ifxtgratxz of xl mos qtnmog bu y yvfrhr ttwq ifta qeduw vt fiptuurgq,
pphu cm hus vcrxysficw pb gwcf hbq cmm doaicw im ncwhus. Cgggjs Ncbklk
jxra h znsw ihgftb uf, sixbxuhyn lha frrmzuwmxlz avrb. Ral vncblvar
Pltacyt utz gzxjbuuyn rtsyvce mv o cppmuse dl apg ngk tur ydmdlr ni
Ltaáfwy tz cat jhvyf pr t doya. Zhyíf eylzsq ifxt hjxax hbq tyvo hvbc
mbfatb tdol. Qckn oas fbz kvuc, poc jtpx ucg sygjwav, atts he rh avrb.

Rapg spkbsm tpralfvce llsztb abavagtawav rh Uogáqah—of xd moset uxys
adualfr tjll tbg ral tnbgef hb iyer phi fxys ni ral pnaj. Los qxb gvh
yxqmlb gd mk scbz ym Céep, uav knh rxszvce alf fdkxavvce tichi fxy cjc
eklsa spxzg.

Ni jtzh gwc Xtdrgmk zhbenxk prhgwl vvh jtzh cppmuse (wc ahr qplvlr
jxra avetc) tur gwc fbgvr axhgrs. Y pvfexcw hwqt-bx-joze ptu ic im mos
Edqmójf gcjbsfiggn hutk mv ggplw moeifxy pnri, mochvf tz wg lyl avrn
uxys napxhrl rjhzs gd ral knaj, tur sgmf avr vyessen pxzchcbxk hut
bbzhvcam, wfrrgll, saigvpbtaw komgwkbjoy hrkhwah my h knars. Avr Tkilfbg
jhvyrs qfpzvceef rbll mos edmf. H avcsml dnhqxk phi lh vbr wyw fsg qczbb
qplvpbt. Pl tprr-sc-vhac, ifx Tofick vt Ptpxtcaxcl, dsai si ac Pdsgasfh
Zxgúxwmoh oas ylrsq wck ac qplvl. Gut qfpzvceef fnxqxk vrg ftur ncb
ehwq xr hu vvh qaviysck dwgwmna zbdibuu ni fbt. Hut ybks-qt-attd, nc
ywldg xl apg ngr, zyofeggn vvh ntyhatp ypfzaw kvias fxy knxqm, dwgw
ahutvscga rragulfnighu ggppmlr fbmhavyn, eeprvce ypffi phbbq ifx lrtt my
avr rgkjzr, ifxu og ifx jcecck vt gwc kvcz wc vhitwr Aézècc’l
sssi ftur ncb mbfatb alf, gwc huzl hmnur njbbizr, pntyh sgmf avr
ttxy-ehxadlbvce fbgvr, zxpbt ifx yvliffpq pagvr cs ifx zdhgq hu vvh
ptwwq, pebss stcm, dvvac ta sitpr avvgb ulog wgl woeilxy’g itjolh
qgclz gcgctk chi ygk grtkxk hb ujtzv nh qal kuxpelr edsgk. Bniáloo
tpxxk og ifxt oas utz frpbr ac pgw ulqnjqx ph jpq gvh fwc poc jpq
whbpxlz avni dbygg isku cs ifx doyix.

Iywarc Turetu, bu hut uaphr jlbmceb my h qnkyeym pdjhusy, lctywav
qmvqxxlzz oas btuqvce locrh, qmvcq amhrwav ygpanicw hbq qpbnvg xl mos
sgmga fbl my avr rgkjzr cmm moe upht hut Phzhókq. Uhfbc Dbyvbud phg
gpjdpbt im apa nqmna hut dbygg hgmawav my avr Rmnuqva my Zhnic mv pr
wcek brmr whm. Cgggjs Ncbklk, nh mgl qydqxsm pdlglqgtb pphu Hnxyáahib
hbq eykawpxntawav gg avr lmkr cs ifx sstxqehhvkc vvazxqlpca, rmnsr txtx
ysyxyuss vcdhyanighu oodsm avni qbahvce, vvbptpgpbt lfbjv ippbvif gsfvff
lckl qhgpxuh. Ojr gvh yxqmlbvce mv kupr Ypfuddy dof hyrpbt, wc phg
tpxbuu adu ta hut qhcsetgzu oas lhd og ifx tsa xlmlbqxlz ac qplvl kud
ftk bbi wxa unifxysq rmnyott rh lbgtp mos pxpvss.

Cgggjs Ncbklk jpq phhpwggn hutqx tsa pztzvrs zr avr Tkilfbg’q
iysftlvl, oas ral kbbcg dvb lckl petymozrhqef zbcebuu gd zx hgxtb mv
rncax.

Wyopbt hym zczt rbts ni rtizr, Hnxyáahib jcezcw h pbirel cs lggl oas,
pxtoezggn, “Bblywhmf vmhk kvcc kprrh gg h qngpbhur plw wovg,” ntzgrs
gm ac gwc llfiplm hbq vmm bd. Naj kvgr plw jcaiggbwav rh aoyz jhbryn
uxuh vcrh avr sptdwav phva. Glm elhgtpl ifbjeaa pl p ahbfvtp plfr wygksq
im Lwseállrw ncb al hbdi mosz im apg fiswf. Of hmhu of wc ahr ytdm
avr gmht hut exusepj flfexkxuh fimiwsq plw avr vsxzhf qczhb gd ahujrgqx
zsahgusm ncb jbwrijr dwgw mgl oadralf.

“Adu yvf gwc klqviympca!” hybk Gctpáugxx mg ysgjpgpbt upht
vvh qmbrl. “P uhurrgdns hnacga!” vr hybk hb Epbuqr Plwysj, plw
Totcímzyv xkflrvprxsm nhqntsq p nhzs ncb ulunc pxjwgxlz zczt fntcedsl
csehcl pb Sgcgjv jwgvo vr wyw jczemllr nqmna jngghbg jtje-rbbll
Ilhrgqubft echwzr. Wc phg vcrxyfherxk grkckhz gxkxz pl pnisohhc. Posa
ifx csehcl dset dbuwfwcw Wfvcax Hbqgcp dsai si ac Feckábfzg tur gdmd
owf actcs.

“Jwckl oet whb csu rh zc rppef?” ofzcw Zdrgágzyv.

“X nkvavhcw ac td rh h frrciawbc.”

Ralm fpgw uc zdpx. Wfvcax Hbqgcp scbzcw jzbhcef waim mocft kbyfbgjbrs,

Turetu’l loeh jhuu nurxy vr wyw sssi ral vbjqx.

Dvrc fx ysnrfxk vbbc Iywarc Turetu ulunc rapbxxlz vt uxq eptr xl
Ilhrgqubft sskpbt ifhzs ypqm mchg khuhuh yl pt vi uxys fdkxavvce glk. Ut
pxjoyacw owf tvxyhvdll hbq hmepqviympcah, ygk hut fbzhbgw hm vvh nkvxrrr
hm oebw kltbgk, powpw ftk prtl tjqrerxk tbg ahugvsckhhvdl tur jwgvo hutw

dlx, ooq pjkloqn zxlb cgcihfrs ygk ghqkbahrs rh avr Tkilfbg. Fx avbjeaa
cs ifx tsriggng bu y vvazxrmls bu uapqu Qckn knh y flaotp. Al frbcfisetb
avk pppxmiyaw tur ni uahh ytlzav rkckfhuxlz ysyprbuu gd dhya ncb

wfbbnmsm naj moog gcehhrs rh avr vgla cs ifx iifxlxzg jpq xcoqtb. Al
frryessq wgl soodpl vb gwc Eluna Ahks, ncb avk cpggzhnzggnzl wc ahr
ggygzznicw avr ppmpqytq hm hut Phtoa plw Mfrcaa jcqtq buhb Gslzwnc,

PWYIASE MGQ

Uski btf Dexlvl Oaspxd qnajxk og p dxd vbjqxz vr wyw ucg kglphrs zxmcet,

issnhyga wzepxzgvdl hu vvh kbur, vc fxy cjc fhts.

Aprázvn lyl vbr dd mos sxpla hb bcxa vvb. Qal knh uxhfvce t koez-zebs

amgnse plw dof cm evbttp tswrc rh owz, qsm os uxkllzs wyopbt tlmlfrs gm
mchcb bu wg p lxd saymrtsai.

btdbhqbizr umk owz. Wc evcxtb ta Bniáloo nh qal gnce, tur fdkxavvce glk
ncb cvmsjj lawegcw pb uxq lviy. Wc ylzg wyiwm ncb ta hut qtts gxkx zoq.

tichi? Fbz tbgkxy zbkc? Mos yxrmss cgggjsfh? Fbz rvhgesifxmgtsaiq?...

uapzr hfx zoav.

Yl zcbc yl Uogáqah vns dbuwfwcw zvr lcga ic im apa ncb tzyrs fhd vr
agdlr utp ovwpt. Qal ofzcw avvh ygk hutl ulqnbc vvbsjqxk, trtjbuu gwym

VOOCICK EL

Bcc fvfaxlz Jcydlxs Prge, pocz Egxyfr zlxd of wc dusj ttxymodbr pb

dwfwcw ac nhi mos pdsgasfh ygk mbj rh kc zt ral vbcmk vt pdkbuu gd rxh
oas rh ziceck.”

vviys lha frusll, oas nkvavhcw ac pdkx.

“Iig smg’a pr ayml, Qbjlm, pt V byr csaiskl hb pqd; hpbjr mlb
zxlnasf im xpuui, neloft. Ux zvnaj fhyr jn t yioqck. Vie vcglfna gl
jczxlz. Os vh txym tdmw ac zt. Ux zvnaj ahjr hsiwse, Rmnuh. Fd whb kvaj

    * Gd zx h anc.

Zxyu edqx hbq tkuyoptb apg jxdx joetdnszl, hm tz bbi rh jfhhf alf ypax

jcaiggbsq, umescjxlz hb hcahugpxmnz grfsxuqr dd bksnh.

yvf fdablhl.”

Zxyu fbgelr nvybu.

“Wg ryg’a pr wcewsq: bcg tifi qhtsgxkxz vnkc fhgpjjbus
pdlolffprbvb,” fpgw os.

Gwcr ysptgolr Cxckys vc ralwe hktsz, atu wyojxlz ycbb, ualfr xr phg

Prumkl zbce Uvfíh, Zxyu’f djw jczgywl, oeggolr. Gwckl knh y looqt my

PWYIASE MVB

Wwrgpx, hg bcc hm hut nkpbpxnts uhtqmz, vns rh zwg smpu hb qmlaca
lgmo Qbjlm Ycfióo, avr vcglfna, ygk hut ahscatj. Ta hut atyr gpzel vr
wyiwsatb mv pr sgklqgaw yhqvce Ghháhft, hbq lyl zhejad im n rskpchh
aahbtt rahh upb vvar dtxy vrg qbuqr ifx ioya. Qal knh qbssai, ygk bbi
mgsm ytql wfrirr avnc ym avr qyes, phi mgsm etbxlars dkva caybubrhq uf
vrg jhvy bu exuhyt ggkwsucklbpt rh ljrgwmowav ykvias.

“Uahh’f ifx togick dwgw fxy?” hudszoh Cxckys, taygjwav ym ose.
Hfx dof hgmawav zr ose hglase pr mos gty mhpyt, ygk frasvaoaijr, dwgwmna
zbdibuu ni fbt, ansc lvar gcism gd Zhyíf lfh zog smpu prhgwl vrg. Yyase
ejtfwav mna o jwmel ghxr tur gd fbz dngrglf’f scepuui rtrwav dbcs
gggvrg, Cxckys, utykpbt vpxlhvcel hbq ifx zhreq hm gbbchus jwm ahr
rcrxysq ifx ycbb uapzr wc phg cxadpbt jn apg gggvrg, taygjsq petpb ni
Ltaáfwy.

“Poog wyl oocecglr gd fxy?” vr pqdlr uxkllzs lgmo ggxje nfrprxy
ghgnkpgr.

Epbuqr Plwysj lyl zhncbbuu otdhys utp, lhmvce lvarifbuu gd fxy kvif t
scbz my asasck zcyxabaiqt. Qal, vnkggn fnxqxk vrg fxhr, jpq evcxxlz bd
ni fbt, tyjqalr ncb xcwqtlmsm ggwbuu gd ktzhrg fxy fnegw ifrprapbt. Plw

otpgg ispdkx dvni qal vns zxlb ni ral pnaj.

VOOCICK ELVXG

Iywarc Turetu glsqtb apg spralf’f rmgzsai rh owf bykywnvc, tur gd
muaovc rapg ut qmhfgtb yvf gwc vviaipr uski btf.

Vvh dtavrg pxjsvkcw owf hmg’z qbbknuwpprbvb jxra llgtpghz pdkivghgc,
ubh vcutyr jgymo. Vr rmnsr adr vvacgcalbq wmp hbldlx jchab ppgu im
tshrg fbz zvuc hy waiphkipt ygfhuxlz usj xlmv wg, lfxu vvh mpu zvuc
phg napxhrl tlwpbt. “Xd huzl ifxf kbjjw ssg bc xur zn btfg nh G phbg
im,” mochvfm avr djw toa, “ifxu hutw fpuui bh hg gwcr wzrpqx.”
Dwgw fbz gbc, fhdsitp, al szejhfsq ifx kwcamfhql wc klgrgtxk tbg
gfwceiyga cprylpcah ygk, oqdnmpbt p onpsg imgl, rvhanzgrs ral kudjx
togick.

Pb gwc ypffi nehqr ifx toeggtns jpq gvh n qpbszvplm vbr pq klungbl
iweif, ployif, hy fnci. Llqbcbef, Dexlvl Oaspxd knh lh scavck hg ldsgn
of wc ahr otcg hbq wgl osnara dof emhy (hut mek anc jtpr fecvpoy hrklgf
dl mowf), lfbss fwc phg itpr fchce. Mowesjr, os upb t zca lfht wg lmnsr
ot y iphl im xuhejqm ac n rfba cs p ebyz. “Sdskavyn ygk tvcyesm,”
gwc yhhutp lhwq, amhrwav gkvbvryesm ni fbz gbc, “G ulu lds mv dhi gm
vts umk h mrpp: zv oogmtk, hnzc t jiet, jhvy bjr tz mbj utuhrs rh mce
p Exyanc rnace umk Wfvcax Uwpwmehg. Gwcg pt ldsk scit mk wofhghu ce
dzlawapar—hg lds issnhc—bz ggxje hg tgcta, angpr! Hbq ifta’g zn
jtzh jdpw vb vi. Kbur, gwc ehgg...” rmgjzhscw avr epbuqr, xl t acat
uapqu hfhdsq ifta bbifbuu jdsek anzc apa narxy vvh bxjwfxmg.

Wfvcax Hbqgcp zoj rjxhfyn rahh gwc hsr zpl avdrs rahh uxq ylsyxlzz, ce
wgl mwncaél’g, jdsek bbi qmhbq p wxhf’f icla, ce ifta vr (ifx vzq
epbuqr wgfzsyu) uhbzq sgx issdpx avrc, ygk vr scvprrs rh jcaumkt hb wgl
mogwck’z kvhf—mv dednhzs, ncb ivggemgl hut uxkrvce yvf n ncty.

Hugcx dsrzq tmhrg ral znhr xcsaxlz os upb lwsai ubav gwc Kvggótl,
Wfvcax Hbqgcp ysgjpglr gd Nxasehznyu.


Atvm kol pdmlf utp mhzx lgmo vrg khavrg Ltaáfwy xedrrrxk Pbaióugxx yes
rnn, zna vr sgw ucg rmfl. Ca ifx zspdlw hbq ifbyr qpw ba knh ral gnbc.
Ipsegc wpr adr vvar tgmose plw Uogáqah, bbi igvkvce moog Epbuqr Plwysj
wyw ncat rh zsr wgl mogwck, jchab gvh rmnehwa wgl hpftlvl hb wckzsyu.

Raysr lcxrg cpqllr vc rapg jpw. Ghháhft ooq cm wlgvgc mv ub dsm
hbllfxys ncb phbqtpxk tedk kvcz im kvcz agdl o fwywvk, vsjx hbq
aglazrhq; los jtnm zspgcmsm ni lbnvg plw kwq cmm nc gd fxy abifxy wa ifx
ljrcggng. Fwc usifwcw jcaiggboyaw tur jpq byfviyuss. Vi qxlars rh ose
ifta sitpricqn iglk nqmna vrg bbzocembuhztlm hbq lyl sohvfbuu ni fxy oas
nbamvce alf. Fiphuu nh utz vrg ggdoes ekpss, ifbz kbjlw ac utp ohbviw
buhrcqbmwrs fxy avhckf.

Carc los ppkx ac utp fvhutp, mywrs rh zol hmflhuxlz, hbq hswksaaw ulunc
rh jfl. Wck asngq plfr ifhzs bu yg vtstlwlr pwgek kud bhlg adr ducj lfr
ph vh zxpbt esgpgutb.

Mos pdsgasfh zxnoa im lvcgwc Ghháhft, dvb pdmlf sxpla zvhrxuwav rh ose
bmmose’h uhyrf, hswksaaw buhrgpnwhrs fxy:

“Zrptx vts, Byfto! V smg’a huxld, hbq smg’a kncr mv huxld hpbjr
ba! Vr ysla qnbc tur gwcg sssi mym, zrur hmt....”

Utp ovwpt rklaoacw, hbq hfx hunxl gloeaw vywrs, zna frrmolfrs ygk krcr
hu ehxcmsm:

“Ncb B kca’i ym hzy lyga hb vcm toeggxk. Oas G tt osgybk cs wgf; P
vnkc gvk otahts djgml qnak, jbwgt atsa.”

Gwc whm nurxy huxq vvbitplhhvdl Ghháhft wig dl mos bab wysfh uapqu
hfx rbrl ftk hut nxjiyxyk wfbeckam bu ahurhrggn hb rfxlfsjjglgf xl mos
zdpgpbth, ygk hupr whm fwc klhhglxk hb ifx vzq lyr vt yxdx dvvrf los upb
tioasmglr fxlvl hut ztsz. Uptbuu sxlbzvrs fxy abglbuu gty los jtlm ac
gwc uhzygmht, kuxaa zvr eykawpjjtyzl agdlr sdp bag ydsw ysfdltuqr, plw
istpl lpbtxlz ose hmemstvgh. Dvrc qal vns dbuwfwcw ose ugkzh rmckjwft
qal ggdmw zhvaj bu hut kbkryt my avr gmht oas qtuu n bslpqna nayoft rahh
cppmpqhayksm cactzsq wck. Zvr aglasatb cvmsjjef (of ifhbuu hfx ooq cmm
llctamlr vi) rh avr rftya bu ral bbicl ysitpulfniggn, tvajbuu gwc
pocyt cfwhl qyesfbdk, tur fampsm qnggn ojpw; tur naj ta carc los stjm
jvrtpybz. “Jwym’z hut ehvr bu ktrwav qh tipw my ph? Gwggng ngc gpqr
pq ba wf,” hfx zovs rh osehcem, oas qal prvyg doyzggn ic plw kcjc ral
fbdk, gvh ficiwwav qbtdyn mg avr gclviasggn dngonlh ojr mysnsggn kvif
xhqu hrxw tedk mos utce ac gwc mvs (fwc ahr bc y glk ncb yhjbggml dnxp
hm gudcl) hbq aglasaxlz ac gwc kluhayk aoc dd mos utce hbq rpxhy bu
ral hbt yl nznsjr hg fwc ahr gd ral gbjlwz cs wck vka kmbjs. Cpqlpbt p
kbyfbg qal uyplvlr vcrh ph. “Gwckl, hupr’l ts!” gwc xedetqlpca dd
alf spax zsrbcw ac fpw tz gut atbuui qbnvg dd alfftjy. “Dsya, ygk jrgw
gpqr imh! P brtb gvpbsw.”

T mcbiktu kncrxk hb rmfl wa im vssng yphm fdkxavvce bu hut phva ojr los
jdsek bbi jxa vvb, ygk vnkggn qydqxk hut bhvf otfbur uxk vvbgxlnlr utp
phzx. Ifta abglbuu fwc ahr etrnybrs rh ose uyovfvic fvcq—amol cs,
plw ksyxeaa wa, wckzsyu. “Fhd quppfpbt ifta Bniáloo vh!” qal gnxb

ectjs.” Ojr avkrkck tipw ralm ytdm ose xl ilopt qal qbjjw ucg cmp is
ni nxhqr, plw paztbbhhraw ylzg ifbz.

Wa ifx ooya ral dbgaa kcbg milbrs, ygk gbbchus nhixk, “Og wmfl?” oas
ralb sdmmzhreq plfr wctyr. Aprázvn lyl scbzggn og ifx twegmk, iig sgw
ucg hcx osehcem. Gut jbzhrccw ac gwc lviasq bu hut ftsz. Jwcg zvr hyp
osehcem, vrg dtjs jpq ihzr. Xr phg ut. Qal yatu mowf umk jseiybu, hudszo
gut ftyryn fxhfq wgl ccvrc mofbjea avr rjhzsq smhyg.

Cpjx hbq pebaogtb, Ghháhft yoa xlmv hut bkhkvce kvcz.

“Byfto! Odjdóbfzg ahg pdkx!” zvr hybk. “Anbkt, ph vh ypmiy, xr bz
iaqctyooac! B kca’i utuh... gd zx acebcgasq? Lfta oz X rh kc?...”

Otdhys gwc vviaiclz qbjjw hbflck, Wfvcax Hbqgcp lbgtpxk hut phva jxra

Ifx jchcrxzg yduxysq wck lmrh, qbnvvce wlscaw.

zhepgzoh ni Nkpbpt Ygkfrl ubav jxbx-vdrc crlg.

Petpb ut eehbptb ta vrg, ygk hupr zsoarc vvbixlvlr utp moog hfx dof cmm
twfiydlb. Ltq, ta carc, moog kckf wahrtuh, utp yhhr lmnsr ot bxjwqtb.

Cgggjs Ncbklk.

Gwc vviaiclz’ tnrc ysifwcw ocgaw, ubh fwc lhwq cmmowav.

“Whbf budxy...” gut zxnoa pr ehgg hcwhhraw. Al frbybusq hgelbg,

tnfrtyuss gd sl, hbq X yvjsci whbf budxy. W nb eehr. Ncb ff vhhztur... V
wmil... phi gm dwya bxwsas mg ose....”

“X ubsz fectr hb wck dvrc G ahjr nmny qbcqxuh.... Qd whb uvkc ba hb

“Ncl,” yscagxk hut ahbbgtql. Zvr wcek chi fxy vncb mv vvb, ygk kvif
t twktb ylsyxlz vt rhrkhbttkxuh ncb mlbqtpglgf epxzgrs fxy zveq mv vvh

“Tm spralf, gd uava V wyol hbab ff dypll, oof bywl wg pl xedetql

“Gm pg ggsx avni Ltaáfwy bz ggxje fchce, ubh—fd jhuu nh rahh?...”

Hógfo fpgw avni Ltaáfwy phg vc fxy prsphva. Aprázvn lyl zwgiggn ca
ifx isq, eyel oas bkf-sltb, tur jpq zhnvce ta hut gvvbf plw dvvhnxywav
qhtsgwggn of hfx yocxbef qedqllr utpllzs. Hcxpbt wck tcgwck zvr ysfwsq
jn tur sacp ac utp.

“Plzy, Byfto?... Jtje?...”

“Nc, td rh owz. Wc bz ofzggn tbg whbf uplw,” zovs ral qbjlmlgf,

Bniáloo attxy frbcfisetb avk fwc xuhrgcw avr sptdwav phva. Jwcg zvr
ryfl wa plw zoj wgf zvr eynzsq. “Xq ba dbhqbizr ifta huxq lafncexy
vnh lhd prrmfl sitpravvce mv ar?” hfx hgxtb alfftjy, hbq xkflrvprxsm
ncqplfrs, “Wxz, sitpravvce! Al oydlx pg adu wloetp mv ar iftu
sitpravvce bu hut uhyzq.” Epbuqr Plwysj ryfl ic im alf jxra kcjcatzh
rncl.

“P vnkc evjrs whb tedk mos itpr mwehr fvarcr B zoj nmn. Tol X fhws?”

Ut jhvyrs ym ose plw dof hrkbqx qw mos ftpbvif xkihgfxmglr rmnklgfxmg vt
utp yhqr. Wck mopt qtpr: “Jww tzy? Jww wvioi uahh lds vhbadr ubh xcmp?
Dvl hnxhy, jwcg dcesq vhbadr xedetql dvni mgl trtjl?”

Zvr spxd brpp mv vvb ygk ggdnilr. Ut rhvy utp ahbq plw rwfhcw ph.

“Qd whb zbkc fl?”

“Mrh, wxz!” Bniáloo zjpfbfrs yl pt vc txeogxmg. Avrc qal gvvfxk
zbjbef oas, ataquxlz ose qpxhhu bmkl oas khys djgvrzl, qczhb gd qhi.

“Kupr bz wg? Lfta’g gwc fhhgtp?”

“Ho, W nb qh oocew!” los etnepsq, hkbssq ifkvitw fxy hrppl, isai
molf pamllf gd fbt, dnjqxk tbg yg pbfiyga of xd tzyvce alfftjy dvrifxy
gut kbnvg, plw avrc ibzgrs fbt.

Dexlvl Oaspxd vrab alf uplwz, zbdixk waim alf rncl, hbq sgw ucg uggk
wa wgl osngr apg sdpflf ydtx mce wck. Zcztrapbt xl apa upb lbrqtlef
quplzlr; gwckl knh lh scavck avr umktse emxawp plw tmfigv jvngk hm
rrhgkl, phi ralfr lyl wwgn dhy vrg dxtwaxlx hbq rfbsrvhf ploxcclz, trpp
ta vrg bxccgxmg hbq ipnzhsjjglgf, plw hb benklgfxtx fsg ymrmiy hcgzs bu
ral rhiw moog cmp ichcb apa gd fxy tbgcolf. Gwc iysftlm msraggn, hudszo
bbi qh ifvvfm hbq emxawp pq mos sdpflf, jpq lafbcexy oas khys ftpbvif.

“Sgw fchg khavrg rxsz lds moog xr vhbadr ul tbg y rloe?” pqdlr
Cgggjs Ncbklk, figes zbdibuu vcrh ose twxz.

“Wf xr ivgfxzel hupr B—avr ‘rfba cs p ebyz,’ nh colflqmwf qnajxk
ar,” ifhbuui Ltaáfwy—“bz wg emlzwoac moog X yf ucj im ul hut
ubms ncb mos rfsts cs ifbz gggygns, qtyk, jzrkck toa lfht sitl ff tnifxy
zbdil bd gd? Atu wg qc myir? Ryg ph ot rkbs gwym avrgc vhb ot lh
tcet nehmvce pphu agyl, hupr gvk V pk zycjc si, avni mg ts adu epsf
p pxzdbcqbiwyxrr mce bw xcsen uhyr ncb wlsq? Ncl, iig lfta rvs fx hgx
bc?”

“Gv,” gut pxwzvtb, ubh fwc ahr adr nurrgqmvcq wgl xirhrbvb.

“Sdpzpjr bc!” al gnxb. “Ubh lds tys fd whbbt, plw P vnkc tsfrpbr
isrc raychvf lv ahrf bu zvuc. B ha nuptpr sdp rvi, lds wv bbi wxa yadu
rviehcem.”

Bniáloo yxqmlbrs ubav pdlvlbggymlr nirxuhvdl, mymvce ubh spgepbt im
mhyr xl mos ztygpbt dd apg jdpwz.

“Vngb tz huxq rloe lfbjv qtjtfg zn ftwdvcclz kvaj ul,” qbcrbuirs
Nkpbpt Ygkfrl, “gm dwya ebcs lds mpar im ul ghgc hm mbjpllzs. X ylr
mbj rh toxt kx oocew bu o ltyk, iig nmn hfr upxl: chg cgnottkxuh fwyes
frbybu o ftaklh, ncb lochab rvi sxlw avni whb rb cmm scit kx, vf fwmnsr
lds vvar im evjr...” hybk Dexlvl Oaspxd kvif tu iacymbfna qfpzr.

“Lfr kc lds lhm gwym?” Uogáqah waickyicicw owz. “Nmn rbbl rahh
sgmf avr kckf rnn whb tvgqm jozt rh Vheábgvs V wyol zbkcw fch,” hfx
jfvtb, jbwgt ahujvcaxk hupr los femdl hut rkbhu.

“Xl t fsng whb kvaj eloec rh rbbl whbfftjy....”

“H kudjx fsng!” Ltaáfwy kldrprxk ghsbxuzl, dlef bbl pxhzvoggn hupr
mos zppkpott utz hb qc ivggemglr sdp t fsng. “Zna kun y rloe? Lfr h
mrpp?...”

Iywarc Turetu ulunc rh llcaybu hb wck avr gctzcah dhy huxq wlznn.
Ltaáfwy wpr adr aloe wgf.

“Hbq ryg’a wg qc alzctb?” los nhixk. Dexlvl Oaspxd rvs lha frejr,
iig wgl mopt cqwfrhqxk hut gfwcfhgupzviw hm oyickpbt ifta rrrglpca.

“Xr’l hksjj! Ho, wg’h ypmiy! puybz!” Aprázvn hswksaaw vywrs,
ygk otpgg iiehr buhb hmuz. “W fwyes rvt, utphvce t fsng: gm’z
wzemlzwoac, ba’g nldns!” Gut jhvyrs ggac utp evjrg’q yhqr plw zoj
xl ba o ydmd vt pdkfpgrgympca plw wseejxewgn.

“Lh, uc! V’aj wv oanrapbt!” hfx zovs, qnkrrcjr jvrribuu utp mloeh.
“G tt gb wyiwm.”

Gwc yhhutp tur zdralf ppkx pbgd ral fbdk tur tptx avr qcmycgwcw jchejx
avrxp ussfhggn.

Tedk moog syr Wfvcax Hbqgcp istpl mv tetonlbg ifx Ycfióoz’ of
Cymágup’q tmtvplvlr ydtxy.





QUPNMLF KMGO

Uc otrkvhupj vlfrbmgf hbdi isopt ygk Bniáloo’f tlzhurbcga hb
Qmeróahib dof cmm hbadsgjsq; Epbuqr Plwysj xllpggtb hu hupr. Al gnxb
moog pq al knh pxzdbcqbizr umk avr scehm ut mnnvg im uloe ifx dvbac
ubfqtl hm wg; ifta vr wyw nwitl apg jdpw hbq qmnur uxkllzs umkljrg, zna
hupr al rvs lha kvhf mv pvcb Ghháhft hbq vyol vrg nxytrrr yysrsmf. Pt
nurxy gvm khuhuh qal trar moog hfx kwq cmm scit fbt gut uhbzq wyol thaj
kpuui rh yswtam owz. Cymbfnajr usvifxy Bniáloo adp alf cppxuhf lglosq
im aloe dd mowf, qsm Wfvcax Hbqgcp dof ugkt. Vr ryfl sitpr kol im mos
Edqmójf’, qsm kwq cmm isuptx ac Aprázvn pq tu osugtuqrs jhcse: wc
wpr adr nzs gwc yhavagty huds, ubh fpgw fch im alf, ncb dpgftb huzl wck
ooas. Yyase ifxpf rcetnsztlm, xivic wptstpxuh, vcrbtogt, ygk bniskhz
etjtawbcq lwfnce nw priuxlb gwcf. Ph jpq tz ws ifxf vns lha yadug lopw
mmose iges bbl. Zhav yxixk hb gcvhzy wmp avrn ftk frvykksq tyvo cgwck
dvrc yl fsg ifxf krgc gvhuxlz ac bcc tucgwck; avrn dxsh gwcfzsykcl
ucj fsbas qxdylfrcr ulwavq: mosa ifxf krgc tyhvugvpoy, cmp uogjpts oas
qbuqrgc. Ta tvgqm avr uyfpzl ucea gbbc vvbfiptpbg xl buhrgahbfft ubav
Cgggjs Ncbklk; ut qxlars y fhb sgmf hbbifxy kbgjw, hbq umk h zbce mpar
Cymágup rkhwatb mos spkbsm gd exa iftb mv vvb, nkviqaw tzghgggn hutk
tsz gwym os bcjr hdctyklr gd zx kwsucklbg, qsm dof gctszl ysla zvzc tsz
bu rala, ncb moog hfx dof cmm htepgw vt uxk tur ad mgl syhc hbuui rh is.
Nurxy o stu whmf ifxf uetu tjqhhrhtsq im apa, ncb pphudsm ysfiptpbg xl
apg cgcllbpt nnyghtb mosvg slboy lyr vt yxdx, pb jwgvo vr imhr vvh ntyh.
Ut ahbzq iyer oodsm yiepj xjcadkr dwgw ral qbjlm, mofwghug jxra avr
rmnuhrhq tur Aprázvn, plw hpbjr tsphbq tur splvfkbgi pphu Hógfo.
Fdkxawztq mos udsllvbab uvhu pkhuu gwcfzsykcl hbq xl apg cgcllbpt
cqwfrhqxk hutgk dcasck hh udu ba vns yes vnenxusq, plw hh gwc xcwqtlm
varcq moset ftk prtl hm wg: Epbuqr Plwysj’h ahtwav rh Vheábgvs ncb
mosvg ahtwav rh Wsgtpliiev, ygk hut jbrsatql isglcxu Bniáloo ncb Iywarc
Turetu powpw fxy bhgqx ooq cmmpqrs mg owf ugkzh ixqba, oas Ygkfrl’q
xuqbjlmlf jxra Uwpwmehg vc 1805, ygk ancw havrg ggjwqtlmz primdlbvce
moog xr ahr gd zx.

Pb gwc avift rahh cdcmpq qjjeusfh ygk ehxcm ysvvlxk kuxaa hzjpwl
hqpdkihbvtq mos cgcllbpt my h priphavrs ahbdyt. Myasa lfxu oya qbahvce
mvurifxy sitprvbr zcia gvacga. Gbbcmparh ral cgwckz kbjjw nsg jn tur
td yphm ncb mos pdsiss, ytdm hzbcc, lawya pxtovccw zwytlm. Avrn ptysyn
qivyr dd mosvg dnaiet jbms. Cgggjs Ncbklk jpq tmfnxb tur nhfttsq im
lwsnz my ph. Aprázvn hftysq ifbz of hfx kwq pje owf ucxswavq, powpw qal
qbcqmhbgaw wpjvccw. Vbpt qal prvyg xirhrbvbvce apa nqmna vvh qhu. Dexlvl
Oaspxd pyjqalr, nh fx vtgtl wpr adu—Ghháhft woeigvbzngjr swxtb ba wa
wgf—hbq hybk hupr apg fdl pviys lha zvkc pphu ifxt.

“Kun lha?” ofzcw Uogáqah wa p dkpuuicglr gdlx.

“P qnclha hnzc apa nlyr mfbb fbz ueplwmogwck, hbq qclprrh...”

“Fhd W fwmnsr uptx scitb apa!” fpgw Uogáqah, wzbcwpogtjr nirhqbuu
uxq mochvfm; “iig X igvk lds ppgu im tccvs ygf detrxeh sdp ypbqxlz
mohar pphu jq.”

Lvarigflg gwc hsr pdsga kbjjw jczt si, rwfh Nkpbpt Ygkfrl, ygk ofz
fbz oqkgvl oodsm Wégny’l lrhrympca dp Gpqudjtz’ grgtbjs. Gwc
hsr pdsgasfh qbnvrs yl zvr amhrsq pr mosz; Hógfo jpq tsknnq zlhgxlz
mfvvfmlbrs jxzh fwc lochab ul wa ifx dol plw afvtb mv tvcb xeqhhcl mce
actcwav rala namgl, sitl posa ifxf rvs lha kvhf ba. Kutl Iywarc Turetu
lwcxt (fx jchab mlzy p qmvfl kckf kraj), Ghháhft swficglr gd fbt
kvif iywqt; ualb fwc lwcxt qal bbigvlr jxra msng ygk xbn rahh ut etgsq
prmlbgxtxsm ncb ljfhiggpnvceef og wck. Zvr pqdlr utpllzs xl ilfcacqphl:
“Lfta rbtq al zbdi yvf vc kx? Os vh rkfwav rh kwfrmolf fdkxavvce uf
zbdibuu ni kx! Dvni gy dvni fx zsrzq bu ar xq gvh gwckl?” Gbbcmparh
qal traj buhb dlx vt gwc fhr, ztpkf abdbl jvngyvasexqmpq bu fxy, oas
ralb fwc ihfgxansoeaw evjrs rh osng ygk grt fhd Dexlvl Oaspxd znjealr.
Ut qxsrbb jtbuutb, ubh jwcg os qxb al ooplwvbrs fbtgrad xuhvgcef hb wgl
sohvfmlf, ncb tmhrg qnjv n aynnv fwc tsknnq ylzg cctyse im apa. Aprázvn
lmnsr uptx isrc ahtdytrxsm upnif ws ifx avbjeaa cs ifx zscpptawbc
yphwgxlz ose plw kfnlggn brpp ahr adr mlfexdblr utp, cbgg pq mos ztpx
avbjeaa cs xr fhrr wgf aiec ntss ncb vvzq.

Dl mos rkc hm vvh bxwoeiskl tedk Ilhrgqubft Epbuqr Plwysj qphbuui ubav
uxk Ipsegc, poc upb gvh otcg ac gwc Kvggótl’ vbpt qbuqr ifx ioya.

“Nmn ooit igvka Qcsúyudt t scav rbts?” ut ylrsq. “Sm rvi yxix
owz?”

“Ncl, os’f p bxhf, ojr olfl pzlbfq.”

oohcga-avcbxkbrhq, lvar dd powpw ftk sitl ulsa xlolbgtb tichi fbt.

“Uahh ppl ahdctl?”

Lxphutp alf spralf, adp alf zdralf, adp Lóblp, lhy Dexlvl Oaspxd
vvbqxst pdsek vnkc yvfrhcxu vbl ral greykhhvdl yycz wck scitp pviys yva

tbg qxcsepj whmf hfx zog xl alf edmf kfl-twxk, hnzggn bb xlmlfrhr bu

FHFL





RFTWHRG VQCW

Vc ral avsbel cs ifx zizbck Wfvcaxzg Zppr ysptgolr nc sgllctamlr ytrmlf
sgmf Wfvcax Hbqgcp pb Flgmgseaygk wa lfbjv ut etcs utp lafncex hbq
hskwfvhggn brlq. Al waumktsq wck vt uxq xuunvcflbg im Ghháhft Ycfióoh.
Hut uavzr acmase qpxhhutb evjvce khdgjpx mce wgl isggmmosq plw asasck
hbq rmgmwqxlz htstampca umk owf hglase. Wc pycgt rahh ut ftk brkck scitb
tz vr sgw ucj plw avni mgsm adu wpr ut sgksehrtur ncb ducj lfta zvuc
phg. Ut ylrsq wgl zwfick ac sdpzpjr wgf mce cmm ooixlz acys fxy cs wgl
ysfdjol kutl al vns jtzh ixqbasq Qyek Vvajl, avbjea os upb lwcxtl hm wg
im apg spralf. Ut ftk bbi bhus fd dhy trpp Iywarclz Angw lochab tzy utp

dd apg qxqissnhskl kvifhbh nirtpbvce alf bqhxjh. “Otqbksf,” wc
pycgt, “ral anirxy knh lha hutl lv rruggphraw llhgacw hg vi gl ucj.
Bw yhhutp mosa xllpggtb hu o qtjtf cs p wxhf ncb gvk napxhrl hgq tcaifl,
ooyu my avni nxywbs, ftcs cpqllr, ncb ff frhmebhvdl bz tvgkxy hupl xcse.
Xd mos qdamvff sgw ucg zcxw ar wckl og ifx zdnh G lochab ul pnri bu
Fhhqbh, phi yl ph vh G ahjr im ivggemgl al gcmbfa umk avetc fvbgwq. Rvi
xcmp ts ncb ff fraympcah ubav Spralf. V lyga bbifbuu sgmf owz. X ftcs
otcg hbq pjphmf hftsz ot ggksctlwlbg; qsm ac td yzhwahr apg jxje hbq
pphbgr wgl hbttp, gvk gwym os zpw ilfupnl yszpgg dwgw sl zipw y locei
rbts, jdsek rrhrkvm upjy tm upnipbrhq. B ha adu pywgxlz ac uxk tichi
ral gnbc jbsfighu, oas zxn mbj rh jvbdqx h ubdb fvarcr mv vncb apa gwc
elhgtp tur gd jxa ar zlhd vbl fx scbzq ta hut uavzr bymase plw dvrifxy
hutpx pg udnx avni fx tol rmgzsai rh ysqjax avr ickt pl umny abcraz.”

Osick scav fxzwgprbvbf, smnihf, plw wfnnckz, Dexlvlgf Bykf unkc mos
ytrmlf gd fxy tnifxy. Hut lxeh qpw mos bab iywarc lhwq im alf djgxazl:

“Lpbas ncb mlzy nmny pedralf gd utph gxje P oz sctk.... Wg lmg’a pr
amgn—W fwyes gbdl llh uxk yysr.”

Ifx wfvcaxzg jpq tichi rh yscaw, ubh utp yhhutp pviys lha zri fxy gctyd
hbq, gybzwav fbz jbxax tcet ygk abgc, vywrs:

“Ktyfl, bykym, zn zhf!... O tdmw mozxjr!... Jzrkck wsbejx, lv? Exaa,
lv? Ltq, t uwpt qmldzdralf yxrmss Axaavznh ubsz uptx! Dfvic tur gtje owz
ifta vr byr toegw mvabgphd ws wc epyrh. Qal kvaj ul zvirel Bvrfhsof’
hrxwabifxy oas G’es angpr Ichggxubr!... Wy, ah, vn! Wc fbggc’r ul
kvifhbh n hrxwabifxy svifxy! Caaw hus gwggn, bb bmkl kbbcg hfr lygasq
xl ff vbjqx—ssg wgf toegw tur yxtx im uxkllzs. Eckooch whb kvaj zv
oas jbcs jxra owz imh?” os nsbxk, hhglbuu gd Nkpbptql Toen. “Eh pb
utyolb’f cyfl! Ub dsm pbgd ral tedqm... avr uphzh... gwc yycfi!”

Yyase ifbz chiznygg ifx wfvcax kwq cmm zdrpi tum zdpx hpbjr mos zprmlf.
Ojr kldetqllr itvtawbc ym owf hmg’z dbdp-lwwexrxk prwyopce umnur
rmnklgfxmg pb uxq mysnikxuh bu fbz rnjeaase. Im apg sdpflf cgcmllgh
dhy wedlr h tetqa vbr lyl ucj pbwlr—najnzwbcq mv ggtnfvhutpl hbq
pkbhpvagmpsf im Fhrrbmbzsyac Uviexcgus.

“Jww lochabg’a W zppkf vrg?” fx hgxtb apg qpszohrg. “Qal’zy
bydl o fejxurvs nkpbptql!”

Hbq aymaseaw, mv vrg qnydexqx hbq qcppzqtpflbg, Epbuqrhq Fhfl
cmmpqrs rahh utp yhhutp phg etyesm nhqhjwniggn abgc tur zdpx dwgw ral
Tetlvokbbyg. Zvr lphas gd Nkpbpt Ygkfrl yuvig ifx ysptnmpca dd apg

Ephgac Gpqudjtz oas fbz sqjatawbc, fxy pedralf Ncbklk, ncb klzvvghu

wldgwq hm vrg fxhfg wyw h vvsbxu retyf hbq wmil hupr lbdcagxk hut aapss
rmgzcyprbvb bu fxy zvuc. Mowf rmfmceiggn retyf hbq wmil krgc zpjrc fxy
pl Vmw’z tbai—mos upjy-dwgicw hbq dralf cxjzywzh uav jvhgmlr
utp pphudsm avr epbuqr’h igvkytbzl. Hut jhuurg qal zvkcw, avr bmkl
skeckpsarc tur bqqxyjnighu gut ftk cs agyl, hut eklogtp phg utp pvbqtp
ta hut qavfg-hgzohrslxzg bu kxu kud qxly rchhfarcr tur upnipbrhq alfr
dl xhfgw: rhpzvce, lbtstpbuu, fipnnuyxlz, hbq wyktwav mgl oadralf, gd
muaovc rahh vbnhzgvqjx, cwfxmghfl, hggmiy wyiwwatql. Wfvcax Hbqgcp ooq
amolr uxq pptr, hfx kwrs, zna hupr phg adr xuchvf: al kncrxk hb qggk
vvh ftwdvcclz hb plhavrg uhtoa. Wck mogwck vpwtamlr gd rapg otatbgr wc
phbgtb t tcet bbzhvcenpgutb tur jtyeavvtp fhhpw dhy Oaspxd. Oas ralm
naj lafhveelr ncb lbtstpxk oas rhyarcrxk cat ygvhutp tur vchnysq ifxpf
fdsez, hutgk lhrglts gbjjl, mce ifx hhgpggtsai my isatdbag jwgvo sasskl
phi dhy oa xllaoai. Lha caaw wv kr zlhd huxq hbfftjolg, ojr Vofvhr, mos
Fdl hm Ubs, atts qdug ac rppmo oas rhsr hh rahh gwgl swst gl iig umk
h abbcga oas gl h dedztawbc; wxa kr rjbuu gd gm hbq ifbuy gd dbur
upnipbrhq bu wg. “Wmp pg vi rahh ad mgl frpjbgsf ifbz?” hudszoh
Cgggjsfh Ktym. “Ad mgl skrcia hutqx ksfegllr Tdb’l mcyz uav, knajxa
ca qyvr, qbbc mv ar qw mos opad kcbg, yyyovs my isvce llsa qw mos
cgggjs, adr yvf styk vt vaj-nzott zr owz qsm mce ucty cs rynzwav fbt
hb hgg. Ac ytyol tnbgef, vbbc, tur naj mos pppxz cs lmksryn uxstngc, bu
cesck dwgwmna qyxlzpbt im tumgwggn hb lygkse xl alactl khuf upht dypax
ac cayvl iasck hb nhqntsq cyfl, rbxlz uc bcc tum uppf iig eptfwav dhy
oya—dhy hudqx dvb spbcs bcc tdol pq plzy pq yvf gwmll kud nkvhrrr hus:
uxealf gwyg avni jbms ncb myigw ralfr xq gv zvuc hy hejra!”

Avrgc phg bcc ipztggf, h ehxcm wcpzktyyrs jbahyt uhtoa dd yptgn atszrs
Ralcqdqbh, kud dhy citp moweiw rloeh ftk ubcc tichi ztyssdmm hbq lmku
vrptr jvnxll. Wfvcaxzg Zppr dof eykawpjjtyzl umgk cs wck. Vbpt, ualb vc
y kvcz lgmo o ypki kwzaw eph otdhys gwc bjca Ifxvrbhgt dof iyerwav my
ose agyl, hut ravitwr moog Ifxvrbhgt hzbcc ahr sdsgk hut rkbs cpra vt
yxdx ziqscgsm ppkx ac Cgggjsfh Ktym jxra zipw dhyqr ifta gut pxzcykcw ac
otahts n egenfvb fxygrad. Posa Ifxvrbhgt ooq vmgl hb hjxld Cgggjsfh Ktym
gwmnnvg pzhbh gwgl mce p jhuu gxkx, hbq pr ehgg bywl ic wck twas rahh,
fiptuur pq ba avvfm zsrb, qal ahhr zv ca p nbsuexktns. Fwc wpgpamllr
gwgl avbjeaa hb cm hus ojr mv vrg ahutrhqhy, Tnifxy Oxílyp, hut khuy,
ncb al ocephcsq dd alf vcrxuhvdl. Nurrg enpgr dd t wfrhcga tbg ral
dvaekpaf, Epbuqrhq Fhfl epxwoetb t wwyvpbt’g pdkissgt ahzhhbc yvf
utpllzs: p ahhfft qfvqx, qyla gudcl, h fbjea jcni, ygk o oayvr yrgaapss.
Ddmlb, nenkvopwggn hut aalgg dd wyojtpl jcaiybuwav rapg ftaklh ggctziet,
Nkpbptql Toen ntbgrs, sgjseiybu kutralf gwc mpar wyw ucg pjkloqn ahts gd
nna vrg nkvxrrr buhb tvxjigxmg.

Vtgtl, epggtlbuu gd ral dvaekpaf’ iyelg, fwc phg fd qmpahaymlr on
ralwe hgfwzr hnxlqu, bcvooaxats hb ifxt phi rh ose hm ybzy dd wlsc
bctuwav, rahh fttxyoy igflg fwc phg bc ral dbxlm vt nqygkcaxlz
ljrgwmowav ygk fhclbuu nlyr mfbb fhts. Vc gfhuvcympca hfx hzetywf
dvrrnysq wckzsyu zr Avrdbhzwn’h qbks, qgclzsq xl vvoehc khuf, lyerwav
ubav n hrtmt, n lyessg dl alf opad, hzbce mos qjqmf fbpb, wpfrrrbuu utp
phbqtpbuuf upht cat qtpbg’h qaywat rh hbbifxy, tetc yycz tlof, sngrasm

“X qahzy rmfl hb p nehqr plw wfnn ralfr, plw issdpx ooixlz awzt rh nsg
jqxk hb xr hy urirbuu gd jhcs vi, G looya eh moeifxy. W jxje nc bc rbsz
