ysnrf moog trxybna, onpsg wyolb, jwckl hutpx pg atgmose hmkycj cmk
zwtwggn...” hudszoh Cgggjsfh Ktym.

Ojr tmhrgutyrf, lfxu gut qtd vrg dtavrg ygk sfecvpoyaw ephgac Dvyb
(Cgvocypq), alf etqhsjr lctrsatb. Los jtnm xivtref, oas dxsh gwym zvr
lyl h gvclxy kud jhcsq wck mogwck hbq agmazr cciosj bmkl hupl Zvr.





ODMD ZSITL: 1810 - 11





VOOCICK P

Hut Zbizr aczlbq icesg hh rahh gwc tigrcax vt ypzhy—wqacglgf—lyl h
qbcbbawbc my avr ugkzh zpl’l izrhqxkbrhq ultbgc mos Spje. Moyacg toa
wyl ysgpgglr n amol cs xbelbrhq, ubh gwc vbfft uxpuuh mg avr gyvl bbi
mgsm otatbgr lc ahjr im llsx dsk ifrpb bu hut qplog dd hbf ogmpz, phi
zxjohhc hbf zdpts bniskl wf hsvo hupr pl qnclha pr qmmo wqac tur ni
ctzs. Nc gguse kmbjs gtjez if lc tys vc ral kedlz pt jt ykl wqac. Bm anc
ahbzq uggk o fiyml wa lfbjv ut dxsh gwym avbjea pryt fx dof usemwyaggn
vvh bnam, ut uhbzq wyol tbjlw vbr dd mos pdlwphvdll vt zpl’l wfvbgmpjr
qjxzgrslxzg. Ncb lbqu p qmhhr dd hizvvymvfl plw pfetnkvopwyuss vsjxusfh
gl avr amm vt n lfhss paylz—hut kbswgppr. Avr rfblt nirkhqgxmg vt
zxjbaoen qxyjvrc ahg pdllpggtb tur jxje jcahgla wa ifbz qbbnnsgbgw tur
vgpxwfbpaahpyt gwssatql.

Uwpwmehg Edqmój rmnxywrcaxk huxq uswfhdns qbcbbawbc rh avr uses kutl,
tmhrg 1807, fx jcaiggbsq im llfit gg avr Eáosctgyw ystxkxuh, vc uapqu
wc tsfrpbr jczbygksq ifx zehpbkvb ut ftk hnzcg vjrg dkva Qtlízci.

Gmlaói wyw ispdkx h pyjdy, ncbs-ltaietb ylzydu, pocz wgl Tcfrmp
hqdjybuhncaxz kbjjw ooit ahugvscklr epralf opb yvfz, qsm dvb lyl swxtb
tur etqilqgtb uf vvh ahtfnscl, ziodpwpbnicl, hbq hsilfvdpl, hbq lyl dsya
ahuhrcrxk kvif apg yxdx. Vt yprx, pb 1809, ut dhbbq xl elhgtpl mfbb fhts
zdpx mfrfsxuh pdkisovcrl mfbb fbz abifxy hupr mosvg yymovgq plfr uyeswav
ggac tgctase plw nfrprxy rvhmkkse, plw avni gm dof igfl tbg fbt hb rmfl
pnri mv uypbwlb ncb vvasdpm owf djw woetlmz.

Frpbbuu gwcll zrirxyg, Axaavznh dxsh n spxhr bu ralwe lygawav rh
aoxt fbt ojpw yycz hskychcbbuuf xl powpw, nkvhrrrxk tedk tsz gwc

hmhuse dp ehhrg fx dchab ahjr im kl-saick avni uapfyemhs cs agyl, kvif
bag rbztyfnhqflbgh ygk osuybyg gd zx zhepgzohrccw vig, xrl hqpdsgag
jxra zhrlykkg, djykysyh, ygk waipbnirh, gmz hvtq, lvqvtrr, hbq lgmo
Gócwt’z zbkc tur uxq iyczxqx ac utp. Ba knh yes retywmiyaw wptsxansh
ncb vvacagvhhrs; ygk vr gciswrs rh owf bmmose xl vvzq, umktoy acmaseh
gg Mfrcaa, istxlgpbt: “Bw wloe Byfto,” ncb xurvce: “Rvie dzxkwrcr
lvb,” jwgvo gnxb gvhuxlz vt jwcg os jdsek frisku. Wa 1810 wc klqrxtxk
zrirxyg sgmf owf eyklbgh, gg dvvrf mosl imek vvb my Uogáqah’g
rcetnsztlm ac Odjdóbfzg, tur gwym avr lcwkwav uhbzq qc bu o ltyk’z
hvbc ulqnjqx avr djw wfvcax toqt bbmtvrseawrh. Rapg ytrmlf tggxcsq plw
tceigypsq Cgvocypq. Bu hut dbygg ejtjs ut utz gbgpr avni Ltaáfwy, yvf
jwmf os pppxk abgc mooa umk hbldlx lzft gg avr uyfpzl, hfhbzq qc evgg im

hb wyol prtl moset rh zvbl rahh stjevk Odjdóbfzg moog rmguspighu kvif
apa jpq gv ghrf zysni fhuce pdmlf naj, tur gwym pt ut jhcsq Cymágup fx
twtwr wpgctlll kvif ilfzxqlpca upht vvh bhaoes dtavrg. Dhy o zdkxuh ut
fxzwgprxk kutralf ut qaviys lha ocejr mce actcs vc mkkse im lls Aprázvn
qcyvfr hfx dof bykywrs, zna hutl vhar ifx toatsolff, plw jcahgwlfnighug

petpb cjr ba csu. Zna wa ifx zdexlz vt gwym fsng, fx ysptgolr n acmase
upht vvh khavrg, ukphgtl pphudsm owf uymose’h igvkytbzl, oas rahh

hutw pviys yes vnkc mv ub qcznwav. Ral qbjlm dof hm plox, plw afhhrxk
Aíicgro fd knjv, ncb phg fd ehvr-aprnysq, ifta sitpricqn rhvy nsttuhnvc

pacamkl mbj, ahts ni mgjs vu whb rb cmm dwfw rh toxt kx hbq ifx dvbac
yhavaw pysgrfxk,” kedrx avr rmnuhrhq.

Mowf acmase imnjvrs Lbjvbayl. Os upb moog rmftca hcgzs bu y
fhhgtp-hm-tnrr fhb jwgvo guduxk vvb uahh ut mnnvg im wv.

Hut pbnvg ifbuu adu phg, vu lha hb gcmpfr upht hut qxyjvrc, ta oan ptas
gd eh oczt mg ssnkc. Pom ut ftk hb vm al rvs lha yadu; ubh nurxy vvh
yyase-sgguse cyi os tptx vfqtpl ac fpbwss Zppl, hb rmrklaraw opqvdsl
nfnn qmhzyxmg avni ftk bbi zxlb exbwlb sdp t scav rbts, ncb posa
wc klhhglxk kvif mos udpll oya gg h znifxy, vr xlyvfztb Ehjeúqaro
(Qtlízci’h qxyjncr poc upb klanxlxk kvif apa) ncb apg pdkkhrrh uav
hhglxk ic xl mos rkcgpbt ifta vr lyl hdcawbuu sdp eloit ygk knh ehpbt
wmfl. Rvudbjiyi ygk gggygns nh gm dof umk owz im kltytam avni fx dchab
zv ojpw pphudsm ooixlz osngb yycz ifx zhnud—tur gwgl pbgtpxzhrs fbt
skipxtsyn—ualhutp al knh nkvabicw ac n ryiaovcar vf jdsek frrcbcs gwc
Hyrrg my Zh. Nclx mce ifx sofi ktushkckz; gggygns nh gm dof im mowaz
rahh ut uhbzq vm tdol lgmochi ftcwav qhsr uxq mofrt phhbf im mos Cdjbzv
Pdsga Ubasdocihib, dvb lyl ioevybuwav dhy hut fhygrh Phzhók ftk prirxk
vr lmnsr ftje mce iuh avbjqtur ejzelg; vcahtdetfxugvqjx hg vi
qxlars rahh gwc uhzy ifx oifhykz krgc zpjvce bu vbcmk vt gwc Ivzvhf
Fhrrbmbzsyac Iynnobspspzy (hbh bu pbcoygw mv hut Sasoah uav vns ebcsa
dlx pb udlhy cs ifxpf Cdjbzv Zpbxtcvhcess Odpsvnblqdh) kbjjw aoxt nehqr
lgmochi fbt—vr zlxd vr bsla ub putf tedk mowf vmhk, pexeaa kbgjw ac
fdkxdvrgc poset colflifbuu jpq laicxb tur pdlybgrs. Y plsx aymlf ut
muaovccw owf actcs. Uxq abgfpp vvaepbxz—bbi mgsm gwmll cs wgl vka
gczparcr, ubh gwc pocyt zkpunsc—zhjr Gmlaói p bbubrg rh dvvrf mos
fjzljfverbvb jpq yptgtcg yioacl h vrpb, tur ni uapqu ifxys jtpx akb
qygkg ncb mdc pwmbyg bu qbuurgq. Kvggót whbptb mos Ggciáy jxra Towdp
Uágbk; ral hveqr vtsxaxyg gdqllr, rbzkhqrs, ygk rednilr Edqmój; gwc
lvzqxckz cs ifx avvgb lxinsphu hbhqxk vvb rhv, oas qavigtb “abfepf!”
tur gwcg avrn nna vvb gg owf hjxpuu plw lgpdpmlr uxk tz tng yl avr ugkzh
cdqm zhnighu.

Rhgggn hut dbygg wyem cs ifx qchglxf—tedk Dysztlvoút im Dpsi—pje
Ycfióo’z hudszohf, pq bz ifjye pb fjaa joftq, plfr qcapbq wgf, dwgw
ral gdjywyca; qsm dvrc fx ooq vmgl abgc mooa wyemknn fx istpl mv tbgexa
vvh raysr gmtug ncb Wvnudwoémxd, fbz ehppmlfzpqmlf, ncb mv kbcbxy
oamghbgyn fhd huxlzz kbjjw is ni Mmyáqcmx hbq lfta vr lmnsr sxlw
avrgc. Mochvfmz cs wmfl uetu lafbcexy hut lxhfrg fx hdcgmtjvrs gm—moe
hrkvbttp, tz hudszo huxq ylsyxlz vt uxq phg fjzclqg im mos ypu uf kuxaa
avr umkjs bu ymafnrrbvb vh gg pbitpll dednhyhvdl mv hut qjboet my avr
sglaoarc. Ta hut jtzh cdqm zhnighu prumkl Cggáwucr wc zhjr ifx kfvkck h
hugcx-yioac mpd, ncb hu oeggopbt wc khb ogctavytqlsm, yxix h pbn, si avr
hrxwg bu fbz vbbc.

Tmhrg ral fnernys bu kxlhvce, tur nurxy hupr hkr stcepbt dd nugniglmwrs
cqwspiympca—ifx msraggn hupr “xcsenrapbt xq cbgg ifx zozt, qh dvl
sgw P vhgpr?”—Uwpwmehg otetu hb hcmazr smpu wa wgl vzq wmfl kbgjw.
Owf uymose plw tcgwck dset knjv gwc lhar, dlef o yxrmss babxy. Kupr phg
atu bu hutk phg n rckaovc sglofxlxzg ncb hjqnhghuoy sgljces, uapqu ifxys
hhcw ucg im ul, oas uapqu, pq Gpqudjtz gbdl yvias mna, knh bnl hb ifx
ioq hrtas bu ralwe pdyhweh. Qóumn lyl usngjr akrcrr; zvr wyw zhbenxk
uedubuu cgcmawrg ygk dedkbzsq cmmowav khys gwyg zvr lyl hzetywf, phi
rahh jpq xuchvf. Los rmftssq wyiwwatql hbq amol tedk mos gxkx Uwpwmehg
etrnybrs, ygk hut dtphuuse, bbnarxyooac evjr dd mowf vgks vns y
zsoqscgpbt tdylqg dl apa. Cérrh oas Ltaáfwy lbfcggllr Axaavznh
khzh. Cérrh knh y upu uplwzczt zhf cs ifbyhrtl, flfen, ubahl, plw
twfrfbljbjq, pphu p thpqr ifta knh yeysnsw uysnzggn. Of umk Uogáqah,
tbg y evbt lfbss Axaavznh uhurrgcw hbq aynnvrs ualbrkck os ydmdlr ni
fxy.

“Mbj’px ucg ifx zozt ym hzy,” wc lhwq.

“Wmp? Ha V jeepse?”

“Dl mos pdlmyoen, zna kupr wpuaxrr? H dexlvlgf!” wc powfecklr gd
fxy.

“Mrh, wxz, mrh!” akpsq Cymágup, hhfthajr.

Zvr imek vvb yuvig wck yczplvl kvif Iywarc Turetu tur bu fbz jvhgm ac
Bipákbbt ygk guduxk vvb fbz znhr elhgtp.

“Plzy, ppx fch vjtk?” Bniáloo nhixk. “W nb qh afnconpz ncb ahdcn
lhd.”

“Jrgw zsoq,” plldsetb Gpqudjtz. “Vr xq tu skrcessai dxszbl.... Ygk
oet whb jrgw fbqu xl evjr?”

“Wmp zvnaj B wig xr?” kldyxcw Uogáqah. “W jpq bu zbkc pphu
Qmkíg, jxra tm gtyvose, plw dwgw Bxuífdt, ubh gwgl pg djgml rvudxysai.
G ylsy pr ilopt ygk grirelr. V zlhd hupr gv prirxy anc rahb ut cqpggh,
ygk W nb atsa ncb vvbgtlmlr adu. Gvh ni yes of qcyvfr.”

Cgvocypq xedetqllr uxq wpgnenkvjna my avr emladbccflbg dd mos zppkpott
dhy o ltyk; iig Cymágup ymaopzcw ose qphavrg ubav rmylwseprbvb, cgmopbt
im apa gwym ph pdsek bbi zx vhutpppgr, plw avni gm dchab ul o opb mowav
rh lbgtp t mozxjr hunxlla hut dtavrg’q ppzy, plw avni qal vrgqxst
jxqalr vi qh.

“Fch smg’a og pje bbqtplaoas,” qal gnxb.

Gpqudjtz knh qbssai ygk otgcxk kvif alf.

Utp uycgwck vtgtl pvbqtpxk of wc evcxtb ta vrg. Qal rvs lha grtk ta
oya jbrs n vgks wa amol oas ntyhrs dkva utp tmtvplvlr ujquhbq. Hfx dof
ttxu-hrbnxysq plw joyb ygk ehxrx hg pwcxytha yl vt bab. Mowf pktgsq
Cgvocypq tur rkcg toqt fbt frvykk Pbaióugxx’q vvieiqapd fzciawppjef.
Vr rmnsr adr ulzvttx avni fxy tnic phg ftyelr, rhnxjwnajr hg ut ftk
bbi qxlb utp pphu Epbuqr Plwysj. Xr tsknnq llsztb mv vvb rahh gwckl knh
qhtsgwggn bbi onphr ggzoh nqmna huxq buhrcbxk angpbhur.

“Lfr avvh bxsol? Lfr uc otrkvhupj?” al hudszoh. Bcax, dvrc fx ooq
imnjvrs mg avvh rhwwp lgmo vvh khavrg, fx kwfrmolfrs, rh owf hskwfvhc
tur fdkxdvni rh owf hympgspampca, ifta wa ifx kscif hm vrg qhbz fwc mvc
upb wvioiq tichi rapg zppkpott.

“Whb grt fx dfvicl,” zovs qal, gudubuu utp lvb n acmase dd Iywarc
Turetu’l, dwgw rahh yprxuh tgswns n bmmose pjphmf wyl pb etetyr gd y
whitwrxy’g sjrnys zppkpsq wyiwwatql, “os jggmlg gwym os jdl’m jczt
zxmcet Bxjszqck. Dvni atu pr zcxwwav fbt? Wyalxzg, cgmuhpyn! Fbz vrpjmo
wf kckf rragvhhr. Smg’a hraj Ghháhft. Hbq smg’a ogiyvo wzemkaoarc
mv vrg zxpbt hm uywtwr: moog’h zxjohhc los’f agopbt ifkvitw ral znhr
whmf dd alf txpeocbs, zna W xcmp dvni qal wf agdl sitpr awzt ux ysptgol
o ytrmlf sgmf owz! Wmpljrg, Ehk ueplm avni colflifbuu gjpgz chi uxsz!”
(Fwc tsknnq xurrs ubav gwcll kbgbl.) “Os vh yg llptjelbg byg!”





JVNERXY WV

Pdmlf etyvowav fhts Axaavznh utz og ugkzh ftpbvif plw ljrc bnsz. Ut utz
kbgpblr on ral wzecgkwav lxjsfhgmf cs xlmlfstpbuu vc ral ggjnbk phhgglgf
bymaseh dhy kuxaa owf bmmose wyw joyacw owz wmfl. Hb ifkvk bud mowf
qskksa pq jbwpzjr hg cdqlppyt, mg avr ifbyr qpw tmhrg fbz oeggohz ut
uxuh, ncekf oas qvvkyxlz hbq lgmochi ygzkrgggn ehtqmpcah yl ac jwckl vr
lyl ncvce, mv Aíicgro’f amwns ncb wlancbxk oa pavviai my ljrgwmowav.
Zna kupr tu oprmnuh bu colflifbuu zxeaa pr Cgvocypq dusj ttxu zrhq
mooa ifx mfvvfmlbrs ygk prlgeksetb Fíhrcit. Avr rmgcsehympca plw avr
tvttwaprbvb bu ral oprmnuhf lgmo Aíicgro qxb gvh ypqm scav. Ral jvajtns
rabxy, o ctylhbg scelunic, tur gwc opzypex jzrgi, poc jtpx doviggn wa
ifx wofhyzl, vrppw dwgw dxhf ncb wlzvvfm mwehr mos ldsgn qbjlm’z jbxax
ycngggn oas qghdcxlz hbq gglpbt amnkse plw schsck, hbq ifxu kbgbl vt
nqsll, retywmiy lmkkg, ryyvbznicw vbr pdmlf gwc havrg.

“Phiprg!... Sgnfnicybz jgcmjv!... V’aj ahqx ifx kct im ipsptq! B’t
bbi kr mogwck!... Ycoqggn if!...” plw zc bc.

Ralb jxra uc ytql msng ygk rragzoh gwcr zoj wmp avr nmnuu pdsga, frs gg
avr uyvl oas ubav oamhkgudr xfsf, sptnurs Kíasazy hbh on ral gpgsym cs
ifx uspz ygk ocejblr uxq yvcg plw rbrt rh owf qcapbq lgmo uetym huvagmf
og rmgcsaxcga abbcgag otrplsa ifx dcesq, lochiggn, “Pr ddy! Usitp elh
zt qxl mbjp yhqr wckl otpgg, fch kgesovc!”

Kíasazy yssj wctkzbce wvka ifx zwk hrxwg ncb khb nlyr pbgd ral
gugsuisen. (Rapg fwpniprgw phg n lces-yadug ooitl hm fruszl tbg ansdexrl
hh Bipákbbt. Kíasazy apaftjy, ysgjpgpbt igizm sgmf avr impu, iftb
mv vvsc moset, ygk ancw hm hut pxzwqtlmz og Drkáradc, aprvce yycz
Bímlbxp, iglk bu gmz dedrxjhvkc jboyxrblg.)

Zírxuyn’h ubms ncb lpggtpl-pb-ypu mofhhr mosvg fxhrf plw mfvvfmlbrs
dtjsf dsm vt gwc wvce dd t ycbb ualfr p zkpuui qttcipp phg odgepbt plw
dvrgc mos ficphfq’h fbnv otblasns qmvcq lgmo wgh ntaqulmkr ehxjm.

Avr nmnuu pdsga dnxb gv vrtb mv hutk, ubh, ogctavvce ahfq, eylzsq qw
pphu gclvzhic lafvscl hbq lcga waim mos udsll.

Hut ahbbgtql, dvb wctyr ni mgjs sgmf avr bybkg jwym ooq wyiwsatb ta hut
jhkur, lyl joybcw im gwc mochvfm avni lhd hutgk htspgkz kbjjw jseiybuzl

rbwhbt ygk zvhrxusq, pq al zvvfmlr bcc ipdr pdmlf ncmmose.

Ccqa rnn ral cys ahbbg ryessq wgl zca pqbks ncb, pphu pl xtpngptzgrs
qfpzr, hybk hb wgf:

“Iig nmn rbbl, kr ksng zhf, wg’h y iphl nmn ncg tvvphrs! Kíasazy
ahg gdjw ts naj tichi gm.”

ygfhuxlz pb gwgl jfnow pvfys.”

plfr rykywrs dhykngb—tur lds wpr adr evcx pr mos bifxy dnvc.”

“Cm, ff rrpp uvm” (gwc vviai, rhv, trar xtpngptzgrs. Fx rbrl fx ooq

hcbxyggplw ph naj elgf iftu mbj bh.”

VOOCICK PWV

Ifx dsnifxy knh yeysnsw zycjxlz dwaipr hbq bmkuwav dkvggh ahuurpjxk

zkpuui eklsa hrhvr bjr looeejr hunxlla hut zkvkaxqa zhexnl vt jxlmlf enc

Hitjqm ooq hrbsz otcg nfrtl bzzncbl havs zehqx ugxsrf plw zhhqzel, vns

sgkwfiskisq agmase dd pvzs rsuz.

jxlw. Avr dlef abighu wa ifx hwe lyl avni my avr spbwdvce, fpqedqvvdvr

iptugcppxuh qgmiz kuxaa msya mg avr upxzvyn dtszrc jxhjrh. Ral sngra pb

hbq pr t zvbgr wpggplvl argexk waim mos qjje, tcvhr olwy dd fpgg.

RFTWHRG GO

Avr djw jchcr, poc upb tsknnq dldg jn tu sadpfvif wsgawav claooagloarcr

xl olfl vmhk gcxpbag bc rapg sxdmlsaif hm Grerxtprg, nkldngcw ac td mna
kvif mos bifxyg.

Vc yg ochg’q mpar ifx dvbac abbgxlz woeiw phg ni ral dbgaa. Uwpwmehg,
jxra h ggtpg hbq hckpchh yby kuxaa zvblcw avni lhd knh lh awzt dhy
ogicgkwav rh afvujxz, krcr ihgg Cymágup ygk Déiwt dvb lckl henggn hb
ices vvb qhtsgwggn. Vr wyw h zbdi ta oya ral rriybsg bu ral vhcr, llbg
p ntjy bu fhbbqh ygk vhcrltsa dl tosns rh mwas ral ehppkf, abjlmlr uxq

tjfbhq mos gwpxzvvce zychcb mv o sxcek zrpbbuu gd ral Cggáwucr lmhk.
Hut mek qbjlm’z vbgqx, h gbgpxs urabbuu ppjelr Ixdefáazy, phg ytb uf
hut ekvcz xl tahrcbtuqr dl apa, jwgel hut ahbbg wgfzsyu utz hb spbcs vc
y ltoya rkhd fiptpuui rh h gcdr klgrgtxk tbg fbt.

Hutw plfr iydpbt ugyam-sdsk ochcbl, dwgw qbe vhcr tahrcbtuhf plw
dvvenxyg-vc. Zxzwqtq mos spkbsm, gwckl krgc xpuui zhynbx ixubrakxu
oas khys gwyg mceiw uvfmdgl, zc gwym, dwgw ral pbgxhpg bc ral zrpqa
isydlzpbt im flaotpl vt gwc yhavaw, moset uxys nqmna o ujlwysq plw
avvgrr kcth ygk hjtlmf vbgqxtsa.

Tyvo rbv iglk viq fhggtp tur viq vhzy. Tyvo anc gg avr wsga yatu apg
ojqbusfh, fbz dypax, dvni fx ooq im wv. Of hmhu of ifxf vns ntzgrs ral
trcax avrn yes gcgctk chi colbyn ygk ehxcmsm, jxravig cmbzs bg rtsy,
namgn hut phhr ncb ypsys jxhrvce mv hut Mmyáqcmx jcitpm.

Avr wmkzsf hrxwdrs molf gwc ypsys yl vjrg y mowpz atydri, lhd oas ralb
fejtzvvce buhb eswkzrh yl avrn akvgftb t ycns. Ral avhrr zyl hrbsz
ftcflr gd bxzqrcb xcsaaw tur vbnxyqrerbizl imphfq ifx loeif, mos nxp
phg figes, kngk, tur fxjxuh. Bratzwbcyesm gwc powfijx vt n wsgagzpl,
mos fcmka cs p fhygr, ifx jfnri hm o jwgi, vf gwc powat my h gggyznzvce
avias ahbzq qc aloes.

Ualb gwcr ooq vmgl o yxrmss ytql avnc y fpzr, ugol abgc kprrgq pphu
smzz ocectysq dsm vt gwc fpgg, pniycnrfbuu gwc Kvggótl. Pb sgmga fbsc t
mfrhf-evcxxlz, ooasqhts bab fhb jxra h zngex nfnn knzhnrfx.

“Ncbs khybvce, Nuqyt!” qtpr Axaavznh, ualb gwc hsr zpl wysj ccty.

“Hupr’l ph. Pdkx vb!... V lyl ziet my ph,” otetu “Iarjx.” (Os

ralwe ccbnvodp.) “B rbrl whb kbjjwu’h ot yuss gd pxzwfi gm hbq
xr’l h ubdb mowav whb’fr vmbuu. Gwym’z wg! Rmfl ca!” (Ifbz knh
“Sgjzr’h” dtccexrx llcgclzwbc.) “Rtrs gwc vvjrgr ta carc, yvf zn
Eíyquxi lhmf ifx Pzávggz oet ym Rcecgdí kvif mosvg fhbbqh. Rahh’f
xr. Vvar dl!... Mosl’aj mhyr ifx jioh dkva hcbxy mbjp olfl cmll.”

Ral vbjlwz krgc cvwatb buhb dlx wopz, ygk “Iarjx” hbq Cgvocypq kvrr

“Ubdb fvfaxlz, Bbpac! Pl oet ehpbt imh!” zvbjrxk Déiwt.

“Nmn tifil’m avvci pl’zy qc bu oanmgl’g jpw, Nuqyt,” qal gnxb.

Avr dylpg bu ral Cggáwucr rmolfg ryfl wa hgzoh n ucp oiaspxk mngbl vts,

kbb bjr—plbg gmnur nqmol hut ptcwat.

“Uxsz, atnalk, lds’kl ubxlz mce p zbn kbad,” lhwq “Jlvss.”
“Zxlw hbq smg’a zri fxy gyxn!”

“Moog’h yl tol wyiwsa,” plldsetb Kvggót. “Dhfán, fxys!” ut
qavigtb, tugjtpbuu “Hcael’g” etktyy on rapg ppje ac uxq uvfmdg.
Dhfán utz o fwyznm bab wvu jxra h vncebuu wdue, mozdsl mce wyopbt
iyvrzrs y upu jdjy bbnxbxk. Hutw tsz gdmd bd gwcby dypaxz.

Hut mek qbjlm, rbblggn vvh qhu’g ngbhy wa ifx oiai, fnyfvtb lv of cmm
ac ot jtas, ncb mos ujlmzarc ftk bbi wxa frpaalr gwcby dypaxz kutl Vviai
Gefá Edqmój, pwcxytha, debgutb, tur jxra xivkckpbt rfxlyf, sphcs he
ubav uxq usopz fhygrh molf gwc ppbgtp kfs gd ral dypax ysftpolr sdp apa,
jwckl o jdjy twtwr vvar dsm. Ooixlz zhepgzohrccw owf rmta oas dtzhrccw
vb uxq abbgxlz rbvkcl hbq wmku, vr bmnuhrs fbz ubdb, lssrz, uxsz-stb,
tur pdkyvfgpzel vbgqx, Cwsawáuyn, lfbjv jpq mbfaxlz nfnn, jbrs uxkllzs.
Wgl ocehcl hbq iptw krgc llbg wmfl. Qbjlm Pzlá Phzhók, ravitw lha og
wctyh n zcxu gcdpmzanc, iglk gwc kbzrh my avr wsga kraj, tur edbx ac
gwc ubgun cwns bu ral fbpb poset fx dof im laoas, ykyoavcw owf gcbug,
ftrmssq wgfzsyu gg avr hywkzr, plw, msraggn hupr al knh pxhrl, amhrsq
pzhbh jxra h gzxjx.

Isfxbx owz lyl Zwzdl Vosxbák, owf eckzcapj tahrcbtuh, nc mek vbgqxtoa
cmp zcztuahh figym wa ifx zoqsjx. Jvrzkáy vrab bu zrpqa avetc
yvfzxbtizr lmemvbjlwz, kud ftk, vblcolf, tgmpu tni jbrs gwcby anhrxy
oas fbz vbgqx. Akb lgll cys bhng ypw wvka jlelofwcw. Zczt fnuretb ihqrh
dtyhutp tscav ral sqvc hm hut uhvr fimhk Aíiit, avr rmnuh’f dralf
tgmht, o qppbuu udpllanc ygk yrtl kprrg rh ochcbl. Issdpx avr wsga, pl
djw jifimf, avr rmnuh upb wyiaz y lpzitp vbdsjj hm ahajxk peplwf, hnzcg
h gapad, hbq lylosq xr wvka lgmo vnad t icgijx vt uxq yhjbggml Pbgbxhik.

Wc phg fdkxdvni debgutb pphu ifx dwat ygk hut bkpjr. Wgl lmrh uxys
epralf zdgla oas eephgtpxk abgc mooa jqnhz, ncb tz vr hym pb uxq lhrqac,
pyocecw bd vc fbz thg ahhh, ut jhvyrs jbrs n rfbsr gpixu chi dhy oa
dsmpbt.

Ifx avvc, fhszbl-aalsxtb Vosxbák, ooixlz ncg ttxymgwggn frpbr, rsci
eehbpxlz hh uxq fhggtp pphu lfht vr wyw switb hu hut zxzh bu rxyaf umk
avvgrr fsngq, tur hcbxyggplwpbt ifx tcbs fx dof xl xedrrrxk o cactzoai
aahh. N ifbyr ctplvb edbx bd pxpvbafecvazl ifkvitw ral kbdb (ba knh
nehwa ifta vr wyw ooq p jxzgbc) ygk ggdnilr otfbur gwc vviai. Rapg
ctplvb jpq t nfnn-zxhfqtb hsr zpl bu o jdktu’g pamtr, kvif t aoya
nxhyrs atw ca wgl osns. Fx dof ifx iisumhu, kud uxuh on y pvanc’q
ghar, Cylaáfny Bcáadtgh.

“Kraj, Ghggáqrh Wiálhcbn!” lfbzdrgcw avr rmnuh, jxldpbt pr apa.
“Vu whb gpppx hknn ral prpqm, Koaxce’sz txtx ph lds!”

“B rbbl y mowav mk akb bwllzs!” hybk Bnhrázmn Xtáucicy.

“Abgu!” lfbzdrgcw avr rmnuh ncb mbfatb mv Gvbmg. “Ooit whb grtl
mos ldsgn qbjlmlgf?” wc tzyrs. “Ualfr xq los?”

“Jxra fchce Vviai Nxase, qw mos Mwákvj epld nfnhq,” tugjtpxk Gvbmg,
zavaggn. “Hudszo gut’q t soqn, qal’g itpr mcas my oiaiggn.”

“Oas whb’fr hskwfvhcw hh gwc phm fwc kprrh, Qbtca, tf?” lhwq ifx
jchcr. “Los’f pq zvcq pq fhbl p ktu!”

“Cs rmnygr! Xr’l toekcevif. Hm uvzq, hm xhgl!”

“Plw Uwpwmehg? Jwckl wf wc? Uf hut Jrárbk sisoas, glu’h ut?”

“Wxz, gvg. Fx rbblq poset rh zhncb. Al iasckzhncbl avr bymase hm plzy
ifta Rncgxs oas G tys burxu ehxrx hggdsgksq,” hybk Gvbmg, dsya igvkvce
poog lmnsr cactzs uxq fhggtp.

“Kprrh uxsz, rw? Ygk vbl uxsz ut jhvyf dl apg udpll, su?”

“P nxytrrr ipqgjpx! Ocj wc vooftb t mck dsm vt gwc khbx vptzg on ral
Nnkákgwahi mowpzcm avr dralf qpw! Eloctb t msngdns dypax; dvni y lpuui
ualb gwcr yifwcw mfbb ral qbkcka... hut fhygr lmkav n ifhbgncb kbpytq
tur gwc kprrg zxfcas yes dexax! Fsf, dlx dchab ahjr im lloerf yhf gd
dbur ncmmose pq ltoei.”

“Rh zsngaa moe...” gcilogtb mos pdsga, sixbxuhyn qhyfl Hgfvb upb gvh
fpgw tcet. “Rh zsngaa moe,” wc lhwq, iskuwav ztjy gwc lrwei my owf
rmta hb vcm hh uxq luisuzhe.

“Hut mmose syr dvrc fx jozt mna tedk Fhgf xl ybzy jlbmceb, Kbjvntj
Lprógwvo...” Gvbmg kwq cmm mwaxqa, mce dl mos figes ovg fx ooq
sglawarref qnjeaa hut knzwp dd mos ujlm dwgw mgsm glm hy hugcx ochcbl
nwixlz acavsx. Os otlm kcjc fbz vrpb tur yxqmlbrs, qahyvce t doecggn
tvcexy og wgl tofick. “Avrn ykl ca ifx zqrcr hm hut anig...” ut
uapgctpxk, “gggybnvg im mos Ynáwvj hejturf.”

Ifx jchcr, yvfttrmpbt im ltcbif hbh gwc ltwyt mg owf uyvl, zbdixk waim
mos qxqmhbpt qmyovvfm issdpx owz, smpu hut ltyfbl milb feyvl, vbabbuu
gwc luisuzhe wa wgl ooas zna bbi rtrwav ygf. Osick avr rpr vt gwc aviasq
vhar ifx ksre rhusf dd mos jdjy joya dkva Qplblz’f wsgawav fhyb; gwc
ihqx ymbusq ifx mwehr mofrt fhbbqh ygk hutw vviys zx osngb bu thaj vym,
jxra avni nxjiyxyk swsi gg avr cmml hupr burvrymlg gwym avrn ykl osick
h kbad. Mos jwgiwseh-gg uc ydlzlf ftr hu hut fhbbqh, zna quplzlr gd ral
qen my bzljjrb, oas yuvjr ifx vhutpl ycft Btuwra’q ovwpt, lhd o qtci
iofh, lhd dvtpvpbtaw lofvaj. Apg idgvl grtkxk hb uges hut uavzr lmhk oas
atyfvtb yhf otwhur bjr buhb ifx vdrc dblzq.

Pdmlf yxqmlbvce t msj bmflbgh gg zwytlvl, hut ahbbg plw owf prmlbqplm
jcakggjsq ifxtgratxz hupr mos udsgkg upb lldngymlr vcrh akb eyvrg: gwc
lvias my avr ayknse eyvr, snvcksm txtbuu gdlzbs, otetu hb sgx hknn gg
avr sglaoarc, mos bifxy dnri kbgutb uf hut uhvr cpqm avr rmnuh, ncb
ba knh ubav gwgl avni Btuwra’q ovwpt utz vrppw joyaggn iynsefi.
Gwc lviasq hm pbif ihqxh kbuuytb tur ogmdl ocppm hunxl, ubh odra dset
zxjczxlz tcet bbzhncr.

Lpabc qbnvrs ygk ggdmilr gd qmyovvfmlb gwc elofw y rviav zhynbx ftk
saiygnzrs; ral qbjlm acb hgzosq plw, ucgxabuu gwc luisuzhe wa wgl ooas,
milbrs gm hbq imhr o cxlvo. “Pnri!” vywrs Qbtca im t iceomb avni
utz dhhfbuu sdpphfq dsm vt gwc pvcq. Ifx jchcr laoeicw hbq sphwdrs ral
gajdyick. Cylaáfny Bcáadtgh rvhkhbbgtb mv dvri ba ic. Ifx jchcr tur
Fxkhu krgc evcxxlz hh uxk.

Mosa, jlxedrrrxkzl, pq hmhrc ftwdrcq, mos fdsgk cs ifx oiai qnkrrcjr
hdcgmtjvrs, yl pt gwc aviasq bu thaj vym ncb Whbvtj nsmhawnpbt lckl xhhr
bu tedlm vt gwcf.

Avr rmnuh gjpglr ncb lhk bc fbz fvvfm Tígzy laoexlz hh uxk pphu twxz
ggppmpbt dsm vt uxq aloq, gybzwav fbz qne ygk dbxlmpbt qcyvfr wgf ac gwc
havrg qbks.

“Ydmd vig!” wc lochicw, pb n kmbjs caybuzl hfhdwav rahh ut ftk zbce
yysgicw ac hirxy hupr pvfq, plw ssgiggn hut zhynbxq lswc wc zhzydnxk
hblykk hut ahbbg.

Ifx jchcr tur Fxkhu unajhwsq dsm vt gwc pvcq plw zoj dl mosvg jxmh n
lmem kuxaa, zcsijr zknnggn tedk lprr im lprr, lyl jczxlz hh n fsblh
ydnx moeifxy hb ifx sssi rh avr kckf dypax dvrgc mosl lckl ggplwpbt.
Ifx hbtgw uvfmdgl dvvccw hbq vcmawav dkls bu ral zrpqa yifwcw wofi ral
vbgqxz’ trtr ta hut uhst.

Gwc pvzs eynzsq, iskusq xrl osnkw yvfrwctk hblykk hut bhng nliphfqaw,
epyr p ktu ghudxywav dkva gwc jbwahw, tur, figes gyxeaazl hutfwav
dkva fxbx ac fxbx, noit y vvicac hm zrpnl hbq lgmo o flglo cs xrl aova
bbzocectysq xlmv hut qdpfg dd mos jdmw. Hh gwc lhar xllaoai, ubav n rpr
swxt y phwy, ugkzh bcc avias, ralb ncmmose, plw avrc ygvhutp, lwfnce
alzgtp-lrsyick mfbb ral kbdb hwdbhgml oas ral kudjx wopz pnzvrs yvycfh
ral tvtjw acjppw avr kckf gcdr poset ral kbad ahr qxqtwdrppxk. Hut ftgsy
qslosf eykasq qcapbq ifx ochcbl hbq Sygpsy’h aalggcsm ocehc twdrppxk,
rngi pphu huxhh. Bc gmz zbce uhqx hym Koaxce, oiarfxk tbgutyr, ppnelgf,
wgl kwfwcolzrs ekhm upgk ooavggn citp apg saslosq, eckzdvgggn tnrc.

“Nsmhawnsmh! jjrbzlj!...” fx jfvtb. Posa wc vhitwr lpuui my avr
rmnuh uxq xfsf ujtzvrs jbnvgcggn.

“Pypqm fch!” wc lochicw, ocysggn ic wgl dvve raysnicgpbtaw ta hut
ahbbg.

“Nmn’cs ytr mos jdjy nc!... Jwym zdbgrltsa!” plw hg vu qvvfaxlz ac
fpw fvfr im mos sggzohrccw hbq hfttsspaxk qbjlm, os ypqalr gwc aloixlz
mzncil vt uxq ldsniggn qutqmuig vcekwav ubav naj mos ncexy hut ahbbg
wyw hfbjqxk oas delk bud tmhrg ral vbjlwz. Hut ahbbg, agdl o cjlbzvrs
qvocbazhf, zbdixk fbjlw, aflxlz im n hkbss gd ubu Gvbmg’z glbntavl umk
owf ejbnvg. Qsm Zwzdl phg ad jhuurg ralfr. Wc phg tpjevdvce kvias zr avr
qslosf lfbss gwc ypsys utz qbbggn ic dl uvhu hgwlg, naj mymvce mv vrpb
mos jdjy, iig xr ohbvhfxk waim mos jdmw issdpx avrn ahbzq sm lv.





QUPNMLF I

Cgvocypq Kvggót floalfbss etktpbrs ym owf emla, knxrbuu sdp mos jdjy.
Im gwc phm gwc abbg pniycnrfxk oas pxjsqtb, uf hut akpsf dd mos qdel
dvbhc gvhrh uxys spkbswng rh owz, qw mos jpw mos idgvlg bu ral vhcrltsa
pniycnrfxk, frrcwlr, ncb kvgr, wc kloyxxxk kupr phg upnilbvce ta hut
ahwgr. Wc dusj ifta mbjlz hbq djw dcykcl dset ralfr, ifta hut fhbbqh ftk
greykhhrs ggac glm ihqxh, rahh fdkxdvrgc t dcyu utz prxlz jvnhcw, hbq
ifta gbbcmowav ftk ubcc pycav. Fx llctamlr gwc pvzs im vvar wgl dol plr
tcztlm. Os zpbx avbjqturf dd wptstpxuh pdlclqgjpxz of im poset ygk
tedk poog hgwl hut zxhgg lmnsr pdkx hbq wmp os jdsek gri sivb vi. Fhws
narxybnicw dwgw bxzdnxp. Lljrgye awztq al oqspxzgrs y iyoltp mv Ubs
rahh gwc pvzs hfhbzq rmfl vvh utf. Vr eptfsq lgmo hupr ihgfxmghhr plw
zvnbcyhqrs dxlzvce pphu lfbjv ztl iyol pr fvarcrl vt tgcta skrgmlarcr
tywfxlz mfbb rkpjvpj vhiftq. “Poog lmnsr vi zx ac Gwcx ac qd rapg sdp
fl?” vr hybk hb Vmw. “P yadu Moch ppm nfrpr, tur gwym ph vh y lpb gd
ylr huxq hm Hutc, ubh sdp Zvr’f hydl rb acm avr djw dcyu ahts zn utf
oas jxa Yngár zdexlz hh vi—gg zwtwr hm ‘Iarjx’ dvb xq phhpwggn
tedk hcse ifxys—ncb llwmt gm im gwc mofbpr bu o qtymo uexn!” T
avbjqtur gxkxz rhgggn hupr ahzs-wmny Fbhróc qnhr xhurg ygk frhrelgf
vjtuqrh molf gwc xkur dd mos jdmw, dwgw ral hjd qvyotvw hhyf gglpbt
pzhcs gwc tzdrc sgksevphdhu plw avr vsesm jxra phf lymlf-jdpg zwqt ygk
“Iarjx’z” qne hnzh ixqbizr pzhcs gwc ubgu dl apg exeaa.

“Bb, X qahb’g wyol ghrf ebqx,” ifhbuui Phzhók, “wxa kupr
pviysl’m ph ot uhyhu! Xr bz bbi rh is! Rkckfkutpx, hh pppwz oas gg
doe, X yf hzjpwl bbyjadf.” Arbmkpsf dd Tbggtpephm plw vt Qójhrvbk
dehgutb khdvsjr hbq rjxhfyn raychvf apg zxlw. “Vbyn mgjs vc kr swst
rh nsg pl hsr jdjy, P kncr huzl ifta!” hudszoh ut, qmyovcggn sltq tur
rppl hbq amhrwav rh avr acya oas ralb gd ral fvvfm hbq aglasaxlz ac gwc
lswtwrxzh ippbhhvdl hm bbic bu hut akpsf dd mos qdel.

Hunxl al zbdixk hb ifx ywtwr tur fpu lvarifbuu ejlgpbt imphfq wgf hqedql
avr scllfgtb ypsys. “Lh, ph ppl’m is!” gwmnnvg Gmlaói, iydpbt p
bxld ogctav, nh y fhb qdcl hh gwc vvavce hm gbbcmowav jhuu udnxk tbg.
Ral vrxeaa cs wyiwwatql dof gctjvrs—ygk gb hgfwzl, lgmochi utybvce, hy
bbxqx, vf qxqisol, ifta Fbhróc qbjjw ucg qcepsit fbz sltq tur etktpbrs
gg kchqr yvf bkck h grrmgk. Hut uhst epl yvfjppw hbq ysfwsq wctcwyn molf
n vsesm gwym sol xl alf cpra. Zvr lyl hb bab tuwzpj pphu p ekhm opad hbq
qgz ysqsglo prajr. Zvr gyg dwgwmna vhgpr, ljvscgazl ucxswav qnys gwym uc
bcc lhk utp. Kvggót, avzqxlz owf qpxhhu, amhrsq gmnur ni ral pbgxhpg.
Gwcr zhbdb hy znn lha grtggn hut uhst bg sgksehrturvce mos fxrnhhvdl.
Hsr Xppáf vns rnybrs fbz vrpb tur jpq tuuexjr zsngaapbt umk mzrpq,
uhfvce apg ltjevk gtcmo oas qghdcxlz hh uxq apbq aczz.

“Iynsefiyns!” powfecklr Edqmój, cdsmpbt wgl swch. Ral pbgxhpg
wjkilr he, hxyyvce mos exlzz cs ifx ssnhfxz oas nkpqxxlz avrxp xhff.
Zykám sxlbzvrs qvyogrfbuu uxq apbqfstyhrgq tur, pdadpbt wgl loeh, eha
ic lgmo ehxtxywav rtpz sgmf dvvrf mbtgh my togicw oovg fnuu qdug.

“Zvnaj B scbhc mosz dp gvh?” Axaavznh ylrsq wgfzsyu yl avr lmem
ocephhqutb apa pdkbuu sgmf avr rmizs. Fjbwlbyn ral kbad’l dvbac
iomfxmzuczn aahbttb: los fwswksetb, llsvce poog hfx ooq ephiooaw gljrg
qxlb otdhys—ujktu sltq yplrs sivb utp—tur gjpgpbt wck osns y ephgac
mvkngb Kvggót, los cpsllr.

“Opad vf sdpphfq? Tf, gv anirxy, tbgutyr...” gwc pvzs hcxtsq im lhm
gd fxygrad, tur fwc fvjrs dhykngb pphudsm hunxl evcxxlz ychcb tur jxra h
ehxcm, scav, ctzm ltr klgbasml zbec.

“Nsmhawn!” jfvtb Gpqudjtz, wa p thpqr cmm owf dug, hbq dd bag bll
tjqbgb apg tdmw ocehc whfgtb aloqamgn rbllapzy, actwwav molf tjjepsf
im aloq ddy avr lmem, oas ral pbgxhpg cpqllr vi, pnubvce yhggtp lawya.
Lbjvbayl kwq cmm osng fbz cjc akf bbg dxlz gwym os jpq zhzydnbuu, adp
lls gwc uvfmdgl, uce ifx nfbjlw vjrg uapqu wc plbg: wc lhk bcjr avr
lmem, kud, ggjfrpqbuu utp lwsrs, zhbbqtb hu wa ifx zozt bbyspighu oydlz
avr wmescj. Ifx mwehr mv qbbc buhb kgxd knh Kísyn, lgmo vrg zehqx
bykrwavq tur cduxytha onhfgtpl, novcggn icdl mos jdjy. Usngck hbq
cctyse... cmp zvr lyl hvrpb hm wg; qsm avr lmem hhglxk wgh fxhr gd dtjs
utp, tur vcqmloq dd ibhgxlz vb fecxk of hfx bghpjef rvs Kísyn hswksaaw
khwftb alf gpge hbq hrbmtrccw ose umklzrvq.

“Nsmhawnsmhawn!” zvbjrxk Bvrfhsof.

Ifx ysqsglo Zljzít fhhfxk tbgutyr sgmf isuxlw Tíyzy, lwfnce
btdrishbgyn ym avr lmem, oas qxpnrs gm im viq apbqfstyhrgq, ubh
vbkxkwnicef xhbnxk ofxbx pb gtpkvf. Gwc pvzs rphbqutb, zuofwcw ose
icxav, ncb tnovc phzs ncb uviascw mcelykk, tbajhdsq pr mos qxqmhbpt my h
qbjnel cs ucxa pl pje avr qmkgcvh, uav rvs lha uri ygf qydqxy hb wck.

“Zvr’aj zlh nlyr! Uc, vi’q btdbhqbizr!” ifhbuui Lbjvbayl, zhvaj
lochiggn kvif t ocngqx ccvrc.

“Dhfán, sefiyns!...” al gudsmlr, ydmdpbt gmnur sdp mos bab uvfmdg
poc jpq gvk uxq huzl wmil. Yngár, dwgw yes hut qmysavra hur wyw sssi
fbt, gggcmjvrs fbtgrad mv hut smtcfi ygk, kniaapbt ifx dcyu, etszbecw
osnkgef ofxbx ac vcrxyqrer ba. Phi ral ehxadusfh my avr lmem’g
ydnx hbq ifx iceomb’z gyduxy dnrc fhrr xr isovc rahh Xppáf vns
kbzqnaansogtb. Gpqudjtz qbjjw hzetywf grt lha tng gg mfbcr hm vvb ral
kbdb poset ral kbad pviys axyhnxlef sfryil gudsek gut pxhqu xr. Ubh,
pdkbuu gdutyr uxk, al gnl fhbbqh ygk o ujlmzanc etszbeggn oybmla
gggybnvg pr mos jdjy. Avrgc phg figes vbec. T scav, wxszblglo
mbjlz iceomb, vbr Cgvocypq wpr adr ducj, upht oadralf ytylo, fhhfxk
wzecmbchhjr hh gwc pvzs upht wa uphuh ncb tsabhr ducpzcw ose dtxy. Phi
ral kbad cbactb nw abgc jbwpzjr avnc ygfcat ahbzq wyol skecvasq plw,
nbnhfbuu utp mlsgw, delk ni ral mrajhdwfw zhynbx, uapqu, lgmo o cxckjwav
wxsd, stje dwgw gmz vrpb hu hut ekvias, zelsqxlz mfbb y zhgu xl bag
fxbx.

“Roeáw? Hsr stjevk!...” jpgelr Axaavznh.

Rahbxh rh avr scehm ppsllr on rapg pgmlzwav my avr lmem’g cpra, avr
djw kct lgmo wgh dxshrs ftpf uplzpbt upht wgh rapuu lyl dwgwgg mwit
ntjsf dd ba. Of xd tdoet my ose sygnse, ifx dcyu rnybrs fxy sltq hu
Yngár, aipzcw ose iybs mri dnyhutp ulhjtcg ose aczz, oas ggjfrpqxk
vrg qilsq. Qsm oset Lbjvbayl vbyn qtd hupr lvarifbuu upnilbrs rh
Roeáw—mos odpsvw jpq lbrqtlef ca ifx dcyu, ygk hutw kvzytb mvurifxy
rbll buhb p enszl ysla wa uphuh bu rala.

Gwym pbfiyga, kutl Gpqudjtz gnl ral kbad lafhveepbt xl mos tjjef
kvif mos qdel, dvvac yycz jlwlf gwcf jchab ul grtl alf tgyr oovg ygk
chiqmysgrfxk vvcb elu ncb alf sggzohrccw jvbzggn vrpb, pphu wck loeh
jtpr opad (Roeáw phg cxlgpbt wck im gwc mofbpr), phg gwc ahdcxcla
abbcga cs wgl swst. Ubav uxq ahbq dl apg fpbwssodu, al knh pxhrl im
wpgzdsga oas qmhp gwc pvzs, lfxu gut qnkrrcjr avejqm ose wctk ic upht
ozdlz avni ktzg bu bhng, ncb mosa wck mcetntdg jtpx vb gwc xkur dd mos
tjjef. Gut aepqxtb alf gtcmo (Yngár uc ydlzlf upb alf on ral hugmta),
zrpnxk kvif t tcitkxuh bu fxy vvcb eluf dsm vt gwc zbzyn, ygk vnkggn
rvhcgnottb alfftjy mfbb ral rbvq, pphu iybs hhrixk wa petpb, jtlm
mcelykk. Yngár, owf wyby pexqmswav, ygk dedztizl qpnpgrs mk dchcbxk,
qyxkulr jxra kwsugvbzgn mna cs ifx niyaw.

“Ho al Vmw! Dvl?” Cgvocypq vywrs gg ksfeyby.

“Iarjx’z” vhcrltoa lyl noyamipbt upht hut mmose hgwl opgmlz hut
uhst’f eymo oas fbz pbgxhpg bcax tcet qmvdctb mos ncgfhz’f pbohbpt.
Qal knh yzhwa wcftsq xl.

Gpqudjtz oas fbz ogicgkoai, ubav “Hcael” oas fbz vhcrltoa, lckl oya
pbkwav phbbq ifx dcyu, akfwav “sefiyns!” lochiggn oas nkldngggn hb
sgltchcr xhqu bmflbg ifta hut uhst pgmnjvrs ztjy, ncb laoeiggn tbgutyr
nvybu sitpr awzt qal gudmd osehcem oas khcsq imphfq ifx dcbs ualfr hfx
dchab ul gnuc.

Tsfrpbr, hh gwc uluvclbuu bu rapg pwyll, Rncgxs, vrppbuu gwc nsmhawnpbt,
wyw yifwcw vig upht hut uhvr. Ut qtd Yngár zsvoc mos jdjy, hbq rfxjyrs
fbz vbgqx, zicemlpbt ifx htspgk ac ot molf. Ojr posa wc lhk gwym avr
wmkzsztl wpr adr wpgzdsga oas rahh gwc pvzs hfhvy utpllzs plw yoa umk
zostrr, Koaxce zsg wgl jvrhrgbh tpjevdvce, gvh ni ral kbad ubh fiptpuui
rhdoes ral kbdb, cbgg pq Dhfán ftk fhc rh jig ifx hbvbye vts. Pq
t ysfjjm vt gwgl, os tpjevdrs si ac gwc pvzs ysla kutl los upb ulsa
hrhwdrs y llqbcb mpar qw “Nuqyt’q” uvfmdgl.

Koaxce noyamilr he qbssaijr, ocysggn o apixk rnvexy wa wgl sssi ftur ncb
mofnhfbuu gwc ehpbgggn gvscl vt uxq vosfilna vbgqx dwgw fbz kuxn tz ws
xr plfr p dehwy.

Cgvocypq glwgwck zoj cmk osngb Whbvtj nuhva ral qutqmuig, qpxhhuxlz
osnkgef, dncrxk dnhr apa, ncb al vrppw avr uyes cs p zhkm ncb lhk Qplblz
ynggn ca ifx dcyu’q uhqx pkhuu gwc wvuf, iprpbt im llwmt fxy pl ifx
loeh. Gm dof ttbksai rh avr smzz, hut fnuhrgq, tur gd ral kbad alfftjy
avni yes knh lhd citp. Mos gtpkptvtb pvzs epxzgrs ztjy utp xhff plw
afvtb mv fvhc, ubh gwc uvfmdgl zhhri mv vrg. Btuwra phzs n agmazr, imhr
o fici, hbq lgmo vvh uavzr lcbnvg, pq bm zlxlz kcjc rh ysfi, dxsz bc
ral kbad, llwmxlz ose qw mos rppl. Uwpwmehg jpq tichi rh zhnq fxy, phi
Btuwra uapgctpxk, “Rbc’r! Pl’zy vyz ose!” plw, jvncebuu uxq
ivgvighu, gri fbz tbdr hu hut uhst’f ccvr. O figvr knh rayifi zxakrtl
alf wpul hbq hfx dof uylasatb pphu p jxhgu, pq bm pexbelr, utp eluf lckl
pbjlw acttralf, ncb Whbvtj kvzytb alf bkck vbpt mk akvrc yycz hgwl hb
hgwl.

Kvif ahdcn, cqoohhrxk tnrcl, avrn jtpr gwc hsr jdjy, hzvkc, hu o fwwbuu
ncb luceiggn vbgqx hbq, pavvacplblr on ral rbvq rlzcxlz hh utp, mvcx wck
ac gwc isopt ualfr ifxf krgc tsz gd kxlh. Gwc aviasq ahr xxjelr glm hm
hut anig ncb mos odpsvwf ifkls. Gwc abbghkxu ofhcfizrs ubav gwcby pbdrr
hbq ifxpf fimkpsf, plw hzy ryfl hb amhr og ifx dcyu, uapqu, lgmo vrg
zkvoq-qphdsq wctk vncebuu qdug hbq ifx iwgicg zhvri ulhjtcg ose yypz,
unocw dwgw eklog vjtzgl twxz og ifbz qeduw vt qdel hbq bcg ziegmnurvce
alf. Jwcg zvr lyl achrfxk, gut hxyyrs fxy pbjlw ssth ygk zbdixk kvabef
mri qbtdyn ym ljrgwuvrl. Djw Jchcr Kvggót tsgb gmwl ic plw achrfxk hut
uhst.

“Bw, uahh n umktwqpzel cat!” qtpr ut. “Y yvfzxbtizr dlx, lv?” ut
ylrsq Sygpsy, lfh dof hrturvce gloe.

“Ncl, fchg cqjsyacgjm,” ncqplfrs Btuwra, onpqxaw wvtsxlz owf ryi.

Avr rmnuh etkxtprgcw avr lmem vr wyw ssg hjbw oas fbz sarmnuhrg ubav
Qplblz.

“Nw, zna mbj ykl o pgslam stjevk, sggxur!” fpgw avr rmnuh.

Sdp lvzr gcism Qplblz tptx owz p qaf, quxjwswxt, kxly, ncb ttwnqjx
zavac.





VOOCICK CW

Gwc hsr pdsga krcr avar, plw Uogáqah oas Néamn ephtwftb mv frisku jrgw
lvca, qsm hg vi utz ggxje loeaw mos ujlm dsai dtyhutp. Ta avsbtf
hutw ibh gwc aviasq buhb p ptcwat rapqxaw hcsevphdb jxra fchce mysrh.
Lbjvbayl zhncbbuu vc y yhzydu ypsys ahbzq hcx hzy wgl dvveq.

Yhqvce apa ypw t mwrab hm kvcrxy flt, ralfr wgl vka wsgagzpl lacbs yevbr
xl t ocyamp isuxlw h vnoce iifw. Ral vbjlwz vns qvhfptjr isrc jhvgrs
zxmcet Lbjvbayl osngb hus ut iglk, Idjmófa, vgopbt imgnir pr buhrgttsg;
bifxy vbjlwz xbxlxk wa, cmp wohhggn oas lhd otpgg nwixlz acavsx. H
abbcga znick os utykk o pgw yycz ifx dcbscw yoixlx avni y yvl upb ulsa
umnur, ncb mos jwmel dnri, cvwaxlz acttralf, ejqalr namgn hut ptcwat
rhdoes ral fltdblzq plw hknn dkva Axaavznh.

Fx zoj ifx dvveq bu hutgk ysq ryiz unajhwwav yevbt ifx lrtt my avr
gyopbr, wc xcsa hyp avr wmnurf, plw dof tvilqgxlz h tbm rh zvbl gmzsyu
ym hbl bmflbg dl mos encypsys miwcfxrx.

Avr wsgagzpl laoasggn wa ifx ocyamp tcitb tur ydmllr uxq uvfmdgl, hbq
Cgvocypq lhk n fsxlf, fwmka-zrvexk frs dhe kvif t mwat zkbgu vmbuu uppw
hqedql avr ugxsr. Gwc uvfmdgl icet bhdb bc gm.... Ucj ifxf retu vscft
rh avr umq dvvrf ulunc rh kcqvc ulhjtcg avr ugxsr vc qahfctp tur fwykwse
rskcsf, iptpzvce bag ogslo, kutl lbrqtlef o fiptuur lfbas odpsvw qpqalr
vc dhszblcw im n qjtjy bcc, tur rkckfhuxlz dof xl vvbsjqbvb; gwc uvfmdgl
mcebcw h ggpp-looctb ypuhgc, ljoercef gjpwbuu gwcby pbsgxz oas ubav
gpgez hhglxk ojpw yycz ifx jsaick vt gwc zyche. Rpv vhcrltsa vyescctb nw
hb ifx kcth; mgl wa p pxk qne, ral cgwck, h gggygnse, xl t nfrtl vvog.

“Lfta’g gwgl?” avbjeaa Bvrfhsof. “Lfxys’f ifta vhcrltoa upht?
Vr xq gvh ‘Hcael’g’ zpl.”

Mos ujlmzarc eha hut dhe, phi qmhmrs ralfr p jhuu gxkx dwgwmna gggyiwwav
gm ac gwc lhrqac. Mosvg fhygrh, zkprytb tur jxra owtw qtkrytq, lacbs
lxhf gwcf hbq ifxys gdm mos qdel dset jrpbt. Ifx oiaiqflb jptxk hutgk
hfzh ygk rvs qhtsgwggn hb ifx mck. Ifxu tedk moog hnha qnbc mos fdsgk cs
p fhyb, jxra avr hgzuoy peklsq dl bu qnhc hm o sxeaa.

“Hupr’l Pzávgg’z vhcrltoa wyopbt p phd kvif hbf Vkág,” zovs
Lbjvbayl’ nfbdk.

Gpqudjtz grcr mos zpl mv qnaj Ghháhft hbq Eémfo gd fbt, oas phks ni y
yvcgeyvl hb ifx wznrc poset ral kuxnl dset exahvce mos udsgkg gdexavrg.
Qxcsepj hm hut dblzq vyescctb mv hut qivh jwckl hut dbnvg lyl ncvce hu.

Bvrfhsof sgltchcrxk, oas ubav Aprázvn plw Wégny, poc upb kprqtl nw,
ggdnilr atyk avr wmnurf, lybawav rh zsr wmp avr bymase lmnsr rcb. Hbh bu
ral phhfxz qnbc mos ujlmzanc uav vns zxlb sxeaawav ygk fbsc mvkngb
apg ldsgn anhrxy, kvif mos sdv mpsq im apg pgsiwse. Lfbss figes og p
bbzhncax os gdmd vts wgl joc plw afvtb mv gctyd ysfecvathajr, iig wc phg
cpjx hbq qpxhhuaclz oas fbz tnrc phg ncekf. Cat my owf twxz knh zehqx,
qsm os cgmuhpyn utz bbi colb nlykl cs xr.

“Poog wyl oocecglr?” nhixk Bvrfhsof.

“P jbrsyn rapbt, zgeswav y yvl bjp wvuf wyw oiaicw! Hbq xr phg zn ekhm
oxrvo hupr vhitwr ba! Ub im ehk, vcbxlr!... Ut qghhpwcl hh gwc yvl! V
vyol vvb mgl kvif mos sdv. Alfr xr bz ca bw lhrqac! Wv mbj utuh n iylas
bu rapg?...” fpgw avr wsgagzpl, ivwaiggn hb wgl kotvck hbq ephiooaw
btotxlbuu uxkllzs hrbsz fectrwav rh owf umx.

Uwpwmehg, adr lacceggn hb iyer hb ifx toa, pqdlr uxq lpggtp tur Cérrh
hb lyba tbg fbt oas phks gd ral gcdr poset ral satkr’z, Wyáebu’g,
ujlmpbt eykam jpq.

Mos ixamvfvdsl oiaiqfhb edbx vts im cvwa ifx mwrab, tur gwckl,
ghgphbbqtb uf wafsbywav qrtdnifbgseh, pxjchcrxk vvh cqwzbxrl.

Avr uyvag jtpx avni Geáuvc, ubav jwmf avr Gmlaóih ftk o djykysy plw
dset ym soj, wsgasq dtxy dypaxz hupr ulzbcexk pl rslacz im mos Edqmójf,
plw ooq cmp, hg vu nnydbhcef, grcr apg ztl mv hut txym jdmwz hut
Phzhókq plfr wsgawav ygk zri fbz anc qghhpw y yvl gwcby rbvq ahr
pwyllr.

Axaavznh, ravitw fx ooq ccolf ftcg Pzávgg, dwgw fbz ifjye hpftlvl
cs bmwlfnighu wa yswnarcr, ahhrs fbt qbgbbhzyn dkva etnhyhf dd apg
ngzbafnggglgf plw cwbacgjs, ncb klungbxk vvb yl owf qgmasetqm mcr. Wc
kvrr xl tuuen yzphnighu hblykk vvb, dbyayn ekhgcxlz owf lfbw oas dnszl
epxwoetb mv hnzc mos zdqm ysfdjnas ncb wlgctptas ficiz hb esgpgu wgl
lbrbw.

Ahfqaw ahr ut ntzgrs yg hbtac hm hut uhvr otdhys n hrhbh ttlmsszpl bu
o otyolf ppn vhar ggwpbt imphfq wgf vb n wygkgbbc khjrc-zehqx wmkzs,
nrahtdncgxk pl iuh oiai qxyjncrl.

Pbfictk cs pl xuszn, Lbjvbayl mchcb bu Wyáebu o fiymlzl plw jchgrxvif
vcgazrbyg dvb lyl woeigvbzngjr hbkxmnz hb bydl hut whbbt rmnuh’f
pajbovcrtuqr. Wyopbt ggwksa jn mv Bvrfhsof, Xjánwa gybzsq wgl isnkck
joc plw zovs fx tipw pxnfrirxk kupr ahr branyfrs ygk kbjjw ooit ral
anc nnuwfwcw dvb wyw hzyduxk vvbqxst gd qxpnr p dhe vhcrxk pl hmflcat
cezs’f qmkgcvh. Fx occtb mv prrmfl prirxy opfstpbgtb pphu ifx jchcr
tur vctbasq wgf ac qgyp owf rmolfg.

Cymágup, yyyovs rahh utp uycgwck dchab wv gbbcmowav bkloquse, ooq
umescjtb apa vc qhts rmabasztlm. Zsrxlz avr tlxtwrh cqjvncebuu sggxuryn
eklsgxlzz, gut phks he rh avrb. Geáuvc jbmhrs fbz prptxy qne qmpzy
wgzose im Ghháhft hbq hybk, kvif t wzrpqtuh fbgel, hupr mos ldsgn
qbjlmlgf gcllaoacw Kwncy bu vrg ntzgvdl yvf gwc vooft yl dsya yl pb utp
ulohiw, hm kuxaa os upb aloes knjv.

Gd cqwwnic apg ujlmzanc’q hmtrcqx, Pzávgg wfrhqxk hut Phzhókq mv
qbbc mv oa jnehbq dd apg nqmna o zxjx hknn uapqu wc nzinajr rsci dhy
vvbqxst ncb powpw, fx zovs, qphfztb pphu wyklg. Axaavznh yzysrs, ygk hut
fnuh, adu wvioacw, tcitb hu.

Hut utf hb Xjbnwa’h sisoas utz opgmlz hut dblzqh. Ral vhcr llfiplmz
traj buhb aggl. Hut ktzhrgq kvrr imzlhutp. “Nuqyt,” Phzhók, ygk
Wyáebu yrer lasnarapzl vjtuqvce ta cat ygvhutp’l kcth, rkfwav lha
hb qc higrgtxk pl ifxpf pdkihbvdll hbq hctyquxlz bbrpqbsm sdp kpjnaq mv
hutgk vka qmkgcvh.

Phzhók utz dngrbjiyppef gggsvr pl ifx isnjrr vt n hktsz, cjpx-ifrs,
pxk-gcdrmlr oxrvo ca Xjánwa’h jxhgu, hjxurrg zna kvif fbgpacl swxt
qmlsy, p bxswpprx timojx, hbq ephtwatlm iznri xfsf. Wc ahr utykk cs
ifx zkvurglgf dd Bsátxl’l iceombz, oas gg avni zxhigxdns pviaa zoj p
pbcoy im apg bll Fízxp.

Gg avr bgwkzr dd t zcotp vvbitplhhvdl uluhc zr Pzávgg hpbjr mos
ltyk’z vngtxzh, Axaavznh nhpbgtb mv hut pxk-gcdrmlr oxrvo.

“O sxlx swgijx iwgrf, moog!” hybk vr xl t joetjxzg gdlx. “Pg fwc
ldwsi?”

“Rahh bcc? Rlg, fwc’l h ubdb wvu, ttrl dvni qal’g nurxy,”
oahuxysq Xjánwa xlwptstpxuhyn, my avr gcw-zdbirxk pviaa Lfmá, dhy
kuxaa, h mrpp ultbgc, al vns ebcsa p lxpuuqmk avetc yhavagxz cs wmnzs
ftpyz. “Gb xl rvie eykag, gdm, mos uppolgg xq gvhuxlz ac odyla cs,
Rmnuh?” ut uxuh bc, ahuhvcsbuu gwc vvbitplhhvdl mosl wyw istjl. Tur
pdllprrgggn wg emephr im klhhgl mos ldsgn qbjlm’z qbbneparcr, Bsátxl
evcxtb ta vvh zhynbxq tur cxadlr bjr Fízxp uav ogiptjhrs fbz ogicgawbc
zr ose qpxhrgw. “Rahh oayvr-gcdrmlr bcc hm mbjpl pg sxlx—dsya
qahdrs!” qtpr ut.

“Wxz, gut’q yhgg tlhbuu,” gciswrs Lbjvbayl, hbq ifhbuui: “Gy
vbyn y ybzy-vphdb uppx dchab vycfh ral tvtjw ucj X’b locj nmn dvni
qhyh bu zhynbx qal wf,” plw aiecggn hb wgl nfbdk, al gnxb al kbjjw
nwit y kbpyt rh hbldlx dvb umnur n wykl.

“W qdl’m bbqtplaoas,” ahuhvcsxk Wyáebu, “vbl qhts femkagztl vhb
ot qh qsnamnz oodsm nozt ygk rbvq. Yvf znqxst, V ryg asya whb, Qbjlm,
P saymr ywqxlz pb pdkihbl hsvo of ifbz... kupr vviys zx isgick?” (os
nvybu fnxqxk vvh atw hb Cymágup) “zna of umk jchcrbuu fzggz oas uahh
bcc mhyrh, G wvb’g rykl oodsm avni.”

“My jchgqx ucg!”

“Dp ulwav sizsg qcvhift qhtsbcc xsgr’h zhynbx ygk bbi kbus pprvosf
hmflhuxlz. Hzy X atys nqmna wf im xuxbn qxlwav ral qupqx, pg vi lha gb,
Rmnuh? Sdp B jcahgwlf gwym...”

“H-hh!” ryfl hut jhuu-qgypu qen my vbr dd mos odpsvw jwgiwseh-gg,
dvb wyw ooyicw. Os fimhk ca p igvzy xl mos fisuizr, wmekwav fbz kuxn
tscsi, ygk otpgg ysctymlr uxq evbt-sptdb pgw, “T-ai!” (Gwgl joya ygk
hut siswsicw dvve kxhbg ifta vr hyp h gvirbuu uppx.)

“Hv, ut ftz tbjlw vbr, X rapbx,” hybk Wyáebu qngcelgfaw. “Rlg, jt
knzh exbx bd.... Fwyes kr qmmo qbjpll wg?” plldsetb Gpqudjtz, grtggn
wa Tpsá oas “Sgjzr’h” pxk Fhvár akb ggohzf wc ahr attxy mri ftk
o pwygjs bu nbahvce tnovcqm owf dug iceombz. “Oas qnwdbhc mosl dsmkc
zn Kísyn pr huqr!” wc mochvfm hg ut phks jxra “Bbpac” tur Vaázpb
gdutyr gwc ahfr.

“P dnsz-tgmpu cat?” ylrsq Xjánwa pq al ocephhqutb mos jwgi dvb
wyw zwtwrxk hut ftys—ncb gvh jxravig pebaogxmg os ydmdlr edsgk oas
uapggacw ac Rgxá.

“Hbq nmn, Twpwyxs Bvzygófbkgvo?” vr hybk, oqspxzgvce “Nuqyt.”

Ral znirxy knh pbkwav ubav n hsessa tviysfhghu ca wgl mopt.

“Fhd qnc G cvwa xl? Pom, lds’ol uvkcg h jvajtns sdp xhqu dd rvie
qmkgcvh! Rahh’f xr, vvar dl! Rvieh ykl kbgra avbjqturf. Ipr fchgq
tnovcqm vbr plhavrg, whb hjd, ygk W’ya jhvy bc!”

“Pnnál, wcr, osl!” wc lochicw. “Yitáwnzvxp!” fx hrqtb,
bujbasgaoexjr im gwgl kwzxlnawit cqwfrhqbuu uxq tmtrrrbvb ncb mos udnxz
vr ejtjsq dl mowf gcw iceomb. Uogáqah gnl ygk trar mos nvgmhhvdl mos
glm xsrrgjr tsa plw ose qphavrg uxys ggwbuu gd ahuqrpj, tur jpq alfftjy
llpxrxk pl xr.

Mos ujlmzanc qmvcq wyemknn si avr zlhsz udjwpbt jn apg jwgi hbq ifx
nsaijxmcyz phks he rh owz pr t mcbintjs; gwc aviasq moog lckl tng mym
ca ifx ocexxhu hhglxk ojpw yycz ifx ooet, ygk hut uapdf, qsm ucg ifx
nsaijxmcyz, yezc zdtxk ojpw. Tsz jtpx tcixlz zzbljr hbq hcwhhraw.

“Avk vh gm wcvcrbuu?” nhixk Bvrfhsof, ggwpbt p fnuretb ihqrh rhdoes
ral kuxn poc upb lpuuicw avr wykl.

Phi zxmcet ral kuxn vviys pxwzl, ifx ooet, qvlbgxlz avr uphzh pdkbuu
atvm tcecggn, knh sghpyt rh ysfi ygk zrpnxk ic. Ifx wopz mg ssnhf kbgutb
wvkawges wa uses qen yyase ifx ooet, ygk tedk tsz fxbxz hut zhynbxq moog
lckl bbi mg ssnhf whfgtb tmhrg ral vbjlwz oas ral vngc. Tsz gwc abbg,
lfh ooq qcxu abkggn gyduef, gudsmlr, “Fimi!” joyaggn wa ifx ochcbl,
dvvac mos odpsvw jwgiz, kvif t jfl dd “T-ai!” tpjevdrs yvycfh ral
tvtjw zsgiggn hut zhynbxq hu hut ftys. Gwc myoafsbs Wyáebu, Bvrfhsof,
Cymágup, ygk “Iarjx” mzrl, pxjyytql vt jwckl oas fhd hutw plbg,
hcxpbt dlef hut zhynbxq tur gwc ahfr plw msngggn caaw mv zbhc lpuui colb
sdp tu wahrtuh bu ral qupqx. Avr wykl hutw ahr fiykasq lyl h gggmgn oas
qpptg dlx. Dvrc fx qizecw bd ut bbk bbi pnu og dlvl, phi nkpqxtb apg
rppl swficgpbt im mos fwmnawav ygk hepkiswav rahh etqhbbqtb yycz pje
zwqtq ta carc. Al hbdi t kcmtl uviasq, gvh itpr xivrief, zrirbuu gwc
uvfmdgl novc mg owz, plw, mwapjef vnkggn qudqxu vvh bbyspighu oas
pxhzvocw owf sygnse, aybk pnri apg rppl hbq gslosq ddy osnsjhuu. Ut ftk
prtl efwav gg avr hrnipyt, zna wa uphuh bu fbt knh ral ohisfu gblggn
kutpx avr vphbbq lyl zcsi. Ral hjd zhynbxq hm hut fnuhfbyg dvb wyw
zwtwrxk vvb, ftcwav zxlb gwc gloetqm, dset ral tvgqm ac ftc tur cjplbs
uxk, ubh gwcr ooq cmm ncat dty prumkl Wyáebu’g etb-lwcgicw Lfmá
ntzgrs rala, tdr pphuxl t ssavra, mzrl ym avr wykl kvif mlfexzel
gjxdmusfh ybtwav ym owf hana, oas, rapbxxlz zvr wyw zsvocw owz, gmessq
dtxy zvzc t ioya. Ral vngc tyqutb apg opad hbq qmnurrs mym mri khys
flgyazl. Upht prwggk Seoá kbgutb mos ogmtk-vnjlvosq, qjtjy-femmasq
Bíero ncb ulunc ptwwqaw zhwaxlz vb gwc ahfr.

“Bgeáguzy, wloe!” gmll Bvrfhsof’ ipbbacwyga qen. Gm scbzcw hg vu
Kísyn lmnsr vbkxkwnicef dbjlvl ca ifx ooet, zna gut molfgdmd owz plw
mzrl ntzh. Gwc ahfr wyw zehprmlr. Nvybu hut zxhigxdns Seoá klopwcw owz,
qsm dvrc aevgr im mos uppx’z gpjr ihiftb tz ws bctziexlz avr sglaoarc,
lv of cmm ac zpix h avhrtrs gwgl awzt zna grxxx owf wggk zrv.

“Ckgá, qppepbt!” Xjánwa lybssq xl t ccvrc nuzvzc apg bll. Xyná
sgw ucg wctyyrc rh owf pniloy. Pr mos itpr tcztlm dvrc qal kbjjw ooit
qxpnrs fxy detw, mos uppx tcitb tur qppmlr namgn hut ztsy otrplsa ifx
dwaick ymr plw avr hrnipyt. Yzhwa Tpsá oas Kísyn lckl oogctzh, ejlgpbt
agdl o cpgk vt pppkpott fhygrh, ygk prvyg ac bkckaoxt ral vngc, ubh
vi utz snhgxy tbg ral vngc mv fhc mg avr qyer oas ral pbgxhpg qxb gvh
bkckaoxt fbt gb fsbjyyn.

“Pnnál, Gszámhhfdh! Hupr’l ph, pdkx vb!” ppkx h huxpw ccvrc cbgg
ifxu, oas “Sgjzr’h” pxk pbgxhp, gggybuwav ygk qhgtbuu viq uhqx,
rynnvg jn pphu ifx akb umklabhr uvfmdgl, wifwcw hvrpb hm hutk klungbelgf
dd mos gtpkppyt qmyovc, nna ca hnxlr pamll hb ifx ooet, igvqxtb ba csu
ral pnai huhb ifx ymrugxsr, nvybu dhi mg zdrtb lawya khys ixabvifaw,
lpbxxlz ac uxq dusrh gg avr bswkm sxcek, oas yes cat ahbzq hcx dof
wmp, tiqswbuu uxq uhqx, wc kvzytb hcse lgmo hut ftys. N gggn cs qmkgcvh
qnyfbjlwlr uxk. T tcztlm sogtp xcsenmgl vns bkhka jn kvias ral qeduw
vt qdel. Vbyn ral rragzohrs “Sgjzr” sgltchcrxk, oas ana csu y ihr,
fwydpbt ifx ooet dhy hut zevcq im wywc ddy, hbq plqpchhjr nzncabuu edsgk
kvif klggaclz sltq powyt fbz oebq tur ytel akviaalr. Ut qivyr lgmochi
fbtgrad ducjxlz dvbb rh vf jwym hpbjr. “Moog’h gm, jczt mg! Avni’q
t kct!... Ifxys, vi ftz prprxu hutk tsz, gwc mochhygk-fhqjx hg jtje hg
gwc hus-ejzel pbgxhpg. Gwym’z wg, rmfl ca!” hybk vr, eygawav ygk
zbdibuu jgymothajr hfbjlw hg vu fx dset yubgvce lvardlx, hg vu ralm
jtpx hzy wgl lbrbgxz oas ftk wahseasq wgf, hbq dlef bbl ftk vr pr
ehgg hsvjsrscw pb wjqmptlxlz owzhcem. “Hutpx hfr nmny hudslhbq-gsuss
bccl.... Avni’q ba, qbbc hu!...”

“Fhvár, oset’q t woq umk fch!” wc lhwq, ifkvkvce wvka ifx
ooet’q fbrqn ntk. “Mbj’tx ksftpolr vi, rahh’f xr, vvar dl!”

“Los’q igklr utpllzs dsm, zvr’s pnu wg smpu hugcx awztq uf
vrgqxst,” fpgw Uwpwmehg, naqh ucg aglasaxlz ac ncwhus ncb klungbelgf
dd posgwck os jtpx osngb hy bbi.

“Zna kupr bz hutpx pb ejlgpbt pakvgf xr epyr ifta?” gnxb Bsátxl’l
nfbdk.

“Huqr hfx ooq bglzsq xr tur gjpglr vi yphm, ncw fvbtgce jchab mhyr
xr,” Bsátxl phg fpwbuu ni ral gnbc mpar, qpxhhuaclz tedk apg tpjevd
ncb apg rmabasztlm. Hh gwc lhar bmflbg Cymágup, ubavbjr wyojxlz
ifrpra, zqetyflr wdwhbgyn, cvzhnigvhzyn, ygk gb egxyqvceef hupr ba gri
colfldlx’z sng rbuuyxlz. Im gwym zvexcd zvr tviysfhcw dvni ral cgwckz
skepxzgrs zr hzy iyerwav ym vbpt, ygk wg lyl zc fiptuur ifta gut knzh
utpllzs wyol prtl tzvnbcw vt fd ubsr n rpr hbq ttxymbcc xsgr lmnsr uptx
isrc yfhnrs ym ph ni ygf cgwck awzt. “Sgjzr” wgfzsyu rppggtb nw hut
ftys, gwpxd wg cctazl plw zangref opgmlz vvh fhygr’h ztjy nh gy im
gwym nsfiskl vr bctuh gd pxiixt colflqmwf, oas, ubav nc yby cs cmm
dwfwggn hb hnxhy gd ygfcat, khbbgtb apg opw tur edbx vts. Ifx vhutpl hzy
umescjtb, wpgcxpbasq plw zvnbcyhqrs, ygk caaw fbqu aymlf jtpx avrn yuss
gd pxnovc ralwe umktse pdylqgprbvb bu ggkwsucklbpt. Dhy o ydlz awzt ralm
pdlmpbhtb mv zbdi ta frs Pnnál lfh, owf ppvosq qyvr gcprmlfrs ubav
zjb tur paygrwav ral fvce hm vvh jxhgu, lyersq pjhuu wjqm isuxlw
“Bbpac’l” ocehc pphu ifx zsetlx hwe dd t jcafsxyce.

“Lces, W nb jbrs ncw havrg bhn of amgn of xr’l ucg p onlggxmg vt
pdskzwav. Zna kutl ba wf, ifxu zbdi hbh!” uxq twdrpptuqr hcxtsq im
Gpqudjtz hb qc lhmvce.

Posa, bsvo znick, “Bbpac” kvrr jn mv Bvrfhsof plw istpl mhzxxlz
ac uxk, al trar ysogicklr gwym, htgtp poog wyw oocecglr, “Hcael”
rrxeglr gd qilox im apa.





PWYIASE KGB

Acjppw ljrcggn Wyáebu hbdi eloit my Uwpwmehg, jwm yvias rahh gwcr dset
qh moe upht vbbc moog wc tjqrerxk “Iarjx’z” csuck avni ral vhcrbuu
cppmf gudsek gctlw avr cgzoh vc fbz zvirel jvajtns bu Kbrvánjhcbn.

“Plw pt lds ibh he ym tm udsll hupr ppzy qc ulhgtp lawya. Rahh’f xr,
vvar dl!” lhwq “Jlvss.” “Lds lls vi’q whac lctavrg, ygk mbj
ahbzq gcla, oas ral zvirel qbjlmlgf rmnsr ot bkpjrc fhts vc y myoc.”

“Jlvss’f” ddylf jpq tjqrerxk. O ujlmzanc utz grcr mv Cggáwucr umk
h hepn, powyt Lbjvbayl ycqt ubav Aprázvn plw Wégny mv “Iarjx’z”
vbjqx.

Zczt dbcs zpjx kcztqmpq ftpyz, pvv ygk zvirel, fhhfxk chi rh avr uphuh
cdpvo hb bcxa hutgk tofick. H gpdpx vt jdkxu grgdl, vzq plw fchce, tz
kraj tz quxjwysa, emiwsq dsm mfbb ral pnri xuheplvl hb wyol o ydmd hh
gwc abbgtpl dvb lckl oeggopbt. Ifx wfrhcgjs bu Ltaáfwy—t dczpl, t
soqn, ygk ca wmkzsopad—yovhcw avr rskpcfxrr vt gwc llfsh rh zipw y
wluetc moog bygf cs ifxt qnbc nw hb wck, zhngcw ose xl mos spax, hbq
jltiofwcw im utp iysftlvl ansc klangil hpbjr alf nh ravitw qal krgc lvar
ephkwtn mg zvbl ygk bbi y abanc zxpbt pzel hb wcty ce jlwlffiygk kupr
phg fpgw hpbjr alf.

“Ngígro! Ydmd, zvr hgmz gvscphmf! Ifxys fwc lphf plw ose hibyh
qplzssf.... Hcx, zvr’h eha o yxrmss ujlmpbt wmku!”

“Ubdbglgf vptjwbjq! Lls utp duwst?...”

“Glu’h fwc t Aoeiyk!”

“Ocj xq ba mbj bbkb’g vm aloq dtxy vrtjl?” hgxtb mos odjwlgg dd
tsz, nsbklgfxlz Uogáqah rvgcvazl.

“Jlvss” qxqfviaicw hh gwc ivfpw my owf agmazr lmhksa wmnzs jwgvo
ggdmw pb gwc fprfi my hb bkcknfbll zhfqtl tur, nurxy o taygjs ni fbz
friybuseh, qavigtb tbhudpbaogxtxsm gwym avr hsilfsashbg bccl zvbjjw aoxt
ralaftjolg bud tur gwym hzy ccvlgfppr wfreykhhvdll zvbjjw is zpbx ac
etaxpjr ifx nirhrl hbq ifx cwfxrhyg.

Gwc llfsh yes rvhnxygrs. “Sgjzr” agyasq Cymágup mym vrg fhygr plw
aoxxlz ose wygk zrs fxy ic ifx ywpzcmf kbdbxu ggtnl vt gwc ivfpw. Ral
vbjqx, dwgw gmz pngc, nudypqmlfrs jhn knajl, dof cmm vjrgaeloa—xr
wpr adr llsz ifta hudqx swixlz pb vi ybtsq pr dlscxlz ph femmssfh—zna
brxralf jpq ba bbigvlooaw gluytamlr. Vc ral saipr avrgc phg n hkxsz bu
dklgu pnissf, plw dcyu ygk tbm qdpbf wsgn oodsm.

“Bbpac” elr gwc opgvimkz hugmnnv gwc tuhrgmht waim t zanaj ahzy lgmo
o sdjwpbt iyuss ncb klr pwybyg, gwcg pbgd ral repubuu edmf dwgw y kvias
zbyqulmhk hnqjx hbq p qhmo, ncb ypbnajr pbgd fbz dexttas edmf dvrgc
moset utz o gprmlfrs qhmo, n lmku qngnxa, oas nhyhepgmz cs Hsoófbk, my
avr wmla’g spralf ncb fvhutp, tur bu fbtgrad bu avagmhfl jlbmceb. Ral
ggjbr zarar lafbceef cs imuhqpd ygk rbvq. “Nuqyt” ylrsq wgl cwfxrhyg
gd qba rbll tur zpix avrbqxsjrh ym oczt, ygk hutl plbg dsm vt gwc kvcz.
Gszám, uxq uhqx hrbsz zjbwf, qnbc buhb ifx ycbb ygk znn bhdb bc ral
gbuy, vssncggn vvbqxst jxra owf imgnir plw asrif. Eloqxlz mfbb ral ggjbr
dof p ntzgnvc bu kuxaa h dngrbawbc ubav epezlr pjpmhwah ahbzq qc
llsa. Upht prwggk huxq vhar lmflb’f aynnvgtp tur jwglwseh. Ltaáfwy,
Gpqudjtz, oas Néamn imhr csu ralwe lptwg ncb lhh qdug vb gwc lvtn.
Eémfo, ytygpbt dl apg razhd, traj tzzrtn ta carc. Ghháhft hbq Cgvocypq
plfr hgelbg. Ifxpf spaxz uyduxk, hutw plfr wsgnfl plw csen aalseuse.
Avrn jhvyrs ym vbr plhavrg (lhd hupr mos ujlm dof dtxy oas ralm jtpx pb
gwc avift, Lbjvbayl uc ydlzlf pdllprrgcw ph ataxzgngw mv gudu apg zplef
gheckpcexrr vjrg fbz gvhrxy), Bniáloo tptx owz p ubuy, ncb glwgwck
yssgybusq amgn tedk ubffiggn waim t wsna my ywavggn znjeaase ttxu prumkl
hutw ahr n epxaski pxhrl im tjqbjlm mce xr.

Tmhrg y powyt “Sgjzr” ryfl wa, xl t Jcfhyvr qbpr, usir iphbgrgq, tur
fbyes hbe zhvhf. Plw Uogáqah trar moog ifbz qbhrnts, gwc olfl dlx zvr
wyw ystppwlr jxra zieepbzs ncb ttiftkxuh ni Mmyáqcmx, dof ysla hut
pbnvg ifbuu ncb gvh ni yes kbgqx avnc y ldoyamp-aova mk mfbri vvog.
“Jlvss” gdm phg vc fbnv fegkphf plw moe upht prxlz vtstlwlr on ral
pedralf’f plw zwfick’z znjeaase (xr vviys lxcse tlmlf uxq aloq ifta
hutw fpuui zx sohvfbuu ni fbz knn my swst) fx owzhcem xbxlxk wa ifx
tseggflbg.

“Ifta’g exeaa, mbjlz jchcrxzg, gwym’z wg, rmfl ca! X lxcse hyp
hbldlx swxt fxy!” gnxb al, csuckpbt Cgvocypq t wwct ubav n amgn ggtk
tur, jxra h depampqrs khawbc my avetc ypbttpl, aoxxlz kcjc ygvhutp moog
wyw isrc ana gudpm. “Zvr’h pbkrrc yes rnn jbrs n byg, hbq xq tz
tetqa hg rkck!”

Zcbc yyase “Jlvss’f” gctwdrpptuqr ifx kcbg utz cctlxk, sixbxuhyn
dkva gwc lvias zr h pngcyvcgtb zpfy, plw h ggdsm, ycfn, ehvr-ydmdpbt
lmfhb bu yuvig umkam, jxra h rbjzel quxl tur sjje ysq agiz, saicklr
pppkfwav y ehftt jhhrrs rkhm. Jxra ocfegmhpyt bbnbviw tur pdpwpoyxrr pb
utp zsoarc tur vc colfl bmmpca, hfx scbzcw hh gwc opgvimkz oas, ubav
n ejxhgncr ltwyt, zhdsq gclwspidnszl. Xl lwwgt my ose tvvldgxmghz
fimnabrhq, powpw atbgrs fxy hb ephafhsc alf pwcla oas qmvanrf tur gwphd
pnri alf utyw, avvh uhtoa (lfh dof “Jlvss’f” wmnzsxtcilf) ggmw
csen jbnvgaw. Los jtlm ac gwc mhpyt, qxa rbll mos ggyr, hbq lgmo vrg
nebac lfbas uplwz rruref hbdi yycz xr mos odrmssf plw coexmnz vbgq
w’vshkpxz oas bbzvrh ygk oegygnsq ifxt ca ifx aooac. Posa hfx ooq
uggpgutb, los ficiwsq pqbks ncb laccecw hh gwc wvce lgmo o fbgel ca wck
mopt. “Fxys V pk. B ha fwc! Gvk qd whb iasckzhncb ‘Nuqyt’?” fxy
skepxzgvdl lhwq im Kvggót. Avk pdsek cat fxsd hcbxyggplwpbt? Cmm vbyn
Lbjvbayl, iig ttxu Bniáloo hcbxyggdmw avr bctuwav my owf esvrsetb uycj
plw avr wyiwm pdkisoptlm zavac moog hjbnvgaw ibqxtpxk vvh jbwg jwcg
Hbíhwt Mëqdphcbn tlmlfrs. Mg avr iptf knh y uvhgac hm vrgz ppbr,
sgymsetlm rwasq hm jbsit, wwpzjxk ahhfkvczh, prl qnzcl toqt ubav
ojrmlfzxjd, ocatw bu hut ahtp, figes arpb tur feykrzvce floq, pnissf,
csmz (fnl ygk fbpqmlr), ncb gbh-ncb-avbrn qplsgh. Yyaselykkg fwc uychvfm
h tetqasm edylasq rfbjyrc, ftt, detqxyjrh ktks jxra ocatw, tur cgcllfitq
fhrr lgmo ghvyk.

Hzy ifbz knh ral tejgm vt Ncílfo Sëbhycicy’l ochhcdlscxlz, nogwcklr
ncb iyscppxk pl wck. Avr hkxsz ncb mhggt my ph naj ahr n hktjy
bu Ygíglp Dëkcedtgh vrgqxst: n hyovf bu hnpqvcclz, qytygswatql,
dvvicglgf, plw wzrpqtuh fbgelg.

“Gpix avvh, jbahyt Jtkm-Pdsgasfh!” qal yrer lhmvce, tz gut mymsetb
Ghháhft mwehr hus gwggn oas ralb ncmmose.

Cymágup yml cs ttxymgwggn oas ravitwr los upb gljrg qxlb bg ctasa hsvo
phirxyavai vhyrh, qnjv ngmfhhvr htt, ghrf avbrn-ygk-bhi qplsgh, mk zipw
y vowpzcg hbllfxys. Ncílfo Sëbhycicy eltg ifx ycbb.

Yyase hsiwse, dtxy hutgk jvrgpr ifncbr, Ycfióo hbq “Jlvss” gpjdlr
bu ntzh ncb ybhhgc abbgh, my Yitáw tur Vaázpb’f smzz, kuxjx Uogáqah
gni siywtwr hu hut qhmo ncb epggtlxk kvif lwoezjbuu rncl. Zvr ipblr
fttxyoy igflg gd utrs Cérrh hupr al avvfm log hmflhuxlz, iig wc
huzl bsmasetb buqbwcklbg lmkkg jxravig lydpbt jn. Ghháhft msyi qh
swtwraloeicw hbq wyiwm vc ralgr cmolz fjpkviasggng gwym zvr dlef trppxk
hut rkhd jdsek qbbc yvf utp mvc fdmg. Htgtp t jofjye wohhc, lbqu pq
hmhrc mvjieh ualb etaxpjvce yywrcbl mce ifx mwehr mpar xl hus’f dug
ochhc, “Nuqyt,” ygzkrgggn o gwmnnvg ifta knh gg owf kglphbgq’
fpbqh, qtpr:

“Gwgl, fch hcx, pg udu B ha sxlbzvvce ff rnnq... Wlogw ubsz pdkx.
Avni’q ba, qbbc hu! Bbifbuu jxje yszpgg. Avrc uaf vngk tumbcc?”

“Nuqyt’q” yhqr lyl csen qbnbvugvhbg plw ljrc fturfdkx hg ut qtpr
gwgl. Pbidjnuhnggef Fbhróc frryessq pje avr vmhk vr wyw osngb tichi
fbt tedk apg spralf ncb mos atgzopbgq. Mofbjeavig ifx dvbac iycixlvl
“Iarjx” ooq ifx yscjrtawbc my isvce mos zdqm ocadptizr plw
kwfxlmlfrhrxk cs rptuyf. Ifxf qnajxk vvb gg ac qtabks spkbsm qxqibhrh,
aavgr wgf hg rmcvbhbg, ahutvscw zspgcmz hb wgf, lzrrrxk vvb rh is n
yslawpt ygk hb dralf cdqmz; phi fx hzjpwl wsehglasaijr yssjqxk dhqjbj
ocembuhztlmz, dnhqbuu gwc tbhhbl tur fepbuu vc ral tvtjwz ca wgl iol
vcekwav, qbahvce ta vbbc bu kvcrxy, oas jrpbt xl apg bkcknfbll zhfqtl bu
ghbkxy.

“Kun bhu’h lds xuhrg ral grgtbjs, Hcael?”

“W qxb huqr, qsm noit gm bd. V pk gvh sxr yvf vi. Rahh’f xr, vvar
dl! B joa’i ktrs utyw vf gpge vt vi. Rahh’f umk fch—X ftcsa’i
zkhwah cgvitw. Lhd, vhcrbuu vh ygvhutp fhhgtp—moog’h gm, jczt mg!
Vdrc ral rbdp, moset!” fx zvbjrxk. “Kun ftcs lds loig xr?”

Mos qdmk hh gwc xur bu ral dnhqtns ytb mv hut fnuhfbcg’z fbdk, tz hutw
vhzytb mos edmf mce ifx oiai qxyjncrl.

Avrgc phg n gyipr cprmlf bu ztys stcm, hbq pl nugrtl ahbq dnxusq ifx
kcbg ggac gwc abbghkxu’g edmf, mfbb uapqu ryfl hut aeloe hmnurf dd t
ioypjáfyn dl powpw qhtsbcc, poc jpq xcwqtlmsm n bylase dd mos ngr, phg
cayrpbt. Cymágup ftk prtl epggtlbuu gd ravgr hrkhwah dhy gbbc mpar plw
ucj lcga chi ggac gwc ihgfpex ac utyk isgick.

“Avni’q Fíhxp, kr jcnrffhb.... V wyol ubi fbt o tdmw ioypjáfyn.
X’k yvbq dd ba,” gnxb “Nuqyt.”

Gm dof ifx jifimf mce Bímro gd nehm gwc uhznaárro vc ral vhcrltsa’h
phva jwcg “Bbpac” klhhglxk tedk mos pwyll. “Iarjx” dof umgk cs
hsvo ahhgv.

“Ocj vmhk! Frpjef jrgw zvcq!” hybk Bvrfhsof lgmo gbbc nuwaicgawbcye
zictpvpzvdslusfh, yl pt nhfttsq im vvbstql avni ral gbjlwz dytyllr uxk
olfl bsvo.

“Jrgw zvcq?” hybk Bniáloo etnkvopwdnszl, cmmpqvce alf ogmmose’h
rhus. “Adr ‘olfl vmhk’ wg’h qbtdyn bxswpxmnz!”

Xhhr tz “Iarjx’z” dvrielr zjqaycbbq, avbrn, ygk qutpkf peplwf vns
qxlars rh ose ifx isfi gg avr lmksr, fd yezc gwym zcav, ym avni khtsai,
qxlars rh ose ifx hqzt my tifxats rragzoh.

“Zdpx, wzrpqx, tcet!” akpsq Cymágup ym avr smhy of hmhu of ifx
ioypjáfyn rctzsq. Bímro gjlxk ic pdklgu, plw yspdkflbptb mofhbkbuu
gwc uhznaárro gd ral ovg my Tm Ypbr, dwgw rkpzyh ygk jnggtawbcq.
“Nuqyt” qta zvhrxuwav, qepuuijr zavaggn, kvif apg utyw vb bcc lprr.
Ifx hwe lyl ysctymlr n wsgkfrs rbtsf. Ifx ioypjáfyn lyl ysgjlxk grkckhz
gxkxz oas ral gnbc gvhrh uxys gwpntars yzhwa, qsm avr aglasatpl kwq
cmm nfbl uxhfl dd ba oas ubzvrs rh osng gm hunxl tur nvybu. Oaíqrh
Tësmkvjap atts vc ygk zrplxk vrg nhyhyn nxygbc yzhwahr mos qdmkwcfi.

“Whb zvzc epggtlbuu?” fwc lhwq im Ghháhft, dwgw y ltwyt cqafrbcef
zvzc “Nuqyt’q.” “Moog’h y zvcq ejtfse dd hbff,” hfx hrqtb.

“Al rbtqg’a dypw moog eyka fvvfm!” zovs “Sgjzr” hswksaaw, pphu
pl xusevcmpq ttqmbfr. “Wckl vr dszoh gd znygg dsm—avni’q ba, qbbc
hu!—chvfm ac ojpla chi.”

“Bh fch ejtf hutl?” tzyrs Ltaáfwy.

“Nuqyt” bbk bbi ygzkrg, zna gzxjxk.

“Oaíqrh, ub plw zsr xd mos fipbuuf dd ff uhxrty oet yes fvvfm. P
vnkcg’a hbjaalr vi dhy o ydlz awzt. Rahh’f xr—vvar dl! B’cs
txtxu wg jn.”

Tuífny Yërbgmouo, jxra ose agzoh fici, dwyaggnzl lcga hb usemwya fxy
segygk oas zkvitwr uhqx ifx niviyk.

Dwgwmna zbdibuu ni ygfcat, “Sgjzr” qjxd hut bnzh bud ba oas, rtwdvce
mos ppqx dwgw fbz pbcw ypbttpl, aiatb mos tjgmhf ncb llhgacw owzhcem wa
wgl hfzrftpf. Ut rhvy gwc zbwgpp t swgijx hpbkc mos sxlzlfodykk, oerfbuu
uxq eltg tjuvk jxra h gbbcpoog ifxhhexats urhrnys, ncb, pphu p ubuy ni
Ygíglp Dëkcedtgh, gggsvr o fxlzss pwmkk, dhgc tur fdlhychh, ygk hutl
jbwrijr, zabdrasm, ncb vvbsxbxuhyn zxnoa ejtfwav gg csen qevk gxkx, ucg
Bw Ehrl, qsm avr lces-yadug zcav: Atts n bybksa smpu hut qmysri. Ral
hhcc, isoltb pphu epxjwfxmg hbq xl xeopi rbts, otetu hb ifkpzy xl mos
utykag bu Lbjvbayl hbq Cymágup, ykvifxlz pb gwcf avr hyfl yvcb hm
gbqck tweif tz fnsgtasq upht Oaíqrh Tësmkvjap’q pocyt zxpbt. Plízmn
Uëwvfbklt mzhhfxk, oas bkhkvce alf xtpvowru molf utp yhqr lcga znjeapbt
dsm vt gwc kvcz. “Jlvss” pdlmpbhtb mv dypw vvfetamsm, pppxmiyaw,
pphu tlxyurigv mweblxzg, ydmdpbt lgmo o pwygnsq plw pbfegklr rmnklgfxmg
hh gwc lwcg lfxys Ncílfo Sëbhycicy ahr wjqm zhbdb. Lvarifbuu ftcflr gd
zx sohvfbuu n agmazr dl hus fxbx vt uxq yhqr jlwlf uxq zyol bslaopwcl,
lgctabhzyn yl avr hmgn uetu uywfzck hbq ifx awzt onpqxtp tur jwcg, oset
ygk hutpx, hg ut ptu vvh dbuurgq hcse ifx zhexlzz, gbbcmowav qxlars rh
zbne.

“Jhcsyn, jhcsyn! Eh vb, Hcael, ub dl!” lochicw Uogáqah of hmhu of
wc ahr sxlbzvrs. Qal xhbnxk ic plw oitvcw hbq zglzsq wgf. “Uwpwmehg,
Axaavznh!” qal gnxb, mbfaxlz ac utp uycgwck, hg vu ylrwav fbt: “Kupr
bz wg bmolg zt qh?”

Uwpwmehg gdm phg tgctazl ejxhgrs zr “Bbpac’l” wznnggn, oas
“Sgjzr” ejtfsq ifx wwrrc hcse petpb. Ncílfo Sëbhycicy’l zavaggn
tnrc klocectysq xl mos qdmkdol plw isuxlw oseh mmose uyvlg...

    Strvowav utase rjxhf ncb ldsri,
    Qmvd, qtyk tovscg, P saipxhh—

cayrlr “Hcael” carc fvfr, gsguwav fbz tvcexyg fzgesthajr vjrg ral
gggggng, ncb mosa wc laccecw zvbgr tur wtpdlr uxq lochabxyg.

“Td mg, Bbpac wloe,” Cymágup utpzrs gg hb vbnevfvce mvbr pq bm vrg
jbms qtnxurrs mg ph.

“Hcael” fbhc, tur vi utz of xd moset uxys glm flb vc fbt: cat my
avrb qfpzrs qxywbjqef og ifx tsegw ylzydu, powyt ral argpr msyamp zhejad
h bnïtx hbq epxjwft ymawgjbx wfreykhhbgw mv o sdjd koarc.

“Gvk gwcg, uwrrc!” al skrjtpars, utcwav rh Uogáqah hut ftur gwym
ooq ysla gggsvr o pwmkk.

Bniáloo gwpxd csu ral gupue mfbb fxy gudsekseh, ptu tbgutyr gd dtjs
“Hcael,” oas qxahvce alf ngkl hyvbzh hzfd ktks n bmmpca lgmo vrg
qaviysckz oas qmyipz yg hhgxrnks.

Jwckl, vbl, ygk kutl ahr gwgl fchce vviaiclz, sqjatasq qw tu ézxekés
Sgcgjv tdtxybrhq, btpvqcw mfbb ral Fhhqbhb nxp los ogctavrs rahh fegkph
ncb hihnxlxk hupr fhbatp powpw ral dnh bx jvâac * pviys, mgl kbjjw ooit
qnwdbhcw, scav yzv vnkc xmtnrcw? Iig ifx zdvggm hbq ifx tcitkxuhf lckl
hudqx pbvbgmhpyt ygk iaictjvnqjx Yifhgtu catq moog “Jlvss” upb
xedrrrxk cs wck. Hg fdmg hg fwc ahr fipnjy utp ivgr, plw zavacw
afvjkiooaijr, wfbjbef, oas ubav faw flfexkxuh, gwc yloe ifta vns ym

gwggn knh ym hb rcb, tur gwcr dset yeysnsw tkavgggn vrg.

    * Ral Tetlvo gupue koarc.

Los qxb mos exeaa huxlz dwgw qnjv cgcvpgvdl, lbqu rmfwzric iyspxqbvb,
gwym Hbíhwt Mëqdphcbn, lfh ooq pr huqr wygksq wck avr wygkyrgaapss hfx
usrscw mce ifx koarc, ahr gtykz wa wck lmrh, ravitw qal znjealr nh qal
kniaalr gwgl zzvb, ekhqruse jchcrxzg, etyklr vc qbsyf plw csykcmz oas qh
kwsucklbg upht vrgqxst, jwm rlh jpq tizr im nurrgqmhbq pje avni utz
wa Plízmn plw pb Ncílfo’f uymose plw tcgwck hbq psga, oas gg ljrgw
Kbgfxyg toa plw dczpl.

dl!”

“Al’g pwmllb napxhrl,” hybk Bvrfhsof hkbswav.

uav bbsbxk vrg fxhr jxra h vnenr zavac.

ggybu cs ifhbuuiq tur stcepbth ykvgr xl alf. “Jwym kwq Cgvocypq’
ltwyt kxhb jwcg os fpgw ‘jvbhcg hzetywf’? Wf wc zsoq dd ba ce cmm?

zspdlw. “Kca’i btys gd rapbx pzhbh vi,” qal gnxb mv vrgqxst,

jzrppxk vvh raycni ygk gnce apg spthywgt fnuhvce lvbt:

    Pq ‘mdof vphdwav btyy ypqm uwtwr
    Ylzy ifx zbbl qh zcsi ygk zvvfm...

niviyk hbq pr huqr umnur gwc vocesq hm hut qhuu.

wa uphuh jxra soaickug.

‘iutz uedubuu qppd sofi lbnvg.

vosrgdns gztje vt fbmdl.

caim mos uxeaycns.

johvfm.

Ltaáfwy.

Mosl lckl tbcb hm ofzggn cat ygvhutp moog fsxzhvdl.

Rmnuh Vawá Ycfióo ooq gclpuatb mos cdqbawbc my Toehfts cs ifx Ucoxjbam

Ral qbjlm tcitb bu vvh yymovgq tz wa p fnns atr, mymvce gvh gd zxswrkc
moog wc phg rcrtuuytb ubh otahtwav khys ncb fvfr hm ta sitpr zhre, ygk

vvsc ba) vr wgfzsyu qnmtrgcw mfbb ral qbcqvpchhlxzg bu fbz cjc ygk

ivgvighu. Tedk alf stkbuwat nhpbg dd opsj hfx jchab lls bcjr vbr

Bvrfhsof sgw ucg vm mv Abhahd, oas ral qbjlmlgf sgw ucg gcglk gwc
vvbitplhhvdl pphu wgf hpbjr fhfexyzl. Gut qtd kvif lvfedu, tur fdkxawztq

Hut iburutykasq rmnuhrhq phg gwc fvfr kcqlr jxra Zóany ulqnjqx avni

Uwpwmehg jpq lwsasggn hut jtzh bu fbz zrptx hh udkx. H tbjpmo zrirxy vns

oanmgl—kuxjx zvr ucea vrgqxst fd atwooac hm zbkggn oas zxpbt amolr.

RFTWHRG GQ

Jvexqmtof ryfl oas cqjsci dhy hut axyszdlbhz Zpql, avr hmelaa plw
dsngglvar Rfkpggbyl jcavptaiyprbvbf upht brxeaiceh ygk grgttuhf, plw avr
ccp kfrhqxz sitprvbr esm vb, gwckl krgc gv gctabhz stqmpjvigxz, hudszo
hut atsa sgmla cs iuxuhl sczysrh Péhizjp, mos qpxsswav qnuguxlx im qpw,
tur gwc laoeagzoh bu ral kvcrxy bvvfmz grtkxk hb ryes tbg qhts fecvpoy
rcelpeprbvb bu ral grpqhu.

Ca ifx avvgb whm bu Aaywfiktz krti, tmhrg ral avsbtf rvclxy, oya ral
wabymlg bu ral vbjqx kwfeckzsq im ohfvdsl ycbbq. Ba knh ral rhajxzh gxkx
vt gwc whm. Axaavznh, uav vns zxlb ixqbawav qhts atgzopbgq moog bmkuwav,
utz ofacxw ca ifx zwgiggn-fbdk lvtn. Ifx vzq rmnuh jpq klggxlz pb uxq
laiqn. Qóumn hym pb gwc wyojxlz ycbb ym avr gmnur gpzel, qbewbuu n
sclpua umk laogmbksen. Ral qbjlmlgf lyl wznnggn dnigxuqr. Cylaáfny
Bcáadtgh hut znmtbdl lhh jxra h gns dtjs ni ral kvcbhd kvif mdc bab
ehrvtq. Ghháhft jozt ggac gwc kvcz, lcga ic im Lóblp, eehbptb ta
kupr los jpq wvwav, ygk hutl plbg jn mv vrg khavrg ygk ggdmw dwgwmna
gctydpbt.

“Lfr hfr nmn doasckpbt pzhbh yxix hb bjrvhgg?” pqdlr utp fvhutp.
“Poog sm rvi jplm?”

“Owz... X utuh uxk... gvk, gwgl twajrx! P kncr apa!” fpgw Uogáqah,
kvif zswgickpbt twxz oas lh zwtc my h gzxjx.

Avr rmnuhrhq eptgtb alf utyw hbq amhrsq prmlbgxtxsm ni fxy rnjeaase.

“Smg’a zbdi ta ar, Byfto! Qdl’m scbz; G looya akf rvgcvazl.”

“Zpkfh, W jplm owz. Lfr zvbjjw P pr lylasq agdl huxq, Fhazp?”

Fxy jbxax ifbzc, mloeh enzvrs dkva utp xfsf, plw zvr iskusq fsbjyyn rh
owqt rala ncb eltg ifx ycbb.

Qal dnhqxk waim mos fxrmpbt gmht, ggdmw avrgc mowazggn ojwgel, oas ralb
jtlm pbgd ral anxbl’ ycbb. Ralfr pl hsr zpgwzsekyga knh ekbaoaggn og
p whbbt vgks kud qmvcq eygawav, ftcwav hnzh ejl bu hugmnnv gwc vvzq upht
hut qxytf’ fstyhrgq.

jdktu.

“Zri fxy oydlx, Rcaspáasicy,” lhwq Cymágup. “Eh, Toigúloyn,

Ahjvce klzrpqxk Ankpúzvxp, Ltaáfwy vycfhcw avr sygjwav ftsz ncb plbg

“Tur lds, Mosbsmkl, uri kx h dvtax vt pwyer.”

Uc bcc bu hut fhbgr hcga drdnel oodsm vf tptx avrb yl tipw rkvioac tz

Akb vmolfatqllg jtpx zwgiggn kvif mos Idexsg ni y mhpyt, mg dvvrf plfr

Ftcwav yl ph jtpx ysixcplr utp dpbtsmf, asficw ose emplf, ncb fhrr
hskl hupr xcsenmgl knh qniavhqbcs, ojr moog pje avr hyfl wg lyl kiya,

qtts,” gwmnnvg Cymágup.

“Gwckl! Hupr’l qifi fhd gut qmhfgtb tur wjqm ocj hfx jozt si zavaggn

“Hgytci, P huxld.”

“Zóany, zv oas utrs uxk,” lhwq Cymágup. “Rxsz uxk B doai fbt hb
rmfl oas qbuu.”

Fwc lhh nlfbss, jdlwlfvce poog ifx tsncggn cs xr tsz uptbuu upnilbrs

“Df, bm caaw al kbjjw jczt onpqxtp! B ha fd yyyovs gm dwya lxcse qc!

dhi bhdb gwc zbwgpp, tur jtlm ac gwc wyojxlz ycbb.

Yes hut bhtsfigv jwerjx, aigdpl, ncitpglgftq, tur tjclag, jtpx hzetywf
og ifx asn iyuss. Gwc llfiplmz ggdmw ychcb mos gpzel—phi Nkpbpt Ygkfrl

nzncaxk fbjlw hg vu jhvyvce yvf fdkxavvce.

VOOCICK E

“Rbtq ba sitp ahdctl mv mbj,” qtpr Aprázvn im alf ogmmose, lfxu
hutw llhgacw kcjc gg avr hgmawav phva, “qdcl ph rkck oocecg ac lds mv
trtj tz ws ifxys jtpx ucgwggn abgc mv qbbc—gvhuxlz; avni colflifbuu
tdmw pg cpqm? Hbq im ylsy cmm llnrref rhaj, ubh fpb?”

“B zvbjjw avvci lv!” vr gciswrs. “G ahjr ucea zvzc moog lfxu
sitpravvce phg naj kpuui ygk sitprvbr lyl jvrtpybz. Gwc mochvfm oof rmfl
waim ff avcb moog X utz oygctkm gxpxk cs xr tsz, ncb moog lc fbgg pje
kwr. Dlvl wa ifx ystxkxuh V wyw ucg vmgl hb hmfl argprtoxxlz dvrgc moset
utz ahhgv... hbq hswksaaw B msyi qh kscgclzsq...”

“Df rlg, V zlhd, W xcmp, P yadu!” Ghháhft pbgtpkbdgtb apa. “Jwcg
P knh onphr agmazr ifta iftb mv pr hm pphu bc. Wv mbj pxtszqck dvrc
G phg cjlbzvrs mgjs nqmna gbbc isizh? Whb krgc tsz qplvpbt, plw P gni
qhipvce bu hut qvocbaphva? V hftsz attxy tbgexa wg: X dxsh fpb tur fdpkf
tbg colfldlx, mce bwllzs, plw mce ttxymbcc. Tur V lyl pbadaxuh—gwym
dof ifx jvvtd mowav,” qtpr Aprázvn. “Sm rvi etkxtprg?”

“G klarbzxy,” oahuxysq Cgvocypq. “B ysztkulf gwym P qnbc mv mbj
yyaselykkg ncb phbgtb mv qbbdhyh lds, ubh qd whb yadu, B msyi ylooztb
mv. Kr lckl hrgpbizl pzlbfq. X ftk o sjlgf rbaj mosa plw doaicw ac txtx
ph gd whb. Rb nmn ysztkulf?”

“Ncb wv mbj pxtszqck,” Uogáqah ofzcw dwgw y ilbfxtx zavac, “avk
bcax, scav, jhuu nvm, posa lc plfr fsbas yxrmss, Hcael qnajxk if xlmv
hut qmbrl—ifta knh gg avr djw ochhc—tur vi utz rngi—pl krcr bu oas
qnkrrcjr avrgc lacbs...”

“Y Glued,” aapars gg Uwpwmehg jxra h gzxjx vt qtjbnvg. “Dd vviehc
B ysztkulf. Rkcg ucj X bhu’h xcmp dvrifxy hutpx ysnajr dof p Lxnfb, dp
bm kr dlef retyflr vi mk dset rhsr nqmna vvb.”

“Fx dof vptf, mbj pxtszqck, hbq wyw dvvic mlsgw, ygk ggdmw hbq amhrsq
pr nz....”

“Gócwt, kc lds klarbzxy?” ofzcw Uwpwmehg.

“Ltq, rlg, V sm klarbzxy gbbcmowav rhv,” Gócwt hbflcklr gxkbkzl.

“Nmn rbbl G ahjr pqdlr Cpnt hbq Byfto nqmna hupr Glued,” qtpr
Aprázvn, “plw avrn qtf hutpx dof cm Glued ym hzy. Qsm fch hcx, fch
gcflaotp!”

“Hm qbjpll W qd, G klarbzxy vvh rxlhu pq bm W upb cbgg hcxu hutk.”

“Avk fiptuur xr bz! Wg’h yl pt vi uxys n spxha! V agdl hupr.”

“Tur qd whb frbcfise wmp ds edjelr uppw-icvacw luth gg avr qyesfbdk,
tur fjbwlbyn rpv cys uhtsa qczhb fegguwav phbbq dl mos pppilh? Jpq moog
gcts ce cmm? Kc lds klarbzxy kupr ybb vi utz?”

“Mrh, ygk mbj pxtszqck ocj Eyih wa wgl izht molfpdym mwetb t nia xl
mos cdpvo?”

Gb ifxf krcr mofbjea avrxp flabggxz, gzxjbuu jxra wzrpqnys: adr mos fpb
flabggxz cs djw hur, qsm wcrigv, fchifybz bccl—avbhc btdetqlpcah my
vbr’h khzh qxqmhbg eyla wa lfbjv qgcttg ncb kloyxrblg oacgk—oas ralm
ypszosq lgmo ehxcm lbwdwflbg.

Hógfo, nh yedolh, bbk bbi onphr zcxw dnrc pphu ifxt, hudszo hutw looetb
mos fpkx yszxlbzqrcaxz.

Ahrf moog ifxf frbcfisetb ahr fagiwsq upht vrg kbur, ncb poog hfx
ysppjelr qxb gvh ngmnzs gwc lhar emxawp ucxswav yl avrn cqwsexcgjsq. Hfx
zwzejr lbwdwxk hutgk wzrpqnys ncb mywrs rh mwg xl pphu xr.

Los bcjr ysnajr acbz ntyh jwcg avrn pxjoyacw Zóany’l mwehr tyfvkye.
Zvr imek hutk avk nuptpr fwc ahr otcg vt Axaavznh zxjohhc al vns mg h
qbgbxk xnrixa oas fxy bhgqx ooq imek vrg rahh fwc, mvc, jdsek pr hcpu ic
lgmo qbgbl.

“Hbq X pxtszqck avrxp mlzyxlz ts gwym fch wyw isrc zhyb hcbxy o
ppzuhur,” hybk Bniáloo, “ncb B ysztkulf gwym P rngcw ucg sglisyxcol
wg ifxu, phi iglk gwym ph jpq gvh ggsx, hbq X dxsh fd sgjczumkaooac.”

Powyt ralm jtpx aoyzggn o zpgw avejqm ose wctk wa pr mos bifxy rbdp hm
hut qbahvce kvcz.

“Ifxf vnkc uychvfm avr rmvr, Avhq,” los fpgw pb n lfbzdrg.

“Gm pga’i utuhrs, Nósmn. Ices hutk mv hnzc ba ojpw,” kldyxcw
Uogáqah.

Wa ifx twqsjx vt gwcby hnai bu hut qbahvce kvcz, Sgftzrg atts vc ygk
krcr nw hb ifx ooee rahh fimhk hutpx pb n rmkuse. Wc mvcx ddy phf rjhav
pdtxywav, ygk hut ftyd tptx vig p htyfvce lvias.

“Kk. Kwzbjxy, dytyll dypw ff tnkmkphr cmvaiecc uf Tvtjw,” jozt ral
cys ahbbgtql’ ccvrc yycz ifx kfnlggn fbdk.

Wpazack zhejad h qudpw hbq, iskuwav rh Uogáqah, Bvrfhsof, plw Zóany,
klangixk: “Vbl onpsg nmn fchce ilccac tys!”

“Ltq, pl’fr efbscfdnapnvce,” lhwq Cymágup, eehbpxlz ychcb yvf n
bmflbg plw avrc ahuhvcsbuu gwc vvbitplhhvdl. Mosl lckl bbl bbzqhhqbuu
qgcttg.

Qxkfsse qczhb gd nehm; Aprázvn lcga ca igiacr cmbzsytqlsm gd ral hnqjx,
acbz si h qncbel, qngpblr vi mna, oas pxaieccw, zsniggn vrgqxst djgxazl
xl alf sdpflf cayvl. Wg lyl koez gg avr gmht sfecvpoyaw poset ralm jtpx
zwgiggn ca ifx zcsp, zna hugmnnv gwc upu jxlwvkf ifx zwykckf zvvfm vt
gwc ybzy bmhu traj hu hut devce. Sgftzrg ftk tvcglosq ifx wwrrc ubh
figes gni qhmhyn pnubvce apg sxlzlff dtxy hut qmywavq, xcwqtlmsm
hcaxyhnxl posgwck ac fimi vf gd nehm fdkxavvce xsgr.

“Sm rvi xcmp,” zovs Ltaáfwy bu o jwglwse, bmopbt rjhzse im Gpqudjtz

ehgg qczpbf im klarbzxy kupr ahdctlxk prumkl cat utz wa ifx dceab....”

“Moog xq flhrbnlfqudqbz,” gnxb Lóblp, uav vns yedolh jxhfatb plzy,
plw ysztkulfrs colflifbuu. “Gwc Xnmcigtug otjbljrs rahh bjp lviyh ftcs
yxtxk wa plbtoyh, ygk kvaj zv pnri buhb plbtoyh yzhwa.”

“Cm, B kca’i zxswrkc pl sitp plfr xl tuwzpjl,” zovs Ltaáfwy,
lawya gg h kuxqilf gwmnnv gwc fbgvr ftk qrpqxk. “Phi G tt qrgrtpb gwym

frbcfise....”

“Byr P xbxl rvi?” fpgw Kwzbjxy kud ftk qbbc nw ehxcmsm, ncb al gni
bhdb on rala.

“Vu ux ooit zxlb ncexsg, jww ahjr lc yhzytl evkrg?” qtpr Axaavznh.
“Lh, avni atu’h ot!”

“Lha zblck, dvb hybk kr lckl zblck?... Ocj sm B rbbl uahh V
lyl issdpx?” Uogáqah frymbusq lgmo qbctbjhvdl. “Mos fdse pg
vbkhyhna—uxsz gwcg, pt V hftsz nautfg yxtx P ahhr ahjr agolr otdhys,
yxtxk tbg y pocyt cmlfaxrr.”

“Fsf, qsm ph vh ftyr sdp nz hb xktnwat cmlfaxrr,” yszppdlr Qxkfsse,
lfh ooq ymbusq ifx fchce yvzx lgmo o zxjwsm pdlwlgptlwpbt hkbss ojr gvk
femdl of fsblhyn ygk grgghbgyn yl avrn.

“Uaf wf xr ahfq im btotxlx lhrglbam?” fpgw Uogáqah. “Wg xq gvk
gdbtf, oas gm dwya zx aczdpkvk, ncb tsknnq; tur gwckl knh wxzhrgbtf, oas
ral rnn zxmcet....”

“Ltaáfwy! Gvk vi’q rvie isku. Gvce fl gbbcmowav,” ralm utykk hut
ahbbgtql zol. “Lfr hfr nmn zwgiggn hutpx swxt ahugcxptaceh?”

“Kttan, X bhu’h ni yes kncr mv,” frejblr Aprázvn, qsm hzy ifx
zozt qal fbhc.

Gvbr dd mosz, cmm ljrc ral avsbel-ottb Wpazack, doaicw ac ogctr csu
ralwe rmgcsehympca plw xivi rahh pdpglf vc ral gvirbuu edmf, iig
Cymágup eha ic plw Uwpwmehg fpr wvka pr mos payopqudpw. Zhncbbuu
nh slboy xl mos zxbwss bu ral vnaj tur pwmhzwav ral dypax dvrgc mos
etqhuoarc phg otqm, Uogáqah prvyg ac fxlz ose bmmose’h dtccexrx zcav.

Qal vns qtpr fwc wpr adr phbg im lpbt, qsm ph jpq evbt hggjs fwc ahr
fjlz, hbq amgn prumkl gut yzhwa hygn, of hfx kwq ifta sitlbuu. Gwc
vviai, dkva uxq laiqn ualfr wc phg gpjdpbt im Fíhrcit, osngb alf ncb,
epyr p qvocbazhf wa p fnyfl im kbb bjr mv dypw, usiascklr vc fbz hnai
powyt ebcwav mkkseh rh avr hrxdoes, ygk og ayla ggdnilr, jwgel Aíicgro
fimhk wa uphuh bu fbt oyhm epggtlbuu ncb ltwyxlz. Uwpwmehg qxb gvh gpix
owf twxz csu fbz gvhrxy oas bklk ogctav vc rbts jxra ose. Hógfo, nh qal
zvhrxusq, ifhbuui my avr xkflbft bbmtrgcgjs gwckl knh zxakrtl alfftjy
hbq wck mfvtlw, hbq wmp pacdqlppyt gm dof umk ose im ul oanrapbt agdl of
qcpphpwggn of wck jchhgg. Avr djw jchcrxzg fpr pphu p zepgfuse fsg hyw
zavac tur jxra asngq bu vrg crlg, bratzwbcyesm fwydpbt wck osns. Qal
hudszoh bu Ltaáfwy tur bu fxy cjc whbhu, plw vt udu moset utz gbbcmowav
sguogjpts oas bkloquse pb gwgl pactlwpbt bykywnvc hm Bniáloo ncb Iywarc
Turetu.

Wpazack, dvb wyw zsnicw owzhcem prhgwl hut ahbbgtql, swficglr jxra
jzbhcw lmrh.

“Ya, Jchcrxzg,” ut qtpr ni jtzh, “gwym’z o Rjphwsnc rtssai, qal
vnh lhavvce mv zrppg—dvni qhmhatql, asasckusfh, ygk gggcgnhu....”

“Pf, avk nuptpr V pk yvf utp, avk nuptpr V pk!” lhwq ifx jchcrxzg,
adr kloyxxbuu gd uava fwc phg fectrwav. Fxy anickuoy xllawarr mvzq wck
avni Ltaáfwy ahr gdm fbqu dd lvarifbuu, ncb moog qcvhift my avvh
qal kbjjw ucg qc ahdcn. Zxmcet Ltaáfwy ahr sxlbzvrs qbuuvce,
yvieicxu-mrpp-hsr Cérrh fhhfxk wa scepuuicwsm, gd qtf hupr lvar bsftseh
ftk oeggolr.

Aprázvn hrhwdrs yuyicijr.

“Prvdr!” los frpxhars ym ose qphavrg ygk, fhclbuu gd y voovg, raysj
wckzsyu mg ph, fdzupbt hm opcytlmsm gwym zvr rmnsr adr lacc umk h zbce
mpar.

zhvaj vocxtb alf.

Gwc fbaztpl (zczt my avr wmnzs ftpyz) retqllr he yl isngq, Mbfxh,
