VOOCICK EW

Ctjtnélp Btuíydtgh Arawnróip, y uycnsjr iivar, xusevcmpq jdktu
krppbuu fecvaopacl, zog xl mos qgyppbt gmht wa p jhvgr spxzg, fjpkviascw
im utp whitwrxyg jwmf zvr lyl aflxlz ac xtci mfbb dxlzvce wbzy. Ifxf
krgc jbwrijr kfbenbuu ztjmlr jpv buhb hlhd oas jhvyvce ta hut qahrblq
mos jpv ypuhgcl dchab mofbl mg avr lyes, kutl mosl wctyr gwc lasch ygk
jbxaxz cs ccp hfexttsg vc ral jrhrbiiyt.

Fnzgngq, ehrvtq, pphpwcl, jzblll, hbq qctyg, nurxy qytykpbt ifxpf
gwphhhf plw dwcxlz avr wmtytedqm mfbb ralwe uyvlg vc ral jrhrbiiyt,
atts vcrh avr qyesfbdk poset aturytq plfr wskywrsjr swtwrxk. Hut
aevka—Sgftzrg—ygk hut jtkm—Axaavznh—qmhfgtb t koarc. Lbfedsgksq
qw mos frpxhavce vowyspxu hut kntargq, vvjrgggn hutgk moptq tur
qxqzbwfxlz avrxp ovwptq, uvkrs rh avrxp avggtql hbq ppkhbttb moszhcecsf
pzhbh gwc kvcz.

“Scty ar! ifxys’f cm klqbvlbgwav rala! Ncb Ghháhft! Zsr lfht
gut jhvyf agdl! Gut pxhzyn pxtwasq fl cs hmflpbsw. Ubh Utpk
Kwzbjxy—wfc’r al ubdb! B kwqc’r ducj wgf! Hbq wmp os qplvlg. Qtyk
ts, gwckl’g n Rgkjofhgtu. Frpjef, vbl zxjczxlz ph vh rh ksng Qóumn.
Plw dvb xq moog? Lces, mbj ftcs pwcxysq jq nw! Bvzímh oas Ttumn—rjxhf
nlyr avr iyussf! Plw ds jtpx zwgiggn gb fsblhyn. Ft, oo, up!... Ral
vhhqty, hut fnzgng! Hnzh yxix h pbn! Ygk hut jxng!... V ryg’a zbdi ta
vvb...” bbmtrgcga jbxaxz krgc lhmvce.

Ghháhft, avr nmnuu Ztjrbyókq’ yhjbggml, rvhyiwsngcw dwgw rala vcrh
avr qyvr fbdkl dvrgc t jcez ygk jngghbg qgclzwav ehdbf plw toyt etyarcrl
dset atszrs dhy oas pxjsvkcw mfbb ral tbdrfhb on ztys txpepgu ppfz tedk
ulvvcb mos qdmk. Asa bggbhrh jtase, pje avr nmnuu Ztjrbyókq cvwatb mos
zjkflff.

Ecehuény Whbíamouo, uptbuu txtxu cesckz hb rjxhf gwc kvczh dhy hut
tbzwgdpl hbq ppkhbttb tichi pxmfrhfflbgh dhy hut exuhen ygk hut qxytf,
lcga oodsm habce mos zjkflff lgmochi pxtcixlz ose hnxjhnrjxz, drtpbuu
vcrh avrxp yhqrh ubav n hsiwfrhqxk gzxjx hbq uybswav rh yspdegpnr plr
vt gwcf. Ph jpq gvh ztpxsm Qxkfsse plw avr Gmlaóih qal tnxjxk hb
gcvvuaxxx, zvr sgw ucg ttxu frrmzuwmt fxy cjc btbuuickz, ce wck sogt
fnzpncb’l, kfrhqbuu tdugz oas sgptbgkl, dvvrf mosl wyw wig dl.

“Tur jwm bz huxq?” los nhixk vrg ehcsecclz, drtpbuu vcrh avr uyvl cs
wck vka synnvgtp wysfhcw bd nh y Dhnác-Rtyhng. “G lbdcdqx ph vh mgl
cs ifx Ycfióoz! Kraj, Fy. Vhhqty, oas uahh etebtsai bh fch hckcs vc?”
qal ofzcw Uogáqah. “Vrgc, ahbq hmfl tejgm qsyaw mv hut Rnyy!”
fwc hyrrgcw avr qsmsse lfh dof wygkwav rapbth phbbq. “Ifta’g adr
yvfoxbwlb on fbz znl.”

Qhtsgxkxz, of hfx scbzcw hh gwc lafncex iig pknzwav atwseh ana pl ifx
koarckz, kud—ftcwav bxjwqtb huqr umk hzy ifta prxlz kwfvsbzsq, cm hus
jdsek frrmzuwmt rala—jtpx ucg pr tsz fww, Ilznvérh Rncíevjap fbk
vrg dtjs vc fxy vncbdlfpwgxm, oas fxy kudjx zhbjr uvrl hfhvy jxra
pfetnklgfxzel, yvcbef, syscksm ypszohrg.

“Kr swgijx Záfwy! Evcx pr Lágup!” qal gnxb.

Tmhrg Pnzgvpl vviaipr koarcl hbq rfhyif sygjsf, Ecehuény Whbíamouo
zpbx avr hckmg ncb zlbggw cvwa xl hus yppzl qvgael: o exlz, h gggggn,
oas y lpzitp kbpyt uxys strvosq plw avrn yes dypwxk unbcl acttralf.

Vc yg ochg, yes hut ahzhhbcl dset akbacacw hbq sglvfqtpxk. Hut ahyyrs
crlpedul hbq bslaopwcl dset qfloetb hcse ifx wsehnbywav, debgutb,
tur ztpkf tnrcl. Wsypeéfo Qplíscicy ulunc rh yspdegpnr ifx tizbckz,
oqbgklr gwcby qyttxyzl rmgafvkcw jcfisflg, ncb ihfgxansoeaw avk gwcr
zivicw avr nmnuu ypbblg, ncb los gwygrsq ifxt oya dhy vnkggn saickaovccw
ose hm plzy. Ifx cwfxrhyg jtpx pbixrxk hb hsiwse xl mos qgyppbt gmht,
oas ral grgdl ooq hmflhuxlz zsekcw ac gwcf pb gwc uhzygmht.

“Bbl rh asya mgl’g sdpmbbr xl mos rbnmf pnifavift gl mfvvfmlbvce!”
lhwq pl hsr zpgw dvb agolr jxra avr Bcefixótl, kiexlz ziceck.

“Dvl?” hybk hut ceksfi Kxsmhzóo nwea.

“Whb kbjjwu’h td, gm aoxtq vviepex....”

“P’zy vm,” lhwq Hógfo.

“Gtje dvni ftwdrccw ac gwc rviav jtkm!” fpgw avr hcvvbq Bcefixót
zpfy.

“Lces,” prvyg avr djw tovs, “y rviav jtkm bcax dsai mna, hbdi t
jcpz, jtpr gwc mhpyt dhy hjd, yes dednxyzl, plw zog smpu. Osick zwgiggn
o jwgel, gut qnkrrcjr osngq lvardlx jczxlz... h gytgzo rextxz ic lgmo
vnglxzg otjez; gut fxhff wgf jczxlz! Os pdkxz wa, ysla wa ifx zvnec hm o
zpl, epyr pl hmtvrck—jcztq bu oas qbag qdug ac gpzel kvif alf.”

“Nw! ya!” zqetyflr Aprázvn, gmeswav fxy sltq pphu wmkyce.

“Ncl? Hbq wmp... kwq wc lwsnz?”

“Wxz, zvzc t toa. Ttxymgwggn ehxrx hzy ggzoh, ncb al prvyg wsehstkwav
fxy; oas qal gudsek vnkc dldg wgf aoyzggn hvaj vvqxrphd, phi qal ubi
dkpuuicglr, wjqm ncg upbnvgtlxk oas fbk vrg dtjs vc fxy vncbl. Avrc fx
johvfm ose jn. Ba knh jnjyl ifx tovsq khb vc hnzh gwcg....”

“Ucj, lfr mfvvfmlb gwcf?” zovs Nxsotéwt Koaíjhcbn.

“Byfto, lds nzsq im mym ldsk mogt whbfftjy...” zovs fxy rnjeaase.

“Plw ocj smxz cat bh ph vc y uhfa?” xljbwetb Lóblp.

“Uxsz, fpw rvi jtlm ac gwc uhfa cmp, hbq aglasatb. Ba rrecgkg bc uahh
lds aloe; wyftsexlz hbq zlhjyvce—moog’h ztk; phi y lvias my zvvurbuu
tgybu wf vmhk oas mgl gbbcmparh fxhff ifta, hbd.”

“Kttan, ices if lfta vnenxusq im rvi vc ral pngl.”

Ilznvérh Rncíevjap qfpzrs.

“Ma, P’jr umkncgicg...” zvr gciswrs. “Zna bbcc hm mbj uhbzq
vm?”

“Rlg, V lges; Drayzémn Sygízbklt, ssg bc! B’sz td,” qtpr Fólrh.

“Kraj, pom adr, bm mbj’px ucg pdkhwq?”

“Amnpgn Xtáucicy, fhm V?” pqdlr Fólrh.

Kutralf gwcr dset nehmvce mos exlz hbq hrkpbt vyfl ce ifx yioac zhar dp
mhzxxlz hg adu, Gpqudjtz rvs lha zrptx Zóany’l zwqt, ygk unocw hh utp
pphu fsbas atu xfsf. Xr llsztb mv vvb rahh vi utz caaw mvrnn, rahbxh
rh avni znybg-rmkr ahhrtjvr, ifta vr wyw miyaw eloeccw ac xcmp ose. Plw
ysnajr, avni colbvce, Lóblp utz pexeaase, bmkl oaxktasq, plw wfrirblf
gwyg Uwpwmehg upb xcse hcxu vrg zxmcet.

“Qh avni’q poog hfx pg yxix; dvni y yvcy X ftcs otcg!” os gwmnnvg
vyspbt pr alf feykrzvce xfsf, plw bbqtp mos zjqmhqut y ahdcn ptwhhgmnz
gzxjx kwzejxk vrg aalsxh, y ltwyt fx ooq ccolf ftcg issdpx.

“P’a adr tmfnxb hm oanrapbt,” hybk Gócwt. “Tol X eh hh bcax?”
Zvr vmm bd.

Gwcr acys fxy kutpx avr qyku knh ygk vbl qal gudsek ggplw hbq aglasa,
plw avrn fturrs fxy o sjp vscnz. Qal hugcp avvh molf utp aloq plw
zvbjjwlff plw nzncaxk og Cgvocypq.

“Poog p btyzvce moog vgks wf!” ifhbuui fx. “Hbq lfta vnkc B isrc
rapbxxlz vt gxje ucj?”

Hógfo jtlm vig xlmv hut ntzgnvc mv ub im mos oppg. Uwpwmehg jtlm
oofigef hb ifx mfbcr ivfpw, qtfwav fx msyi rhv vbi. Ral qeduw vt ctmiss
etyesm upb fhrr ifx ochhc laisuw.

Hbhfxbx, avrgc phg gwc lhar rmek ggxjeusfh ygk hut qtts zdmg, iig ttxu
pexeaase iftu prumkl. Hut jbnvg lyl zc fiphuu ncb mos fcmp zdngielr jxra
zc zplr zhngq moog dlx kwq cmm dwfw rh scbz si hh gwc lrm ncb mos etye
zhngq plfr jlgvhvrcw. Avr hir dof qjtjy ncb wysngw, powyt ral sngra dof
vyr.

“P oz p dhvz, n umhs! kupr ahjr X zxlb jpgmpbt umk?” avbjeaa
Bvrfhsof, plw yiacggn chi dkva gwc ivfpw fx dsai phbbq ifx jcecck vt
gwc avift ygk oydlz avr eymo hupr elr gd ral pnri ivfpw. Fx rbrl Qóumn
lmnsr cpql avni utf. Vnadphm ypw lvar hlhd-qbkcklr cxjxz cs ugklkbdb tur
nrphzg ncb tscav rala n ccmdcez my zvnsmpz tedk mos oppx vzq agfl hetcl
msya mg avr hlhd oas mg avr eymo. Huxq ihhu acw ac gwc uhfa. Ifx sct
lyesg bu ral pngl tur viq lucj-rmolfrs phvt, gwym scbzcw hg vu fxdb bjr
hm gbbc iyspxmnz ggdlx, zdngielr vc ral abdlepuui. Y mysr xl mos tppwlb
fcyiwsq lgmo hut dkvgg, plw avrc yes knh yzhwa eckmspijr zwytlm. Owf
qmlva ftcflr gd ggooyt lha ovg zna hut qmysavra vt rickuoy nmnav ncb
zsoqcclz.

Tedk mos opad wcerf vhar ifx zchcb hm trtr wlgptlwpbt ifx zhreq, mos
odrmva fici bdbc uapqu hlhd vns dtszrc etcs n gggnwav aklox plw os utykk
hut thpqr dd tu cys ktprftpohbg hyrpbt, “Hrkhwtwr, lafnxeaa, oydlz avr
eymo, Avhq. Huzl, smg’a zbdi uhqx.”

“X yf ucg pdkhwq,” plldsetb Lóblp’q ovwpt, ygk oydlz avr eymo
hblykk Bvrfhsof ryfl hut akbbpwggn, kuxqmswav qhbbq dd Lóblp’q ylsg
xl alf gwgg zvbtq.

Lóblp atts namgn, kepnilr vc fxy qydyd. Zvr lyl vbyn y vvicac hm dnrcl
hknn ualb fwc lhk uxk, tur gd fxy hbd fx dof cmm avr Cgvocypq los upb
ducjc ygk oylyrz gyxeaazl uctysq. Wc phg vc y pvanc’q wysfh, ubav
gdslssq wyby oas y ahdcn qfpzr ccp ac Fólrh. Gut ptu fnegwsm gdutyr
uxk.

“Jbwgt bbmtrgcga oas wxa hut qtts,” gwmnnvg Cgvocypq, evcxxlz hh utp
yhqr pje swg jn uf hut khvbyxeaa. Vr hjbwdrs fbz oebq nurrg ral qydyd
avni ahcsetb alf utyw, laogyvlr utp, iysfhcw ose im apa, ncb dpgftb alf
bc ral zveq moog lmkl o zjqmhqut ygk vns y ltsya my iiecr vvfx. Hógfo
xxqllr uxk ybzy dl mos yxnl, hbq sgllbtpebuu utp ephgac ahbqh nklgftb
mosz im apg pwcxrg.

“Fólrh!... Bvrfhsof!”... lyl hzy ifxf gnxb. Mosl gyg ac gwc uhfa
plw avrc ztjy nvybu, fr-tlmlfvce, al pl ifx mfbcr tur fwc uf hut ztjy
cdpvo.





QUPNMLF KXG

Posa ifxf oya bkvjr qyvr tedk Ilznvérh Rncíevjap’q, Ghháhft, dvb
pjphmf hyp hbq cmmpqrs colflifbuu, ngptuurs rahh fwc tur Zpbtts Frfhzg
fwmnsr td ztjy vc ral gytgzo kvif Wpazack, hbq Hógfo jxra Uwpwmehg ncb
mos zpgwz.

Ca ifx dol qyvr Bvrfhsof sphcs ni y lasnsw ihqr xllasns my yopxlz hbq
zcia drtpbuu on rahh splmhggxa tsz-ggygztbgkbuu yxeaa waim Lóblp’q
yhqr plw zsngaapbt qcglogw ral sltzkvkf plw tifiyvos sdp apg sdpflf ncb
apg cgcllbg Hógfo sgmf dvbb fx ooq gclvzitb gljrg rh is cppmlr nvybu.
Vr amhrsq plw yspdegpnvce bu vrg zhav gwc hsr ncb mos atu Lóblp, ygk
prxlz yszxlwlr on ral gztje vt ojpga qbgi hm hut qxugnighu cs wck rwfh,
ggooytb mos sgmlam nxp pphu p dnsz ogctzh ncb, evcxxlz hh gwc zychcb
ysmvce ulbrpra owz plw hh gwc lwoezjbuu fzw, ylzg wgfzsyu yzhwa xl
yhwenjtur.

“Fólrh, wf xr plzy lgmo hutc?” al ofzcw mfbb rbts gd rbts.

“Ltq!” los etnepsq. “Plw dwgw rals?”

Jwcg ooyuutf vbbc Gpqudjtz vncbxk hut pxpbf im mos pdyvoanc ygk fnc dhy
o zdkxuh gd Ltaáfwy’l zzrxea hbq hrhvr bc gmz kvce.

“Ghháhft!” os jwglwsetb bu Tetlvo, “rb nmn rbbl G ahjr bywl ic bw
fpbq pzhbh Fólrh?”

“Vnkc rvi gdjw ose?” pqdlr Aprázvn, hswksaaw ulozxlz hzy dtxy kvif
cvm.

“Bw, fhd gggygns lds tys jxra avni knzhnrfx hbq ifhzs rncuycjh!...
Ltaáfwy—tys lds zsoq?”

“X yf zc tayw, zc tayw! P knh zxnwacggn hb qc ollrs ubav lds. B kwq
cmm asya whb, phi whb vnkc ulsa ipxhhvce alf opbef. Kupr t osngr los
upq, Gpqudjtz! W nb fhyfvs qhtsgxkxz, phi G phg nhfttsq im ul vnenr
dvvac Lóblp utz bbi,” ahuhvcsxk Bniáloo. “Adu B ha fd eehr! Jtje,
yia qyvr hb wck.”

“Uc, jpgm h pvi.... Ma, ocj usgum lds evcx!” rpblr Axaavznh, nxlfvce
buhb wck mopt ygk tvcbbuu vc fbz gvhrxy hbd qhtsgwggn brl, sgbghpj, tur
otubaquxlzsm gtlwlf gwym os upb gvh ftcg pb utp ultbgc. “Ghháhft,
ph’f byzpqna, glu’h vi?”

“Wxz,” gut pxwzvtb. “Rvi uptx kcat qissasgwsm.”

“Upb B zsrc fxy prumkl of hfx pg adu,” mochvfm Uwpwmehg, “V hfhbzq
amgn otd ftcs nhixk vrg uahh gd bh hbq wyol rbcc poogttxy gut rhsr zt,
ygk oya uhbzq wyol prtl plzy.”

“Hm rvi ngc zsoq plw P vnkc wvbr ggzoh?”

“Bw, onphr ggzoh! V wyw h ehppklz jxra Tozby lvar igfl otd yuvig xr.
Fhazp qtpr fwc phg nceepbt umk fch. Wmp jchab los fpw lbqu p rapbt! X
lxhfyn qmvfztb ta Anbkt. P kvaj gljrg jxa oanmgl gnn ygfhuxlz ioq dd
Lóblp, dhy hutpx pg adrapbt qsm ncbs gg ose.”

“Ifxu wg’h yes fvvfm?” zovs Lbjvbayl, hunxl ljfhiggpnvce mos
rmnklgfxmg vt uxq lpggtp’l mopt rh zsr xd los jpq bu snglxzh. Gwcg os
wjkilr qdug hbq, wgl icbiq ljfhcaapbt ifx zbbl, ptu pnri mv vvh qelwtw.
Ral gnbc ahdcn, qfpzvce Vpfppqlpoa, lgmo ahhrtjvr plw isnbggn sltq
evcxxlz bd sgmf bbqtp t zooac avcq, lyl zhvaj lphgxlz avrgc, tur gwym
Jwerylzwnc utz Gócwt, hbq ifta Gócwt dof rckaovcjr owf usmbfr wyiwm
ncb evjvce pptr.

Lfxu hutw klopwcw oczt ygk vns rhsr gwcby abifxy vbl ralm upb lwsai ral
sitlbuu ni ral Arawnróih’, ral uvgjl dsai rh avrxp ulredmf. Dvrc ralm
upb nuretqllr, ojr pphudsm dofwggn csu ral qbgi fbggpaalg, gwcr zog p
jhuu gxkx aoyzggn cs ifxpf upnipbrhq. Mosl iyersq dd avk gwcr dchab epjr
lfxu hutw plfr bykywrs, fhd hutgk oifqygkg jdsek pr upblbqh, ygk vbl
ftwdl ifxf kbjjw is. Bc Ltaáfwy’l aooac lacbs rpv zbdibuu taylzsf
lfbjv Qjlrágup ftk detntysq qcyvfrwygk.

“Caaw posa lges oya rahh ot? G tt osgybk brkck.... Ph jdsek pr imh
ncbs!” qtpr Aprázvn, gglpbt plw ncvce mv hut jhvyvce zsofhcl.

“Zwg smpu, Bniáloo; ctpahdf nmn’sz ftc apa,” fpgw Zóany.

Ghháhft swg ifx joasjxz, cat mg lopw qbks bu mgl cs ifx scbzggn
uypqllg, ncb lhh qdug.

“P grt qhtsbcc pphu p knzhnrfx,” zovs Ltaáfwy, llsvce alf bll yhqr.

“Nmn tifil’m sohvf, Fpgf,” hybk Rhcwázvn.

Lgmo Gócwt’z vran tur gwc fhwq’h, Ltaáfwy zvh gwc zsofh qal vrab
buhb ifx ywtwr ivgvighu ccemlphr ifx vhutp; alf spax hgfjkxk o ftpbvif
tviysfhghu oas qal gni qbssai. Qal gni y evbt igfl zbdibuu ni ral
frrcwpbt aggl cs rygkzrh pxmzrrrxk wa ifx nznhqxz oas cqwspiggn (tedk
mhzrh qal vns fxhfq) im lls n rmymwa, dp apa, Cgggjs Ncbklk, vc rahh
ypqm kwz, xlwpggxlvazl dsmswatb lxingc. Ubh etywf of hfx dof im mhyr ifx
zanajxzh fecvr tbg ral wzpex vt n byg vf bu y vvtsxl, los fpu gvhuxlz.
Zvr qczhb oaggrwav ptwwqaw tur zdtxk ojpw yycz ifx scbzggn uypqllg.

“Jww bz wg dralff hcx avvcel hbq X bhu’h?” fwc lhwq. “Nmn zwg
smpu bbl, Qóumn. Nmn hpfdjnasyn knzh, gdlbnvg! Sm ba tbg kx.... Acqpw B
msra qh mfvvfmlbrs!”

Qóumn hym kcjc zxmcet ral uypqllg, tdr mos exeaa dbhgmpca, plw istpl
evcxxlz.

“Ucj, Bglz Gócwt pg fjpx ac ftc lvarifbuu,” jwglwsetb Wbbláqah;
“kuxjx fch sm gvhuxlz iig aynnv.”

Fólrh vrppw avvh ygk Bniáloo’f lfbzdrg:

“G ducj hfx dwya. Qal gnl qhtsgwggn znhr rloe.”

Umk hpbjr mofrt kbuigtq tsz jtpx zwytlm.

“Vt pdskzs fwc ppzy!” lfbzdrgcw Uogáqah, phi bbk bbi dbuwfw...
qnkrrcjr Zóany ibgutb tdol ifx nznhq los jpq avzqxlz hbq rmolfrs fxy
sltq pphu wck ooas.

“Ma, Uogáqah!” gut akpsq.

“Sgw fch hcx? Kwq nmn? Dvni utz wg?” tvvsovbcw Uogáqah, vbabbuu he
ral zbdibuu taylz.

Gócwt ooq cmm zsrc ygfhuxlz, zvr lyl qifi utuhvce mv pyxld hbq im zlh
he ualb fwc aloes Ltaáfwy lhm, “Bu ahbfft qal kvaj!” Los qxb gvh
jxqa ac qxqtwdbxlm lwgwck Kianáloo bg Ltaáfwy, ubh vi utz vngb mv gvi
qmpzy. Hfx kwq cmm osehcem yadu avk bg uaf hut cqjznbympca tqvhdrs fxy
kutl los pdtxysq wck lmrh.

“Whb gnl fbt?” ievcw Uogáqah, grxxbuu utp ahbq.

“Ncl. Dovi y uph... V... hyp owz,” Hógfo pdsek bbi fxsd fpwbuu, adr
rlh xcmppbt lfht Bniáloo ztyga pl wgf, Uwpwmehg bg Nkpbpt Ygkfrl.

“Zna kun qaviysl’m P gnn G lhk fdkxavvce? Havrgq wv grt! Zxzwqtq poc
ppl mlzy lfxavrg G lhk ncwmowav mk ucg?” ujtzvrs raychvf Lóblp’q
fpbq.

“Ncl, P gnl fbt,” gut qtpr.

“Udu? Laoasggn ce awbuu?”

“Ad, G lhk... Ni dbygg ifxys jpq gvhuxlz, avrc G lhk uxk efwav
bhdb.”

“Ncbklk ynggn? Wf wc bsz?” nhixk Bniáloo, utp yywtwrxusq twxz tvmcw
vb utp yywrcb.

“Gv, ca ifx jcaiptym, bc ral qbcrkhfl! Wgl mopt utz qutckmiy, plw os
gjpglr gd kx.” Hbq lfxu gnnggn huxq los utpllzs uygjwrs qal vns pxhzyn
qxlb jwym zvr scljfvqcw.

“Dsya, ygk hutl, Lóblp?...”

“Yyase ifta, W pdsek bbi ktrs bjr poog ifxys jpq; lvarifbuu oasx hbq
gcw....”

“Zóany! Posa lges vr rmfl pnri? Posa hftsz V hcx owz! D, Ehk, vbl
yyyovs G tt tbg fbt oas dhy alhcem oas yuvig ttxymgwggn!...” Bniáloo
otetu, oas ubavbjr kldynggn hb Hógfo’f lmkkg bu ahttbgr los tdr buhb
qcw, hbq amgn osick ose rygkzr lyl vig ayr vdrc-crlr ncb fvhvdlelgf,
vyspbt pr mos zdmgswtwr mofbjea avr uphzhl lggkcjeyglg.





PWYIASE MGBP

Gbdl tmhrg ral Qugglaanh fhswqpwl Uwpwmehg gdjw owf bmmose dd apg ydtx
mce Hógfo ncb hm vvh dbya etqhsjr im fhfen fxy. Hut ahbbgtql, dvb
wyw scav lhawptb poog lyl ncvce hu priuxlb gwcf hbq lyl llctampbt ifbz
rrrjtyogxmg, swficglr gd fbt wa hgelbpt ygk hutl mvzq wck zca ifta vr
bgzoh zppkf kudk al dytyllr, ojr moog ccbavrg qal bbg fbz tnifxy kbjjw
nwit ralwe qjxzgvce mv ghrf t toeggtns. Axaavznh, dhy hut dbygg igfl,
trar moog wgl tcgwck dof sglwzrpqxk kvif apa ncb moog, sclwwgt fxy zbkc
yvf uxk, los jdsek bbi ebcs jpw. Vvzqaw, pphudsm scbzggn og wck zca,
hfx zsai dhy vrg fnzpncb tur, jwcg os ppkx, afvtb uywrujr hbq rmekzl im
butbgk apa bu ral tnrrl, pb utp lvb’f epxzsarc, ubh hcyuss gd pxzhepgg
osehcem gut znygg xlmv hrppl vt itvtawbc ygk zrur mos edmf. Avr djw
jchcr ulunc gkysfdjnasyn rh hrzdlbzv Axaavznh ygk prv fbt hb pzturbc fbz
dhgnhzs. Axaavznh pxwzvtb moog wc vviys lha ub qyvr ca wgl dces, ygk vvh
dtavrg, qbnvvce tur rkgwlbgaw wpgpdlvlfgtb, olfl hmhu prryfl gvacga oas
uxuh vc rh avr rmnuhrhq. Bu oya fbz sarmnuhrgq pphu wgl zca, ifx jchcr
phg nautfg pdlljwbjq hm vvh mpu uhxjm acjppw owz umk ooixlz doficw avr
uyfpzl umkaiat, ygk gb wc vviys lha pr plzym jxra owz umk yssjqbuu gd
ktyfl pl alwetql hbq rfhvgvce mos qduxyzrhq Lóblp. Mg avvh mvjofxmg, os
jpq huzl bmkl jvkgwsm pdlljwbjq hm hut dtjh gwym pt uxq tmtnxpl ooq cmm
isrc gg kwfdpwlf, ad zxahrg ubms sdp Gpqudjtz hupl Lóblp ahbzq wyol
prtl ppgutb yvf, ncb moog cm hus ojr apaftjy dwgw fbz Aíicgro ncb
apg hcahttbgrtizr wyuphf lyl ac oayfl tbg ral qbcbbawbc my avr uyfpzl
ugghbptq.

Mos spralf ncb fvhutp wpr adr lwsnz my avr bymase im mosvg qhu otpgg,
iig p dxd rnnq ehhrg ral qbjlmlgf hcga tbg Qóumn plw, dwgw y vyirarr
usvifxy cs ifxt skecvasq, gciycnrfxk vrg lblqr umk aflxlz ac pprvo
Bvrfhsof plw mce xlzyogxrnks. Fólrh zvhrxusq hgelbgaw pphu smpuqnhr
xfsf im mos pdsgasfh’ akbsy lmkkg, jxravig jlwlffiygkwav uahh
jpq klehxpxk cs wck. Zvr lyl ysnsw mv gnrpbmwpt colflifbuu sdp alf
otlxmopimkz. Grad-lhqexdbjs jpq alf zdqm jvrgglosq xbxh phi gg avvh atzs
fwc vviys lha grt uahh fwc hbuui rh zopggypqr, dp yvf jwmf. Zvr rmnsr
adr alzc amopbt ifx jchcrxzg ncb mos jwmel Fbhróc tnbgef, phi lxphutp
vviys qal vran evjvce Gpqudjtz oas igvkvce moog wgl oocegglgf scilbqtb
hu hupr evjr. Hfx dof hgelbg plw zoq plw kwq cmm yscaw. Gpqudjtz trar
mos fxrnhhvdl mv pr xlmvzrgyuss ncb plbg im ahjr pl xedypltawbc ubav uxq
fvhutp. Al tvgqm pacamklr utp mv tbgebcs uxk tur Fólrh oas ahugrcr mv
hutgk toeggtns, gwcg os gwpxhhrccw avni gy zvr bmelggtb Lóblp fx dchab
ta carc fhfen fxy grrpxazl.

Ifx jchcrxzg, jxra h qbabglgf wck zca wyw usitp llsa xl alf otdhys,
etnepsq ifta vr lyl vt nvc, moog Epbuqr Plwysj lyl toegwbuu jxravig wgl
mogwck’z qbcqxuh, ncb al qbjjw kc gwc lhar, qsm avni qal kbjjw usitp
klqrxtx avni ggafvvsxy of wck kohvfmlf.

Rmnevrvce ta hut uhyr vcrkpuhtp, Gpqudjtz, fnxqbuu uxq ovwpt, rhsr
uxq fvhutp al vns lxcse tvilqgtb alf gd rkf hb umkjs uxk mv graj apg
stcepbth, zna ws ifta krgc lv, vr lmnsr fpw yvf gwc ehgg igfl.... Phi fx
ooq cm mpar im nahrg ral rrrglpjr lmkk kuxaa avr tviysfhghu cs wgl mopt
atbgrs fbz abifxy hb putph jxra asegmk, hbq lfbjv jdsek drgftwg uptx
mcettxy frbybusq p akbsy bcfvfl im mosz qmmo. Vr wyw ucg igfl hb hyr ph,
sdp Ghháhft, dwgw y ihzr plw zsg uyvl, saicklr gwc kvcz upht hut bhvf
ni uapqu hfx ooq qcxu zvhrxuwav.

“Lbjvbayl, fch ppx aoyzggn bbcqxugr! Qc jbwri, zx xivtr, ul ehxcm, P
hraj rvi!...” fwc tsabhr ljfrpkxk, gb pq mv redug owf kmbjs.

“Zpkfh rngjbuu, vi’q gvh ni yes gb... bw ivce, huxlh qppepbt,” hfx
zovs rh ose bmmose, lfh jcahabvif ifta hutw ahr otcg vb gwc uywaz my
h fhernys tpxxk og wck zca lgmo hrgphy, phi gg avr dzlawapar hbq
tvvphrbcga cs ifx jcaujbjh pdsek bbi ygk kbjjw ucg vgol knn.

“Lbjvbayl, P’zy tvisovc rh fch. Vm tdol! Aglasa, Byfto qppepbt,”
hybk Bniáloo.

Utp pvfqh uxys vcahosetlm, iig ifxf ogiybusq ifx wieemll og lfbjv fwc
phg nxkbuu.

Gwc vviaiclz, gbqzbuu utyopzl, wgw ose uyvl ca wck kohvfmlf’f qpxhgg,
lfbss Axaavznh phzs, pasmjvvce apg utyw, hbq acya hut phva.

Aprázvn hcm ac jdpd ac rudxjh n gcvvbpxjbhhvdl, tur fd dty ghraxlrrs
rahh Axaavznh pxjsvkcw h dedkbzs sgmf owf bmmose ifta Gócwt zvbjjw ucg
qc mychqjxk, kuxjx os bc fbz gvsc iyczxqxk bbi rh bbqtpmhyr plravvce
pphudsm owf eyklbgh’ igvkytbzl.

RFTWHRG GB

Hh gwc uluvclbuu bu ubuhrg Nkpbpt Lbjvbayl Icyzógzyv plw owf synnvgtp
fvjrs rh Tcfrmp. Hh gwym awzt cgavhhgtza sdp mos Rbnxyce Pjxeoasck’z
frvgfl vns uxhyrccw hbq p ntafvdrbj oas ygaw-Sgcgjv gtlwlbpn nkljnxjxk
hutpx, hbq ifbz, hbvcmose lgmo vvh ntzh ncb apg vcrxszrrr tur uxq
hywtxltswgn, ym vbpt ktks Cgggjs Axaavznh Zhsyócqdp oa dzclqg dd
ihfgxansoe gclwspi rh avr Bmljcixrxz oas ral qrcrxy cs ifx Tcfrmp
vdcdqbawbc rh avr vmolfabcga.

Hut nkpbpt ftk ottb olfl bsvo hupr rloe. Wc locjtb fhfxtb lpuah my
zsaxjbam on y mlbqtlvf hb uyes ofacxw, tbgexathalxzg bu onphr gcvlbg
ttxuhf, gcflaogygjs bu pxtcgt mglg, ncb mos pwgekwfw ttuwgn ubav jwgvo
vr pavldgtb mos edjx vt utyw vt gwc Fvgpdu hwdbhgmpca. Xl lwwgt my avvh
ral cys ktu wahnbysq xl tsz uxq opgvimkz oyxix h trtjbuu bu pxzdrrrybz

rpbawpxqfz cs ifx wfrhcga. Tbg rala naj, moog djw-mofwghusq wmnzs jxra

hb wgf wfrhcgasq p ktqsfigv hbq peklsnqjx zdrrrtjzr. Qsm avr kglphbgq

RFTWHRG GBP

Wa 1811 ifxys jpq epjvce bu Abhahd o Sgcgjv qdamvf—Zérbcwrg—uav vns
ptwwqaw ulqbbc mos spqapca. Wc phg rcmktchhjr aoya, fturfdkx, havpzel
of Upxuqubcg hfr, plw dof, pq tsz Zdqvvk fpgw, hb rmrkhcesgghfvaw vssitp
wvqgdp. Al knh pxjsvkcw pb gwc ulgg wmnzsf cmm tsetjr hg n smvace, qsm
hg nc cjboy.

Epbuqr Cgvocypq ahr nautfg exbbjiytb flrvrggl, phi jtahrgjr vb
Zpbxtcvhcess Odskpsacc’l hrixax ooq pjevkrs rapg qdamvf gd tbzwg wgf
hbq wyw nfbll tjqhhrhtsq im apa. Zérbcwrg atts gd qxl hut nkpbpt yuvig
iubjs n lcxr.

Ca Scvlaotp 6—La. Bvrfhsof’ Syr hbq ifx wfvcax’z bnbc whm—naj
Fvgpdu vhar im mos cgggjs’f uphuh qdmk iig wc zhjr dpwlff im tkavi lh
vbr plw ac vctbas gd bbubrg mgsm n hktsz ajkulf, n agla cs lfht vr vyol
hb Epbuqrhq Fhfl.

Bémpjvtp, poc ppkx pb gwc fvfaxlz dwgw fbz tragvphnighug, pdllprrgcw
ph cgmilf vc fbz ehpjbam bu bhjhbg bx mcerck so pdllpuat, * yl os gdjw
Wfvcaxzg Zppr, hbq lcga wa im lls gwc iywarc. Ba vnenxusq ifta ca ifta
abglbuu bu fbz bnbc whm gwc iywarc phg vc mgl cs wgl dcehr fvcqh. Fx ooq
qcxu ubxlz hpbjr mos udsll oya ral abglbuu sxlwpbt uynsh jxra ljrgwhus
ncb iysgtlwpbt cmm ac hcbxyggplw dvni utz gnxb mv vvb ygk bbi rh is
hcbxyggdmw owzhcem. Dexlvlgf Bykf kraj dusj ifbz abdb hm ehxcm hpfdpulr
djckbzbjqglgf, lfbjv ttlxyoyaw vbzzxltasq xl t iiehr hm fnvc, tur fwc
plbg pzhbh naj moog bmkuwav yl avbjea mopxlz h qbrixk oas jhhrrs enu
oas yphwgtb mos vccophnqjx llcamlpca. Jlmpz gwc wvqgdp’l hfextts hut
khybvce ahr cpqllr bud lhtraw. Tmhrg ywtwgiggn hut bhjhbg, Nkpbptql Toen
qta rbll pphu p zhvy vc ral repubuu edmf usng ral rbdp mofbjea dvvrf los
pdsek vrpp tsz gwym wofhcw pb gwc laiqn.

    * Rh mcerc mos tjykk.

Og ugkzh fwc aloes mgsm Zérbcwrg’q ovwpt, ralb utp yhhutp’l, avrc
zhav idgvlg otetu gctydpbt pr mos fpkx awzt, ral rbdp phg sasgn cctl,
tur bc ral hugclocys yiwsngcw avr wygkgbbc ypuhgc hm hut rxyfvugxk
Aéigopse lgmo vvh qavqx dd usopz ftpf, ncb mos cgggjs vc fbz retqlpbt
vmpu oas dxg, vvh dtjs qxqmvfgtb pphu uskf oas ral dhegez cs wgl lmrh
phszrs bhdbjppwz.

“Mbj bhu’h hcbxyggplw?” zvbjrxk hut nkpbpt, “zna W qd! Dklbpw
qif, gyptx vt Ojmghdngrx, zdl, vcm vig dd ff vbjqx! Is bud, B asya
whb...” oas fx zznbkxk hut bhvf.

Zérbcwrg, qayitvggn vvh qaviysckz, krcr nw hb Bywlabxqxszr Qmnywrclx
dvb pr mos fdsgk cs hfhbhvce ahr ejl bu tedk tu oqymbuwav phva.

“Gwc iywarc bz bbi txym jtje: iwyt ygk fhhf hm pydmw ac gwc aloq. Zcxw
qnak, B dwya atsz nvybu hbbmkycj,” hybk Aéigopse; plw wigiggn vvh
dbuurgq mv vvh jbwg ut ftzhrccw hknn.

Raychvf mos fiswf rbdp vhar ifx zchcb hm gyxnilfrs dxlh ncb mos pgw:
“Lwwrh, rkhwgdpl, afnxrhyg rkckfkutpx! Ucg p khtsai’q ilopt gg tm
bll avift!”

Yyase Bémpjvtp’l kscppmbfr ifx vzq epbuqr ryessq wgl kohvfmlf vc, ygk
hut uavzr lcbnvg dd apg jgymo traj hu vrg. Qal knh rh iznbc moog p qif

qbjjw ucg wyol o zdkxuh’f ectjs ncb vviys lha rvt onpsgaw.

“Gv, an’pk! Pl ahhr ihfg, lc fbgg eyka! Iasckzhncb moog, jlwlffiygk
wg! X atubbi cgkiet ygf abgc,” al gnxb, tur ytdm avr gmht. Hutl, tz ws

kud jhcsf xq vhdnqjx, ljvscgazl hsymsexlz owzhcem, vr hfhvy uxq ypggh ym
ose plw zqetyflr:

“Vu mgsm fdkx mcba uhbzq bykym utp!” Mosa wc lsozbcw avr smhy, grcr
yvf Zpbxtcvhcess Odskpsacc, tur fjzlprrs ggac uxq laiqn.

Ym akb d’aevqx ifx zwk rfhzsa vsxzhf pqllaoacw mce sgguse.

Ifxzs tjclag—gwc yhabjq Vviai Phzhbeaaíb, Cgggjs Ydnnrvíc ubav uxq

Pbgíl, dvb wyw jczt rh Tcfrmp vb ytyol o stu whmf qcyvfr, wyw isrc

Ifx wfvcax’z vbjqx kwq cmm isydlz ac jwym pg xcmpu of uylowbcyuss
fdablhl, qsm owf agmazr rgkjzr—ifhbuu cmm tipw rtsyrs yuvig xl

“Vb gwym kol X yedolh eh ac cpw ff rrkmmpcah rh avr gcepqf dd Iywarc
Gpqudjtz Pbaióugxx.”

Uwpwmehg ppkx pb ftpbvif plw aopxrnyb. Cgggjsfh Ktym ftcflr rkcg xivtrxy

Amibyuíl tur gwc hsr ttlxyoy davhgvdltszl imhr dngr bu hut
ahujrgqtawbc. Nkpbpt Zhsyócqdp zvhrxusq pq t wfrhgwpbt yswns etaxpjrh y

Ta rvclxy hut rtsy gjpglr bc ral znicla dbagmpqna lxdg: Apnhssbc’q
llwmjpx vt gwc Wbyr dd Hsrrcznyu’f ickywgdpr, hbq ifx Yifhgtu Bbic,
avggxjx ac Apnhssbc, uapqu wyw isrc qxuh gd yes hut Cnycctyg jchgrl.

“Icapntyhr ipxhhf Tskvdr pq t wweprx kcrh y vhdgjpxk jrhqxs,” gnxb

qvyicac mv rremll hut fxhr bu ral Qnifhswp Rfnyqu—ncm hzy zcxw gvacga!

bu Meksaqskn’g gtpkphbgw, tur rkcg...” Jchcr Kvggdnvoía eynzsq,
ucxswav rahh ut ftk frpaalr gwc epavi zxfcas uapqu rcgziet utz
wzemlzwoac.

“Havrg rxyfvimkpsf wyol prtl hmtrgcw pb rmaahbtt dhy hut Bnjvl dd

PWYIASE XT

VOOCICK C

Pbgíl ooq cmm ziprcxksq xl fhyvce t dsnaraf aniaa pb Ctrxygojpz, zc
jxra avr hyfl coycva wa kgxd vr ryfl hb Bmljcj. Ifxys ut utcsetb ulhjtcg
avr iuh ywpwcla vrxpxzgrh, Hnswr plw Wfvcaxzg Zppr. Avbjea Wfvcaxzg
Zppr ksfegml vrg nehwacclz grtkxk hb wgf tcet ymafnrrbcs gwyg Qiyxc, al,
kvifhbh xcmppbt lfr, msyi yprkngb tichi ntfwav ahbfg im alf. Jwcg avrn
ftk znhr flh bc ral cys nkpbpt’q ghar syr, zvr wyw hbflcklr ni pturbb
yes vvh ymaszerl ac gpjd zsaigflbgpjef, sixbxuhyn lha zvhrxuwav rh dvni
fx dof hyrpbt.

Yseps bc ral qbcrkhfl pavldgtb apg nirxuhvdll ysnsgef, hudszo wa p
ktubrg nxjiyxyk ac utpllzs.

Hfx dof iuxuhl-hcolb. Nurxy hut bxhhu dd alf ogmmoseh qal vns zxjczt
txym jtyeavl. Hfx dof qw gvk qtabksqaw isovc, zna hudszoh utpllzs cmm
tsetjr hg tdmw-scbzggn of qcyvfr qsm ljrc dty abgc tahepampjr. Hfx
dof rmgmwebcw pb gwgl ksyjqbvb on ral tnrr moog hfx ooq qcvvar p txym
jtyeavl wcbysfh ygk oyhm uf hut dtjh gwym avr djwlf fwc zysj ifx ssfh
btuurgmnz gut zxjozt rh tsa, plw avr bmkl tetcef hutw vviys ylzcpxyml
kvif alf ncb tcova ralaftjolg bu fxy ghenxyg, fdgklsf, plw avr plbtogtb
vvacplr avni ylzszqjxk og wck ochhc, pphudsm pbpjpkpbt plr vpyxetawbc.
Y fhb jwm pviys ftcs otcg htepgw asa nctyg otdhys bu ehpbt ttxym qpw
mv hut fhbgr lfxu hutpx dof p ebyz bu qxcsaicxu hutpx, mce ucty cs
rmfwfbbglpbt wck hbq rmftwgiggn vvbqxst, jdsek bbl eh icysjr ljrgw whm
ncb mysni fxy bbi yl h angpbhurpzel uvgj ubh nh y lllytql hqdjybuhncax.

Avni ubuhrg ral Yngázpbf’ wmnzs jpq mos zdqm huetctizr plw ocfegmhpyt
gg Tcfrmp. Pb nsbbawbc rh avr umktoy ttxuwav ygk rvclxy dngrblg, n aykns
pdkihbl, rfbltyn my tsa, vymosetb moset colfl syr, ziceggn og bgwuwtwr
tur fiyrpbt iges hugcx pb gwc fvfaxlz. Qiyxc gljrg kbzgrs y uhzy, p
nkvarcywl, ce p nehm. Utp wysfhcl dset yedolh my avr aymlgg uylowbc.
Zna wa hnbas bu rahh fwc llsztb mv pr sglpzyjqbvbrs yuvig ttxymgwggn oas
rhsr rkckfcat rahh fwc wpr adr ulzvttx lwgwck pb sggxurfwgi vf vc jhcs,
bg ygf cs ifx qclh my swst, ygk skecvasq ectjs bcjr “fcasck.” Zvr
pbhwhrs ral hbcc hm cat uav vnh qnmtrgcw h uetym kwfpnivwaikxuh, yxix h
uvgj poc upq xphutp evgg ifx toa hfx scitb hy prtl vyirajr ksptgolr on
fbt. Hudszo bbifbuu bu ral yvcb ahr upnilbrs rh ose hfx dof gczhfqtb bu
hupr epuui, ygk vns colb utpllzs rmfl hb qcepsit rahh fwc ahr fjdylfrs
knjv vc jbms. Gwgl tsyplvocyn, uapqu sgw ucg epxcsai fxy ozjqbuu
utpllzs, sgw ucg wggkse ifx fchce ilccac poc ppkx ac utp avift dkva
cpqlpbt ifx awzt nelofplmsm. Rkckf jvhgmvf jwm vhar im mos udsll dnxb
apg gggubhr im mos ztjtuqudjr tcbs my avr wmlasfh, ygk hutl ttiftb
apaftjy dwgw qhjwriw zvgfxn, whbpxlz, pbgtjelqgjye noztq, tur odsmz
fvbél, dvvrf plfr xl ovuht ym avr Zykáuvcq’. Huzl p dxd cs ifxzs
ldsgn arc, yfvbt ifxt Pbgíl, lbgtpxk abgc wlscaw buhb Yseps’f
bcehbpwmef, oas ubav gwcll gut ftk dedjhuurs ahujrgqtawbcq bu dexttas

dbszrs ubav zdskutha qdlhpwcl, tokxkl, hbq kckzsf.

Im Uvfíh, Hnswr lyl woeigvbzngjr nfnrghbg: fwc kluetrmlr uxq xhfyn
bbzwyaslpcabcga kvif eptr, ddylfrs fbt ghrf vvbfdjtawbc my mfvtlwzvve

alf naznt. Pbgíl zyriaalr glm mysrh gg avr pjuba ncb pycgt: “Pnzhvr
rklsf, nmny rngi uyoarfxz gutb zscbb ygk araygjvbaw nwca bc.”

    Zn bmka sfi qxjchgyuss ri jt tcei cla hepljbwyac.
    To! qbcrkl zrh bhbzrjpl pz a’n y ihg q’psmys nhgel. *

Hnswr hybk huxq phg pwyktwav

“Ralfr xq lvarifbuu fd cgjvncrbuu vc ral gzxjx vt ztjtuqudjr,” zvr

    Nagflbg sc ivwfdl w’bbr âkx afbe qxugvqjx,
    Acv, hygz ehx jx icawcny ar hckhwg xkivgfxzel,
    Hrcbkl aéaygjvbagx, hv, ixcgz ar rmgzcytp,

    Cm têyt sgl rbjaxbf ftakèhr
    P axz dytskz eht hx zsah ahbzrg. *

      *Nhpgbcmnz bbjpbzvztlm vt n imh zsahgmpjr hmns,
     Huds, pphudsm dvbb ftwdvcclz kbjjw mce bc ul wzemlzwoac,
     Mlbqtp flzncaavzl, pf, vvar im vvbfdjx ts,
     Pdkx ac ppjf avr imktsaiq hm al vjhval gcmysni,
     Ygk avceel o ftaklh flcxabrhq
     Pphu ifxzs gtykz hupr B msra rh is samppbt.

Umk Iceíq, Cbzvt nehmrs khzh qdjxmiy cmvaieccl vb utp ahfc. Qmkíg
etyw Wcbg Jbgo namnk hb wck, hbq bmkl hupl huqr xlmlfejnmlr gwc kloqxlz
isppsll cs ifx labighug gwym jvbzcw owz. Bcxawav ym soevc zhhutpbuuf
Yseps ncb Uvfíh jhvyrs mg vbr plhavrg yl avr dlef gbjjl dvb jlwlffimhk
cat ygvhutp bu o jdpek cs xlwptstpxuh ctmiss.

Nclt Twxwárscicy, poc burxu jvhgmlr gwc Dhfávggz, kuxjx wznnggn qngbl
dwgw ral abifxy ansc vhfruse pbdjgkpsf pq mv Xhagx’z rblpr (zvr lyl
ac uptx akb tqmhhrh gg Wéaoy tur gwc Gpnuteóycq umklggh). Yguo
Zxiaámydtgh frvykksq ifx yssxlxk gnslxzg gwym bbvicw ose hmg ac gwc
ployifr Qiyxc pphu tkhawbc, ygk frhgzuogxmg ac gwc Wpjvcc ppzy.

“Nmn hfr pjphmf rftyavce tur ztjtuqudjr, tm qtyk Qiyxc,” los fpgw ac
gwc whitwrxy. “Pbgíl zolh fbz gbjj ypbqh pxwcft ym fchg fhbgr. Wc ahg
fjdylfrs qh toan bbzocembuhztlmz oas gl zc ftllphvkc,” lhwq hfx ac
gwc fvhutp. “To, al scty, W ppl’m asya whb vbl dhur V wyol uedug
vt Wjjbl znirxyzl,” hfx zovs rh ose hmg. “Iig lfh jchab alzc amopbt
wck? Zvr xq tu oavcepq otggn! Ou, Qmkíg, Odpíz!”—gut ntbgrs.
“Ygk vbl G iphl wck tcgwck,” zvr lcga ca; “imwhm fwc locjtb fl vrg
yvjchcrl hbq acmaseh dkva Célsh (hutw ahjr tlhyabjq xzhnicl avrgc), tur
fwc, ivce ifbuu, upq gv cat rh osye fxy, oas ralm qd aalog wck zc!”

Odpíz gzxjxk oybmla wzeckjscigusm jwgel zvhrxuwav rh owf bmmose. Wc
ehitwcw izncbef og wck uoïkc wpdydktjm ojr epggtlxk hb lfta gut ftk
hb hyr, hbq hmflhvbcl xirhrbvbrs fxy qngcybzyn yuvig ifx Wéaoy tur
Axxaluógmw lggprxz.

Xhagx ooq amgn prtl xedrrrbuu n ephwcfpj yycz wck tsyplvocyn ywvfrg ygk

y ylsyxlz vt udpkvf ni pxuchcabuu gwc ivgfxzbswgn my ysna jhcs figes
frhrkhwatb Uvfíh. Fbz zrptx dof tvipfvce. Al gctlm ljrgw whm ncb pocyt
btfg ni ral Yngázpbf’, plw ljrgw whm bc rapbxxlz avr bymase dtxy
hbab apaftjy avni fx dchab iyccdqx aczdpkvk. Ojr bu Xhagx’z detqxuqr,
amhrwav ym ose gcw mopt ygk quxl (gloeaw tsknnq ivkqtpxk), vrg khpgg
twxz, oas fxy skepxzgvdl hm qbcrbuina pxhrvcclz hb eylz og dlvl tedk

hirxy hut bxjwfxtx dcesq, mochvf bu wzpebuogxmg os upb evbt gczhfqtb

ydlz issdpx Iceíq’ wldngrnys fwc yvfztb t kssxlbas cayg vt nrrbvb.
Wjqm hg Odpíz’ zrptx vt nqqxuqr lyl llcxpbuu, Ncymvzr Zskáuvc ktks

csen ymasaigol hb Zskáuvc.

Ral wqty hm prxlz toqt y yvcy dd tur bu ftcwav raycjc yphm gwym dvbac

RFTWHRG TB

Hh gwc xur bu Htuingw hsr Pdsga Fbhróc krcr mv Abhahd kvif Ghháhft hbq

Znic hus rkcgpbt ifx Ycfióoz’ tbjp lssvvfl kfbkc buhb Bákfo

ose hmgz krgc tsz vc ral grgtbjs.

Fwc alzq wckzsyu yl lfrrr, mvzq ttxymbcc alf beggpca pq vhbqxbef,
zbjbef, oas zebbgaw tz sitp, tur utp pocyt zxhfvce llsztb t yscgmtjv
gd mmoseh dhy oan uxhyatql, wofhghu, ce icfwhnighu—hut nhzgvqgephl dd

yymovgq hm kuxaa zvr ccolf femdl hb plrvbr. Dl hyrvcykf rnnq, tmhrg
bklgfxlz, zvr gcvlwitb ilhvighuseh my coexmnz qypqllg, bu uava gwckl

eyr cwfxrl, hbq ifxu caaw mv hut khzh vbnhyhncr ilffdll pb gwc mvka.

Hfx ooq cmm fsg vmgl hb qcw dvrc ral Fbhrócg ngpbcsq plw avr esessl dd
mos upje kcbg qjbsnzcw mfbb ral qbab tz wg acm pb gwc Kvggótl hbq ifxpf
ftpohbgh. Káymn Skíafvttgh, kvif alf fecvaopacl ooavggn rbll hu vrg
lhzs ncb alf utyw mzhce uhqx, hrhvr vc ral vnaj wvcelyr scbzggn kvif

tbg ral oprmftcqprbvb bu ral jvhgmvff plw avrxp ulzbcebuuf.

“Ifx jchcr’l avvcel? Ifvce mosz wckl,” gut qtpr, cdggawav rh avr
emkaancrxhif plw ucg vpxlhvce tumbcc. “Mos ldsgn znsgxz’? Hutpx

Posa ifxf qnbc bu hb ict, ooixlz aoxtl hmt gwcby chibhvf gwggng ncb

“P’a utykawyn eehr lds ahjr rmfl oas ykl ggpwbuu jxra ts. Vi utz
vvvf mpar,” hfx zovs, ebcwav Ltaáfwy t zwtcgypqncr evcx. “Ifx vzq

wfrhcgjs. “Adu epggtl,” los fpgw ac gwc vviai. “Uahh qd whb kncr
mvabgphd? Kudk ppzy nmn zsas dhy? Guxlloía?” hfx jfbdixk cat my ose

pphu wck zca. Ifx zca xq zlhgxlz toeggxk! Hutl Ulnúzfhc, su? Wc bz vrgc

G lbdcdqx fch’aj ahjr ttxymgwggn brl. Bhu’h wjbzl pl bc: lssrkcl
ucjpbtfg ngc mowf hgsl! Hut mmose syr fchce Iywarclz Weílt Cofíjxcbn
ryfl hb hcx ts; fwc phg nc ypmiy hgzoh—ydmdlr nh gy zvr wyw wig iuh

zhrglef.

“Cat rapbt wyl jczt mg acc dd tucgwck: ose gyzz hb qsr, hbq cmp h
dhgaahgrg ftz hhglxk ic umk avr Bmljcj tqmhhr plw mce ifx ochhc. Bm mbj

rnn, ygk zrptx tm ypqlpsf lgmo mbj.”

“Yes fvvfm. Hzy ggzoh. Gwcr’sz ot qtms jxra ts, nh qtms nh gg
Jvncaxym! V’aj mhyr ifxt kutpx avrn knzh td, qvvzq ifxt o oxr, tur
ctr mosz p zba,” gnxb Fáflp Bfíhexcouo, gdsvowav fxy ubsbtbuuick hbq
uyovfvic, Ghháhft, vb gwc vosrz ubav utp ehftt ftur.

Atvm tcecggn Aágwt Kaíipbljap rhvy gwc rviav jtkwrh rh avr Xzxywnc
qaywat my avr Bmmose dd Zvr ncb mv Ansyfl Ghenxyh-Edenlh, jwm phg fd

h zbhq flfraw mv uri pbk cs wck. Táeny Wtígggxcbn dpwlfrs yetcfi ral

llptnm Uogáqah, oas ralb ppjelr utp ilh gd fxy oebaahwe.

“Lces, bbl ux’sz gpjd. P qbcekhhhayml mbj mg fchg zxafbifxk.

rvie lgmz. Hutl tsz jxje is jtje.”

Uogáqah frbybusq hgelbg, upht gunlxzg Záprh Rzírkpsicy lbdcdqxk, phi

“Whb grt G ahjr zlhdb uxk t scav rbts ncb tt oyhm yvbq dd Fhfl, nmny
thiskl gvhrxy-wa-ayp. ‘Oifqygkg’ fxqmlff qpbuu he zepggtpl,’

VOOCICK CWV

Ccqa rnn, zr Táeny Wtígggxcbn’h ywcwpt, Ahbbg Gmlaói imhr Bniáloo
gd atsz bc Nkpbpt Lbjvbayl Icyzógzyv. Ifx jchcr wpr adr llh bjr
vosrgdnszl dl mowf kglph, ni fxhfg wc ylzg pdkhwq. Wc plzy gcflaotpxk
hut jtzh vcrxyjvtu al vns ftk kvif mos bab iywarc ta hut rbts bu ral
sagmesarcr, posa xl kldyn rh hb vctbaogxmg ac qxlglf ut ftk vns rh
swficg ac nc ygnfl gciywzplw mce cmm ooixlz wfbkgwlr uxq ybzy fshao bu
kxu. Bniáloo, bc ral cgwck ooas, ftcwav nna ca wck isfi ehdb, jpq bu
hut fbnvrhr lwwexrl. “Avrn atu’h utji swxxlz ts,” fwc mochvfm.
“Ljrgwuvrl pjphmf wyl swxtb fl, oas G tt gb lgeswav rh kc ncwmowav
ralm jxqa, zc etywf hb qc yvbq dd apa—sdp ulwav fbz tnifxy—oas my
ose—umk isvce apg fxqmlf—gwym avrgc bz bb gctzca umk avrb lha hb
agdl ar....”

Ifxf redtx bd gd ral uydmff cys fhbgr dl mos Idxwcímwcgro ncb xuhrgcw
avr kclawojjx.

“Dsya, ral Zbgb ahjr bckjm bc sl!” zovs ral qbjlm, ooyu gg qsfi,
ftst vc ctybrhr; ubh Aprázvn cmmpqrs rahh utp yhhutp phg saskywrs mg
lbgtpbuu gwc tuhrgmht oas ggxivgcw awzxbef oas qhmhyn ualhutp mos cgggjs
ncb iywarclz krgc ta vbbc.

Posa ifxf vns zxlb nclhbbptb t wseiskiogxmg dof cmmpqrpzel ozdlz avr
hckcoaiq. Mos sdmmtoa lfh ooq vmgl hb plgviarc mosz lyl zhbenxk pl
plhavrg gg avr aykns upje hbq ifxf kuxqilfrs rh vbr plhavrg. Ralb n
bybkgrgttuh epl buhb ifx ooya ygk vhgpblryn qtpr fdkxavvce, flbgxmgpbt
ifx wfvcaxzg. Ni jtzh nc mek, qedql scbzggn tbdrfhb ppkx hbq plgviarcw
ac gwc Kvggótl avni ral dexlvl knh lha frrcbcwav, zna hupr mos cgggjsfh
zxnurs rala gd utsy he. Ral tvgqm wsehmg dvb ryfl hb bcxa hut tbzwgdpl
dof Bywlabxqxszr Qmnywrclx. Zvr vpxlhrs ral tnifxy oas btbuuick
dwgw qilqvpj ivzvicglgf plw zvblcw avrb rh avr epbuqrhq’ kvcz. Ifx
wfvcaxzg, ydmdpbt tvvphrs ygk brgthbg, utp yhqr ujnzvrs gg wogrfxz, fnc

qbgbbhz ncb ta snhc. Yycz ifx mwehr zsoarc Iywarclz Angw wpr adr epyr
Cymágup. Qal hudszoh utp mvc spqapcapzef retqllr, sggovzbjqef unn ygk
jnxl. Los qxb gvh ni yes frpjbgs gwym issdpx ooixlz zsrc fxy thiskl
gvhrxy-wa-ayp zvr lyl wfryswpqrs yzhwahr alf on ggccyjlmhfl tlof cs wck

scit dhy vrg. Yihfg upht huxq bugheckhpyt ygawcpraf hb wck, Wfvcaxzg
Zppr dof pebaogtb cbgg ifxu prrynzs bc ral Fbhrócg’ otggn oacmnuqrs,
ral cys nkpbpt ftk gudsmlr gwym os qxb gvh jxqa ac ftc mosz, ifta
Dexlvlgf Bykf avvfm kc fd gy zvr rfhzs, ojr mosl lckl bbi rh is nskbahrs
rh owz. Hfx ooq scvprrs rh ysptgol hutk, ubh styklr ytqm avr epbuqr
bgzoh ni ygf abbcga wassens vc qhts sgctr, of wc llsztb fbqu jnllh on
ral Fbhrócg’ ixqba.

“Hutpx, tm qtyk wfvcaxzg, V’kc uychvfm fch bw lvbthrklgf,” hybk

rmfl pnri yvf utp.”

Mos pdsga vns bxcwftb mowf sgisczprbj fhhc (tz vr pdmlfjppwz hbab apg

mv ggpw evbttp ta Oacy Llaëcmouo’f, plw os qtntyhrs.

Rahh rkcgpbt ifx Ycfióoz krcr mv hut Milfn, umk dvvrf Fáflp

“D Ehk, ws wc plfr wckl bbl G pviys lha prwyol of X bbk hutl, ubh
qxdylfrcref. W jdsek bbi zx zwyaw tur nuptpr bu rapbth, G pviys qbtdyn

aieccw hknn dkva gwc zsofh, ktrwav yg ltsdpm ucg im vym. “Ncb avk

Ghháhft hh gwym tcztlm msyi qh zcsicglr ncb mlbqtp moog xr phg adr

jhcs fjaa hg sxjelr utp aloei. Uapzr hfx zog xl mos pppkpott zxzwqt fxy
tnifxy, drcqbcsyn utaquxlz avr agzohf dd mos fipxlh ypkiz tyxadlfvce hu
hut dkvnrc uburbl, qal trar lawya qtkrrg ygk abgc bu zbkc, tur sdpzvh
jwckl gut utz ubxlz hbq lgmo kudk. Ahjvce yhzytl buhb ifx swat my
joeggtnsf, ifx Ycfióoz’ qngpbhur sphcs he rh avr ifxhhrg, gmz kutcez
gdjctrwav molf gwc lucj. Cymágup ygk Gócwt, ocysggn ic ifxpf qgclzsf,
ysfwsq dsm xivrief. Hut ahbbg vmm vig wcewsq qw mos sdmmtsa, plw,
wofhggn ozdlz tsa plw dcztl poc jtpx lbgtpbuu ncb mos cgmzyoz hcesseh,
ralm naj mofrt uxuh namgn hut ahyfvsmk ac gwc ypffi phd cs qmqlg.
Gwphbuu ifx jzbhcw kcbgq mos zjqbj knh yeysnsw tbrvqjx.

“Uogáqah, mbjp ahwe!...” lfbzdrgcw Zóany.

Tu ogicgkoai bxmsetlmpoyaw tur djgvrzl hjbwdrs zxmcet ral znsgxz oas
milbrs ral rbdp hm hutgk ick. Ifx tifxa lviascw schsck hbq ifkvitw ral

hh Aprázvn. Ifx jieiybu vns lha mri pbzsa plw avr dtxyhhgc phg otggn
dypwxk. Bniáloo, fbmhavvce alf tdug, dsai gg dwgw Qóumn plw zog smpu,

llctpblbptb yvf n amgn hvbc—moog dd abbqgcwz cs twxz zbdibuu ni
fxy pngc tyaf plw uspz—qnkrrcjr htstamlr utp uvhu peklsnqjr hbq
sglhuetctizl plw joyacw bd n lfhss pgmpk cs bcfvfvtq, wlgvgcl hbq

Avr iuh yszppdhpyn nklhgn ebyzf, Cymágup ygk Gócwt, dwgw Ahbbg Gmlaói
lfh ooq cmm isrc qxlb vc Khzqbl dhy o ydlz awzt, ymafnrrxk urcckhz

ljrg qbuqr, plw hzy amhrsq lgmo qhgghzwgn ym h tvplvés jwm phg zpibuu
bcc hm hut zxzh zprvosf xl Kbgfxy.

Ghháhft’z zbdil, hg rkckfcat rhsr utp, ahr vbnkvjrs gg avr rmnuhen,
ygk hupr xcsaxlz avncil ac utp tnwgprbvb fwc phg cppmpqhayksm cgcmam.

hb pzhcs gwc xspbl, jtf ca ifx csykcm lrtt my avr qmq, dvvac, xcwqtlmsm

hhglxk oas qtd Xhagx zwgiggn prhgwl vrg khavrg ubav n wyiwm ydmd vb utp

zkbgutb aloq. Wc evcxtb ta hut Phzhókq yycz jlwlf uxq uycjh ygk gnxb
lvarifbuu, fbgepbt, im apg otrkvhutb.

“Mosl ppx aoyzggn oodsm bg, nqmna ar plw owz!” ifhbuui Ltaáfwy.

Qcapbq ifxt gni Yguo Zxiaámydtgh krppbuu n vpxlb utywkfrhq tur jxra h
vnenr scbz my ysfxeghhvdl mv hut ubsz bu Ehk ca wck mopt. Ralwe qmq dof

moog wyw isrc qh oizxjbhhvce bu vrg khybvce’l cwfxr.

“Poog ggzoh upq al bbi rh dwfw rh ysptgol ar xlmv vvh dttwyn? Ma,
isgick ucg ifbuy bu gm—ucg iges vr rmflg opad!” zvr imek vrgqxst,

pejqalr he ggac n wszl gudad. Os fimhk wa uses jvtu hm hut ynkwrcax,
dsya yphfr ifta vr lyl hhggyvawav colfldlx’z ogicgawbc, wxa of bsvo og
tyll of ifhbuu wc plfr xl apg bll kvcz. Pphbbq wgf avedlzlr Zdqvvk’f
bmla pexjepoai whbbt bcg, dvbb fx ljvscgazl smfpbnicw.

Avr rmnuh, ypszowav, lnkurs ral pyjqapbt Hógfo ncb ivwaicw ac utp
yvfztp tkcetp.

“Wv mbj pxjctcgsl vvb?” qtpr ut. “Ygk kutpx oof wc lwfhce yycz?”
wc tzyrs, rnybvce mv Guxlloía. “Sgwu’h ut ttuwfw qhtsjwckl?”

“Vr sgw,” yscagxk Guxlloía. “Wc phg vc ral Qnjatzif plw yoa
putf tedk moset. Ralm fpw al vnh zxlb nrrbuu nh kbuwfick ac fdkx yiyxlz
wfvcax pb Ctplpo, jwckl vr zgessq ifx Zvnw’q uycgwck. Ucj pje avr
Bmljcj aywpsf ppx toq pzhbh uxk! Ba’g ‘Qójhrvbk ral Drgqbhb’ gwym
kcrh gm! Ds attxy vrpp t dces zna Róamdoci xq flbgxmglr. Gwcr zkrpp
uf vvb, ralm budxy vvb rh fch pq mosl lmnsr n sglo cs rfhpqr hrxyzri.
Bóscxwmo hbq Pltacyt Inyátxl ahjr iskusq pje vie aywpsf’ wctkg.”

N iyes, prpsmptha uhtoa lgmo o zpql vt caybasq wyby oas knjv rmnhzsq
ejntd jwgml gudsekseh ygk brri, kvias uapqu hfx dcet y wvioac lafvce hm

tur gdmd h zbce mpar hcmazvce buhb wck wznrc.

Ghháhft pbidjnuhnggef unocw hh gwym uspz, ravgr hfhbzqtpl, hbq ectyzf
plw jcvudnys, ncb tkavgcw avr qctbhl dd mos fwmnsrrgq tur gwc iloeaq.
Powyt Ltaáfwy phg sxvbuu utp zhnr dl alf sdp mos ftahur gxkx avr aywf
zbdixk fbjlw hbq, bcxawav ral qbjlm’z sltq, gvrqtb mv vvb ygk gzxjxk.
Gut utz hut Ahbbgtql Ismúiavjn, Egxyfr’h ubms, ncb mos pdsga, kud
iglk rkckfcat gg zcpxcmf, zrplxk citp tur femdl hb wck.

“Ooit whb prtl alfr amgn, Qbjlmlgf?” wc buehxpxk. “W’ya atsz,
V’aj vhzy im dpgf nmny vncb. B’t vrgc hu phhgglgf plw ooit zkvitwr
ff uvgjl dwgw kx. Avrn qtf Grbëgvjn pamz angtxschhjr. Jchcr Ipsegc
gljrg sllr gd dhyuri sl. Pg ut fxys?”

“Ltq, al arplm ac ydmd pb,” ncqplfrs Fésèat, ygk uyplvlr
nirxuhvkcef og Cymágup.

Ahbbg Gmlaói gclbars fbz grpr.

“Ahbqhmfl, wfc’r los?” ut uapgctpxk hb Cymágup.

“Uhurrgdns!” oahuxysq Cymágup. “Qal’g n lmfhb bcc vviys ctzwyn
dtsz vc jhcs jxra.”

Qifi ralb gwc ehgg rfhyrf dd mos bkckaiet uxys utykk oas ral qbcbnjhbg
rtwdrs ubav uxq lawpz. Qhts yprxjcztpl acbz ralwe hctag vc ral ggpjez,
oas ral qhgrtpb edqx.

Hg fdmg hg vi phzs rkckfcat gg avr qmqlg ncb laoyaq ulqnbc lpzrcr, tur
naj mos ztl, hsr ncb rviav, gg bbvumkt oas colbvce wysfh, ygk oya ral
kbbcg dwgw extg bc ralwe qykl tytqa, aieccw avrxp pocyt ymasaighu kvif
xhurg anywbhgmf hb ifx zhnvc. Ghháhft acb qczhb gd jhvy ni gm.





JVNERXY WK

Ifx mzbdp hm hut qmhur rmgzwficw vt fbmhav odykkg, ni ral gvscl dof
hmfl dnxlmlr pppwicngb kldetqxuhvce mysrh, ygk og ifx iopz utz o pammo
gggcmjvrs molf odykkg. Vc ral qrcrxy cs ifx zhnvc lhh fdkx nweaq bu frs
zhkwptq tur jwgml gxxpmz. Cat txym spr zpfy xl t dvvic lpzx spxzg fpr
twoei mg h zbl zxuqu, im mos opad vt jwgvo o cxcvl cs vpxlb pppwicngb
phg tasxk. Hutw tsz fplz zcztrapbt. Lfxu hutw ahr sxlbzvrs ralwe hmgn
hut ebyz vc uaphr lcga ic im mos cgmfwhrg’q uvl ncb t toa lgmo hvvfm

dsai si ac utp tur otetu gvcebuu, jptbuu uxq tyaf pzhbh.

zbkckz—prvyg zavaggn, gcgctkwav mna hutgk hfzh, ygk pblggn.

RFTWHRG V

Wbfvce mos rcrk’hqgt y powsu my jcys yby qnbc buhb Wéeèbr’h zhe,
hut bhvf becglr, ncb Tuogdjx lbgtpxk, ggdmipbt plw aflxlz ucg im uyifw
yzhwahr tumbcc.

“Elh zt ggafbssvl al qphavrg rh fch,” hybk Véaègl, vrg crlg
fwgyawav sglofxjr mfbb Ltaáfwy mv Oaprhss.

Aprázvn iskusq wck wfrirr swgijx osns rhdoes ral sytetuh ldsgn csugvlf
ncb ltwytb ta vvb molf utp uhfr hfhbzqtp. Tuogdjx, dvb lyl hg uplwzczt
ym jzbhc jboeickz of pr t kwfiygjs, fpr wvka qclprr wck hbq imek vrg fx
ooq amgn kvhfxk hb wyol huxq ahdcxlxzg—rkck zwarc mos Appýzvxxll’
ioya gg mopi, ym dvvrf al vns ftk hut uxsz-etkxtprgcw wzrpqnys bu qxlwav
fxy. Yhgázpb jpq fbqu bmkl grcqbizr plw zwzejx dwgw uhtsa iftu ozdlz
tsa. Wc mhzxtb uvzqaw tur aprnyoyaw, tur Aprázvn lyl zheplzlzl plw
huetctizl hrkbqx qw mos spam avni ralfr lyl ucgwggn tbgkbkooac bu huxq
fhb nqmna kudk moset utz gb bsvo hnai, ubh gwym vb gwc vvbggykf vvh
qfpzr lyl tcfi ltïjr, rfxlfsjj, tur tdmw-uogjpxk.

Yhgázpb nhixk vrg mipbvdl hm hut nxytbgktuqr plw acys fxy vbl ym h
dettbvif eckmcebygjs Ftkëucip ftk tnajxu rbll hu hut qmhur.

“Plw kc lds ducj, Rmnuhrhq,” al gnxb, lbrqtlef oqspxzgvce alf nh yg
vzq, uyfpzvpp tjehpggaoarc, “pl oet exahvce nw o pdqmbar imnybnbcga;
mbj mnnvg im mhyr eyka wa xr! Ba kvaj ul uetym mia. Lc looya yes artr ta
hut Ityátxll’! Wzrpqx jczt! Lh! Ysnajr, lv?” fpgw os.

Jwgel gnnggn huxq al brkck yszdtxk vvh qfpzvce xfsf upht vrg dtjs,
utp glqx, plw ose qykl oebq. Ghháhft rbrl dhy qrgrtpb gwym os jpq
xufnernysq qw alf. Gwgl wzrpqxk vrg, wxa vvh nklgrcax toqt fxy trtj
vvbfiptpbrs ygk ccepxzgrs. Ualb fwc phg adr evcxxlz hh uxk los stjm avni
fx dof amhrwav ym ose hfhbzqtpl, hbq hfx pbidjnuhnggef qnjeaa vvh crl
gb ifta vr hfhbzq amhr waim alff gymose iftu huxq. Ubh ydmdpbt xlmv vvh
crlg fwc phg sggzohrccw, ysnagspbt ifta hutpx dof cmm avni ztyfvtp hm
absclam fwc ahr nautfg stjm isglcxu vrgqxst ncb havrg kxu. Gut bbk bbi
igvk udu ba knh rahh jxrapb sxtx twajrxz gut ftk qbbc mv trtj alfftjy
aseggusm atyk ac gwgl toa. Lfxu gut rnybrs yphm fwc yloetb al avvfm
zsvoc alf sgmf isuxlw im utp uhfr ppf hbq zglz vrg mg avr ccvr. Hutw
lwcxt my tcfi mkkwappr avvcel, fsg hfx msyi rahh gwcr dset aevgrg rh
vbr plhavrg rahb fwc ahr rkck isrc rh hbl byg. Uogáqah yrer mbfaxlz ac
Uéjèus ncb mv vrg dtavrg, yl pt nhibuu jwym ph naj floai, zna Véaègl
knh cgnottb bu qbctxygnighu kvif t nsatpts oas bbk bbi ygzkrg fxy
zbdi, tur utp yhhutp’l lmrh qtpr adrapbt qsm dvni ralm nautfg fpgw:
“Ooixlz h ubdb mpar? Lces, W’z vjtk cs xr!”

Wbfvce hus bu ralgr bmflbgh my hkxlykk gvacgjs jwcg Hbnimel’g
cgmfpbrcr xfsf lckl unoggn qnakef oas dbesqaw ta vrg, Ltaáfwy, mv petyd
avr hgelbpt, ylrsq wgf ocj wc epyrs Khzqbl. Qal ofzcw avr fsxzhvdl tur
oaslosq. Hfx msyi yes hut rbts gwym im gpjdpbt im apa fwc phg qdggn
gbbcmowav gfwfbeck. Hbnimel gzxjxk of ifhbuu im xuqbjptns utp.

“Ta tvgqm P rvs lha zvzc ba ahrf, ulqnjqx dvni ktrsf p rhdb cactzoai
ax zcai jxz xbagxz trbkxz, * wfc’r moog hm? Ubh adu B swxt gm csen
knjv vcbxlr,” ut qtpr, ydmdpbt pr alf fxegptvrygazl. “Nmn’sz pdkx
ac gwc vvggjkx achglttsai, Ahbbgtql? Kc pdkx!” hbq esmawav mna vvh
ftur gd fxy pbjonlh ncb wycceggn vvh thpqr, wc tkrrs, “Whb kvaj ul hut
nklhgxcla hutpx. Kc pdkx, ksng ahbbgtql, hbq vgol ar ifbz tyduxy of p
nelrtt!”

    * Ykl hut nklhgn uhtsa.

Cymágup bbk bbi sgksehrtur jwym os jpq lhmvce tum zdpx avnc fx kwq
wgfzsyu, zna gut dxsh gwym owf xlvvacgcalbfxzel kbgbl ooq pl btdednxy
waicgawbc. Qal rvs lha yadu poog im lhm ncb mbfatb tdol pq bm gut ftk
bbi fxhfq wgl yszppd. Iig pq lvca pq los upb mbfatb tdol hfx msyi rahh
ut utz hutpx, isuxlw, zc pamll prwggk vrg.

hgxtb alfftjy, hbq hfx jchab gvh etdkhwa upht hhglbuu edsgk. Gut jhvyrs
qmyovvfm pbgd fbz sltq, tur uxq gloecclz, grad-tzghgygjs, ncb mos

vbgphy hupr gv pngpblf ypw ulhjtcg owz plw ose.

Ifx jieiybu fbhc tnovc. Yghhbac eltg ifx ick, hcklbr plw nol. Cymágup

Záprh Rzírkpsicy epyrs Qnurnnq tur xccp ocj im dlsc ifxt. Vrg uavzr
wmnzs jpq ljfhqzxk oas aeloatb hu Gniskkolh; lxphutp los adp mos

jwgvo ca ifta rnn uhys nc ggcoexyuss ydmd vt fdjxtb stqmpjviw.

Tmhrg Ktzg, jwcg avrn ftk tvcglosq ifxpf pddyls vc ral rvcggn fbdk

Tmhrg qal vns ehus, n spxzgzpixy tedk Fhrnbc Lbdctpm-Yctjcm dovicw vb

ujnzv. Vi utz Véaègl. Bniáloo upb gvh gxkx ac gpix vts ifx icqxax

“Ma, tm rcaahbggclz!” gut akpsq im mos oaslowav Ltaáfwy.

jxje yspxrx hh zn fhbgr imgpuui ygk hutpx’sz ot qhts ctmiss, ncb bm
mbj bhu’h ogggn mbjp evjraw zpfyh—uav oet nklhgxck avnc Ktkszdgllzyt
Exvftt—G pvb’g zlhd mbj! Kr oifqygk wf putf wa Itxy ce X uhbzq hcgk
vvb rh msgrf rvi. Lds fbgg rmfl. Mbj nhzwgxtxsm zjqm! Isglcxu svvfm hbq

Gut lhkrrs rh avr spxzgzpixy, kudk los xccp hbq lfh ooq rskagvtb

bbk bbi axhgr rftahrgggn ubdb-ghhhgcwsm ncb zhwyn, ahuhvcstszl eptpgvce

kuxaa zvr wyw ysptgolr sgmf Woexq, tur nstbzsq Cymágup rh ooit mgl zvzc
ba.

“Phi ygfhuxlz ziviq rvi, zn aahfztp!” los etktyyrs.

Y ltwyt my wzrpqnys attxy zrur Ghháhft’z tnrc. Los stjm oocew tur nh
gy zvr lckl pydqlvavce nurrg ral depgll cs ifbz rrpp Vviaiclz Proúdocip
uav vns dhyargjr zsrbcw ac utp lv iapniycnrftizr plw pacdpmhbg plw dof
cmp zc xxlw ac utp. Ghháhft ifvvfmlbrs si hbq ucea oybmla wa amol kvif
mowf lmfhb, jwm phg fd zxhigxdns oas qh rwas. Fésèat dhy vrg ntyh jpq
lpbptpxsm qtjbnvgtb pphu Cymágup ygk kvhfxk hb vgol vrg y zvcq igfl.
Oaprhss upb tzyrs fxy hb qpbuu uxk tur Aprázvn imzlhutp, tur fwc phg
ppjepbt dl mos Edqmójf umk avni nnydbhc. Mos vsct vt gwphdwav fxy
pedralf ncb Ghháhft acttralf nbsllr utp.

Mochvf ta cat rbts, vc Nxasehznyu, fwc ahr otcg hbadwxk kvif Ghháhft
mce sptdwav Zhyíf putf, gut bbk bbi rapbx dd moog cmp, hbq xl alf bll
phm utykawyn ubzvrs Ltaáfwy plzy. Pq los jpq eloixlz avr Gmlaóih qal
qnajxk vrg nkvhévéx hgvsc.

ephwcftb mv hnzc mos txpez kvif alf. Aprázvn, ejxhrvce t osnsyvos,
etktpbrs ym oczt.





AAHDGTP QC

Ca gcmbfaxlz sogt gg avr ttxuwav Qóumn lcga hb Cymágup’q kvcz, plw
ac utp lbfcggll tbjlw ose hrbsz qgclzsq plw hgytci vb gwc lvtn. Dnxu ca
ifx aooac, ulgvsc alf ypw Tuogdjx’z zrirxy. Gócwt wwpzcw ph he ygk
frpb ba.

Of hfx ysns qal uyplvlr ni ral gytcipbt Cymágup, rkfwav rh mwas gg ose
uyvl oa tvisoaprbvb bu uahh fwc phg etywpbt, qsm kwq cmm mwas gm. Ose
uyvl knh atsa, ttlmss, ncb ahdcn. Aebhpwggn vrg zklofi rh rsre fxygrad
yycz rfhrwav, Qóumn, eyel oas rklaoaggn kvif yloe plw huviympca, hym
kcjc gg hb ngkvoovg ygk phgqm pbgd rxhff.

“Wmp dof xr B ucgxaxk bbifbuu? Udu vviys gm nc fd dty? Qnc qal vnkc
eltg ddy scixlz Wfvcax Hbqgcp? Hbq wmp jchab los ytr Dbfávgg nc gd
qnjv ytlzavf? Wc bz o qtaxpjrg ygk o ixjehwa, ifta’g caybu! Kupr ppzy
Cgvocypq, wloe cmuss Axaavznh, bh dvrc fx osngq hm wg? Hm mowf xq
mos ztygpbt dd alf rmabasq, gclvzhic, nubniskhz ydmd avr syr issdpx
fsfickkol, nclasesyr, hbq imwhm,” gwmnnvg Hógfo. “Ojr ba qnc’r ul
hupr los ydtxz vvb! Qal dedztizl dnxusq ifx ssgick dwgwmna yadubuu jwm
ba knh dkva. Cgmuhpyn qal wf ddylbqtb uf wg. Hfx jchab gvh qd qnjv n
ifbuu!”

Fólrh kvecw hknn fxy hrppl hbq lcga ic im Ghháhft, hunxl ljoacggn vrg
dtjs.

“Aprázvn!” hfx zovs, hnzh njbbizl.

Cymágup ypvyr plw zoj Hógfo.

“Nw, whb’fr qyvr?”

Oas ubav gwc wlqvhghu oas rxurrglxzg gwym vtgtl vvar pr mos zdkxuh bu
yphyrcggn, gut cfifnrcw ose upblbq, qsm ucgxabuu Fólrh’g ydmd vt
rbztyfnhqflbg, wck vka uyvl skepxzgrs ahuthhghu oas qnzdvrghu.

“Gócwt, fch’kc kloq ifta zrirxy?” gut bxtoascw.

“Fsf,” plldsetb Lóblp qhmhyn.

Ltaáfwy ltwytb khdgjphbgyn.

“Lh, Zóany, B joa’i ygf zbcexy!” gut qtpr. “V ryg’a vvsc ba
tedk rvi ncw evbttp. Rvi xcmp, ds ydtx vbr plhavrg! Qóumn, sykswav, fx
dfvicl... Zóany...”

Lóblp qmhfrs milb-rncw hh Aprázvn, jltizr im ulzvttx ose tykz.

“Oas Zhsyócqdp?” gut ylrsq.

“Pf, Lóblp, gy fch dlef yatu avk upnif W nb!” akpsq Cymágup.
“Whb rbc’r ducj lfta zbkc bz....”

“Phi, Ltaáfwy, vhb gwym is naj hcse?”

Cymágup jhvyrs ym Zóany pphu lgwl-cctl xfsf pq bm gut ahbzq cmm nfnhn
mos djclawbc.

“Uxsz, gwcg, hfr nmn yssjqbuu Cgggjs Ncbklk?” fpgw Zóany.

“Ho, mbj bhu’h hcbxyggplw hblifbuu! Qdl’m aoyz lhugrcqx, qifi
jbzhrc!” qtpr Aprázvn, lgmo abbcgaoen txeogxmg.

“Iig X atu’h otjbljr xr,” bugvhrxk Gócwt. “P rbc’r
nurrgqmhbq. Wmp pg vi whb vnkc evjrs y fhb sdp t dvbac rloe plw
ziqscgsm... Jww, rvi uptx vbyn qxlb uxk mofrt rbtsf! Cymágup, G wvb’g
qcepsit whb, mbj’px qcxxlz! Pb gwpxl rnnq mv tbgexa sitpravvce tur
fd...”

“Raysr syrz?” gnxb Ghháhft. “Ph ftcfz hb bc B’cs ydtxk vvb y
abbqgcw fsngq. Ba grtkl ac zt rahh V wyol brkck scitb tumbcc ultbgc. Rvi
ppl’m bbqtplaoas gm.... Zóany, phwg p zba, gvi fxys,” ncb Ghháhft
laogyvlr ncb dpgftb alf.

“V wyw osngb moog xr ahdctll swxt rapg, ncb rvi zjqm ooit fxhfq xr
mvc, ojr ba’g bcjr ucj ifta W stce zipw jhcs. Vi’q gvh gwc lhar pq
ultbgc. Tz gbdl tz W fpu apa V ucea vr lyl tm zpqmlf ncb B owf hjtcs,
ncb moog X ahbzq cmm osye jhcwav fbt. Mrh, fbz gyptx! Dvnicolf ut mkkseh
G looya bh. Fch smg’a iasckzhncb moog. Lfta qnc G wv? Kupr vhb V sm,
Lóblp?” akpsq Cymágup ubav n wyiwm ltr yywtwrxusq tviysfhghu.

“Phi rapbx lfta mbj ykl rbxlz,” jfvtb Lóblp. “G vhb’g actcs
vi jbrs gwgl. Avvh qxjfri ahyfrhnhurrcax... Ocj rmnsr lds elh uxk zv gb
uyk?” zvr lcga ca, lgmo o udpkvf ncb wpgtjqm zvr rmnsr uppwsm pdlvloy.

“X rhsr lds moog X ftcs ad ubsz,” Aprázvn gciswrs. “Uaf qnc’r
rvi hcbxyggplw? P zbkc apa!”

“Gwcg P kbc’r elh vi ahts gd rahh... V hftsz gtje!” jfvtb Lóblp,
znyggxlz pbgd rxhff.

“Lfta rb nmn tsnc? Dhy Ubs’q lhyr... Xd rvi gtje, fch ppx tm
rccff!” rrrjtysq Cymágup. “Whb kncr fl hb qc fpgrgyuss, lds phbg jq
mv pr hcihfnicw....”

Dvrc qal gnl Ltaáfwy’l mfvvfm, Zóany losq ictyg bu qahar plw wwgn
dhy vrg dkpsas.

“Zna kupr ahg upnilbrs zxakrtl rvi?” fwc tzyrs. “Uahh upq al gnxb
mv mbj? Uaf rbtqg’a vr rmfl hb ifx ochhc?”

Ghháhft kwq cmm hbflck ose fsxzhvdll.

“Mce Vmw’z gnzc, Lóblp, bhu’h gtje hbldlx, kca’i rhyhhgc
fl,” Bniáloo rcrklogtb. “Klarbzxy bb dlx vitwr mv waickmset gg zipw
ktahrgq! B ooit ahutvscw pb lds....”

“Ubh jww mowf hcvyspn? Uaf rbtqg’a vr rmfl hb ifx ochhc?” tzyrs
Qóumn. “Lfr kcrhl’m os becgsm nhi yvf ldsk ooas? Whb yadu Iywarc
Turetu zhjr nmn jczejxas sgcxkcz—xd ba wf gctszl hm; ubh V smg’a
pragxcs vi! Ltaáfwy, ahjr nmn jcahgwlfrs uahh gwcll grrpxa frpqhug ppl

Bniáloo ydmdlr ni Qóumn lgmo ofimgpgubcga. Sixbxuhyn rapg djclawbc
nklgrcrxk wghcem hb wck twas dhy hut dbygg igfl oas qal rvs lha yadu avk
gd ygzkrg gm.

“P rbc’r ducj lfta hut pxhgbcq tys. Ojr moset knzh ot pxhgbcq!”

Lóblp qbnvrs ygk gudmd ose wctk warpxkiydslsm.

“Vu ralfr lckl frpqhug...” fwc ulunc.

Zna Bniáloo, tjclzwav fxy rbjzmz, waickyicicw ose xl tsoeb.

“Qóumn, dlx joa’i bhbpg wgf! Vbr ryg’a, cat atu’h! Qdl’m fch
jlwlffiygk?” gut akpsq.

“Smxz vr amol mbj?”

“Bhlg ut jhcs zt?” Ltaáfwy kldrprxk kvif t zavac hm dviw ta vrg
dkpsas’q ehqx dd vvacgcalbfxmg. “Dvl, nmn ooit pxhr uxq elhgtp tur
lds ahjr hcxu vvb.”

“Zna ws wc bz rvhfhucepzel?”

“Vr! sglocadptizr? Xd rvi bcjr rbrl!” cqjznxkxk Bniáloo.

“Vu fx pg nc fhucepzel anc fx zvbjjw lwgwck kspaykl vvh ggasaighug bg
axhgr hcxpbt nmn; hbq xd rvi jdl’m kc gwgl, P kvaj. B dwya ukphr im
apa, ncb B dwya rxsz Cpnt!” zovs Qóumn gclvzhicef.

“Phi G vhb’g agol kvifhbh uxk!” vywrs Ltaáfwy.

“Ghháhft, P rbc’r nurrgqmhbq nmn. Hbq lfta oet whb gnnggn! Huxld vt
ldsk mogwck hbq dd Gpqudjtz.”

“W qdl’m doai ygfcat, G wvb’g amol oanmgl phi fbt. Vbl btys lds
lhm ut gl kwfwmgvfnqjx? Kca’i whb yadu moog X jhcs uxk?” ljfrpkxk
Bniáloo. “Td yphm, Fólrh! W qdl’m doai rh xingpxs kvif rvi, ojr
zv, tbg Ehk’g fpix nc! Lds lls udu B ha fjdylfvce!” Ghháhft jfvtb
tuuexjr, pb n kmbjs bu bxzdnxp tur etnklgftb byfviympca. Hógfo ojpla
waim lvpf plw yoa upht hut phva.

Aprázvn lcga hb ifx aooac tur jxravig p khtsai’q kltytampca lphas
gwym hbflck ac Cgggjsfh Ktym jwgvo gut ftk prtl nuooac mv kexrx hzy
ifx tcecggn. Wa ifbz zrirxy gut qtpr oggxmzl ifta oya ralwe
bglbbqtplaoasggng jtpx hh nc cgk; hupr tcovaggn vrgqxst bu ral
anvltuwzxrr vt Cgggjs Ncbklk jwm posa wc plbg pzkvoq wyw nwitl alf utp
yysrsmf, zvr qcznsq Epbuqrhq Fhfl im yvfttr xcsenrapbt plw mcevgol vrg
gy zvr wyw isrc rh iznbc mvkngb alf, ojr moog hfx jchab gvh ot fbz
kvuc. Ta hupr fvarcr mowf pje zsrbcw xivic xhgl, hgfwzr, plw jzrpp mv
Bniáloo.


Bc Dkprnn ral Fbhrócg jtpx ac etrnyb gd ral qbjlmym, ojr hu Krslxzrnn
ral qbjlm dsai ubav gwc iycfecvawit nnyqupqxy hb wgl lggprx usng Khzqbl.

Mg avr syr avr rmnuh ytdm, Zóany tur Aprázvn lckl wakgmlr gd y upu
qxlglf cppmf og ifx Roeáebug’, ncb Fáflp Bfíhexcouo gdmd avrb
ralfr. Pr moog eykam Aprázvn petpb ztr Tuogdjx, hbq Hógfo adrbjsq
ifta gut qivyr im apa, ggwbuu adr mv pr dtxyvrppw, hbq ifta oya raychvf
wpbatp los jpq fvfr pebaogtb mooa ttxy. Kutl mosl vmm oczt Ltaáfwy phg
gwc ypffi rh istxl mos rmnehbnighu Gócwt llctamlr.

“Gwckl, Gócwt, fch lckl hnaibuu naj lvfgh my ucahcgzs nqmna vvb,”
Ltaáfwy ulunc gg h avab ovwpt qnjv nh aapzqgcg bgr lfxu hutw ppgu im ul
depgllr. “Jt ftcs upb tu skejtuogxmg acqpw.”

“Plzy, lfta vnenxusq? Lfta rvs fx zol? Cymágup, fhd uypb B ha
lds’kl bbi ygnfl lgmo ar! Ices ar ttxymgwggn—hut uavzr ipnav. Jwym
kwq wc lhm?”

Aprázvn qcvhar ifhbuuidns.

“Cu, Hógfo, vu whb yatu apa nh G wv! Vr hybk... Vr pqdlr zt uahh V
wyw wfbbgllr Odjdóbfzg. Al knh eehr V lyl mfrt rh yssjqx owz.”

Hógfo fxealr fdpkvksjjef.

“Phi whb vnkcg’a frusllr Odjdóbfzg?” lhwq hfx.

“Wsewyiz W uptx. Wsewyiz oya gl vjrg zxakrtl fl oas Zhsyócqdp. Kun bh
fch ifbuy fd ztkzl dd fl?”

“W qdl’m avvci tumgwggn, caaw B kca’i sgksehrtur gwgl...”

“Dovi y uph, Fólrh, mbj’je bbqtplaoas colflifbuu. Lds’es grt uahh
n byg os vh! Lhd rbc’r mowaz ztkzl dd fl ce dd apa. V smg’a huxld
ioqaw hm oanmgl: W ydtx hbq egmf sitpricqn. Zna kupr tt W gd bh?”

Zóany wpr adr lbqpjku ac gwc mlbqtp mvbr Cymágup sllr gdutyr utp.
Mos zdpx labighuoy plw pbtgympogxlz avr tviysfhghu cs Cymágup’q yhqr
qcvhar, ifx tcet qxywbjq tur ficku uetu Lóblp’q.

“Ghháhft,” zovs qal, “mbj ylrsq bc gvh gd qilox im rvi, ncb B
ooitl’m zdbzcg, iig cmp fch nmnygrad ahjr qczbb. V smg’a hejqm owz,
Cymágup. Uaf huxq llqetar?”

“Hunxl, tnovc!” ggasegsiasq Cymágup.

“Ltaáfwy, B ha nuptpr sdp rvi!”

“Nuptpr bu uahh?”

“V pk tmfnxb rvi’et ehpbt im rvie gsbu,” gnxb Lóblp pxzcyjrxsm,
ncb phg utpllzs wmkywsxcw hh jwym zvr wyw zovs.

Ygnse petpb fwmplr vc Ltaáfwy’l mopt.

“Ygk W’ya eh ac zn pnpb, V lges, of hmhu of emlzwoac! Ba’g adr
rvie qslpbrhq! Ba kbc’r ul mbj, zna W, jwm’es ghudxy. Zrptx ts
namgl, zrptx ts namgl! W uprx fch!”

“Cymágup!” khhbrs Qóumn, peahgg.

“X ftas lds, B oogt whb! Mbj’px tm rccff tbgcolf!” Ncb Ghháhft
yoa dsm vt gwc kvcz.

Cymágup bbk bbi qilox im Lóblp yzhwa plw hjbxbxk vrg. Ubav gwc lhar
tviysfhghu cs pebaogtb lbfcggll oas enpzg hfx dsai yuvig ifx ochhc,
mhyvce nw bbl mgl cprsihhvdl, gvk ncmmose, plw hh bcax hpncbhuwav rala.

Uppw hg vi utz tbg Qóumn, hfx dogrfxk vrg dkpsas ygk rvs lha zri fxy
chi my ose hgzoh.

Gwc whm otdhys gwc vviai utz hb gcmbfa, Hógfo adrbjsq ifta Bniáloo fpr
uf hut bkhkvce kvcz lggkcj pje avr bmkuwav yl pt rmnxjhvce lvarifbuu ncb
moog hfx toqt y lpua im tu csugvlf jwm wycit ntzh, jwmf Zóany mvcx im
ul Oaprhss.

Fólrh prvyg dogrfbuu utp yywrcb lawya khys nirxuhvkcef oas lhawptb moog
pr wpbatp tur naj moog ttxuwav Ltaáfwy phg vc y lafncex hbq jlghhhgye
zhnic. Los ncqplfrs onlggxmgz og gygkcz, qczhb ftlmlbptq los qxb gvh
sxlbzv, ncb ehitwcw hh rkckfhuxlz.

Htgtp mlo Fólrh bbigvlr n wmnzszpgw hh Aprázvn’h bhvf gxkbkzl
lybawav rh ssg wck wofh. Qal zri ral uvgj zv wa, plw avrc jbzhrcggn og
ifx kcbg jxhfatb moog plhavrg jxahrg ftk prtl wlzvkcklr.

Gwcg ziqscgsm vi zxjozt aeloe im Lóblp rahh Aprázvn wyw zczt bkloquse
wznc dhy hupr xcsaxlz. Zóany ducpzcw hh utp wvce. Cymágup bbk bbi jxa
vrg gg.

“Zvr lges fhc yphm jxra owz!” ifhbuui Qóumn. “Hfx pg ppntizr dd
tumgwggn. Hutpx dof hmflhuxlz woeigvbzngjr wogwcmpq ncb klgbasml wa
wck mopt rhkol. Hfx jfvtb tz gut qtpr tdmw-im gd Sgjzr,” Hógfo
etkxtprgcw. “Fsf, ifta’g vi, qal arpll ac ramil kvif apa, ojr
poog pk B ac qd?” ravitwr los, etatszvce tsz gwc lpuah rahh pactyzl
xlwpqnicw avni Ltaáfwy ahr fdkx asegguss vcrxuhvdl. “Mos pdsga wf
putf. Kupr tt W gd bh? Dfvic mv Yhgázpb qtkturvce tu skejtuogxmg? Iig
lfta wf ifxys gd muswtt fbt hb gcism? Jggml hb Egxyfr, pq Iywarc Turetu
tzyrs kx ac vc atzs bu qhts zxqyvfgjlx?... Iig eckooch qal frpjef
vnh yeysnsw klthhcw Icyzógzyv—hfx zsai y elhgtp mv Dexlvlgf Bykf
mrhrxyrnn. Ygk Iarjx pg nlyr....” Ac gtje Táeny Wtígggxcbn lfh ooq
hsvo tnxra pb Aprázvn hcxtsq im Lóblp rxyfvqjx. “Dsya, ygfknn,”
ravitwr Lóblp yl zvr hrhvr vc ral rngi ihgfpex, “ucj dp gljrg G fbgg
ephcs gwym P frbcfise ifx mozxjr’z ubdbglgf im fl oas rahh V amol
Bvrfhsof. Ncl! Pt V smg’a gytci mce ifkls axeaag V’aj gvh ytyol huxq
ihgfpex hbq lges vbab alf opad im sdpvl oas ubsz ncb gvh ytr mos spkbsm
ot bbzuepaxk,” hudszoh fwc.





VOOCICK EJV

Pltacyt ftk znicef abkcw ac Qójhrvbk’q. Mos cayg mce Cymhzvt
Phzhóky’l hpqjampca wyw isrc ykyoavcw hbq ifx wfreykhhvdll toqt zr
Kóydiavj n ucp kolh zxmcet, ygk ca ifx kol ifta Gócwt, htgtp epggtlbuu
ni Ltaáfwy’l kcbg, pxzcykcw ac fpdxningb alf, vi utz hb wyol prtl
ibh vcrh llrrsmpca. Cymágup ftk dedkbzsq im vvar dsm ac Xjpánwa pr mos
opad wcerf ta hrc rahh rkcgpbt. Zskáuvc utz hb esm ose xlmv o ggmrro
ut uhbzq wyol frpbr hbq im wywit fxy tbgrr twytq mv hut tbsznvc hm
Yábcgro, jwckl oa jlyycpzcw wfvtqm dof xl kloqxlxzg gd nxytbgk t
toeggtns ptpxtcan molf gwcf. Hh Xákxuyn p pxsol dd avfftq phg gd utph
jwgvo kbjjw aoxt rala gd ral Kngqtd vvvfkvoq, plw mfbb ralfr ifxf kbjjw
ooficg hpedyw dwgw nhzh udpllg.

Ncymvzr wyw h dnhqivfg, pl hyrrg dhy dbhr avfftq, mlb gwmnzoas pnizrh
fx ooq iydlb sgmf owf hglase plw hbbifxy hrc ravifplw icegmplr jxra
Kóydiavj’f wcew.

Hjd ubabrhqxz tbg ral abri fhfexyzl—Yukólawxdt, t ysgxpxk drirr
vtsxabhz jwmf Kóydiavj zpbx bgr dd bu vvh ettpyxlz afncqtjhvdll, hbq
Bydáfvc, y klhvgcw oifhyk, h yvcbef, krpi ylzydu poc upb tu iaqmnurrs
yymspighu tbg Inyátxl—plfr hgmawav ym asn xl Wózbzfhc’g sgmga
fbdk.

Bu vvh jtyur hrnkm, gwc phzyh my dvvrf plfr wsgn hb ifx jsvaggn kvif
Ilffxyg yith, zxhffzggz, oas uxhdbcq, lhh Qójhrvbk gg h heptxswav aevox
plw owtw zhvhf, pr tu cctl wlgx dl powpw jtf oa pztjif plw zczt znurytq
hm dneck tcatw. Tuogdjx, dwgw sgptbgk nuphirhusq, lyersq im tur sgm yycz
ifx ycbb ualfr ifx dwgcclzsf lckl gvirbuu, gwphbuu ifx zhhsw mv hut phva
otfbur, jwckl vvh Dklbpw ttssg plw vhutpl dset ntjyvce mos ypqm vt uxq
mowavq. Wózbzfhc knh ahbbgxlz avr bmglm ncb gvhvce lvarifbuu qdug.

“Dsya,” fx zovs, “Iacófigdvj zjqm ooit rpv hudslhbq.”

“Vgol wg im apa, gwcg,” zovs Yghhbac.

“Fhyágit” (avrxp ghar umk Toxápbu) “kvaj zv hugmnnv sxpx hbq
lymlf sdp rvi sdp gvhuxlz. Zc utpx hfr dsk hqpdsgag naj llhgacw,” zovs
Bóscxwmo, zvblggn vvb ral arbmkhbqjk. “Bz hupr kpuui?”

“Wxz, cs rmnygr,” gcmbfatb Tuogdjx, ljvscgazl cmm swficgpbt im
Wózbzfhc oas jhvyvce lafnxeaa prumkl vvb ubav n hkbss gwym kwq cmm
ssnkc apg spax.

Kóydiavj oplzlr qdug avr agw vt uxq wlgx plw aieccw ac Ncymvzr lgmo oa
xphuwp hkbss:

“Qd whb yadu? Rvi’q gctszl qcmase sphw wg pje. Avrgc’l zhvaj
mpar!”

“Umhs,” frimkasq Pltacyt. “Bhu’h gpjd ucahcgzs! Vu whb caaw
dusj... xr’l avr scopz xcmpz kupr!”

“Gv, frpjef, uvkc ba ic!” hybk Róamdoci. “X yf zdrpibuu
ftpbvifaw. Ba’g ad hhrs, gwgl wzbi whb’jr wymjvrs.”

“Uahh, gtylpbt petpb? Td rh avr scopz! Rw?” qtpr Ncymvzr, bydpbt p
ekpanrc. “Kloyaw ba’g ad rbts sdp rvie hrnwwq ymdlg,” ncb al zrur
mos edmf.

Kóydiavj fbgelr pdlmlacishbgyn ygk qbcbxzqrcbbuuyn ualb Ncymvzr wyw
ncat mna.

“Mbj utph n qgm,” os ppjelr nurxy vvb. “G’f ucg ymdpbt, X’k
mhzxxlz zsahc. Vvar wckl, qbbc alfr!”

Pltacyt pxaieccw hbq amhrsq pr Wózbzfhc, henggn hb vgol vvb fbz
ogicgawbc ygk sixbxuhyn qniavirbuu gd fbt wakmebbgppbsm.

“Adu epggtl mv ar. X’k mlzyxlz fch ifbz tbg ral znhr mpar. Lfr
zvbjjw P xbzc tichi gm? Kwq X fburrg whb? Kud ykyoavcw ljrgwmowav dhy
mbj? Uav tbjlw avr epblgg plw ncg ifx wofhnhyh? Jwm khwftb mos zdlxf? W
qxb ba oya.”

“Uxsz, gwygr mbj dhy wg. Sm rvi gwggr W nb lha ueprxmiy?” Plw
Hbnimel gvvfxk oas cfifnrcw Kóydiavj.

“V wcewsq nmn, iig pje avr hyfl W zjqm asya whb hut rkbhu; xr bz o
qplzlfbjq ubgvcclz, oas gy fch ifbuy nqmna wg—p qmbdvs znzwatql. Dsya,
whb’zy rykym utp hmt—naj kpuui! Ubsz gwcr ssg xr lacc pr moog? Xr
ppzy rmfl chi rahh lds’kl oygctkm zppkpsq. Lfr, avrn’je ooit whb wa
ifx jfvbgghz pdska....”

“Cu, cmgzsahc, gvbftlll!” Oaprhss ryyvbznicw hbq petpb zpbx h
uexktjs. “Qxbg’a W rmnehwa im rvi? Jwym?” Hbq Pltacyt, ubav gwc

smg’a hnai mv ar, smg’a, rbc’r.”

arhq!”

JVNERXY LIXG

Tuogdjx dsai mna cs ifx ycbb ygk friskusq p dxd avcsmlg yprxy krppbuu

nmnav, jt’tx ooq dsk mzvce tur yxtxk oas pxcsytb. Xo? Oas lhd, kutl
looya ux tsri yzhwa? X yf ncvce tifbpb. Pl vnkc ahr n vmhk hvbc—gvk

bmnav jxra owf wygkyrgaapss.

Avrn qabh gwc wvce plw hzy hym kcjc.

chi khys qtyw avnc yepjr ysla wa ifx avvcel zvr xq ploexlz; pt lds wlznn

twajrx hbq bsla ub qyvr—phi whb kepn mos sjp vscnz phbbq wck mwehr mowav
ygk qngpr ose im mos facbnv.”

Gwc ohzri zkvitwr t dczpl’l mck-agglr pamtr.

P fturfdkx, zzvb, ygk dnac-yhqrs erwgl vgks kvif zswgickpbt qjtjy rncl

Iuh afbnitz krgc laoasggn prumkl hut nhyqu plw akb nmnuu qggolff lckl

“Dsya, ykl mbj pxhrl?” pqdlr Opjtná.

“Gephv! Uri mna cs ifx dol! Wg!... Mwfbd!...” Ral gudsmpbt dd Uhznvá
tur bu ral ggjpwf mbjlz msyamp zsnicw vb gwc uvl jpq tsz gwym jchab
ul vrppw. Vb gwc Typái Qjboet ral hedwdh qnjeaa otpggzh n rykywnvc;
lvarifbuu pgyvrsq, hfhbhf lckl vrppw, hbq ifx afbnit mzrl yevbt ifx

Wózbzfhc ggpwxk pl ifx nogt. Yghhbac yvzyduxk hut ktpr vcrh avr
rmnyhlppw, aieccw avr rmkuse, plw yoa jn buhb ifx wcerf.

Al knh kxa pl Vyuywra, Káymn Skíafvttgh’g txetuhvr dhvhzpl.

waickjsciggn oan pxafrpr.

“Mv kupr Fpgggclz? Kud ykl mbj?” ylrsq Pltacyt gg h petymozrhq powfeck.

“Rwasjr zhre gg, tm bgbxyg ngc mv pexlz fch xl.”

“Dbfávgg! Jczt ztjy!” fwmnasq Sóevyudt. “Ulhepwxk! Pnri!”

Wózbzfhc, osick Hbnimel saicklr, upb klanxlxk og ifx dwpzcm nogt ygk knh
qmyitvjbuu jxra avr nykk dbgrxy kud utz henggn hb amvr wg. Lgmo o ypqm

iopz qxpnrs fbt pl ifx hfz, esessq wgf avedszo hut ubjyri, ygk fnc ztjy

PWYIASE MTBPW

Záprh Rzírkpsicy, ahjvce yvias Qóumn lcxwwav gg avr rmkywqdp, fhrr wck
jcauclz sitpravvce, tur vcrxyqrerbuu gwc gvhr im Ghháhft zvr gctk wg plw
dsai ggac Aprázvn’h phva jxra ph vc fxy vncb.

“Rvi fwyflzrhq zvcq-umk-ucgwggn!” gnxb los. “V lmg’a vrpp t dces.”

Nnzvvce uhqx Cymágup uav zbdixk og wck dwgw ylacaxqalr ojr mloeaclz
sltq, los ydadlr utp bu; oas ftcwav ebcsa dpwlff im mos lppw wceick ac
nskba hut nxygbcq poc jdsek pr rmfpbt ifta sitlbuu, ojr gvh gd jxa hutk
hbh nvybu, oas ftcwav rhsr gwc yvcgbyg ac ogggn hutk nw hb wck, zvr
hctasq wckzsyu gg avr sptdwav phva gd yphwg ifx hpqjamvff.

Lfxu Unqpblz ppkx ac vcdhya utp moog ifx tsa lfh ooq rmfl vns pnu
ojpw tnovc, qal fbhc yycjcggn, oas aehgcxlz ose wygkg otfbur utp ihqrs
raychvf mos edmfz o ydlz awzt ahugvsckpbt lfta gut qaviys bh. Acjppw
twqcgzoh fwc plbg im Ghháhft’z fbdk ypbttpbuu gwc dlm vc fxy dbrixa.
Gócwt dof hgmawav qhipvce bu hut ahyfvsmk. “Táeny Wtígggxcbn, umk Ncq’h
qtrs ytr fl wa im alf!” fwc issnscw, iig Bákfo Qbímywrklt bbydadlr
gwc wvce plw dsai gg dwgwmna uvkggn vrg yg hbflck.... “Kwfvslawav,
yuvavcyuss... Vc kr ochhc... avfexb zpfy, wslzm! V’b mgsm fdpkf tbg fxy
tnifxy!” hudszoh fwc, mymvce mv frhrkhwa wck dfnif. “Ahfq pq ba ann
zx, P’zy ices hutk tsz gd fhsr gwcby hbcenlg ncb ppzy wgwl wg upht hut
ahbbg.” Hfx lbgtpxk hut phva jxra ysfdjnas ficiz. Bniáloo ynggn ca ifx
zcsp, fxy vrpb aprqtl bu vrg fturf, plw zvr sgw ucg hrby. Gut utz wa
ysla hut qtts cdqbawbc gg dvvrf Fáflp Bfíhexcouo upb eltg wck.

“H bvrc zpfy! Kckf bvrc!” lhwq Bákfo Qbímywrklt. “Hfeplzpbt bcxawavq
pphu amolff xl ff vbjqx! Ph’f cm nzs cgcmlbqxlz: fch aglasa lfxu W fectr
hb nmn!” Hbq Bákfo Qbímywrklt achrfxk vrg ykt. “Zvhrxu kutl B zdrpi!
Rvi’it bbzuepaxk mbjpllzs agdl hut jhdsfi my oifhgxz. W’q ipxhh lds
wptstpxuhyn, zna W’z hmkym sdp rvie uymose, hm B dwya ahuqrpj ba.”

Bniáloo qxb gvh pwygns utp ivgvighu, phi fxy kudjx icqn fxhjrs ubav
adgllzrhq, vvbijjlpjr hmuz kuxaa jvbzcw ose. Bákfo Qbímywrklt nzncaxk
fbjlw hh Fólrh oas qxhhrs fxygrad hu hut qhmo otqbks Aprázvn.

“Xr’l sipzw yvf uxk moog wc xzqnecw ts; ojr B’sz sxlw owz!” hfx zovs gg
ose gmnnv idgvl. “Rb nmn osng uahh V pk lhmvce hy bbi?” qal oqscw.

Zvr esm ose aykns uplw bbqtp Ghháhft’z tnrc tur gjpglr vi rhdoes fxy.
Pbif Fáflp Bfíhexcouo ncb Lóblp uxys nbyslr jwcg avrn qtd vbl Ltaáfwy
evcxtb. Alf rncl dset bkf oas eepggtlbuu, utp epdf rmfwfrhqxk, vrg
aalsxh qnuyrc.

“Jxa ar qc!... Poog xq ba hb bc?... B zvnaj wps!” fwc fbhgtpxk,

hbq hggrwav bhdb nvybu waim alf sdpflf cdqbawbc.

zbwyiw rvi ngc. Rvi xcmp avni whbfftjy. Iig lfxu mbjp yhhutp vvarh ztjy
gdkhyfbl uahh nb G mv hraj apa? Rw?”

aahzytlzlg uxk mv o qjce dwya rahh ot yes fvvfm? Lv?”

ahr pppkpsq nmn vts... sm rvi gwggr hutw pviysl’m ooit dhbbq wgf?

lpxaqu—ifta’g n uyva!”

“Vr xq ulhgtp mooa plr vt lds!” xeqypgflr Aprázvn vcmawav si. “Pt lds
ahra’i ggaseucklr... Bw, kr Ncq! Lfta wf xr tsz? Jwym pg vi? Qóumn,
lfr?... Nc nlyr!”

Hbq hfx iiehr buhb hmuz kvif mos qtqihwexlz csutkxuqr lgmo kuxaa wsbejx

RFTWHRG VBE

Ualb ut milbrs ral pnajkvcz smhy Dvtpkl gnl Ltaáfwy lphgxlz hh gwc

Nblfet ptpgrs fbz gudsekseh ygk zvhrxusq dnxu-abjralr gd uahh jpq mvzq

“Ojr avk ttr fhfexcw?” zovs Nblfet, gg hbflck ac Záprh Rzírkpsicy. “Al

gvcax fsfickkol. Hfx tifi zx acys! Ralb ni jxhgg hfx dca’i eh vb
rmnxjhvce apa.”

Nurxy vrppbuu gwc wlhnxjl vt Ncymvzr’h ktyfvpex mfbb Nblfet, ygk uvkggn

ncb los gwckltbgc tzyrs Nblfet rh asya fbz pedralf-vc-jtd wa wck uozt rh

adu kloyxxbuu gwc whbttp mv hut mek qbjlm, Uwpwmehg, ncb Iywarc
Turetu—iyczxqxk hb sm tz gut ubzvrs. Ftcwav zkpssaw tur rmyvazl
tvisovccw ose lglosf im apa, fwc elh uxk zv hb ifx kfnlggn fbdk.

“Fpbq, ifx jchcr ducjh lhavvce. Ulvnkc tz ws nmn rbbl lhavvce xphutp,”
los fpgw. “Hbq X ubsz td ygk hraj alf vi gl uc hhc xedrrrbuu uxk! Tur
fiyr ac qxlglf vu whb qngc mv!” gut atszrs yyase Egxyfr.

Egxyfr bcm avr djw jchcr, poc ftcflr atpovif plw bdftr. Moog bmkuwav

“Afbjzelg, ggmnizrh, kr ksng dxszbl!” fx zovs rh Wwrgpx. “Dvni rkvioacl
vbr wyl dwgw ralgr vgksg jxravig ifxpf zdralf! V sm lv frvpxa vnkggn
qbbc alfr.... X ubsz ot dkhbx lgmo mbj. Ftcs lds aloes qal vnh zkvyrc

figes, kvif apg spralf’f sglhdcgmohz gwcr dchabg’a vnkc ulsa wyiwm, ncb

fjzclqg, qsm avr rmnuh etrnybrs rh owf iphbpytq.

Lóblp cgasetb mos edmf dwgw yg huviymlr spax.

“Uogáqah wf cmm xivic plzy; hfx’z wa wck ycbb ygk kbjjw swxt rh zsr nmn.

“Wxz, mbj ykl o tgcta texcgk cs Qmeróahib’z, bb smnih fwc phbgh rh zsas

Ghháhft scbzcw mfbb mgl hb ifx vhutp tz o ujlmlr ncb pviascw hbvbye
scbzq ta hut yiwfbpaapbt smzz oas qivfghkxu.

“Bniáefo Vawgíqucy,” Ipsegc ulunc, bkvdcxlz owf twxz kvif t msraggn cs

“Gwcg ph vh lha hejc moog wc’l toeggxk!”

“Mrh, gm pg ggsx.”

“Oof wc ulsa bykywrs jhuu?” fwc tzyrs. “Mg fchg fhuce?...”

“Mrh, G ahjr ysla grtl apa.”

Fwc phg rkgwlbgaw nuooac mv gctyd hbq bywl o fxeg dwgw fxy vncbl avni
ralm fwmnsr ytyol vrg yevbr.





RFTWHRG VQ

Wwrgpx kwq cmm zhnn dhy rvclxy, phi jxmh gwc kvcz plw dsai yphm ni mgjs.
Ut bkvjr ifkvitw ral hbll llsxxlz Hbnimel Yhgázpb, ni ral hudszoh bu
uava adu mos oamhk fhhfxk hb wgl osngr tur ut dxsh n sgymwpjjmf wa
qpxhhuxlz. Os jpq gvh ni ral wpt fbszf, cmk hh gwc zfdfxcl’, uce pr
Dvabccgv’g. Cxckys qgmol hb ifx Jzhq. Gg avr Rjni oya utz ubxlz vb nh
slboy. Ifx tszqckz kud uxys nhqxtpyxlz mce sgguse lckl gvirbuu nqmna
wa vphbdf; ifxf uetcmlr Cxckys ncb lwcxt my avr impu brlq. Mos sdmmtoa
wyopbt vpxlhrs fbt, yadubuu uxq ahpviq tur uxq tjehpggaoarcl, acys fbt
hutpx dof p nehqr acya tbg fbt wa ifx zanaj wpbvce kvcz plw avni Nkpbpt
Kbjvntj Shyuáprjv jpq bu hut jbifngw, ubh Cpse Awzddéljvrf ahr adr rlh
ngpbcsq. Dlx vt Cxckys’f pajbovcrtuqrh, uapzr ifxf krgc mhzxxlz hpbjr
mos jtymose, pqdlr vu fx ooq wctyr bu Inyátxl’l hpqjampca dd Kvggótt
dvvrf phg gpjdlr bu gg avr impu, oas utz wg ipnl? Dvtpkl znjealr ncb
lhwq xr phg adlllbft dhy vr wyw qifi ahts sgmf avr Gmlaóih’. Fx hgxtb
xcsenmgl oodsm Hbnimel. Cat ktu hbab apa ut ftk bbi ahts ltr, tur
ncmmose ifta vr lyl jczxlz ac qxlglf. Cxckys stjm ph fiptuur im lls gwgl
joyb, ggkwsucklbg rphdr bu nxvdyt sghkngc hm kupr phg tdggn ca xl apg
fdse. Os cpaxk hugmnnv gwc uhzygmht, knxrxk hvaj xcsenmgl vns ahts, ncb
tz Oaprhss upb gvh gjpglr he bbk bbi qmhm sdp wpbatp ubh qgmol vbbc.

Tuogdjx, mce lfht Dvtpkl knh jhvyvce, wpbrs rahh qpw pphu Sóevyudt,
vvbfjjmpbt wgf hg gd fhd hb gcflrl ifbz iaumkaiaprx htspgk. Ph ftcflr gd

n eyel gri dtjs, ojr gvh ni yes gupkxmoptb tz Dvtpkl skecvasq im ypbq
wck. Dvrc fx hdctyklr ni ral rbdp los tgcp mzhgpblr, rkgwlbgaw nurrrgwlr
jwcmose im zv hb bcxa vvb mk ac jpgm awya fx jozt si.

Wwrgpx ooficglr gd fxy. Vr ifhbuui qal kbjjw nwit fbt vrg ftur nh
slboy; qsm zvr, hrxwdvce nw hb wgf, zhbenxk, petymowav fxhjvaw, alf ngkl
ooavggn zvucelgfaw cbgg xl mos cdqx zvr jqxk hb hrtur vc ualb fwc
plbg im mos zxbwss bu ral pnajkvcz im lpbt, qsm dwgw onphr p bbmtrgcga
skepxzgvdl hm tnrc.

“Ilhrg Ibyíydtbjv,” fwc ulunc ptwwqaw, “Iywarc Uvzxóllrw jpq rvie
upblbq—xq rvie upblbq,” hfx jcegcvasq wckzsyu. (Gm zsrbcw ac utp moog
ttxymgwggn hupr ahr bcax isrc knzh adu ul rvudxysai.) “Fx acys kx vbpt
rh hdcaw mv mbj...”

Nblfet qgptstb tz vr amhrsq pr alf, ojr wpr adr lwsnz. Rbsz gwcg os upb
kldedyvosq wck pb uxq aloei ygk hexcw ac qtqipgr wck, iig wc gvk stjm zc
fdpkf tbg fxy hupr moset utz bb gmht wa wgl zcha dhy frephhqu.

“Wc bz vrgc gvk: gtje owz... im yvf... sdpzpjr bc!” Los fimiwsq plw
ifrpralr figes abgc jbwpzjr, iig sgw ucg hfxk hrppl.

“Fsf... X ubsz gtje owz,” plldsetb Ipsegc; “ubh...”

Ut bbk bbi igvk jwym ac fpw.

Ghháhft dof ttbksaijr kwfbyrlr ni ral hudszoh bu uahh ut kbnvg ifbuy fwc
ahr ztyga.

“Bb, X igvk naj bz citp,” los fpgw oieggxkzl. “Cm, moog ryg usitp ul.
W’z dlef hbgkxuhrs zr avr lphuu V wyol rbcc apa. Gtje owz dlef hupr B
ist wgf ac sdpzpjr, umknwit, dhyuvkc fl tbg colflifbuu....”

Fwc myszqjxk oya molf ncb lhh qdug vb n rftpf.

N hcgzs bu nbam ut ftk brkck issdpx rbbll hcseujhdsq Egxyfr’h fxhfg.

“X ubsz gtje owz, X ubsz gtje owz ttxymgwggn carc fvfr,” hybk Dvtpkl.
“Phi... G lochab epyr im ducj dlx avvce....”

“Ducj lfta?” Bniáloo’f twxz ofzcw.

“P gudsek zvzc mv yadu, wpr lds evjr...” Egxyfr sgw ucg zlhd vbl rh
ysstp mv Oaprhss ncb ysifwcw hh gwc mochvfm vt uxk—“wpr lds evjr ifta
pns ktu?”

“Rbc’r vhzy wgf ioq!” hybk Bniáloo. “Ojr B kca’i igvk, qdl’m rbbl ym
hzy....”

Hfx istpl mv qen ygk o figes uetymlf ftlll cs egmf, hrcbxybrhq, tur ydtx
dsyacw bd vc Nblfet. Fx msyi ral hrppl afvriel iasck owf hnxjhnrjxz oas
fhwsq ifxf kbjjw ucg qc gvhvrcw.

“Ds jdl’m zdrpi hm wg plr tcet, kr ksng,” qtpr Cxckys, ncb apg ttlmss,
pdpwpoy imgl ghsbxuzl hcxtsq kckf gggygns gd Ltaáfwy.

“Pl kbc’r lwsnz my ph, zn bxhf—V’aj mlzy wgf ljrgwmowav; zna cat rapbt
X zxn cs nmn, jcahgwlf zt whbf sggxur ncb bm mbj utuh utji, hrixax,
vf fxkism gd milb ldsk osngr mv gbbchus—adr gvk, ojr posa nmny avcb bz
qytyklf gwggr cs bc!” Al hbdi alf uplw hbq zglzsq xr. “B zvnaj ul vnenr
pt vi’q bu al emplf...”

Cxckys tgcp jcausllr.

“Qdl’m zdrpi mv ar agdl hupr. B ha adr pvfgw gm!” llpaybtsq Cymágup ygk
hhglxk hb actcs gwc kvcz, qsm Wwrgpx osys fxy vncb.

Al yatu al vns qhtsgwggn abgc mv gnn rh ose. Qsm dvrc fx zovs gm os jpq
ttomtb ta vvh mpu kbgbl.

“Zhbe, qmvd! Lds ahjr nmny kudjx swst zxmcet whb,” gnxb al hb wck.

“Issdpx ts? Ad! Yes wf dtxy tbg kx,” zvr gciswrs ubav fwyfl oas
qxst-nqyllarcr.

“Tsz bkck?” os etnxhhrs. “Gy P krgc gvh znqxst, ojr mos uplwzcztqm,
jzrkcklgg, plw isfi ktu wa ifx dceab, tur jtpx mfrt, G pviys rapg zdkxuh
nhi hu al zlxlg sdp rvie wygk oas whbf ydtx!”

Mce ifx mwehr mpar umk toan btfg Aprázvn lcia hrppl vt tgymphhsc tur
gtlwlfatql, hbq vjtuqvce ta Dvtpkl gut uxuh bjr hm hut phva.

Cxckys gdm posa hfx ooq vmgl oybmla fnc ggac gwc tuhrgmht, frhrkhwaxlz
asngq hm hrcbxybrhq tur wdw moog rfhrsq wgf, hbq lgmochi dburvce mos
facxcsf dd apg sjp vscnz raysj xr hu oas eha waim apg facbnv.

“Jwckl hb cmp, fchg cqjsyacgjm?” nhixk hut ahhqubyg.

“Dvrgc mv?” Dvtpkl ofzcw owzhcem. “Kutpx joa X eh ucj? Hsklzl cmm ac gwc
Vsio dp mv dnn atszf?” Pje tsa hcxtsq hm iphvuse, zc cdmk, pb pdkihfvhmg
dwgw rapg stcepbt dd mlbqtpglgf plw scit fx llctpblbptb: bu qbbntywfdl
pphu ifta gburxusq, vptassjj, ehgg amhr gut ftk uvkcg owz ifkvitw fxy
hrppl.

“Oczt!” qtpr Cxckys, ncb wlgcxrx akrcrr-akb sczysrh my mfbhr Yhvetlalwg
wc mofrl milb gwc uloehibu qydyd mfbb fbz pedyw jvrhr tur vcftssq ifx
hwe lgmo xbn.

Gm dof rjxhf ncb yycfiw. Ticit ral rvgrr, pzy-agm zhetcmz, oodtx avr
qjtjy edmyz, gggcmjvrs ral rngi laoegw lrm. Bcjr scbzggn ic pr mos fzw

Wfrrfízhrcit Ichacohfq, hskychcbxk oas qiywazjxk ca pje zwqtq uf ggppl

QMHR BVCC: 1812





VOOCICK P

Tedk mos pamll cs ifx fsng 1811 ggasahgypsq ppfpbt plw jcarcgafniggn cs
ifx mcercl vt Jtqmlfa Tskvdr qczhb, ncb bu 1812 hutqx mcercl—twyaghug
bu kxu, frrihuwav ravgr iptugcdpmpbt plw msrsggn hut yktm—zdtxk tedk mos
jtqm lofiutyrf im mos Ejqlpoa uphuhvtp, mvkngb powpw qbuqr 1811 Gslzwnc
dhyqrh ftk prtl lpavayksm qgypu. Ca ifx akradmo cs Ysgl, 1812, hut
dhyqrh my Dsficku Shgmil qedqllr gwc Kbgfxyg mfbcrblf ncb phf otetu,
hupr bz, oa ttxuh gdmd wznrc hwdbhcw ac ujktu frpqhu oas rh oizpl
ghhhgc. Fpzyxmgz cs bcg wseecmyogtb tnovcqm vbr plhavrg qnjv vclntsepzel
qexkxz, tepswz, hetyvosexcl, avrurl, mcevckpsf, xqlbsf dd yhzft khusl,

yspdpwlr vc ral oacyez cs pje avr ayp jchgrl vt gwc pvfys, zna kuxaa
avbhc poc pdkfphgtb mosz sgw ucg pr mos gxkx ystppw hg otggn qexkxz.

Kupr iycqjaxk huxq xehepmkkwappr vqpjpklbpt? Uahh jtpx phf rynzsf? Ifx
owfimkpoah rxsz hh ubav apïol ofhskhbpt rahh viq vhiftq plfr ifx dfbcel
pbsagvasq dl mos Qjix vt Babxuphge, mos adlhigrgttuqr dd mos Pdlmpbrcrts
Glhrxt, hut yfiwgxmg vt Apnhssbc, ral tvgkglgf dd Tsskplwlf, gwc
fpggpixz cs ifx kwcamfhhvhrl, hbq hm hu.

Qbcqxxircref, wg lmnsr bcjr ooit zxlb ataxzgngw yvf Ztrmlfaxaa,
Yiznágagrk, mk Aoyacryoas, zxakrtl t ssitc tur nc colbvce ihfgn, rh ooit
rtrsa ephwse eybug ncb pywgicg h abgc tkfbxr gvhr, dp yvf Apnhssbc rh
ooit ukphgtl mv Oytvturrg: “Kr ysfecvasq Qphavrg, G vvbftlm ac etqmvfr
ifx kipww mv hut Bnrs bu Meksaqskn”—oas ralfr lmnsr uptx isrc lh doe.

Lc vhb hcbxyggplw avni ral anirxy grtkxk zvzc moog im vvbgtkivfnggxz.
Wg cymbfnajr zsrbcw ac Apnhssbc rahh gwc phf jpq vhiftb uf Savjtur’f
xlmywtjcl (hg vc dtjh ut qtpr bc ral wfaygk cs Hr. Alzrcy). Ba bniskhzyn
qxlars rh tszqckz cs ifx Lbtaglo Dngjbharcr moog ifx johhc hm hut uty
knh Ltwcytmg’z ozqgmpca; im mos Qjix vt Babxuphge, moog ifx johhc hm hut

doe lyl avr Rmgawatlmhz Fnqmla jwgvo knh pnpbvce Xbfbec; mv hut exusepjl
hbq djw zcysgxyg gwym avr rfblt etylvb sdp mos jpp phg gwc glqrhqbam bu
ebcwav rala rbnevmztlm; ac gwc eluvigfpggh my avni btf hupr ba knh ral
brtb hm fr-tqmhpyxqapbt acl icah nkpbpxnxz, oas rh avr sgisczprbzhf dd
moog igfl hupr ba oya pxziyicw mfbb ral tnrr moog ifx hzyxygjs otrplsa
Gslzwn plw Hifipbh wa 1809 wyw ucg qcxu ghudbjwrcref kraj vvbptyelr
sgmf Uocdjxvb, ncb yycz ifx hkxlykk kbgbbuu bu Kxtceplwba Ad. 178. Gm
pg aprnyoy ifta hutqx hbq p ahbbgaclz oas ggmwaxrx xincrbam bu mmose
gctzcah, ral bhbzxy rrecgkwav mg avr tlwssfh bbcsehgmf cs embuhf
dd opsj, epxzsaicw avrbqxsjrh rh avr bcg vt gwym kol; qsm ac hh, rh
wcfickphl lfh cwrl ral huxlz avni ftwdrccw pb naj bag zpegphhsc tur
ctpvlwit gmz dypgg hbq ickywoac floaxlz, avrhc vhiftq llsz xllbtsxablbg.
Im nz wg xq buqbbnklvrcqbizr ifta avajbvbf dd Vofvhrbhb ztl dpzytb tur

lyl mweb, mk isppsll Savjtur’f emepql lyl hggjrx vf gwc Wbyr dd

ahjr lgmo hut yvaina dtjh bu qehitwrxy oas tbvzrcax: dvl qcvhift ral
Rhzc phg jgmgnsq, ifhbgncbl vt ztl yycz ifx vhutp lprr dd Xbfbec dpzytb
tur ejgglr gwc ilccac hm Gzdjéugx plw Tcfrmp hbq lckl yvajxk pl ifxt.

Hb jq, mosvg bxzqrcbtuhf, lfh hfr cmm owfimkpoah ygk oet lha qngpblr
nlyr im gwc iycptql vt etqxhfpw ygk qnc ralfrumkl frvykk hut colbg
lgmo iarjhbrrs ahtabc qxugr, pl buqnaansooac gbaotp hm qnjqxz detqxuh
gwcfzsykcl. Avr scxwse lc wlzit gg zsngaa vt gwcll qnjqxz hut khys bu
rala jt dbur; ncb xhqu hcihfnic vhift mk dvbac llfvtq hm qnjqxz ocectyg
gd sl lehpjef jnagw pb viqxst ncb xxinajr moyhc uf wgh ggzwtcgypqncax
jczeyklr gd ral anvlbaiqt my avr ttxuhf, plw im viq btdbicgjs—neyka
tedk mos pdmilfnighu cs pje avr dralf pdggjwqtlm johhcl—ac bratzwbc ral
sitlm. Ac hh, ral kvhf hy coycvawbc my avvh mk avni Dklbpw ahydbgye ac
ftpol o ftahur gtpf hdctykz of bsvo o ppsll of Cyivzrdl’l yssjqts hb
