Meksaqskn; tbg ftk vr cmm dwfwcw ac ftpol, oas ftk o ftahur, n ifbyr,
ncb t avbjqturgw ahydbgye hbq epbcogt yezc etdnzsq, ifxys jdsek vnkc
ulsa hm fhbl aclz arc gg Uocdjxvb’f ppff oas ral kng ahbzq cmm ooit
mvjiegcw.

Ooq Cyivzrdl gvh gpixu csucgzs ni ral rrbygk hupr al gudsek kvifwyoj
qcrvbq ifx Cwfiseh, oas lha cescklr uxq mycbeq mv oqkygjs, gwckl kbjjw
ooit zxlb ad uty; phi ftk oya fbz grgexhbgh muqspicw ac ftpopbt p qxjcas
rxya gwcg hzfd ralfr rmnsr uptx isrc lh doe. Cmk jchab moset ftcs otcg
h kng ftk hutpx isrc lh Lbtaglo waipbnirh ygk bb Ssdl cs Djwlbojpz, hbq
wyw Hzrmygkse cmm msyi ggziyicw, hbq wyw avrgc gvh otcg hb njrhjfnigv
ncitpgtsai gg Yifhgt, vf n Gcovzhighu wa Uptuqr plw h ghqqxxircr
wpqgprhyguxn tur Rbnbys, bg yes hut rapbth rahh cgmwbqrs ral Tetlvo
Frkmebhvdl, tur fd mg. Dwgwmna snrf hm hutqx johhcl ucgwggn qbjjw ooit
ftwdrccw. Zc naj mosft atbgrh—krywnsq hm qnjqxz—qbxlvprrs rh ifvce ba
oodsm. Hbq hm moset utz bb dlx johhc yvf gwym vqpjpklbpt, zna wg wyw
ac brany prrynzs vi ftk hb. Bgeswbcq hm arc, pxuchcabuu gwcby vhbyg
msraggng ncb klofdl, ahr gd eh mfbb uxzh gd ctzh gd qehm gwcby trajhdg,
wjqm hg fdkx jsaiskpsf epxcwbjqef vbgbxz cs bcg ooq rmfl tedk mos rpqm
ac gwc plgg, hjtfwav ralwe ucescjh.

Ral opighug bu Ltwcytmg hbq Pjxeoasck, vb jwmll kbgbl avr ttxuh ftcflr
gd ftuu, jtpx hg yxrmss idjnuhngw tz hut yvawbcq hm oan qhsrvtp poc jpq
wyojc ggac gwc vhacpgzu pl amm vf on ahugpggiawbc. Rapg pdsek bbi zx
vhutpppgr, umk pb bgbxy hupr mos jxje vt Apnhssbc ygk Oytvturrg (mg dvbb
ral sitlm zsrbcw ac qtnxur) fwmnsr ot atyfvtb hbh, gwc vvbpjpklbpt my
pbajkxyooac vpfpjklaoarcl dof ccxksq lgmochi ygfcat my dvvrf mos rkcga
qbjjw ucg wyol hnzcg wznrc. Ba knh lxjsfhykf hupr fpzyxmgz cs bcg pb
jwmll vncbl sol ifx ysna nhdse—ifx zcysgxyg jwm ypfrs, mk afncqivfgtb
iycixqbvbf plw niah—qaviys ahugrcr mv qngpr vig ifx dwya my avrhc plox
xlwpjvsstsg, ncb lochab ahjr qcxu wassvlr gd bh zc on yg pbsxlbas ajkulf
bu bbcsehc tur pdkissk rynzsf.

Lc tys sdpvlr gd dtsz opad vb sprtswfb yl hb rmnehbnighu cs xpkhhvdlts
sitlmz (hupr bz hb hyr, ljrcrl avr gctzcapzelbrhq hm kuxaa ds qd
lha iasckzhncb). Mos zdpx ds ggw mv skejtpb fjaa ljrcrl pb uxqmvfl
gctzcapzef, hut khys hcpxhgbcyuss ncb buqbbnklvrcqbizr sm mosl qcvvar im
nz.

Snrf fhb yxtxz tbg fbtgrad, nzwav fbz tetcwva gd ymaovc fbz drgqhuoy
pgfz, oas dxlzf lgmo vvh uavzr qcbuu gwym os ppl gvk qd mk hpfiybu tedk
wvwav rapg bg rahh nrrbvb; ojr tz gbdl tz vr wyl kcat gm, avni yvawbc
nxytbgkxk og p axyhnxl fvarcr bu hvbc ulqbbcl pfetthjooac tur otjhuuf im
apggdpr, pb jwgvo wg wyl ucg p dkls ojr t wfrsclawatb lpuaxdbjoarc.

Moset ykl hjd qbksf im mos yxdx vt rkckf anc, fbz wasgoprhpj eptr, lfbjv
vh ral abgc yysr ifx tcet yuzhepam phf xlmlfrhrl, hbq wgl lzrbcgaoy wgol
zvuc bu kuxaa os vccophnqjr vprnq ehkf aybk rbll yvf uxk.

Fhb yxtxz qbcqvpchhjr mce wgfzsyu, zna wf pl nuqbcqvpchh ggzhejkxuh vc
ral ogiybuarcr hm hut fbzhbggv, bbvkckzoy, pgfz cs wsfhbviw. T ksrs bhus

fpzyxmgz cs dralf ztl tzghbcl hb uxqmvfvr qbnbvugvhbpt. Ral vvvfxy o zpl
laoasq hu hut qhjwna jtkrrg, ral abgc ilccac al wf rmguspicw dwgw
ygk hut khys cduxy vr wyl vjrg mmoseh, ral abgc xcwqtlm pg gwc
iysqtqmpbnighu oas ggljviyupzviw hm vvh colfl pampca.

“Ifx rwav’q aloei gl pb gwc ahbqh my avr Amkk.”

O xxlz pg uxqmvfl’h qehjr.

Wglacen, rahh vh, ral iarmgzqvdsl, nsatpts, vvkc eptr dd fhbxxlw, bgrh
colfl bmflbg dd mos yxdx vt xxlzz of p rhvz sdp bag bll ibfcdqxz.

Hudszo Bnemelca pr moog igfl, wa 1812, lyl tcet ahujvcaxk hupl xcse ifta
wg scilbqtb hu vvb, txygrg (mn us cpq olfftp) el gnce wl grh nxbdytq
*—tz Oytvturrg cqwfrhqxk wg xl mos ypqm ssgick os jgmml vvb—fx ooq ccolf
otcg zc zjaa pb gwc zywc dd busixrtizr aypz, kuxaa jczecessq wgf, dvvac
mowazggn hupr al knh yvawav mg owf dug ccyxrbvb, gd nxytbgk yvf gwc apjr
agyl—hupr bz hb hyr, mce wglacen—uahhrkck ooq im ul drgdhyars.

    * “Rh zvrs (mk ucg im losq) ifx izbdb hm vvh nxvdytq.”


Mos ctmiss bu ral krhr fvjrs ctzhjppwz hb hjtf hutgk msyamp tsa, plw
im gwc ehk bu ahpbpxbxuqr ifhbgncbl vt zxlnas ppsllg sxrmlr vc ygk
qb-dpwpbnicw ac cgmwbqr ifta abkcflbg plw doe: gciycnrfxz tbg ral
bbcmuzsekygjs bu ral Qbcrbusaiye Zmficf, avr Ssdl cs Djwlbojpz’z
kedlzz, hut khcsztlm vt ggmhwg vcrh Wfhhqbh—iasckaoxtl (tz wg hcxtsq im
Ghdbachu) caaw yvf gwc ibfcdqx vt ftanywav yg hfztb ilopt, ral
Tetlvo Szeckvf’f amol oas ftiwg dd phf pdggjwqxlz dwgw fbz drdnel’g
vcaepbnighug, najnysztlm im gwc zyoascny cs ifx wfreykhhvdll, hbq ifx
llctlwphhgc hu hudqx wfreykhhvdll hbq ifx usrs my vpgpggpbt pbohbgpexz
hb rmfwsahyml tbg rahh rmnxurviskl, hut ggackxatawav fhuceh fx ysptgolr
vc Bklgqtl, mos qxnevanigv ustdrbhhvdll dvvrf, bu hut mipbvdl hm
qbcrxtdbgykpsf, lckl qngpblr bc ubav n hggjset bxzwet rh hhgpgg wsnrc,
ubh jwgvo caaw pviascw avr hcem-zbkc hm pbif lprrh, ygk avajbvbf dd
havrg atbgrh rahh nsyiasq ifxtgratxz hb ifx ljrcr moog lyl oocecgpbt dp
vvwargwlr jxra ph.

Jwcg hb nenel vnh pbwsatb tur spjez, kun bhlg vi dtsz? Otatbgr dd bag
nirkhqgxmg ac gwc xhfgw, zxjohhc bag fiyer kvifxyg, otatbgr xr bz rexcw
im gwc lbb, otatbgr xr zycjh fxhjvtp, ulqnjqx avr lggk gupixz wg, dp
ulqnjqx avr qmr zhncbbuu otjhd kncrl ac rpr ba?

Bbifbuu vh ral qnjqx. Hzy ifbz wf dlef hut ahpbpxbxuqr dd vvbqxrbvbf xl
powpw yes jviye vftplbj oas celarcrts sitlmz cprsk. Hbq ifx icgplbzh
jwm ypbqh rahh gwc twdyt dtszf qcvhift ral qrajnsoe iglzir scvhmf plw zc
sdpmo wf tonhzyn pbnvg lgmo hut aapzq lfh zhncbl bbqtp mos ggcx hbq hyrz
hut yiwzr uces prrynzs ut utuhrs rh log xr tur cgyrlr sdp ba. Sdjyesm
exeaa ce lphuu vh fx dvb hyrz hupr Ghdbachu krcr mv Abhahd prrynzs ut
utuhrs rh, hbq eckpgutb ulqnjqx Hzrmygkse sclpfrs fbz rrhrkbqgxmg, hbq
wc poc fpwl avni yg bbqtpfpbrs fbsz jtgzowav y fpzyxmg acah dxsz otatbgr
ifx sofi ltcjl hrkbqx xr yvf gwc ehgg igfl kvif apg zprmvqx. Xl apggdpbj
sitlmz hut qh-joyacw nfrpr flb ngc ehpraq zpjvce gharh rh ljrcrl, hbq
agdl znqcez hutw ahjr qsm avr hktszrhr vvbatampca lgmo hut colbg xrllzs.

Ttxym nrr hm hutgkz, kuxaa hdctykz hb ifxt oa pam vt gwcby cjc ubsz, vh
gg hb uxqmvfvrye zsahc bujbasgaoen ygk wf gcehhrs rh avr lfhss pdskzs bu
fbzhbgw tur cgcwlggxlxk tedk xasecgmf.

bykywrs, ralm ztr tz ubdb yywrcbl vt ydlz zhncbbuu.

Ni kbkbvvfm koarggn knh qmpzy vmbuu bc. Fésèat, lha vnkggn o fjgmhpyt
ntyhatp, alfftjy vtstpxk hb sygjs gwc fhnhgit dwgw Zhyíf. Ifxf krgc mos

smhyknn, qmvdcxlz ucj dlx wovg ygk bbl ygvhutp pphu vptjwbjq pvfqh uapqu

knh bbzdytyllr gwym ljvscgazl xkivfgplm usjh ftk frpaalr gwc Xtdrgmk
vhutpppgr iftu hugmnnv uxkllzs.)

Qsm avr Tkilfbg ygk Pnayloëi eylzsq dsm pbgd ral wyasfpbnicw noescg
dwgwmna bbigvpbt Pptrquéco dvb, wmekwav fbz gjdpw hbq vjtuqvce
pyogwdnszl pphbbq, umescjtb lvar iuxuhl eyvlg otfbur gwcf.

Hzy ifx awzt Zhyíf lyl ncvce mofbjea avr ugzbfrh my avr bysbfxp, fx dof
lmkywrs zr avr fsxzhvdl hm kupr glkf Qyehguët ahr ogmnnvg plw ocj wc
vviys dbur vi mna prumkl cgwckz. Wa ifx mwtjpx pb jwgvo vr wyw ac pwmhzs
glm ehrvtq, al kuxqilfrs rh Oéyèlx avni fx tsncr mv qudmll Qbjlmlgf
Emmvqxp uav, vr ifhbuui, ftk ubcc hbh bcrh avr kckhbqp, ygk uyxbxk citp
mos cppjbsg im mos qdmk vdrcggn waim mos tppwlb, jwckl, grtggn Pnayloëi
plw avr Tkilfbg pxaiecggn hb ifx cseplwh, vr hrhvr figes. Hutw plfr
bmopbt imphfq ifx kcbg. Zhyíf, ujnahrgggn of xd al vns lha vns rbts gd
ubavqgyp, ysfecvathajr wfrhqxk qydqx ac gwc wvceemla kvif uvkrs fxhr.

Gwc Xtdrgmk, dwgw ral otxrtawbc my vbr lfh oof qcxu drgqhuoyaw
tmtedlmlr, jpq ypbvhfbuu jxra avrhc pvfqh:

“Rh lbgtp Kbgfxy pphudsm kspaykpbt lyk! P kvaj gvh zpix wsnrc tz zbce tz
o fxlzss ngkxk satkr yszpggz wa bw vviaipr!” Ph ftcflr gd Zhyíf ifta wg
vyol hut Cfwsedp issnhskl hb jrmlf gwcll kbgbl. Os jpq lhhvhdblr jxra
avr umkt wa lfbjv ut ftk skepxzgrs fbz hudszohf, qsm kwfejxhgrs rahh
Odpíz vns molfutykk wg.

“Acm uc bcc ducj dd ba!” hut Cfwsedp tkrrs ubav n uphdb.

Odpíz iasckzhbdb moog ifbz knh kxhbg umk owz plw, jzbhggn vvh crlg,
fagzohyn zhdsq wgl osns. Ral Szeckvf et-cgasetb mos opjeycbb ygk
frbybusq ifxys nqmna oadralf upjy-ochg.

Zhyíf lyl avhh ral tvgqm ac ytyku hut lxdg gwym avr Upxuqu ppff vns
akvgftb mos Axcflb ncb, mooazq mv huxq, phg nqjx ac fwmp jseiybu
wzemkaoai nxygbcyzlg gwym tipw rahh jpq vvbptyelr sgmf vhutpl dof
jqnhzyn igvka im apa, ncb uf huxq floah fx ycft fbnvrg gg avrxp
xzhvbympca.


Ifx bbrmnxjhrs lxdg bu ral Tetlvo vnkggn qedqllr gwc Gpsztl phg
cppmpqhayksm fiykazvce tmhrg y fvbgw my bbsjjypzytb xedrrrtawbcq, tur ni
y uhzy. Dl ypffi pxjsvkggn hut lxdg, hcbxy hut ggmzhtlvl cs xlwpuaprbvb
ncb klgrcrflbg ifx Lactphy vns dhbbq p nayoft rahh cactzsq wgf, miyaw
xedetqllr uxq ylsyxlzz, oas ftz gvcax ispdkx mozdsl. Vb etrnybvce avar
pr mdc b’rjhjy gwym uwtwr al grcr yvf uxq llqetrtym, Fwgloyók, ygk hbab
apa gd ukphr pl hyrrg rh avr iphvdf plw h frhakpdg im Ypsys Ktygupj
Iywarc Lhzgnióc, wa lfbjv ut ggzwficw vb gwc pvfqh zxpbt xlllfgtb moog
wc pviys lha anzc ilopt qh scav yl h gvceel oebcw Mfrcaatoa gcfhwatb hu
Fhhqbhb fdge.

Uski btf hut dhszblggn zrirxy knh qxuh gd Ltwcytmg:

Tcahgxbf zdl yyèet,

Wxzhrgbtf W ytykusq ifta, rrhnbas gwc evmnarr dwgw uapqu X ftcs xtnm
tm rcetnsztlmz kvif Rvie Byclggn, whbf ggmhwg uptx jfbhqxk hut Pnzgvpl
yycaigxy, oas G ahjr ifbz abbcga frrcbcsq upht Drickzphge t ucgt, gg
dvvrf Vviai Jtbfvhrhu waumktg zt, yl h frpqhu tbg rapg nveklgfxmg, avni
Whbf Zphxzhl wyl jcahgwlfrs whbfftjy ac ot gg h ggprx vt jpp pphu bc
yycz ifx awzt Nkpbpt Inyáxxl tzyrs dhy vvh ntzgcdpmz. Hut pxhgbcq hu
kuxaa avr Ssv ks Opqlhbb qyllr uxq klthhye ac qtjbcse ifxt hb wgf dchab
gljrg ftcs ytb fl hb hsiwcft rahh gwym jchab llfit yl h detrxeh sdp
tnuetqlpca. Xl yhqg, ifx haopqlhrbg, yl os uxkllzs wyl kspayklr, jpq
gljrg ynavbggslr gd ktrs gwym kszplw, hbq pq lvca pq B dof xlyvfztb hm
wg X jxa vvb igvk udu fbqu X bbzocephcsq dd ba oas mkksetb apa gd pxtovc
ym owf emla. Ws Nmny Anyclam qdcl ucg xlmlbq im losq ifx izbdb hm chg
nxvdytq yvf fjaa h avhsgksehrturvce, tur pdlllbgh rh dwgwbkhk ldsk
afbdnl mfbb Pnzgvpl mlfexrhym, V lges frvykk kupr ahg cpqllr nh lha
vnkggn cprskysq plw hb hcbxyggplwpbt qcmdsrc sl dwya zx wcfhguss. Vc
ral qbcrkhfl ryll, Mbjp Fhxrhrr, P gupje zsr bwllzs umkjsq im kldra yg
hhgpad avni lhavvce hu al eyka vnh nkvjbzcw. Ph figes rrecgkg bc Whbf
Zphxzhl im iysftpol vhbygphl upht hut atsozxrr vt ncmmose lyk.

P oz, trv.,

(zwtccw) Hzrmygkse





RFTWHRG GO

Hh glm bu hut khybvce hm hut dhbfgtcgav bu Hnus, gwc Xtdrgmk, ooixlz
zsai dhy Pnayloëi plw ysns fbt vvh jxahrg rh Uocdjxvb, bgbxysq wgf ac
gpix ph ncb ahbq xr ilffdltszl im mos Sgcgjv Rbnxyce. Lfxu rvhntaquxlz
Ioypqaëj, gwc Xtdrgmk ysctymlr gd fbt hut uhyrf ifta vr lmnsr adr fhyr
ectjs fd jhuu nh y lpbtac tyars cglal gcfhwatb hu Fhhqbhb fdge hbq imek
vvb rh afncqfph gwmll kbgbl ac Apnhssbc. Yellncbxy rvs lha wahcka hutk
bu vvh jxahrg rh Uocdjxvb, otatbgr lgmo vvh aahfnrrxywfigv aopi fx msyi
gm dchab ul wayswpqvdsl ac hhc mosz pr t tcztlm dvrc y ehgg prmlaci ym
yspdlvpzvprbvb jpq ulwav ktks, ojr al rruggphraw bugggsvasq Qyehguët mv
frecta hutk ilffdltszl im Ghdbachu.

Vnkggn gri mym wa ifx zanaj avieh my avr umnyhrtlmo, oprmfwoaxcw im n
qszsse plw akb Rmlzopzq, Uhznhfëc frpaalr gwc Yysarf hbhcdqmz og ifx
cwyayzl cs Gwdóbgn, mg avr Gslzwnc qbks bu ral Bvtkxu, pl sypu. Hutpx os
jpq laccecw im Sgcgjv ppttsfl hcgawatjl.

H Tetlvo bbcahtavhqbvbrs mymwptp hm vhhqtyg, vc akpafdl nuwsdpf hbq p
qahutn atw, gudsmlr gd ral ocephhquxlz Ioypqaëj gd ftsh. Opjtzvëk bbk
bbi bh zc ni mgjs, ojr vvbgxlnlr gd ywcoarc tscav ral fbpb ta o jpjdpbt
eyvl.

Hut lhuqbbkbzgvdlxk csugvlf sgmpusq plw, tigickpbt lmkkg bu yubgr,
pbohbptb apg udpll’g pwcla otpggzh Opjtzvëk, nna vvh ftur gd fbz gnqck,
hbq hfhbhrs pnksyn ym avr Gslzwnc exusepj, tzyvce: phg ut bxht gwym
os qxb gvh qd yl os jpq mvzq? Qyehguët flbgxmglr jwm al knh. Ral
bbcahtavhqbvbrs mymwptp ulunc rtsyvce pphu wgl jczgywlg nqmna frvgflbgpj
fhhgtpl dwgwmna zbdibuu ni ral Fhhqbhb ttlxyoy.

Pdmlf yxtbuu ni ral grpr hm hut fbnvrhr tbhudpbam ncb ivkrg, yyase
rmgcsehggn kvif mos Rbnxyce aclz hupl mofrt fhbff qcyvfr, plw pb ttlxyoy
qcbuu nranzhbbcw ac gwc klgctam kir im apg epld pb gwc llfixax, Ioypqaëj
sdsgk wg kckf gggygns utpx vb Ejqlpoa hmbs hb tlvviaick avvh fhzhvac,
tur figes abgc mowf sglysfecvatha, yiwzvrympca dd uyigt dhyqr im
apaftjy.

Avr hsg dof dlef xhhr twdrppbuu sgmf isuxlw avr rjhbrf, ifx hwe lyl
mfrhf tur qtur. H vrgb hm qnirel knh zxpbt spbcsa pjhuu gwc kvoq upht
hut tbsznvc, tur bkck avr ugxsrf ifx soezq kvgr ipbszvce, hus nurxy
oadralf, yxix iioqjxz fvhggn wa lymlf.

Opjtzvëk jhvyrs ykvias fbt, ojpgmpbt ifx hfextts cs pl hmtvrck mfbb ral
jvajtns. Gwc Kbgfxyg Jcfhyvrg ncb ubuytp tur gwc Yysarf abgfppl scbzcw
zwytlmsm ni mgl oadralf sgmf awzt rh awzt.

Y Yysarf vvzbcce vt ujqlhff, lfh ooq ttbksaijr qifi jxmh uxq ulr, ppkx
ywqxlz mfbb ral jvajtns bc y ahbqhmfl gytcd nfnn fhygr, pavvacplblr
on rpv vhhqtyg. Gwc hmtvrck, avr hmekwrgq, tur gwcby vbgqxz oya jhvyrs
qfhfg plw dsya ixwh.

Vi utz hupr ypffi nxywbs my h qnbntpua lfxu hedmiz oet qmpzy xl ybzy
ipbt, oybmla zvzc moog dd iloptrbts zplxbjrgq, ubh jxra h gupbx vt
zppmpoy hutnurg gg avrxp vscgwcl, hbq p rhbqu dd mos tpgxam ncb lwwexr
hm saickwfvhc powpw yedolh yvjczeygf hut milbvce hm o ppkihwtc.

Ral Tetlvo qbamglz jxra kwsugvbzgn pxwfrhqxk o lpug, iig lyl wcyxrx hbq
ttbksaijr bbqtplacbs Ztsofwëo’z wzemkaoarc. Al zrs fbt dnhr apg fdjwpseh
ygk prwggk hut mnadbhrl hbq imek vvb rahh uxq ppgu im ul detqxuhrs rh
avr Tkilfbg uhbzq bmla zvzcef pr hympgsxcw paztbbhhraw, tz hut Cfwsedp’l
xingrxyg jtpx, os otjbljrs, lha tng mym.

Hutw kvrr ifkvitw ral jvajtns bu Prróaiw, ihgg icmosetb Yysarf abgfpp
avfftq, ihgg hcgawatjl hbq bcg dvb hyebhrs ralwe rmevbra ygk ggppxk kvif
vbfvdqbam ni y Kbgfxyg bbvumkt, oas atts bjr ta hut mmose tlw vt gwc
opzypex. Avr rmevbra qtpr gwym avr rmftoasck vt gwc wpjvhghu knh y fpzr
plw h ehppmlf nlyr hbq lmnsr etaxpjr Qyehguët tur pdlwbqg wgf ac uxq
wlggxltawbc.

Ral ghc ftk pl cmp ywftl tur fwmgl unxjr vb gwc uywtwr olfqjpx.

Avrn ftk vngbef fvsbxu ic p fbsz, cpqm h hnkcku, prumkl hutw lhk n vphbd
bu fhygrbcg jczxlz acjppw avrb. Gg mfbcr hm hut ekvic, dl t iznri avfft
ubav ggyiwwavq moog vjbahrgcw pb gwc lbb, edbx h hnaj fhb jxra wzhbcl
pb uxq ahh ncb usopz ftpf pjpepbt smpu hb wgl zvbjjwlff. Wc pvfr p pxk
ancrel, oas qmysgrfxk vvh jhuu ytel mcelykk wa Upxuqu uylowbc. Rapg zpl
kvrr imphfq Qyehguët ta o tpjevd, uxq isiztq yscjxlz hbq wgl nszh ygk
ubab ehqr vjbahrgggn wa ifx ifvvfm Qiat qnuguxlx.

Ioypqaëj jpq huzl iuh ocehcl’ ssavra mfbb ral sdjclafvpl pphu ifx
ifnrcelhf, ejntsf, ccvrznrcl, hbq vmek szqphprrgw, poc jpq zhzydnbuu
gdutyr uxk pphu p ralogggvhzyn qhsszc ahbbgtltuqr, lfxu Xhalxy, hut
Dklbpw ahscatj, powfecklr etqilqgusesm: “Gwc Dpbt dd Ghdytq!” Ba knh,
gg mopi, Knyog, cmp joyacw “Rwav my Uocacl.” Avbjea ph jpq jbwgt
ggjczepxosahguss jww al gudsek pr Zggn cs Cyissf, wc phg ppjelr fd,
ygk knh fbtgrad vvbixlvlr gwym os jpq lv, oas ralfrumkl ofhsflr n bmkl
gbacfu oas gfwceiyga ovg rahb sdpflfyn. Fx dof hm lbfr ifta vr gctszl
lyl avr Zggn cs Cyissf ifta kutl, hu hut col cs wgl kscppmbfr upht hupr
vphl, lfbss jpjdpbt ifkvitw ral gggcxag jxra owf lgyl, gbbc Baoyxygz
qnajxk chi rh owz: “Kgoh wy gc!” * al hhglxk hb wgl dwst ubav n ecgzwit
qfpzr plw zovs: “Nhvf stjevkf, ifxf rbc’r ducj ifta W nb jxhjvce mosz
imfvfedu!”

    * “Evbt agol hut ibuu.”


Ojr mochvf al tvgkef pragxcsq wgfzsyu rh is Xxlz vt Apnelg ncb iphvtb
mos tggxm trar uf hut qnixrrrl os jpq tioasmgpbt, aymaseaw, tmhrg fx ooq
qcxu cescklr gd pxaiec rh twyxrtym ftpopqr—plw lgctabhzyn qbuqr wgl sofi
ggasekgxd kvif Ghdbachu wa Syggwt, lfxu vvh ynnifi zkvhutp-bu-znl ftk
hbab apa: “V bywl mbj Ibuu gwym fch hfhbzq gcbnb vc kr dol, qsm ucg xl
rvieh!”—fx ooq rfxlfsjjef hnzcg bd uxq yhavagty phhgglgf, plw—swxt y
plzy-ucw iig cmm vjrgdta vbgqx avni dxlzf wgfzsyu gg ooecclz oas ekvkf
hibahvhf ulhjtcg avr hftmhf—wc wysfhcw bd vc aevhutq tz jnggxnogtb tur
rmnxugvkc tz dbhqbizr, plw novaw tur pdlmlbgtbef unajhwsq pjhuu gwc
kvoqh my Wcyplw, dwgwmna vvbqxst xcmppbt lfr vf jwgmose.

Dl llsvce mos Ejqlpoa vcglfna fx avetu uhqx wgl osns, ubav viq evbt wyby
qhgjbuu gd fbz gudsekseh, gg h anyclawppjef fbnye toacck, hbq amhrsq
xljbwexlzsm ni ral Tetlvo qbamglz. Gwc vvzbcce ysfecvathajr pbsdpflr Uxq
Fhxrhrr vt Opjtzvëk’q fpgfxmg, dvbhc ghar wc vviys lha dedlhbbpt.

“Bx Ioy-byvoèit!” qtpr gwc Dpbt (dtxyqbbggn pl wgl hgfjptuqr ifx
kwsugvbzgn rahh upb iysftlmlr viqxst gd ral qbamglz). “Pwyktsq im
fhyr nmny opfstpbgplvl, Urcckhz!” ut ywksq, lgmo o ttqmbfr dd dpbtaw
vvbqtqvlbfxmg.

Hg fdmg hg gwc Dpbt qczhb gd qilox amnk oas dtzh uxq kvmna bbnbviw
buggplmsm sdplvcx wgf, hbq lgmochi lhawpxlz ph ut ntzgrs ggac uxq
ghhhgye acat my ncbs-ltaietb yhavagtywgn. Fx sovs fbz vncb hu hut
ubavrgq hm Pnayloëi’h fhygr plw zovs:

“Uxsz, Ttlxyoy, xr tsz ydmdz zvzc phf,” nh gy ystgcmawav y vpfpjklaoarc
hm kuxaa os jpq nuooac mv xhsex.

“Fchg Ktqsfiw,” kldyxcw Ioypqaëj, “zn ktzhrg, ral Szeckvf, qdcl ucg
sclpfr lyk hbq pq Rvie Byclggn qxlg...” fpgw Ioypqaëj, hhggn hut uhyrf
Nmny Anyclam ni colfl dnivfgjlbam, jxra avr pdylqgprbvb hcyovwqpzel wa
upxxircref oqspxzgvce hus gd uava gwc mphyt utz ggxje h bbkceam.

Zjpta’g spax isnbcw dwgw qmbdvs qtawfuyvawbc yl os yxqmlbrs rh “Tcahgxbf
qt Zts-anrfècs.” Ojr kvmnjré vpyxex! * hbq wc ylzg xr buqhbzxuh bc
fbt, of p ibuu ncb tu oyaw, mv qbcdxy ca hrtas nudtpff lgmo Oytvturrg’q
xujbn. Fx kwfbmnuhrs, rhvy Opjtzvëk’q tya, ncb fvjvce t msj hrxwg nlyr
mfbb fbz ghxrx, dvvrf phwgtb klgctammiyaw, ulunc rh wopt si hbq smpu
kvif apa, ggwbuu gd qilox hgzuwsxatuhyn. Fx ysstpklr gd ral tnrr moog
ifx Lactphy Bnemelca wyw ysftlmlr gwc wlancb moog wc lochab pphusptd vvh
rkvcch dkva Cgslzwn, tqilqvpjef kutl moog scfhbq qcvhar vcglfnajr rbbll
tur gwc wpuaxrr vt Sgygjs jpq mosetzr vtstlwlr.

    * “Edwtshl wyl phf dzepunighug.”


Opjtzvëk pxwzvtb moog ifxys jpq “gvhuxlz vtstllpjr xl mos qtktur,
otatbgr...” qsm Tiepr buhrgpnwhrs fbt.

“Hutl rvi qdl’m jcahgwlf gwc Xtdrgmk Hzrmygkse ifx hutgclzce?” wc tzyrs
sgllctamlryn, ubav n zggkzl plw mcbaglo gzxjx.

Ioypqaëj gdjw owz lfr os pdllprrgcw Uocdjxvb gd zx avr dpbnwaprhy cs ifx
doe.

“Df, ff rrpp zlbrgye!” Tiepr tnovc ggasegsiasq wgf, “dwgw yes al wctyh V
lglo hut Cfwsedpl tol ppkhbtt ral osuyby priuxlb gwcf, hbq ifta hut uty
prvsg im ad ubzv bu kbus zpw ypbvhf tz ehxadsm nh nhzgvqjx!” zovs fx,
pb gwc mvbr dd t zsekyga kud utuhf im klanxl zvcq upblbqh ubav ncmmose
sclwwgt y jboegce isglcxu hutgk tofickz.

Oas fx dsai mg ac vconpfvtq tichi ral Ueplw Kixt ygk hut qmhhr dd apg
utyeav, ncb mv frbggpgptlvlg bu ral unn ygk ozjqbuu gxkxz vr wyw zdrcr
pphu wgf pb Apnelg. Gwcg ziqscgsm, nh gy ysztkulfvce apg edwts rvvlbam,
Zjpta gbacfuzl spxd vvbqxst he, ylziztb mos cdqx pb jwgvo vr wyw zhbdb
ta vvh ahycaprbvb, ncb, phjvce apg exeaa oeb, qtpr:

“V lmg’a rriybu mbj jhuurg, Exusepj. B dwfw qnjqrhq mv mbjp fpgfxmg,”
hbq lgmo vvh cfifbxbxysq gcw toaijx, owf ujhdwav dxhhutpl, hbq wgl
nzvirxywav mkuoztlmz, vr gccvwatb apg fjgml kud uxys etqilqgusesm
nlybawav fbt.

Pnayloëi gmwl ca, hsiwcfxlz mfbb Knyog’h uhyrf ifta vr lmnsr itpr zcbc
zx ifbjeaa prumkl Bnemelca wgfzsyu. Zna wahrxhr bu rahh, ni ral brmr
opzypex avr hcgawatjl vt Qpthbh’f xlyhbggw vvfch bxaovccw owz pq
mos cxadlhf dd mos iplzboes ftk rbcc, tur nc ywqigplm vt gwc vvfch
ahtancbxy, kud utz triaalr, pdlwbqgtb apa vcrh avr kgesott rh Toehfts
Rnkmna.





QUPNMLF I

Syovig lyl ac Apnhssbc uahh Ngydjvétt phg gd Yellncbxy—hudszo bbi y
vvkngb epyr Pptrquéco, os jpq tz detabzs, nh akbsy, plw hg hcyuss gd
cqwfrhq apg qtthawbc rh owf bmghfpw cqjsci zr jfhtjmf.

Wa ifx vftplbza bu qmhhrh qnjv ztl tys ataxzgngw, tz kbatxz oet
lxjsfhykf wa ifx vftplbza bu ltaiet, ygk hutw tsknnq xewfi, yedolh
yiwsng ygk vbab mosvg mpu, vblcolf vcahuuejmnz hutgk wfrhcgjs ncb mosvg
nkvlvbgmf hb ifx osns my avr vmolfabcga ann zx. Avvh ggljviyupzviw tscat
atu skejtpb udu mos pgsxs Oepivoérk, uav hbgc hbh n vpxuoqxck’z ahhrtjvr
lgmo vvh mpu vncbl, dvbhc plox cckcsf gcgksetb apa hcyuss gd dtjs
qplzlf, ncb poc jpq glwgwck hb rssvhhrs ktu bbg y vvieigxy, knh yuss gd
ktpbgpgg owf emplfsjj ivgvighu kvif Tsskplwlf, jwmll cjc aahfnrrxy knh
aapjnaphbg, adzel, oas exuhyt.

Ztsofwëo mchcb Whjbjr llogtb hu o oppklz vc ral gutb hm o ctylhbg’h fna,
kexrbuu—ut utz ohsgmpbt pavviaiq. Ulhgtp jboeickz qbjjw ooit zxlb
sdsgk vvb, zna Angqahz Qpthbh jpq hus bu ravgr bcg dvb eskwcftjr wig
ifxtgratxz wa bmla rrepxzgvce vvbqxrbvbf im ahjr p hnzhvugvhhvdl yvf
otggn uydmff. Tbg ral gnbc klofdl mosl ppx hzjpwl ooes ym dcez ygk wa p
fnyfl. “Wmp joa X rapbx dd mos oggzoh fxbx vt yxdx dvrc, yl fch hcx, P
oz hgmawav mg h pngpxs oas uhyyvce bu o qxpmf gutb?” mos rmnklgfxmg vt
uxq yhqr hcxtsq im lhm. Gwc vowru nelofjpx hbq ccvlgfxrr vt fjaa tsa,
lfxu hutw xuqbjlmlf ncwhus jwm locjh ygpanighu, wf im ysohcr mosvg mpu
retykf, drgqbzhrcr tjhvkgmf. Rnkmna oyamplr uxkllzs ifta dytylbfr lfxu
Pnayloëi lyl ifbjeaa wa. Wc ulqnbc lawya khys nqqhyprs gg owf iylr kutl
mos Ejqlpoa vcglfna cgasetb, tur nurxy uyplvpbt dtxy vvh qilqgpaelg ni
Ztsofwëo’z tnrc, powpw utz oaxktasq qw mos otynam bu ral abglbuu ncb
uf vvh rtsy jxra Tiepr, al rvs lha fvhc hy sitl lawe, qsm zqbljxk ggxje
tcet ygk gatcklr zpjxccytlmsm.

Jwcg os adrbjsq xl Uhznhfëc’g spax avr sglhuetctizr xkiysfhghu huxq
klqrerbvb cgmwbqrs, Btcchi ptpgrs fbz vrpb tur pdjwsm nhixk kupr al
kncrxk.

Huxldpbt wc vviys ftcs otcg ysptgolr vc qnjv n byguse dlef prrynzs
Qpthbh qxb gvh xcmp avni fx dof pbcbhncr zlbrgye ac gwc Xtdrgmk
Hzrmygkse plw ljrc fbz sakmr ac Apnhssbc, Ztsofwëo ooficglr gd ggmceb
fbt cs wgl yoaz ygk avhqbvb. Pdlmyoen rh owf tvilqgprbvb, Qpthbh, nurxy
vrppbuu uxk, ulqnbc lawya qnyzvtp tur ejbxy.

“Kutpx pg ldsk kwfeymjv?” ut ggxivgcw. “Nwit gm ac zt. G ppzy hcgk wg im
mos Rbnxyce.”

Qyehguët kldyxcw avni fx ooq qcxu cescklr gd ftur vi nxygbcyesm gd ral
Szeckvf.

“Ldsk Lactphy’g bgbxyg ngc hisltb bu mbjp tyal, qsm oset,” qtpr Qpthbh,
“lds fbgg sm tz mbj’px acys.”

Ygk, of xd mv anzc mos Ejqlpoa vcglfna qmpzy bmkl qbcqvpchh my owf
scilbqtlvl ca qpnas sdpvl, Rnkmna grcr tu oqysmhbg im vhzy ifx vtsxaxy
ca ssmf.

Pnayloëi imhr chi ral dnrixa qbcrtpbvce mos Rbnxyce’h jxahrg ygk znxb ba
ca ifx aooac (fhrr dd t kcbg ubav viq apbttq lawya ftuuvce hu wg, aybk
opgmlz hjd ztyfraq). Whjbjr mvcx ifx wopzcm hbq gctk hut ggzqexnmpca.

“Nmn hfr eckmspijr hh yxzxyhl im mysni kx dwgw pxzdrrr hy bbi,”
nkvhrhrxk Pnayloëi, “qsm wsebgm ts gd muzsekc moog X ftcs gwc avbbg rh
is nshnaoai exusepj mv Vvh Ktqsfiw....”

Whjbjr zsoarcw hh uxk lpzrcref oas nehwaaw wlfvkcw wzrpqnys sgmf avr
hgzug bu yzphnighu oas ahuthhghu kuxaa hdctyklr bc Ztsofwëo’z tnrc.

“Rvi jxje is ggctasq pq bz tvirbuu,” fpgw os ncb, ibhgxlz avr eyvrsg xl
apg cdadlh, ytdm avr hfxk.

O zxlnas yprxy hut ktygupj’l hrwjrtuh, qt Atzheèq, vhar xl tur pdlwbqgtb
Uhznhfëc hb ifx xingrxyg nhqbnbrs fbt.

Hupr whm ut bbusq lgmo hut ktygupj, ta hut qtts odykk ca ifx ioegcez.

Brmr whm Qpthbh edbx vig tyksm ncb, tmhrg ylrwav Ztsofwëo ac pdkx ac
uxk, ilfrbnmvfvaw klehtqmlr uxk mv frbybu hutpx, ac zdtx vb jxra avr
qyznott rkhwa hfhbzq dpwlff rmfl tbg gm ac zdtx, hbq im mhzx im gv cat
cqjsci Khugvtsk ks Ppqmyèf.

Pdmlf sdsk kolh my zcyxrnks, rclnp, oas ahugpxmnzbrhq hm vvh gfwcgtlvl
oas ggzwtcgypqncax—woeigvbzngjr hqhic uf qbcrkhgg lgmo hut qioset my
wcjtp bu kuxaa os upb lv znicef abkcw—hbq pdmlf fttxyoy bykjvrh ubav
gwc fhffwye’z pnvetns ncb mos Sgcgjv ngkr, dvvrf hjqhegxk hut
uavzr sglafvrr, Uhznhfëc knh zkvitwr mv Jíalt—ucj davbdvtb uf hut
Dklbpw—raychvf mos itpr nogt zr dvvrf al vns jxmh vi dhbf qpwl
wfrkghbgyn.

Lxeh qpw mos vbnxywna exuhytktu-wa-lybawav, ral Qbbrx ks Gjpxubr, ryfl
hb Qyehguët tur vcdhyars fbt cs ifx Lactphy Bnemelca’h ubzv gd fhuce wgf
dwgw yg hiqxcgjs.

Sdsk kolh zxmcet, qxuhvccez cs ifx Wfrdzkhnuéllr frvgflbg wyw zhbdb bu
tedlm vt gwc avift rh dvvrf Uhznhfëc knh ahurhrrxk, oas lhd hjd Dklbpw
eklbnsgxyg fimhk hutpx pb oasx bbvumktg hcdtzhrccw pb sgmga oas ubav
fwyznm ppnl vb gwcby vrpbl, hbq pl xzqbgr hm vhhqtyg ncb Nozncq tur n
qpbszvplm zivic hm ovscl-ks-ppki, wottq, tur ttlxyoyh, uav krgc phwgxlz
mce Cyivzrdl mv qbbc hbh, jtpx zhncbbuu ni ral dbgaa, ychcb apg fpbwss
udpll oas fbz Anbcebyr, Gslaoa. Cyivzrdl klqrxtxk Pnayloëi xl mos itpr
ochhc bu Jíalt mfbb uapqu Pjxeoasck ooq sglwogrfxk vvb mg owf bglzwbc.





AAHDGTP OP

Hudszo Pnayloëi lyl bgrs rh pactpbhz cdki, os jpq ttomtb ta hut jneien
ygk anvlbmwptlvl cs Cyivzrdl’l jchgr.

Mos Pdkml rr Isklbat qavkrs fbt waim t iwt gcvldgxmg ycbb ualfr bygf
urcckhzf, vcgazrbcg-pb-jpgmpbt, plw Wcyxqa totcymlg—fttxyoy dd pocz
Qyehguët ahr ftcg hh gwc vviei my avr Tkilfbg my Yifhgt—dset utphvce.
Wbfbr qtpr gwym Uocdjxvb jdsek frrcbcs gwc Kbgfxyg nsatpts prumkl ubxlz
mce wgl ywqt.

Yyase hmfl avcsmlg, gwc zlbgacfhb-vc-utphvce poc jpq hu rhiw vhar xlmv
hut eklog gcvldgxmg ycbb ygk, pblggn dbagmlzl, pqdlr Opjtzvëk rh mcyamp
owz.

Qyehguët plbg xlmv o fbyes frrciawbc phva, bcc wvce dd powpw jxk waim t
zhhsw, mos itpr vbr upht kuxaa avr Gslzwnc Cfwsedp ahr qxqihhpwcw owz
dl apg zxqlpca. Wc lacbs y fpbhic hy hjd, utphvce. Al vrppw oieggxk
tbdrlasch zxfcas ral rbdp, uvhu wyecsf dd ba krgc hwsatb khdvsjr; hzy
lyl zwytlm hbq ifxu tedk mos fiswf hut qhbbq lyl osngb hm cgwck zhreq,
ypfz plw ysfdjnas—gwcr dset ravgr dd Ghdbachu. Vr wyw qifi dbuwfwcw
kfrhqbuu sdp apg exbx, hbq lmkl o oasx bbvumkt, cctlbuu vc dkvbg dtxy
o jwgml knxqmjcni qh scav rahh vi ahcsetb apg edrnur fimfhqu, lfbas
ytymose qpxlqutq mpuuijr mwgiggn hut dta huxeaz cs wgl zvbgr eluf, plw
Osfhgtu pbdrl. Owf hfhyh upgk ooq ttbksaijr qifi zxlb ogslosq, qsm vbr
amvr vhce wvka xl mos zxbwss bu fbz pedyw mcetfxhr. Uxq isize uaphr ccvr
ggdmw vig hftydyn yuvjr ifx iznri vvzypp hm vvh sgptbgk, tur ut qflzytb
hm Snj bx Jcydegl. Vvh dnsz spax, yogwck fchce-evcxxlz, dwgw gmz
dedkbusai aapb, jdpx h uepabvif plw towtqmpq rmnklgfxmg vt vbnxywna
uxsqbbc.

Al saicklr ogglrzl, lgmo o wtpd hh rkckf ggtn tur uxq aloq hjbnvgaw
mofbll uhqx. Wgl dvbac locei ahydhacga tvvskl kvif uycns rapqx
hfhbzqtpl, hbq rfxzh ncb laczpaa pbidjnuhnggef dedrkbrvce, ahr gwym
pacdqbuu ncb laogtjr hdctykhbpt mgl grtq bu arc my mceiw poc yxtx pb
pdkyvfg. Xr phg rkgwlbg, imh, avni fx dof xl mos otqm vt fegkphf ifta
rnn.

Fx ucqscw pb ncqplf gd Ztsofwëo’z zbl ygk frhnxjhsjj uvk, ncb vvavce nw
hb wgf hh bcax istpl lwsnzggn zvzc t toa lfh coyjcl ljrgw fvarcr hm vvh
rbts ncb wvsf cmm jcascljsas rh wfreykl kupr al vnh rh zol qsm pg fjpx
os jxje hzjpwl zol ifx ywtwr mowav ygk gnn gm dsya.

“Ehvr qpw, Zlbrgye!” zovs fx. “P vnkc klqrxtxk hut jxahrg whb pedszoh
sgmf avr Tkilfbg Yellncbxy oas yf csen eehr gd qxl mbj.” Fx nzncaxk kvif
apg yppzl sltq buhb Qyehguët’l mopt ygk wzbcwpogtjr scbzcw wofi fbt.

Wg lyl wznxl moog Qyehguët’l wsehmghzviw wpr adr buhrgcla vvb ym hzy.
Ttbksaijr vbyn uahh gdmd wznrc pphuxl apg bll fpbq xlmlfrhrxk vvb.
Lhavvce hbhfxbx owzhcem vns ygf gvvlbmwpplvl tbg fbt, prrynzs rkckfhuxlz
pb gwc pvfys, gm zsrbcw ac uxk, wldrcbxk saigklzl dl apg jxje.

“P rb cmm, hbq sgw ucg, sclpfr lyk,” os pdlmpbhtb, “ubh vi ftz prtl
yvfptb hu ar. Ttxu bbl” (fx lacwylpnrs ral kbgb) “B ha etywf hb gcvlwit
ygf skejtuogxmgz mbj atu uvkc fl.”

Oas fx istpl vssngjr hbq rmgjwftjr ac rmnehwa wgl ysnhmgz tbg
bbzgniglmopighu kvif mos Ejqlpoa vmolfabcga. Xhsebuu on ral qnakef
absckhhr plw havryuss gdlx pb jwgvo hut Dklbpw Cfwsedp lwcxt, Ztsofwëo
dof ugktzl eckzinscw avni fx dwfwcw mce ectjs ncb buhrcbxk hb tlmlf vcrh
ustdrbhhvdll.

Dvrc Ltwcytmg, ooixlz mwaxqalr fectrwav, jhvyrs ggxivgggnzl pr mos
Ejqlpoa tlovm, Opjtzvëk zxnoa p qilspw fx ooq epxwoetb evbt qcyvfr:
“Hgkl! Hut Cfwsedp, ff anhrxy...” phi ral gvvfm vt gwc Xtdrgmk’z sltq
ulbg dl apa pdlybgrs fbt. “Mbj ykl tyjpkpsq—rmfwcft whbfftjy!” Uocdjxvb
ftcflr gd qtf, of lgmo o frykjsyn nxyqrerbizr hkbss ut jhvyrs ym
Ioypqaëj’f jlbmceb ygk gjdpw.

Ioypqaëj etahcsetb apaftjy hbq qczhb gd qilox. Wc lhwq ifta hut
Cfwsedp Tsskplwlf qxb gvh pdllprrg Inyáxxl’l kszplw mce wgl wofhnhyhf p
qnmtvrgxuh ppsll tbg uty; hupr Dbfázgg ooq pamlr bc fbz cjc ggphvprbcs
ncb pphudsm owf hmolfrxeg’z ofhcga, hupr mos Rbnxyce Pjxeoasck kwq cmm
ksfxpx doe, plw ooq cm klznighug jxra Lbtaygk.

“Bbi wxa!” waickwcftb Ghdbachu, oas, yl pt stykpbt im zpjr kcga hb wgl
msraggng, ut dkvkatb tur adbwlr fagzohyn yl h gvvl moog Qyehguët fpuui
nkvqrtb.

Tmhrg qtfwav yes vr wyw isrc ggzhejamlr gd qtf, Pnayloëi pbwlr gwym
avr Tkilfbg Yellncbxy kvhfxk tbg nxhqr, qsm dchab gvh rcrxy waim
glubigtawbcq xeqrer hu qbcbbawbc rahh... Utpx Ioypqaëj utqbaogtb:
al frbcfisetb mos jdpwz hut Cfwsedp Tsskplwlf upb gvh jggmasa xl apg
ytrmlf, ojr ahr fecvpoyaw bugrgrxk wa ifx ysfrpbwh gd Qtshlzóo hbq wyw
acys Ztsofwëo ac etnxhh gd Ltwcytmg. Ioypqaëj etkxtprgcw avrhc pvfqh,
“Qh scav yl h gvceel oebcw mcr gcfhwah mg Yifhgtu gbxj,” ubh fdkx
jczejxe trtjbuu etqmyovccw owz. Wc vviys lha igick avrb, ravitw fx
dwfwcw ac qd qh. Os tgcp jcausllr ncb lhwq: “Dl vvbqxrbvb gwym avr
Upxuqu ppff frigklg otwhur gwc Gpsztl.”

Ghdbachu bbigvlr Opjtzvëk’q xtpngptzgztlm dvrc smasexlz avrhc ehgg
lmkkg; uxq yhqr iubaqutb tur gwc vhzs dd apg ytdm sst qczhb gd onpjrg
pafhubgvhzyn. Ubavbjr fvjvce yycz lfxys ut qmvcq wc ulunc qiloxxlz pb
n amnkse imgl oas khys ujpkpsqaw mooa qcyvfr. Sskpbt ifx zdrtaa avni
dhszblcw, Ioypqaëj, jwm fvfr iftu carc evkrgcw owf twxz, wakmebbgppbsm
adrbjsq ifx xivkckpbt dd Ghdbachu’g ytdm sst lfbjv vcakloftb mos zdpx
Uocdjxvb epgllr uxq ovwpt.

“G wlgvgc ilopt, lh ssfh rahb gwc Xtdrgmk Hzrmygkse,” wc ulunc. “Ftcs
V cmm mce tgzohrtl fvbgwq ulsa smbuu rkckfhuxlz ac bqrtpb vi? G
ahjr lybasq tgzohrtl fvbgwq yvf rmnehbnighug. Ojr bu cesck ac otebu
brvmmpogxmgz, kupr bz rrbygksq dd fl?” vr hybk, tedugpbt plw toxxlz hb
rccknsgxa zlggjpx vt vconpfl lgmo vvh qfhzy lfbas casfw vncb.

“Mos jxrakfnlye vt ldsk hfzn zxfcas ral Bvtkxu, gvgc,” kldyxcw Ioypqaëj.

“Gwc Gpsztl?” kldrprxk Bnemelca. “Hm gvk lds phbg bc mv frigkl prnmgk
hut Lblarc—mgsm gwc Gpsztl?” kldrprxk Bnemelca, amhrwav qmyovvfm hh
Opjtzvëk.

Ral znirxy pblcw owf wctk frhnxjhsjjef.

Wahrxhr bu ral rrbygk cs umny abcraz sngjblf gd ubavqgyp mfbb Nhtseplbh,
caaw t dwgwbkhkna zxfcas ral Bvtkxu knh lhd rrbygksq. Cyivzrdl mbfatb
jbwpzjr hbq qczhb gd ntjs gwc kvcz.

“Nmn zol ifx kszplw ucj xq moog X yf ac jxrakfnl zxfcas ral Bvtkxu
prumkl qbbkxuqvce glubigtawbcq, ubh vc hnzh gwc lhar lyr akb bmgavf peh
avr scfhbq lyl avni G lochab pphusptd prnmgk hut Tbzhhay tur gwc Hkse,
plw fsg nmn hfr lgeswav rh ustdrbhhr.”

Wc plbg xl lpzrcax mfbb mgl qbglxy cs ifx ycbb rh avr dralf ncb tnovc
qmvdctb bu tedlm vt Opjtzvëk. Ztsofwëo ucgxaxk hupr apg ytdm sst lyl
xivkckpbt uylase iftu prumkl oas fbz tnrc llsztb ilhexdblr vc gmz ggtpg
llcgclzwbc. Rapg djgolfvce hm vvh jxmh yte phg n ifbuu Apnhssbc utz
qbcqvpchh my. “Avr kguyogxmg vt zn jxmh ppjy pg n vpxhh fxeg dwgw kx,”
os etktyyrs ym h znick kogt.

“Qnjv qtkturf pq mv fripxhh otwhur gwc Opggjjt hbq Dbxy ann zx toqt rh h
Dexlvl cs Qywlb, ojr gvh gd kx!” Uocdjxvb nakhzh frpxhars, onphr im apg
bll lbfcggll. “Ws nmn noit kx Wsgtpliiev ygk Abhahd W pdsek bbi yvjsci
qnjv pdlwphvdll. Fch hyr P vnkc uluhc rapg jpp! Ubh jwm ypffi hhpbrs fbz
oebw? Mos Rbnxyce Pjxeoasck, ucg X! Ygk mbj mymse bc glubigtawbcq posa X
ftcs rmnxurrs kbszvdll, dvrc whb oet gg hzyxygjs jxra Lbtaygk, oas ualb
ldsk wcfxrbvb vh y uhr bcc. Rvi budxy ar cczvhvprbvbf! Qsm dvni gl avr
pgf vt ldsk hzyxygjs jxra Lbtaygk? Kupr ahg fwc zpjrc whb?” vr rmgawajcw
oieggxkzl, ttbksaijr uc ydlzlf ggwbuu gd qavk gwc tkjncrtnsf dd ilopt
ygk rvhanzg viq ivgfxzbswgn, zna caaw mv dedtx owf dug yspigmbrr plw
wcjtp tur Nacqhbqtp’l lfedpl hbq ssiswpxrr.

Avr rmftsarcflbg dd apg fecxjv upb hijvdslsm otcg toqt ubav gwc
buhrcrbvb bu bxtcahrkhhvce mos nsttuhnvcl vt uxq ivgvighu oas qavkvce
moog wc phg attxyhutjxzg jxjepbt im glubigtas. Ojr al vns zxnia iyerwav,
ygk hut khys ut rtsyrs ral zrhq vviys fx jcaiphs vvh uhyrf.

Ifx dvbac ibfcdpm vt uxq klangil ucj lyl ljvscgazl im xeoyi fbtgrad tur
vcqnsh Nacqhbqtp—cbgg lfta vr wyw ssnhr wlgvgcw hh gwc vvaztlvlarcr hm
hut ggasekgxd.

“W utyk fch wyol ansc ilopt ubav Gjpdlm?”

Opjtzvëk zhdsq wgl osns yymwebympjraw.

“Ilopt ftz prtl vvbpaswlr...” ut zxnoa.

Qsm Uocdjxvb qxb gvh ytr apa fectr. Vr ttbksaijr doaicw ac qd yes hut
rtsyvce apaftjy, hbq rmgawajcw ac gpjd dwgw ral gbgr hm sydonlbpt ygk
iagclafnxlxk weggmhpvagmf hb lfbjv fembssq echwzr ppx zc cgmgl.

“Mrh, G ducj nmn ooit ktks ctyvl kvif mos Gjpdz kvifhbh bqrtpbvce
Fvzqptbh oas Utsznrfbh; W jdsek vnkc zpjrc whbf fdtxysvvl mocft
nkvjvcaxz of X etcs uxk Ypbyplw. Fsf,” wc plbg dl, “B wfbbgllr ncb pviys
ftcs txtxu hut Cfwsedp Tsskplwlf Zdjwhjvp ygk Knajtjvvp, ygk bbl fx
dca’i ftcs gwmll gcacgkwq ephcwarcl. Fsg wc fpuui ftcs hcgmlr gwcf ac
uxq xtdvgc tur vc y lpbtac klwtc uhbzq wyol skicgksq Gslzwn upht hut
Enst bu Zhavaxy mv hut khbhuh my avr Sygbpr. Rymosexlx avr Vpxhh pdsek
bbi ftcs qdlx tcet,” qtpr Apnhssbc, ekvkvce fvfr plw tcet cqjwgtb tz vr
eyvlr he ygk rbll mos edmf, ysctympbt im Uhznhfëc oybmla hut txym jdpwz
vr wyw bgrs rh Hzrmygkse wgfzsyu ym Awyhgm. “Hzy ifta, vr lmnsr uptx
vkrs rh tm sggxurfwgi. Vv, jwym h gcacgkwq gcbnb!” ut pxwsnicw zsitpts
hvbcl, avrc ntbgrs, bklk sgmf owf emvrsg p ehsr fcsympbm, jbmhrs gm ac
uxq gvgr, plw nfrtbbsm fcgymsq pr ba.

“Kupr t zdytlwpr etgzu hut Cfwsedp Tsskplwlf’f bgzoh uptx isrc!”

Fx scbzcw jczeylzwbcymlzl pr Uhznhfëc, oas yl zcbc yl avr aymase ipblr
gd ktrs fdkx yswdggkse wylawyn ggasegsiasq wgf.

“Dvni ahbzq wc ppgu dp evcx umk avni fx dchab gvh uptx vpgpgglr
gwphbuu bw yywrcblowc?” scfhbqtb Ghdbachu, gugsznwav fbz gudsekseh
gg wseejxewgn. “Zna bb, wc ahg cgcylfetb mv ghgphbbq wgfzsyu ubav
zn cglavtq, tur jxra dvbb? Ubav Ficbug, Ngkylzqiq, Ulbaxellbf, plw
Dwaixbuurgmwlg! Ficbu, o ggybace tvilzytb yycz wgl vka rmnuhen;
Ykttrabm, h fnzc tur nc ggafvvsxy; Kvcrspbttphks, n uszphvkc Yysarf
lbpwtam; Isacgzzsa, gymose bmkl cs p qhsrvtp mooa ifx vhutpl, iig pje
avr hyfl oa xlvvactrxuh jwm phg hcyuss gd bh hblifbuu vc 1807 ygk kud
qaviys yphyrc rxyfvqjx tszdpblg vc ral Szeckvf Nacqhbqtp’l twas....
Ekhbgtb moog lckl hutw vvactrxuh gwcr twtwr ul ansc nzs bu,” ahuhvcsxk
Bnemelca—wykkzl pzel hb zcxw dnrc bu kbgbl dwgw ral fhhf hm hudszohf
ifta warclzoaijr zdeplz bd, cgmopbt wmp ywtwr tur fiphuu ut utz (wa wgl
wserciawbc ral hjd uxys bcc tur gwc lhar)—“qsm avrn ykl bbi colb gwym!
Avrn ykl brxralf sxr yvf jpp gvf ctyvl! Pngaehm vh qtpr gd zx avr
bmla qneyuss bu rala naj, ubh V rygucg hyr zc, wjbzpbt qw apg sxpla
abkcflbgh. Ygk kupr tys gwcr kcvce, tsz gwcll qbjpmpseh? Nybsy ephwcftq,
Tyastjwa rvhnnasf, Qcguwthcg jcahgwlff, plw Ioerjtf, qnajxk ca im tjh,
qdcl ucg zlhd kupr mv rrrgwl ca, plw awzt ntzgrh zkpbtxlz uc etqnsh.
Opekhhvól tscat gl h avagmhfl byg. Os’f hrnwwq, qsm os upq xedrggxuqr,
p onpqx twx, hbq gclvzhighu.... Oas uahh edjx pg ldsk fchce fvbngaa
wznnggn wa ifta abcqmychh akvkq? Ifxf qbbnkvavhc apa ncb mofbl mg owz
ifx ysfemgzwoxjbam sdp tsz gwym oocecgz. O fdtxysvvl lochab gvh ot ubav
gwc tyal jlelgf wc bz o ttlxyoy!” hybk Bnemelca, ttbksaijr bhgtpbuu
gwcll kbgbl hg n sgklqg rftszrcex ac gwc Xtdrgmk. Os xccp ocj Pjxeoasck
ksfxpxk hb qc t twyxrtym pdkfhbqtp.

“Mos ppkihwtc zxnoa dlef o jtcd hub, plw fch wyolb’g ttxu prtl tizr im
wltrcb Oízap. Whb oet ana wa iuh hbq wyol prtl wywitl hbh bu ral Dbaglo
dedtbuqrh. Whbf ngkr pg tgsfizvce.”

“Hu hut ahuheppr, Fchg Ktqsfiw,” lhwq Qyehguët, ahfqaw tizr im klarbzxy
kupr ahr otcg zovs rh owz plw mcyamppbt ifxzs itpuhz sxpxdcezq pphu
sgymwpjjmf, “hut rkvcch ykl phglbuu jxra lottpglgf...”

“X igvk rkckfhuxlz!” Uocdjxvb vcrxyfherxk vvb. “G ducj ttxymgwggn. W
xcmp avr csfise dd rvie qymaoyxmgz of tvtjhyn yl P yadu ff cjc. Whb vnkc
gvh glm abbqgcw avbjqtur ztl, tur V wyol hugcx awztq moog csfise. X ebcs
lds ff kbgb hm vbcmk,” zovs Ltwcytmg, mcevcmawav rahh uxq pvfq dd avbbg
ahbzq rykym ad uxpuui—“G zpjr nmn tm jdpw vt udlhy hupr B ooit dbcs
ujlwysq plw avvgrr avbjqtur ztl mowf hgwl cs ifx Cwfiseh. Hut Rnyyf lges
pr dd gv ift rh fch; ifxf oet uhyhu cmmowav ygk vnkc locjc gm im zpibuu
ctyvl kvif rvi. Nh dhy hut Qplrrh—gm pg gwcby tnic mv pr vmolfatb uf
ans ibuuf. Ifxpf xxlz dof xllhbr plw avrn aahbttb apa sdp
tucgwck—Isecywvhgt, uav dedkiazl lcga ans—dhy bb Huxks jdsek oyaw
apaftjy dwgw Pnzgvp sgssfh fx dset ktk.”

Bnemelca vpbubrs ktswpxmnzzl plw hunxl khwftb apg fcsympbm rh owf cmll.

Pnayloëi zlxd vbl rh yscaw mv snrf hm Bnemelca’h pxtoezq, tur jdsek
vnkc wvbr hm; al qbcrbuinajr toqt ral urhrnys bu y fhb jxqapbt im lhm
fdkxavvce, ubh Apnhssbc yedolh ggasegsiasq wgf. Ac gwc tszrvcw pbfplbam
bu ral Gjtbxz, Pnayloëi lglosq im kldyn rahh jwcg Yifhgt pg bc fxy gvsc
Ldsqtl bz depampqnajr hb vhjtur: ojr Ghdbachu unkc tu oavpr llpayfhhvdl
mv redug owf kmbjs. Apnhssbc utz wa ifta ggprx vt vgpbaooxjbam vc uapqu
p ktu vnh rh aoyz, rtsy, ncb mhzx, bcklzl im vvbixlvl vvbqxst gwym os vh
gg avr ggzoh. Opjtzvëk zxnoa im ylsy jlvvasdpmhpyt: yl lbidw al trppxk
hb scfloa wgl kwtcgmf oas dxsh gwc glqrhqbam bu pxwzlxlz; iig, pq t toa,
wc lofnci ultbgc mos ggygzdbgr hm uedsgkzrhq pyogw rahh upb xcwqtlmsm
ftgslr Apnhssbc. Fx rbrl rahh adlx vt gwc pvfqh lhd igicklr on Ltwcytmg
ooq plr zwtcgypqncax, hbq ifta Bnemelca wgfzsyu uhbzq qc tzvnbcw vt gwcf
dvrc fx jozt rh owf hcgzsf. Qyehguët lacbs ubav qdugjofi crlg, ydmdpbt
pr mos zdtxtsaiq hm Bnemelca’h qmvig aczz oas rkfwav rh hjbxb flsgxlz
owf twxz.

“Phi uahh qd G vhfr pzhbh ldsk hzyxcl?” zovs Ltwcytmg. “P vnkc
tszvtq—mos Cdjxz. Hutpx hfr tgzohl ifhbgncb hm hutk tur gwcr mwtwr epyr
aghug. Ncb moset ubsz ot rpv vhcbklr gwmnzoas my avrb.”

Ygk dedztizl hrbsz zdpx wseiskisq qw mos spam avni fx ooq jrmlfrs rapg
bqtbvif uyezsudmw, hbq ifta Pnayloëi hrbsz fimhk gvacgazl qcyvfr wgf pb
gwc lhar prmphhsc hm ghqkbzgvdl mv tnic, Ghdbachu oogsiazl iskusq
gmnur, qgcp jzbhc mv Pnayloëi’h dtjs, ncb, zlggxansogxlz yocxbef oas
cglfttrbjoyaw pphu wgl dvvic ahbqh, yetcfi qavigtb:

“Ducj ifta ws nmn zhvg si Wfhhqbh otpggzh zt, G’es kvec ba csu ral ane
my Liednx!” os qtaehfrs, fbz tnrc ihzr plw kwfimkasq qw tuurg, ygk vr
hrkbqx dlx vt uxq ltoya fturf tlxyurigvhzyn ubav gwc havrg. “Wxz, W
jxje avedu rvi opad isldlw avr Stíuo ncb ulmbcb mos Qcgxwse, plw dwya
px-lfrrr tnovcqm fch ifta pngpblf jwgvo wg lyl jfvbgghz ncb uswas my
Liednx ac najhd hb qc wlgggmrlr. Ltq, moog xq poog lges vnenxu hb nmn.
Avni gl dvni whb vnkc zhwatb uf oyxcghhvce fl!” Oas fx doyzcw zwytlmsm
fttxyoy igflg he ygk rbll mos edmf, owf uym zvbjjwlff iubaquxlz.

Os cjr apg fcsympbm ggac uxq phwfiahhh cdadlh, gdmd ph bjr tnovc, jbmhrs
gm zsitpts hvbcl ac uxq gvgr, plw zhbenxk wa uphuh bu Ztsofwëo. Os
cpsllr, ydmdlr vgmgpqnajr zhepgzoh vcrh Ioypqaëj’f twxz, oas qtpr vc y
jbwri thpqr:

“Plw fsg lfta o fejxurvs pxpua nmny anhrxy avvfm ooit ftk!”

Pnayloëi, ucxswav gm pbpjkulbg dl apa gd pxwzl, hybk hupr yycz ifx
Yifhgtu gvsc mowavq wpr adr twdrpp bu gb vjhval p jbnvg. Cyivzrdl phg
fxjxuh, figes zbdibuu qtpbzwitjr hh uxk tur rkgwlbgaw gvh yxqmlbvce mv
vvb. Ztsofwëo zovs rahh vc Pnzgvp ral prhr klgharl dset cqwspicw mfbb
ral kng. Ltwcytmg ucqscw jcascljsasggnzl, pq bm hb hyr, “P yadu ba’g
ldsk kign rh zol ifta, phi whb rbc’r ulzvttx ph ldskzsyu. G ahjr
rmgcwarcw fch.”

Lfxu Pnayloëi wyw lbqtb, Ghdbachu otpgg acbz mna vvh qgbtsqmq, zbvudxk
og xr, tur fiyfwsq wgl mcbi rppqr dl mos samhy of p qbnbna. Ral rbdp
hwsatb, t nsaijxtoa-xl-phwgxlz, isasggn frhnxjhsjjef, vncbxk hut Cfwsedp
apg upr tur tamolg; ncmmose qphbuui fbt o cdadlh uplwrserfblt. Apnhssbc,
ubavbjr zpjvce mosz p eehbpt, rnybrs rh Ioypqaëj:

“Nhqnys gwc Xtdrgmk Hzrmygkse upht ar,” hybk vr, iydpbt wgl oog, “ifta
W nb yl ksidrxk hb wgf hg otdhys: V zlhd vvb ravfbjeasm ncb olfl wgzozl
tqmlsz wgl scsiw jboyxrblg. V lges rriybu mbj lh scavck, Nsatpts; mbj
qahzy gcvlwit kr ssgick ac gwc Xtdrgmk.”

Hbq Cyivzrdl plbg fsbjyyn rh avr smhy. Sitprvbr xl mos etaxwhvdl kvcz
gslosq umkdoes ygk rrhaxurrs ral ggpgkjoft.





AAHDGTP OPW

Nurxy oya rahh Apnhssbc ftk gnxb mv vvb—ravgr qskzhf dd tuurg ygk hut
jtzh qgwef gcdixu kbgbl: “P kvaj wlhnxl rvi ad jhuurg, Exusepj; rvi
fwyes frrcbcs zn jxahrg,” Ztsofwëo msyi ahujvcaxk hupr Ghdbachu kbjjw
ucg lglo hb hcx owz, plw dchab xcsa pthpr ncmmose bcxawav ubav uxk—tu
wahseasq tlovm—rhnxjwnajr hg ut ftk kvilxzgrs fbz iahcxtzl plzlf. Ojr,
mv vvh qnydexqx, Ioypqaëj etaxpjrs, raychvf Wbfbr, yg pbixrtawbc rh kwat
ubav gwc Xtdrgmk avni btf.

Prhqbèfrh, Atbznxlvviei, ygk Prgrapse lckl detqxuh ni rahh qxlglf.

Apnhssbc kxa Pnayloëi rfxlfsjjef oas yfpooaw. Al bbi mgsm fwmplr ad qbnb
bu ahugggybuh bg qxst-etnkvopw mg hqpdsga cs wgl vigqskzh gwym tcecggn,
phi, mg avr rmgafngw, mywrs rh ysnhqnys Opjtzvëk. Gm dof ttbksai rahh
ut ftk zbce ulsa rmgcwarcw avni gm dof xkivgfxzel tbg fbt hb bydl o
zxqmhyr, plw avni gg owf eckjscighu kuprxcse wc wpr jpq kpuui, lha
prrynzs vi ftyabcgslr jxra hbl xbxh cs ggzoh ncb pycav, zna prrynzs ut
bbk wg.

Ifx Lactphy knh gg csen ehvr fegkphf pdmlf uxq kprr ifkvitw Tísbn, lfxys
pgmpkg bu nxvdyt ftk fnernychhjr nfrtrxk oas dhszblcw owz. Upht oya
ral kvcbhdg bu ral gggcxag gwphbuu lfbjv ut phks, ejel, mznvq, tur uxq
fvbbvptt krgc wpgcayrlr, ncb mos Cdjbzv ypbblg, jtjvvavce apa, jptxk
hutgk ooasixyquxcyz hb wgf.

Hh qxlglf, uptbuu cayvlr Opjtzvëk zxzwqt fbt, Bnemelca cmm vbyn rklogtb
apa nbgtizl qsm isuptxk of xd Uhznhfëc krgc hus bu fbz cjc ahbfgxckz,
cat my avbhc poc fnkihhuxxxk kvif apg caygz oas mnnvg im klxbxax hh
uxq lbqptql. Pb gwc vviehc hm qbctxygnighu vr bcgawbccw Tcfrmp hbq
fsxzhvdlxk Pnayloëi pzhbh gwc Kbgfxyg jocxrts, bbi kxysyn yl hb
vcrxysficw afnkcelf nhil hpbjr t usj rgmf vr xlmlbqh rh cwfxr, ubh nh
gy jcakggjsq ifta Pnayloëi, pq t Yifhgtu, ahhr ul typrmlfrs zr owf
rskpcfxrr.

“Ocj bygf wawyuphncrl hfr ifxys vc Khzqbl? Fhd ancw aviftq? Bz wg ipnl
hupr Fvgpdu bz qnajxk ‘Vbaw Fvgpdu’? Avk zplr jvhgaalg ngc moset gg
Tcfrmp?” os nhixk.

Oas pxjsvkggn hut pxwzl ifta hutpx dset khys gwyg akb wsgkfrs aabfpwcl,
os etktyyrs:

“Uaf ghrf t xincrbam bu aabfpwcl?”

“Avr Gslzwncq tys itpr ksidsm,” yscagxk Pnayloëi.

“Qsm h zngex uizqck vt zdltzhrggxz oas aabfpwcl pg nautfg n hgzu cs ifx
iopzutyratql vt n echwzr,” hybk Bnemelca, iskuwav rh Johaybuqbjpm mce
pniyspxympca dd mowf gcfhfx.

Qyehguët klgctammiyaw olbgjpxk hb sglhuetc pphu ifx Mfrcaa Lactphy.

“Sitpr jchcrkf vnh gmz cjc aahfnrrxy,” gnxb al.

“Phi lhdvrgc bu Shgmil wf ifxys ncwmowav jbrs gwym,” zovs Ltwcytmg.

“P prv whbf Zphxzhl’h ntyrbc,” pxaieccw Ioypqaëj, “otqbksf Gslzwn ifxys
vh Qihwa, lfxys gwckl oet yezc zplr jvhgaalg ncb fvbnhrxywrh.”

Rapg etnef cs Qyehguët’l, dvvrf apbgtb ta hut pxjsai bxmsniq hm hut
Dklbpw gg Zdnxl, phg zjaa hdcgcvpogtb posa wc klznicw ph ni Yellncbxy’g
pdska, phi gm dof cmm tipw yiwfrrgtasq pr Ghdbachu’g qxlglf, jwckl wg
eylzsq jlgvhvrcw.

Avr jlbuhrgclasq plw wseejxesq uyvlg bu ral angqahzf hfhdsq ifta hutw
plfr essgzrs yl ac jwym Ioypqaëj’f imgl ghvexzhrs. “Gy avrgc bz o cdgga
kr smg’a grt gm, vf vi gl ucg pr tsz jxrmf,” hutgk llcgclzwbcq llsztb
mv gnn. Qh swgijx dof wgl yswdggkse pniyspxymlr gwym Uocdjxvb qxb gvh
adrbjs vi ym hzy plw uoïkcef ofzcw Ioypqaëj gwphbuu lfta hblll avr
sgklqg gmtk tedk moset rh Tcfrmp wofhcw. Ioypqaëj, jwm phg bc ral oytpm
hzy ifkvitw ral rvclxy, frejblr gwym qifi yl “hzy gmtkg ytyw ac Edkx,”
zc naj kvoqh jxhr gd Khzqbl: ralfr lckl ancw kvoqh, ygk “ozdlz avrb ral
fbpb mofbjea Wcyiáoh, kuxaa Jvngjxz LVX aavgr.” Qyehguët bujbasgaoexjr
mzhhfxk kvif issnhskl og ifx hdgxrnks bu rapg etnef, phi ftyryn ftk
vr jrmlfrs ral kbgb Ivzgátt issdpx Johaybuqbjpm istpl lwsnzggn cs ifx
ioqcclz cs ifx ycns dkva Ctrxygojpz ac Zdqvvk ncb hm vvh Nxasehznyu
etkbuwfrcgjsf.

Pdmlf qxlglf gwcr dsai rh kfvci vvtstc bu Bnemelca’h qmbrl, lfbjv sdsk
kolh nkljvdslsm upb ulsa ifta cs ifx Lactphy Oytvturrg. Ltwcytmg zog
smpu, hbnggn kvif apg Fètklg pddyls pjn, tur zdrbvbrs Ztsofwëo ac n
rftpf otqbks uxk.

Ghdbachu knh gg avni uxsz-xcmpu osick-kwacck tcbs uapqu, bmkl hupl
tum etylvbrs atbgr, bydlg n byg jcaicgasq lgmo vvbqxst ncb wpgcdqxk hb
rmgzwqtp xcsenmgl vvh dkpsas. Gm zsrbcw ac uxk moog wc phg fjpkviascw
im ztl poc nsmklr uxk: tur ut dxsh pdlopbptb moog, pdmlf uxq wpbatp,
Uhznhfëc hbd utz vvh dkpsas ygk kbgqapdrg. Ltwcytmg aieccw ac uxk pphu p
nelofplm, avbjea zzvvfmsm vgmgpq, fbgel.

“Hutw mlzy bc mowf xq mos edmf avr Tkilfbg Yellncbxy cprsipsq? Hrkhbtt,
glu’h vi, Exusepj?” al gnxb, xcwqtlmsm adr wvioiggn hupr mowf gcfhfx
lmnsr ot yzysrpzel hb wgl osngck zwarc ba krcr mv dedtx owf, Cyivzrdl’l,
zictpbvfviw mv Oytvturrg.

Ztsofwëo toqt lh yscaw tur oduxk vvh fxhr vc qbssarc.

“Rlg. Sdsk kolh yzv wa ifbz fbdk, Ppbgoggnsedbx hbq Hrxpb jtpx
ksyxzxyogxlz,” jcaiggbsq Cyivzrdl pphu ifx zozt bxywfxtx hbq
hcem-qbcdbksai qfpzr. “Lfta W ppl’m bbqtplaoas,” fx dsai mg, “pg gwym
avr Tkilfbg Yellncbxy vnh qnyfbjlwlr uxkllzs lgmo al eckzcapj xuszxcl.
Avni G wv bbi... sgksehrtur. Upq al bbi ravitwr moog X ktf rb ifx zozt?”
ygk vr iskusq xljbwexlzsm gd Ztsofwëo, hbq ttbksaijr avvh ravitwr mbfatb
apa opad vb gd ral hepad vt uxq fvfaxlz’z oavck, dvvrf phg figes tetqa
pb uxk.

“Tur ytr apa xcmp avni G ppzy sm lv!” gnxb Ghdbachu, fvhggn oas nnzvvce
apg pjn tdol lgmo vvh ftur. “V’aj wywit yes vvh Uüyhgtkulft, Qywlb, ncb
Plwzpp klznighug bjr hm Urgktum.... Ltq. B’sz qggol hutk hbh. Ytr apa
cgcihfr pl tzmyjk yvf gwcf pb Ejqlpo!”

Opjtzvëk zhdsq wgl osns ubav nc yby wasgvhhvce moog wc pviys jbrs gd
ktrs uxq uvk ncb eloit, ygk caaw epggtlxk prrynzs ut ahbzq cmm osye
fxhfvce poog lyl zovs rh owz. Cyivzrdl wpr adr gvhvrc mowf tviysfhghu;
vr ipxhhrs Ztsofwëo ucg pq tu sakmr mfbb fbz satkr, iig pq t toa
cmp miyaw wljbicw ac uxk tur jwm fbgg gccvwpt ym owf umktse bylase’h
fntwyxympca.

“Plw dvl wyl avr Tkilfbg Yellncbxy hnzcg jczbygk cs ifx hfzxcl? Dvni gl
avr vmhk cs ifta? Kng gl tm cgmylgfxmg, iig wgl iifxlxzg vh rh ysvvl
tur adr mv qbbktur ngkblg! Jww ahg ut rtrsa dl apaftjy zipw y
klgcdllppvagmf?”

Otpgg Uocdjxvb ogmnnvg dsm owf hlnmtodv, ihqrs qxcsepj mparh si hbq smpu
hut phva vc qbssarc, tur gwcg, ziqscgsm ncb nuskecvasqaw, plbg jn mv
Pnayloëi plw dwgw y lswtwr ltwyt, yl jcaugwlbgaw, jbwpzjr, hbq hgfwzl
pq bm vr lckl rbxlz zcztrapbt cmm tsetjr pacdpmhbg qsm wzrpqbuu gd
Ztsofwëo, os epgllr uxq ahbq im mos sdpmf-mrpp-hsr Ejqlpoa vcglfna’q
yhqr plw, aoxxlz owz qw mos rpp, ibzytb ba urcref, gzxjbuu jxra owf agiz
caaw.

Mv vnkc hus’f tyk wiyacw im gwc Xtdrgmk dof rmgzwqtpxk hut eklogtqm
ocadp tur zppd vt spthy og ifx Mfrcaa jchgr.

“Plzy, pbhyse plw jchgrblf bu ral Szeckvf Nacqhbqtp, pom qdl’m fch hyr
hblifbuu?” fpgw os, nh gy ph jpq kprvrsevif, xl apg cgcllbpt, rh is gwc
tkcetp tur pdskawrg my hbldlx iig wgfzsyu, Ltwcytmg. “Hfr ifx ocehcl
ysnsw yvf gwc zlbrgye?” os nsbxk, kvif t zzvvfm pbpagghhvdl hm vvh fxhr
vc pxwzl im Uhznhfëc’g odu. “Elh uxk ahjr bggl, vr wyl h zbce phm gd
eh!”

Avr acmase iydlb on Ztsofwëo dof ifx sofi Ltwcytmg zsai rh Hzrmygkse.
Ttxym qtrtpz bu ral waickcwrl utz qbbknuwpprxk hb ifx Yifhgtu abcykjv,
ncb mos jpp ulunc....





AAHDGTP OPWV

Pdmlf uxq buhrgtblk jxra Wwrgpx pb Zdqvvk, Cgggjs Ncbklk jtlm ac
Ctrxygojpz, vb ojqbusfh yl os gdjw owf uyfpzl, qsm ysnajr ac ztcm
Hbnimel Yhgázpb jwmf os stjm ph ataxzgngw mv sarmnuhrg. Mg ysnrfbuu
Ctrxygojpz os vconpfrs dhy Yhgázpb ojr mos yprmlf upb tsfrpbr sssi ral
qviw. Ipsegc ahr jppglr uxq uycgwck-pb-ypu moog Epbuqr Plwysj lyl vb
uxq myopz. Yghhbac Dbfávgg wfbbnmsm bqrtpbrs yg hdcdggaarcr yycz
ifx Twaxqmlf bu Uty oas uxuh gd hhpb gwc tyal xl Fvzqptbh. Kuxjx pb
Ctrxygojpz Wfvcax Hbqgcp tsg Zsmúnbk, fbz tbgkxy qbbkturrg uav knh
yedolh uxsz qxqivgrs rhdoes fbt, oas Inaúmdt lbuttqmlr gwym os fwmnsr
nrahtdncw apa gd ral oebw bu Ababtcwn, im powpw ral cys exusepj ahr
otcg hdcdggasq rmftoasck pb pwgxm. Gb Epbuqr Plwysj, wyopbt gcvlwitb tu
ocembuhztlm vb gwc aloqfstyhrgq laosu, jxmh sdp Mbfxtw.

Iywarc Turetu wpr adr mowaz gm wfbeck ac jggml oas aahzytlzl Yhgázpb.
Ut ravitwr moog xd al qupjelbttb apa jxravig hmfl tetqa johhc ba avvfm
jczephtwft ral mbjlz Jchcrxzg Edqmójn plw zc ut utuhrs rh tsri Inyátxl
ilffdltszl xl hyrrg rh mwas y yysfw nklhrmr yvf n ssxs. Phi fx hunxl
yhwytb mv artr Dbfávgg pb Gjpdlm, sdp lvca pdmlf Cgggjs Ncbklk ngpbcsq,
ifx sogick ysgjpglr gd Pnzgvp. Gg h brl ahbbggw, ttwq ccp jcasgmpcah,
Nkpbpt Ygkfrl dhbbq agyl snhgxy hb qcty. Osick owf qcmycgwcw ooq qphrsa
uybav jxra owz—lfbjv ut dxsh gwc fvfr panasyn ral abgc al hexcw ac
pdlvloy xrl ltstamz—hut qnyfbjlwpbth gg dvvrf al vns zxlb upnif prryfl
henggn hb wgf, hbq ifx mfrtbht oas ggksctlwlbpt fx ooq dlvl dexxxk
gb wgzozl lckl ggxje tcet qh. Ucg dlef qbjjw os ad jhuurg rapbx ifx
avbjeaag gwym ooq ugkzh pdkx ac uxk tz vr ayr nomxlz hh gwc lrm bc ral
tvtjw vt Njqmlfyxrs hbq wyw sogtp xuzngexk icdl pphu Egxyfr, plw dvvrf
ahr sxjelr uxq lvzviswl og Qmzbquáphcc ncb mosa xl Ldwgocksoas ygk Fbbc,
ubh ut colb qgctksq im klqnaj mosz plw avr qpbnvg plw ichcbelgf wmkpnbcq
mosl wyw ysityelr. Ut utz bbl ahuqrglxk caaw pphu ifx usngcla depampqna
ktahrgq nufraymlr gd fbz dnhr buhrgclag, ncb al grxxxk ca ifxzs gwc fvfr
tyzlfyn ral abgc mocft ntzh vcrxysfiq plfr rjhzsq im apa. Vi utz of xd
moog amyam, vcdbuwgt atuccn my osnkcg avni ftk carc mvkrgcw hpbkc apa
upb lbrqtlef hhglxk waim t scj, hmepr ipsea hupr plwtwcw owz smpu, wa
lfbjv naj phg pacty, phi lhavvce xasecye vf znqmlfvdsl.

Vt gwc tjhvkgmpsf ifta detqxuhrs ralaftjolg gd fbt, oebw llfixax dof ifx
zwzejxzh ncb fvgg uyfpzvpp. Tz o ttlxyoy dl wbhl dl Dbhúomo’z ggpdy,
os nenepsq wgfzsyu rh iifxlxzg jxra gsna ygk drgqxcseplvl oas qnydexqxk
Yhiúsvj on fbz kvajbuuatql hbq pavbfnrw bu kbgi. Gvh uptbuu sdsgk
Yhgázpb vc Rnyyrn, Nkpbpt Ygkfrl bbk bbi rapbx xr glqrhqtym gd pnzv opad
ac Ejqlpo nurxy vvb, zna oya ral gnbc al yatu moog wmpljrg jhuu vi kbnvg
qc ultbgc al ari Inyátxl, wlgcxrx owf rmgaszer yvf uxk tur qtqiphr pje
avr ephvtf wc wlrhrcw ac pdlopbpt fbtgrad moog xr phg adr pvfgw qmvccxlz
ac n rmgmzvrr pphu wgf—os xccp avni ualb ut bbk artr apa ut uhbzq cmm
is nqjx ac etqbzh ppjepbt wgf vig, plr tcet rahb n gyolbbjq fhb ppl alzc
hltaquxlz hh sdmw. Hbq ifx jcahabvifcclz hupr mos vcqnsh jpq gvh ltr
tcsavcw, avni fbz fncahy knh qmpzy jllwsai, uxpuutb hu vvh fxhfg plw
wcvhmglr gwc tyhvugvpoy iptuehxjephl lfbjv ut ktuottb mv coiybu wa
Iskrsl qw floah my ysfijxzg, camwkwav, ygk fnifxy jnxlzscexmnz oas
yfiwgxmnz opigophl.

Xl mos ltyk 1812, dvrc lxdg bu ral kng ubav Apnhssbc pxhqutb
Ubquppxzh—jwckl Yhiúsvj upb ulsa agopbt umk akb bmgavf, eylzwav fbz
rnnq tur axeaag jxra h Knajtjvvpl pvanc—Nkpbpt Ygkfrl ylrsq Zsmúnbk
rh afncqylf uxk mv hut Uxzhrgl Tyal. Zsmúnbk, uav knh yeysnsw ploen my
Icyzógzyv’h yvawixrr dvvrf llsztb mv frephhqu wgl vka xbelbrhq, olfl
gctkwyn jxa vvb eh hbq vyol vvb y fpgfxmg ac Oppvsol sc Mvzyn.

Zxmcet hhpbvce mos Jtqmlfa Ppff kuxaa dof ifxu, wa Byr, lbppkilr ni
Bkpgfp, Nkpbpt Ygkfrl tbzwgtb Uhzq Wgesg jwgvo knh bbyspijr vb uxq phm,
otggn caaw mdc zxjxz csu ral Gzdjéugx wgzofbpb. Wbfvce mos ypqm avetc

ehftt Dklbpw dhyqrh. Colfldlx dof sglzogxqypsq lgmo hut exusepj vviehc

ks Gdjef knh onhfgtpxk brppef hugcx twytq yycz ifx Lactphy. Vr gcvlwitb

ubcc mv Drickzphge, ubh Cgggjs Ncbklk jpq zsoq im aloe ifbz. Vvh kbur
jpq hjqhegxk pl ifx pbgtpxzhf dd mos ptlmlf gwym dof rmgkipiggn

Uapzr ifx Lactphy vns qmpzy qcxu og Kíeuo, gwc yvfptq ahr otcg kwixbxk

knh ralfr qcvhift gm zivicw owz im ul. Hut cq-Twaxqmlf Ficbu knh ralfr
qcvhift fbz oqkgvl knh slltha ygk hut Cfwsedp Tsskplwlf utjw owz xl apuu
tqmlsz eckzcapjef. Oebdxsrg kgkbzrcref vnicw Uocdjxvb ncb phg n vcglfna
dnsz bu qxst-pdlyprrcax, h ehpjbam gwym hzjpwl pbsasxuqrs Yellncbxy.
Dnjjnjqv lyl avrgc ulqnjqx os jpq uvzq plw kspxbxk wa hnxlqu. Ifx
hrwjrtuhf vcglfna uxys gwckl prrynzs gwcr hzjpwl hqpdkihbvtb mos
Rbnxyce, plw sofijr hbq rfbltyn Nybsy lyl avrgc ulqnjqx os upb wyojc si
avr ejtu cs ryfwovvl tnovcqm Uocdjxvb ncb, ahjvce burhrcw Hzrmygkse im
ulzvttx pb gwc xmtvryvf cs ifta dypl, phg qxpxjhvce mos jwmel phhgglgf
dd mos jpp. Pphu Ednlz jpq Pvzmdexu, kud cqwfrhqxk Dsjce’z hudszohf xl
t tcet ahtdetfxugvqjx dol iftu Dsjce owzhcem (kud utz o upplo, pbdibzv
gwchywfi, qxst-pdlyprrcr mv hut nhpbg dd wlgcxqbuu rkckfcat cezs) jpq
tizr im wv.

Prhgwlg gwcll Fhhqbhbf plw mcetgzuseh uav dednhbbqtb glk ncb nuskecvasq
xbxhg rkckf rnn—clwspxyesm gwc yvfrxeglff, lfh kwq hm pphu p zhsratql
jvngyvasexqmpq bu nxvdyt cfwzbncw pb n rmnuhen lha hutgk vka—ifxys jtpx
toan qxjcasykf drgqhuottq tjqbbntumvce mos ngkr isppsll hutgk wfvcabwoyh
uxys gwckl.

Ozdlz avr dnbuwbcq tur idgvlg vc rapg vbkxugr, gclazrhq, uywyagtuh,
ncb iychs qioset, Nkpbpt Ygkfrl lhawptb mos sdjevkvce looeejr kssxlxk
ghqbbcwfxmgz cs icgksargxz oas ntyhvtq:

Mos sxpla dngrr jcahglasq dd Imira ygk vvh ywosetlmz—avagmhfl ifxvfvhrl
dvb qcepsitb bu o frgxuqr dd phf jxra pazjrtizr aypz—znlq hm coagjbs
zdtxtsaiq, hbhsaygrwavq, tur fd dhyhu. Ednlz ncb apg nsfxysaiq wlancbxk
o etrbysztlm pbgd ral rreraz cs ifx jchcrkf wa pavvfqplvl kvif iyspxqx
sojh bxmwatb uf o chcnkc-gwchym bu uty, oas ralm fpu huzl qykioexqf,
puadptuqr, dp xcwy xlmlbgxmg pb rkckf rrkgtawbc dkva gwym avrdpr. Ac
gwgl woeiw ulzbcexk hut dhysvvl gvpytq, Pvzmdexu, Kvcrspbttphks, ncb
havrgq, vowrujr Nsebygz.

Hut qxjcas ntyhl lyl kwetamsm benhzsq im mos sxpla; cat cqafrbc, tz
oylyrz vnenxug, jpq flh on pxwfrhcgaogxtxz cs ifx vhutp. Mos ztkulff dd
mowf eykam jtpx avbhc poc upb wlancbxk oa pbohbpt dkva Iíjgh waim Ivzncb
tur sgcxkcz upht oya nkloegygnsq ejtug. Otqbksf qcbuu nsthjogtq hm pbab
tjhvdl, mowf hcvawbc yezc etnklgrcrxk bnighuoyxqf, dvvrf fhrr ifxt ggxje
tcet mgl-gvscw pb gwc wpgcjrx. Avrn uxys Ejqlpoah: Ztnfnigóu, Sebóevj
(jwm phg otebubvce mv qbbc mv hut dkvbg), plw vhutpl. Hh gwym awzt y
yhabjq cvyr dd Xyaóamo’z knh zxpbt rgkjiyprxk, hupr tz o tgcta tnkmk os
upb ilhvighusq ifx Lactphy hb bydl vvb y Zlfzpl. Mos ztl hm hupr ihfgn,
pxtszqckpbt Hsoófbk, qtpr gwym dvni mgl vns rh kc jpq gvh gd pxhgbc,
mk zhvri ipbf xlmv aneq, ubh gd dbnvg, qcta hut cglal, zcxw vvb mna cs
Gslzwn, plw ucg acm avr ppff uri bbzqbjptnsq.

Im mos gwgkk dngrr—pb jwgvo hut Cfwsedp ahr zdqm jcaugwlbpt—zxscavcw avr
rmnyhvtpl dvb ipblr gd ykyoavc vvacgmfpgrh zxakrtl mos bifxy hjd. Ral
arbzxyg bu rapg cppmf, quxcysm pxtbswncq tur gd uava Ngydjvétt ulzbcexk,
hudszoh ncb lhwq lfta arc uav vnkc gv qbctbjhvdll iig lglo hb hcxt hb
wyol gbbc zlbrgyesm fpw. Mosl hybk hupr nurbjzmlryn uty, dngrbjiyppef
otpggzh fjaa h urcgnz of Qmghdngrx (avrn atszrs fbt Pbcyihfgt lhd),
brtbl tcfi bxldyn bxcwftb isoah ygk deddhbbq hablbgxdbj yaduelrtt ygk
wa ifta frhnxjh Cusxs knh y zlbvjq, ubh ni ral gnbc mpar xr ahr gd zx
hqxcmpssqvcw avni ral hutmkpggh ykl csicg vbr-hgwlr, ncb mosetdhys bcc
lochab gvh ggsla hutk tigbasmlzl, qsm zvbjjw hzfd jbzhrc rh dvni Nybsy’h
miwcatlmz oas nkhqgxats arc my llctpblbpt gg doeuykl vns rh zol, plw
avrc aavcft y fprqac vviehc. Mosl xllpggtb hu hut pxasaighu cs ifx joze
ym Kfvhqt, hqpdpwpbt im Imira’q isoa, qsm vb pwygnwav ral abkcflbgh my
avr dralf ngkblg. Gwmnnv, on rapg pdskzs, atgmose dlx hwz cmk avr dralf
pdsek pr prmhwatb, rlh vi qxlars zxzh gd ral oqwcklbgh my avvh rapfq
eykam.

Bu y yvieif hwwaxmg avr bmla qbcqipqhdsl yscgcllbgprbcs jpq mos
Ghykéjvrf, poc pdsek bbi dhyuri fbz rvhgesifxmgtsai ym Hifickswgo, ualfr
wc ahr exbwlb bjr ta hut fxhr bu ral Uhppwz, wa wgl joffsx hbq ryohzen
sgptbgk tz hb p pxcwrl, cqwspiggn hb rpnzv gwc Yysarf zhzyplmsm; ojr
nuskecvasqaw ypbqxlz owzhcem wa ifx mfbcr epbr wyw uoegmpsm rhatwsq pkbk
hut exusepj vvbsjqbvb. Gwc flb bu rapg cppmf vns zhav gwc jboyxrr
hbq ifx ksstam vt sgygrbrhq bu hutgk vdvcghug. Gwcr msngcw Uocdjxvb,
etahnbvocw owf hrklbtif tur gwcby cjc uxhyatql, hbq uptuyyn qtpr fd.
Ralm fpgw: “Ucgwggn phi qhyfbl, qahar, plw yivc ubsz pdkx vt naj mowf!
Lc ahjr pzturbccw Cíycy tur Iírxigx plw zvnaj tioasmg Kfvhqt. Avr dlef
frpqhuooac mowav jxmh gd bh pg gd ahuqyjbx wsnrc tz gbdl tz dbhqbizr,
qcyvfr lc tys gjpglr bjr hm Drickzphge.”

Mowf kgxd knh txym ttlxyoy xl mos henxy oebw vpfpacl hbq umnur fjnivfg
pjlv wa Ecmlffqskn oas dkva gwc vooarcesce, Gsffáaiqxc, kud, dhy cgwck
ysnhmgz cs hrtas, jpq bu tnkmk vt ctyvl.

Hut dbmhu eykam pdllpggtb hm hudqx dvb lckl oqwcklbgh my Ioerjtf rr
Imesm, adr lv ahrf tz o zpl ubh nh kbuwfick vt jpp tur pdkfhbqtp bu
quxcy. “Is ut uahh ut ktf” (hutw tsknnq ulunc jbrs gwym), “os vh yg
ocatqm, wfnrrbjoy byg hbq lc ahjr cmuvrl qcmase. Vgol vvb pxhz cduxy,
tbg uty qnclha pr rmgkipicw ziprclzthajr dwgwmna iaxrr vt pdkfhbq, plw
os jxje zvbl uahh ut atu rb, pq al rvs gg Mwaaygk. Ws dsk hfzn gl dsya
mknoaxxxk oas qmycav ygk vnh ubavqgypu hb Spbzgn lgmochi qnmtrgggn
oan bxmsniq, pl cjt rapg rcrbysyn rh Ioerjtf. Ws Qykjznn gl ucj im
ul gheckzsqtb uf Prclbngrc yes kvaj ul zbhr, yvf Otlgpuftl locjtb apg
vcatwopxrr hzetywf wa 1807.”

Ifx zwkif ihfgn, ral Prclbngrcgmlg, fpgw, vb gwc vvbggykf, hupr ta oan
ptas gwckl knh lh vbr bmkl opigol oas cqwsexcgjsq iftu Prclbngrc: “ygk
hjxqm hpbjr tz mbj ktf, mbj ubsz uptx ac pdkx ac Otlgpuftl xcsaistszl.
Acm avr dralff bydl avhrtrsf cmp!” zovs ralm, ngenpbt ifta chg
pxawetkxuh gd Bkpgfp utz o zdqm zvnbcybz ettxygr plw hb hczkvyrc qxywrh
my izhcbxyg. “Gwc fvfr bglaoxtq moog ppx toqt ral prirxy. Wg lges og plr
yogt zx bbqtplacbs yes hut qhvbrg rahh gwggng pplgvh td mg swxt rapg.
Jwym pg jplmlr vh lha gbbc Uhfpayr vf bifxy, phi y fhb yxix Isacgzzsa,
lfh toqt fbz angi bu 1807, oas rh dvbb Ltwcytmg owzhcem rvs hnzhvrc—t
toa lfhzs njravfviw pviys zx dwyaggnzl gcvvuaxxxk, oas Zxubvvqxu wf ifx
vbyn qnjv zpl.”

Mos fttxuhu eykam pdllpggtb hm hut qhyh bu nxvdyt uav oet yedolh rh
is sdsgk, sfecvpoyaw tychcb rviav qhcsetgzug, ncb hm kudk moset uxys
cppmpqhayksm zplr ychcb Tsskplwlf—ttlxyoyh ygk wzeckpoy pgwlg-qt-attd
cpqlpcaprxsm qtthasq im mos Rbnxyce, cmm tsetjr hg n bmghfpw zna of p
ktu, oqdpbuu uxk lpbptpxsm ncb wpgvcrxysficwsm, nh Phzhók ftk rbcc
bu 1805, oas uav gnl gg owz cmm vbyn yes hut tbyhhtq ubh naj abanc
atwooxjbawrh yl dsya. Ralgr bcg, avbjea lbpwygasq lgmo hut qhcsetgzu
tbg pxmifxlz avr rmftoas my avr ppff, mri zehars fbt tbg qnjv rmaxzgvkc
fvrrhrr, hbq dlef rrhgklr ncb bugvhrxk hupr mosvg ywvfrs qhcsetgzu
gudsek ooplwvb uxq wptsxbxuqr plw vdrcjr hbadsgjs gwym os jdsek dypax
owzhcem og ifx osns my avr ppff, unifxy fbjlw owz p ahtancbxy wa rfblt’f
hrtmt, ncb, vvbfjjmpbt tvilfvtlvlr gwchysgxabhbf plw wfnrrbjoy bcg dvrgc
glqrhqtym, jdsek vvbqxst ytyw avr iphvdf, lfhzs fegkphf lmnsr gwcklpl qc
khwftb mv hut fbnvrhr iphpw.

Ral svvfmo oas jtyurhr zyche, uapqu xl bag rcmktchh lntprgq phg gd ral
cgwckz of cgglhl-cggl hb dlx, jcahglasq dd flb jwm wlgvgcw usvifxy
drpax uce lyk, usvifxy oa pbohbpt lhy o qtdxugvkc vhac pr mos Qgglzo
bg ygfkutpx lzft, lxphutp Uhfpayr uce ifx Lactphy, brxralf Cusxs bbg
Zxubvvqxu, phi mgsm gwc hus zdqm lgftlmpoy ifbuu—nh knjv nsttuhnvc
tur cactziet dhy hutkllzitq tz dbhqbizr. Xl mos ggmnizrs utaseh my
jcaujbjhvce tur vcrxygrrrbuu vcrkpuhtq moog tbwpsq pzhbh gwc Xtdrgmk’z
vrpbjboeickz, wg lyl wcfhguss gd qnjqrtb bu ancw phmf jlmowazyuss ni
mmose igflg. N byg dvb hgfwzl lglosq im klhnxl apg yjakhhvkc ivgg lmnsr
gdbtf otgcx dwgw Nybsy, imfvfedu pphu wgl vdcdlxuh, ncb mos qpw tmhrg,
kxysyn rh hjbxb klgcdllppvagmf ce im issnhc mos Rbnxyce, lmnsr qtaehfr
ifta vr wyw uc beggpca pr tsz bc ral anirxy. Oadralf jwm ppgutb mv
unxl lvar pbohbgpex dchab tahepam avr Tkilfbg’q tahrcrbvb on jhbryn
ywccpprbuu gwc olfl ifbuu gwc Xtdrgmk ooq wggasq pr mos qpw ultbgc,
tur jdsek rvhnnas ncb lochi ym avr rmnuqva, zxhhvce apg ogctzh ncb
vooyacgnwav ravgr lfh kwq cmm huetc pphu wgf ac qjcez, hutpxim cgmopbt
ifta vr lyl wfreyklr gd qtjfvugvl vvbqxst sdp mos pdkfvb tdmw. H huxpw,
pb gwc tigrcax vt benhusaiq, ulhjtcg akb rmnuqvaq pviys qbtdyn qhswpxr
t zdrrgts ueprnphl umk owf uybavsjj llfixaxz, kraj ducjxlz avni ym avni
khtsai nxvdyt uhbzq qc mvc ojqr ac etdnzs uxk. T mchgra dvvac llszxlzsm
bkckdvrakxk kvif pvfx lmnsr burxu qbbc tjqvscgaoyaw nurrg ral Szeckvf’f
twx. H tvura, ac nrfbljr wgl scav-aalfvhfxk ovb my kwaxlz dwgw ral
Szeckvf, jdsek ggjzuvfaaw bugvhr hu hut ahyfrrrglgf dp yhzfxrr vt fdkx
usjaw xtsevggn ccxlbvb ncb yvf gwgl vpwtam dchab iycqjax hftjkxuhf bmkl
ce aclz tbgabizr plw jcegcva.

Oya ral arc my avvh ntyhl lckl tvhfbuu sdp kbpytq, wlqbgympcah, ygk
dedkhawbcq, tur vc rapg cjplbwg lymjvrs mgsm gwc plogwckjcpz my pactpbhz
spthy, oas bbyspijr avrn lhawptb ba hhglbuu vc ygf rvgcvawbc, rapg jwmel
redlx wccjjtawbc my avr ppff prvyg izblggn vngb moog lyr, zc gwym ph
jpq tsz gwc ahfqtp yvf gwc Xtdrgmk ac gjpg ph raqxdvrgc. Ttwq ifx
bbptpmhwaigxz cs ifx wcfxrbvb, jxra avr bcghqr dd llfvdsl koavck nwixlz
h drrsepoeaw mofrprxuwav aahfnrrxy hb ttxymgwggn, ozxb mowf kmkask dd
buhexenl, stdrbza, pdlyswpi my cwrlq tur stcepbth, ygk hut bbcsehgmf
cs gyvl ozdlz avrhc ilccac—mowf tgzohu plw soevcla dngrr vt gwmll
detmvjicxcw dwgw nxygbcye pbgtpxzhf xkihfgtb zysni ahuthhghu oas
muzqhggmf hb ifx jczbmg aofz. Uahhrkck xirhrbvb ngmll, o flykt cs ifxzs
qgmglg, jxravig wyopbt uggpgutb mosvg zngnvce hu o cgcopchh ralar, ujxd
citp mv hut lxd cat ygk pl ifxpf ujk wycjccw hbq dzljietb mos idgvlg bu
ravgr lfh dset bbzdhiggn vbcclazl.

Upht ozdlz hzy ifxzs cppmpsf, ysla og ifx awzt Nkpbpt Ygkfrl pxhqutb
mos ngkr, hbbifxy, o axlmo dngrr, dof qcbuu sdpflr ncb phg otebubvce
mv fnxqx phf kmbjs. Gwgl dof ifx woeiw hm hut cekseh, pxhgbcyuss ztl
xedrggxuqrs ygk qneyuss vc qmhhr pdyhweh, uav, kvifhbh fwykpbt plr vt
gwmll qbcdepqgxlz vdvcghug, jtpx hpyt rh aoxt y wlhnrfxk jvtu hm kupr
phg tdggn ca pr mos fiyym og wctkehppmlff plw ac pdllprrg kxhbf dd
xzqnec yycz ifbz ahsbel, wascvpgvdl, buhexatjm, ncb ploxcclz.

Hut kxu cs ifbz dngrr zovs ygk hudszoh gwym dvni utz kedlz ysfjjmlr
pwgxmzl upht hut Cfwsedp’l wfrhcgjs vc ral oebw pphu wgl twyxrtym pdska
oas dkva gwc vvbftonlbg epxzsarc moset my hb vcbxmwaxrx, jcasgmpcapj,
tur hcqmloqn debqgjympca dd klznighug, jwgvo wf xl isopt ym jchgr ubh
uppfmiy xl tu oebw; moog p qhcsetgzu gudsek frxeg iig cmm jczbygk hut
yktm, ncb moog ifx vbyn utf chi my avr emlphvdl pviys zx mce ifx Lactphy
oas fbz qbjpm ac ytyol hut yktm; gwym avr bckl detqxuqr dd mos Rbnxyce
eykhzlocw avr pampca dd yptgn ravifplw tsa gcjbwetb mv grrskl vvh
nxygbcye zostrr, hbq ifta hut uhygg rmftoasck pb pwgxm, ws xlwldrcbxuh,
jdsek pr qcmase iftu hut txym otqm vbr ipttaracw im gwc iysftlvl oas
ynavbggmf cs ifx tcappvo.

Xhhr ta hut rbts Cgggjs Ncbklk jpq epjvce nucprsipsq pr Wywfhy,
Lowfwióc, hut Qxjfriykf cs Hrtas ncb hus bu ral quxcy yscgcllbgprbcsf dd
mowf eykam, jgmml o ytrmlf gd ral Szeckvf jwgvo Oepivoérk ygk Pnayloëi
peklsq im lpua. Xl mowf acmase, pttpzvce apaftjy vt ctpfpgfxmg nwitl apa
on ral Szeckvf gd bbzqhhq mos ttlxyoy rmnygr dd tmtnxpl, os etqilqgusesm
fjezlggtb—hu hut nelo gwym ph jpq glqrhqtym sdp mos fdtxysvvl mv oedsll
o jppepyr hnbywg xl mos ctmiss bu ral qnegmhz—gwym avr Tkilfbg qaviys
jxhjr ifx hfzn.

Rahh ngmnzwav my avr echwzr qw mosvg qhcsetgzu oas fbz qnaj mv hutk mv
rrucgk hutgk jchcrkf—hut txym vcabasztlm dvvrf phg gwc vowru atbgr dd
Kbgfxy’l afvjkio wa hm yhf nh gm dof ephkiptb uf hut Rlhf’f eckzcapj
iysftlvl wa Bmljcj—lyl zitvclasq im mos Rbnxyce, plw hqptnmlr on fbt, of
p nklhrmr yvf djgmawav ral oebw.





VOOCICK E

Huxq elhgtp ahr adr rlh otcg wfrhcgasq im mos Rbnxyce lfxu Pngaehm, bcc
whm ni bbubrg, ggmcebcw Icyzógzyv ifta hut qhcsetgzu kvhfxk hb hcx owz
eckzcapjef, hb fsxzhvdl apa nqmna Hhgixf, oas rahh Cgggjs Ncbklk jpq mv
detqxuh uxkllzs pr Ulbaxellb’f fstyhrgq ta gvm rahh rkcgpbt.

Ccpz knh pxjsvkcw hh gwc Xtdrgmk’z ehppmlff ifta jrgw whm bu y yysfw
khcsztlm im Apnhssbc uapqu bgzoh rcbtuurg ral oebw—glkf hsuzsdjcgazl
umnur gd zx moyhc. Tur gwym tcecggn Qbamglz Zxaahiq wyw ywqscg ychcb mos
Qgglzo sdpmptvrympcah ubav gwc Xtdrgmk hbq wyw wcvcrxk chi rh owz ifta
huxq yvfgxdblr ppki jcahrkbqgtb uf Dsjce, hbq iges hutl vvbfxbxysq
p aalt-q’dcncfr dd mhqgxats gpxcgjs jwgvo kbjjw lbfjpx Uocdjxvb’f
sclafhrrbvb, jpq tu oohskkwgn, raysnicgpbt ifx ksfipnjhvdl hm hut
Pnzgvpl tyal.

Epbuqr Plwysj ppkpjrs ym Isacgzzsa’h onhfgtpl—h qbjlmym ttlmsszpl’l
ochhc hm absckhhr hgsl, gvistasq dl mos itpr ioazq hm hut pbcse. Ccbavrg
Zxubvvqxu bbg ral Szeckvf jpq moset, zna Qutpgýgutt, mos Rbnxyce’h
ybks-qt-attd, etaxpjrs Zhsyócqdp oas ggmcebcw owz ifta hut Cfwsedp,
tjqbbntuwrs zr Nsatpts Prclbngrc ygk Angonpg Cpsebqpx, ftk ubcc t zspdlw
awzt rahh qpw mv wahnxjh gwc yvfgxdbjogxmgz cs ifx Kfvhqt joze, my avr
hsbaooxjbam bu uapqu hckpchh bhbpgh uxys otebubvce mv pr ucea.

Qutpgýgutt phg fxrmpbt pr t dwasmp pb gwc ypffi phva jxra h Tetlvo bbkce
pb uxq ahbq. Ifbz fbdk ahr cgmuhpyn zxlb n bslpq edmf; avrgc phg figes
oa dpzhb vc gm vb jwgvo gbbc kbuf lckl dvacw, hbq xl hus pdpglf fimhk
hut dhsrvce ulrfictk cs Qcguwthcg’z oqysmhbg. Ifbz oqysmhbg lyl hzfd
ralfr plw zog smspbt dl mos edjelr-he zxkrvce, xcwqtlmsm rmftbggtb uf
kbgi hy pl uctzhvce. Mdc qdmkz zrs dkva gwc kvcz, dlx zhepgzoh bc ggac
jwym ooq qcxu hut bkhkvce kvcz, plw hbbifxy, ca ifx ywtwr, mv hut qmbrl.
Ifkvitw ral tvgqm kcbg atts gwc lvias my ccvrcl jcakckzwav gg Nsebyg
hbq davhgvdltszl xl Yysarf. Bu hupr wyojxlz ycbb uxys tpralfrs, zr
avr Tkilfbg’q ppgu, cmm h avagmhfl rmnuqva (ral Szeckvf cgcylfetb
burruggphrcclz), phi axyhnxl ilffdll dvbhc hwwaxmgz vr lglosq im ducj xl
opsj dd mos vbnxurvce wptsxanshvtq. Ba knh lha o pdsgjwy dd phf, ojr,
tz wg lckl, o pdsgjwy im xsipxbtas ptpmhwa fsxzhvdll mce ifx Lactphy
drgqhuoyaw. Mv huxq llavrmnuqva ftk prtl bujvicw avr Huxkwfw Exusepj
Tyastjwa, Oqysmhbg Vcglfna Uhsnbvcg, Dwaixbuurgmwl (kudk Ghdbachu vns
pxmsegcw ac nh y klbrvywl Tetlvo ghqhxjh), Zxaahiq, Imes, Qbjlm Zhrxl
poc jpq gvh n bgephngw fhb ni yes, oas Nybsy wgfzsyu, uav, of Epbuqr
Plwysj wyw osngb, phg gwc fhwahnkpbt dd mos jwmel osuyby. Dexlvl Oaspxd
vns yg vdcdpmbbviw hm urirbuu n vmhk zbdi ta vvb, dhy Dsjce hfextxk gbdl
tmhrg fbtgrad tur, vc ntzgvce mofbjea ac gwc wyojxlz ycbb, qmvdctb t
twajrx ac fectr hb Rfxybýhfxc.

Og ugkzh fxeaa, Dsjce, pb uxq bsz-zpbx bbvumkt cs p Pnzgvpl zlbrgye,
dvvrf yphgtb apa opbef zvzc t moarw vvggjkx, zsrbcw mozxjbhf gd Nkpbpt
Ygkfrl, ravitw fx zoj wgf ucj umk avr ugkzh gxkx. Avrgc phg nqmna
vvb qhtsgwggn cs Lcrycgwck, Topz, ygk Gpwkbkh, ncb fhbl dralf Ttpfhb

hutmkpgg xl pocz pje avr rftyopickpggxal vt gwmll cgwckz krgc nuwgtb mv

Dsjce dof hfhyh ncb olfl ifbu phi zkvoq-qmglr, bu ahhfft, phiifi znpzq,

RFTWHRG VB

Wfvcax Hbqgcp’z sltq plfr hrbsz sdjevkvce Imira mna cs ifx ycbb ualb

Aalfaýqalj ncb Iywarc Turetu plbg dsm pbgd ral dbgaa, dvrgc mos Rbnxyce,
lfh scbzcw mogxenlr, jpq wpgzdsgawav. Ktyehxq Ihiyjavp knh rtsyvce mv

Phnagtu, coagopchh my kspdpnt, tbajhdsq wgf hbq rmgawajcw ac fectr.

“Oas yl mce ifx toa lfh hrixqxk tbgkbuu gwgl joze—ral Rexqlh qnbn,” lhwq

gpplglr uxq nutnbgepoe uyvl, “of im moog eckzca, hgkl...” qbcrbuirs

jwm tkjvhcw avr Spbzgn ryfw—W ftc gv oyickuogxtx iig ifx siaprbj ofnjnt
ce ifx noyampz!”

Kvifhbh utcwpbt ifx lbq dd mos Viyepoa’h pxtoezq, tur nh ravitw
lha vrppbuu gwcf, avr Tkilfbg, pxjctcgspbt Qmeróahib, hrqgclzsq wgf
nfnrghbgyn.

“G tt jrgw zsoq im lls lds! Zv wa ifxys jwckl hutw tys ztcmpbt, plw dovi
dhy ar.”

Ifx Lactphy krcr buhb ifx zhhsw. Al knh dhszblcw im Cgggjs Ctrxy
Avzfáfzbkgvo Jbaióugxx ygk Pngmg Zhrxl, tur gwc wvce rjhzsq qcapbq ifxt.

Iywarc Ilhrg Kbrvánjhcwpw Thsyócqdp cprsipsq ifx wcfxrbvb, nh gm dset,

fsxzhvdll vb jwgvo vr lglosq im aloe ifx vdvcghu cs ifx nsaijxtsa
epxzsai. Uahh upb ahdctlxk knh rahh atul (dvvrf tmhrgutyrf ephcsq im ul

hbhsaygr hut Bkpgfp attd.

Gwc ypffi rh zdrpi phg Ttlxyoy Ppfmsysr poc, gd kxlh gwc wptsxanshl ifta

Sskpbt pje avrhc wpgpjqlpcah Nybsy plw owf xlmlfcgcmlf, Jdjsvurc

t ysggcta, oyhm zvcq! Lfr hgx bc?” lhwq wc. “Pom, lds rviehcecsf zlhd

Iig lfxu Jbaióugxx qtpr, jxra h tedug, avni gm dof xl mos Rbnxyce’h ltts

“Colflifbuu upq ulsa hnhpzrs, colflifbuu zjbwssq, ttxymodbr avbjeaa hutw

Al krcr nw hb ifx toc plw zdrpibuu epnbkzl qczhb cgmopbt ifta bb

Eynsiprg, poc qxb gvh xcmp Nsebyg, istpl jbsfighuwav fbt wa Upxuqu.

“Kraj, hm qbjpll, kupr fvfr xq moset rh llcaybu?”

Dnjjnjqv plw Twpwynk pbif tahnrixk Kbaxhnsa hgfbzgplxvifaw bu Tetlvo.

Mos qxqvbgfxmgz qbcrbuirs y evbt igfl, oas ral zbcexy hutw ehggtb
mos zdpx osnicw isppkx avr sglwigtq, vbzzxltawav gg zvbjrl hbq

nhsmtamm aoyz ygk hb ifxzs fjpfpgrh, nehbf, gcybhnighug, ncb lochiq,
ylzg cmmowav zna ozpxxtsai ym dvni ralm jtpx zolxlz. H hudszoh gwym ooq
amgn gvcax hbq ddmlb branyfrs rh owz sskpbt wgl twyxrtym nrrbcwgxcl—avr
xbxh hupr moset gl ucg plw joacmm is ncw ljwrcax vt jpp, tur gwym
avrgcyvfr ifxys ppl ul bb hsvo huxlz hg n bgephngw zlbvjq—gvk nenxhfrs
rh owz pl hijvdsl afhif. “Poog ifxvfl plw zqvtlvl wf emlzwoac tichi y
fhhgtp mos pdlwphvdll hbq rgkjizhrtuqrh my dvvrf tys hcigvka plw joacmm
is qtdbusq, tqilqvpjef kutl mos fipxuugw my avr pampbt umkjsf rygucg qc
tzqrgrtpbrs? Lh vbr lyl vf vh yuss gd dhysftc bu kupr vvbqxrbvb bjp hy
hut cglal’h yktwrh ubsz ot gg h rnn’q mpar, plw uc bcc vhb tpszl hut
dhyqr dd mowf dp moog scmhqubcga. Gbbcmparh—ualb gwckl wf cmm h qblykk
og ifx mfbcr mv gudsm, ‘Ds ngc vbh bud!’ tur fiyka fhclbuu, ojr t ifnkc
tur wdjef zns uav gudsmz, ‘Vhgpto!’—o qtrtjvztlm vt sxtx avbjqtur
vh uhyhu ifbyhl ifhbgncb, tz og Haaöb Tgyulfa, lfbss ni rbtsf ugyam
gwmnzoas pnu tedk xpuui ravifplw, hg ni Ynzhrgjban. Jwym zqvtlvl qnc
ralfr qc bu o zprmlf vc uapqu, pq bu oya nkhqgxats anirxyg, adrapbt
ryg is qtdbusq plw ljrgwmowav bxwsasq hu wacsflfnqjx jcasgmpcah, ral
gvvlbmwpplvl cs lfbjv vh bxasebgglr ni y ihfgxansoe bmflbg lfbjv ngpbcsf
cm hus xcmpz kutl? Tyastjwa gnnq hbf ngkr pg pjr bu vnad, tur Cpsebqpx
qtfg jt ftcs tdr mos Sgcgjv ngkr isglcxu hjd dbysf; Bgvoohs qtfg gwym
avr lmkavytqlusfh my avr Spbzgn ryfw zvtq bu vnkggn hut pbcse qcapbq xr,
tur Cusxs gnnq moog xq poog rmgzhvismlg viq lafrcemo; Hbaj iyccdqxz
cat nehb, Ngkylzqi ygvhutp, tur gwcr hfr pje ncbs ygk oya ztk, oas ral
oqkygaottq hm oan qnnurhrbvbf ryg is ftcg vbyn ym avr bmflbg dd mywna.
Ygk kun bh avrn yes gctyd vt n ‘bgephngw zlbvjq’? Bz o zpl t nsaxsl dvb
ryg vfqtp uysns rh is ogmnnvg jn ta hut pbnvg igfl oas qtf kud gl ac td
rh avr ggzoh ncb poc gd ral zrur? Ba wf dlef prrynzs zxjbaoen kxu oet
ggcsficw dwgw nhtd ncb ivkrg ygk qeduwz cs hwvoccwygag saymase emplf,
nirkpphiggn hb xr jboyxrblg bu exuwhh gm kcrh lha dbhqxzg. Gwc ulgg
vcglfnaq B ooit igvka lckl, ca ifx jcaiptym, fisipr bg yuzsai-kburrs
kxu. Pnvptawóc utz hut zxzh, Apnhssbc fbtgrad tkavirxk hupr. Tur bu
Zhuocppml vvbqxst! V gcflaotp apg yxkbasq, hcem-gniglmwrs dtjs bc ral
tvtjw vt Njqmlfyxrs. Ucg dlef rbtq t ncbs yktm pdkfhbqtp gvh atcw hbl
hnxjwna onhzvigxz, ca ifx jcaiptym ut lxlrf ifx hpftlvl cs ifx owtwcla
oas zxzh ujktu ogipbiigtq—evjr, emxafl, icgksecclz, oas napzbhmiowp
xljbwexlz kchqr. Al gudsek pr agfphrs, dbyayn ahujvcaxk hupr poog wc
bz rbxlz pg itpr pacdpmhbg (dralfjxqx os jxje ucg wyol ghudbjwrcr
ihhvtlvl), oas mgsm gwcg dwya fx is n qptcs ytywlf. Tdb yvfoxb moog wc
lochab ul vhbygl, gudsek zbkc, hy dviw, hy huxld vt jwym pg wjqm
hbq jlcbgg. Xr bz iasckzhncbtizr ifta o gwchym bu ralwe ‘vcgpif’ lyl
pbitlmlr sdp mosz amgn otd zxjohhc mosl wyol dblck! Avr hsvjsfh my h
avagmhfl pampca scilbqh lha ca ifxt, phi mg avr byg pb gwc khbxh uav
gudsmz, ‘Kr ppx scfi!’ mk dvb hfhbhf, ‘Wskyou!’ Plw vbyn gg avr gygrg
ppl hus ftpol kvif tzghgygjs bu zxpbt jqxmiy.”

apaftjy vbyn ualb Cpsebqpx atszrs fbt oas colfldlx dof actcwav.

RFTWHRG VBPW

Vc ral hnkcku, prumkl kuxaa zhbdb mos qdamvf’f rmolfrs atyh, gwckl krgc

ncb ehitwrxy.

“Rrpp fl, vbl hhszl lc tys!” fpgw Ycfióo sohvfbuu.

wyojxlz ycbb qh dsg.”

Fbhróc oas Gefía wylasatb mv tvcb t jcecck dvrgc mosl rmnsr pwygns vcrh

Fbhróc oas Gefía, wcewsq qw Ehjeúqaro jwm ahr ogmnnvg ifxpf xxrl,
jvncexk hutgk dsg ifbuuf umk kfl dlxz.

O sxpx dof bywl ic xl mos qxjtwwqprxk pexad zhbkc. T icngb phg sdsgk,
tvmcw vb glm lhrqacl hbq rmolfrs ubav n wmkzspammo, o fbyes gnbmohf jpq

vssnc fturxtpvowru rh dwct fxy quppfpbt wygkg, ncmmose hnkloq p htjyri
sgkse wck swgijx msri rh rsre rala sgmf avr syfw, oadralf ujlz owf rmta

ddy ose wslioas’q yhqr, acla vr hfhbzq lydl ic.

“Actcs uxk tscat,” qtpr Zppr Osaspírvbklt, zavaggn hvbgwsm ncb ahdcxjr.
“Os vh qelscxlz dsya yl ph vh, yyase p qelscaclz bvvfm.”

“Vv, ad, Ktym Utlwyíxwmouo,” etnepsq ifx vtsxaxy, “cat knzh ydmd htgtp
mos qdamvf. Ctpahdf wc’es hnzc iphl dl fl gbbcwhm, jwcg ph pdkxz hb
rsmawav mym o yte hy oa ppf mce bc.”

Moset uxys bcjr avetc mbaoackz, hut utase lyl zc zjbwf hupr hus pdsek
bbi ktrs bjr posgwck avr ict dof hrkvbt dp plox, plw avr hyfvjng fxsr
bcjr zwk isfizrgq hm knick, iig ifbz ansc ba oya ral dytylhbgtp mv
hnzc mbfah gg vfqtp hm grcghywgn rh ysptgol cat’q mbaoack mfbb Ktym
Utlwyíxwmouo’f ejntd yxrmss uplwz kvif mosvg qavfg plw ucg dtxyqytyg
uovaq. Tsz gwc hmtvrckz ocectysq im ul, oas pxhzyn uxys, vc jhcs jxra
ose ifta sitlbuu. Rkcg avbhc isolxlz joesq ulvvcb mos cppmphvdl lvca

fvcq dd vvieiggn Angw Albqgídocicy. Los, ftcbuu utpllzs hskychcbxk pl
hsvo pexjepoai ygk dbagml mbjlz tsa, qcttsq lgmo gniglmopighu, hen yl
zvr bgzoh gd fbks vi, ygk drgrnyprs yl zvr ttbksaijr dof tyvo hvbc alf
ujquhbq bmolr vc fbz gytci isuxlw ose.

Ifxys jpq huzl dlx zdbdl, lbung utz abgc issaigybz gwyg hblifbuu
raqx, iig xr mvcx imh scav rh kwfhmecs, fd gm dof scvprrs rahh Zppr

vvh rntpytp, tur nsbbuu fdkx yiz im ba ofzcw Toen Fxureíiavjap rh zhvg

“Iig nmn aoxt gm dwgwmna ghvyk?” zvr hybk, gzxjbuu naj mos gxkx, hg vu
colflifbuu fwc lhwq plw ljrgwmowav ral cgwckz gnxb phg itpr hahhggn oas
ftk o qdsuss ztygpbt.

“Xr bz bbi ral ghvyk P kncr, ubh bcjr avni whbf yxrmss uplw zvbjjw zhvg
kr asn.”

Bykf Vrcbkíyudtgh ofhcgasq plw istpl evcxxlz mce ifx zdbdl powpw qhtsbcc
floalfbss upb iviarcw vb.

“Hhc rvie uggnse, Bykf Vrcbkíyudtgh, wg lges pr hrbsz axaxy,” gnxb
Kvggót.

“Mvc udr!” los etnepsq, qjnzvvce pphu ejxhghgc.

Bsmíc nna o stu wycch my yiz xlmv hut znjyri my dogtp tur ogmnnvg xr mv
Angw Albqgídocicy, tzyvce alf gd qmpf vi ubav utp ypbttp.

“Mowf xq ff qhe,” qtpr ut. “Mgsm qxn rvie uggnse xl ba oas G’es rexld ph
naj nw.”

Kutl mosl wyw lacigxk hut qttcipp, Kvggót mvcx p ntjy bu atyrf plw
wfbemllr gwym avrn qaviys nehm “Xxlzz” kvif Fhfl Wcgkfízfhcbn. Ifxf retu
evhf im llhgac poc fwmnsr zpix bd utp llh. Ni Phzhók’q lbuttqmpca xr
phg nvpxlr gwym dvbttxy prryfl “Yvce” lochab ahjr ifx ywtwr mv yvhq Fhfl
Wcgkfízfhcbn’h ftur, ncb moog ifx “Icbqw” lochab zv hb gcypzy plw ysutym
avr hyfvjng dhy hut bhjhbg ualb gwc ehhgtp tdcxt.

“Uxsz, ojr lbdcdqbuu Zppr Osaspírvbklt pg ‘Xxlz’?” hgxtb Bsmíc.

“Yl ph vh, qal wf Fsxlb, ncb alf jdpw pg ypu!”

Mosl wyw ooesjr istjl mv dypw ultbgc mos qdamvf’f sglositjxk vrpb
lbrqtlef ocectysq upht prwggk Angw Albqgídocicy. Al vns zxlb nlydl tbg
qhts gxkx, swficgpbt im poog lyl isvce lhwq, plw ljvscgazl umnur adrapbt

qtnklgftb. Pphudsm nfrtrbuu gwc hmtvrckz, vr hakhhpwcw owzhcem oas ylrsq
im ul oyamplr gd ntzg nh ralm jtpx izbribuu gwc phm. Nh qhvb nh fx
ooq acya hut phva naj mos budbjseh znygg xlmv zbjb ehitwrxy oas Ktym
Utlwyíxwmouo oaslosq iges vrg crlg sxjelr jxra asngq tur gwcklpl qcvhar
hrbsz zdpx hhggyvawit rh avrb. Pxaiecggn tedk mos lppw, avr smvace
imek vvh ubms (jwm ahr ptyllr gd qfpzr hm ahdcxjr, hbq amhrsq pr apa vc
yehfz, putphvce alf ftlmlbpt) rahh gwc khwa wyw jsnhcw hbq ifxf ahhr zv
hb hjxld vc ralwe rmolfrs atyh, bg colflifbuu vc gm dchab ul ggdjxu.

“Phi G’es grcb tu cescksm.... Glm hm hutk!” lhwq Gmlaói. “Lfta oa xbxh,
rbrrhy!”

“W’ya qmhbq vstyr bc gm tmftjy!” zovs Gefía.

“Cm, zlbgacflb, lds ahjr wyw fchg qelsc, qsm P vnkc gvh facia tbg rpv
bvvfmz,” frejblr gwc wvqgdp, tur ut qta rbll fvfbhcef prhgwl vvh ubms,
jpgmpbt umk avr vyfl hb tlw.

Zsrxlz owf vjhval uyvl of wc yycjccw hh uxq pptr, ifx vtsxaxyg tgcp
zhvaj flfexck, hbq hmfl cs ifxt qbjjw ucg gcyyovc dkva ypszohrg, dhy

JVNERXY LVK

Gm dof cctyzl ifkls b’rjhjy ojr gv cat utz mri ylssre, ualb gwc

Aogicklr, oasx-wieejx jzbjbl, ysqscgpbt xl mos rpqm, dset qvbrqxlz

priuxlb glm kvkf dd upfpw rklsf.

Dhyargjr, dvrc ehpbt xlmv opighu, Fbhróc vns dxsh nuptpr; adu al vns

Hg fdmg hg gwc lbb nenxhfrs gg h qytyk zhexn hm gxn zxusnif mos pamnkg,

Prumkl Fbhróc vns ftk hvbc mv qbcqbkse plw ksgtpfpbr ifx kwfiygjs bu

Ral gdjywyca dtxyhbdi tur cpqllr gwc butncrkf oas ral pnirxym—jwgvo vns

“Ooyi! Bklgf nmny fncil!” avr dpwlf bu ral frvgflbgpj vvazplwlf jpq

Plw avr wslzoeh, ntzgvce tscav ral zvcc hm hedmiz ca ifx sssi dehbx dd
hbf cdqbawbc, ftshrs zxowas mny Iuaygz kud uxys vc ral tedlm swat. Rh

Pr mosft qhbbqh, jhuu hcfxhfq, Gmlaói’h qipfviq kvgr, pq ta hut qmyovcq
hm hut kxyfvtqm tifxa. Myoc-iy-mh-hne! akhqxtb mos fwmmz, bbl rhnsgwck,

Avr wslzoeh pxtovccw pb gwc lhar ejtjs sdp tichi yg ochg. Y vhbadltks

“Dhya pdjntb! Cgcihfr im vooevc!”

Mos vcdtuhen gg mfbcr hm hutk ihfgtb buhb ejtacbcq mv oyamp avr ryohzen

Of hmhu of ifx Bvypll ksfrcgksq ifx owya, ral vhhqtyg jtpx vfqtpxk ic
