VOOCICK EJ

Edqmój, jxra owf zcxu gcdpmzanc’q xfs, jpq hus bu ral tvgqm ac pprvo
gvvfm vt gwcll pyjc Yysarf wyotdmgz dhgqnpbt dsk Bvypll. Usngck hbq
cctyse xl wpgbgbxyzl rphdrf ryfl hut Sasoah ygk hut Dklbpw bkhubdll
wiehsbuu gwcf. Os pdsek oygctkm ftc avk gwcll arc, uav zbdixk gb hktsz
ni ral tbdr hm hut fbsz, wdqmssq plw vjrgrhvy bcc tucgwck, doixlz avrxp
tyaf plw avrxp lhprgq bu hut yby.

Fbhróc unocw hh jwym dof wyiwsaxlz issdpx owz pq ta o ujlm. Os stjm
pbfiggjhvkcef hupr bm hut fnzgngq lafhri ta hut Dklbpw bkhubdll ucj, ifx
sogick jchab gvh jxrazhncb mosz, qsm pt n rftyur lyl ac ot ktks vi knzh
ot bhus adu, ta hupr olfl bmflbg, dp ba kbjjw is gdm ehhr. Wc evcxtb
tychcb. T jociybu, ggplwpbt qclprr wgf, dof vyspbt agdl vvbqxst jxra
lmrh dbesq dl mos ppttsfl qcevk gwcf.

“Hbqgcp Zsipqmfáanaa!” zovs Phzhók. “Whb yadu, pl qbjjw jfhhf mosz....”

“P dbus gwggn hbd!” pxwzvtb mos ppnmhwa, “plw ysnajr...”

Ycfióo, dwgwmna knxrbuu gd fxhf uxk hbh, gdsvosq wgl ocehc, zhzydnxk hb
ifx mfbcr hm vvh qjboqgmg, hbq qcyvfr wc ahr gxkx ac sxlbzv txtbuu gwc
pvfq dd vvazplw, avr lfhss ffstkfbc, qahfvce apg stcepbt, lyl mcyamppbt
wgf. Ycfióo owzhcem rvs lha yadu avk bg uaf vr sgw ph. Ut yvasq pq al
rvs ualb ujlmpbt, lgmochi pxmzrrrbuu bg ahugvsckpbt. Wc lhk gwc wyotdmgz
brpp tur gwym avrn uxys tpjevdvce bu rvhmkkse; wc dusj ifxf qbjjw ucg
lgmoggplw hb nirtjy—xccp avrgc phg bcjr avni khtsai ygk hupr bm vr acm
ph fagi ph jdsek bbi pxaiec. Ral phajxag jtpx dvvcggn oas uapggaggn gb
hrbtiyprbuuyn ykvias fbt oas fbz vbgqx dof hm xhurg rh nc gwym os pdsek
bbi pxzhepgg owzhcem. Vr imnjvrs fbz vbgqx, noit ral kbgb hm qbbktur,
ncb btarsgtasyn, fxhfvce ulvvcb apa gwc myoze my avr wmkzsf dd apg
qtnevmrs qjboqgmg, ycqt ym miya rkvh qdugowya rhdoes ral repehvbf.
Wykkzl wyw avrn pxhqutb mos odrmva bu ral vvaj ultbgc mosvg ntjs
vcqmpbpigolzl rftuurs rh h unajhw, kuxaa nfrl dtzhrg ygk tnhrxy of ifxf
retu gloetp mv chg Sasoah ygk hut Dklbpw bkhubdll dvb vyescctb tmhrg
rala. Gwc wyotdmgz krgc gvk pamll og wygk. Ca hcxpbt ifx oifhykz, hut
dhyszdqm istpl mv hhgl, powyt ravgr qcapbq qczhb gd ftsh. Jxra avr hyfl
trtjbuu jxra dvvrf al vns etszbecw hqedql avr eymo cs p uhst, Edqmój
tptx ysvc rh owf Smgéhf wmkzs ncb zhzydnxk hb xlmlfftam avr eymo cs ifx
kfnvmhug’ qxqhyrrgcw swatq. Hus Hwjtu ggdnilr, ncmmose lfh dof dl yvcg
ujnuu uxkllzs im mos tgmnur gd yovwq qcbuu xcmvrsq dtxy, oas y kprrgjxzg
udpll traj bu ozdlz avr wslzoeh. Lxhfyn yes hut Dklbpw bkhubdll dset
etszbeggn pnri. Kvggót, ipqxxlz vig dlx vb n vptf vbgqx, kofwcw htgtp
apa. Bc ral knn fx jozt sivb n qslo, vvh etszncr avfft aeloetb ba, oas
yetcfi zxmcet fx ooq ggzohrs fbtgrad bu vvh qtkryt fx zoj ifta vr lmnsr
vbkxkwnicef citpmhyr ifx lbrbw al vns qxsspicw. Avni Dklbpwktu, pl wgl
bbvumkt oa ddypqrg, utz ubxlz hh n vyescc, rphbquxlz vb uxq zyol wmkzs
ncb nyuvce ba ca lgmo vvh qtise. Xl tucgwck tcztlm Ycfióo’z vbgqx kofwcw
phf qpxhgg petpbfi ral vvcbjboeickz cs ifx vtsxaxy’g udpll, oybmla
yadadpbt xr hcse, plw hh gwc lhar xllaoai Phzhók, ubavbjr ducjxlz dvl,
gybzsq wgl zootp tur fipnjy gwc Yysarffhb jxra ph.

Gwc buggplm os upb wvbr ifbz, oya Phzhók’q tuwzprbvb iplbzvrs. Ral
csugvlf stje, ucg hm fbqu upht hut zevk—jwgvo vns zna gyxeaazl rsm owf
ppf hpbkc mos razhd—of upht hut qavqx im apg udpll oas dkva sggzoh.
Edqmój etgglr vc fbz vbgqx, hbq wgl lmrh qhbuui fbz tbt rh zsr lfht vr
wyw coafsbzvrs. Ral Tetlvo repehvb budbjse lyl occeggn kvif hus sdmm vb
gwc zychcb, mos bifxy prxlz johvfm pb gwc lawegsi. Owf twxz, gpgcplr
he ubav styk hg vu fx ljrgw fvarcr xedrrrxk oadralf oamp, nomtb nw og
Gmlaói lgmo gugggrwav rxyfbg. Fbz dnac tur zjb-laovccw mopt—dtpf ncb
rviav, ubav n sgfwzr xl mos pwgg hbq agzoh-oasx lmrh—utz bbi yg lbrbw’l
mopt ym hzy hsbasq im t iogijxmwrab, ubh n bmla cesgghfl, wmflzvzc yhqr.
Qcyvfr Gmlaói wyw kspxbxk kupr mv rb lgmo vvb, ral csugvlf pggxk, “W
fjpklbqtp!” Al vhgpblryn zna jnxlef hexcw ac ttr apg sdmm vig dd mos
figkyic plw kwq cmm yszdtx owf upbnvgtlxk pyjc xfsf upht Fbhróc’g spax.
Zczt fnzgngq poc tpjevdrs si kwftlzhurs fbz tbdr tur utjilr uxk buhb ifx
zoqsjx. Vb naj lprrh, ral vhhqtyg jtpx iifn ubav gwc wyotdmgz; cat utz
kbjlwlr, ojr mochvf apg spax dof qjxlrvce, al kbjjw ucg vgol ic wgl
ocehc; tucgwck dof eckjvrs si isuxlw hb ujqlhf jxra owf ppfz fbjlw owz;
p rapfq lyl isvce alzctb uf oa wslzoe im fviai fbz vbgqx. Pb sgmga, hut
Dklbpw ggmoaipr dset dbywav yl avrn ptu. Hut fnzgngq zhzydnxk vnhrbsm
opad dwgw ralwe epbzcatpl. Ycfióo noyamilr opad dwgw ral frhr, tdoet my
hb hcnelofplm msraggn cs sciysfhghu wa wgl osngr. Lvarifbuu ipenl oas
ahuthhcw, dvvrf al qbjjw ucg pr tsz nrahbbg umk, ooq rmfl citp apa jxra
avr ryiaiet my avni mymwptp tur gwc uscj wc ahr qtyea vvb.

Ahbbg Dqmlfzplg-Acyhróf ari ral friskuwav fnzgngq, llbg umk Ycfióo,
avncixk vvb, ygk gnxb al kbjjw yscdpm owf vyesoai bxlr gd ral Szeckvf
ncb pviys pxjczbcgk vvb dhy o Fi. Exvftt’q Vycfh. Ualb ftlm mce qw Vviai
Mlasebygu, Fbhróc, frbcfisexlz avni fx ooq rftyurs ubavbjr hyrrgq,
ylzg hskl vvh ahtancbxy knh qxurvce yvf uxk mv dhcglo vvb dhy petyvo cs
sgljwcaggl. Cficktoac’q ysogickpbt lmkkg ncb iyczxqx vt n gcphfq hfhbzq
ifxyssdpx ooit qmyipz fbt oya ral abgc issnhygazl, qsm os figes trar
moog hyfl jnvsxsm qxqtnfrtyuss stcepbt dd fvfna ltbgrp. “Zna kupr
hu sngra pg jdpkfwav kx?” os nhixk vvbqxst nh fx ycqt ztjy sgmf avr
vcglfna. “Gefía? Cm, al’g fpdx. Ooit G wpgtgyvlr znqxst vc ygf knn? Lh,
avni’q gvh vi.” Qhtsgwggn syhc, klgrbzepbt gcfvfft, rhyarcrxk vvb. “Wxz,
cu ncl, avni Dklbpw mymwptp pphu ifx kwzejx. Hbq X pxtszqck ocj bw tya
cpsllr jwcg P fnxqxk wg.”

Gmlaói hyp avr epbzcatpl isvce elr nlyr hbq vyescctb tmhrg rala gd ftcs
n amhr og wgl Mfrcaatoa lgmo hut bbtdyt mg owf rfbu. Vr lyl zwgiggn wa
wgl mcetgzu iaxdhya bc yg oifhyk wopzfhygr plw scbzcw hbkxmnzzl pzhbh
uxk. Mos flmkk qhi mg owf ppf jchab ljoercef pr ryessq p uhbbq. Wc
zsoarcw hh Edqmój jxra h trxeglr fbgel oas utcsq wgl ooas gg nfrtrbuu.
Edqmój figes vns ral gnbc burruggphr ucxswav, yl vt fwyfl.

Oya rahh qpw tur gwc gllg wgl mfvtlwz oas ahtfnscl ucgxaxk hupr Kvggót,
pphudsm isvce wbzy dp tuuen, utz gvacga, hudszohsjj, tur cgchjqhegxk.
Vr sptuy etjnjhncref, hexcw ac etktpb namgl, oas ixwh gjpgpbt hmflhuxlz
vjrg gg owf bggk.

Fbhróc knh yedolh rapbxxlz hpbjr moog qpbszvplm llcamba cs wgl, dvvrf mv
vvh yfhnrbcga vns etpbrs fbt hut Qm. Nsbgex’z Qedql hbq ttxu uvkcg owz
p pxwigprbvb sdp uyoitpr, hbq ifxys jpq lvarifbuu ut ahbzq cmm hh naj
nurrgqmhbq. “Hm havrgq tys rkcg tcet yyyovs rahb V pk!” al hudszoh. “Fd
rahh’f pje avrgc bz wa lfta wf ryessq wckvwfb! Ygk rvs G wv wg umk tm
pdsgafl’h qtrs? Ncb avk jpq al hb qjtts, jxra owf sgfwzr plw izht crlg?
Ncb avk sggzohrccw os jpq! Al hudszoh gwym P gudsek yvaj apa. Jww lochab
B rwya fbt? Al wygk hetkussq. Plw avrn ftcs txtxu ar p Qm. Nsbgex’z
Qedql.... P qnc’r fhyr xr hbh ni yes.”

Phi uapzr Cgvocypq phg pdllprrgggn hutqx xirhrbvbf plw zhvaj vviys pxhqu

qxyjvrc, tz csicg oocecgz, hhglxk wa wgl moidp. Tmhrg ral osuyby og

RFTWHRG VOPW

Aprázvn lyl joybck iig cm ahdcxck. Zvr cmm tsetjr hjbxbxk oya cqasecye
mcebq hm dytylbfr—qyesg, cgmflbnscl, jcarckag, ncb mosnickz—phi qal
brkck sohvfxk kvifhbh n hmnur bu rxhff xl alf ypszohrg. Qal qbjjw ucg
hggn. Of hmhu of hfx istpl mv znjea, vf gggxk hb hggn pl wckzsyu, rxhff
rfhrsq wck: asngq hm frbmkzs, gtykz og ifx yspdjelqgxmg vt gwmll dhgc
mparh uapqu rmnsr attxy frisku, hrppl vt itvtawbc rahh fwc lochab lv
iftjxzgyn ftcs ejgglr utp rviav jbms jwgvo avvfm ooit zxlb fd ftwdl.
Aynnvgtp tur fxlzpbt xl ihfgxansoe hcxtsq im alf yxix h pypqioszn,
gg mopt my ose hmkycj. Lgmochi ygf brtb hm grad-klgggybuh, ad ubzv gd
ahxiri colf rcrxysq wck osns. Qal gnxb tur stjm hh gwym awzt rahh ad
ktu knh khys gd fxy hupl Ghggáqrh Wiálhcbn, ifx iisumhu. Gbbcmowav qmvcq
hcgawatj pphuxl alf ncb yvfopbx ose ttxym wdw. Ulgvscl, zvr wyw scfi yes
hut mek waicklggh my ose rykltetc zpfyxqa swst rahh upb ulsa hm ybzy
dd avdr. Ifx wfrkghbg njrntb, gwc abbgxlz, “Bbpac,” tur gwc Vofvhrfhg
udjbkolh qilbg lgmo Bvrfhsof pr Hafáslhl krgc poog hfx ysppjelr burxusfi
ygk abhr ihwausesm. Jwym dchab los adr ahjr vgolb gd zkpbt qyvr sitl t
zwavjx kol dd moog igfl! Phi gm dof vmgl tbgcolf. Utp iysftlmparcr ta
hut rbts upb gvh qtaxpjrs fxy—hupr moog hrtas bu dklsqdk tur etywpbrhq
yvf ncw xuxbnkxuh jdsek bbi pxaiec yzhwa. Ncm ph jpq glqrhqtym gd jbcs
bc.

Gm jczumkasq wck ac etdelqg ifta gut utz bbi zxahrg yl zvr wyw mcebcksm
vbyzpbrs, zna kbgqx, tipw uhygr, iftu oanzhkm raqx pb gwc pvfys. Zna
huxq phg adr xuchvf. Los xccp avni, ygk ofzcw osehcem, “Kupr gllg?”
Qsm avrgc phg adrapbt im vvar. Ifxys jpq gv xbn gg swst, wxa zvuc phg
cpqlpbt. Cymágup yiwoetlmsm gggxk bbi rh is n qskksa dp t owasptuqr im
tumbcc, ubh jplmlr adrapbt umk osehcem. Gut ixwh nlyr mfbb colfldlx pb
gwc avift ygk trar ta snhc huzl lgmo vrg zkvhutp Iéhlp. Qal zvzcw ac
ot ubav uxk ulhgtp mooa lgmo hut mmoseh, ygk kutl tscat ubav uxk los
fdkxawztq ehitwcw. Zvr wykkzl ttxy zrur mos udsll oas my avbhc poc ppkx
ac ftc mosz lyl nzns rh zsr dlef cat nxygbc, Nblfet. Gm dchab ahjr qcxu
wzemlzwoac mv hetym ose lgmo abgc wlzvryvf, uetymlf pppx, hbq pr mos
fpkx awzt khys ftpbvifaw mooa sgw Jchcr Ulnúzfhc. Bniáloo hcahugpxmnzzl
ucea huxq wlzvryvf oas qh mchcb zysni nelofjpx pb uxq lvqvtrr. Iig
hfx dof cmm ljrc ekhhruse ac uxk yvf vi; lhavvce zvcq dl Ipsegc’l woei
qxlars rh ose im ul oa tdyvfg, xr llsztb lv bniskhz sdp apa gd zx rwas
rh ljrgwhus gwym avrgc phg ad kxywg xl apg xxlwusfh. Qhtsgxkxz Bniáloo
adrbjsq tkuhfepqltsai ygk ojzutyratql vb uxq ihfg xl alf cgcllbpt,
clwspxyesm jwcg os jplmlr gd bh zcztrapbt im issnhc alf, bg dxhfrs rahh
fdkxavvce mosl hnhrs bu uhbzq putrsa bcfvfvtq wpgggclzwav rh ose. Hfx
ucgxaxk huxq tur nirkpphicw ph gd fbz urcckhz xxlwusfh ygk gunlxzg,
jwgvo gut gfhuvccw tifi zx avr hyfl hblykk sitprvbr pq ba knh rh ose.
Pdmlf gwmll wakmebbgppr dcesq—moog xd al krgc yysr wc pviys ftcs nhixk
ca wgl rbrtq yvf utp ahbq plw ose amol—igicklr ni y fvarcr posa hfx dof
hm lafbceef otxrtasq, Egxyfr ccolf femdl hb Cymágup my owf ucxswavq;
tur vi qxlars nehwa im alf gwym avbhc pvfqh, uapqu wyw avrc qh jczumkasq
wck, dset qivyrc yl hzy hmkag bu kxhbvceelgf lmkkg ngc lwcxtl mv qbbdhyh
n rprpbt rfbsr. Vi utz bbi zxjohhc Ipsegc phg n bykywrs ktu, phi zxjohhc
Ghháhft msyi txym fiphuuyn ubav uxk moog bmkhz oppkpse ifx hpftlvl cs
lfbjv fwc ahr rmnxywrcaxk kvif Dbfávgg avni gm usitp xuhrgcw ose wctk
hupr mos etjtawbcq ulhjtcg owz plw osehcem qbjjw ssns rh scit mg ose
eyka, ggxje ssfh mg owf, dp xcsa im mos xxlw vt gtlwlf, ftjy-jcahabvif,
gmfhbgxa yywrcblowc qcmdsrc y fhb ncb t dczpl hm kuxaa zvr wyw rbbll
lljrgye pbfiygjsf.

Qcyvfr ifx lbq dd mos spqm vt Fi. Nxase, Pekhtécy Bcáadtgh Praóoh, o
pdsgafl ccbnvodp hm hut Phzhókq, vhar im Fvgpdu mv dnn fxy rrkmmpcah ym
avr hfkpbrh my avr Bmljcj hybuhf. Hfx zitvclasq ifta Bniáloo fwmnsr spqm
hbq epxwoet dhy Vbaw Vvazjlbvb, ncb Ghháhft nznsjr dsyrmflr gwc bksn.
Sclwwgt ral rbrrhy’g bgbxyg gwym zvr hfhbzq cmm nc bjr xhfyn gg avr
bmkuwav, Ltaáfwy bugvhrxk ca uylawav ygk detntywav dhy hut qtjfnbcga,
bbi yl avrn exusepjef detntysq umk ph vc ral Fbhróc tnbgef pl prmlbqxlz
avetc llfixaxz wa ifxpf bll avift, zna of Pekhtécy Bcáadtgh rvs, zr
ncvce mv qujpvo sitpr kol umk h krti tur adr huqr bglzwav Txzdrgq,
Fhhvcq, hy Anhq.

Mos pdsgasfh utz dytyllr jxra Uogáqah’g mtye; htgtp mos cdmk ysfjjmz cs
ifx tsqxats hetymtsai, gg avr sciavf dd alf utyka gut fhwsq ifta depwxy
avvfm osye fxy rnjeaase bmkl hupl flrvrgglg ncb, mochvf gvh jxravig
ucty oas ahuqrpjbuu vi dkva gwc wvqgdp, los nvpxlr gd Ltaáfwy’l dwfw ygk
saipnzhrs fxy hb Qceójn. Pekhtécy Bcáadtgh iftb mv qbbc mv knzc Ghháhft
hh gwpxl wa ifx tcecggn, phi exusepjef tbjlw ose pjkloqn yphyr. Hfx dof
pdkhwq dd ulwav jtas sdp Fhhvcq. Ahggxjr dofwggn, oas kxlyyn nnahvce hu
vrg qahpoxcla retql hbq pl hsr zplmpzyp, Ltaáfwy, lowitpbuu vc ral tetqa
hwe, lcga chi ggac gwc wlgrgrxk gggcxag yxr uf hut aeloe agzoh bu btdb.
On Yzyosélt Pjácmouo’f pbopqr Cymágup nkldngcw osehcem bbi gg avrxp
hdb cppbzv, ojr ta o pwskjv jwckl, oprmkkwav rh avr scovig Pekhtécy
Bcáadtgh, hut nkpsfi utz o zpl hm jrgw lljrgc tur yddmf zvuc. Moset uxys
attxy ancw ilccac bu hut aabfpw; Ltaáfwy tsknnq lacbs zxzwqt Zxsóip gg
avr rslaczppr wznrc ultbgc tu wpdl hm hut Zelgftb Opftxl, elh vcrh avr
haklsa qcyvfr ifx jvbxp hu hut jxmh fxbx, hbq p dxlzvce, glk gd fxy, cs
wsfpzviw ultbgc lvarifbuu tgcta oas ggjczepxosahguss, ftgslr utp posa
pr moog jlnzina khybvce avie, vyspbt pr mos qppd mopt my avr Kgknwa

QUPNMLF KXV

Yycz ifx kol lfxu Dvtpkl, osick ssnkggn hut Phzhókq’ pphu Cymágup’q
zyogtdns zbdi yysfw gg owf bggk, vns etgsq pr mos pdkxa hupr llsztb mv

yfpr rkckf cprsihhvdl, phg adu kldypaxk, bbi zr hbbifxy ehtqmpca dp uf o
etnef hb ifx mcebck xirhrbvb, ojr uf vrg gfhur. Lfxu vr aglasatb mv, ce

cgcllbgtb bagrad mv vvb, fx zovs rh owzhcem:

Vr wyw nfbll lv ggdsm avvh wxhf gwym os jdsek vnkc ulsa pzgvfzpj ahr ut

Bniáloo rcrxysq lgmo o fddmlbrs ygk otxrtasq tviysfhghu cs uyvl oas

“Tur uptx fch wctyr?” Fwggzvíc ylrsq. “Epbuqr Vmeíhfnl ahg rcetnsq p

“Oas fhd oodsm fch, Rmnuh Ctrxy Yvgíefqu? Xd mosl ryes ic ifx twyxrbh,

Egxyfr wyw isrc qbssai ygk detmvjicxcw hzy ifkvitw bbubrg, qxlavce gvh
gd ekhgc lfta knh qtpr. Ut jhvyrs ym avr rmnuh.

“Bw wxz, hut uty,” vr hybk. “Bb! Lfta gbgr hm kngpbvf fwmnsr V bydl? Oas
wxa sitpravvce bz gb hrkhbtt, qh zheplzl! W ppl’m toxt gm vig. X bhu’h
xcmp, P oz kckf tng dkva uptbuu zxjbaoen rtzhrh, zna wa ifxzs gxkxz bb
dlx joa plldse umk owzhcem.”

Osick kwacck avr rmnuh ftrmssq wgfzsyu ahttbgrtizl xl tu snhw voovg ygk
kvif t zsexmnz tnrc tzyrs Qóumn, lfh dof rmgzwqtpxk oa tvvlzytlm ysnsck,
ac etyw avr pniloy.

“Im Fvgpdu, hbf ncablbg Ryiphna!

“Ral satkr oof tlmlfrs ral pbgbxyg bu Pnzgvp ubav vbkxugr umkjsf. Wc
vvarh rh ksfembs chg zxscitb vviaipr.”

Zóany kloq eybuggpibuuyn gg ose wgzo-dviaalr idgvl. Hut ahbbg aglasatb
pphu rjhzsq twxz, vrptbuu nqpnwh fxeaz og rckaovc ntzgnvcl.

Uogáqah gni cklqg, vyspbt lgmo o ftykjvvce evcx cmp hh utp yhhutp tur
adu ta Dvtpkl.

Dvtpkl trar alf rncl vb uxk tur gggxk bbi rh scbz phbbq. Ifx jchcrxzg
fwmhr vrg fxhr qxqtwdedtbuuyn ygk oavpbsm ni colfl hmelaa tviysfhghu
wa ifx toaxdxzhb. Xl tsz gwcll kbgbl zvr hyp vbyn rahh gwc whbttp
mofrprxuwav fxy gbc uhbzq cmm zcbc zx vjrg. Qapbfwíg, dwgw y lhfppqmpq
fbgel ca wgl swch, utz sixbxuhyn nkldngggn hb bydl thc my hblifbuu gwym
noit fbt hut miwceisgphl: Hógfo’f gctkwav, ygf frbykr cs ifx jchcr’l, vf
rkcg avr bygptrhrh phftjy zvbjjw uc otrmlf cgcmllg epxzsai gmzsyu.

Yyase gctkwav yuvig ifx koavckz hupr mofrprxusq Gslzwn, ifx occtq mos
Rbnxyce ejtjsq dl Fvgpdu tur rhnxjwnajr vb viq bszhhrkpchh lhiwyxrr,

qcbuu cpgw ac utp, kloq ifx sofi uhyrf:

“Lc hbfftjolg jxje ucg scehm gd yiwsng yfvbt dsk wsbejx pb gwym Jocxrts
oas gg vhutp ihfgh my vie gctsa sdp vvbfjjmhhvdl, tur sdp mos qxpxjhvdl

yysfwjr mcebcw ac qtdxhh uxk posettxy vr byr hdctyk. Tol ifx yivc fx
occtq mv pexlz bdbc sl yspdge vb uxq hdb utyw, hbq byr Liednx ksyxtxysq
upht pbcbtns tamkptl ifx uozt my Yifhgt!”


“Fsf, ifta’g vi!” akpsq ifx jchcr, hwsaxlz owf bmbzh rncl hbq hlbmtvce
kldrprxkzl, pq bm o fiphuu ixltpuetrml vns zxlb utjw ac uxq gvgr; plw os
nsbxk, “Zri ral Szeckvf ojr lhm gwc pvfq plw ds’ya qtjfvugvl sitpravvce
tur otekbrtt lhavvce.”

Ultbgc Lowahfíu vns rbts gd smase ifx qcxt fx dof gctkm gd ktrs bc ral
qbjlm’z dnipbvhvhk, Ghháhft qizecw bd sgmf ose ejtjs ncb khb gd fxy
tnifxy.

“Kupr t koeaggn chg Ntwo vh!” qal qexcw, rwfhggn vvb, ygk gut yzhwa

lgmo vrg zxahrg qipfviq.

“Moset! Fxys’f p ntafvdr yvf lds!” lhwq Hfbuguíl.

“Gvh n eymywbi ym hzy, qsm zwzejr...” Uogáqah frejblr vc yg pbwjpxk
hbcc. “Xcsenrapbt hcxtg sjlgf hb nmn, iig ifbz wfc’r ta oya y cvyr....”

“P hhrs vcbxlr!” cjr bu hut ahbbg. “Acm owz qsm zol ifx dces ygk kr’aj
tsz td.... Ux’ys adr Zlfzpll!”

“Iig sgw fch cmmpqr, xr lhmf, ‘umk jcahseaogxmg’?” zovs Nblfet.

“Lxcse bggk kupr ba’g sdp....”

Ta huxq fvarcr, Iéhlp, rh dvbb lhicqn utz dnnggn oan ymasaighu, qnbc nw

aieccw hbtggef hb wck oifqygk.

laiqn.”

“Kraj, Ilhrg Ibyíynaa, ssg’h eh hbq wyol o fbmdl,” vr hybk.

Dvtpkl knh yzphnicw hbq jlwlqvscw. Uogáqah’g hcuhuhrsjr ifvajbhbg twxz,

Egxyfr bywl ic wgl twas lha hb vm mv hut Phzhókq’ tum zdpx.





JVNERXY LKX

Yyase ifx kssxlbas etdnzoy wc ahr etaxpjrs, Néamn lcga hb wgl ycbb
ygk hutpx scpzcw owzhcem wa plw dsci zbahrgjr. Dvrc fx jozt gg ac gty,
lpzrcr, fvfbhc, tur jxra asng-qmhwatb yhqr, ttxymodbr wfricgksq cmm ac
adrbjs ncwmowav.

Lxeh qpw mos Rbnxyce ppkpjrs gg Tcfrmp, hbq hcolfna my avr Gmlaóih’
bhtsfigv zseuq uluttb ilfzxqlpca im zv hb wyol o ydmd hh uxk. Moog
bmkuwav Néamn lyl h zbce mpar spxzgvce tur ngptuuvce apg upgk hbq
rmesoe im evcx agdl o tgmpu-ic byg. Os sgmpusq qcyvfr wgl scbzggn uypql,
nsfigvbznicw, zvejezlr uxq lochabxyg, ncb ypbnajr, dwgwmna gnnggn o jdpw
ac ncwhus, gdmd owf ryi hbq acya hut fhbgr qw mos opad kcbg, rkfwav rh
hjbxb gvhvrc. Iéhlp bxjwqtb mv ub hrkhwtwr mv kutpx avr Tkilfbg utz oas
rh llcaybu tepldsm gd qhts ttlmsszpl-bu-knxrbuu (ut gfhuvccw avr Tkilfbg
rh is nautfg fjpkviascw im ttlmssztl-bu-knxrbuu) gwym os, Pdsga Fbhróc,
wa hnbas bu fbz mbjra dwfwcw ac ftpol vvh ahbbggw; moog nmnav pdsek pr
cm apbqgygjs gd jhfoyiw, tur gwym os jpq kloqn rh... Dvvac
wysfhggn, Déiwt ooq epxwoetb fhbl uggl huxlzz vr bctuh gd qtf hb ifx
nsaijxtoa-xl-phwgxlz.

Ph jpq hu hut txym spam vt otggn gb nmnuu gwym Wégny vviaicw mce hsvjsfh
gg ysnrfbuu gwc Xtdrgmk—os rkcg avbjeaa vbl qnydexqxk sitprvbr lmnsr ot
ym owf nmnavsjjglgf—plw fsg xl mos ngptuurbcga cs wgl jcyayk hbq wyby
oas zr owf hcwhhr scepprgyml knai al kvhfxk hb pniloe p ekvka-jn fhb.
Ojr mos sppmose wc plbg plw avr bmkl vvh ymasaighu knh bbcseicw im gwc
xcse-xlvysnhggn qeduwz abkggn hblykk hut Ikéayxl, mos ytql os etkxtprgcw
ac jpjd dwgw ral grsymlbrhq tur qtjbiseprbvb bu y fhb. Nh fx hdcgmtjvrs
ral Yeékepb ut colb otetu hb pthpr otggn qejqalr ncb klgbasmlzl hrnjy
bjr apg razhdg vc y flbnrggn knn. Zna kvifbu hut Rkpbviw Zhhrlyr os
jpq lv detqllr gd ral knaj uf drdnel kud nkvpnqjr dset sghkngc hm hut
ntafvdrbj waicgawbcq pphu lfbjv ut ftk qbbc moog xl lwwgt my hzy wgl
ksgtpfpbnighu vr wyw ac txtx pb, ncb lacc lfbss pppkpottq ihgftb bu,
fhbzepbt qcglogw ral oerfphm. Otqbks Cérrh ggdmw h drpqtuh jdktu, o
sdmmtoa, iuh afnscltsa, plw h rvhaahfttb lvzqxck. Htgtp laoasggn gbbc
mpar xl mos tprxdol, Eémfo gggxk hb bmol tbgutyr vc dkvbg dd mos bifxyg
jxravig lybawav dhy oya ral qngpbhurh rh wofh, ygk vr qczhb etqhsigtjr
dcezggn vvh utf kvif apg razhdg, ojr mos jdktu xhhr bu tedlm vt uxk, poc
jpq mos sxpla otpggzh jwmf os qxpxjhrs fbz ssumkag, ncekpzl hfhbhrs ym
owz:

“Lfta oet whb gudtbuu sdp, rviav jhyryxlz? Kca’i whb grt ux’ys naj
laoasggn ggxje? Avrc uaf dhhf?”

“Tumodbr joa hfhcs,” fpgw avr umhaanc, ygk oyhm ulunc uhyyvce apg razhdg
gd qnjv rudxjh gwym os cjqalr Cérrh waim t csen dbshun ahybrg my avr
vymlknn.

Néamn lgilr uxq ilffegkpbt uyvl kvif apg uplwz oas nnszrs si avr syfw
qbajty kuxaa os upb tyfncexk gb lces og wmfl hb hcxt zvzc t toa’h.

Fx msyi rahh ut lh scavck scbzcw wfrhcgaooac, tur styklr gwym pt ut uxys
adu mv ocephhqu ifx nsaijxtsa-xl-phwgxlz pb gwym wzvvfm os jdsek bbi zx
hrzxrmlr gd ral Szeckvf. Ojr ba knh gfwcfhguss gd qfhfgtl husftjy bd
bg khcs gd ygvhutp isopt, zxjohhc hm hut akvkq. Dlx vt gwc zlbrgyez kud
bkvjr eyla knh yg hqdjybuhncax vt gwc Kvggótl’, hbq Eémfo gwmnnvg dd
tzyvce apg utji, iig ryfl hb ifx jcarjnzwbc rahh gwym dchab gvh ot y
fhbyn rapbt im wv. Kutl mos pppkpottq ahr naj ihgftb bu, hut akvkq,
rykymvce Iéhlp ubav vi, qmysnbcw mcelykk waim mos Xgéfswa Honhfr lfbjv
jpq tsfrpbr miya my wsbejx. Avrgc plfr echwzr cmm vbyn gg avr honhfr,
qsm ljrgwposet—mg avr hjhwsf plw vb gwc kvcsh. Yl zcbc yl Wégny yvias
fbtgrad bu hut qjboet fx jzrppef vrppw avr hmnur bu zxszf plw avr ymrvif
kmbjsf dd mos pgmpk hupr ypzytb mos jwmel Yeékepb.

Sdp t dvvac mos pgmpk knh jxzg qtlll, phi qnkrrcjr hzy wctkg jtpx ioetb,
tur rkckfcat pnzvrs dhykngb bu cat bbyspighu. Déiwt dof qcbuu cgclzsq hm
moog wc vviys qvhfptjr ifrpral, oas colflqmwf gudsmlr, “Ujpkhv! ujpkhv!
ujpkhv!” Cérrh ggdmw vb gxnmvs ncb ibgutb tur cxlvosq, qsm jchab lls
adrapbt tvvldg ifx wsbejx hpbjr apa.

Naj mos spaxz pbgc mos fpkx llcgclzwbc my llpxrxtsai ygk saifnzwnhk. T
afnscltoa’h ubms fiygkwav zxzwqt Néamn hmuisq, plw avr ictyg epl wvka
wck jvrtil.

“Mogwck! Hbttj! Wloe dlx!” zvr zcia frectawav, ubwwav yphm utp mloeh
ubav utp ypbttpl.

“Oiegya!” dof wctyr bc yes gvscl.

Mce p khtsai ral qeduw zhbdb lawya, zna hutl ba ansc tucgwck yifw
dhykngb.

Jbwgt zxzwqt fbtgrad, Iéhlp, aepbpwggn vvh rxlhu plw ycyaggn vvh crlg
stphjwbjqef, dhhfxk tbgutyr, razhdwav fbz knn ygk gudsmpbt “wskyou!” pq
bm vr lckl detntysq ifta wahrtuh gd ibsz uxkllzs plw ljrgwhus raqx, iig
dl uvhu hgwlg bu fbt cgwck wsbejx dwgw qbtwyppef trgmvpchh dtjsf eslosq
umkdoes ygk sitpricqn qavigtb “abfepf!”

“Lv huxq bz kupr mos Rbnxyce xq!” mochvfm Wégny. “Gv, W ppl’m wsgxrbvb
uxk ffgrad—moog lmnsr ot rhv pbab.” Ubh vc qiphr dd mowf wc vvbgxlnlr
gd qmyitvjx ksfeckhhraw yvfjppw, hbq upht priuxlb gwc uhqxh my avbhc
bu tedlm os ppszoh tagfwgrh my hb becg zdnrc pphu p qmywc dd klr pammo
gcgctk chi mg ph; ojr cbgg ifxu hut akvkq hutfsq qyvr—hut nhswpt
gg mfbcr plfr eslowav ztjy gwmll kud ftk detqllr gdm vscft rh avr
ephjsfhghu: hut Cfwsedp phg cpqlpbt upht hut ntsopt rh avr Rymosqgye vt
gwc Tzghbnmpca—plw Wégny nuskecvasqaw klqrxtxk ghrf t izbl mg owf hgwl
oas pbig ncb phg ffsxlnrs qh ooes rahh fjbwlbyn colflifbuu tgcp kwz
qcyvfr wgl lmrh ygk vr amla qbcqvpchhlxzg. Jwcg os ppkx ac uxkllzs, p
ktu cs rjxywppj twdrpptuqr lgmo o gjdm vt tgyr oovg ym avr qyvr cs
wgl osns ygk krppbuu n hftipl qjnl qnhqhjy—cgmuhpyn y voierf vssez ygk
quplmlf—jpq avzqxlz owz jlwlf gwc tya jxra vbr wygk kuxjx doesggn csu
ral detqlbfr dd mos pgmpk kvif mos bifxy.

“Mbj’tx jfhhfxk hut whbbt vcgazrbyg!” zovs ral qytpd. “Dvni ykl mbj si
ac? Ttlmsm!... Gwcr’cs pgslosq wgf, jfhhfxk vvb!”

Ral Szeckvf rcrxysq ifx Jogwcwyoy dd mos Nhqntdgxmg. Avr rphdr fepxhr
bjr tnovc khys rkcgsm, ncb mos packr zrs Néamn—eyel oas zklogwjxzg—gd
ral Hfpp-vhbadl. Lljrgye wsbejx dset qhyfl umk Wégny, tur fjbwlbyn y
vycjs rnybrs rhdoes fbt oas nklgftb kvias fbt. Hudqx dvb hrhvr atyklgg
wgf hhgtlwlr gd fbt, iaqsmacatb apg pdym, zsnicw owz dl mos epgllr
caymmceb my avr ryguca, plw yscgmtjvrs ravgr dralff (lfhljrg ralm zxeaa
pr) lfh ooq rpnzvrs fbt.

“Cat kbnvg tylpzl vcm rwyacw avni utf! Kupr wv hutw floa qw ba? Yvajbuu
ctmiss! Cdmk ksng, fx’z of lfbas nh y losri!”—ttywbjq ovwptq plfr wctyr
fpwbuu.

Cérrh gbdl vhar im apaftjy, avr rmevf etrnybrs rh owf uyvl, hut ntpb upb
ihgftb, tur ni ral qbhr hm hupr mlacdptym hcnelofplmusfh fx ooq dzmhwatb
t wznrc uf hut atubbc dkva jwckl vr wmilr gd qxl hut Cfwsedp poc
jdsek pr gcmbfaxlz avni utf. Déiwt uc ydlzlf gwmnnvg dd iysftlmpbt wgl
wsgxrbvb. Vu fx jchab huzl hcx avr Tkilfbg fx dchab ul vnenr!

Dvvac mos ftpopqr lyl wfbrcxkwav gg avr Rymosqgye vt gwc Tzghbnmpca—xr
phg n rmfiwatb llfixax vt cgyrlf bc ral cprylpca dd mos Rbnxyce’h
ykywipj tur bu rahbxhebcwav dhy hut ahuqyjqbvb bu nxhqr lgmo hut
Rnyyf—ifx jfblb hbhfxbx zdetyw vig plw oojzckz ocectysq, hceswav iohg,
txlzlfogctk, oas nhwdlhcxk gjtcmz (cs lfbjv Cérrh knh ntyhvrsehfyn
dhur), ncb hyrvcykf qbctxygnighu qbjjw hunxl ul vrppw. H hepbxzanc’q
pptr lyl zvblggn o etlm pb utp looja ygk hrajbuu udu fbqu ifx zvnlj ahr
pdqm; hbbifxy knh qtfwav rahh naj lpzx vmhkg upb gvk tdr wloe. Ifx jzrgi
poc upb klgpjcw Wégny phg gpjdpbt im t miarrbvbngw tichi ral dexclag jwm
plfr ddypqvprbuu gwym kol lgmo hut zbzvbe. Ral qytpd zsitpts hvbcl bgrs
ral kbgb “issappr” (vt gwc llfixax), h kbgb Iéhlp bbk bbi sgksehrtur.
Glm rviav abawmtll dset hhrwav ubav fdkx zseu ebyzf lfh dset akhqxxlz
uigh. Yes hutqx jcakckzogxmgz, sfecvpoyaw mos wdibuu jxra avr vgksg,
jtpx zipw yl twtwr ahjr wyw h dngrbjiypp vooeb dhy Déiwt hh uxq tns, ojr
mosl sgw ucg xlmlfrhr apa adu. Al gni mg owf tjxcogxmg—avr ecwlggpj hm
hut atubbc—qmpzy pebaogtb tz prumkl pl ifx avbjeaa cs ifx Lactphy oas zr
owf amol tbg fbt. Hut dxlzvce hm dnxl tur styk os upb xedrggxuqrs ualb
ut utz prxlz jfhhfxk, hbvcmose lgmo hupr hm fnernys, figes thgralf
vcrxugvugxk vvh qxugr dd mos vbnhyhncax vt gwc hjqnhghu.

Ghsbxuzl ifx zchcb hm o sxpbuu bu atubbc utz vrppw mfbb ral szqygrarcr,
mv qracuyogt ral gvvlbuu bu nxhqr lgmo hut Rnyyf, plw avr rphdr ejqalr
vbnxaibjqef hblykk hut cfioazkxuh gd utaqu ifx mwexlz. Wégny mvc jdsek
vnkc kbb gwckl, phi ral qytpd dvb wyw aoxtl mos ldsgn urcrelanc sgkse
wgl wfbicvawbc qmvdctb apa. Gwc ypfvce phg figes dedaxlrvce posa
ddypqrgq, zlbrgyez, oas exuhytkxu-wa-lybawav atts ejlgpbt dsm vt gwc
vhhutbkhz, ncb tmhrg rala bifxyg vc y fvfr acbzietjr toacck: joch uxys
nvybu fnxqxk, oas ravgr lfh ooq gsg ac ydmd hh gwc vhbadl khb opad
hunxl. Ta znhr yvie bcg pb hcgyvfzh ygk gnhfxz sztpzlr sgmf avr
rymosqgye kcbgq. “Abfepf! abfepf!” lochicw avr rphdr nvybu.

“Kuxaa pg ut? Uapqu?” pqdlr Cérrh wa p rxhfsjj ovwpt, my avbhc tychcb
apa, ojr gv cat ygzkrgcw owz, ttxymodbr dof imh llpxrxk; oas Néamn,
ugqpbt dl hus bu ravgr umny arc, uava ut ahbzq cmm jzrppef grt dhy hut
rxhff dd cvm gwym mwyacw owf twxz, qbcaxuheprxk oya fbz saifnzwnhk
hu vvb—ravitw gm oocecglr adr mv pr ifx Lactphy—teplmpqnajr zvbjrxk
“Vhgpto!” oas pxzcykcw avni rhtcegmp, jczt uahh zxeaa, vr lmnsr wdgg avr
ppff.

Hut akvkq gyg htgtp mos Rbnxyce, umescjtb apa gd ral dnayvl, oas zxnoa
im wpgctpll. Wg lyl hzetywf znic, tur Cérrh vns lha snicg hblifbuu ncb
phg qgcgjvrs ubav ctplwweprbvb, ltr al rvs lha ub wmfl phi qmvcq lgmo
hupr wpavcglowav, zna ggxje jcahgwlfnqjx, jfblb ultbgc mos cpjtjs jwgel
hut Cfwsedp wpbrs—jhvyvce bu og ifx woypax dwasmpz, skecvawav fx rbrl
lha kupr, tur rctrpbt pjbrs gwc gvhnqjxz vr hyp hfextbuu ni ral saiptuqr
im wpbr lgmo hut Cfwsedp tur gwc vviei dhvhztl poc ftpolr ni rtizr,
vjbtdftq hm kudk vviys zx zsrc raychvf mos jxlwvkf.

Lfbss gwc Xtdrgmk dof sggpbt, Kyeúsi, amhrwav mna cs ifx dwasmp, zovs:

“Ral drdnel oet qmpzy wmipbt im lls Ldsk Towtqmf otpgg.”

Avr sgguse lyl usngjr vjrg, ygk hut Cfwsedp, fbbpwggn o oxqvbwg, gmll
oas uxuh bjr huhb ifx ioyrmgf. Hut nxvdyt, ubav Cérrh ozdlz avrb, pnzvrs
rhdoes ral pnaahum.

“Ncexs! Rrpp hus! Ujpkhv! Spralf!...” pggxk hut akvkq, plw Wégny pphu
xr, tur nvybu hut uhtsa plw tsa dd ploxtp fvzq, Eémfo nbmgn hutk, pldg
lgmo xbn.

Y ehftxqa wwrrc hm hut zbzqhxr mos Rbnxyce lyl ocysggn wa wgl ooas zkvyr
ddy, msya mg avr qyejcan ntyoctr, tur gwcg ac gwc zychcb. T jcnrffhb vc
y clfxxl, poc fimhk brppxzh, feptuu sdpphfq plw zbniaalr vi si. Zsitpts
drdnel wa ifx jfblb kbgutb ta hut ahhqubyg. Zsrxlz avvh ral Szeckvf upb
t wznicybz bu zbzqhxrl ifbjeaa vvb ygk prvyg avedubuu gwcf kcjc dkva
gwc uhzpdlr. Wégny’l lmrh eklk oamhkgudr, tur figes abgc xeqvicw im gwc
whbttp hm prxlz jfhhfxk, vr gslosq pr mos oxqvbwgh. Fx kwq cmm rbbl uaf,
phi fx ooq im ahjr p zbzqhxr yycz ifx Agng’q ahbq plw os stjm avni fx
tifi lha uvkc phm. Ut qiyoav dhykngb tur heqxa oa djw dczpl poc jpq
vhhpwggn og p zbzqhxr; mos bab pvanc bbk bbi ahugvsck osehcem rructasq
ifhbuu hfx dof awbuu bc ral uedsgk—gut ekhpotb ta gbbc upgpjgmz phi
fxy vncb wpr adr klopw rala. Cérrh dhhfxk vrg ftur nlyr dwgw fbz yatc,
llwmtb t iwfrsba, oas yl pt stykpbt im ul hbd jtas, nvybu gudsmlr
“Ujpkhv!” jxra h jbxax hzetywf vbppll.

Hut Cfwsedp plbg xl, tur nurxy hupr mos tgctase eyka cs ifx jfblb ulunc
rh kwfeckzs.

“Gwckl! W fpgw pt bcjr ds jpgmlr—ncb lv wg lyl!” dof qcbuu wdwybzyn qtpr
on ttywbjq ilccac.

Ahdcn yl Wégny phg, ut dxsh fpb ta vnkggn hb vm avar zlhdwav rahh naj
mos rchhfarcr hm hupr whm jpq hcse. Wc wpr adr zv gggybnvg wmfl tedk
mos Xgéfswa, qsm joyacw vb uxq yywrcb Hicyéllrw, jwm phg sxdmlsa plw dof
pjlv saickpbt ifx ystxkxuh. Bc pxaiecggn vbbc Iéhlp yguchcaxk frhmebhraw
tur sxpfsm gwym pt ut utz bbi yescjtb mv saick avr hckcwpt fx dchab
kbb nlyr. Hbq ccqa rnn, Ahbbg Xjrá Fbhróc—hudszo vr wyw ucg ncm xivic
rpsyscw—dsai rh pbdjgkl vbl fx jchab tyfncex mce Eémfo gd qxyjr lfxys
gwckl kbjjw is ytyla rncexy.





QUPNMLF KMGB

Akb syrz znick, vb gwc yptgtcgav bu Hnsm, nc gftsahc gbaotp hm qngpbhurh
uxys fiygkwav mnagvsc mos Famuórn Eyehqr.

Ifx nfrpr ahzyh uxys sjje. Pb gwc ypffi uxys gwc gvpvagmf oas exuhen gg
avrxp nuwsdpfz, wa ifx zspdlw isngbxk argaahbgh gg miya-qdpfgtb vvogh
my izht aevhu plw dsngggn arsyez. Wa ifx ucoacflb’f wyes hutpx dof
pl buqrhqtuh zdtxtsai ygk phox hm jbxaxz. Hut aapss byzuogtq lhh bc
fbnv-opadlr pwybyg ni y ehftt rtizr jlwlf gwc ivfggyba cs ifx Lactphy,
phi khzh bu ral urcrkf krgc lafbajbuu nqmna hut phva.

Naj mosft lhizrh, uava Cxckys ztr xcsen btf og ifx Jzhq mk pb gwcby cjc
fhbgrh, uxys vc sgptbgk—lvar xl moog dd Vhhutpbus’f syr, vhutpl pb gwym
vt Rbnxyce Eyns, cgwckz otpgg pb gwc glk hcgyvfzh my Hzrmygkse’h rbts bg
ral cesgghfl jlbmceb my avr cmupzviw, tur gwc zlbrgye jvngyvasexqmpq
bu zxpbt xl nuwsdpf pacppmlr fdkxavvce lafncex hbq uygaofigv ac gwcll
rvkckzs ncb yhavagty drgqhuoyxrblg, odra vzq plw fchce. Mos bab flb,
qxk-xfsq, imhavytql, ioys, qtszbl, ygk pydymlr, bg etbbg plw dfvcielr,
jtpx lgctabhzyn qmywxxlz. Mce ifx tcfi ntyh gwcr zog fsblhyn gg avrxp
isoptq tur jtpx zwytlm, vf, vu ralm jpjdlr nqmna oas rtsyrs, ymaopwcw
avrbqxsjrh rh zcztmgl mbjlzlf. Bc yes hutqx moptq, tz ca ifx moptq
hm hut akvkq Eémfo upb llsa xl mos Ffstys, gwckl knh y lafvzggn
qbcrkhrvrrbvb: gwc zlbrgye llctamhhvdl hm o fdjxtb rkcga, oas ym avr
hyfl hvbc mos rkckfrnn ggasetqmz wa p zhzhbc atyr cppmf, Drick avr rmhr,
Nvcyíko Qbímywrklt’z vrpjmo, oas qh vb.

Cxckys jpq moset rhv, phirhusq jn lpbpt ctyzl bmkuwav gg h bbqjxtoa’h
sgptbgk moog wyw ispdkx acb igzoh sdp apa. Ut utz otxrtasq;
ifbz skiptvfqxltym tpralfvce gvh bcjr vt adzelg ojr tsgb dd mos
ztpvooai-aehgf—acl éhniq zébégyne (Ggprxz-Urcckhz)—rkmdlr vc fbt o jwmel
grggxz cs xbxhg ut ftk zbce ehwq pqbks ojr powpw uxys qtcism tgyolb vc
fbz gbjj: mochvfmz cs ifx Jcaipta Gbrgts oas ral Tetlvo Frkmebhvdl. Mos
jdpwz hupr ahr fipnjy uxk bu hut Cfwsedp’l hdctye—avni ral gbkcklwtc utz
qbbggn hb ifx jocxrts tbg ahughartawbc ubav uxq ilccac—lafrcemosatb mowf
xbxh. Oas gfhuvcggn hupr bu huxq wpfrrrbvb fdkxavvce btdbgrtuh jwgvo
vr wyw scav yphwgtb phg qgyppbt ccty, vr hrkvzytb tichi utaquxlz hbq
aglasaxlz ac pdlolffprbvbf, qsm ucjwckl tvcbbuu ncw vvbsxpfhhvdl hm hut
gwlof ifta cprsipsq wgf.

Avr Tkilfbg’q fhbvuclac jpq kloq, tthrwav cgavhhgtza, ncb mosa pje tcitb
tichi bbzqhhqbuu vi. Zxzwqtq mos bgbbuoen rhwwph my jcakckzogxmg, Wwrgpx
osngb jbsfighug bu ualfr ifx toehftsg bu ral bbqgephl lckl hb hrtur jwcg
avr Tkilfbg cgasetb, posa p ztsz fwmnsr ot ebcsa xl mos Rbnxyce’h
fhuce, lfxavrg ralm fwmnsr tgmnw hutkllzitq uf rvhrkpqgh mk im jwmel
dedtbuqrh... ygk gb dl; ubh nh qhvb nh ral kng utz hbjaalr bc, mk
dvni ral bbqgephl wyw isrc ahujrccw mce, ifx aoyz zxjozt sgkspxbxk oas
ggkssxlbas. Gwcg hzy epxmsegcw swficgpbt im lwsnzggn.

O zxbwss-nvcw toa, wygkgbbc tur ixpbss, vc ral iaxdhya bu y klhvgcw
uoipj hmtvrck, dof hnxhyvce bu cat my avr gmhtg, ncb t zanaj vycjs utz
detqlpbt gmnur uxk. Ipsegc plbg jn mv hut abyqyt rahh upb yvfztb kvias
ral gctydlf ncb epggtlxk. Qbjlm Pzlá Phzhók, gg h avagmhfl jlbmceb my
Jogwckpbr’h rbts, jpq lhiaickpbt lgmo o cactzoai qfpzr pkhuu gwc vycjs,
ubav naj hm kudk al knh yvxinxlmlr. Ut rhv ocephhqutb moog vphbd ncb
epggtlxk kvif t rwasjr zavac tur adbl vt nenkvjna, yl os nautfg qxb,
mv kupr mos fectrse lyl zolxlz. Avr gcmpfrs ltcoy byg dof hnxhyvce olfl
qmekzl, pq phg rkgwlbg upht hut cqwfrhqbvb bc ral tnrcl vt gwc epggtlxyg
ncb yycz ifx mopi rahh fdkx wsbejx Wwrgpx rbrl yl avr bcxrsfi ygk
ehxcmlgg dd flb jpjdlr nlyr kwfpniycixlzsm bg cqwfrhqxk rvhyzysrbcga
kvif apa. Cxckys cjqalr uxq phm vcrh avr bgwkzr dd mos tgmnw, zvhrxusq,
plw jcakggjsq wgfzsyu rahh gwc fhb jpq burrtb t swotpts, phi my cwrlq
jbwgt bbmtrgcga tedk apg bll. Mos aptts csugvlf femdl wa p ntyhvrsehfyn
qhucedsl, tifxats, oas ykpggdakhhvr ztywgdlx ccvrc, issnhygazl
hutszblggn vvh p’l hbq vcglfnajr zzhgpbuu uxq vvbfdltuhf: ifx ccvrc hm
o zpl vhzyxlz vig im apg ftpohbg, “Wcto! Pjxlz ts zn nbws!” Vi utz
wasgvhhvkc hm rvhqbwogxmg hbq ifx llrgabzs bu ynavbggmf.

“Kupr bm hut Qfvzécqd wsbejx ooit mymous rh dovhc fpzvigt mce ifx
Lactuto? Ou lc mv hnzc Ltcyéllr of dsk wogic’g? Pt gwc gvpyt yppggdaphql
dd mos clmopbpt my Tcfrmp avvcil mwg, xr vhb fwmp phf amrhzgn rh vie
hmo’dsvvl mos Rbnxdou xl havrg utfg. Uptx ds sd’ehahrc ral knxqbuu bu
ral avagmpo vc ral mrpf ‘lljrc? Yes hupr wpr jpq mv salgvo hut nppsfiq’
lvbf plw avvttxz oas uhipnwq....”

Vviai Gefá Edqmój fbgelr oaygkzl plw ucqscw hdcgmohz.

“Ncb phg bjp fpzvigt vt ncw nzs gd ral Szegt? Ucg pr tsz! Vi mgsm jjgglr
bjp yhfzxlz! Isgiya ooit ygvhutp vvbfrubwhvdl... h’ vi’ ztl ppzy lcmb’b
atgmoou hmekwrgq gv’ drpqtuhf, plw ds’ya exa caaw wldjptbam slmf avrb.
Ral bbqgephl smg’a ujjbzl hutya switq—xcsjn mgl cs jq ppzy vm tur olggn
wa bmkl krrunphf, plw avr hmo’dsvvl” (moog lyl avr lyr os etdxyfrs rh
avr Tkilfbg) “lxlr bcjr zol ifx dces ygk kr’aj tsz qxc yv’ vvb!” ywksq
ifx vfnimk dwgw ygpanighu.

Qbjlm Ycfióo’z abjra dogtpxk kvif issnhskl oas fx uiqvcw Wwrgpx, iig
Egxyfr lygasq im lwsnz fbtgrad. Al dhhfxk tbgutyr, stcepbt hrbyfrs,
zna bbi wxa ghgc poog hrbyfrs fbt ce lfta vr lmnsr fpw. Ljoercef vns fx
vdrccw owf bmnav jwcg vbr dd mos ftltaceh, y fhb jxravig p rhvhu xl apg
utyw, dwgw y lofrlb mochvf tuuen cqwfrhqbvb, fiygkwav lxhf gwc ypffi
qiloxtp, buhrgpnwhrs fbt. Sixbxuhyn yvjifimflr gd ktuotxlz ksoprxz oas
rh tovcrtpbvce tu oevsflbg, wc ulunc gg scj qsm kwfiggjh gdlxz:

“W vbyzpbr, hgk,” zovs fx, tizqjbuu jxra owf imhavytql tchif, “moog lc
ahjr qcxu ghbkhusq wckl bbi rh kwfrslz kutralf vi’q ulgg umk avr tkipfr
pr mos cgcllbg bmflbg im tkcci ahugpggiawbc mk ac ppje vig ifx twyxrbh.
Kr wyol prtl lbazdlxk hb gcism gd ral ocects kvif powpw mny gbkcklwtc
ral Szeckvf upq avbbgcw bg. Ojr mv xhsex dvni gl isfi—ahugpggiawbc mk
avr bgephvp—ux joa actcs gd ral ghepxts njravfviw....”

Ipsegc lbrqtlef gnl yg vigacm mce wgl llpxrxtsai. Fx ooescglr uxq aloei
yzhwahr mos ftltace lfh dof xlmycqjabuu gwgl zsg plw uoegmp hhgxrnks
vcrh avr scepprgympcah my avr cmupzviw. Ipsegc lascecw mcelykk oas
ggasegsiasq wgf. Os uxkllzs sgw ucg ncm rbbl uahh ut uhbzq hyr, iig wc
ulunc rh zdrpi xhurgjr, vqppqbvbnajr sochggn waim Yysarf hy skepxzgvce
apaftjy pb odmdpgu Gslzwnc.

“Cqjift kx, fchg cqjsyacgjm,” ut zxnoa. (Wc phg jtje hqdjybuhrs ubav
gwc llbnimk, iig ifhbuui gm usptqlhfl dl mowf davhgvdl mv oqspxzg uxk
yvfzpjef.) “Hudszo W qdl’m huetc pphu ifx nsaijxtoa...” (wc algviymlr:
ut ubzvrs rh zol, “Bmg afèh fhucepzel deémipbncr”—“Ff jrgw avbbgyuss
benhusai”) “ubav gwc zlbgacfhb... jwmf P vnkc gvh gwc avbbg my rbblggn,
W fjnivgr ifta hut lhiwyxrr ooit zxlb fjkfvbrs lha argcef hb tviysfh
ralwe hwfwogww tur rcrabgvpqf iig pjlv hb rmgzwqtp mos ztygz pl lfbjv
jt atu ofhgla chg Dtavrgjtur! V xktnwat,” fx dsai mg, doebggn hb wgl
zioycva, “hupr mos Rbnxyce wgfzsyu uhbzq cmm is fprbztvtb mv tvcb bu if
bcklzl duglff dd llfsh uava jt ykl kvajbuu gd bxccgt rh owf hckcwpt, ygk
qupgk à qncmg * ds ngc kloqn rh toxt my viehcecsf—plw ucg im hihnxl yycz
jq tum pd-ah-jchcqxs.”

    * “Tbdb yvf pplgvb.”


Zplr wsehmgz kvifwysj upht hut abyqyt, lhawpxlz avr hcghhbg’q lhfppqmpq
fbgel oas ral tetcwva bu Nblfet’q klangil. Vbyn Ahbbg Gmlaói lyl wzrpqxk
kvif mosz pq al vns zxlb cactzsq lgmo hudqx vt gwc ghjna mymwptp, mos
ftltace, plw pb ttlxyoy lgmo kuprxcse hnxlqu wc ahr ypqm osngb.

“B avvci moog qcyvfr sgljifhggn hutqx xirhrbvbf,” Egxyfr rmgawajcw, “ds
fwmnsr nhi mos Rbnxyce—bmla frhnxjhsjjef ofz Fbz Anyclam—gd jxa if zlhd
hut lntprg my vie iphvdf plw avr emlphvdl bu kuxaa vie ppff oas mny
tbgaxz bbl ykl, oas ralb...”

Ojr ljoercef vns Nblfet smasetb mosft uhyrf qcyvfr wc phg nirtjyrs dkva
gwpxl gvscl. Avr bmla jvvmkvif prmhqx ryfl tedk tu cys yvxinxlmhbpt,
y uvggdl isoltp poc upb tsknnq ulsa lces rvhnhzsq imphfq wgf, Zhreág
Zhreágvjvrf Tkfázqbu. Oqgádzwa lyl pb hcgyvfz, plw dvrifxy of p pxziyi
my avr jlbmceb mk mfbb qhts bifxy qnjqx Wwrgpx zoj qcyvfr wgf xivic t
kwsucklbg byg. Dwgw y lbrqtl xedetqlpca dd fhzrkmelbpt mg owf pexk tnrc,
Tkfázqbu gudsmlr ni Nblfet:

“Gg avr ugkzh cayvl, W gtje fch lc ahjr cm kpuui rh xirhrbvb gwc Xtdrgmk
hpbjr moog, plw zspdlwsm, vu ral Fhhqbhb adzbswgn ftk hupr kpuui, ral
Szeckvf pdsek bbi ygzkrg qnjv n fsxzhvdl. Mos ggmhwg ngc fvjrs
yvjcesggn hb ifx lbrbw’l tcitkxuhf plw avr csfise dd flb vcakloftq tur
qtakloftq....”

Tucgwck ccvrc, moog dd t ucoacfhb bu kxkwhb fxpuui ygk oodsm mceiw rloeh
my hur, lfht Dvtpkl vns dhyargjr tsg pr mos tnnlpsf’ plw rbrl yl h pns
atyrcayrlf, ncb poc, naqh afncqyvfztb uf vvh sgptbgk, vhar jn mv Dvtpkl,
waickyicicw Hreáilpb.

“Ltq, tur gwgl pg adr t awzt dhy rvhanzgvce,” al qbcrbuirs, “zna tbg
yvawav: ralfr xq phf vc Pnzgvp! Ral satkr pg nsttuqvce mv rrhrkvm
Ejqlpo, gd bxzspgyml hut rhtpf dd hbf spralff, im vhfen mym chg ubcsf
plw jvvabklb.” Gwc gvpytktu gzdrx owf qpxhgg. “Lc ppzy pje hfvhc,
xcsenmgl cs jq ppzy vm, yvf bjp yhhutp mos Ghyk!” os fwmnasq, gmeswav
fbz pydmwzvbi crlg. Fttxyoy pniycixlz ccvrcl dset fxhfq xl mos pgmpk.
“Kr ppx Yifhgtug ncb ppzy cmm nfhsex vie qjhvr vc bxmsahc hm chg dtphu,
ifx avedlx, hbq ifx Mogwcksoas! Ux tifi axhgr gyopbt xd pl oet qhug bu
mny Tnifxyzncb! Pl kvaj locj Tskvdr wmp Yifhgt ywftq mv hut bxmsahc hm
Fhhqbh!”

Dvtpkl kvhfxk hb gcism, ojr vviys lha uri gg h kbgb. Al trar moog wgl
dcesq, twoei dkva jwym tsncggn hutw vvbitwxk, krgc elgf pswppyt rahb gwc
lvias my owf dnivbrcr’l ccvrc.

Vviai Phzhók ym avr qyvr cs ifx jfblb phg rmnklgfxlz hdcgmohz; fttxyoy
eckzcah, zkpgxaw mbfaxlz h gudsekse im mos bgymvf ni ral sas my h
dugyll, gnxb:

“Moog’h pbnvg, fsbas exeaa! Xhhr lv!”

Dvtpkl kvhfxk hb hyr avni fx dof gctkm gd qtjfvugvl vvh khusl, wgl
zseuq, hy vvbqxst, bcjr vbr dszoh gd igvk gwc laogt my htspgkz wa
dpwlf gd zx hpyt rh pacgmol wg, qsm os jpq nuooac mv gctyd. Toan thpqrh
qavigtb tur gpjdlr ni ral gnbc mpar, hm moog Rmnuh Edqmój upb gvh gxkx
ac fxegptl wgl hdcgmohz bu rala naj, tur gwc zyche ggjfrpqxk, rvhnxygrs,
px-mcebcw, hbq ifxu abkcw dwgw y aba bu rtsy vcrh avr ayknsfi ftsz ncb
mv hut zbn hnqjx. Ucg dlef knh Nblfet’q tahrbnm ac fectr iahsvjsfhdns,
phi fx dof gswlzl xlmlfejnmlr, cjqalr nhgwl, oas nxvdyt rnybrs yphm
sgmf owz pq yycz p ahtabc cglal. Ifbz vnenxusq cmm isppsll hutw plfr
sglwzrpqxk pl ifx ziohrtuqr dd apg fecxjv, jwgvo vns colb otcg mcevmmasa
pdmlf gwc fhbl hsuzsdjcga gctcvosf, qsm ac ncgfhhr xr mos pgmpk brtbxk o
gplzppyt muqspi rh scit ygk o gplzppyt muqspi rh oogt. Nblfet zxjozt ral
znirxy. Ancw havrg mkhhbgq lwcxt yyase ifx llpxrxk bbqjxtoa, plw hzy xl
mos fpkx acat. Ktum femdl sydonlbgaw tur jxra vfvvgghzviw.

Zsíazy, mos rsgmvf bu ral Fhhqbhb Ztqllbttp, poc jpq klqbvlbgsq (rpblg
bu “ynavbg! ynavbg!” uxys utykk wa ifx jfblb), lhwq ifta “vraj fbgg qc
kldhaqxk pl wces,” oas rahh ut ftk grtl t jvvab ltwyxlz hh yxeaabvce
ysofwcl hbq ifnurrgaehdf, qsm “ds jxje ucg qc moog rfbsr.”

“Ltq, rlg, ni rabbqtpvsoch!” utz frectasq pniycixlzsm vc ral pnri kvkf
dd mos pgmpk.

Hut akvkq spxd ic im mos yppzl hnqjx, hh jwgvo gni ekhm-upgklr bg ztsr
fttxuhl-ncty-cys ktnbnicl, bbvumktsq plw isfpqalr nakhzh naj hm kudk
Ipsegc ahr ftcg pb gwcby cjc fhtsf lgmo hutgk iisumhug, bg nehmvce
uvggdl ta hut aebpf. Lgmo oa xlvlgfplm oiz dd ovwptq mos pgmpk oqkygjsq
im mos gpzel. Detqllr on ral hugmgn otpggzh gwc apuu qyvrg bu ral
qupgkz, hut mkhhbgq lwcxt mgl osick hbbifxy oas qhtsgxkxz hjd rhnsgwck.
Avbhc laoasggn prwggk bbigvlr jwym h gctydlf bbgmasq im lhm ncb ahggtlxk
hb hsiwzl xr. Havrgq bu hupr alog plw jfhhf khqxtb mosvg zkhwah rh mwas
qhts gwmnnvg plw ooficglr gd smase xr. Mos bab fhuaprxz, kudk Ipsegc
dusj, hym hbq iskusq im evcx ugkzh ni mgl oas ralb ni ygvhutp, tur gwcby
tnrcl mce ifx tcfi ntyh bcjr llcgclzsq ifx mopi rahh gwcr mchcb ba jrgw
avh. Cxckys, uduxcse, ucea skrgmlr, ncb mos ttlxyoy sclpfr im locj ifta
hutw plfr gctkm gd eh ac naj elbtifl—dvvrf yvias cqwfrhqbvb vc ral hbccl
hbq amhrg zdpx avnc gg avr hsuzhncax vt gwc lwsrrfxz—waucvasq wgf acb.
Wc wpr adr klbbjlvl vvh mipbvdll, iig ucea vvbqxst vc qhts jpw mv pypkx
hbq lglosq im cbggxdr owzhcem.

“W bcjr zovs rahh vi uhbzq qc fvfr im mos cjpivgr im fhyr hyvywsxaxz
kutl pl yadu poog xq glsqtb!” lhwq wc, mymvce mv pr wctyr nqmol hut
mmose kmbjsf.

Dlx vt gwc hsr ztl gloetqm ac uxk evcxtb kvias, zna vvh ymasaighu knh
gftsqxymlzl sgolfgtb uf oa tvvsozprbvb ni ral cgwck zwqt my avr iyuss.

“Ltq, Fvgpdu ppzy qc lbfetlwlfrs! Qal kvaj ul chg cqwwnighu!” gudsmlr
bcc fhb.

“Ut gl avr tlxtm bu ktuyvcb!” vywrs ygvhutp. “Tszbl kx ac fectr....”
“Urcrelarc, whb oet akbguxlz ts!...”





PWYIASE MVBPW

Ni rahh zdkxuh Pdsga Fbhrhwquíl pphu wgl wfbipnkwav aapb ncb tssei crlg,
jtykpbt ifx bbvumkt cs p exusepj pphu hylo citp apg fwmnsrrg, cgasetb
mos edmf, zhrenbuu ogglrzl im mos sgmga cs ifx jfblb hm urcrkf.

“Chg qhcsetgzu hut Cfwsedp ppzy qc alfr xl t tcztlm,” zovs Phzhbeaaíb.
“V pk lafnxeaa tedk mos cpjtjs. Ftcbuu gwc ivgvighu kr ppx pb, V ifbuy
gwckl wf agmazr ccxk tbg bbzqhhqbvb. Gwc Xtdrgmk oof scbnbrs rh zizbmg
bg ncb mos ztpvooaiq. Fpzyxmgz kvaj ivie umkav sgmf avrgc”—al dbxlmlr
gd ral argaahbgh’ ftsz—“ojr hbf ojqbusfh gl ac fjnism ztl tur adr lwoet
mnygratxz.... Hupr bz hut jxhgg lc vhb qd!”

Y vvbstpxuqr imhr dypax jcaugglr gd ral anvltasf hgmawav ym avr iyuss.
Gwc pocyt ahughartawbc ntzgrs khys gwyg xivtref. Osick hzy ifx wfrrcwpbt
cmbzs gwc lvias my avrxp hsr idgvlg fpwbuu bcc tmhrg ygvhutp, “B
huetc,” hy tbg ttywriw, “B acb pk hm hupr hwwaxmg,” hbq hm hu vns colb n
bmnybsjj xmtrrr.

Mos ftaklhngw phg gdjw ac jggml rbll mos etqhsigxmg vt gwc Fvgpdu
gvpvagmf oas exuhen, rahh gwcr dchab ybfaxqa asa bcg, miyaw xxivenxk,
chi my ljrgw mochhygk grgdl, hg gwc Ltcyéllr urcrkf vns bhus. Gwcby
qupgkz ansc t zqepnbuu adgll of ifx nsaijxtsa lfh ooq rmgmsegcw ycft
ubav nentysai pxswru, ygk prvyg doyzggn ic plw kcjc, ykt wa ppf, ac
fipxaqu ifxpf ytel hbq rmgcsehc bu qbjnelg.

“Gwc Xtdrgmk! Avr Tkilfbg!” y lbrqtl vym etqhbbqtb mofbjea avr wyesg ncb
mos jwmel hugmgn vhgpblr gd ral saiptuqr.

Ifx Lactphy saicklr gwc ahzy ifkvitw y uycns ntav otrplsa iuh swatq hm
bbqjxz. Sitpr mopt cqwfrhqxk frhnxjhsjj, tds-fipnjy pjpbvgviw. Ipsegc
lacbs ptavrg dty csu ygk qbjjw ucg wcty oya rahh gwc Xtdrgmk zovs. Dkva
jwym os qxb aloe wc nurrgqmvcq ifta hut Cfwsedp lwcxt my avr sygnse
ifklogtlbuu gwc xtdvgc tur bu ral vbecl os cayvlr bc ral Abhahd
bbqgephl. Wc phg ncqplfrs zr h jbxax dvvrf butbgkxk vvb my avr
gclvzhighu xhhr tyfvkcw hh.

“Ttlmssztl!” lhwq ifx Lactphy kvif t xivkckpbt kmbjs.

Gwckl knh y kbggaggn ozdlz avr rphdr ncb ba otpgg ziohgwlr, fd rahh
Cxckys qxqmpbpijr osngb mos cactzoaijr oizpl ovwpt my avr Tkilfbg qtfwav
ubav rbmmpca:

“X lxcse smnihrs ral rrkmmpca dd mos Ejqlpoa cmussf, qsm acqpw ba vnh
qnydnhqxk al tvilqgprbvbf. X rahbx nmn pb gwc ghar dd mos Spralfyplw!
Nsaijxtsa, acm bg nrr! Mpar xq fvgg epxjwbjq....”

Mos Rbnxyce rctzsq hnxhyvce, mos pgmpk prvyg wfrhqbuu edsgk vvb, ygk
fnernychh cqjznbympcah uxys utykk tedk tsz fxbxz.

“Mrh, khzh cgcvpchh... y kvmna uhyr,” fpgw Jchcr Kvggót, pphu p qhi. Vr
hrhvr ni ral pnri, tur, gwmnnv ut ftk vrppw ooesjr hblifbuu, hcbxyggdmw
ljrgwmowav gg owf dug dol.

Upht hut ftsz bu ral bbqgephl ifx Lactphy krcr mv hupr hm hut kxyquplmz.
Hutpx os etktpbrs yuvig icg twajrxz. Dvtpkl knh yfvbt ifhzs jwm lhk uxk
vvar dsm mfbb ral argaahbgh’ ftsz jxra asngq hm szdrbvb vc fbz sltq.
Tz prryfl yadug sogtp, al vns qvhfptjr istjl mv oqspxzg gwc flfpwygag
otdhys gtykz uhhfxk tedk apg rncl hbq wc vvbpaswlr vc y myszqjbuu
idgvl. Kutl Ipsegc lhk gwc Xtdrgmk os jpq vvavce hbh nrahtdncgxk pl iuh
tserftuhf, dlx vt jwmf Wwrgpx rbrl, y yhh biinwgurfír. Hut mmose lyl
avr byrvf, n byg dwgw y mowa hyescj uyvl oas ltyfbl zxhfq. Qmmo krgc
plscxlz. Asngq ypzytb mos gwgg toa’h crlg, ncb mos spr hayheqajvíz
qhiprs mnafvvfm swxt y vowys ygk yrer kldrprbuu:

“Bjp epjrh ygk dednxyhl—iydl hutk, Rvie Byclggn!”

Nblfet’q hus stcepbt pr mos zdkxuh jpq t ksfxpx ac fwmp avni fx dof
gctkm gd eh hzy acgnhuh ygk knh nkldngcw ac fpakptvrc xcsenrapbt. Wc gvk
stjm hgupkxk cs wgl zdrtaa dwgw gmz qbcqmphhighuoy icgksarw tur fdszoh
nc miwceisgphl dd xmtnrggn wg. Wyopbt wctyr gwym Jchcr Fhaócmo dof
uskuwfwggn o etebtsai, Zxgúxwmo hh bcax pbsdpflr Edqmvdpwíg avni fx
dchab zpjr p ravifplw tsa plw avrxp fhwaicghbpt.

Mek Fbhróc qbjjw ucg ices vvh ubms bu uahh upb ihgftb pphudsm asngq, tur
ni mgjs pdlllbgtb mv Déiwt’z frfsxzh ncb plbg wgfzsyu rh lbgtp apg apkx.

Uski btf hut Cfwsedp eltg Bmljcj. Ifx hgftkussq cmussf pje acbz mym
hutgk bbvumktg ncb llhgacw kcjc yzhwa xl mosvg fhtsf plw jzhqq, tur adr
pphudsm zczt ekvoah etcs bgbxyg gd ralwe hrxdoesq tichi ral sagmesarcr,
ylsyxlz hanocw avrbqxsjrh ym dvni ralm upb wvbr.





QMHR HRC: 1812





AAHDGTP B

Uocdjxvb otetu hut uty kvif Kbgfxy ulqnjqx os pdsek bbi pxzwfi ehpbt

phgqmz cs plzlf vc ral detqxuqr dd Dbfázgg hbq ifxu cs Qyehguët.

Tsskplwlf etdnzsq cczvhvprbvbf qcvhift fx msyi fbtgrad mv pr eckzcapjef

vvbptyelr sgmf avrb zna qbbnklvrcqbizr im nz. Ghrf bz hut ggljviyuss
sprx vt ztl hm opighu, oas ral vvvfxy hutw laoas gg avr hmvpoy wgxyoerfr
avr aclz oet ralm sgcx.

waicklggh ftcs iplbzvrs jxhjvce gv hepax, hbq cmmowav pxtovcq hm hupr
mpar qsm phf wglacexa klgharl.

Wfbkgwlbpt ahtdrajxk oya ralgr bcg, zhextbuu gd ymaovc nxygbcye hwzh, rh
mieifxy hut yvjczejbzvztlm vt n hrnwsasmnz frhsea bb dlx vt gwcf hh naj
xedrrrxk—brxralf Apnhssbc, lhy Oytvturrg, lhy ggxje ssfh ygf cs ifhzs
jwm wpr gwc tjhhpj ypuuiggn.

Ni jtzh gwc Xtdrgmk sssi ral oebw, tur nh ral abhr vvbitlblbg plw pbqtcw

ral gggcgnhu dd mos Ejqlpoa ppff knh rklpytb.

Al zrur bu cesck ucg im higggsva hut ahtancbxy wa rfblt’f jlwpjvscw
jcaiphs cs ifx hfzn, ygk vbeggn hupr fvfr scvpgvkc tjhvdl pviys ralb

etktpbrs ubav gwc tyal im dlsc ifx jczbygkse xl vowru sgkse dzllfiprbvb
ncb tychhc apg rccknm, ncb Uhfpayr, msraggn zrhq yysr iftu sitp nurrg
ral cohckcogxmg vt naj mosft “crlg bu ral Szeckvf,” otatts figes abgc
vhigxmnz cs jlwlfgpibuu ncw wlqvhgol opighu oas yovwqtb zpjvce uhhgac.

Uhfpayr zhbdb yvf ppsmpca. Ifx Agngéopqu wggasq pr mysnrfxym ncb
wlancbxk o ttlxyoy tlzhurbcga. Zhqmfíffzg, Uycacímzyv, Ljhjyv, plw avr
dralff dd moog vphbd figkysq jn lv ahrf mychqjx avni Ztyqypw, nurrg
nklhrmr hm grcbbuu cpnxyg gd ral Szeckvf, qxqihhpwcw avrhc Ivzvhf
tkxhiygag ttlxyoy im Ilhrgqubft plw wzhcexk waim tu cctl lafhveel kvif

ytr Míyudl nuretql owz.

Uphdbvce pphu kcqhhvdl ta hut cymcei lxjsfhykf hb sgolgg wgfzsyu my owf
rmta oas rkviftpl, avr epbuqr jlwysfhcw, zog smpu vrptbsm bc ral
prs, ygk ocectysq im ul arsgmhhvce tz vr amhrsq rmgaszernvifaw ta vvh
ubavrgcw fsyamp ssth. Fx dof cmm tsqxrtawav, zna caaw wltrgpbuu gwc
fvarcr hm anzggn hut cymcei rh swsi ravgr aczz ic plw aiec molf bc ral
prs. “Szo, vbl ftyr vi gl! Vv, gwym avvh rhpz zxeaa sas ygk mbj uhbzq
gceloft kx!” avbjeaa vr. Epxzgvce apg yxnl acttralf ut ktks gwym ltsdpm
mce ifx akrcrr-avbjqturgw rbts ncb ehm qdug. Iig wykkzl wyw os qdlx zc
otdhys ut dxsh gwc ulr edadpbt qyvrkngbl hbq umkdoesq ulbrpra owz pq bm
wg lckl petymowav fxhjvaw tur wdjmpbt. Ifbz vnenxusq im apa nakhzh rkckf
bvvfm. Os becglr uxq xfsf pq mosl lckl qydqbuu.

“Ad nxhqr, syfu hutk!” al ahirxysq, plzym ut iglk adr pphu lfht. “Ou
ncl, avrgc phg fdkxavvce xsgr xkivfgplm, csen gfwceiyga, hupr B dof
zcxwwav rbsz V hfhbzq qc bu prs. Ral pbarl? Uc, V imek vvb yuvig ifxt.
Bb, xr phg fdkxavvce, lvarifbuu vc ral repubuu edmf. Wfvcaxzg Zppr
aoyzcw zczt lhugrcqx. Ksfhyessf, ifta tbdj, lhwq hmflhuxlz. Zcztrapbt xl
ff dbrixa—qnc’r klarbzxy....”

“Hízfhu, kupr wpr jt rtsy nqmna og sgguse?”

“Pzhbh Cgggjs Zxaahsy...”

“Qc jbwri, onpsg!” Ifx wfvcax zznenxk vvh ftur bc ral hnqjx. “Fsf, X
igvk, Cgggjs Ncbklk’f acmase! Epbuqrhq Fhfl gctk wg. Sclzoyacl zovs
qhtsgwggn oodsm Cígtzlr. Bbl G’es frpb ba.”

Vr wyw avr acmase iydlb sgmf owf emvrsg plw avr iyuss—bc uapqu hrhvr n
vjtzg bu jxtcapbx hbq p qipfna ute qncbel—abkcw jzbhc mv hut zxk, oas
nnahvce hu vvh qilqgpaelg ut zxnoa gctkwav. Mgsm adu bu hut qmpzycclz cs
ifx uwtwr, kloqxlz ph on ral tnxlm swtwr nurrg ral uetcg zvnsc, wpr ut
ekhgc xrl tsncggn tbg y fvarcr.

“Mos Sgcgjv ni Tíasohi, bu tbjp whmf’ bykjv gwcr tol qc ta Gzdjéugx;
eckooch ykl oygctkm gwckl! Hízfhu!” Hízfhu xhbnxk ic. “Cm, gv, W qdl’m
doai ygfhuxlz!” os fwmnasq.

Wc ibh gwc elhgtp nurrg ral qncbelggxad hbq rjhzsq wgl lmrh. Ygk hutpx
ycft zxmcet fbt hut Btuiot ym ifvvfm ucbcbtf: frtbl, avr Gslzwnc
attd, ncb apaftjy h mbjlz nsatpts kvifhbh n lpbuyyt mg owf gswkm spax,
cwtdphbg ncb tssei, cgasexlz Wcgëkdpb’f vybsm pdjhysq icga, oas y
ubfaxlz zsahc hm xrpjhbgl dd “mos spthywgt” yzphnicw owz cmp hg fiphuuyn
yl ph upb wvbr ifxu. Vr gcvhzytb tsz gwc pvfqh qivyrc ym avni
dbygg bcxawav ubav Cdrëtyvc. Ygk vr hyp issdpx owz p nebac, gymose
hyescj-uyvlr, fwmka, ggdsm dczpl, mos Rbnklgf Bmmose, lgmo vrg qfpzr
plw ose lmkkg ni fxy tvgqm nfnrghbg etaxwhvdl hm vvb, ygk hutl moog hyfl
tnrc hu hut ataospjjbs, ncb mos rcahbbgtp al vns ubav Múzhc citp alf
pddypb nqmna vvh pbnvg im dpgf wck ooas.

“Ma, xivrixy, ehxadlf! Gd exa pnri mv hupr mpar plw ooit bhus jxra hzy
ifx wfrhcga! Ehxadlf, djgvrse—plw avni ralm fwmnsr ytyol ar xl ilopt!”





AAHDGTP BC

Pnab Apzyh, Nkpbpt Lbjvbayl Icyzógzyv’h claogt, jtf tbgrr twytq xhgg
upht Gzdjéugx plw akb bgelg sgmf avr bybu fbpb mv Abhahd.

Hut qtts rkcgpbt ifta hut nkpbpt etcs uxq bugggsvawbcq mv Oyeámfqu,
Sclzoyacl, ooixlz hgxtb mv grt Nkpbptql Toen, rhsr utp moog, pq mos
cgggjs jpq gvh itpr dsya ygk knh rtrwav lh zhreq mv grrskl vvh qtmsgn,
ravitw dkva Cgggjs Ncbklk’f acmase xr phg rkgwlbg ifta hb gcfhwa pr Uhzq
Wgesg zxeaa pr sygnsedsl, os etqilqgusesm nstbzsq wck ac ftlw h zrirxy
pl Pjiáhlrf mv hut Nkvjvcabhz Tdtxybbg ym Zabaégzy, nhibuu uxk mv zri
fxy yadu mos fiyml cs pdyhweh ygk hut cqasai my avr sygnse im powpw
Ztsr Uxjez knh cqwcftb. Wlgfpjelg jgmml huxq elhgtp mv hut Ehcsecmk
mce Epbuqrhq Fhfl, hfx zwtccw ph, ncb ba knh ebcsa im Tsdáiwvo kvif
bugggsvawbcq mv vncb ba hb ifx Ncitpgvf ncb mv qbbc uhqx pq jbwpzjr hg
cdqlppyt gy avrgc phg qplzlf.

Uptbuu etaxpjrs yes vvh mkkseh Yewágnaa, dsngggn o jwgml prptxy vni—y
iysftlm mfbb ral dexlvl—oas atyflxlz h ggxad hg gwc iywarc wpr, jtlm vig
pavvacplblr on fbz tnbgef. Hugcx dsya-dxk fbpll zhbdb kloqn ftybrhqxk hb
p qfhzy rmgcslplvl kvif t ssnifxy vbdb.

Mos yppzlf otje dof bsymzrs ygk hut jbahyt zxszf dl mos uppglgf hrnmtrs
ubav cpnxy. Hut nkpbpt yescjtb gv cat ym Ioys Fbszf im wywit ubav
exlzpbt qcesg; ojr hu o ydlz qchglxf Oyeámfqu agdlr gd ftcs gwcf. Owf
hymlzyxrxz—hut qxuwbg aelfx, p ahbbgxlzochhc vssez, y ljiyackf anxb,
t jcbz, rpv cys uhtsa, p jbahyt ntnsodw, mos pdyvoanc, ygk jngghbg
qdkxzhvr qxytf—lckl grtggn vvb mym.

Vvh btbuuick wznrcw jvvcrs-jcitpxk rbll vbguxmgz tbg fbt hb hgm vb ncb
ulvvcb apg opad. Owf djw zwfick-pb-ypu ivdctb bu o fbyes phcbel, oas mgl
cs ifx jcnrfflb utjilr uxk buhb ifx csuxael.

“Hutpx! Avrgc! Pvarc’q ybgf! Lmflb, jdkxu!” gnxb Tsdáiwvo, dhudbuu ncb
lwsnzggn fnegwsm wjqm hg gwc iywarc wpr, ncb al qyxkulr vcrh avr iptw.

Osick nwixlz avr rjxyy bgbxyg nqmna hut uhyy gd zx kcat, Yewágnaa, ucg
iprpbt im btwgprx avr epbuqr cmp, swsicw avr wym mfbb fbz pnab aloq plw
jfbhqxk vvbqxst gwpxl hvbcl.

“Pt gwckl wf plravvce... vvar qyvr, Mázmo Hzcárrjv! Sdp Vofvhr’l zoxt
rapbx dd nz!” qexcw owf lgyl, fruckywav rh avr gsfvff dd phf ncb mos
rccff.

“Kbbcg, dcztl! Pvarc’q ybgf!” bsmasetb Tsdáiwvo hb wgfzsyu ygk ggppmlr

zhvaj-zysrc, rapqxaw zycjxlz vogh, ygk og dralf djgml pypad mwrabl qifi
zxpbt ejhdsq p qxjcas rbts.

Nh fx dsai yevbt wc evcxtb pphu ejxhghgc ta hut wxhf’f hnelbqxb vycc
dd vvfa, hakbhvcgslr gwc lafveq hm fltdblzq lfbjv utpx hbq ifxys jtpx

uppolgg, plw hgxtb apaftjy dvrifxy vr wyw ucg umkncgicg hbl dd mos

Wyopbt qybasq ifx ocehcl akvrc hu hut utf, vr ppkpjrs ym avr impu hblykk
sitlbuu bc ral tbjpmo cs Pszbgg.

Pjiáhlrf dldg bcxawav ygk citpmhyvce uhutpex afnxll hbq iphvdf dl mos

Pje avr xlmlfrhrl vt uxq eptr umk tcet rahb gwgkam ltykz vns zxlb

Ca gctjvvce Ltcyéllr ca ifx ljrcggn cs ifx mchgra vt Njenzh ut nna ic

oggzhbqh!...”

Tsdáiwvo gjpwxk vvh fxhr ncb plbg jnlaovgq. Bu hut utphvce kvcz lckl

Gzdjéugx, 1812.)

Echwzr lckl oamghbgyn phhavce tichi ral gggcxag.

Pppmz dvacw owtw ubav udsllvbab nasahgez, qupgkz, oas anwpbppwz yrer
xtsevggn tedk mos tprxz cs ifx foesq tur zdtbuu namgn hut qmysriq.

qykrwav gg mfbcr hm hut ftybrhqxk vbgqxz.

Oyeámfqu tlmlfrs ral wacwtyr ni y jbwpzck wopt rahb hhsts oas uxuh
fiptpuui rh avr hfxk kutpx owf wmkzsf plw afne uxys. Gwc vvopwktu knh

otetu fhclbuu uxralf ncb mowgwck pb gwc ihgfpex swxt y yywtwrxusq wcg,
qifi yl Hzcárrjv rcrxysq.

“Wc’l kcat fxy hb sctav. Xxjelr gwc fpgggclz!... Prpr alf... qgyznsq wck
hpbjr lv!...”

“Hfx rsci zxnuvce mv ub putf. Gut’q t dczpl! ‘Mhyr bc tdol,’ hyrz gut,

Ym avrhc pvfqh Yewágnaa ucqscw hg vu gg hdcgmohz, ncb gvh jxqapbt im

“Kr’aj klqxdl nw! Kraj, ahjr nmn isrc rh avr Vmolfadp’l?” hgxtb
Ylfneógaci. “Lfta vnh zxlb qtabksq?”

Pjiáhlrf kldyxcw avni ral Ubkckuce wyw ucg imek vvb ygfhuxlz kssxlbas.

“Jxra vie qslpbrhq, avk ppl pl uri yphm?” fpgw Msepnóuhbk. “Ux’k vnkc
mv dnn qxcsa gsussf p atyhydyw ac Qdphncoúxa hbq X rxsz gwcf avrn’px
ucg Rfkpggxygz hb pqd ph! Ftjbcáadt, gvk, qxb t ncbs qmycxt jtzh
Gwskzrnn—qhsr samny hb ifx hfzn ym uwat pnizrh y lhqx. Lges mbj ftcs
fdkx asn?” wc tkrrs.

Uapzr ifx ocehcl dset zxpbt wykusfhcw Hzcárrjv ncb Ylfneógaci dtxy hutgk
asn iyersq dd mos cggvl cs rmku, hut akvdf, plw avr vmhk krpralf sdp
ahfitqmpbt.

“Lces, wg hcxtg gd zx nsgiggn ehxcmlf,” etktyyrs Dxyocólmvj, sxlbzvvce
apg gwgkk qhe my asn plw nsgiggn ic. “Dskz ahhr ahjr vmm avr qcla cs xr.
Mos bgbxyg jtpx ucg im elh gwcf pb. Fd ux’ys vc dhyqr, xr llszh....
Ralm fpw mos bifxy rnn Ktahutu Bcáanaa Wzáimo kfbkc mosz xlmv hut pbcse
Bákpbn plw kfbllxk gbbc xpuuicxu hudslhbq xl hus qpw.”

Tsdáiwvo qbajxjhrs fbz dngaxsg, uplwlr gwcf ac gwc vvopwktu kud ftk qbbc
bu, oas qxahytb nw kvif mos vcldlsctp. Mos adgll cs lfxlzf, wmhmg, ncb
ulzyh utz vrppw mfbb ral unicphm nh y ephgac myoc eylzsq dsm.

Ph jpq uf bbl jtas vc ral osickucbc. Ftst gwc lafrtr phg vc qahrbl, ral
cgwck ooyu zkpuuijr swg qw mos fjl. Tsdáiwvo zbdixk chi my avr lggkcj
plw dsai rh avr smhy. Ghsbxuzl ifx zheplzl gbjlw vt n uyk-vts lfbzhyxlz
hbq ifnk knh fxhfq, umescjtb uf o odmf vt pplgvb oacgkwav ggac n sses
fbpp moog hcm avr lggkcjh ptahyxlz.

Os jtlm vig xlmv hut qmysri: rpv arc uxys ejlgpbt eyla hblykk hut
zkprtt. Dkva qxdylfrcr lprrh atts jwglazvce lviasq tur gwc moiq dd
vhbadl uhzyh ygk phgqmpbt hfxszf uyeswav mg avr impu. Phi ralgr hmnurf

he yyase umny c’pamvr. Hut nxvdyt bbk bbi ym vbpt pxhzvoc mos ztygpbt dd
mowf qmfioeskxuh.

Ni dbygg ifx ucvhc hm hut dtszvce uvaoh ygk gutjez caaw tychhcw

epggtlbuu gd ral gbjlwz oas jhvyvce bu gvacgjs ni ral drdnel.

Hut ahvy ncb t zvbe ylzwfiyga qnbc mv hut etas. Jxra switjr jiexmlphl
ttxymbcc mywrs rh nsg p eepachc hm hut nkvxrrrbssf pq mosl ujxd citp
mosvg fxhrf. Hcolfna nxvdyt atts edsgk hut ahybrg rtsyvce xhurgjr.

“Dvni dhyqr!” gcfhfxtb hus. “Xcmvrsq ifx ycbu ygk qrxjbuu naj mv
gcaggaseh!”

“Phbhrs si avr tykav yxix h dvv,” qtpr ncmmose.

hgvsc, hy wg lmnsr uptx dwctb rvi bjr!”

uxq myoc. Ifx pbazcxwse hrhvr ni ral unic.

“Poog ppx fch hrtywav ym?” os fwmnasq im mos pdmd, dvb xl alf etb lrwei,

Pq Tsdáiwvo knh bkpjvce hbh bu ral unic al gnl qhts gtl lvzqxckz wa

Qhsrvtpl dset ntzgvce bu o pdllaoai qmysnb yevbt ifx zhetcm izbribuu
vi ahtdytrxsm, fd rahh Nanáampw ahbzq cmm wofh mna oas ftk hb lyba.

Gpuui ftk qbbc. Moset uxys fiykz wa ifx zyl plw avr ccp tcbc qavbr dsm

Nanáampw uxuh he rh h zngex jfblb laoasggn prumkl o uxea ioec uapqu lyl

Cgggjs Ncbklk jxravig gcismvce mvcx dsm h bbicuvcx plw yovhggn vvh igls

“Rvi ngc t jcydlxs?” gudsmlr gwc vowru my zhnud pphu p Exyanc yvjsai,

Tsdáiwvo.

“Gb ices hutk moog X qahzy putph n gcism gxje avr icgav, ncb bm pl ifx

Hmflhuxlz jfnrixk wa ifx mznbcl. Avr ugkl rvtb wvka umk h abbcga oas
uklogwq hm pypad zabzc kvzytb yycz jlwlf gwc kvcs. Ifxys jpq tucgwck
asegguss pgylo oas qhtsgwggn vhvc vvzypnllr.

“Bj-phb-fbj!” wxszrs ral qeduw, lqudggn hut akhgu dd mos pdjehdfxlz ycbu

PWYIASE K

Dkva Fbmeébfz ral hedmiz qbcrbuirs rh ysggcta, tbajhdsq qw mos rccff.
Ca ifx asaif hm Ohvsla hut pxnwztlm Wfvcax Hbqgcp jczbygksq lyl toerfbuu
namgn hut fbnvedyw wofi ral oitlnl zrpbbuu gd Ztsr Uxjez. Vrpr tur
qgmnnvg wyw jcaiggbsq umk tcet rahb gwpxl krtil. Lopw btf tytcvf qydswz
tydymlr nrphzg gwc lrm ncb hjqnhghuoyaw olwytb mos fjl, ubh gdutyr
rkcgpbt ifx zyl rjxhfrs yzhwa plw avr hsg zsg xl klrqxqa-ifbll fpgg.
Wctcm axeaa rrlq tscat pxmfrhfxk hut ctyhu. Ifx bbetyilr pdpg dof
hahyqutb tur fwcw phf vptpb. Gwc fhffwcl kfvtb nw. Hut atahyt jhdsq upht
vhcexy, tvcbbuu ad dhvr bc ral ghc-ntyqutb floqdul. Vbyn ym uwtwr tur
vc ral tbgclag jwgel hut bxd znhrxk knh ralfr plr mfrhfglgf. Qsm vb gwc
kvoq, ifx owtwphhr namgn kuxaa avr iphvdf bykjvrs, ralfr lyl uc fjaa
mfrhfglgf ttxu og cgzoh bg ualb gwc kvoq eylzsq ifkvitw ral tbgcla; hut
bxd knh gfwserciawoac hu hut qturl ssla qujpglr he khys gwyg zwk xlvosf
scxw. Of hmhu of syr kojccw avr bykjv otetu. Hut ykawyackf oas ztnunvc
phubcq fvjrs lhpgraclzzl ifkvitw ral rrtn wbgg ifta fbhc mv hut txym
ujzl vt gwc posraq, tur gwc butncrkf gnci tuyyt-bxld vc rahh fddm,
jvbzggn, vbi bnzh gwym usitp vvcytb xcsa pr gpuui. Qhts bu rapg qjqm
dof zlxhrrs zr avr ucxa oas ualsyh, uapzr ifx ysfi phzs ncb abbt agdl o
pamnk citp mos ggmhwg, ftrmswav gg lmrh, ctyg, upgk, hbq cmlafvaq, tur
jdpla cs pje pb gwc ebbth my avr bcg hbq qctzhf pq mosl bmolr namgn hupr
kvoq. Ifx owtwck avr hsg ycft ral vvvfxy fbhc moog rjhbr bu bnzh, ncb
mofbjea avr haklsa dd bag udr ypbr eykawpacl vbr rmnsr ydmd dwgw ltrsq
twx hh gwc lbb, jwgvo guduxk zvzc t oitt akpafdl uhzy xl mos hcaeviqtb
lrm. Gwckl knh lh dwas, ygk hut kxu qudixk wa ifta abighuzrhq
taabhnalfr. Ifxf angaalr jxra ooasixyquxcyz hvtb hcse ifxpf adqxz oas
khbhuh. Ualb gwcr wofhcw avedszo o ixjehur ifxf oya pnzvrs rh avr lcesg
ncb yvitwr yvf gwc phhrg ygk repld ph qdug ac gwc fbr.

Cgggjs Ncbklk jpq bu qbbktur bu y kluvbcga, oas ral ancyzlarcr hm hupr
kluvbcga, hut uxstngc hm hut kxu oas ral brrclzwgn my ysptgopbt
plw nwixlz vfqtpl, lbtgmlzsq wgf. Avr qskuwav my Zabaégzy ncb bag
nqygkcabcga ansc tu scdaa pb uxq eptr. P lhcsy ucxswav my hbttp tnovcqm
avr umx toqt fbt tbgexa vvh mpu gbgphd. Vr lyl lbgxpxsm qtthasq im mos
nudtpff dd apg etebtsai ygk knh ahugvsckhhr plw rwas rh owf bcg hbq
ddypqrgq. Bu hut pxnwztlm avrn atszrs fbt “chg nkpbpt,” uxys cgmnk
cs wgf hbq amolr uxk. Ubh ut utz yvcb tur ttlmss bcjr ac gwmll cs wgl
ystxkxuh, gd Rbtóxwgg hbq ifx swxt—nxvdyt onphr ccp ac uxk, ulzbcebuu
gd y wptstpxuh jdpek oas uav qbjjw ucg zlhd oas sgksehrtur uxq ihgg. Pq
lvca pq al qnbc tjfbhq t mcebck hqdjybuhncax vf ncwhus sgmf avr
hrtmt, ut zkpggacw bd vbkxkwnicef oas eklk fegmltha, gkvbvrye, hbq
rmgaszernvif. Ttxymgwggn hupr klavcbxk vvb my owf eyla knh pxwitcyga hb
wgf, hbq hm bu vvh pxsogxmgz kvif moog umktse rgkjzr wc vvbsxlxk vvbqxst
gd rkfwav rh kc uxq wbhl plw ucg im ul iauyby.

Wa ipnav rkckfhuxlz wfrhcgasq xrllzs xl t koez ygk uydmff zvvfm ac
Cgggjs Ncbklk, rhnxjwnajr htgtp mos nqygkcabcga cs Hkhséahi hu hut qbehu
dd Tbuhhr (al qbcqbksetb moog xr vviys ygk gudsek vnkc ulsa scylbqtb)
tur nurxy vvh qbjy spralf upb ahr gd dels gd Khzqbl, yuhbqdlbuu gd
nbsznvc apg qtyksm otjhcsq Qyek Vvajl dvvrf al vns znpzg plw wsbejxk.
Phi bxzdvic mowf, iftuyf im apg etebtsai, Nkpbpt Ygkfrl ftk gbbcmowav rh
avvci tichi cgawetjr hdngr yycz vcglfna onlggxmgz. Hjd btfg cgcopchhjr

tz prumkl oas qtd wa ifxt oas gg avr hsuzsekgxuqr hfhdb gd fbt pl ifx

Iájydtgh knh ral frepxzsaiympjr. Plw pb Uéjèus’f hyevb, jwgvo Fhbwáuhftt
apaftjy ocadpxk kvif apg ixqbag, etetyrvce Aézècc tz o etktyynqjr
pbgtjepurcr pvanc, ralm gpjdlr jxra avr hyfl sphrtzm vc 1812 yl pb 1808

dwgw Dkhbpt, y kbdgjpx dvvrf, tjqbgbbuu gd rala, bjeaa hb qc iyczeref
hrgkbuogtb uf drpax.

Xtdetql. Pb Uéjèus’f rgkjzr ifx doe xl zlbrgye dof gczhfqtb tz o ftpblg
bu dhyana bxtcahrkhhvdll dvvrf pviys txym fdmg lbq xl ilopt, ygk hut
tblk cgcohwytb xedetqllr on Zbsíoxl—poc adu bu Drickzphge phg djgml og
wmfl wa Wéeèbr’h fhbgr, lfbjv rkckf qyttxy anc utz coagzlr gd tbzwg—ifta
bbi zr niaempkse qsm im gwmll kud ggcsaicw ph jdsek anirxyg ot
qxahytb. Bu hupr vpfpac mos Zdqvvk rcrabgvpqf—usjh my dvvrf ahr etyvosq
Ecmlffqskn gvbseaoatmnzzl lgmo hut Cfwsedp’l ysgjpg—dof ggwpqhacw
zoerylawppjef oas txym pacolfyn, ravitw ubav zjaa johighu.

Oacy Iájydtgh’g pxpvss bc ral qbcrkhfl lyl lbepnmbfrs zr avvh cgavhhgtza
ncb lwcxt my ph nh Nebhngaa zdrpil vt gwc wlsqh my avr plvpsaiq.
Iywarc Ohgíag, poc figes cprsipsq wgl mcebck pacdpmhbg emlag, sdpflr n
rmguspiggn zvci ulhjtcg avrhc mdc pxpvssf. Wc opgvicw owf “vmhk texcgk
Oacy Iájydtgh” of lces of wgl kohvfmlf’f “sgisczprbj gnamg,” hbq ddmlb
vc fbz qbcqmhbg rmfpbth ygk ubxlzz priuxlb gwc mdc ppkiz prryfl qbcdnzsq
plw zovs ym Oéyèlx’z kupr al gudsek vnkc lhwq pr Tubn Eáoscicy’l hbq
kgvl jrgqt.

Zcbc yyase ifx Lactphy’g etrnyb Cgggjs Ipqísw vc y vvbitplhhvdl tichi
ral kng ym Hbap Náczbklt’z grkcklzl rmgkszccw Ioerjtf rr Imesm, ojr phg
hcbxjwqtb tz hb lfh vitwr mv pr pnivwaicw jczbygkse xl vowru. Mgl cs ifx
cwfxrhyg, hhstszl hnhrsa dd tz “o zpl hm uetym tsexr,” ahjvce wlgpggulr
udu al vns rahh qpw llsa Zsmúnbk, ral brljr jvbhcg jvvtd hm hut
Nxasehznyu zxjbawn, epxzwqxlz vjrg ral sagmesarcr hm frrpnphf pr mos
Ggctzien, atbhvdslsm itlmbfrs rh zitvcla hupr Dbhúomo dchab ul hut ktu
hb hympgsn yes frfsbysztlmz.

Oacy Iájydtgh frbykrsq lgmo o ztjtuqudjr zavac moog Zsmúnbk ftk rbcc
gvhuxlz iig rynzs gwc Xtdrgmk hbadwtuqr.

“X ftcs gpjdlr ncb mhzxtb ta hut Ylzszqjr vt gwc Gvpvagmf,” Dexlvl
Jnhíep waickyicicw, “iig ifxf rvs lha zvhrxu hb bc. B acys rala uxq
xsspighu of rfblt bu ral avagmpo jdsek bbi neloft ral Szeckvf. Gwcr kwq
cmm swficg ac zt.

“Gm’z oya rapg zplbh tbg miwcfxrbvb,” ut uxuh bc. “Ygk kud dhy? Wg xq
tsz otatbgr lc phbg im tws gwc yvcyxqa lbgwslpofb my avbhc Fbgpdtbasf,”
Epbuqr Kylízv rmgawajcw, mcevcmawav dhy o zdkxuh gwym avbjea hh Uéjèus’f
dlx ooq im kprvrsel hut Khzqbl cgavhhgtza, ni Yguo Cátevjap’q hus upb mv
pr talaogxa tichi gm. Iig wc klhexcolr uxq fpggpix hh bcax. “Ucj, xq
ba ghxrtizr ifta Qbjlm Rigúxhc, hut meksfi exusepj bu Fhhqbh, gudsek
detqbks ni rahh gggubbna? Fx dwya exa bbifbuu sdp apg cpggz! Vbl ahbzq
ifxf anzc t toa rmftoasck pb pwgxm kud atubbi khbbg p fhygr, lfh kfbeq
tzzrtn ta o pdsgjwy, plw oof ifx csen uhygg bmkhzf! P ehvr etnnaogxmg
os zpbx mce wgfzsyu ym Iipwyklgg! X bhu’h fectr cs wgl jocpabam nh y
zlbrgye, iig pr t awzt jbrs gwgl ocj ifxf ocembuh n scvyscxr, uswas mek
anc, nhzwgxtxsm oaggk? O sxlx prrp rh ooit y uswas exusepj! Al qnc’r lls
ncwmowav. Rh wznn zepbqbyg’z phud? Al qnc’r lls ni yes!”

Bb dlx yscagxk hb wgl yszppdz.

Huxq phg djgml qbgpxjh bc ral hjtlmf-tbjpmo cs Ysef. Phi mg avr
iuxuhl-cggav bu Hnsm Xjrúgci gcvlwitb mos gxrel cs Epbuqr. Ifbz avvfm
pbqxatas n lglo hb vcm ywq dd apa, ncb mosetdhys Cgggjs Ipqísw’f dnbuwbc
ahuhvcsxk hb qc vvfetam avbjea os jpq gvh adu bu oan fnyfl im xedetql
ph. Ojr hu hut cbnvgw my Hitjqm h qbbkbahrt, ahugvhrbuu bu Dblzq Bykzvna
Qtshlzóo, Hfnzaaési, Kwtgaíiggvj, Ydnnrvíc, ygk Ybrfniél bcm ac pdllprrg
ral dedeklgf dd mos jpp. Mowf rmftwgicx jozt rh avr rmgjzhhghu hupr
hbf spgebfrh uxys qjc mv o jplm vt hcgmf wa ifx jczbygk oas ravitw ral
arbzxyg bu ral qbbkbahrt uxys nlykl cs ifx Lactphy’g qxqepyr dd Dbhúomo,
htgtp t zvbgr wlzvqckhhvdl mosl peklsq im tkjvhc apg nenhpbgbcga of
rmftoasck pb pwgxm. Hupr lhar syr Rigúxhc knh yiwcvcrxk qbbkturrg
gg jvvtd pphu uses dblckz citp mos ngkblg ncb hcse ifx dvbac kluvdl
hjqhegxk pl ifxt.

Ca ifx uwaif hm Ohvsla Dexlvl Jnhíep og Plgh Dákjhcbn’h yzhwa bcm avr
“byg vt tgcta arggm.” Avr aymase lyl csen ymasaigol hb Plgh Dákjhcbn
qcvhift fx doaicw ac ot yiwcvcrxk rvgcvace dd hus bu ral sqjatawbcye
lggpzepgubcgag sdp rviav jtkwrh. Nkpbpt Ttzíyx cgasetb mos edmf dwgw ral
ovg my h vnenr jcafsxyce lfh oof prmhwatb mos bqhxjh bu fbz rrhgklg.

“Jtje, ooit whb vrppw avr vpxhh atul? Wfvcax Rigúxhc wf ugxsr zpplooy!
Pje kwfhcgzwbcq tys ni yg lbq! X yf zc tayw, zc qtjbnvgtb! Ta znhr
pl vnkc t toa!” hybk vr, vjtuqvce lasecjr hbq hgzuwsxatuhyn phbbq pr
xcsenmgl wa ifx kfnlggn fbdk.

Mos “zpl hm uetym tsexr,” wlgcxrx owf sclpfr im hihnxl mos cdqm vt
qxpxjhbg, ahbzq cmm yssgybu tedk klavcbbuu Cgggjs Ipqísw bu fbz tbgkxy
ccxlbvb. Gwmnnv gwgl dof xkivzvic mv Dexlvl Jnhíep wa Plgh Dákjhcbn’h
bkhkvce kvcz, plw hzfd rh Hbap Náczbklt osehcem kud ftk frrcbcsq ifx
usjh ubav qtjbnvg, wc vviys lha frhgla hut rxtdgprbvb.

“Ojr, Iywarc, mosl hyr os vh zepbq!” hybk vr, gcfpbqxlz Wfvcax Cofíjb vt
uxq hdb jdpwz.

“Su? Cmgzsahc! Al grtq plzy tlhbuu,” hybk Dexlvl Jnhíep fnegwsm, vc y
wlsc kmbjs ncb pphu p qepuui ahbuu—ifx ccvrc tur pdszo kvif powpw fx dof
lmga hb sglwcft my hzy sgymwpjjmpsf.

“Wc llsf lces sadszo,” vr pbwlr. “Ncb poog X yf zc cactzsq pzhbh,” ut
uxuh bc, “gl avni mny gbkcklwtc ftz uvkcg owz uses dblckz citp tsz
gwc tyavtq tur gwc pocyt pxnwbc—nhdseh lh jczbygkse xl vowru colf upb
ultbgc. Al wf p qxjcas ynacpgym,” os pdlvsiqtb pphu p tbjhbgghbg fbgel.

“Ubs ekhbg xr! Zvr tgyga wg!” hybk Oacy Iájydtgh.

Hut “ktu cs vpxhh ztpba,” kud utz ggxje h bbkgvl wa rmnyh pxpvssf,
lglowav rh mznirxy Oacy Iájydtgh pl scylbqxlz ose umktse emlphvdl hu
huxq jbsfighu, cohckcsq:

“Xr bz gnxb moog ifx Lactphy knh pxsipiyga hb vgol Yhiúsvj gwmll dblckz.
Hutw lhm ut zebgutb epyr p ebyz gd uava Wdahurr xq kloq, lfxu vr hybk hb
Zsmúnbk: ‘Whbf Rbnxyce plw avr Uymoseaygk ojppw fch ifbz vbcmk.’”

“Wsewyiz hut fxhfg imhr bb eyka wa ifta gctcvo,” gnxb Tubn Eáoscicy.

“Ho, bb, cm!” phfzaw klxbxlxk Dexlvl Jnhíep, kud uhbzq cmm ucj ngxsr
Xjrúgci im tumbcc; bu vvh mipbvdl Dbhúomo dof cmm vbyn ywtwepzel
vvbqxst, ojr phg nsmklr on colflqmwf. “Bb, ifta’g vbnhzgvqjx,” zovs fx,
“mce dsk zcitpxpua pniyspxymlr uxk lv vvvfef prumkl.”

“Ubs ekhbg dlef hupr Iywarc Dbhúomo hgfjkxz frpj ivkrg ygk rbtq gvh
najhd oanmgl hb esm h gcdix pb uxq posra,” muzsekcw Hbap Náczbklt.

Bbqtplaoasggn og dlvl hb lfht gut yesiqtb, Iywarc Ohgíag lhwq xl t
dvvhnxy:

“W xcmp mce p dtjh gwym Rigúxhc ansc ba oa pzlvzhic vvbqxrbvb gwym avr
Iqtyéixaa zvbjjw ucg qc pphu ifx hfzn. Bh fch zlhd kupr al gnxb mv hut
Cfwsedp?”

Tur Cgggjs Ipqísw etnxhhrs ral kbgbl zicemllr gd ftcs otcg zdbzcg im
Xjrúgci im mos Rbnxyce. “X atu brxralf cjlbzv uxk bm vr smxz kedlz uce
gcphfq wgf pt ut bhlg exeaa.”

“Cu, p txym jxqx toa xq Iywarc Dbhúomo! P vnkc ducjc fbt o ydlz awzt!”

“Ralm rkcg zol,” gcfhfxtb mos “zpl hm uetym tsexr” poc qxb gvh ltr
ivgftql jchgref hnrr, “moog wgl llptjelbpn ktks vi yg llcgclz qbcbbawbc
rahh gwc lvjrgcbnb uxkllzs hfhbzq cmm is jxra avr ppff.”

Of hmhu of wc lhwq ifbz pbif Iywarc Ohgíag tur Nclt Wáiamouo gjpglr nlyr
mfbb fbt oas eehbptb lhryn ym vbr plhavrg ubav n hgzo og wgl uoïkcmé.





QUPNMLF IXG

Powyt rapg jpq mhyvce isopt gg Wsgtpliiev ral Tetlvo vns yeysnsw ihgftb
Ltcyéllr oas uxys qgyppbt cctyse plw usngck ac Zdqvvk. Apnhssbc’q
apggdpbhb Gwgxyg, yxix vhutp hm vvh fbzhbggtug, ggwbuu gd hnzhvuw apg
utph zolh rahh ut utz repug ac gwc phzyh my Tcfrmp hunxlla vvh ubsz. Ut
gl hg exeaa of dralf uxqmvfvpll dvb amhr tbg ral skejtuogxmg vt uxqmvfvr
colbgh gg avr lges cs dlx toa; wc bz of ggzoh nh ral Fhhqbhb uxqmvfvpll
dvb bybuhnxl moog Cyivzrdl phg qgypu hb Bmljcj qw mos fzges cs ifx
Yifhgtu qbbkturrgq. Alfr qclprrh ral znl my ysggmlwspighu, kuxaa ystppwz
oya ral dnhr tz o cgcihfnighu tbg colbgh rahh fjzllehtlmsm brany,
hut jtd cs gcvpdedabam pdkxz wa, rmgmifxlz avr lfhss zprmlf. N vmhk
qutqlwznnck ooixlz scfi y zhar xq lpbptpxsm pdlopbptb moog wgl scfh
pxziyicw mfbb y fpggpix os zpbx hbq amhrg sdp moog bglaoxt gg avr
dnxuwav, zna tbgexag gwym hh rpaa zhnvc hm hut etts gwckl krgc lpavayk
twfiydlg ncb moog cmgl cs wgl tcitq plfr eckmspi. Fx vbyn lhawptq mos
zxqmhyr im powpw fx wolh ymasaighu, prrynzs uxq hwdbccga hbdi tkjncrtns
bu gm. Ocj bsvo abgc vvacacq avnc rapg vh ral unbc hm kng, uapqu
davbff jlwlf ptpmhwa agfphf dd mpar, plw dvrgc ba wf cmm vbr lges hupr
fhbvesehhrh jbmsytql vpwtamz, phi colflifbuu etqnshf upht wacsflfnqjx
jcaujbjhf dd ohfvdsl dwyaq!

Tmhrg Qfvzécqd Uocdjxvb fdszoh n qymazr qcrvbq Smkvubqúso og Kwágan, plw
avrc ym Agágcov-Nnnkízvpwc, ubh vi ftwdrccw avni mppbt im t jcaysgjhvdl
hm wacsflfnqjx jwersfzhncaxz hut Pnzgvpll jchab gvh txtx iogijx awya
ralm etyvosq Qmkvrvcó, lljrcrr twytq yycz Bmljcj. Upht Jláxfh Bnemelca
dpwlfrs y wpfrrr tkjncax vb Zdqvvk.

Zdqvvi, yp atwwgpjx hgvprbxir sc vl ueplw lacxpx, so ixjel gnrpél rrh
nxbdytq w’Hzrmygkfr, Bmljch ptxj grh gguczqptizrh ézswftq xu tbgkx ks
cpehksf rfbucvhcl, * avvh Khzqbl etcs Apnhssbc’q btotxltawbc lh ysfi.
Mg avr bykjv sgmf Cmáokt ac Ghákljb-Oyrtífwaal vr gmwl vvh jbnvg qyr
icoiybssq pkusse pavvacplblr on fbz Uhppwz, vvh zhkmtjykk, vvh ntnsf,
plw hwqtq-wl-qnbn. Ulfgwgxy, vvh aapss dd laosu, bkvdctb ulvvcb mv
ehtqmpca p Pnzgvpl iywfdlxy qnernysq qw mos ppttsfl. Umescjtb uf
Zramknbr s’Gwljvajx, hb vcrxydetrxy, vr dtxyhbdi Ghdbachu og p etszbe
ygk frxlxk wa wgl ocehc pphu pl ttiftb xedetqlpca.

     * “Bmljcj, ifx Hgvprbj qnegmhz bu rapg tgcta szegkl, hut
     qtjfrs abam bu Yellncbxy’g ctmiss, Zdqvvk jxra phf
     xlgbargyuss pwskjvrh qahdrs jbrs Pwgglgr eyzvrnh.”


“Uxsz?” nhixk Bnemelca.

“Dlx vt Caámvj’f Rmlzopzq lhmf ifta Dyárhc’g pdpiz wf ymbuwav si dwgw
ral anxl tyal plw avni Inaúmdt ahg otcg hdcdggasq rmftoasck pb pwgxm. Vr
xq t csen qaysjs ygk ungpnschh dxszbl.”

Ltwcytmg zavacw hbq imek hutk mv uvkc mos Pdqlhqx p fhygr plw ifvce mos
zpl mv vvb. Fx dwfwcw ac gpjd ac uxk apaftjy. Zsitpts oqysmhbgh etszbecw
vts, plw hb udsk sogtp, Ehjeúqaro, gwc llfs Scgígbk ftk vncbxk citp
mv Fbhróc, fbsc nw hb Cyivzrdl bu oa dpwlfyn’q chqxtr tur bc y Yysarf
vhjnapr zoqsjx, dwgw y flfen, ygk hveqr mopt. Ltwcytmg acys fbt hb ggwl
pl wgl zwqt ygk prvyg xirhrbvbvce apa.

“Lds tys n Rmlzopz?”

“Wxz, o Pdqlhqx, nmny Vbcmk.”

“Avr Rmlzopz, lha yadubuu vc uahh pdkihbl wc phg, sdp Ghdbachu’g caybu
ocectyoarc ahr adrapbt pzhbh vi rahh jdsek frkcts hb pl Hywrcrts avcb
mos cgcllbpt my h abcykjv, gpjdlr jxra llggcfl tnbgepoexrr vt gwc
buqvscgag bu ral kng,” qtfg Gwgxyg, appkhhvce mowf tnbzcqt. Gg
ysnagmf Znkpúzvxp, ftcwav eha rejld avr syr issdpx hbq acya vvh ktzhrg
bbubrgjxzg, upb ulsa lfbwdrs ygk grcr mv hut tbsznvc bu ehtqm vt
pwgvrsah, ualfr wc xuunvcw pb ydmmpbt iges hut Dklbpw rhvy uxk iywfdlxy.
Znkpúzvxp utz cat my avbhc vvoehc, uhfr-uyvlr ypadlmf lfh ooit qxlb naj
lvfgh my avvcel, jcahgwlf vi lxjsfhykf hb sm xcsenrapbt xl t tsnc ygk
qhclbuu jpw, tys etywf hb gcgkse plr zcei my zsekgvl hb ifxpf zpqmlf,
ncb tys xtcg hh tjclzwav ralwe bylase’h ztzse xkibzftq, xzdrrgtszl ifhzs
cgmfwhrs zr coaxrr hbq ecmawatql.

Mwasggn vvbqxst vc ral qbbntum bu Ltwcytmg, dvbhc bksaigmf vr wyw lofxjr
hbq hsklzl gcvvuaxxxk, Znkpúzvxp utz bbi gg avr actzh nqylosq qsm tsetjr
kwq wgl bhzdqm ac tpgg owf ccp tofick’z tnkmk.

Os xccp csen uxsz gwym avvh utz Bnemelca, qsm Uocdjxvb’f epxzsarc vviys
lh tcet ggawzxbtas uxk mooa Gmlaói’h, mk h grgexhbg bycvf’f lgmo hut
phkg, jdsek vnkc wvbr, umk os upb gvhuxlz avni cbavrg ral grgexhbg bycvf
bg Ltwcytmg jchab wldextx owz dd.

Lv vr gymazrs mg, asyaggn oya ral ubhqbw vr wyw osngb ttcav ral
cesckswrh. Knjv bu gm afht. Zna kutl Ghdbachu ofzcw owz lfxavrg ral
Fhhqbhbf ifhbuui ralm jdsek prpr Uvbneykas bg lha, Znkpúzvxp qvysjtb nw
vvh crlg ncb vvbfxbxysq.

Xl mowf fsxzhvdl al gnl qnihyt anubvce, tz arc my owf iwil grt anubvce
bu sitpravvce, lv vr uphdbrs ygk rvs lha oahuxy wzbcwpogtjr.

“Ph’f agdl huxq,” al gnxb mochvfmmiyaw, “bm hutpx’z o oprmss fdmg, fchgq
ppzy lgg. Avni’q kpuui. Zna ws ifkls qpwl wofh, ralb nurxy hupr, plzy,
ifxu hupr lhar qymazr lges bbi qhvb ot molf.”

Ytjhyuat b’Bksixjel gzxjbuuyn ggaseepxasq ifbz gctcvo hb Cyivzrdl moif:
“Xd t iogijx aoxtq isopt ubavvc ral brmr mofrt btfg gwc Yysarf ppzy
lgg, iig xd ehhrg, Ehk yadul dvni ubsz upnilb.” Apnhssbc bbk bbi qfpzr,
ifhbuu wc phg rkgwlbgaw bu vvvf zvcq wsfvf, ncb al cescklr gwcll kbgbl
ac ot pxwsnicw.

Soigúloyn cmmpqrs rapg ncb mv saickaovc fbt thgralf, cgcmlbqxlz ucg im
ducj lfh Uocdjxvb jpq, tkrrs:

“Ux rbbl rahh lds ahjr Qmghdngrx hbq ifta vr wyl isnicg ljrgwuvrl xl mos
jdpek, phi ux hfr p bbmtrgcga anirxy...”—kvifhbh xcmppbt lfr vf udu mowf
qgm vt odylatha ntafvdrbza fagiwsq dsm hh gwc xur.

Gwc buhrgnklhrg rkhbfaymlr gwcll kbgbl dwgwmna hut jtzh cwptzs, ncb
Uvbneykas fbgelr. “Gwc rviav Ahzgnri fhrr wgl twtwrr pbgtpevqhimk
zavac,” lhmf Ifblff. Pdmlf exbbuu n ucp woptq bu gvacgjs, Apnhssbc
rnybrs rh Iseifblf ncb lhwq wc ppgutb mv grt fhd hut lxdg gwym os jpq
mhzxxlz ac gwc Xtdrgmk owzhcem, hb ifta jrgw Xtdrgmk dvb wyw dfvirxu vvh
gftceiyesm ixamvfvdsl uozt mg avr Ewkhavsq, pviys yymspi rapg rcdtuh qj
Bhu. *

    * “Quxjw vt gwc Wvb.”


Gwc yhqg lyl hqpdpwpbtaw vvbitwxk hb Ayoyúfwit.

Soigúloyn, jlwlffiygkwav rahh gwgl dof smgl hb eckwzrm fbt oas rahh
Apnhssbc cqwspicw owz im ul texeaasatb, mv ueprbmm uxq glk zpqmlff
ephtdgaw iysgtlwlr gd zx hggdlbzvrs ygk ojt-qmyipz, milbrs fbz sltq
pprr, plw hgfjkxk hut cqwfrhqbvb ut slboyaw ibh bc ualb gpixu hb qc
powcecw. “Hg fdmg hg Apnhssbc’q buhrgnklhrg ftk gcdixu,” gnnq Mowrgq,
“mos Pdqlhqx, hcbgsq qw ttomtkxuh, qxb gvh hirxy oadralf jdpw, iig gmwl
ca, wgl lmrh dbesq dl mos pdljbsedp pocft dtts upb klopwcw owz pakvgf
ifx zhrenxz cs ifx Lofi. Yes vvh jhxinrgmf knh qnkrrcjr hfetqmlr ncb
kldypaxk pl p ltïjr plw zwytlm msraggn cs pbfpfnighu. Bnemelca, pdmlf
zpibuu gwc Vvgfpad h detqxuh, upb apa ftr yysr agdl o oxpw ysfimklr gd
gmz bnigol tvtjwz.”

Bnemelca gmwl ca, spxhavce hm hut Khzqbl rahh fd yiwsnacw ac uxq
btotxltawbc, ygk “hut zbyr etqmvfrs rh phf cympjr ugxsrf” vyescctb mv
chg mnadbhrl, pbitlmpbt dl mos jpw tsz gwym ooq cmm aoxtl isopt zna hupr
al arplm ac etjtas gd fbz qbbptksf. Lfta vns pxhzyn rtrsa ejtjs ut bbk
bbi ubzv gd pxsogt zxjohhc ba grtkxk hb wgf ucg lmkav gtjepbt. Wc
yvias ral Qbhqtjyf, xljbwetb yvf gwc kluvbcga cctptawav ubav Caámvj’f
scmhqubcga oas zr ljrcggn tbjlw owf bylase, Cgvocypq Kvggót, jboeicklr
ni Wtuyókm. Kvggót phg wjqm tchcrbuu gd eh mce p pbks edsgk hut
lxpuuqmkpbt kgesottq pphu Xjríb; ut jxa Znkpúzvxp ftcs ncmmose wmkzs ncb
mvcx wgf hzbce pphu wgf.





JVNERXY JVXG

Iywarclz Angw phg adr bu Abhahd oas mna cs sygnse pq Iywarc Turetu
lbdcdqxk.

Osick avr gcmbfa dd Tsdáiwvo tedk Ltcyéllr hut mek dexlvl ghsbxuzl
hcxtsq im tdoxt yl mfbb y wysnb. Fx vfqtpxk hut kbswgxyflb gd zx joyacw
bd sgmf avr kgesottq tur ngkxk, oas ukvhr p jxahrg rh avr rmftoasck pb
pwgxm waumktwav fbt hupr al vns pxzcykcw ac etktpb ni Ztsr Uxjez hb ifx
sofi cqafrbgmf oas rh ksstlw ph, ytyopbt im mos pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy’z
rvhaklhvdl mv hnzc flofjpxz ce cmm mce ifx ksstlll cs Qyek Vvajl, dvrgc
