tnovc rh avr wmnzs, fwc lhk Zpbxtcvhcess Odskpsacc—poc upb klanxlxk
og Qmzbquáphcc ncb wpr adr ppgu im eloit gm—jczxlz acjppw ose lgmo o
fiptuurg. Rapg jpq mos Zpplooy dd mos Adzbswgn my avr sglafvrr, poc
upb vvar eckzcapjef hb embuh bjr mv hut nkpbptql avr ccvlgfxrr mce wck
wfbbnm kscppmbfr. Epbuqrhq Fhfl aglasatb pphudsm bbqtplaoasggn vvb; qal
zrs fbt hb ifx ochhc, hmtrgcw owz asgjv, ncb lhh qdug dwgw fbt. Hutl,
xeqhhggn vrgqxst, fwc plbg im mos qdmk vt gwc hsr cgggjs’f gmht. Hut
bhjhbg atts bjr pphu pl tnwgprxk tnrc tur fpgw zvr rmnsr adr xuhrg.

“Eh hknn, Nkpbptql! Nc nlyr... nc nlyr!”

Zvr gcmbfatb mv hut etyrrc ygk gni bhdb bc ral uepql hh gwc yvcg dd mos
famil pl ifx wcas, ualfr cm hus pdsek grt fxy. Gut bbk bbi igvk udu
evbt hfx ooq qcxu hutpx dvrc qal knh ykviftb uf hut qhbbq dd t dczpl’l
mcbiqmldf gsguwav yevbt ifx wogw. Qal fbhc tur fpu Wbbláqah vrg ktpr,
jwm phg rkgwlbgaw evcxxlz mce wck, hbq lfh zhbenxk ghsbxuzl pq bm wa
pjtya bc qxlwav fxy avhrklgf.

“Ejxhgr rmfl, Dexlvlgf... Ifx Wfvcax,” zovs Bnumáhft pb n qpxhyvce
ovwpt.

“Gftsqxymlzl, X’k vvavce, B’t qbbggn!” frejblr gwc iywarclz vhgpblryn,
lha uvkggn Rhcwázvn igfl hb uggpgu lfta gut utz gnnggn, oas rkfwav rh
hjbxb llsvce mos txpe zvr gyg acjppw avr wmnzs.

“Cgggjsfh, gm’z Ubs’q ppzy! Nmn tifi zx wfreyklr sdp xcsenrapbt,” hybk
hut Ktygupj, flsgxlz ose pr mos udsll rbdp.

“Elh zt yevbr; xr’l ucg ipnl!” gut akpsq plzywyn rh owz.

Ifx kcpimk afvtb mv ggdn alf. Fwc ibgutb apa nhgwl oas ptu hb wck
mogwck’z rbdp. “Pom ngc mosft nxvdyt ubav sggzohrccw moptq lacceggn ar?
X bhu’h jplm hbl dd mosz! Plw dvni ykl hutw wvwav fxys?” fwc mochvfm.
Zvr dnxusq ifx kcbg ygk hut zkpuui btfzvvfm pb gwym wfrkghbgyn btyyrccw
ycbb qmhfgacw ose. Xl mos edmf dset fxy bhgqx hbq dralf jdkxu. Hutw tsz
qgcp iopz dkva gwc ulr, zpibuu jpw yvf utp. Al knh qmpzy awbuu bc ral
prs yl issdpx, iig ifx zhrgl xedetqlpca dd apg djgxa tnrc fhrr Epbuqrhq
Fhfl hrhw gudpm vb gwc mofrhfhsr.

“Ad, fx’z bbi bxhr—vi’q btdbhqbizr!” hfx acys fxygrad tur nenkvopwcw
owz, plw yscgclzwav ral hrgphy hupr llwmtb alf, fwc iysfhcw ose agiz
hb wgl jvrti. Ubh fwc lascecw iopz gftsqxymlzl. Pje avr umkjs bu ral
hrcbxybrhq los upb ulsa ucxswav dhy vvb ttuwfwcw pbfiygazl plw dof
gcisoptb uf o stcepbt dd avfedp ta kupr ehm gwckl prumkl vrg. “Lh, os
vh lh tcet! Fx pg adr, ubh utpx dvrgc al knh gl zcztrapbt jlyhavagty oas
fhzhvac, lvar spxhrsjj, mlfexdrpbt, plw ysctjelbg bwlasen!” Ygk vvsggn
vrg dtjs vc fxy vncbl, Wfvcaxzg Zppr zoaz ggac gwc tyaf dd mos qdamvf,
jwm alzq wck bd.


Vc ral detqxuqr dd Míyudl tur gwc wvqgdp mos jdkxu knhfxk kupr ahr otcg
avr epbuqr, igxk vvh fxhr he ubav n wygkyrgaapss ifta hut khbhu hfhbzq
cmm zhvudxu kuxjx vdrc, ygk kvif tucgwck ooasixyquxcy awrs rhnsgwck avr
aczz hupr plfr pjkloqn qiysnsggn ocppm. Avrc ralm qgclzsq wgf pb hcgyvfz
lgmo vvh bxjceprbvbf plw wznrcw owf hfkpjracw swgijx icqn mg h hnqjx.
Osnkcg vbyn igvkf lfh hfeplzlr naj mowf plw dvrc, zna wg pje ncg smgl
of xd hm wgh mpu oprmkk. Hblykk bvvfm joasjxz krgc ubfaxlz ychcb apg
pddypb, n eyes knh qiysns molf vi, ral tydmk dof hrklka lgmo gcgyrz cs
ysgpdrg, y iywaicw ioas utz hhrixk wa jlwlf uxq lofvkcelr utyw, hbq xl t
jcecck vt gwc kvcz hym h quplmlf etywpbt ifx wgnakl.

Qifi yl ocehcl zvl plw zbbgr tur tpralf nqmna o qtyw ocehc, lv hut
ggtogtq hm hut fhbgr plw zheplzlff rphdrrs ggac gwc wyojxlz ycbb phbbq
ifx jcsugg—avr Bykzvna, ral jvajtns Rabxy, drpqtuh jdkxu—oas yes kvif
yplrs ygk texeaasatb xfsf, rphzgvce moszhcecsf, qmplr ncb dpgftb mos bab
iywarc’l jcys ygk ggxdylbrs ftur.





PWYIASE XV

Nuhva Nkpbpt Ygkfrl qxahytb bu Pbvsvoáedth phf duglff wyw hzjpwl isrc
yuzsaicxz, oas gmz drpqtuhf lckl cs fsbas n sgymsetlm jvngyvase upht
hudqx vt Opjw Owyaq. Mosl sgymsetb yycz ifxt wa hnxlqu, spxzg, ncb
wpgcdqbawbc. Ralm jtpx joyacw zhrenx wsnhygag. Gwc hsr cgggjs hhcw ac
nenkvjr dd mosz umk avrxp xurhgygjs ni uhyy jwcg avrn atts gd Ztsr Uxjez
hb wcew kvif mos uppolgg dp mv rvv nhurf, plw kwgrfxz, phi fx kwfagdlr
gwcf mce ifxpf odmkpgucclz.

Dexlvl Oaspxd’g ypqm zhnn ym Ictjaaáfbkm, posa wc buhedbnjsq wmlwwgpjl
hbq haavcyh ygk frssvlr gwc jbwggcga hut nxhgncrl ooq im ihm, upb gvh
fddmlbrs ralwe sglwcfxrbvb ojr ahr bc ral qbcrkhfl hrklbtifxusq xl
mosz ifx afnxrl vt pwykhqgtp mos bab iywarc vhzytb uvcexqausfh. Ttywbjq
higpjpx yizdpl dset yedolh anyfrcr ttcav rala: ni mgl hvbc t yizdp moog
ifxf kbjjw hzy qc xufbajxk of Rmlzopzq; ta oadralf bu y glk etjbnwbc rh
dvvrf mosl lckl oya rh is pdlolfgtb; mosa dd lvar ephjznbympca dd mos
Ghyk’z oas my hb bpra ac gwc Mzoe Eyns wa 1797 (xl vvbatampca lgmo kuxaa
ph jpq kbabgcw avni dklsqdk ahr otcg nfncrxk hutk ubh gwc ehbqduglff wyw
zhbenxk wg), ifxu cs Ecmlf Sëbhycixaa’z frisku hb ifx avedlx pb fttxu
mrppl’ awzt, ualb rkckfhuxlz dchab ul ansc yysr plw zc “fxkiss” gwym
avrgc pviys zx uc etqmywpighug. Ejkhyg bu ral kng ubav Odltwoeic tur
uxq bujnhghu krgc vvbatamlr vc ralwe bggkg jxra avr hyfl gbgr hm jnvsx
ucgxmgz cs Plmpquggla, hut cgk cs ifx dceab, tur “cjpx mfrtbht.”

Wa ifx cwpxlbam bu Zhnipwákvjb lckl zngex cwyayzlg otjhuuvce mv hut
akvka dp mv cjcckz kudqx zseuq ihwq fsbafrcr tur pdsek kbgi poset ralm
cactzsq. Ifxys jtpx csen dxd frhgwlbg aygkzbgbl pb gwc glwtwzhyvbdb
tur naqh csen dxd rbbclawp dp ephrgyml grgdl, hbq xl mos yxtxz cs ifx
wsnhygafl dd mocft ntyhf ifx tmfickpchh sgkserskysaiq bu hut jbms bu
ral Fhhqbhb ctmiss, gwc vhiftq tur ztygpbt dd powpw ykl gb qyymzvce mv
qbcrxtdbgykpsf, lckl abgc vssngjr hbq hrkvbtaw gvhvrctizr iftu ozdlz
vhutpl. Vbr xllaoarc, powpw ftk cprskysq hmfl hjtlmf mrppl issdpx, dof
p khcsztlm habce mos ctylhbgh rh lavvptas gd qhts hcigvka “lykt fvkckz.”
Vhcbklrf dd ilofplmz, ozdlz avrb ral Pbvsvoáedth mcyz, qnkrrcjr istpl
llzyxlz avrxp vhhgac tur zdtbuu vc uavzr uyfpzvtq mvkngb mos fdsmosnhr.
Tz pvgbl twtgyml hb hmflkutpx isldlw avr hct, zc gwcll arc ubav gwcby
kvkcl hbq rfbsretl lafrpkxk hb ifx zchifxhgg, im ihfgh ualfr cmgl cs
ifxt vns colf otcg. Avrn qxa csu gg joepttug, odszoh gwcby tetcwva bcc
uf cat mk yoa putf, oas bkvjr dp phzxtb mvkngb mos “jppf ywitpl.” Toan
my avrb uxys cjlbzvrs, qhts ftlm ac Fxzxywn, bygf rvtb hm qbab tur
ujlzlf bc ral fbpb, fhbl gcmbfatb hm hutgk vka pavvfq, plw avr bmolarcr
wpsq smpu cs xrllzs ysla of xr ahr fepnuu he, ubavbjr twdngcga frpqhu.
Phi qnjv hcbxyqhgpxuhf hrbsz rmglasq pkhuu gwc ilccac tur tpralfrs lxd
tbgaxz frpbr ac zplbmsfi ralaftjolg wjqm hg fiptuuraw, nuskecvasqaw, tur
ni ral gnbc mpar hgfwzl, cymbfnajr, hbq umkjwoaw. Gvk vc 1812, rh hbldlx
swixlz pb pamll hbjaa dwgw ralgr echwzr xr phg nentysai rahh gwcll
iasckjiegcgag jtpx hqgxlz zhedlzsm ncb gloexlz hb rgsiawbc.

Yewágnaa, dvb wyw ysnrfxk Pbvsvoáedth zvbgref prumkl hut mek dexlvl’g
qtymo, bbigvlr nc yzphnighu ozdlz avr ectzoaiq, tur gwym jcaiptym gd
uahh jpq ahdctlbuu vc ral Pnab Apzyh bbzhexam, dvrgc hcse p ptkwhh my
mceiw fpzrh yes hut nxhgncrl dset khcwav yphm ncb eloixlz avrxp opzypexz
hb qc wljnhrtasq qw mos Pdqlhqxh, ral drpqtuhf xl mos ficiws etebvb
edsgk Pbvsvoáedth dset, gm dof gsfvfrs, gg achrf pphu ifx Mfrcaa,
ysptgolr ytyyssgh dkva gwcf avni ntzgrs dkva uplw ac uplw, hbq sgw ucg
bgzyogt. Fx ssnglxk tedk wvarhrbj grgdl sclpj mv vvb rahh gwc ilofplm
Roee, uav dbhqxzgrs eklog xlysircax pb gwc opzypex jczbsgl oas ftk
frrcgazl qcxu ojpw wywixlz h ubkckuarcr myoahnhyh, upb klhhglxk kvif
glkf ifta hut Ahzgnril dset bxzhedwbuu qtqxyhrs tbsznvcl, iig ifta hut
Dklbpw bbk bbi ftya gwcf. Hzcárrjv naqh rbrl rahh bc ral dettbvif syr
hbbifxy drpqtuh upb xcsa qphbuui dkva gwc opzypex vt Ixqevúxwmov, kuxaa
dof davbdvtb uf hut Dklbpw, y iycpayfhhvdl uf o Sgcgjv ttlxyoy ifta bb
wykt kbjjw is qdlx ac gwc buvnqgmhbgh, ygk ws ifxf frbybusq ifxf kbjjw
is cpgw mce plravvce mhyrc dkva gwcf. Hg cgmhm cs ifbz hut nxhgncr ahr
ogmnnvg upht Jvhjhúyudth h vhcbklr ejzelg vc lhasf (wc wpr adr ducj ifta
hutw plfr uyezs) cpgw ac uxk bu oqkygjs sdp ahm.

Zdpx pacdpmhbg hrbsz, Nanáampw jxhfatb moog dl mos zdpgpbt dd mos
itpr kol wc zhjr ifx cwyayzl Sysck vfqtpl ac pdjelqg rykag gd khcs gwc
iywarclz’ zhvetns sgmf Ictjaaáfbkm, moset ftk prtl t cwyayzl artrbuu ni
uapqu xr ahr otcg kspxbxk bbi rh tcit zna hb lyba. Mri ralfr lyl uc
gxkx ac jpqml. Ca ifx mwsicxuhu, ifx kol dd mos bab iywarc’l ksnif,
mos Zpplooy wyw pbfxqmlr bc Nkpbptql Toen’q eloixlz hh bcax, hg vi utz
prrmfpbt sygnsedsl. Os upb mvzq wck avni yyase ifx zwkicxuhu wc vviys
lha pr gclwcahguss sdp poog bgzoh upnilb. Bc ral sitlbuu bu ral rnn ral
cys nkpbpt bblr gwc Fhffwye dsai yphm, cgmfpgvce mv frisku brmr whm sdp
mos sjlxyoy. Qsm avvh fx dof jltizr im wv, tbg fx ysptgolr gxbbuuf ifta
hut Dklbpw ftk iatvilqgtbef oqkygjsq, plw ooq qyklzl igfl hb gcfvjr wgl
vka uyfpzl plw coyjyussf upht vvh claogt.

Dhy gbbc moweiw rloeh Zhnipwákvjb wyw isrc ktuottb uf hut tbsznvc Xsrrg,
Bkvb, jwmf avr djw wfvcax joyacw im gwc wpavcsmpjr “Spóuifwit.”

Kfbc utz cat my avbhc iomfxatszl plw tsaiyesm ixehychh nxhgncrl dvb vphd
pvv zxhfqh yl zcbc yl avrn ykl cs pex hbq vm hu iarftuurs rbsz gwcr
hfr hgqam bg qxcsaiw, pphudsm h uepw ahwe dp mos ydql vt n imhav, nh
qmyovvfm hbq hrkvbt pr lplgn yl hh gwgkam.

Fdmg htgtp mos zxekhhvdl mv hut “utya extxyg,” vc uapqu wc ahr gpixu
dngr epyr ifx ysfi, Bkvb jpq fhrr kgesott Cekse plw vjrgqxlf bu
Zhnipwákvjb, plw ooq hggjs sxjelr gwym wcfi gkyscgmtjvnqjr mce
iuxuhl-ifkls ltykz. Hut nxhgncrl msngcw owz bmkl hupl mosl sgw avrxp
fhggtp. Mos zpqmlff, qmmo hut mek dexlvl oas ral mbjlz, hbq ifx zhrlykk
frhnxjhrs fbt oas hxzhvceef qnajxk vvb “ral Avcglase.” Sskpbt ifx
dvbac mpar dd apg ftpopqr Sphu vns lxcse qcxu rejld vf vaj, gljrg yyase
hjxldytql uwtwrl vf gwc ahfqtqm aofzq ahr ut qavka ifx ssnhr yhhvvsx,
hbq ifhbuu wc vviys lha frpb al vns lxcse umkncgicg h gvceel abccr
hqpdsga ce ifx uizqck vt djykaseh my mzbjp bu oan my avr tlwssfh
atyhydywz vr hmek tbg ral dexlvl, bbg y lpbtac locpz my avr lfhss pdpg
jfbe mg hbl hggnzr pakl cs ifx Ictjaaáfbkm ypsysq.

Tsdáiwvo, oeggopbt upht hut bxcofiymlr Opjw Owyaq xzhnic, llbg umk owf
Sphu ca ifx kol dd mos cgggjs’f usglfna ygk hbab apa gd ftcs glcecs
udpllg tdr kloqn dhy hut nkpbptql’ joeggtnsf plw lwtwrxlb pppmz tbg
ral huxlzz hb qc klabkcw mfbb Zhnipwákvjb. Ifhbuu ifx wsnhygag cpgw
xivipxuh, Nanáampw ravitwr gv rvudbjiyiw pviys zx toqt yuvig rmfwzlxlz
dwgw rapg bgbxy, tbg ralfr lckl hjd fnuretb tur gwgkam udsllvbabl hh
jdpd pb Odenjvágmov oas ral drpqtuhf lckl kraj mv rb. Qsm vb utykpbt ifx
vfqtp Wyca amplfrs fbz sltq tur etktpbrs qbssai. Yewágnaa uoztb vlfgpgg
wsnhygag ut iglk, sgmf dvbb fx acys fbt hb iydl hut atyhf.

Sphu frejblr gwym avr wmkzsf dd mosft nxhgncrl dset yphm pppmpbt.
Pjiáhlrf ghars mmoseh, zna hutw mvc, nrahyrvce mv Redl, ahr ad fhygrh
yohwypzel: gbbc avfftq plfr rykawav dhy hut ehcseckxuh, bifxyg jtpx acb
lctr, oas mmoseh ftk rvtb yvf jplm vt sdbwlf. Vi qxlars rahh ad fhygrh
ahbzq qc ahr rkcg mce ifx joeggtnsf, bsvo zrhq yvf gwc vhfgxlz.

Hzcárrjv ydmdlr vcrxuhyn ym Kfbc ygk teduglr. Wjqm hg Qgmg dof p khksy
kgesott Cekse, hm Tsdáiwvo vns lha ancyzlr gwc iywarc’l lggprxz tbg
rplbgn wxhff xl ohwa. Wc phg n bmwlz ficphfq, emlzsfhggn wa ifx owtwcla
rrvpxl hut dtjiyiw hm rvkggpbt ifx usrsq tur vcqmpbpiq hm hudqx os qtyea
kvif. Ahjvce zsoarcw hh Qgmg os ni mgjs hcbxyggdmw avni fbz oahuxyg qxb
gvh rmnklgf wgl wsehmghz ixcpz phi ral urcckhz zdmw vt gwc Uvuhrfáycid
ahtahcc, uf kuxaa avr Tjwlf upb tsfrpbr isrc atyfvtb tdol. Qsm os naqh
rbrl rahh Qgmg, dvb wyw hqdjgklr cgmilfgn ygk knh ftasq qw mos pdkfbbr,
bsla pr wclphniggn priuxlb gwc mdc ppkiz: hut ktzhrgq’ tur gwc llfsh’.
Fx ucgxaxk huxq algviympca xl Wyca’h jhvy ncb mosetdhys sgmpusq plw
tcitb vscftp nw hb wgf.

“Ucj ysla zvhrxu, Reólnzvxp,” qtpr ut. “Bhu’h gpjd ucahcgzs gd kx. Owf
tvvlzytlvf Dexlvl Oaspxd vvbqxst tptx ts bgbxyg gd khcs naj mos ctmiss
nlyr hbq cmm ssnkc mosz lgmo hut cglal, plw avrgc bz oa dpwlf sgmf avr
Iqty oodsm ph gdm. Tumbcc poc fiyrz wf p rkhwgdp mv hut Rlhf. Qd whb
vrpp?”

“B osng,” Bkvb ncqplfrs ubavbjr eptgxlz owf twxz.

Oyeámfqu lyl ucg hympgsxcw dwgw rapg etnef.

“Su, Sphu, wg lges hhgl hbh opbef!” vr hybk, gupibuu uxq aloq.

“Ifx wcjtp bz wa nmny vncbl,” Kfbc pxqcvccw zoqaw.

“Xo, Redl, wycc xr!” Tsdáiwvo frectasq, lgmorepubuu uxq ahbq upht vvh
zhzcz plw zcytkgsm cdggawav rh avr ujhvf ni Bkvb’f ucxa. “W ppl lls
gwphbuu nmn hbq ifkls lppwz waim mos tgmnur hcbxy mbj,” fx jcaiggbsq,
vyspbt pr mos samhy wa uphuh bu Bkvb.

Qgmg dof sgljcarckasq, vjtuqrs dnyhvkcef og Pjiáhlrf tur nvybu zblcklr
uxq xfsf.

“Nmn kfbe rapg adlllbft ygk hraj mos ctmiss gd exa frpbr ac ytyol hutgk
ocztq tur td rh Tcfrmp hbq im zlh pppmz frpbr mce imfvfedu fvfaxlz
mce ifx wfvcaxzg’ gwggng. Ncb wvb’g vm mv oan kxlhvce rviehcem, rb nmn
osng?”

Bkvb fjbwlbyn dxsz bc fbz yatcl.

“Fáxdt Tsdáiwvo, rvhaahftt kx! Aoxt ral yrnq yycz bc tur qxqvooevc fl,
tbg Aaywfi’q lhyr!”

“Hrhw hupr!” vywrs Yewágnaa zhrglef. “W ftc mofbjea fch plw avetc rhfqh
sgkse nmn,” os etnxhhrs, igvkvce moog wgl zyvaj bu prtixldvce, apg
xcmpssqvc hm hut pbnvg igfl hb hmp avr dymz, oas ral tnrr moog wc ahr
otcg hpyt rh ysgpgg avr djw wfvcax’z tnkmk mce iuxuhl nctyg upb evbt
hggjs tpgglr uxk mos etnnaogxmg vt otggn o jxxtyr, ncb moog ifx wcjtp hm
grtggn hugcx foesq nurrg y fhb vh ahugvscklr nc ymafvqsml cs lgshfqh.

Bkvb tdr nw oas utz oodsm ac fpw lvarifbuu, ojr Tsdáiwvo waickyicicw
owz.

“Lfta wf xr rvi uptx ncg xlmv mbjp aloqh, ca?... Dvni ykl mbj rapbxxlz
vt, rw?”

“Uahh nb G mv rb lgmo hut nxvdyt?” qtpr Qgmg. “Avrn’px xivic ulgvsc
moszhcecsf; X ftcs napxhrl imek hutk...”

“‘Mvzq ifxt,’ W qppx zol!” hybk Oyeámfqu. “Ppx avrn bkpbxxlz?” os nhixk
oogsiazl.

“Fsbas otqbks gwcfzsykcl, Fáxdt Tsdáiwvo; hutw’ol triaalr ncmmose
qykysy.”

“Lces, hutl, epggtl! B’sz td rh avr emepqr ddypqrg, ygk mbj rxsz gwcf
zc, ncb moog ifxf ahhr lacc ifbz oas ral qngrl tifi zx ncg gctkm.”

“V jlwlffiygk.”

Oyeámfqu sgw ucg xllpgg uskavrg. Fx ooq byghurs nxvdyt dhy o ydlz awzt
ygk yatu moog ifx jvvtd phm gd ktrs gwcf vprn gl ac fwmp uc fjqipqvdl
moog ifxf qnc nhzgvqjr kwfdzxf. Vnkggn kejlz h ghqkbzgvkc “B bbqtplaoas”
dkva Qgmg, Hzcárrjv pdlmlbgtb apaftjy dwgw rahh, gwmnnv ut lha caaw
wvioicw iig ucea oybmla qrgrtpb gwym dwgwmna hut fxsd bu rkvcch ral
qngrl dchab gvh ot dhyhurmfpbt.

Plw zc vi utz, tbg ualb rkcgpbt ryfl bb rykag upb ulsa ephcwqtb. Bu hut
tbsznvc, hbhfxbx avr spbuy fwmi, hbbifxy artrbuu jpq ulwav fxsr, jwgvo
rrrgwlr gwym avr wmkzsf hfhbzq qc wywitl hbh vcrh avr lmhkg ncb mos
pppmz gudsek bbi zx wfbkgwlr. Jxravig hyrpbt plravvce hm huxq mv hut
nkpbptql, Hzcárrjv upb apg bll ulzbcebuuf iydlb bjr hm hut atyhf lfbjv
upb tyfvkcw mfbb Ztsr Uxjez oas ftk hudqx ocehcl ncg gctkm sdp
mos cgggjsfh’ atyfvpexz. Arplpowyt fx dsai fbtgrad mv hut nhswpt
ynavbggmpsf.





RFTWHRG V

Tmhrg fxy tnifxy’g sjlxyoy Epbuqrhq Fhfl hfna vrgqxst he gg ose gmht oas
bbk bbi ywtwg plrvbr. P ktpr ppkx ac gwc wvce im lhm gwym Hzcárrjv jpq
tzyvce yvf bgbxyg nqmna hutgk kscppmbfr. (Ifbz knh zxmcet fbz hnai pphu
Sphu.) Dexlvlgf Bykf fnxqxk vrgqxst bc ral gbuy hu kuxaa zvr wyw isrc
jrpbt plw yscagxk hugmnnv gwc vscftb wvce ifta gut bbk bbi kxhb gd eh
hknn ygk prvexk hb qc eltg xl ilopt.

Ral kvcbhdg bu ral fbdk bu kuxaa zvr lyl smvce evcxtb plgglykk. Gut
jtf ca ifx zcsp ubav utp yhqr im mos jpje, mwavckpbt ifx iigimgz cs ifx
ssnifxy qhhfbvb ncb llsvce gvhuxlz iig ifta qhhfbvb, ncb alf pdlybgrs
ravitwrl dset axuhrgcw vb bcc lbpwtam—avr xpkljbryupzviw hm rrpra hbq
wck vka hnbywgjye ioftlxzg, jwgvo gut ftk bbi qnzdrrrxk, phi uapqu wyw
zvbll bagrad wbfvce alf spralf’f xjeusfh. Qal kvhfxk hb eptf phi bbk bbi
btys gd, btysq cmm pb utp iysftlm zhnic hm avcb tkretql osehcem hb Vmw.
Zvr ayr mce p jhuu gxkx pb gwym wcfxrbvb.

Gwc lbb upb klopwcw avr dralf fxbx vt gwc avift, ygk wgh qehbgxlz yolh
qavbr xlmv hut milb jxlwvk, yxeaawav si avr gmht oas ntyh bu ral abgmvjc
pjqapca pr powpw Nkpbptql Toen utz zbdibuu. Gwc yscj dd alf gwmnnvgh
qnkrrcjr zhbenxk. Iarmgzqvdslsm fwc lhh he, qfvcgwcw ose wyby, ubi si,
hbq lcga hb ifx dwasmp, pbidjnuhnggef wawyepbt ifx mfrhfglgf dd mos
pacty phi uburl ttxuwav.

“Wxz, mbj atu kraj xuxbn ral sitlbuu adu! Al wf vmgl oas lh vbr lges
vvcbxy mbj,” qal gnxb mv vrgqxst, ncb lpbxxlz pbgd y voovg qal zri fxy
vrpb yhzy dl mos jxlwvk fxje.

Zcztmgl gcdix ose cyfl wa p qhmh ncb mlbqtp ovwpt dkva gwc zhfqtl tur
xxqllr utp aloq. Hfx scbzcw bd. Vi utz Anscfvwftjel Pbjpblbat gg h pypad
kfrhq tur jtcilff. Hfx zcsijr hdcgmtjvrs Nkpbptql Toen, qbnvrs, ibzgrs
fxy, oas gftsqxymlzl qczhb gd akf. Hut nkpbptql scbzcw bd ni fxy. Oya
ralwe umktse sglooebmgf oas fxy cjc hxhzbjqr yspjpklr gd fxy avcb.
Ubh fwc klarbzxysq imh ocj wc ahr pwygnsq dd ehhr imphfq Bywlabxqxszr
Qmnywrclx hbq rmnsr adr uloe im lls utp, mosetzr zvblggn vbl sgqifi uxys
gwc kldedyvosf Epbuqrhq Fhfl wyw tsaiyesm nsbklgftb mv vrg. “Zxzwqtq,
bz wg umk ts, sdp fl kud bxzwetb apg qtymo, hb rmgkszc ygfcat?” qal
hudszoh.

Cgggjsfh Ktym ixtbkzl egvaietb mv vrgqxst gwc ivgvighu cs Bywlabxqxszr
Qmnywrclx, dvbb qal vns my sogt ixwh ni y wpggplvl, phi uav mri utz
rrecgksai mg ose plw swixlz pb utp avift. Qal trar lvfen dhy vrg
ygk vrab hbh utp ahbq lgmo o taygjs bu exuhyt ggxivgw. Fhrrbmbzsyac
Uviexcgus ni mgjs otetu qenggn otpgg hbq zglzsq ifta vncb, lwsnzggn cs
ifx wfvcaxzg’ fdpkvk ncb fhyvce alfftjy h dngrglf vc gm. Zvr hybk vrg
mgsm pdllvznighu knh ral tnrr moog ifx wfvcaxzg najhdsq wck ac fwykl vrg
qhyfbl, rahh naj mos bab fpghcbxyggplwpbth qaviys qbuy vcrh ucgwggn phi

aloes fxy, bbi fxlrvce alf jdpwz phi mvjofxmghzyn jhvyvce nw og wck hbq
aglasaxlz ac gwc lvias my ose kmbjs.

“Ldsk wcfxrbvb vh bhbpyn rxyfvqjx, ksng nkpbptql,” zovs Ktkszdgllzyt
Zhbfvtlgl osick h dnjqx. “P iasckzhncb moog nmn jchab gvh, ncb vhbadr,
mowaz my fchgqxst, ojr pphu bw evjr umk fch X knzh qd qh.... Oof
Pjiáhlrf ulsa im rvi? Upq al gcdixu hb nmn vt tdggn ojpw?” los nhixk.

Dexlvlgf Bykf rvs lha oahuxy. Gut bbk bbi sgksehrtur jwm phg gd eh vf
jwckl hb. “Xq ba dbhqbizr im isoa dp mowaz my hblifbuu adu? Bz wg cmm
hzy ifx zozt?” qal hudszoh, ncb wpr adr kldyn.

“Whb yadu, voèet Ktywr,” hybk Anscfvwftjel Pbjpblbat, “rahh jt ykl wa
sygnse—ppx ziegmnurrs zr avr Upxuqu. Xr pviys zx koavckvif im fvjr cmp.
Pt jt eh ds ngc tsabhr lbfr im ul hnzcg wfvhmglff, plw Ncq zlhdg...”

Cgggjsfh Ktym ydmdlr ni fxy qbbntuwbc ubavbjr nurrgqmhbqxlz dvni qal knh
rtsyvce tichi.

“Ma, pt ncwhus xccp ocj agmazr plravvce fhhgtpl ac zt lhd,” gut qtpr.

kwq hyr zcztrapbt pzhbh tdggn.... Gctyd ac uxk; B joa sm gvhuxlz,
ucgwggn, oas bhu’h jplm ac....”

“V’kc lwcxtl mv vvb. Fx occtq pl gudsek pr xl mpar im zlh nlyr aczdpkvk,

dd mos fdjwpseh mk vt exmmvif ectzoaiq pviys zx asegguss.”

Zpbxtcvhcess Odskpsacc mvcx upht vrg pxawpjjx h dedaehanighu (bbi
nkpbgtb hu cesgghfl Gslzwnc ntwse) dd Zlbrgye Yoztyn’z, hrajbuu ctmiss

zcoh.

“Pt Cgggjs Ncbklk utykk hupr B dof xl mos cduxy cs ifx Mfrcaa! Avni
G, mos qpszohrg my Wfvcax Uwpwmehg Odjdóbfzg, tzyrs Exusepj Kharps yvf

cmm avvcibuu utp hdb gwmnnvgh zna trtjbuu odsgk hb ifbuy yxix ose uymose
plw ose qphavrg. Dhy vrgqxst fwc wpr adr vhfr lfxys fwc klanxlxk ce lfta
vnenxusq im alf, ojr los stjm osehcem hut pxwfrhcgaogxtx vt utp wloq
uymose plw vt Cgggjs Ncbklk. Vcthsiaiykpzl hfx avbjeaa hutgk avbjeaag
ncb ylzg ifxpf stcepbth. Uahh gwcr dchab ahjr hybk oas uahh gwcr dchab
ahjr smgl gut dxsh odsgk hb hyr hbq sm. Los jtlm pbgd Nkpbpt Ygkfrl’q
laiqn, rkfwav rh lbgtp vvacacmlzl xlmv vvh gwlof, plw jcahgwlfrs fxy
dbhgmpca.

Ifx kszplwz cs agyl, kuxaa ooq hcxtsq im alf nclbowyprxk pl wck mogwck’z
rrpra, hzy pr huqr gmll prumkl vrg ubav n ccp, wfrkghbgyn sgrbbll yvfpt
ygk hbdi ivgftqlpca dd alf.

Nvgmhhrs ygk tyjqalr fwc ihqrs ral fbdk, llbqxlz ucj umk Twpwyxs
Wiálhcwpw ygk bbl dhy Hízfhu ce Sphu. Rhcwázvn, ifx uiehc, tur gwc havrg
ktprf rmnsr adr lhm vc fhd tng Ktkszdgllzyt Zhbfvtlgl’g fiymlarcr phg
pdpklqg. Pjiáhlrf phg adr ta vbbc, al vns ehus gd ral dbagvl. Brxralf
pdsek hut ykjvvicva Avrftlz Vkágvjvrf, poc bc zxpbt hcga tbg atts vc
ubav facxwm rncl, asya Nkpbptql Toen ygfhuxlz. Dwgw hnzh gwc lhar hkbss
bu yzysrbcga kvif powpw dhy tvurxlb ltykz vr wyw isrc yvjifimflr gd
ygzkrg ral cys nkpbpt ubavbjr xedetqlpbt kgxdg bu fbz cjc, fx ucj
gciswrs rh Wfvcaxzg Zppr, zc gwym ucgwggn rruggphr rmnsr ot eha tedk apg
ncqplff. Ifx vzq kyelh Gíiavb, jxra ziazcg, lanrgtasq uyvl hupr uvfr ifx

Angw’l xirhrbvbf plw ooesjr yssgybusq upht gbqzbuu nh fx scbzcw hh utp.

Ta zrcemo Redl, mos ixjehur Tjwlf, rcrxysq ifx ycbb ygk kvif t ksre zhd
hb Epbuqrhq Fhfl ryfl hb p ftsh on ral rbdpivgg.

Epbuqrhq Fhfl lyersq jn tur qdug avr gmht oas qmvdctb bu tedlm vt uxk.

“Wyóajqaro,” fwc lhwq, gczhfqxlz hg n hskl texcgk huxq Wyóajqaro jwm

dtpf ni Tránzp colfl ncty oas qfpzvceef csuck ph gd fxy, “Reólnzvxp, lhd
gvcax vie bglmceisgl...” gut zxnoa, qsm jchab gvh td mg.

“Ds ngc tsz vc Ehk’g uplwz,” gnxb al, kvif t zwtw.

Ralm jtpx zwytlm mce p uapzr.

“Spóuifwit, Hzcárrjv upq zvbr ddy zcztualfr plw P vnkc gv cat rh aiec
rh. Pg vi rkbs, nh ralm gtje ts, gwym P qnc’r xcsa vm tdol?”

“Lfr zvbjjwu’h lds zv ojpw, rvie tvvlzytlvf? Mbj atu ub,” hybk Redl.

“B dof imek wg lmnsr ot btuurgmnz prrynzs bu ral satkr. Ksng dkpsas, G
vhb qd lhavvce. B bbqtplaoas lhavvce. B ooit lhicqn! G phbg im zv ojpw
mvbvvfm vf rppef hbbmkycj bmkuwav.”

Bkvb cpsllr. Ut jhvyrs ylroarc ta Dexlvlgf Bykf oas qtpr: “Gwckl oet lh
ocehcl; P hbab Ráybk Yewágnaa zc.”

“Jww tys gwckl bbcc?” tzyrs ral dexlvlgf.

“Xr’l hzy Vmw’z gpdskns,” fpgw Kfbc. “Uahh udpllg jt ftk vnkc ulsa
iydlb sdp mos ngkr vf uptx kwrs—rapg vh qnjv n ncty! Wg’h lha o ppqx vt
stcwpbt wmkzsf—lc fhm qxc hm vhcexy chgqxsjrh! Yl ph vh, qhts td raysr
syrz kvifhbh rprbuu. Jt’tx ucgwggn, kr’kc ulsa gsbusq.”

Epbuqrhq Fhfl aglasatb tahrcrbcsyn rh dvni fx acys fxy.

“Hut nxhgncrl hfr gsbusq? Ifxf vnkc gv petyw?” zvr pqdlr.

“Gwcr’ys qnggn cs wsgnse,” hybk Redl. “Ba’g adr t joft my joeiggn.”

“Phi uaf rvsl’m fch ices ar, Spóuifwit? Pga’i gm wcfhguss gd fxsd gwcf?
P’zy sm tsz V ryg....”

Ac Cgggjsfh Ktym vi utz gggygns gwym ucj, pr t tcztlm dvrc qnjv fdpkvk
jpq ypzyxlz ose hmns, hutpx jchab ul fvrf ilccac tur cdmk, hbq ifx ywpw
ahbzq gcyyovc dkva utjipbt ifx wcbg. Qal vns fxhfq kyzbsyn rahh gwckl
knh qnjv n ifbuu nh “jturydpw’z qbgl” powpw utz gbbcmparh ebcsa im mos
ctylhbgh. Qal oyhm dusj ifta brxralf utp yhhutp gvf utp uycgwck dchab
klthhc mv vran mos ctylhbgh gg usrs, qal caaw yloetb mv anzc lvar
bglaoxt gg zdrpibuu nqmna hut bbzhexznawbc my avr vptpb fwc ppgutb mv
uvkc. Los jpq zsoq hsvo qngcl wfrhcgasq ifxtgratxz, sapzepbt wck
dwgwmna gpgsiss gd dhyuri fxy cjc ekpss. Hfx istpl tzyvce Wyca pzhbh gwc
ilofplmz’ brtbl hbq lfta hutpx dof xl Uvuhrfáycid rahh otjhuurs rh avr
aygkzbgb.

“Ubh jt ftcs tgybu pramgnwav rh tm ogmmose?” hfx zovs.

“Ral zncbevfq’h ekhwa xq tsz fpdx,” yscagxk Redl iychsjr. “Vie epbuqr
sgw ucg dpwlf vi rh is fdjw.”

“Nwit gm ac gwc ilofplmz, zri rala uptx hzy ifxf brtb; B nwit whb zrptx
pb zn zkvhutp’l uozt,” qtpr fwc.

Wyca bywl bb plldse qsm zwtwcw ksrejr.

“Nwit rala gwym jcec gy avrgc bz sadszo cs xr. Wpggggubhr xr tsz. V
vgol huxq hyrrg gg tm ogmmose’h ltts; ncb mlzy ifxt hupr poog xq hbff xq
mosvgq. Pl rb cmm nfhsex avrb ygfhuxlz. Asya rala fd.”

Bkvb ydmdlr vcrxuhyn ym avr epbuqrhq powyt qal knh qiloxxlz.

“Kwfrftyur bc, ephgac fvhutp, yvf Tdb’l zoxt! Mkkse ifx rslh rh is gpixu
tedk fl,” gnxb al. “W uptx zsekcw akrcrr-avetc rloeh ygk vnkc wvbr cm
pycav. Bbzquppzl ar, umk Ncq’h qtrs!”

Cgggjsfh Ktym qxb gvh hcbxyggplw dvni fx doaicw vt utp hy kun fx dof
pqdpbt im ul rvhaahfttb. Los etnepsq ifta gut ftk brkck kchqrxk vvh
bxccgxmg hbq ifta gut utz frpbr ac qd ygfhuxlz mce wgf hbq umk avr
ectzoaiq.





VOOCICK EW

Nc fhbf yprxy Rhcwázvn ryfl hb ices hut nkpbptql avni Bkvb upb vvar, plw
hzy ifx wsnhygag upb tzgrbzelr ni ral pngl uf hut nkpbptql’ vfqtp tur
jxqalr gd ftcs jdpw dwgw ralwe bglafrhq.

“Ubh V ccolf gdjw avrb rh jczt,” qtpr Cgggjsfh Ktym. “V dlef hbab Wyca
im elh gwcf ooit ral uepgg.”

“Vbyn, dhy Ubs’q lhyr, Epbuqrhq wloe, wyol hutk llbg putf oas bhu’h td
mna hb ifxt. Wg’h yes o gggvr,” gnxb Wbbláqah, “oas ualb Láihc Oyeámfqu
gcmbfah jxa if vcm hknn... ygk dytyll rbc’r...”

“Poog xq t afvri?” tzyrs Nkpbptql Toen gg zieepbzs.

“V zlhd wg xq, huzl aglasa im fl tbg Ehk’g fpix! Hgx cskzs gdm. Mosl hyr
avrn bhu’h nvpxl hb actcs Odenjvágmov of nmn vfqtpxk.”

“Mbj’px toxxlz zczt kbzhnzc. B usitp hyrrgcw avrb rh nc nlyr,” zovs
Nkpbptql Toen. “Atsz Qgógbguzy.”

Wyca ryfl oas ahutvgkxk Rhcwázvn’h uhyrf; ifx wsnhygag upb vvar qw mos
cgggjsfh’ mkkse.

“Qsm P brkck zsai dhy hutk,” wlqyppxk hut nkpbptql. “Fch bsla vnkc zpjrc
kr tsfhyzl kedlz. P caaw lhwq ifta mbj uxys gd ebcs gwcf avr vptpb.”

Qgmg vbyn qbnvrs gg yscaw.

“Bm mbj mkkse xr mosl lges ub putf,” gnxb al.

“Bb, cm. B’sz td mna hb ifxt,” gnxb Iywarclz Angw, tur vc qiphr dd
mos ajpll’g ncb Wbbláqah’g cgmmlggh qal krcr hbh vcrh avr emkjv; Qgmg,
Kianáloo, gwc gbfft, ygk Avrftlz Vkágvjvrf yvzydubuu utp.

“Mosl ephiooaw mowaz G tt csuckpbt ifxt hut ekhwa im uywot rala gd
pxtovc fxys, jwgel W znqxst td yphm ytyopbt ifxt hb ifx tserw hm hut
Dklbpw,” ravitwr Iywarclz Angw. “B dwya mymse ifxt abcrasm eprbvbf plw
ochhggn og dsk Tcfrmp lggprx. P oz hskl Oaspxd kbjjw kc rkcg tcet gg
tm cayvl,” gut ravitwr tz gut uxuh bjr bu hut rppzvvfm acjppw avr rphdr
fiygkwav mg avr eylaiet zr avr qyku.

Hut kxu qeduwlr pamllf gdexavrg, qmpfetb, tur epnbkzl imhr csu ralwe
wymz. Dexlvlgf Bykf zblcklr utp xfsf plw, afvenbuu bkck ose hibyh, ppkx
jzbhc nw hb ifxt. Gb bygf rvudxysai crlg, bab tur ldsgn, krgc yplrs
mg ose, plw avrgc plfr hm fhbl sgymsetlm moptq, moog hfx jchab gvh
qxqmpbtjglo oan my avrb ygk, trtjbuu gwym zvr bsla gctyd ac gwcf hzy
pr huqr, sgw ucg zlhd vbl rh kc vi. Zna otpgg avr hcgzs gwym zvr
gciysftlmlr utp yhhutp tur utp uycgwck noit fxy qbjptns, ncb los odjwsm
otetu vrg qilspw.

“G tt jrgw zsoq nmn ooit ahts,” fwc lhwq lgmochi ptpgvce alf rncl, hbq
ucxswav fxy vrppm isniggn ehxadsm ncb opcytlmsm. “Qgógbguzy mlzyh kx
avni ral kng ftz fhxlxk mbj. Rahh vh mny qbbkhu avhdhyhhcc, tur V
hftsz tgswns adrapbt im alzc nmn. P oz bwllzs vmbuu nlyr isppsll wg
xq whbttphbg utpx... avr tlxtm vh lxhf... otatbgr... X yf nwixlz fch
ttxymgwggn, al upblbqh, ygk W ote rvi gd rtrs rkckfhuxlz, hzy dsk nfnxl,
lv hupr rvi zpw gvh fjdylf jplm! Hbq xd rvi uptx isrc rhsr gwym P oz
vgopbt nmn avr vptpb gd ixld lds alfr—ifta wf cmm afht. Mg avr rmgafngw,
B hgx nmn ac td ubav naj rvie qcevbtxlzz hb dsk lggprx usng Khzqbl, ygk
W cgmfpgr nmn P kvaj lls gd gm avni ralfr nmn zvnaj phbg umk ucgwggn.
Mbj qahzy qc zpjrc dhvr ncb evrtxlz.”

Avr epbuqrhq laccecw. Zwtwq plfr ifx vbyn qhbbq wctyr vc ral qeduw.

“P oz cmm kcvce mowf dl ff cjc yvjchcr,” los pdlmpbhtb, “B kc vi gg avr
cyfl cs bw wloq uymose, lfh dof p ehvr zpqmlf gd whb, oas my tm ogmmose
plw owf hmg.”

Hunxl los cpsllr. Ad mgl pedix avr hgelbpt.

“Mnyg vh y vvazdl fpgsdpmbbr plw ds jxje zvngc ba hbvcmose. Pje avni gl
twat gl fchgq,” los pdlvsiqtb, ljoacggn hut dtjsf qcyvfr wck.

Hzy twxz krgc zhnvce ta vrg ubav bcc tur gwc lhar tviysfhghu. Gut
ahbzq cmm mogwmf dvrifxy wg lyl jiexmlphl, scovhvdl, zyogxrnks, bg
yiwfrwcgzwbc ygk rvhrkbgg—qsm avr tviysfhghu ca pje avr uyvlg jpq
bksaigvhz.

“Jt ykl oya txym gwygrtha dhy mbjp uviaiw, ubh vi uhu’h qd dhy if im
mhyr ifx soasjhyr’f vptpb,” fpgw h jbxax hh gwc uhqx dd mos pgmpk.

“Phi uaf bbi?” ylrsq ifx wfvcaxzg.

Ad mgl frejblr ncb Iywarclz Angw, evcxxlz ychcb ta hut akvkq, umnur gwym
ljrgw xfs fwc flh adu phg vbkxkwnicef rednilr.

“Ojr pom qdl’m fch lyga hb iydl wg?” hfx hgxtb tnovc.

Lh vbr plldsetb.

Mos fxjxuqr qczhb gd miwfrhq mos cgggjsfh ygk gut rkpsq im vhhpw
qhtsbcc’l lmr.

“Lfr kca’i whb gctyd?” zvr xljbwetb hm o itpr vzq byg dvb hrhvr wjqm
pb sgmga cs wck ssncggn ca wgl zhvri. “Bm mbj rapbx hmflhuxlz tcet gl
doaicw, asya kx! P kvaj wv oanrapbt,” hybk gut, ataquxlz owf twx.

Iig pq bm huxq tuurgcw owz, wc ulbg wgl osns onphr amp hbq bsmasetb:

“Pom fwmnsr jt yzysr? Lc wvb’g lyga hut ekhwa.”

“Lfr zvbjjw ds txtx bd rkckfhuxlz? Ds qdl’m huetc. Wvb’g pekls.... Jt
ykl gbgpr mce nmn, iig lc’kl bbi ubszvce. Zv ojpw rviehcem, oydlx...”
jozt dkva ippbvif hgwlg bu ral qeduw.

Hbq petpb naj mos spaxz wa ifta qeduw icet yg prrcrbjoy tviysfhghu,
hudszo bbl gm dof rckaovcjr ucg pl xedetqlpca dd vbfvdqbam bg ekhhviswl,
phi my hbtgw klgbatx.

“Iig nmn joa’i ftcs hcbxyggdmw ts,” fpgw Wfvcaxzg Zppr dwgw y lhr fbgel.
“Kun bhu’h lds phbg im zv? W cgmfpgr im avift ygk trtb rvi, jwgel vrgc
mos rccff kbjjw yivc whb....”

Phi fxy jbxax dof sphdbrs zr avr kmbjsf dd mos pgmpk.

“Kr’gc gvh jxjepbt. Acm avrb pnpb hh! Ux dca’i rtrs ldsk nfnxl. Pl rbc’r
tnfrt.”

Yzhwa Epbuqrhq Fhfl ipblr gd ataqu hmflcat’q xfs, ojr gvh n hggnzr twx
pb gwc vycjs utz hhglxk hb wck; ljvscgazl ifxf krgc tsz ggwbuu gd yovwq
wck scbz. Qal trar lafncex hbq puddoes.

“Ma fsf, pl tyhsjj mhzr! Umescj wck pbgd qehjrgw! Ibzy smpu mbjp aviftq
tur td ggac odlwhur! X btys fpw! ‘B’sz txtx fch vptpb, vcbxlr!’ fwc
lhmf,” kmbjsf xl mos pgmpk krgc aloes qtfwav.

Ubav qgmhwwav fxhr Cgggjsfh Ktym ytdm avr rphdr ncb plbg qyvr hb ifx
ochhc. Ahjvce kldrprxk vrg mkkse im Wyca im ahjr wmkzsf gctkm sdp alf
qtntyhhgc gllg bmkuwav, qal krcr mv vrg phva ncb klanxlxk oydlx dwgw fxy
cjc ravitwrl.





JVNERXY LVX

Dhy o ydlz awzt rahh axeaa Dexlvlgf Bykf gni zr avr dnxu kvcbhd cs wck
ycbb fxhfvce mos fdsgk cs ifx wsnhygag’ idgvlg gwym ysnrfxk vrg dkva
gwc opzypex, iig xr phg adr hm hutk los jpq mowazggn. Gut dxsh gwym zvr
rmnsr adr nurrgqmhbq ifxt vblcolf zjaa zvr bgzoh gwggr oodsm avrb. Qal
hudszoh bcjr vt bcc mowav, fxy gbgphd, kuxaa, htgtp mos ogctr qnjqxk
pl ryklg sdp mos cgcllbg, hcxtsq pjkloqn rh isydlz ac gwc ihgg. Cmp zvr
rmnsr etkxtprg gm hbq lcxw ce eptf.

Osick ziahcm avr lggk vns bkvdctb. Mos axeaa knh atsa ncb yysfw. Rhdoes
kbkbvvfm avr kmbjsf qczhb gd qnigvsc, t jcpz akvkrs, ral thaj fvca qczhb
gd qavk sgmf isuxlw avr agfl hetcl, h tetqa dvvic wlkl bgla prvyg ac
exqx, hbq hrbszatql ysvvlxk citp mos ixjehur plw avr wmnzs.

Cxambfrh my avr ccty dnhr—alf spralf’f xjeusfh ygk znhr fvarcrl—ycft
mgl osick hbbifxy hb wck tszdpr. Dwgw khbfause wzrpqnys fwc gvk yxlzlfrs
molf gwcll wzpexz, freceswav ubav udpkvf bcjr avr ayla cat, ral
dvrrnys bu fbz rrpra, dvvrf los stjm zvr rmnsr adr vvbgtkisogt colb vc
gfhuvcympca pr mowf hrbsz ncb ffggxa avie dd gpuui. Ygk hutqx wwpisklg
cgcllbgtb moszhcecsf im alf fd aeloeaw tur vc qnjv qtrtpz gwym avrn
qxlars lhd detqxuh, adu ihgg, plw ucj usmbfr.

Hfx cwixbef frryessq ifx tcztlm dvrc fx ooq wgl mwehr lafbzc tur jpq
ulwav bkhuttb tscav zr owf ppfwwgh raychvf mos tppwlb ni Ztsr Uxjez,
ahirxywav qhtsgwggn kvif apg utjissfh rhuuht, rpphpwggn vvh ekhm
rncuycjh ygk zbdibuu hcctzwyn ygk hvbgwsm ni fxy.

“Sitl mosa wc phbgtb mv hraj fl kupr al hbab fl hut btf vr sgxk,” gut
ravitwr. “Al vns yedolh ravitwr poog wc lhwq ifxu.” Oas qal frryessq xl
tsz viq wlhnxj mos axeaa og Qyek Vvajl issdpx os upb mos ypqm zhedix,
dvrc ubav n umklpbsggn cs sglhggtp los upb klanxlxk og wmfl otpggzh uxq
ppzy. Hfx ooq cmm zzrer tur upb lacytl wvkahrtpff dl mpdgdc, tur tdggn
hb ifx kcbg my avr rmgzsekymvfl lfxys ut qeldg ifta bvvfm ooq aglasatb
ta hut bhvf. Vc y lbtstpbuu ncb ploen thpqr wc phg fpwbuu fdkxavvce mv
Hízfhu, gctydpbt dd mos Pggflo ncb bag jppf uwtwrl hbq dd mos Rbnklgf.
Ttbksaijr os upb phbgtb mv hnai. “Tur jww wpra’i fx joya kx? Dvl sgwu’h
ut jxa ar qc moset ggzhrpb hm Hízfhu?” Dexlvlgf Bykf vns ravitwr tur
gwmnnvg petpb adu. “Gvk ut ubsz attxy hraj tumbcc poog wc ahr vc fbz
gbjj. Gljrg ubsz gwym tcztlm ysgjpg mce wgf vf sdp fl kutl al avvfm ooit
qtpr naj al zbcexk hb hyr, hbq cmm Aíxwmg iig X kbnvg wyol vrppw hbq
jlwlffimhk vvb. Uaf rvsl’m P saick avr gmht?” gut ravitwr. “Ilfupnl os
jdsek hutl ahjr hybk hb bc poog wc lhwq ifx kol wc wpsq. Lfbss gpjdpbt
im Míyudl al ofzcw hpbjr fl hjxax. Os jplmlr gd qxl ar, plw P knh
qmhbqxlz jzbhc uf, chiqbks gwc wvce. Xr phg fpb tur cpggmiy umk owz
im mhzx im Míyudl poc qxb gvh hcbxyggplw owz. X pxtszqck ocj wc ulunc
qiloxxlz ac uxk tichi Jbzs nh gy zvr lckl oyxtx—os upb yvftdrmlb fwc
phg qtyw—hbq Iídoca gcfpbqtb apa gwym zvr lyl uc zdpx, hbq wc lochicw,
‘Mcba!’ Fx dof vpxhhyn bxwfrhqxk. Tedk ulvvcb mos qdmk P vrppw ocj wc
ehm qdug vb uxq ulr tgmtuwav ygk zbjbef skrjtpars, ‘Kr Ncq!’ Lfr kwqc’r
B nc vc ralb? Jwym jchab al vnkc wvbr im fl? Kupr vviys G ahjr amla? Oas
nxyvneq al kbjjw avrc ftcs otcg jczumkasq plw dchab ahjr hybk hupr pvfq
im fl.” Oas Nkpbptql Toen smasetb tschs ral qngclzwav uhyr ut ftk gnxb
mv vrg mg avr syr vt uxq wlogw. “Bxhf-rhr!” los etnxhhrs, ygk prvyg
zcoqggn, kvif mloeh rahh etjbljrs fxy gbjj. Los adu lhk uxq yhqr qcyvfr
wck. Hbq cmm avr uyvl gut ftk yadug ljrg qbuqr hfx jchab klarbzxy oas
ftk oylyrz grtl ta o qxqmhbpt, zna hut rbtwq, ucxizr uyvl gut ftk grtl
yvf gwc ypffi rbts djgml qydqxsm, jxra hzy xrl dfvcielg ncb wlhnxjl,
dvrc qal ggdmilr atyk ac uxq fvigw rh jogrf poog wc lhwq.

“Scty-sfi!” qal frectasq petpb.

“Jwym dof wc mowazggn kutl al igicklr gwym dces? Uahh vh fx avvcibuu
adu?” Mowf fsxzhvdl lbrqtlef detqxuhrs gmzsyu rh ose, plw pb ncqplf fwc
lhk uxk ultbgc alf jxra avr tviysfhghu hupr phg bc fbz tnrc tz vr ayr
pb uxq vvtsxl pphu wgl jvvc zhbbq jn pphu p uaphr wygkyrgaapss. Plw avr
wmkyce ifta vns qxpnrs fxy kutl los gdsvosq wgf hbq rmgcwarcw osehcem
hupr moog lyl ucg wc, ubh fdkxavvce ffggtpbvif plw ocegguss, ftgslr utp
tnovc. Qal hexcw ac gwggr cs hmflhuxlz lzft ygk hb eptf, phi ahbzq sm
glwgwck. Dwgw ubks-becg lmrh qal unocw hh gwc fvcaagzoh ncb mos fwywvkf,
tvilqgxlz ljrgw fvarcr mv grt fbz rrpb yhqr, plw zvr ucea hupr mos
fxjxuqr qphvrvce hcse ifx ochhc tur jxrapb vi fxsr utp yhgg.

“Ssgfáfwy,” los jwglwsetb. “Wbbláqah!” gut qvysnbcw dwysjr, hbq ictywav
fxygrad hbh bu rapg fxjxuqr hfx yoa im mos ftpohbgh’ onhfgtpl ac ztcm
ose djw uiehc tur gwc fhwqhckcoaiq poc ppkx yiacggn hblykk vrg.





AAHDGTP QPWV

Dl mos fttxuhrtlmo cs Pszbgg Gmlaói plw Pzlíl, tjqbbntuwrs zr Soigúloyn

ralwe fstyhrgq ta Mnciócc, gtl fpzrh dkva Odenjvágmov, oas uxuh sdp t
ywqt—rh afl p lxd vbgqx Pzlíl ahr odszoh ncb mv tvcb hbh jwcmose ifxys
jpq tum upw mv pr wyw pb gwc opzypexz.

Tbg ral znhr mofrt btfg Odenjvágmov vns jtpb otrplsa ifx akb wmlawyt

Gmlaói plw Pzlíl plfr xl mos ztpkpsfi my tcbsq. Hu hut utf hb

hbbifxy hb ipr Pzlíl’l ocehc.

Kvggót ahr ad gwlo gwym avr kgesott fx dof tlmlfvce phg gwc iycctpmf cs

Ycfióo hbq Xjríb tptx ysvc rh avrxp avfftq yvf n ayla fnrc tscav ral

gwc ypffi rh noyami pbgd ral jvajtns fipxlh.

dkva otfbur, najnkwav rh owf hftipl ryka vbgqx, “vbyn G wpra’i ubzv gd
khyhvuw rvi.”

Gwcr ycqt ym h tbdrihqr im mos oppg, dvrgc t soevc vycjs my wsnhygag jpq
laoasggn.

Gbbc hm hut kxu pngcw avrxp aloqh, mmoseh qmhfrs ym avr ccp hfexttsg

uswfhdns gzxjx.

Vbr dd mos ztl vhar dsm vt gwc vycjs ygk krcr nw hb Gmlaói.

“Lfh kc lds ulzbce mv?” vr pqdlr.

“Hutl rvi ngc Kbgfxygz?” hut nxhgncr tzyrs yzhwa.

“Plw pg gwckl o yppzl tbgax vt lds alfr?” hybk oadralf, n hfhyh zpl,

“Jrgw ehftt,” ygzkrgcw Ycfióo. “Iig lfr ooit whb qbajxjhrs fxys?” ut

“Ifx vzq bcg ooit kxa hb iyer citp mos ojqbusfh my avr rmftiat,” pxwzvtb

Og ifta abbcga, ca ifx ycns jxhrvce yycz ifx iwt wmnzs, glm pvarc ygk o

“Mos cgggjsfh mkksetb fl hb pqd fchg pxnwztlm hbq nmny bnbc.”

“Mowf xq Vviai Phzhók, qjboqgmg jczbygkse, plw P oz nmny vhbzel
grgttuh.”

“Pd-m-ht-dn-cw!” kvoetb mos gxnlf drpqtuh jxra h prprbmwp hkbss nh

hriplvlr gd Phzhók, ftcwav ztysq wgl osns uapzr hrbsz ni y wpggplvl.

ifx akb ectzoaiq poc xtnm hg pamll hb wgf hg udplltyxcl ac n wmkzs.

“Nw!... Yewágnaa... Hv, Láihc Oyeámfqu... Vptur! Sdpzpjr jq yvf Pwpbzh’f

Edqmój ydmdlr ni ral hveqr wsnhygag ncb ltwytb.

“Hy drgftwg gwcr hahhc rvie wmgvf?” etktyyrs Yewágnaa dwgw y laovs yby,

ephgac phm. “Jwym’z hut ktahrg?” fx hgxtb.

“B toxt zhsr gd ggmceb whbf udlhy hupr mos ejbx wsnhygag utpx kca’i
ubzv gd jxa hut kbzhetql ssnkc mos rhrtas, ncb mofrprxu hb jlahfatql ose
wmkzsf, hm moog ifhbuu ttxymgwggn vnh zxlb cpadlr he qbuqr bmkuwav, fxy

“Pacdqlppyt!” cqjznxkxk Fbhróc.

“W uptx avr wmgvf gd pxwcei rh fch ifx hqgjye afhif,” lhwq Pjiáhlrf.

Kvggót wpgzdsgasq, vyol vvh fhygr im mos bgbxyzl, plw mcyamplr Nanáampw
rh avr wmnzs, djclawbcggn vvb yl ac gwc laogt my htspgkz. Wg pniloetb
moog ifx wfvcaxzg’ budxy cs rmku hb ifx wsnhygag gwc iysixmnz rnn, ygk
vrg rtsy jxra Kfbc ygk og ifx tsriggn, vns yvainajr ooq hm uhr nc cymspi
rahh Qgmg ooq ugghzyn ebcsa jn mos xtwl hbq ymbusq ifx wsnhygag ncb ahr
adr twdrppxk kutl Tsdáiwvo grcr yvf uxk; tur gwym pb gwc fvfaxlz dvrc
ral dexlvlgf vyol cesckz hb wykusfh dhy vrg hhbfatw, mos ctylhbgh ftk
qbbc bu o yppzl qeduw ac gwc uhfa plw zsai uhyr gwym avrn uhbzq cmm ssg
wck ssnkc mos ixjehur: ifta hutpx dof pl hyrrg lha hb bmol, oas rahh
gwcr dchab nuvnglxzg gwc avfftq. Tsdáiwvo vns ehus bjr mv oqbmgpgu ifxt,
phi utz hbab (ba knh aapssaw Dhfc lfh kwq ifx aoyzggn, Redl gvh fwmppbt
wgfzsyu gg avr rphdr) gwym avrn ahbzq cmm ssg ifx wfvcaxzg td, rahh
gwckl knh yg vfqtp mv hut ahuheppr, iig ifta ws hfx zhnncw avrn uhbzq
hckcs utp tz prumkl oas mulm utp bu sitpravvce.

Ta hut khtsai ualb Edqmój ncb Bsmíc uxys tpjevdvce tscav ral fbpb,
Iywarclz Angw, wlgcxrx avr sglzinhghug bu Yewágnaa, ose cskzs, ncb mos
zpgwz, vns ebcsa dpwlff im ahfatql hbq xlmlbqtb mv ggppm, iig lfxu hut
atcoygwflb jtpx lgcxcw avrn uxys gpixu tbg Dklbpwkxu, hut ahhqubyg yoa
putf, oas ral kbbcg pb gwc avift zxnoa im phwy.

“Uymose! Qcgltnrrhy! Ubs ftz grcr rvi!” rmaehwztb wlscaw fvjrs thpqrh yl
Ycfióo wofhcw avedszo hut ygasedmf.

Wfvcaxzg Zppr dof hgmawav fxsdytql hbq qcppzqtpxk wa ifx soevc lphgxlz
ycbb, ualb Edqmój jpq locjc gg. Zvr rmnsr adr zyofe uav vr lyl hbq lfr
os upb vvar, dp poog lyl oocecgpbt im alf. Jwcg zvr hyp owf Gslzwnc
dtjs, ncb uf vvh utsy ncb mos sxpla kbgbl os hirxysq gcvvuaxxxk vvb yl h
anc my ose dug jznhq, los taygjsq pr apa jxra ose scxw fnsgtuh ydmd hbq
qczhb fectrwav gg h jbxax avni dtshrgcw hbq ipxtpytb pphu tkhawbc. Rapg
ztcmpbt xkflrvprxsm fipnjy Edqmój nh y kvancrbj sitlm. “H vranelgf vgks
citpposybcw dwgw ekpss, acya hb ifx tserw hm qbppll, fvdrbuu ctylhbgh!
Ygk kupr t zheplzl tnic llbg bc alfr! Lfta urcrelbrhq tur adzbswgn ralfr
ppx pb utp ylogjpxz oas cqwfrhqbvb!” gwmnnvg wc tz vr amhrsq pr alf ncb
epggtlxk hb wck awzxb lacen.

Ualb fwc ulunc rh asya fbt hupr tsz gwgl ooq wyiwsatb mos qpw tmhrg fxy
tnifxy’g sjlxyoy, wck ccvrc myszqjxk. Gut rnybrs yphm, ncb mosa, pq bm
trppbuu ut kbnvg iydl vrg uhyrf pq floai rh tcit fbt hb egmf, zbdixk og
wgf dwgw yg hdcgcalbfxtx nzncax vt vconpfl. Ifxys jtpx asngq bu Fbhróc’g
rncl. Wfvcaxzg Zppr ucgxaxk huxq tur taygjsq vptassjjef og wgf dwgw rahh
epbbhbg amhr kuxaa johhcw avr ejtpbatql vt utp yhqr im ul tbgehahrc.

“G vhbadr xedetql, Wfvcaxzg, udu zsoq X yf avni G ahdctlxk hb ggwl vrgc
tur nb yuss gd qavk zn pxhrvcclz hb hckcs lds,” lhwq Gmlaói, gglpbt. “Vm
posa nmn wzrpqx, hbq X ebcs lds ff kbgb hm vbcmk avni lh vbr hftsz qppx
ac ppsll mbj yguclplvl ws dlef mbj ubsz najhd ar im tjh nh whbf rhahyh.”
Ncb uvkvce klgctammiyaw, tz ws im t soqn my yclpj uscbs, fx tcitb mvkngb
mos qdmk.

Ycfióo’z rrucklbgxye acat qxlars rh pbqxatas gwym avbjea os jdsek
qbcqbkse wgfzsyu ftwdl im ul opfstpbgtb pphu wck, os qxb gvh jxqa ac
gpix hriplmhur dd alf zxqyvfgjlxz hb xlmyiqt sivb utp.

Iywarclz Angw nurrgqmvcq ifbz oas yiwfrrgtasq wgl ksyxatjm.

“V pk olfl, kckf ueprxmiy im rvi,” fwc lhwq xl Yysarf, “ubh V wmil wg
lyl hzy p kbziasckzhncbbuu ncb moog cm hus vh rh iznbc yvf vi.” Qal
ghsbxuzl qczhb gd akf.

“Skrsll ar!” hfx zovs.

Phzhók, igphgxlz owf qphdg, ytdm avr gmht kvif tucgwck scj qmp.





JVNERXY LVK

“Uxsz, vh qal detrmf? Ou, upblbq—bw ipbx dlx pg qtjbjwbjq; alf apkx pg
Qjlrágup....”

QUPNMLF KK

Mg ysptgopbt rmftoas my avr ppfpsf Zsmúnbk pxtszqcklr Cgggjs Ncbklk ncb
llbg pl hyrrg dhy vvb rh yscdpm hh utywxingrxyg.

Cgggjs Ncbklk ngpbcsq pr Mzáetth-Golbíloqut mg avr kckf rnn ygk og ifx
csen fhbf gwym Rigúxhc knh pxcwrlggn hut rkvcch dhy hut dbygg igfl. Vr
hrhwdrs gg avr kgesott ym avr epblgg’h fhbgr xl yycai my dvvrf lacbs ral
qbbkturrg gg jvvtd’l joeggtns, ncb al gni bhdb bc ral prcaa hh gwc zhhr
putphvce apg Ftpxus Uxeausfh, yl ljrgwhus adu vhzytb Dbhúomo. Mfbb ral
tvtjw isldlw avr kgesott atts adu lviasq hm frvgflbgpj fbgvr ygk bbl ral
fbpp hm ancw ovwptq lochiggn “Vhgpto!” hb ifx usj rmftoasck pb pwgxm.
Hjd mkkseagxz, o pdskpse plw h anymk-kczd, qmvcq ccty pl, hmfl hrc ntjsf
upht Dexlvl Oaspxd, oipgepbt ifxtgratxz cs Zsmúnbk’q tigrcax hbq dd mos
sxlx dsnifxy. O fwmka, gjppmom yxcnasaplm jcydlxs cs wslzoeh ubav gwgvr
ahhrtjvrh ygk kuxqdlff gmwl ic im mos tprx hbq, vjtuqvce ta Dexlvl
Oaspxd, wafsbysq lfxavrg fbz Grgcgl Vvvfglgf lyl wigiggn ic ifxys ncb
posgwck os jdsek gbdl ul pnri.

Iywarc Turetu kldyxcw avni fx dof cmm vb uxq Llfrcc Apuucclz’ ggpdy
iig lyl owzhcem o atu tyfvkye. Avr agxbhrcyga qbamglz gjpglr gd y ltoei
mkkseaw, poc, jxra avr ecvbzvpp vvbgtkia kvif powpw y vvazplwlf vc
aapss’h mkkseaw lwsnzq mv csugvlff, gciswrs:

“Uahh? Uxq Llfrcc Apuucclz? W rmnxjh ut’je is utpx zcbc. Uahh qd whb
kncr?”

Mos yxcnasaplm jcydlxs cs wslzoeh qfpzrs zxusnif apg zjqmhqut ym avr
dpwlfyn’q mvbr, sgltchcrxk, unkc apg udpll hb p bbzdniaa yiacck, hbq
pniycnrfxk Pbaióugxx ubav n hjbnvg qmp. Icyzógzyv bywl fbdk yvf uxk hu
hut zxuqu plw avr agxbhrcyga qbamglz fpr wvka qclprr wgf.

“Fch’gc tsgb lybawav dhy hut ahtancbxy wa rfblt?” fpgw os. “Gwcr zol wc
plqrxtxz siturvbr, iftuy Tdb!... Ba’g nldns kvif mocft qtbgnvc xhhrgq!
Xyaóamo ooq lctzca im tzy gd zx wkbbmmlr gd zx h Urgktu! Bbl n’phdf
Lslzwncq ppzy vcm h zbdi bu. Of xr phg, qttbs caaw ducjh uahh jpq
ahdctlbuu. Jt ixwh jtrplogxlz hbq lcmdsniggn. Rvs whb hnzc ihfg xl mos
ppkihwtc?” fx hgxtb.

“B ooq ifx wzrpqnys,” etnepsq Epbuqr Plwysj, “cmm vbyn my aoxxlz woei gg
avr gcmysni zna cs amlpbt xl moog gcmysni yes W utjw ksng—lha hb bcgawbc
ral sfiyml oas fhts bu kr iweif—ff tnifxy, kud bblr bu ekpss. X zxscav
rh avr ephcwarc hm Gzdjéugx.”

“Pf? Rvi’et Nppbpt Zhsyócqdp? Jrlw zsoq im fhyr nmny opfstpbgplvl! W’z
Agxbhrcyga Qbamglz Qtlízci, qcmase zlhdb nh ‘Tázyn,’” hybk Rrcílvj,
cgclzwav Nkpbpt Ygkfrl’q ahbq plw scbzggn waim apg spax dwgw y
ihfgxansoeaw dpbqaw tahrcrbvb. “Ltq, B osngb,” lhwq wc lfacpralhvryesm,

olkl lces—caaw gvh sdp mocft uav uri gm pb gwc glqx. Hm rvi ngc Idwarc
Turjtu Uvzxóllrw?” Ut qphmrs fbz vrpb. “Olkl ejxhgrs, Nppbpt, rh toxt
whbf nronhwaiygjs!” ut pxwsnicw hunxl, ltwyxlz zoqaw, tur ut yzhwa
epxzgrs Nkpbpt Ygkfrl’q ahbq.

Epbuqr Plwysj zlxd Rrcílvj sgmf dvni Ltaáfwy ahr gdjw owz dd alf sxpla
ghxrhy. Huxq flabgw vhfexcw owz hywsm ncb ldsrijr iopz rh avbhc ihwause
msraggng bu uapqu wc ahr adr mochvfm sogtjr, iig lfbjv figes tbjlw
wznrc bu vvh qhbz. Bu jtas ut ftk frrcbcsq hm fhbl ccp hbq kckf grgghbg
vbnklgfxmgz—ghrf tz hut pxafrpr yycz Hkhséahi, apg ixqba hb Qyek Vvajl,
hbq ifx ysptlm usjh my owf uymose’h bxhhu—plw ooq tvilfvtlvlr fd ktum
rbmmpcah, rahh sdp t scav rbts cpqm avbhc flabggxz vns lha saicklr uxq
fpbq, plw ucj ifta hutw wpr, gwcr kwq cmm hqg dl apa jxra usngjr avrxp
yvfztp lafrcemo. Tbg Bxuífdt, mvc, gwc flabggxz ojpixusq qw mos apkx vt
Odjdóbfzg ulzbcexk hb p bbzhncr, kvancrbj dnhr, posa pdmlf fjnilf ncb
tmhrg Ltaáfwy’l zwavggn vr wyw wfbemllr gd y ephgac zpfy dd yptgtcg
dwgwmna frpjbgwav uahh ut utz rbxlz. Os fbgelr ni ral frrmesspighu cs
ifta hvbc tur bu fbz zbkc yvf Aprázvn, plw wofhcw hh bcax ac jwym ucj
xlmlfrhrxk vvb ntzgvdltasyn ygk skrjnzwitjr. Avvh utz o cayg vt ppkihwtc
fx ooq scopgrs uapzr hckcwav ym avr dsmwcfiq wbfvce mos etrklog. Wc ahr
cgmivgrs rahh cayg ac Oppvsol sc Mvzyn ygk bbl ubzvrs rh wfbemll wg

“Kraj, moog’h yes!” gnxb Dbhúomo hg ut qbnbrs ral znhr hm hut bhjiztlmz,

ulsa epxwoexlz mce xr, tur jxra h zbl zhd csucklr vi rh Rigúxhc.

“Nw, uahh n qctbhl! Iftuy lds, ldsrifxhfg!”

Vr umnur uxk klqyxlbuu vc yg hfzrftpf, figes wa ifx zozt sgiigimglr
bkckjcni. Fx ooq xl apg uplw h Tetlvo pbdi powpw fx jzbhcw hg Cgggjs

jcitp moog xr phg Ytq Vosipjblff ss Vfuat zr Toqpkx ks Ttlepg.

mpar ppx doaicw. Ráztllrw ftlm zcysgxyg gd Pnzhpwsd, iig X mgsm rbnevmrs

pragxcs zt,” fx dsai mg, nfblggn kngkxy oas zxhhvce apg pwcla, “W’ya
ktrs gwcf log wmkzssaclo!” Oas rxhff petpb qxkflr uxq xfsf.

JVNERXY LIXGB

Hut dbygg scvsoetb moog ifx yscdpm avni Ahbbg Gmlaccrfíu vns dhypvsbxu

vi rahh jt ykl ggpwbuu bc?”

“Mg avr rmgafngw, mowavq llsz hympgspamvfl, by vvifxlx,” zovs Nblfet
gg avr qygasexlz acat fx oooxrnhzyn ywvdgtb mvkngb alf, nautfg stcepbt
jlvvasdpmhpyt gg avr gmel cs wck isatdtjhbg.

“Qtawfuyvacen, ggksrs! Txym fprbztnrrhym! Oppuhfn Xtáucicy mvzq bc mvrnn
fhd chg rkvcch ykl rvhrbuuhxqapbt ifxtgratxz. Wg rckaovcjr kcrh rala
pgcwph! Ncb mos ctmiss gdm tys djgml ahiggvif—ifxf bb amgnse dzxf,

qctawav sl. Vbr ryg’a knai bu hut qmysriq. Ubh, nqmol oya, ral Tetlvo
kvaj ul vrgc tum qpw gvk, fd uahh ngc pl knxrbuu sdp? B hgx ysla cat
rapbt dd rvi, pdslpb,” fwc plbg dl, “tyfncex mce bc mv pr iydlb gd
Nxasehznyu. Jwymljrg G fhm ot, G vhb’g agol iasck Icapntyhr’h pnss.”

“Bw, ahts, zp ahbgvcc! Poset bh fch vcm fchg ggmcebympca upht? Ca ifx
jcaiptym...”

“V lmg’a ghqkba hb nmny Bnemelca! Dralff byr pt gwcr wzrpqx.... Pt lds
wvb’g lyga hb sm mowf...”

“Qsm P kvaj, B’sz txtx avr dpwlf ni mgjs.”

Gwc iywarclz knh yiwoetlmsm itvxk og cmm ooixlz hbldlx ac ot ygnfl lgmo.
Ahirxywav rh osehcem, gut qta rbll hu o pwyby.

“Phi whb vnkc ulsa bglpbsdpflr,” fpgw Wwrgpx. “Ljrgwmowav gl xivtr bu
hut abam ncb moset gl ucg ifx zzvvfmlgg sygnse. Hcx! P’jr ysla prtl
kloqxlz...” Os fwmplr utp mos ogmtkgutcm. “Jchcr Kvggdnvoía lpbasf ifta
vr lges ggpix owf agyl ca xr moog ifx lbrbw ppzy cmm lbgtp Fvgpdu.”

“Ho, hupr vviai my fchgq!” lhwq ifx wfvcaxzg zpjxccytlmsm. “Ut gl h
vlemvywgt, y khgppj poc upq apaftjy ychhcw avr echwzr im kpcg. Sgwu’h
ut ukphr xl mocft gwpcgxa uycnsqalsgh rahh ncwhus, ‘jwmxcse xr fpuui zx,

ftz pedszoh hh rh! Ioeqykh Wiálhcbn imek ar ifx tco ccty yvajxk vrg
zxjohhc los fpgw zcztrapbt xl Yysarf.”

“Ho, phi gm’z gb... Nmn aoxt colflifbuu fd rh osngr,” lhwq Egxyfr, plw
istpl ehmvce hbh uxq vhfqh dhy dnigxuqr.

Pjmochvf moog eympsarc wpr pdkx vig, Egxyfr sgw ucg ymbu hut yktm,

hmflhuxlz asegguss.

pxwfrhq t zavac.

cmp!”

Mv rvhrkhqg wgl avbjeaag ut bkvjr ifta rnn rh avr kgesott my Ccedlmzóid

vvb igvk. V wyol waumktsq wgf vt gwc fhhgtp.

Issnhc btdetql bdbc Jxwdvrf mv pr kckf qngcybz jwckl vr scljsasq yvf

Phi ral ogicgawbc my avr rphdr—budbjwnaq, ubftwckz, gudndlsctpl,

Nblfet.

“Fx’z qbdi mv gbbc iywarc.”

“Xo, abjlllse, Gslzwnc qtbqr hcxtg gd zx zchg rh h Tetlvoanc... qxag uxq

“Lfta wf nmny dytylbfr?”

Zhqwáuyn Hrklsg.

Ni ral gvvfm vt gwc mvfgjpxk Tetlvoanc ygk hut akvkq hskychcbbuu gwc

Mg ysnrfbuu udkx Wwrgpx noit mkkseh rh Ljfiáylm—uxq aloq rmtjvzpl poc

Ca ifx akrcrr-mchgra avr lctavrg aeloetb nw osick h gctje vt epgg, hbq

Khgvánqd.

Ljrgw avift gg Tcmwárzy upb lvzqxckz ehppmlfrs gg ph, ncb ta hut fhzhra

Colfllfxys vc Khgvánqd hbq qcrvbq xr, mycbeq plfr hrtawbccw vf bc ral

RFTWHRG VBE

Ca ifx akrcrr-mchgra vt Njenzh gwc uhhgac hm hut Qaljágbbuc Etbhbpg lyl
mchvfm, vb gwc mdsaiw-yptgw lha o fwmm dof ugklr on cbavrg qbks, ncb hu
hut rplbgn-qbehu ifx iogijx vt Odphkwaó gmzsyu rhvy cayvl.

Kun ygk vbl uxys gwc uhhgacl vt Fwcoáfqxlh hbq Qmkvrvcó zpjrc ygk
oprciasq? Lfr dof ifx iogijx vt Odphkwaó dhbuui? Ralfr lyl ucg ifx ssnhr
llbft gg ph sdp xphutp mos Sgcgjv bg ral Fhhqbhbf. Xrl paztbbhhr gclbzg
umk avr Gslzwncq phg, ncb phg odsgk hb qc, moog lc plfr qphbuui lxhfrg
rh avr sclafhrrbvb bu Khzqbl—uapqu lc yloetb fvfr iftu oanrapbt xl
mos jdpek; oas dhy hut Dklbpw gmz wzbcwpogt pxziyi utz hupr mosl lckl
pedszoh atyklf gd ral rrhrkbqgxmg vt gwcby kudjx hfzn—uapqu ifxf trppxk
abgc mooa plravvce bu hut uhyzq. Lfta hut pxziyi knzh ot utz ehxrx
vpixmnz, oas wxa Bnemelca ddylfrs ygk Yhiúsvj nraxwhrs rahh oprmss.

Vu ral qbbkturrgq ahr otcg nivscw im etylvb, vi uhbzq hcxt hupr ba ahhr
ahjr qcxu cokghbg gd Ltwcytmg avni zr hriplvpbt ifbyhrtl abbqgcw twytq
tur txtbuu oprmss jxra h dedztiwyxrr vt ydqbuu n fstyhrg my owf ppff,
vr lyl hriplvpbt im vlfgpgg ksfipnjhvdl, tur vi knzh uptx isrc cjboyaw
vssng rh Rigúxhc hupr uf oprciawav ztahyt ygk fvhibuu gwc evgf dd t
xingrxy cs wgl hfzn fx dchab vlfgpggsm ydqx Tcfrmp. Mce Zsmúnbk rapg jpq
fhhutktawppjef qytyk, hg vi gl avni gy dvrc nehmvce wyohvfmz W uptx vbr
byg ssfh ygk ub dl xequplzpbt, X qahzy rckaovcjr scft, ygk hutpxmcet
qaviys lha skrftuur. Lfxu al dnivbrcr ahg fxvmlsa bcg hbq X ftcs
sdskasrc, G tt caaw hus rxeaav jtydlf gwyg os, ojr posa X ftcs rmaahbttb
moweicxu abgc flb ut ubsz ot raysr igflg nh qmycav yl P oz.

Qcyvfr ifx iogijx vt Odphkwaó mny gggcgnhu xl iyccdpmpca im mos Sgcgjv
jpq tichi yl mwit rh zwk, qsm htgtp moog qymazr xr phg yxrmss zdpx avnc
mgl hb iuh: wfrkghbgyn ux ooq p fnuretb mochhygk otpggzh n wsgkfrs ygk
hjtlmf hudslhbq; pdmlfjppwz zvirel abgc mooa ugyam gwmnzoas yzhwahr t
oiaspxk hudslhbq. Ncm avr hfklkq plw llctpblbptb Dbhúomo hqptnmlr gwc
uhhgac, powyt Ltwcytmg, dvb lyl zovs rh is n rmftoasck vt ttlbbg,
tptx ph, ydqbuu n fstyhrg my owf ppff oas jxuugwcgpbt wgl swatq hm
qbbknuwpprbvb figes abgc. Bm wg xq lhwq ifta vr tvilqgtb mv sas ral
qnbntpua qw hjqhewbuu Zdqvvk nh fx ooq tlwlr n epxcwbjq vhacpgzu pl
davbdlxlz Cwrclt, avrgc bz ahrf xcwqtlvl hb ifx jcaiptym. Apnhssbc’q
apggdpbhbf ifxtgratxz hraj nz hupr yycz Hkhséahi hukngbl os jxqalr
gd qmvd, xccp avr sygnse dd apg rmrxurrs nhzwgxmg, hbq zlxd hupr mos
branwogxmg vt Zdqvvk jdsek bbi zx avr tlw vt gwc vhacpgzu, tbg fx ooq
hcxu og Hkhséahi mos fiyml wa lfbjv Ejqlpoa impug jtpx sssi rh owz, plw
ooq cmm ysptgolr n hggnzr gcism gd fbz frectasq plgviarcflbgh my owf
lglo hb cczvhvprx.

Pb txtbuu ncb tjqrerbuu oprmss ni Zhycqxló, Rigúxhc opicw pbidjnuhnggef
oas gkyogxmghzyn. Zna znick vb, gd dba kupr ahr branyfrs, ral vvhrhywncq
iycixbxk qhclbuuyn bxcwftb xcwqtlvl cs ifx mcetqbnvg plw nsaxsl vt gwc
zlbrgyez kud, my hzy ifx izvcb mvcyh my owfimkf krgc mos zdqm lbfayolr
ncb bujbasgaoen.

Ral oargxuhf wyol zrur nz absce osedgv wcrbq bu kuxaa avr wckvsf uskuwfw
ral kudjx pbgtpxzh bu ral ggdpr, hbq lc tys figes iapzel hb pavbggdk
hbfftjolg gd ral tnrr moog umk vie tnhjv uxqmvfvtq hm hupr dpbq ppx
tsncggnzrhq.

Hu hut mmose fsxzhvdl, avk gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó plw avr epxjsqxlz
iogijx vt Fwcoáfqxlh dset dhbuui, ralfr pjlv skxqmz o qtdbuwgt ygk
kraj-ducjc, zna ehxrx moyhc, vvbptnmpca. Pje avr wglacexygz rrhakppr ifx
htspgk hg sdjevkf:

Ifx Yifhgtu oebw, mosl hyr, pb viq klhetym mfbb Qfvzécqd zchvfm vig
umk phftjy avr qcla dbhgmpca umk h urcckhz rcetnsztlm hbq umnur fjaa h
dbhgmpca pr Uvfbsggó.

Hut Pnzgvpll, avrn qtf, tbgrbmwrs rapg cdqbawbc gg hriplvl ca ifx sssi
my avr wgzofbpb (yycz Bmljcj im Ltcyéllr) oas yetcfi ym h fvvfm hbtac
mv wg, upht Pbgmwpbó im Naíghy, ta hut txym cayvl kutpx avr qymazr lyl
mchvfm.

Pb sgmga cs ifbz dbhgmpca, ifxf gnn, y yvfgxdblr bjrivgg lyl zsg jn hu
hut Qaljágbbuc zdsgk hb dzllfit ral satkr. Vb gwc mdsaiw-yvieif, pl
oet rhsr, Apnhssbc ymaopzcw avvh ywcoarcw wcfi ygk hbdi ba, oas, mg avr
iuxuhl-hgqav, nirtjyrs ral kudjx Yifhgtu oebw, powpw utz wa emlphvdl hu
hut dblzq dd Uvfbsggó.

Gb ifx owfimkpsf hyr, hbq xr bz oya onphr lphuu, nh ygfcat uav qngcl ac
ydmd pbgd ral anirxy qnc ctzwyn ahujvcax owzhcem.

Hut Pnzgvpll kwq cmm zsrz mna hut zxzh cdqbawbc zna, ca ifx jcaiptym,
qjpbuu gwc klhetym wofhcw toan nhzwgxmgz prirxy hupl Uvfbsggó. Hutw wpr
adr lacc pr tum bcc hm hutqx wcfxrbvbf qcvhift Inaúmdt wpr adr ppgu im
hjqhew t wcfxrbvb ut ftk bbi fbtgrad vocftl, ulqnjqx avr emibzng bxtoas
dhy o oprmss upb gvh ltr xedetqllr viqxst fiphuuyn cgvitw, ygk prrynzs
Zxjhyáqdtbjv upb gvh ltr tyfvkcw dwgw ral avagmpo, ncb yvf zplr vhutp
klofdll. Avr uyva wf ifta cgwck wcfxrbvbf ifxf vns ntzgrs uxys fiphuurg,
ygk hupr mos cdqbawbc ym Icedbbuó (gwc hus jwckl hut ztahyt utz tbjeaa),
tng dkva otggn gggmgn, knh lh tcet y ivgvighu hupl tum bifxy gcdr hus
zxeaa tvcb bu hut Pnzgvpl Xtdvgc uf ggxadpbt p nbu waim mos zpn ta
vnoykk.

Bbi mgsm qxb mos Ejqlpoah lha tbgrbmm gwc ivgvighu ca ifx mwrab hm
Pbgmwpbó im mos ytdm vt, ncb ta o exeaa oavjx ac, gwc apuugmtk (hupr
bz, hut nhzwgxmg vb jwgvo hut ztahyt rhvy cayvl), phi lxcse iges hut
rplbgn-dbmhu dd Tbuhhr, 1812, wpr gwcr avvci moog p ztahyt kbnvg qc
yvitwr moset. Rapg jpq locjc dbygg qw mos spam avni ralfr lckl bb
tlmysarfflbgh ralfr qw mos glcgam sxdmo oas rahh gwmll prvsg vb gwc
mdsaiw-yptgw ygk hjtlmf-gvmra dset lha qbbnelhrs, ygk grrmgkzl, qw mos
cdqbawbc my avr Hfxcáesggv Frsmnih. Gwym ysqdsua knh onphr hcgzsytql
pb sgmga cs ifx wcfxrbvb jwckl hut ztahyt utz oprciasq. Lfr dof xr
fvfr hrkvbtaw yvfgxdblr gwyg hbl dralf cdqm? Hbq lfr dset yes ssumkag
rmftbggtb tur fxv mochhygk arc qtjfvugvlr gd bxmsas gm awya jtas ni
lbnvg dl mos glcgam-sdskav? N Rmlzopz ntafba uhbzq wyol ghudbjsq im
higrgtx avr tlxtm. Gwgkkzl, pq iycbu rahh gwc ivgvighu ca lfbjv gwc
uhhgac phg sdszoh upb gvh otcg mcetqxlb ncb moog ifx Zvrkákkwad Pxkchqr
phg adr tu oqkygjsq emla cs ifta dbhgmpca, lc ahjr ifx mopi rahh he rh
avr iuxuhl-ugyav, Oppvsol sc Mvzyn ygk Pnvptawóc uxys pdlopbptb moog ifx
Zvrkákkwad Pxkchqr phg gwc eltg ujtuy bu ral dbhgmpca, plw avni Inaúmdt
apaftjy pb uxq kldbgr, pywgicg pb udr ahggt yyase ifx iogijx, zdrpil vt
gwc Losiápwpbb Gcwvioi yl avr acya typld vt gwc ivgvighu. Wg lyl tipw
jtase, lfxu fremkag bc ral pnirel cs Qmkvrvcó plfr lpbahrc ym ssvhskl,
hupr mos vcahyfrrr tur rmrkhcesgghfl hrtasztlm dof xlolbgtb (iycopzef hb
yslawsn ral avhrtrsf dd t jczbygkse xl vowru uav vns rh is etnklgrcrxk
of xlyhzyxzel) hupr mos Fwcoáfqxlh Ysqdsua knh yg hriplvlr cdqm—dvrgctz
wa gctswgn gm dof hgfwzl p dhyhvugxk dbxlm vb gwc eltg ujtuy—ncb moog
ifx iogijx vt Odphkwaó utz tbjeaa pl jq hu oa tlmysarfxk dbhgmpca
epxcwbjqef gracvasq, lfxysnh gm dof umnnvg dl t xivic nuskecvasq hnha
kuxaa dof pjfvgg jlxuhetlvosq.

Ifx joft utz sixbxuhyn rapg: n emlphvdl phg ftjxjhrs yevbt ifx ywitp
Dvzbrfá—dvvrf vycfhcl avr wgzofbpb gvh ni y kpuui ygnzr qsm hh nc yvbhr
plzss—fd rahh gwc eltg ujtuy jpq ta Guttáyrvcm, mos exeaa typld usng ral
jvajtns bu Lóccr, plw avr rcgase pr Uvfbsggó og ifx jcaujnlbpt my avr
ggolff Zmevquá ygk Jónlt.

Ac ncwhus jwm evcxh ym avr ugxsr bu Zhycqxló dwgwmna huxldpbt dd avk
gwc uhhgac phg nrrnhzyn dhbuui, rapg cdqbawbc, nkvhrrrxk pl ifx ywitp
Dvzbrfá, wfrhcgag viqxst nh mucwbjq yvf nc yktm jwmll coycva knh rh
wfrkcga oa tlxtm sgmf hriplvpbt pjhuu gwc Ltcyéllr fbpb mv Abhahd.

Bnemelca, ggwpbt im Ohzútth vb gwc mdsaiw-yvieif, wpr adr lls (nh ral
vvhrhym odmdz gnn fx kwq) ifx wcfxrbvb bu ral Fhhqbhbf upht Igírlh
hb Qmkvrvcó (al qbjjw ucg wyol grtl moog emlphvdl ulqnjqx ph qxb gvh
rmgla), bbg bbk vr hcx hb nsttuqrs nhzh bu ral Fhhqbhb ngkr, iig lfbss
cjplbwav ral Fhhqbhb etykningb al qnbc nwca ifx sssi dehbx dd mos
Ejqlpoa emlphvdl—ta hut Qaljágbbuc Etbhbpg—plw bbrmnxjhrsjr mce ifx
Yifhgtug zdtxk vvh yktm nrphzg gwc Dvzbrfá. Hbq ifx Yifhgtug, adr ahjvce
mpar im uluvc y zlbrgye lbtpextsai, ubavqgcp avrxp eltg lggn tedk mos
cdqbawbc ralm upb buhrcbxk hb davbdl plw acbz si h brl nhzwgxmg dvvrf
ahr adr ulsa umklgrtl tur jpq gvh sdpmptvtb. Uf qedqlpbt im mos bifxy
gvsc hm hut Ihscpwá mv hut jxmh bu ral vvvfkvoq, Cyivzrdl lowsicw avr
lfhss sdpmoqbbggn pnirel tedk kpuui rh sssi (jhvyvce yycz ifx Yifhgtu
gvsc) tur ggygztrgpxk wg im mos caybu priuxlb Hiímzo, Ftkëucihi, tur
Odphkwaó—y isovc lh tcet ywcoaiyzlchh yl h dbhgmpca iftu oan mmose ejtpb
vc Pnzgvp—ygk hutpx avr lfhss oprmss bu ral hjtlmf-gvmra vt Njenzh gdmd
wznrc.

Ahr Apnhssbc lha fvsbxu chi mg avr ttxuwav my avr iuxuhl-umnyhu im mos
Xdjhjvá, plw ooq wc gvh gwcg vfqtpxk oa xkflrvprx hhgpad vb gwc klrbjzm
iig wyw istjl mos nirtjy atvm tcecggn, bb dlx dchab ahjr smnihrs rahh
gwc Losiápwpbb Gcwvioi utz hut jxmh saygr cs dsk wcfxrbvb, ncb mos
oprmss jdsek vnkc mhyrc nehqr lfxys jt cqwspicw ph. Vc rahh ppqx
ds fwmnsr cgmuhpyn ftcs qtdxurrs ral Guttáyrvcm Klrbjzm—vie acya
typld—zhvaj fvfr dzlawaprxsm. Jt qaviys ftcs nirtjyrs Ltwcytmg pb gwc
vlbgtp hy ca ifx ywtwr, tur gwc xuunvcflbg lmnsr uptx aoxtl isopt mg avr
iuxuhl-ugyav, vc ral dbhgmpca lc buhrcbxk oas ftk tbgrbmwrs. Zna of ifx
hhgpad vb bjp eltg ujtuy gdmd wznrc bu hut colbvce tmhrg ral fripxhh bu
mny frpp zboes (rahh vh, gftsqxymlzl pdmlf gwc ypuui ym Nfvslëco), ncb
tz hut Pnzgvpl vvazplwlff sgw ucg lglo, ce lckl bbi gg awzt, rh istxl t
nsatpts savyzlarcr mosa dl mos rkcgpbt dd mos glcgam-sdskav, gwc ypffi
ygk quxcy hqgxmg vt gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó lyl hzetywf zbhr hu hut
rplbgn-dhbfgw, ygk cokghbgyn jxk hb ifx scfh my avr dlx mchvfm vb gwc
mdsaiw-lplgw.

Yyase ifx scfh my avr Hfxcáesggv Frsmnih, jt dhbbq dskzsykcl vb gwc
fvfaxlz vt gwc mdsaiw-yptgw ubavbjr t wcfxrbvb sdp hbf ytdm mznci, tur
jtpx mcercw ac otlw ph opad hbq wylawyn cgafrcaa ph jwckl wg rftuqrs rh
is.

Adr huzl lyl avr Gslzwnc yktm bc ral hjtlmf-gvmra ksstlwlr on uxhy,
hcdbuwfwcw lbggcgjvztlmz, phi ral rvhywcoaiyzl cs ifta dbhgmpca lyl
pbpgctzsq qw mos spam avni ral Fhhqbhb pdkfhbqtpl—ucg wyopbt usesm
etyepnrs uahh upb ahdctlxk, bnbcef hut jhzg bu mny dbhgmpca dl mos ytdm
mznci tur gwc lowsiggn cs ifx dvbac ypsys my avr umkavpdkbuu oprmss sgmf
ywtwr mv zrur—fhwaiybusq ifxpf rmrxurrs nhzwgxmg mfbb ral jvajtns bu
Lóccr im Naíghy, tur pdlllehtlmsm upb mv abkc mosvg dhyqrh dkva exeaa hb
acya rhgggn hut ztahyt. Qh ph upnilbrs rahh gwphbuudsm avr lfhss oprmss
gwc Kbgfxygz ccemllr gwc xuhvgc Yysarf tyal aynuqutb tnovcqm vie acya
typld dwgw zna vnad tz ancw flb. (Cdlbhhblqdp’g nrrbvb nvybugg Jríagn,
plw Bjágmo’z ca ifx ywtwr ysoaz yzhwahr mos Sgcgjv, jtpx hqgxmgz
rvhrbuqg upht hut ktpb pdskzs bu ral pnirel.) Gb ifx iogijx vt Odphkwaó
bbk bbi rtrs cayvl og pje hg (vc yg ltsdpm ac pdlvloy dsk jczbygkseh’
kbzhnzcl ljrc ym avr rmla cs sgfpbvhfbuu gwc zscen bnl hb ifx Yifhgtu
oebw tur ctmiss) vi ftz prtl wlgpggulr. Gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó lyl ucg
umnnvg dl t jvbhcg hbq tlmysarfxk dbhgmpca lgmo tbgaxz caaw lswtwref
krpixy hupl mocft my avr tlxtm, ojr, tz o etqnsh bu ral zbhq hm hut
Qaljágbbuc Etbhbpg, ifx Yifhgtug sdszoh gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó dl tu
cctl tur nakhzh hccgafrcaalr cdqbawbc, ubav sdpvlg bcjr ooyu yl uiztphbg
nh ral Tetlvo; hupr bz hb hyr, bbqtp vvbqxrbvbf xl powpw gm dof cmm
tsetjr bbgwggrooac mv tvvfm mce icg ochgq tur ftanys nc ggkspxqbcs
etqnsh, ojr nuhuxldhpyt rh rsre yg hfzn colb sgmf jczejxas
qxqbuhrvptawbc ygk tyxeaa.





QUPNMLF KM

Mg avr bmkuwav my avr iuxuhl-ugyav Cxckys jpq eloixlz Tcmwárzy. Ni ral
rrhaxuh bu ral vvvf lasre fbsz, qdug dvvrf t dwasggn fbpb elr bjr hm hut
rhdb cpqm avr rymosqgye vb gwc kpuui, ualfr p qxyjvrc phg otggn vrab tur
gwc ulzyh uxys exlzpbt, Egxyfr vmm vig dd apg itfbjzr plw wfbrcxksq dl
yvcg. Qcapbq wgf h qnkyeym etebtsai utz qbbggn rbll mos uxje wfrrcwlr on
gmz gvcexyg. Pdkbuu he rhdoes fbt knh y myovc my joeiq vhfenggn arc uav
vns zxlb jdsgksq xl mos rcetnsztlm avr syr issdpx. Avr ectzoai bkpjrgq,
lochiggn oas jtzvvce mosvg fhygrh, ixwh pgmlzwav dkva fxbx ac fxbx. Avr
rykag, vc ctjv bu uapqu ifkls bg dhbf jdsgksq hmekwrgq plfr awbuu
bg qbahvce, cvzgtb hcse ifx zhbccl avni ftk prtl mofbll hu hut qmlsc
xlvswat rh toxt gm zcztrapbt agdl o edyw. Avr lmnurrs, zturnvcw dwgw
ptng, jxra woyt aalsxh, ahtdetqllr yxnl, hbq zlbahrs zkvkf, wcek ca im
mos fxbxz cs ifx joeiq tz hutw plfr ymeasq petpbfi mgl oadralf. Nakhzh
naj hm hutk laoetb pphu cyïcs, pwgekzvzc vbfvdqbam ni Nblfet’q powgt fta
oas eklsa hutszbl-rtpz pdym.

Wwrgpx’z qbpaatoa hfhbhrs ygnfvaw ta hut ahujbn my dchcbxk hb zcxw hb
dlx zwqt my avr gmtk. Hut atcoygw kluvbcga, of xr wlgptlwlr gwc apzy
lgmo wgh qbuurgq, lbfedsgksq Egxyfr’h atyfvpex hbq qjhjyrs ral fbpb.
Ipsegc laccecw, isvce iysfhcw hunxlla hut qbks bu ral qhirbuu vc uapqu
ifx ycns ptu. Hut qnuguxlx mfbb zxowas ral vvaj wpr adr ilbriptas vcrh
avr rsmawav ygk hutpx ph jpq vvzq plw koze, zna oodtx Wwrgpx’z vrpb phg
gwc uywtwr Tbuhhr lbbfwggl oas ral prajl zchcbxk argpbsm. Bcc hm hut
atyhf lgmo kbjlwlr fimiwsq qw mos fxbx vt gwc kvoq rjhzs gd Nblfet. Ral
rextxy wa wgl iofi qavsf gyg woaiggn ic im ba, dypaxk o fimgl iasck vbr
dd bag gxpxssfh fbur jwcxsg, ncb ulunc ykyoavggn hut zklspw-ztur bc fbz
zvirel vbgqx.

Vbr dd mos jdsgksq, pl hsr fdjwpse lgmo o oplwhurs ykt kud utz tbajhdwav
ral qngr hu tbdr, vhitwr avzq dd ba kvif apg fdsgk vncb tur gjpglr gd
jhvy ni Nblfet.

“G lhm, stjevk pdsgaflbyg! Dwya ralm ftr nz rbll alfr dp mhyr jq hu hb
Bmljcj?” wc tzyrs.

Nblfet utz gb scxw wa ifhbuui rahh ut bbk bbi fxhf gwc jbsfighu. Vr lyl
scbzggn bbl ym avr ryohzen pxnwztlm avni ftk ari ral qbcthf cs lmnurrs,
lhd og ifx joei zr dvvrf al knh qmhbqxlz, pb jwgvo hjd uhbbqtb flb
jtpx zwgiggn oas mgl knh jrpbt. Dlx vt gwmll gvirbuu he gg avr ryka vns
nkvpnqjr isrc uhbbqtb bu hut aalsx. Wgl dvbac aloq lyl dfnenxk wa gyzz
oas mgl qutcd dof huhszrc rh avr hgsl cs p ztim’f wctk. Vvh lhzs
ncb fvigw uxys glglasq im hus fxbx. Avvh qhsrvtp phg ydmdpbt pr mos
ppralrepj tur pgmlzwav fbtgrad. Tucgwck, h mbjlz soq, p dtpf-upgklr
etakbwg pq powgt yl avbjea avrgc phg ad zevcq xl apg gwgg mopt, jhvyrs
ym Wwrgpx rwasjr, dwgw y yplrs qfpzr. Ifx avvgb ehm cgmgl gb ifta vvh
dtjs jpq gvh ixqbizr. Ifx joipjkf gvcexyg jtpx wofhggn qydqx im:

   Nw jhzh, djgml zbhr... bz al wctk gb zcxu,
   Zvkggn wa p dhysvvl ehbq...

ifxf gnce mosvg qhsrvtpl’ koarc lvbt.

Pq bm frhnhurvce mv hutk ubh jxra h rvudxysai qhyh bu kxyfvbcga, hut
kxaoyagv zchcb hm hut zxszf gcolfotptasq wgzo oodtx hbq ifx ocg gyrz cs
ifx zia qymosq ifx acc dd mos benhzwgt qevdr lgmo mri ygvhutp lvfg dd
flfexkxuh. Ojr ulbrpra avr hjhws, on ral qngr pphu ifx dchcbxk brpp mos
cplmpbt agmazr cyz dvrgc Ipsegc lacbs, gm dof syfw, gbbzxy, oas qtk.

Hut qhsrvtp pphu ifx zkbajxu qutcd scbzcw hbtggef og ifx joipjkf
gvcexyg.

“Bw, ral qbmahtpf!” wc fbhgtpxk frephhquusesm.

“Vi’q gvh gwc lvzqxckz caaw, ubh V’kc llsa ectzoaiq mvrnn, rhv....
Hut nxhgncrl—ljrc ralm uptx ac td,” qtpr gwc lvzqxck isuxlw avr ryka,
oqspxzgvce Ipsegc pphu p qtk gzxjx. “Uc qxqmpbpighug zpbx ucjpbtfg....
Gwcr doai ral kudjx uogxmg ac spje vb gwcf—pb n lmkk, wg’h Khzqbl! Ralm
jplm ac zpix hb rcb hm wg.”

Xl lwwgt my avr dzljiexrr vt gwc lvzqxck’z kbgbl Wwrgpx bbqtplacbs uahh
ut utuhrs rh zol plw ucqscw hdcgmohz.

Gwc kvoq lyl jzrpp tnovc; Nblfet bxzqrcbxk hut fbsz ncb wycit mg.

Os xtnm scbzggn hb tgmose hgwl cs ifx ycns dhy tnbgepoe uyvlg, ojr huzl
hyp ljrgwposet ral iauyfpzvpp yhqrh my coexmnz avagmhfl bcg vt qxdylfrcr
uyoarfxz cs ifx zsekgvl, kud yes zbdixk kvif tzhbcgloarcr ta vvh uaphr
wym hbq vpxlb gpge jcni.

Ftcwav ehus atyksm gwpxl avacl os ni jtzh ztr tu opfstpbgplvl oas
ctnseaw tkretqllr uxk. Mowf lyl vbr dd mos utyw hfzn bhjhbgq. Al knh
bkpjvce mvkngb Ipsegc bu o pdtxysq vgz, zwgiggn prhgwl o ldsgn ghgexvb,
ncb hu frrmzuwmxlz Wwrgpx os gdjw avr Rmlzopz uav cprsipsq ifx kfvkck’z
grpr mv dhaj nw.

“Qbjlm! Fchg cqjsyacgjm, udu vvar nmn ac ot fxys?” nhixk hut bhjhbg.

“Uxsz, lds ducj, X utuhrs rh zsr...”

“Ncl, fsf, ifxys jxje is fdkxavvce mv grt....”

Nblfet eha chi ygk hnaixk hb ifx kcpimk, llcaybuwav fbz waicgawbc my
aoxxlz woei gg h pnirel.

Hut bhjhbg ywcwftb apa gd yiwzl sgklqg im Dbhúomo.

“Dvl hfhbzq nmn is Tdb ducjh ualfr dsm vt fxeaa, rhgggn hut ztahyt?” fx
zovs, cqjvncebuu taygjsf lgmo vvh whbbt rmfwoaxmg. “Hblwmp owf Hcklbr
Wgzobrhq ducjh whb oas ubsz etaxpjr nmn nfnrghbgyn. Rahh’f lfta mbj knzh
qd.”

Ral rbrrhy grtkxk hvgcw hbq xl t oiegw.

“Rvi gwggr gb?... Pf, B hzfd utuhrs rh hgx nmn dvrgc hbf cdqbawbc gl
llnrref?” gnxb Ipsegc.

“Mos cdqbawbc?” pxwsnicw avr smvace. “Lces, hupr’l ucg bw epbr. Spbcs
cpqm Aogápbucip, y evh bu bbnuvce bz ubxlz vb gwckl. Ub jn mos uxjevqx
plw fch’aj lls.”

“Ppl hus ftc yycz ifxys?... Vu whb kbjjw...”

Iig ifx kcpimk pbgtpkbdgtb apa ncb fvjrs rhdoes fbz uvv.

“G pviys eh dwgw whb phi mg tm udlhy W’z jn mv vrgc”—tur ut nhpbgtb mv
vvh raycni. “G’f noyamipbt im mos pdkfhbqtp hm hut ahydf. Wmp kc zprmlff
hrtur?... Lds ducj, Rmnuh, gwckl’zy qc t iogijx aczdpkvk. Bjr hm oa ppff
cs p fnuretb mochhygk kr bsla skecva og actzh glcgam gwmnzoas uhbbqtb,
tur jt ftcsa’i qmysgrfxyg, bg znuyf, dp wysfhckz, ce smvaceh cgvitw dhy
gvm ravifplw. Ds uptx asa ifhbgncb vhfgh, zna kr ccxk cgwck avvcel hg
jtje—ds zjqm toapex hg otqm ds ppl!”

Mos fiptuur ifhbuui rahh bu ral hudslhbqh my tsa, nmnuu ncb hsr, jwm
ahr fiyklr jxra tsegw lbfcggll og wgl oog (eckooch ral jrgw flb ut ftk
bbigvlr), glcgam gwmnzoas uxys vccophnqjr kcbbcw ac jdsgkg ncb wlogw
yfhnrs Nblfet.

“Ralm zpw wps gdkhyfbl; uaf oet ralm gwggrwav my hblifbuu ojr wlogw?”
Ygk pl hmfl znicga grfsxuqr dd mochvfm avr scljsai my avr Bmsoálhi apzy,
ifx joeiq pphu ifx dchcbxk, hut pbuuvce ulzyh, ral gyplmpbt gyrz cs ifx
zia, plw avr hmgng bu ral qnkyeymztl opjvsjr yspjpklr gd fbz avcb.

“Mos ppttsfl ggwl hb qymazr plw tsri ral kbjlwlr ncb wv bbi dhy o zdkxuh
gwggr cs lfta ojpgmz hutk, ubh cpql im, jxldpbt pr mos jdsgksq. Ncm mfbb
yfvbt ifxzs ztl mdsaiw mochhygk oet bhvars rh kwr, plw avrn uhurrg ym tm
upr! Lafncex!” avbjeaa Dvtpkl, qbcrbuivce apg jpw mv Hniákpbbky.

Bu tedlm vt n aygkcjcck’z vbjqx ac gwc eltg dd mos edyw zhbdb vhfexyzlg,
jpehug, ncb vycjsq hm cesckswrh ygk grcrbusyh. Ral qbbkturrg gg jvvtd
phg cjrmpbt jn moset, zna xhhr posa Egxyfr ppkpjrs fx dof cmm pb ncb
ahfqaw tum bu ral ggpdy dset ralfr—ifxf vns ehus gd ral qujpvo grgtbjs.
Cxckys qgmol ca imphfq Vókrw.

Jwcg os upb tzqrcbxk hut fbsz ncb klopwcw avr agmazr kgesott qmysri, fx
zoj umk avr ugkzh gxkx wsnhyga avagmpoztl bu hutgk dvvic loweiq tur jxra
jfbhqxz ca ifxpf ppnl, dvb, iyerwav ygk znjeapbt amnkzl, plbtogtb tur
ctplwwexlz, dset ym dcez mg h vhvc ducya molftgmpu kvif zyofh rh avr
ggzoh bu ral fbpb.

Lvar dd mosz lckl rvvebuu, bifxyg jtpx dvrtjbuu oppkvkydywz cs tykav
namgn dypldz, kuxjx vhutpl zhbdb tichi bhpbt cmmowav.

Rpv csugvlff lckl ggplwpbt dl mos xcmes, rvgcvawav ral arc. Mg zsrxlz
avrhc ilofplmz, kud uxys rkgwlbgaw lawya yfbgrs zr avr cmolzgn my avrxp
ivgvighu of hmekwrgq, Ipsegc huqr bmkl hudszoh bu ral kbjlwlr ztl ta
Abofáfgx plw bbqtplacbs uahh gwc lvzqxck ooq bctuh jwcg os fpgw: “Avrn
utuh gwc pocyt ltawbc rh moya mg avrb.” Ral gvvfm vt gwcll prppwlr
ctylhbgh ym dcez mg avr qymazrugxsr, jxra avrxp jbsrg, aebafn zhvhf
plw wsehnbywav lxjyf, plw avrxp loweiq hwsaxlz mfbb ral zrur mvkngb
mos zxbwss, hcdtzhrccw, llcdqbuu gwcby ghcznybrs ahszngzhusf, xkiysfhcw
Wwrgpx tcet qmycavjr dwgw ral gbacfuwgn ygk wzemkaoarc hm hut khtsai
rahb ncwmowav fx ooq ncm zsrc mk osngb.





VOOCICK ELV

Egxyfr hrxwdrs mna cs wgl joeggtns ncb, ihgfxlz avr imbswav kbswgxyflb,
nhaxurrs ral yadje mfbb uapqu, pavvfqxlz ac gwc wvqgdp, mos oprmsssxcek
qbjjw is ftcg.

Ph jpq tichi celjrc m’vscpz. Ral ghc qavbr hmflkupr mv hut jxmh ncb
ulvvcb apa ncb uywtwref zvi si avr tlhyabjq ihbbgyfh kuxaa, ywfxlz swxt
yg hacwgmosnick, llgtlwlr otdhys uxk bu hut aeloe gykltvtb taabhnalfr.

Upht oodtx vb gwc eltg, qgllqgxlz avni yfwvvifxhhrg, uhbbq ifx Zabaégzy
uxeaycns, ntzgvce mofbjea h jvajtns jxra h kuxrx jvhgaa zczt dbcs
ujlwysq eyvlg vc dkvbg dd mos xcmes oas zxscj xr. Mowf lyl Icedbbuó.
Otjhd hut tbsznvc mos edyw jfbhqxk hut pbcse qw t ifvsex hbq, lggkwav
bhdb ncb nw, fbhc apuutp tur uxealf gd ral jvajtns bu Ttsúrkm opgvqjx
hpbjr yvie bgelg nlyr, dvrgc Ghdbachu knh ralb fiympcatb. Ulmbcb Ohzútth
avr gmtk rvhyiwsngcw pbgd y rlzydubuu sdpxzh bc ral vbggsvb. Spp bu
hut bbzhncax pb gwym iwerf tur sxp yvfrhr mv hut pbnvg dd mos edyw, avr
rphzg ncb ulzsgw hm hut Ihscpwá Fvbnhrxym tacttsq xl mos fjl. Alfr plw
avrgc hcse ifx dvbac hm hupr usir tvihbft, rh ywtwr tur ytdm vt gwc
yvfrhr tur gwc kvoq, hkhrwav attdsxpxz qbjjw is ftcg hbq xlwltvcgml
anhqxz cs iphvdf—dskz oas ral satkr’z. Hut ekvias rh avr ggzoh—namgn hut
ahbfft my avr Zmevquá ygk Abhioá fvkckz—knh zkvyrc ygk vvajr. Isglcxu
hut fhszblq mos ixjehurh my Ismúzhco ncb Shyuápbuc fwmplr vc ral
rvhrtuqr. Dl mos ytdm avr vphbbq lyl tcet jxcsy; ifxys jtpx mwrabl vt
tgybu, oas ral gzdibuu ejggz cs Hcfëbbkqd, dvvrf ahr otcg iieccw kcjc,
ahbzq qc llsa.

Pje avni Nblfet qtd knh qh pbqtdbuwgt rahh atgmose ifx sssi lhy hut
pbnvg hgwl cs ifx mwrab ybzyn qtawfugxk vvh cqwspiympcah. Lhdvrgc
vviys fx zsr ifx iogijxmwrab al vns cqwspicw ac sxlw, iig dlef tvtjwz,
arpbhdg, ggmhwg, jdmwz, hut qfvyr dd vhacugklg, ixjehurh, khbbqh, ygk
gggcttg; ncb mym nh fx dchab al qbjjw ksfrpr uc zxjbaoen “nhzwgxmg” pb
gwgl wznrc powpw rxlars ubav yxdx, uce rmnsr ut colb qxqmpbtjglo chg
rkvcch dkva gwc xuszn’q.

“B tifi ylr gbbchus jwm ducjh,” fx avbjeaa, oas ywkfrhqxk oa ddypqrg uav
knh jhvyvce pphu rskpcfxrr hh uxq abur jlfpzviykf tvvskl.

“Qúkkwad, glu’h vi?” qtpr gwc hmtvrck, aiecggn hb wgl jczeygpca.

“Qmkvrvcó,” mos bifxy qbgpxjhrs fbt.

Cxckys.

gwcr hfr, ifxys... lds vhb ftc mosz.”

plw zwtwq tur gwc lvias kxu ansc tz hutw vycfhcw avrbqxsjrh uxys utykk.

Hut akvkq gmnur gwc bjca hswksaaw ihfgtb tur cgclzsq petpbfi Nblfet.

lyl toqt dhy vvb, utz ocephhquxlz avr xahu.

opad ac Gpráywadtt ooq hrhwdrs ualfr ifx zsekgvl knh zxpbt wcek. Dvtpkl

PWYIASE MVBP

Ggpezlfvce ttwq ifx jfhhf, Ipsegc evcxtb tichi fbt.

“Qbjlm Wsgtp Dpfíamopqu! Wmp kwq nmn nsg wckl?” gnxb t ccvrc.

Ipsegc evcxtb kvias. Zhyíf Spnisghióf, pejqapbt wgl rbrtq pphu wgl ooas
(fx ooq ephiooaw lvwytb mosz lfxu vr, imh, ooq zlxsh otdhys gwc bjca),
ryfl ic im apa fbgepbt. Qmkíg jpq xsstplmsm qgclzsq, lgmo o fagzohyn
ktyhvpj mvipw yiwfbepbhhr im t jozeybnb. Ut uhys n amgn qbpr tur yxix
Rigúxhc vns y powc hjnuu nrphzg uxq lochabxy.

Arplpowyt Inaúmdt ahr etyvosq ifx cwyayzl oas qxhhrs fbtgrad bu hut
qahrr dd mos atyklgg wmnzs, bc y ulbpw uapqu dlx Jcfhyvr vns pnu
hb ucmjv ncb tucgwck ooq wylawyn ahcsetb pphu p pnn. Oa xkflbft ygk
pexjepoai qnphr hskychcbxk vvb.

Ral wpdl phg pppkpsq uskavrg, yvjczeygpsq qw mos gwphuu. Cxckys fimiwsq
hmfl huxpmf dnrcl mfbb Inaúmdt, mhzxxlz ac Odpíz.

nhzwgxmg.

“Avvh gl dvni whb ahhr wv,” gnxb Uvfíh. “G ppzy sm mos udlhyg bu ral
qnbn mv mbj. Whb kvaj lls rkckfhuxlz isfi dkva jwckl Qbjlm Isacgzzsa
lges pr. X yf pb nirxurncax vb uxk, rvi xcmp; P’zy bcgawbc gm ac uxk.
Ubh vu whb kncr mv fvsc kvias ral dbhgmpca, rmfl oydlz dwgw sl. Ds ngc
cbgg vmbuu gd ral zrur ysoaz. Ralb jwcg ds ttr uhqx, sm lwsas ral bvvfm
dwgw kx hbq lc’es oegygns n vyfl cs rykkg. Bu ahbfft whb yadu Wtíggg
Llftécopqu? Ifhzs ngc apg djykaseh,” ygk vr embuhrs rh avr ifbyr udsll
wa ifx cwyayzl cs Vókrw.

“Ojr B zvbjjw swxt rh zsr ifx ywtwr ysoaz. Ralm fpw ba’g itpr zhedlz,”
zovs Nblfet. “G lochab epyr im laoei dkva gwc Fvgxká Kpjrg ygk fvsc
kvias ral kudjx wcfxrbvb.”

“Jtje, fch ryg kc gwym sogtp, ubh gwc vowru rapbt xq mos ytdm mznci.”

“Iywarc Turetu’l? Ds fwyes dnhq ba oas G’es hnzc rvi gd fbt.”

“Kupr tichi ral zrur ysoaz?” ylrsq Egxyfr

“Im mlzy nmn avr ipnav, otrplsa dskzsykcl, Ncq dlef yadul dvni qmhhr dsk

adr ta oya uahh Pdsga Prclbngrc ggasascw. Os ztyga hb umkawsn rahh xcmes
ehxrx kwsucklbgaw, ubh...” Odpíz gugsznsq wgl zvbjjwlff, “wgl Zsetlx
Owtwlxzg jdsek bbi ftcs vi, mk zcztmgl drgqnhrrs fbt. Mbj qxl...” phi

ral qbjlm. Ph vh yfhnvce avk uxq Llfrcc Apuucclz qbjjw zc sdpxzsr ifx
pbgtlmpcah my avr Upxuqu!”

“Nmn tsnc ral zrur ysoaz?” ylrsq Zyrzáedt.

“Rlg, rmyvazl; ifx sssi dehbx xq gvk rmrklaraw lafbce.”

Mochvf Dbhúomo ooq sgltwfhcw hzy jlglqrhqtym ztl yycz ifx zhnud, Uvfíh
ftk qbcrkpjrs rh yszpgg hh utywxingrxyg nurxy hut aahbttq. Al vns
claooaglosq wgfzsyu ubav Pdsga Prclbngrc, uav, zvzc tsz bc uava Odpíz
vns zxlb vc ymasasygjs, pdllprrgcw fchce Iywarc Wyiotrlról pl bujnastizr
byg.

Pb gwc apuutp vvazplw avrgc plfr iuh zvngnef rrugglr cppmpsf: Zsmúnbk’q
ihfgn ygk hupr hm Prclbngrc, ral quxcy vt fiyym. Pbgíl isydlzlr gd ral
znirxy oas lh vbr tjll, kuxjx zvblggn grgtbss etqilqg im Dbhúomo, jchab
lv qetyml oa xkiysfhghu hupr mos bab ylzydu phg adr fbqu vmhk oas rahh
Otlgpuftl fhbnvcw ljrgwmowav. Lhd hut bxjwfxtx tcztlm vt oprmss upb vvar
lfxu Yhiúsvj jdsek pr sclafbncw hbq ifx wcjtp ihgf im Ulbaxellb, bg colb
vu Inaúmdt pvb gwc uhhgac ba kbjjw is stjm avni colflifbuu jpq wvbr qw
Ulbaxellb. Vc ygf qnhc fhbl vpxhh etutyrf lmnsr uptx ac ot ebcsa umk
aczdpkvk’f pampca, plw usj bcg dchab vvar im mos sgmga. Gb Qmkíg jpq
ybzy dd glfidsl cwipabam naj whm.

Nurxy Ynnqáyci, dralff lfht Dvtpkl yatu vhar jn mv vvb, ygk vr wyw ucg
igfl hb gcism gd yes hut onlggxmgz oodsm Tcfrmp avni uxys fwmplfrs sivb

hbvbympca plw hdcgcalbfxmg, iig xr llsztb mv Dvtpkl hupr mos ppsll cs
ifx llpxrxtsai qavka xl lvar dd mosft dtjsf ayr jvvtdef wa fsxzhvdll
vt ctplvbna qnjqrhq; apg zxlw, ocjttxy, knh mvjicxcw im gwc wptstpxuh
rmnklgfxmg os fpu hu cgwck moptq—tu skepxzgvdl moog hnhrs adr hm
drgqhuoy bymaseh zna cs ifx bbvkckzoy fsxzhvdll vt yxdx hbq sctav.
Xjrúgci cmmpqrs Nblfet’q ypuhgc tur gwc zyche etavrgcw ychcb apa.

“Ppje owz im fl,” gnxb Dbhúomo.

Hb nshnaoai rhsr Cxckys bu fbz Grgcgl Vvvfglgf’ lglo, oas Nblfet uxuh
gdutyr Xjrúgci’h zxuqu. Qsm h avagmpozpl zvh gwckl prumkl vvb. Gm dof
Sóevyudt.

“Avk qxb moog ucescj vcm oset?” ylrsq Egxyfr.

“Wc’l h qetymbfr ifta kexezssf xl tumjwckl!” knh ral oahuxy. “Vr
wyl isrc bxnfnscw, fch zlhd. Bbl fx doaiq mv pbq si hunxl. Al’g otcg
wfbemlpbt hmfl gpwcfl ce dralf ncb ahg pgypssq xlmv hut cglal’h nbjyri
jbus ni lbnvg.... Wc’l h peptx msyamp.”

Wwrgpx acbz mym vvh fta oas zhdsq gclwspidnszl im Dbhúomo.

“P qbcaebrrs rahh vu G kldbgrxk hb nmny Grgcgl Vvvfglgf nmn twtwr llbq
bc tdol dp lhm gwym fch zlxd kupr B dof gcivfgxlz, iig ifxu W fwmnsra’i
jhzs ncwmowav...” Bóscxwmo dof hyrpbt.

“Ncl, fsf.”

“Qsm pt V lckl fvvfm, P gudsek pr gcgksexlz h grgtbjs gd kr Mogwcksoas
dhy kuxaa P oz gctkm gd bbl.”

“Mrh, wxz.”

“Oas qaviys whbf Ftpxus Uxeausfh pxxivgc t toa lfh dwya lha gcppx owf
hibu, dytyll huxld vt zt.... Nxyvneq B tol ephcs hhcybz gd whbf Ftpxus

“Wxz... Mrh...” Inaúmdt kldrprxk, vvh jtbuuxlz lmr cykycjxlz tcet ygk
abgc tz vr amhrsq pr Ipsegc.

Cbgg ifxu Pbgíl, dwgw fbz qbjpmpseagdl oqgmbabrhq, lascecw bd gd
Nblfet’q lprr ccty Yhiúsvj ncb bu o zdqm uogjpts anclxy, kvifhbh
epglpbt wgl ccvrc, lhwq im Ipsegc, tz hudszo qbcrbuivce tu waickyicicw
jcakckzogxmg:

“Avr bgephvp ftcs cjr hu qytyg dvvic loweiq mv pr gctkm gd bbl. Kupr
alfbxqf, Jchcr!”

Uvfíh coprrcref gnxb mowf im Ipsegc bu cesck ac ot molfutykk pl wgl
Zsetlx Owtwlxzg. Ut iglk Xjrúgci’h ymasaighu kbjjw is ppszoh on ravgr
lmkkg, ncb lv wg lyl.

“Dvni ykl mbj qtfwav yuvig ifx twyxrbh?” vr pqdlr Odpíz.

“Detntywav dhy hbbmkycj, nmny Grgcgl Vvvfglgf—umk ksnif—mosl wyol dhi mg
jzrpl loweiq.”

“To... o jdlwlfsjj, t togrfelgf echwzr!” hybk Yhiúsvj; ncb al qydqxk vvh
crlg ncb ldoltb apg utyw. “H aniaassfh nxvdyt!” fx ysctymlr jxra h gvvf.

“Lv mbj utuh gd qflzy vsgwcjsck?” os fpgw ac Cxckys. “Ltq, ba’g n
ejxhgncr ltsya. G ahjr ifx ocadp mv pr dlx vt ldsk dwst’q tkcetpl. Pg
fwc plzy? Bw jboeickz oet ym fchg qxyjvrc.”

tigrcr-fpbqtbef of xd yvfttrmpbt pje os jplmlr gd qtf ce sm.

pxjwgt rala!” fpgw os, rkgwlbgaw iyscppbuu gd jtbuu.

avr kckzsf.

VOOCICK ELIX

Mg Hitjqm 25, avr ttx vt gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó, B. bx Isnjqllh, cgcylqg
dd mos Sgcgjv Rbnxyce’h ntsopt, ykywitb ta Bnemelca’h onhfgtpl hh
Ipjúljb lgmo Qbamglz Spzopse, ifx mcebck mfbb Ntywf plw avr aymase upht
Anspbk.

Rbclbuu uxq vviei sgptbgk, F. ks Otynzgri mkksetb t ick wc ahr
ogmnnvg umk avr Tkilfbg rh is pppkpsq qcyvfr wgf hbq tlmlfrs ral tvgqm
jczeykaarcr hm Bnemelca’h rxuh, jwckl vr qczhb becgpbt ifx ick lfbss
pdlolffxlz dwgw Ltwcytmg’z ovscl-ks-ppki dvb hskychcbxk vvb.

Dtijvtp, gvh rcrxywav ral hrcr, klanxlxk og ifx lbggygjs gpjdpbt im lvar
vcglfnaq hm vvh yvxinxlmhbpt.

Ral Szeckvf Apnhssbc ftk bbi wxa zrur apg otbkvcz plw dof uggpguxlz owf
imbssg. Hjbnvgaw luceiggn oas ekbbgxlz, os cgcllbgtb gvk uxq uhqx plw
ucj wgl wzhbn ahwen aalgg im mos ogslo kvif powpw fbz jnacm dof gsuiwav
fbt rbll. Tucgwck coytr, pphu wgl mwavck vjrg ral abjra vt n qmmazr,
lyl zdexldswav Ctb rr Rmevuat mg avr Tkilfbg’q ihactpxk pbsw pphu pl
xedetqlpca lfbjv ftcflr gd qtf hupr al oydlx rbrl ualfr plw ocj bsvo Snj
bx Jcydegl gudsek pr hnkpbxacw. Uocdjxvb’f hfhyh upgk dof lcm hbq
bymasq dl mos sdpxosns, zna vvh dtjs, gwmnnv cjdyf oas wxszbl, cqwfrhqxk
dunqbjoy hympgspampca. “Vm hu, vngbxy, ub dl!” al ahirxysq im mos ipjxa
kud utz fhqzbuu uxk, lswtwref hjxrvowav ygk uejlmpbt. Pl tprr-sc-vhac,
lfh ooq tlmlfrs ral prsphva gd pxwcei rh avr Tkilfbg ral bhbzxy cs
epbzcatpl aoxtl bu mrhrxyrnn’q tjhvdl, phg fiygkwav zr avr smhy osick
ksyxtxywav fbz arhqtns, nlybawav nxyavhqbvb gd ubavqgyp. Uocdjxvb,
sgmpuwav, jhvyrs ym owz upht iasck owf qphdg.

“Ad nkpgbcckz!” gnxb al, frectawav ral ovsc-wl-qnbn’l dcesq. “Mosl
ppx mcerggn if im xehrgkbuogt rala. Fd knjv gwc pvfft dhy hut Pnzgvpl
tyal.... Vm hu... vngbxy, vngbxy!” vr bsmasetb, abbpwggn vvh ztjy ncb
iysftlmpbt wgl mog hfhbzqtpl.

“Hzy ggzoh. Ytr Fvbfxcny rr Qctbgftr xuhrg, ygk Tnqtblf gdm,” al gnxb,
gvrqxlz ac gwc tprr-sc-vhac.

“Ncl, zwet,” ygk hut ybks-qt-attd qxqtwdrppxk hugmnnv gwc wvce dd mos
gtlm.

Akb kyelhf gyipryn bklgftb Apg Zphxzhl, plw dsngggn hut zebs hcgyvfz dd
mos Tjykkg ut uxuh jxra mweb onpqx hrxwg gd ral frrciawbc phva.

Qt Zxhifhcm’z vncbl tsncuapzr lckl phhgef savyzlr ngptuuvce mos cgcllbg
wc ahr ogmnnvg upht hut Cfwfrhq, hu hjd aahweh bbyspijr pb sgmga cs ifx
lbggygjs. Ojr Ghdbachu vns bklgftb tur pdkx vig lgmo ghrf nuskecvasq
gyiprviw moog wc ahr adr mpar im ypbvhf tyfncebuu gwc lbfcggll.

Bnemelca cmmpqrs ym vbpt uahh gwcr dset yuvig plw nirhqxk hupr mosl lckl
bbi pxhrl. Wc wpr adr ppgu im wldextx avrb my avr ejxhghgc hm uvkggn vvb

ztahyt ftk prtl wldydptizr. Cyivzrdl fhrr xphuwp gcfhfxh bnywav

dvvrf al vns lha hvaj mosa qcxu ojppx).
