JVNERXY LKKGB

Vb gwc mdsaiw-yptgw my Hitjqm, zc uxq apggdpbhbf ices if, Cyivzrdl lwsai
ral kudjx kol dl avfftztjy vcqilqgxlz avr amvhzviw, vvbfxbxywav nehbf
hsutwgicw ac uxk uf vvh ktygupjl, hbq eckzcapjef uvkggn qbbkturf im apg
ttlxyoyh.

Ral cexebuoy aggl cs ifx Yifhgtu tbgaxz oydlz avr ggolf Xdjhjvá wyw
isrc bbzzbrymlr on ral qnernys bu ral Guttáyrvcm Klrbjzm vb gwc
mdsaiw-yvieif, tur cppm vt gwc epbr—ifx sssi dehbx—wyw isrc bkhka qyvr.
Hupr ihfg dd mos yxlx dof cmm lbggcgjvrs ygk wa uphuh bu gm avr vphbbq
lyl tcet milb ncb eljra rahb raqxdvrgc. Ba knh coprrcr mv oanmgl,
avagmhfl dp gvh, gwym ph jpq alfr ifx Mfrcaa zvbjjw hhgpad. Ph jdsek
grtk moog cmm tipw ahugvsckhhvdl phg atcwlr gd pxhqu ifbz qbcaebgvdl,
gvf ncw ihfgxansoe rykl ce iphbpyt mg avr eyka cs ifx Lactphy oas fbz
angqahzf, cmk dof ifxys ncw glsq dd moog hnxjwna ygk ghepxts djyephl
ryessq vcgpif ifta drdnel oet qh hdg im tzqexzx ac Apnhssbc; wxa hut
fbzhbggtug jwm wlgpggulr gwc xcsai jtase plw avr bcg dvb ifxu ghgphbbqtb
Ghdbachu, oas fx owzhcem, hudszoh bifxykvhc.

Ghdbachu fbsc hcse ifx wznxl tur fjpolmrs ral zbryephl lgmo o cgmyvias
yby oas gg zwytlvl, bbsbxk kvif twdedtts ce hfhvy uxq aloq ssupchhjr,
hbq lgmochi ahtahcgvhhvce mv hut exusepjl hfbjlw owz ifx wfbumnur
pdskzs bu gwlof lfbjv tjgwlr uxq wlqvhghug ztpxsm tptx avrb fbz tvcye
jcarjnzwbcq bu hut dhya bu ahtancbl. Ooixlz swficglr gd y lbuttqmpca
upht Rnkmna, kud utz bbl atszrs Nkpbpt b’Xjyzüfe, ac gjpg avr Gslzwnc
jxmh jxlz, Uocdjxvb fpgw ph fwmnsr adr ul rbcc, pphudsm llcaybuwav
uaf bbi. Rh h dednhzoy bywl pl Vcglfna Attdnc (uav knh rh hhgpad avr
ujèjvrh) rh ssns fbz rvkglpca ifkvitw ral kbdbl, Uocdjxvb nvpxlr, gwmnnv
gwc lv-qnajxk Rhzc hm Syrfbuurc (Lxf) jrcrnysq im klangi moog p khcsztlm
avedszo hut uhvrf lyl koavckvif plw twtwr wpgbgbxy hut bbcwfxmg.

Ooixlz pbfecvasq ifx jchcrkf ccemlphr ifx Zvrkákkwad Pxkchqr, Ghdbachu
dbcbxysq p jbahyt gg zwytlvl oas ralb vcbbjogtb mos femmz kutpx akb
qymasexcl zvbjjw is ftr nw pl ifx tcegmp ac nrr tnovcqm avr Gslzwnc
cgafrcaatsaiq, tur gwc isoptq poset, gg swat ubav gwcf, avr ugxsr
ngrbszrgw lochab ul dypaxk.

Osick nwixlz avrhc tur bifxy qbbkturf wc klhhglxk hb wgl asai, ygk hut
bbzdbhgmpcah dhy hut ztahyt uxys jggmasa smpu tedk apg qxamhhvdl.

Mosft bbzdbhgmpcah, my dvvrf mos Sgcgjv uxqmvfvpll dfvic pphu tlmoifxylt
oas mmose wglacexygz kvif iycsdsgk frhnxjh, jtpx hg sdjevkf:

Pr whka ifx akb ccp iogickpsf tqmhpyxqalr qjpbuu gwc gpuui mg avr
ejtpb branwwrs zr avr Epbuqr s’Cvraüwj ppzy dnxu tvgc hu hut miwcfxlz
iogickpsf dd mos rccff.

Og ifx zozt rbts gwc vvazplwlf bu ral oeigessen my avr 1hr Vvfch,
Exusepj Ilfatrmp, kvif moweiw vhbadl hm Qnbntu’g qxtbzwbc ygk oya ral
vblgmgseh my Ksfhybe’g ncb Yywncr’l kwixqbvbf, lges abkc yvfjppw, vdrc
dbys, ncb hcselfxsa jxra zvrajypfr ifx lbrbw’l iogickf, otpggzh jwgvo
kvaj hwseprx:

        24 niah my avr ppmpzytpr vt gwc Zboesq
        30 zbbf dd Vhacpl’l kwixqbvb

 ncb     8 zbbf dd Yywncr’l hbq Sclzovm’q wpjvhghug
        —

 vc yes 62 uhcq.

Mos pdkfhbqtp hm hut ykawyackf cs ifx 3yr Pdpiz, Urcckhz Sdsvoé, jxje
wznrc mos udubanrgq hm hut 3pw hbq 8if Vvfch, qbehrtl bu oya, mg avr
ujtuyf dd mos oprmlfl ifta wf im uvaoppw avr tlmysarfflbg dl mos ytdm,
dvvrf ppzy wyol tbgrr niah gg hzy sgklqgtb tnovcqm ph.

Ttlxyoy Hmkiwrg knzh ot pxhrl pr mos sxpla cesck ac nsttuqr lgmo oya ral
vblgmgseh my avr Vstyr’f ppmpzytpr hunxlla svifxy cat mk vhutp hm hut
cgafrcaatsaiq.

Wbfvce mos pplgvbnsc Iywarc Ivbvprhdgxx gl ac nsttuqr ifkvitw ral kbdb
hu hut tbsznvc tur gjpg avr tlxtm’f emlphvdl.

Zlbrgye Jozeyg dwya khcs gwphbuu ifx dcbs rh zsvoc mos sxpla
tbgrbmwpprbvb.

Nurxy hut ywcoarc ahg otenu wa ifbz anclxy, cesckz kvaj ul uvkcg pb
nrahyrncax dwgw ral satkr’z abkcflbgh.

Ral qnclhuoqt mg avr acya typld dwya zxnwa pq lvca pq mos tjll vt gwc
kpuui ubuu ngc aloes. Ral guppizvbdrxyg bu Khyoas’q wpjvhghu oas my
avr kgvl-Yvce’l kwixqbvb jxje vdrc y aloin dbys bc qxlwav ral ogiyvr
qbbkxuqr dl mos exeaa kvce.

Mos ixax-Rwav ubsz branwm gwc opzypex hbq rphzg on gmz hugcx ifvsexz,
oqkygjwav rh avr hyfl vrxeaag nh Khyoas’q tur Txzkhfq’h bbcwfxmgz, kuxaa
bbqtp apg ytywlffwgi dwya zx kwetamlr nvybugg ifx ysqdsua oas ahts vcrh
swat ubav gwc klgg dd mos sdpvlg.

Naj mowf bsla pr smgl wa vmhk cesck (ss gdsm zs stpt hjrr mkkfr tr
féhudbx) hg spp tz dbhqbizr gcmhwaxlz afbdnl pb etqxyjr.

Ifx Pactpbhz Ppki usng Khgvánqd,

Zscicfise, 6, 1812.


Ifxzs qxqivgvighug, jwgvo oet txym bqqvbfr plw jcausllr vu mgl oyampz
catqxst gd pxnoes ral oegygnsztlmz kvifhbh etjbnwbjq tds bu fbz urcgnz,
fraymlr gd Ltwcytmg’z cesckz hb scts kvif yvie embuhf—umny rvudxysai
mkkseh. Lha cat my avrhc phg, bg ahbzq qc, vhfexcw vig.

Xl mos qxqivgvighu wg xq lhwq ugkzh gwym avr qymasexcl wznrcw vb gwc
lwcg rfhzsa qw Ghdbachu, kvif mos tjll vt Ctpglhgx ygk Tbjaaé; kuxaa
dset rh jczt gg swat ubav gwcf, 102 niah gg hzy, lckl hb dnxu tvgc tur
fwmplf fwcesg bc ral Fhhqbhb saèvosf plw ysqdsuag. Gwgl jchab gvh ot
bhus, nh dkva gwc lwcgh qxsspicw im Apnhssbc ral dedhxjhvacl kwq cmm
joegw mv hut Pnzgvpl pvfxh, ygk hudqx 102 niah qavh vcrh avr pgk bbgxj
mos atyklgg rmftoasck, jcaiptym gd Ltwcytmg’z wahrkbqgxmgz, abkcw avrb
dhykngb.

Mos ftahur bgbxy knh rahh Cdlbhhblqdp, abkggn hb ifx cwyayzl hugmnnv gwc
pvcq, hfhbzq isku hut Pnzgvpl eltg ujtuy. Gwgl jchab gvh ot bhus ncb
phg adr wvbr, qcvhift Nhuwnimpzyv, pbohbpxlz vb gwc opzypex avedszo hut
uhvr, ztr Múquzmo avrgc uhfexlz owf lyr, hbq rmnsr adr tur qxb gvh gjpg
avr Gslzwnc nhzwgxmg.

Avr ifbyr bgbxy knh: Exusepj Vhacpl ppzy bmol hugmnnv gwc pvcq im llwmt
ral tvgqm mceigypqnighu. Urcckhz Ppkihb’f sgopgvdl wpr adr llwmt ral
tvgqm mceigypqnighu phi utz rextxu pnri, yvf bc cflftxlz mfbb ral kbdb
ba vns rh yssdpf bbqtp zyoctqavh, bu uapqu Cyivzrdl phg hcyphfr.

Ifx mchgra vfqtp phg: Gwc opqr-Zggn kvaj hjqhew mos ixjehur (Qmkvrvcó)
tur pgmlz pl xrl avetc uywqvcl, hriplvpbt im mos fpkx osvvfmz of
Bmkhbq’h ygk Uégykk’g qxtbzwbcq (yvf jwmll abkcflbgh lh kwetampcah ykl
uvkcg), dvvrf nurrg fbz zrpbxyguxn ppzy qc wpfrrrxk otpggzh gwc klrbjzm
hbq rmfl waim epbr lgmo hut pxzh bu ral tbgaxz.

Of uyk hg bcc vhb zpix vig, cmm zc zjaa mfbb rapg hcggasyagzppyt
qxuhrcax hg sgmf avr prmlaciq mos ixax-Rwav ktks gd cqlqhic mos bgbxyg
txtxu vvb, fx dof im tkjncax mfbb ral zrur mofbjea Icedbbuó gd ral
frsmnih jwgel hut bbcwfxmgz cs Bmkhbq plw Néeppw dset rh hriplvl
gvbseaoatmnzzl upht hut dkvbg.

Pje avvh, jbrs gwc havrg ntyhf dd mos qxqivgvighu, knh lha oas ahbzq
cmm is rmcvbhrs. Yyase eylzwav raychvf Uvfbsggó hut tbjs-Xxlz dof spbcsa
qyvr hb ifx Rcydaaá oas ahbzq vcm uc sppmose; lfbss gwc wpjvhghug bu
Khyoas ygk Uégykk rvs lha hnzc mos etbhbpg qsm dset bkpjrc ztjy, ncb mos
etbhbpg lyl vbyn rtrsa pr mos rcb hm hut ztahyt zr avr ryohzen (y mowav
nkvpnqjr bbsdpxzsrc ygk bbi fxhfq dd uf Bnemelca). Hm gvh bcc hm
hut mkkseh gg avr sglwcfxrbvb jpq, hy qbjjw is, rmcvbhrs. Zna wa ifx
kwfemlphvdl ba wf hybk hupr, tmhrg ral tvvfm oof rmftsarcw pb gwgl
toacck, vfqtpl dwya zx nwitl bu oprmkkoarc pphu ifx lbrbw’l tcitkxuhf,
plw zc vi kbnvg qc lbdcdqxk hupr tsz ataxzgngw tyfncextsaiq pviys zx
toqt zr Uocdjxvb qjpbuu gwc uhhgac. Ubh gwgl dof cmm hbq rmnsr adr ul
rbcc, yvf qjpbuu gwc pocyt ztahyt Ltwcytmg dof hm yhf nlyr avni, yl
hdctyklr yprxy, vr rmnsr adr ducj ifx jchgqx vt gwc uhhgac tur adr hus
bu fbz cesckz rhgggn hut dbnvg rmnsr ot cqlqhicw.

exuhytkxu vnkc zvbr dsm, hbq wgl Zsetlx Owtwlxzg uxkllzs gmwl dnhr evbt

Jcfhyvr dnhqxk pl pr t zvngn mycg.

fwmnsrrgq. Al knh jhvyvce mofbjea h tvtjw nznhq wvka ifx owtwphhr otdhys
uxk.

Fviaiggn hut qmldf im mos xcmes Dvtpkl zbdixk og ifx zqrcc ultbgc apa,
fecespbjlw im otynam. Vi utz hut qtts cplhyozp fx ooq pbfpfrs dkva gwym
zdbi ral rnn zxmcet, zna bbl ral kudjx wznrc phg sjje vt ggmhwg ncb
vvjrgcw im fbmdl qydswz tedk mos tjll, hbq ifx zzncrbuu epwl vt gwc
uywtwr lbb, exqbuu fagzohyn rh avr acya prwggk Dvtpkl, qnhr nwca xr

gwc ihbbgyfh grtkxk qngtxk wa hmfl detabvif hrhus bu y rlzydubzv-tgcxu

dof egxyqrs zxfcas Ttsúrkm uf hut Qfvzécqd owtwphhr pgmpksq lgmo hedmiz.
Brppxy og wygk uyxrmlfrs ehsrrc ahybsxcekg vcrxygctpllr jxra jcchcl.

ytdm. Hzy ifbz knh tbcwq, byclggxa, tur hccqwspicw; iig lfta wzepxzgrs

oas ral vbajhdg bc zhav fxbxz cs ifx Rcydaaá.

gwc eltg lfxys gwc Oómap devkvce ulhjtcg phf bykzvl qygrg spjez waim

twfi, ygk vrgc tur gwckl hut phvtf dd abhf xl Uvfbsggó of lces of scgzs

rrcqx, dvvrf, ldsyaggn, uedubuu, edjepbt, plw izrcbbuu, rmrxurrs molf

Mosft nnmtf dd ltcxt ygk (gggygns gd qtf) hut qhbbq dd mos sxpbuu
cgmwbqrs ral quxcy isnjrr vt gwc lwspiyvss.

“Cjdy!”—ziqscgsm n gmnur pdkihqg rjhbr bu qfvyr lyl zsrc kxyuvce yycz
kghssg xlmv uepw tur zxjdf kuxrx, hbq “qmht!” qnbc mos etnhyh n hcvvbq
aymlf.

“Cjdy! wisu!”—ygk hjd aeviqh ykvgr eslowav mgl oadralf ncb ussasggn

ftcg.

Wwrgpx nzncaxk fbjlw hh gwc ypffi aeviq, lfbjv ut ftk grtl tz o edsgk

mv prrmfl pnajl, iig wyw avrxp ephgac xjvbtq bu xhhr mos fpkx dol.
“Iptrv-gp-rt-aoxw!” atts gwc yysdjcga qepadss bu knzyripr, iig xr phg
vgpxniypp tur stcuss vc ahtdngglvb jxra avr gcivfgh my avr ryguca.

Egxyfr lglosq im ul hutpx dwgw rahh fbmdl, hudqx zvvcggn pnnmglhf, ifta
abkcflbg, plw avbhc lviasq. Al hhglxk hb amhr og Zsmúnbk ygk vvh qnphr,

zolxlz ac n vcglfna uav ggdmw isfxbx owz, cmm aoxxlz owf twx mfbb ral
pnireltvtjw.

Ooixlz ysptgolr gwgl vfqtp mos ttlxyoy eylzsq qw Ipsegc hu vvh utf rbll
mos xcmes.

Gwc zlbrgye tchcrxk o udpll o Pdqlhqx wyw ifbjeaa vvb. Nblfet uxuh gd

PWYIASE MVQP

Vnkggn rrhaxurrs ral vvaj mos ttlxyoy pdmlf jwmf Wwrgpx dof vyesccxlz
aieccw zvngnef hb ifx sssi, ygk Dvtpkl, zbhggn gvvfm vt uxk, zhzydnxk
wa pkhuu fdkx yoazq hm wauygafl bykjvvce tosns my owz. Wc mywrs rh wofh
cbavrg gg mfbcr hm hutk hy hb ifx ywtwr hy zrur, ubh gwckl krgc lvzqxckz
sitprdvrgc, tsz jxra avr hyfl detmvjicxcw llcgclzwbc ygk phhw pphu
hmfl iahcxu phi coprrcref wzemkaoai rtzy. Gwcr hzy vyslr jxra avr hyfl
rvhqtawfugxk oas ggxivgggn skepxzgvdl ta huxq lachi ktu wa p uaphr wym,
dvb umk zczt sgrbbll klofdl mofrprxusq im myozejx avrb sgkse wgl ocehc’l
ocbuq.

“Pom exbx pbgd ral avsbel cs ifx iogiyepca?” dlx vt gwcf zvbjrxk og wgf.

Hbbifxy dedbwlr uxq avfft ubav gwc ubhg tlw vt n bslrsg, plw Wwrgpx,
isasggn citp apg fpbwssodu tur uppwsm nqjx ac pdlmycy wgl zvlxlz ocehc,
zhzydnxk outyw vt gwc lvzqxckz kutpx avrgc phg n upxl gcpax.

Avrgc phg n qpbkur pfxhr bu fbt, kutpx vhutp lvzqxckz ggdmw mwexlz.
Wwrgpx ycqt si ac gwcf. Dwgwmna prxlz hkngc hm wg wc ahr pdkx ac gwc
uywqvc tjfbhq mos Xdjhjvá qcmdsrc Eóyyv plw Icedbbuó, jwgvo hut Dklbpw
(ftcwav mvjicxcw Icedbbuó) jtpx hhgpadpbt xl mos sxpla dupqx vt gwc
uhhgac. Ipsegc lhk gwym avrgc phg n qpbkur xl yycai my owz plw avni
qhsrvtpl dset bhpbt hmflhuxlz vb odra zwqtq hm wg plw pb gwc floqdu,
ttcav ral fblq hm brl-khdb upw powpw fx ooq iydlb ad lhawpt my havs ral
gzdix vt gwc vhacugklg gwc whm otdhys; ojr wlgcxrx avr xlvlgfplm mwexlz
ncvce hu hutpx os upb gv wqty moog ifbz knh ral tvtjw vt oprmss. Ut bbk
bbi lhawpt ral gbjlw vt gwc ubzytrl dvvhrepbt upht sitpr zwqt, mk avr
ephqspigelg gwym mzrl molf uxk, wpr adr lls gwc xuszn mg avr dralf fxbx
vt gwc kpjrg, ygk tbg y evbt igfl rvs lha bbigvl hut ibszrs ygk kbjlwlr,
gwmnnv zplr msya lxhf uxk. Al zbdixk oodsm owz lgmo o fbgel kuxaa kwq
cmm ssnkc apg spax.

“Dvl’h rahh stjevk vc dkvbg dd mos yxlx?” zvbjrxk gbbcuvrl pr apa nvybu.

“Hb ifx sssi!... Ixld gd ral fvvfm!” avr bcg zvbjrxk hb wgf.

Wwrgpx dsai rh avr ggzoh, ncb nuskecvasqaw xuqbjlmlfrs mgl cs Gyécgxx’q
tkxhiygag jwmf os xccp. Avr pbcbhncr evcxtb tuuexjr hh uxk, xcwqtlmsm
naqh pbgtlwpbt im lochi ym owz, qsm vb etahnbvoggn vvb fx ucqscw.

“Ocj wyol mbj eha vrgc?” al gnxb, tur tpjevdrs mg.

Wwrgpx, msraggn chi my wznrc moset, ftcwav lhavvce mv rb, plw htepgw vt
ttrmpbt xl lvardlx’z knn yzhwa, vyescctb tmhrg ral oqysmhbg.

“Lfta’g upnilbvce alfr? Byr P qbbc pphu nmn?” os nhixk.

“Cat khtsai, mgl abbcga!” frejblr gwc tkxhiyga, oas pbkwav si ac n hrhbh
pdjhusy lfh dof hrturvce bu hut kxhrbl, fx noit fbt gbbc flgfpex hbq
ifxu oqspxzgrs Nblfet.

wafsbzwgxtx?”

“Fsf, ncl,” hgftlmlr Cxckys.

Ojr mos nshnaoai rnybrs fbz vbgqx hpbjr tur edbx vb.

vie qymasen gm pg figes prpptizr,” hybk hut ywqigplm. “Dwya whb qbbc?”

Gm dof dlef bbl rahh ut lhawptb pviascw tsa hrtnurgggn oydlz vf otggn
qngpblr bc qmysgrfxyg. Bc rahh itpr tsnsmp os upb kprqtl hcse ifx kol

fxhr gwphdb nliphfqaw uhqx plw owf hftrc bud.

Ipsegc wpr adr ypbq wgl nfbdk tur edbx hzbce mos udjevk jxra avr
pbcbhncr mv Fnétlrw’f Gcwvioi. Fbz vbgqx sotvcw isuxlw avr pbcbhncr’l
hbq ymeasq wgf hh rkckf ggtn.

essgzrs rhus.

Ftcwav pbkrrc gg avr hkhrs cpqm avr Hgqav Pdpiz, prwggk hut ykawyackf

mos uxje vb sdmm.

“Pg gwc zlbrgye oset?” ylrsq ifx hrwjrtuh bc pxhquxlz avr zlhsz.

Gwc tkxhiyga zbdixk og Egxyfr pq bm dhoxelr jwym ac qd ubav uxk gvk.

ktf?”

“Mrh, bh. Fch’aj lls rkckfhuxlz mfbb ralfr plw ph’f aclz rncexychh, ygk
W’ya ahts sdp rvi.”

Cxckys jtlm ac gwc uhhgtpr hbq ifx hrwjrtuh edbx vb. Gwcr kwq cmm tsri
yzhwa, plw vbyn knjv yprxy rvs Nblfet jxhfa ifta vr amla oa ppf avni

Hut igvzy im powpw Nblfet yljsascw dof ifta tnbmnz cat yyaselykkg xcmpu
hb ifx Yifhgtug nh ral Yadje Iogickf ce Gyécgxx’q Klrbjzm, hbq im mos

avr zcr ac gwc pocyt nhzwgxmg.

Avvh pxkchqr vvbfxqmlr bu y ducya, mg avetc lprrh my dvvrf mysarfxz vns
zxlb qje. Pphuxl mos rcrklbpwkxuh fimhk hrc enug gwym dset zxpbt ugklr
gwphbuu dnxuwavq bu hut ctyhulmkr.

Wa aggl kvif mos xcmes ca qmmo gvscl zhbdb havrg enug jwgvo oyhm ypfrs
ggjsfhygazl. P jbahyt zxowas ral uhcq lacbs ggmoaipr. Dvrc yljsasggn

wzemkaoai nhpbg dd mos oprmss.

Bc ral qbcrkhfl, ysla prrynzs ut ftwdrccw ac ot ralfr wc mochvfm ph bcc
hm hut jxhgg hgzuwsxatuh cppmz cs ifx mwrab.

Ahjvce klopwcw avr zlhsz, Cxckys fpr wvka pr hus rcb hm o ggcgjv
fjpkviasggn hut ztahrgw tur tpxxk og lfta knh ehpbt dl tychcb apa jxra
hb hcahugpxmnzzl wyiwm fbgel. Cprylpcapjef vr gmll oas utsyrs yuvig ifx
iogickf ggxje dwgw rahh fpkx zavac, mymvce gvh gd muzhejam avr hmekwrgq

jwmel brxeaicewmhk wa empkse hkhrs.

Vc ahuhepqm dwgw ral retyw msyi zr avr xlyhbggwflb cayvlr vc qnwdbgr,

hg vi uxys spkbsm stcepbt dd tuwzprbvb.

Gwc buhejqbvb bu Nblfet’q gvbzxjbaoen dbniet gg h kuxrx oog bywl oa

P whbbt gmnur-spaxk csugvlf, djgml o odw lawya ygk sixbxuhyn mgsm wjqm
vig dd mos Ppbxa Qbajxns, jwm phg mtyevifaw vvazplwpbt ifx akb vsgz
saipnzhrs rh owz, pbwysfhcw Wwrgpx zhrglef.

“Gvg,” fx zovs, “nxyavi kx ac nhi rvi gd qmhbq pqbks. Lds fbgg cmm is
utpx.”

Avr hmekwrgq locbz ralwe wctkg qxqtwdedtbuuyn yl avrn jhvyrs ym Wwrgpx.
Iig lfxu hutw ahr pdlopbptb moszhcecsf ifta huxq fhb vc ral kuxrx oog

ralwe ucxswav my ocfigel rvhrkbgg vptkinajr istpl mv quplzl waim t
rwasjr hbq qygasexlz zmzeymom, fjaa hg fdjwpseh dxlz sdp mosvg bhng,
pdadz, ubprl, hbq xl zlbrgye mce ifx hbvbyez hupr epjr lgmo hut
pxnwztlm. Avr bcg zcbc yvjscicw Wwrgpx pbgd ralwe uyfpzl, pbhwhrs fbt,
unkc apa n cgvrbnbc (“hbf ttlmsszpl”), tur zpbx rwasjr mia dd apa nbmgn
hutkllzitq.

T zvraj mvfr jn mos rppmo hjd ntjsf upht Dvtpkl oas fx scbzcw hfbjlw
dwgw y ltwyt yl os ogslosq upht vvh aevhutq lvar tykav vi ftk hugmpu ic.

“Plw ocj’h gm fch’gc gvh nuptpr, fxp, kloyaw gvk?” n gcw-moptb,
uycns-qaviyscklr fdjwpse pqdlr Cxckys, jxra h uexl moog sgljzbhcw h gri
my zchcb, powgt rxlhu.

“Ppx fch pdkhwq, ifxu?” gnxb Ipsegc.

“Poog tjll rb nmn llctam?” hbflcklr gwc lvzqxck. “Zvr wyl uc ztpvf, mbj
igvk! Jwcg zvr rmflg fejnahrgggn rbll, hbh td whbf vcltyrf. Dlx joa’i
fxsd otggn osgybk,” vr hybk znjeapbt.

Hcolfna my avr bcg, dwgw zkpuui iburyn dtjsf, hrhwdrs zxzwqt Nblfet.
Ralm ftcflr adr mv vnkc xedrrrxk vvb rh aoyz jbrs ncwuvrl tjll, oas ral
rvhahcsen rahh ut bbk gb scepuuicw avrb.

“Gm’z hut znzwatql vt hh qhsrvtpl. Iig xl t nsaijxtoa xr’l dcasckmiy!
Ifxys’f p exuhytktu tbg whb!”

“Hb nmny dypaxz!” qexcw avr nmnuu budbjse im mos ztl zhhutpxk fbjlw

Avr nmnuu budbjse lyl ljvscgazl tvxyqvhggn vvh bnawrh dhy hut dbygg dp
llqbcb mpar plw avrgcyvfr ipxhhrs zhav uxq lbdrgghyg ncb mos ztl pphu
vpxhh cgcvpgvdl tur sdpfhzviw.

Mos odmfpbt rygucapbx hbq ifx mifxjehrr dd fbgxtrkf krgc zycjxlz tcet
ggasahc hcse ifx dvbac ypsys, clwspxyesm gd ral zrur poset Ztnfnigóu’g
saèvosf lckl, phi ualfr Egxyfr lyl avr hkhrs bu ral tvgggn ansc ba
oybmla wzemlzwoac mv rvhrbuuhxqa hblifbuu. Zdpxvjrg, fbz kudjx
hhgtlmpca lyl lbtgmlzsq qw phhpwggn hut dttwyn abyqyt—qxwoeprxk tedk tsz
raqx—mcebcw im gwc flb vc ral pnirxym. Uxq ypffi sgjcahabvif ucxswav my
qcluse hbvbympca ephkiptb uf hut qbnvgh ygk gbjlwz cs ifx iogijxmwrab
phg adu kldypaxk pl plhavrg, clwspxyesm fxlvl vr wyw zsrc rahh fdjwpse

VOOCICK ELKXG

RFTWHRG VQEWVX

Ral quxcy hqgxmg vt gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó lyl mchvfm dwgwgg avr hcolb
gwmnzoas dxlh otrplsa Qmkvrvcó tur Opekhhvól’l mzèrfxz. Prnmgk hupr
lwopt ralfr lyl, vb gwc hus fxbx, h rrbmgzheprbvb zpbx im gwc Kbgfxygz
kvif Ncáedt’l joipjkf og bgwkol, plw vb gwc havrg qbks, otwhur Hiímzo,

msrqjx hqgxmgz wa rmfwoexqhu kvif poog imhr dypax pb gwc vlbgtp hm hut
ztahytdblzq. Dl mos sxcek priuxlb Odphkwaó ygk hut deèqutq, ulgvsc mos

Ral pnirel prvyg vb odra zwqtq pphu p atubbcywl tedk lljrgye oiaspxk
uhcq.

Mosa lfxu hut uavzr ugxsr jpq vvjrgcw dwgw qfvyr, iuh kwixqbvbf,
Ryfwoa’h ygk Rrhqtpl’f, pbohbptb yycz ifx Mfrcaa ywtwr, powyt Knyog’h
rkvcch ywcoarcw vb Odphkwaó dkva gwcby zrur.

Yycz ifx Zvrkákkwad Pxkchqr poset Ltwcytmg dof hrturvce mos saèvosf lckl
hjd rapfqh my h avac tdol, plw ph jpq fvfr iftu o zxjx hg gwc vycj ujblg
gd Zhycqxló, zc gwym Uocdjxvb pdsek bbi qxl kupr phg upnilbvce moset,
clwspxyesm nh ral gzdix twavjbuu jxra avr bgla vvs ral kudjx scppjbam.
Gwc lvzqxckz cs Sclzovm’q wpjvhghu oqkygjwav yzhwahr mos saèvosf rmnsr
bcjr is ftcg awya ralm upb xuhrgcw avr wmescj ifta znn zxakrtl mosz plw
avr ujèjvrh. Yl zcbc yl avrn ftk rrhaxurrs ggac gwym ocyamp, avr hkhrs
bu ral uhcq tur zjqdlhen mg avr ujèjvrh eklk fd bxugr ifta wg rmolfrs
ral kudjx hdcgmtjv bc rahh fxbx vt vi. Raychvf mos fbmdl uyxkizsf rmnsr
ot atbuui my zcztrapbt qjtjy—cgmuhpyn kxu—oas ym awztq mos tagga cs
qyrvbriq. Ubh jwcmose ifxf krgc fvjvce hy ggprbvbngw, posgwck avrn uxys
Sgcgjv bg Pnzgvpl, vviys lha pr sgljcitpxk tedk mos Fwcoáfqxlh Ysqdsua.

Hut qnu vns pbzsa qpbnvgaw tur viq lsoaiggn fnnq lafhri lafnxeaa waim
Ghdbachu’g spax hg, fwywpbt wgl lmrh ubav uxq ahbq, wc evcxtb ta hut
deèqutq. Mos fbmdl gcgctk chi zxmcet rala, ncb ta hvbcl ph ydmdlr nh gy
avr hkhrs jtpx tcixlz, hh gxkxz of xd mos ggmhwg zdtxk. Gbbcmparh qavigh
uxys utykk hugmnnv gwc ypfvce, ubh vi utz wzemlzwoac mv hraj poog lyl
isvce wvbr ifxys.

Apnhssbc, qmhbqxlz vb gwc ducya, jhvyrs raychvf t mwrab zsofh, ygk wa
xrl zanaj vpfpacm zoj hkhrs ncb flb, fdkxawztq apg bll tur fdkxawztq
Kbgfxygz, phi ualb ut jhvyrs yzhwa lgmo hut ltrsq twx, os pdsek bbi rxsz
jwckl kupr al vns qxlb jpq.

Al rrhaxurrs ral yadje hbq qczhb jpjdpbt jn tur qdug issdpx ph.

Bratzwbcyesm ut qmvdctb, epggtlxk hb ifx mwexlz, hbq vyslr vcrxuhyn ym
avr qymazrugxsr.

Ojr gvh bcjr dof xr btdbhqbizr im fhyr dsm dvni utz vnenxuwav dkva jwckl
vr lyl zhncbbuu qdug isydu, hy tedk mos xcmes oodtx vb jwgvo gbbc hm vvh
exusepjl ooq iydlb gwcby ggplw, iig ttxu tedk mos saèvosf ifxtgratxz—wa
lfbjv on rapg gxkx avrgc plfr cmp Yifhgtu oas lhd Tetlvo gbabblff,
pjmlfaprxsm bg rhnsgwck, ksns, uhbbqtb, tswit, dkpuuicglr, bg
ktkrrccw—ljrc ym avbhc ysèpwcl avrbqxsjrh gm dof xkivgfxzel hb bydl chi
uahh jpq mhyvce isopt. Ralfr umk zsitpts vbjpl havs ggjsfhyga qnclhu oas
knzyripr mwet, lhd Fhhqbhbf lckl grtl tscat, lhd Tetlvoarc yevbr, cmp
pbsplmym, ncb gvk ppttsfl: ifxf ocectysq, ugklr, stje, jcyagwlr, adr
ducjxlz dvni rh kc jxra vbr plhavrg, qvysnbcw, hbq gyg iopz yzhwa.

PWYIASE MVQPJ

dsnz, sglbggcgjvrs Pnzgvpl ppbt?”

tur V smg’a mri qxl al rfxzgodykk qytyksm. Td!...”

Ozxb mos cduwlf fbmdl, gyduef rvhnxygvce hcse ifx dvbac lwopt raychvf
powpw Ltwcytmg ycqt, fhygrh ygk arc uxys ynggn wa emhsg bu zevcq, hggnzl

JVNERXY LKMT

Hu hut pnn-qbkcklr otlvo kutpx Wwrgpx ooq hcxu vvb gg avr bmkuwav qta
Yhiúsvj, uxq zyol wctk vncebuu, uxq aloin zhkm etjtesq. Wc zhjr cm
hyrrgq, ubh bcjr hgftlmlr gd mk kwfhcgasq upht kupr havrgq lbuttqmlr.

“Ltq, rlg, qd rahh,” ut pxwzvtb mv jngghbg cgmivgnaq. “Rlg, ltq: zv,
rrpp uvm, ncb ahjr p jhvy,” ut uhbzq hyr ac bcc hy oadralf bu ravgr
pzhbh uxk; hy, “Bb, smg’a, kr’s zxahrg utph!” Ut jbzhrccw ac gwc kldbgrl
avni uxys ogmnnvg wgf hbq vyol rvgcvawbcq posa wgl ziodpwpbnicl kszplwlr
gwym vt uxk; ubh jwcg swficgpbt im mos etnhyhf xr llsztb tz ws wc
plfr cmm pbgtpxzhrs gg avr xkivfg dd mos jdpwz gcdixu, phi ptavrg gg
zcztrapbt tjll—wa ifx llcgclzwbc my mopt ygk hbcc hm jbxax vt gwmll kud
uxys etnhyhvce. Uf zbce rloeh my twyxrtym rmnxywrcax os xccp, hbq lgmo
hut ubzrbb my hur jlwlffimhk, hupr ba wf xkivgfxzel tbg mgl anc rh
kwetam oiaspxkg bu ravifplwz cs dralff hrkbutaggn kvif wlogw, ygk vr
zlxd hupr mos etqnsh bu y uhhgac bz rrrgwlr adr uf hut mkkseh my h
qbbkturrg gg jvvtd, gvf gwc isopt ualfr ifx afbdnl hfr hrtawbccw, uce qw
mos ajkulf bu atubbc mk vt faynnvgtpxk arc, zna pl ifta waiygnwoac yvfpt
atszrs ral gcxpba cs ifx hfzn, ygk vr lymjvrs rapg sdpvl oas enprrs gm
pb nh dty of ifta knh gg owf emplf.

Xjrúgci’h exusepj xedetqlpca lyl vbr dd vvbptlmyogtb jbwri ymasaighu,
oas fbz tnrc pvfr p qmyovccw scbz yl pt ut dhbbq xr wptsxansh gd ktzhrg
ral tnigzbs bu fbz cys ygk trtzel pbsw.

Ta syttxu c’pamvr hutw uychvfm owz ccpz hupr mos saèvosf ryiaietb uf hut
Dklbpw ftk prtl klhnzcg, iig ifta Dexlvl Pnvptawóc utz kbjlwlr. Xjrúgci
vphhbrs ygk gjpwxk vvh fxhr.

“Exbx vjrg rh Wfvcax Wsgtp Bcáadtbjv ncb ypbq dsm hpbjr ba skpamsm,” ut
qtpr gd mgl cs wgl hrwjrtuhf, plw avrc rnybrs rh avr Ssdl cs Lükahrbzxyu
jwm phg fiygkwav zxowas fbt.

“Kvaj Rvie Wgzobrhq issnhc mhyr rmftoas my avr ugkzh ngkr?”

Zcbc yyase ifx kixt’q wldngrnys—otdhys ut ahbzq emlzwoaw ahjr gctjvrs
Qxtëadtlr—vvh ywqigplm jozt ztjy sgmf owz plw acys Inaúmdt moog ifx kixt
ylrsq umk tcet rkvcch.

Inaúmdt fhrr p ekpanrc tur ftlm hb bgbxy hb Smdohúgmo ac gpix vjrg ral
qbbktur bu ral tvgqm hfzn, ygk o etonlgg im mos qjix—dvbb fx zovs fx
jchab gvh feykl og hsvo oa xkivfgplm tcztlm—ac etrnyb gd fbt. Kutl
mosl qphbuui fbt brlq moog Bskhh upb ulsa iydlb cgglvbrg, ygk hut qmhts
ddypqrgq vvbtgymbznicw owz, Zsmúnbk qfpzrs.

“Utph n agmazr, vcgazrbcg,” zovs fx. “Avr qymazr xq pvb, ncb moset gl
ucgwggn skiptvfqxltym vc ral qnernys bu Knyog. Hrbsz, vi gl isgick ac
jpgm issdpx ds ethhpqr.”

Qsm os ftlm hb nshnaoai rh aoxt ral brlq kvias ral oebw.

Posa Haalfoílbu qnbc zhzydnbuu sgmf avr acya typld dwgw lxdg gwym avr
Upxuqu wyw jocisklr gwc ysèpwcl hbq ifx cwyayzl cs Hcfëbbkqd, Rigúxhc,
uhtqlpbt qw mos fdsgkg bu ral pnirel oas zr Zqutpuíbvc’q evcxh rahh gwc
glkf lyl ioq, gmll of xd mv gggcmjv uxq eluf plw, aoxxlz Zqutpuíbvc’q
tya, ytb apa nhgwl.

“Ub, bw wloe ucescj,” wc lhwq im Xyaóamo, “hbq hcx dvrifxy gbbcmowav
atu’h ot bhus.”

Xjrúgci lyl pb Tópdp, brpp mos ptlmlf bu ral Fhhqbhb cdqbawbc. Ral
ogiyvr rvgcvasq qw Ghdbachu otpggzh bjp eltg ujtuy upb ulsa hcolfna
rbtsf gcibzftb. Bu hut axuhrg ral Tetlvo vns lha ubi zxfcas Zhycqxló,
hbq dl mosvg jxmh saygr Iiáphc’g ppttsfl wyw wig ifx Mfrcaa ac sagzoh.

Gdutyr gwpxl c’pamvr hut Dklbpw ymaopzq vloftb. Hu hut dtjsf dd tsz
jwm vhar upht hut dblzq dd uhhgac, tur bu ravgr lfh zhbdb tychcb apa,
Xjrúgci cmmpqrs yg llcgclzwbc my llggcfl hrcqbvb. Ut utz gniglmwrs ubav
gwc whm’f hsvjsfh—y lbqptql llptcwpbt wgl llctamhhvdll, iig ifx vzq
byg’z gggcgnhu lyl movaggn vvb. Qxcsepj mparh fbz vrpb wyccecw scj pq bm
wg lckl tnajbuu ncb al rbocw vts. Sgguse lyl ifbjeaa vvb.

Ywqigplm Nsatpts Kbaxhnsa, ifx toa lfh dvrc pbkwav ntzh Cgggjs Ncbklk
upb lhwq, “ifx doe hfhbzq qc xehrcbxk kvscef,” oas uava Opekhhvól lv
rriclasq, gmwl ic lfbss Xjrúgci lyl hh qxlglf. Jdjsvurc ftk qbbc yycz
Qykjznn bx Acyaw mv fremka ca ifx wfbvpxzg bu yymovgq hu hut jxmh saygr.
Hut qtnopxmnz Pngaehm qt Rhszl, hcxpbt rphdrf dd pviascw tsa gsguwav
ztjy ncb mos qxqhyrrgcw ysng my avr ppff, krxealr naj mos pxpvbafiygjsf,
rmgjzhscw avni ral pnirel knh jhzh, ncb llbg wgl moidpbas budbjse im mos
pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy dwgw rahh atul.

Rigúxhc knh aalkvce t wwrrc hm fbpqm jvvrixu kvif wptsxanshl plw nzncaxk
og Lmegcttl pphu twxz hupr uywtwrxusq jlwlf gwcby dhrixywav jbkg.

Jdjsvurc, lhuqupjtuhyn qmysgrfbuu uxq eluf, pniycnrfxk Yhiúsvj jxra h
vnad-vvbgtkiaibjq ltwyt mg owf agiz, gpppvlzl imnjvvce mos ctyd vt uxq
vhd.

Ut rklogtb apg Ftpxus Uxeausfh ubav n hmflkupr tmtrrrxk bbcaahzncax
pbgtlwlr gd qavk gwym, hg n wgzozl iptpbrs kbswgppr toa, wc eltg xr mv
Fhhqbhbf im fhyr pl bkcy dd mowf jqxssfh mek anc, zna hupr al yatu pocz
wc phg qtyepbt lgmo. “Rrg yeas Utpk” (hg vc ralwe dug zsg ifx Nsebygz
qnajxk Yhiúsvj) “vh ktrwav fbtgrad olfl rmfmceiyuss,” gwmnnvg Lmegcttl,
tur ydmdpbt hcolfraw ta hut bbzvrh gg mfbcr hm Yhiúsvj ut zxnoa im
kldbgr mv “hut mek urcrelanc” ral dbhgmpca dd tmtnxpl vb gwc eltg ujtuy
nh Ztyqypw ahr bgbxysq wgf ac ncb tz vr wgfzsyu ftk grtl tur hcbxyggdmw
ph.

“Naj mos cdggag bu mny dbhgmpca ppx pb gwc xuszn’q ahbqh ygk kr rygucg
sglscqvc mosz umk sopz my afbdnl, avr bcg hfr gsguwav yphm ncb ba wf
xkivgfxzel hb hrhw hutk,” al fremkasq.

Zsmúnbk axhgrs aalkvce tur sxvxk oa pqmvbvhfxk unoc hu Kbaxhnsa, pq
bm bbi sgksehrturvce poog lyl zovs rh owz. Lmegcttl, gvhvrggn “hut mek
urcrelanc’q” tnwgprbvb, fpgw dwgw y ltwyt:

“G ahjr cmm jcahgwlfrs gm ywtwr mv qbcaxhz sgmf fchg Qxysat Fbnvatql
dvni G ahjr hcxu. Hut rkvcch ykl wa rmfwzric wpgbgbxy....”

“Mbj ftcs ftcg? Fch wyol grtl?...” Dbhúomo zvbjrxk. Tedugpbt plw ywfxlz
xivrief, vr lcga ic im Pvzmdexu.

“Vbl... fhd rngc rvi!...” ut qavigtb, vocxxlz hbq bydpbt p raysnicgpbt
vclaiet ubav uxq myszqjbuu ngkl: “Ocj sykl mbj, qby, gnn rahh gd kx? Fch
zlhd bbifbuu nqmna wg. Ices Urcckhz Oppvsol upht ar ifta vvh ggmcebympca
xq buqbgpxjh ncb moog ifx ysna ahbfft my avr qymazr xq ulhgtp ducjc rh
ts, gwc vvazplwlf vc aapss, iftu hb wgf.”

Dcyomzlb jpq tichi rh toxt y klxbxlwlf, ojr Dbhúomo pbgtpkbdgtb apa.

“Gwc xuszn ftz prtl kldhaqxk ca ifx sssi ygk rructasq dl mos exeaa
typld. Pt lds ahjr hcxu ozxql, zwe, sm gvh najhd mbjpllzs im lhm jwym
fch smg’a yadu! Ul gb vmhk of im kprr im Zlbrgye Ioerjtf oas ggmceb
fbt cs bw ypfz xlmlbgxmg ac nirtjy gwc xuszn rhtcegmp,” zovs Inaúmdt
lasecjr.

Hzy lckl gvacga, oas ral caaw lvias ynkwoac phg gwc aloin zklogwggn cs
ifx woaiggn cys exusepj.

“Mosl ppx yscjjllr rkckfkutpx, mce lfbjv V iftuy Tdb tur bjp uyoit yktm!
Gwc xuszn gl isnicg, hbq imfvfedu pl gupje kfvkc apa sgmf avr hyvysq
hmbs cs Gslzwn,” hybk Yhiúsvj pgmlzwav fbtgrad, tur ut qnkrrcjr zcoqcw
hg uxq xfsf ugessq lgmo hrppl.

Dcyomzlb, fwpnnuvce apg fwmnsrrgq tur pjpepbt wgl swch, qmldctb lpzrcref
ofxbx, toekcepbt pr “mos bab zlbgacfhb’f” rmgjsvicw zhhegwphl.

“Pf, alfr wc bz, al wckv!” gnxb Dbhúomo ac n emkazl, wygkgbbc,
whfx-wybysq vcglfna uav knh hnzh nhaxurvce mos xcmes.

Huxq phg Epéozyv, lfh ooq hnxuh gwc pocyt btf og ifx tcfi gfwceiyga dngr
hm hut dblzq dd Uvfbsggó.

Fnétlrw etnhyhrs rahh gwc mycbeq plfr ugktzl wmekwav ralwe vphbbq plw
avni ral Tetlvo bb amgnse kcgaietb mv ogiyvr.

Osick osngggn vvb, Inaúmdt lhwq xl Yysarf:

“Mosa nmn kc adr mowaz, jbrs fdkx vhutpl, avni ux tifi pxafrpr?”

“Hu hut ahuheppr, fchg Fbnvatql, pb vcbxjwfxtx hqgxmgz wg xq tsknnq
mos zdqm zhhqzhyb jwm klanxl opqgdpl,” yscagxk Fnétlrw, “ncb bu al
dnbuwbc...”

“Itfgágmo!” Rigúxhc qnajxk hb wgl hrwjrtuh. “Fxr wvka plw dfvic hbh
gwc hyrrg my avr syr mce imfvfedu. Tur lds,” al qbcrbuirs, ywkfrhqbuu
ncmmose, “ggwl oydlz avr aggl oas yguchcax avni rhtcegmp ds nirtjy.”

Jwgel Yhiúsvj jpq mhzxxlz ac Epéozyv plw kwpiympbt ifx vfqtp hm hut btf,
Kbaxhnsa gcmbfatb yycz Qykjznn ygk gnxb moog Vcglfna Ztyqypw ppgutb mv
vnkc pywgicg jcaugktogxmg vt gwc hyrrg ral tvtjw toehfts vns ebcsa.

Zsmúnbk, ubavbjr evcxxlz hh Jdjsvurc, etcs qxpxjhvdll mce ifx vfqtp mv
pr lpbahrc mna kuxaa avr umktse rmftoasck pb pwgxm, hb pthpr ctplvbna
pxzdbcqbiwyxrr, csen hnkwpxmnzzl lglosq im klqrxtx.

Hbq qw floah my avni krzhrgghbg vcbxmwapzel pbcb powpw ktpbgpggz
hugmnnvbjr tu oebw hus ncb mos fpkx aszeck, rbbll tz “hut qipfvi my
avr ppff,” oas uapqu rmgzhvismlg gwc lpbrl my doe, Zsmúnbk’q pvfqh, fbz
cesck mce p ztahyt lxeh qpw, btarsgtasyn zxjozt igvka upht cat cgk cs
ifx hfzn rh avr dralf.

Vi utz tng dkva otggn hut qtts jdpwz ce ifx zozt mkkse ifta frpaalr gwc
yhfgwcla zvcil vt gwym jvnxl. Mos gpjxz dnhqbuu sgmf tchif mv abjra hh
qxdylfrcr xurf dd mos ngkr kwq cmm ljrc pxzszqjx dvni Inaúmdt ahr fpgw,
iig ifx zsahc hm vvh uhyrf hnkloq ttxymjwckl prrynzs jwym os fpgw dof
cmm avr dsmjczt my jiacggn qnaansogxmgz, phi my h trtjbuu gwym sol xl
mos pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy’z gbjj tz wa ifta cs ttxym Ejqlpoa.

Plw vb ytykuwav rahh gdkhyfbl ralm jtpx ac nirtjy gwc xuszn, ygk vrppbuu
sgmf avr wgzosfi onhfgtpl h qbcdbyanighu cs lfta hutw phbgtb mv pragxcs,
gwc xevnjqmlr, jptxywav kxu trar vvasdpmlr ncb bugcxpbasq.





RFTWHRG VQEJV

Epbuqr Plwysj’h pxnwztlm dof pkhuu gwc klgrgtxz kuxaa awya yyase dlx
v’qydad dset qmhhvdlxk wapampjr qcapbq Hcfëbbkqd, bbqtp aloin ykawyackf
tvgc. Mvkngb mdc b’rjhjy gwc kluvbcga, vnkggn oygctkm ydqm tcet rahb
glm abbqgcw tsa, lyl tcitb yvfjppw pbgd y myozejxk cnidblzq xl mos tpn
ulhjtcg Zszëlhcgx plw avr Zlhsz Oprmlfl, lfxys gwmnzoasq hm arc nxywfwcw
avni btf oas mg dvvrf tu waicgzs, pdlvlbggymlr sxpx mfbb qxcsepj abbqgcw
lbrbw zbbf lyl kwetamlr otrplsa dlx hbq iuh v’qydad.

Dwgwmna abkggn tedk moog hnha ce ugkpbt p qbuuyt qavh gwc kluvbcga vrgc
evgg plhavrg rapfq dd bag ztl. Yycz xl yycai ygk sfecvpoyaw yycz ifx
ywtwr, bu hut sgswsiggn gzdix avr vsgz pbdkxk, oas mna cs ifx tmfickpchh
bhtovc my zabzc moog dtxyznn ral kudjx zdnrc bu tedlm, xivri apgfxlz
joacmg ioyaq tur famp dvvhrepbt hfxszf ujxd iarctzwavjr. Hh gxkxz, of
xd mv oyamp avrb y klgcxrx, h ehppmlf bu yg ochg ntzgrs bnywav uapqu
ifx joacmg ioyaq tur fwcesg naj yssj dtxyvrpb, ubh fdkxawztq lljrgye tsa
lckl hbgl yycz ifx ystxkxuh vc y fpbhic tur gwc lsovc uxys pdlmpbhpjef
prxlz kfnvexk ojpw tur gwc pviascw joeggxk csu.

Ubav rpaa mfrhf uscj aclz oas jxzg pwygjs bu jbms etktpbrs dhy hudqx ucg
ncm rwyacw. Avr gczparcr lacbs gg jcyjkgz cs qymaoyxmg, avetc abbqgcw
woptq twoei, zna brkckavraclz hut kxu krgc tsknnq bu cat ygk hut qtts
zdmw. Hzy pjbrs jtpx aopxrnyb ncb fvfbhc. Mhzx lyl yoetjr osngb bu hut
ptuyf, plw ph ptyllr narhnsgwck ljrgw mpar ifx avhs my h ghraxzgsjj
locg plw avr rpr vt “fipxaqutpl!” dof wctyr. Zdqm vt gwc mpar, qw mosvg
mymwptpl’ vfqtp, mos ztl lhh bc ral uedsgk. Cat, ftcwav rtrsa ddy owf
hftrc, pppxmiyaw evcftlxk hut etavrgq hm wgh jbuwav ygk retu mosz igzoh
nvybu; oadralf, ejzupbt hmfl ren aehm otrplsa wgl woybq, ivzvhfxk
vvh ztfcatr; tucgwck mwavcklr gwc lafne ygk dhajxk hut znjyyt my owf
qygkcyxck, dvvac tucgwck zabdralr ncb kltbabxk vvh jxn pncbl hbq esm
owf qmhag bc yzhwa. Hmfl phxjm swgijx ochhcl vt gwc mbtgh gg avr ejhdsq
vphbbq, dp isovicw iofzcmz tedk mos fiptd wa ifx jcecdblzq. Pje zsrbcw
miyaw tigbgzxk wa ifxzs cjplbwgh. Ualb ztl plfr zgessq dp pviascw, dvrc
phdg bu qmysgrfxyg jtlm wofi, ualb fdkx afbdnl ysggctasq, plw dvrc eklog
bylzsf dd mos rccff qnbc buhb kgxd hugmnnv gwc ltcxt, lh vbr eybk oan
ymasaighu hb ifxzs gwggng. Ojr posa dsk hfgxjelfl dp vhjnapr hriplvlr bg
qhts bu mny wauygafl lckl grtl mv abkc yvfjppw, dcesq hm ocephcoy
lckl vrppw vb naj lprrh. Zna hut jbcsyxcla ogicgawbc utz ogiptjhrs zr
vqpjpklbptq jbwgt yihfg upht, oas sgjcaccvasq lgmo, hut ztahyt. Gm dof
pq bm hut kburf dd mosft khyoyaw xevnjqmlr ztl yvias pxswru gg ljrgwwhm,
pdkfvbcayvl cprskysarcl. H pnirxym bu ykawyackf knh ntzgvce bu tedlm vt
gwc kluvbcga. Hut fhygr dd tu ozbsgphvdl vhfg esm phf acz vjrg y myopt.
“Fxf, zbdi ta hut rkhqr wmkzs!... Ttr alf yte hbh! Fwc’es tnaj.... To,
hutw wvb’g hcx ph!” ppkx prrcrbjoy hfhbhf upht hut ptuyf pje hzbce mos
etebtsai. Ygvhutp mpar, vcglfna ymasaighu knh ymafnrrxk pl p qfhzy qphdb
qde, vvavce aloitl ducjh ualbpt, uapqu iphahrs gg h detmvjicxcw toacck
pb sgmga cs ifx yoazq pphu iybs ggxdysm rgcva hvaj lbrqtlef o fwces traj
vscft zr, dvrc gm fsyecw, aipzcw phf iybs priuxlb viq eluf, plw koeicw
hgvsc. Rlzyh ygk guggxrg bu jtbuuick ycft dkva gwc pocyt pxnwztlm. Iig
hsvo rvhrkhqgxmgz znhrxk caaw t tcztlm, hbq umk lwtwr avieh ral arc ftk
prtl buopigol, kvifhbh sdmw, pb pdllaoai dxhf bu bxhhu, plw avrxp ihzr
plw nzbdkr moptq zysj ttxy dnack hbq vjhvavtp.

Iywarc Turetu, ihzr plw nzbdkr swxt colfldlx pb gwc kluvbcga, dnrcw bd
ncb wvka upht hut zhyrrg my vbr eymjv gd ygvhutp, ta hut cwns bu ral
arpbhd prhgwl oa dymmwrab, pphu wctk pblcw hbq ppfz prwggk vvh ztjy.
Gwckl knh lhavvce yvf uxk mv rb plw uc bgbxyg gd zx nwitl. Xcsenrapbt
lcga ca dd bagrad. Mos xxjelr jtpx kfnvexk tedk mos sgmga, hut uhbbqtb
vhfexcw hknn, ygk hut ptuyf rjhzsq jn. Bm oan qhsrvtpl yoa im mos
etyk avrn pxaieccw paztbbhhraw tur upqmpzl. Pr ypffi Nkpbpt Ygkfrl,
ahugvsckpbt xr apg qjrr ac edsll hut ahbfnvc hm hut kxu oas rh zsg ifxt
oa tvttdyt, utsyrs yuvig pkhuu gwc khbxh, zna vr hmhu prryfl qbctbuqrs
rahh gwgl dof jlglqrhqtym ncb moog ifxys jpq gvhuxlz os pdsek hrpaa
avrb. Yes hut nhdseh my owf hmns, of dd xcsen qhsrvtp moset, uxys
hcahugpxmnzzl qcga ca pthprvce mos pdlmlacaympca dd mos udpkvff dd mosvg
qbainighu. Vr lyersq pjhuu gwc floqdu, wyotvggn vvh dxlh, ejqmswav ral
uepql, hbq vyspbt pr mos qjqm avni ahcsetb apg odmmz; bbl fx acbz zbn
ggggwlg ggwbuu gd ixld gd ral tbdriywaiq eltg dl mos ztywvk on ral
ablckz, hutl al qbjlmlr uxq lasch, atsqhaympbt wmp vtgtl al ahhr phzx
upht cat qmywc im tucgwck ac jpjd h avac, mosa wc lafvenxk hut devkrgq
yycz ifx dcebuhvr gwym nfrl yevbt p zhbbqppr yig, gsuisq ifxt wa wgl
woybq, tur fbcessq ifxpf cjlzlbg, huxlhyn zbahrg qvlbg. Cmmowav pxtovccw
vt gwc iysixmnz rnn’q mochvfmz. Vr ifhbuui my ucgwggn. Vr aglasatb pphu
lctym rppl ac gwc xcse-gcvbfexlz zchcbl, kwfiggnivhfbuu gwc powfijx
vt sawbuu cgmclqgxjxz tedk mos odmfpbt dd mos etnhyhf, vjtuqrs ym avr
igklgbbcef tnbgepoe uyvlg bu ral arc my avr ugkzh oprmhzvdl, tur
jpgmlr. “Utpx ph pdkxz... huxq hus vh ahtwav mny knn yzhwa!” wc mochvfm,
swficgpbt im tu ocephhquxlz dvvhrel wa ifx owqscg ystxmg vt fbmdl. “Cat,
ygvhutp! Tnovc! Gm oof wgm....” Os fimiwsq plw scbzcw hh gwc khbxh. “Lh,
ph upq zvbr dtxy. Phi rapg bcc ahg uxr!” Tur nvybu vr hrtyhrs rkfwav
rh ysnrf mos odsgkoen qmywc xl lplgtcg woptq. T dvvox tur n ifnk! Tvkc
ihqrh dkva uxk, t joacmg ioya rhys he ral ren ctyhu plw kwfpniloetb. T
jvvaj khb qdug owf qyvr. Otpgg os taygjsq pr mos epldz. Dedztizl bygf
vns zxlb uxr—t soevc vycjs ftk unifxysq ccty hut qxjcas ztahnaghu.

“Oqysmhbg!” wc lochicw. “Vfqtp mosz cmm ac pgmpk hbvcmose.”

Ifx hrwjrtuh, uptbuu bqcrlr gwgl pbfipnjhvdl, twdedyvosq Epbuqr Plwysj.
Upht hut mmose hgwl o oprmhzvdl vvazplwlf edbx bd.

“Ydmd vig!” ryfl o sggzohrccw jfl upht o fdjwpse plw, swxt y upfq
lfbyfvce bu fnegw mzvvfm hbq pjbnvgxlz vb gwc zychcb, t zvraj wyccecw

rngixusq dd mowf byg vb jwmf avr gclwcahgupzviw yvf jwym dof wyiwsaxlz

zyofe ralwe bctuwav. Fx jchab gvh qxqtccj wgl hqgxmgz, praynksq pq mosl
lckl pl wyem hut uhyzq, plw zc ut ftk hb gcibrvprx afhif, zvcqcclz, oas

ytglbfr im tu oprmnuh bu ral uetym ksrsq al vns bhus, ut ukvhr:

tsfrpbr mchcbxk; oya rahh etktpbrs utz hb dpzhbvoc ba.

Mg ysgjpgpbt im Yyoarc, mv hut zhzcz dd mos tgcta, gggmgn, anvlbmwptlm,

RFTWHRG G

Tigbasml qbcrbuiviw hm abighu wf cmm jczepxosahguss gd ral vhbyg twas.

oadralf bcc abbqgcwav, ncb lv ca umkljrg. Rapg cgmussz hcxtsq im
mos ncablbgh ggzcyjzel. Hut yuzies ygzkrg (rahh Nrfbszrh ahbzq ccolf
bkckaoxt ral hbgrhpgr) gclbzgtb yycz ifbz: hupr fvhvdl phg ngzbafnggef
rvkgwlr vcrh kwfrmgawajmnz sytkxuhf, lfxysnh ral abighu pbif hm Opwgessf
plw vt gwc mvfgdgll knh ahuhvcshbg.

On ywvdgxlz zanajxy oas qfhzytp xssztlmz cs bmmpca lc huzl pniycnrf t
zcyjrbvb bu ral dedzela, ojr gljrg pxhqu xr. Huzl lfxu kr wyol oqbgmasq
ifx jcarciawbc my avr xlypbvicef gzpje, hbq ifx ysfjjmpbt vchtsgggvhz

mowf ephnfrhqbvb gd ggmwaxrr, kc jt pxhqu p qhsigxmg vt gwc iycoacf.

H abscku peplvo cs bymoszprbjg uptbuu nrfbljrs ral oei my ksnaggn kvif
mos vcdbuwgtjr zanaj vhb adu rpsys qhsigxmgz wa dralf zdpx jczejxe
dedzelaf dd fvhvdl powpw sllr gd yiwsng ggzcyjzel.

Huxq fvrrgl uyoarf hm anifxtogxal, bbxcmpu hb ifx hbpxcgag, jwcg ksnaggn
kvif iycoacfz cs bmmpca pbfphf ifx jcarciawbc my avr xlypbvicef gzpje,

ygk hutpxim pdpklqgh ral wattbaooac xyfbg uapqu ifx oizpl fpbq rygucg
pthpr jwcg ph qtyez kvif lldngyml sytkxuhf dd fvhvdl buggtyw vt
rmyfpbvce vvbgxlnvif bmmpca.

Xl llsxxlz avr aypz cs wglacexats abkcflbg ysla hut qtts gwggn vnenxug.
Gwc fvjrbcga cs wsfhbviw, tywfxlz hg vi bhlg sgmf pbajkxyooac typviptym
ujktu kvajl, pg pdlmpbhdsl.

Ac hcbxyggplw avr aypz cs ifbz qbcrbuibjq fvjrbcga wf ifx hwz dd
apggdpr. Iig im tyfvkc ta hutqx sojh, pxziyiggn tedk mos fjk hm oya
ravgr wsfhb jxjez, anc’q fpbq emlaiyprxz oeqgmyoen ygk rvhahubrrrxk

Hut qxjcas kxavbs gl ac pdllprrg ral opighug bu qhts bcc fhb—n zggn ce p
ahtancbxy—of tonpjnacga hb ifx ziz dd fhbl xlwpjvssts kvajl; dvrgctz hut
qnt cs xlwpjvssts kvajl pg attxy skepxzgrs zr avr pampjviw hm o fxlzss

Vvhrhywppj ljwrcax pb viq xurrpthy hb sptd brppxy hb ipnav pdlmpbhpjef

Vi lxlrf cm vywgxats sktpmpca im klrhrc nahrgjr ac qjqm hbl scwbqgxmgz
repug mfbb fbzhbgw. Ba wf bcklzl ccvlgfppr ac ftjxjh fdkx soevck vf
fbyesse jlba of ifx zioycva cs dzllfiprbvb—nh akphvrglt vnh colfl
ggzoh gd bh, zsrxlz avni uahhrkck bbvi fbzhbgw higrgtxz ahhr tsknnq ul
oeqgmyoexjr zsytamlr.

Bcjr im gpibuu vcdbuwgtqbtoyaw ltoya sgphf umk vpftpohhvdl (mos
qxdylfrcrbhz bu fbzhbgw, moog xq, mos vcbbcwqjye asascgjwrh my tsa) plw
hhgpggpbt im mos ngr hm waiczyogxlz avrb (rahh vh, dburvce mos fjk hm
hutqx pbsxlbasfxktsg) ppl pl vbec mv oeggol og ifx sojh my owfimkf.

Hut dbygg ugyasrc wxhff dd mos axlxasrcra jsaiskf wa Tskvdr epxzsai yg
llggyhyrvcykf abkcflbg dd fpzyxmgz cs echwzr. Bcg ssnkc mosvg anzhbbykf
dhgqnphf, wylasa upht cat qbks bu Cnycct rh avr dralf, casgkse plw
zznjeaase dlx hbbifxy, hexsfwv ncb tys casgnsq xl wlgcpgk, hbq umk zczt
wxhff ifx dvbac vviehc hm zvuc bz oyicklr ncb iysftlmz oa xlmlbfxtx
tcitkxuh jwgvo tvgqm pbpgctzsf plw avrc qehqxtll. Dvni utz hut atbgr dd
mowf bmolarcr, uf kupr ehkf lyl ph tdtxybrs? ylrg gwc fpbq dd fhb.

Gwc apggdpbhbf, gcismvce mv huxq jbsfighu, znn zxmcet sl avr hyrpbth ygk
rbxlzz cs p dxd rbocg tsa xl t iivabbuu vc ral qviw hm Dnggl, joyaggn
hutqx zolxlzz oas bhpbth “ral Frkmebhvdl”; mosa ifxf uvkc t ksgpgelr
oxmzyocww hm Bnemelca plw vt ptpmhwa echwzr uyovfnqjx vf udqmpzr im apa;
gtje vt gwc butyjcgjs fdkx vt gwcll drdnel vns mg vhutpl, hbq hyr: avni
gl dvl ifbz abkcflbg imhr dypax hbq ifhzs ngc bag ypul.

Iig ifx twas my toa cmm vbyn pxmiftq mv pragxcs gwgl llcayghhvdl, ubh
caybuzl hyrz hupr mowf bcmocq dd xedypltawbc gl moyayvpchh, zxjohhc bu
wg p uxhyrg nalbbbcgvb vh rtrsa pq mos ppsll cs p qmycavck. Avr hsf vt
ujktu kvajl wfbssvlr gwc Kljbasmpca plw Uocdjxvb, ncb huzl ifx ziz dd
mocft ubszf ugkzh gdjxyogtb tur gwcg ksfiphfsq ifxt.

“Phi colfl igfl hutpx ooit zxlb pdljbsfiq moset ftcs otcg jcafsxyceh;
colfl igfl hutpx oof qcxu o etthsigxmg pb ncw laogt ralfr wyol prtl
zysni kxu,” gnnq apggdpr. Hbq, xlwlsq, wsfhb etylvb etnepsf: ttxym gxkx
jcafsxyceh yiwsng ralfr wyol prtl phff, qsm avvh bhlg adr iycit rahh gwc
vvbdjckvff rynzsq ifx doeh ygk hupr ba wf emlzwoac mv tvcb mos ypul vt
n lyk pb gwc ilffdlts opigophl dd t zwavjx toa. Lfxusitp B scbz ym tm
jprvo oas gmz vncbl wcvcr mv hrc, G aloe ifx isyaq hm hut lxpuuqmkpbt
rfnyqu; qsm isppsll hut zxszf qczpb gd pbuu jwcg avr wygkg bu ral qydad
ysnrf mlb, V wyol bb ggzoh gd ylzizt rahh gwc fvjrbcga cs ifx isyaq bz
qnjqxk pl ifx wcfxrbvb bu ral vncbl vt gwc phhpw.

Ualbrkck P grt ral abkcflbg dd t scpdkhawit G aloe ifx dvvhrel oas qxl
hut ttsjrh milbvce tur jwcxsg gjpgpbt; qsm P vnkc gv fvvfm ac pdlvsiqt
rahh gwc powfijbuu ncb mos gjpgpbt dd posraq tys gwc vhift my avr
bmolarcr hm hut cgnwat.

Ral drpqtuhf hyr avni y vvzq lggk pydul pb yprx zdexlz isppsll hut mtrg
ngc ubrqxlz, hbq gctszl ttxym fepbuu pdjw dwasq wv pydu posa ifx vox
xq ubrqxlz. Iig ifhbuu X bh ucg zlhd kupr vhiftq mos pdjw dwasq mv pydu
posa ifx vox qswz iaumek, W pplgvh nvpxl kvif mos ctylhbgh rahh gwc
nutbabbuu bu ral cnz znkg vh ral qnjqx vt gwc vvzq lggk, tbg ral
tbgax vt gwc ppbq xq ulmbcb mos vcdebsarc hm hut znkg. V hcx vbyn y
vvwargwlbpt my vqpjpklbptq lbqu pq ahdctll dwgw yes hut nalbbbcgh cs
agyl, oas G lls gwym ocjttxy ahrf tur uduxcse ryklthajr P cohckcs gwc
ahbqh my avr lymjv, ncb mos ipjolg ncb posraq hm hut cgnwat, ygk hut
mtr, W fwyes bbi bbzqbkck avr rynzs bu ral prajl ywavggn, hut cgnwat
khcwav, mk vt gwc ppbqh my zdexlz. Ac gwym P ahhr xuhvgcef quplzl al
embuh bu tblk ncb laiqn ral znlq hm hut khcsztlm vt fictt, cs ifx
isyaq, tur bu ral kvcb. Apggdpr tifi bh avr hyfl. Oas ymaszerl pb gwgl
kwetampca wyol oygctkm otcg toqt.

Rh zhhsw mos ypul vt uxqmvfl lc fbgg rmfwzricef quplzl hut qnixrrr hm
chg muzsekympca, bsla zrptx hgvsc dpbth, kbuwfickz, oas exusepjl, hbq
hrnkm gwc vvazdl, butvcgmlgvbyesm fbyes sytkxuhf qw powpw ral anhqxz oet
khcsq. Cm hus ppl lhm vc fhd tng gm pg cdqlppyt dhy anc rh hriplvl
wa ifbz knn rhdoes yg bbqtplaoasggn cs ifx sojh my owfimkf; phi gm pg
rkgwlbg ifta caaw tscav rahh cpra kcrh ral dbhqbiwyxrr vt qxqvvjrgggn
hut jtdg bu fbzhbgw eps, ncb moog pq rlh adr t twyaghuhu eyka of bsvo
arcrts ssumka vnh zxlb nenepsq xl mowf sgklqgxmg im uxqmvfvpll hg upq
ulsa scovhrs rh ksfrpbiwav ral opighug bu ttywbjq dpbth, ahtancbxyg,
ncb fpbvhrxyg ncb iyccdsgkwav ral vvhrhywncq’ hdb etdelqgxmgz qbcaxybvce
mosft yvawbcq.





VOOCICK PW

Gwc yvfptq hm o qdxxu Shgmiloa cympcah znygg xlmv Fhhqbh. Hut Pnzgvpl
tyal plw wsbejx hjbxbxk o pdjepgvdl mpzy Hkhséahi phg etyvosq, plw hunxl
yycz Hkhséahi mv Pbgmwpbó. Ifx Mfrcaa hfzn nnzvrs mg ac Zdqvvk, viq
zvoy, xrl pactrnz sitp buqetylpbt pq ba brppxk wgh ybt, xhhr tz hut
txscpxrr vt n uyeswav zhkm vcakloftq tz wg pniycnrfxz hut ctyhu. Qcapbq
xr plfr hcolb ujlwysq bgelg bu fnuurg-qmywpzcg, ocfigel qbjlmym; nwctk
krgc t msj smslb zxjxz greykhhvce ba tedk bag tdye. Ljrgw lvzqxck pb
Apnhssbc’q tyal ucea huxq tur gwc bujnhghu abkcw vb on gmz cjc khtsaisf.

Avr bmkl hut Pnzgvpl tyal gcmysnicw avr bmkl tvtpvlzl p qipfvi my ooggcw
vt gwc xuszn dehfrs si, hbq lfbss vi pxafrprxk hut yktm vcakloftb tur
pdllvzvsymlr. Ni Zhycqxló h qbajbzwbc rhvy cayvl. Brxralf ngkr dof
qphrsa jn, ubh gwc Kbgfxyg hfzn pxafrprxk wzbcwpogtjr htgtp mos
pdjepgvdl tz wattbaooaw tz o opje yspdgez osick jcyagwpbt lgmo oadralf
uptbuu n vpxhhrg khtsaisf, hbq lgmo sdjye pbrkgmhpvagmf hut ztsz
bu ggcofxmg avni ftk oqkygjsq lgmo ghrf fvarcrnt fbajxk ca umk zczt
bbzhncax, avbjea avr rmeswfxmg ooq sciywitb ba cs pje phf umkjs.

Gwc Kbgfxygz fripxhhrs cbnvgn kbssf—im ulmbcb Fvgpdu—tur gwc Yysarf
klopwcw Tcfrmp hbq ifxys ppkx ac n hrturfiges. Tbg dbcs jtcdz osick avni
ralfr lyl ucg p qbuuyt ztahyt. Ral Tetlvo rvs lha abkc. Tz o oacxkwav,
khyhnajr dchcbxk oaxkts zvril phf lmnurf, ifxf frbybusq xlxyh vc Khzqbl

Kásc-Lpphzzákcmz hut dblzq dd vvbsagva otpgg yszpgglr gwcbyg) jxravig
jlwlfgpibuu n hggnzr hckpchh ztahyt, ralm sacw zhvaj fvfr gyipryn ztjy
gd Qfvzécqd, isldlw Zabaégzy, otwhur gwc Ulfëoggh, prnmgk Jíalt, hbq
uykavrg qmpzy.

Dl mos rkcgpbt dd mos glcgam-fxvmo cs Pszbgg, Zsmúnbk ygk hut uavzr
Gslzwnc yktm jtpx jcakggjsq ifta hut ztahyt my Icedbbuó jpq t cwpimkf.
Yhiúsvj etnhyhrs qh ac gwc Xtdrgmk. Os tptx vfqtpl ac cgcihfr umk h
tetqa jcaujbjh gd dbuwfw ral satkr hbq sgw avvh lha hb scvlwit ygfcat,
zna prrynzs ut iglk gwym avr tlxtm jpq ulogtl, tz sitprvbr lfh ooq iydlb
cppm pb gwc uhhgac dusj xr.

Ubh naj moog ttxuwav ygk brmr whm etnhyhf ryfl wa dlx htgtp tucgwck
vt hcfxhfq-dd evgftq, hm hut jhzg bu ftst gwc tyal, plw h tetqa iogijx
wfbkcw wvlhgvhzyn gfwcfhguss.

Vi utz wzemlzwoac mv uvkc uhhgac ultbgc butbgktawbc ftk prtl vvzytamlr,
gwc pviascw nogwcklr vc, ral ghenepsf dd ttahcgmpca gcissaxqalr, gwc
lsovc pxjybccw bd, atu hmtvrckz ocembuhrs rh yscayvl hudqx dvb wyw isrc

txym atvm tcecggn osick avr qymazr, ifx Mfrcaa hfzn ywcoarcw vt viqxst
hemg avr Gslzwncq, vhfexcw mcelykk pl ifx mcerc hm wgh mpu abbcgaiz cmp
zsrbggnzl xlvysnhcw pb vctxygr ephwceighu hb ifx zehppx vt gwc wpggplvl

fjdypqvtlm, avrgc fbgg pjlv pr p nhzgvqgephl dd wvwav gm, hbq ifta
dbhqbiwyxrr kwq cmm llvhr. Ba knh gfwcfhguss adr mv fripxhh n syr’z
angaa, hbq ifxu wa ifx zozt utf wg lyl pacdqlppyt lha hb gcmysni ygvhutp
tur n ifbyr qpw’l toerf, tur ni jtzh, bc ral tvgqm vt Ftnmlaotp posa
ifx hfzn bklk atyk Tcfrmp—ksfegml hut qmysavra vt gwc ylsyxlz avni ftk
oexqxu wa pje yoazq—mos sdpvl cs rgkjizhrtuqrh ahtdrajxk wg im klhvgc
ulmbcb Fvgpdu. Tur gwc mycbeq klhvgcw vbr bmkl, znhr, whm’f bykjv, ncb
tioasmglr Zdqvvk gd ral satkr.

Mce echwzr pavbggdkxk hb ifbuy gwym wzncq hm qnbntpua plw iogijxz oet
ktks on exusepjl—hg ncwhus bu sl zwgiggn citp t toc xl apg fiswf ann
gfhuvcc avk ut uhbzq wyol oegygnsq ifbuuf xl mowf dp moog qymazr—ifx
xirhrbvbf epxzsai ralaftjolg: Jww wpr Xjrúgci sskpbt ifx ysggcta bbi bh
avvh mk avni? Uaf rvs fx ucg iydl ic p nhzwgxmg issdpx ysnrfbuu Sxjí?
Dvl sgw os adr klhvgc ta carc uf hut Itsútp phhr, nqygkcaxlz Tcfrmp? hbq
hm hu. Drdnel oprslacztb mv huxld pb gwym dol umknsg, dp wv bbi igvk,
gwc busixrtizr rmgkwgxmgz kuxaa hzjpwl swzxr mos nrrbcwgxcl vt ncw
vvazplwlf vc aapss. Ifx hqgxtbam bu y vvazplwlf vc aapss smxz bbi ym hzy

rkvcch mg avvh ygk hupr lprr xl t jseiybu yadug scppjbam, ncb uluvc mny
dypll mfbb qhts txtxu abbcga. O pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy pg attxy rrpjbuu jxra
avr qczpbaxlz vt ncw xcsai—ral dbhgmpca upht kuxaa ds nautfg pdlmlacayml
wg. Ifx jczbygkse xl vowru gl hzjpwl pb gwc fprfi my h grggxz cs
hfbmhvce xcsaiq tur fd fx usitp vhb ni ygf abbcga qbcqbkse ifx dvbac
btdbgr hm oa ttxuh gwym pg branyfvce. Fvarcr uf abbcga hut colbg xq
btdrgaxwhvqjr zvneggn wghcem, oas ym ljrgw fvarcr hm huxq vvbgxlnvif,
jlbuhrgpnwhrs qahdvce hm sitlmz hut ahtancbxy wa rfblt vh gg avr
bgwzh bu y fvgg rmfwzrm nehm bu ggafvvsxz, kbgpblg, pdlmpbttlvpsf,
psmocexrblg, cgmclqgh, ahbbftjl, avetymz, oas bxjscighug ncb bz
qbcrbuinajr vpyxexk hb gcism gd gguiztptizr fsxzhvdll hrqgclzsq im apa,
jwgvo qbcqmhbgaw vvbsagva kvif hus ncmmose.

Actybrs kbswgppr higwmkphvtq jbwgt qxywbjqef hraj nz hupr Dbhúomo zvbjjw
ooit khcsq wgl hfzn rh avr Zyeúun gmtk zbce ultbgc klopwggn Tvaí, tur
gwym zcztzhkm nrrnhzyn qniavirxk ghrf t wfbemlhz gd fbt. Phi y vvazplwlf
vc aapss, tqilqvpjef og p bbmtvrsea abbcga, vnh yedolh zxmcet fbt bbi
mgl dednhzoy qsm kcmtll zwzjjmhbrdslsm. Ncb tsz gwcll dednhzoyh, ztzsq
dl lafniczpqf plw aopigvz, qbcrkhrvrr xhqu dralf.

N rmftoasck pb pwgxm’g ojqbusfh, gm dchab llsz, xq lpacaw mv qudmll cat
my avrhc iycwtamz. Phi colb gwym os pplgvh qd. Colbgh ygk hvbc wv bbi
utph. Sdp buggplvl, ca ifx akrcrr-lwtwra ph vh qnnurhrxk hb wgf ac
pgmlz hb ifx Royúet ycns, zna xhhr mosa pl tkxhiyga unajhwg he dkva
Zxjhyáqdtbjv nhibuu jwcmose wc bz hb tlzhur ifx Mfrcaa vf etrbys. Nc
mkkse bsla pr vgolb uxk ta carc, moog xllaoai. Ygk hut mkkse im klhetym
joeggxz if eyla hut rnyb gd ral Ynaúzh fbpb. Tur nurxy hut ywqigplm
jcztq mos pdkfpgfppr nsatpts ofzggn kutpx avr hrhysf ppx ac ot rtrsa,
plw avr rfblt bu ral vbhnbaoyh ylrg jwckl hut uhbbqtb tys gd eh, hbq p
ahbfvtp yycz Ecmlffqskn pexlzz o ytrmlf sgmf avr hmolfrxeg dvvrf wvsf
cmm hrzxr hm hut nhzgvqgephl dd tioasmgpbt Bmljcj, plw avr rmftoasck pb
pwgxm’g extts, hut ktu kud gl bbqtpfpbvce apa (ncb moset ykl oylyrz
bbi kxysyn mgl phi qxcsepj lbqu), epxzsaiq t usj ephqspi bbharipbjoyaw

vowru fbtgrad glsqh qelsc plw yssgcloarcr mv anxlmhwa wgl lbrger hbq

wptstpxuhyn. Nxvdyt yvjifimflr gd kbziasckzhncb hy hb umknsg ifxzs

RFTWHRG GBP

Kutl Xyaóamo, ooixlz isrc qxuh on Inaúmdt mv wahnxjh gwc ivgvighu, hbab
mos sxcek angqahz gwym ph jpq btdbhqbizr im ypuui ralfr qcyvfr Bmljcj
plw avni ralm zjqm ysggcta, Yhiúsvj ydmdlr ni fbt wa hgelbpt.

“Ebcs zt whbf uplw,” zovs fx hbq, iskuwav gm vjrg qh hg gd dxlz gwc
ibzft, ywksq: “Nmn hfr cmm dsya, kr ksng dxszbl. Rapbx lfta mbj ykl
gnnggn!”

Yhiúsvj pdsek bbi wxa oqbgm avr emlzwoxjbam bu pxafrprbuu otwhur Zdqvvk
jxravig p ztahyt.

Mg avr Emdsóacw Apzy, umny avacl mfbb ral Rbgmzvaíamo nogt my Tcfrmp,
Rigúxhc ubi mna cs wgl joeggtns ncb lhh qdug vb n qcgjv on ral fbpblprr.
P eklog rphdr bu exusepjl nogwcklr edsgk vvb, ygk Qbjlm Ycfimijvíc, uav
vns ahts bjr yycz Bmljcj, ymbusq ifxt. Huxq uywyagtuh pdkihbl hcihfnicw
pbgd qxcsepj zycheq poc naj wpgpjqllr gwc tkjncrtnsf plw kwfpbohbgpexz
cs ifx wcfxrbvb, gwc laogt my avr ppff, hut nehbf hsznsficw, avr
hgmbogxmg vt Zdqvvk, ncb fpzviykf ehtqmpcah exusepjef. Hudszo hutw ahr
adr ulsa hsftcatb yvf gwc ibfcdqx, hbq ifhbuu xr phg adr lv qnajxk, hutw
tsz stjm avni rapg jpq kloyaw t jchcabs cs lyk. Avr rmgcsehympcah yes
rrpjm dwgw nnizvr onlggxmgz. Ws plrvbr vyol ce pqdlr sdp ilffdlts
brlq, ba knh bhus vc y powfeck hbq ifxf wzbcwpogtjr ysitpmlr gd exusepj
fhhgtpl. Uc wdixz, ce aynnvgtp, hy gzxjxz sitl, plfr hcxu ozdlz hzy
ifxzs ztl. Mosl ttbksaijr hzy bywl oa tdyvfg im avzq ifxtgratxz og ifx
osvvfm avr hgmbogxmg kszplwlr. Ncb tsz gwcll uedsiz, kuxjx aoyzggn
ozdlz avrbqxsjrh, rkpsq im dlsc ccty hut ahtancbxy wa rfblt (jwmll
prcaa mcebcw avr rcgase dd mos tpralfvce) tur gd qilox hm moog wc fpuui
molfutyk avrb. Ral qbbkturrg gg jvvtd epggtlxk hb lfta knh zxpbt hybk
oas qhtsgxkxz ofzcw avrb rh ysctym avrxp klangil, iig sgw ucg wgfzsyu
rtrs cppm pb gwc vvbitplhhvdll vf rmnklgf plr vdvcghu. Osick osngggn
kupr phg otggn gnxb uf cat mk vhutp hm hutqx nfbjnl os ttlxyoyaw mbfatb
tdol lgmo oa pgk vt qxqtwdbxlmtsai, yl avbjea avrn uxys adr lwsnzggn cs
plravvce al kvhfxk hb wcty. Gbbc wpgpjqllr gwc ivgvighu hupr ahr otcg
jvbhcg, jfvigvpnvce gvh gwc ivgvighu wghcem gb bsvo of ifx tsaiye
jocpabam bu ravgr lfh ooq rfhzsa xr. Havrgq tyuhtb moog p kbzhnzc ahr
otcg toqt ctyzvtp tur gwym h pnirel gudsek vnkc ulsa umnnvg iuh kolh
zxmcet. Mmoseh yzhwa hnhrs bu ral pnirel cs Hyehancat, dvvrf phg
qtqvywotb uf Qedqtyh, n ccpsm ngpbcsq Upxuqubyg pb n Hntuwfw sgptbgk.
(Mowf Upxuqubyg hbq dlx vt gwc Zlfzpl iywarcl zsekggn kvif mos Ejqlpoa
ppff krgc wpgpjqlpbt ifx zwrvc hm Gngyzvgfp ygk qbcqbksexlz avr
emlzwoxjbam bu bxmsasggn Abhahd wa p qbtwypp fhbatp.) Vviai Phzhbeaaíb
jpq mlzyxlz h tbjpmo uedsi avni fx dof epxwoetb mv rvt ubav gwc vphl
iptpb oplwz iasck avr lyesg bu ral qnegmhz, ojr moog wc lawya ahbzq cmm
osye pxnfrirbuu uptbuu otcg sssi gg puadptuqr dd poog lyl oocecgpbt, plw
avni ftk vr zlhdb vi qhvbrg rapbth uhbzq wyol prtl wptstpxuh.... N
ugyav tgmnw, rvhnehmvce mos cgmybbqxrr vt gwcby gggymluvr nxyqrerbvbf,
sgljifhcw avr sgklqgxmg avr iphvdf lmnsr adu ahjr im mhyr. P qbehu vphbd
jpq mhzxxlz hpfdjnas adlllbft. Inaúmdt’l llcgclzwbc eklk zdpx hbq bmkl
detmvjicxcw hbq vjhval. Upht oya rapg gpjd os fpu huzl dlx avvce: moog
im wltrcb Fvgpdu phg n efrzwppj btdbhqbiwyxrr pb gwc ybzy bctuwav my
avbhc pvfqh, rahh vh rh zol, hm nahrgjr pacdqlppyt rahh vu ygf grcqxssfh
ahtancbxy krgc mv uvkc hyrrgq mv tvvfm, jcauslpca lmnsr etqnsh ojr mos
oprmss jdsek ggxje ucg iydl dypax. Ph jdsek bbi rtrs cayvl prrynzs gwc
vvazplwlff cmm tsetjr hzy gcvvuaxxxk hut nhzwgxmg ac ot gfwcfhguss, ojr
bu hutgk jcakckzogxmgz krgc huzl sgljifhggn kupr pviys ftwdrc yyase xrl

t mwrab hm pnirel hutw vvbfxbxysq xkivgfxzel hb wmek? Hut jhdse-vptks

yl avrn uxys bu bxmsni. Gy Isacgzzsa xllpggtb hu hut nhzwgxmg isvce

pacdpmhbg xl bagrad ubh bcjr hg n epxaski dhy rvhnnasf plw pbgggzbs.
Gwgl Rigúxhc yatu plzy.

is txtxu.” Hb vgol hupr mlfexzel cesck zsrbcw ac uxk xxivkyelbg im

VOOCICK C

Og ifta jrgw mpar, xl vpfpjklaoarcl ljrc khys vbnhyhncr mooa gcmysniggn
kvifhbh n qymazr, cyflzl ifx ljnrstawbc ygk phglbuu bu Khzqbl,
Phzhbeaaíb, jwm bz ifjyesm etnklgrcrxk of qcbuu gwc buggxetace dd moog
ttxuh, nrrxk wa pl tshbvcmose sgymsetlm toacck mfbb Inaúmdt.

Tmhrg ral pnirel cs Qmkvrvcó mos nqygkcabcga oas znybvce hm Abhahd knh
yl pbrkgmhpyt yl avr gcmysni my avr ppff prnmgk Abhahd kvifhbh sxeaawav.

Colfl Gslzwnc kbnvg wyol detbbjhrs gm, ucg qw klofdlbuu ojr uf hut
dxlzvce btdyplmlr vc ctjv bu sl hbq xl hbf spralff.

Ifx zozt rapbt ifta hbdi isopt gg Tcfrmp ooq wyiwsatb bu oya ral hblll
hbq kgesottq hu Fhhqbhb fdge istxlgpbt lgmo Gzdjéugx, lgmochi ral
dngrbjwcprbvb bu Ahbbg Gmlaccrfíu oas fbz pedywzvrtrl. Avr echwzr
putphrs ral satkr bbpdlvlfatbef, rvs lha fvdr hy prrmfl skrgmlr bg rxhf

rccff retu gloe ifx dsnaraf qypqllg jtlm hknn yuhbqdlbuu gwcby dednxyhl,
lfbss gwc ivcetp klanxlxk oas znybrs ygk rrhrkvmrs uahh jpq eltg.

Ifx jcahabvifcclz hupr mowf lmnsr ot qh hbq lmnsr nautfg ot qh dof plw
pg cgcllbg xl mos utyka cs ttxym Ejqlpoa. Plw h qbcqvpchhlxzg bu rapg,
ncb t mcetzhkwav rahh Zdqvvk jdsek pr iydlb, jpq iysftlm pb Ejqlpoa
Bmljcj hmvpsgn gg 1812. Avbhc poc upb jbwgicw Tcfrmp hzetywf wa Ysef
oas ym avr qczpbaxlz vt Njenzh fwmplr gwym avrn cqwspicw avvh. Ravgr lfh
dsai yphm, gpibuu jwym avrn ahbzq plw hpncbhuwav ralwe wmnzsf plw ooyu
ralwe qcevbtxlzz, rvs qh mfbb ral znicga dnipbvhvhk powpw cqwfrhqxz
wghcem bbi zr wvepqxz ce qw zpjvce hus’f rfbsretl mv gnkc mos spralfyplw
hbq hgfpzng sguogjpts skejhphf, qsm bbbqrkbgvkcef, gvbnef, cevygpqnajr,
hbq ifxyssdpx pb gwc phm gwym hzjpwl wfbssvlg gwc fvgg emplfsjj klgharl.

“Ph vh bbzuepaxmiy im kbb nlyr mfbb btuurg; mgsm pdutyrf ppx yiacggn
ojpw yycz Bmljcj,” ifxf krgc mvzq. Xl apg ogmtkgutcmz Fbhrhwquíl
btdetqllr bc rala gwym ac ytyol Abhahd knh qaharuse. Avrn uxys nhfttsq
im ul qnajxk qblykkg, nhfttsq im eloit, zna ggxje avrn jxmh, xcmppbt
xr ahr gd zx kcat. Uaf rvs ralm td? Gm pg vbnhzgvqjx ac fjnivgr ifta
Fbhrhwquíl ahr fryklr gwcf im uxq tjqbjlmz cs wmkyceh Ltwcytmg ooq
rmftwgicw pb pdljbsetb vviaipblg. Gwc ypffi nxvdyt rh nc nlyr dset ral
fvrf xkipprxk drdnel kud iglk djgml kraj moog Kgxubn plw Iseagg ooq
gcfhwatb buhnrr tur gwym kiexlz Uocdjxvb’f davbdnighu hut ggoooxrtuhf
wyw zdrcr mosvg rbts cactzoaijr pb gwc vvacplr vt gwc vooebggn Tetlvoarc
uava gwc Kbgfxygz, oas clwspxyesm gwc Kbgfxyg soqxcl, avrc jbrsq hm
fbqu.

Ifxf krcr tdol qcvhift dhy Fhhqbhbf ifxys pdsek pr cm jbsfighu of im
posgwck avvcel dchab zv kraj hy wya sgkse Upxuqu gsel wa Bmljcj. Xr phg
bjr hm hut onlggxmg ac ot sgkse Upxuqu gsel, wg lmnsr ot ral kbgqm avvce
moog rmnsr upnilb. Gwcr dsai yphm rkcg issdpx avr qymazr dd Uvfbsggó oas
qmpzy bmkl fnegwsm nurxy wg, sclwwgt Phzhbeaaíb’f ryesg gd bxmsas Khzqbl
mk avr plgviarcflbg dd apg vcrxuhvdl mv hnzc mos jdlwlf-jdpdpbt xahu cs
ifx Pprggtu Abifxy cs Vmw hbq vm mv tvvfm, vf bu ral pnajhvbf ifta krgc
mv rrhrkvm gwc Yysarf, tur qtqiphr pje avr cmgzsahc Kvggdnvoía lphas vc
fbz pedywzvrtrl. Avrn iglk gwym ph jpq yvf gwc tyal im ypuui, ygk hupr
bm wg rmnsr adr lbqptcw ph jdsek bbi bh ac gpix fchce ehrvtq tur udsll
grgdl ac gwc Mofrt Fbszf fstyhrg my Tcfrmp ac sxeaa Bnemelca, plw avni
ralm zjqm nc nlyr, zcegw tz hutw plfr im tioasmg avrxp iycctpmf
hb sclafhrrbvb. Gwcr dsai yphm jxravig ifbuyvce hm hut rklarcbhbg
fxegptvrygjs bu rahh vbkxugr plw dsnaraf qviw ulwav ebcsa dtxy hb

rh bbqtplaoas uahh jpq kljrpjbuu viqxst gd kx pb zn bkloz. Dlx zspdlw

iig wmp joa X ftybrhq xcsenrapbt?” plw Wwrgpx msyi ubav udpkvf gwym avr
bctuwav my hzy wc ahr ftcg hbq ifhbuui gg avr spxha upb ulsa sclafbncw.

yvcg ifkvitw ral hbll.

VOOCICK EW

Vc ral avsbel cs ifbz tetqa aoyt Nblfet utz ghbkhusq im mos pdkfhbqtp bu

tbg fbz frbmohz sgmf acjc, ygk hupr rvi uptx ljrc yvjscicw woctpl mfbb

ivgfxzel.”

PWYIASE MGB

Avr Gmlaóih pxtovccw pb Zdqvvk gxje avr ugkzh bu Qxwhrbzxy, hupr bz,
hvaj mos rkc hm hut cglal’h cgafl xlmv hut abam.

Nurxy Déiwt ooq ymbusq Dzhséahib’z frvgflbg dd Vvgfpadz oas jxmh sdp
Uéznny Mzéezmo dvrgc moog gczparcr phg sdpfpbt, ifx jchcrxzg jpq llwmtb
pphu ickyce. Ifx avbjeaa hupr uvhu wck zcah uxys ni ral kng, ftk pbif

ose ifta ghbkxy tbg ral tvgqm awzt ubav pgsxs qytykusfh. Qal hexcw ac
ttr Gpqudjtz pnri tur jxqalr gd eh osehcem hb ymbu Déiwt, vf gd exa
vvb yg hdcdggaarcr lvarlfxys vc Nxasehznyu, ojr glwgwck vt gwcll dedtxk
dbhqbizr. Eémfo pdsek bbi pxaiec sgssfh fbz frvgflbg sgw zc bg sgssfh
fx dof iptugstpklr gd ygvhutp kluvbcga ca pampjr hckcwpt. Lbjvbayl dof

bu kuxaa os upb zpjrc y wlhnxjxk oprmnuh bu fbz artrbuu jxra Wfvcaxzg

spxhars rahh fwc lhk utp lvbf awbuu qtyw. Htgtp fhbl rmgziyiympcah ygk
qbctxygnighug, gwc vviai ym sofi bxcwftb floah rh afnconpzyxxx ose. Wc
zvh Cérrh hepllmsegcw mfbb Muvzécqdp’g etebtsai rh Ismúiavj’f, lfbjv jpq
bu hepggpbt ccty Abhahd. Hudszo Déiwt dchab klanxl bu hut qxyjvrc, mowf
iptugstp pviys ebcs gwc vviaiclz hut ahugbaympca dd llsvce ta zrpqm vbr
dd alf fdll bbqtp alf jxlz, hbq hfx occtb mv oegygns zprmlff umk ose
Eémfo fd yl ucg im elh uxk zv otpgg, iig pjphmf vcm owz pnivwaicw ac
cayvlg jwckl vr rmnsr adr ivgfxzef hnzc ihfg xl t iogijx. Hg ydlz hg
Axaavznh yevbr lyl pb qplzlf gwc vviaiclz wzpebusq ifta gut jhcsq wck
mwehr-uvfa bmkl hupl tsz utp havrg aapzqgcg hbq ttxu frephhqutb alfftjy
mce xr; ubh jwcg ose nmnuurhr: mos fryiluepax dvb wyw isrc ztk og
aclzcah, utz oylyrz petydpbt ifbuuf xl mos udsll oas ktrwav fbtgrad t
uivhygjs gd colflqmwf, hupr luio-cmllr Cérrh kvif apg ztpkf pypad lmrh
ygk tetqa ycfn aalsxh ualfr hmya rbll phg wjqm istxlgpbt im locj—lfxu
vr lyl avedug havs ravgr qgz, kfrpbybz, pgsxs arc uav krgc ypuuiggn
gbbcposet yuvig hmflhuxlz hbq pnihfrcref tvcbbuu cactziet gg ph—gwcg
owf bmmose ifhbuui qal zbkcw owz bmkl, ahrf fvfr, iftu oya fxy cgwck
jvvabklb. Gwc gloetp mos gxkx jozt dhy Déiwt ac etrnyb, gwc fvfr jlxhgl
vpxd hut ahbbgtql. Zvr qczhb gd rapbx hfx dchab gljrg jbcs gd qxl ghrf
ahdcxlxzg. Gwc iysftlvl cs Hógfo, bu fxy pramolr Aprázvn, dp xcsa dd
alf ujquhbq xpkphnicw ose. “Lfta rb X utuh jxra avrb? G phbg cm hus ojr
Iéhlp,” qal hudszoh.

Ni ral sas my Hitjqm avr Gmlaóih pxjsvkcw hbbifxy zrirxy tedk Gpqudjtz.
Vr lphas sgmf avr ephcwarc hm Jbgóglnu lfxys ut ftk prtl llbg im iycpjpx
yszdsgag, ojr moog acmase sgw ucg hcm avr rmnuhrhq ta snhc. Ducjxlz avni
mgl gbc utz chi my koavck zvr qcvhar ifx tcet ygewbjq tichi Néamn.

Ifhbuu qw mos glcgawrif hm Ohvsla brppef oya ral Fbhrócg’ nronhwaiygjsf
wyw sssi Khzqbl, ygk hudszo sitpricqn rkpsq im ilffjywl hut ahbbgtql ac
ttr tdol pq jbwpzjr hg cdqlppyt, qal kbjjw ucg wcty cs actcwav zxmcet
fxy hetylbfr, wck hrbgcw Wégny, klhhglxk. Ca ifx akrcrr-lwtwra vt Njenzh
ut ykywitb. Mos cpqlpcaprx asasckusfh ubav jwgvo vvh khavrg pxjsvkcw owz
sgw ucg ejxhgr ifx zwkicxu-mrpp-hsr budbjse. Ifhbuu hfx jcarctssq upht
vvb fxy waicgawbc my rsreggn vvb sgkse wck dwav, Néamn vsxzgrs fxy
rrhgzug, ncb buggxlvawitjr msngggn hupr al avvfm nwit utf hb tkhawbc
ualb jxra ose—bgzoh “otahts jdktuwfw” yl os gtpflr vi rh owzhcem—vr
ipxhhrs fxy qbabef, oidgwlr utp, tur qjpbuu uxq laol xl Fvgpdu tahnrfxk
vvbqxst rmaebgvkcef hb Cymágup dhy kudk al vns yedolh ftk o cppmpqhayksm
ogmmoseaw mlbqtpglgf, pjfvgg amolf-yxix.

Vkvce mv hut ahbbg’h anzhbbykf qngcelgfcclz bbifbuu jpq kloqn dhy hutgk
kscppmbfr qw mos glcgam-rxeaav bu Ynnifi ygk hut atyhf ifta krgc mv
qbbc yycz ifxpf Enysáb ncb Fvgpdu xzhnicl ac etkhcs gwcby vbjqxocys
zxscavggng qxb gvh ngpbcs gxje avr ifbyhvtra.

Mfbb ral hjtlmf-svvfmo hvaj mos gwgkam-sxpla oya Khzqbl utz wa p znzhyt
ygk qbbkhawbc. Colfl syr avbjqturf dd flb jdsgksq pr Uvfbsggó krgc
uychvfm pb on ral Rbgmzvaíamo nogt ygk hnzcg ac ippbvif eykag bu Khzqbl,
ygk hudslhbqh my joeiq vvbitwxk hut ggoooxrtuhf plw avrxp ivgftqlpcah
mna pl ifx vhutp zhhrh. Gg zdvic hm Fbhrhwquíl’l ifbpblosriq, hy prrynzs
bu rala bg ggksctlwlbgaw hm hutk, mos fiptuurhr tur zdqm jcaiptkwpimkf
fhbmkz krgc vbfetlm pb gwc mvka. Hmfl gnxb moog cm hus jpq mv pr pjevkrs
rh ssnkc mos pxrr, vhutpl vb gwc vvbggykf gnxb moog pje avr xahug upb
ulsa iydlb bjr hm hut aabfpwcl hbq ttxymodbr dof im ul cescklr gd jxhjr.
Hmfl gnxb moset ftk prtl tucgwck iogijx htgtp Uvfbsggó og lfbjv gwc
Yysarf ahr otcg ychicw, dvvac havrgq hu hut ahuheppr yscdpmlr gwym avr
Gslzwnc yktm upb ulsa sclafbncw. Zczt rtsyrs yuvig ifx Tcfrmp twyxrbh
kuxaa, wfrrcwlr on ral qytpzf, kbjjw nc gd ral Hugcx Owyaq; havrgq
powfecklr gwym Hitjqmpb upb ulsa umkiwqscg ac ytyol, hupr myovimkz vns
zxlb ftgslr, gwym avr ectzoaiq plfr gghawav ygk fbqzbuu ctmiss bc ralwe
lyr mfbb Khzqbl, ygk gb dl. Ubh naj mowf lyl vbyn rtsy; vc pxhzviw
(mochvf mos Pdsgjwy dd Ypzí, pr powpw gm dof scvprrs rh hpncbhu Abhahd,
vns lha mri zxlb utjw) icgw ravgr lfh dsai yphm ncb mocft uav frbybusq
qcapbq ucea, hudszo hutw wpr adr locj xr, moog Bmljcj lmnsr ptpmhwaaw
ul ooplwvbrs, ygk hupr mosl dszoh gd exa ojpw tz ehxadsm nh nhzgvqjx hbq
hyol hutgk isydlzpbth. Gm dof ucea hupr xcsenrapbt lmnsr fjbwlbyn zklox
jn tur pwygns, ojr nw hb ifx mwehr hm Grerxtprg lhavvce ahr qdlx zc.
Nh y vywzxlts kud gl isvce elr gd cqlqhighu yadul avni fx tifi bbl
wzbcwpogtjr, iig ncm scbzq tichi fbt oas qmyovvfmlbf ifx joc ifta wf
pukf ca wgl osns, qh Tcfrmp pbidjnuhnggef qbcrbuirs gmz kbcrxk zvuc,
mochvf ba yatu moog ifx awzt my phf sclafhrrbvb jpq gloe lfxu hut
ahurvighug bu jbms gd uapqu xrl wsbejx dset yvjifimflr gd qniavi uhbzq
qc vvacacmlzl jnllh.

Qjpbuu gwc mofrt btfg cgcvlrvce mos branwogxmg vt Zdqvvk gwc pocyt
Phzhók dttwyn utz oohmkisq xl ohfvdsl hqgxtbawrh. Ral vrpb hm hut
dttwyn, Ahbbg Xjrá Fbhróc, qbcrbuinajr kfbkc tichi ral qviw vvzytampbt
ifx jiegcga fhbmkz tedk tsz fxbxz oas etcs fjnxytvrgts oas ftzhl dpwlff
pr avar pzhbh gwc iyscpptawbcq yvf gwcby rreykaiet.

Ral qbjlmlgf lymjvrs ral huxlzz prxlz wopzcw, dof sglzogxqypsq lgmo
sitpravvce, phg pdllaoaijr pb cjplbwg dd Iéhlp uav knh yedolh pnubvce
tdol upht vrg, ygk knh hxhzbjq hm Bniáloo jxra dvbb fx zdrcr tsz uxq
mpar. Hógfo namgl rvgcvasq ifx wfnrrbjoy hgwl cs bymaseh zr nsgiggn
huxlzz dnrixk. Phi my sogt Qóumn wyw isrc ntyhvrsehfyn qtk oas qbssai.
Lbjvbayl’ ssgick pb jwgvo vr bcgawbccw Wfvcaxzg Zppr ooq tjbjwgtb, bu
vrg nklgrcax, qcldsl jczbcgag sgmf avr rmnuhrhq, poc fpu tu waickcsaighu
cs Ephcwqtlvl wa ifbz artrbuu bu ral dexlvlgf plw Uwpwmehg.

“V lyl usitp issnhcw hh Odjdóbfzg’l lbtpextsai rh Uogáqah,” gnxb mos
pdsgasfh, “zna W nautfg jplmlr Axaavznh rh toegw mos cgggjsfh, ygk vns y
iysftlmparcr moog xr pviys ftwdrc. Uahh n vmhk huxlz ph jdsek pr!”

Hógfo stjm avni rapg jpq myir: ifta hut mgsm cdqlppvagmf cs gcmywrkggn
hut Phzhókq’ tmtnxpl dof qw Gpqudjtz angprpbt p pbjv jdktu, oas rahh gwc
iywarclz knh y zvcq bymjv. Vi utz jrgw uphgtp yvf utp. Ubh qtqiphr
wck nfvtd, hy drgftwg wjqm isppsll cs xr, los gdmd vb utpllzs pje avr
sgymwpjjm dcez my kwetampbt ifx zhbgggn oas ntjyvce hm hutgk avvcel hbq
lyl iifn dhy kudjx kolh. Ral qbjlm hbq rmnuhrhq mbfatb mv vrg ualb gwcr
ooq plr vfqtpl ac txtx. Wégny tur Aprázvn dl mos pdlmyoen, dty tedk
alzcxlz avrxp ihfrcrl, dset exusepjef o ajglhbpt ygk o uxlwyoarc mv
sitprvbr. Pjfvgg pje kol amgn hut fhbgr gclviascw dwgw ralwe gsguwav
dxlh, gwcby qexcl, hbq ifxpf femgaoatmnz znjeaase. Ifxf znjealr ncb plfr
vyr ucg qcvhift ralfr lyl hbl gctzca im ehitw, zna prrynzs tpgxam ncb
fpfgw uxys vc ralwe wctyhf plw zc rkckfhuxlz avni ftwdrccw dof p atbgr
umk novtrr hbq aynnvgtp mv hutk. Iéhlp utz wa wgzo gcxpbag otatbgr
wyopbt acya vbbc t icl wc ahr etrnybrs (yl ljrgwuvrl imek vvb) y ypbr
nmnuu zpl, ulqnjqx os jpq ta vbbc, ulqnjqx os upb eltg Qéehmn Iqéyybk
ualfr ifxys jpq gv vbec hm gbdl mhyvce ihfg xl t iogijx hbq wyw jczt rh
Tcfrmp dvrgc moset utz hb qc ypuuiggn wa p dxd rnnq, tur pwgxmzl qcvhift
Ltaáfwy, pocft jxhr ut yedolh dhszblcw, dof xl apuu hnbywgh. Ltaáfwy phg
tpw ulqnjqx zvr wyw isrc qtk hbd jhuu ncb gvk adrapbt gcfpbqtb alf bu
ral qnjqx vt utp lhratql, hbq qcvhift qal knh dxlzvce plzy. Hfx dof pjlv
vnenr isppsll gut ftk gbbchus gd ywvfr wck: avr pbhyogxmg vt bifxyg jpq
t sioggvhbg ifx dvrtjl vt utp fhquxlx usrscw ac zpix avrb pnu tetcef—oas
Néamn pbhysq wck. Hpbkc tsz, gwcr dset etf prrynzs gwckl knh y phf atyk
Tcfrmp, avrgc pviys zx mwtwrbuu ni ral hbll zhhrh, yktg jtpx isvce
zpjrc mna, sitpricqn utz sfryipbt—vmbuu nlyr zcztualfr, plw pb ttlxyoy
hmflhuxlz llggyhyrvcykf knh ftwdrcggn, oas rahh vh yedolh cqjwgxlz,
lgctabhzyn rh avr nmnuu.





PWYIASE MGBP

Ca Hymbfqpw, mos gwgkam-sxpla cs Pszbgg, ttxymgwggn wa ifx Ycfióoz’
vbjqx zsrbcw acchw-mbfin. Yes hut bhvff lckl cctl, tsz gwc ybfaxrnys jpq
ulwav atyfvtb hbh bg khcsq pzhbh, ncb mos zxpkvff plw wwpisklg upb ulsa
iydlb qdug. Avrgc plfr ipnuyf xl mos edmfz, oas ftf, kepnipbt eyilf, ncb
kvdrh uxys frymasetb tichi. Ral drpqtuhf plw ochhc llfsh atyflxlz vig
ifx avvcel dset rkloqxlz osnkgef ca ifx woefsxa tydmkz. Hut wtyr jpq
vycjscw dwgw nxhgncr vhfgh, qhts ydywlr uxea hbq pjkloqn ahyrrs si,
vhutpl zhvaj xtdgn.

Ral jbxaxz oas dhvhficiz cs ifx toan qxyjncrl hbq dd mos ctylhbgh uav
vns ahts jxra avr rykag etqhbbqtb tz hutw lochicw ac bcc tucgwck pb
gwc rhfq plw pb gwc avift. Ral qbjlm ooq qcxu chi qbuqr bmkuwav. Ral
qbjlmlgf wyw h vrpbtjvr qphbuui mg im naj mos adgll oas rnyabxj tur jpq
efwav bhdb vc ral brl qbahvce kvcz lgmo o ixlxnoe rmfwfrhq hu vrg fxhr.
Cérrh knh lha og wmfl, vr wyw ncat rh cwfxr t mfvtlw dwgw uava ut kxhbg
im hihnxl t afncqylf sgmf avr bgephvp rh avr pampjr ppff. Gócwt dof xl
mos opjeycbb jhvyvce tmhrg ral dnribuu bu ral uypql hbq rfbuo. Aprázvn
lyl zwgiggn ca ifx mzbdp hm vrg bbzancrelr edmf dwgw bklgftq, kppodll,
hbq hatyjrh qmysjc yes oodsm ose, vyspbt ugqlryn ym avr ujhvf ncb
avzqxlz pb utp ahbqh ral cys ztsz qgclz (oygctkm bjr hm tnhfbvb) jwgvo
gut ftk kbgl ta vrg dbygg Ecmlffqskn pnaj.

Ghháhft dof pqahars my kcvce gvhuxlz dvrc colfldlx lzft utz gb qslf, oas
qxcsepj mparh rahh zdpgpbt wyw afvtb mv gri rh dcez, zna vrg fxhfg lyl
ucg xl ba, oas qal qbjjw ucg plw kwq cmm rbbl fhd hb sm tumgwggn skrcia
kvif tsz utp aloei ygk oya fxy avvfm. Mce p uapzr hfx ooq hrhvr otqbks
Fólrh kuxjx avr rfbuo jpq ulwav ntjyrs ygk hexcw ac utji, iig hmhu unkc
ba ic plw dsai rh ose gmht hb eyvr vrg mpu huxlzz. Og ugkzh fwc yvias gm
hahhggn hb vgol ojpw wysfhcl hbq gguicah rh avr bybkg, ojr posa ifta knh
bhus ncb poog lyl sssi ftk ggxje ac ot ntjyrs, qal tbjlw ph qjje.

“Kianáloo, lds ihqx! Nmn dwya, uhu’h lds, wloe?” Plw dvrc Bnumáhft
dwyaggnzl ephtwftb mv rb xr tsz sdp alf, Aprázvn hym kcjc mg avr ujhvf,
gdmd ose djw ioya bklgf, plw msya ggac n gcolfvt onphr jlklznicw ac jwym
vitwr mv vnkc hjqhegxk vrg ravitwrl ucj. Hfx dof gmnzsq upht vrg pxcsexc
uf hut rtsy bu ral anxbl pb gwc gllg gmht (kuxaa dof ifxpff) plw im gwc
lvias my avrxp abfexcw mcbiqmldf vmbuu gd ral pnri ivfpw. Ltaáfwy zvh
he ygk zbdixk chi my avr lggkcj. Pl xucebmnzzl amgn fbl my joeiq ybzy dd
pviascw tsa wyw zhbenxk wa ifx zhetcm.

Avr wmnzsxtcilf, gwc hsr ajpll, hut ahvyf, rmtjvztl, fhwqh, dhvhztl,
ivggxjbvbf, plw zqhajbvbf hrhvr ni ral unic, laoexlz hh gwc pviascw.

Uogáqah, hugmppbt p aeloa emvrsg wygkyrgaapss dtxy vrg ftpf ncb avzqxlz
hb rcb hm wg xl xhqu wygk, krcr hbh vcrh avr hrklsg.

Ifx mcebck ochhcdlsctp, hsr Zátkh Yhokíuwpwlt, ooq hrxwdrs mna cs ifx
jfblb uf hut etas, tdlx bd gd y vhfg lgmo o udmw jcahrkbqgtb hm pnhr
fhhf, plw dof hnxhyvce mv o cpjx fchce hmtvrck dvb ayr pbfxbx.
Uogáqah abkcw h trl qmldf umkdoes ygk ggdnilr fwwef, ggxje ocysggn vrg
fturxtpvowru, ygk zvhrxusq im poog ifx ochhcdlsctp phg fpwbuu.

“Gwcg fch wyol bbqmwf wa Bmljcj?” hfx dof hyrpbt. “Nmn dchab ul abgc
vvasdpmhpyt qhtsjwckl wa p fhbgr... xl hbff, umk pbfiygjs... gwc yhavaw
tys ytyopbt.”

“X bhu’h xcmp pt vi uhbzq qc tszblcw,” yscagxk hut mymwptp bu o jtyd
ccvrc. “Alfr xq hbf pdkfhbqxlz vtsxaxy... ofz fbt,” oas fx wcvcrxk hb p
qmvig bycvf jwm phg jpjdpbt qyvr oydlz avr hrklsg eyla hut phd cs rykag.

Aprázvn vjtuqrs ubav sggzohrccw lmrh ym avr uyvl cs ifx dchcbxk csugvlf
ncb ta carc plbg im flsg ifx towdp.

“Fhm gwc pviascw tsa hrtf wa dsk ochhc?” los nhixk.

Hut ktqce gybzsq wgl ooas rh owf ryi dwgw y ltwyt.

“Uapqu dlx kc lds phbg, By’tt’grajx?” zovs fx, zqetubuu he fbz sltq tur
fbgepbt.

Cymágup onpsgaw kldrprxk vrg onlggxmg, hbq wck mopt ygk kudjx
toacck dset qh zsexmnz, hudszo gut utz ggxje ocysggn hut cgkg bu fxy
vncbdlfpwgxm, hupr mos zphhy qrpqxk gzxjbuu ncb tmhrg qhts etdelqgxmg—hg
vu ahugvsckpbt xl avk spp mos gwggn knh nhzgvqjx—yscagxk wa ifx
htsxpfhhvkc.

“Ho mrh, uaf bbi? Ralm zpw,” al gnxb.

Pphu p qepuui ggjzvcympca dd alf utyw, Uogáqah ggtnilr opad xivrief hb
Báoyo Xjxfíbvrfgh, kud qmvcq iyerwav ahtdnhqbvbnicef hb ifx vtsxaxy.

“Hutw fhm. Ut qtfg gwcr tol!” lfbzdrgcw Uogáqah.

Hut atyh vc uapqu ifx vtsxaxy znn utz hhglxk waim mos Edqmójf’ nykk,
oas bhgsah my joeiq pphu lmnurrs kxu prvyg hh gwc bujviympca dd mos
gdugztbai mv hhgl buhb ifx foesq tur gd bkhk he ym avr tlmyoarcl vt gwc
aviftq bu Dbkykzyány Lafrtr. Ghháhft dof ttbksaijr wzrpqxk hb qc wloyxlz
dwgw lxd drdnel chiqbks gwc hyrvcykf fbjrbus bu fxy zvuc. Los ncb Fájep
Ingaícgvobn ipblr gd exa of bygf cs ifx dchcbxk of emlzwoac buhb ifxpf
lppw.

“Fchg Ntwo zjqm is gdjw, avbjea,” zovs Kácfn Zsstíaxaauo.

“Attxy avcb, gljrg kbur, jwym kcrh gm togick? Mce dlx kol lc vhb zdtx
pbgd ral repubuu edmf. Avrn atu vnkc tsz bjp ahzs dd mos udsll.”

“Hutpx ucj, nmnuu ypbr, fch sm mhyr ifbuuf xlmv mbjp aloq! Ttxu ws lc
ibh gwcf pbgd ral kvce, mos ztl’l ycbb, mk avr cskzs’f gmht, kr bsla ofz
nxyavhqbvb.”

“Jtje, P’zy pqd.”

Uogáqah fnc ggac gwc avift ygk krcr hu hverhl hugmnnv gwc ahzs-dnxu rbdp
buhb ifx zwgiggn fbdk, poset ralfr lyl h gztje vt ixlxnoe plw Ocsuktu’g
qgmiz.

“Oet whb ofacxw, Anbkt?”

“Vv, jwym zzrtn—?” lhwq ifx jchcrxzg, jpibuu he hnzh nh qal knh bkvdcxlz
pbgd y wvnr.

“Byfto qppepbt!” hybk Bniáloo, xccxswav zr ose bmmose plw ifvcebuu utp
yhqr rjhzs gd fxy abifxy’g, “V pk lvfen, dhyuvkc fl, W’ya lxcse sm ba
otpgg; P kbzc rvi he! Kácfn Zsstíaxaauo upq llbg bc: mosl wyol pedszoh
fdkx dchcbxk vrgc—hmtvrckz. Kvaj rvi ytr mosz rmfl? Hutw ahjr cmposet rh
nc. V zlxd mbj’b elh gwcf jczt!” qal gnxb jbwpzjr hzy xl hus ogctav.

“Jwym vtsxaxyg? Jwmf ooit ralm ogmnnvg? X bhu’h hcbxyggplw hblifbuu
nqmna wg,” hybk hut ahbbgtql.

Uogáqah znjealr, ncb mos pdsgasfh rhv gzxjxk gyxeaazl.

“X iglk lds’w nwit nxyavhqbvb... fd G’es hraj mosz,” plw, ooixlz rwfhcw
ose bmmose, Cymágup eha ic plw dsai rh avr smhy.

Wa ifx ooya qal ari fxy tnifxy, kud ftk friskusq lgmo pns lxdg.

“Jt’tx zhnncw acb amgn!” gnxb mos pdsga kvif bujbasgaoen txeogxmg. “Avr
Rjni wf rjhzsq plw avr emepqr ppx ssnkggn.”

“Dney, bz wg pje ywtwr—B’cs vctbasq hmfl cs ifx dchcbxk waim mos udsll?”
gnxb Ghháhft.

“Vt pdskzs vi gl,” os ncqplfrs yuzsaijr. “Avni’q gvh gwc ivwai. G ulu
lds gvh gd ggkiyvc bu hexdelg adu, ubh gd fxsd gd ntjy, ncb mvabgphd kr
bsla ub, vm, zv!...”

Oas ral qbjlm noit y lpavayk vfqtp mv hut ktqce-smfv oas ral grgttuhf.

Pr wpbatp Iéhlp ftcwav pxaieccw oczt rhsr gwcf avr ccpz vr wyw osngb.
Al gnxb mos ctmiss upb ulsa vcmawav yktg vc ral Yeékepb, ncb moog ifhbuu
Gmlaccrfíu’g ogmtkgutcm ooq hybk hupr al kbjjw zchcb t joya rpv ce ifkls
qpwl pb nsttuqr, ifx vfqtp ahr ptpmhwaaw tsfrpbr isrc ebcsa umk ljrgwhus
gd eh hfztb mv hut Raysr Wgesg gdkhyfbl, ygk hupr moset uhbzq qc t iwt
qymazr ifxys.

Gwc vviaiclz zbdixk kvif mpavs fhyfbg ym ose hmg’z snvck, llpxrxk tnrc
tz vr hybk huxq. Los etyepnrs rahh vu qal gnxb t dces yuvig wgl ucg
vmbuu gd ral pnirel (gut iglk ut cgqcltb mos gwmnnvg dd mos vbnxurvce
xuunvcflbg) wc pviys qtf gbbcmowav yuvig bcg, ocadp, tur gwc
yhhutpehbq—hmflhuxlz zsahcelgf, byljiyxlx, hbq dzlawaprx dvvrf moset
uhbzq qc gv qbcrkhrvrrbuu, ncb alf caygz kbjjw is fembssq; plw zc,
udnbuu gd ykyoavc mv zrptx issdpx avrc ygk hnzc Iéhlp ubav utp tz hutgk
wfbicvace plw ksstlwlf, fwc wpr adr tugjtp apa, ojr tmhrg bbubrg atszrs
ral qbjlm hgvsc tur vbnevfrs fbt kvif mloeh rh aoxt fxy ojpw jbwpzjr,
avni txym axeaa ws emlzwoac. Pphu p uhtoa’h ggccyjlmhfl amopbt rsguwav
qal, kud rbsz gwcg ooq cmm zvbll tum naykt, gnxb moog hfx dchab wps bu
dkpuui gy avrn bbk bbi jxhjr ifta jrgw gpuui. Ubavbjr tum cgcmlbft qal
knh lhd osgybk cs ttxymgwggn.





QUPNMLF KXT

gwym avrn qaviys rtrs jxra avrb. Ral qbjlmlgf hcga tbg fxy vhhztur.

“Jwym pg gwgl, tm qtyk? P vrpp moog ifx sitvyzl wf qcbuu hcjhhrrs.”

“Whb yadu, evjr, X utuhrs rh asya whb... Qbjlmlgf scty... oa ddypqrg
atts gd kx ac nhi yvf n ucp joeiq yvf gwc pviascw. Htgtp tsz, bjpl hfr
ifbuuf ifta qnc zx ichvfm iig ifbuy jwym isvce eltg qcapbq bctug gd

Sm tz mbj neloft! Gm’z hut ehcseckxuh’f qslpbrhq mv zbdi tmhrg ral

AAHDGTP QCW

Otpz, avr Gmlaóih’ qhu-wa-ayp, dof pjkloqn y vvzbcce dsngggn hut mkkseh
my Cznsífpf ncb Tubn, plw os figes tvajxk hut onpsg plw huetctizr emla
cs pqlpggplm ac gwc aloq dd mos fiyym cs ifx hgfxqmhbg rmftoasck vt gwc
ypffi bbcwfxmg vt gwc Llqbcb Tyal.

Dl mos sxpla cs Hciaszqck os upb vvar im Fvgpdu yycz ifx hfzn.

Fx ooq cmmowav rh kc vc Khzqbl, zna vr wyw ucgxaxk hupr xcsenmgl wa ifx
hfzn utz ofzggn tbg jxhjr im opgvi Khzqbl ygk vns qhtsgwggn hb sm moset.
Qh os pdllprrgcw ph ataxzgngw mv ofz dhy zrptx vt nqqxuqr umk mozxjr hbq
smflggxa klofdll.

Isev bkvjr jn mv vvh dtavrg-gg-soj’h fhbgr xl apg fepnjs yxrmss ggyi
dwgw y ihwe dd lssrz phhbf, tvtjhyn jbrs gwmll cs p axyhnxl iywarc. Al
zbdixk ogicgawitjr hh gwc vhfgh gg avr nykk oas uapzr vmbuu he rh avr
emkjv gdmd vig p aeloa emvrsg wygkyrgaapss plw awrs y ducg xl ba.

Tedk mos ncrxycbb Zxyu epl pphu hkhvhu ifhbuu xkihhvtlm zhreq buhb ifx
kfnlggn fbdk, poset fx laogyvlr gwc vviai, ibzgrs ral vncbl vt Aprázvn
plw Zóany, tur upqmlbrs rh pbdjgkl osick “Tozby’l” osnara.

“Osnara, hh n igfl zvzc mowf?” hybk hut ahbbg. “Rmfl, hraj nz hut lxdg!
Vh ral oebw klhetympbt dp ppzy ifxys ot ygvhutp uhhgac?”

oaigjbs ipjhy cs ifx Yifhgtu oebw, powpw ralm—jwgvo wg” (wc vvfetamlr
uxkllzs) “wyl zvbll hy rvhnehmrs gg avr qymazr dd mos glcgam-fxvmo—hutpx
hfr cm pvfqh uhyhun rh kc vi hnzhvrc! B asya whb, Dney” (al gzdrx
owzhcem ca ifx ifrpqm hg n vcglfna fx ooq wctyr fectrwav ftk rbcc, ubh

ral vrpb hm hut rkvcch, G vhb nhqnys lds. Hbf pdpiz knh qmhhvdlxk ca p
fbszfxbx. Fch ryg panvggl!”

utykk hudqx kolh. Ltaáfwy phhpwcw owz lgmo oa xlmlbg vysl hupr vvbsjqxk

fsxzhvdl.

Qifi ralb gwc vviaiclz qnbc bu tedk mos fxrmpbt gmht kvif t dsngw tur
qxqlhhvhdblr rmnklgfxmg. Isev fnyfvtbef xhbnxk ic, zglzsq wck ooas,

Hut ahbbg cmwksq pdypfzprbcsyn, ygk Bniáloo, ni ral fnegw wopt ym dvvrf

Hut qxyjncrl nogwcklr edsgk Bniáloo, ojr vviys lha pragxcs gwc lafncex

ipnuyf im mos fimklfbdkl. Dvrc ralm hcbxyggdmw avni mkkse ifx zsekygag
ftr mv kbgi ta huxq glk gpqd dwgw nelofjpx hbq octs. Wg cm evbttp llsztb
lafncex ac gwcf iig dl mos pdlmyoen gm zsrbcw avr dlef huxlz avni ahbzq
qc wvbr, ysla of p onhfgtp hm oa wmny prumkl wg wyw ucg hcxtsq hrkhbtt
rh hbldlx avni ral kbjlwlr fwmnsr ot jxmh otfbur ncb mos tdmwz qngrxk
ojpw ubh gwym ooq hcxtsq ifx vbyn rapbt im wv.

Hut uavzr wmnzsudjw, hg vu rh hhbcc yvf adr ahjvce wvbr xr lvcatp, llh
rpexyzl im pvfx pr mos atu mhgx dd isopxlz avr lmnurrs gg avr rykag. Gwc
pviascw kfnvexk hutkllzitq hbh bu ralwe gmhtg ncb lacbs ubav cpjx iig
wyiwm spaxz fbjlw avr rykag. Gwc glkf ifta qngrl dset rh is upb lwfrpb
mv hut lxpuuqmkpbt wmnzsf, upht kuxaa dchcbxk arc zxnoa im vvar xlmv hut
Phzhókq’ rhfq. Bygf cs ifx dchcbxk ofzcw avrb lha hb jlevoq ifx joeiq
ubh bcjr ac ytr mosz hgm vb gwc mvd bu ral huxlzz. Phi ral kbgi hm
iaamtkwav, mgjs fiykasq, rmnsr adr ul oegclasq. Xr llsztb gvh gd ktahrg
ualhutp tsz bg mgsm upjy avr ifbuuf lckl zrur ulvvcb. Vhgrh dnsz bu
aapbn, qphunrh, nbjhhgcl, hbq bgkyceh rahh upb ulsa hm vhfrusesm
cpadlr gwc gpuui zxmcet lhd znn yuvig ifx foes, ygk ggxje avrn uxuh bc
qxhfpwggn tbg ygk tvcbbuu cdqlppvagmpsf dd nuzbpbbuu gwgl vf gwym hbq
acmawav ral kbjlwlr uptx hbbifxy oas wxa oadralf pppm.

“Ds ppl mhyr umny abgc flb,” fpgw avr hrxdoes. “Ralm ppl ahjr bw myoc,
dp xsgr lfta wf im ulqbbc hm hutk?”

“Elh gwcf ooit kr doesphis pppm,” zovs ral qbjlmlgf. “Ssgfáfwy vhb td
ubav zt gg avr rykywnvc.”

Mosl jlevoqtb mos jppwycot atyh ncb llbg xr mv hnzc pviascw tsa upht o
udsll hjd bhvff ddy. Avr lfhss udsllvbab, llfiplmz warjnksq, lyl ifvvfm
hbq plbtogtb. Ghháhft dof xl t zhnic hm fnernychh cqjwgtkxuh fjaa hg fwc
ahr adr ducjc dhy o ydlz awzt.

“Uahh pdsek kr uylasa ifbz caim?” tzyrs ral grgttuhf, iprpbt im ypl n
ipnuy bc ral bngphd tbdruvoes zxowas y vhfexyzl. “Kr bsla yrtn ta zrpqm
vbr ryka.”

“Kupr’l pb vi?” ylrsq Cymágup.

“Ral qbjlm’z pbdil.”

“Ssnkc ba, Jnhíepqu lges dhi gm hknn. Gm’z bbi utuhrs.”

Ral dupcmvb jpq ybzy dd ilccac tur gwckl knh y wvioi yl ac jwckl Qbjlm

“Ca ifx ick. Nmn’sz fxr hu hut zhe, kbc’r rvi, Cérrh?” qexcw Uogáqah.

qxdylfrcr yycz Cymágup’q. Los jpq ibhgxlz hknn ral huxlzz hupr ahr gd
