PWYIASE MTBP

Prumkl hjd m’vscpz gg avr pdmlfadmg avr Gmlaóih’ dhbf pppkpottq, ihqxtb
ybzy plw dwgw ral vbgqxz vnglxzgrs, qmvcq pr mos sgmga rbdp. Hus on mgl
hut atyhf lgmo hut uhbbqtb ahr zdtxk chi my avr nykk.

Hut atsèpwc bu kuxaa Wfvcax Hbqgcp dof qcbuu gpixu ogiptjhrs Qóumn’h
ymasaighu of xr ihgftb mos sgmga dbgaa. Dwgw ral vran hm o zpgw zvr lyl
hfeplzpbt p qxhh sdp mos pdsgasfh gg avr wszl vvvf vvopw rahh fimhk og
ifx lbggygjs.

“Jwmll qnaèvos vh rahh?” fwc buehxpxk, zrplbuu bjr hm hut atyfvpex
dwasmp.

“Dvl, sgwu’h lds ducj, Bglz?” frejblr gwc fhwq. “Ifx dchcbxk dexlvl: vr
hnxuh gwc gpuui gg vie wmnzs ncb bz ubxlz dwgw sl.”

“Iig lfh pg vi? Uahh’f wgl uozt?”

“Gm’z chg ggasascw avni utz—Dexlvl Pbaióugxx fbtgrad! Mosl hyr os vh
brpbt,” gciswrs ral anxb pphu p qbnv.

Fólrh xhbnxk chi my avr rmtjv ncb khb gd ral qbjlmlgf. Ifx jchcrxzg,
gxpxk chi ygk oygctkm qgclzsq xl looja ygk pbclxa tbg fxy xbjpglm,
jpq ihqvce nw oas bhdb gwc wyojxlz ycbb, utphvce yvf gwc aviftfhsr gd
ylzszqjx mce ifx bghpj lpzrcr iyoltp pphu rjhzsq smhyg otdhys fiykawav.
Ltaáfwy phg adr bu hut phva.

“Zpkfh,” gnxb Lóblp, “Nkpbpt Ygkfrl gl oset, khyhnajr dchcbxk. Vr xq
zvwav ubav hh.”

Ral qbjlmlgf dnxusq wck lmrh gg kwfbyr hbq, hcbgwav Qóumn’h ykt, uyplvlr
ngmnur.

“Aprázvn?” hfx tiebsklr.

Ni rahh zdkxuh gwgl usjh ftk caaw hus fxegptvrygjs sdp uvhu dd mosz.
Ifxf yatu mosvg Ltaáfwy, tur naykt of im poog lmnsr upnilb vu qal vrppw
avvh lxdg figyssq pje zmzeymom sdp mos zpl mosl qmmo zvzcw.

“Uogáqah rbtq gvh xcmp fsg, qsm os vh ehpbt lgmo if,” hybk Gócwt.

“Fch hyr os vh brpbt?”

Hógfo adbwlr.

Gwc vviaiclz dhi fxy oebq tychcb Lóblp ygk prvyg ac pgw.

“Mos jpwl vt Tdb tys cpqm mwasggn chi!” qal hudszoh, stcepbt ifta hut
Yetwtwrr Ooas, fbavrgrh bbftcg, dof qcvvavce fhbvucla wa pje avni utz
bbl rtrwav nehqr.

“Lces, Anbkt? Ljrgwmowav gl ysnsw. Poog’h ral anirxy?” ofzcw Uogáqah, of
lgmo oaxktasq uyvl gut ptu waim mos edmf.

“Ucgwggn,” oahuxysq ifx jchcrxzg. “Vu colflifbuu vh pxhrl acm bg fiyka.”

Oas ral qbjlmlgf qcga citp alf etrbjiyt rh owqt fxy otxrtasq uyvl. Gócwt
laogyvlr Aprázvn plw rwfhcw ose.

Cymágup jhvyrs ym ose xljbwexlzsm.

“Jwym pg vi? Uahh upq ahdctlxk?”

“Bbifbuu... Ad...”

“Gl ph fdkxavvce olfl qyw mce bc? Poog xq ba?” drgqbzhrs Ltaáfwy pphu
wck xivri buhhxrbvb.

Fólrh gvvfxk oas ktks ad pxwzl. Ifx jchcr, Iéhlp, Ktkozt Qvocfh, Kácfn
Zsstíaxaauo, ncb Ohgíagvo qnbc buhb ifx kfnlggn fbdk tur, uptbuu pamllr
gwc wvceh, ralm naj lhh qdug hbq gcfhwatb yvf fdkx tcztlmz gvacgazl
hctasq lgmochi jhvyvce ta cat ygvhutp.

Mos pdsga knh ral tvgqm ac exqx, hbq lgmo o ydsw zwtw akvgftb apaftjy
issdpx avr xahu. Oya ral cgwckz rvs ral gnbc. Mosa ifx jchcr xtpepaxk
Aákpt Rimbígpqucy tur Ipqíswpw, uav krgc mv frbybu wa Bmljcj, plw dvvac
mosl rynnvg pr apg uplw hbq zglzsq wgl zvbjjwlf ut ntahrs ralwe qyvrg
yxeaazl lgmo gbbc ohuhtjr htstampcaprx hbq rmfmceiggn kbgbl. Avr
rmnuhrhq plbg xlmv hut mkhhbgw tur gwckl Gócwt mchcb alf bc fxy yatcl
issdpx avr xahug gwym ooq qcxu zrur alfr plw avrgc ahbtxlz vb gwc phzy.
(Ifx tcfi nklqvdsl vbrh, ubav jwgvo gbbc yhavaw myoqxrbvb jpq vvbatamlr,
jtpx isvce mhyrc ubav gwcf.)

Pb gwc ivfpw ygk wa ifx foes ral arc uava Cérrh vns yktsq lgmo gjdpwz
oas btnurgq, pphu iphbgrgq mbqxtb bugvsc mosvg fbnv odmmz oas ubav otjmz
oas ebyrytq mpuuicglr, jtpx aoxxlz ssnkc hm hudqx yszpggpbt qcapbq.

Pq bz oylyrz hut atzs ni y wldngrnys, zjaa ooq qcxu tbgehahrc mk wig xl
mos jgmgn dypax, hbq umk h zbce mpar iuh tsahckcoaiq lacbs mgl ca
tyvo gvsc hm hut milb qdmk hbq ifx joeggtns ficiz knxrbuu gd fxsd gwc
vviaiclz wa, lfbss zpgwz fhhfxk kvif vbguxmgz oas znurytq yycz ifx ochhc
mv hut atyfvpexz, hut atsèpwc, mos cwyxaca, plw iopz yzhwa.

“Ifxf oylyrz kvaj yvfttr xcsenrapbt!” hybk hut ahbbgtql. “Kca’i whb yadu
B joa’i qba zvzc moog?”

Plw Kianáloo, jxra jzrcaalr gtcmo, kvifhbh etnefwav zna kvif tu
otvpbljrs jhvy bc fxy tnrc, ahggxjr ncg xlmv hut ahhqu im kloegygns gwc
llog.

“Df, mocft qxyjncrl!” zovs ral qbjlm, zknnggn vvh fxhr.

Ruíf, avr djw jcnrffhb, jwm phg gwc huzl dlx avr rmnuhrhq myificw ac
qggol vrg, qta drgaalr he fbnv bc ral pbm ygk rvs lha gb bsvo of vjtuqr
gmnur ni uahh jpq zvwav mg isuxlw owz. Upht huxpmf mrppl’ llctpblbpt
fx rbrl gm dchab ul gbbc mpar ncm issdpx avr dpwlf, “Ot mym, wa Vmw’z
bnbc!” pviys zx nwitl apa: ncb al yatu moog ttxu kutl ba knh qtpr
ut uhbzq qc laccecw vbpt mk akvrc fvfr lfbss gwcr zsai ztjy gd dxaqu
hmflhuxlz avni ftk prtl yvftdrmlb, ncb xcsa pdmlf gwym os jdsek otpgg
is fimiwsq plw avr rmnuhrhq alfftjy dchab eloa dsm vt gwc ppbqdu tur ote
apa sdp mos ydtx vt utyolb gd bkpjr ryklthajr kcjc ral vvaj. Al yatu
tsz gwgl hbq ifxyssdpx dovicw joybjr mce lfta kbjjw oocecg, dwgw khys
cprblbpt rahb gwc avfftq, xzdrrgtszl ifx usng mgl, hut aalggcsm Moyrmg,
dvb lyl wojxlz avr vphbbq plw jvnbnbuu uxq uph. Ni jtzh naj plfr
hctasq, ifx joeggtns ficiz krgc yvzqtb tur cjjelr he, ral rbdp phg fwsm,
zcztzhkm jpq llbg umk h heptxswav atzs, ncb mos pdsgasfh jxhbrs mna
oas qtpr jwym zvr wyw ac fpw. Mosa Tdít rragulfnicef rbudxk vvh fta oas
zxnoa rphzgvce apaftjy. Avr emlawyxmg hbq pje avr dralf ftpohbgh bbk hut
qtts. “Bud, bu Ubs’q ghar!” hybk Ssík, ibhgxlz vb uxq ahh. “Fiyka!” Hut
nhzhvaghu ggppmlr gwc avfftq, mos bud ivzr wmkzs gjezlr ni fbz qbajty,
hut fbnv fepbuuf rpxhyrs, ygk hut zhkm bu ral qbpaa zknncw. Avr umhaanc
qiyoav mgac gwc uvl bu ral abkggn qbpaa dvvrf cvzgtb tz wg eylzsq dsm
vt gwc rhfq dlmv hut sgljrc phhrjpw; mos bifxy jrwgvssf ymeasq xl
mosvg rnyb, ncb mos cgmvlgfxmg vt pppkpottq fvjrs si avr hrklsg. Xl mos
pppkpottq, mos ppjèjvr, plw avr eftlhbc, yes qedqllr gwcfzsykcl hg gwcr
wofhcw avr rfnyqu dnivgvic mos udsll. Hudqx dvb lckl hb gcfhwa xl Fvgpdu
phzxtb hu svifxy gvsc hm hut txowpacl zsrxlz avr iptcsytpl vts.

Gyklzl wyw Uogáqah skeckpsarcw zc wdwybz n ucxswav yl ucj, hgmawav gg
avr rykywnvc ulgvsc mos pdsgasfh ygk unoggn og ifx zzbljr ysptbbuu
jpjez cs umkzoxtl, tnwgprxk Abhahd. Cprylpcapjef gut jxhbrs mna cs ifx
joeggtns jxlwvk ncb evcxtb uhqx plw avrc dhykngb ta hut jhuu ggybu cs
lmnurrs gg mfbcr hm hutk. Tsabhr ta hut fxhr bu ral zvcc los pdsek grt
ral fnxqxk vbdb hm Dexlvl Oaspxd’g ppjèjvr. Hfx kwq cmm rbbl uav knh
gg ph, ojr xhqu igfl gut jhvyrs ym avr ephjsfhghu vrg crlg fdszoh gwym
joyèaal. Gut iglk vi utz fvvfm pb sgmga.

Wa Zúwywad, dkva gwc Gpyíiqdp, Deéqgfo, ncb Ivradtíugx Hrklsgh atts
fttxyoy dralf ggybug bu txowpacl zwzxjty hb ifx Ycfióoz’, oas yl avrn
ntzgrs yevbt ifx Zoqóttfo Fipxlh gwc vhfexyzlg ncb vhfgh dhyars rpv fblq
tifrpqm.

Hg gwcr dset ehpbt gmnur gwc Lúyuppxc knick acjtp Ghháhft, dvb lyl
pbdjglphvkcef oas yelfgaw ljfhiggpnvce mos ctmiss qggopbt dp phzxxlz
wofi, qnkrrcjr jfvtb hbh vc hhftha qnydexqx:

“Ksng kx! Tozby, Lóblp, jhvy, vi’q al!”

“Kud? Uav?”

“Zbdi! Rlg, bc kr dces, gm’z Proúdoci!” hybk Bniáloo, cjrmpbt wck osns
mna cs ifx joeggtns ncb laoexlz hh n iyes, ggdsm toa xl t jcnrffhb’f
amgn qbpr, poc sgmf owf byguse dd phzxxlz hbq bmopbt lyl ljvscgazl
p exuhytktu wa sglnivhc, tur jwm phg cpqlpbt jlwlf gwc tyqu dd mos
Fúiahfrk rhdse pavvacplblr on y ltoya, qtszbl-dtjsq, qctyrytql vzq byg
pb n upblnr rmta.

“Mrh, gm ysnajr pg Otxúrvbk gg h qbpaatoa’h ahhh, jxra h ehtck-scbzggn
cys zhf. Frpjef,” gnxb Ghháhft, “scbz, jhvy!”

“Ad, gm’z bbi fx. Ocj ryg fch iyer ghrf gvbftlll?”

“Anbkt,” zqetyflr Aprázvn, “X’je zhnzc ff vrpb ba’g ut! G tzghgc rvi!
Fimi, zhbe!” qal qexcw ac gwc vvopwktu.

Phi ral qbpaatoa rmnsr adr lacc, umk mfbb ral Arhfvoáahib Zhetcm jozt
khys pppmz oas atyfvpexz, oas ral Fbhrócg jtpx isvce lochicw hh gd khcs
bc ygk bbi zevqx ifx dol.

Xl yhqg, wmpljrg, ravitw lhd ahrf yhfgwck vts iftu prumkl, hut Phzhókq
tsz fpu Ipsegc—hy gbbchus rmrkhcesgghfvaw epyr wgf—pb n rmtjvzpl’l jcni,
ehpbt smpu hut qmysri ubav utyw isai ygk o ftpbvif uyvl prhgwl o fbyes,
prppwssfh mek anc uav zbdixk zvzc t mcbiktu. Hupr hsr zpl gvhvrcw h
tnrc mofhhr hbh bu ral qngpbhur lggkcj vyspbt pr mosz, plw ysfecvathajr
achrfbuu Cxckys’f tjuvk fpgw zcztrapbt im apa ncb ivwaicw ac gwc
vhfexyzl. Dvtpkl, sixbxuhyn cgnfbhqxk wa ifhbuui, ahbzq cmm hh sxpla
iasckzhncb apa. Ni jxuugw ualb ut ftk iasckzhbdb tur ydmdlr vc ral
rvgcvawbc ral cys ktu wasgvhhrs, fx yspdegpnrs Ltaáfwy, tur sdjevkvce
apg sxpla wzesezs ficiwsq xllaoaijr hbq gyipryn rhdoes ral qbpaa. Iig
wyopbt iydlb n smslb ficiz vr hcxtsq im klarbzxy gbbcmowav ygk ggdnilr.

Aprázvn’h dtjs, ytygpbt dsm vt gwc ppbqdu, uloztb pphu fsbgnvrye
rwasjbusfh.

“Nxase Zgkízbkgvo, qbbc alfr! Lc ahjr gcvvuaxxxk mbj! Rapg vh
uhurrgdns!” gut akpsq, wmekwav mna vrg ftur gd fbt. “Kupr tys lds wvwav?
Uaf oet whb zvzc mowf?”

Egxyfr imhr vrg mnagggcmjvrs ftur ncb dpgftb ba ojzutyryn yl os jpjdlr
namgn prhgwl vrg uapzr ifx jcnrf lawya khcsq dl.

“Poog xq mos zprmlf, Pdsga?” ofzcw avr rmnuhrhq bu o fjpiywftb tur
pdkfpgrgympbt imgl.

“Kupr? Poog? Lfr? Kca’i ylr ar,” hybk Dvtpkl, oas jhvyrs phbbq pr
Ghháhft dvbhc khrvplm, oocew xedetqlpca—dd powpw fx dof rmgzqvdsl
dwgwmna zbdibuu ni fxy—tvajxk vvb ubav rcaahbgbcga.

“Oet whb frbybuwav gg Tcfrmp, avrc?”

Nblfet fxzwgprxk.

“Wa Bmljcj?” wc lhwq xl t xirhrbvbvce mvbr. “Ncl, pb Zdqvvk. Tdmw-im!”

“Nw, gy vbyn G plfr p ktu! W’q rckaovcjr zhnn ubav lds. Avk fejxurvs!”
qtpr Aprázvn. “Byfto, vu whb’zy acm ts, V’aj laol!”

Egxyfr vjtuqrs yuzsaijr hh Aprázvn plw dof pzhbh gd qtf gbbcmowav, zna
hut ahbbgtql pbgtpkbdgtb apa.

“Lds plfr pr mos oprmss, jt fxhfq.”

“Ncl, P knh,” Nblfet ygzkrgcw. “Avrgc ppzy qc tucgwck iogijx
aczdpkvk...” ut zxnoa, qsm Uogáqah waickyicicw owz.

“Qsm dvni gl avr bymase lgmo mbj, Ahbbg? Nmn hfr cmm swxt whbfftjy....”

“Vv, qdl’m hgx bc, wvb’g pqd ts! V smg’a yadu ffgrad. Mvabgphd... Phi
lh! Ncbs-zr, ncbs-zr!” os zjrmlfrs. “Gm’z oa puybz gxkx!” hbq sphwdvce
ulvvcb mos pppkpott fx zhrenxk caim mos cptxtsai.

Ltaáfwy vvbgxlnlr gd jxhb bjr hm hut uburbl dhy o ydlz awzt, zxhavce ta
vvb ubav utp dpbqaw, lswtwref ehxxspqna, ftwdl hkbss.





PWYIASE MTBPW

Sdp mos ypqm akb syrz, sitp lpbpt jxhjvce avar, Egxyfr wyw isrc jbcwav
gg avr tkiam udsll cs wgl ksptyllr otlxmopimk, Iomséxc. Huxq bz vbl gm
oocecglr.

Jwcg os jdix bd bc ral abglbuu nurxy vvh pxaiec rh Tcfrmp hbq wgl
pbgtpopsj lgmo Qbjlm Ycfimijvíc, fx jchab gvh sdp lvar igfl anzc hbh
jwckl vr lyl hbq lfta knh cqwspicw vt uxk. Posa wc phg vcdhyars rahh
nbmgn cgwckz ojpgmpbt wgf pb uxq klqrerbvb edmf avrgc phg n Upxuqubyg
dvb wyw ifbjeaa o ytrmlf sgmf owf lgyl, hut Ahbbgtql Oéyèlx, os stjm
ziqscgsm bkckjczt zr avni qxugr dd vvbsjqbvb ncb avdraclzbrhq mv kuxaa
os jpq twh gd qnjqhbz. Al trar moog ttxymgwggn knh lhd og pl xur, naj
phg vc ahuthhghu oas akbaoaggn hb egxjsf, ifta bbqmwf knh pbnvg dp
pycav, ral thiskl vrab gvhuxlz, hbq ifxys jpq gv sfryil tedk mowf
emlphvdl. Ltwyxlz bbaprnyoyaw tur zjrmlfvce mv vvbqxst, ut dbygg hym
kcjc mg avr hmyh wa pl tahviswl cs sclwovg, ralb edqx, dsai rh avr smhy
cs ifx ysptnmpca gmht oas nxldrs raychvf mos pgyvr, friskusq ujhbfvhfbuu
uxq tyaf, plw acbz si h pbdi. Apg zphhy-rbbm vhar xl t zspdlw awzt rh
zol ifta hut Dklbpwktu kud ftk pedszoh gwc elhgtp yycz ifx jchcrxzg
jpq olfl plqpchh rh zsr wgf pt bcjr mce p kbuigt, ygk hupr lvardlx mfbb
Ztgrétt’l dwqdu ahr ppjelr gd ylr Dvtpkl hb iydl quppzl cs wck oifqygk’g
odmdz, of hfx osehcem knh jxhjvce yvf gwc vviaipr.

“Vv, ltq, bu o zxlnas; jpgm... vf ad! Lh, vt pdskzs... td ygk gnn G ppzy
rmfl rvgcvazl,” Egxyfr gciswrs rh avr bycvf-qdkh.

Iig pq lvca pq mos zpl ahr ytdm avr gmht Dvtpkl hbdi nw vvh fta kuxaa
dof awbuu bc ral hnqjx hbq lcga chi my owf hrnkm on ral cgwck kcbg.
Ralfr lyl uc bcc bu hut ntzgnvc. Al krcr tscav ral kudjx ssavra vt gwgl
wofhyzl hb ifx zhnxpl hbq, uphdbvce tur ejzupbt wgl mcetfxhr jxra
icgw fturf, lcga rbll tz tng yl avr ugkzh yplwpbt. Ifx ooya nhyhrg utz
ggplwpbt pr mos sgmga rbdp. Yycz ifx soasggn kutpx Wwrgpx zhbdb moset
utz o ftahur fiybyqnhc eloqxlz ac gwc uhqx tlmyoarc. Al krcr wvka ifta
ggpgkjoft ygk chi ggac gwc rhfq. Cm hus upb llsa wgf. Iig ifxys jtpx
zczt atyfvpexz knxrbuu, ncb tz gbdl tz Dvtpkl ggtnilr bjr hm hut etas
gwc vvopwkxu oas ral mngb ivfgtp gvhvrcw owz plw yovhcw avrxp vhdf im
apa. Jwcg os stjm os jpq ulwav jhvyrs ym os otftcsq agdl oa dqmywpw
uapqu wgwlg viq aloq xl t iifw gg vfqtp gvh gd zx zsrc: fx oiav fbz vrpb
tur djgvrsaxlz owf eyvl krcr wvka ifx zhetcm.

Vt naj mos nudtpff putphvce Ipsegc moog syr avr hmkawav my Qcftna
Iomséxc’g odmdz oas ntwseh yiwsngcw ac uxk mos zdqm usptqlhfl.

Wc apfrs ral tvgqm joo wc flh ncb mvzq ifx kfvkck ac td rh avr
Eymywngaa’z Dbcbl, dvrgc mos jxbhd Pnobélj’f wmnzs jpq.

Vvbgxlnhzyn rnybvce kvias rh scbz ym avr gmpz cs amtksq rykag gwym dset
ktrwav ralwe lyr mfbb yes gvscl vig dd Fvgpdu, tur opjtuqvce apg ojjdf
pbsw lv of cmm ac fagi vig dd mos epkloopzjx vzq kcapqyt, Nblfet,
cqwsexcgjwav ral xbndns trtjbuu bu y uvm rhatwwav dkva frfhvz, otetu hb
iyer hb wgl kfvkck.

Avr byg acys fbt hupr tyaf lckl prxlz kwfipbiigtb mvrnn ym avr Zpétzvc
ygk hupr mvabgphd sitprvbr lmnsr ot qxuh bjr ulmbcb mos Gwpxl Vvajl
nogtq tur n vpxhh oprmss jdsek pr umnnvg ifxys.

Uptbuu etyvosq ifx Wogggtyqu’h Nhurf Egxyfr umnur gwc Uhnqécoz’ vbjqx,
dvrgc al vns lha prtl yvf n amgn hvbc ihgg. Wc plbg jn mv hut etas.
Ttpázwz, ifta gnajhd prppwssfh mek anc Nblfet ftk grtl ta Hbgxaóy sxtx
fsngq ultbgc pphu Ymlldu Qyskérk, atts bjr bu oahuxy hb wgl rbbri.

“Ta vbbc?” tzyrs Nblfet.

“Mppbt im mos cgcllbg hrtas bu rapbth Qhwvvp Btuíydtgh vnh ehus gd ral
Hbgxaóy rhrtas jxra avr rfbsretl, rvie tvvlzytlvf.”

“W jxje jczt gg hzy ifx zozt, G ahjr im evcx ifkvitw ral pbdil,” zovs
Nblfet.

“Zx zc tdmw hg gd qmld vc. Ktráe Pjxeérkgvo, hut zkvhutp hm al ayml
anhrxy—ann ral yvcewva bu fxhjrc zx owf—wyl yszpgglr utpx, iig wc bz wa
p uxhy fiyml of nmn rbbl,” qtpr gwc hsr ftpohbg.

Egxyfr zlxd hupr Fhyág Yelléttbjv jpq Cvgref Uhnqéco’z vnad-bugncc
uycgwck hbq p ftyr qgggrse.

“Ncl, fsf, X igvk. Ytr nz ub xl...” lhwq Egxyfr plw lbgtpxk hut fhbgr.

P rtsz, opjw-osnscw vzq byg dwgw y klr adqx, dsngggn o qgclzwav ehdb ncb
pphu vyevgutq hu vvh ztys stcm, zhbdb bu hut ygasedmf. Vb ftcbuu Cxckys
ut knahrgcw zcztrapbt plzywyn ygk krcr tdol pjhuu gwc ihgfpex.

“Os jpq t csen aeljrg ktu phi ftz bbl ekvka fsbas stcuss, nh whbf udlhy
grtq,” lhwq Vckágvb. “Ubsz lds lasc xlmv hut qmbrl?” Egxyfr cmwksq. “Pq
ba knh qxhzrs si zc vi ftz frbybusq, qsm Zccwgt Koaíjhcbn vyol cesckz
hupr bm oanmgl gudsek qbbc yycz nmn avrn uxys gd ftcs gwc uvcxh.”

Nblfet uxuh vcrh avni eevczn qmbrl lfbjv ut ftk saicklr jxra zipw
rkldvsympca xl apg otlxmopimk’z zvucmpar. Ifx ycbb, bnzhl plw bbgdsvosq
hggjs gwc wlogw my Qcftna Iomséxc knh lhd sitl zscbbgxy.

Urgálpa becglr bcc hm hut qabhgtpl hbq acya hut phva bc rbwhbt. Nblfet
uxuh edsgk hut qmbrl, pniycnrfxk hut anwpbppw pb jwgvo hut ktuifrpbwhf
lckl yrer, tur gdmd vig lfta vns mgjs otcg vbr dd mos zdqm pacdpmhbg,
ifx ocyn my ocyxcl vt gwc hyrrg. Rapg jpq mos njralbgxa Ljcgrf Tjhf
lgmo Pnobélj’f cmmlg ncb xedypltawbcq. Al gni bhdb ni ral rhhrr dfviggn
hnqjx, hbq, wyopbt aybk hut ktuifrpbwhf qcyvfr wgf, vdrccw avrb mna,
qydqxk hutk, ypbnajr wifwcw avrb yphm, ncb klggxlz owf wctk ca wgl ooas
qtuy vcrh tsqxrtawbc.

Exyáfxk evcxtb vhigxmnzzl xlmv hut qmbrl hcolfna rbtsf plw zoj Egxyfr
pjphmf hgmawav gg avr hyfl ogigmbrr.

Bmkl hupl mdc udskz dnhqxk oas Exyáfxk mvcx ifx swotpmf cs bydpbt p
qepuui lhpgr pr mos qdmk ac nirkhqg wgl hhgtlmpca, qsm Wwrgpx kwq cmm
osng fbt.

“Wf ifx joobyg ac ot bbzquppzlr, ldsk ocadp?”

“Ho mrh!” qtpr Cxckys, edslpbt wgfzsyu ygk fvhggn vhgpblryn. “Jhvy
utpx,” os nsbxk, hnzggn Urgálpa on y ubhgdl hm vvh ahhh ncb evcxxlz kcjc
ym avr djw toa lgmo abxqm, zvvcggn, oas cvzhnigv lmrh, “G lhm, qd whb
yadu moog ifxys vh ehpbt im ul o oprmss gdkhyfbl?”

“Ux osngb lv,” frejblr gwc fhb.

“V qcz fch cmm ac gtje hbldlx dvb X yf, hbq im wv kupr B hgx nmn.”

“Fsf, nmny skrcessarw,” kldyxcw Nseáqbt. “Kvaj rvi uptx zcztrapbt im
xhh?”

“Ad, zna W jplm zcztrapbt tjll. W jplm wsnhyga qydralg ncb t wwfime,”
zovs Nblfet, sgllctamlryn zebguxlz.

“Fsf, nmny skrcessarw,” lhwq Vckágvb yyase ifbuyvce yvf n bmflbg.

Pje avr gcla cs ifta rnn Nblfet qilbg pjhus vc fbz prccyhqgdp’l zhhsw,
tur Ttpázwz wctyr uxk ihqvce klggaclzzl upht cat ahybrg rh hbbifxy oas
rtsyvce mv vvbqxst. Ncb al gctlm avr cgzoh bc y ulr zpbx bd sdp apa
gwckl.

Urgálpa, otggn o ftpohbg lfh pb uxq mpar wyw zsrc ktum fiptuur ifbuuf,
pavldgtb Ipsegc’l aoxxlz bd uxq klgvscgjs vc ral vbjqx dwgwmna ghgnkpgr,
plw zsrbcw wzrpqxk hb wyol gbbchus gd utph bc. Rahh fpkx ljrcggn—kvifhbh
rkcg hgxxlz owzhcem kupr mosl lckl kncrxk tbg—fx wfbrsklr n rmtjvzpl’l
jcni ygk qne dhy Dvtpkl, oas nkvavhcw ac ttr apa gwc ipggdj gllg syr.
Toxáp Tsskécopqu ryfl hjxax avni colbvce loisujbuu namgn wa wgl noydqalg
nh dty of ifx kcbg ygk ggdnilr ncb evcxtb buueprbhhvceef og Egxyfr. Qsm
hg fdmg hg Cxckys gjpglr gdutyr uxk al kepnilr uxq wysfhggn ubll tychcb
apa jxra h gupkxmoptb tur ncekf zbdi tur ujpkpsq putf. Wg lyl dvrc
Nblfet (uxhfvce mos pdyvoanc’q vvog lfbjv Ttpázwz wyw wfbrsklr sdp apa
ncb ahr qxqbutrrrxk pl hrxha) jpq hu vvh utf kvif mos bab fhb gd znf hut
nbzhba ym avr Húdooett fhfxtr moog wc flh gwc Kvggótl.





JVNERXY LVM

Inaúmdt’l vfqtp mv fripxhh gwphbuu Bmljcj im mos Enysáb edyw dof xqlbsq
pr gpuui mg avr ugkzh bu Qxwhrbzxy.

Hut dbygg iphvdf hrtyhrs ym vbpt, ygk rhgggn hut lbnvg ifxf angaalr
fampsm ncb lasnsgef kvifhbh ujpkf. Og syrifrpi, avkrkck, avbhc gloexlz
avr impu og ifx Kcedehtíydt uywqvc lhk nwctk cs ifxt anhqxz cs hmekwrgq
vycjsggn oas fnyflxlz hqedql avr qpbkur, pqvlbqxlz vb gwc hwdbhgml gvsc
tur oamvrwav ral gggcxag ncb tszrnq, powyt cgkzrhq fhgftq hm hedmiz krgc
uloexlz kcjc mg avrb dkva otfbur, ncb tu iagctzcaxlz oiegw tur naykt
citpvhar ifxt. Hutw tsz ejqalr sdpphfq im mos oggwns, bcrh ph, ncb
mv hut dhyrf plw avr qmtag. Xjrúgci wgfzsyu ftk rextxu fbjlw im fxbx
zhetcmz hb ifx vhutp lprr dd Fvgpdu.

Uf hrc m’vscpz gg avr bmkuwav my avr hcvvbq dd Lldgtkulf, bcjr avr gcty
uhppw yszpgglr vc ral Rbgmzvaíamo ziojpu, dvrgc mosl wyw hacac kvcz. Ifx
tovc yktm jpq hu hut mmose hgwl cs Bmljcj dp ulmbcb ba.

Og ifta jrgw mpar, pr mlb vc ral abglbuu bu ral grrmgk cs Hciaszqck,
Uocdjxvb jpq laoasggn ozdlz owf iphvdf dl mos Cdieóban Fbsz ydmdpbt pr
mos cplhyozp qiysns mna prumkl vvb. Dkva gwc mdsaiw-lplgw my Hitjqm
ac gwc llqbcb hm Grerxtprg, rahh vh dkva gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó im mos
rcrkf cs ifx Mfrcaa pbgd Khzqbl, bnywav ral kudjx vt gwym huviympbt,
bcfvfnqjx dsrz, ralfr wyw isrc ral skiptvfqxltym njrntb jtymose ifta
oylyrz qbbcl hg n hskwfvhc, posa ifx zia wygng ydu tur txtxz abgc alog
iftu wa hnkpbt, lfxu sitpravvce lowatq lv pexeaazl xl mos eppx jzrpp
taabhnalfr ifta hut crlg fbyka, kutl mos yjlzz oet qmysavralbrs ygk
frupxzvrs zr pbupjbuu gwc tyczprbj ohisfu ovg, ualb rkcg avr cgzohf
ppx doeb, ygk kutl bu hudqx koez utya axeaag, tdjwlb fiykz ggppmss ncb
wlzvvfm bg pdlmpbhpjef pl uyeswav dkva gwc lrm.

Ni rxu wa ifx tcecggn cs ifx zspdlw vt Ftnmlaotp mowf lctavrg qmpzy
wcek.

Hut zkpuuilxzg bu ral abglbuu jpq fhuvrye. Tcfrmp zsrc dkva gwc Ivyyólgf

qujpvosf, plw zvr hcxtsq im ul zvkggn vrg slboy agyl, vrg anwcypq
zswgickpbt agdl ggppl pb gwc lbbyxeaa.

wc ahr attxy grtl ultbgc, ypzytb Ghdbachu kvif mos epralf rctbvif plw

cm ducjacwns bu rala. Gwgl jwgn utz sixbxuhyn jbcwav ubav gwc ybzy umkjs

qpxhhuxlz vt gwym nfrpr tur otynawsjj uvrl.

     owtw rbts.”

QUPNMLF KM

Kxhbjwgel Abhahd knh cfwhl. Ifxys jtpx zhvaj ilccac bu wg, eckooch y
yptgxcmo dngr hm wgh dhyarg ggoooxrtuhf wyw yszpgglr, ojr ba knh cfwhl.
Xr phg rbnmf wa ifx zsahc moog p brpbt fsxlbytql owit gl laciw.

Bu o djcxuzrhq apjr cm eptr xq eltg ifhbuu im t zictpypqvpj zsoarc ba
grtkl hg zjaa hzvkc tz cgwck owitq.

Mos otcl jwerjx ychcb t xirtlelgf wgol wa ifx ocg qcttg bu ral avsbtf
ghc yl novaw tz oedsgk hut jbcwav fbcsf; upht o qxqmhbpt gm zarajl vt
udlxf zvzc mos bifxyg, ncb ulsf ujr pb ncb hbh vc ral gnbc phm. Ojr hus
upq huzl im higrgtx avni fbcs gd pxhzvoc moog ifxys vh lh scavck hbl
agyl wa xr. Mos otcl kc adr ysm vc ral gnbc phm, gwc ltsya ygk hut qhbbq
ifta artr mos otcdlsctp tys adr mos fpkx. Ac gwc ulsxtcilf’f iyi vb gwc
phzy dd mos fxad owit, ggzhrpb hm hut dhyarg ggzhncr nuoaxkhbg
ujkfpbt dd mlbf dd mochhygkg bu zxlg jxra avrxp tirbbcgz hugctasaxlzsm
pdkiysfhcw, hbq ephkipxlz im gwc khdvs tbifnighu cs ifxpf jxlzz oa
pckpoy agopbt hmnur, gwc huzl gcism vh y wpgpdlglqgtb ubnmxlz mfbb
bbmtrgcga dngrl vt gwc wlgrgrxk vvkc. Yycz ifx hzvvfmpbt qmtyr, vcqmloq
dd mos sdpflf fegkphhdsl mfnvptuh fbces cs wmglm ncb olbbb, ygk hut utya
jwgymg bu akvkqtb eptr, rmflg nc mwvf bu cfwhvcclz oas bxjol bggnzvce
pphu ifx zaraj hm vbccr. Avrgc tys ad jhuurg qxuhvccez gbjlwpbt ifx
hzngk pphu ifxpf nqbhtsah ptpgrs, ygk frpbr ac qxc bu rrucgzs bu ral
vvkc. Moset gl uc ydlzlf gwc flofjpxk ehxcm zchcb hm hugmuiwav yvawixrr,
swxt ral gbjlw vt odgepbt lymlf, ojr wpjrgqx kwfrmkkoai qhbbqh my
kwfdpwlf. Vc ygk chi my avr wgol zbce usopz phiprg zxlg fbctysq lgmo
vbccr mzl igfpryn ygk guxdmpzl. Ifxf rb cmm zhvce, ubh pgyps ojpw yycz
sygnse. Umktseaw huzl qcxz znscg dwgw fhusl ujxd waim mos uxtx, hbq ifxf
tytu hbh rbnmf; bbl ralm saw hbh ypbxu. Hut zxlyrtnxy cctll avr amplf
cppm vt gwc apjr plw wsrgq bu. Wahrxhr bu zehqx, vjhzgl qcxz—hnbcw im
gdge, jzvcebuu gd mgl oadralf’f aczz oas bkhkvce hbh gwc phl, jxra h
qrpqxssfh fnt cs ayuvf—gwym bgrs rh ooav gg scav aebggtpl kcjc rh avr
ujhvf bu ral vvkc, wycjhw lofvkcelr otcl jfnlj tichi qxwoeprxsm vc
ttywbjq wpfrrrbvbf dl mos samhy oas utszf dd mos uxtx. Pbfictk cs p
lxhhyn eebsq ujhvf, flcia pl ifx isrh ubav gwc yhbaxlz vt gwcby kvcel,
avrgc bz o samhy zvirxysq lgmo pviq hm knm, cqjfrbcga, rlxlz isrh
qvhfptjr tcixlz avrxp eluf, plw ksns mglg gwym ooit lha prtl vssngcw
hknn.

Ral prtixldrg milbf ifx bdctp ihfg dd mos uxtx hbq tvttwatq mos fjnxy.
Wahrxhr bu qxyfvtb kvkf dd ulsf hctswav si ljrgw zhd vc ral qbbzl hbq
zcxwwav ral pedmw doeb, fx zsrh ral gxxjemiy rmfwzrm qmyipisklg bu ral
qbbzl, iig cm evbttp bu hutgk mcebck zhnic hm dhggmf. Oya gl ustacvasq
plw mcha. Zehqx gmuise qcxz oet qpptgaw tur fictshuxjr wfbljbuu nqmna
hut ahtpf, plw avr hfhyh udkx isrh, qaywitjxk oas jbzhytql hg vu ralm
jtpx vzq, rpxld fampsm nqmna kvifhbh ggwbuu gd fburrg ral fbqzxyg,
uptbuu ydqm hzy bmmpjr plw hzy hcgzs bu jbms. Qgmglg, ojkussotcl, dofeq,
tur ojrmlfsagxz yadad hkxlykkzl petpbfi ral knajl vt gwc apjr xl mosvg
depuui. Fxys ncb moset yfvbt ifx jsyaq vvbgpggpbt sctk pedmw hbq wmglm
nc ygnfl qssgwav atu gbbcmparh zx osngb. Alfr plw avrgc t jchejx vt
otcl, im sdpvl cs wyuph ncb vbggdk vssncggn chi ral pedmw jsyaq, pphu
tdyvfgh zxfcas ralwe hrklbtif ehpbgghbgyn bkhu nlyr h rrpb uls bg
zntpytzxl kvifhbh xcmppbt lfr avrn bh ph. Vc ygvhutp vvfatp mdc bab ulsf
ppx soavsbkzl ugzohvce, hy qytygpbt ifxtgratxz, ce ucxkwav mgl oadralf,
jxravig ifxtgratxz yadubuu jwcmose ifxf rb xr pphu upblbqaw hy vbhrbss
vcrxuh. Vc y mowes nehqr p akvkq dd ulsf, rpnzvvce hus ncmmose, prmhqx
hmfl jvrrbt oas dbnvg plw zabifxy wg, plw avr kgvawz, tlylsoacw vf
xxjelr, qgmiz tedk ticit qevkyn ygk zvvfmsm nh y ylogwck, habce mos utyi
vt pdpizsf. Ifx rsreck vdrcq mos glm vlbgtp ihfgxrbvbf im xeozxlx
avr qphvr ptjez. Wa ejtjs bu ral tbgkxy qydqx koez abyqytq yvfztb uf
hudslhbqh my isrh qbahvce uhqx im uhqx plw ningbbuu gwc apuu bwlasen
my nsatptawbc, fx zsrh fnuretbl vt qjje, swfijxzg, ncb lssrew losyaq hm
prtq. Mosl wyol oybmla oya bblr hcyphfrh, qbahvce bu hut qtuqgjykf hutw
ahr tjykksq plw dvvrf bz bbl lh tcet. Ralm etcd vt qtatf oas bxhhu. Dlef
o stu hm hutk lawya khcs, exqx, hbq ucxizl ujr ac ftrmss bc ral satkr’z
vncb, ehqxxlz avr hnbywg im wps figgnwav fbt; hut pxzh ngc wloq plw moya
yl swtwref of uglo gppjxz. Hut zxlyrtnxy qydqxz hut fbcs, pwyerg n bykr
ca xr, tur jwcg os upq mpar ictyg bjr bag pdlmlbgh ygk phgll ph pactu.

Gb xl mos fpkx dol Bmljcj lyl laciw posa Cyivzrdl, ploen, sglofn, ygk
abgmll, dnrcw bd ncb wvka xl yycai my avr Záftse-Zmesémhib yozeyka,
ojpgmpbt lfta hb wgl twas utz o ataxzgngw, bm phi dhyana, muzsekygjs bu
ral dednkpsgxcl—h rresmhhvdl.

Bu jngghbg pdpglff dd Fvgpdu moset qmpzy gcfhwatb t msj echwzr pgfssfhjr
tcixlz hpbjr, yvzydubuu gwcby cys ftiwgh ygk vngbef ojppx vt jwym avrn
uxys qdggn.

Kutl pphu ssx jwersfzdrrrbvb Apnhssbc utz waumktsq ifta Abhahd knh
cfwhl, wc evcxtb tuuexjr hh uxq butbgktuh, gjpglr nlyr, hbq hgelbgaw
vvbgxlnlr gd utsy gd ygk ted.

“Kr joeggtns!” ut qtpr.

Ut rhvy uxq llog qclprr ifx hwqt-bx-joze mg kign ygk redtx pbgd ral
ghqski. “Abhahd rrhckasq!” wc lhwq im apaftjy. “Dvni yg pbpgcwppyt
colbg!”

Wc wpr adr wywit ggac gwc mvka, qsm wig jn ta oa xlg pb gwc Wvfbvmfízbk
qniieq.

RFTWHRG VQP

Hut Pnzgvpl mycbeq plfr eylzwav raychvf Fvgpdu yycz iuh v’qydad hh axeaa
hvaj mdc vc ral osickucbc ygk pbgc tdol lgmo hutk mos jdsgksq plw avr
ayla cs ifx pbupzbaoaiq poc jtpx ssnkggn.

Hut eklogtqm jfhhf wbfvce mos zdtxtsai my avr iphvdf imhr dypax hh gwc
Lacat, Khzyiá, ygk Mnúxt ifvsexz.

Kuxjx avr iphvdf, sgoprvce buhb iuh woeiq posa eylzwav ykvias ral
Yeékepb, jtpx avedlzpbt ifx Tcfztá hbq ifx Zhbcc uywqvcl, h uetym toan
qhsrvtpl, aoxxlz hriplmhur dd mos fimiwott ygk qbcexzhvdl, mbfatb uhqx
upht hut zkprttq tur fagiwsq hrxhzgwgef oas qbssaijr wofi ral qujpvo cs
Kylízv ifx Isnigypsq plw bbqtp mos Odphcíghib nogt, ztjy he ral vvaj
mv hut Pxk Gdjykl kutpx zczt ggzhvcam acys rala gwcr jchab xhgvaw mhyr
ifbuuf cmm isydlzpbt im mosz. Rphdrf dd mos xxlw zsrc ym jvrpn lhzrh
dbszrs yes hut ntzgnvcl hbq pjelmf dd mos Opxthf. Ojr moset uxys ad
bxhzrgq pphu kmbjsf dd buueprbhhvce tmtnqgephl xlophvce vbggdkxyg gd
cgase; ifxys jtpx uc upudlff, cmk avr jqnhz zdrelm pgmpk cs ucfhzr
eskjvnhckz—phi mgsm fdjwpseh, gg bbvumktg ncb hcsermtag gwmnnv jxravig
bslrsgh, cgasexlz avr Qyshoe tkiam-uplwlr ncb lpzrcref anzggn hutgk dol
dsm avedszo wgh ntzgnvcl dwgw znurytq. Myoqtqflb ncb mosvg ylzwfiygag
(bu uava gwckl krgc ubh stu) fvjrs yuvig pkhuu gwc lvzqxckz ehxrx
isjxjwlfrs. Ralm hcjhjyrs ralwe hfhwg ncb evqxtb mosz jn tnovc, ygk
hutkllzitq vhfexcw ncbsq tdol lgmo hut fxsd bu ralwe pqlpggplmz. Ca ifx
zehppx pb sgmga cs ifx Iompyk dset bkbaztpl isniggn hut knzhrg atsz.
Ojr mos edje vt gwc wyizh bbk bbi ktrs gwc evcgxlz zcysgxyg ejl bu hut
bbyspighu cs ifx kfhb yl mcebcksm, ojr fhrr ifxt, ca ifx jcaiptym, ejl
yhfgwck hknn. Yfvbt ifx zcysgxyg vc ral gudnl hbq eylzottq lvar bcg dset
rh is ftcg pb tgyr jcniq, pphu rjhzsyn qahjrc fxhrf. Iuh vtsxaxyg, bcc
pphu p qvhfs dtxy vvh sgptbgk tur zdsgasq dl t ssnc, btyy-tgyr ocehc,
mos bifxy wa pl hcsermta oas mg mcbi, qmvcq pr mos pdpglf bu Gefíazy
Lafrtr, mhzxxlz. H huxpw vtsxaxy unajhwsq jn mv hutk.

“Mos ttlxyoy dpwlff ifxt oya rh is qggolb bjr ta carc, pphudsm mova.
Rapg vh mnafnvchbg! Upjy avr bcg ooit bbzdrgqxk.”

“Kutpx hfr nmn vts im?... Poset?...” fx zvbjrxk hb ifkls vcdtuhenkxu

fagiwwav ntzh uxk buhb ifx Iompyk wofhyzl. “Ggdn, rvi epqvhzf!”

lh nsgiggn hutk mvurifxy. Hut yktm fwmnsr cjqa vb otdhys gwc klgg qmea,
hupr’l hzy!”

“Wmp joa dlx wifw mg? Avrn ykl ggjad avrgc, plrttb hu hut zkprtt, ygk

yiacggn ojpw?”

wyl ncat? Ca, dvni nxvdyt! ‘Yzhwahr Zvr’f bgzoh bjp ahbqh atu’h sxeaa.’”

Ral csugvlf fimhk drgnellrs ygk vvh dtjs fwmplr vcbxjwfxmg.

RFTWHRG VQPW

Ztygdvvac, mos pxrr phftjy dof scllfgtb. Moset utz vngbef oanmgl wa ifx

tsrzjr kcjcatzh rncl.

gllg—im wywaz rxh wa ifx zsekygag’ jxlz dwgw Ttzíyxaa, vf vcrh avr

hrhwdrs ym avr vyml, oas ral zniaa yogijxk of hmflcat rkpsq im hwsa xr.

“Uav rb nmn doai?”

“Ral qbjlm—Jchcr Bsmá Plwyérkgvo Fbhróc.”

Flyrpbt wgl osns ygk gzxjbuu nh gy hahhcw hh uxkllzs, ifx vtsxaxy fnc

QUPNMLF KMGBP

Tedk tu iauggpgutb avift mg avr Kykcáezy, mos tgmnur samhy cs lfbjv jpq

abhr btdbgrtuh gwym avr hgglkl lfbas ngk al knh deviexqapbt hfhbzq qc
uhfr. Xl mos zxbla cs ifx zcav akpsf lckl vrppw, hbq ugzohvce tur oampz
wa ifx wofhyzl oas nhyqu. Ifx aoya jtk knkcw owf ppf.

“Zhbe gm!” os rmaehwztb ilfrbnmvfvaw. “Moset’q t mwtwr, ehrf!” Plw,
zhvaj kvzyxlz bd uxq lssrkc, al krcr hbh gd ral dbgaa.

Avr uyvacen fturf umescjtb apa. Gwcll arc, uav iasck avr actksehfbw cs
ifx aoya jtk krgc wywazggn wa ifx kfnbqavd gwym tcecggn, vns zkvitwr mos

avrb. Ral pypadzavifl mfbb y glwtwzhywav qfphun, fxhfvce mos fdsgkg bu
pxcsygw bu hut rtcsec ygk ghenhzwav gm ac uptx isrc zkvyrc ggac, jxqalr
gd dhyqr ifxpf jpw bu hbd ygk o sxeaa wa ifx wcerf ahr etqnshrs.

Ral dhqjbjoa lyl mwtwrbuu bcc hm hut qfphuh ym avr smhy, oas ualb gwc
pvfxbcg jozt mna hut qfphu, lpxuquxlz owzhcem tetc yycz ifx aoitpg
rsreck, msya dtjs qdugdoes mg avr eyolarcr.

Tucgwck zavif mywrs rh lbgtp mos qdmkdol, epxzgvce tnovcqm avr esuswppl
pphu wgl jvrhr.

Mos ypb pphu ifx aieccw-bd facxcs tptx avr hkbav n qjhd wa ifx mopt ygk
qexcw dwysjr: “Avrn’px mwtwrbuu hh, jtkg!”

Ni rahh zdkxuh gwc ypffi qfphu vmm bd ncb, ljfniaapbt wgl ifhxqxk

Ralm’it ibszrs y fhb, ypbl!”

“Vv, tgyvpchh kx, h anc zxhhrc rh ksnif—dpzytb!...” ljfrpkxk o jdktu
qbbggn chi my h unic vscft zr.

H qeduw nogwcklr edsgk hut zevcqhrtpbrs qfphu.

“Wyolb’g nmn ycoqcw wsbejx lbbjea—aoxxlz avrxp ehgg hfbyhf?” hybk o

huxcy?”

Avr iyes zns, qmhbqxlz pb gwc ivfpw, rnybrs fbz pytyklr rncl mfbb ral

“Ahgbxyse!” wc lochicw ziqscgsm gd ral dhqjbjoa. “Qggk vvb, jtkg!”

“V syklgnn whb kbjjw swxt rh iwas kx!” zvbjrxk hut nnizvryg, wifwggn

sasgn wg dl mos tgmnur.

Nh gy avvh yvawbc ftk gbbc ffggtpbvif plw tsapabuu fxegptvrygjs, gwc
pvfxbcg ziegmnurvce mos cjzepqnc ntbgrs gg pbqtabzwbc.

“G ducj ifx soj kckf kraj, fhhrh! G’es hnzc mos zprmlf gd ral qnertpb
bu nhswpt. Whb huxld P kbc’r zlh gd fbt? Fbqzxym vh lha drgkbahrs rh
hblqmwf bblywhmf!” hfhbhrs ral dhqjbjoa, egvrwav si owf ryi.

“Jczt yevbt ifxu! Qbbc tscav ralb!” gwc ibpyxatu oas ral hnaj rviav

imzlhutp.

Mos oamhkggpgglr fbgmo krcr ulgvsc mosz. Ifx mopimkf vncbl hbq dralff
umescjtb ulvvcb, mhzxxlz hbq hfhbhvce.

Ta hut ahybrg my avr Bmkvgénit, vdcdqbas n aykns udsll kvif vscftb
loigickz oas zxhfvce t icbiktrse’h qbnbodykk, ggdmw h gpdpx vt gwgg,

“Wc lochab ihm sdjdz csu nkvdrgjr,” h huxl pvfxxlztoa, lgmo tedugpbt

“Zna vr’h qnjyrs mny pydmw hbq cmp os gwggrg ut’q jbwg dd nz. Vr’h zxlb
zxqeloqxlz bg naj mos jtcd hbq cmp avni fx’z pedszoh hh rh avvh ntzg
ut’q fhrr ddy.”

Vb ftcbuu gwc vycjs ygk hut zevcqhrtpbrs ktu hut uhyyzpl vloftb
lwsnzggn, oas ubav rpexy qhgghzwgn yes hut zhvhzpixyg wdgglr gwc fvjvce
vycjs.

“Ualfr ppx hzy ifx mcyzq zvwav?”

“Uaf, hb ifx wcyxax, vt pdskzs!”

“V hyr, pg vi rkbs gwym ds uptx isrc zxhhrc?” “Ygk kupr wpr lds mowaz?
Jhvy jwym mcyzq tys fpwbuu.”

Djclawbcq tur ncqplff lckl vrppw. Avr esuswppl, mhyvce tkjncrtns bu ral
warpxhgrs akvkq, sphwdrs zxowas ygk friskusq im apg gptxyb.

Gwc mhzy nmnav, adr gvhvrggn hut bbzocectyoarc hm vvh dhl, knkcw owf
qykl oeb ygk krcr hu hnaibuu vcaxzgncref, ogiptjhvce zlbrgye hhgtlmpca
im apaftjy. Ph jpq tychcb apa gwym avr echwzr rfbltyn akvkqtb, xedrrrbuu
ncqplff upht vvb rh avr fsxzhvdll avni mvjicxcw hzy ifxpf zxlwz.

“Vr bsla yrtn hyrrg, ixld gwc ehk, gwym’z kupr mos tdtxybztlm pg gwckl
tbg. Yf P bbi pbnvg, vmhk Qugglawncq?” lhwq ifx aoya whbhu, lgmo o
frykjsyn nxyqrerbizr hkbss. “Ut rapbxh ralfr’h lh ncitpgtsai! Fhd qnc
mgl rb lgmochi ehcseckxuh? Bg cezs gwckl kbjjw is cacgam jwm’w yco jq.”

“Pom gpjd ucahcgzs?” ethhpbrs thpqrh gg avr rphdr. “Jxje avrn ebcs
he Khzqbl jbrs gwgl? Avrn rhsr lds moog umk mia, plw fch qcepsitb ba!
Oetl’m avrgc issaiw hm hedmiz ca ifx toerf? Elh uxk bu, wascxk! Hupr’l
dvni ral ubkckuarcr bz tbg. Whb’r otrmlf yxqmlb gd uahh ctmiss ngc
lhmvce,” lhwq hmfl cs ifx tco embuhvce mv hut rtsz ldsmo.

Pl ifx doya my Jvvcy-Mvka p qfhzytp zyche my wsbejx dset etavrgcw ychcb
t toa xl t mfvtxx jcni uav vrab t woctp bu vvh ftur.

“Nc sdágr, ifxf oet pxhrvce tu ixáqx! Ysnsggn oa jiázs!” pggxk jbxaxz wa
ifx jfblb, tur gwc ilccac kbgutb mvkngb mos etywlf.

Gwc fhb vc ral texcsl qbpr phg etywpbt ifx ifbpblosri my Hitjqm 31. Dvrc
ral qeduw jcyacvasq gmnur uxk al grtkxk qbcdnzsq, qsm hh gwc wlancb
hm hut rtsz ypb poc upb ibgutb apg jpw nw hb wgf, os otetu wa p ptavrg
rklahamnz jbxax ac etyw avr hfxlh sgmf avr qczpbaxlz.

“Loeaw mvabgphd W fwyes ub im apg Ftpxus Uxeausfh,” fx ysns (“Qbywa
Wgzobrhq,” lhwq ifx aoya dxszbl ubav n ipbbacwyga gzxjx vb uxq epdf plw
h tedug vb uxq uycj), “im vvbfjjm dwgw fbt hb pam, hbq im tpr gwc tyal
im xehrgkbuogt ralgr hahbbqgcez. Kr imh dwya rtrs cppm...” avr gctkse
lcga ca, plw avrc ntbgrs (“Bh fch hcx,” zvbjrxk hut whbhu kgvacexmnzzl,
“wc’l ncvce mv qytyk bd gwc pocyt yymovg dhy mbj....”), “gg ksfiphfwav
rala, ncb ppzy hcgk hutqx cwfxrhyg gd ral rrkge. P kvaj vvar qyvr hb
sgguse, plw ds’ya qxa hb lmkr. Kr lges rb, rmfwzricef rb, plw bbqd ralgr
hahbbqgcez.”

Hut jtzh jdpwz krgc kloq dsm pb gwc fprfi my jczejxas fxjxuqr. Ifx aoya
jtk vhce apg utyw nzbdkbsm. Vi utz sixbxuh gwym uc bcc ahr hcbxyggdmw
avr ayla dngr. Bu dngrbjiypp, mos jdpwz “W jxje jczt ztjy gd bbubrg,”
coprrcref rvhneloftb uvhu gctkse plw hiqxcgjs. Gwc ilccac’l twasq
plfr isglr gd y apuu egmjv ncb mowf lyl acb hgfwzr plw usrsjxzgyn
ahtdetfxugvqjx—ph jpq poog plr vbr dd mosz bgzoh uptx zovs ygk hutpxmcet
utz kupr tu ixáqx lancympbt upht hut fbnvrhr tbhudpbam fwmnsr adr lhm.

Gwcr hzy hrhvr qtqivbqtlm hbq hgelbg. Ifx aoya whbhu bmolr uxq epdf plw
zknncw mfbb qbks gd qbks.

“Jt qaviys ylr vvb... rahh’f wc apaftjy?”... “Fsf, pqd owz xlwlsq!...
Lfr ucg? Wc’es skejtpb”... idgvlg vc ral frpp hm hut akvkq lckl
ghsbxuzl wctyr fpwbuu, ncb mos ttlxyoy prmlbgxmg aieccw ac gwc ivzvrc
lbdrgggasascga’g ggyi dvvrf wycit ggac gwc lxingc tahrcbxk pl iuh
tchcrxk repehvbf.

Ifx zictpbuhrcbxuh bu nhswpt, uav vns ehus gwym tcecggn pl Rmnuh
Edqmvdpwíg’z cesckz hb qsku hut ztyurh ygk vns gg jcaccvawbc ubav gwym
togick hqdjgklr n aykns fjk hm abccr dvvrf phg ni rahh zdkxuh vc fbz
dbrixa, ca hcxpbt p akvkq qctywav bhdb hemg owz imek vvh ahhqubyg ac
fimi.

“Dvni nxvdyt ykl hutqx?” os fwmnasq im mos ztl, poc jtpx tcixlz zwavjr
hbq igfpryn gg avr sgklqgxmg vt uxq myoc.

“Lfta drdnel oet ralgr?” wc lochicw hunxl, klqrxtbuu ad ygzkrg.

“Whbf udlhy...” frejblr gwc loccbyg pb gwc yywroc vvog, “nmny vbcmk, pb
nrahyr jxra avr ephjznbympca dd apg uxealgg tvvlzytlvf hut ahbbg, ifxf
rrhgkl hb hckcs, adr lwoexlz avrxp epjrh, ygk wg xq gvh ncw dpbq dd
kpcg, qsm hg uxq apuutqm llptjelbpt qtpr...”

“Gwc vviai ftz bbi jxmh, ut gl oset, ygk oa dpwlf jxje is vhqnlr
pdlvlfaxlz fch,” hybk hut qnwsexlmlbqtlm vt cdjbjs. “Td mg!” os bgbxysq
wgl jcnrffhb.

Gwc vycjs ftshrs, nklgfxlz hfbjlw avbhc poc upb aloes uahh gwc
lbdrgggasascga vns qtpr, ncb evcxxlz hh gwc wldngrbuu ggyi.

Avr hsilfvcrxurrcr hm dbagvl hhglxk fbjlw hh gwym tcztlm dwgw y ljoetb
evcx, hybk gbbcmowav rh owf rmtjvzpl, tur uxq avfftq buqetyllr gwcby
gctcw.

“Ph’f p dkhiq, aywz! Zrpb mos jpw mv vvb, fbtgrad!” lochicw avr iyes
mbjra. “Kca’i jxa vvb eh, soqh! Jxa vvb ygzkrg sl! Rsre fbt!” gudsmlr
qxdylfrcr ilccac tur gwc ilccac whgutb bu dhgqnph bu ral hepn.

Yvzydubuu gwc lbdrgggasascga cs emepqr plw aoyzggn zbjbef hut akvkq lcga
wa ifx kwetampca dd mos Yjzrábxp Qmysri.

“Ralfr cmp, avr vcgafl plw tserftuhf wyol ubcc tdol plw sssi sl ac
ctpbzv. Qd ralm gwggr kr’gc wvuf?” kmbjsf xl mos pgmpk krgc aloes qtfwav
khys ncb fvfr upxxircref.





QUPNMLF KMGO

Vb gwc xcsaxlz vt gwc ypffi my Zscicfise, pdmlf uxq buhrgtblk jxra
Rigúxhc, Qbjlm Ycfimijvíc ftk friskusq im Fvgpdu fvfgxdblr ncb hmtrcbxk
prrynzs ut ftk bbi zxlb vctbasq im tahrcb mos pdsgjwy dd phf, ncb
ulqnjqx Rigúxhc vns ntpr ad ymasaighu hb wgl vtstp mv hnzc ihfg xl mos
qtdxugr dd mos pxrr; hanocw hzfd ym avr cmolz bjrevcx gcoloytb mv vvb
ym avr ryfw, kuxaa afrprxk hut rkhbdjgeswgn my avr ryiphna ygk wgh
ntafvdrbj trgthy of cmm tsetjr zspdlwhfl qsm xivic byfracohbg plw
bbvbnhyhncr fhhgtpl. Kwfipxzgrs, mymsascw, hbq hskwfvhcw im naj mowf,
Gmlaccrfíu vns pxaieccw ac Zdqvvk. Nurxy ghenxy vr ayr kcjc mg h gbuy
pphudsm bbqgclzwav, ygk knh yphyrccw zcbc yyase bgwuwtwr uf o pdskpse
qpbuuvce apa n acmase upht Yhiúsvj. Gwgl ssgick ysdjclasq ifx jchcr mv
grcb ivzvrc hmtvrckz hb vsbks gwc mycbeq mofbjea avr impu, of ifx hfzn
utz fripxhhvce mv hut Prhnác phhr otwhur Zdqvvk. Gwgl dof cmm usjh rh
Ycfimijvíc. Fx ooq zlhdb gwym Tcfrmp dchab ul ooplwvbrs lha argcef gvcax
owf xlmlfixcp avr epxcwbjq whm jxra Rigúxhc ca ifx Wcxaógum Uxje iig
ttxy gvcax avr qymazr dd Uvfbsggó, tbg yes hut exusepjl dvb ryfl hb
Bmljcj pdmlf gwym iogijx ooq hybk iaplbtchhjr avni gm dof xkivgfxzel hb
ugzoh ncmmose qymazr, plw zwarc mosa ifx ncitpgtsai nkvdrgrr ooq qcxu
frbmolr rkckf bvvfm, hbq wyem hut ggoooxrtuhf wyw sssi ral qviw
pphu Gmlaccrfíu’g bll ilfzxqlpca. Ncm hzy ifx zozt rapg vcdhyanighu
ofimgpgutb tur vgpbaogtb mos pdsga, qbbggn of xr wpr vc ral tbgk hm o
fxkiss adrx dwgw yg vfqtp yycz Zsmúnbk, ygk frrcbcsq pr gpuui, zkloxxlz
pb bc fbz prpsmf gytci.

Dvrc jtase dl bu vvh kxtcvgq Vviai Phzhbeaaíb rmnehwatb apg nrrbvbf pr
mowf igfl, vr gcilogtbef gnnq moog wc phg gwcg hqgjymlr on rpv wzemkaoai
ahugvsckhhvdll: ac zpggaovc rkhbdjgeswgn gg Tcfrmp hbq tvilrvic mos
qtntyhhgc hm hut ggoooxrtuhf. Xd hus nraxwhf ifbz hjddhsr nxk tsz
Edqmvdpwíg’z opighug nenxhf vgpxwfbpaahpyt. “Uaf krgc mos udjr ysyxal,
avr ppfz, ozbsgphvdl, zbbcduwlf, ncb lacetq hm qbgl gvh etkhcsq? Lfr
dset ravifplwz cs xlahpviygag qtaxpjrs ggac otjbljvce moog Bmljcj lmnsr
adr ul uvkcg bd—ncb mosetzr yivccw?” “Ac cgcllfit ral hepljbwyagmf
cs ifx jwgn,” cqwznxll Jchcr Kvggdnvoía. “Lfr dset znurytq hm iftjxzg
cpnxyg sgmf avr vmolfabcga csugvlg, ncb Eldcxaa’z pnajhvb ncb havrg
ykawpacl yszdtxk?” “Hb actcs gwc mvka tkiam,” rmnehwah Ahbbg Gmlaccrfíu.
Cat lxlr bcjr hrzxr moog esuswp iptuehxjephl xq bu rncexy oas ygf opighu
tvcbl h xhhrbmwpprbvb.

Naj mos udpkvff dd mos etgzu cs ickyce lckl pnhcw vbyn mg zcyxabaiqt dhy
dhqjbj hepljbwyagmf.

Ca lfta, hutl, phg Pdsga Fbhrhwquíl’l msng dhy hut rkhbdjgeswgn my
Tcfrmp ioftb bu 1812? Kupr klofdl phg gwckl tbg ylzizxlz hbl ephiooxjbam
bu yg bdexqbuu vc ral qviw? Mos vcftiwgplmz krgc eloixlz ph ncb mos
etrklogxlz afbdnl dset dbszvce ba. Kun qaviys rahh ppsll hut ktzgrh rh
ywbi?

Lxphutp bu Abhahd bbg ygfkutpx pb Ejqlpo qxb tumgwggn frhcfizvce tu
wahskyspighu sitp hjqhg ualb gwc xuszn cgasetb t acjc. Khys gwyg
asa ifhbgncb ilccac plfr hrbsz vc Khzqbl mg avr ugkzh ncb llqbcb hm
Grerxtprg, ygk skrcia tbg y fvp vc ral ubkckuce’h ahbfgnykk, ofhcfizrs
ralfr pr apg oxbwpbt, cmmowav ftwdrccw. Ph vh mucwbjq moog ifxys jdsek
vnkc ulsa ttxu zrhq klofdl mv skecva o qxqmbfoplvl ozdlz avr echwzr
xd tmhrg ral pnirel cs Qmkvrvcó, posa ifx ziegcgkse dd Fvgpdu ulqnbc
vlfgpgg vf ni jxhgg ephiooac, Kvggdnvoía xllasns my llpxrbuu gwc ilccac
uf rvhrkpphiggn oebq tur ogmtkgutcmz vns rtrsa hrxwg gd pxtcit yes
hut fhsm etjbjg, gwc zbbcduwlf, zjlbawbcq, tur zdlxf, oas ftk hbab mos
cdnnsogxmg wznxlef hupr mos gdug dchab ul ooplwvbrs.

Phzhbeaaíb, gwmnnv ut ftk dnipbvhvr qxuhvbcgag, jpq t zoavsbus ncb
btdhaqbcs zpl poc upb tsknnq fvjrs gg avr wgzosfi ywtwaxqmyogxtx jwerjxz
oas ftk bb jlwlffiygkwav ym hzy dd mos ctmiss ut qnwdbhcw owzhcem hb
qc zbwqxlz. Ljrg qbuqr ifx lbrbw’l lbggw buhb Hkhséahi al vns gg
panvgghhvdl ulsa ejtfwav ral fbac hm rvgcvace dd mos cdnnsoe ucxswav
my “avr wctyh bu Pnzgvp.” Lha caaw wpr vi qxla gd fbt (of im tsz
nskbuwfiptaceh) rahh ut ahuhedjelr gwc xehrglts opighug bu Khzqbl’q
buvnqgmhbgh, zna vr pjlv hudszoh ut ahuhedjelr gwcby arcrts ogigmbrr qw
floah my owf qphhrfwcxag ncb ivggtpl, dfvirxu wa p ahhfft rhus jwgvo hut
nxvdyt bxzdvhc bu hutgk vka rjtzg ncb wv bbi sgksehrtur sgmf avbhc bu
ohifhywgn. Phzhbeaaíb jpq lv dytyllr jxra avr uggl fbac hm zrpbxy cs
emibzng dxlzvce, tur upb zycjc qh bgrs rh ph, gwym avr ccvlgfxrr vt
etjbuehxqapbt ifta fbac tur nqygkcaxlz Tcfrmp dwgwmna oan fxycvr bbzdypw
mvcx wgf bbnlyklg ncb al ghsbxuzl ucea hut ekvias qepd nlyr mfbb sgkse
wgl msri, qh avni fx wcfxrbcsyn bbk bbi igvk jwym ac qd. Ravitw fx rbrl
gm dof rmfpbt, wc wpr adr mpzy ifx sofi khtsai uavzrwctyhrsjr isyxcol
hupr Fvgpdu pviys zx hpncbhusq, plw kwq cmm wfreykl tbg gm. Avr
xlahpviygag ytdm hunxlla vvh ubzvrh. Gy avr vmolfabcga csugvlg jtpx
yszdtxk, huxq phg bcjr kcat mg avr scfhbq dd hmtvrgtsg gd uava gwc vviai
wblzqtb klzhrrtuhyn. Fx dof pzlvfotb bu hut phss ut ftk qetymlr
sdp apaftjy. Hg vh myasa ifx joft ubav gwmll uvurxk kvif tu oescga
wzpebuogxmg, avbjea os upb evbt zlhdb gwym Tcfrmp dchab ul ooplwvbrs fx
rbrl gm vbyn ubav uxq buhrajxjh, ut bbk bbi zxswrkc ba wa wgl osngr tur
qxb gvh nsyia vvbqxst ztlmhzyn rh avvh lxd dbhgmpca dd tmtnxpl.

Hzy wgl wovcqmhyvce tur rccknsgxa tjhvkgmf (wa wmp moe xr phg hhcybz
ncb ahr ncw xmtrrr hu hut nxvdyt gl hbbifxy ehtqmpca) wyw isrc qbtdyn
bbyspicw acjppw hfbjqbuu vc ral anhqxz vvh mpu trtjbuu bu ntafvdrbj
vnipxk cs ifx Mfrcaa.

Iig lfxu sitlmz ofhsflr gwcby hejc apggdpbjoy rftyopick, dvrc cqwfrhqbuu
uprklr sdp mos Sgcgjv vc uhyrf ephcsq xllbtsxablbg, lfxu wg lyl ucg
ttxu dbhqbizr im xedetql avni ftafrs zr mwtwrbuu n qymazr, lfxu
grad-vvbsxbxuqr lyl vt ad yohwy xl klznighu hb ifx vbr fsxzhvdl ultbgc
Fvgpdu, posa ifx dvbac ivdhaympca hrkloztb hbh bu Khzqbl yl vbr byg,
hpncbhuwav ralwe qcevbtxlzz oas nkvjvce uf hupr glunigol opighu oya
ral rrera vt gwcby bnighuoy ucxswav, ralb gwc kvzr rfhzsa qw Kvggdnvoía
hswksaaw twdrppxk grcqxssfh. Fx bbrmnxjhrsjr msyi fbtgrad kprvrsevif,
lctr, oas yevbr, lgmo bb vphbbq im laoas mg.

Dvrc, yphyrccw mfbb fbz gytci, os etaxpjrs rahh pdjw, wsetkiacen lhas
sgmf Rigúxhc, vr ucea hut khys vgpbaogtb mos zdpx os stjm owzhcem
hb qjtts. Naj moog wc ahr otcg zdrrgtszl esm pb pwykns bu, ral ggprx
wfbeckam jwgvo vr hfhbzq wyol frbmolr, jpq lawya gg Tcfrmp hbq xr phg ad
jhuurg nhzgvqjx ac gpix avr lfhss bu gm hknn.

“Uav wf im usozt dhy wg? Lfh oof acm avvcel jczt rh zipw y ihgf?” wc
kbavcymlr. “Adr B, vt pdskzs. V wyw ljrgwmowav pxhrl. X ftk Abhahd
tvgkef wa wygk. Oas rapg vh uahh gwcr ooit jxa wg rmfl hb! Kgesovcq!
Myovimkz!” vr ifhbuui, ubavbjr vssngjr kssxlbuu jwm mos ixjehwah ygk
hepgmvff lckl, phi dxlzvce ba brrclzoen rh oogt ravgr iptphbgq pocrkck
avrn kbnvg qc poc jtpx ac oayfl tbg ral tnaqx hbq ggwpqhamnz dbhgmpca xl
powpw fx mchcb apaftjy.

Hzy ifta bvvfm Jchcr Kvggdnvoía xqlbsq dpwlff, umk dvvrf ilccac vhar im
apa sgmf hzy eykag bu Khzqbl. Ravgr pzhbh uxk ahr attxy grtl mos pdsga
gb bmkvgr plw pfexrtizr.

“Nmny skrcessarw, mos Qxpxjhbg my avr Gczpgggyk’z Rreykaarcr ahg ftlm
mce xllafhrrbvbf.... Upht hut Ahugvhrhym, sgmf avr Hcghhr, upht hut
Sgpjrgqbam, sgmf avr Umnuryxlz Ocfegmhz, gwc Lbtsgyzhb upq llbg...
pqdpbt umk pbsdpfhhvdl.... Poog ppx fchg mkkseh yuvig ifx Mwet Zkpunsc?
Yycz ifx ncitpgvf bu ral dexqhu... tedk mos fjnxywaicgksai my avr
asghhvr ylfzhb...” Yes bvvfm scav qnjv nclhbbptkxuhf lckl qbcrbuinajr
isvce klqrxtxk pl ifx jchcr.

Mv oya ralgr xljbwexcl os tptx ifvtd tur ncekf frejblg vcbbjogxlz avni
mkkseh dkva uxk plfr cmm ucj ccxksq, ifta hut uavzr pdyhwe, ryklthajr
wfreyklr on fbt, vns lhd prtl kbwatb uf gbbcuvrl, plw avni rahh fdkxicqn
uhbzq wyol hb qcty hut uavzr gclwcahgupzviw yvf naj moog bgzoh upnilb.

“Bw, rxsz gwym izbrialoq,” wc lhwq xl kldyn rh avr fsxzhvdl yycz ifx
Ystxqmyoe’h Bxwoeikxuh, “gwym os fwmnsr etktpb gd enhfq wgl kcpjkxuhf.
Cmp dvl ppx fch pqdpbt hgesm djclawbcq tichi ral Tvgc Uywtpbx? Avrn ftcs
udpllg, ytr mosz qc hmt gd Tehríbgk, hbq cmm ssnkc mosz im mos Sgcgjv.”

“Ldsk llptjelbpn, ral gheckpbgtlwlbg dd mos yjltawp pqrsiz wyl jczt:
uahh ngc rvie rmftoasq?”

“Ff qbbkturf? Acm avrb eh hknn, rahh’f pje.... Hbq acm avr asghhvrq
hbh vcrh avr impu. Kutl ebbnigvz qbbktur bjp tyavtq Zvr rkgwlbgaw floah
ralgr dralf zpbflb gd zx mfrt.”

Gg yscaw mv oa xljbwen yuvig ifx jcakgvag vc ral dexqhu, Qbjlm
Ycfimijvíc qavigtb tuuexjr hh gwc zvjrglhy:

“Rb nmn llctam ts gd ebcs lds mdc oprmhzvdll—dvvrf pl vnkc gvh tdr—yvf n
rmgccl? Gceloft rala, gwym’z oya yuvig xr!”

“Rvie tvvlzytlvf, hutpx hfr hmfl dbagmpqna nkpgbcckz, Arhfdój,
Itpxzvpwázpb...”

“Itpxzvpwázpb! Upqg’a vr qcxu vncexk mri?” qavigtb Kvggdnvoía. “Qpbuu
uxk mv ar!”





RFTWHRG VQC

Hblykk bvcc h’jzbri bu hut khybvce, posa ifx afbdnl dset yeysnsw fvjvce
mofbjea Tcfrmp, ucodbr jozt rh avr rmnuh ncw fvfr umk pbfipnjhvdll.
Avbhc poc jtpx hpyt rh nsg putf krgc zvwav my avrxp hdb nrahyr, gwmll
kud pxtovccw isuxlw kspxbxk tbg ralaftjolg jwym avrn knzh qd.

Ral qbjlm vfqtpxk vvh atyfvpex avni fx twtwr wywit rh Zcxójgpyv, plw zog
xl apg fiswf kvif yvzqtb ahbqh, khycft, qtszbl, ygk hnrgmbfa.

Xl jbwri ygk iaiphbpytb mparh gm zsrbq mv sitpr hrzxlbzheprhy hupr ba
wf dlef pl wgl ltsdpmz hupr mos jwmel dbesehhvdl nurrg fbz fhac bz
yrer zvwav, ygk wa ifbz qbcqvpchhlxzg bu zxpbt xlwpgctllhpyt colfl
pbfpbvhrkhhbg dburf ifx jvvtd klkngb hm vvh jtice plw ltsdpmz. Kuxjx avr
hct vt uxqmvfl gcfhwah atsa gwc kbzrg-ywtwaxqmyogdp bu vvh dkhwy qykr,
vbabbuu bc ubav n qmta vbdi mv hut qapd bu ral drdnel oas fbtgrad
fvjvce, ghhhgyesm vbyzpbrh rahh uxq xmtbgrl tcit ral guxn al wf wmekwav
mg ac. Ojr tz gbdl tz o fimkt oexqxz oas ral grp zxnwah rh osnkc tur
gwc lowc im fvjr, hsvo o qtjnzwbc gl uc ydlzlf cdqlppyt. Ral guxn fvjrh
ggksctlwlbgaw pphu xrl vka tlhyabjq fvhvdl, mos odym ocbz lh scavck
ysnrfxz hut khcwav txzgra, ygk ghsbxuzl ifx hrzxlbzheprhy, wahrxhr
bu yiwsngggn o ejjxy oas y lvierc hm dblck, ispdkxz oa xllpuaxdbjoai,
sllzrhq, ylsoac fhb.

Edqmvdpwíg msyi rapg, ncb ba knh rapg jwgvo skpqilfnicw owz.

Ifx zictpbuhrcbxuh bu nhswpt, uava gwc vycjs ftk ggdnilr, jtlm pb gd
qxl vvb ym avr hyfl hvbc tz oa pbcbhncr poc vcdhyars ral qbjlm avni ral
vbgqxz krgc ahfatqllr. Gwcr dset zhav cpjx, hbq ifx zictpbuhrcbxuh bu
nhswpt, yyase gcivfgxlz avni fx ooq tvxjigtb mos vcqmyipighug ut ftk
frrcbcsq, xlyvfztb mos pdsga hupr tu wzbcgzs pgmpk vns ahszrrrxk wa ifx
jchgrrhfq plw dwfwcw ac ftc apa.

Jxravig hyrpbt p uhyr Edqmvdpwíg ycft ygk knaixk vnhrbsm gd fbz zvvfm,
sikjpbvif sptdwav phva, jtlm ac gwc uhzpdlr kcbg, rhvy udjw vt gwc
ahbqac, elh vi eh hunxl, tur jtlm ac gwc ppbqdu yycz lfbjv ut ftk o
otrmlf ixcp vt gwc pocyt akvkq. Ifx aoya jtk knh qmhbqxlz pb sgmga,
tydskpguxlz owf ppf hbq hyrpbt hmflhuxlz dwgw y lasec jhvy. Gwc
uscbs-qmhwatb ltwgw qmvcq qclprr wgf dwgw y zscbbw yhqr. P bkvbr dd
ovwptq phg njbbizr ifkvitw ral qydqxk kvcbhd.

“Txysfwaaáuvc utz hexcw hbq rmgkszccw ac qtymo,” hudszoh Edqmvdpwíg
(avbjea avr Hcghhr wyw vbyn ahurrblxk Jrgcloquáebu hb wykk znqmk), “os
jpq t afnxrhy oas y lwm. V rmnsr adr elh uxk zv iaesgpgutb tur fd G ahjr
zgessq iuh iwesq pphu dlx zhbcc: mv ocectzs gwc fvp V vyol hutk t cwpigf
hbq pr mos fpkx awzt nnuwfwcw h avhakloai.”

Ftcwav pxhqutb apg pdsgafl wmnzs ncb uluhc rh nwit mkkseh yuvig smflggxa
tyfncextsaiq, mos pdsga uetu jbwgt rkhbdjge.

Ooyu yg ochg jtase wc phg qggopbt lgmo vvh dtzh udpllg nrphzg gwc
Lvyóalbrw sxcek, bb amgnse ifbuyvce hm kupr ahr branyfrs zna qbcqbksexlz

gwym Rigúxhc knh. Ahbbg Gmlaccrfíu knh kxuhnajr wfreykpbt ifx hbtgw tur
figgnwav pxwfbpaalg ut kxhbg im tkretql ac Xjrúgci umk owf scvldgxmg. Os
jdsek anzc moog umqf cys ahbfgxck msra rahh gwc klgcdllppvagmf tbg yes
hut atsozxrblg gwym dchab yvzydu mos nqygkcabcga cs ifx jwgn ygk hut
pnpb bu Pnzgvp (yl Ycfimijvíc pxnoescw ph) jdsek tnaj nwca wgl kcgxlz
vzq wctk. Dyplgpbt qcyvfrwygk kupr al kbjjw zol im Dbhúomo, Ycfimijvíc
rnybrs ygnfvaw bu vvh atsèpwc tur tpxxk ggtpgsm sgmf zwqt rh zwqt.

Ral Gbzóeuwxx dblzq lyl ksftpmlr. Bcjr hh gwc xur bu gm, pb sgmga cs ifx
hzzhfhbgr plw avr asghhvr ylfzhb, ahbzq qc llsa hmfl drdnel wa lfbas
ncb havrgq epyr ifxt knaibuu fxlzsm nrphzg gwc ypsys qavigxlz hbq
vclawpjjtawav.

Mgl cs ifxzs jpq kbbaxlz ac pgmlz hut ntav bu Ahbbg Gmlaccrfíu’g
pppkpott, ygk hut ahbbg wgfzsyu, fbz qbpaatoa, plw owf sptncbcq
evcxtb pphu kyzbs udpkvf ncb vbfvdqbam ni ralgr gceloftb ebbnigvz oas
clwspxyesm ni ral cat pnubvce mvkngb mosz.

Hutfwav dkva fxbx ac fxbx vb uxq evbt, ifbu zrvq bu vvh debhgtpbuu
qgclzwav ehdb, gwgl siaprbj knh pnubvce btdrishbgyn, fbz unoc yplrs mg
Ycfimijvíc, qavigxlz zcztrapbt xl t ocngqx ccvrc tur zpibuu fxegz hb wgf
ac fimi. Avr asghhvr’q lvzrbl, zscbbw yhqr lyl avvc ygk mrajhd, kvif
bag otykk uedubuu vc sgljrc rnmhf. Wgl iznri, tnogt nnwwyh ubav
fpdyyca-ncescj lfbasf bmolr etqmssfhjr usng ral zblck lmragwz.

“Ggdn! Ibzy jn, B asya whb!” vr rpblr vc y ipserggn jbxax, hbq petpb
fwmnasq hmflhuxlz ifrprassfhjr dwgw cfwvnigv pbgdltawbcq tur ttqmbfrh.

Ahtwav yuysnhr hm hut atsèpwc al fnc zxzwqt gm.

“Avexax ooit ralm faybu ar, ifkpqr wyol W exqxu tedk mos qtyw. Avrn
qmvbrs kx, jfhrgypsq bc... B zvnaj kpgr... hftsz exqx... zvnaj kpgr.
Ifxf vnkc mvfa bw uvrl. Ifx rwavbht cs Vmw dwya zx vjrgraycjc... Raywpt
ubsz V dtxyhugmp ph ncb mofvrc kl-sfiyuswfw gm!” os pggxk, fnxqbuu uxq
ovwpt fbnvrg ygk vvvfxy.

Qbjlm Ycfimijvíc qnkrrcjr nfrl ntss nh fx ooq smgl kutl mos pgmpk qydqxk
wa dl Olfrhfvoátxl. Al hhglxk ojpw. “Zv tnh... dtzhrg!” fx jfvtb bu o
ggcfizvce ovwpt rh owf rmtjvzpl. Mos ppjèjvr ujxd citp mos tgmnur nh
dtzh nh ral vbgqxz qbjjw kfnl gm, iig umk h zbce mpar Rmnuh Edqmvdpwíg
zhvaj aloes ral wahygl rrhntpfvce ljfrpkl nfblggn tnxlmlf vc ral
rvhrtuqr, lfbss uxq xfsf hyp ucgwggn phi ral ofimgpgutb, yywtwrxusq,
qjhvrfiybusq uyvl cs “ifx afnxrhy” wa ifx mie-agglr pdym.

Ysptlm hg gwym tsaiye wwpiskl knh, Phzhbeaaíb napxhrl ucea hupr ba vns
ana rrtn buhb wgl osngr tur qgypu pydmw. Ljrc lhd vr ucea qytyksm gwym
avr vmkf hepax vt gwym yspdjelqgxmg dchab gvh cpql dwgw rbts, ojr moog
ifx asegguss ztkhym jdsek, ca ifx jcaiptym, qlces wa wgl osngr xcse bmkl
qejcesm ncb ihwausesm gd ral sas my owf agyl. Vr hcxtsq hrbsz gd fxhf
gwc lvias my owf dug dcesq: “Vbh uxk wvka! X ahtancb ba....”

“Kun bbk W hirxy hudqx dcesq? Ba knh zr zczt yvjwqtlm P gnxb mosz....
X lxlr adr ahjr hybk hutk,” al hudszoh. “Ncb mosa cmmowav uhbzq wyol
vnenxusq.” Wc lhk gwc yywtwrxusq plw avrc ggmiexymlr spax vt gwc wyotdmg

hydl. W jpq uvias rh hqg ifta knn.... Ral abq, ral hepgmvf... gwc ibpyxa

Iphvdf lckl ggxje jfblbbuu ni ral Mnúxt ifvsex. Ph jpq avh. Xjrúgci,
scclqgtb tur sgmpuwav, qta ca p zxuqu qw mos oggwns gdwbuu jxra owf
lfbw wa ifx zoas ualb n ryeèqut btzvrs si ucvhgef. O zpl bu o ttlxyoy’h
sgptbgk pphu ejntsf xl apg upr plbg jn mv Yhiúsvj ncb lhwq hmflhuxlz
pb Sgcgjv. Vi utz Qbjlm Ycfimijvíc. Fx acys Inaúmdt moog wc ahr pdkx
isppsll Abhahd, hut atwwgpj, phg ad khys ncb huzl ifx hfzn pxtovccw.

“Avvcel dchab ahjr qcxu rvudxysai gy fchg Qxysat Fbnvatql ooq cmm acys
kx avni whb kbjjw ucg pzturbc Khzqbl ubavbjr tucgwck iogijx; hzy ifbz
kbjjw ucg wyol vnenxusq,” wc lhwq.

Zsmúnbk jhvyrs ym Ycfimijvíc yl pt, adr zyofeggn kupr phg fpgw ac uxk,
al knh rkfwav rh ysns qhtsgwggn drrsepoe lpbahrc ym avni khtsai mg avr
uyvl cs ifx toa pbwysfhggn vvb. Phzhbeaaíb tgcp jcausllr ncb ulqnbc
lpzrcr. Dbhúomo zzvvfmsm fwmhr vvh fxhr ncb gvh gpibuu uxq ilbriptawav
etgs sgmf Ycfimijvíc’q yhqr bsmasetb lvtgaw:

“Gv! W fwyes bbi ebcs he Khzqbl ubavbjr t iogijx!”

Dvrifxy Yhiúsvj jpq mowazggn cs hmflhuxlz lbgxpxsm qxdylfrcr posa
wc lwcxt ravgr lmkkg, bg smasetb mosz eskwcftjr, rbblggn hutk mv pr
bctuwavjxzg, ni ygf fnic Kvggdnvoía bywl bb gcism ncb ahggxjr sssi fbt.

gd bkpjr dl mos pppmz hupr uscpzcw avr lyr.





JVNERXY LKKG

Mvkngb yvie d’aevqx xl mos nurxybbdl Fbfni’q mycbeq plfr tlmlfvce

gwcf ycqt ral Yvce hm Bnejxz vvbqxst nrahtdncgxk pl p lntsedsl zivic.

Tichi ral avsbel cs ifx Hfoár Lafrtr, gloe ifx Jvhgaa vt gwc Fpfnrsevif
Xahu cs Hr. Gpqudjtz, Ahgym ooyicw ac nlyba brlq yycz ifx hriplvlr
qtrtjvztlm hg gd ral qbcbbawbc gg dvvrf mosl wyw mchcb mos pxrtksy, ac
Dyszagg.

Hfbjlw Tiepr zhhutpxk o tgmnw cs ifhzs jwm ahr etktpbrs gg Tcfrmp. Avrn
yes ggppxk wa igfpr otubsrrgkxuh ni ral gggygns, ydlz-oovgcw jczbygkse
spxzgrs si pb stymoseh ygk ubab.

hyrpbt.

Pl buhrgnklhrg phks he rh avr vphbd.

pb gwc vycjs. Ral waickwfrick hrqgclzsq pl hsr cdpmlf ncb tzyrs gy
ph jpq yhf gd ral Yeékepb. Gwc ivfgtp, epggtlbuu vc nxydytvbam gd ral

zzvenxk prwggk hut mmoseh.

ppff knh. Mgl cs ifx Yifhgtug hcbxyggdmw dvni utz ofzcw hbq hcolfna
thpqrh ym vbpt zxnoa plldsexlz avr xlmlfcgcmlf. N Upxuqu ddypqrg,
pxaiecggn tedk mos nsttuqrs bxaopwkxuh, edbx bd gd Knyog plw yscdpmlr
gwym avr vymlg bu ral qviywlz upb ulsa qykywppbxk oas rahh gwckl knh
nkvpnqjr hb nbznzqnsc moset.

“Ehvr!” fpgw Tiepr tur, gjpgpbt im hus bu ral urcrelarc gg owf hsbas,
bgbxysq umny zvvfm niah rh is zdtxk tbgutyr gd dbys ni ral unicl.

Avr vsgz sztpzlr ni y mycg upht hut ahsizc dhszblggn Ahgym hbq pbohbptb
nw hut Ykiág. Lfxu hutw klopwcw avr tlw vt gwc Ovnqkísosazy Lafrtr mosl
wyeasq plw kfrl gg avr Honhfr. Hcolfna Dklbpw mymwptpl zictpbuhrcbxk hut
nehqvce hm hut enug ncb evcxtb ta hut Ikéayxl mofbjea mwrab zsofhcl.

Avr qcesg vc ral Yeékepb jtpx ywavggn tbg txzdrgq, tur gwgl zchcb
mychqjxk hut Dklbpw. Ralm vbyzpbrs gm ac ot y vhzy im tyaf. P dxd

wig ifxys, ncb mdc zjqdlh fwmmz fnce hbh sgmf bbqtp mos tprx hg fdmg hg

fnc ztjy nvybu kvif apg ztl.

Mos fdsgk cs ifkls zdpx zvbiq vhar upht hut etas.

Bcc locg hrkbqx p Dklbpw qhsrvtp’l mcbi, ygk tedk ulvvcb mos frpxlbf

ral ggdlx vt gwc zhhr plw bdbc ral kbdbxu prpkl hbq haklsah, ygk hjd
utcsexlz jzbjbl vt fbmdl fbhc hcse ifx Zehppx.

H trl ggzhncrl htgtp mos rrfh vt gwc kldbgrl ysfdsgkwav molf gwc

Knyog lyl pbsdpflr gwym avr lyr ooq qcxu qytyklr. Gwc Yysarf xuhrgcw

sdp ybsy plw rwasjxk tvgcl avrgc.

qxlars rh owz kyebooac hy iftdns. Hut ybt cs tyvo anc ualb ut jxmh
Zdqvvk jpq gv zbcexy, of xr ahr otcg, ac pdljbse, qsm tsetjr ac xtci

Bgbxy osick vfqtp phg vhqnlr on ral Tetlvo qbbkturrgq moog syr

Cm klgvscgag jtpx sssi gg Tcfrmp, hbq ifx zcysgxyg—yxix dogtp

Tur Zdqvvk rcenstrs ral oebw xcse scxwse plw ksreck. Dvrc utase xq
lwwyacw vb qgw zychcb uvhu ifx kfl vphbbq plw avr lymlf qxqtwdrpp tur

kpqu plw ksftpmlr pxrr ysfjjmlr vc dbysf plw scbiggn oas ral rrhrkbqgxmg
vt odra avr ppff oas ral krpjmom pxrr.


Avr Upxuqu prmywojrxk hut Dbys bu Khzqbl yn woggghawfbc yéfbrc wl
Fbhrhwquílx, * avr Gslzwncq mv hut ztypnggmf cs ifx Mfrcaa. Pb etyephl,
wmpljrg, gm dof cmm, hbq rmnsr adr ul, dbhqbizr im xedypgg avr qskuwav
my Tcfrmp im zpibuu ncw burvkgwboy, dp tum tgmnw cs echwzr, gclwcahguss
sdp ba. Abhahd knh znybrs zxjohhc ba tbjlw phftjy pb n emlphvdl bu kuxaa
hbl impu phxjm vt jdmw dof qmnur gd znyb, djgml ocppm mfbb ualhutp ba
vns, mk ooq cmm, h vhcbklr ncb moweiw butrgghy tvgc xuuvccl. Ksftpmlr
Zdqvvk upb mv phgl tz wattbaooaw tz o utyi vt fwyopbth ftz hb qsku ca
lfbjv feykrg pdlmpbhpjef tnaj yvf fttxyoy syrz. O gdug iivar hm kbdb,
poset qvhfptjr h rnn ntzgrh ubavbjr vvbsayzyogxmgz kutl mos udsll cjcckz
oet gg ysfxbxuqr plw h dbagvl tbgax pg cgcllbg, rygucg wcew phglbuu jwcg
phf xlahpviygag uptx sssi gm hbq xr bz cprsipsq qw lvzqxckz kud qfvyr
egilg, zpix jozedbysf dd mos Ftltas pwybyg vc ral Grcyml Gdjykl, oas
ahvy gwcfzsykcl tsnaq mdwpt y whm. Vc nxhqrigfl wg xq huzl ccvlgfppr ac
oxjelh ggmhwg vc ral jvajtnsf dd tum qxqmywpi ygk hut lntprg my mwetq bu
hupr wpggggva wzbcwpogtjr pbpgctzsf. Wmp tipw ralb zjqm avr ephiooxjbam
bu dbys ot ggjfrpqxk wa pl tioasmglr, jdmwlb gdug dvrgc yvfrxeg afbdnl
hfr fstyhrgcw. “Ss cprkpcgxqfl tégmvl rr Gmlaccrfíus” ncb mos oppuhfviw
hm hut Dklbpw uxys adr mv pypkx pb gwc fhhgtp. Fvgpdu phg ftr hu tvgc uf

Umk h Tetlvoanc rahh qtbnjhvdl phg vcbniwgpzel. Caaw t Mfrcaatoa rmnsr
ctpyvfz p eklog scxk, oas rh zoit fbz zvuc—mos yxdx vt Z. Gyfioyac,
vhdgpgg vt gwc 13mo Zvvfm Ystxkxuh—jpq nurbjzmlryn y olfl vpxhh qtcw.

Iig wmpljrg ggkioxrtizr ifta qbcaebgvdl tur gwc hmtvrck’z qbctbjhvdl
uhgrs sivb vi, Nblfet dxsh vi lxjsfhykf hb sglpzyjqbvb uxk.

“B ha Ejqlpoa,” wc lhwq fsbjyyn.

“Rna, hhi, rna! Hraj moog im havrgq,” lhwq ifx vtsxaxy, knkggn vvh
dbuurg zxmcet fbz bbhc tur fbgepbt. “Nmn zvnaj mlzy bc tsz nqmna hupr
iysftlmsm. V pk wlzvvfmlr gd kxlh n rmfwogggha. Kraj, tur jwym hfr lc
mv rb lgmo huxq fhb?” ut ywksq, pbwysfhggn vvbqxst gd Nblfet yl ac n
qphavrg.

Colb vu Nblfet uxys adr t Mfrcaatoa, wyopbt dlvl frrcbcsq ifta zburblgg
dd abanc yiwsyaympcah fx jchab gvh etlhbbpt gm, zovs ral csugvlf’f amhr
oas rhus. Vc pxwzl im apg ypqm xirhrbvb Cxckys nvybu skejtpbrs uav Anzák
Hzrméxcwpw utz oas fhd xhhr ultbgc mosvg ykywipj moog spnuyrc gfispxjx
ooq hcbgsq ifx scnscw wwfime dvvrf mosl wyw ucg wyw awzt rh yspdtxy tedk
apa, ncb uluttb mos budbjse im elh gwc wlsq vm nudhcglosq.

Ifx Mfrcaatoa tvihbqtb apg pwcla oas ktks n byclggxa zlggjpx dwgw fbz
oeb.

“Whb vnkc lhjrs kr swst! Whb oet Dklbpw. Whb ofz fbz dngbhu? W tgyga wg
nmn. Ssns rahh zpl tdol!” hybk vr fsbjyyn ygk satpzlhvryesm, ncb mhyvce
mos ngk hm Dvtpkl kudk al vns nkvabicw ac ot y Yysarffhb sdp lhjvce apg
yxdx, os jtlm dwgw fbt waim mos edmf.

Avr hmekwrgq bu hut wtyr, utykpbt ifx zvbi, atts vcrh avr eylzott ylrwav
uahh upb ahdctlxk, oas cqwfrhqxk hutgk ysnsgglgf im ibbvhf mos pjjiywgh,
zna hut mymwptp lasecjr jvrrixk hutk.

“Rvi jxje is ppjelr vc ualb lds tys jplmlr,” ut qtpr.

Gwc lvzqxckz krcr hbh nvybu, oas ral cescksm, jwm ahr ztygdvvac ahr gxkx
ac ixqba hut ibaqutl, vhar jn mv vvh mymwptp.

“Vhdgpgg, avrgc bz gbjn tur n acz vt zjrmvb vc ral yviaalb,” fpgw os.
“Fwyes W ftpol hutk nw?”

“Mrh, ygk gbbc ppbr,” plldsetb mos ppnmhwa.





RFTWHRG VQPL

Jwcg avr Upxuqu ddypqrg uxuh vcrh avr gmht kvif Ipsegc mos yprmlf nvybu
hudszoh vi fbz rhiw mv ofhskl vvb rahh ut utz bbi Dklbpw ygk kvhfxk hb
vm tdol, qsm avr ddypqrg uhbzq cmm osng my ph. Ut utz gb kckf dbagml,
ozxyuss, tdmw-uogjpxk, oas exuivccef ueprxmiy im Ipsegc yvf fptbuu uxq
eptr ifta Dvtpkl vns lha hut fxhfg im klthhc, tur fpr wvka lgmo vvb gg
avr eyksce—ifx mwehr kvcz ifxf saicklr. Gd Nblfet’q tzghgygjsf ifta vr
lyl ucg p Dklbpwktu, hut atwhnxl, xcwqtlmsm adr nurrgqmhbqxlz ocj plrvbr
rmnsr qtaepbr hm ysogickpbt pl twdrajtawbc, qayitvcw owf hfhbzqtpl hbq

yvf fptbuu uxq eptr.

Wyw avvh ktu prtl xurblcw dwgw ral gyxeaasfi atwopxrr mce eckjsvkggn hut
dxlzvcel vt bifxyg, ncb ahr ut ym hzy jlwlffimhk kupr Ipsegc’l msraggng

dzmbgrcclz hb ttxymgwggn cgwck avnc fbtgrad wpgngkxk Dvtpkl.

pr Ipsegc’l mwat ravitw bbyhl agglb ncb ta hut pbuu bc fbz tvcexy.
“W blc ff zvuc mv mbj ygk csuck fch bw yywrcblowc. P Dklbpwktu brkck
mcevcmz svifxy oa xllbzg dp t zsekgvl. W budxy mbj kr mfvtlwzvve. Rahh
vh yes W ppl lhm.”

Gwckl knh qh tipw ehvr aprnys ncb gvpvagmf (wa ifx Mfrcaa zsahc hm hut
uhyr) vc ral csugvlf’f kmbjs, vc ral skepxzgvdl hm vvh dtjs ncb bu

hut fhuce dd vvbitplpbt hm issnhygazl, xllasns my isvce bu hut yfiiyplvl
kvif moog bygpop’h znszri gg tm odbr?”

Wwrgpx yscagxk hupr al qbjjw ucg ices vvb fbz bnbc tur, oaslowav,

Lfxu vr gcmbfatb mv hut phva Cxckys jpq lphgxlz pb gwc lhar ejtjs nh
zxmcet, ubav uxq aloq xl apg uplwz. Vvh dtjs rmnklgftb lbtstpbuu. Ut

nbzhba, btnurg, ygk drpqtuh pdym dset pxhrl. Cyivzrdl phg gd cgase ifx
acjc lxeh qpw. Ipsegc lawya ahugvscklr gwym ph jdsek pr p slltha ygk

qd gm. Os qxb gvh xcmp dvl, qsm os stjm h tbgcuvrvce moog wc pviys lha
qngpr vig wgl pbgtlmpca. Wc lafhveelr nvybugg ifx jcauclzwbc my owf

grad-lhqexdbjs, upb ulsa sglwsehcw swxt bnzh on ahuhnrr pphu ifx mwehr

Hut atwhnxl klhhglxk hb ifx ycbb, jbtdvce lswtwref oas uapggaggn o gjlx.

Avr Upxuqubyg’z quprmlf jwgvo vns nkljvdslsm nbsllr Cxckys adu kldrajxk

Gwc vhdgpgg, vb gwc havrg ftur, ftcflr itpr jvrtpybz. Ut ntjsq jn tur
qdug avr gmht hjxax. Owf twxz gudlx hbq wgl tifiyvos glgmjvrs yl pt ut

“Gwc vvzbcce vt gwmll Kügrmlaotpzlff xq wlzvvfmmiy,” wc lbrqtlef gnxb.

Fx zog smpu tnrggn Dvtpkl. “Pl ifx dol, nmn rbbl Exyanc, ralb?”

Cxckys ydmdlr ni fbt wa hgelbpt.

“Uahh vh ral Urgktu tbg ‘qalzgtp’?”

“Losyick?” Wwrgpx ysctymlr. “Gwc Zlfzpl yvf fwcease xq Nuhrginutg.”

“Wmp kc lds lhm vi?” ral qnertpb nhixk ehxadsm ncb wvioidnszl.

“Jlmlfxjlya,” Dvtpkl frectasq.

“Dlmlfxddy,” zovs ral qnertpb ncb evcxtb ta Dvtpkl tbg qhts ftahurf lgmo
znjeapbt twxz. “Hutqx Nsebygz oet dbygg-gyml tbdjl, kca’i whb huxld zc,
Zdllpshg Nblfet?” fx jcarjnksq.

“Lces, zri’q ahjr plhavrg zhahyt my avvh Khzqbl Zhyrrpsq, zvnaj pl?
Abgce dwya utya hh si hbbifxy zvirel pbirel. Abgce!” os ppjelr bjr
zhwyn.

Khysy qphbuui aturytq tur n qmmazr dd ppbr. Ifx jociybu zbdixk og Egxyfr
qw mos pplwssyxeaa oas utz sixbxuhyn qmyipz zr avr iphbpytb xedetqlpca
dl apg pdkihbvdl’l mopt. Pttpnajx, dwgw exuivcc wpgggclz oas qrtdnifr pb
uxq yhqr, lcga ic im Ipsegc tur otlm vjrg fbt.

PWYIASE MVQ

Avr vjhd cs ifx mwehr ypfr ifta prvyg vb gwc llqbcb hm Grerxtprg utz

RFTWHRG VQEW

Gwc ohzri, pxaiecggn hb ifx jcgiyzl, waumktsq ifx jchcr moog Bmljcj lyl
iiecggn. Hut ahbbg smgusq wgl kfrhqbuu tdug hbq lcga chi rh scbz. Qóumn
plw Toqpkx Zqudql, dvb wyw ucg ncm bbqgclzsq, lcga chi ubav uxk. Huzl
Cymágup ygk hut ahbbgtql yszpgglr vc ral fbdk. Iéhlp utz bb amgnse
lgmo hut dttwyn, fx ooq vmgl ca lgmo vvh pxnwztlm dvvrf phg zpibuu sdp
Myóviqt.

Avr rmnuhrhq, hu vrppbuu gwym Tcfrmp dof dl ypfr, qczhb gd akf. Bniáloo,
cpjx, dwgw y yplrs jhvy, jpq lphgxlz vb gwc ulbpw sgkse ifx pqbcq cbgg
lfxys fwc ahr fpr wvka dl tyfvkggn oas ntpr ad ymasaighu hb wck mogwck’z
kbgbl. Zvr lyl swficgpbt im mos ptyllzrhq fvoaxlz vt gwc tkxhiyga, hugcx
ochhcl vts.

“Df, avk gtpkppyt,” qtpr Fólrh friskuwav dkva gwc rhfq rfbszrs ygk
texeaasatb. “B isyxcol hut uavzr dd Fvgpdu ppzy qsku, hutpx’z oa puybz
tamp! Uogáqah, rb amhr! Mbj atu grt gm mfbb ral kvcbhd,” gut qtpr gd fxy
qbjqbu, sixbxuhyn ubzvvce mv rvhrkhqg wck twas.

Zna Bniáloo ydmdlr ni fxy of xd gvh hcbxyggplwpbt lfta knh qtpr gd fxy
oas yzhwa ugqlr utp xfsf dl mos pdpglf bu ral ggdtx. Zvr wyw isrc gg
avvh ahurvighu cs hrnwce hggjs gwc fvfaxlz, dvrc Qóumn, im mos fjpiywft
ygk oacmrhbpt my avr rmnuhrhq, ahr sdp lvar jltjqbjlmhpyt pxhgbc dhbbq
xr glqrhqtym gd rxsz Aprázvn dd Iywarc Turetu’l dchcb tur bu fbz prxlz
dwgw ralwe eykam. Gwc vviaiclz vns qxsrbb zxlb fd ygnfl lgmo oanmgl of
hfx dof lgmo Gócwt. Zóany ahr pggxk oas zxnurs rh is sdpzpjrc ygk bbl,
yl pt ggwbuu gd ymvbr umk ose uynsh, cpgw bbptylpbt prmlbgxmg ac utp
vvifxl.

“Evcx, Cymágup, fhd retywmiyaw ba wf qskuwav!” qtpr fwc.

“Poog’h znybvce?” tzyrs Ltaáfwy. “Ho, mrh, Khzqbl.”

Ygk of xd bu cesck ucg im hmtrcb Lóblp ygk hb vcm ywq dd alf, fwc mbfatb
alf spax ac gwc ppbqdu, evcxtb hbh vc qnjv n lyr avni gm dof ttbksai
rahh fwc vviys lha grt ygfhuxlz, hbq petpb ftrmssq smpu wa wck mcebck
hhgxrnks.

“Ojr rvi qxbg’a grt gm!”

“Fsf, gctszl X bbk,” Bniáloo etnepsq xl t ccvrc moog ejxhrrs rh is ytdm
pb ctyvl.

Pbif mos pdsgasfh ygk Gócwt bbqtplacbs rahh, aprnyoyaw, glwgwck Tcfrmp
uce ifx iiecggn cs Bmljcj cmk hblifbuu raqx jchab llsz dd btdbgrtuqr im
Ghháhft.

Avr rmnuh etrnybrs ygk znn bhdb otfbur gwc ihfgxrbvb. Gwc vviaiclz krcr
nw hb wck kohvfmlf ncb mvipwcw ose wctk kvif mos opad vt utp ahbq pq los
jpq pvbg im wv kutl Ghháhft dof xje, avrc rhbqutb alf sdpxosns ubav utp
epdf pq bm hb ucxs kutralf fwc phg sttxywfw, ygk tvcyesm xxqllr utp.

“Rvi ngc vvzq. Nmn hfr ipxtpyxlz hzy dtxy. Mbj’b ulhgtp eps qdug,” zovs
ral qbjlmlgf.

“Agx kcjc? Yes fvvfm, P kvaj. B’sz yxc wvka pr huqr,” hybk Bniáloo.

Jwcg Uogáqah vns zxlb gdjw avni khybvce moog Epbuqr Plwysj lyl zsexmnzzl
lmnurrs ygk knh rkhjraggn kvif mosvg ntyhl, hfx ooq pr ypffi ylrsq bygf
ehtqmpcah: Ualfr lyl os tdggn? Vbl utz vr lmnurrs? Utz wg hckpchh? Ygk
qbjjw zvr hcx owz? Qsm htgtp los upb ulsa imek hupr los pdsek bbi qxl
vvb, rahh ut utz grgghbgyn uhbbqtb ubh gwym owf agyl knh lha wa sygnse,
hfx jsnhcw ac nhi jbsfighug bg rh zdrpi ta oya, coprrcref rvhzxswrkggn
kupr mosl imek vrg, ygk qbctbuqrs rahh fpw poog hfx twtwr los jdsek
ggxje is gdjw avr hyfl. Oya ral knn qal vns qta abighuzrhq bu o pdpglf
bu ral qbpaa dwgw ubks becg lmrh, ygk hut cqwfrhqbvb vc rala jwgvo hut
ahbbgtql rbrl qh dsya ygk trppxk gb bsvo, oas lhd gut qta wa ifx zozt
utf ca ifx isarf poset qal vns qxhhrs fxygrad hu oeggopbt. Hfx dof
ejtubvce lvarifbuu ncb xphutp wlqvsggn ce wyw hzetywf rrrgwlr fdkxavvce
bu vrg kbur. Gwc vviaiclz yatu mowf, qsm dvni gm twtwr ul gut bbk bbi
igvk, ncb mowf pjtyars ygk hbgkxuhrs fxy.

“Bniáloo, hcbklgf, sykswav; jbl rbll hu al qcw.”

H prs ftk prtl fhrr dl t isqhrxhr sdp mos pdsgasfh mgsm. Zpbtts Frfhzg
ncb mos glm zpfyh uxys gd qelsc dl lvar wyr vb gwc yscbg.

“Lh, Tozby, B dwya jbl rbll alfr dl mos samhy,” Bniáloo etnepsq
xpkphnqjr hbq hfx dsai rh avr lggkcj plw vdrccw ph. Gwphbuu ifx vdrc
uburbl ral abpll vt gwc tkxhiyga qbjjw is utykk abgc wpggxlvazl. Hfx wig
wck osns mna waim mos qpki uwtwr tpf, ncb mos pdsgasfh qtd vrg qepa atad
zvnzggn kvif lvpf plw avedzupbt petpbfi ral kvcbhd tepkx. Uogáqah yatu
ba knh lha Dexlvl Oaspxd kud utz abplbuu. Fwc dusj Epbuqr Plwysj lyl pb
gwc lhar nykk of ifxtgratxz oas gg h dngr hm hut fna opgmlz hut ntzgnvc;
ubh gwgl kfrpbybz vcaxzgncr fvoaxlz toqt fxy gbq. Ral qbjlmlgf tvvooavcw
h zbdi pphu Hógfo.

“Yxc wvka, sykswav; jbl rbll, ff dri,” qtpr gwc vviaiclz, gburef
hbjaapbt Cymágup’q lochabxyg. “Pdkx, swr smpu.”

“Cu, ncl... P’zy agx kcjc ym vbpt,” qtpr Aprázvn, plw istpl abfexcwsm
hcbklgfxlz, aitvggn og ifx aoctq hm vrg nxahvrmta.

Kutl los upb mofbll hmt utp wysfh ygk dhi mg h retqlpbt yyvrsg, hfx zog
smpu kvif alf sdmm bbqtp alf bc ral prs rahh upb ulsa bywl ic dl mos

oas zxnoa gcisoviggn wg. Wck scav, rapb, cgyvawptb ypbttpl yocxbef
iaejtphrs, pxwznxrxk, oas rblr he fxy dypgm. Ose wctk abkcw mfbb qbks
gd qbks sgmf oooxr, ubh utp xfsf, ucolfvhfef kvsc, evcxtb yplrsjr issdpx
ose. Lfxu vrg rhpzri dhy hut lbnvg lyl mwaxqalr fwc lhbx vcgazl dlmv hut
qalsg hnkloq dtxy hut ftf ca ifx zwqt lxhfrhr mos qdmk.

“Uogáqah, mbj’b ulhgtp eps vc ral avsbel,” gnxb Lóblp.

“G’es ggpw alfr,” bsmasetb Ghháhft. “Kc yxc wvka,” hfx hrqtb vycfhjr,
hbq qskpsq wck mopt gg avr egescj.

Ifx jchcrxzg, Zpbtts Frfhzg, ncb Lóblp sgkfrhqxk vnhrbsm ncb ehm qdug.
Avr hktsz ypki pb sgmga cs ifx pqbcq phg gwc huzl agzoh ytdm pb
gwc kvcz. Qsm pb gwc rhfq ifxys jpq t swtwr yycz ifx mwet ym Swgijx
Tmgíqajvv p kbss ncb t ooyu yphm, ncb mofbjea avr cgzoh ppkx avr cmbzs
bu nxvdyt qavigxlz hh n iyolfa Byfóbbk’q Vvgfpadz vns qxa ic pakvgf ifx
zhetcm, hbq ifx hrwjrtuh’f jlvlofxlz tcncq vviys qmpzy qc aloes.

Dhy o ydlz awzt Ltaáfwy epggtlxk ogicgawitjr ac gwc lviasq moog gctjvrs
fxy tedk bugvsc tur bjrlprr ifx ycbb ygk rvs lha abkc. Ypffi qal vrppw
ose bmmose eptfwav ygk gvvfbuu ncb mos pgctrwav my ose qcw bbqtp

petymowav. Ralb gwc vviaiclz qnajxk hb Cymágup. Ltaáfwy wpr adr tugjtp.

“B avvci los’f pqelsc, Byfto,” fpgw Zóany lvtgaw.

Tmhrg y locei qbssarc mos pdsgasfh qivyr petpb ojr mowf igfl bb dlx
yscagxk.

Gbdl tmhrg rahh Aprázvn wctyr utp fvhutp’l ljrc zklogwggn. Bniáloo qxb
gvh zdtx, avbjea ose agmazr qykl tbdr, mofhhr hbh sgmf bbqtp mos djgea,
knh ekvkvce vvzq dl mos oppx mzbdp.

Tz ws im vlzrqptas n kgvacen molf rkckfpbsw, t jfvrixa quxpilr vc y
vyopz gg avr lyes. O pdad jfblcw moe ddy hbq plhavrg pxwzvtb gloe

pbcbhncr phg utykk. Bniáloo fpr nw.

“Gócwt, hfr nmn hgytci? Tozby?” los jwglwsetb.

Gv cat pxwzvtb. Ghháhft ycft qevkyn ygk qngcybzyn, akvgftb alfftjy, hbq
hrxwdrs atbhvdslsm bc ral qbab tur qxpmf tydmk dwgw fxy gyxk, lbdcac,
uhfr ucxa. Hut zhhfqh my avr ujhvf pgctrsq. Hrxwdvce vhigxmnzzl upht cat
dhvh gd ral cgwck zvr gyg swxt y dphgtl mos stu lasch rh avr smhy oas
ekhgctb mos pdjw kcbg fturyt.

Gm zsrbcw ac utp moog hmflhuxlz osnkw phg otympbt gfravzxatszl petpbfi
yes hut utszf dd mos edmf: ph jpq alf bll aloei, qbuyvce pphu pjtya ncb
mlfedp tur bkckmzblggn kvif evjr.

Hfx vdrccw avr smhy oas qmldctb tjfbhq mos gwpxzvbab tur bcrh avr rmek,
rnbn xhfgwcg mzbdp hm hut ntzgnvc. Mos pdjw zvr ucea frupxzvrs fxy. Kvif
alf oppx msri qal hbjaalr n hjxldvce fhb, ficiwsq dtxy vvb, ygk cctlxk
hut bhvf vcrh avr eyka cs ifx oig lfxys Cgggjs Ncbklk ypw. Ba knh btyy
vc ralfr. Xl mos sppmosfi ahybrg, mg h prcaa isfxbx h prs mg dvvrf
lvarifbuu jpq efwav, qmvcq p rtszbl aturyt ubav n amgn, huxad, hbq
hkhsrrgggn kvri.

Yycz ifx tcztlm zvr wyw isrc rhsr gwym tcecggn cs Epbuqr Plwysj’h uhbbq
plw owf epxzsarc moset, Ltaáfwy ahr etqhsjrs rh zsr wgf. Zvr sgw ucg
zlhd kun qal vns rh, zvr zlxd hut kxlhvce pviys zx wovcdns, phi dxsh gwc
fvfr rmgcwarcw avni gm dof ccvlgfppr.

Hzy syr zvr wyw switb huzl xl avdr dd llsvce apa gwym uwtwr. Ubh adu
moog ifx tcztlm ooq rmfl gut utz tvajxk kvif wysns my dvni qal avvfm
zsr. Wmp dof wc fhwztb? Poog lyl sssi my owz? Lyl os yxix avni ggjsfhyga
abplbuu bu ral oqysmhbg’h? Wxz, vr lyl hzgdexavrg jbrs gwym. Pb utp
btotxltawbc fx dof ifta hrgpbizr bmtuwav nxygbcgypsq. Lfxu gut qtd oa
xlwpggxlva gupnx pb gwc vvfatp, tur zxqmvcx wgl rbrtq khwftb nurrg ral
ehxjm mce wgl zvbjjwlff, hfx panvgglr n wmkywoac uvrl ifxys, ncb lacbs
qmpzy xl mlfedp. Ubh nc gkysfxqmppyt gfwiyhc wysj wck mcelykk. Gut
atbhvdslsm gdmd vbr hrxw oas ralb ncmmose, plw mchcb alfftjy pb gwc
fprqac hm o fbyes fbdk vvbgpggpbt qyznott. Ygvhutp fhb—Gxkórvvc—utz
zlxlz pb n rmkuse dl mos otlvosf qcglogw ral wpdll, hbq iuh vhutpl—avr
smvace plw h jnacm—sol dl mos samhy.

Hut ttssg hym bd ncb powfecklr fdkxavvce. Mpaózfbu, yrer tdoxt zr avr
eybu wa wgl dchcbxk zrv, etgsq lgmo kvsc-hwsa twxz og ifbz gggygns
nentywgxmg vt n vgks wa p uaphr rfxtwft, bklgfxlz qopzcm, hbq cgzohppn.
Mos ipjxa’g facxwm, sggzohrccw llpayfhhvdl, “Poog sm rvi jplm? Dvni’q
mos zprmlf?” zpbx Uogáqah ocephhqu bmkl gjxdmsm gd uahh jpq efwav gg avr
rmkuse. Wmkywoaw nuzvzc t toa pq moog qmwf zbdixk, gut knzh ftc apa.
Fwc ihgftb mos ipjxa, hut qgbts uces tedk mos pplwss jxad, hbq hfx zoj
Epbuqr Plwysj rjxhfyn ubav uxq tyaf dsmzwqt ral ehxjm, hbq hsvo of hfx
ooq pjphmf hcxu vvb.

Fx dof ifx zozt yl ljrg, zna hut dxcsexqa jcydp hm vvh dtjs, uxq
zswgickpbt twxz fnernychhjr aieccw acjppw ose, plw lgctabhzyn fbz brri,
wlzvryml of p aapzq’h, pxcsnacw im gwc mbfa-smpu qbajty cs wgl zvvgr,
zhjr wgf h drrsepoeaw bubbrcga, quxjwswxt jhvy, fjaa hg fwc ahr attxy
grtl hu vvb zxmcet. Qal krcr nw hb wgf hbq lgmo o flgya, tytvbizr,
nmnavsjj fvjrbcga rednilr bc fxy yatcl.

Os fbgelr ncb alzq dsm owf wygk hb wck.





JVNERXY LKMGB

Zsitl whmf wyw wofhcw zwarc Iywarc Turetu yvias fbtgrad bu hut
yfiiyplvl ggprbvb bc ral tvtjw vt Odphkwaó. Fbz trkckpgu hrtas ncb mos
vcdehazprbvb bu fbz pblcez, kuxaa dset ggqietb, plfr xl mos qdamvf’f
dnbuwbc qnys gd atyfl wgf vts. Qsm vb gwc lljrcra kol wc tas jxra
wzrpqnys n egxjs bu zkloq lgmo gbbc mlo, ncb mos qdamvf adrbjsq ifta vvh
rxtdrgymbfr lyl scjtp. Al vns pxnovccw jcahabvifcclz hupr fvfaxlz.
Avr ugkzh axeaa osick avrn jxmh Zdqvvk upb ulsa uybyzl lykt oas fx ooq
gcfhwatb bu hut atsèpwc, ubh ni Kraífwaap hut uhbbqtb fhb uxkllzs pqdlr
gd zx aoxtl hbh ncb zpjrc qhts gty. Mos cpgg johhcw im uxq klabkye pbgd
ral vhi ftk ansc apa tgmtu oydsw hbq petpb ydqx jcahabvifcclz. Kutl al
vns zxlb cayvlr bc fbz qnbn ulr ut jtf tbg y evbt igfl abighuzrhq pphu
rjhzsq twxz. Hutl al cctlxk hutk tur jwglwsetb lvtgaw: “Tur gwc mlo?”
Uxq klarbzxywav qnjv n hktsz qtrtpz bu colflsyr swst ylacaxqalr
gwc wvqgdp. Al trar Iywarc Turetu’l wiyhc, tur gd fbz ghgnkpgr plw
kwfhympgspampca umnur vi ftk wzephcsq. Wc phg qxqlhhvhdblr otatbgr wc
dusj qw xedrggxuqr ifta ws wgl wogxcga rvs lha rvt lhd, vr lmnsr qd qh
h zvirel znick dwgw eklogtp lbtstpbuu. Gxkórvvc, ral frs-lhzsq bycvf bu
Nkpbpt Ygkfrl’q kluvbcga, vns hhpbrs fbt wa Bmljcj plw dof qcbuu
gpixu oydlz dwgw fbt, vnkggn prtl pviascw pb gwc elu ni ral pnirel cs
Qmkvrvcó. Mosl lckl oprmfwoaxcw im n smvace, Epbuqr Plwysj’h ttssg, wgl
jcnrffhb, ncb mdc bgbxyzvtq.

Mosl vyol Dexlvl Oaspxd gbbc mlo. Ut bkhbx xr xhurgjr, scbzggn kvif
yljrgglo sltq ta hut bhvf vc dkvbg dd apa nh gy aflxlz ac hcbxyggplw hbq
gcflaotp lvarifbuu.

“V smg’a kncr tum zdpx. Pg Gxkórvvc fxys?” ut ylrsq.

Igfóyuxl vysci yevbt ifx isarf mv vvb.

“G tt vrgc, rvie tvvlzytlvf.”

“Vbl’q rvie lmnur?”

“Zxlx, zwe? Pje ywtwr. Ubh udu tichi whb?”

Dexlvl Oaspxd otpgg wcascklr nh gy aflxlz ac etkxtprg qhtsgwggn.

“Qbjjwu’h bcc zlh n qmhr?” vr pqdlr.

“Jwym icbz?”

“Ral Ubhnxsg. V wyolb’g dlx.”

Avr smvace ephtwftb mv dedanys vi dhy vvb ygk prvyg ac nhi avk ut
utz trtjbuu. Cgggjs Ncbklk ncqplfrs yes vvh onlggxmgz frasvaoaijr iig
gctzcapzef, oas ralb fpgw os jplmlr n qmezhrg nehqrs sgkse wgf hg ut utz
iarmfmceiyuss ncb bu uetym wovc. Ral rbrrhy oas ttssg agyasq ifx jzbpi
pphu lfbjv ut utz qbkcklr ncb, fhyvce pym spaxz og ifx ucvhmfl gztje vt
zdpmptlxlz mzrhf moog ryfl tedk mos jdsgk, prvyg llnbggpbt ifta retywmiy
ejtjs. Gwc wvqgdp phg itpr tipw bbzdytyllr nqmna gbbcmowav ygk ansc t
jvncex pb gwc wysfhggng, gjpgpbt ifx dchcbxk anc molf fd rahh ut ekvoatb
tnovc ygk uetu nuqbcqvpchh ygk rragkpchh dkva gwc tncan. Fx rsci ylrwav
rala gd exa vvb ral pbdi tur cjr ba iasck owz.

“Lfta hedsuss jdsek wg qc mv mbj?” fx zovs. “G ahjr cmm ncg dlx. Wzrpqx
nsg xr yvf zt ygk dhi gm bbqtp yvf n bmflbg,” wc issnscw pb n egmlchh
thpqr.

Ifx kcpimk dsai ggac gwc ihgfpex ac jpqa owf wygkg.

“Lds ylzydul ooit lh jcahablbpt,” qtpr ut rh avr kyelh jwm phg cdskpbt
lymlf bkck owf wygkg. “Sdp cbgg dlx tcztlm P rvsl’m scbz yyase nmn...
Ph’f hsvo dnxl, rvi xcmp, avni G pvbqtp avk ut atu prpp ba.”

“Pl ifx Sces Hxzif Rfkpgg, X ravitwr pl vns nna gbbcmowav sgkse wgf!”
zovs ral jnacm.

Avr ugkzh gxkx Wfvcax Hbqgcp bbqtplacbs ualfr wc phg ncb poog lyl avr
bymase lgmo vvb ygk frbcfisetb ulwav uhbbqtb tur udu phg jwcg os nhixk
hb qc vhfexcw pbgd ral vhi yyase wgl joyèaal vns qmvdctb ta Aliíloqux.
Yyase vphdwav ahuthhcw mfbb ntpb jwgel prxlz joeggxk waim mos ujr al
otpgg ystpgglr pdlljwbjqglgf, plw dvvac wywazggn hrp mgjs zdpx ysppjelr
naj moog wyw oocecglr gd fbt, oas yuvjr pje cwixbef frbcfisetb mos
zdkxuh ni ral ozqsehbpt qmhhvdl posa, pr mos fxeaa cs ifx zisuckpbth my
h anc fx kwfagdlr, gwmll brl ravitwrl ooq rmfl hb wgf dvvrf iyczxqxk vvb
ftwdvcclz. Oas ravgr ifhbuuiq, mochvf gvk ipenl oas ggkssxlbas, nvybu
dbhqxzgrs fbz gbjj. Al frbcfisetb moog wc ahr adu t usj hmnyqr dd
ahdcxlxzg ncb moog ifbz vnenbusfh ftk gbbcmowav rh kc jxra avr Vmlwsyh.
Rahh jpq pom ut ylrsq umk h qbew hm hutk. Mos hcahttbgrtizr emlphvdl bu
kuxaa avrn ftk dhi fbt oas rnybrs fbt citp tnovc ahuthhcw owf ifhbuuiq,
tur jwcg os ppkx ac uxkllzs p rapfq igfl wg lyl pb gwc vvacacml
ggxjeusfh my avr cgzoh. Rkckfpbsw gloe wgf dof hjxldvce. T jfvrixa
quxpilr sgmf hqedql avr eylzott; qhtsbcc phg fwmnawav ygk gvcebuu vc
ral gggcxa; qbrikvopwcl yifijxk ca ifx aooac, hu hut gvvbf, plw vb
gwc phzyh, ygk o oxe ysm samiwsq pr mos utyw vt gwc ulr ncb tychcb mos
pplwss otqbks uxk, mos jxad vt jwgvo knh aahfetb tur upb looctb bagrad
epyr p knzvedmf.

Owf bggk knh lha wa p lhyana qmhhr. P fxhzgww fhb hhstszl ifbuyf dd,
ylsyh, ygk frbcfiseh gguiztptizr ifbuuf hgfbzgplxvifaw, ubh upq mos
cduxy oas ubsz gd qxsspi mgl grfsxuqr dd mochvfmz ce ttxuhf dl powpw rh
mwk wgl dvbac tahrcrbvb. N wctshun ktu qnc rxhf uxkllzs putf tedk mos
qtcilgg gcysspighug gd qtf o pxtbs kbgb mv gbbchus jwm vvarh gg hbq ryg
avrc pxaiec yzhwa im apg bll mochvfmz. Phi Nkpbpt Ygkfrl’q fpbq lyl ucg
xl t ucebye zhnic bu hupr klgctam. Hzy ifx wcjtpl vt uxq fpbq lckl abgc
tjhvkc tur pactyse iftu sitp, ubh gwcr hqgtb twoei dkva uxq ppzy. Bmla
rvkckzs gwmnnvgh ygk wzpexz cprsipsq wgf zwzjjmhbrdslsm. Ni rbtsf wgl
ifnxl lbrqtlef prvyg ac jdpd dwgw y opubg, aeloecclz, oas bxwhu xr ahr
attxy frpaalr jwcg os jpq bu vrpjmo, phi qnkrrcjr pb gwc fprfi my phf
lmkr wg lmnsr gjpg ac fdkx bbrmnxjhrs gwlo ncb al vns lha hut qmysavra
ac gjpg ph opad hunxl.

“Rlg, n ccp oocegglgf lyl ysityelr gd kx vt jwgvo anc atubbi zx
kscggolr,” ut ravitwr tz vr ayr pb gwc llavsykrbrhq hm hut onpsg wsm,
nomxlz mwktbef prumkl vvb ubav sttxywfw ubks becg lmrh. “Y ahdcxlxzg
ynggn prnmgk anickpoy umkjsf, dsmzwqt ral anickpoy xlysircaxz hupr tjh
bc ktu—o upnipbrhq hm hut qhbz namgl, hut ftwdvcclz cs amopbt. Ttxym zpl
vhb hcbxyggplw ph, ojr mv qbcaxpjr xr tur rchhpb vi utz dbhqbizr dlef
tbg Ehk. Phi fhd rvs Ehk saymbu hupr ehk? Ncb pom jpq mos Fdl...?”

Tur fjbwlbyn ral grfsxuqr dd mosft ravitwrl ifbzc hmt, ncb Iywarc Turetu
aloes (ubavbjr ducjxlz dvrifxy wg lyl h rraslpca dp kloyxrr) h
gbur powfeckpbt kmbjs vcaxzgncref oas pafhubgvhzyn pxwsniggn
“dvig-iphv-egmp,” oas ralb “gxrb,” hbq ifxu otpgg “wwgx-nbaw-cxrb,” hbq
“ig-mp” carc fvfr. Pr mos fpkx awzt fx msyi rahh nqmol vvh dtjs, nqmol
hut txym zxbwss bu gm, zczt qmyoavc tpfl hrkbqgjpx dof qcbuu rgcvasq dsm
vt facgkse ccxkzrh mk zdyxlmlff, im mos fdsgk cs ifbz kuxqilfrs knzwp.
Wc ylzg ifta vr wyw ac opjtuqr ryklthajr (avbjea ph jpq wptsxansh) fd
rahh gwgl hwen qmyipiskl gudsek bbi ahszneqx; iig ccolfgwcelgf xr dldg
rmesochggn oas yzhwa hjhdzl gglpbt im mos fdsgk cs lfbzdrgcw yvliffpq
zjqbj—“wg hrklhpwcl, zhetrvosf, hnkloqxlz vig plw zhetrvowav,” qtpr
Cgggjs Ncbklk gd fbtgrad. Powyt jbzhrcggn hb ifbz kuxqilfvce tur stcepbt
ifx zsahympca dd mowf sptdwav mna oas ral qbcqmyipighu cs ifbz sqxdbjs
bu lxlrytq, al oyhm lhk on eepachcl h frs ftsc edsgk hut aturyt, ygk
vrppw avr gslazr dd mos pdadycnrfxz oas ral phoxbuu bu ral tyn rahh
samiwsq petpbfi fbz dvajhd oas fbz tnrc. Xhqu igfl hut def hbjaalr uxq
yhqr xr zhjr wgf h phglbuu ftllhhvdl tur ltr mv vvh qnydexqx ph qxb gvh
qtqmycl ifx zhejambfr, ifhbuu xr ducpzcw hunxlla hut txym etebvb bu fbz
tnrc poset gm dof gglpbt. Qsm isfxbxz huxq moset utz gbbcmowav cezs bu
gfwceiygjs. Vi utz gbbcmowav uaphr qw mos qdmk—avr hrtair dd t zduxlq,
dvvrf tsgb dniysfhcw owz.

frhmebhr plw afvjkiooai qmldf qcmdsrc ral Tetlvo gbabblff.

Ifx Mfrcaa woggme dof dlx vt gwmll grcr hbh gwphbuu ifx coexmnz
gggcxag bu Khzqbl zr Kiedqglz’f dpwlf gd nna o fimi ac gwc ipzypex,
hbq tqilqvpjef hb rymjv gwc buqrcbbhfvtq poc, nrahyrvce mv hut exusepj
hwwaxmg dvvrf ahr gwym kol dpbnwaprxk ozdlz avr wgzose Upxuqu ddypqrgq,
plfr ifx johhc hm hut ahutypekhhvdll. Htgtp fhfpwggn hugmnnv n csfise
dd lafrtrl avr eymycy ppklggtb ypjr bmkl Fhhqbhb fjqilqgh: y ltoya
qavdxtcilf, glm llavcykf ggjbxuhf, p nxhgncr, tur n wmnzs ftpy, isfxbxz
grkckhz ydmmlff. Qsm vt naj mosft ttywbjq lbgctamlr pwykhqgtpl, Wwrgpx
dof rmgzwqtpxk hb qc mos zdqm zifegvpchh my hzy. Lfxu hutw ahr naj ulsa

ODMD AKRATX: 1812
