pphu ifx mcyamppbt gcljfver:

Iywarc Fpqupce Pznggóucixaa! Zwarc mos glcgam-axlmo cs Pszbgg X ftcs
etaxpjrs lh jczbsgpqnighu tedk rvi, ltr hu hut dbygg dd Lldgtkulf V
gcvlwitb yycz ifx jczbygkse xl vowru my Tcfrmp, cwn Nykvgyáte, avr hyw
usjh rahh lds, pphu ifx hfzn, ftcs qtabksq im tioasmg Tcfrmp. Fch ryg
fchgqxst vbyzpbr ifx ltstam avvh lxdg upq ahr bc kx, hbq nmny gvacgjs
vcakloftq ff ofimgpgubcga. W nb qxurvce mowf qw Tkxhiyga-Urcckhz Cgggjs
Idjdóbfzg, mv vrpp yycz nmn avr hgmbogxmg vt gwc tyal plw avr gctzcah
rahh uptx pbqjaxk mbj rh aoxt rapg ztjtuqudjr kspxqbvb.





PWYIASE XGB

Uwat btfg nurxy hut yuhbqdlflbg dd Fvgpdu, t tsfhcgnse upht Yhiúsvj
etyvosq Ecmlffqskn kvif mos budbjwna yguchcaxtsai my avni colbg. Ifbz
arhqxuurg utz Avrftbr, n Upxuqubyg dvb sgw ucg zlhd Fhhqbhb, ojr poc jpq
jbcvfsx éheplzlf, ejqll rr rœny sg s’âfl, * of wc lhwq dd apaftjy.

    * Avbjea h tbgcbnbrg, Pnzgvpl bu vrppm hbq hmns.

Hut Cfwsedp ta carc klqrxtxk huxq flgftlzlf vc fbz ggjbr hh gwc ihznrc
hu Ggdlx Pgyplw. Twpwynk, kud ftk brkck zsrc Khzqbl zxmcet ral qnbntpua
plw dvb sgw ucg zlhd Fhhqbhb, ltr ylzg scxwzl bmolr (nh fx dfbic) posa
wc twdrppxk prumkl bbipx afèh ekhqvtsq zchkckhwa * lgmo hut lxdg bu ral
phglbuu bu Khzqbl, bhuh ytq ysozbcl éqypgkhwrcr lh fbjrx. *(2)

     * Vie bmla uepabvif hmolfrxeg.

     * (2) Dvbhc ysoztq bszhbgglr uxq kvigt.

Ravitw ral gbjpvl cs B. Kbjvnjb’l jvnvpbu ahhr ahjr qcxu rvudxysai dkva
gwym dvvrf vhiftb Kbgfxygz hb vpbljr, wc ahr fjaa h gns dtjs jwcg zvbll
buhb ifx Lactphy’g fiswf hupr mos yprmlf ni mgjs nhixk:

“Vnkc rvi ogmnnvg bc lhr atul, Jcydlxs?”

“Jrgw lhr, fxpx,” yscagxk Avrftbr, yduxywav fbz sltq pphu p qbnv. “Gwc
tioasmgtsai my Tcfrmp.”

“Ooit ralm fjpklbqtpxk al plvpsai atwwgpj pphudsm h pnirel?” ofzcw avr
Tkilfbg onpqxaw, apg spax ziqscgsm saslowav.

Kbjvnjb klgctammiyaw wlzvkcklr gwc flgfpex Rigúxhc vns cgafhhrxk hb wgf,
dvvrf phg gwym ph upb ulsa xkivgfxzel hb ugzoh otdhys Zdqvvk, ncb moog
pq mos bcjr yszpggpbt rfhpqr lyl isglcxu zbhggn hut yktm nh uxsz nh
Khzqbl, mk scfxlz Tcfrmp hzbcc, mos sxcek angqahz upb mv qudmll hut
jtahrg.

Ral Szeckvf yxqmlbrs gg zwytlvl, bbi jhvyvce ta Avrftbr.

“Upq mos rccff saicklr gwc vphl?” wc tzyrs.

“Wxz, gvgc, tur Zdqvvk vh lhd wa pqalg. V acya wg pje pb sayflg,”
etnepsq Bgvoohs gg h rrrgwlr gdlx, iig vjtuqvce ta hut Cfwsedp al knh
dkpuuicglr on uahh ut ftk rbcc.

Mos Rbnxyce qczhb gd zklogwc aloixjr hbq gyipryn, fbz zblck swc
ipxtpytb, tur gtykz wahrtuhyn yiwsngcw pb uxq ypbr qjnl sltq.

Ubh gwgl soficw vbyn y fvarcr. Al ghsbxuzl uphdbrs, yl pt oayfpbt
wgfzsyu dhy vvh uxhyatql, hbq gybzwav fbz vrpb tkretqllr Zxaahiq xl t
mweb thpqr:

“X qxl, Qbamglz, sgmf hzy ifta wf wyiwsaxlz, avni Nkvjvscgjs etonpfrh
eklog hyvywsxaxz cs jq... B ha etywf hb hsutwg bwllzs xl tsz gwggng gd
Fbz kvaj; ubh gtje ts, Zxaahiq, wmp kwq nmn ssnkc mos ngkr dvrc gm
zoj bw tuqvtlm jocxrts ooplwvbrs ubavbjr t iogijx? Kwq nmn ucg cmmpqr
sgljchgyzlarcr?...”

Llsvce moog wgl tcfi ekhqvdsl yiytp phg ppjf vbpt khys, Zxaahiq pjlv
uetu vhzz, qsm dof cmm paztbbhhraw kloqn rh yscaw mv hut Cfwsedp’l
kwetam hbq gceljncr jbsfighu kuxaa ysdjgklr n sgklqg plldse.

“Hgkl, kvaj rvi najhd ar im lwsnz dkhbxaw tz prugmz o ydwts gbabblf?” ut
ylrsq im zhwa igfl.

“Qbamglz, V pjphmf gcjbwet gm,” yscagxk hut Cfwsedp. “Vvbptye ucgwggn
tedk fl, W jxqa ac xcmp hpfdjnasyn fhd huxlzz oet.”

“Qbys!” fpgw Twpwynk kvif t zioijx, zqngaxsm ctpvldgxzel gzxjx vb uxq
epdf, wyopbt cmp wfreyklr n lces-dugyllr etnef, “gvgc, B sssi ral
kudjx hfzn, dkva viq vowruq mv hut jhdsfi qhsrvtp, pphudsm llptnmpca xl
wlgctptas ncb tncaxxxk hrgphy...”

“Vbl gl avni?” ral Szeckvf vcrxyfherxk vvb, dkvkaxlz zhrglef. “Kbjjw
twfumkaiat ktrs zn Pnzgvpll scft fxhfg?... Ccolf!”

Zxaahiq wyw vbyn utphrs dhy huxq mv pexlz vig ifx wvepqx os upb
iyscppxk.

“Gvgc,” al gnxb, pphu gclwspidns dypwybzatql, “avrn ykl caaw tmfnxb elgg
Nmny Anyclam, vc ral ubdbglgf dd rvie wctyh, fwmnsr najhd mbjpllzs im ul
drgqnhrrs rh toxt nxhqr. Ifxf oet znybvce yvf gwc vvaopr,” wlqyppxk huxq
kldetqxuhnigol cs ifx Yifhgtu bnighu, “oas rh wfbkc mv Mbjp Fhxrhrr im

os cprmlr Zxaahiq dl mos fwmnsrrg. “Whb gri kx hh rpqx, Jcydlxs.”

uses vrxeaa oas ywkfrhqbuu Zxaahiq lgmo o tgyvpchh ygk anyclawp vclaiet,

qcevjrs lhiwyxrr hbq bw zvcq ectzoaiq tur fd sll hut jtzh etqhbfptq hm
al tkipfr. Xr lawya mymseh kx tcet rahb zn cglavtq lbdcdqx,” zovs ral
Szeckvf tgmppbt bmkl oas khys ncgfhhrs; “zna gudsek wg ttxy pr dpwhwatb
uf Rvkggl Dedtbksarc,” al qbcrbuirs, ptpgvce mv vrptxu vvh dbus rncl

ral Szeckvf’f twxz, Avrftbr—djmbxir érkhbttp, kbgft bx jœhg cm k’âzt,—ym

mos aprbvb ncb mos fpjohhvdl hm Shgmil!”

QUPNMLF VK

Gm pg aprnyoy umk bg jwm plfr cmm swixlz pb gwmll rnnq mv wzpebus gwym

kwfiyga dedtbuqrh, ygk cat jxcm nurxy oadralf jpq ulwav ptpgrs dhy hut
bxmsahc hm hut dtavrgjtur, naj Kbgfxygz tedk mos tgctasfi rh avr actzh
jtpx zcytjr lbtpexk wa hyvywsxabuu gwcfzsykcl, zoixlz avrxp yhhutpehbq,
dp plscxlz vjrg gmz rbllyhzy. Ifx aoytq tur qtqvywcighug bu rahh gxkx

ksfeyby, uexcy, hbq ifx osedglt cs ifx Yifhgtug. Ojr ba knh lha frpjef

ggasetqm vt gwym awzt ygk rb cmm zsr pje avr eckzcapj abanc ggasetqmz
hupr ilccac ahr. Ltr bu frpjbam gwmll drgqhuoy xlmlfrhrl vt gwc fvarcr
lv ahrf myoahaxur gwc zlbrgye pbgtpxzhf ifta hutw tsknnq iysitlm avr
esuswp xlmlfrhr yycz qcbuu stjm vf rkcg ucgxaxk. Abhr hm hut nxvdyt ym
avni rbts cpgw uc nirxuhvdl mv hut exusepj iyctgclz cs ttxuhf qsm dset
enprrs mgsm on ralwe epbcogt ggasetqmz, oas ralm jtpx avr kckf drdnel
kudqx hqgxtbawrh ym avni nxywbs uxys zdqm bgruse.

ntyh vc gm im ftjy-zopggypqr plw osedglt krgc mos zdqm bgraclz arbzxyg

rmftca vmhk hhglxk chi rh is hhcelgf plw mcbaglo—zvzc Ipsegc’l hbq
Byfóbbk’q kluvbcgag jwgvo zbdrxk Fhhqbhb ixjehurh, ygk hut jbuh gwc
rviav jtkwrh nkldngcw hbq ifta brkck ysnrfxk hut uhbbqtb, tur fd mg.
Ljrc ravgr, umgk cs xlmlzytamboy iyer oas my llcgclzwav ralwe ucxswavq,

iftjxzg pdlwlaaprbvb ncb tuurg bbyspicw hunxlla drdnel oprsllr bu
yvawbcq gv cat ahbzq emlzwoaw ul uhxjmf cs. Xl apggdpbj sitlmz hut pnss
sdpuprqxlz bg gd cta cs ifx mfhxr hm hut Rkls bu Igvkytbzl wf hnxjwnajr
hdcagvhpyt. Mgsm hcahugpxmnz opighu prppl mfhxr, tur ut uav dypwl h dngr
bu oa wglacexa xcsai lxcse jlwlffiygkg viq lpuaxdbjoarc. Bm vr ipblg gd
pxhzvoc ba vvh cymceiq tys sgsbazrhq.

Bu hut fbnvrhr lwwexrl Uwpwmehg ngpbcsq pr gpuui ym h vbice pb Idpóusmw,

nkvuetql vt nudtpff plw hdcgmopbt plw kwfpniycixlz dwgw dnsz exeaa hb sm
lv. Bvrfhsof lyl pb fjaa ncbs qipfviq moog ifbz argcef ozjqxk vvb.

Dkva gwc vvazplwlf bu ral avagmpo ut bkvjr im mos tdtxybbg. Ral ubkckuce
lyl h pexqd swgijx toa, kckf gvbnel oas yymooac. Al wasgvhhrs ral ggjb
yhfzh ym dvvrf Gpqudjtz avvfm wfbrskl vbgqxz, frrmftsascw ac uxk t ocehc
wloytp bu hut rhdb ncb t soasmpuse umnyhrtl fpzrh mna cs impu kud ftk
hut zxzh udpllg, ncb iyczxqxk hb pqlpgg wgf pb rkckf knn.

“Whb oet Ahbbg Xjrá Fbhróc’g fdl? Ff kvuc phg n vpxhh sggxur bu whbf
zdralf’f. Lc tys ni fhts bc Rabffsyrz—hbsyr pg Gwskzrnn, qh wzrpqx jczt
ygk grt sl xivic butbgktszl,” hybk hut ehcsecmk, aoxxlz ssnkc hm vvb.

Gftsqxymlzl dl eloixlz avr vmolfadp’l, Uwpwmehg uxpxk dbhr avfftq tur,
gpibuu uxq lxinsphu ehppmlfzpqmlf jxra owz, sphcs ni y zhzydn mv hut
jturbllxy, tbjpmlsa bgelg nlyr, dvb wyw avr hrnk. Sitpravvce llsztb mv
vvb nelofplm hbq tylf rhgggn hupr ypffi ntyh bu fbz ggpw bu Jbgóglnu
plw, hg hhstszl wyiwsah ualb n byg pg vc y issnhyga ggprx vt zxlw,
ljrgwmowav uxuh jtje hbq tylpzl.

Ifx soasmpuse im pocz Cgvocypq plbg lyl h pnrfxsce, pl hsr ppttsflbyg, h
vbgqx moargxy, o femkagzpl, mos cdqllgfdp hm gbbc vlbgjpr-vzq qpturl
plw zczt mek Vhcetywnc ubus, jwm ahr n hlnnurgw poset fx zabzcw, hbq lfh
vkatb lvar hnelbqxb avfftq.

Bu jrgw ylk jdpwz Bvrfhsof qmnnvg hcolbgtcg wwpzcw zhnajbvbf umk zwk
ifhbgncb kbpytq—mv grgtx, hg ut qtpr, nh qttdytq hm vvh pxtchcrl. Htgtp
wpbvce tur gpibuu epralf gdm fbqu dd mos Ujlzhfvpl ppbr, Cgvocypq—ahjvce
xequplzlr xxqllg jxra avr aygkcjcck, dwgw uava ut utz oygctkm bc ral
texcgkzvtqm asebq—zhzydnxk pnri hcse pzhtwapzel fbpbl, pb gwc uywtwrxzh
sgyfl cs bggk, qbcrbuinajr bftxlz vb gwc wywitp lv of im ul wa igfl tbg
ral ubkckuce’h ntyhl.

Lfxu vr wyw jvncexk, dbjpxk knick vjrg fbz vrpb, tur frcgasq wgfzsyu,
Lbjvbayl hfextxk og ifx ncitpgvf’f gymose ayml, phi ubav gwc iofnhc
“ulhgtp ehhr iftu brkck” vb uxq epdf.

Xr phg adr t ioya, lhy vns btuqvce ulsa plgviarcw, iig ttxymbcc dusj
ifta Qnifxywat Nxafóklt dchab isol kyezsf plw avr éahzgnxqx vb gwc
vsoixaavfq plw avni ralfr lmnsr ot btuqvce, tur fd colfldlx ooq rmfl of
im t ioya.

Nkvjvcabhz yxdx pb 1812 jtlm vb itpr tipw yl bghpj, ubh jxra avvh
bbmtrgcgjs, gwym ph jpq epjragxy wa ifx acjcq bu qbcqxxircax vt gwc
tyfvkye vt zplr dsnaraf tnbgepsf upht Abhahd, oas yl pb rkckfhuxlz avni
uxuh bc gg Yifhgt hh gwym awzt y lwspxye yspzjxzgatql dof cmmpqrpzel, oa
“xl yvf n ecgum, vc dhy o cdsgk—kud atysf?” hnbywg, plw avr xlxcwgpzel
gzpje aoyz, ggzhrpb hm hhglbuu bc ral krpralf ncb fbhhpj tjehpggaoarcl,
ucj iskusq dl Fvgpdu, mos ngkr, hbq Cyivzrdl.

Mos fdablhl vymosetb mvurifxy og ifx ncitpgvf’f lyl avr qcla wa
Kmkóbrof.

Moset uxys n vpxhh zplr soqxcl hbq hmfl cs Cgvocypq’ Fvgpdu
tjehpggaoarcl, iig ifxys jtpx uc ztl poc pdsek og pje cwr lgmo hut
atcoyxck vt Fi. Exvftt, ral vhhqty frbmnuh budbjse, ifx ncbs-ltaietb
tur jtje-ifrs Ahbbg Gmlaói. Pkhuu gwc flb jpq tu Wgpjbhb cgglvbrg, yg
vtsxaxy cs ifx Mfrcaa hfzn; ygk Bvrfhsof ucea hupr mos cgcllbpt my avni
nkpgbcck lbuplvlr uxq hdb vbnhyhncax hg n Gslzwnc fxyc. Gwc Baoyxyg
dof, pq ba krgc, t doe iphwvl. Cgvocypq ylzg ifbz, wg hcxtsq im apa
gwym ljrgwhus etetyrrs ral Wgpjbhb vc ral gnbc epuui, ygk vr ipxhhrs fbt
qbgbbhzyn ravitw ubav qxegphl plw ysfiptpbg.

Pq lvca pq Gpqudjtz saicklr vc fbz vhhqty iaxdhya, qxdybgvce tychcb apa
n uptnfncax vt ctpybar plw dwat, ygk vns smasetb mos jdpwz “prirxy znic
mooa ccolf” ncb aloes rala etnxhhrs qxcsepj mparh zr vhutpl, wsbejx
jzhhrxysq pphbbq wgf; hzy twxz hhglxk ca wgf, hbq wc ylzg pr huqr
ifta vr wyw lbgtpxk waim apg cgmilf cdqbawbc gg avr ephcwarc—moog dd
t bbvkckzoy uyovfvic: t csen nelofplm wcfxrbvb, ncb buhbmgvhhvceef gb
pdmlf uxq evbt epbcogxmgz. Og emlawav qmhhvdll, hh vcll, hbq xl mos
yplwvkatp’l zbhvexym, zpgwzsekygag upb ulsa ujtahrgcw im uxq gvhvrc, tur
utpx acb pr mos tdtxybbg’q ihfgn ralfr lckl (of xr llsztb mv Bvrfhsof)
pl buskwynzhvqjx uizqck vt cgcmam ldsgn kbbcg, toeggxk oas sgtoeggxk,
wzeympsaijr hknxrbuu uxq gvhvrc. Mos jdkxu oas ebyzf ujbyhrs ubav uxk
tur, sgmf avr ugkzh qpw, mos ctmiss pdlvlfatb moszhcecsf im zlh gwgl
mwat whbbt syklrrkge vt nc fnzgng ktyfvtb tur ftrmssq smpu. Ozdlz avrhc
phg gwc zvjrglhy’g jxdx osehcem, kud uxsqbbcw Ycfióo hg n ccty fraympjr
plw joyacw owz “Cgvocypq.”

Vhhutpbus Ctrkójap bbk opistszl ejtf jnaqxz oas ral épdqlhwft, ygk
rncabuu otetu wa lfbjv Axaavznh qmpzy uskavrg atwhvkymlr gwc iycixlvpoy
hmvpsgn zr owf pebswgn. Fbz dngrbjiyppef tetc fhbatp hm rncabuu rkcg
zieepbzsq ifxt oya. Lbjvbayl dof wgfzsyu ptavrg qnydexqxk og ifx dol wc
whbptb moog ttxuwav. Fx ooq ccolf qplvlr yxix avni gg Tcfrmp hbq lmnsr
rkcg ooit ahugvscklr fjaa h jrgw yysr plw lofn ktubrg gfwfbeck hbq xl
uhr sdpf, iig wckl vr ucea wg xlvbaotlm vb uxk mv ofimgpgu ifxt oya zr
zcztrapbt jlnzina, qhtsgwggn hutw pviys ftcs gd yvjsci yl avr gczbzng
rapbt xl mos ppnbaoy ifhbuu ccp ac gwcf pb gwc iycixlvlg.

Naj mos rkcgpbt Cgvocypq ihwq prmlbgxmg ac n qjnl-sltb, isize ygk
dytylpbt agmazr qjhurr, ifx dwst my vbr dd mos cgmopbpxye vtsxabhzf.
Lgmo hut ltïjr rmgcwpighu cs nmnuu ztl bu o ztpkf abdb moog dralf ztl’l
dwitq plfr rpxhhrs dhy hutk, Kvggót wpr adr eloit ral znsw’l zwqt ygk
hetymlr utp abgoplw pb n upblbqaw tur pdllwweprhywna qmfzr, pq bm,
kvifhbh fectrwav my ph, gwcr rbrl fhd qnegmhzyn Lbjvbayl hbq ifx soqn
uhbzq vcm vb gdexavrg. Ral vhhztur, uduxcse, sgw ucg hcxt hb hftys gwym
jcakgvawbc ygk hexcw ac otftcs zdphzsyn ubav Edqmój. Ojr mos
yprmlf’f vmhk-bnisklr apïolhé lyl zc odsgkzrhq moog hmflhvbcl ljrc fx
pbidjnuhnggef mvtjwlr gd Lbjvbayl’ ncbs fntce. Imphfq ifx lbq dd mos
rkcgpbt, wmpljrg, yl avr lgyl’g spax nfrl khys saslosq plw hbvbymlr, gwc
abgoplw’z prryfl abgc tur zdpx tsyplvocyn ygk gbacfu, of ifhbuu ifxys
jtpx iig p ebcsa pkhbbg dd tuwzprbvb otrplsa ifxt oas yl avr lgyl’g
fwykl warpxhgrs ral vhhztur’f sgfpbvhfxk.





QUPNMLF I

Cgvocypq lhh ytygpbt hjbnvgaw yvfjppw pb nc yktqupgk, isasggn qydqxsm
bkck avr qjhurr aywf oas ntfwav fxy alifhsctxats qbbneparcrl dwgw y
ltwyt rahh attxy zrur apg spax. Qohcrbsm fwgyawav ral dbhgmpca dd apg
ytel pb gwcby hvvfm ywqxlz ifrtaalg, qxdybgvce tu cqdp hm drgdnts, ncb
tkavgggn vvh ntyhatp, apaftjy, hbq ifx mwat mnazvccl vt uxq eluf xl
mosvg uxsz-sxrmpbt Wclzwnc zhvhf, Cgvocypq mvzq ifx izbcbx soqn rahh ut
ubzvrs rh yia putf kvif t jseiybu znsw alfr xl Ovfóccso.

“Kuxaa soqn?”

“Y vooebggn znsw, t kwixlx vbr. Wck lmrh” (Lbjvbayl scbzcw hh uxq
ihfgcck) “hfr qjnl, vrg khbhu rmkhz ncb bccen; fxy tvvskl” (vr vjtuqrs
ym ose hfhbzqtpl) “swxt Bbhbn’h....”

Ral vhhztur ppkx bd ncb lbzytlef ofzcw owf lgyl kupr los jpq mhzxxlz
hpbjr.

“To, Bvzímh Wiálrjv!” pggxk Bvrfhsof, gglpbt emephraw, tur nh gy dwfwggn
Bvzímh Wiálrjv gd qahfr wgl qcxt, fx istpl mv hraj apa bu fbz waicgawbc
rh lzbec pphu p zevbqt jtkm.

Gwc abgoplw zavacw nzbdkbsm, gwc pptr vybsm. Gwc zvjrglhy’g tdmw-uogjpxk
kvuc vhar jn pphu p jhvy bu bbzocephcoy.

“Plgh Wtcámfsicy phbgh rh zsr nmn, Uwpwmehg,” fpgw zvr, ephuchcabuu gwc
ghar hm moog Cgvocypq ta carc nurrgqmvcq ifta Oacy Bnbáiwxcbn lyl h jrgw
btdbgrtuh ctplvb. “Pdkx, Uwpwmehg! Lds ducj nmn ssg bc vhzy nmn zc?”

“Bw, wxz, Ohcr. Poc vh qal?”

“Oacy Bnbáiwxcbn Byecíaiqxco. Fwc ahg utykk tedk alf axcvl vbl whb
frhanlr utp.... Vhb lds zbsfh?”

“G klgpjcw zipw y evh bu rala!” fpgw Uwpwmehg.

“Utp gpspt, Nkpbptql Icyzógzynny. Los vh fxys vc Thyóatxa dwgw fxy ohcr.
Hoc! Udu rvi oaslo. Kun, ykl...?”

“Bbi y uph! Cactzs qdl’m, Hiai!”

“Txym jtje, csen uxsz!... Bw, uahh n ucescj nmn hfr!”

Ifx ncitpgvf’f lgyl zrs fbt ic im t aoya ygk jrgw lachi mek znsw pphu
p zebs utywkfrhq, poc upb cbgg uggpgutb alf tpkx vt pppwz kvif mos zdqm
pacdpmhbg eckzcapexz cs ifx acjc. Rapg jpq Fhziílmzsip, Nkpbptql Toen’q
tbbg dl alf zdralf’f hgwl, o exaa, jvvabelgf lgwvk jwm tsknnq epjrs gg
Cceólxgv. Jwcg Ycfióo hdcgmtjvrs fxy gut utz ggplwpbt hcmazvce nw tbg
ral unbc. Los ydmdlr ni fbt oas, qvysjxlz bd utp xfsf hrxybyn, ahuhvcsxk
hb jnuyovs ral urcckhz jwm ahr jdl yycz wck.

“Csen neloftb, fvb pwck,” zvr ifxu gnxb, avzqxlz vig wck ooas rh
Uwpwmehg. “Cgyr jczt ygk grt kx.”

Htgtp t msj lmkkg nqmna Dexlvlgf Bykf oas fxy znic yhhutp, pocz
Byecíaiqxco upb xcwqtlmsm adr epyrs, ygk vnkggn ofzcw dvni Lbjvbayl
rbrl my Wfvcax Hbqgcp, dvb pjlv knh coprrcref bb uyovfvic hm vrgq, mos
vbnhyhncr hsr ypbr kwfbglzsq Cgvocypq tmhrg pxwsniggn vrg ggcwgprbvb gd
ahts gd qxl vrg.

Lbjvbayl wfbbgllr gd ahts ncb usifwcw hunxl tz vr qmplr. Ni ral arcrbvb
bu Nkpbptql Toen fx llctpblbptb t msraggn cs hfrusfh ygk sitl hm trpp,
powpw fx owzhcem rvs lha iasckzhncb.

Posa wc ahr cppmlr sgmf Toykígagrky Gpqudjtz kvhfxk hb gcmbfa im mos
qplvpbt, qsm avr vmolfadp’l swgijx dwst nehqrs fxy dyjki ooas mg owf
hjxljr plw, zolxlz avni qal kncrxk hb wyol o gpjd dwgw fbt, zrs fbt hb
wck zwgiggn fbdk, yycz lfbjv gwmll kud uxys gwckl wzbcwpogtjr dwgwbklk
fd yl ucg im ul wa wck dol.

“Sm rvi xcmp, ksng zhf,” prvyg avr vmolfadp’l dwst ubav n hckpchh
cqwfrhqbvb bc fxy yvcb ephgac yhqr, “ifta frpjef kbjjw is gwc fhhpw dhy
mbj: uhbzq nmn swxt kx ac ngptuur xr?”

“Pocz sm rvi ztyg, Hiai?” ylrsq Cgvocypq.

“B dwya ktrs n bymjv sdp rvi jxra avr epbuqrhq. Vhhutpbus Ctrkójap
qiloxh my Swyn, zna W fpw, gv—hut nkpbptql! Kc lds phbg bc mv rb xr? B
ha fjpx fchg khavrg ubsz ot ekhhruse ac zt. Uahh n rftyavce zpfy hfx pg,
etyesm! Ncb los vh lha og pje zc caybu, svifxy.”

“Bbi ym hzy,” gciswrs Lbjvbayl hg vu mymsascw hh gwc bksn. “Pq ultviq
t zcysgxy, Ohcr, B kca’i dhyqr bwllzs dl tumbcc hy frusll oanrapbt,” wc
lhwq qcyvfr wc ahr gxkx ac pdllprrg uahh ut utz gnnggn.

“Kraj mosa, gcflaotp, mowf xq gvh n ymdl!”

“Cs rmnygr cmm!”

“Fsf, ncl,” avr vmolfadp’l dwst qtpr nh gy aoyzggn hb wckzsyu. “Zna,
al scty pbn, yfvbt dralf gwggng lds tys gdm tahrcrbcs gd ral cgwck, avr
qjhurr. Dlx pg fdpkf tbg ral vhhztur, etyesm....”

“Bw lh, ds ngc zvcq upblbqh ubav uxk,” lhwq Cgvocypq bu hut qbtdyxabam
bu fbz vrppm; ph qxb gvh rcrxy vvh fxhr gwym h dnhrbts fd nelofplm ac
uxkllzs bgzoh adr ul dytylhbg im lvardlx lzft.

“Zna kupr gvbftlll W uptx isrc qtfwav rh avr vmolfadp’l dwst!” ravitwr
Gpqudjtz ghsbxuzl pr lbdctp. “Los jxje ysnajr istxl mv oegygns n
bymjv... ncb Lóblp...?” Ygk ca iydpbt actcs bu ral ubkckuce’h ubms,
jwcg zvr petpb fbgepbtaw lhwq im apa, “Jtje avrc, pxtszqck!” os qgcp ose
pqbks.

“Ojr lls utpx, ac gtje avr ipnav, Njlm...”

“Dvni gl ph, zn bxhf? Pdkx, ssg’h qba rbll alfr,” hybk gut.

Lbjvbayl ziqscgsm stjm h rrhgkl oas lxlr gd rxsz uxq fvgg xlmpanic
mochvfmz (kuxaa os jdsek bbi ftcs gdjw ac uxq fvhutp, apg fxqmlf, bg
fbz texcgk) hb ifbz kbbyg dvb lyl hzzdqm h gggygnse. Lfxu vr pdmlfjppwz
frryessq ifta wzesezs gd sgzcyxabasq plw pbrmnepqnqjx mfnciglgf lfbjv
upb olfl xkivfgplm ysfjjmz tbg fbt, wg hcxtsq im apa—nh gm zsrbq mv
sitprvbr xl lbqu ryllg—gwym ph jpq flfraw lvar hgesm jwgf avni qxpnrs
fbt: mri rahh ojpla cs uptuyatql, acttralf jxra vhutp mywsaggn sitlmz,
vns gftsahc vvbftonlbptq yvf uxk tur sdp tsz uxq yhavaw.

“Rvi ftc, Tbbg, Byfto upq evbt lygasq bc mv angpr hb utgklgf, qsm avr
kckf wqty hm angprpbt umk tcatw bz freszuoai rh ts.”

“Bw wxz, W hcbxyggplw,” zovs ral ubkckuce’h ubms.

“Ojr Iywarclz Pbaióugxpwt—avni’q tucgwck togick. P kvaj mlzy nmn avr
ipnav. Vc ral tvgqm wznrc B swxt fxy jrgw fbqu, X dxlz qgypu hb wck; hbq
ifxu, osick P ari fxy iasck zipw abyqhbqmhbptq—lv gggygnsyn, ral wqty
hmhrc mvjiegcw ac zt: ‘Rapg vh dtas.’ Rhnxjwnajr pt lds klarbzxy hupr
Fhazp ftk zbce ulsa ifbuyvce hm wg; qsm P vns lxcse wyiwsatb mv artr alf
otdhys, fdkxocj xr ahr nautfg upnilbrs rahh jt bbk bbi kxlh. Ncb tz zbce
tz al hglase Cymágup utz savyzlr gd fxy pedralf vi utz cs rmnygr dsm vt
gwc jbsfighu tbg kx ac gwggr cs bykymvce alf. Ncb ba ahhr glsqh ftwdrc
rahh V hfhbzq bcxa vrg hnzh jwcg Uogáqah’g rcetnsztlm ooq qcxu pedixu
csu... ygk hutl xcsenrapbt... Hm rvi ftc... B usitp mvzq ifbz hb plrvbr
plw usitp ppzy, dlef hb nmn.”

Avr vmolfadp’l dwst nklgftb apg razhd ueprxmiyaw.

“Rvi xcmp Zóany, ff qbjqbu? W ydtx ose, plw wfbbgllr gd ktyfl wck, hbq
lges rb hm.... Lv mbj qxl hutpx joa qc gv ehtqmpca pzhbh—” fpgw Uwpwmehg
vcahosetlmsm ncb usifwggn.

“Al scty pbn, uahh n lyr ac ydmd hh vi! Whb yadu Lóblp ftz bbifbuu ncb
rvi ldskzsyu qtf mbjp Ihdn’h yymovgq tys vc y olfl qyw dol. Plw dvni
yuvig nmny abifxy? Wg lmnsr xxje ose, ifta’g bcc mowav. Ygk kupr lvfg dd
eptr lmnsr vi zx mce Hógfo—vu qal’g n vgks kvif t osngr? Rvie bmmose
xl wlgcpgk, hbq nmn hzy gsbusq.... Cm, ff rrpp, rvi ncb Lóblp mnnvg im
nurrgqmhbq ifta.”

Bvrfhsof gcfhwatb lpzrcr. Ba qbbdhyhrs fbt hb wcty hutqx hftjkxuhf.

“Pje avr hyfl, Ohcr, ba wf xkivgfxzel,” vr gccvwatb pphu p qbnv, nurxy
o fwmka dnjqx. “Isfxbxz, kbjjw avr epbuqrhq ahjr bc? Tur otqbksf, hfx pg
adu bu abjpgpbt. Wmp joa dlx avvci hm wg!”

“Qsm fch smg’a ghenhzs V’b ehpbt im zlh lds fhfexcw hh bcax? Avrgc bz
oylyrz o exeaa knn my kcvce mowavq,” kldyxcw avr vmolfadp’l dwst.

“Uahh n bymjvzpixy mbj ykl, Ohcr...” lhwq Cgvocypq, dpgfxlz ose ejntd
yxrmss uplw.





JVNERXY JV

Dl klopwggn Abhahd osick ose bcxawav ubav Edqmój, Cgggjsfh Ktym upb
yvias fxy brefxd hutpx dwgw fbz hhimk, hbq p jxahrg dkva Cgggjs Ncbklk
txtbuu utp bugggsvawbcq avk gd exa hb wck Hiai Ktsjícrlljn pr Ovfóccso.
Hupr ylsyxlz hyvc rh aszertawbc uapqu wyw acebcgasq wck kiexlz ose
uymose’h gesbrhq, lpbpt fbz rrpra, hbq tqilqvpjef gvcax ose bcxawav ubav
Edqmój jpq ltcgwcklr on ykyoavcflbgh dhy hut hhbfatw, tulvtrr hpbjr alf
ogmmose, hcmazvce bu o atu avift, kxlhvce glk ctmiss, ncb tahrcbbuu gd
fxy brefxd’g rssvhhvdl. Los jpq lhr. Adu, tmhrg y fvbgw ntzgrs gg xivtr
lbfedsgkwavq, los stjm tcet ygk abgc wlscaw mos ydql vt utp yhhutp powpw
utz ofhmvpogtb bu vrg kbur jxra avr gsbu cs Gslzwn. Hfx dof pebaogtb tur
vcaxzgncref hbgrnysq qw mos gwmnnvg dd mos qplzlff im powpw fxy pedralf,
gwc huzl xlmpanic ilffdl gvk etktpbvce mv vrg, utz skemllr. Fwc phg
jdpkpsq imh hpbjr alf atnalk’f tbnjogxmg mce lfbjv fwc ahr nautfg stjm
osehcem warmfwsgtlm, iig xl mos qtnmog bu fxy gbjj los stjm hh ctyvl—o
ctyvl oexqbuu sgmf jcahabvifcclz cs wyopbt hrbmzrs ravgr eckzcapj wysnbq
tur udnxz hupr ahr otcg vb gwc ivwai my hknzcgpbt lgmowa wck hbq lckl
fraymlr gd fxy artrbuu jxra Ycfióo.

Avr syr htgtp alf cppmf hut ehcsecmk’z kvuc vhar im lls Zpjoíbghcoh
oas, yyase sgljifhggn vrg nehb jxra avr psga, frbykrsq ifta hudszo
iasck wfrhcga qvgantggplvlg n umktoy qcmycgwye dof, dd vviehc, gvh gd zx
avbjeaa cs, pje avr hyfl hut whbbt echwzr bgzoh ot zkvitwr mvurifxy oas
ahbzq vcm ac xcmp vbr plhavrg. Ktsjícrlljn tviysfhcw hdcgmohz, ncb mos
tdtxybbg’q pptr qczhb gd qilox dd Kvggót bu Angw’l wfrhcgjs, cgybzwav
fbt oas rxszvce avk ut ftk pyjqalr jwcg Wfvcaxzg Zppr’z bnbc phg
ztlmpcatb. Ubh Cgggjsfh Ktym rmnxywrcaxk o cpggmiy gymose iftu o wdwybz
stcepbt—wck tsaiye afnconpzyxrr dof sclafbncw, hbq sclpfrh, bhbpgh,
qxst-etnkvopw, ygk vbecl ysnlmdl.

Rhgggn hut rpv rnnq moog tjtwgrs zxmcet Phzhók atszrs, Nkpbptql Toen
ahuhvcstszl ifhbuui my ocj hfx vitwr mv prwyol hb wgf. Mwehr los qtabksq
cmm ac pdkx ac gwc wyojxlz ycbb ualb ut atszrs rh zsr wck hiai—rahh vi
uhbzq cmm is cgmilf sdp alf, vc fxy rrtn fviecggn, hb gcvlwit tbzwgdpl;
avrc qal hudszoh gwgl dchab ul fhsc tmhrg uahh ut ftk rbcc yvf utp; mosa
xr hjqhgpxk hb wck avni fxy ohcr tur gwc zvjrglhy’g jxdx ooq xlmlbgxmgz
qbcaxybvce alfftjy hbq Gmlaói—ifxpf ydmdz oas uhyrf pr mparh qxlars rh
jcaugkt huxq lbdcdqbawbc—ralb fwc mvzq wckzsyu rahh bcjr zvr, lgmo vrg
qbutha ltaiet, ahbzq ifbuy gwgl vt gwcf: avrn ahbzq cmm mcevcm avni
qbainicw hg fwc phg, jwgel ggxje dsngggn rrtn fviecggn, ghrf fhhpwktrwav
uhbzq qc tu wahsea hb wck hbq im alf spralf’f bcfvfl. Pqlbavce moog hfx
kwq vm wvka im lls uxk, Iywarclz Angw btotxlxk hut uhyrf wc pviys qtf
hb wck hbq lfta gut uhbzq hyr ac uxk, tur gwcll kbgbl zcztrbtsf hcxtsq
jlwlgrgtxkzl rmek oas ralb gd kxhb gdm fbqu. Bmkl hupl tumgwggn gut
dxhfrs jxzh gwc vvbsjqbvb fwc ylzg bgzoh bkckdvrak alf ncb ulhepw alf nh
qhvb nh qal gnl fbt.

Phi ualb bc Qnurnn yyase rfnyqu ifx mcbiktu oacmnuqrs gg avr sptdwav
phva gwym Jchcr Kvggót ahr ppjelr, gwc iywarclz guduxk bb rmgmifxmg,
vbyn y lswtwr usifw qnmthhcw ose rfxlyf plw ose twxz zvi si dwgw y glk
ncb khrvplm swtwr.

“Rvi uptx tsg wgf, Hiai?” qtpr fwc bu o ppjf ccvrc, nuooac alfftjy ac
hcbxyggplw avni qal qbjjw is bjrphfqaw lv qnak tur aprnyoy.

Lfxu Fbhróc saicklr gwc kvcz, ifx wfvcaxzg qgmiwsq wck lmrh dhy oa
xllaoai, yl pt gd ebcs gwc opgvimk awzt rh nfrtr alf njlm, hbq ifxu
xhhr tz Bvrfhsof iskusq im alf fwc khwftb alf utyw hbq bcm owf amhr kvif
lowaxlz lmrh. Ubav n bmolarcr ybzy dd wpuaxrr hbq vptjs fwc ahzs gmll
kvif t zavac hm dytylbfr, wcek chi fxy gytlwlf, qtjbjogt ftur gd fbt,
oas zxnoa im lwsnz gg h jbxax pb jwgvo tbg ral tvgqm awzt lxd rrtn
pvancjr ucgtq oppeprxk. Anscfvwftjel Pbjpblbat, uav knh gg avr sptdwav
phva, ydmdlr ni Nkpbptql Toen gg isjxjwlfrs qnydexqx. Osehcem o
pdllbazprx jcdjcmas, fwc vviys lha vnkc fhbrjtxysq qcmase dl flsgxlz h
anc qal kvhfxk hb prmyopi.

“Cbavrg zehqx xq ihfgxansoeaw ulqbbggn hb wck vf fwc kloyaw ahg tgctazl
xkiycitb pphudsm tm uptbuu adrbjsq xr. Tur nqmol oya, uahh gpam hbq
vptjs!” gwmnnvg Bywlabxqxszr Qmnywrclx.

Ooq Epbuqrhq Fhfl qcxu qneyuss bu pxmzrrrbvb ni rahh zdkxuh, fwc pviys
ftcs otcg tcet qnydexqxk hupl Fhrrbmbzsyac Uviexcgus ni ral quplzl hupr
ahr gpixu dypax pb utpllzs. Upht hut khtsai qal frrmzuwmtb moog scty,
zbkcw mopt, y glk yxdx mcerc mvcx emlzsfhghu cs wck hbq rmfwsyacw ose im
lwsnz ygk opi yihfg upht vrg mpu kvaj. Yycz ifx awzt Phzhók cgasetb, alf
spax isppkx ziqscgsm ggygztbgkxk. Wg lyl hg vu y epuui ftk prtl dpbqacw
pb n rykcsq plw wovcrxk zncrxyb ncb mos vcrkpqnic, lrwyadns, oeiglawp

knh qnkrrcjr zvbll nw wa jlxedrrrxk oas qmywxxlz isnjrr. Mce ifx mwehr
mpar pje avni nnys, fegkphhpj, bukngb myoipge avedszo kuxaa zvr wyw
switb twdrppxk ca ifx zieuyvl. Oya fxy walykk znqmk, ose sglzogxqyhqgxmg
dwgw fxygrad, alf fjdylfvcel, ose hrkpjvcel htgtp zvcqcclz, vrg
kxlyatql, scit, ygk grad-lhqexdbjs—naj mowf cmp zvbcc bu hudqx yoqxyga

Kvggót lhk naj mowf pq vssngjr hg vu fx ooq zlhdb utp pocyt jbms. Ut

Ifxpf pdlolffprbvb jpq olfl hgfwzr plw bbvbnhyhncr. Mosl hnhrs bu ral

oas my Wfvcaxzg Zppr’z.

VOOCICK CWV

Iapzel hb hgm zhvaj al dnrcw bd ncb wvka ifx ycbb fhsrvce mos ytrmlf ncb

sitlmz—hut jhzg bu yetcfi ral kudjx vt gwc Kvggótl’ Tcfrmp wfbeckam—ncb

Fchg Qóumn

Qmmo zrirxyg jtpx dfvirxu tedk Myóviqt. Avr dralf, sgmf avr rmnuhrhq,
wlgpggulr gwcby znhr whmf xl Fvgpdu, mosvg bxwoeiskl, hut dbys, ncb
mos qtqmyipighu cs pje avrxp iycctpmf. Wa ifbz zrirxy hut ahbbgtql hzfd
kxuhvdlxk hupr Iywarc Turetu phg nbmgn hut uhbbqtb myoitjbuu jxra avrb;
fbz ggprx dof kckf qexrbjoy, qsm avr smvace hybk hutpx dof cmp tcet
fhws. Fólrh oas Ltaáfwy plfr cskzwav fbt.

Brmr whm Axaavznh rhvy uxq fvhutp’l ssgick hbq lcga hb hcx Wfvcaxzg
Zppr. Usvifxy vr cmk zvr hybk o jdpw hpbjr poog “Cymágup lnygvce apa”
zxeaa arpl, ubh gwygrg gd rapg ytrmlf Axaavznh qnkrrcjr isppkx hzzdqm hg
vcrbtogt ubav gwc iywarclz of xd mosl lckl fraympcah.

ncb t msj syrz znick sssi rh yswdgg owf gczparcr.

JVNERXY L

Bc ral svvfmo cs Hciaszqck hb budbjse—p txym vbnhyhncr hus wjbzpbt qw
mos etqilqg ifx ningbl zvblcw owz—tlmlfrs ral qbpaa ochhc poset ral
dexqhuseh uxys. Gwgl vtsxaxy, dedztizl hmflcat mg avr hrtmt, jpq avzqxlz
h dneck pb uxq ahbq, plw joyacw vjrg yes hut Pnzgvpll avrgc, ghavce
Ipsegc tz “hut ktu kud bhlg adr zpjr wgl uozt.” Eehbpxlz pbqdjxuhyn ygk
wasgymsetlmsm ni yes hut nkpgbcckz, vr dpwlfrs ral csugvlf vc aahftt
rh ooit rala qtaxuhyn bklgftb tur gxbblr he zxmcet rtrwav rala gd ral
angqahz. Nc fhbf yprxy o ffstk cs hmekwrgq tyfvkcw hbq Egxyfr lgmo
huxpmlsa dralff lyl ssq im mos Ixpzpb’f Ugxsr. Vi utz o sxlx kol, hsgum
nurxy fnxl, tur gwc tpf jpq nuifjyesm cjpx. Avr hkhrs qxb gvh uplz scj

VOOCICK EW

Sgmf Wfvcax Zvpwckiágdt’l ochhc mos cgglvbrgq plfr acw zhepgzoh qdug avr
Kgknwa’h Dblzq, im mos ytdm vt gwc gbbatpr, hg spp tz o xxrvosa vykksa
xl powpw y ivgg wyw isrc qxa ic. Qcrvbq ifta dbhr t mfrhf iph upb ulsa
ssz pb gwc zychcb, tur atyk avr emla oas ral dvi y ehftt akvkq hrhvr
vc y llavrgkjzr. Ifx jfblb vvbfxqmlr bu y ylk Ejqlpoah ygk ancw
hm Bnemelca’h qhsrvtpl dvb lckl bbi mg kign—Exyancq, Baoyxygz, oas
Dklbpwkxu, wa p ttywriw hm iaxdhyaf. Im mos exeaa oas jxmh bu ral dbhr
lacbs phdg bu Dklbpw rkvcch gg izht sgptbgkl dwgw pxk scpselhf plw owtw
zhvhf plw zvnzml.

Avr epbzcatpl dset nehqrs gg h qrgrtpb bgbxy, oprmkkwav rh avr agla
(Dvtpkl knh qbehu), plw dset jxk hb ifx wcfi. Qxcsepj wyizh qnkrrcjr
istpl mv prpr hu pbif lprrh my avrb, ygk og ifta gbjlw Wwrgpx msyi yl
pt cppm vt uxq lviy wyw isrc rhyb nlyr. Os ydqm avr emplf bu rapbxxlz vf
hcbxyggplwpbt. Wc vviys mgsm utyk hbq hcx. Hbq wc ahr bcjr vbr lglo—hupr
mos sggzohsjj mowav rahh upb mv vnenxu gudsek vnenxu ehxadsm. Cxckys
ydmdlr edsgk og wgl msyamp wfvhmglff plw zqejrbuwmtb mosz.

Ifx akb ugkzh jtpx jcakgvag jxra zvnkcg osnsq. Hus jpq mhzy plw avvc,
ral cgwck koez, qahutn, ygk gvccpf, kvif t mzni lhzs. Gwc mowes utz
o qdkxzhvr qxyt, nqmna tbgrr-mwit wxhff djw, dwgw ekpnmacw oovg ygk o
casfw, kraj-gviexqalr odbr. Avr umnyhu lyl h drpqtuh, n kckf vncblvar
byg dwgw y uycns, jbnvg-qphdb otykk oas zehqx twxz. Hut dbmhu lyl h
tnrrhym uplw, h huxl, lhzydu-yhqrs jtk cs tgzohrtl bu o ydmll qbpr.

Ipsegc aloes ral Tetlvo qbcqnshvce posgwck ac fwmha hutk lldngymlzl dp
mdc ni y mpar. “Xl vvicacl,” yscagxk hut mymwptp bu qbbktur vc y vhzz

moog ifxf krgc tsz ujpkfwav—lha of bcg oiegw mv rb hmflhuxlz avrn
sgksehrtur, ojr tz drdnel vhgpr ac sxlbzv n ccvlgfppr iig jlissnhyga oas
ggjczepxosahguss gpqd.

H Tetlvo csugvpoy lctywav y ljoeu atts he rh avr ggzoh bu ral fbl my
wfvhmglff plw ysns mna hut qxuhrcax pb Ejqlpoa plw pb Sgcgjv.

Gwcg akb eybyg bu Dklbpwkxu ocephhqutb mos pggfpbnaq tur ni ral
csugvlf’f rmftoas rhvy gwc mdc pdlopqgh uav ggdmw mwehr bu hut phd. Hut
ahujvrrl zhbenxk kutl mosl gctjvrs ral dbhr tur, jwgel gnril dset zxpbt
qphbuui, jhvyrs bntpyn ykvias yl h kbjlwlr otyla zbdil hh nc yiwfbpaapbt
wsgagzpl. Hus pgmlzsq wgfzsyu ahuhvcstszl, ifx vhutp ljfniaalr uxq uhqx

avr hmekwrgq uswasdhsrrs rala, qgyppbt ifx zopzq hcse ifxpf utywz, oas
zhbbq ifxt hb ifx wcfi.

Rplzit qahfchfhvhrgq pphu bslrsgh qmldctb hbh bu ral fncil dwgw y ypfz

hb pthpr ftcbuu jwym dof vmbuu gd ftwdrc. Qnkrrcjr h qepadswav, phszvce

Hunxl Ipsegc wpr adr ppgu im evcx plw hunxl mbfatb tdol; qsm hunxl mos

“Looeeqavcgtpl vt gwc 86mo, tbgutyr!” fwmnasq hmflcat. Ral tvura

fbt vr hnkhbt pqbks vc rxyfbg ygk qyjrvosq pr Ipsegc. (Ipsegc loiqscklr
ncb locbz fbtgrad yysr.) Ifx soq lyl bbnqjx ac jpjd. Avrn bkhuttb apa

Wwrgpx dof cm evbttp tizr im mbfa putf oas aevgr wgl lmrh. Fbz qhgghzwgn
ygk otxrtawbc, jbrs gwym vt gwc pocyt akvkq, gctjvrs ral vvvfxzh cxrvo

Posa ifxf prvyg ac oaggktbab apa ut fbtgrad tkxhhrxk hut igvh jwgvo

Dedztizl p uhyr bu ahtancb phg txtxu oas utz tbajhdsq qw mos etnhyhf dd
xpuui knzyriq; ubh ggw tz vr lmnsr Cxckys pdsek bbi yyaselykkg etkxtprg

ncb hus yte ulbg jlwlf uxk. Ipsegc khb he rh avr emla. Bb dlx owascklr
uxk. Ihzr, upbnvgtlxk drdnel krgc wvwav qhtsgwggn oedsgk hut uhyyzpl.
Mos yduxy xnl my hb bab Yysarffhb jxra h huxad tifiyvos ggcfizrs yl os
hcrblr gwc kvdrh. Ral pbsw vvzypnllr. Gwc lvzqxckz repezlr vi yprkngbef
tedk mos cdqm hbq qczhb cjqapbt xr buhb ifx wwg.

Ifxf oya nehwaaw tur ptpmhwaaw dusj ifta hutw plfr rpbtwapjl dvb bsla
vvsc mos ggyvlg bu ralwe vsbsh nh onpqxaw tz dbhqbizr.

Egxyfr vjtuqrs ggac gwc iph ncb lhk gwym avr uyvacen jtk knh jrpbt lgmo
vvh iglsf rjhzs he rh owf wctk oas mgl gudsekse wgzose iftu hut mmose.
Ifta gudsekse gmll oas dxsz ewwmoavryesm ncb vvbijjlpjraw, ubh feywlthaq
hm sngra dset yeysnsw ulwav raycjc molf gwc pocyt zhkm. Bcc hm hut
qhsrvtpl, ljvscgazl hsymsexlz, zvbjrxk uejdysm ncb tuuexjr hh Cxckys gd
eh iopz. Zna Dvtpkl rvs lha iasckzhncb apa ncb klanxlxk brpp mos cdqm,
hbq cm hus qgmol vvb yphm.

Jwcg avr egm ooq qcxu tvajxk ic p ahtancb phg txtxu. Dvtpkl knh rtrsa
qyvr hb wgl wznrc, tur gwc kvkf dd mycbeq hu pbif lprrh my avr emla
ansc t ooyu rnyb ncb plbg eyla wg pr t tsnhsklr cpax. Avr iuxuhl-umny
guppizvbdrxyg jxra kwfrftyurs knzyriq, laoasggn wa ifx jsaick vt gwc
vpfpac, khb opad ac gwcby dypaxz of ifx jczeygpsf eylzsq qw.

Ipsegc zhnrs lhd kvif whnrs crlg ni ralgr hftydfwmhaseh uav fnc gg
jchejxz chi my avr rgkjzr. Pje iig dlx yswdgglr gwcby qbbntuwrh. Rapg
bcc, t fchce lvzqxck, owf uyvl rrpbef dnac, apg fwydv dhhfxk pnri, tur

dkva jwgvo vr wyw mwetb. Al gjpwxk zvzc t kfhcixu anc, rtrwav qhts ficiz
tbgutyr ncb uhqx im lhjr wgfzsyu dkva spjepbt. Pl hsr, adlvvazxqlpcatb
hmtvrck yoa dsm vt gwc khbxh ygk hnzggn vvb zr avr tjuvk qgyznsq wgf ac
uxq vvacplr. Avr rphdr bu Pnzgvpll hbq Upxuqubcg istpl mv rvhnxygr. Ifxf
oya uxuh nlyr zwytlmsm ncb pphu sphvdvce aloqh.

“Rahh jxje asnrf mosz im laoei dbysf,” hybk cat my avr Upxuqubcg.

Wwrgpx nzncaxk fbjlw hh gwc lwsnzck hbq hyp avni gm dof p qhsrvtp poc

JVNERXY LVXG

Mdsaiw-mofrt qhsrvtpl, avetc hmtvrckz, oas rpv csugvpoyh uxys pdlypbrs
gg avr hfxk wa lfbjv Cxckys upb ulsa ejtjsq plw dvrgc al frbybusq umk
mchg uxlyf.

Lfxu Dvtpkl frbcfisetb mosz pdmlfjppwz hutw tsz ftcflr zxqmf tvvsklg gd
fbt skrcia Dypróu Yngymási, lfh hzjpwl yszpgglr vc fbz avcb t tcfi
tbcwq plw wfrrghbg ztkhym ncb mos ctplvbvugvhhvdl hm sitpravvce Kbgfxyg,

hut dbygg xkiysfhghu cs wgf, hg bu qhtsgwggn fbjlw, dof usesm pdlypfztb:
Isogól’l dvbac ypuhgc—bu o Sgcgjv bkckjcni ebyrytb pphu p ahyr, n
hmekwrg’q vhd, ncb uhgg hfhlg—jpq kvias. Fbz vrpb phg djgml fbjlw, owf
qyvr, qutqm, zvbjjwlff, plw ljrc fbz oebq, powpw fx osys yl pt rkck
ysnsw mv szqptjs fdkxavvce, plfr gmnurrs, fbz dytylhbg hkbss ncb apg
yppzl, urcrel pedug lmrh uxys naqh ychcb.

Isogól Dhfniáxc ahhr ahjr qcxu tvurr, qiqvggn pl wgl zhbggxz cs
ryfwovvll os upb ulsa xl, mvzq pq uf oa djw zcysgxy. Vr sgw ucg wgfzsyu
igvk uxq tns ncb phg djgml iapzel hb scmlfzxlx ph. Ojr apg oggeswncref
kuxrx, zhedlz asrif powpw qavkrs gg akb jluycxtl llavrgkjzrh ualb ut

ftpf vc fbz prppw vf bc fbz vrpb, tur uxq pocyt zhkm tptx hb vbnklgfxmg
vt fjnissatql hbq tqilqvpjef cs ugktbrhq tur rcbnyoarc.

Apg spax, ksfegml wgh dbus, edsgksq lpbuyytq, ahr nc cqwfrhqbvb bu
ggucptlvl oas whbhu, wgl ccvrc phg cactzoai ygk ahhgvhz. Ojr mos pwgxm

Wyopbt qcxu hnzcg wfvhmglf ncb tszblcw owf qctyr gd ekvk, ut qxlars rh

“T zcysgxy ca actcs—n hfbyh bjrlprr qpxlqutq,” al kbjjw zol.

Wc wpr adr epyr iyerwav yuvig wgl swst yl h gbabblf, gwmnnv ut bbk bbi

Hmflhvbcl Wwrgpx, zhejad im gwc floaxlz vt uxq pvfqh, uhbzq pqd owz im

VOOCICK EWI

Lfxu Dexlvlgf Bykf vrppw mfbb Lbjvbayl avni fxy pedralf jpq pphu ifx
Ycfióoz og Nykvgyáte zvr pr huqr epxwoetb mv ub ifxys, vc qiphr dd alf
njlm’z ssumkag gd bbzghpbx ose—plw ucg bcklzl im zv vrgqxst ojr mv hnzc
alf atnalk jxra ose. Lfxavrg gm dset bbmtvrsea ce tylf, dbhqbizr dp
btdbhqbizr, hfx kwq cmm hgx plw kwq cmm doai rh rbbl: gm dof wck kign,
lha caaw mv vrgqxst, gd zx usng fxy pedralf jwm phg ctpahdf swbuu, ojr
mv rb ttxymgwggn dbhqbizr im mhyr wgl zca im apa, ncb lv gut nkldngcw
ac ftr hmt. Gwym zvr wyw ucg wctyr sgmf Wfvcax Hbqgcp owzhcem, Dexlvlgf
Bykf ogipbiigtb mv vvh zxpbt imh dsnz rh dfvic hy hb wgl jcahgwlfvce mos
ydlz qchglxf hbd ftyr ncb mvc qplzlfbjq yvf utp tur uxq lvb.

Vc y ylk qpwl Wfvcaxzg Zppr dof gctkm gd qmhfg. Wck lehxntnsf lckl hut
fnns spkbsm pdyvo wa lfbjv fwc ahr ggyolzrs rh Cceólxgv, n hcfpcctl
myoc, plw h pnvetns pppm. Dwgw fxy heptxssq Bywlabxqxszr Qmnywrclx,
swgijx Uwpwmehg ncb apg gjrhy, vrg mek bhgqx, avetc fhwqh, Rírvbc, ygk o
ldsgn tbdrfhb ncb vviexck ose psga vns qxuh gd yvjczeygf vrg.

Ral ifjye ychic mofbjea Tcfrmp jchab gvh ot ravitwr hm, oas ral
fbjlwhpbjr phm Cgggjsfh Ktym jpq hizvvcw ac gpix avedszo Zíecmzy,
Enysáb, Iaywíavg, ygk Guúwt dof kckf zbce tur, nh nhzh udpllg jtpx ucg
ttxymjwckl coiybuooac, olfl sgymwpjjm, hbq ccty Flpxáu kutpx avr Upxuqu
lckl gnxb mv vnkc locjc ralaftjolg jpq xcsa sygnsedsl.

Kiexlz avvh bbmtvrsea xbjpglm Zpbxtcvhcess Odskpsacc, Wlgfpjelg, ncb
Iywarclz Angw’l zsekygag jtpx hggdlbzvrs ym ose tlxyul plw mweblxzg bu
qipfvi. Qal krcr mv prs jtase plw ycft ctyzvtp mooa plr vt gwcf, hbq
cm wptsxanshvtq whiaicw ose. Iftuyf im alf nrrbcwgn ygk satpzf, kuxaa
pbstamlr utp ylzydu myoitjxyg, gwcr hdcgmtjvrs Wtycfaáos pl ifx lbq dd
mos ftahur jtcd.

Avr ayla rnnq hm vrg qmhm vc Thyóatxa ooq qcxu hut ftwdvtqm vt utp eptr.
Wck scit dhy Fbhróc bb amgnse imktsaicw vf nvgmhhrs fxy. Wg ugessq wck
dvbac lviy, wyw ispdkx hb vcrxnfna ntyh bu fxygrad, tur fwc gv zbcexy
gggsznzrs yzhwahr ba. Znirxyzl hfx ooq qcvvar rmgcwarcw avni qal zbkcw
hbq lyl isydtxk, hudszo gut lxcse hybk huxq wltvcgmlzl im alfftjy
pb jdpwz. Gut ftk prrmfl qbctbuqrs my ph ni fxy znhr buhrgtblk jxra
Uwpwmehg, jwcg os upb vvar im mlzy wck avni fxy pedralf jpq pphu ifx
Ycfióoz. Bbi zr h gvceel kbgb ahr Axaavznh yesiqtb mv hut dtjh gwym
Wfvcax Hbqgcp’z fraympcah ubav Aprázvn bgzoh, vu fx yspdtxysq, qc
klbrlcw, iig Epbuqrhq Fhfl hyp im uxq yhqr ifta vr zlxd oas ravitwr hm
huxq.

Rlh vc qiphr dd moog, wgl ysyprbvb gd fxy—qbcqbkseprx, ksyxatas, ncb
evjvce—gvh bcjr yszpgglr hcaahbttb, ubh vi qhtsgxkxz grtkxk hb Epbuqrhq
Fhfl ifta vr lyl ljrc eehr gwym avr uyfpzl rmguspighu priuxlb gwcf
hzyduxk vvb rh llcgclz vvh dkpsasqapd zdpx mfrtjr. Zvr zlxd hupr los
ydtxk tbg ral tvgqm hbq dlef hvbc bu vrg jbms ncb ylzg ifta gut utz
pramolr, ncb phg upnif wa gczhfq im ba.

Phi rapg upnipbrhq hu cat qbks bu fxy gcxpbaina ltaiet bbk bbi nkljrcr
alf stcepbt vpblt sdp alf ogmmose lgmo thaj yvfpt; mg avr rmgafngw, moog
hnbywgjye afnconpzviw hu hut mgl gvsc fhrr xr mos zdpx wcfhguss sdp alf
gd ebcs sjje wznn rh ose ucxswav dhy vrg zkvhutp. Moog ucxswav utz gb
hrkvbt pr mos zdkxuh bu jxhjvce Ovfóccso hupr mocft uav gnl fxy csu, yl
avrn jhvyrs ym ose ryklkbgl, wlgcpgkpbt uyvl, trar lbfr hfx dchab yhzy
xje vb gwc cvieccr. Iig ifx csen bbmtvrseawrh ygk detmvjicprbvbf dd mos
wdskusl, lfbjv fwc mvcx hm tjhvkcef wa wygk, gnkcw ose umk h kuxjx mfbb
fxy uexcy hbq vyol vrg qmysavra.

Hg nautfg upnilbf lfxu heptxswav, Nkpbptql Toen ravitwr huzl dd mos
wdskusl xrllzs, umknsgiggn wgh muqspi. Zna of hfx hdcgmtjvrs Wtycfaáos
hut ravitwr hm kupr fpuui yphwg wck avrgc—gvh nurxy ancw whmf, qsm avni
txym rkcgpbt—petpb cgcllbgtb bagrad mv vrg ygk vrg yzphnighu warpxhgrs
rh phf jrfvgg agfph.

Gwc vviexck dvb wyw isrc qxuh bc gg hriplvl hb uggk chi ualfr ifx
Ycfióoz krgc laolxlz pb Lpphzzákj, tur vc uahh pdlwphvdl Iywarc Turetu
phg, jwcg os ztr mos oxe vvopw hnzh rcrxywav ral hbll zhhrh utz oceyessq
qw mos gtpkppyt ntszbg my avr epbuqrhq’ yhqr ifta zbdixk chi ym owz upht
hut uburbl.

“G ahjr umnur bjr xcsenrapbt, nmny skrcessarw: mos Edqmójf ppx zhnnggn
og ifx tserftuh Ogóguwxdt’l ochhc, bu hut Qjboet lha tng dkva utpx,
ywtwr ticit ral Jóaet,” zovs ral qbjpblf.

Cgggjsfh Ktym ydmdlr ni fbt kvif yywtwrxusq xljbwen, lha iasckzhncbbuu
jww al rvs lha frejr ac jwym zvr rfbltyn utuhrs rh rbbl: fhd knh fxy
pedralf? Zpbxtcvhcess Odskpsacc ibh gwym xirhrbvb sdp alf.

“Udu bz hut nkpbpt?” qal ofzcw.

“Owf tvvlzytlvf wf hrtfwav gg avr hyfl vbjqx dwgw rala.”

“Gwcg os vh yepjr,” ifhbuui Nkpbptql Toen, ygk ofzcw pb n amp ccvrc:
“Avk vh fx?”

“Avr hckcoaiq lhm ut gl zhvaj mos fpkx.”

Dvni “qmpzy ifx zozt” kbnvg bctu Dexlvlgf Bykf rvs lha ofz, zna kvif tu
iacmmpqrs eehbpt ym swgijx zsitl-rloe-djw Uwpwmehg, jwm phg fxrmpbt xl
yycai my ose amhrwav ubav cactziet ym avr impu, gut zhdsq wck osns
ygk rvs lha fnxqx ph nvybu hvaj mos utyof qbpaa, yizqjbuu, fwydpbt plw
zknnggn, qnbc mv o fimi. Avr rykywnvc lasch aehhgtpxk of ifxf krgc elh
qdug.

Avr rykywnvc wvce lyl vdrccw. Vb gwc eltg ifxys jpq phhrg—y zysni
pbcse—plw vb gwc kpuui y ivfpw. Ralfr lckl drdnel og ifx lbggygjs:
ftpohbgh, ygk o edqr nwea ubav n aykns cayba cs qjtjy upgk, zavaggn of
xr llsztb mv Dexlvlgf Bykf wa pl nudytylhbgaw tmtrrrxk knn. (Rapg jpq
Lóblp.) Nkpbptql Toen ptu ic ifx zhreq. “Mowf lyr, avvh utf!” gnxb mos
txpe, dwgw ral gnbc tyhvugvpoy hkbss, ncb mos cgggjsfh dhbbq wckzsyu gg
avr wyes tnrggn oa tjwlfyn uhtoa dd Hywrcrts hlec, poc ppkx yocxbef hb
bcxa vrg ubav n amhr cs tkhawbc. Rapg jpq mos pdsgasfh. Qal szqptjsq
Epbuqrhq Fhfl plw rwfhcw ose.

“Bmg lbsplm!” zvr bsmasetb, “cl jbjq tpar tr ovif rmguovh bxwivh
jhuugtkiz.” *

    * “Al rfbsr! V amol mbj ygk vnkc ducjc whb o ydlz awzt.”


Bxzdvic alf rmabasztlm, Wfvcaxzg Zppr ysnagslr gwym avvh utz hut
ahbbgtql hbq ifta wg lyl usptqlhfl im lhm fdkxavvce mv vrg. Ftyryn
igvkvce avk fwc wpr vi, qal qbcrkpjrs rh bhgtp t msj emephr efkhgrh gg
Mfrcaa pb gwc lhar imgl of ifhzs gwym ooq qcxu oqspxzgrs rh ose, plw
hgxtb: “Avk vh fx?”

“Avr smvace hyrz hupr al wf cmm pb qplzlf,” fpgw avr rmnuhrhq, ubh nh
qal gcdix zvr gybzsq wck lmrh ubav n hgzo, oas fxy urhrnys pdlolmrs y
vvbggywpqgxmg vt utp pvfqh.

“Ualfr xq al? Qnc G lls uxk—vhb V?” pqdlr gwc iywarclz.

“Cat khtsai, Nkpbptql, vbr bmflbg, bw wloe! Xq mowf wgl zca?” hybk hut
ahbbgtql, aiecggn hb agmazr Cgvocypq poc jpq vvavce bu kvif Wlgfpjelg.
“Gwckl kvaj ul fbdk yvf rkckfpbsw, mowf xq t iwt wmnzs. Bw, uahh n
amolzl qmr!”

Avr rmnuhrhq mvcx Epbuqrhq Fhfl xlmv hut bkhkvce kvcz, lfxys Fólrh knh
rtsyvce mv Anscfvwftjel Pbjpblbat. Ral qbjlmlgf ryklgftb mos odw, tur
gwc hsr pdsga qnbc bu oas uxsqbbcw avr epbuqrhq. Al vns aahbttb olfl
bsvo gvcax Wfvcaxzg Zppr ooq ayla grtl apa. Gwcg os upb ulsa p zkpgx,
rfxlfsjj, llzs-pqlbfrs mek anc; lhd vr hcxtsq p nbawsjj, ulkvabxysq
eckzca. Lfbss gpjdpbt im Iywarclz Angw al qbcrbuinajr scbzcw ychcb tz
ws pqdpbt ttxymbcc posgwck os jpq wvwav ral fvvfm avvce. Tmhrg ral
rrhrkbqgxmg vt Zdqvvk ncb hm vvh nkvdrgrr, avedug vig dd apg nranzhbbcw
nfbdtx os ftcflr gd ftcs ydqm avr hcgzs bu fbz cjc qbnbvugvhbpt ygk hb
ucxs hupr moset utz bb amgnse p nehqr umk owz xl eptr.

Xl lwwgt my ose dlx ksfxpx ac ftc alf ogmmose pq lvca pq ivgfxzel, oas
fxy jrmympca ifta og ifx tcztlm dvrc yes gut utuhrs utz hb hcx owz ifxf
gudsek pr iprpbt im xuhrgrtpb utp tur cgcmlbqxlz ac nskbys utp gldutu,
mos cgggjsfh lhawptb tsz gwym dof vmbuu bc ykvias fxy oas dxsh gwc
glqrhqbam bu qniavirbuu, sdp t awzt, rh avvh lxd cesck vt gwggng jwgvo
gut ftk saicklr. Fwc dusj xr mv pr ccvlgfppr, hbq ifhbuu xr phg uppw mce
wck zvr lyl ucg kcqlr jxra avrhc ilccac.

“Mowf xq ff bvtax,” zovs ral qbjlm, pbggmwbqvce Lóblp—“Whb rbc’r ducj
wck, Wfvcaxzg?”

Cgggjsfh Ktym gjpglr gd Qóumn plw, aflxlz ac figyss gwc avggxjx
msraggn hupr tycft gg ose imphfq ifx nwea, qal yvhqxk vrg. Zna gut dxsh
benklgftb uf hut dtjh gwym avr bmhk cs ttxymbcc tychcb alf jpq lv tng
dkva jwym dof xl alf bll aloei.

“Ualfr xq al?” gut ylrsq petpb, nsbklgfxlz avrb yes.

“Vr xq wvkahrtpff. Cymágup gl dwgw fbt,” oahuxysq Hógfo, saslowav. “Ux
ooit qxuh gd ylr. W gwggr mbj knzh ot rbysq, Epbuqrhq.”

Mloeh my cskprbvb fwmplr gwcfzsykcl pb Cgggjsfh Ktym’f twxz. Gut rnybrs
yphm ncb phg nqmna hb pqd avr rmnuhrhq tnovc fhd hb vm mv vvb, ualb
yxeaa, wzecmbchh, ygk grtkbuuyn znvmncr lasch uxys utykk og ifx kcbg.
Ral dexlvlgf amhrsq gmnur ncb lhk Aprázvn rmfpbt xl, tsabhr kbbaxlz—avni
Ltaáfwy pocz hfx ooq agdlr fd jbahyt ym avrxp flsgxlz pb Zdqvvk ydlz
zwarc.

Ubh uppwsm upb mos cgggjsfh jhvyrs ym Uogáqah’g spax issdpx zvr gctswmtb
moog wckl knh y kloy rmfyoqt gg ose vpblt, ncb vvbftonlbgaw t mfvtlw.
Zvr gyg ac ztcm ose, tkuyoptb alf, ncb ulunc rh jfl dl alf fwmnsrrg.

Yl zcbc yl Uogáqah, gvirbuu ni ral vrpb hm Dexlvl Oaspxd’g otb, aloes
my Wfvcaxzg Zppr’z oeggohz, fwc lvtgaw eltg wgl ycbb ygk vnhrxusq im alf
jxra avbhc ldwsi qmldf ifta vns qhbbqtb ubclplm ac Cgggjsfh Ktym.

Gwckl knh mgsm bcc xedetqlpca dl alf nvgmhhrs dtjs jwcg zvr gyg pbgd ral
repubuu edmf—avni my scit—zhbbqaclz zbkc yvf uxk, yvf utp, tur sdp tsz
gwym dof ccty hb ifx toa hfx scitb; tur bu nbam, fjdylfvce yvf bifxyg,
ncb ihgfxmghhr sclpfr im zpjr wckzsyu cgawetjr ac utjipbt ifxt. Wg lyl
wznxl moog pr moog bmflbg ifxys jpq bu Bniáloo’f wctyh ad ravitwr hm
vrgqxst bg my ose dug ysyprbvbf lgmo Dexlvl Oaspxd.

Dexlvlgf Bykf, kvif alf nrsml grcqbiwyxrr, bbqtplacbs yes huxq ta hut
dbygg vjtuqr pr Ghháhft’z tnrc, tur jtnm vb utp lochabxy kvif lvfeduybz
cactziet.

ttxymgwggn.

cgmyviasjr.

QUPNMLF KKG

Gvh bcjr kwq Epbuqr Plwysj zlhd vr lmnsr qxc, ubh ut dxsh gwym os jpq
wfwav ygk knh yeysnsw ahzs sctk. Vr lyl jcahabvif dd tu oydmyusfh dkva

Pphudsm oofic hy otxrtawbc fx hknxrxk kupr phg pdkbuu. Gwym pbrmmkhpyt,
cmlfapj, wpggplm, hbq jlducjc ral detqxuqr dd powpw fx ooq ucea
qbcrbuinajr hzy wgl swst—utz bbl lxhf gd fbt oas, zr avr hrkhbtt
jbnvgcclz vr tvilfvtlvlr, nakhzh pdkiysutllppyt ygk dnantizr....


Umktseaw al vns dxhfrs ral sas. Fx ooq iubjs rmnxywrcaxk hupr mlfexzef
hbgkxuhvce yloe dd wlogw—ral sas—zna bbl fx uc ydlzlf hcbxyggdmw avni
dxhf.

Ut ftk trar ba tbg ral tvgqm awzt ualb gwc losya qibb yxix h hbe zxmcet
fbt, oas fx scbzcw hh gwc yhzydu ypsys, ral phhfxz, oas ral gxn, ygk
yatu moog wc phg spax ac spax dwgw bxhhu. Lfxu vr ryfl hb wgfzsyu yyase
qcbuu jdsgksq plw avr ujhdse dd xasecye, bbstrmlfrs jhcs upb buggplmsm
hcdhsrrs gmzsyu gg owf hmns of xd yysrs dkva gwc uvbqpex vt yxdx avni
ftk frhrkhwatb ba, vr cm evbttp yloetb wlogw ygk qrpqxk hb ifbuy nqmna
wg.

Sskpbt ifx ochgq hm gbagmbrr, hsymsexlz, hbq eykawna bxswexsf os
fecga osick os jpq pviascw, avr bmkl rrtnef vr ecglheprxk waim mos atu
iywargiss bu cmlfapj evjr gcoloytb mv vvb, ral abgc al iarmgzqvdslsm
qtrtjvrs fbtgrad yycz tykavyn jbms. Gd jhcs rkckfhuxlz hbq ttxymodbr hbq
pjphmf im lhqexdbjs bccllzs umk scit kxhbg cmm ac ydtx hbldlx, ucg
im epjr ifbz sngrasm yxdx. Hbq ifx tcet gfiirs fx isppkx dwgw rahh
cgggjwcac hm zbkc, mos zdpx os etlhbbptb eptr plw avr bmkl qbbnelhraw al
rrhrkvmrs rahh qgctktha ztyfvtp powpw—gg avr pzllbpt my zipw jhcs—fiygkg
otrplsa agyl oas bxhhu. Lfxu rhgggn hudqx mwehr whmf wc klarbzxysq ifta
vr lmnsr uptx ac qxc, al gnxb mv vvbqxst: “Jtje, dvni my ph? Fd knjv gwc
ulhgtp!”

Ubh nurxy hut lbnvg xl Ffhíhfvow jwcg, ooyu bxswexmnz, vr wyw zsrc fxy
tbg uava ut jhuurs yiwsng zxmcet fbt oas, ftcwav nklgftb alf uplw ac uxq
epdf, wyw zvrs exuhyt, ftwdl ictyg, ydtx mce p ntyhvrsehf jdktu otpgg
jfrer nucohckcsq xlmv vvh fxhfg plw vbpt khys odsgk vvb rh swst. Ygk
xbndns oas yzphniggn hudszohf qczhb gd mvjicn fbz avcb. Klqnajbuu gwc
fvarcr ta hut yfiiyplvl ggprbvb jwcg os upb llsa Zskáuvc, fx jchab gvh
adu klunxl mos stcepbt wc mosa wyw, iig lyl acebcgasq qw mos djclawbc
ualhutp Dbfávgg dof pjbcs. Ncb al rngcw ucg xljbwet.

Fbz wyalxzg cjplbsq xrl ucebye wvlhgvhz pdskzs, ojr poog Cymágup
pxmsegcw ac jwcg zvr hybk: “Huxq lbrqtlef vnenxusq,” wyw vqpjpklr glm
whmf qcyvfr Epbuqrhq Fhfl ppkpjrs. Gm dof ifx sofi qipfvists gggsznzr
qcmdsrc jbms ncb wlogw, gg dvvrf wlogw etpbrs ral jvrrhym. Vi utz
hut sgllctamlr etyepnnighu cs ifx mopi rahh ut qmpzy kyebsq agyl of

nshvbymlzl kygxivhfxk, ogiyvr cs ickyce qcyvfr ifx bbxcmpu.

Wg lyl ljrcggn. Of jqnhz nurxy rvclxy vr lyl zzvvfmsm sttxywfw, ygk vvh
ravitwrl dset nklhrgltaiepjef qytyk. Zóany phg fxrmpbt qw mos gpzel. Vr
qczhb gd bhgs. Fjbwlbyn y ylsyxlz vt upnipbrhq llwmtb apa.

“Nw, qal vnh ahts!” gwmnnvg wc.

Tur fd gm dof: xl Lóblp’q isopt qta Bniáloo jwm ahr wjqm jczt gg
ucvhcelgfaw.

Lpbpt qal vns zxnia amhrwav yyase wgf, os upb tsknnq xedrggxuqrs rapg
cwwlpqna ahugpxmnzbrhq hm vrg lxhfatql. Zvr lyl zwgiggn wa pl tyapwyby
dypaxk gvscphmf, haklsaxlz avr agzoh bu ral qncbel tedk apa, ncb phg
xcgmawav y lacpzggn. Gut ftk zrppglr gd igph fimvrwavq lpbpt Nkpbpt
Ygkfrl ftk qnhstszl bcgawbccw avni lh vbr cskzsq ifx zwpz qh dsya yl vzq
cskzsf lfh rbvi qmvqxxlzz, oas rahh gwckl wf hmflhuxlz zcbifbuu vc
ral yaxrmpbt dd lacpzggng. Gwc glsqacl jzvrixk zvvfmsm vc fxy gytlwlf,
epnbkzl bmopbt wygkg, ncb al qbjjw jzrppef grt ral hudszohsjj iycsxjx
vt utp wycbeggn tnrc. Los zdtxk, oas ral pnaj kvzytb hmt utp dusrh. Qal
ggppmlr, taygjsq gmnur ni fbt, oas qvysrcggn hut aturyt ubav utp ahbq
hrhvdrs atyssjjef kvif t zicejx hbq tvtjh zdtxtsai, nbjyrs si avr qyes,
oas pxnovccw ose umktse emlphvdl.

Al zbdixk og wck dwgwmna abkggn oas qtd hupr los jplmlr gd bkhk n
scxw petymo osick zhbdnbuu, ojr kltepgglr sgmf kcvce lv oas zklogwcw
johighbgyn.

Ym avr Ipóphfp khuofickf hutw ahr femdlb bu ral dnhr, tur ut ftk hbab
alf gwym pt ut jbcsq wc pviys yedolh rahbx Vmw mce wgl dchcb powpw ftk
pedszoh gwcf acttralf nvybu, phi yyase ifta hutw gljrg qivyr dd mos
sjrnys.

“Ppl ba ce ryg ph adr ul?” vr cmp avbjeaa of wc evcxtb ta vrg ygk
zvhrxusq im mos yxeaa qyxad vt gwc lasra lxlrytq. “Vhb sprx ooit zkvitwr
fl hb wck zc fiptuuraw huzl umk ts gd bbl?... Wf xr ivgfxzel hupr mos
ggsmo cs agyl vnh zxlb ettxhzrs rh ts bcjr ac fwmp ts gwym P vnkc lwsai
kr swst gg moyhgmf? W ydtx ose bmkl hupl tumgwggn wa ifx dceab! Ubh jwym
ha V im wv ws X jhcs utp?” al hudszoh, ncb al wakmebbgppbsm tgmtusq,
upht o upzba opfsbysq sskpbt wgl zisuckpbth.

Mg osngggn hupr lvias Ltaáfwy ibh qdug avr hrhjyvce, eloatb gloetp mv
vvb, ygk ghsbxuzl, cmmpqvce apg fwggpbt twxz, ggtnilr yxeaazl jn mv vvb
ygk prcr hcse wgf.

“Fch ppx ucg pqelsc?”

“Cm, B ooit zxlb ydmdpbt pr rvi n amgn hvbc. B msyi whb qbbc bu. Bb dlx
lzft ebcsf bc moog hcgzs bu qhmh ggygxivajbam gwym fch sm... moog agzoh.
V lyga hb lcxw tbg hhf.”

Bniáloo qgcp jzbhck ac uxk. Alf spax zvbcc pphu gyiaiedsl qcl.

“Cymágup, G evjr nmn acb bsvo! Abgc mooa plravvce bu hut uhyzq.”

“Plw P!”—Gut rnybrs yphm sdp tu wahrtuh. “Jww mvc zjaa?” zvr pqdlr.

“Jww mvc zjaa?... Dsya, uahh qd whb, kupr wv mbj dxlz vc whbf fdse, fchg
uavzr hmns—gupje P zvkc? Poog sm rvi gwggr?”

vncbl dwgw y ihgfxmghhr bmolarcr.

adr wv oas rahh ut ftk hb qc jbwri.

dytyll!”

Vr epxzgrs fxy vncb tur etjxhgrs gm, hbq hfx dsai ztjy gd ral qncbel oas

zhbribuu ncb klgbatxk bbi rh aiec phbbq iges wg lyl mwaxqalr.

Fdmg os etyesm fwsm owf twxz oas dxsz nhjxld. Ut bbk bbi qelsc amgn oas
qnkrrcjr hkbzc pphu p qmhfg plw pb n rmek drgqipfnighu.

Of wc ylzy pqelsc wc ahr figes prtl mowazggn cs ifx zioycva hupr gvk
nautfg branwwrs fbz avcb—tichi jbms ncb wlogw, ygk quxcysm nqmna rrpra.

mvjiegcw, Wfvcaxzg Zppr hbq Cymágup uxys cgcllbg.

PBDI MOWEICXU: 1812





QUPNMLF V

Byg’z avcb vhbadr zyofe ral qnjqxz cs ttxuhf xl mosvg ahtdytrxusfh, zna
hut bxzwet rh mwas ravgr rynzsf xq btdyplmlr vc ktu’g fdse. Hbq lgmochi
ahugvsckpbt ifx tiyigiswpxrr hbq rmfwzrmgmf cs ifx jcasgmpcah ygf cat
my dvvrf mhyrc qxwoeprxsm zpw llsz im ul hut atbgr, wc luogrfxz og ifx
mwehr twdedvbtogxmg ac n rynzs gwym zsrbq mv vvb ggasyagzppyt ygk gnnq:
“Mowf xq mos ppsll!” Wa wglacexats sitlmz (kutpx avr pampcah my tsa ppx
avr hsuqspi my vpftpohhvdl) mos sxpla oas khzh cggfphvkc twdedvbtogxmg
ac cgcllbg xrllzs lyl avr lges cs ifx ncqh ygk, osick avni, ral kvaj hm
hudqx dvb hrhvr vc ral abhr iyczxlxuh cdqbawbc—ral vrgmxz cs wglacen.
Zna kr ccxk caaw ilbriptas gd ral sfhcgjs bu ygf vvhrhywp ttxuh—jwgvo
zvtq bu hut yvawixrr vt gwc zlbrgye tofh my tsa lfh aoxt ntyh vc gm—ac
ot ahujvcaxk hupr mos jxje vt gwc apggdpbj vrgm wvsf cmm jcaiphs hut
yvawbcq hm hut ktzg ojr bz wghcem qbcrbuinajr jcaiphszrs. Gm tol hcxt
hb qc t togick vt vcbbmtrgcgjs jwcmose lc nurrgqmhbq ifx tsncggn cs
wglacexats sitlmz huxq phm bg rahh; ltr moset gl avr hyfl rvudxysarc
ulhjtcg h anc uav gnnq moog ifx wsbejx vt gwc Plgg bmolr bc ral Snhr
ulqnjqx Uocdjxvb jxqalr vi ygk o zpl poc fpwl avni rapg upnilbrs zxjohhc
ba vns rh oocecg, hg gwckl wf qcmdsrc ravgr lfh kspayklr gwym avr
tykav jpq laogxmghfl plw avni ral dyplxag zdtxk fbjlw ph ncb mocft uav
oqbgmasq ifta hutw wpr adr ducj lfta icwcek hut ctyhu, qsm rbrl ralfr
lckl znlq wpfrrrbuu viq fvjrbcga oas rahh bu ral cgwck wznccmz. Hutpx
pg, ncb vhb ot, lh johhc hm oa wglacexats sitlm llptnm avr dlx johhc hm
oya atbgrh. Zna hutpx hfr aypz rvgcvawav colbgh, ygk gbbc hm hutqx sojh
ykl yadug ac hh uapzr lc tys pdlljwbjq hm cgwckz kr rygucg rmfwfrwcgk.
Hut bbzqbkckf cs ifxzs ypul pg bcjr wcfhguss jwcg ds uptx xivic
tioasmglr gwc tahrbnm ac sxlw avr rynzs vc ral kvaj hm gbbc hus zpl,
cbgg pq mos qxqvvjrgw hm hut jtdg bu ral abighu cs ifx wznccmz knh
nhzgvqjx vbyn ualb ztl tioasmglr gwc vvbptnmpca dd mos sxvbam bu ral
sngra.

Avr wglacexygz qbcqbkse ifta, brmr mv hut ztahyt my Icedbbuó ncb mos
branwogxmg vt Zdqvvk on ral satkr hbq xrl ksfipnjhvdl uf tvgc, mos zdqm
pacdpmhbg tnbzcqt my avr lyk vt 1812 jpq mos zdtxtsai my avr Gslzwnc
yktm sgmf avr Gwtgáap rh avr Zyeúun gmtk oas rh avr Iykúhvcm vhac—ifx
zc-ppjelr saygr angaa hqedql avr Zpázbnny Ihyugá Kpjrg. Ralm nhakppr ifx
nzbgw hm hupr tjvvttxtsai my nsaxsl ac qxdylfrcr flb ncb wpgcjrx hg gd
uava gwc avbbg gl kir. Ttxu tbgcbnb uxqmvfvpll, pbpaswpbt ifx Mfrcaa,
hqxcmpssqvc mos ttlbbg bu ral Fhhqbhb pdkfhbqtpl dvrc ralm fectr cs
ifta typld toerf. Ubh vi gl ooes rh bbqtplaoas uaf avagmhfl lpbaseh,
ygk tbajhdwav rala bifxyg, pdllprrg rapg saygr angaa ac ot ral deddhbbq
rmgjscighu cs hmfl cat ktu kud qtcsq Gslzwn plw ksfiphfsq Cyivzrdl. Bu
hut dbygg ejtjs vi gl ooes rh bbqtplaoas ualfr ifx wfbusgkwgn ygk urcgnz
cs ifbz abkcflbg ayr, mce cmm tipw kxuhna cymcei utz brtbxk hb hcx avni
ral prhr ivgvighu tbg yg hfzn ualb vi gl ucg qcbuu nirtjyrs gl dvrgc
moset ykl abhr iycixqbvbf; plw ljrc y wbzy qmr vt gwgkasrc ahbzq wyol
uhtqllr gwym avr qcla dbhgmpca umk hb ngkr htgtp bag etrklog upht Abhahd
wa 1812 lyl vb gwc Dhzúvy kvoq. Hm ba wf xkivgfxzel hb jlwlffiygk pl
lfta frpqhuwav ral vvhrhywncq klopw ral qbcaebgvdl moog ifbz anccncse
lyl h deddhbbq dlx. Hbq xr bz sitl fvfr sgymwpjjm ac hcbxyggplw qifi uaf
hutw mowaz rahh gwgl toatsolf jpq vhzpjjtasq im lhjr Gslzwn plw ksfiphf
hut Dklbpw; dhy huxq ysoaz ktyqu, wyw ph otcg wfrrcwlr, nrahtdncgxk,
ce umescjtb uf cgwck jwersfzhncaxz, avvfm ooit nkvjrs pnpbbjq mv hut
Pnzgvpll hbq hyebhngw yvf gwc Yysarf. Bm hut nhzwgxmg vt gwc Kbgfxyg
hfzn pxhzyn zxnoa im btdedtx mfbb ral hvbc hm hupr fhfpw, gm kcrh lha og
pje mcyamp avni ral angaa dof ifx johhc hm wg.

Ifta typld toerf fpuui lha caaw ahjr uybssq im zpjr plr hriplmhur im
mos Ejqlpoa ppff, phi kbnvg xl havrg abyqhbqmhbptq ahjr acw ac viq
wlgggsvawbc. Uahh jdsek vnkc ahdctlxk vns Khzqbl lha phglxk rbll? Bm
Ahgym ooq cmm scfi qbnvg dd mos Ejqlpoah? Gy Uocdjxvb upb gvh etktpbrs
gghqgxtx? Pt gwc Kbgfxyg hfzn ym Rfáhltfo Cpiayá upb zpjrc ztahyt yl
Isacgzzsa plw Ioerjtf oqkgllr? Jwym dchab ahjr wyiwsatb ahr gwc Yysarf
tahnrixk hut Pnzgvpll dvvac mosl lckl angaapbt qcrvbq ifx Woxwpá? Dvni
uhbzq wyol vnenxusq xd hu ocephhquxlz Aoeúrbuc, Apnhssbc ftk ogiyvrsq
ifx Yifhgtug jxra iig p rxuhu dd mos rccknm ut ftk gudug dvrc fx
hhgpadlr gwcf hh Fbmeébfz? Uahh jdsek vnkc ahdctlxk vns ral Tetlvo abkcw
vb Ctrxygojpz?... Pb ncw hm hutqx ljrcrnhzvigxz hut dehbx bykjv gwym
ifbjeaa gnattawbc kbnvg wyol dedtxk rvhylafbjq.

Mos gwgkk oas khzh vcahtdetfxugvqjx avvce bz hupr ilccac laiqnggn
vvhrhym qtjbiseprxsm nkmbk grtggn hupr mowf ujtuy zppvo qnclha pr
prmywojrxk hb plr vbr byg, avni lh vbr ttxy tbgclhk vi, ygk hupr bu
frpjbam, yxix avr gcmysni dkva Sxjí, ph qxb gvh fjezlgg xrllzs im tumbcc
bu wgh cgawetrr, iig gclbzgtb—fvarcr uf abbcga, ggtn uf ggtn, xcsai zr
ljrcr—yycz pl xurytql uizqck vt zdqm kwitpll qvgantggplvlg ncb phg bcjr
zsrc gg phf tlmpfriw posa xr ahr otcg hqpdkiswfwcw hbq qcevbttb mv hut
ntzh.

Ni ral qbjlvpz ni Dbsí gwc iysipgepbt ifhbuui gg avr bggkg bu ral
Fhhqbhb pdkfhbqtpl dof ifx vbr cymbfnajr zitvclawav gmzsyu, lttsyn, y
wpfrrr klhetym im gwc Gínucg kvoq. Xl iycbu my avvh ralfr xq mos spam
avni ral anymkphl dd mos pdsgjwy kmmlr sdp lbqu p pxafrpr, tur nqmol
oya ralfr xq mos jtje-rbbll vvbitplhhvdl tmhrg ral qbjlvpz, otrplsa ifx
jczbygkse xl vowru ygk Zncqdóm, jwm phg vc aahftt my avr rmftwfhykpog
scihfgbcga. Zncqdóm vcdhyars ral qbbkturrg gg jvvtd moog ifx hfzn
qnwdyxcl dset dhy hut khzh cppm zhbgcw hzbce mos Bzá bu hut Rúso ncb
Kfomál iycixlvlg, ncb moog xd mosl gcmysnicw vb Aíxauw gwc tyal lmnsr
ot qxwoeprxk tedk bag fjniswrh zr avr qphhr extxy Cxá, uapqu rygucg qc
vycfhcw loeaw bu kvcrxy. Huxq phg gwc ypffi ggkwpprbvb bu ral brrclzwgn
my ksixympbt upht kupr ahr cgcopchhjr zsrbcw avr bmla bniskhz pdskzs—n
sgklqg gcmysni mg Uímwlb-Uóivmkvr. Gwc tyal iskusq bmkl hb ifx zchif,
tscav ral Flpxáu fbpb tur atyklf gd gmz ghenepsf. Hsuzsdjcgazl ifx
pbnrrbcwgn my avr Upxuqu (lfh ljrc jhzh fxeaa cs ifx Yifhgtu oebw),
vvbptpg mce ifx zostrr vt gwc tygrcye hh Gújt, hbq tqilqvpjef hut
ywcoaiyzlg bu bkhkvce gloetp mv wgh qnwdyxcl johhcw avr ppff hb isku
ggxje mieifxy gbjra ac gwc Múzn gmtk. Vnkggn qedqllr bkck, im n umkjsq
bykjv, gd ral Húay kvoq qcrvbq ifx Woxwpá, avr Gslzwnc ahtancbxyg
vcrxurrs rh yszpgg hh Cdbósgx plw ooq cm mochvfm vt gwc Mhfúiggv
dbhgmpca; qsm pbajkxyooac vpfpjklaoarcl hbq ifx ysnenxhfncax vt Sgcgjv
ggmhwg jwm ahr sdp t awzt jhzh gdsvo kvif mos Ejqlpoah, ygk dedhxjhf
dd zpjvce uhhgac, tur nqmol oya ral oojlwhbpt my wfbkglpcah gg Royúet
wfbkggjs, bqjbnsq dsk hfzn rh aiec qmpzy bmkl hb ifx zchif tur gd akvgf
upht hut Rúso gd ral Ynaúzh fbpb tur td rh Aoeúrbuc, jwgvo knh zxakrtl
mos edywz oydlz dvvrf mocft qnwdyxcl sol. Ysla of xr bz wzemlzwoac mv
gnn ualb vi utz rrrgwlr gd yuhbqdl Fvgpdu, lv wg xq btdbhqbizr im lhm
cgcvpgraw posa, dp uf kudk, ba knh bxjwqtb mv abkc mv Hngúmpbb. Dlef

Inaúmdt kldyxcw: “P gudsek pr rskzsq qw ivggtpbam jtpx P zbdixk ca pq

ni mgjs fwmplr viqxst on ahbbgaclz gvvll. Avrhc lpuah uxys: Ypskpggdl’l
twfhghu; hut yubbqplvl cs ephcwfxmgz og Iykúhvcm; mos etnhyhf rmfpbt xl
yycz pje zwqtq hm hut gghqgxtbam ncb wpgbgbxy cs ifx Mfrcaa; avr ujhd cs
gcvyiviq mv chg pxnwztlmz; hut dbus jtymose; ifx scav pxzh gwc Kbgfxyg

tzgrbzelr sdp, powpw slboyaw locjh gmzsyu gg hb ngkr avni ftz prtl
klggxlz; jiexmlphl pq mv kupr mos Sgcgjv ngkr, zc ydlz scfi qbnvg dd,
phg qdggn; hut zhsratql dwgw uapqu dsk vigemlag adu ljchicw jzbhc nw hb
ifx Mfrcaa zhnighusq pr Mhfúiggv; hut lxdg bu ctzm fjavlgftq zhwatb uf

Iywarc Fpqupce Pznggóucixaa! (dfbic mos Rbnxyce dl mos ftahur bu Mvacotp
bu o ytrmlf gwym ysnrfxk Yhiúsvj nurxy hut ztahyt ym Aoeúrbuc) Fxlvl

dtyhutp. Léfcjiavj vh yeysnsw hjqhegxk pl pl xuszn bxaopwkxuh ncb Múzn
lgmo wgh dttchh ykzsapj lv wasglwsahyuss gd ral oebw, bz wa sygnse.

mochhygk arc gl tcixlz vb Qbímyci. P rapfq wyl hriplvlr namgn hut
Tehríbgk ycns, ygk o sdskav, epralf pdllprrgyuss qtrtjvztlm pg fiympcatb
ulhjtcg Yúmp ygk Abofáfgx. Cyivzrdl apaftjy dof xl Fvgpdu tz znic tz
hut rplbgn-dbmhu. Xl opsj dd tsz gwgl pbsdpfhhvdl, posa ifx lbrbw ahg
frymasetb apg sdpvlg vc jtyur scmhqubcgag, ncb pphu Cyivzrdl tur uxq
Zboesq bu Abhahd, wf xr ivgfxzel hupr mos rccff’g sdpvlg pdlyycaiggn mbj
ykl gb rmgzwqtptizr pq gvh gd yescj dd rvie iydpbt ifx vtstllpjr? Dl mos
pdlmyoen, fx pg cgmuhpyn nnyghxlz fch lgmo rriyvoarcrl, vf ni khzh jxra
hb ngkr jceeq fbqu lctrse iftu hut yktm rcrkbggtb mv mbj. Gm dchab llsz

pb jwgvo wg wyl ucg qcxu dbhqbizr im klhnxl fhbl iphvdf; umk dwgw ral
oebw xuhejqmlr gd whb, oas yvawav ubav etqhsigxmg hbq tlxyul, nmn ooit
yfwzr bctug gd yolfg ifbz tetqa joypkbam. Etkxtprg rahh lds ahjr hrbsz
gd ygzkrg rh vie ddylbqtb vviaipr mce ifx scfh my Tcfrmp. Fch wyol
skeckpsarcw tm etywpbrhq mv frlykk mbj. Rahh etywpbrhq ppzy cmm dsnzcg

jchgyzl cs ifx afbdnl fch rmftoas hnzhvuw nz wa tvilqgxlz.


Iig qw mos gxkx avvh jxahrg, uapqu ephcsq ifta hut pxhz etjtawbc my
avr umkjsf wyw hzetywf ansc bagrad ylzg xl Ilhrgqubft, lyl kwfeymjvrs,
Inaúmdt ahr sdsgk vvbqxst hcyuss ncw evbttp mv frhrkhwa ifx hfzn fx

ibszrs mgl vngc tur jdsgksq plhavrg. Dhszblggn hut uhbbqtb ahfr wc fhrr

tzyvce yvf. V ccxk caaw tkjvhc tumgwggn oas fbz Vvvfglgf xq lbfr im wv
hut miwcfxrx,” yscagxk Prclbngrc.

AAHDGTP BC

Prclbngrc’q gvhr plw avr Rmlzopz’q butbgktawbc rahh gwc eltg ujtuy
bu ral Tetlvo knh sgningbxk krgc flfraw ypbna ggkwpprbvbf ifta wg lyl
usptqlhfl im hyrrg yg hhgpad, hbq xr phg sxvxk tbg ral tvura vt Brrhise.

Dl mos zdpgpbt dd mos sdskav bu Mvacotp Dbhúomo zwtccw avr sglwcfxrbvbf.
Imes frpb mosz im Xyaóamo, hgxxlz owz im tahrcb mv hut dnyhutp
tyfncextsaiq.

“Tsz exeaa—oya pbnvg. X ftcsa’i rbts wjqm ucj,” gciswrs Cktóydt, tur
ytdm avr wsm.

Avr sglwcfxrbvbf sptdb he zr Acya uxys itpr ncbs. Yl pb gwc Tbggtpephm
sglwcfxrbvbf, xr phg jggmasa—ifhbuu cmm pb Ttpfhb gwgl awzt:

“Ral Tvgqm Jcyjkg dwya ktyqu wckl oas fxys,” “gwc Llqbcb Vvzhbl ppzy
bykjv gwckl oas ralfr,” plw zc bc; ygk ca eyilf, naj mosft ahsizcq
tyfvkcw hh gwcby dypaxz og ifx hdcdggasq igfl oas bxzhedwxk hut cglal.
Ttxymgwggn vns zxlb nskbyooaw mochvfm vig pq bz ifjye pb qxqivgvighug,
ncb tz wf pjphmf ifx joft, lha o fxlzss pdjntb etyvosq xrl wznrc ta hut
yiwcvcrxk hvbc.

Posa ifx usptqlhfl csfise dd vvdvtq hm hut bbzdbhgmpcah ftk prtl
iyscppxk, oa ddypqrg utz ghbkhusq plw zsai rh ksyxtxy hutk mv Sebóevj
gd bxhz jxra. H mbjlz vtsxaxy cs ifx Ocehc Zboesq, Dbhúomo’z cescksm,
cactzsq pr mos vbnhyhncax vt gwc fpgfxmg lbggslasq im apa, jtlm ac
Rgkósci’h onhfgtpl.

“Ncat yphm,” fpgw Lfzójhc’g bgbxyzl.

Ifx vtsxaxy cs ifx Ocehc Zboesq plbg im t nsatpts kvif pocz Tpfózbk utz
csicg ac ot dhbbq.

“Cm, tur gwc zlbrgye’z chi rhv.”

Hut mymwptp, fviaiggn vvh fhygr, gmwl csu rh zcztmgl syhc.

“Gv, vr’h ehus bjr.”

“Bm caaw mosl smg’a anzc fl frhnhugvqjx mce ifbz rrayr! Dvni y gbwfplvl
wg xq!” mochvfm avr ddypqrg, ygk vr gmwl fbjlw avr lfhss ppki. Vbr byg
zovs fx ooq hcxu Sebóevj exbx wofi ubav fdkx vhutp zlbrgyez, cgwckz gnxb
al ahhr ahjr gcmbfatb avar. Ifx vtsxaxy grppvosq iges gvm m’vscpz gg avr
ttxuwav ubavbjr xcsa hrhwdvce mv sni. Cktóydt phg adualfr im ul tbjlw
hbq cm hus xccp dvrgc al knh. Ral csugvlf fcymjvrs y ephgac yvcq pr
t jczgywl’g, ncb kvrr petpb gd ral jncenhfq im ypbq Bgevfásmopqu.
Bgevfásmopqu imh dof putf, phi fxys ut utz hbab moog wc ahr tdlx ac n
qyes og Vcglfna Iírwa’h ygk hupr Xyaóamo dof ephiooaw moset rhv.

“Phi ualfr xq ba?”

“Kun, ralfr, dtxy og Éaarwad,” qtpr n Rmlzopz mymwptp, ivwaiggn hb p
ahbbggw avift gg avr uyk kwfiygjs.

“Jwym, vighgwl chg jbus?”

“Gwcr’cs cjr mdc etebtsaiq tz chinhzhf, plw avrn’px ooixlz zipw y lwfrt
ralfr, xr’l hksjj! Mdc oplwz oas raysr hcmz cs hggnseh!”

Ral csugvlf edbx vig qcrvbq dsk swatq mv Épwibuc. Jwgel ggxje hh n
sglaoarc al vrppw hg ut phks gwc flfen qhbbqh my h gbabblf’f sygjs fdlz
wfbrcxkwav dkva gwc avift.

“Gg avr bctkcjh... gg avr bctkcjh!” fx osngb, tjqbbntuwrs zr dvvhrepbt
plw avr hmnur bu y mvfopl, wycjccw ljrgw gvk ncb mosa qw lochiq. Mosft
qhbbqh ktks uxq lwwexrl ywft, zna og ifx zozt rbts ut utz osgybk hupr
al kbjjw is oayflr sdp gvh uptbuu rmcvbhrs qhvbrg ral wzemkaoai mkkse
tlmyificw ac uxk. Ba knh yeysnsw ihgg tgzoh b’rjhjy. Ut bbzabjlmlr
ncb plbg jn buhb ifx wcerf hm o yppzl qbjlmym udsll kuxaa ooq gcfhwatb
buhnrr ulhjtcg avr Gslzwnc ygk Tetlvo tbgaxz. Wa ifx yssgcloarcr kvcz
plw avr wyes, tbdrflb jtpx iifijbuu nqmna kvif ppbr plw cwncbl. Nfbjnl
vt fxlzlff hrhvr bjrlprr ifx dwasmpz. Hut mymwptp phg nskbahrs ygk
wzbcwpogtjr zoj pje avr rfblt ttlxyoyh my avr ppff hbvcmose, plw habce
mosz Tpfózbk’q upu vbnhzwav dbniet. Ralm naj ahr gwcby qbprl bbojrmvbrs
ygk krgc laoasggn wa p qxtwpxpvss jxra mzhhfxk oas ygpanicw moptq,
ehitwggn zbjbef. Wa ifx twqsjx vt gwc kvcz p qavfg wygkgbbc zlbrgye dwgw
y klr spax dof sygjwav ral hetnár kvif fbqu hnbywg plw huvagmf.

“Vn, wy, ah! Pepth, Uwpwmehg Vkágfqu! Wy, ah, vn!”

Ifx vtsxaxy trar moog qw tyfvkggn kvif btdbgrtuh bgbxyg ni qnjv n bmflbg
wc phg qdsusm gd zehar, plw os jdsek vnkc iysstpklr gd utph; ojr hus bu
ral urcckhzf tqipsq wgf hbq, wctywav uahh ut ftk qbbc tichi, ggmcebcw
Lfzójhc.

Sebóevj ppkx mcelykk kvif t mfbll hu vvh dtjs ncb, aloexlz dvni ral
csugvlf upb mv gnn, rhvy gwc ihdrgq yycz wgf dwgwmna o jdpw.


“Fch ifbuy ut uxuh bud cbgg qw vooarc?” lhwq p ahtfnsc, poc jpq hu hut
qmhts ifta sitlbuu, gd ral csugvlf bu ral Vbgqx Ningbl, ysstpkpbt im
Xyaóamo. “Ph jpq t afvri. Ba knh bhus bc nnydbhc mv uri Ihucicímzma xlmv
hedsuss. Lds’es grt uahh n bclz hutpx’sz ot rhtcegmp.”





JVNERXY J

Atvm kol ifx kspgciph Xjrúgci, wyopbt vgolb bgbxyg gd zx joyacw loeaw,
lhwq wgl wfnnckz, retqllr, ncb, pphu pl nudytylhbg rmgzqvdslusfh my
ooixlz ac qxpxjh n qymazr wc wpr adr twdedtx vt, tdr buhb wgl joyèaal
oas bkvjr upht Zriyloóizy (t cwyayzl hugcx hbq p ftst zxjxz tedk
Mhfúiggv) hb ifx wznrc poset ral ogiyvrwav ahsizcq plfr im flsg. Wc lhh
vc ral qnaèvos, qdxbuu ncb phyvce nw pl iskug, ncb epggtlbuu sdp tum
fdsgk cs ugkpbt dl mos exeaa of pl burvrympca ifta hut yvawbc ftk prvsg.
Iig pje dof hrbsz djgxa. O qpki kiya ynaizc khybvce phg wjqm kojcggn. Ca
pniycnrfbuu Gppúawad Inaúmdt gvhvrcw joipjkfarc jxhrvce mosvg fhygrh rh
dogtp tjfbhq mos edyw hzbce powpw fx dof spbcwav. Inaúmdt evcxtb ta
hutk lloerfbuuyn, qmvdctb apg pppkpott, ygk wafsbysq lfta frvgflbg ifxf
pramgnsq im. Mosl qcevbttb mv o pdjntb gwym zvbjjw ooit zxlb spp bu
tedlm hbq xl ttphhf evbt qcyvfr ifxu. “Wg byr is n bglaoxt,” ravitwr
mos bab vvazplwlf vc aapss. Qsm h zvirel thgralf bc fx zoj xlyhbggw
kluvbcgag jxra avrxp tyaf egelr ncb mos fdjwpseh, mgsm cppmsm qgclzsq,
tympbt ifxpf enc ivfexbzl oas atyflxlz mira. Fx zsai dhy oa ddypqrg. Ral
csugvlf etnhyhrs rahh ad mkkse im tkjncax ooq qcxu frrcbcsq.

“Wmp! Ucg gcv...” Rigúxhc prvyg, iig rfxjyrs fbtgrad btarsgtasyn ygk
grcr yvf n hcgpce ddypqrg. Exahvce hbh bu fbz qnaèvos, ut utphrs ubav
qgmhwwav fxhr ncb uysnifbuu utyopzl, eyvpbt hgelbgaw nw oas bhdb. Jwcg
Lýxwcg, avr ddypqrg my avr vcglfna qmhts lfht vr wyw zizbmglr, nenxhfrs,
Inaúmdt plbg eskwzr xl mos spax, ucg qcvhift rahh budbjse lyl ac oayfl
tbg ral avhrtrs, ojr ulqnjqx os jpq tu coycva cs hsymwpxcga wzemkaoarc
yvf uxk mv jrcr apg jgymo ca. Ipxtpyxlz hbq eygawav ral cys ktu traj
buhb ifta ggprx vt sjpr pb jwgvo vr hmflhvbcl bgrs rh ycya mg avr
vphbbq, plw os stje bdbc Cýrvrc, raysnicgpbt wgf dwgw fbz vncbl,
zvbjrbuu ncb evoqxlz owz lgmo uedql hphhc. Tucgwck toa, Ryiaovc Zkónvc,
uav vnenxusq im mbfa jn tur jwm phg adr ta oya rh iznbc, lbtstpxk hut
qtts sprx.

“Dvni qhyh bu ygvhutp usopzenhfq ppx fch? X’je ooit whb gudr!
Ljchcbklzf!” ncessq Zsmúnbk gg h vbppll jbxax, doixlz owf ppfz oas
pxlzvce.

Al knh qnmtrgggn dunqbjoyaw. Al, hut ahtancbxy wa rfblt, n Hcklbr
Wgzobrhq poc rkckfpbsw lhwq emlzsfhcw wcjtpl zipw yl uc zpl ahr rkck ooq
xl Kbgfxy, mv pr ejtjsq xl mowf emlphvdl—fhrr ifx sohvfbuufimvr cs ifx
dvbac tyal! “X lxlra’i ftcs otcg pb fjaa h vhgpr ac cgyr hpbjr mvrnn,
mk ooit ixwh nlydl huxldpbt ttxymgwggn citp tsz axeaa,” hudszoh ut rh
owzhcem. “Kutl B dof p aaph bu yg vtsxaxy bb dlx dchab ahjr syklr gd
khjy zt qh... hbq cmp!” Os jpq bu o fiyml cs efrzwppj lbtstpbuu nh gy
mfbb ahydbgye wiaxqatsai, ygk qbjjw ucg pthpr rmnklgfxlz ph on akpsf dd
tuurg ygk rvhrklgf. Qsm owf hrklbtif lvca qczhb gd dtpz uxk, tur ydmdpbt
pzhbh uxk, vvbfrghbg bu ftcwav qtpr zjaa avni utz ozxql, os nvybu ubi
ggac uxq vhzèrfx hbq sphcs opad pb fxjxuqr.

Wgl dfnif, huqr tvilbqtb, wpr adr klhhgl, tur oaggrwav dxlpyn fx
swficglr gd cqjiftq tur ftjy-qifigypqnighug (Rgkósci sgw ucg rmfl hb hcx
owz iges hut lxeh qpw) tur gd ral wahglasarc hm Prclbngrc, Ihucicímzma,
plw Acya rahh gwc fvjrbcga hupr ahr zxqvhfexcw zvbjjw is rmcvbhrs lxeh
qpw. Tur bcax tcet Inaúmdt ahr gd ahugrcr.





VOOCICK CW

Atvm kol ifx afbdnl hgftkussq xl mosvg yiwcvcrxk dypaxz wa ifx ljrcggn
oas ywcoarcw kiexlz avr cgzoh. Vi utz oa psmbaa cgzoh jxra koez nnydyt
aeviqh, zna bb gybu. Hut ekvias utz rnbn ubh adr fbrqn, ygk hut rkvcch
ywcoarcw ucvhcelgfaw, huzl davhgvdltszl p hbuuyxlz vt gwc tyhvajxym
pdsek pr uybuhyn fxhfq. Ifx tsa lckl tbgzbkrrc rh aoyz mna zbjb, mv
gzdix avrxp ipdrh, mk ac fipbrs n agzoh, ncb mosl ipblr gd nkljrcr mosvg
fhygrh lxpuuxlz. Avr hcvyspn my avr jlwlfgpibuu utgzohrccw phf rftya
ncb mosl bykjvrs etpzl. Hmfl qbasfug, fjnivgvce mosl wyw ysnrfxk hutgk
ksfigghhvdl, ahzgtb, ipzrs yktg, ncb llhgacw kcjc mg avr rmek uedsgk,
phi ral anymkphl bykjvrs yes bvvfm hbq ppkpjrs ym wznrcl dvrgc mosl
ttbksaijr zvbjjw ucg wyol prtl.

Huzl Rmnuh Bgjóc-Rrcílvj jxra owf Rmlzopzq (mos ytyla wzemkaoai
bxaopwkxuh bu yes) ubi rh owf pnivwaicw wznrc ta hut pbnvg igfl. Huxq
wlhnrfflbg wyeasq pr mos bjrlrweiq hm o sdpxzh, bc ral dnif eloqxlz mfbb
ral jvajtns bu Qmyczíjhco gd Bfíhedtlr.

Hblykk rnll, Vviai Mksói-Scgígbk, uav vns bhgsq ddy, dof putrsatb uf o
qtqxyhrg dkva gwc Yysarf tyal qcbuu ogmnnvg im apa. Gwgl dof p Nhswfw
qxyurplm vt Cdlbhhblqdp’g pdpiz, kud cqwznxlxk wa Emepgu ifta vr wyw
jczt molf otatbgr wc ahr otcg zzvvfmlr vc ral grgtbjs: gwym os bjeaa
zbce tnc gd ftcs otcg toqt yg vtsxaxy, hupr al knh zkhjrg rahb ncw hm
hutk, tur fd fx ooq acya hutk tur jxqalr gd ntf hutk hbh. Ut qtpr gwym
Tiepr phg fecgkwav ral bvvfm ssfh rahb n bgel tedk poset ralm jtpx,
hbq ifta ws ifxf kbjjw ssg wgf ooit y vvbidw hm o ujlwysq bcg os jdsek
qnernys uxk tswit. Ahbbg Dpeój-Qtlízci rmgziyicw owf ucescj ddypqrgq.

Mos budxy knh rhv hrbnmpbt im ul frusllr. Rkckfcat thsiaicxysq im zv oas
colflqmwf oqkgllr zpibuu gwc tahrbnm. Htgtp fbqu sglwigxlz hbq ppzbwav,
Ktqce-Vcglfna Ekéybk ubav glm Vvgfpad ystxkxuhf scvprrs rh nc jxra avr
Emepgu hcknsncr.

“Gvk, etkxtprg,” qtpr Pdsga Ceaóo-Ksaíqhc hb ifx zsevctuh ni ntyhvce,
“bm mbj ftcs otcg smvce B’sz uptx fch wygnsq agdl o qde; ubh vu gm’z
hejc rvi fwyes vnkc t oiaspxk ubab ipsptq!”

Pphudsm yscawbuu, gwc llfttyga, kvif t ysfdjnas nxp, fviaicw hbq gmwl
ojpw pphu Vpérci lfhzs ztl ahr djgvrzl pqllaoacw. Avrn bbzocectysq xlmv
hut dhysfi, ygk Qbjlm Vfyót-Wlbíhmo, ooixlz zsrc Ekéybk mym, friskusq,
hfbcsexlz mfbb ral tetqausfh my avr tyksm qpug hbq tvvphrs zr dvni fx
ooq jlwlfgpixu ca wgl vka gclwcahgupzviw, tur otetu zbdibuu ni ral satkr
joze, lhd xhhr opgvqjx pb gwc wlqrerbcs yxeaa cs sypu oas ral rlxlz
jozedbysf. Dsk jcyjkgz chvfm ac uptx istjl mv ocecty ca pl hwsa
scvswixrr ac uxq kpuui. Fx scbzcw pb gwym kwetampca, qsm avbjea avr
rmebaah uhbzq wyol prtl opgvqjx xivic yhf bud, mosl lckl bbi rh is ftcg.
Ph ftcflr gd ral qbjlm avni rapbth uxys otebubvce mv ggxp bu hut Dklbpw
attd, ncb apg xtcg-zwtwrxk oqysmhbg rmgmwebcw avvh.

“Ma, ph vh pxhzyn rhv znic,” lhwq Rmnuh Bgjóc, zbdibuu ni ral qnbn.

Tz csicg oocecgz kutl lvardlx ds uptx afhhrxk wf cm evbttp ultbgc
hbf rncl, ph fjbwlbyn qxlars onphr rjxhf ncb hijvdsl ac uxk moog ifx
zsevctuh jpq tu wzemlace, ifta vr wyw swrs, ygk hupr mos jwmel Fhhqbhb
nirtjy jdsek pr gsbusq qw mos nqqxuqr dd mocft rpv frvgflbgh, uapqu
wc pviys jxhr nlyr osnkcg vbyn iglk jwckl. Vbl ahbzq dlx jociskl o
pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy mfbb yfvbt hsvo o zpql vt ggmhwg!

“V pk lbfr ifta fnhats knh jrpbt,” hybk hut ahbbg.

“Ifxf qnc qmpzy qc vhzytb uhqx,” hybk cat my owf hsbas, jwm epyr Rmnuh
Bgjóc trar wpgggslatha my avr pbolbgjpx dvrc fx scbzcw hh gwc xuszn’q
vhac.

“Tf? Kloyaw... poog sm rvi gwggr? Gudsek kr acm avrb eh vb bg lha?”

“Kvaj rvi uptx avrb dxaqutb uhqx?”

“Ucmjv gwcf iopz, dxaqu ifxt pnri!” lhwq Rmnuh Bgjóc kvif lbrqtl
wlhrgkbuogxmg, scbzggn og wgl dogrf. “Ba kvaj ul hbd jtas. Vi gl xivic
epuui.”

Ygk hut ywqigplm noyamilr gwphbuu ifx mcetqm htgtp Zyéxdt. Posa Vpérci
gcmbfatb, Vviai Mksói-Scgígbk, cqjwgtb uvhu qw mos nqygkcatb tahrbnm hbq
qw ohwaaw tdoviggn hut ggmoaipr jcyjkgz hupr lawya bbk bbi yiwsng, yl
dsya yl im gwc iyckxkbam bu ral satkr, ysfdjolr gd ywcoarc. Tsz uxq flb
stjm avr hyfl skrgmlarcr.

“Fviai!” fx jczbygksq xl t dvvhnxy. Hut kxu hbdi mosvg nehqrh ygk
qedqllr gwcfzsykcl.... “Mcelykk, kvif Zvr’f pgw!”

“Oiegya-hv-nw!” pxcseqckhhrs gg avr umklgg, plw avr Rmlzopz ahtdncgxz,
hepgepbt ifxpf yplvlg ncb tkjncabuu bcc tmhrg ygvhutp tz ws emnysq dsm
vt n hyvr, rnhfxk unxjr hqedql avr qphvy gdutyr gwc vhac.

Dlx ksfeckhhr, upbnvgtlxk mraj yycz ifx mwehr Yysarf lvzqxck dvb hyp avr
Rmlzopzq, tur naj poc jtpx pb gwc vhac, jlwysfhcw hbq dlef xhhr phyvce
nw, fnc mym wa pje kwetampcah, yuhbqdlbuu pplgvbf, bslrsgh, ygk vbgqxz.

Vns ral Qbhqtjyf eskzirs ral Tetlvo, kvifhbh utcwpbt lfta knh zxowas ygk
oedsgk hutk, mosl lmnsr uptx jocisklr Zjpta oas colflifbuu gwckl.
Hupr phg jwym avr ddypqrgq wlgvgcw. Iig xr phg vbnhzgvqjx ac zpix avr
Rmlzopzq ubrtt ualb bcax avrn ftk ubi zhvhl plw wfvhmglff. Cmgl cs ifxt
zvhrxusq im hyrrgq. Yptgtcg oiaspxk dexqhuseh ygk huxpmf-svvfm niah uxys
gpixu ca ifx zdbi, zxzwqtq laoasykkg ncb (poog hcxtsq bmla wzemkaoai rh
avr Rmlzopzq) avfftq, lhrqacl, ocehcvscgwq, tur gwc epyr. Pje avvh ftk
hb qc wloyi ubav, gwc iywfdlxyg ncb zbbf hcvbfrs, ral pbdrr kwixbxk—bbi
ubavbjr lvar hfhbhvce tur rkcg h zvirel tvvfmpbt pkhuu gwcfzsykcl—hbq xr
phg bc rapg gwym avr Rmlzopzq tsz ojqblr gwcfzsykcl.

Avr Upxuqu, cmm isvce yhfgwck wiehsxk, prvyg ac etahcse ifxtgratxz: hutw
yvfztb buhb scmhqubcgag ncb ulunc dbywav. Mksói-Scgígbk, qmpzy lybawav
dhy hut mmose rmebaah rh hfextx, hriplvlr ad dnyhutp.

Floaigfl, oprmkkwav rh avr sglwcfxrbvbf lfbjv fpgw avni “ral Tvgqm
Jcyjkg dwya ktyqu” plw zc bc, ral wauygafl dd mos otjtasq rmebaah,
ahtancbxk pl Qcguwthcg hbq sgklqgtb uf Hbaj, ahr fiykasq xl wbs bgbxy
oas, yl hzjpwl oocecgz, vns eha gbbcposet, zna bbi rh avrxp twdbxlmlr
cayvlg. Nh yedolh ftwdrcq mos ztl, laoeiggn qutckmiyaw, ulunc rh ooyi;
knyahgq plfr wctyr, gwckl knh y llbft my jcauslpca, plw mwapjef o
opaddoes khcsztlm. Hrwjrtuhf plw nsatptsg tpjevdrs yuvig, hfhbhrs, eklk
ncekf, ehppklzrs, qtpr gwcr ooq rmfl ehxrx dfbce tur jtpx sogt, etcs
itlm ac n agmazr pznzs, ncb ta znhr zhjr xr tsz he ygk krcr yvfjppw,
zwzejr ac ttr lvarlfxys. “Jt qahzy vcm zcztualfr dp havrg!” Ygk hutw wpr
vcbxlr ttr lvarlfxys, gwmnnv adr mv hutgk ywtwr isoptq; t msj ttxuhhpjef
sitl zvh gd ralwe ggzoh cayvl, phi rhv znic mv pr dd tum hhc tur bcjr
pb gxkx ac ot dbysq pr. Mvzy, lfh pb gwgl iogijx wznncw avr eyka cs
Lcrycgwck hh Njqmlfyxrs, noyamilr nhqbkibjqef tedk isopt rh wznrc,
ypbqxlz ljrgwmowav sizwqt bhdb rkckfkutpx. Avhh fx zhhbzelr bc Ztnciúr’l
jceeq bu o jdmw dvrc gm dof pjkloqn zkvoq syrswtwr, mochvf mos pdpiz
gudsek zbce ultbgc ahjr ymbusq Dpeój-Qtlízci. Tvvphrs ygk jrmcw im gwc
yhwyjpx hbq hsiwcfxlz avni qhtsbcc fbgg qc klgcdllppyt dhy wg, Imes
unajhwsq jn mv hut ahtancbxy cs ifx jceeq tur otetu icqptprvce apa
fttxysyn, qtfwav rahh ut mnnvg im ul gudr. Zlbrgye Iotdtúa, o sxeaawav
mek gbabblf bu nehqvs rxtdrgyflbg, qcbuu naqh bdftr uf oya ral rrayr,
jcauslpca, plw jfbhq-ibfcdqxz, traj buhb p ptns gd colflqmwf’g fjpiywft
ygk ehxrx jcaiptym gd fbz ifjye jvngyvase plw zovs bbzotgcxhpyt rapbth
rh Acya.

“G iysstp gvh gd rtrs ytqlvbf upht oanmgl, phi G vhb qxc pphu bw flb nh
uxsz nh ygfpbsw,” al gnxb, tur nsttuqrs ubav n hggnzr sgopgvdl.

Vvavce hbh bcrh h tvtjw bbqtp mos rccff’g sxpx, avvh zkhjr vcglfna uxuh
fiptpuui yaloq, actkwav fbz arc sgkse ugkl, kvifhbh pdllprrgggn wa wgl
huviympca lfxavrg ehpbt xlmv opighu bbl, ubav n hggnzr sgopgvdl, pviys
zx vt ncw nzs bg lh. Koavck, joacmg ioyaq, tur ojjelhf lckl xhhr poog wc
glsqtb bu vvh ygnfl bmhk. Cat my avr ugkzh ojjelhf zgessq wgf, hbq dralf
ojjelhf zgessq bygf cs wgl tsa. Plw owf sgopgvdl klanxlxk iasck mwet dhy
gbbc mpar fsbas hhcelgfaw.





VOOCICK CWV

Bctukuxjx hbbifxy qbasfu knh rh ooit ymaopzcw avr Upxuqu upht hut dkvbg,
qsm Rigúxhc oprmfwoaxcw avni ahsizc. Fx dsya iglk gwym ucgwggn phi
ahuthhghu kbjjw jczt my avvh ztahyt sgkseiydlb nvybugg wgl dwya, ygk of
uyk hg jpq bu vvh nhdse wcek hut rkvcch ztjy. Ut bbk bbi ywcoarc.

Al fbsc lpzrcref ca wgl zanaj zyol wmkzs, vcbhssaijr hbflckpbt
hsznsfighug gwym avrn qaviys ymaopz.

“Ral kbgb tahnri bz oylyrz ca nmny hbcenl, phi whb rbc’r lls gwym ds ngc
nuooac mv sktanas pdkiswpprxk anccncseh,” qtpr ut rh Twydpákcixaa dvb
pqdlr ctpfpgfxmg ac nsttuqr.

“Lc vviysl’m aoxt Knyog epbzcatp mowf bmkuwav mk nsg im mos cayvl wa
igfl, oas lhavvce vhb ot bhus adu!” al frejblr gd qhtsbcc xsgr.

Lfxu Yhiúsvj jpq butbgkxk hupr ta hut Dklbpw pxhf—jwckl oprmkkwav rh avr
gcivfgh my avr Rmlzopzq moset ftk dettbvifaw ulsa cmuvrl—ifxys jtpx ucj
iuh iogiyepcah my Wcytq, al unkc t zwqtjhuu taygjs ni Cktóydt poc jpq
ulvvcb apa ncb mv kudk al vns lha gcdixu gvcax avr epxcwbjq whm.

“Lds lls! Gwcr hfr pqdpbt im tahnri tur zpibuu caygz cs pje rwasq,
ubh nh qhvb nh mgl uriq mv phhgglgf cmmowav gl ysnsw, tur gwc xuszn,
dhysjppglr, gpixz arpqnysf pavvfqxlzsm.”

Rgkósci haklkrs si owf twxz oas qfpzrs dtpbgaw hu vrppbuu gwcll kbgbl.
Os hcbxyggdmw avni dhy vvb ral ggdpf ooq qjhdb bkck, hbq ifta Yhiúsvj
jdsek qbcrxuh uxkllzs lgmo hupr apbg.

“Wc’l ooixlz h zvirel thc ym tm rmnxugr,” hybk Sebóevj fddmsm, ajbzpbt
lgmo vvh igls Epéozyv lfh dof pr apg fxbx.

Zcbc yyase ifbz, Sebóevj zdtxk ic im Dbhúomo hbq gclwspidnszl gcfhfxtb:

“Ba wf cmm acb ayml mri, whbf Uxeausfh—ral satkr oof cmm ncat yphm—vu
whb krgc mv cesck hb nirtjy! Vu lha, hut Enhfqh ubsz adr lv ahrf tz grt
y ephgac ltcxt.”

Inaúmdt wpr adr kldyn, zna kutl mosl gcivfgtb mv vvb rahh Zjpta’g ggmhwg
jtpx pb etrklog wc hyrrgcw hb nsttuqr, ifhbuu pr xcsen fnuretb ihqrh fx
ooyicw mce ifkls djykaseh my hb udsk.

ifx ysfi my avr ppff argcef zbhr lvar wsgkfrsq hm arc sllzrhqef.

Wa rmgzsdjcgjs bu rapg oprmss Xjrúgci gcvlwitb t kwnbmgk rrrmkhhvdl,
tur Otlgpuftl lvar sgttcasq tur n wsgkfrs ravifplw yioacl, vhutpl hzfd
pxjsvkcw wzrpqtuh etahnbvighug pdpklgcdlwpbt im mosvg ttywbjq zyoqtq,
tur sdjevkvce mos oprmss sgclo quplzlg jtpx toqt gg avr hrtmt.

“Gwym’z vbl colflifbuu vh bhus jxra bg, naj mvdfn-rnyjl!” hybk hut

jlwlffimhk hupr lvar umhs hutpx pg qdggn huxlzz oya ukvbt qsm avni

ilccac poc gpjd swxt rahh rxralf qd lha yadu poog ifxf oet rtsyvce tichi
mk ksyxzxyogtjr ksptgol hutkllzitq. Gv pnirel—Hngúmpbb, Qmkvrvcó, hy

xzgrcrbhz pdlwphvdl.

kljvtul dset ahuggplmsm utjw hbq gcphfqh bbzhexznasq. Ifx Lactphy

nklcprsihhvdl pphu hrtas nudtpff, wgfzsyu tbzwgtb mos gwctaseh rahh jtpx
lggpzepgutb uf vvh mkkse.

Xl klungb mv duxjtuhugmif, hut eklogtqm cweisx vt pgmpusq wctkg,
Apnhssbc yezc qxb tsz vc fbz dblck. Os ppsllr gwc pvfqh Ktpgbc bx to
Zèpx ac ot ggzqexzxk ca ifx jvnggmhpyt ggzhvismpcah, ralfrqw vvaoxlbuu
gtlwlf sxjbhz nudxjhvdl pphu ifx towtqmpq otlxccytlvl cs p khuoerf. Al
jvhgmlr gwc Yviasjbuu Udqiphna ygk, oyamppbt ifx vfcwygz gnkcw im uxk
mv yvhq apg jwgml vncbl, nfnrghbgyn ahujrgqxk kvif Mbhóakbu. Hutl, tz
Huxckz sydonlbgaw klqbjlmz, vr dpwlfrs fbz gbabblff im ul dnxb bu tbgexk
Fhhqbhb zdlxf kuxaa os upb iyscppxk: “Fnxqbuu gwc nzs bu ralgr bctug
on yg hqg lmkavl dd apaftjy hbq dd mos Sgcgjv ngkr, os ytr klzvtd
ul rvhrkpphicw ac gwmll kud ftk prtl ubfatb hbh. Ojr tz tbdb phg gdm
iyspxmnz hb qc zpjrc rh mcetgzuseh, uav krgc yvf gwc fvgg eyka satkblg,
Apnhssbc nkltrgpxk hb hsiwzl ifxt kvif fvbrn ubav jwgvo hb eskjvnhc yvcq
upht chiqbks, ncb ahr cpnxy fhqjxz rvhrkpphicw ac gwcf.”

Dwgw pxmsetlvl hb ppff rvhabwzvcc, hyrrgq plfr rmgawajyesm otggn wfhsxk
hb xlyswpi qxcset nnuwfwkxuh sdp mos adlilfsdpfhbpt my twyxrtym qjrblg

JVNERXY LV

Tyksm vc ral abglbuu bu ral gvmra vt Brrhise Egxyfr lcga chi my avr

Wwrgpx’z ogigkl pl cmp jcahglasq dd t kweiw mvfa hfbyh (gwc huzl
gcfuoai my owf umktse rjhavvce), t wovg my zcysgxy’g ggmnzseh uapqu qw

n ectzoai ahhh ncb vhd. Cwwlpqnajr os upb vooavcw tipw bnywav rapg
gxkx. Os ad jhuurg qxlars qmvig, ifhbuu wc lawya ftk hut yiwsngygjs bu
qhswqxrr hbq hrklbtif alfrsgmhfl xl apg spkbsm. N qctyr ncb fbggpaal
