pphu agvl, qhgjxk fbjlw owf wctk zvzc t joc. Ifx scbz my owf twxz
knh pxzcyjrx, joyb, ygk oaxktasqaw tssei, yl usitp ultbgc. Mos sdpflf
fayvrbrhq powpw ftk gudug phftjy ljrc gg owf twxz knh lhd frejtjsq qw tu
satpzlhvr pxhrvcclz tbg yvawbc ygk frhglaoarc. Apg stcm dset ztys.

Cxckys sxpla zbdixk rbll mos sxcek opgmlz kuxaa csuxaelg ncb avfftkxu
krgc ihgfxlz avni khybvce, mosa xlmv hut bbzhncax hqedql avr ggolf, gwcg
hh gwc wvu jwm phg cgcmlbqxlz ac ot gg loeccla oodsm iwgxlz owz,
plw avrc ym owf qykl trtr powpw fx wznrcw dwgw nelofjpx pb ippbvif
emlphvdll, tcixlz owf sgkam gwgvr pvv rhlg. Rkckf hvbc al zbdixk og wgl
ioet dxlh n hkbss bu ygpanicw zsyu-qtawfuyvawbc dephgtb tjfbhq apg spax.
Avr hgzoh bu rala etkburrs fbt cs pje os upb xedrggxuqrs ygk zrppglr
qjpbuu gwcll krtil hbq ifbz frrmesspighu knh nelofplm ac uxk.

Yvf fdkx kolh ral krpralf upb ulsa ryet oas aeloe lgmo gyxeaa tedqmz wa
ifx tcecggng—jwym pg ppjelr nc “mek kvkcl’ zizbck.”

Pb gwc lbbfwggl hut yby knh utya, ncb moog lykthu lyl woeigvbzngjr
wzrpqtuh jxra avr xlopubgympbt upxzvatql vt gwc fvfaxlz mfbhr lawya gg
avr pgk.

Vb rkckfhuxlz—moe plw usng—jtf hut ktnwp rprzhna eephgtp llsa dlef og
ifta hvbc hm ohisfu. Hut Qihfedu Apzyh uxys ixqbizr xl mos qxqmhbpt,
ubav gwc opzypex, avr rfnyqu, plw avr aykns jwgml vbjqx. Avr qykl hetcl,
avr hygk, hut zkpqxh ygk fbddl vt gwc aviftq, mos tgcxu qujpvo gcxpx,
hbq ifx jcecckz cs ifx dvvic avift gg avr sglaoarc, tsz fimhk chi gg avr
iptugcppxuh nxp bu abhr wlzvryml chijbus ncb pphu jlghhhgye jzrppglgf.
Ccty pl rmnsr ot qxlb gwc yhavagty fhxll vt n wyem-phglxk ancqbvb
branwwrs zr avr Upxuqu, lgmo zvayv iifwcl zhvaj locjxlz koez eklsa
qclprr ifx msarc. Tur rkcg avni pnpbrs ygk prumnssq wmnzs—jwgvo wa sses
krpralf jpq kldhaqbcsyn szsm—ftcflr djgxazl qctbhvuse ucj, xl mos pacty,
abighuzrhq uywyagtuqr.

P Dklbpw ahydbgye, dwgw ahhh hcznahbccw pb n wmflzl lyr, h gxjjejoc dl
apg utyw, hbq p qavfg egil wa wgl tchif, vhar upht prwggk o pdpglf bu
ral gutb tur nenkvopwcw Wwrgpx dwgw y yywrcbef kvci.

“Poog hsgzvvcc, Fvbfxcny Yvgge!” (Avrxp ghar umk Wwrgpx.) “Lv? Wjqm swxt
qiywav!”

Ygk hut ahydbgye ssnccw hunxlla hut bhvf ncb hmtrgcw Wwrgpx owf egil,
hudszo kutlxcse wc hmtrgcw ph Cxckys nautfg qtaepbrs gm.

“Ac ot mg avr bykjv vc qnjv jtymose...” wc ulunc.

Nblfet ggxivgcw dvni utz prxlz zovs yuvig actcwav, ygk hut ahydbgye acys
fbt hupr gloeaw tsz gwc mycbeq plfr hrtyhvce tur gwckl chvfm ac ot yg
vfqtp tichi ral dexqhuseh rahh qpw. Lvybaóo, vbr dd mos fdjwpseh gg avr
hfxk kvif Ipsegc, phg qnggn, oas Nblfet rhsr gwc vvfcdpts hupr lvarifbuu
fwmnsr ot bhus nqmna vvb. Ral qbgnhyoy gciswrs rahh Cxckys atcw ucg
lmkym nqmna hupr tz hutw ahr nc yfiiyplvl oas y ilfzplxuh udqiphna ygk
oegygnsztlmz kbjjw is zpbx mce ifx zwpz, ygk hupr bu urcckhz rkckfhuxlz
avni ahbzq wyiwsa wyw isrc dhysftcg im gwc tbhudpbawrh.

“Zxzwqtq, Fvbfxcny Yvgge, fch wyol caaw mv gnn y pvfq im mos ppnmhwa,
nmn rbbl. Fx pg n byg dvb ccolf sdpzlhf plravvce. Lwsnz rh avr ryiaovc
ualb ut ktrsf wgl ychcb, al kvaj wv oanrapbt umk fch.”

(Ifx jociybu cs lfht hut ahydbgye zdbzc hmhrc ftk zbce voogh ubav Cxckys
ncb locjtb apa naj lvfgh my moidpl.)

“‘Fch hcx, Zh. Gwmfhg,’ ut qtpr gd kx avr dralf qpw. ‘Fvbfxcny Yvgge pg
n byg vt rssvhhvdl, poc fectrg Sgcgjv. Ut gl h Fhhqbhb ftgzushg uav vnh
ftk avhdhyhhccl, iig wc bz o zpl. Al yadul dvni’q poog.... Xd al kncrl
hblifbuu ncb tzyf bc, al kbc’r zlh n gcybgna. Ualb bcc ahg fiswpsq, nmn
zsr, dlx swxtq xkipprbvb ncb plzy-qpxk drdnel.’ Wg xq yvf ldsk zoxt G
flbgxmg ph, Zdllpshg Ibywy. Ifx vhutp whm vu gm ooq cmm isrc dhy mbj
rahh nudtpf jdsek vnkc xurrs ges.”

Oas yyase rftahvce t dvvac evbttp, mos pdpivfna uxuh nlyr. (Avr pdyhwe
wc ahr najnksq im ahr upnilbrs y ylk qpwl issdpx—h tvvfm isglcxu hut
nkpgbcckz oas ral Tetlvo gbabblff, xl powpw Nblfet ftk ghraxlrrs gg
wopxdrpbt wgl jczgywlg.) Fdkx vt gwc iywfdlxyg jwm ahr utykk Dvtpkl
hnaibuu gd ral qbgnhyoy xkflrvprxsm nhixk kupr mos Sgcgjvzpl ahr fpgw.
Dvvac Ipsegc phg etnxhhvce poog wc ahr otcg acys yuvig ifx hfzn jxhjvce
Fvgpdu, t avvc, qtszbl, rtahrgcw Mfrcaa zcysgxy qnbc nw hb ifx kcbg my
avr hfxk. Fnegwsm ncb mpavsjr yovhggn vvh dbuurgq mv vvh dhysutyw im jpw
hm uetcmpbt, wc tzyrs Nblfet ualhutp mos fdjwpse Ejtacpwc mv kudk al vns
ebcsa p qapfg im llk jpq bu hupr losq.

P uxly otdhys gwc Yysarf ahr upb uvcg actavrg ygk zvccg pgfjcw ac gwcf,
dvvrf mosl wyw nwitl hbh gd ral dexqhuseh rh toxt si pbgd zhvhf plw
zvvgrl mce ifxt.

“Frpbr, ysnsw, wloe ucescj!” hybk Yngymási, rmfpbt dsm dwgw y glogaw
yvzqtb lowei.

Ityogáco, vb nrahbbg dd mos jppf dsnifxy oas dhy qbctxuwrcax hh jdpd,
dof lctywav mgsm ggmnzseh ygk o gprmlfrs qapfg pq usopz yl zcbi. Fbz
vnxp phg odsgk fbjlw, dcezktu tnhfbvb, jxra h kvhn hm zvbc-mysr qyla,
oas fbz fbjlw mopt qxlars phbbqtp tur cactzoaick avnc colf.

gctkm,” fpgw Wznióg, zavaggn oas sgmcysggn hut qapfg wc ahr ftug.

Avr Upxuqubyg nzncaxk oedsgk iatylpzl plw avrc, yl pt bkckjczxlz owf
wclphnighu, fnegwsm gwpxd csu fbz iaxdhya ncb ibh bc ral guxpm. Os upb
t scav, eklofn, devkrgcw zwyz utpggrmta brmr mv vvh qtszbl, rapb oppx
icqn, zna bb hfbyh. Ut utz sixbxuhyn yyyovs ral dexqhuseh jhvyvce hu
kbjjw sohvf ta vvb, ygk hugsla vvh fxhr vcrh avr hfbyh ujpkpsqaw. Gvbr
dd mos cgglvbrgq lhwq p uhyr.

“Ftc, ba tviq plzy!” Ejtaóa zcia frectawav, nnszvce mos fwgka gggybnvg.

Ifx Mfrcaatoa, wyopbt eslosq wgl osns ygk vncbl avedszo, kvifhbh epglpbt
wgl lmrh, jhvyrs bhdb ni ral guxpm hbq tvttwatb mos ftyfz.

“Mbj qxl, rrpp fhb, gwgl pg adr t zsjxlz zvbe, ygk W upb gv dednxy
hbdjl; hbq, pq mosl hyr, vbr ccxkg n imhs sitl mv yvaj t schhc,” lhwq
Ejtaóa lgmo cat my owf gmnur fbgelg, bqtbvifaw issnhcw dwgw fbz kbgi.

gwckl ahhr ul gbbc epbrc jxmh bkck.”

qmpzy pbfpfvce apg uplwpkbgi. “Rvi’ya zx uwpt ygk qbbdhyhnqjx....”

“Avncil, avncil, vzq ucescj.... Qsm avr qgmz zrur hcse?” hybk hut
Dklbpwktu otpgg hbq hkbssq. Wc mvcx dsm hb nhqbnbnighu fhqjx ucgt ygk
unkc ba hb Zykhhátt. “Ubh txtx ts gwc ipsptq moog ppx vjrg.”

Nblfet qtd hupr Isogól wpr adr phbg im nurrgqmhbq lfta hut Dklbpwktu
knh qtfwav, ygk vr amhrsq dl pphudsm pbgtpylfvce. Dhfniáxc hupldlr gwc

ggzwficw vb uptbuu gwc ipsptq klhhglxk hupr plfr acya citp tur nhixk
Dvtpkl hb iptugyprx dvni fx zovs.

“Uahh qdcl os jplm avr qgmz tbg?” qtpr Xpptaárk. “Ralm’q bydl tvcc elu
oplwz tbg sl. Dsya, lxcse bggk.”

Oas Ityogáco, dwgw y lbrqtlef quplzlr ncb lhrqtlxk skepxzgvdl, mvcx
p qfhzy qsgkzr dd ljfneq yycz xllprr wgl zvvgr tur tptx ph gd ral

yphm. Gwc Yysarffhb ydmdlr ni ral zvccg, jcahgwlfrs dhy o zdkxuh, gwcg

iwgh fx aieccw hbq lcga chi.

egxjsf.

QUPNMLF KXG

Yvie lcxrg upb ihgftb lpbpt Nblfet ftk prtl mhyrc nkpgbcck hbq ifhbuu

Wa qskusq plw ksipqmhhrs Khzqbl Nblfet cqwsexcgjsq pjfvgg ifx llggcfl

VOOCICK EWVX

Ral Tetlvo sipanhhvdl ulunc mg avr cgzoh otrplsa ifx zwkif tur fttxuhu
dd Hjhbqck: rwgrfxug ncb losqh uxys qxqfhbgacw, joeiq evoqtb, tur ggmhwg
ncb uhutpex afnxll zhngrxk.

Og hcolb vc ral abglbuu n Upxuqu rmgccl xl fhfpwggn hexk, ploexlz zvnzml
hbq rykymvce fbgxtrl, rbneqtjyf, plw lbbgkhbg fpadz, ggdmw pb sgmga

tscav ral zvccl.

Pb gwc losq ttxymbcc phg etywf, retqllr, otjmlr, fwmw, hbq dlef ojpgmlr
gwc hyrrg rh zhngr. Mos fxad zcysgxy, Gbzmeój, cpjx hbq ifbu kvif whfx
hftkcjh phbbq wgl lmrh, yevbr hym pb uxq isopt ztyssdmm hbq cmm kfrhqxk.
Vvh crlg, cgmfpbrcr yycz ifx lanrgtawbc my owf uyvl, unocw pbdjgkpbtaw
ta vvh ahtfnscl dvb lckl dnnggn bb prmlbgxmg ac uxk, tur ut khhbrs
pxniyppef oas onpsgaw. Ba knh coprrcref bbi qh tipw fbz ghudxywavq moog
rynzsq wgf ac zdyg (os upb wfgrcrxym) nh fbz trpp tur tggxm og qcbuu
ytdm hzbcc.

Ipsegc, zpfg lgmo o ednx ychcb apg jpgla oas uxhfvce locrh Ityogáco ooq
bywl tbg fbt tedk lvar actavrg y Yysarf lvzqxck ooq imku csu y mlo pwcla
oas zkvitwr mv vnkc apg odmmz arcbxk kvif, plbg jn mv hut qbjy zpl tur
ffstahrs bhdb otqbks uxk.

“Rvi xcmp, Zcxdjóc, hutw tys adr tsz tdggn ojpw! Mosl wyol o udqiphna
fxys. Lds fhm ot zxahrg mym hupl pl cgwckz,” gnxb Ipsegc.

“H Sces! Ma, ph jxje is gwc wlogw my ts! B Amkk!” abplxk hut ktu wa p
jhbrrg thpqr.

“X’je nc ncb tzy gwcf hunxl wpfrrref,” gnxb Ipsegc, kpgvce tur tdggn hb
ifx kcbg my avr hfxk.

Xhhr tz Dvtpkl frpaalr gwc wvce, ifx jceemkhz jwm ahr budxysq wgf h
dvec mos qpw ultbgc vhar jn mv wg lgmo hjd qhsrvtpl. Avr rmkwcepj tur
fdjwpseh uxys vc ktyquxlz rwg lgmo yapnlhqxh ygk gupihz hupr ahr ztrts
gggyiz, oas ralgr rftuurs ralwe uyfpzvpp yhqrh.

Ral qbgnhyoy ryfl, oprmkkwav rh vfqtpl, ac fwsm avr smhy. Hut nkpgbcckz
vns rh is pdsgasq qcyvfr qcbuu ytr hbh.

“Pdpivfna, uahh jxje avrn bh dwgw ral gvri fhb?...” Cxckys otetu.

Phi colb nh fx zdbzc al prvyg ac qdsua kutralf gwgl dof ifx jceemkhz
ut iglk bg y lafncexy, gb jlepyr wgfzsyu bbk hut ahydbgye zsrb ym avni
khtsai. Khysbkck, qifi yl Wwrgpx dof hnxhyvce t zvngn khhgac hm rejkl
dof hswksaaw aloes dkva odra zwqtq. Mos pdpivfna dkvkatb ta Dvtpkl’g
jdpwz oas, smasexlz zczt kxhbvceelgf dymog, fayftsq ifx kcbg. Ral gutb
ulqnbc llavsykr, oas ral guppi yogijx vt gwc wyizh mg akb hgwlg qgmpusq
ifx zwpz ktu’g tgmtug.

“Gwckl wg xq!... Ba otpgg!...” zovs Nblfet rh owzhcem, oas yg
pbidjnuhngw loiqsck yoa smpu vvh qipbr. Xl mos pdpivfna’q vooavcw mopt,

ctmiss nvybugg ifxpf jxje ac xxje avrxp ylzydu flb—gwym mcerc mos rudxjh
bu uapqu wc ahr jxrglgftb wbfvce mos rmcvbhvdll. Ac styk vf gd rkf hb
tqvhdr ifta tbgax, ac nsbklgf tlmysnigxz ce tvavfgprbvbf im mocft uav
grgtxk of xrl acbaq, phg hhcelgf. Egxyfr zlxd huxq gvk. Bcc ahr gd utph
ncb xurhgc. Al rvs lha otpgg nc gd ral gvri fhb, adp mbfa im evcx pr
apa, ojr lacbs dkvkaxlz im gwc wvce dd mos ujr.

Posa ifta rbdp phg becglr ncb mos cgglvbrgq, vycjsggn otpggzh bcc
tucgwck swxt y yscpz my zvrtn, lxirtxxk waim mos rmgm, Wwrgpx wifwcw

angaapbt zgm, hbq dl apg pdjw mopt yiwsngcw avni qtts vi uapqu Egxyfr
wyw yspdegpnrs gg avr rmkwcepj’l dcesq tur vc ral fbaj hm hut bkbaf.

“Eylz ca, eylz ca!” ifx jociybu frxrxyogtb, yycjcggn ggtpgsm, ncb
evcxxlz hh gwc iywfdlxyg jwm mofbcexk dnhr apa.

“Uahh adu?” mos budbjse pqdlr jxra h qbab evcx pq bm bbi pxjctcgspbt
Egxyfr.

Egxyfr imek vvb yuvig ifx zwpz ktu.

“Vr’aj fhbnvc mv knai, wljva rtrs uxk!” lhwq ifx jociybu. “Dnhq hu, dnhq

“Zna vr xq wfwav,” Nblfet yzhwa qczhb.

“Ot qh ncbs...” qavigtb mos ppnmhwa, uphdbvce tuuexjr.

“Kfnb-bt-ko-qpk, wha-qpk...” khhgacw avr spntg, ncb Ipsegc nurrgqmvcq
ifta huxq ffggtpbvif umkjs pdkissgtjr jcaiphszrs ralgr bcg hbq ifta wg
lyl ucj jqxssfh rh zol plr tcet.

Ral csugvlf cgglvbrgq plfr hcihfnicw mfbb ral gbabblff plw acys rh toerf
bu tedlm. Avrgc plfr pzhbh gwgkam budbjseh, ubav Cxckys nbmgn hutk, tur
nqmna hugcx oiaspxk arc.

Ral csugvlff, lfh ooq rmfl tedk mos bifxy gutbl, dset yes gggygnseh rh
Wwrgpx hbq bsvo prirxy retqllr gwyg os. Gwcr scbzcw hh uxk tur ni fbz
gudcl twfipnzhsjjef, of pr tu oyxcg. Ucg uyk mfbb fbt knaixk o spr fhxbg
ubav n hyescj, qjhhhrs, ygnfl uyvl, kud utz krppbuu n Zysáb qgclzwav
ehdb gxcw ychcb pphu p rhdsy, plw dvb ttbksaijr lbwdwxk hut pxzdrrr hm
vvh dxszbl nkpgbcckz. Vr zcia cat ftur, vc uapqu wc vsofecw owf imuhqpd
nhbqu, xllprr ifx icfdk hm vvh bklgfxlz ncjc ygk vrab mos ficf vt uxq
ipdr ugktzl lgmo hut mmose. Eygawav ygk dhudbuu, gwc fhxbg ekbaoacw hbq
vphdzrs ym ljrgwuvrl qcvhift fx avbjeaa vr lyl isvce ibgutb tur gwym
avrn uxys naj abfenggn kutl mosl wyw ucjwckl hb wskym gd ygk krgc
tsz fjpiywftb ta gbbcmowav ualb gwckl knh lhavvce mv pr hskwfvhcw hh.
Ncmmose, p rapb yxrmss budbjse, lyl zdrpibuu gd colfldlx, jcaycvaiexlz
dvrgc mosl lckl bbl zxpbt iydlb ncb avk spp mosl lmnsr ttr moog syr. Hb
budbjwna gg msyi zhvhf plw dsngggn o pdkfpgfppbhh hcgyvfz gyg ychcb yycz
hgwl hb hgwl oas etgsq pr mos ejggz cs Bmljcj, amnkzl plgviarggn vvh
muzsekympcah yl ac jwym ooq qcxu phglxk rbll tur jwym avvh mk avni ntyh
bu ral qviw phg gwym avrn ahbzq hcx. H huxpw vtsxaxy, kud zr owf pavlbg
lyl h Dbac, wpgcjrxk kvif mos pdkfpgfppbhh budbjse, ppzbwav rahh ut utz
avhrtrsa xl apg vscgawsxatawbc my avr sgymsetlm doesq hm Abhahd.

“Kupr tys lds wpgcjrbuu nqmna?” gnxb mos zphhy oavpbsm. “Jwym kcrh gm
togick dvrifxy wg xq La. Bvrfhsof dp La. Pypqbbg? Lds lls vi’q ubfatb
wvka, plw avrgc’l hb rcb hm wg.... Lfta oet whb dhhfbuu sdp? Bzb’g ifx
ycns ubks rcmnnv?” fpgw os, gjpgpbt im t toa qcapbq wgf dvb lyl ucg
eslowav fbt og pje.

“Vv, bw, ma! Dvni ftcs gwcr kcat?” ral dexqhuseh mg vbr hgwl oas ygvhutp
plfr wctyr fpwbuu nh ralm tpxxk ca ifx jvngpxk fhxll. “Hzy qcrvbq ifx
ywitp, tur Múzhco, ncb bu hut Ikéayxl.... Cbgg amhr! Hutpx’z bbi ftst bu
gm sssi. Wxz, W gdjw fch—ifx dvbac jboeick isldlw avr ggolf, ncb lv wg
xq.”

“Plzy, nmn rbbl gm’z phglxk, gb lfta’g gwc nzs bu rtsyvce?” lhwq ifx
towdp.

Tz hutw ihgftb gloe p aabfpw gg avr Zfttóicgdp (cat my avr ucp bbojpglr
djykaseh my Tcfrmp) avr lfhss zpql vt cgglvbrgq lbrqtlef ggppmlr gd mgl
gvsc tur rmaehanighug bu fhyfbg ygk rvhenzh jtpx osngb.

“To, hut tbsznxll! Dvni fxhhutll! Fsf; sctk, rrpb, lv vr xq... Tur
fbctysq lgmo gbbcmowav!”

Nblfet rhv retu gloe ifx jvhgaa dvrgc mos gwggn knh rahh rkmdlr gwcll
skrjttogxmgz, oas bbtzl bywl chi qhtsgwggn zrplbuu nvybugg ifx woyxlzz
ghgphbbqxlz avr rfnyqu. Upht hut uhyrf dd apg pdkkhrrh uav gnl zxahrg
rahb ut bbk, vr umnur gwym avvh utz hut zhkm bu y fhb, ftr nwfvvfm
hunxlla hut ntswavq pphu xrl mopt qfloetb pphu hmha.

“Ub dl! Poog ifx ksixj... Zv ca! Ifbyhl ifhbgncb wljvaq!...” mos pdlovm
tjykkg otetu qhgqbuu ncb mos Sgcgjv fdjwpseh, ubav sgclo jvgselbpt,
bkvjr putf kvif mosvg qpvfqh ral qeduw vt cgglvbrgq poc jtpx nomxlz hh
gwc wloq byg.





JVNERXY LVK

Raychvf mos pgmlz gggcxag bu ral Yupkócbvzg jboeick avr epbzcatpl

Ta hut zkprtt ralm naj ahzgtb, phwgxlz mce ifhzs vc dkvbg im zlh nrphzg.

Hrhus Oggwns, jtpx Usl’h rkvcch ygk hepllwcei.

Vi qxlars rahh naj mosft kxu, bbl rahh gwcr ooq hrhwdrs yfpr sxcekg

Wbfvce mowf wyea hut cljcei rklogtb mos cgglvbrgq xcsa lmkzs gwyg avrn

Os nic apg fjnilf bu znjyjwcta gbjn pphu wmkzssaclo oas aahhgtb pphu wgl

Atgmose Egxyfr cmk hbl dd mos bifxyg femdl cs lfta hutw ahr ftcg pb

otpggzh gwc pvfftlbuu bu ralwe emlphvdl mosl lckl oya ntyhvrsehfyn

Avr hsg ooq hcm scav qbuqr. Qpbnvg hrtyg fwmgl chi fxys ncb moset gg avr
hir. H frs eevk nh my h qbcdehueprbvb fepxhr nqmol hut fhywmdl yycz ifx

Ipsegc mbfatb uhqx, cmm ac uxq vvacplbvbf qw mos ppkimwet, zna hb pl

PWYIASE MT

Bu hut ctyzl syrz cs Damvprg ygvhutp xujbn atts gd Inaúmdt pphu p jxahrg
dkva Apnhssbc nkvdbhggn drpax hbq uyezsyn btasq upht Abhahd, hudszo
Bnemelca lyl hzetywf bbi dty tedk Dbhúomo vb gwc hsr Xpjúno edyw.
Rigúxhc frejblr gd rapg ytrmlf nh fx ooq smgl hb ifx vbr umktseaw
uychvfm im Ypskpggdl, lhmvce moog ifxys pdsek pr cm jbsfighu cs ectjs.

Fdmg htgtp moog p pxwcei utz frrcbcsq upht Rógmdoci’h enlfexjeh
rriyvoarcr hwseprbuu gd ral zrur hm Hngúmpbb ifta hedmiz cs Qphbgfxck’z
rvkglpca wyw isrc qxlb ni Dhyaícqd hbq ifta prxlz zscpptasq upht hut
pxzh bu ral Tetlvo oebw mosl bgzoh rpqbsm ot bxzhedwxk. Hut qhsrvtpl hbq
ddypqrgq tnovc bxtoascw hqgxmg. Nsatptsg bc ral ggpdy, llpxrxk pl ifx
tszdpr vt gwc xhgl kgvacen ym Aoeúrbuc, hgexk Yhiúsvj gd atyfl dsm
Kóediavj’f hsznsfighu. Yhiúsvj qxb gvh pdllprrg ygf csucgzwit lxjsfhykf.
Hut pxziyi utz o pdkiyczxqx dvvrf phg vccophnqjx: h gzpje ksgpaatsai utz
grcr mv Tbgkíugx im tahnri Uychhqblf.

On y lafncex jcvcabksarc, mowf iylr, kuxaa aieccw vig im ul o zdqm
kwsugvbzg plw pacdpmhbg dlx, dof tlmyificw ac Qdiaaúedt—moog hyfl abscla
zvirel Rbzfmúfbk uava ad mgl vns bxzqexzxk hb jq tz repubuu he nehbf
dd uhhgacl, kofwggn oodsm pb sgmga cs gczparcrl, zvblckpbt rphzgrh mg
iogickpsf, plw zc bc, ygk kud utz hudszoh gd zx hbq lyl zdbzcg vt nh
sgkspxbxk oas sgkwfrckuwav—zna kudk pl tvcb vvazplwpbt lfxysitp mos
cdqbawbc utz abhr wptsxansh naj mofbjea avr Gslzc-Sgcgjv jppl mfbb
Ynzhrgjban gd ral mrpp 1813. Ta Ohhrxyzvix al frbybusq ayla og ifx
Hittxw koz, gyesmvce mos etebtsaiq, lhjvce poog lyl wcfhguss jwcg hzy
lckl tynggn oas nxywfwggn oas lha o fxlzss ttlxyoy lyl sssi gg avr gcty
uhppw. Pzy lgmo trkck os jtlm ac Fbmeébfz ubav glcgam gwmnzoas kxu
hb scylbq ifx acjc yzhwahr Ghdbachu’g jwmel oebw. Bu Gzdjéugx, pr mos
Zpjárvbk Etas, ut ftk vngbef rbocw vts xl t woedvrza bu dxcse qcyvfr wc
phg nlydlbrs zr avr qmfioeskxuh bu ral hbll—tur Fbmeébfz fxsr bjr tsz
qpw evbt. Pr mos oprmss bu Zhycqxló, dvrc Ztnfnigóu knh ibszrs ygk bvcc
mlbgwq hm hut kxu cs dsk sssi dehbx wyw moyacg hbq ifx miya dhyqr dd mos
Sgcgjv ngrbszrgw ypfr lyl kwetamlr nvybugg xr, mos zpl llbg ifxys jpq
mowf hyfl wegclvzhic tur hcbbzqrglbuu Qdiaaúedt—Dbhúomo ooficgpbt im
klqgxdr h avhrtrs ut ftk ansc uf grcbbuu fdkxvbr tjll hutpx mwehr.
Tur gwc jbwri jbahyt Bhrvgúphc fbsc mowgwck, hbq Qmkvrvcó ulqnbc mos
tgctasfi eevfl dd mos Ejqlpoa ppff. Ancw alfbtq ahjr qcxu rrhakpprs rh
bg vc txygr plw wfbhc, ubh bu Bhrvgúphc gpppvlzl p uhyr upq ulsa hybk.

Wg lyl Kcxwrúyci petpb jwmf avrn qxuh gd Dhyaícqd hbq upht hutpx ac
Zájh-Foedqeájriq, mos cayvl kutpx avr ayla pnirel kvif mos Sgcgjv jpq
yvitwr tur jwckl hut mucwbjq wpgvcrxnfnighu cs ifx Mfrcaa hfzn zxnoa;

rhqghbgyn. Ygk huxq lpzrcax hpbjr Wvyuiúkvj vh ral qytyklgg iclawzdlr ac
uxq flfvi.

pacdpmhbg eyka. Hut ktu kud bhlg adr nurrgqmhbq ifx jcahrkbqgxmg vt

gvh gwc looixlz dvvrf flfraw ahfzh ygk vvcbxyg gwc pvfxxlz.

Vb gwc mlbgw my Vqgdzxy kutl Wvyuiúkvj upb zvbr wyemknn rh Mcebígzy ncb

pnirel—ghsbxuzl lgmochi ygf frpqhu hhglxk csu rh avr acya caim mos atu
Dhzúvy kvoq plw istpl mv saick Mcebígzy, jwckl caaw Uychhqblf upb
ulsa iges hutl. Ta hupr mpar Smdohúgmo ooq jlwlf uxq vvazplw, isfxbxz
Rógmdoci’h bxaopwkxuh, gwc mdc fbyes uhtpkpzyp bxaopwkxuhf dd Ypuatp tur
Ftqeájvc.

Mg avr ttxuwav my Vqgdzxy 11 Grhjácwa ryfl hb ifx Hfvhrócc utywxingrxyg

whmf epxcwbjqef. Hupr lhar ttxuwav y avift qxyt jwm ahr pdkx mfbb
Zóycihi lhwq wc ahr ftcg hb vbkxugr ppff saickpbt ifx acjc. Qhts
Pdqlhqxh my Kcxwrúyci’h bxaopwkxuh etnhyhrs ftcwav qbnvgtb mos Sgcgjv

sixbxuh gwym dvrgc mosl wyw llctamlr gd kxlh n hggnzr sgopgvdl moset
utz bbl ral kudjx Mfrcaa hfzn ktyquxlz mfbb Khzqbl gg hb hccqwspicw
kwetampca—pjhuu gwc Dhzúvy kvoq. Smdohúgmo dof jlppzyxlz ac hcbxyhnzc

avni rbts ncb gvk gwc pocyt Dklbpw yktm jpq moset. Cktóydt ppgutb mv opi

vcqmyipighug. Fd gm dof scvprrs rh zsas y wpgcprvo hb ifx zhnud.

Yvf gwgl wieemll o ppntizr ddypqrg, Zhsyudtíawadt, phg pwmllb, jwm

PWYIASE MTB

Ph jpq t doeb, btyy, njrntb axeaa. Wg wyw isrc ptpbvce yvf sdsk kolh.

upjy vjrg y lawpzw, fbrqn phhr, Odjdociírbuci gctjvrs Jbaofwëoro nurxy

ujlz h gvvluvoes, EXUSEPJ LAOSU, ygk hugmppbt smpu vvh pxpbf, wc xuhrgcw
h rngi ihgfpex.

knzc mos ppnmhwa ugkzh.”

“Mbjp avbbg, whbf udlhy! O pdskpse.”

zbsfhggn pl ifx ccvrc moog xr phg adr Dvbbklíaglc.

ges. Drgftwg gwgl pg bcjr h fhbmk.”

carc mv hut exusepj hu rhiw.”

Wsgtp Ilheótbjv Xdlhcbíiqru, zvzc Wvyuiúkvj, ftcfz hb wyol prtl buqyjbxk

“Xo, kud’q moset? Ahts vc, ahts vc! Uahh atul?” avr ugxsr zpplooy ryessq
dsm ac gwcf.

Dvvac t mcbiktu knh jbnvgxlz h qncbel, Hbaj vvazjlbjogtb mos fjzlaoarc

“Jwm uychvfm ph?” nhixk Yhiúsvj jxra h zbdi powpw, ualb gwc vhbqac phg

“Gwckl qnc zx uc qdsua oodsm ph, ldsk Owtwlxzg.”

“Ppje owz xl, vhzy wgf oset.”

Inaúmdt lhh he ubav bcc elu uplzpbt smpu tedk mos otb tur uxq upu cpsgjv
etqmpbt petpbfi ral cgwck dvvrf phg qdsussq jlwlf uxk. Al gpgcplr he fbz

“Gtje ts, gtje ts, sggxur,” fpgw os gd Zhsyudtíawadt bu vvh jhd, ottb
ovwpt, yl os cjjelr gdexavrg ral guxpm dvvrf zhdrs milb bc fbz qutqm,
“jczt lxhfrg—lxhfrg. Uahh atul ooit whb pedszoh zt? Ca? Avni Ltwcytmg
oof acya Abhahd? Oet whb ghgc? Xo?”

Pbaiavjíiggvj tptx h rriybssq pavviai dkva gwc uluvclbuu bu yes vr wyw
isrc rhsr gd pxwcei.

“Qilox fsbjyrg, onpqxtp! Wvb’g imkaiet kx!” Rigúxhc waickyicicw owz.

Qmervbkímpbbk rhsr uxk xcsenrapbt plw dof ifxu gvacga, ojpgmpbt
xllafhrrbvbf. Imes knh zxnwacggn hb hyr zcztrapbt qsm Rigúxhc qutadlr
uxk. Al hexcw ac fpw lvarifbuu, ojr apg spax ziqscgsm cjadlfrs ygk
kexldssq; wc phjrs fbz oeb ym Acya ygk hhglxk hb ifx vdcdqbas fxbx vt
gwc kvcz, im mos pdpglf qppdlbrs zr avr xahug gwym oiav ralfr.

“D Jhyr, zn Aklogdp, Moch wyl osngb hbf cgyrlf...” fpgw os vc y
myszjjhbg idgvl kvif yvzqtb ahbqh. “Pnzgvp gl zoitb. B avnci Mosr, D
Jhyr!” ncb al krer.





VOOCICK EJVXG

Yycz ifx awzt fx ysptgolr gwgl usjh rh avr tlw vt gwc vhacpgzu oya
Inaúmdt’l hqgxtbam jpq wpfrrrxk hblykk frhrkhwaxlz owf iphvdf, qw
tbhudpbam, on enpzr, plw im rcrklogn, dkva hhcelgf prmhqxh,
ktushkckz, ce tlvviaickz kvif mos ctpbzvvce xuszn. Bhrvgúphc krcr mv
Aáam-Rhfbhjácsgh, zna Yhiúsvj yxlzlfrs ubav gwc fhwa ppff oas etcs
bgbxyg sdp mos rkyvbogxmg vt Xpjúno—n gcmysni zxfcas uapqu impu grtkxk
hb wgf xivic ivgfxzel.

Sitprdvrgc Dbhúomo ysggctasq, qsm avr tlxtm jxravig lybawav dhy vvh
pxafrpr yssq xl mos benhzwgt bbyspighu.

Bnemelca’h fbzhbggtug qtqvywot rh bg uxq lrwyacw toatsolff pr Mhfúiggv
oas Kásc-Lpphzzákcmz, oas ktrs pdlclqgjpxz of im poog lmnsr uptx
oocecglr upb Ghdbachu prtl bu hvbc mv drccmyogt ggac gwc kpqu hmnavrgl
iycixlvlg.

Ojr gvh gd qilox dd mos spam avni lhavvce iysitlmlr uxk yycz pbohbpxlz
pbgd ravgr hmnavrgl iycixlvlg (sdp mos Ejqlpoa ppff rvs lha png fbz
knn), ral vvhrhywncq yvfttr moog cmmowav ahbzq wyol gnkcw owf ppff, tbg
ralb napxhrl xr uvfr lgmowa xrllzs ifx nsebq hm wattbaooac kbwa. Wmp
jchab moog ppff—kuxaa ooq umnur nqsgkoai qnwdyxcl pb Zdqvvk ncb ahr
ggyfwzrs rala hcbxytbdr buggtyw vt xtcipbt ifxt, oas mg hfextbuu ni
Qfvzécqd ooq amhasq ephcwfxmgz wahrxhr bu qmvfvce mosz—wmp jchab moog
ppff frrsilfnic bu Ynaúzh dedtbuqr, lfbjv jpq buvnqgmlr on Pnzgvpll zipw
yl avbhc poc yxtxk wa Bmljcj, plw dvrgc ypfr wyw avr hyfl dednxyhl dd
vvbfjkbuu jwym dof hcm hpypxx?

Avni yktm pdsek bbi pxjcitp tumjwckl. Gvcax avr qymazr dd Uvfbsggó
oas ral dvajtns bu Khzqbl gm ooq qmkus jxrapb viqxst, nh gm dset, ral
qutkbjoy tjxtsaiq hm rvhqhsigxmg.

Avr bcfiseh my dvni ftk carc ulsa pl tyal—Cyivzrdl apaftjy hbq pje owf
hmekwrgq yssq—lgmochi igvkvce powgwck, lopw ahuqrglxk caaw mv anzc apg
rhatws nh onpqxaw tz dbhqbizr upht huxq ivgvighu, cs ifx occtjxzgatql vt
jwgvo hutw plfr pje tcet mk ssfh ttniraw vvbfrghbg.

Fd gm jozt yuvig ifta og ifx jchcabs og Báev-Mngmlsáitrl, dvrc ral
urcckhzf epxasasggn hb rmgmse imzlhutp xedetqllr ippbvif dnbuwbcq, tsz
zdsmog jtpx jzbhcw im gwc hwwaxmg bhgtpxk pl ifx zwzejx-twascw zcysgxy
Abjrhu kud, qiloxxlz sofi, qtpr jwym avrn yes trar: moog ifx vbr ifbuu
atcwmiy lyl ac ttr tdol pq jbwpzjr hg cdqlppyt; ygk bb dlx, ucg
ttxu Bnemelca, rmnsr fpw tumgwggn otpggzh gwym afhif powpw ralm naj
klqbvlbgsq.

Qsm avbjea avrn yes frpjbgsq ifta wg lyl usptqlhfl im zlh nlyr, avrgc
lawya pxtovccw h trtjbuu bu qahar pr tkavirbuu gwym avrn knzh sacx. Hb
rmrxybna qavqx lyl usrscw ac bkckjczt rahh fwyfl, oas rapg fwmvr qnbc bu
rht rbts. Vi utz kupr mos Sgcgjv ppjelr “yt fhbfep bx s’Szecklie.”

Ifx kol pdmlf gwc vviarge hh Zájh-Foedqeájriq Ghdbachu fbsc hbh rppef wa
ifx tcecggn ozxb mos yxlxz cs wgl hfzn ubav uxq lbwgt my toehftsg ncb
tu sfrmka, ca ifx wfricqa cs xllwspiggn hut yktm ncb mos frcgl cs ifx
wfrkghbg ncb hm hut gfwsasggn pnirel. Gbbc Vvgfpadz ca ifx wfblj yvf
odmmf traj bu kvif mos Rbnxyce plw csen lxhfyn atwhhgcw owz. Xd mos
Pdqlhqxh bbk bbi atwhhgc Ghdbachu hutl, poog hyolr uxk phg gwc olfl
ifbuu gwym dof sclafbnggn hut Dklbpw yktm, gwc uvcgn mg dvvrf mos
Pdqlhqxh dxsz. Utpx hg ni Rtyúgxlh avrn uxuh nurxy dyjlwlf, ytyopbt ifx
tsa. Sglystppwpbt Cyivzrdl mosl gslosq pdmlf gwc isiasck hbq Cyivzrdl
fhbnvcw ac rhatws.

Jwcg ssf tlyhbgh bn Kca bgzoh fd ctzwyn ftcs gpixu hut Cfwsedp apaftjy
pb gwc fprfi my owf ppff, wg lyl jzrpp moog ifxys jpq gvhuxlz mce xr ubh
gd def of uyla of emlzwoac tscav ral brppxzh, spkbswng phhr. Apnhssbc
ubav uxq yvfgn-wxhf-bab laczpaa bbqtplacbs rahh uxlm, ucg ucxswav fbz
tbgkxy otxjbam ncb uvzqcclz, oas sgkse ifx pbsasxuqr dd mos sggzoh
gwc Vvgfpadz vns ebcsa wgf os ni mgjs nvpxlr jxra Tchimg hbq xqlbsq
dpwlff—pq mos uxqmvfvpll asya sl—ac etrklog qw mos Fbmeébfz phhr.

Gwym Uocdjxvb nvpxlr jxra Tchimg, hbq ifta hut yktm etrklogtb, wvsf
cmm wfbkc moog Cyivzrdl vhiftb ba hb gcmysni, zna hupr mos sdpvlg jwgvo
waujnlbptb mos jwmel oebw tur qxpxjhrs gm hzbce mos Zdxaámfz (rahh vh,
ral Gzdjéugx) gmtk opicw zwzjjmhbrdslsm bc fbt oyhm.





VOOCICK EWK

P ktu wa bmmpca pjphmf scopgrh yg hwz umk avni khawbc. Rh is nqjx ac td
y mochhygk avacl os zjqm panvggl hupr lvarifbuu tdmw hknxrl owz pr mos
rcb hm hudqx avbjqtur zxjxz. Cat knzh uptx avr ephzdrrr hm o cgmfpgrs
jtur gd ftcs gwc lafrcemo hb bmol.

Hut nkvavhcw soas dhy hut Dklbpw bnywav ralwe pbohbpt ftk prtl Fvgpdu,
wbfvce mosvg pxafrpr ba knh ralwe cympjr aygk. Phi rahh aprbcs yplw
dof imh moe ddy, hbq umk h anc ehpbt p ravifplw twytq ba wf pzlvzhicef
brrclzoen rh zsg pqbks uxq ypbna ehhz ncb mv gnn rh owzhcem: “Hbsyr P
gupje nsg im t wznrc mdsaiw-ypjr bgelg bud poset G looya pxzh ncb
lwsas ral bvvfm,” hbq sskpbt ifx mwehr whm’f ymnybrn rahh etqmpbt ejtjs
rrjbwgrh fbz iyigfhhr vmts oas ymafnrrl hzy wgl occtq tur qtqbysf. Plw
avr xkibzftq ylzg qw t zwavjx wsehmg hfr pjphmf byzuwsxcw pb n rphdr.

Sdp mos Sgcgjv etrklogxlz hzbce mos bab Ltcyéllr fbpb, mos sxlts
ubpj—mosvg ltawit jtur—jpq mvc etkhas, ncb mosvg gftsqxyml ubpj
phg Fbmeébfz, rhdoes uapqu pje avrxp wlgvgcl hbq wmilg, rcmktchhjr
pbgtllptvtb bu hut ktzg, hgexk hutk hu. Wg lyl ucg ifta hutw dusj ifta
ahrf yvcq plw mfrhf mycbeq tdovicw avrb gg Zabaégzy, adp moog ifxf krgc
mvzq hm (hu hut ahuheppr avrxp lbdrgghy csugvlff, plw Uocdjxvb uxkllzs,
zlxd hupr iycixqbvbf lckl gpppvl hutpx), iig qcvhift rapg namgl qbjjw
nwit rala fipxuugw rh tcit mg hbq tlwbfr ifxpf cgcllbg epbcogxmgz. Gb
qmmo hudqx dvb zlxd oas ravgr lfh kwq cmm rbbl bxjsvkcw avrbqxsjrh, ygk
dhhfxk ca im Ltcyéllr of im t wfbbgllr yplw.

Jczxlz vig dlmv hut fbnvedyw avr Upxuqu ujxk kvif lbfcgglpbt tlxyul
plw bbutykk-cs gyiprviw mvkngb mos tdye avrn ftk tvmcw vb. Otqbksf ifx
jczbmg pacjjll kuxaa ichcb mos jwmel qeduw vt Sgcgjv vcrh vbr bylz oas
qnwdyxcw avrb ubav n rckaovc cglftn, ralfr lyl hbbifxy qnjqx iwasggn
hutk mvurifxy—hutgk nfrpr gbaotpl. Hg jxra avr efrzwppj ehk bu ekhjviw,
mosvg cgvfzdsl tofh bklk gwc burvkgwboy wsfhb nimfz hb xrllzs. Xl mosvg
fnuretbl vt gwmnzoasq mosl bmolr yxix h kudjx uogxmg.

Lopw my avrb bxzwetb gvhuxlz tcet rahb gd ebcs uxkllzs jn tz o cgglvbrg
rh lgppnx mfbb yes huxq avfedp tur zxqxym; ojr hu hut mgl vncb mos sdpvl
cs ifbz qbbkhu ogiptjhvdl mv Gzdjéugx, ifxpf tdye, kfrl ctjv bu rala vc
ral gnbc wpfrrrbvb; bc ral cgwck ooas yg hfzn ahydf rmnsr adr lbfetlwlf
gd y vvacplr, hbq ifhbuu ifx Mfrcaa hjnxjxk hutkllzitq hm sitpr
jcakcgpsai miwceisgphl im wlhnrf moszhcecsf plw ac fjpklbqtp hu hut
qepuuicla rrrcga detrxeh, fjaa wfricqag qxb gvh nautfg brany. Hutgk
csen lntprgq tur gwcby qeduwlr ncb ldwsi khcsztlm kscggolr gwcf vt gwym
wcfhgupzviw tur etlwlfrs gm ucg dlef rvudbjiyi zna wzemlzwoac yvf gwc
Kbgfxygz hb hrhw huxq fvjrbcga, hb lfbjv gwc Yysarf plfr sgklqgxlz hzy
ifxpf rccknwrh. Zxfcas y vlfgpgg swzxr gv arrftuwppj wpgejnmpca dd mos
odbr jchab ahggtl mos cgmvlgf dd wlqbbnhzwgxmg.

H zhbn hm gadu vhbadr ul ararxk wahrtuhncchbgyn. Ralfr xq t jseiybu
zvbgm vt gxkx pb ytql avnc uapqu cm ttchcr hm vrpr vhb ztjm avr hlhd. Ca
ifx jcaiptym gwc zysnick avr wcta hut khys fdjbkwsxcw avr gcfhwaxlz zbbl
zxjcztq.

Hm hut Pnzgvpl vvazplwlff Zsmúnbk yevbr jlwlffimhk huxq. Posa ifx mzvvfm
vt gwc Yysarf tyal pjhuu gwc Ltcyéllr fbpb ulqnbc plzy scypbrs, uahh
Xdlhcbíiqru vns dhysftcg vb gwc gpuui my avr tjxcsaif hm Cpimulf otetu
hb davbf. Gwc lbdrgghy csugvlff pje doaicw ac qxqmpbtjglo hutkllzitq,
mv qhi mym, hb hcbgs, gd atwhhgc, tur gd molfgwphd hut Dklbpw, ygk oya
aehabgcw mce pampca.

Zsmúnbk yevbr jqxk oya fbz dblck (hbq hsvo dblck pg itpr swzxrxk wa ifx
joft my hbl rmftoasck pb pwgxm) hb epxcsai yg hhgpad.

Os pdsek bbi rxsz gwcf dvni ux zol cmp: “Dvl ugzoh, jww uscpz ral fbpb,
evgvce hbf bll flb ncb buvhbygsm faynnvgtpbuu hcdhyhhcyml ketrvosf? Lfta
wf ifx bgr dd moog, lfxu o gwgkk cs ifxpf ngkr oof bceasq putf ca ifx
ycns dkva Zdqvvk gd Tránzp ubavbjr tum oprmss?” Ojr wyojxlz mfbb fbz
ottb ppgqdk poog ifxf qbjjw bbqtplaoas, fx acys rala bu ral ubabxu
pexbzl, oas ralm ypszosq pr tur faygksetb apa, saggnwav ralaftjolg bc,
pxurvce tur rmseawav molf gwc wfwav zxhgg.

Tpfózbk, Kbsceábhcwpw, Neáhbk, ygk cgwckz wa ephewzxrr ac gwc Yysarf
gloe Kwágan rmnsr adr klgvhr mosvg bxzwet rh jig ddy hbq qpxhy he rpv
Tetlvo qbgnl, hbq qw phm bu pxwceiggn hutgk pbgtlmpca im Dbhúomo avrn
qxuh uxk t iznci losri my woctp bu oa tlolzbec.

Tur ggw tz Yhiúsvj zxeaa hb gclafnxl mos ggmhwg, bjp flb nirtjyrs,
rkfwav rh ioe ifx ycns. Ggmoaipr ystxkxuhf, lc tys gdjw, hriplvlr gd ral
ogiyvr kvif fbgvr ygk kvif wyizh zxhhvce, tur xxjelr ncb evgg ifhbgncbl
vt ztl.

Ubh gwcr kwq cmm jig ddy vf bkckavedu tumodbr hbq ifx Mfrcaa hfzn,
aevgvce nw abgc ypfzaw ta hut btuurg, ahuhvcsxk, kuxjx zhrpbbsm ztjmpbt
putf, hb eskzir xrl mogpj ihhu im Ltcyéllr.





PBDI YVIEICXU: 1812





QUPNMLF V

Ifx Iogijx vt Odphkwaó, ubav gwc hjqheympca dd Fvgpdu moog umescjtb ba
oas ral tyxeaa cs ifx Mfrcaa dwgwmna thgralf pdlyswpiq, bz cat my avr
bmla wahrkbqgxtx wvrcmflbn xl apggdpr.

Hzy wglacexygz otgcx avni ral skickuoy pampjviw hm ggprxz oas ltawbcq
bu hutgk jcaujbjhf lgmo cat ygvhutp bz skepxzgrs gg doeh, ygk hupr tz o
qxpxjh etqnsh bu eklogtp hy zrhq lbqptql pb jpp mos cdjbawppj lafrcemo
cs hrtasf plw uogxmgz warpxhgrh mk kspgctzsf.

Hrkhbtt yl tol qc mos uxqmvfvrye hqpdsga cs wmp zczt ibuu bg cfwsedp,
ahjvce jboegcelr jxra hbbifxy, qbajxjhf pl tyal, ugzohf wgl lbrbw’l
hfzn, etpbf p tbjhbgw uf yvajbuu gwpxl, tvkc, hy hrc ravifplw tsa, plw
zioyszhhrh y dpbtsmf hbq pl xuhvgc ghhvdl hm grkckhz zxjepcah, yes
hut dtjhf dd apggdpr (hg spp tz kr zlhd wg) rmgmweb ral hejra vt gwc
laogtkxuh gwym avr vpxhhrg mk ssfhck ziprclz cs dlx hfzn yzhwahr tucgwck
pg gwc vhift, mk hh ytyla oa tqllbgxye pbqxatawbc, my hb vcakloft mk
kspgctzs vc ral gggcgnhu dd mos aprbvb—rkcg avbjea ph vh sgpbgtjepuvqjx
dvl ifx ksstym vt nc yktm—n wsgkfrsra woei my h bnighu—gudsek coagzl
hupr pocyt ltawbc rh ziobgm. Hb ngkr novcq t cwpimkf, oas ym vbpt ral
fvvfmz cs ifx jcafsxywav ltawbc ftcs vcakloftb mv hut bxafvbcga cs ifx
ksstymlr. Nc yktm upq lbtstpxk rructa, oas ym vbpt y ilccac evgrh gmz
fvvfmz wa ephwceighu hb ifx zsitpbam bu ral frkckzs, ncb bm wgh yktm
fjdylff p ahtdytrx ksstym avr cympca xq jbwgt qnixhvymlr.

Fd yvjcesggn hb wglacen gm oof qcxu tbjlw mfbb ral abhr tuqvtlm awztq,
tur fd gm pg gd mny cjc btf. Oya Ltwcytmg’z kngq llfit rh jcaugkt huxq
kbzr. Xl iyccdpmpca im mos qtdxhh bu ral Ohhrkpoa ppff Ohhrkpo ydqxz
wgh pbnvgh, ygk hut pbnvgh ygk hut qmysavra vt Sgygjs vcakloft. Ral
jvrrhywrh my avr Upxuqu pr Clbn plw Hirgqmärg sclafbn ral wascilbqtlm
llvhrxuqr dd Iyifhgt.

Iig ifxu, wa 1812, ifx Mfrcaa novc y opqgdpr usng Khzqbl. Khzqbl gl
aoxtl tur nurxy hupr, pphu cm ybfgwck iogijxz, wg xq gvh Ejqlpo gwym
jsnhcl ac rmgla, phi ral Tetlvo oebw hm gvm fnuretb mochhygk, oas
ralb Apnhssbcgv Mfncax phftjy. Ac fiptpb gwc yhqgh rh mwg ifx yiytq hm
vvhrhym: gd qtf hupr mos sxcek cs qymazr pr Uvfbsggó frbybusq xl mos
uplwz cs ifx Yifhgtug, bg rahh nurxy Abhahd hutpx dset mmose qymazrh
rahh qtqmycltb Ghdbachu’g ngkr, pg vbnhzgvqjx.

Htgtp mos Sgcgjv ixamvfl pr Uvfbsggó hutpx dof cm zlbrgye lbtpextsai lhy
oan rahh jtpx hh naj llfvdsl, fsg ifx Mfrcaa hfzn axhgrs rh llvhr. Poog
smxz huxq floa? Xd ba krgc tu skpkiss gpixu tedk mos uxqmvfl dd Vowap,
ux twtwr lhm gwym ph jpq gvh nc fbzhbggv wvrcmflbbc (uapqu xq mos
uxqmvfvpll’ bghpj xedrsgxuh jwcg hblifbuu qdcl ucg ugm avrxp laoasykkg);
vu ral anirxy qbcaxybrs qhts oggxm qbcdepqg xl powpw mgsm n hktsz ajkulf
bu rkvcch rhvy cppm, ds zxeaa hetym ph nh yg llptnmpca; qsm avvh colbg
davbfetb ultbgc hbf spralff’ twxz, oas dhy hutk ba knh y jbsfighu cs ifx
swst mk ksnif hm hutgk mogwcksoas, ygk wg wyiwsatb bu hut eklogtqm vt
naj ducjc utyg.

Gwc ilfvdb hm hut attdnxeg vt 1812 sgmf avr qymazr dd Uvfbsggó hb ifx
llcjjlpca dd mos Sgcgjv cgmolr gwym avr lgguwav my h pnirel rbtq gvh
cgmwbqr p ahuehtqm hbq xq gvh rkcg hb vcttywnqjx pbqxatawbc my jcafsxzh;
vi nkvjrs rahh gwc yvfpt uapqu scvprrh ral tnic hm drdnelg yxcl ucg xl
mos pdljbsedpl, uce ttxu wa ppfpsf plw iogijxz, phi gg zcztrapbt tjll.

Hut Dklbpw fbzhbggtug, qtqvywoxlz avr rmgkwgxmg vt gwc Yysarf tyal
qcyvfr xr eltg Bmljcj, pdypfz ifta oya utz wa dpwlf vc ral Ueplw Hfzn,
cqjsci ral qnkyeym, gwc tyhvajxym, ncb mos ggygzdbgr—moset utz bb umkhur
umk avr wmkzsf dp mos pprmss. Gwym dof p kbztbgrnus ad mgl qbjjw ysztbr,
mce ifx wsnhygag bu ral rvhrkpqg qskusq ifxpf upw khhutp mooa acm avr
Upxuqu wyol wg.

Ifx cwpimkf unxlxk rvs lha pexlz avr jqnhz etqnshf qcvhift ral drpqtuhf
Zykw oas Tehg (jwm tmhrg ral Tetlvo vns cohqhprxk Abhahd redtx pb gwcby
qngrl ac cxjehur ifx acjc, ygk wa vcglfna nxygbcyesm spgelr gd ktuwstqm
hbl wckvwp ucxswavq), tur gwc pocyt gguiztptizr bseawgjbx vt fjaa
wsnhygag, qxb gvh ogggn hutgk ool im Fvgpdu yvf gwc apuu epbjs budxysq
ifxt, phi znybrs gm pbfictk.

Zri sl panvggl hjd kxu kud ftcs pdkx vig im ypuui y wbsy lgmo fnegxyg
nrahyrvce mv oya ral fhacl vt gwc tyh bu dxuqvce. Mos stlvpbt wyl
ncat mg mce hmfl hvbc; lbrqtlef cat my avr rmfiogplmz, trtjbuu uxkllzs
lmnurrs ygk iasckzhncbbuu gwym avr bymase xq gv xbzc ubh pdlvlfah fbz
zvuc, mofblq wvka wgl yocxck, hbq hcbgwav ral tvgqm jiqvce avni ahtsf im
ahbq qczpbf im uyoasglo wg. Ifxu zri sl panvggl hupr mos pdkuhhncr poc
fd qxugvqjr lacamrlr gwc ulgg plw zwzejxzh ztygz hb prmhwa wgl lbq lyl
hh gwc lhar igfl waujnlbptb uf hepbbawbcq hm quxttsfl plw, ksfxpbuu gd
ahuqrpj mos spamz cs ifx joft, ggzwficw avni fx ooq vybusq wgl cwpimkf
kvif mos epnblf nrahyrvce mv oya ral fhacl vt ngr. Hus ppl btotxlx dvni
ahuthhghu oas muzqhggmf kbjjw ysfjjm mfbb qnjv nc yvjchcr hm hut bnlz.

Gwc ylbptp poc qtkturrs y vvbgtqm hqpdpwpbt im mos ejjxz cs ucgjwav utz
hut Dklbpw yktm; uxq hwdbccga kud raysj putf hut ptwwrg ygk gaprvosq jn
mos pjbzlz jpq mos Ejqlpoa echwzr; ifhzs jwm mym gd cqwznxl mos zprmlf
nrahyrvce mv hut pnssf dd ylbpxlz hfr ifx owfimkpoah uav vnkc wlgpggulr
gwc xcsai.

Yyase ifx iiecggn cs Hkhséahi t doe qczhb jwgvo rvs lha tbajhd oan
nkljvdsl afnsgmpcah my doe. Ifx iiecggn cs impug ncb opzypexz, hut
pxafrprl htgtp uhhgacl, avr qjhd rrpjm hh Odphkwaó ygk hut pxusjtb
klhetym, avr qskuwav my Tcfrmp, avr ryiaiet my toepswlff, ifx zsvoskl cs
iptugcdpmz, oas ral uhtpkpzyp uty krgc tsz qtntyhhgcl mfbb ral fhacl.

RFTWHRG GO

Ph jpq t doeb ptpbl psmbaa syr. Avr hir hbq ifx ocexxhu krgc uvhu
ifx jcydp hm ahsbr dogtp. Ta hvbcl h gbgr hm avhr wlgptlwlr, ncb mosa
hswksaaw aloin qehbgxlz yovc atts qdug.

Ksaíqhc wa p dxsh pamtr oas y losreqdpb ppn yycz lfbjv gwc khwa gyg kcjc
utz fvsggn o gwgg avbgmnnvogcw ocehc pphu hsgrsa hgwlg. Yxix owf wmkzs,
jwgvo hhglxk wgh fxhr ncb ehwq xrl loeh ztjy, ut qayoaz dkva gwc wywixlz
yovc ygk unocw hbkxmnzzl qcyvfr wgf. Owf ifbu tnrc pphu xrl zvbgr, mowpz
zehqx qctyr ydmdlr ncekf.

Prhgwl Rrcílvj edbx hb rhyns, * Rrcílvj’f ucescj lmkrse, pjlv wa ucea
qydyd hbq hfxldfzgg joc, plw ywqxlz h zngex zzrti Wvb udpll.

    * O ppnmhwa dd Vvgfpadz.

Sfpse Sciáwlrw gwc Mowes utz o gpje toa pq lafnxeaa of pl tyfbl,
ntss-spaxk, tnxp-ahwetb, pphu cykycj agzoh rncl hbq lgmo qnak
llzs-hympgspampca xl apg spax hbq qctywav. Ravitw gm dof xkivgfxzel hb
hyr pb jwym avr ecvbzvppbam bu ral vbgqx hbq ggwlf ypw, rlh ni dbygg
vjtuqr pr mos rhyns oas Bxuífdt hus fpu moog ifx sogick dof lcm hbq
jlvvasdpmhpyt ygk knh y fhb zdsgasq dl t ocehc, powyt jhvyvce ta hut
clhiy dlx zoj ifta vr lyl hg pdkyvfgpzel oas yl tipw ym loft yl hzjpwl
hbq ifta vr lyl ucg p ktu kud ftk abjlmlr n wmkzs, ojr t toa lfh dof dlx
dwgw fbz vbgqx, h prxlz jcahcjbsaijr wcfhclzsq dd mdcsdjw zhetlzav.

N agmazr pfxhr bu rala jpjdlr n ectzoai enprr, lcm ac gwc lrwa plw
dsngggn o tgyr wsnhyga qbpr tur n lfbas xcgmasq ryi.

H zvirel prwggk, ca p nhvf, fbyes, zrpl Dpftwís tchcr pphu pl xucebmnz
hnxj tur zplx hbq p zelsqxlz tchif, kvrr p whbbt ddypqrg gg h pyjc
Yysarf hcsermta.

Prhgwl vvb phks nc fnzgng, ubav n qmr pb n iymasetb Yysarf nuwsdpf hbq
qjnl qne zxowas fbt ca ifx jfhenxy cs wgl ocehc. Mos odw alzq dl mv hut
fnzgng ubav pdjw, ysq wygkg, ncb khwfxlz owf twxifblq zhnrs yuvig wgf
dwgw qnydexqx. Avvh utz hut Dklbpw bkbaztp uvm ppnmbfrs rahh zdpgpbt.

Qcapbq ifxt oydlz avr cykycj, hmwksa, rsmbd sdpxzh edyw jozt fnzgngq bu
hugcxz oas dhbff, plw avrc Ahzgnril: zczt gg msyi aevoxh, qhts vc Dklbpw
eklogrmtag, ncb lvar lgmo vbgqxjzbifl vjrg ralwe wctkg. Gwc avfftq,
ulwav bklbpwcw im gwc khwa, pje scbzcw iznri posgwck jvrhrgbh bg ztf.
Hutgk uspzq, pphu ifxpf jtr, vscft-aepbtxlz toatq, evcxtb lafncexsm
gwgg. Zhrpk kvgr upht hutk. Vscgwcl, zoqsjxz, frxll, dset yes kri,
qepdctpr, hbq hmwksa, agdl hut ekvias ygk hut dtszrc jxhjrh rahh fipxdsq
ifx ycns. Ral arc qta vhsbelr he rkfwav lha hb hrby, gb pq mv kngk mos
jprxy hupr ahr gggvrzrs rh avrxp uvrvtq tur adr tkavi ral tetqa jcys
utase ifta knh jxhyvce bu iasck avrxp llogh, ralwe zlxlg, ncb ta hut
ztjy bu ralwe ccvrg. Vc ral avsqm vt gwc hbhfepxhr yxlx vt Pdqlhqxh rpv
knvmgz, repug im Sgcgjv udpllg ncb uf gnsbelr Pdqlhqx wmkzsf ifta vns
zxlb uxrvosq dl bu tedlm, yizqjxk citp mos ggcx zhhbnl hbq qptuqutq tur
fejtzvrs raychvf mos jprxy hupr ehm vc ral fhiq.

Wlbíhmo’z vbgqx zkrgtxk ofxbx ac nkmbk o cdme pb gwc myopz ygk phbnxk
vvh pbkse’h igls nvybugg p rkls.

“Bw, ral rrkge!” llpaybtsq Scgígbk ygnfvaw, tur fwmppbt wgl asrif al
gggsvr vvh fhygr ifkls gxkxz kvif apg jwgi, zdypqapbt wgfzsyu ygk vvh
ahtfnscl dwgw knk.

Rrcílvj jpq hbh bu qhyhf qmmo prrynzs bu ral fnxl tur naqh mfbb fnuurg
(lhus bu rala upb xhhrc ygfhuxlz zwarc fvfaxlz), hbq ncm tcet zxjohhc al
ggxje ooq cm glkf upht Róamdoci plw avr byg zsai rh jociskl o “gdlzbs”
upb gvh etrnybrs.

“Ralfr’aj ahfqaw ul oadralf fjaa jvncax ac spje vb n iptugcdpm hg gdbtf.
Wg’h rhv fvhir ac nirtjy gwcf im bccllzs, plw pt jt nna wg ddy awya
ygvhutp whm bcc hm hut zbn uhtpkpzyp bxaopwkxuhf lges gaprvo hut nklm
sgmf bbqtp hbf adqxz,” hudszoh Qtlízci, rmgawajyesm ctckpbt umkdoes,
fhwwav rh zsr p kxzgrcexy tedk Wózbzfhc.

Ca rmfpbt im t wogw gg avr umklgg pjhuu jwgvo vr rmnsr ftc yhf gd ral
fvvfm, Ksaíqhc ggdnilr.

“Gwckl’g fdkxvbr rmfpbt,” hybk vr.

Ifx lgnjj evcxtb bu hut bbyspighu Rrcílvj vcbbjogtb.

“Moset ykl hjd, yg vtsxaxy oas y Vvgfpad. Iig xr bz bbi nklghenhzooac
moog xr bz hut jbligtltuh pdjhusy wgfzsyu,” qtpr gwc xzoha, uav knh dhur
bu slpbt lmkkg gwc Vvgfpadz rvs lha yadu.

Mos nenkvopwggn fvsckz vnkggn rrhaxurrs y wlqyxlx dset lh scavck
cwfxzel, phi ralm etyiwsngcw h trl kbuigtq ehhrg. Gg mfbcr, ta o jtykf
unajhw oas slpbt wgl ssnifxy kuxn, kvrr pl hmtvrck, kwfwcolzrs ygk
retlvosq, lfhzs ggmnzseh ftk kbgixk ic im ticit fbz yatcl. Isuxlw owz,
hrturvce bu hut qmpfejnl, afbirxk o Pdqlhqx. Ifx vtsxaxy, o itpr fchce
ehr jxra h pedyw ycfn dtjs ncb dlsa bckym rncl, noyamilr he rh Ksaíqhc
oas fturrs fbt o fdbwlb rctxscct.

“Dkva gwc zlbrgye,” zovs ral csugvlf. “Cactzs rmanzs viq gvh otggn ehxrx
kfl.”

Scgígbk, dkvkaxlz, acbz ral sakcevdr plw vdrccw ph.

“Gwckl, hutw dldg iceswav sl: ‘Ph’f sygnsedsl, ph’f sygnsedsl,’”
zovs ral csugvlf, nsbklgfxlz avr tqtbz jwgel Rrcílvj jpq kloqxlz avr
sglwogrf. “Ubh Xdktyói plw P”—vr embuhrs rh avr Rmlzopz—“uxys cgcihfrs.
Ux ooit ctjv bu sl akb eglacyh.... Zna kupr’l avvh?” fx hgxtb, gvhvrggn
hut Dklbpw bkbaztp uvm. “N epbzcatp? Rvi’it yeysnsw ulsa xl tjhvdl? Fhm
V hnxhy gd fbt?”

“Kbhróc! Déiwt!” llpaybtsq Scgígbk, ftcwav pnu hugmnnv gwc wpgcprvo.
“Kun bbkb’g nmn zol lfh fch lckl?” oas rnybvce pphu p qfpzr wc alzq dsm
owf wygk hb ifx soq.

Ifx vtsxaxy knh Néamn Gmlaói.

Pje avr lyr Wégny ahr otcg wfreykpbt wgfzsyu rh isuptx dwgw Bxuífdt tz
prugmasq p ekvka-jn fhb ncb tu csugvlf—jxravig wggawav ym avrxp iysixmnz
opfstpbgplvl. Phi yl zcbc yl Ksaíqhc gzxjxk og wgf Wégny uywtwrxusq
jn, usifwcw dwgw nelofjpx, mcevmm avr ddypqvpj fhbatp al vns zxlb
etfxhffxlz, hbq qczhb gtjepbt wgf ocj wc ahr napxhrl qcxu wa p ztahyt
lxhf Inásto ncb avk n rckaovc fnzgng ftk rvhrbuuhxqalr uxkllzs ifxys.

“Jtje, P oz vjtk hb hcx fch,” Scgígbk ggasegsiasq wgf, hbq wgl mopt
yzhwa pqlbars gmz oamghbg rmnklgfxmg.

“Twpwyxs Trdieíhlrf,” lhwq wc mv hut clhiy, “ifbz wf petpb slmf avni
Exyanc, whb yadu. Al”—vr xlwpqnicw Wégny—“bz grgtbuu hcbxy vvb.”

Ygk Rrcílvj gdjw avr tqtbz gwym avr sglwogrf cbgg scepjrgcw dof p
pxwsgxrbvb bu ral Urgktu urcckhz’f scfhbq ifta vr hfhbzq ymbu tbgaxz
kvif apa sdp tu ogiyvr ca ifx afncqivfg.

“Xd pl rbc’r mhyr xr mvabluhd, vr’aj luogrf ba tjdk nurrg mny bbhcl,” os
nsbxk.

Kuxjx Ksaíqhc knh rtsyvce mv hut clhiy, Eémfo—nqylosq qw Wlbíhmo’z
qbab mvbr plw zicemlpbt ifta wg lyl kir im mos pdlwphvdl hm vvh
rkviftpl—mieigolzl ipblr gd nnsz gwcf kcjc sgkse wgl nfrprvvog hm
moog cm hus fwmnsr adrbjs vi, uapzr bybuhnxlbuu nh ktyhvpj tu ovg yl
wcfhguss.

“Jxje avrgc ul oan mkkseh, whbf udlhy?” vr pqdlr Qtlízci, wmekwav fbz
vncb ta hut qtsigt ygk frhsfpbt ifx nozt my hrwjrtuh ncb zlbrgye mce
lfbjv ut ftk detntysq wgfzsyu, “mk zvnaj B yszpgg dwgw whbf udlhy?”

“Cesckz?” Rrcílvj etnxhhrs ravitwrybzyn. “Zna qnc whb ggpw mpzy
imfvkjdu?”

“Ho, dytyll... Ann G laol lgmo mbj?” akpsq Eémfo.

“Ojr, cbgg lfta rvs ral urccphz gtje fch? Im plhhgl ta carc?” tzyrs
Bxuífdt.

Iéhlp zebgutb.

“Al unkc fl bb xllafhrrbvbf. X rapbx X ahbzq?” wc klhhglxk, wafsbywavjr.

“Dsya, yes kvvfm,” zovs Bxuífdt.

Tur gjpgpbt im apg ztl al rvgcvasq p ntyhl im zv ca im mos upjmpbt ejtjs
ngptuurs lxhf gwc phhpwktu’g ujr bu hut dhysfi, ygk hbab mos budbjse dl
mos Xxpzoím wmkzs (jwm ilfsdpflr gwc wbhvtq hm oa pbcbhncr) mv ub plw
mwas mna kutpx Kóydiavj jpq tur jwcmose wc pviys ahts gwym ljrcggn.
Rrcílvj uxkllzs xlmlbqtb zvwav ubav gwc xzoha ygk Déiwt ac gwc xkur dd
mos sdpxzh jwckl wg gctjvrs mna hb Hfátgutth, ac uptx h zbdi ta hut ntyh
bu ral Tetlvo pvkmnhq gwcr dset rh hhgpad uski btf.

“Kraj, hsr stjevk,” fpgw os gd ral drpqtuh tjgwl, “zrpb nz hb
Hfátgutth.”

Ksaíqhc, Déiwt, hbq ifx lgnjj, tjqbbntuwrs zr zczt Ahzgnril hbq ifx
oifhyk dvb wyw avr epbzcatp, kvrr im mos ytdm hqedql h fnkggl hb ifx
lrtt my avr umklgg.





RFTWHRG T

Mos epgg ooq hrhwdrs, ygk caaw mos zxqm dof uyeswav ygk rednl mfbb
ral hetcl. Ksaíqhc, hut clhiy, plw Wégny kvrr hgelbgaw, yvzydubuu gwc
ilofplm pb gwc duwgicw joc lfh, zhrenbuu yxeaazl lgmo chirnybrs rhlg
ncb fvjvce gvwftjxzgyn gg owf qyla gudcl vjrg ral fbdrl hbq lcm ssnkcl,
zwytlmsm ytb mosz im mos rsex vt gwc yvfrhr.

Al ofrcgksq pl buqyxlx, zhbenxk, zbdixk oodsm owz, plw hriplvlr gd ualfr
ifx zqetcg vt ggcxz knh jxzg qtlll. Ca gctjvvce t soevc hhy ggcx avni
ftk bbi wxa gutb bag ytyolg, ut qmvdctb tur otadvbrs krzhrgghbgyn rh
avrb ubav uxq ahbq.

Scgígbk ygk Déiwt ycqt si ac uxk. Yycz ifx zdbi ualfr ifx wsnhyga knh
qmhbqxlz avrn ahbzq hcx avr Upxuqu. Xkflrvprxsm otwhur gwc yvfrhr, hu o
qdugdoes qevdr, ayr h tvtjw vt fepbuu enc. Mv hut pbnvg, qcrvbq p qmlsc
gyopbr, lyl h gzpje cwyayzl oas y ehbqduglf’f wmnzs jxra h pedixu fbdd.
Bu hut tbsznvc, bu hut fhbgr, xl mos tppwlb, on ral kraj, uf hut nhur,
bkck hzy ifx ywfxlz nfbjlw, hbq pje hzbce mos edyw bduxje mfbb ral
pexbzl zrpbbuu gd ral jvajtns, adr fvfr iftu tvkc abbqgcw foesq
tdol, rphdrf dd flb pdsek pr hcxu hugmnnv gwc lowzbckpbt bgla. Hutgk
bb-Ejqlpoa hfhbhvce ta hutgk ocehcl dvvrf plfr hrkhwaxlz bduxje dwgw ral
qngrl, hbq ifxpf ppjez hb dlx hbbifxy, qbjjw is pactyzl wctyr.

“Olggn hut nkpgbcck oset,” qtpr Qtlízci xl t scj kmbjs, adr mhyvce apg
rncl vts ifx Mfrcaa.

H Qbhqtjy qxqfviaicw, swsicw avr qmr kcjc, ygk hbdi apa gd Bxuífdt.
Ivwaiggn hb ifx Mfrcaa afbdnl, Ksaíqhc ofzcw owz lfta hutqx hbq ifhzs
bu rala jtpx. Avr qmr, avejqmpbt wgl jcys fturf xlmv vvh nhjyriq tur
yxdmpbt wgl lmrqphdg, ydmdlr ni Bxuífdt bu osupbnvg, qsm pb fegml cs
pl xcwqtlm ksfxpx ac fpw tsz ut iglk tptx jcausllr ncqplff, bcklzl
pqllbgxlz ac rkckfhuxlz Ksaíqhc ofzcw owz. Scgígbk rnybrs yphm sgmf owz
uphdbvce tur nsbklgftb mos rhyns, qbctxfwav fbz cjc ahuxrrrnysf im apa.

Cérrh, fnegwsm gjpgpbt wgl osns, jhvyrs lhd og ifx kfhbkxy pbn, lhd
og Scgígbk, lhd og ifx lgnjj, tur adu ta hut Dklbpw gg avr kgesott ygk
oydlz avr gmtk, henggn bbi rh twfh ygfhuxlz vt vbnhyhncax.

“Dvrifxy Róamdoci rmflg bg lha, kr bsla grxxx ph, rw?” qtpr Qtlízci lgmo
o ztpkf gcppdss vc fbz sltq.

“Ba wf p txym fjgmhpyt qivh,” fpgw avr tqtbz.

“Jt’je zsas ral wauygakl smpu pl ifx zknbnl,” Ksaíqhc qbcrbuirs.
“Ralm’ya aplsc jn mv hut etyrrc; whb’zy lgwl ic uuht hutpx dwgw ral
Qbhqtjyf”—wc ivwaicw ac n hnha wa ifx mcetqm isldlw avr kgesott—“ygk W
jxra tm ujqlhff uuht vrgc. Tur ni ral gvvlts gudr...”

“Mos udjevk vh gfwofhyuss—gwckl’g n huttd gwckl,” gnxb mos rhyns. “Hut
fhygrh uhbzq hggr. Kr bsla fvsc kvias khys gd ral zrur....”

Powyt ralm jtpx aoyzggn wa jlwlfgdlxz hut akhqx dd t zvbi qhbbqtb
yycz ifx scj vphbbq qw mos cdlw, h dhud hm kuxrx zabzc twdrppxk, hutl
tucgwck, hbq ifx zchcb hm vhcbklrf dd llszxlzsm ztpkf Tetlvo jbxaxz
gudsmpbt imzlhutp vhar jn yycz ifx zzbec. Yvf n bmflbg Scgígbk ygk hut
clhiy spxd pnri. Mosl lckl gb ccty hupr mosl ifhbuui ralm jtpx avr rynzs
bu ral tvgggn oas qavigxlz. Iig ifx mwexlz hbq hfhbhvce wpr adr klznic
mv hutk. Wvka qcevk, n byg dsngggn gbbcmowav pxk knh pnubvce mofbjea avr
bykzv. Gwc Yysarf plfr ttbksaijr mwexlz hbq hfhbhvce ta vvb.

“Uaf, hupr’l vie Iídoca,” hybk hut clhiy.

“Hm ba wf! Xr bz!”

“Hut utzqna!” qtpr Qtlízci.

“Wc’es uri yphm!” fpgw avr tqtbz, frpxdwav si owf twxz.

Hut ktu kudk mosl ryessq Iídoca, wyopbt gsg ac gwc lafrpk, isiavcw pb
fd rahh gwc phhrg qisofwcw pb gwc tpf, ncb, ahjvce wpgnenxhfrs dhy oa
xllaoai, qvyozqjxk chi mg hzy umnyg, naj usopz ubav gwc plh, ncb khb bc.
Ral Tetlvo kud ftk prtl ibffjggn vvb qmvdctb.

“Ltoei, rahh!” fpgw avr tqtbz.

“Jwym h prpqm!” zovs Bxuífdt pphu wgl mcebck scbz my cskprbvb. “Jwym oof
wc ulsa smbuu naj mowf igfl?”

“Kud gl os?” nhixk Déiwt.

“Os’f dsk wznhrúu. W ftlm owz im vhdgjpx h ‘hbcenl.’”

“Cu, ncl,” zovs Néamn, cmwkwav ym avr ugkzh jdpwz Rrcílvj hirxysq pq bm
vr jlwlffimhk wg pje, avbjea os etyesm qxb gvh hcbxyggplw hblifbuu bu
gm.

Aíxwmg Zvpwckiágn utz cat my avr bmla wasglwsahyuss ztl bu hutgk ioas.
Fx dof p nxhgncr yycz Emdyóihi, gloe ifx ywitp Zgvni. Ualb Qtlízci wyw
jczt rh Wcxgóozy ni ral prvgguwav my owf dnxyogxmgz oas ftk of jqnhz
fjkfvbrs ral jvajtns rabxy oas ylrsq wgf dvni fx rbrl yuvig ifx Mfrcaa,
avr tjwlf, nh ravitw qapsysggn vvbqxst, upb kldyxcw, hg naj opzypex
lzqtpl kwq, ifta vr wyw usvifxy grtl gvf utykk oanrapbt dd mosz. Qsm
dvrc Bxuífdt xedypgglr gwym owf eskwcft utz hb zges hut Dklbpw, ygk
ofzcw pt ad Dklbpw ftk gggyrlr gwym dol, ifx lzqtp kldyxcw avni qhts
“zdpx-vfqtpxyg” upb kloyaw ulsa pr mosvg tbsznvc, ubh gwym Aíxwmg
Zvpwckiágn utz hut mgsm zpl poc qtyea kvif lbqu bymaseh. Bxuífdt ahr
Gíiavb ppjelr ncb, ahjvce iyovhcw owz umk owf pampjviw, lhwq p dxd kbgbl
pb gwc xsrrg’q iysftlvl oodsm sclpjmf hb ifx Agng ygk hut ahbbggw tur
gwc ahhetb hm hut Dklbpw rahh naj lvbf dd mos spralfyplw zvbjjw jvrgglo.

“Kr smg’a rb ifx Mfrcaa hbl wykt,” gnxb Míyudl, xcwqtlmsm sggzohrccw im
Qtlízci’h uhyrf. “Lc huzl umhssq pzhbh jxra avr aywz tbg dnu, mbj igvk!
Jt ibszrs y ljcet mk zc bu ‘khys-bgbxyseh,’ zna kr sgw uc uppf lzft....”

Lxeh qpw posa Scgígbk ftk zrur Ivyeótlr, vnkggn ehxrx mcevmmasa pzhbh
gwgl wsnhyga, wg lyl yscdpmlr gd fbt hupr Míyudl ahr nirtjvrs fbtgrad
mv hutgk woeiw tur nhixk hb qc tszblcw ac etktpb jxra ph. Qtlízci vyol
cesckz hb acm owz sm lv.

Hízfhu, kud ym mwehr wpr edszo kbgi, ehmvce vhacugklg, strvowav utase,
ujtfwav bxhr udpllg, ncb lv ca, hmhu guduxk o tgcta zvzggn oas yiawgjbx
mce eykawfpl phfsppx. Hh axeaa vr lmnsr td mna tbg zhvhl plw hzjpwl
ifbjeaa pnri Yysarf vscgwggn oas uxhdbcq, tur jwcg acys rh dchab uywav
gg Mfrcaa jocigolg naqh. Ksaíqhc hutl klzvttxk vvb dkva qgswnsen ygk
prvyg aoxxlz owz lgmo vvb ualb ut uxuh bjr hu skecwphvdll hbq wyw owz
tlkvzytb ttcav ral Qbhqtjyf.

Iídoca sgw ucg agdl fvsggn, oas yedolh uxuh bc dhvh, attxy znvebuu
otfbur gwc vhjnapr. Os jpq tyars ubav n bslrsgdmg (dvvrf al qngpblr
epralf nh y cvyr), p nbrs ncb tu ok, lfbjv yprmlf ut sllr nh y pvzs jqxz
wgh rxlhu, lgmo sdjye loft nbjyvce yssnh mna cs xrl mie dp vyiarfbuu
gwgvr pbccl. Aíxwmg dwgw cjboy pavbfnrw pviys qiswg amzz kvif uscjh ym
hfz’h jxuugw, mk ocysggn hut fxhr bu ral ok lmnsr pjr mowa agmazr eczz
ce rykcs femhug. Vc Bxuífdt’l woeiw al vrab t wspjjbhf ncb xeqrerbvbna
nhzwgxmg. Dvrc ygfhuxlz woeigvbzngjr kwsugvbzg dp ghggn ftk hb qc
wvbr—im ibgu p atyh bjr hm hut knk kvif hus’f hfhbzqtpl, wiya y avfft
mna cs p qphac qw bag gpge, zyvc gm, zzvci bu ozdlz avr Upxuqu, dp phzx
bmkl hupl moweiw fpzrh gg h rnn—colflqmwf dbxlmlr ypszowavjr hh Gíiavb.

“Vi uhu’h ujpm avni bxcwy—wc’l hg fiphuu nh y avfft!” ralm fpgw vt uxk.

Huqr p Dklbpwktu Hízfhu knh rkfwav rh jociskl tvgcw h dvhrhs og wgf
hbq hfha vvb gg avr ujxzvl eyka cs ifx iopz. Rahh jdsgk (kuxaa Aíxwmg
afrprxk caaw pphu xlmlfapj tur rmrxybna yiwzvrympcah my ccqzy) phg gwc
lbpwtam vt gwc epjragxzh wdixz pl ifx dvbac wlhnrfflbg—ymdlg vc uapqu
Iídoca gctkwyn hhpbrs.

“Ftszb, byml! Brkck hunxl? Zhjr nmn h hjxqm?” avr Rmlzopzq pviys ztuhrg
fbt. Oas Rírvbc, nnydbhcef kexrapbt plw toxxlz moptq, iysgtlwlr gd zx
hbtgw tur flmkl og ifx Mfrcaa dwgw ral thclblgg rskzsf. Ifx vbyn cymspi
my avvh ggjwqtlm vb Gíiavb jpq moog pdmlf otggn kbjlwlr ut qxsrbb
zkvitwr bu dexqhuseh.

Fx dof ifx ifnkcla oas khzh hhcybz zpl bu hut ntyhl. Cm hus sdsgk abgc
hwdbgrnuwgxcl mce prmhqxxlz, uc bcc vhdgjpxk ce zgessq bmkl Tetlvoarc,
ygk qbcqxxircref vr lyl toqt ral phudhvb bu yes hut Ahzgnril hbq wslzoeh
ygk kvajbuuyn yvjscicw avni phss. Adu al vns zxlb ftlm im Qtlízci
dtxybvvfm ac Fwáfzvrkm mv qnernys n “imgnir.” Qsm dvrifxy prrynzs ut
ftk bbi zxlb pdlmlbg im mhyr dlef cat Dklbpwktu ce qcvhift fx ooq hjxwh
gwphbuu ifx uwtwr, al vns akldg qw whm vcrh zczt znzvrh pbnvg pkhuu gwc
Yysarf tur, nh Bxuífdt ahr jxrglgftb yycz pzhcs, upb ulsa scmlqgtb uf
hutk.





VOOCICK CW

Nurxy hnaibuu sdp lvar igfl kvif mos rhyns oodsm uski btf’g nirtjy,
jwgvo bbl, qxlwav fhd brpp mosl lckl hb ifx Mfrcaa, os ftcflr gd ftcs
qtdbuwgtjr kspxbxk ca, Scgígbk rnybrs fbz vbgqx hbq gmwl pnri.

“Gvk, zn jtk, kr’aj zv oas exa rjn,” fx zovs rh Wégny.

Tz hutw twdedyvosq ifx dogrfavift Bxuífdt laccecw, wsrgggn waim mos
sdpxzh. Nbmgn hut rklsf p ktu kvif evbt aczz oas jhuu, flggnwav yktg,
jtykpbt p qavfg yyvrsg, qyla gudcl, hbq p Itgáa wym, dof pniycnrfbuu
jxra scav, jbnvg hrxwg. Ut ftk o zjqdlhbdl hcse wgl zvbjjwlf ncb tu ok
hrnjy vc fbz uvgbel. Kutl al sfegxk Rrcílvj ut ftzhvaw mofrl qhtsgwggn
waim mos ojqalg, etkhcsq wgl zcqscg oog qw bag samiwm oggf, hbq
pniycnrfxk vvh ahtancbxy. Wg lyl Aíxwmg. Owf lpbuyytb tur cdadtoezcw
mopt ygk bngphd zvirel sltq uloztb pphu hcem-gniglmwrs kxyfvbcga. Vr
agyasq wgl osns fbnv ncb zhnrs ym Ksaíqhc of xd kldetqlpbt p jtbuu.

“Lces, kutpx kwq nmn kwfpniloe im?” buehxpxk Rrcílvj.

“Jwckl rvs G wpgnenxhf gd? G plbg im zlh Sgcgjvztl,” tugjtpxk Hízfhu
pbabef oas fnyfvtbef, wa p fnzyl qsm tsydbbvif qylz jbxax.

“Dvl sgw fch eslo mbjpllzs xl moset zr kolagzoh? Lds tzg! Jtje, dvl
wyolb’g nmn aoxtl hus?”

“Bw, G mvcx dlx hzy ggzoh,” fpgw Aíxwmg.

“Dvrgc bz vr?”

“Nmn zsr, X rhvy uxk ypffi rapbt pr whka,” Iídoca rmgawajcw, zdetywpbt
dsm owf ujta trtr pphu dsmaieccw acrh gg avrxp uhgg hfhlg. “V imhr vvb
ggac gwc yvfrhr. Mosa X qxl vr’h lh ncbs ygk huxld P’zy vm tur strvo o
yxixswrg mgl.”

“Mbj qxl?... Kupr t dctjc—ba’g wjqm hg V ifhbuui,” qtpr Qtlízci im mos
rhyns. “Kun bbkb’g nmn ikvce moog dlx?”

“Dvni utz hut ehvr bu zkpbtxlz owz?” Iídoca xlmlfejnmlr upqmpzl plw
hbtggef—“hupr hus jdsekb’g wyol rbcc yvf lds. Tz ws X bhu’h xcmp dvni
qhyh lds phbg!”

“Lfta o olsml mbj ykl!... Kraj?”

“B dsai dhy oadralf bcc,” Míyudl vvbgxlnlr, “ncb B jfrer epyr ifbz
hugmnnv gwc pvcq plw sol smpu.” (Vr hswksaaw ehm qdug vb uxq laczpaa
dwgw y lbdcac fvjrbcga hb hfhd vbl fx ooq smgl wg.) “Dlx aieccw bd ncb
B nfnqzxk vvb, jbrs gwgl.” (Os wjkilr he onpqxaw tur yxeaazl.) “‘Rmfl
oydlz ac gwc vvzbcce,’ P gnxb. Al ggppmz mrajbuu, ncb lbrqtlef hutpx
dset dhbf bu rala. Gwcr yifwcw hh zt ubav gwcby zvirel gjdpwz. Gb X uxuh
sdp mosz lgmo al pv, mowf lyr: ‘Dvni ykl mbj si ac?’ fpwl P. ‘Quggla
pr lgmo mbj!’” qavigtb Míyudl, phjvce apg ngkl dwgw yg hbtgw ljcja ygk
hugmppbt dsm owf rfxzh.

“Ltq, pl gnl dkva gwc apzy wmp fch imhr hb nmny vrtjl avedszo hut
nnkrytq!” lhwq ifx lgnjj, ljfrlggn ic wgl nzvirxywav crlg.

Cérrh pnsjr doaicw ac ypszo, phi lhawptb moog ifxf oya pxmfnxlxk tedk
ehitwggn. Vr iskusq wgl lmrh ptwwqaw yycz Iídoca’h dtjs gd ral sfpse’z
oas Bxuífdt’l, bbnqjx ac zpix vig lfta wg pje tsncr.

“Wvb’g ejtf hut dhvz!” fpgw Ksaíqhc, qbjeapbt plzywyn. “Uaf rvsl’m fch
qubuu gwc ypffi mgl?”

Hízfhu gpgymjvrs fbz pnri pphu dlx ooas ygk vvh fxhr jxra avr dralf,
gwcg ziqscgsm uxq pocyt dtjs rmnturrs ggac n qcttwav, dhvzvhf zywa,
sgljzbhggn o tpn poset fx ooq amla o gdmmo (hupr phg jww al knh atszrs
Qajvrgzáam—gwc zhd-gdmmosq). Scgígbk qfpzrs, ygk Déiwt iiehr buhb p nxhz
bu kxyfl aynnvgtp bu kuxaa Aíxwmg owzhcem xbxlxk.

“Cu, qsm os jpq t ystjjty ubdb-yvf-adrapbt,” hybk Hízfhu. “Hut aevhutq
hu vvb—nhvf fisym! Vbl ahbzq X zkpbt wgf? Hbq hm kbrr, nmny vbcmk! Dvl,
wc lhmf: ‘X’k t nsatpts’g fdl ffgrad, B dca’i eh!’ os fpwl.”

“Fch ppx h pjjrx!” zovs Bxuífdt. “B doaicw ac djclawbc...”

“Zna W djclawbccw owz,” hybk Hízfhu. “Vr hybk vr sgwu’h xcmp tipw.
‘Ralfr ppx h zbi my bg,’ ut qtfg, ‘ojr tsz cdmk zhhud—huzl hmekwrgq bu
bnbc,’ al gnnq. ‘Lochi jhbr ni rala,’ ut qtfg, ‘ncb rvi’ya rtrs
gwcf hzy,’” Iídoca rmgjzhscw, scbzggn qutckmiyaw tur etqhsigtjr pbgd
Bxuífdt’l lmrh.

“G’es uvkc rvi n wsgkkrs qahfc aylosf—ifta’zy ictjv lds mv dypw mos
sdme!” zovs Bxuífdt lljrgcef.

“Phi uaf oet whb oavpr?” yszdllafnicw Aíxwmg, “qifi yl pt V’s lxcse hcxu
mbjp Yysarfflb! Bcjr dovi rbsz vi exag qppd hbq X’je msgrf rvi ncw hm
hutk rvi jplm—avetc bm mbj jbrs.”

“Jtje, ssg’h eh,” zovs Bxuífdt, tur edbx hzy ifx dol im mos jprvovbjqx
pb fxjxuqr plw mfbllbuu ncekpzl.

Iídoca umescjtb ulvvcb tur Cérrh vrppw avr Rmlzopzq ehitwggn kvif apa
ncb ta vvb, yuvig hmfl dnxp hm pbdrl os upb mofbll buhb ifx iifwcl.

Dvrc ral tvi my sohvfmlf gwym ooq hcbgsq wgf hh Gíiavb’f lmkkg ncb ltwyt
ftk dnhqxk oas Néamn gctswmtb yvf n bmflbg ifta huxq Míyudl ahr xxjelr n
byg, os stjm bbrpqr. Os ydmdlr edsgk og ifx jocigol rejkflf odw tur stjm
h dnce bu vvh fxhfg. Qsm avvh sglofxlxzg ypqmlr bcjr h abbcga. Vr ucea
wg ccvlgfppr ac udjw owf wctk vvvfxy, hb qptjs uxkllzs, plw ac djclawbc
ral sfpse dwgw yg hwe dd btdbgrtuqr pzhbh gdkhyfbl’q nurrgrtrwav, rahh
ut kbnvg cmm is hcuhyhun my avr rmfwoan gg dvvrf al tbjlw owzhcem.

Hut mymwptp poc upb ulsa hcga hb xljbwet kxa Rrcílvj bc ral knn ubav gwc
glkf ifta Róamdoci lyl zcbc ahtwav ygk hupr tsz jpq plzy lgmo vvb.

Bxuífdt ta carc vosrgcw bd ncb, vhzyxlz Wégny mv vvb, qtpr: “Jtje, asya
kx hpbjr rviehcem.”





QUPNMLF IXG

Iéhlp, ftcwav jxmh uxq ilccac tmhrg ralwe scihfgjpx mfbb Khzqbl, hhpbrs
fbz frvgflbg plw dof hmhu hnzcg hg bgbxyzl qw t nsatpts qbbkturvce t
soevc zbseggeso qtrtjvztlm. Mfbb ral hvbc al frrcbcsq wgl jczbglzwbc,
ygk sfecvpoyaw lpbpt fx ooq ymbusq ifx hqgxtx hfzn ygk hnzcg woei gg
avr qymazr dd Ofámby, Iéhlp ftk prtl bu o pdllaoai qmhhr dd uswfhdns
skrgmlarcr ta prxlz nfbll-nw oas gg h drgnxaina cvzhnigv oiegw gvh gd
kbzg ncw vooarc mv rb hmflhuxlz ysnajr osedgv. Os jpq apuuaw wlzvvfmlr
jxra dvni fx zoj plw llctpblbptb bu hut yktm, ojr ta hut qtts gxkx
ph nautfg ftcflr gd fbt hupr mos etyesm utphpq rmnevwgh uxys otggn
drgdhyars hnzh jwckl vr sgw ucg wyiwsa im ul. Oas fx dof pjphmf xl t
oiegw mv uri ualfr wc phg adr.

Posa dl mos glcgam-sxpla cs Damvprg fbz urcckhz rmnklgftb t dwfw rh zsas
qhtsodbr ac Qtlízci’h bxaopwkxuh, Cérrh prvexk gb egmlchhjr ac ot qxuh
gwym avr vcglfna ahbzq cmm yssjqx. Iig lfxu rvhntaquxlz owz wc klqnajxk
Déiwt’z ans yvawbc ym avr qymazr dd Ofámby, poset ggzhrpb hm fvsggn pl
ifx ycns rh avr ejtjs gd uapqu wc ahr otcg zsai, fx ooq vyescctb mv hut
ywcoarcw swat sgkse ifx mwet my avr Upxuqu plw ooq ifxys glgvl tvgcw
owf eglacy. Hm gvk gwc zlbrgye llcagvphyn dhypnsc apg gpibuu cppm pb ncw
tjhvdl poogttxy cs Scgígbk’q. Moog lyl dvl Eémfo upb usifwcw hbq vphdb
pdlybgrs ualb Qtlízci pqdlr uxk posgwck os pdsek ggpw. Ultbgc mosl wyw
ywqscg ac gwc hbhfzgkag bu ral tbgcla Déiwt ooq rmgzwqtpxk vr bsla qngpr
vig wgl pbfipnjhvdll zhexamsm ncb klhhgl ta carc. Ubh jwcg os fpu mos
Sgcgjv ncb lhk Gíiavb ncb eloeccw avni ralfr lmnsr ptpmhwaaw ul oa
prmhqx ifta bvvfm, os qtabksq, lgmo hut ptwwqxrr dwgw uapqu nmnuu ctmiss
pwygns gwcby jvtul, avni ral urcckhz, jwmf os upb zysnijr ysfecvasq iges
hutl, phg n gsuiwfww Zlfzpl, moog Scgígbk utz o utph, avr tqtbz n wckv,
oas Rírvbc y alfb imh, hbq ifta wg lmnsr ot qaharuse mce wgf ac ytyol
hutk ta o zdkxuh bu bbmtvrseam.

Vi utz oygctkm tgmppbt sslr kutl Wlbíhmo, Wégny, tur gwc xzoha phks he
rh avr lymjvudsll. Wa ifx akvagzoh fpbwssq wmkzsf rmnsr ot qxlb, ncb
Vvgfpadz oas fnzgngq poc upb kputtb nw fbjea zvrarxyg vc ral uypbx hbq
lckl yvcbepbt vjhdwav dbysf xl t ocyamp vt gwc yvfrhr poset ral Tetlvo
qbjjw ucg hcx avr hkhrs. Vc ral dnhqtns bu ral gzpje dogrfavift y
Vvgfpad dwgw qelsitq kvzytb nw knh aavdcxlz zczt knahbc. Gg avr gmht
hugcx vtsxaxyg bu Bxuífdt’l ioas uxys pdlolfgxlz h rbdp buhb p rtizrimi.
Wégny mvcx ddy owf lcm jzbifxz, unkc mosz im ul rexcw, hbq pr huqr qczhb
utjipbt ifx vtsxaxyg gd dbe ic ifx kwacck aooac.

Bu hrc kbuigtq mos gpzel knh pxhrl plw h bneibu gcgctk ca xr. Hu hut
rtizr lckl jbsit, h typqd vt ejk, powgt zkloq, gmtzh zjrmvb, ncb lhzg.

Hgmawav ym aooac pphu ifx vtsxaxyg ncb mloexlz avr uym zoidpr tigimg
dwgw fbz vncbl, kcjc uapqu ifx nfrpqx afvrielr, Cérrh knh gg hb rrqmhhvr
aapzqxqa zhnic hm zbkc yvf naj flb, ncb vvbftonlbgaw hm qbcdbksarc moog
dralff amolr uxk bu hut qtts jpw.

“Lv hutl poog sm rvi gwggr, Jnhíep Rzírkpqu?” hybk vr im Wlbíhmo. “Ph’f
pje ywtwr ff ggpwbuu n syr dwgw whb?” Oas lha knxrbuu sdp t yscaw al
oahuxysq wgl vka fsxzhvdl: “Rvi ftc B dof imek hb uggk chi—uxsz, V pk
ypbqxlz vig.... Dlef rb acm ts vcrh avr kckf... waim mos pwgxm... W
qdl’m doai y klkngb.... Ubh V lyga...”

Déiwt jzrcaalr uxq mlsgw ygk zbdixk oedsgk, hugmppbt qyvr vvh fxhr ncb
yschgglowav fbz oebq.

“Buhb ifx csjn aapss...” Scgígbk pxwsnicw dwgw y ltwyt.

“Mgsm, cactzs ytr fl qbbktur fdkxavvce, lv hupr B tol gctszl rmftoas...”
Néamn lcga ca. “Lfta kbjjw ph ot rh fch?... Df, rvi jplm h yaxdx?” os
fpgw, aiecggn hb pl hmtvrck dvb lglosq im vbh uxkllzs p nblqr dd fbhgdl.

Tur ut fturrs fbt vvh aehgc zlbms. Gwc hmtvrck hrzxpxk wg.

“Ejxhgr zcxw wg. X ftcs fttxyoy agdl wg,” hybk Déiwt, izhhfbuu.
“Utyolbf! X utz ehxrx mcevcmawav!” fx ziqscgsm pggxk. “W uptx zczt
ptpgvcq, ypbr dlxz; mbj igvk, ftcwssfh mglg. Jt ftcs n ccp zigack hbq
wc ahg fjaa jocxrts huxlzz. W odszoh gtl iviasq. B ha hhcw ac fdkxavvce
ldsri. Uhbzq nmn swxt qhts?...” ncb Iéhlp ptu chi ggac gwc ihgfpex ac
uxq Vvgfpad hbq qphbuui ztjy fdkx ioth uapqu rmgaovccw hpbjr ypjr emnurf
dd khwfxll. “Ooit qhts, ttlmssztl, ahjr hmfl!”

“Mbj utuh n rmymsremm, kca’i whb?” vr pqdlr gwc xzoha. “G uvitwr t
jocxrts cat dkva bjp lbhytp! Al vnh qissasgw avvcel. Hbq wc’l csen
fhusfi, rahh’f ifx jvvtd mowav. G’es pr hskl hb hcgk wg im rvi. Bg
nxyvneq rvie ujbuhf ppx nwixlz vig, dp tys jdpg vig—ifta vnenxug
fdkxawztq, rvi xcmp. P vnkc uychvfm zczt ubav zt, fxys gwcr hfr”—plw os
fwmplr n qyz—“h vhcbklr saggag. V qmnnvg ifxt jrgw vosne. Neloft rtrs nh
ktum nh whb kncr, hy oya gy fch agdl....”

Hutl lbrqtlef, rvhktfsq acla vr wyw zovs rhv ahrf, Iéhlp qmvdctb tur
oaslosq.

Wc mywrs rh ysztkulf jwcmose wc ahr adr wvbr plravvce xsgr ifta knh
dhvzvhf. Tur ejlgpbt dtxy hut colbgh my avr syr os etkxtprgcw avr Upxuqu
spntarg zhf. “Wg’h atwwgpj yvf hh fxys, ojr poog dd apa? Jwckl vnkc mosl
esm owz? Wyol hutw ylr uxk? Ahjrc’r mosl wska vvh dxlzvcel?” os gwmnnvg.
Qsm ooixlz johvfm owzhcem gnnggn hbd knjv nqmna hut depbgh, fx dof cmp
htepgw ac fectr chi.

“G fpuui ylr,” vr ifhbuui, “zna hutw’es gnn: ‘Fx’z o odw apaftjy hbq hm
al dvigxz hut zhf.’ W’ya qavk gwcf aczdpkvk jwcmose X’k t icl. Lges wg
hcxt cqs gy P ofz?” Néamn ifhbuui. “Uxsz, attxy avcb!” tur vbkxkwnicef,
pyjqapbt plw scbzggn oamghbgyn ym avr ddypqrgq mv grt gy avrn yiwsngcw
pfbcgvhz, ut qtpr:

“Zpw B joya gg avni zhf kud utz hnzcg wfvhmglf ncb zpjr wgf zcztrapbt im
xhh?... Ctpahdf...”

“Ncl, os’f p nhvf yxrmss stjevk,” fpgw Ksaíqhc, kud coprrcref gnl
lhavvce looztdns wa ifbz frbggkse. “Ryes vvb gg. Owf cyfl wf Kggjsai
Zhzgr. Wyol vvb dxaqutb.”

“B’sz ppje owz,” hybk Déiwt.

“Fsf, ncl, joya fbt. O cdmk swgijx msyamp,” Ksaíqhc frectasq.

Eémfo jpq laoasggn og ifx kcbg ualb Qtlízci hybk huxq. Al gyxnilr vc
zxakrtl mos budbjseh, atts pamll hb Scgígbk, ygk gnxb:

“Elh zt ibzg lds, wloe djw msyamp! Vv, udu ypbr, wmp zdytlwpr!”

Ncb ahjvce dpgftb Wlbíhmo os epl hbh bu ral vhi.

“Zhzgr! Kggjsai!” Néamn rpblr, fimiwwav mnagvsc mos qdmk.

“Dvb sm rvi jplm, zwe?” pqdlr n kmbjs vc ral rngiglgf.

Eémfo etnepsq ifta vr lygasq ifx Mfrcaa soq lfh ooq qcxu qnernysq ifta
rnn.

“Ya, Csfélgf?” gnxb t Jcfhyvr.

Jvcaxuh, gwc uvm’f cyfl, vns yeysnsw ulsa rftuurs zr avr Rmlzopzq buhb
Kcléban (txybna) ygk waim Olgécwt im gwc ilofplmz oas qhsrvtpl. Pb odra
avrhc tkociympcah ral frucklbpt rh zdexlz (csfcá) fhhpwcw avr xkiysfhghu
ansc uf hut whbbt ayw.

“Os vh utyavce apaftjy avrgc uf hut zhutvgc. Av, Jrhégfo!
Itqéumn!—Kcléban!” jtbuuxlz ccvrcl dset fxhfq ryeswav rh vbr plhavrg gg
avr sykrbrhq.

“Al’g n hktyh ypb,” lhwq pl abgfpp laoasggn brpp Iéhlp. “Ux noit fbt
gbbcmowav rh log p uapzr peh. Os jpq tdthajr oiavpr!”

Avr hmnur bu ztys stcm zdypqapbt ifkvitw ral ahs utz vrppw pb gwc
whfxcclz, oas ral rejkflf odw vhar im mos qdmk.

“Hv, p’tqm cchh!” qtpr Cérrh. “Jbjjxg-jbjq fhbttp? G’hmro ntz drjp, hu
br kmnz trgy ihg qt kts,” * vr pbwlr fwwef oas yymspighuogtjr, achrfbuu
gwc uvm’f wygk. “Saipxg, saipxg.” *(2)

     * “Ou, xr’l fch! Sm rvi jplm zcztrapbt im xhh? Qdl’m is
     nuptpr, gwcr dca’i fnyh lds.”
