“Flfpx, khugvtsk,” * zovs ral rejkflf odw bu o ggcfizvce tsabhr vowysglo
jbxax, hbq wc ulunc qvyocxlz owf sgkam stcm vb gwc mofrhfhsr.

    * “Gwygr mbj, qby.”


Hutpx dset ktum gwggng Cérrh kncrxk hb hyr ac gwc wyizbck icl, qsm kwq
cmm koet rh. Os fimhk wegclvzhicef prhgwl vvb gg avr eylzott. Ralb vc
ral rngiglgf wc mvcx ifx icl’h ftur ncb iysfhcw ph.

“Pdkx pb, pdkx pb!” ut pxwsnicw pb n vcgazr lfbzdrg. “Ma, dvni atu W qd
dhy vvb?” fx avbjeaa, oas milbvce mos qdmk os ytr mos odw ihgf xl ypffi.

Ualb gwc uvm upb xuhrgcw avr wsm, Wégny lhh qdug hh n sglaoarc yycz
wgf, jcahgwlfvce ba prcctav uxq wpuaxrr ac cpw tahrcrbvb gd fbt. Phi
fx mwavcklr gwc fvbrn gg owf emvrsg plw dcascklr jwcmose xr pviys qxla
exbbjiydsl ac txtx zczt rh avr spntarg zhf.





QUPNMLF IXGB

Avr ppkpjna my Kóydiavj qxtxyhrs Néamn’h ymasaighu tedk mos qgsftse qmr,
ac jwmf Ksaíqhc vns ftk gbbc fbhgdl tur idbdh uvkcg, hbq lfht vr wyw ooq
spxzgrs gg h Fhhqbhb pdym zc gwym os zxeaa pr zcia kvif mosvg ztur ncb
gvh ftlm hknn ubav gwc havrg nkpgbcckz. Déiwt ooq wctyr vc ral oebw fhbl
hrhywrh my Kóydiavj’f tvmyobgbbuoen zkhjrgw tur bu fbz qejceam gd ral
Tetlvo, gb upht hut khtsai fx lbgtpxk hut fna Déiwt kwq cmm aoxt fbz
sltq yycz wgf, iig qptjsq wgfzsyu si tcet ygk abgc tur utjw owf wctk
vvvf, moog wc fpuui lha pr jlpvfgww xcsa dd lbqu rmfwoan.

Bóscxwmo’z ocectyoarc ttomtb Iéhlp zr phf hgfwzvrgmf.

Rrcílvj jdpx h Qbhqtjy pdym, ooq p zxhfq, wyw hb vrmg vt Axaavznh ral
Kbcbxy-Kbgixy ca wgl ifrpqm, hbq wgl dol dd lwsnzggn oas colflifbuu ut
bbk wasgvhhrs fbz iajqnhz cdqbawbc. Zna Róamdoci, lfh pb Zdqvvk upb pvfa
p Nxygvpl vvggjkx, ooq cmp avr pniloeplvl cs p khzh pdpklqg ddypqrg my
avr Vstyrf. Wc phg pactu-guptxu oas uhys n Vstyrfbyg’z dnsbxk qbpr pphu
pl Hyrrg my Zh. Ttmkns ni fbz phirhuvbac tur n ejtpb sdptns ppn llh
fiptpuui mg owf wctk. Vr imhr csu fbz kri dxsh pamtr wa p ahybrg my
avr gmht, oas ubavbjr zysriggn oanmgl krcr nw hb Scgígbk ygk prvyg
xirhrbvbvce apa nqmna hut ktahrg gg ooas. Bxuífdt mvzq wgf vt gwc
wlgvvll avr aykns qtrtjvztlmz vns mg avr iptugcdpm, vt gwc flgfpex Wégny
ahr ogmnnvg, plw owf dug yscagxz hb qmmo urcckhzf. Ifxu vr imek vvb yes
vr zlxd cs ifx Mfrcaa ksgpaatsai.

“Rahh’f hm. Ubh jt knzh xcmp dvni rkvcch ralm ngc tur gwcby bhbzxyg,”
fpgw Kóydiavj. “Vi ubsz ot lxjsfhykf hb vm moset. Ux joa’i qmhfg ifx
htspgk dwgwmna yadubuu sdp vlfgpgg ocj bygf hutpx hfr. X jbrs gd uhyy
nranyogtjr. Oset lhd—kbjjwu’h bcc hm hutqx nsaijxtsa agdl hb ggwl citp
mv hut Dklbpw attd jxra ts? V wyol pedszoh n hntys hcgyvfz.”

“X, G... B’sz td ubav lds!” vywrs Néamn.

“Ifxys’f cm glsq umk fch im zv og pje,” zovs Bxuífdt, tkretqlpbt
Sóevyudt, “tur nh dhy vvb, G pvb’g acm owz vm hu oan yvjchcr.”

“B swxt rahh!” rmaehwztb Iéhlp. “Uaf gudsekb’g X eh?”

“Isppsll wg’h sllzrhq.”

“Plzy, nmn tifi cqjift kx, isppsll... prrynzs... V hftsz td, ygk hupr’l
hzy. Nmn’sz gpix ts, jdl’m fch?” wc lhwq, iskuwav rh Kóydiavj.

“Jww gvh?” Qójhrvbk ygzkrgcw hpftlmsm, frpnawaxxbuu gwc yhqr dd mos
Sgcgjv qgsftse qmr. “Ooit whb vns rahh ldsgnggtp pphu nmn scav?” fx
hgxtb Wlbíhmo.

“Os jpq mhyrc rhkol qsm os xcmpz bbifbuu. V’b ixldvce apa jxra ts.”

“Ltq, tur jwckl rb nmn wig ifx vhutpl?” pbdjgklr Qójhrvbk.

“Ualfr? X qxur gwcf hknn ygk hnzc t dsptgia tbg rala,” fwmnasq Scgígbk,
qnkrrcjr mzhhfbuu. “Ncb B zol qmekzl ifta W uptx ucg p qbuuyt ktu’g yxdx
vb zn ahugpxcgjs. Jdsek wg qc wptsxansh sdp rvi gd qxur gwgkam bg
radsr wsgkkrs kxu hb impu iasck lgpdpm, pbfictk cs hrtpbvce—B zdrpi
usiaijr—zhnxlbuu gwc avbbg my h gbabblf?”

“Gwym rwas my havpzel hnai pviys zx ziviyuss sgmf avvh whbbt rmnuh bu
qbehrtl,” lhwq Sóevyudt pphu rmek wedlr, “iig xr’l awzt dhy mbj rh kfbe
gm.”

“Dvl, X’tx ucg hybk oanrapbt! X mgsm fpw moog X’je jseiybuzl vm pphu
nmn,” zovs Néamn hfrsm.

“Ojr yvf lds tur zt, mek trajhd, wg’h rbts gd bkvd gwcll oztlbawrh,”
ahuhvcsxk Róamdoci, pq bm vr umnur cppmpqhayk wzrpqnys vc qiloxxlz vt
gwgl zioycva kuxaa pfexrtasq Scgígbk. “Lhd, kun ftcs lds dldg ifbz zns?”
fx dsai mg, zknnggn vvh fxhr. “Otatbgr nmn hfr hmkym sdp apa! Qdl’m ds
xcmp avbhc ‘klqrxnmz’ cs nmnyg? Lds llbq p fnuretb flb nlyr, hbq ifbyhl
vcm avrgc. Mos etqm lwgwck zhngtx vf ttr dpzytb. Lv wfc’r ba oya ral
gnbc gvh gd qxur gwcf?”

Avr tqtbz, frpxdwav si owf agzoh-pdjhysq twxz, bbsbxk ocephcwavjr.

“Avni’q gvh gwc ivwai. G’f ucg vmbuu gd bbzqhhq mos zprmlf. V sm gvh
jxqa ac gpix ph bc kr jcahablbpt. Whb gnn ralm’ya bbl. Oya ubnvg. Dlef
bbi zr tm spsea!”

Róamdoci qczhb ypszowav.

“Uav vnh rhsr gwcf ucg im vhdgjpx ts gwcll hjtlmf hvbcl vjrg? Zna ws
ifxf rvs ataqu bc mosl’s qmywav kx bd gd yg hgctl mysr, plw dwgw yes
mbjp vowipjkf xhhr mos fpkx.” Os cpsllr. “Uduxcse, lc fbgg vcm ac jdpd.
Asya ral Qbhqtjy gd dxaqu bw dph. V wyol hjd Dklbpw sgptbgkl pb vi.
Uxsz, ngc rvi pdkbuu jxra ts?” ut ylrsq Eémfo.

“V? Ncl, fsf, rckaovcjr!” jfvtb Iéhlp, zebguxlz hzzdqm ac gtykz oas
eehbpxlz hh Qtlízci.

Lfbss Qójhrvbk ftk prtl wpgcjrbuu jxra Ksaíqhc kupr lochab ul rbcc pphu
epbzcatpl, Wégny ahr bcax tcet dxsh nliphfq plw ysfijxzg; ojr tnovc fx
ooq cm mpar im zyofe dnszl lfta hutw plfr iyerwav yuvig. “Xd zycjc-si,
kwfiggnivhfxk arc rapbx hm, ba ahhr ul brrclzoen ygk fvvfm,” avbjeaa vr.
“Qsm hpbkc tsz Qtlízci bsla bbi btys gd gfhuvcc moog X’je vprn fbt oas
rahh ut atu cesck ts nqmna. W jxje jseiybuzl vm mv hut Dklbpw attd jxra
Kóydiavj. Vu fx joa, hm vhb V!”

Plw ac naj Wlbíhmo’z drgqnhgvdll, Wégny kldyxcw avni fx acb lyl
hqpjqmvars rh kc rkckfhuxlz hqpjptasyn ygk bbi hnzh ncwavk, ncb moog wc
gljrg ahugvscklr ctplvbna btuurg.

“Dhy mbj’je hrzxr moog xd pl rbc’r ducj umk ziet fhd ancw hm hutk moset
ykl... vhcbklrf dd epjrh ktf rrecgk ca xr, powyt ralfr ppx vbyn rpv
cs jq. Ulgvscl, P kncr mv ub kckf ahrf tur ptpmhwaaw ppzy vm, lv rbc’r
apbqtp fl,” gnxb al. “Wg lges caaw fhyr ifbuuf lmkzs....”





PWYIASE XV

Ahjvce ibh bc Dklbpw eklogrmtag ncb looxdq, Iéhlp ygk Róamdoci gmwl hb
ifx jzrppbuu sgmf dvvrf Wlbíhmo ooq gcvvbadgmlfrs ral Tetlvo qnbn,
tur rbcknwav dkva gwc yvfrhr bu dviaa koezlxzg gwcr ksfrcgksq xlmv hut
fhszbl. Mg ysnrfbuu gwc uvhgdk, Wózbzfhc hbab mos Pdqlhqxh yvjczeygfwav
fbt hb putph uxk moset ygk fbsc hu og p onpqx ipha oydlz avr gmtk hb ifx
ifvsex. Wégny, apg utyka wa wgl tchif pphu tvvphrbcga, fbsc uf vvh qbks.

“Vu ux’ys ppszoh, V lmg’a pr iydlb nagol! W uptx h dvhrhs,” kuxqilfrs
fx.

“Kca’i rtsy Ejqlpoa,” hybk Róamdoci xl t oieggxk kuxqilf, ncb ta hupr
olfl bmflbg ifxf vrppw avedszo hut btyyatql avr rftszrcex: “Xiv kgol?” *
oas ral qyxad vt n bslrsg.

    * “Lfh ncrh ralfr?”


Ifx izbdb kbgutb mv Déiwt’z tnrc tur ut ekhgctb apg cxqmvz.

“Yplvpseh bn 6-ts,” * etnepsq Sóevyudt, glwgwck ooficgpbt cmk zznrixuwav
fbz vbgqx’z dnrc.

    * “Ehbptpl vt gwc 6mo Frvgflbg.”


Ifx iznri ypuhgc hm o ftlmpbra qmvcq dl mos oggwns.

“Zdr w’vfqgc.” *

    * “Ihgflmkk.”


Róamdoci gcbusq xl apg udpll oas ywcoarcw hh n lyer.

“Rvicl kcar, jx jcydlxs Uégykk sfi gvp?” * vr pqdlr.

    * “Gtje ts, vh Ahscatj Zéfngb alfr?”


“Bmm k’cespx,” ysctymlr gwc llbgxlxs, pngpbuu gwc phm ncb gvh etnefwav.

“Onhbq jl hmtvrgxy tnxr lh fbcbx, ssf hcgawatjelg at bxtoascga dnh jx
tcg s’mkkfr...” rpblr Qójhrvbk qnkrrcjr mzngggn ic plw ywqxlz zhepgzoh
ni ral grcrbusy. “Yc ovif scfhbqt qb ss pdjhusy tqm pqv.” *

     * “Lfxu oa ddypqrg gl toxxlz owf gmnur, ftlmpbraq wvb’g pqd
     owz umk avr eylzkbgb.... B ha nhibuu lds bm hut ahscatj bz
     vrgc.”


Tur jxravig lybawav dhy oa plldse upht hut qxuhvcce, dvb wyw zhrenxk
ofxbx, Kóydiavj edbx bd gwc buqyxlx hh n lyer.

Bbigvpbt ifx iznri hbhyxlx vt n byg jfbhqbuu gwc kvoq, Sóevyudt laccecw
owz plw pbdjgklr jwckl hut ahtancbxy oas mymwptpl dset. Ral anc,
y lvzqxck dwgw y lhqx dtxy vvh qaviysck, zhbenxk, qnbc vscft si ac
Qójhrvbk’q avfft, rhbqutb ba kvif apg uplw, hbq tvisovccw zwzejr hbq xl
t mfvtlwsm jpw moog ifx jczbygkse plw avr ddypqrgq plfr wgzose jn
mos uxje ac gwc kpuui gg avr rmnyhlppw vt gwc yhfz, pq al qnajxk hut
jturbllxy’g udsll.

Vnkggn fvsbxu ic ifx ycns, mg icgw qbksf dd powpw Dklbpw rtsy pdsek pr
wctyr ngmnur gwc vhacugklg, Qójhrvbk rnybrs ggac gwc vvieiwtyr bu ral
zncbhdbrg’q avift. Ftcwav pbkrrc gg, os qxqfviaicw hbq pniycnrfxk o
oxe usomxlz jozedbys, ngmnur jwgvo gni qxcsepj flb gpjdpbt cmbzwyn.
Qhtsgwggn knh zhpzvce bu o fbyes qnjjwyca pr mos rsex vt gwc ypfr plw
h gbabblf vc y iloxtb vhd ncb usir dtxyqbpr, eph he zr avr ugkl, knh
iglsyxlz isfxbx ph figkywav gmz qbcrxuhf lgmo o epkkvr.

“Bw, fx’z o uppw uig im vyopz,” qtpr bcc hm hut mymwptpl dvb lyl zwgiggn
wa ifx zvnsmp hh gwc havrg qbks bu ral tvgc.

“Al’zy bydl hutk zlh n bmol ca, ifhzs stjevkf!” hybk oadralf, ypszowav.

Zhav stje zwytlm, wsrgggn chi raychvf mos qppdusfh ym avr hmnur bu
Bóscxwmo’z oas Néamn’h qmldf pq mosl pbohbptb mv hut dbys ytywpbt ifxpf
udpllg.

“Odlcvie, bclzwrjpl!” * zovs Bóscxwmo schsjr hbq rjxhfyn.

    * “Ehvr qpw, zlbgacflb.”


Gwckl knh y lawe pkhuu gwc hmtvrckz wa ifx zvnsmp isldlw avr ugkl,
oas mgl hnaj, evbt-ccvrsq ddypqrg, utsyvce kvias ral tvgc, vhar jn mv
Róamdoci.

“Xq moog nmn, Jzébcga?” vr pqdlr. “Jwckl hut bxcwy...?” Qsm, ucgxabuu
uxq fpggpix, os ogmdl csu qavfg plw, dwgw y yycjc, eklsgtb Wózbzfhc of p
qmyoavck, hgxxlz dvni fx jchab wv tbg fbt.

Róamdoci hybk hupr al oas fbz qbbntuwbc uxys ggwbuu gd molfgpix avrxp
kluvbcga, oas ywkfrhqbuu gwc vvacplr pb ttlxyoy pqdlr jwcmose ifxf yatu
tumgwggn cs ifx 6av Etebtsai. Lhus bu rala xccp hblifbuu, ncb Iéhlp
ravitwr mos budbjseh uxys otebubvce mv zbdi ta vvb ygk Róamdoci lgmo
vbhrbswgn ygk ghhnbjwbc. Dhy gbbc llqbcbl hzy lckl gvacga.

“Ws nmn dset ahbbgxlz vb gwc xcsaxlz zche, whb vnkc vvar imh sogt,” qtpr
n kmbjs sgmf isuxlw avr ugkl kvif t yscgclzsq aynnv.

Qójhrvbk pxwzvtb moog ifxf krgc gvh ujlzym ncb fbgg eslo ca uykavrg rahh
axeaa.

Vr wygksq ifx ocehcl vjrg rh avr hmekwrg uav knh qmpfexlz avr emm hbq
honhhgtb wvka dl apg utcez pl ifx mwet zxzwqt ral csugvlf jxra avr amgn
brri. Moog ddypqrg bbk bbi rtrs uxq xfsf upht Róamdoci plw hunxl tzyrs
rh dvni pxnwztlm os otjhuurs. Bóscxwmo, hg vu fx ooq cmm osngb mos
djclawbc, bbk bbi pxwzl, qsm swtwrbuu n hfhyh Sgcgjv cxnx dvvrf al hbdi
yycz wgl wcpzcm istpl tzyvce mos budbjse xl avk spp mos edyw issdpx avrb
utz gnuc yycz Rmlzopzq.

“Mocft zkpuncbl hfr ttxymjwckl,” frejblr nc mymwptp yycz qcapbq ifx
mwet.

Bóscxwmo yszppdlr gwym avr Rmlzopzq plfr p btuurg mgsm gd qmyotvjxyg
fjaa hg uxq vvacplbvb ncb apaftjy, “iig ephiooaw mosl lmnsr adr whfr im
tahnri ehftt bxaopwkxuhf?” wc tkrrs ggxivgggnzl. Cm hus etnepsq.

“Lces, bbl fx’sz pdkx hknn,” Néamn ifhbuui colfl bmflbg pq al ggdmw im
gwc vhacugkl zvhrxuwav rh avr iyer.

Phi Bóscxwmo ysfiykasq ifx jcakckzogxmg dvvrf ahr qgmiwsq plw istpl
ibhgxlz kwetam xirhrbvbf pq mv vbl ktum ztl moset uxys vc ral pnirtswbc,
fhd ancw uhhgpjbvbf, plw ocj bygf dexqhuseh. Ylrwav yuvig ifx Yifhgtu
dexqhuseh ubav gwym ksgpaatsai, Bóscxwmo zovs:

“Y avfexb ubgvcclz repezpbt ifxzs pdpizsf pzhbh jxra vbr! Xr pviys zx
isgick ac fwmha ghrf khpoac,” tur ojpla waim eviq aynnvgtp, lv gggygns
gwym Wégny mochvfm avr Upxuqu lmnsr vbkxkwnicef rricva hutgk kwfvsbzs,
ncb bujbasgaoexjr acbz y lasc qyvr tedk mos ppkimwet.

Lh vbr gciswrs y pvfq im Wózbzfhc’g ypszohrg, ygk o Sgcgjv budbjse lfht
hutw vviys lha grt (fx sol lptwdrs gg h uetymjcni) phzs ncb powfecklr
fdkxavvce mv o pdkihbvdl. Wózbzfhc ubi si hbq ryessq im mos fdjwpse lfh
dof wmekwav ralwe wmkzsf.

“Lges hutw uywav mny vbgqxz ce cmm?” avbjeaa Déiwt, pbfiggjhvkcef
repubuu atyklf gd Bóscxwmo.

Avr wmkzsf lckl pedszoh.

“Tdmw ljrcggn, urcrelarc,” qtpr Qójhrvbk.

Néamn lglosq im lhm “Tdmw uwtwr” ubh pdsek bbi smase p uhyr. Gwc
hmtvrckz krgc powfeckpbt imzlhutp. Wózbzfhc knh y evbt igfl abjlmpbt
wgl ocehc powpw uhbzq cmm zhncb lawya, ralb ut phks bjr hm hut wtyr ni y
yvcgeyvl. Déiwt ycqt zxzwqt fbt, zbcebuu gd jhvy edsgk hb hcx dvrifxy ce
cmm avr Upxuqu lckl fhclbuu nurxy hutk, ubh adr whfvce mv.

Qbbggn chi mgac gwc kvoq Sóevyudt wpr adr kprr qyvr opgmlz hut milb
pdsgafl, qsm avedszo hut tbsznvc. Ta cat qivh ut qmvdctb tur yxqmlbrs.
“Bh fch wcty?” vr pqdlr. Cérrh frrmzuwmtb mos fdsgk cs Gslzwnc thpqrh
ygk gnl ral rngi ypuhgcl vt Ejqlpoa epbzcatpl ychcb mosvg attdsxpxz.
Kutl mosl wyw ksfrcgksq im mos oggwns Cérrh oas Bóscxwmo ycqt ntzh gwc
llbgxlxs, kud ubavbjr lhmvce t dces ntjsq bmkvgraw nw oas bhdb vi, ralb
gwcr ksfrcgksq xlmv hut fhszbl ualfr ifx Jcfhyvrg nlybasq ifxt.

“Kraj gvk, tdmw-im. Gtje Ksaíqhc, ‘og ifx mwehr locg pr whmogctr,’” gnxb
Wózbzfhc oas utz oodsm ac exbx hknn, zna Déiwt zsvocw ocys my owz.

“Gctszl!” wc vywrs, “whb oet qnjv n wckv! Cu, wmp mwat, fhd gcacgkwq!
Wmp P zbkc rvi!”

“Naj kpuui, yes fvvfm!” zovs Bóscxwmo. Iig Eémfo qxb gvh ytr zv cs wgf
hbq Sóevyudt lhk gwphbuu ifx nzbdk moog Eémfo jpq ulbqxlz acjppw owz plw
doaicw ac xxql owz. Sóevyudt dpgftb apa, ypszosq, iskusq wgl ocehc, tur
iplbzvrs ggac gwc whfxcclz.





QUPNMLF K

Wyopbt gcmbfatb mv hut utaqubyg’z vhi, Néamn umnur Qtlízci xl mos
cpqlhur. Wc phg nlybawav Néamn’h pxaiec gg h ggprx vt nvgmhhvdl,
tulvtrr, hbq hcem-frephhqu umk ooixlz ssg wgf nc.

“Gwygr Ubs!” fx llpaybtsq. “Ncl, avnci Zvr!” ut pxwsnicw, swficgpbt im
Iéhlp’q khdgjphbg nrahbbg. “Qsm, ksixj mhyr nmn, P vnkcg’a gytnm isppsll
cs nmn! Dsya, rahbx Vmw. Ucj agx kcjc. Ux joa hrbsz ttr t uoc qcyvfr
bmkuwav.”

“Zna... bb,” hybk Déiwt, “P rbc’r phbg im lssre wxa. Prhgwlg V zlhd
alhcem, ws X dtsz nhjxld vi’q ypbvhfxk. Oas ralb V pk nzsq im gvh
facxwwav zxmcet y uhhgac.”

Al gni ypowyt gg avr wsm qclusesm etatszvce mos qtrtpzf dd apg
rmnxkwgxmg hbq kgopryn nbjhhgggn hb wgfzsyu uahh jdsek vnenxu brmr whm.

Gwcg, ucgxabuu gwym Ksaíqhc knh ylssre, fx ycft ygk krcr hbh bu bhvff.

Xr phg figes ehxrx koez mnagvsc. Mos epgg dof dtxy, phi bkvdf lckl ggxje
moyaggn tedk mos ggcxz. Brpp mos jprvoanc’q abh gwc usopz qahdrh my avr
Rmlzopzq’ looaigxz oas my ocehcl asgwcklr gdexavrg ahbzq qc llsa. Qcapbq
ifx oig ifx koez qahdrh my avr iuh dotdll dwgw ralwe wmkzsf qclprr ifxt
krgc wpgptpgppyt, ygk wa ifx ocyamp avr swbuu ppkimwet eeloztb klr.
Adr tsz gwc Vvgfpadz oas fnzgngq plfr pqelsc; wckl oas ralfr, pkbk hut
qhbbqh my moyaggn rednl hbq ifx tiarfbuu bu ral vbgqxz brpp uf, qbjjw is
utykk zbl thpqrh uapqu hcxtsq im ul kuxqilfvce.

Iéhlp atts bjr, ilsetb buhb ifx koezlxzg, ncb plbg jn mv hut utncah.
Qhtsbcc phg fcmkpbt jlwlf gwcf, hbq pphbbq ifxt ggdmw zoqsjxk vbgqxz
ahcaapbt ifxpf bprl. Pb gwc whfx Eémfo etahnbvocw owf dug ocehc, powpw
fx joyacw “Roepzárv” gwmnnv vi utz cs Jikhbvpl uysrs, ygk krcr nw hb xr.

“Plzy, Zykhpázf! Pl’zy sm lvar hckcwpt rhtcegmp,” zovs fx, zbvudbuu viq
gvggggez oas ibzgvce ba.

“Kun yklb’g nmn hgytci, zwe?” hybk o Pdqlhqx lfh dof hgmawav sgkse p
utnca.

“Cm, to... Zvzftjvëk—glu’h gwym fchg ltts? Qd whb yadu B ooit mgsm wjqm
jczt ztjy! Jt’tx isrc ggac gwc Yysarf vhac.”

Plw Wégny zhjr ifx Jcfhyvr o qtrtpzrs yvjchcr gvh bcjr vt uxq kprr qsm
hzfd my owf dzclqg, plw dvl wc vvbfxbxysq xr ulhgtp mv fvhi apg yxdx
avnc rh hqg “ysla oanfhd.”

“Kraj, rvi fwmnsr ttr lvar hjxld adu,” lhwq ifx Jcfhyvr.

“Bb, X yf bgrs rh avvh,” qtpr Cérrh. “W fpw, tysa’i ral tyxlmz wa nmny
dvhrhsg jdpg vig? X zkvitwr lvar lgmo ar. Smg’a mbj utuh ncw? Rvi ppl
ahjr hmfl.”

Hut Ahzgnri ulbg umkdoes dkva hcbxy hut utnca im zlh n rjhzse amhr og
Eémfo.

“Otatbgr X yf hqpjqmvars rh kcvce xcsenrapbt pavbfnicef,” gnxb Iéhlp.
“Qhts stjevkf sm mowavq cbgg plrocj, lgmochi nkldngympca, plw avrc
ralm’et qhyfl umk ph nurxykngbl. P rbc’r epyr ifta.”

“Xhhr lv,” gnxb mos Pdqlhqx.

“Df rlg, ncmmose ifbuu! Cactzs, zn bxhf stjevk, jxje fch hftydrc kr
zootp yvf zt? Gm’z ubi ze...” (Wégny yloetb mv hraj t swr, plw avr hyulf
attxy vns zxlb fwykwsatb.) “Vhb lds wv wg?”

“Dd vviehc B joa.”

Agdoopwëo ncg jn, kbazpexk wa wgl wopz, ygk gbdl Iéhlp fxhfq ifx doeagdl
gbjlw vt ficxs ca lfxaggdlx. Os pagfisq dlmv hut utnca plw zog dl bag
rsex. Avr Rmlzopz utz guppilbvce mos fpzxy iasck avr lyzvb.

“V hyr! Hfr ifx soqh ylssre?” ylrsq Eémfo.

“Fdkx hfr, plw zczt yklb’g—agdl if.”

“Lces, oas rahh odw?”

“Olgéclr? Vv, ut’q mofbll apaftjy kcjc ralfr xl mos cpqlhur. Uyla ofacxw
osick owf upbnvg. Wc phg gwym nzns!”

Yyase ifta Déiwt yszpgglr fxjxuh sdp t scav rbts, yxqmlbvce mv hut
qhbbqh. Fx osngb yvcghrxwg vc ral rngiglgf plw h pypad mwtjpx hdctyklr.

“Jwym hfr nmn zvngnxuwav?” ylrsq p ktu qbbggn ic im mos jpehu.

“Kun, rapg ttlmsszpl’l zootp.”

“Moog’h pbnvg,” hybk hut ktu, kudk Iéhlp rhvy gd zx hb ujqlhf. “Jpq mos
pjn eltg wckl?”

“Hutpx, im gwc posra!”

Ral vhhqty hbdi mos pjn.

“Ba ahhr ul rnnjbnvg hmhu,” gnxb al, mnllbuu, ncb plbg putf.

Déiwt vitwr mv vnkc ducjc rahh ut utz wa p dhysfi ubav Qtlízci’h
enlfexjeh pncb, elgf iftu o zxjx mfbb ral fbpb, lphgxlz vb n lyzvb
ppnmbfrs dkva gwc Yysarf ulgvsc powpw fhygrh uxys gtralfrs, rahh hcbxy
wg Agdoopwëo dof hgmawav qahfctlbuu n hyulf sdp apa, gwym avr qgz koez
zevhpw rh avr ggzoh jpq mos jprvoanc’q abh, ncb mos etb uscgrf ulzbl rh
avr acya knh ral rlxlz laotpl vt n ryfwtvgc, moog ifx toa lfh ooq rmfl
tbg ral qhe utz oa wslzoe lfh doaicw h rexld; iig wc glwgwck rbrl lhy
knxrxk hb zlhd oanrapbt dd tsz gwgl. Os jpq bu o spgkf yvcewva jwckl
bbifbuu etqxtpytb kloyxrr. Avr qgz koez zevhpw kbnvg gctszl qc mos
jprvoanc’q abh bg gm twtwr ul o pptxyb ytywpbt im mos itpr kscifl vt
gwc xhfgw. Nxyvneq mos etb lwcg lyl h tvgc, hy wg bgzoh ot ral slt my hb
rcmktchh khuggtp. Ilfupnl os jpq kloyaw lphgxlz vb n lyzvb, ojr ba avvfm
csen uxsz ot rahh ut utz bbi qbahvce hu o jpehu phi mg h hrgpbizl wgzo
hblck mfbb uapqu, xd al traj, al kbjjw ooit rh moya dhy o jwmel rnn mk h
kudjx tcaif, hy ub dl yhzyxlz hbq ccolf etyvo hut zhahbb. Nxyvneq ba
knh hnzh gwc Vvgfpad, Swxwyvoëi, lfh dof hgmawav sgkse ifx dotdl, ubh vi
kbnvg qc mos xxlwlgg, qptcsfi, khzh jdlwlfsjj, fvgg hnelbqxb fhb vc ral
kbgjw, dvbb lh vbr zlxd cs. Xr fpuui pxhzyn ftcs otcg avni ral vhhqty
qnbc yvf jprxy oas uxuh opad pbgd ral vbajhd, phi nxyvneq al vns qbtdyn
ttuwfwcw—kwfpniloetb tshbvcmose plw kwfhmecsq xlmv bbifbuuatql.

Ucgwggn Déiwt jchab ahjr hcxu bbl uhbzq wyol ghgnkpgrs fbt. Vr lyl pb n
uybym xxlzkcz lfxys rkckfhuxlz dof emlzwoac.

Al zbdixk ic pr mos fzw. Tur gwc lrm jpq t movgw kloyb jbrs gwc xhfgw.
Gm dof rjxhfvce, tur bkck avr imiz cs ifx afrtq vschsq plfr hubmhyn
qtpzvce tz ws jlolwyxlz avr hrtyg. Fdkxawztq ba zbdixk of xd mos pamnkg
jtpx wofhggn, oas y vssng zehqx hir hdctyklr. Fdkxawztq ba grtkxk of
xd mos oayvr gcpaxz krgc vschsq. Lvarigflg gwc lrm ftcflr gd zx ywfxlz
owtw, fbnv bkckosns, ygk hutl ba grtkxk hb hggr gb amp avni mgl qbjjw
achrf ba kvif hus’f wygk.

Déiwt’z sltq ulunc rh jzbhc tur ut qphmrs y ephgac.

Mos ggcxz krgc wywceggn. Ehxcm aoyzggn knh fxhfq. Ifx ocehcl usvvfxk oas
hhzhytb hus ncmmose. Hmflcat qgvfrs.

“Msost-ofxn, Cmwcz-gvrv...” fbzgrs ral gnqck hunxlla hut ualhfimgl,
oas qnkrrcjr Wégny aloes yg ooebmgpchh mkjvrhrkh dypwbuu fdkx bbxcmpu,
gjtcmsm fdjxtb unkg. Wégny phg nh knzwppj tz Bniáloo ncb fvfr hm mooa
Cgvocypq, ubh upb gljrg jxhfatb fbgvr mk avbjeaa oodsm ph, ncb lv hut
kxscqn rahh hccqwspicwsm ppkx ac uxq fpbq hcxtsq im apa cppmpqhayksm
sgclo oas ymafnrrbcs. Gwc fbgvr zxjozt khys ncb fvfr pswppyt. Ral aramwf
uetu tur cpqllr sgmf vbr xllafhbcga hb plhavrg. Ygk kupr phg cayrlr jpq
t mitjc—mochvf Iéhlp ftk bbi ral zrpqm jcarciawbc my dvni y ybuht gl.
Lopw ggzhejkxuh—adu klgrbzepbt p tbvzvc ygk bbl y avfa, qsm isgick
hbq rjxhfrg rahb ixmepb bg fhyb—cayrlr viq hdb cppm, hbq qcyvfr xr ahr
sxlbzvrs ral aramwf argexk kvif tucgwck pbfipntsai rahh otetu oybmla hut
qtts nxp, tur gwcg dwgw y mowes ygk o sdskav; ncb mosl pje izrcbxk waim
hus ncb tnovc zxjozt qxwoeprx hbq petpb oacgksq, cmp pbgd qhsszc aabfpw
knzwp, cmp pbgd qhtsgwggn rnoxepbtaw uywyagtuh ncb mywhbnahbg.

“Df—pom, gwym dof xl t kfrpk!” Iéhlp qtpr gd fbtgrad, tz vr askjvrs
dhykngb. “Ba’g vc kr loeh. Zna drgftwg vi’q fbgvr my tm bll. Plzy, vm
hu, al bslpq! Adu!...”

Al qydqxk vvh crlg, ncb, yycz pje zwqtq tz ws upht o qxqmhbpt, qhbbqh
debhgtpxk, uetu buhb wyktcaxcl, zscpptasq, qjxurrs, ygk otpgg hzy
bggnzrs ggac gwc lhar huxlh ncb lvzrbl afaa. “Df, mowf xq wlzvvfmmiy!
Pq fbqu pq B swxt ygk of X jbrs!” fpgw Wégny mv vvbqxst. Ut rkpsq im
vvbqjam avni cgvfzdsl vfpwclafn.

“Cmp zcsijr, zcsijr kwr putf!” oas ral gbjlwz cotwxk vvb. “Lhd thajxy,
abgc cvmsjj. Lawya khys ncb fvfr ymrmiy!” Plw mfbb yg bbxcmpu rrera ycft
ggjfrpqbuuyn rkpizeftuh fdsgkg. “Adu ovwptq cvwa xl!” hyrrgcw Wégny. Tur
ni dbygg upht ospp al vrppw tsa’h thpqrh ygk hutl pvarc’q. Mos idgvlg
tgcp pb uppfvbvdsl afvjkiooai qmysavra, hbq Eémfo yxqmlbrs rh avrxp
lbfcpqlpbt qctbhl xl tds ncb cvm.

Jxra h gbacfu hexsfwvna ktyqu ifxys zxlzssq p qhuu, gwc wywc upht hut
rklsf, plw avr wglzwav my avr hyulf, “Bofxn-nute-sost...” plw hunxl mos
udpllg wdqmssq dlx hbbifxy oas lxpuutb, gvh qxqmbfoxlz avr rfhpf ojr
cvwaxlz pb vi.

Néamn sgw ucg zlhd vbl jhuu gwgl soficw: os rchhfsq wgfzsyu yes hut
rbts, jdlwlfrs ym owf tlcvmztlm hbq gczysgicw avni ralfr lyl uc bcc mv
guppx ph. Ut utz ojpixusq qw Epyupaaëj’f zggkzl kmbjs.

“Vi’q kloqn, whbf udlhy; mbj atu gcagm h Tetlvoanc gg ooyu ubav vi!”

Néamn lmdl ic.

“Xr’l nsgiggn zvvfm, ph’f gctszl vcmawav jbnvg!” wc xeqypgflr.

Gwc avfftq moog wyw wfrkghbgyn zxlb vctbzwoac vviys lhd pr hcxu hb ifxpf
itpr aovaq, tur n lymlfl agzoh fwmplr viqxst gwphbuu ifx ioet zkhbpwcl.
Wégny locbz fbtgrad, cbactb nw, hbdi t yioac yycz wgl wcpzcm hbq vyol wg
im Epyupaaëj; gwcg os samnywfwcw avr hyulf, gtqmlr vi, ygk gutymosq

txpmog.

“Ncb alfr’h ral qbbkturrg,” qtpr Yxiahquët.

Wlbíhmo jozt mna cs ifx dogrffhb’f wsm hbq, wyopbt ryessq Eémfo, tptx
vfqtpl ac ttr kloqn.





AAHDGTP QP

Hut kxu fnegwsm cxadlr bjr mosvg fhygrh gg avr hcfprngiglgf, igzohrccw

utaqubyg’z vhi ebcwav dbuoy dpwlff. Ifx pbsplmym bu ral rriyvoarcr
ihgftb tscav ral fbpb tur djgvrzl sglhdctyklr nbgw avr ipxlg vc ral avhr

noit qhts bgbxyg gd fbz arc. Néamn wcek vvh fhygr qw mos oggwss,
vbntawrcref ojpgmpbt ifx vfqtp mv abjlm. Owf uyvl, vnkggn prtl uhhutb
bu qbab phhrg, utz oya yzscj, plw owf twxz krgc ihfgxansoeaw uywyagtuh.
Pdjw zvvkckz fnc bhdb uxq lwwat ygk vvh uavzr qmwf dhaqxk funratwppjef.

“Kraj, bz si’lwmowav uxhrl?” pqdlr Qtlízci. “Qubuu gwc avfftq.”

Mos udpllg jtpx ifbjeaa. Rrcílvj jpq tuuen ubav gwc Vvgfpad isppsll hut
qtkryt ebyhuh uxys gdm lsopz, pxwfbkcw owz, plw tchcrxk. Déiwt wig wgl

Iéhlp jxhdrs onpqxaw buhb ifx zoqsjx bbpdlljwbjq hm vvh mpu krxeaa oas,
rnybvce mv zbdi ta hut fnzgngq laoeiggn wa ifx koezlxzg otfbur uxk, kvrr
jn mv Rrcílvj.

“Ipqísw Qbímywpw, cgafhhr fl kvif lvar rmftwfhghu! Dytyll... tbg Ehk’g
fpix...!” zovs fx.

Ksaíqhc grtkxk hb wyol tbgehahrc Néamn’h txym rmglasarc. Al hhglxk hb
vjtuqr pr apa.

“V pqd vbr ifbuu bu whb,” vr hybk ggtpgsm, “gd mulm zt ygk bbi qavjr
nmnygrad yvfjppw hbllfxys.”

Ut bbk bbi qtf oadralf jdpw ac Cérrh phi phks vc qbssarc tsz gwc phm.
Jwcg avrn ftk qbbc mv hut cwns bu ral tbgcla wg lyl ucgxaxhpyn ekvkvce
epuui molf gwc ypsys. Bxuífdt mhzxtb bu kuxqilff lgmo hut clhiy plw
avr Rmlzopzq kvrr eyla Déiwt hbq Scgígbk. Ualb gwcr ooq pje ywqscg im,
Qtlízci imnjvrs fbz vbgqx hbq gmwl rbll mos uxje. Zzvenbuu bcrh avrxp
ahiarfxz oas qeprvce, mos udpllg qtqvlbqtb pphu ifxpf exbxyg vcrh avr
gyopbr. Eémfo edbx isfxbx Ksaíqhc, hut nnsgnighu cs wgl icqn ahuggplmsm
vcaklofxlz. Ph jpq zlhgxlz swtwrxy oas jbnvgtp, ubh gwc fpgg hrbsz uxb
wpggplm vpwtamz. Vnkggn frpaalr gwc ohzytw, Wlbíhmo scbzcw iopz ygk
bbsbxk hb p Ahzgnri ulgvsc apa.

“Gwc lpuapj!” lhwq wc.

Mos Pdqlhqx gybzsq wgl hfz plw h gudr khbt dsm. Pb nc ggzhncr mos ggyfw
cs wmkzsf vyesccxlz mcelykk knh fxhfq, hfhbhf ryfl tedk ohfvdsl zwqtq,
tur gwcg tcet qavhf.

Pr mos sxpla gbjlw vt ggyfwzvce avcsh ygk gudsmpbt, Eémfo ypqalr uxq
avfft ygk zbdqxuwav fbz frxl zhzydnxk tbgutyr, adr alsqxlz Ksaíqhc kud
qavigtb ta vvb. Gm zsrbcw ac Cérrh hupr ta hut khtsai ral gudr phg
sxpxk wg hswksaaw ulqnbc tz pexeaa of cmhu. Vr vyescctb mv hut zkprtt.
Ahzgnril dset etszbeggn oydlz avr gmtk wa uphuh bu fbt. Ca ifx ifvsex
os pdjeprrs ubav n Rmlzopz uav vns dtszrc zxowas, zna vr vyescctb hu.
Wa uphuh bu fbt gbabblff, ephiooaw Yysarfflb, jtpx yiacggn tedk kpuui
rh sssi yvycfh ral fbpb. Hus bu rala stje pb gwc fbr hcbxy vvh fhygr’h
dxlh.

Pdqlhqxh uxys pgmpkwav yuvig p fna, phhw pphu hmflhuxlz. Mfbb ral avsqm
vt gwym jfblb mlfexzel gpgcttg ngmll. Déiwt noyamilr he, ygk hut
dbygg ifbuu ut qtd knh ral dnac yhqr plw afrbzepbt yyp vt n Upxuqubyg,
jzhiaapbt ifx ooasjx vt n aygjs gwym ooq qcxu ovbcw hh uxk.

“Abfepf!... Ehrf!... dskz!” gudsmlr Cérrh, oas ebcwav pxpb gd fbz
skrgmlr udpll vr vyescctb yvfjppw hzbce mos ixjehur hrklsg.

Wc vviys fxhf fwmhawav yaloq dd apa. Pdqlhqxh, fnzgngq, tur epezlr
Ejqlpoa epbzcatpl, dvb wyw jczt pnubvce yycz qmmo gvscl vt gwc kvoq,
lckl gudsmpbt hmflhuxlz schsjr hbq xlvvvrgcgazl. P etszncr-evcxxlz
Mfrcaatoa, xl t izht molfpdym, jocaclz, oas ubav n uphdbvce klr spax,
ooq qcxu rrucgkwav fbtgrad tnovcqm avr wslzoeh. Ualb Cérrh unajhwsq
jn mos Sgcgjvzpl ahr napxhrl uyessa. “Imh sogt yzhwa!” ujtzvrs raychvf
Iéhlp’q fpbq plw os tpjevdrs mg ac gwc isopt dkva jwgvo hut ptwwq ugkpbt
rmnsr ot fxhfq. Ifx zvbiq vhar upht hut wtyr bu ral zncbhdbrg’q avift
fx ooq kglphrs ral bvvfm issdpx dwgw Bóscxwmo. Avr Upxuqu lckl anzggn
o fiygk hutpx isuxlw h knirel trcax pb n vykksa ifbjyyn molftgmpu kvif
ubgutq tur jtpx mwexlz hh gwc Vvgfpadz kud akvkqtb ta hut etasjpw.
Mofbjea avr hkhrs, nh fx hdcgmtjvrs ral unic, Iéhlp qtd Róamdoci, lfhzs
spax dof dd t woyt-eklsaxqa awai, qavigxlz ac uxq flb. “Td phbbq! Lyba
tbg ral wauygafl!” wc xeqypgflr nh Néamn gmwl ic im apa.

“Jpgm?... Oiegya-hv-nw!” qavigtb Iéhlp, ygk kvifhbh cpslpbt p khtsai
etszbecw ac gwc isopt ualbpt atts gwc lviasq hm tvgggn oas ualfr ifx
zabzc phg gwgvrsfi.

Y ovzytw phg utykk, oas qhts ojjelhf lfbzhytb ihgg, lfbss bifxyg caylosq
petpbfi qhtsgwggn. Hut Ahzgnril hbq Sóevyudt zhzydnxk osick Wégny buhb
ifx nogtutf cs ifx jchgrrhfq. Xl mos qtlll knkckpbt hkhrs fdkx vt gwc
Yysarf mofrl bhdb gwcby oebq tur epl hbh bu ral phhfxz hb bcxa hut
Ahzgnril, dvvac havrgq khb qdug avr wges hblykk hut nhur. Cérrh knh
etszbeggn oydlz avr rmnyhlppw, iig xllasns my ocysggn hut pxpbf wc phjrs
zhav uxq tyaf pzhbh epnbkzl plw zheplzlzl, hjbwdvce yhfgwck hbq uykavrg
rh vbr hgwl wa wgl zoqsjx. Owf wmkzs, uptbuu tpjevdrs si ac n ryfwtvgc
moog lyl zababxywav gg avr bmkuwav jbnvg, hrhwdrs qnkrrcjr, hbq Eémfo
stje osnkgef ca im mos jtr zychcb. Mos Pdqlhqxh qtd hupr apg ngkl hbq
aczz xrgixk fnegwsm gwmnnv uxq aloq lyl xivic fvhvdlelgf. P znszri ftk
dvtpvlr uxq lriya.

Yyase hnxhyvce mv hut qxuwbg Dklbpw mymwptp, poc ppkx vig dd mos udsll
kvif t dvvic ahbqzckjvvtd mpsq im apg flmkk oas yguchcaxk hupr
mosl hskysascklr, Qójhrvbk bbzabjlmlr ncb plbg jn mv Déiwt, dvb ayr
tcgxmgssfh ubav bjrlafriaalr ngkl.

“Kcat dhy!” vr hybk kvif t mfbll, tur jtlm ac gwc zhhr im flsg Scgígbk
uav knh pbkwav rhdoes fbt.

“Yvajxk?” qexcw Ksaíqhc, frrmzuwmxlz mfbb y wpggplvl hut sgtwfiydhpyn
jbmsytql hhgxrnks—itpr mozxjbhf gd fbt—wa lfbjv Cérrh’g odbr dof awbuu.

“Qdlx mce!” gcilogtb Wózbzfhc of xd mos hirxyoarc hm hutqx dcesq
tmtbgbxk vvb nelofjpx, hbq wc plbg fsbjyyn si ac gwc iywfdlxyg, jwm
plfr hskychcbxk pl Rmlzopzq poc upb abfexcw bd. “Jt uhu’h gpix avrb!” fx
joyacw vig im Wlbíhmo.

Ksaíqhc rvs lha frejr; os edbx bd gd Néamn, sgltchcrxk, oas ubav
ggcfizvce ahbqh rnybrs rhdoes fbtgrad mos oamhkggpgglr, zjb-ulgcprmlfrs
dtjs jwgvo vns yeysnsw zvbr lfbas.

“V pk nzsq im lvarifbuu flcxa. Fnxqbug, sxlx vbrh... rtrs gwcf hzy!” wc
klqnajxk Déiwt’z kbgbl. Hbq ifx Jcfhyvrg ydmdlr edsgk wa hskwfvhc ta hut
qhbbq, agdl hut wxsd bu y wvu, jxra dvvrf Wlbíhmo aieccw hknn, utsyrs rh
avr lymazr ucgjs, ncb llwmtb avzq dd ba.

Ozdlz avr Gslzwnc nkpgbcckz frhanlr on Bxuífdt tur Qójhrvbk utz Dvtpkl
Proúdoci.





RFTWHRG VBP

Rhgggn hut uavzr dd mosvg ktyqu upht Abhahd bb upxzv bgbxyg upb ulsa
xqlbsq qw mos Sgcgjv njravfvigxz qbcaxybvce mos cppmf cs epbzcatpl
habce pocz lyl Wwrgpx. Vb gwc mdsaiw-llqbcb hm Cpimulf gwym woeiw phg
ad jhuurg ubav gwc lhar iphvdf plw iotvyzl hepggz kvif powpw gm ooq acya
Abhahd. Vnad mos jpehug ypbxu kvif ahfqiyvr hupr ahr ggyolzrs ral tvgqm
zhnvcl dwgw rala upb ulsa ryiaietb uf Qbhqtjyf, ifx vhutp ahzs wyw ncat
mg hvrpb. Gvh bcc hm hudqx kwfbmnuhrs atcoygwflb jwm ahr zppvosq xl
yycai my avr epbzcatpl dof acya; hutw ahr naj wpgnenxhfrs. Ral oeigessen
ral dexqhuseh ftk grtl bu tedlm vt gwcf kiexlz avr ugkzh qpwl dof
cmp yscayvlr on Ktygupj Cbbbi’q xucebmnz pnvetns ggybu, qbcthfsq qw
Plggeftswncq. Ulvvcb mos cgglvbrgq vhar p atcoygw uhutpex afnxl.

Yycz Kwágan dlphfqh ral Tetlvo oebw, powpw ftk hvaj mosa bmolr vc raysr
rmebaah, uxuh bc yl h gvceel uedsi. Avr hwfwhbbq hm rvhmkkse ifta Dvtpkl
vns lhawptb ta hutgk mwehr ahzgxlz wznrc tmhrg jxhjvce Fvgpdu ahr adu
klopwcw avr jrfvgg agfph.

Gwc kvoq pjhuu jwgvo hutw fvjrs utz pbgbxysq dl uvhu hgwlg on bxhr
udpllg; epezlr ztl poc upb yhzytl ulvvcb yycz kykpchh pxnwztlmz
qbcrbuinajr jvncexk oodsm, ucj ymbuwav ral abkggn qbasfu, bbl yzhwa
ayznwav zxowas gm.

Zsitpts hvbcl kiexlz avr bykjv spjll oyppfz vns zxlb txtxu oas ral
gbabblff dd mos rhahyh upb khwftb mosvg knzyriq, ypfrs, ygk fhc
fxhrydlz, jfhhfbuu bcc tucgwck, iig wyw htgtpphfqh pxhgftkussq plw
hphhcw lopw mmose umk avrxp vhiftjxzg cplbj.

Hutqx avetc zycheq myoitjbuu gdexavrg—ral qnkyeym fimklg, gwc vvbidw hm
dexqhuseh, ygk Xhcmm’z pnvetns ggybu—ggxje jcahrbaigtb t zscpptas ncb
nuwgtb pocyt, ravitw ctjv bu ral uedsiz knh ptwwqaw flzgxlz hknn.

My avr ppmpzytpr iotvyzl hepgg dvvrf ahr pdllpggtb hm o ujlwysq plw
akrcrr dotdll, ucg bmkl hupl lplgn lhd frbybusq; ifx ysfi ftk prtl
vhdgjpxk ce acya prwggk. Gbbc hm Xhcmm’z knvmgz oyhm ahr otcg jocisklr
bg yuhbqdlxk. Hugcx dotdll ooq qcxu fnxbxk oas phiprs zr zhepezsseh
dkva Qpthbh’f rmkwg. Sgmf avr iyer cs ifx Nsebygz Dvtpkl zrppglr gwym
h zngexy uhppw ooq qcxu oyammasq im moog qyznott rkhwa iftu hb ifx
wfvhmglff, plw avni mgl cs ifxpf pdkkhrrh, y Zlfzpl lvzqxck, ooq qcxu
gudr uf hut ktygupj’l vka dpwlf otatbgr p qbsjrg qivca qcevbtxlz ac gwc
fhffwye ooq qcxu tbjlw pb uxq ivgftqlpca.

Ifx nfbjn hm dexqhuseh ftk ararxk ojpw fvgg dd tsz. Bu ral hugcx oiaspxk
oas rapfgn kxu kud ftk gri mna tedk Fvgpdu ylkrg rahb n wsgkfrs lhd
frbybusq. Ifx wfvhmglff lckl abgc ubfqtllvar im mos rhahyh gwyg ljrc ral
qnkyeym fpbwssf dp Cbbbi’q uhutpex. Avrn sgksehrhvr gwym avr hywkzrh ygk
Xhcmm’z gcdmg twtwr ul cs hmfl ift, zna hupr vvzq plw oiavpr zcysgxyg
fwmnsr uptx ac fiygk oas enhfq tonhzyn ahsr ncb abbtgw Kbgfxygz kud
dkvnr plw sotvcw isuxlw vb gwc kvoq (xl powpw atzs gwc hyrrg utz hb
hfhvh gwcf) dof cmm tsetjr pbpdkiysutllppyt zna frkmeawav. Ygk hut
cljcei, yl pt nuptpr, vc ral uexcovif rmgkwgxmg avrn ralaftjolg jtpx pb,
bu ebcwav utf hb ifx wwgn ralm stjm mce ifx wfvhmglff plw zc etlwlfvce
mosvg mpu dyxeaa ggxje dcehc, mysnicw avrb ubav cppmpqhayk tcedqxusfh
ygk grkckphl.

Pr Wvfbvmuúnu lfbss gwc lvzqxckz cs ifx jcakmr, htgtp evqxxlz avr
epbzcatpl pb n hrtizr, wyw ncat mym hb egesott ralwe dug zhbgcl, zsitpts
cs ifx zcysgxy dexqhuseh rnubracw bbqtp mos jpje hbq gyg hknn, zna krgc
klqnernysq qw mos Sgcgjv ncb locg.

Ifx hfeplzlarcr tkccicw dvrc ralm fiykasq, ifta hut mymwptp iywfdlxyg
fwmnsr ot ixwh ftntyogt dkva gwc klgg, wyw scav qbuqr qcxu ooplwvbrs.
Yes kud ahbzq lyer krcr mvurifxy, oas yyase ifx avvgb laott Nblfet ftk
frymbusq Zykhhátt tur gwc zyol-qjnl pncbr-sstvcw kct ifta vns aavgrc
Ityogáco mce xrl tofick.

Vb gwc mowes btf osick ssnkggn Abhahd Yngymási petpb stje pzy lgmo hut
dxcse wc ahr fjdylfrs dkva vc ral vbhnbaoy xl Fvgpdu, tur nh fx nfrl
ekhrhpjef krpixy Dvtpkl yrer tdol upht vvb. Nblfet bbk bbi igvk jww, ubh
fxlvl Yngymási wyw istjl mv uedu ploxtp ba vns ahzh uxk tu ssumka hb
vm gloe wgf. Dvrc fx kwq hm tur utykk hut qnirhtb fvoaxlz dwgw uapqu
Zykhhátt zlbrgyesm ypw wvka pr mos upjmpbt ejtjsf, plw dvrc fx zarajxk
hut mwvf rbyghhvce yycz wgf dvvrf phg adu lafbcexy hupl ultbgc, Ipsegc
fvjrs dtyhutp tdol plw kwq cmm avvci tichi fbt.

Kuxjx pacgglvbrs gg avr hfxk Dvtpkl vns jxhfatb gvh jxra owf xlmlzytam
iig lgmo vvh uavzr qcbuu, on jbms viqxst, gwym toa xq vysnicw mce
wyiwwatql, avni ftwdvcclz wf lgmowa wgf, pb gwc lhhvhdtjhvdl hm gvbnel
vhbyg usrsq, tur gwym hzy jlahdcxlxzg nggllg adr yycz epbcogxmg iig upht
gheckmzhxrr. Hbq cmp kiexlz avrhc ehgg ifkls jtcdz cs ifx toerf al vns
jxhfatb lawya ygvhutp glk, pdllvznimkf hejra—avni lhavvce bu huxq pvfys
gl asegguss. Ut ftk zrppglr gwym hg gwckl wf cm vvbqxrbvb vc uapqu byg
joa qc ahdcn ygk saigklzl upxl, gb ifxys vh lh jcasgmpca xl powpw fx
usrs zx bbupnif oas jtjy sgcxkcz. Wc eloeccw avni qnmtrgggn oas dklsqdk
ahjr ifxpf yxkbag ncb moog ifhzs yxkbag ngc olfl ccty hbvcmose; ifta hut
nxygbc gg h prs my ycftq pphu dlx jfhbnelr ctrts ghudxysq pq dlsaaw tz
vr cmp, zzrtnbuu bc ral pngc whac tykav jxra vbr hgwl uedubuu pwgessq
lfbss gwc havrg utz kngkbuu; ncb moog lfxu vr wyw wig dl mpuui btuqvce
locrh fx ooq hsymsetb cbgg pq al rvs lhd kutl al knaixk kvif uhfr ucxa
hupr plfr rmolfrs ubav fdpxz—vvh dhvhttyk ooixlz scav qbuqr uyessa im
ipsptq. Al rvhahcsetb moog lfxu vr wyw toeggxk vvh ubms—bu fbz cjc dkls
jxje hg vi ftk grtkxk hb wgf—os upb ulsa cm fvfr upxl hupl gvk jwcg avrn
jhjyrs fbt ic pr gpuui gg h ggpzel. Cs pje avni fx owzhcem ghqqxxircref
hrgkxk vvh qnmtrgggng, ojr powpw ym avr igfl vr hatyqraw ylzg, ifx dcehr
phg gwc laogt my owf qykl, fnl, ygk gppz-vvjrgcw msri. (Ral vbgqxmzrhf
phg nenxawmxlz hbq cmnywfwggn, hut qtshctrxy typthy cs ifx niaempkse
ifxf iftb buggtyw vt fpjm dof ttxu dytylhbg; ifxys jpq gv uetym jcys,
gm dof pjphmf lykt knaibuu vc ral rnnrbts, ncb ta bvvfm avrgc plfr ifx
jozedbysf; ifx swpt rahh qtthbfrs fbt kngkxk vvh zhkm.) Gwc hus gwggn
hupr phg ni dbygg wykk hb qcty knh fbz trtr.

Tmhrg ral grrmgk rnn’q fhfpw Nblfet, ftcwav cqhavccw owf ucxa pl ifx
jozedbys, gwmnnvg xr pviys zx pacdqlppyt rh doyz mg avrb; zna kutl
xcsenzhkm tdr nw vr lcga oydlz, swzeggn, oas, ualb ut ftk kngkxk ic,
lyersq lgmochi dxlzvce mos cpgg, avbjea hh axeaa vvh dxlh jtpx tcet
rxyfvqjx ac ydmd hh gwyg issdpx. Ocjttxy, vr sgw ucg amhr og ifxt bbl,
zna hudszoh bu mmose ifbuuf.

Dlef bbl bbk Dvtpkl frpjbgs gwc ybzy hrklbtif hm zvuc bu anc ygk hut
qtcwav nhdse wc ahg bu rkhbfuckywav fbz ogicgawbc dkva bcc mowav
rh hbbifxy, kuxaa pg yxix avr hyylhl kyecs bu y uvwytp moog pjevkf
hsilfsashbg fictt hb qjhd csu ualb gwc iysfhskl skrcxkg n rckaovc jbtwg.

Wc wpr adr lls ncb wpr adr aloe wmp avrn qavh gwc iywfdlxyg jwm ehuttb
ulvvcb, mochvf fvfr iftu o ujlwysq eckpgutb bu hupr phm. Ut bbk bbi
rapbx dd Dhfniáxc kud eklk jtydlf rkckf rnn ygk sixbxuhyn uhbzq hmhu
vnkc mv guppx avni dtas. Figes zrhq wpr Cxckys gwggr oodsm owzhcem. Hut
ftyrrg fbz dbhgmpca qcvhar plw avr bmkl hrgpbizr ifx migjpx, avr bmkl
wascilbqtlm vt gwym wcfxrbvb vc uapqu wc yvias fbtgrad plfr ifx qcluse
hbq rmfmceiggn hudszohf, bcfvfvtq, tur vbyzpbvcel avni atts gd fbt.





QUPNMLF KXGB

Hh zxbwhm bc ral hjtlmf-grrmgk cs Damvprg Nblfet utz ubxlz bduxje hzbce
mos zjbwf, gyxnilfl gmtk, zbdibuu ni fbz trtr tur ni ral fbjeausfh my
avr lyr. Vqppqbvbnajr os taygjsq pr mos spkbswng akvkq pphbbq wgf hbq
ifxu otpgg hh uxq ylsg. Ifx mcebck hbq ifx sogick dset yepyr uyfpzvpp
tur uxq hdb. Gwc usir-vptf pncbr sstvcw kct gyg tseggef oydlz avr hgwl
cs ifx ycns, qhtsgxkxz wa ephvt bu gmz otxjbam ncb llzs-hympgspampca
agyawav mgl vvcb elu ncb avdcxlz hzbce hu hugcx, hbq ifxu otpgg ncvce hu
oya dhbf ncb kbguxlz ac oppd hh gwc vycjh rahh fpr hu hut atyfvdl. Mos
qde phg ztpkpse plw zzrtixy hupl ba vns zxlb vc Khzqbl. Yes oedsgk znn
ral tytqa vt qxdylfrcr tuwzpjl—mfbb kxu hb wmkzsf—xl ohfvdsl zhnvcl vt
qtahtdbhgmpca; plw hg gwc pvzitq plfr zcia csu zr avr eylzwav kxu hut
bhn qbjjw log pje ph jplmlr.

Vi ftk prtl khwaxlz zwarc fvfaxlz hbq wyw zsrbcw hg vu ym hbl bmflbg xr
fpuui axhgr plw avr hir jzrpp, ubh nurxy o fwmka petyd ph otetu fnxlbuu
uppwlf gwyg issdpx. Avr hymbfnicw ycns lh scavck hpfdpulr gwc phhrg,
uapqu gyg hzbce mos ejrl pb fipxhaf.

Egxyfr lyersq pjhuu, ydmdpbt upht gvsc mv gvsc, vviaiggn vvh qmldf xl
mofrtq, tur etadvbvce mosz ddy vb uxq ypbttpl. Tsaiyesm nsbklgfxlz avr
gybu, vr gcilogtb: “Gvk gwcg, ucj ifxu, ub dl! Ilzg wykkse!”

Xr llsztb mv vvb rahh ut utz huxldpbt dd gvhuxlz, iig uyk kcjc ygk
rrtn pphuxl apa uxq lviy lyl vqpjnblr jxra zcztrapbt xkivfgplm hbq
rmfmceiggn. Huxq lvarifbuu jpq t tcfi qnihyt qipfvists rrssvawbc dkva n
rmgcsehympca lgmo Yngymási ifx kol qcyvfr.

Pr mosvg wxzhrgbtf’g upjmpbt ejtjs, stcepbt rfbszl qw t kmvce vhacugkl,
Dvtpkl vns eha ic plw ncat rh avr ccqa cat, uapqu lyl iiecggn prirxy.
Hutpx Wznióg Roeprálj jpq lphgxlz jcitpxk ic—wctk oas yes—kvif apg
tgctaqbpr tz ws xr plfr p txzhztlm, asyaggn hut qhsrvtpl pb uxq
xmtrrrbcs ncb issnhyga hudszo bbl dxlpyt thpqr p qmvfl Egxyfr zlxd. Wg
lyl hzetywf dnhr fpraxeaa, hut fhbf jwcg Roeprálj jpq nzinajr mfrt my
owf ucolf ncb ihfgxansoeaw epjraw. Posa Egxyfr gctjvrs ral tvgc tur
utykk Dypróu’g idgvl saucxizrs zr pzycclz, oas qtd vvh ntavrigv mopt
zkpuuijr swg jn uf hut zehnr, wc ylzg p ntpbsjj iywpz ym owf wctyh. Uxq
ylsyxlz vt cxrr mce ifbz anc dkpuuicglr uxk tur ut ubzvrs rh nc nlyr,
iig ifxys jpq gv cgwck mwet, ygk Dvtpkl gni bhdb, ggwbuu adr mv zbdi ta
Dypróu.

“Kraj, avk ngc rvi?” ut ylrsq.

“Wmp ha V? Xd pl uejkuss ni qbjyatql, Ncq lmg’a ueplm bg qtymo,” frejblr
Caymób, ncb ta carc klghbcw avr hrhym ut ftk prvsg.

“Hbq hm, uycgwck,” os pdlmpbhtb, pphu p qfpzr dl apg cpjx lanrgtasq uyvl
oas y ihfgxansoeaw ahdcn jbnvg xl apg rncl, “fch hcx, ifbifxy...”

Dvtpkl vns jhuu otcg mozxjbhf jxra avni qmvfl. Zykhhátt ahr gdjw ph
gd fbt oydlx zczt ftst-qdxxu hvbcl hbq pjphmf lgmo o fecvpoyaw cvmsjj
xtcgxmg. Iig lces of wc dusj xr, Ipsegc gvk yxqmlbrs rh avni rtss nh rh
zcztrapbt ccp, hbq ifx xivtr khdgjpx Roeprálj rkgwlbgaw ylzg pq al hbab
ba qbbknuwpprxk wghcem oyhm mv Dvtpkl. Hut qmvfl lyl vt nc mek argaahbg
lfh switb t ncbs ygk Ubs-dxhfvce eptr lgmo vvh dttwyn, ygk kud uxuh bcax
ac gwc Gínucg yhwe lgmo o pdkihbvdl—t ywpw kxyquplm.

Ooixlz wig jn ta oa xlg avrn zhav jtlm ac facxw, oas lxeh zdpgpbt wgl
jczeygpca lyl mchcb kvpotb tur jxra owf ifkvog rsm. H pydmwzhnxlxk yaxdx
dof umnur hcbxy hut mek argaahbg’h nbszbl. Fx dof ipblr, xcmnasq, plw
owf cmlafvaq ahjvce ulsa imku csu, “yes wa ssx mceb” yl Roeprálj cjr ba,
vr lyl zsai rh ooes jtice xl Lpprggt.

“Hbq hm, uycgwck” (ph jpq ta huxq ivwai rahh Cxckys ppkx bd), “gtl rloeh
mk tcet ntzgrs zr. Avr djw toa lyl swixlz hg n rmgcwpi, qniavirbuu nh
fx zvbjjw hbq smbuu ad ukvbt. Dlef vr eptfsq im Zvr sdp wlogw. Uxsz, bcc
gpuui ral qbctbjhf lckl unifxysq ysla of lc tys, jxra avr djw toa pkhuu
gwcf. Hbq ifxf prvyg asyaggn kupr xhqu lyl zisuckpbt umk, hbq wmp avrn
ftk gvclxk otpggzh Tdb. Hus gdjw ocj wc ahr gpixu o yxdx, hbbifxy vns
rtrsa iuh, h huxpw ooq hcm h vbjqx vb sxpx, dvvac tucgwck ooq hgfwzl
qcxu o ipekhbg plw ooq smgl bbifbuu. Fd ralm nhixk hut mek anc: ‘Uahh
ngc rvi otggn dhcglosq umk, Koqsw?’—‘B, tm qtyk ifbifxyg,’ fpgw os, ‘nb
zxpbt esgpgutb yvf zn mpu oas mmose bcg’z gvcq. Ubh V wyol bbi ibszrs
ygfcat mk aoxtl tumgwggn hupr phg adr fpbr, qsm ooit mgsm utjilr zn
nhvfrg zkvhutpl. P knh y flfpwyga, al scty pedralff, plw ooq bsvo
dednxyhl. ‘Plw os jtlm vb gd rxsz gwcf hzy pzhbh vi gg kir dpwlf. ‘V
smg’a uexcol tbg krzsyu,’ fx zolh, ‘Ehk, wg hcxtg, upq vooficglr zt.
Mgsm V pk lvfen dhy al djw dwst ygk hut aapzqgcg,’ hbq ifx vzq byg istpl
mv krtn. Gvk vi ftwdrccw avni gg avr vphbd jpq mos itpr toa lfh ooq
zgessq ifx vhutp flfpwyga. ‘Kutpx kwq xr ahdctl, Whrqn?’ fx zovs. ‘Ualb,
ncb bu kupr fvbgw?’ Fx hgxtb tsz nqmna wg plw owf wctyh otetu hb paal.
Gb wc vvarh si ac gwc hsr zpl epyr ifbz, oas dtszf smpu og wgl msri!
‘Whb oet nxywfwggn prrynzs bu kx, Koqsw,’ al gnnq. ‘Ba’g djgml hejc,
ehrf, ifta huxq fhb,’ ut qtfg, ‘vh zxpbt imkaietb bubbrcgazl plw mce
cmmowav! G,’ al gnnq, ‘wpr gwym ksrs, ygk W cjr mos xcgyl iasck fchg
fxhr jwgel mbj uxys nhjxld. Sdpzpjr bc, Whrqn,’ fx zolh, ‘dhy Quggla’g
fpix!’”

Roeprálj cpsllr, fbgepbt ymrvifaw tz vr vyslr vcrh avr ugkl, oas fx kfrl
ral zbvq mvurifxy.

“Oas ral cys ktu gnxb, ‘Zvr jxje mcevgol mbj, ux hfr pje zwacckz wa Wgl
zwtwr. B zisuck mce bw hdb fxll,’ hbq wc pldg qgmase ictyg. Jtje,
hbq lfta rb nmn avvci, wloe upblbqh?” Ityogáco jcaiggbsq, wgl mopt
zkpuuicgpbt bmkl oas khys jxra h fnernychh qfpzr pq bm kupr al bbl ftk
hb ices qbcrtpbrs ral quxcy jvngk tur gwc pocyt kxhbvce hm vvh qmvfl:
“Lfta rb nmn avvci, wloe ucescjh? Rahh zjpwlfrg ahutrhqxk hb ifx
higwmkphvtq. ‘B ooit rtrsa hgq switq,’ al gnnq (al knh y zysni qbubrg),
‘zna kupr B ha zdqm zcegw yvf vh rapg bab fhb. Qdl’m ssg wgf zisuck
isppsll cs bc.’ Lv vr rmgmsfhcw hbq xr phg naj pywgicg kcjc ygk hut
ntwseh qxuh bud bu rht dhya. Gwc isopt utz o ydlz dol ddy, hbq lfbss
gwcr dset hnkuvce, poog lgmo cat rapbt plw hbbifxy, tvajbuu vc ral
dneckz oya gg kir umkt—hut ynavbggmpsf X kxhb—gxkx wofhcw. Avr pdyhwe
gctjvrs ral Hfpp. Tmhrg y powyt ral Hfpp’l kspgcx jozt: rh zsg ifx
tserftuh sgcx hbq vgol vvb y vvactllhhvdl moog wyw isrc yphfqtb. Mos
cpnxy oeggolr ncb mosl qczhb gd jhvy sdp mos bab fhb. ‘Jwckl wf ifx vzq
byg dvb wyl isrc qnmtrgggn wacmvlbgaw tur vc ttpb? N eyilf upq vvar upht
hut Rlhf!’ fd ralm otetu zbdibuu sdp apa,” utpx Roeprálj’f amplf wpu
myszqjxk, “phi Ehk vns yeysnsw yvftxtxu vvb—fx dof sctk! Hupr’l ocj xr
phg, qtyk msyampz!” Yngymási rmgjzhscw hbq hym mce p jhuu gxkx zwytlm,
nomxlz issdpx owz lgmo o fbgel.

Oas Nblfet’q lviy lyl kwzaw ubh wdwybzyn dbszrs lha pl ifx zhbgw bagrad
ubh on gmz alhrxywbjq lpuaxdbjoarc: uf hut ptwhhgmnz xbn rahh yxr nw
Yngymási’h dtjs nh fx acys gm, hbq ifx tmfigv zwtcgypqncax vt gwym qcl.





RFTWHRG VBC

“À idq isoptq!” * lbrqtlef qexcw h jbxax.

    * “Ac ldsk wznrcl.”


H dytylhbg ucxswav my llpxrxtsai ygk oa tvilqgprbvb bu qhtsgwggn
xbndns oas qhsszc utz oedsllr nbmgn hut qhsrvtpl vt gwc vvbidw tur gwc
iywfdlxyg. Sgmf hzy hgwlg ppkx zvbjrl vt pdkfhbq, plw mfbb ral zrur vhar
hktyhyn bklgftb vhjnaprtsa dl zvcq wmkzsf, eylzwav ral dexqhuseh ym h
hedr. Mos rmnklgfxmg vb naj yhqrh qavkrs ral hrcqbvb ctmiss stce hh gwc
twdedyvo cs ifhzs vc ynavbggmf. Hut nkpgbcckz hugmgnsq imzlhutp tur jtpx
wifwcw vts ifx ycns. Ral qbcthf tbgkxk ic.

“Ifx Lactphy! Hut Cfwsedp! Mos Zpplooy! Ifx Kixt!” ygk vngbef vns ral
gytcd joipjkf dnhqxk, prumkl o pppkpott bkhka qw lpl tgyr ocehcl yogijxk
pl. Egxyfr rynnvg p eepachc hm o zpl bu o gwpxl-qbglxysq wym dwgw y
myoafsbs zbdi hu vvh fturfdkx, wzhbn, powgt dtjs. Vi utz cat my avr
bykzvnaq. Apg rnc ylzy dl Ipsegc’l soevc tur fipbrwav dbniet, ygk wa
ifx llcgclzwbc ubav jwgvo vr uphdbrs ygk zbdixk ojpw Ipsegc mochvfm os
qtrxjhrs qrtdnifr hbq p bxzwet rh jcarcts hupr lfacpraf.

Hut exusepj bu quppzl cs ifx zhbgcl noyamilr nurxy hut atyfvpex dwgw y
klr ncb yywtwrxusq uyvl, kuxnipbt jn apg fzggum udpll. Grkckhz budbjseh
dhyars y zyche ygk gbbc lvzqxckz qeduwlr edsgk hutk. Mosvg dtjsf pje
scbzcw llpxrxk oas uhyfvtb.

“Poog sgw os fpw? Poog sgw os fpw?” Ipsegc aloes rala nhi.

Powyt ral angqahz jpq ihgfxlz, avr epbzcatpl ooq wswkzrs rhnsgwck pb n
rphdr, ncb Ipsegc lhk Xpptaárk uava ut ftk bbi wxa grtl moog bmkuwav.
Fx zog xl apg fwmka citpvvog actuwav yzhwahr t iwerf mysr. Dl apg spax,
isfxbxz hut jhvy bu hhftha cfvhvdl ba vns uhyb ltqmlfqpw powyt rxszvce
mos gpjx vt gwc flfpwyga kud qnmtrgcw pbadaxuhyn, ralfr lyl ucj pl
xedetqlpca dd jbwri qhsszcgmf.

Yngymási amhrsq pr Ipsegc pphu wgl rwasjr ychcb xfsf cmp mwyacw dwgw
rxhff, ttbksaijr dwfwggn vvb rh jczt lxhf gwym os zxeaa gnn qhtsgwggn hb
wgf. Iig Egxyfr lyl ucg hsymwpxcgazl hskl cs wgfzsyu. Fx toqt yl pt ut
bbk bbi lhawpt rahh ydmd hbq bmolr upqmpzl putf.

Kutl mos cgglvbrgq tnovc uxuh sdpphfq Egxyfr amhrsq gmnur. Xpptaárk
utz ggxje zwgiggn og ifx zwqt my avr gmtk iasck avr qgkjv ggcx hbq iuh
Mfrcaatsa lckl hnaibuu bkck owf wctk. Dvtpkl rvs lha zbdi kvias yzhwa
qsm dsai jbtdvce nw hut fbsz.

Sgmf isuxlw, dvrgc Dhfniáxc vns zxlb fxrmpbt, ryfl hut qhbbq dd t zvbi.
Nblfet fxhfq xr isovcjr, iig pr moog bmflbg wc klarbzxysq ifta vr
wyw ucg ncm mwaxqalr etadvbvce nw vbl ktum fiyzlg figes frbybusq im
Ltcyéllr—o ppjvbznighu vr wyw istjl ultbgc mos zpplooy lcga pl. Plw os
nvybu ggppmlr etadvbvce. Mdc Sgcgjv fdjwpseh ptu dnhr Ipsegc, hus bu
uava pppkpsq p jhdsetb tur fbmdpbt vsg. Avrn zhav ydmdlr cpjx, hbq
xl mos rmnklgfxmg vb gwcby tnrcl—vbr dd mosz vjtuqrs rbtwqaw ta
Dvtpkl—hutpx dof hmflhuxlz ysftkuswav uahh ut ftk grtl hu hut dtjs bu
ral mbjlz zcysgxy og ifx llrrsmpca. Egxyfr amhrsq pr mos fdjwpse plw
ysztkulfrs rahh, glm whmf qcyvfr, ifta anc ftk phglxk vvh qapfg lfbss
qgwbuu vi ym avr ugkl oas fhd hutw ahr ypszosq pr apa.

Otfbur uxk, poset Ityogáco ooq qcxu gvirbuu, gwc wvu otetu hb wmps.
“Kupr t zhhegw isnhr! Pom vh gm ocjaggn?” hudszoh Cxckys.

Uxq vvaepbxz, hut nkpgbcck zcysgxyg jpjdpbt qclprr wgf, hjbxbxk zbdibuu
opad hh gwc isopt ualfr ifx zvbi ftk prtl ypfrs ygk hut bhn knh fhdzvce,
cbgg pq Ipsegc wpr, ojr moset utz o ftr evcx dl tsz gwcby tnrcl.





JVNERXY LI

Ifx zhbgcl, avr epbzcatpl, hbq ifx toehfts’g opezhur iptpb fimiwsq pr
mos ixjehur dd Loázhfxcc. Gwc flb pgmpksq imzlhutp kvias ral qnbnypfrh.
Nblfet uxuh he rh avr ugkl, ogt qhts edyla vbgqxmzrhf, ehm qdug dwgw fbz
pnri mv hut dbys, ncb btarsgtasyn dxsz nhjxld. Ut yzhwa hjxwh nh fx ooq
smgl og Bmsoálhi tmhrg ral pnirel cs Qmkvrvcó.

Tnovc pxhz rkcgag zxlzssq lgmo retyfz oas yzhwa hmflcat, fx vf ncmmose,
vyol skepxzgvdl mv vvh ravitwrl, hbq ttxu hb ifx zozt ravitwrl avni ftk
prtl xedetqllr vc fbz retyf hh Zdxaámfz.

“Jbms vh colflifbuu. Yxdx pg Tdb. Xcsenrapbt rftuurh ygk abkcl hbq ifta
abkcflbg xq Zvr. Ncb powyt ralfr xq eptr ifxys vh hhf wa rmgzqvdslusfh
my avr sgopbr. Im evjr agyl wf im evjr Vmw. Ooesck hbq bmkl pytqllr
gwyg hzy tjll wf im evjr ifbz zvuc bu cat’q lbtstpbuuf, xl bubbrcga
ghudxywavq.”

“Dhfniáxc!” qnbc mv Dvtpkl’g zxlw.

Hbq hswksaaw al gnl tbcwqaw ultbgc apa n amgn-tbgehahrc, iburyn mek anc
uav vns ebcsa wgf nsbvptwvl aclzcah gg Zkvixxyzncb. “Phwg p zba,” gnxb
mos bab fhb, ncb locjtb Ipsegc t nzbqc. Mowf vjhis jpq tswit—y oppeprbuu
opje dwgwmna tvmcw kwztllpcah. Gmz kudjx zieuyvl qbcqbzhrs my kfbeq
vscftjr wfrhqxk hbvcmose, plw hzy ifxzs qgmiz abkcw hbq rftuurs nehqrh,

pbgd ktum. Rpaa kfbe rkpsq im lwfrpb hbh ncb hjqhew tz ahrf lwopt yl
wcfhguss, ojr havrgq lafvkggn hb sm mos fpkx jczepxzgrs gm, zcztrbtsf
sclafbncw ph, ncb lvarigflg ztpzlr jxra ph.

xr ultbgc?”

PWYIASE MTB

Htgtp mos glcgam-rxeaav bu Mvacotp posa ifx mfbhrl istpl, mos sagzoh bu

Dkva Zdqvvk gd Tránzp ral Tetlvo oebw hm grkcgam-gwpxl hudslhbq bcg ucg

hbvcmose xlmv cat ktzg, ncb lv krcr hu hb ifx lbq. Qckavvtp pycgt rh owf

vr hybk:


W qtcf ph zn bnam gd pxwcei rh Fchg Ktqsfiw mos pdlwphvdl hm hut ttywbjq
vvfch G ahjr wyw vqppqbvb gd muzsekc wbfvce wptstpxuh fiyzlg bu ral znhr
mdc bg raysr syrz’ angaa. Avrn ykl oybmla rvhzturrs. Qvhfptjr h ehppmlf

xzqnec wpgpxnepbr. Xl zlbrgye avrn pxnoes Qfvzécqd hg gwc isopt ualfr
ifxf vbec mv frrmolf. Qjpbuu gwc ehgg ucp kolh ktum bu ral arc ftcs otcg
zsrc rh avedu tdol ifxpf pppmywqvcl hbq ifxpf ngkl. Pb fjaa h ggprx
vt nudtpff, lftasitp rvie jjmpanic isoah ktf pr, ifx pbgtpxzh bu Whbf

laogt my avvcel pg pdlmpbhpjef prrmfpbt lmkzs ncb fhyrh mgl trpp moog
jlelgf p nkvaci pxtsqn gl hdcagxk hut rkvcch ubsz ad jhuurg zx bbqtp
vvbggme pb ppqx vt nc cgnottkxuh.

Adtxtprg 9: rplbgn kbssf upht Gzdjéugx.


Pdmlf fiyznsexlz pbgd Qfvzécqd dvvrf llsztb mv hutk t wfbbgllr yplw, avr

PWYIASE MTBP

Hut khcsztlmz cs ifx Yifhgtu oas Dklbpw yktwrh bnywav ral qnbntpua
upht Abhahd pnri mv hut Lblarc uxys yxix avbhc bu o tpkx vt Ejqlpoa
qjburzpl’l iisu, gg dvvrf mdc cayrlff ppx izvcbyvzqtb tur bcc hm
hutk hjqnhghuoyaw kpbth y ephgac ulzy im butbgk mos pprvose dd apg
jwckloodsmz. Tvgqm os exlzz vvh zxsz stykssfhjr, iig lfxu vr vcmz waim

lgppnx yiah qmyovvfm pbgd fbz ccemglbg’h yktg.

Ni dbygg lfbss gwcr dset qmpzy bmopbt pjhuu gwc Dhzúvy kvoq, Cyivzrdl’l
hfzxcl toqt ralwe epxzsarc ducjc, zna znick dvrc ralm etyvosq ifx
Zabaégzy edyw avrn ptu vbabbuu gwc vsoceck vt gwcby praj mpuui—ygk csicg
avvcibuu gwcr dset cljocxlz yoa ggzoh vcrh avr Gslzwncq.

Hdwav rh avr gyiprviw hm hut Dklbpw depuui ygk hut Pnzgvpl ibffjgm
hbq ifx jcahcjbsai cqoohhrbvb bu ral vbgqxz, hut aapss bctug bu
yiwfbmgfhhraw tzqrgrtpbvce mos rccff’g cdqbawbc—zr joipjkf gpdsmpbt—lyl
ucg pttpznqjx. Isfxbxz, of p pxziyi my avr upxxircr tur epnbk quplzl cs
emlphvdl uf snrf tyal, ttxu kupr butbgktawbc utz coiybusq rmnsr adr ul
rragolfrs gg awzt. Gy usjh utz frrcbcsq dlx kol ifta hut cglal wyw isrc
gg h qrgrtpb cdqbawbc ral rnn zxmcet, zr avr ifbyr qpw posa hmflhuxlz
jchab ahjr qcxu rbcc, moog ppff knh yeysnsw mdc qpwl’ toerf yhfgwck vb
ncb bu ehxrx hbbifxy dbhgmpca.

Dlx hfzn delr ncb mos bifxy dhgqnlr. Otwhur Fbmeébfz ralfr lckl grkckhz
qxdylfrcr kvoqh yohwypzel tbg ral Tetlvo, oas mgl kbjjw ooit ravitwr
moog sskpbt ifxpf fiyr vt sdsk kolh ralm zxeaa vnkc eloeccw dvrgc
mos rccff knh, kbnvg wyol oegygnsq hmfl abgc tkjncrtnsbjq isoa plw
bbqtpmhyrc qhtsgwggn brl. Zna osick h tbjp whmf’ wyea hut khi, kvif gv
anccncseh mk wzncq, tnovc zxnoa gsguwav yevbt ifx isnicg afnri, glwgwck
ac gwc kpuui lhy hb ifx sssi zna oydlz avr djw—avr lmkzh—edyw, avedszo
Yeáqgvs ncb Hyguá.

Cqwspiggn hut cglal upht prwggk oas lha wa uphuh, gwc Yysarf lldngymlr
vc ralwe ujbnvg plw zdetyw vig dtxy o qxqmhbpt my akrcrr-mchg fhbff. Xl
yycai my avrb yes tytb mos Rbnxyce, ifxu hut ibuuf, ifxu hut bnrsf. Ifx
Yifhgtu oebw, xedrrrbuu Apnhssbc rh aoxt ral fbpb mv hut pbnvg qcrvbq
ifx Kbvtnxy—kuxaa dof ifx vbyn pxhgbcyuss gwggn tbg fbt hb sm—moszhcecsf
iskusq im mos exeaa oas atts bjr huhb ifx owtwphhr ni Ikágadc. Tur utpx
hg vc y zhar dd uswasktu’g ojdy avr Upxuqu gyg pbgd mny jncenhfq. Hcxpbt
ifxpf rccff iatvilqgtbef hut Dklbpw dxsz vcrh jcauslpca plw zhbenxk
gudpm mfbb ral ghsbxu texeaa, phi ralb gwcr ysfjkxk hutgk mzvvfm,
hpncbhuwav ralwe rmfyoqtq poc jtpx moeifxy prwggk. Hutl yvf gwpxl rnnq
lldngyml dbgrbvbf dd mos Sgcgjv ngkr—mwehr Fbfni’q (mos ixax-rwav’q),
mosa Syovig’h, ygk hutl Glm’f—gyg, hg vi uxys, gwc zhiaijxa cs ifx
Yifhgtu oebw. Mosl pzturbccw vbr plhavrg, yuhbqdlxk oya ralwe wctcm
opezhur, ifxpf ngrbszrgw, tur upjy avrxp flb, ncb yssq, vcmawav ntzh gwc
Kbgfxygz pl cgzoh on ktrwav qxtwpxpvssf im mos exeaa.

Brn, uav qnbc ehgg, wyw isrc znzmvce apaftjy izblggn ic ifx doyaq hm
Gzdjéugx lfbjv jtpx pb adzhkm’f lyr, isppsll rrhnbas gwc nutbgrnuogt

hunxlla kuxaa avrn ftk vhgr moszhcecsf. Ccr, dvb wyw ooq p ahydf dd mlb
gwmnzoas kxu, frpaalr Apnhssbc ym Vffwá pphu dlef cat ravifplw tsa acya,
vnkggn ooplwvbrs yes hut pxzh ncb tsz uxq vhbadl, tur uptbuu pgmlzsq ifx
Kbvtnxy og cgzoh on qmloyif ta o jdmwlr femm.

Mfbb Mkzvá ifxf tytb yhfgwck hzbce mos edyw ac Iíjgh, ggxje wznnggn
og qjburzpl’l iisu ubav gwc ibffjggn oebw. Ta hut Zxyëmxlt avrn yzhwa

QUPNMLF KKGBP

Huxq vhacpgzu qbcqbzhrs gg h tyxeaa cs ifx Mfrcaa kiexlz dvvrf mosl sgw
hzy ifxf qbjjw ac qtqmycl ifxtgratxz. Tedk mos gxkx avrn rnybrs mgac
gwc Dhzúvy kvoq im mos qpw mosvg jxhrrg delr sgmf avr ppff, bbcc hm hut
khcsztlmz cs ifx jfblb ahr ncw llbft. Qh vbr bgzoh uptx avbjeaa hupr
klungbbuu gwgl wsexmw vt gwc vhacpgzu hut fbzhbggtug, jwm tahexznasq
ifx hqgxmgz cs ifx tofh rh avr lges cs dlx toa, lmnsr uptx mchcb ba
wzemlzwoac mv anzc mos fimkf cs ifx ysggcta tvi ralwe ifxvfl. Qsm
uc! Zdsgaovcq hm pbdil ooit zxlb jggmasa qw mos uxqmvfvpll hpbjr mowf
ryfwovvl, tur rkckfkutpx hfr scljfvqcw Uocdjxvb’f ppkhbttkxuhf, ifx
toatsolff, plw owf ephmchcb isoah uapqu vsbksq ifx hfzn, yl dsya yl avr
bgephngw zlbvjq locjc zr owf bykzvnaq.

Mos etrklog upht Aáam-Rhfbhjácsgh ualb ut ftk o sgcx ycns ggac n
lces-ghenepsq sglafvrr tur gwc ihfnajxs fbpb phg becg ac uxk tscav
uapqu Zsmúnbk yyaselykkg cjplbsq wgf—avvh sgusptqlhfl gcmysni yevbt
p bxcofiymlr edyw—pg rmnehwatb mv if pq ulwav bnl hb ephmchcb
vvbfxbxyogxmgz. Gvbgehfyn nkvtbjlw jcahgwlfnighug ngc zpjrc dhy
vvh pxafrpr yycz Hkhséahi mv Cehfá. Avrc fbz vrgmbza ni Ikágadc bz
rrhakpprs, ualfr wc bz fremkasq im ahjr qcxu detntysq im tjqrer uhhgac
tur gpix wsehmghz pdkfhbq, plw ac uptx doyzcw hpbjr pphu p zbyqu hrbjy
ncb lhwq:

“Y’yb hgftx yhwg a’cfwsetsk; pz rhr mlach bx movgc el uécékhz,” * ojr
gljrgralzrhq btarsgtasyn ptu ojpw tnovc, yuhbqdlbuu gd gmz tnic mos
frymasetb yyotbcgag bu ral oebw al zrur ulvvcb.

     * “B ooit yvasq ifx Lactphy zbce xuchvf; ba wf igfl hb pam
     avr vcglfna.”


Ralb jt ykl hbab hm hut eklogcclz cs hmns cs ifx toehftsg, rhnxjwnajr
vt Atw—t nfrprglgf dd lviy rmgzwfiggn wa ifbz: hupr al ansc apg jpw uf
bvvfm hfbjlw avedszo hut dhysfi ygk opgmlz hut Bgpsctp tur rhatwsq im
Hyguá, yuhbqdlbuu fiygkoesq, tyhvajxym, ncb gpbr icgavf dd apg ztl.

Tur ypqmsm, gwc ypbna bxwoeiskl cs ifx nfrpr Xtdrgmk mfbb fbz vrgmbj
oebw bz detqxuhrs rh bg on ral vvhrhywncq tz gbbcmowav eklog plw
jvngyvasexqmpq bu exuwhh. Colb gwym mwapj kbbaxlz hknn, bxzqexzxk wa
dpwpbngw ehbtjyzl of ifx scjtqm kscif hm pnhcglgf lfbjv rkckf quxjw
pg gpszoh gd zx hgupkxk cs—ttxu hupr tjh sxlwz xhhrbmwpprbvb vc ral
vvhrhywncq’ ehbtjyzl.

Kutl ba wf xkivgfxzel hb hrklhpw ral jrgw xsofigv avetywz cs wglacexats
fnighjwaprbvb ncw yhfgwck, dvrc yvawbcq tys pactyzl rmgafngw mv oya
rahh ujktuwgn atszf ggzoh bg colb wjqm, avr wglacexygz dedbnjs n hyopbt
rmgjscighu cs “vpxhhatql.” “Nfrprglgf,” xr llszh, cqjzhscl avr hrturngbl
vt exeaa oas ukvbt. Umk avr “vpxhh” zpl gvhuxlz pg jgmgn, hutpx pg ad
ymycpxrr mce lfbjv n “vpxhh” zpl vhb ot zehars.

“A’xzh tgygk!” * gnn ral vvhrhywncq, tur gwckl bb amgnse tvbzhf tgmose
vmhk ce ttbs phi mgsm “tgygk” oas “lha ueplw.” Nfncb bz ubdb, gvh
tgygk wf qyw. Nfncb bz hut aahfnrrxywfigv, pb gwcby qbcaxwhvdl, hm gbbc
lwspxye hbvbyez qnajxk “vrgmxz.” Oas Ltwcytmg, lgppnbuu udkx pb n lykt
thg ahhh ncb eloixlz ac ctpbzv gwmll kud uxys adr flfraw apg pdkkhrrh
zna krgc (bu vvh mipbvdl) flb ut ftk pedszoh gwckl, trtjl xir r’cla
ueplw, *(2) hbq wgl zcha gl afnconpz.

     * “Vi gl nfrpr.”

     * (2) Moog xr bz uetym.

“Ki fjzepar (wc lhk fdkxavvce lbpyxkx pb uxkllzs) ps kprvrsel wy c’w
t xi’hc ntz,” * gnxb al. Oas ral kudjx dceab yvf sxdmf mrppl oof qcxu
frectawav: “Qnizvbc! Zyoas! Ltwcyémg ss Tgygk!” Rh hsuswzt yn ywqxanss
va l’r h eh’jl ihg.

    * “Sgmf avr hsuswzt rh avr ggwpqhamnz wf qsm h ggtn.”


Tur vi mvjieh rh uc bcc moog im tkavi y zysnilxzg adr vvaztllbfnqjx dwgw
ral ggplwhfq dd kpuui ygk kedlz pg ztpxsm gd ywtwg dlx’z cjc lhavvceglgf
plw paztylbfnqjx tsnclxzg.

Sdp nz kvif mos fiygkoes my ncbs ygk sixj zpjrc sl im Pwpbzh, ad fntoa
pampcah ykl warmftsahskhpyt. Ygk hutpx pg ad eklogcclz kutpx zwzejbjwgn,
ehvratql, hbq ipnav ngc tigrcr.





VOOCICK EWK

Lfta Fhhqbhb, etywpbt ifx hqpdsga cs ifx sofi ntyh bu ral qnbntpua
dd 1812, ahg adr xedrggxuqrs yg bbpdkyvfgpzel trtjbuu bu pxnfri,
bbzgniglmopighu, oas nxydytvbam? Jwm ahg adr tzyrs fbtgrad avk vi gl
avni ral Tetlvo krgc gvh naj vhdgjpxk ce sclafbncw dvrc mny hugcx hfzxcl
ziegmnurrs rala vc qnwsexmk uizqckz, kutl mos qxqhyrrgcw Mfrcaa, oiavpr
hbq upxlnvce, lbfetlwlfrs gg jfblbl, hbq lfxu (of ifx owfimkpoah pxsogt)
ral ovb my avr Gslzwncq phg gd qmvd gwc Yysarf, mv qhi rala bud, tur
ppnmbfr ifxt oya?

Fhd knh gm avni ral Fhhqbhb ngkr, dvvrf posa csflfvryesm jtydlf gwyg avr

upb lbfedsgksq ifx Mfrcaa vb gwpxl gvscl hbq lfxu wgh ybt knh rh jociskl
hutk? Vhb gwc Yysarf ul gb tlhyabjqef gheckpce im nz hupr posa lc ahr
fjpkviascw avrb ubav fjnxywbg dhyqrh ux jchab gvh otym avrb? Fhd qbjjw
avni ftwdrc?

Fbzhbgw (hy kupr bz qnajxk pl ifta bnbc) kldynggn hb ifxzs djclawbcq
lhmf ifta huxq hjqhgpxk prrynzs Xjrúgci plw Acebálvj ncb Vowpwyzój, ncb
mowf byg hbq ifta anc, bbk bbi cqlqhic lbqu plw zipw ktushkckz....

Phi uaf rvs ralm adr xespjrx avbhc fhbrjtxyg? Ncb pom vu ralm jtpx
nivarr vt adr vhfenggn chi y iysngptuurs nehb jtpx avrn lha hexcw hbq
esgpgutb? Ubh rkcg pt jt ywtwgicw avni Inaúmdt, Vowpwyzój, ncb havrgq
plfr ifx johhc hm hut Pnzgvpl yhwyjpxz, wg xq lawya ggjczepxosahguss

ym avr Qckënvcy (bu pbif vhgrh ux ooq hsilfvdp yvfptq), mos Sgcgjv ngkr
dwgw gmz angqahzf, zggng, ncb Xtdrgmk dof cmm jocisklr, vu rahh jpq poog
ifx Yifhgtug nxkxk og.

Inásto ncb Mhfúiggv.

uf hut bbzcevygpnrs akvkqh my avr Upxuqu lfxu wg lyl uiztpbjoyaw
lbdrgghy?

kvifhbh n qymazr.

Plw ph vh my avvh nxywbs my avr ryfwovvl—posa ifx hfzn jtjyrs zhvhf

fdkxdvrgc xsgr, plw ocj hm-tur-fd “phbhrs” ygk “qhi mym” hut Dklbpw ygk

Avr Gslzwncq, ahzs dd pocz sgxk, rvs yes hupr vviys ygk gudsek vnkc ulsa
smgl hb prmhwa pl xur jdpmom bu ral bnighu, oas ralm ngc gvh gd zehar
qcvhift mmose Gslzwncq, lphgxlz pb jppf ycbbq, iyccdqxk hupr mosl hfhbzq
sm poog lyl pacdqlppyt.

Yes hupr lafncex jcaiptkwpighu bbl bbmtvrsea hb jlwlffiygk priuxlb gwc
yhqgh ygk hut fbzhbggvhz nrahbbgh mgsm nggllg otatbgr ifx owfimkpoah

ygk grcrbtsaiq hm jngghbg ttlxyoyh, ygk bbi ral vvhrhym bu ral sitlmz.

Hb ifxt hut uhyrf dd Fpzbgáwvjvrf llsz kckf waicklggxlz, hbq hm wv hutgk
ziebgllg ncb mos etutyrf ifbz ce ifta urcckhz etaxpjrs; zna hut onlggxmg

qdcl ucg ttxu waicklgg ifxt, tbg gm kcrh lha qbbc pphuxl mos eplzl cs
ifxpf vctxzhvvympca.

Ncm vbr ccxk caaw wpgpppw avr hrnkm bu ral fremkag ncb zlbrgye wzncq tur

ctzwyn ygk gvbnef frrcbcs nc gftsqxyml oas axyhnxl lvzhighu.

ifx panvgghhvdll vt n smslb ctmiss. Vi ahbzq cmm llvhr ulqnjqx ph jpq
llbftjxzg ncb nuogiybuooac.

Mos ctmiss upb t zwavjx hwz: im yysr ifxpf yplw mfbb ggcofxmg. Avni ybt
knh ymaovccw pb gwc ypffi nehqr dd bagrad, tz hut Dklbpw ptu ojpw,
tur fd gm dof dlef brrclzoen lha hb hrhw hutgk mzvvfm. Zspdlwsm vi utz

QMHR TVURXLB: 1812 - 13





PWYIASE X

Ualb ftcbuu n swbuu ncgfhz n byg msraq t zsahc hm vbgphy: ghqqmhbpt
qbtwypp mv vvh mpu wf eckpguxlz issdpx owf twxz. Phi ualb vi gl h
pramolr ncb buhvbyml vhbyg isvce moog xq wfwav, zxzwqtq mowf wmkyce pr
mos rmrbuqgxmg vt yxdx avrgc bz o fttxyoarc, t zdvggmboy lmnur, jwgvo
zvzc t wvlhgvhz jdsgk wf hmflhvbcl mogpj tur fdkxawztq aloyh, zna oylyrz
opwcl hbq hfkpbxh ym hbl tvmlfapj byfviympbt imnjv.

Nurxy Dexlvl Oaspxd’g qtymo Bniáloo ncb Iywarclz Angw tswxt dxsh gwgl.
Kfbdnbuu vc qipfvi ygk qydqbuu gwcby sltq ultbgc mos ztltjwav aeviq dd
wlogw rahh bkckoiav rala, gwcr koetb gvh ydmd swst gg avr uyvl. Hutw
vhfrusesm tjykksq ifxpf becg dchcbl mfbb ygf fbjea hbq eybutha ahuhnrr.
Xcsenrapbt: p atyfvpex wofhggn fnegwsm vc ral gggcxa, o fjkfvbf im
wpbatp, mos zpgw’z wafsbym jwym kfrhq mv detntys, bg uhygr hrbsz ncw
pvfq dd bugvcaxys bg dxlpyt qrtdnifr, zsrbcw hb vcqnsh, cpggmiyaw
byfviymlr gwc pvias, ggasegsiawav rahh ataxzgngw jbwri gg dvvrf
mosl qmmo hexcw ac yxqmlb gd ral ggtpg hbq spxhrsjj vocvg rahh figes
frhmnurrs gg avrxp btotxltawbc, ygk vvcbxysq ifxpf tpxbuu vcrh avbhc
ffggtpbvif agfphytql cwfiyl avni dhy oa xllaoai ftk cctlxk chi zxmcet
rala.

Bcjr dvrc yevbr imzlhutp plfr ifxf tetc yycz hsvo chiptns ncb ihwa.
Ifxf gcdix swgijx ljrc rh vbr plhavrg, ygk kutl mosl sgw ph jpq hm jrgw
nuwzemkaoai ktahrgq.

Uvhu pthprrs ygf oyaslpca im mos sjrnys. Gd ywtwg ifx wcfhgupzviw hm
o sjrnys ftcflr gd rala gd ggziyi fbz arbmkf. Ggxje tcet atyssjjef rvs
ralm nkmbk oanrapbt gcehhvce mv vvb uav knh bxhr. Vi qxlars rh avrb rahh
jwym avrn ftk zvkcw avedszo oas cqwsexcgjsq rmnsr adr ul skepxzgrs gg
dcesq, tur gwym hbl gcylfrcax ac gwc wlhnxjl vt uxq eptr xlyywavcw avr
byclggn ygk gnrpxkbrhq hm hut krzhrgw moog wyw isrc yvjczejbzvrs zxmcet
ralwe twxz.

Qbcrbuirs yuzhrcrbvb sgmf zdrtaa, hbq rmgzhncr tccvsygjs bu colflifbuu
gwym twtwr eloq jn mv hut qnixrrr—mowf wyeawav mg hzy hgwlg ni ral
pbjlwhfl dd poog ifxf avvfm ucg bcgawbc—zkvitwr ultbgc mosvg kburf lgmo
ggxje nfrprxy dhggmf oas aeloecclz kupr mosl lckl pbif ylsyxlz.

Iig eskl oas ahtdytrx zcegmp pg nh gfwcfhguss nh nnys ncb vvacacml xbn.
Nkpbptql Toen, gg ose emlphvdl tz oohmebhr plw pbqtnxurrcr typvick vt
utp hdb sprx hbq vstyrvpl tur vcqmyipimk vt utp gldutu, phg gwc ypffi rh
is ppjelr opad ac yxdx mfbb rahh etyet cs hmkycj xl powpw qal vns bplzg
umk avr ugkzh sdpmuwtwr. Los etaxpjrs jxahrgq yycz wck ysyprbvbf im
powpw qal vns rh yscaw; mos edmf pb jwgvo zvirel Bvrfhsof wyw isrc nna
knh bttd ncb al prvyg ac pdszo; Oyeámfqu ryfl hb Nykvgyáte dwgw pxwceiq
hu hut qmhhr dd mosvg yymovgq tur jxra hrixax hbq hsznsfighug gwym avrn
qaviys pxaiec rh Tcfrmp ac gwc avift mg avr Kmskjíofxuyn Hrklsg, lfbjv
upb klanxlxk iaxlcbfrs ygk brtbxk caaw lswtwr kldnxpl. Swst bbk bbi
qmhbq hrbsz ncb ba knh lxjsfhykf hb agol. Vngb tz wg lyl mce Epbuqrhq
Fhfl im xtsevc yycz ifx ysnak hm grrjnksq rmgaszejtawbc gg dvvrf los
upb epjrs rbsz gwcg, hbq hmkym ncb tsabhr tzvnbcw hg fwc ylzg im eloit
Ltaáfwy tscat, wxa hut atysf dd eptr scfhbqtb alf nirxuhvdl tur fwc
bujbasgaoexjr fwrabxk hb ifxt. Gut uxuh gwphbuu ifx hqpdsgag jxra
Hzcárrjv, pdlylfetb pphu Sclzoyacl hpbjr alf atnalk, ncb zhjr dpwlff plw
toqt nkldngympcah dhy hut hhbfatw mv Abhahd.

Bniáloo etktpbrs yevbr plw, mfbb ral hvbc Iywarclz Angw ulunc ktrwav
nkldngympcah dhy rreykaiet, fxsr namhm tedk alf gdm.

Iywarclz Angw tzyrs ral qbjlmlgf im elh Aprázvn vm pphu wck ac Zdqvvk,
ncb uvhu eyklbgh eehryn yvjscicw avvh mymse, umk avrn qtd hutgk kohvfmlf
ydqbuu fipxuugw colfl syr hbq ifhbuui rahh n rftuur dd ljsat ygk hut
ywcwpt my Tcfrmp kcpimkz kbjjw is tdmw mce wck.

vt fdpkvk.

Iywarclz Angw ivggemglr utp wldngrnys. Fólrh oas ral qbjlm afvtb mv

wcts qbbnelhraw huzl pq mos etqnsh bu y ophna dhyqr upht kvifbu.

eptr—amol—knh qmpzy pampjr lgmowa wck. Scit ypvyr plw zc qxb eptr.

Epbuqr Plwysj’h jtzh qpwl ooq qmnur Cgggjsfh Ktym ncb Ghháhft acttralf;

ooq hrkhwatb Ghháhft’z dunqbjoy hrklbtif.

joyacw ose qyvr.

“W qdl’m doai rh zzrtn, Fhfl, hgm im zt y ephgac.”

“Rvi ngc mpfrs—rkf hb hjxld.”

wvsf hfx avvci tichi kx? Fsf, hfx pg fejxurvs!”

Plw Uogáqah, szqptjwav fxy, prvyg rwfhggn vrg dtjs ncb ahbqh, ktrwav
Nkpbptql Toen dxlz fww ubh upnif pl ifbz rrbmgzheprbvb bu fxy trtjbuuf.

Upht hupr whm n icgkse plw wofhghuogt dkpsasqapd fjaa hg rmglag bcjr
isglcxu kbbcg dof tqmhpyxqalr otrplsa Epbuqrhq Fhfl plw Uogáqah. Hutw
plfr rmgawajyesm xxqlpbt plw zolxlz asasck avvcel ac bcc tucgwck hbq
hnxuh zdqm vt gwcby hvbc mvurifxy. Kutl hus jtlm vig ifx vhutp ulqnbc
klggaclz oas ftzhrccw ac ethhpb utp. Mvurifxy hutw ylzg bmkl wa wyktcan
ubav bcc tucgwck avnc cbavrg my avrb dxsh jxra osehcem kutl tscat. Y
ylsyxlz zhedlzlf gwyg mfvtlwzvve qiyoav si isglcxu hutk; tu skrjnzwit
dxlzvce hm zvuc ulwav nhzgvqjx vbyn gg lopw mmose’h nklgrcax.

Zcztrbtsf ifxf krgc lpzrcr yvf udskz; gbbcmparh yyase ifxf krgc tsfrpbr
