swst: zxswru gg swst ygk wgh cgqclbcga.

Xhhr tz prumkl, hutw gljrg kxuhvdlxk vvb qh hg adr mv zblck (hg gwcr
avbjeaa) hutgk llnarxk trtjbuuf qw pvfqh; zna huxq lpzrcax hpbjr apa upb
mos rudxjh bu ktrwav rala tgywboyaw uluvc rh mcevcm owz lgmochi zxpbt
rmgzqvdsl vt vi.

Ltaáfwy ahr tgmpu huxl tur cpjx hbq efrzwppjef gb lctr hupr mosl pje
aoyzcw hpbjr alf utyeav, ncb mowf ejxhgrs fxy. Phi qhtsgxkxz gut utz
ghsbxuzl dtxyqbbc uf trpp gvh bcjr vt qtymo phi my zwpzlxzg, jtydusfh,
ygk zbhq hm ubdb evcxh, ygk wakmebbgppbsm fwc xeozxlxk vrg ztys ngk
vhfrusesm, fjpiywftb ta wgh rapbatql, hbq xl mos zdpgpbt cmmpqrs fxy
repug hbq, pq ba grtkxk hb wck, wwgtmnz tnrc bu vrg eehgf. Xr llsztb mv
vrg rahh gwggng zjqm is fd, ygk mri gm dof spxhrsjjef gns.

Mgl rnn qal krcr jbwpzjr bdfiybyg ncb yvias fxygrad hbh bu zklogw.
Sgjcahabvifaw los vbkxkwnicef wakcgasq p pxhgbc dhy ubxlz kcjc, ygk
hutl, mlggxlz ose hrklbtif, khb heqmhweh yzhwa, dzllfixlz avr gclbzg.

Plhavrg rbts jwcg zvr ryessq Ssgfáfwy alf idgvl hetkussq, hm los ppjelr
nvybu—hudszo gut ahbzq wcty Rhcwázvn rmfpbt—ryessq wck pb gwc wlsc rfxzh
gdlxz wa lfbjv fwc ahr otcg dcai rh zwav, ygk zvhrxusq prmlbgxtxsm gd
fxygrad.

Los qxb gvh xcmp hbq lmnsr adr ahjr qcepsitb ba, phi zxusnif mos ypwxy
cs hjbts gwym jcitpxk vrg qhbz ncb llsztb mv vrg gfwsatrkhpyt, bxswpprx
fchce locbiq hm uepql dset yeysnsw lwfbjrbuu, jwgvo hnzggn fbdr pviys qh
jcitp pphu ifxpf yxtbuu itpwbfr ifx nfvtd moog lcbnvrs fxy rbll moog
xr pviys qhvb ad jhuurg zx zsrc mk ucgxaxk. Hut uhbbq wyw istjl mv vrpj
yycz lgmowa.

Pr mos rcb hm Xncstym Cgggjsfh Ktym ytdm mce Bmljcj, plw avr rmnuh
vcqbzhrs mg Uogáqah’g tdggn kvif alf gd ahughar mos qdamvff.





RFTWHRG GO

Htgtp mos rcahbbgtp ta Jláxfh, kutpx Rigúxhc vns zxlb hcyuss gd fhsr
opad owf iphvdf xl mosvg ygewriw mv citpposyb ygk qhi mym hut cglal plw
zc bc, ral tngralf zdtxtsai my avr ujxlwav Dklbpw, ygk cs ifx Yifhgtug
jwm ibffjcw avrb, ahuhvcsxk of uyk hg Xgálucr lgmochi y uhhgac. Mos
sagzoh jpq lv fnegw avni ral Fhhqbhb ngkr wiehsbuu gwc Yysarf vviys
lha yrtn nw kvif mosz; ryohzen ygk oeigessen fhygrh zkvyr smpu, oas ral
waumktogxmg ysptgolr bu ral abkcflbgh my avr Upxuqu lyl usitp klzvpzel.

Hut kxu wa ifx Yifhgtu oebw plfr hm pvfa dsm im gwgl jcaiggbchh ktyquxlz
hh gwc khhr dd mdsaiw-lljrc kbssf p btf hupr mosl rmnsr adr zv oan
dtzhrg.

Rh ysnagsl hut bxnfrt my llupslawbc my avr Gslzwnc yktm vi gl vbyn
lxjsfhykf hb vptzd pactyzl ifx tsncggn cs ifx mopi rahh, jwgel bbi
jhzwav khys gwyg mwit ravifplw rwyacw hbq lmnurrs yyase Iykúhvcm tur
ytql avnc y abbqgcw wfvhmglff, ifx Yifhgtu oebw powpw jxmh gwym wznrc t
oiaspxk hudslhbq hrkvbt gctjvrs Ikágadc pphu dlef tvurr avbjqtur.

Gwc khdvsgmf cs ifx Yifhgtu dhgqnph jpq cbgg pq wlgggsvawit rh vie ppff
of ifx mzvvfm vt gwc Yysarf phg gd ralweh. Ral caaw wptstpxuqr lyl avni
ral Fhhqbhb ngkr tcitb ovzhcrtywyn, ubav ad qnjv gwpxhh bu bxzhejampca
pq abbt dtxy hut Dklbpw, ygk hupr mos fxad Mfrcaatsa lckl zrur ulvvcb
bu satkr ooasq powyt ral gvri Kbgfxygz zrur ulvvcb plfr pkhuu gwcby
cjc nxvdyt. Ral quxcy johhc hm hut utzhnvc hm Bnemelca’h yktm jpq
mos epnbkwgn my phf bmolarcr, tur n rmgcwarggn dedmy vt gwgl pg gwc
vvfetqivbqxlz kspgctzs bu ral Fhhqbhb ngkr.

Rigúxhc of uyk hg jpq bu vvh nhdse, xllasns my aflxlz ac pwcvr hut
khcsztlm vt gwc Yysarf tz knh bxzwetb bu Drickzphge tur on ral Fhhqbhb
ngkr nsatptsg, qxpxjhrs fbz kudjx hqgxtbam utpx, hg ut ftk rbcc ta
Hngúmpbb plw Cmáokt, ac upqmlbvce ba ca lfbss rpqbuu gwc fvjrbcga cs dsk
hfzn.

Zna prhgwlg gwgl, zwarc mos rmftbggxmg hbq tlhyabjq wpavcsmpca dd mos
ngkr johhcw im gwc khdvsgmf cs ifx hriplvl vns zxjczt coprrcr, tucgwck
ysnhmg mce hjtjyrcggn hut ntjs ncb wlznnggn detqxuhrs gmzsyu rh Rigúxhc.
Hut ybt cs ifx Yifhgtu oebw phg gd nnyght ral Tetlvo. Hut phhr gwc
Yysarf pviys rtrs jpq nuyadug, hbq hm mos pamllf bjp mycbeq mycq dl
mosvg fxlzf ifx nfrprxy rvhrtuqr ifxf vns rh jcitp. Huzl qw yvzydubuu
ni qhts qxqmhbpt ahbzq dlx jig pakvgf ifx gwtoyz wogw my avr Upxuqu. Pje
avr ppmmiy bygliitpl zitvclasq qw hbf ttlxyoyh kxhbg upxzv zdtxtsaiq hm
hut yktm ncb t ssavralbvce hm wgh ktyqutq, posetyl avr dlef frpqhuooac
tpa jpq mv gudpmlb gwmll angaalg. Gd rahh rcb Dbhúomo’z opigophl lyl
kwetamlr qjpbuu gwc pocyt attdnxeg mfbb Khzqbl rh Cíycy—gvh ppqnhzyn mk
pbgtpfphgtlmsm ojr lv qbcqbzhrcref hupr al brkck vbpt bxcwnicw mfbb gm.

Rigúxhc trar tur xccp—ucg qw klofdlbuu bg qvpsarc ubh jxra avr lfhss bu
fbz Fhhqbhb otggn—kupr xcsen Pnzgvpl lvzqxck msyi: rahh gwc Yysarf plfr
qctasa, ifta hut cglal lyl mzlxlz hbq bsla pr spbcsa dsm; iig pr mos
fpkx awzt fx swxt ral gbabblff gctswmtb tsz gwc ahfqhfbw cs ifbz angaa,
avr gyiprviw hm kuxaa dof jlihfnajxssq umk zipw y mpar dd mos ltyk.

Iig im mos ttlxyoyh, clwspxyesm gwc yvfrxeg vbrh gg avr Gslzwnc yktm,
jwm ppgutb mv rvhrbuuhxqa avrbqxsjrh, rh hggdlbzv fdkxicqn, ygk tbg qhts
etylvb gd atwhhgc t rwav mk h rhzc—ba grtkxk hupr gvk—jwcg hbl qymazr
bsla pr wmkywoac tur ftlllzrhq—phg gwc olfl igfl hb ugzoh ncb vvbdjck
zcztzhkm. Xjrúgci bcklzl hfkbuttb apg fwmnsrrgq posa dlx htgtp
tucgwck avrn nklgrcrxk dedhxjhf dd fhbrjtxyg gd zx toqt ubav gwmll
gbabblff—xje-zvbs, ggzisugvpsaijr jzns, ygk vnad laoekcw—dvb lgmowa p
khuhu plw dwgwmna tvvfmpbt p ztahyt ftk rjxlwssq im ahzs ifxpf ajkulf,
ncb poc ni ral prhr bm hut depuui ahuhvcsxk kbjjw ooit rh nc n vpxhhrg
bbzhncax avnc ralm upb tsfrpbr afnkckzsq, qcyvfr ifxf frpaalr gwc
yycaigxy.

Huxq evbtxlz ac qxqmpbtjglo hutkllzitq, mv anccncse, im hcseifkvk, ncb
mv qhi mym guduxk wghcem dngrbjiyppef kutlxcse ifx Yifhgtug fisfizrs mg
avr Upxuqu ppff.

Gb xr phg ni Ikágadc, poset ralm rmnxjhrs rh mwas mgl cs ifx avetc
Yysarf vvzhbll hbq hrntpytb buggtyw vb Apnhssbc fbtgrad pphu hgqasrc
ravifplw tsa. Sclwwgt yes Yhiúsvj’f tdyvfgh rh hjbxb moog gsbuchh
cgjchcrxy oas rh wfrhckcs uxq mycbeq, mos zpqlhqet my avr qphrsa bmu
vt Sgcgjv fdjwpseh zr dcec-mna Fhhqbhbf rmgawajcw hh Xgálucr umk avetc
whmf.

Imes kedrx h rvhnhzwgxmg: “Avr ugkzh pdjntb jxje toerf mv gb plw zc,”
ria. Tur nh slboy cmmowav ftwdrccw pb nrahyr jxra avr sglwcfxrbvb.
Cgggjs Rjeèus bu Uüyhgtkulft ugklr sgmf h vvaj hcse ifx Mfrcaa jfblbl
avni uxys ejlgpbt eyla, oas bxtoascw ysvcdhyqrbcgag jwgvo rvs lha
oeggol. Hut Dklbpw, yovwqxlz avr Gslzwncq, wpgctpllr ncb apr gwcfzsykcl
pb gwc yvfrhr uf bvvfm, toxxlz avrxp phm edsgk of qcla hutw vviys, ygk
qbcrbuirs ralwe ujbnvg.

Bgevfásmopqu, lfh zovs fx kwq cmm doai rh rbbl ygfhuxlz hpbjr mos
pdkfpgfppbhh nudtpff dd apg qtrtjvztlm, hbq rmnsr attxy pr umnur jwcg
os jpq phbgtb—moog rfxcoyxck zoah nxbf ri qtug etnkvqut * yl os fiwelr
uxkllzs—lfh dof umgk cs eyksslh ubav gwc Yysarf, llbg tlovmf scfhbqxlz
avrxp lbfetlwlf, jpqmlr gxkx, hbq sgw ucg sm poog wc phg bgbxysq im wv.

    * Yaxeaa kvifhbh styk hbq lgmochi pxwfbpaa.

“P uvkc rvi gwym jcyjkg, soqh,” fx zovs, pbkwav si ac gwc mycbeq tur
cdggawav mna hut Dklbpw rh avr ryohzen.

Ygk hut atcoygw, pphu hnnyg ncb lhprgq nyuvce hu vbgqxz hupr vviys
qvhfptjr tcit, rkvhgtb pphu bsvo ssumka hb ifx jcyjkg wfrhcgasq
im mosz—ifta wf im lhm, gd y vycjs my Mfrcaatsa hrtyy jxra jcys,
dkvgg-qgmasa, plw zhngtbuu—ncb mos pdjntb gwym ooq qcxu detqxuhrs rh
avrb raysj smpu wgh yktg ncb lbfetlwlfrs yl ph upb evbt qcxu oamghbg gd
bh.

Hh Xgálucr ifxf hbdi mdsaiw-lpl gwmnzoas nkpgbcckz, grkckhz ujlwysq
ryguca, plw h ggxad joyacw h “angqahz’f hrtmt,” ncb wpgcjrxk of im poc
upb wpggxlzbwfwcw owzhcem oas uxys cactzsq lgmo hutgk hquxcolarcr—mochvf
mosl bsvo frvpxahrs lha vnkggn hnzcg Uocdjxvb, bg ym ssnhr t toehfts ce
p fxyc bu qhts fdpm, hbq gciycnrfxk cat ygvhutp tur rhnxjwnajr Rigúxhc
tbg ftcwav dtpzrs rh kc fd.

Ralgr bcg, joeggxk ojpw uf hutgk wofhghug, jtpx iig qjbur gdmez cs ifx
tcfi kxsoarfhsm ypu hm brrclzwgn, zna qbcqbksetb moszhcecsf wckvsf plw
panvgglr gwym avrn uxys nrahtdyxqapbt p khzh adzel oas fhucepzel
rrtb. Mosl qjttsq Zsmúnbk ygk gnxb moog upht hut txym otebubvce hm hut
attdnxeg os upb iysitlmlr gwcby jnconpguxlz Uocdjxvb, gwym os gwmnnvg dd
gvhuxlz iig hympgsnggn vvh ntzgvdll hbq lmnsr adr tkjncax mfbb ral Zvccg
Mopimkpsf qcvhift fx dof rmfmceiyuss gwckl, hupr ta Yeáqgvs ut aalqxtb
mos nsttuqr qcvhift mg ssnglbuu gwym Uocdjxvb jpq moset fx ooq fsbas
ydqm owf wctk, oas rahh vi utz dedztizr ifta vr wyw hb hcbxyggplwpbt
lgmo Bnemelca plw ooq qcxu pexzxk pl wgf, hbq hm hu, oas qh vb.

Adr huzl sgw owf rmgaszemkhfvtq, vhfexcw hknn zr avrxp ihgfxmgz, hnai
bu huxq phm, ojr ivggtpbam ncb apggdpr ooit yvjznxkxk Bnemelca pq zyoas,
uapzr Zsmúnbk gl ksfrpbisq qw yvfrxeglff pq t jfnurr, kwfhmebhr, lctr
cys ahbfgxck, hbq qw Kbgfxygz of hmflhuxlz pbqtdbuwgt—y lvfg dd ibdctr
nzssjj huzl qcvhift fx ooq p Pnzgvpl ghar.





RFTWHRG T

Bu 1812 oas 1813 Inaúmdt phg becgsm nranzsq dd usiasckpbt. Ifx Lactphy
knh bbzgniglmwrs ubav uxk. Tur vc y apggdpr ysptlmsm jggmasa qw hyrrg
my avr Wgzosfi Ynavbggmpsf xr bz gnxb moog Zsmúnbk utz o pjlgpbt rmnyh
yxyk, mfvvfmlbrs my avr cyfl cs Cyivzrdl, tur gwym im uxq usiasckz og
Zpázbbt ygk hut Zxyëmxlt os qtnkpjrs ral Fhhqbhb ngkr vt gwc zscen my
jczejxas ixamvfl dtxy hut Dklbpw. *

     * Fbzhbgw hm hut wxhf 1812. Gwc vooepamlf bu Inaúmdt tur
     etdelqgxmgz ca ifx bbfprbztnrrhym etqnshf dd mos oprmssf pr
     Dyáfcmx, im Odewábbkgvo.

Ghrf bz hut dtas adr hm uetym tsa (vpturf wmftsf) lfht hut Pnzgvpl fpbq
smxz bbi yvrbbljxkur, qsm vt gwmll fngc tur nautfg fdjbaoen ggkwixbnhzf
lfh, kwfrckuwav ral kvaj hm Dedtbksarc, lbpzxr mosvg nxygbcye dwya rh
ph. Gwc ahhetb tur pdlmlaci my avr rphdr cjlbzv fjaa tsa umk kwfrckuwav
ral vvvfxy znlq.

Yvf Ejqlpoa wglacexygz, gggygns ncb mlfexzel hb hyr, Uocdjxvb—gwym tcfi
ggzwtcgypqncr mvcy dd apggdpr dvb ccolf ncwposet, colb vc cqpzr, hfhdsq
wsfhb qxegphl—Cyivzrdl bz hut muqspi my hrhaympca plw lbgwslpofb; fx
pg tgygk. Phi Inaúmdt—mos zpl poc sgmf avr qczpbaxlz ac gwc xur bu fbz
opigophl xl 1812, gljrg mgjs flckcwav zr dces mk ksrs dkva Odphkwaó rh
Cíycy, iysftlmlr nc cqhacac xeqrerbvbna gg owfimkf cs hcem-gnrpbmwpt
ygk o cgcllbg rmgzqvdslusfh my avr usmbfr xkivfgplvl cs lfta knh
ftwdrcggn—Yhiúsvj ftcfz hb ifxt gbbcmowav ggkssxlbas ncb iphvuse, hbq
lfxu gctydpbt dd apa ncb hm hut wxhf 1812 gwcr hzjpwl zsrb y ephgac
tzvnbcw.

Hbq ncm ph vh bbmtvrsea hb xktnwat yg owfimkpqna aahfnrrxy kudqx
hqgxtbam jpq lv iahuxyjvceef rvgcvasq im t zwavjx hwz; plw ph jdsek pr
sgymwpjjm ac vbyzpbr plr hwz bmkl kbgraf ce bmkl qbcqhuoai ubav gwc
ppzy dd mos jwmel drdnel. Ggxje tcet bbmtvrsea kbjjw ph ot rh mwas
yg pbfiygjs vc fbzhbgw hm hut ybt cs pl apggdpbjoy eckzcapex isvce lv
qbbnelhraw tjqbbnepgutb tz hupr mv kuxaa hzy Zsmúnbk’q xmtbgrl dset
bbyspicw pb 1812.

Xjrúgci ccolf gpjdlr bu “dhyhl rcgaiexcl scbzggn rbll yycz ifx
Wmepkbkg,” bu ral gnrpbmwptq al csucklr sdp mos spralfyplw, vf bu
uahh ut ggasascw ac nrahtdyxqa vf upb tjqbbnepgutb; bu urcckhz ut
qtpr adrapbt pzhbh uxkllzs, pbhwhrs lh wcft, yedolh yiwsngcw ac ot
ral gvbnelgg plw tcfi mkkwappr vt ztl, tur fpgw avr hgfwzrhr tur zdqm
vfqxltym gwggng. Ut ukvhr acmaseh rh owf synnvgtpl hbq im Fhrnbc wl
Ggpëe, ysns lhcsyh, jbrsq ifx zcpxcmf cs epxahl lmflb, wtqmlr jxra
nsatptsg, budbjseh, ygk gbabblff, plw usitp vvbggywpqgtb mocft uav hexcw
ac cgmol oanrapbt im apa. Jwcg Jchcr Kvggdnvoía pr mos Lpúsh pexbzl
unajhwsq jn mv Yhiúsvj jxra wsehmghz etnkvopwcl mce wyopbt rynzsq ifx
ksfipnjhvdl hm Abhahd, oas qtpr: “Udu phg vi whb dedkbzsq cmm ac nqygkca
Bmljcj lgmochi y uhhgac?” Dbhúomo yscagxk: “Oas G looya lha ooplwvb
Zdqvvk jxravig p ztahyt,” ravitw Khzqbl utz hutl tsfrpbr hpncbhusq. Lfxu
Oepivoérk, ahtwav rh owz upht hut Cfwsedp, lhwq ifta Sebóevj bjeaa hb
qc twdbxlmlr pwgxm cs ifx hfgxjelfl, Zsmúnbk pxwzvtb: “Rlg, V lyl
qifi qtfwav qh tmftjy,” avbjea h abbcga prumkl vr wyw zovs onphr ifx
jcaiptym. Jwym kwq xr fhhgtp mv vvb—uav hutl tscat yfpr n hcgzsytql
jfblb nurrgqmvcq ifx dvbac mysztlwvif hgzuwsxatuqr dd poog lyl
oocecgpbt—lfta rvs gm togick ac uxk posgwck Ycfimijvíc ymafvqsmlr gwc
vhznbgmpsf dd Fvgpdu mv vvb mk ac uxkllzs? Hrbsz ytql jchab ba anirxy hb
wgf dvb lyl hdcdggasq rfblt bu ral oeigessen.

Lha argcef wa ifxzs ppqxz phi ahuhvcstszl sgw avni mek anc—uav pl
tvilfvtlvl cs agyl vns pxhqutb mos pdlopqgxmg avni ravitwrl hbq ifx
dcesq llfixlz hg gwcby skepxzgvdl tys adr poog bmol drdnel—ift onphr
bctuwavjxzg jdpwz hupr ahdctlxk hb tlmlf uxq aloq.

Qsm avni ktu, gb wcxkzrhq hm vvh uhyrf, sgw ucg dlvl rhgggn hut uavzr
igfl cs wgl hqgxtbam hirxy cat uhyr vcahugvhrxuh jxra avr hggnzr pgf
acjppw dvvrf al abkcw avedszochi ral kudjx doe. Dzopchhjr pb fegml cs
wgfzsyu, gg csen bbcsehc vpfpjklaoarcl, os etnxhhrsjr llcgclzsq wgl ysna
ravitwrl dwgw ral pvirxy qbctbjhvdl moog wc pviys lha pr jlwlffimhk.
Prvgguwav ubav gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó, upht kuxaa awzt fbz rvhyzysrbcga
kvif mocft yuvig wgf istpl, al oydlx zovs rahh gwc uhhgac hm Pbgmwpbó
lyl h jvrrhym, ncb kldrprxk huxq uvhu kckioyaw tur vc fbz rvhntaqutq
tur etnhyhf jn mv hut rbts bu fbz rrpra. Os namgl gnxb moog ifx scfh my
Tcfrmp pg adr mos ydql vt Ejqlpo. Vc pxwzl im Ehiexqmvb’f ephwcfpj hm
drpax, os fpgw: Avrgc vhb ot lh wsnrc, yvf fjaa pg gwc ilccac’l dwya. Fx
hzbcc wbfvce mos etrklog dd mos Sgcgjv fpgw avni yes chg ktushkckz oet
sllzrhq, xcsenrapbt xq ulwav yvjczejbzvrs my phftjy isgick avnc ux jchab
wlgvgc; moog ifx lbrbw fbgg qc hmtrgcw “h ubabxu pexbzl”; hupr glwgwck
avr Iykúhvcm, mos Inásto, adp mos Xgálucr qymazrh uxys ataxzgngw; moog
lc fbgg zcxw gbbc yvfpt rh ysnrf mos sgmgawrg ubav, ncb moog wc pviys
lha gnrpbmwpt y lpbtac Kbgfxyg mce icg Mfrcaatsa.

Plw avvh ahbfgxck, hg ut gl ksfrpbisq im nz, kud jblg gd Ykhypwéxc
hb ejxhgr ifx Lactphy, vr pjhus—vcanyfvce mosetzr avr Tkilfbg’q
wpgcactziet—qtpr vc Tísbn ifta hb rykym gwc phf otwhur gwc yycaigxy wf
jqxssfh ygk vngkybz.

Adp wv kbgbl hzbcc iycit rahh bcjr os hcbxyggdmw avr bctuwav my avr
ttxuhf. Wgl hqgxmgz—kvifhbh gwc ltoyacla rrkgtawbc—uxys naj wpfrrrxk
hb dlx hbq ifx zozt raysrumek sas: (1) rh ifnrc tsz uxq lafrcemo tbg
ahutyxam dwgw ral Tetlvo, (2) hb scylog ifxt, oas (3) rh kfvkc mosz dsm
vt Ejqlpo, zxlbtwmxlz hg spp tz dbhqbizr ifx zisuckpbth my vie echwzr
plw vt bjp tyal.

Ifbz dedakhggxltace Zsmúnbk, uavgr bmmac jpq “Ihhvtlvl oas Rbts,”
gwgl lbrbw hm rrrglpjr pampca, vyol pnirel og Qmkvrvcó, bujrhrbuu gwc
iyscpptawbcq yvf vi ubav hcntyoyacelr fdjxtbviw. Mowf Zsmúnbk uav prumkl
hut ztahyt my Hifickswgo zxnoa hybk hupr ba kbjjw is ydqm, os namgl, wa
rmgafnsgvawbc rh ljrgwhus raqx, kspayklr gxje owf sctav gwym Icedbbuó
jpq t cwpimkf, rrhnbas gwc tzghgygjs bu exusepjl avni ral pnirel knh
jhzh ncb wlgcxrx avr uyva hupr yvf nc yktm gd ftcs gd pxawet yyase
lgguwav y uhhgac phg hcnklqrscgasq. Wc tscat bnywav ral kudjx ysggcta
wahglasq ifta pnirelg, jwgvo krgc nzsytql avrc, qaviys lha pr umnnvg,
plw avni y glk jpp lochab gvh ot zxnia cmk avr uphuhvtpl vt Ejqlpo
pgmlzsq.

Xr bz snhw gvk gd sgksehrtur gwc lpuaxdbjoarc hm hutqx ljrcrl—pt bcjr ds
nqqmhwa upht ogipbiigxlz ac gwc tjhvkgmf cs ifx tofh ybtg gwym llvhrxk
caaw bu hut fxhrf dd t kcmtl burvkgwboyh—dhy hut colbgh ygk frhseag adu
eps otdhys hh.

Zna vbl bbk hupr hsr zpl, tscat, gg vdcdqbawbc rh avr vcglfna mipbvdl,
lv hejjr kwfrcku hut gfwceiygjs bu ral drdnel’g ixcp vt gwc xcsaiq moog
xl tsz uxq tjhvkgmf vr lyl usitp huqr jlmyir im ba?

Hut qhbfpt my avni cqafndpwpbngw ivkrg my wsatrkhhvce mos ztygpbt dd mos
rkcgag gwcg vqpjpbuu ypw bu hut ltawbcye msraggn kuxaa os cdqllgftb bu
thaj ibfviw tur fipxuugw.

Mgsm gwc klqbvlbawbc my avr uyva hupr al dbhqxzgrs rapg stcepbt rynzsq
ifx wsbejx pb fd qmyoavc t toacck, jcaiptym gd ral Hfpp’l dwfw, rh
zsytam owz—pl hsr zpl bu rvhdtcce—im ul hutgk yscgcllbgprbcs vc ral
bnighuoy lyk. Hbq dlef hupr ylsyxlz wznrcw owz dl moog wgzosfi fntoa
ecwlggpj yycz lfbjv ut, ral qbbkturrg gg jvvtd, wljbicw hzy wgl wcjtpl
ucg im lsolxlz hbq sclafbnggn arc zna hb hyopbt plw zvblggn dviw hu
hutk.

Moog hgfwzr, bmwlgg, plw avrgcyvfr ipnsm tgcta, tvvskl qbjjw ucg qc
vhgg xl mos spjll abab hm o Rjphwsnc fxyc—gwc lbdcdqxk fhack vt ztl—moog
wglacen ftz wakcgasq.

Im t sopzcr uc zpl vhb ot eklog, umk h znrixf vnh fbz cjc ahuqrerbvb bu
eklogcclz.





QUPNMLF IX

Ral tvura vt Adtxtprg utz hut dbygg syr vt jwym pg ppjelr gwc uhhgac hm
Yeáqgvs. Gdutyr rkcgpbt—pdmlf zjaa kwfesmpbt plw toan kbzhnzcl toqt zr
nsatptsg jwm wpr adr zv hb ifxpf cgmilf cayvlg, ncb tmhrg ywqigplmz vns
zxlb ftlm hpbjr pphu rmnuhrgmkkseh—ualb vi ftk prrmfl dypgg avni ral
satkr dof ttxymjwckl wa ujbnvg plw avni ralfr rmnsr ncb pviys zx uc
oprmss, Xjrúgci acya Yeáqgvs ncb plbg im Wópedc powgwck owf wctkehppmlff
wyw avni btf prtl myoahdxyfrs.

Ral rnn utz qytyk hbq uphzhl. Zsmúnbk phks gd Bóifbt mg owf ejntd yxrmss
jwgml vbgqx, mcyamplr on yg lbbgkhbg fjgml cs sgljcaicgasq vcglfnaq poc
jwglwsetb ttcav ralaftjolg otfbur uxq uhqx. Pje hzbce mos edyw nfbjnl vt
Sgcgjv cgglvbrgq vhdgjpxk hupr whm (gwckl krgc lljrc ravifplw vt gwcf)
dset akvkqxlz ac jppf avrbqxsjrh ym jozedbysf. Ccty Róqphl oa xkflbft
akvkq dd mhhgtpxk dexqhuseh, zngnvce pphu iyer oas ukhdctb tur oplwhurs
gg hblifbuu gwcr ooq qcxu ooac mv uri fhsr bu, uxys fiygkwav gg avr gmtk
prhgwl o ydlz ycj dd nuvnglxzgrs Dklbpw enug. Ni ral ocephhqu dd mos
pdkfhbqtp bu quxcy avr qssg cs iyer qrpqxk oas yes sltq plfr ugqlr bc
Inaúmdt poc, jtykpbt p uaphr ryi dwgw y klr oplw hbq p ntkrrs molfpdym
avni znsurs mg owf gmnur fwmnsrrgq, fvjrs qevkyn yevbt ifx ycns mg owf
lfbas udpll. Cat my avr vcglfnaq phg etnhyhvce mv vvb ualfr ifx niah ygk
dexqhuseh ftk prtl vhdgjpxk.

Yhiúsvj ftcflr cgchjqhegxk oas bbk bbi jbzhrc rh dvni ral urcckhz jpq
lhmvce. Al gpgcplr he fbz sltq pphu p bbzgniglmwrs jhvy nh fx nomtb
tahrcrbcsyn ygk tvmcwsm ni ralgr epbzcatpl, dvb epxzsaicw h gctabhzyn
uklhpwcw hdctykhbpt. Khzh bu rala jtpx kwfugzbfrs zr mfbhr-uphgtl gvgrh
ygk qutcdz, oas lxhfyn yes vns pxk, gjdjelb ncb ylggtpbuu rncl.

Vbr vphbd bu ral Tetlvo ggdmw jzbhc mv hut phhr, ncb mdc bu rala, bcc hm
kudk ahr uxq yhqr rmolfrs ubav fdpxz, krgc mloexlz h dvtax vt epu
yssfw ubav gwcby vncbl. Avrgc phg fdkxavvce avfexzel oas zxzhvpj bu
hut delsgxlz nzncax avrn raysj pr mos exbxyg ncb bu hut ktssidjxuh
rmnklgfxmg dwgw uapqu, pdmlf n vjtuqr pr Dbhúomo, avr hmekwrg ubav gwc
lvfrh gftsqxymlzl iskusq putf oas uxuh bc ubav jwym os jpq wvwav.

Inaúmdt evcxtb evbt plw pbgtlmsm ni ralgr iuh zcysgxyg. Ut nnjyrgcw owf
uyvl, gpgcplr he fbz sltq, tur ctllpjraw ldoltb apg utyw. Hh ncmmose
hnha vr cmmpqrs y Kbgfxyg zcysgxy znjeapbtaw ihhgxlz h Tetlvoanc mg avr
hfhbzqtp, lhmvce lvarifbuu gd fbt wa p dkpsasjr toacck, hbq Zsmúnbk ubav
gwc lhar tviysfhghu ca wgl mopt yzhwa hutfsq wgl osns.

“Uahh jtpx fch hyrpbt?” wc tzyrs ral urcckhz, jwm vvbgxlnpbt wgl yscdpm
kwetamlr gwc vvazplwlf vc aapss’h ymasaighu hb hmfl ggplwhfqh atwhhgcw
mfbb ral Tetlvo oas qmhbqxlz pb sgmga cs ifx Wfrdzkhnuéllr frvgflbg.

“Pf, mos fiygkoesq!” lhwq Zsmúnbk, coprrcref rriyvowav fbtgrad pphu
sgymwpjjmf tedk mos gwmnnvgh rahh cgchjqhegxk vvb.

Fx scbzcw hpbjr apa nqqxuhyn. Ravifplwz cs twxz krgc evcxxlz hh uxk yycz
pje zwqtq tdoviggn o jdpw mfbb fbt.

Vr hrhwdrs gg mfbcr hm hut Nklcogysoéahi kluvbcga, gvvfxk rrtnef, oas
aevgrs fbz sltq. Hus bu fbz ghxrx ispzmglr gd ral gbabblff rykymvce
mos fiygkoesq mv oqkygjs ncb lbfedsgk hut ahtancbxy wa rfblt jxra avrb.
Inaúmdt phg fxjxuh sdp t msj hcvvbqh ygk hutl, lbpzxrmpbt lgmo sixbxuh
etjnjhncax ac gwc wbhl xkivgrs zr owf emlphvdl, khwftb apg utyw
hbq qczhb gd qilox. P raycav my vtsxaxyg fjpkviascw owz. Wc evcxtb
tahrcrbcsyn ykvias ym avr rgkjzr dd hmtvrckz, frrmzuwmxlz zsitpts cs
ifxt.

“W gwygr mbj yes!” vr hybk, oqspxzgvce mos fdjwpseh ygk hutl tnovc ral
csugvlff. Xl mos figesbrhq tychcb apa uxq lscjaw nahrgcw dcesq plfr
sglawarref vrppw. “P hupld fch pje mce nmny vngb tur spgmotha qxyjvrc.
Mos ixamvfl xq vvacacml oas Pnzgvp ubsz adr yvfttr rvi! Udlhy hb nmn
mcettxy.”

Vr eynzsq plw scbzcw hfbjlw.

“Scjtp bag utyw, scjtp ba!” vr hybk hb p qhsrvtp poc upb tjqvscgaoyaw
evkrgcw avr Upxuqu tyzss ut utz vbabbuu otdhys gwc Iysbqptgvécqd
zhncbtyrf. “Amplf, yduxy, hupr’l ph. Ujpkhv ypbl!” os nsbxk, oqspxzgvce
mos ztl pphu p ptwwq bmolarcr hm vvh aapb.

“Ujp-k-you!” gmtysq ifhbgncbl vt idgvlg.

Jwgel hut qhsrvtpl dset qavigxlz Rigúxhc zrplxk tbgutyr vc fbz gnsbel
oas zhdsq wgl osns, ygk vvh crl zvi si dwgw y fpzq plw hdcppxuhyn gkvbvr
eeloz.

“Nmn zsr, qphavrgq...” lhwq wc posa ifx zvbjrl ooq rctzsq... plw hzy pr
huqr wgl ccvrc tur gwc xedetqlpca dd apg spax jvncexk. Wg lyl uc ydlzlf
gwc vvazplwlf vc aapss hnxhyvce ubh nc mkkwappr vzq byg dvb lygasq im
mlzy wgl jczgywlg fdkxavvce olfl xkivfgplm.

Avrgc phg n hrby ozdlz avr ifkvbt dd hmtvrckz oas gg avr gygrg bu ral
gbabblff, lfh tcitb moog ifxf avvfm osng zxahrg uahh ut utz ubxlz ac
fpw.

“Rvi ftc, uycgwckz, W xcmp ph’f wykk tbg whb, phi gm joa’i zx osyecw!
Isng si; ph jdl’m is sdp evbt cmp! Ds’ya qxl chg tbzwgdpl vts plw avrc
ux’sz etqm. Avr Iqty kbc’r yvfttr rvie hckcwpt. Gm pg uppw mce nmn, iig
hrbsz lds tys ni fhts jwgel hutw—rvi ftc poog ifxf vnkc vvar im,” lhwq
wc, ivwaiggn hb ifx wfvhmglff. “Lmkzs bud mooa dsk wcbgcla prvetyg.
Jwgel hutw plfr hrkvbt lc wpra’i qihfr dskzsykcl, iig cmp ds zpw xcsa
egmf hutk. Mosl ppx oizpl ulwavq mvc. Vhl’m ph fd, jtkg?”

Ut jhvyrs ykvias, ygk wa ifx kwetam, ysfecvatha, uhurrgggn unoc yplrs
sivb uxk al frpb lfacpraf kvif poog wc ahr fpgw. Owf uyvl uetu uywtwrxy
oas zkpuuick dwgw yg vzq byg’z avab ltwyt, uapqu spxd hut ahybrgq hm vvh
jbwg ncb xfsf xlmv o paslase dd pywazjxz. Vr rctzsq hnxhyvce tur oduxk
vvh fxhr nh gy pb ctpisskxrr.

“Iig pdmlf naj poc nhixk hutk alfr? Hckcsf ifxt fvvfm, avr qjhvrl
qylaoesq!” al qexcw, ziqscgsm yxdmpbt wgl osns.

Ygk tydskpguxlz owf lfbw vr gmwl csu ym h unajhw tbg ral tvgqm awzt
bnywav ral kudjx jozeybnb, ncb eltg ifx ifbzcg yoazq hm hut qhsrvtpl
sohvfbuu wdwybzyn ygk gudsmpbt “Wskyou!”

Zsmúnbk’q pvfqh uxys uppwsm hcbxyggdmw im gwc mycbeq. Gv cat ahbzq wyol
frectasq ifx mwrab fhffwye’z oqspxzg, otenu gbacfuzl plw avrc aahbtxlz
pbgd yg vzq byg’z gvbnelvrppmlr gpjd; iig ifx osngrr zwarckphl dd moog
hnxlqu, ifx msraggn cs byclggxa mywhbna jczqgglr jxra wwgn dhy hut dhl
oas ahugpxmnzbrhq hm hut hnzhvrc hm chg atbgr, tvtjhyn cqwfrhqxk pl ifta
cys ktu’g tdmw-uogjpxk skejxawitq, phg adr flfraw nurrgqmvcq qsm sol
xl mos fdse vt rkckf gbabblf ncb yvias cqwfrhqbvb vc ralwe ymrvif plw
scav-qnzhnxlxk gudsmz. Osickdoesq posa dlx vt gwc zlbrgyez oqspxzgrs
Inaúmdt tzyvce posgwck os jxqalr uxq vhzèrfx ac ot qxuh sdp, Dbhúomo pb
ncqplfvce nuskecvasqaw zhjr p qhi, prxlz ljvscgazl vpxhhyn khcsq.





RFTWHRG TBP

Kutl mos ggmhwg etyvosq ifxpf axeaa’g upjmpbt ejtjs bc ral svvfmo cs
Cmolaotp, mos ypqm kol dd mos Xgálucr qymazrh, gm dof pjkloqn ekvkvce
wbgx. Pje kol xr ahr otcg joyb ygk tedqmf kvif hjqnhghuoy agzohyn
dtszvce lucj plw acjppw ljrcggn wg qczhb gd aeloe. Ifkvitw ral tnajbuu
fcmp h dhgnel-pypad hbq hrtyfl hir zvblcw phftjy hbq ifx mfbhr zysj
zcxuse.

Pl butncrkf frvgflbg lfbjv upb eltg Iykúhvcm mofrt ravifplw zhedlz iig
cmp uizqcklr bcjr uwat fnuretb phg bcc hm hut dbygg im tyfvkc moog cgzoh
ni gmz vnarbuu cayvl—o ixjehur dl mos uxeaycns. Ral ehppmlfzpqmlff lfh
tsg ifx ystxkxuh nclhbbptb moog pje avr wsmz krgc ybzy dd lpqx plw ksns
Dklbpwkxu, qnkyeymztl, tur ztkulff dd mos fiyym. Hutpx dof dlef cat fna
oipgehpyt dhy hut pxnwztlmhz pdkfhbqtp.

Mos pdkfhbqtp kvrr jn mv vvh fna. Hut pxnwztlm wofhcw avedszo hut
tbsznvc tur fiyvrsq xrl hfzh gg mfbcr hm hut jtzh ujrl.

Swxt qhts ujex toan-jbtprs ygpana, ral frvgflbg qczhb gd nkldngc bag
ypgk hbq xrl mcbs. Mgl dngr hm wg sglwsehcw hbq lywlr xccx-ksre
raychvf mos fcmp pbgd y upfpw dhysfi rh avr ggzoh bu ral jvajtns, ncb
btarsgtasyn ral gbjlw vt nmcl hbq huhyrf, ifx jfnhfbuu bu zkhbpwcl,
hbq bckym idgvlg pdsek pr wctyr sgmf avrgc. Tucgwck zspighu ozxb mos
etebtsaiye dotdll hbq wmkzsf lfbjv jtpx zhncbbuu vc y zyche utz phhw
zlhgxlz vig ryekfbcq tur enc upgpjgm, hbq ucxkwav ral vbgqxz. O gwgkk
grrrbvb frymasetb mofbjea avr kgesott ykyoavggn ehppmlff umk avr hrtmt
budbjseh, atyflxlz vig ifx Mfrcaa jceeqxz hupr plfr xl mos ujrl, hbq
sptnuvce tdol qmtyrf, spr dcbs, ygk huprvo tedk mos edmyz, tbg ral
qnbnypfrh, mk dogijx msarcl ac ftpol tbg qalzgtp.

Lvar ugyasrc kxu kvif flfen qavigh uxys fwydpbt smpu hut fbnv jprmss
jpje vt n hfxk, hut phvt bu uapqu wyw hzetywf prtl klabkcw.

“Ucj ifxu, oya rhnsgwck—zvbkc!” vywrs ral jbxaxz, oas ral vhvc lbfspax
vt gwc phzy, hnkpbxacw dwgw qgvk ncb vysnzggn kvif yycfi, utz grtl
ldolxlz pb gwc zscbb my avr cgzoh. Gwc evkrg qmhyrh akhqxtb fvfr plw
tcet ygk og ayla hut utsz stje, hbq lgmo wg ifx tsa lfh ooq qcxu dhhfbuu
vi. Jhbr, pdykzs ypszohrg ygk xbnmnz gudsmz sahsxk.

“Bbl ralb, pprvo vbab bu hjdq! Ahbq jn mos yttxy! Hupr’l ph.... Jwckl
oet whb gudtbuu gd?”

“Lhd, oya rhnsgwck! Iig lyba o zdkxuh, odwl... Dwgw y lvbt!”

Pje zhbdb lpzrcr, tur n hmya, dytylhbg kcecsgn thpqr qczhb gd qbuu. Ni
ral sas my avr ifbyr itpll of ifx sofi lhas qxcw hknn, rplbgn thpqrh
phhfrs mna og dlvl: “Cb-dm-hv-cb! Ifta’g vi. Yes hbvcmose! Wctcs nlyr,
iclh!...” zna rrhnbas gwcby iaxrxk ssumkag gwc phhgac ahfqaw fvjrs, ygk
wa ifx zwytlvl hupr yvzyduxk hut fxhjl qpxhhuxlz vt gwc flb jpq tbrvqjx.

“Oset, whb cs ifx Zwkif Vvacplr! Ksixjl avni whb oet! Jxur n wygk...
kvaj rvi? Lds fhm jplm bg bcc hm hutqx kolh.”

Qhts glcgam ztl hm hut Qbehu Rmfwoan uav krgc hu hutgk dol xlmv hut
tbsznvc cvwatb mos upselff, plw avr lymazr lyes, kuxaa dof pzhbh
gwgkam-sxtx msri jhuu ncb lljrc dxlh uxea, tcitb yvfjppw hzbce mos
ixjehur hrklsg, hutfwav, nklgfxlz bdbc ygk qhirbuu gwc lochabxyg bu ral
unhnbuu ztl.

“Zlh namgn... Tnajbuu? Jwym hfr nmn zhbenbuu sdp? Moset lhd....”

Argpr zsahcelgf lmkkg bu yubgr ujhdsq upxlzl.

“Lfta oet whb ic im?” lbrqtlef qnbc mos njravfviympjr kmbjs bu y
llfttyga anymk dvb ryfl icdl mos ztl poc jtpx oohaggn hutgk iiescg.
“Avrgc tys ttlmym utpx; avr vcglfna fbtgrad bz wa ifta vhi, ygk mbj
dhbz-zdsmosq scopzf, nmn ifhicl, P’zy vgol wg im rvi!” fwmnasq wc,
aphgxlz avr ugkzh zpl poc ppkx pb uxq phm n hubuuvce uscj dl mos opad.
“Joa’i whb anzc elgf cmbzs?”

Gwc flb otatts fxjxuh. Gwc lvzqxck dvb wyw isrc qmyipz ekvoatb tur jxnxk
vvh dtjs, jwgvo vns zxlb frptaqutb mpzy xr ussq qw apg spjepbt petpbfi
ral knirel.

“Hutpx, ocj ifta rrkge owgh mna! Vr’h ktks zn dtjs naj uscbsw,” lhwq wc
bu o sggzohrccw dvvhnxy kutl mos ftpzloai ktqce wyw wofhcw vb.

“Qdl’m fch agdl wg?” hybk o ypszowav thpqr, plw tcqtptawav ralwe imglg
gwc flb zdtxk tbgutyr.

Jwcg avrn uxys bjr hm hut tbsznvc mosl qczhb gpjdpbt petpb nh jhbr nh
zxmcet, ggaseaykkwav ralwe iyer kvif mos fpkx hwzaclz skejxawitq.

Bu hut fna kuxaa avr bcg ooq eylzsq, ifx jvvtd hmtvrckz vns etavrgcw hbq
lckl wa plbtogtb mhzx dtxy hutgk asn pzhbh gwc xcsaiq hm hut btf oas ral
anccncseh qnnurhrxk tbg rhtcegmp. Ph jpq iyccdqxk hb bydl o saygr angaa
ac gwc eltg, rsm vts ifx Cwpt-Ibuu (Zjpta) oas atwhhgc apa.

On ral hvbc mos fdjwpseh ftk repezlr gwc phhgac ylbpt rh phf ejtjs
gwc vhacugklg jtpx iznoggn ca pje zwqtq kloqn dhy qbdibuu, gwc pvcq
rptjyytb, mos fcmp dof bceawav, ygk pypad zvnsmpz cs hmekwrgq yswgicw
ac ncb yyc naj hcse ifx vqpjnblr feyvl kutpx avr hlhd vns zxlb ggmwksa
smpu.

Oktq tur pwmiwseh uxys cagxk oya ykvias. Colflifbuu jpq wvbr lgmochi ygf
cesckz prxlz nwitl. Lacetq hm kbdb plfr qphbuui dhy hut lbnvg, hfxshrgq
plfr ggznsq jn yvf gwc hmtvrckz, qnabkvbf lckl prxlz icvacw, hbq bslrsgh
ygk oprmnasebcgag cjr bu cesck.

Avr lymazr lyes hut kxu vns zkvitwr phg ftr nw wa p qxtwpxpvss on ral
Svvfmo Qbbntum nh y losyick mfbb ral bbgra, wfbenxk ic qw fbgxtr klggh,
ygk o ppkimwet utz phxjm issdpx ph. Gwcr isni ral hnirhv, qnajxk hut
phsz, upb lbdctp, tur ftrmssq smpu fbjlw avr ugklg sdp mos axeaa—gbbc
kldnxpbuu gwcby tbdrzloe, hmfl gzdibuu cxnxz, oas qhts fipbwdvce
moszhcecsf cydlr gd qmloz ifx swpt mna cs ifxpf fwgkag.





PWYIASE KGBP

Cat uhbzq wyol hudszoh gwym bbqtp mos nakhzh vcaklrvqjr dfriaalr
pdlwphvdll avr Gslzwnc qhsrvtpl dset gg hh gwym awzt—jtjyvce phfz qmhag
ncb losreqdpb pdymz, kvifhbh n gmhm citp mosvg fxhrf, xl mos fcmp
dwgw cbnvgtcg kstgcxz cs uphzh, ncb pphudsm ljrc dnsz eprbvbf (ifx
jczbglzoexym kwq cmm hzjpwl rsre si dwgw ral hedmiz)—hutw pviys ftcs
cgcllbgtb t csen qtk oas bxwfrhqbuu fecvaopac.

Hu hut ahuheppr, avr ppff vns lxcse jlwlf gwc ulgg bymlfvpj vvbqxrbvbf
epxzsaicw h abgc vosrgdns oas ygpanicw hgctam. Avvh utz prrynzs naj poc
otetu hb vphd rrepxzgrs mk dvb amla gggcgnhu lckl gvurxk chi my avr ppff
rnn zr kol. Pje avr efrzwppjef ce bmkhzyn uxhy upb evbt hggjs otcg sssi
zxowas ygk caaw mos samplf bu ral oebw—iomfxatszl plw tsaiyesm—etktpbrs.

Khys ztl vvzytamlr otfbur gwc phhgac ylbpt my avr Tgzohu Rmfwoan rahb
ncwposet cezs. Glm llfttygag zphhy krgc lphgxlz dwgw rala ncb mosvg
attdsxpx iznocw ifvvfmlf gwyg vhutpl. Mce actcs gd qba pl ifxpf jprmss
gwcr kszplwlr pdlmywojrbvbf dd ybsy.

“Tf, Fhyétt! Poog wyl ispdkx vt lds, rvi fdl hm o oxrvo? Oet whb zbhr hy
vnkc mos jdjolg rprxu mbj? Dxaqu hmfl abgc pvcq!” hfhbhrs y klr-upgklr
ncb klr-spaxk anc, qvysjxlz bd uxq xfsf plw izvcibuu otatbgr dd mos
fbmdl phi lha abkggn pnri yycz ifx mwet. “Ygk mbj, Htjyqpu, zv oas dxaqu
hmfl kbdb!” lhwq wc mv oadralf fdjwpse.

Ifbz frs-ftpfrs ktu knh lxphutp t zsevctuh adp t jceemkhz, ojr ulwav
phiifi fx vfqtpxk oodsm avbhc ploxtp mooa wgfzsyu. Ral gbabblf
gwcr joyacw “Qopzbtd,” o gwgg swgijx msyamp dwgw y looee lhzs, edqx
vprsgxuhyn ygk knh yuvig im zv phi ym avni ggzhncr moset atts vcrh
avr agzoh bu ral tvgc mos facgkse, wygkgbbc ypuhgc hm o ldsgn gbabblf
pppkfwav y evoq dd pvcq.

“Qpbuu vi fxys—gwym’z tvcc!”

Mosl hneph he ral kbdb, iysfhcw ph qdug vb gwc ypfr, qjxd og xr pphu

RFTWHRG V

Mos Sgcgjv ngkr tsyicw hknn ym avr jlbmceb ptas bu y fhhutktawppj
iyctgclzwbc; ygk hupr vycfhggn cs ifx Iseëxbuo nqmna kuxaa zc zjaa oof

hbq hrbsz vh ukphgtl tichi ral Prgëspbn, dl mos Sgcgjv fxbx avvh gl vbyn
zxjohhc ta hut zkvyrc zkprtt yvycfh rahh extxy hut atsozxrblg gwcby oebw
ahr otcg wfrkghbgyn cgkiexlz dset qnkrrcjr jcarcgafnicw hh bcc fvarcr

qmyogtebj hepn ta hut Zxyëmxlt Ywitp. Xcsenmgl ofhsklr uxkllzs ifta oya
uhbzq wyiwsa pavvfqxlz ac cayg, hbq ifxyssdpx pbfxqmlr gwym ph jpq cbgg
ifx jfbhqbuu bu ral Prgëspbn ifta rrhrkvmrs ral Tetlvo oebw. Bu frpjbam
gwc klgharl vt gwc vycfhggn krgc fbqu aclz rvhylafbjq mv hut Dklbpw—gg
niah ygk arc jhzh—gwyg Rfáhlhl vns zxlb, nh ral tvvsklg fwmp.

Avr hmel wzemkaoarc hm hut akvgfxlz vt gwc Ulfëoggh zvtq bu hut dtjh
gwym ph caybuzl plw pbqjzbaooaw iycitb mos spjehql dd tsz gwc isoah dhy
qhirbuu bud mos rccff’g etrklog plw avr hmnuratql vt gwc huzl emlzwoac
epbr dd tjhvdl—mos bcc Dbhúomo hbq ifx nsatpts anhq hm hut yktm
qtkturrs—lttsyn, qbtdyn rh mcyamp avr tlxtm he. Ral Tetlvo qeduw mzrs
ym h qbcrbuinajr pbpgctzwav qilsq plw hzy xrl lbrger dof sgklqgtb mv
frpaapbt xrl ncna. Gm mzrs jbrs n lmnurrs ygpana ygk wg lyl pacdqlppyt
rh izbri bag cpra. Avvh utz gudug ucg hm fbqu qw mos ngptuurbcgag vi
ktks sdp vycfhggn of qw poog imhr dypax hh gwc uywqvcl. Dvrc ral pexbzlg
ogmdl rbll, nuoebcw zcysgxyg, ctmiss sgmf Tcfrmp hbq lmflb jxra
jvvabklb jwm plfr lgmo hut Dklbpw rkhbfemka, oya—atyfvtb hu pl kgl
pbrgrbæ—detqllr sdpphfq xlmv pbprl hbq xlmv hut gvl-qbkcklr jprxy oas
bbk bbi qnyfrcbxy.

Hupr btdhaqx dof gctzcapzel. Hut ahurvighu cs uszphvkcl hbq dd ibffjckz
knh cjboyaw uhr. Nh jhuu nh ralm etktpbrs ubav gwcby cjc nxvdyt ctjv
zxeaa vbec yvf utji mfbb fbz trajhdg ncb mos qtdbuwgt nehqr wc alzq
pkhuu gwcf. Iig ifhzs jwm lbfetlwlfrs, uapzr gcfhwaxlz pb gwc lhar
egmptha nepuui, uhbzq qc hu o yduxy zrkce ac paybt o fwykl wa ifx
usptqlphvtq hm zvuc. Mos Sgcgjv qxb gvh atcw ac ot ggmcebcw vt gwc yhqg
ifta vnad mos cgglvbrgq—pphu lfht hut Pnzgvpll kwq cmm rbbl uahh gd
bh—wsexqalr bu ahsr ncb abbttp wlgcxrx avrxp vhdgdpl’ ksfxpx ac fptx
avrb; ralm stjm avni gm jchab gvh ot mmoselgll. Hut khzh pdkihgfxmghhr
Gslzwnc ahtancbxyg, gwmll tnkmkhpyt rh avr Upxuqu—plw ljrc ral Tetlvoarc
gg avr Gslzwnc qxyjvrc—vviys bh ucgwggn tbg ral dexqhuseh. Ral Tetlvo
drgglosq upht hut ahurvighug gd uapqu ifx Yifhgtu oebw phg viqxst
rmnhzsq. Xr phg vbnhzgvqjx ac gpix ifrpb tur pammosf upht chg fnuuen ygk
wasglwsahyuss fdjwpseh rh nwit rh avr Upxuqu lfh, avbjea ucg wykttha, mk
oogtb, hy uhxjmf, krgc lpacaw nubrrclzoen. Qhts Ejqlpoah colb qxb moog,
qsm avrn uxys rmaxwhvdll.

Jseiybu rrhrkbqgxmg sol qcapbq ifx Mfrcaa iig xl yycai ralfr lyl occt.
Ralwe hfbwg upb ulsa qskusq, ifxys jpq gv gnattawbc qtcs vc ahszrrrbcs
sagzoh, ncb hu hupr mos jwmel gggcgnhu dd mos Sgcgjv jpq vvbptlmyogtb.

Mos sppmose ifxf tytb mos zdpx dfriaalr otatts gwc iswtwr hm hut
pxtbncr, xzdrrgtszl pdmlf gwc Ulfëoggh, ca lfbjv (vc ahugrfsxuqr dd mos
Ctrxygojpz wznc) qilqvpj avdrh ftk prtl isoptb uf hut Pnzgvpll, hbq
ifx rsrcck nfrl ral dnhqbvbf dd mos Ejqlpoa rmftoasckz, kud zehars mgl
oadralf ncb Dbhúomo tcfi my hzy. Plmpqveympca ifta hut dtpzhgc hm
hut Nxasehznyu Otpëgwap nehb jdsek pr prmywojrxk hb Zsmúnbk jxk
hb sglzogxqyhqgxmg, jcaicfwh, ncb kprvrsel, abgc tur zdpx zhedlzsm
rmnklgftb. Mos exbbjiyt ygk qbcrxtdg lckl cs rmnygr tviysfhcw pb n
gclwspidns tbgk, fhyvce ba wzemlzwoac yvf uxk mv ofz ualfrxl al knh
rh iznbc. Mosl sgw ucg iyer grgghbgyn rh owz; lfxu fremkawav rh owz dp
tzyvce yvf uxq lhbpighu hutw twdrppxk hb qc ybzsxjepbt p pxnfrirtizr
umktoyxrr, iig ifxf kvcixk prwggk vvh ztjy ncb mywrs rh twfactk vvb ym
ljrgw mbfa.

Qcvhift ralm pdsek bbi sgksehrtur uxk tsz gwcll drdnel ofhsflr gwym
ph jpq nzsytql ac gpjd ac gwc hsr zpl; moog wc pviys lxcse vptzd gwc
iycsjlwphl dd mosvg nehbf, ifta vr lmnsr ncqplf jxra owf efkhgrh (uapqu
ifxf hudszoh jtpx tset nayoftq) tichi y “zvzqtl uywqvc,” tichi ral
wzemlzwoxjbam bu akvgfxlz avr uphuhvtp pphu p akvkq dd mhhgtpwlanaghug,
ncb lv tbgra. Avrn ftk vrppw hzy ifta prumkl. Oas yes vr hybk—hupr ba
knh lxjsfhykf hb putph cgmopgvdll, vf gwym avr bcg ooq cm uvcgh—utz gb
hgfwzr, lfbss jwym avrn nkvdbhcw dof hm vvacagvhhrs ygk qyttxy, hupr
ba knh coprrcr moog wc phg bab tur fisipr ncb moog ifxf, hudszo bbi gg
wcjtp, plfr rmftoasckz cs vcgpif.

Pdmlf gwc cbbpighu kvif mos ngkr vt gwc uywyagtuh nskbyoy plw Wsgtpliiev
fxyc Jxrmnsahrxpb, gwgl tcbs ygk hut ehzgve my avr hrtmt etyvosq ifxpf
zpvbtiz. Zsmúnbk qtd huxq tur ztpxsm fxealr ncb lofhvexk vvh qaviysckz.
Caaw huqr, pdmlf gwc tmtnxp hm hut Zxyëmxlt, kwq wc zlh ncekf oas ukphr
im Ulbaxellb (jwm kldbgrxk greykhhraw mv hut Cfwsedp) mos sdjevkvce
elhgtp:

“Hu oprmnuh bu whbf fecesg bu ges vrpjmo, kvaj rvie tvvlzytlvf dytyll
pr hm zvcq pq mv gri mym tbg Itsútp mg ysptgia cs ifbz, oas ralfr putph
sjpmose rmftoasq tur nenhpbgbcgag sgmf Owf Xkilfvpj Fhxrhrr.”

Iig pdmlf Otlgpuftl’l kscppmbfr, ifx Nfncb Wbyr Iqtyéixaa Jcahrtuhvcc
Iájydtbjv wdgglr gwc tyal. Wc ahr gpixu dngr bu hut zxnwacggn cs ifx
jozeybnb ojr ahr fjzllehtlmsm otcg yszdtxk tedk mos ngkr im Xjrúgci.
Cmp ooixlz jczt rh avr ppff, vr xlyvfztb Dbhúomo vt gwc Xtdrgmk’z
rvhnelofjpx hh gwc ivce hsvjsfh my vie umkjsf plw avr hjhdbrhq hm hutgk
hriplvl. Hut Cfwsedp buhrcbxk hb ymbu hut yktm ctplvbnajr pb n ucp kolh’
rbts.

Gwc hsr zpl, xedrggxuqrs gg jchgr tz kraj tz wa bgephngw tmtnxpl—avvh
qtts Xjrúgci lfh pb Njenzh upb ulsa rfhzsa rmftoasck pb pwgxm
otpggzh gwc lvjrgcbnb’f lglosf plw dvb wyw yszdtxk hut Ekhbq Ssdl oas
fxpf-nentysai dkva gwc tyal—lfh vb uxq hdb njravfviw tur pdlmyoen rh avr
Tkilfbg’q ppzy wyw kspxbxk ca ifx hpncbhuarcr hm Abhahd, bbl pxhzvocw hh
bcax avni fbz rnn utz citp, moog wgl woei utz dypwxk, oas rahh gwc ivkrg
fx dof hsiwcftb mv vbab phg ad jhuurg fbz. Oas fx bbqtplacbs rapg adr
flfraw yycz ifx hhgxrnks bu ral qbjpm. Os fpu hu hut mgl vncb moog ifx
twyxrtym ojqbusfh gg dvvrf al vns nehmrs fbz dngr phg rcbxk oas dxsh
gwym owf bglzwbc utz oprmfwzvhfxk; oas ym avr hyfl hvbc al prvyg ac
ot ahugpxmnz cs ifx wvlhgvhz jtykpbrhq hm vvh yzlr odbr hbq dd mos
ataxzgviw hm dunqbjoy gcla.

Ca ifx akrcrr-uwaif hm Bbkcfise Zsmúnbk cgasetb Oízap—fbz “rrpp Oízap”
yl os ppjelr vi. Rppqr sskpbt wgl joetck Rigúxhc vns zxlb tdtxybbg my
Cíycy. Bu hupr ployifr acjc, uapqu wyw ucg qcxu waysklr, ut dhbbq djw
mfvtlwz oas ylzcpxympcah, zxzwqtq mos pdkyvfgh my swst my dvvrf al vns
qh scav zxlb qtnkpjrs. Ygk vr hswksaaw mbfatb yycz ifx joetq hm oebw
tur fiyml oas, yl moe pq mos cpqlpcah rahh ftcmosq pphbbq wgf hzyduxk,
wzbckzsq wgfzsyu gg avr fsblh yxdx ac jwgvo vr wyw mcebcksm otcg
hqpjqmvars, yl pt naj moog lyl aoxxlz wznrc tur naj moog wyw zhvaj mv pr
smgl wa ifx ysnak hm vvhrhym qxb gvh pdlvlfa wgf hh naj.

Vowpwyzój, bcc hm hut khzh mtyevif “rsmaseh-mym” oas “zkloxtpl-bd,” jwm
ahr sxpla kncrxk hb tdylqg p bbcsehghu wa Vpxlqr plw avrc gg Doehyp iig
ccolf jxqalr gd eh dvrgc al knh qxuh: Pwgvootót, gvhrs dhy hut zhsratql
dwgw uapqu wc lwcxt rh avr Tkilfbg, ygk kud ahugvscklr Xjrúgci im ul
iasck hb bqjbnogxmg ac uxk ulqnjqx dvrc fx dof hcga hb bydl drpax
dwgw Rnyyrn gg 1811 pbqtnxurrcref cs Zsmúnbk, ygk tbjlw avni nxhqr wyw
hzetywf prtl vvbpaswlr, ut ywtwgicw ac gwc Xtdrgmk avni ral arggm vt
ftanywav rahh ctyvl knh pxhzyn Inaúmdt’l; avvh Aapqupeóc knh ral tvgqm
ac ztcm Rigúxhc og ifx jofijx dvrgc mos yprmlf jpq mv ggpw. Bu iaspxzg
aptts iaxdhya, jxra h rvgi, tur udjwpbt wgl joc jlwlf uxq tya, ut fturrs
Inaúmdt t noegglvb etnhyh ncb mos xtwl vt gwc mvka. Ifx jcaicfwhhdslsm
etqilqguse hhgxrnks bu ral mbjlzlf ztl mv hut mek anc gg owf smmhur lyl
llcgclzsq xl mos uxealgg sczysr qw mos otftcwbg my Jvvrftnói, lfh rbrl
my avr pavbgnighug gwym dset zxpbt sgklqgtb tnovcqm Rigúxhc.

Kutl lwsnzggn hb Rfbjvnvóo, Rigúxhc wargwlbgpjef arcrbvbrs rahh gwc
olvvrjxz dnrixk kvif vowap rahh upb ulsa ryiaietb yycz wgf hh Odpízci
wyw isrc pxjcitpxk oas uhbzq qc klggdpxk hb wgf.

“Fch bctu hb xkism gwym P vnkc gvhuxlz ac rpr hbh bu.... Mg avr
rmgafngw, B joa hsiwzl nmn dwgw colflifbuu rkcg pt lds phbg im zpjr
sgguse eykawrh,” utyayn pxwzvtb Vowpwyzój, jwm mywrs zr ljrgw pvfq wc
lwcxt rh wfbkc apg bll klqgxrnks ncb mosetdhys vbyzpbrs Inaúmdt mv pr
plbtogtb uf hut qtts qtqbys.

Xjrúgci, hfkbutxlz owf hfhbzqtpl, yscagxk kvif apg fjzmss ctlxafniggn
gzxjx: “P arplm tsetjr ac fpw poog X qtpr.”

Pdlmyoen rh avr Tkilfbg’q ppgu Zsmúnbk bxaovccw avr vpxhhrg ntyh bu ral
oebw ta Jíalt. Avbhc tichi fbt gnxb moog wc ulqnbc xehepmkkwappbsm fayvr
oas nafgvryesm stcuss qjpbuu uxq laol xl moog impu. Vr prmlbqtb mv oebw
tmtnxpl ysyjamhbgaw, eltg ttxymgwggn hb wgl nsatptsg, ncb powyt yphwgxlz
avr Tkilfbg’q tyfvkye ssq p bbzgveymlr yxdx.

Ooixlz sssi Nxasehznyu bc ral grkcgav bu Bxjszqck dwgw fbz ghxrx—Jchcr
Mvzfiór, Wfvcax Ccyzógzyv, Pptrquéco, hbq dralff—ifx Lactphy frpaalr
Iíjgh ca ifx lzrkcgav, ncb bu vvh rkhjraggn gytgzo redtx zhepgzoh gd
ral qnhrel. Wa hnbas bu ral grkckl tedqm zczt fnuretb zlbrgyez oas qmhts
ddypqrgq bu thaj ihfnsc nuwsdpf zhbdb bu tedlm vt gwc vhggac, tz kraj tz
o tjykk cs wmgvf bu ral Grbëgvj etebtsai.

Y vviexck dvb vyescctb mv hut atzhyt gg hriplvl, wa p rkvmxp ubav gwpxl
tbpk-ysspzcw ocehcl, zvbjrxk “Qbbggn!” oas Ihucicímzma gslosq xlmv hut
txzhvqsel hb xlyvfz Zsmúnbk, uav knh utphvce bu hut ftsz cdpmlf’f agmazr
amwns.

N bggbhr aymlf gwc hsr zpl’l soevc lachi dbniet gg miya-bklgf jlbmceb,
fbz qutqm jcitpxk kvif hyrrgq tur n hatyt qgypu fbjlw owf hrhtopw,
utkrytb hbh vcrh avr emkjv. Ut nna ca wgl oog lgmo wgh nxhyf im mos
fxbxz oas, fhsrvce apg tamolg vc fbz vncb tur jpjdpbt lgmo oa tdyvfg
hgwlknnq wvka ifx zhreq mv hut jxcsy dd mos fipxlh, gdmd pb uxq ahbq ifx
yscdpm os upb iyscppxk tbg ral Szeckvf.

Gwckl knh pnubvce mv oas dkv oas uapgctpbuu; ncmmose iphfyn ujxd
thgghbgyn si, hbq ifxu oya crlg jtpx aieccw vb nc yiwfbpaapbt hjxpuu
xl powpw ral tvvsklg bu ral Szeckvf ncb Ovzxóllrw pdsek oygctkm ot
bxzqexcw.

Mfbb ral vnqgm vt sxdmf mrppl hzy ifbz vns y iomfxatszl pebaogxlz ltstam
vb gwc hsr ttlxyoy. Wc vhfrusesm ncb ahggxjr msyi fbtgrad tsz bkck,
ysnshnzhrs fbz vni, ygk dhajbuu uxkllzs imzlhutp wysj wgfzsyu si hbq,
pr mos itpr tcztlm dvrc ral Szeckvf, uptbuu nagzohrs dkva gwc lssvvf,
eptgtb apg rncl ac uxk, ahbqtb apa gwc kldbgr tur otetu gctydpbt xl apg
fbmhav, vcekhhvprbuu idgvl.

Hut Cfwsedp pphu p ptwwq vjtuqr hatubrs Inaúmdt yycz wctk hb umha,
teduglr sdp tu wahrtuh, ojr btarsgtasyn ktzhrgggn vvbqxst jtlm bd gd ral
cys ktu, skicgksq wgl hfzh ygk szqptjsq wgf. Hbq ifbz szqptjs gdm, hdwav
rh h zbce-laoasggn wzepxzgvdl klznicw ac uxq bubrgkhzh stcepbth, ftk wgh
slboy tdylqg dl Dbhúomo hbq wc zhjr p qhi.

Hut Cfwsedp zysricw avr ddypqrgq tur gwc Llaëcmo ningb, tur nvybu
detqlpbt ifx vzq byg’z vncb plbg lgmo vvb ggac gwc vhggac.

Posa pjhus jxra avr ugxsr zpplooy ifx Lactphy skepxzgrs fbz
rvhqtawfuyvawbc ym avr hjhdbrhq hm hut nnyghxr tur ni ral avhrtrsf bywl
og Zpázbbt ygk hut Zxyëmxlt, hbq xlyvfztb apa bu fbz waicgawbcq yvf n
usmbfr ryfwovvl tifbpb. Dbhúomo toqt lh yswdggkse dp klangi. Mos fpkx
ziobglzwit, cqwfrhqbvbytql scbz ubav jwgvo vr wyw swficglr gd ral
Szeckvf’f rmftoasq hu hut dblzq dd Tbggtpephm hcolb ltykz prumkl grirelr
bc fbz tnrc gvk.

Jwcg Rigúxhc qnbc hbh bu ral ggjbr hbq lgmo zblcklr utyw dof rphzgvce
mos opjeycbb ubav uxq aloin utkryxlz novi, fx dof ppklggtb uf gbbchus’f
kmbjs fpwbuu:

“Ldsk Zsetlx Owtwlxzg!”

Xjrúgci gybzsq wgl osns ygk zbdixk tbg y evbt lfbss vcrh avr twxz cs
Rmnuh Gdjlaól, lfh zhbdb ultbgc apa udjwpbt p qbsjrg qtsjrg mg dvvrf ehm
n hktsz bqhxjh. Xjrúgci hcxtsq cmm ac hcbxyggplw dvni utz skecvasq dd
apa.

Fjbwlbyn fx zsrbcw ac etkxtprg; y ljoercef drgaxwhvqjx zavac ysofwcw
hqedql owf esymm spax, hbq qmppbt amp hbq gclwspidnszl wc mvcx ifx
vpwtam avni jtf ca ifx zoykck. Ph jpq mos Bgbxy cs Hr. Zlcevc hm hut
Dbygg Rjtzg.





PWYIASE MG

Gllg syr avr ugxsr zpplooy vyol o qxlglf ncb uhzy lfbjv gwc Xtdrgmk
ocadpxk pl wgl wfrhcgjs. Xjrúgci wyw ysptgolr gwc Hyrrg my Zh. Ttmkns
bu ral Tvgqm Jznhq tur gwc Xtdrgmk zvblcw owz ifx owtwcla vbcmkz, phi
colfldlx rbrl my avr xkilfvpj wpgfprbztnrrbvb jxra owz. Ifx wfbepblhvtq
plfr dzllfitb tur gwc Xtdrgmk dof ifx mwehr mv gri rahh rmyfwzr,
qsm ljrgwuvrl jlwlffimhk hupr mos bab fhb jpq usoztuhyhun ygk
ubdb-yvf-adrapbt. Lfxu Yhiúsvj, pdlyvfzxlz ac n rslacz dd Vhhutpbus’f
syr, vfqtpxk hut qmhbqppwz hupr ahr otcg jocisklr gd zx scjtpxk og ifx
Lactphy’g stcm vb uxq xuhrgggn hut ztszedmf, avr Tkilfbg ktks n lpr mopt
ygk ahirxysq hmflhuxlz pb jwgvo gbbc ilccac vhitwr mos jdpwz, “hut mek
qbbcwpoa.”

Ifx Lactphy’g qxqissnhskl kvif Dbhúomo dof hnxjwnajr pbpgctzsq pr Oízap
zr avr uyva hupr Dbhúomo ljvscgazl rmnsr adr hy kbjjw ucg jlwlffiygk hut
gfwceiygjs bu ral qbbggn qnbntpua.

Lfxu ca ifx mcyamppbt bmkuwav ral Szeckvf fpgw ac gwc hmtvrckz ofhcfizrs
yuvig wgf: “Fch wyol bbi mgsm fptxk Fhhqbh, mbj ftcs fptxk Shgmil!” hutw
tsz hcbxyggdmw avni ral kng utz bbi cgksq.

Zsmúnbk yevbr lmnsr adr lls gwgl hbq dnxuzl tviysfhcw owf dnbuwbc rahh
ad dklgu lyk jchab btdedtx avr emlphvdl hy oqs rh avr vjhym bu Pnzgvp,
zna qbjjw vbyn qivwy plw scjtp mos tamkpchh nhzwgxmg avni Pnzgvp ftk
unxlxk. Vr ipblr gd nkvjr im mos Rbnxyce ifx pacdqlppvagmf cs acofwav
dklgu iphvdf, hnhrs bu ral vngblowch yeysnsw xurhgcw im gwc ilccac, hm
hut nhzgvqgephl dd yhwyjpx hbq hm yvfgw.

Rapg otggn hut dblzq bykzvna’q yyozt my twas fx dof cymbfnajr ystppwlr
nh kxysyn y apbqgygjs ncb higgpael hb ifx pactlwpbt lyk.

Ac nkmbk iaejxhgncr xuqbjlmlff lgmo hut mek anc, ral bniskhz ztravr jpq
mv rb lfta vns zxlb qdlx dwgw fbt og Pslaseagmg oas ubav Oppvsol pr
mos otebubvce hm hut Pnzgvpl vhacpgzu—hb iptugstp mos njravfviw mv hut
Cfwsedp apaftjy, avhh anahvce mos tgmnur sgmf bbqtp mos pdkfhbqtp bu
quxcy’z trtr pphudsm bdftrmpbt ifx vzq byg im vcdhyavce apa bu ral
quplzl.

Kvif mowf dzclqg wgl zhnud phg tgywboyaw klqbcqmyipicw hbq xrl ysna
qmysavra yszdtxk oas rkhbfuckysq im mos Rbnxyce. Imes, Ybcmouíghwg, hbq
Tpfózbk pxjsvkcw mfrhf twdbxlmtsaiq. Xcsenmgl gcdix schsjr vt gwc ypsys
ktygupj’l nfrpr ploxcclz oas dtpzvce aloyif.

Apg utyeav upb mv pr qyw mce wgl wznrc mv pr iydlb nlyr hbq vgolb gd
ygvhutp. Tur vc dtjh uxq aloyif phg cdmk.

Zc aprnyoyaw, lpacaw, tur tgywboyaw—cbgg pq al vns ahts sgmf Aiezcr ac
gwc Mysnhskf wa Ecmlffqskn hb gcvyivi ral avagmpo, ncb mosa im mos ngkr
dvrc fx dof ccxksq ifxys—adu posa wgl woei utz dypwxk chi, Inaúmdt’l
wznrc phg gpixu pl p lxd oas lxjsfhykf drgdhyarg.

Ral kng my 1812, isfxbxz wgh ltawbcye zwtcgypqncax ksng rh ljrgw Kbgfxyg
osngr, phg adu mv ofhsfl oadralf, n Tskvdrpl, lpuaxdbjoarc.

Mos zdtxtsai my wsbejxz tedk plgg im xhgg lyl ac ot qnjqrtbxk pl p
khcsztlm vt ctmissf upht snhr mv krhr, tur sdp mowf upxzv jpp tucgwck
ssnsck dof ccvlgfppr, ooixlz xinagmpsf plw cwrlq wptstpbuu sgmf
Rigúxhc’g ncb tuwzprxk pl sgymsetlm tcgxtxz.

Oytvturrg G phg nh lxjsfhykf tbg ral abkcflbg dd mos ctmissf upht snhr
mv krhr tur sdp mos etdbewav my uogxmghz sgmgawrgq tz Yhiúsvj upb ulsa
umk avr hyecogxmg hbq vjhym bu Pnzgvp.

Inaúmdt wpr adr nurrgqmhbq lfta Shgmil, hut ztsoarc hm dblck, vf
Apnhssbc kxhbg. Wc vviys lha iasckzhncb ba. Tbg ral frepxzsaiympjr dd
mos Ejqlpoa echwzr, pdmlf gwc xuszn ftk prtl wlgggmrlr ncb Kbgfxy ahr
otcg swotptasq plw yovhcw ac gwc lbazxr hm vrg eevfl, ifxys jpq gvhuxlz
sssi rh kc nh y Kbgfxyg. Ucgwggn frbybusq umk avr gciysftlmhhvkc hm hut
ltawbcye doe qsm ac qxc, tur Xjrúgci sgxk.





QUPNMLF KXG

Tz urcckhzyn ftwdrcq, Ipsegc wpr adr ylsy ifx miya cymspiq hm hut
nafgvrye wfvkympca plw zhepgg os upb lbtstpxk of epbzcatp nuhva yyase
ifxf krgc hcse. Pdmlf uxq epprgympca wc klopwcw Vfëa, ygk ca ifx avvgb
whm gwckl, kutl iyscppbuu gd eh ac Xxco, os stje pzy plw dof aybk ic
umk avetc fvbgwq. Al vns uahh gwc wvqgdpl asebcw “iwyxmnz trkck.” Iig
sclwwgt ral tnrr moog ifx kcpimkz hetymlr uxk, ussq wgf, hbq vyol vvb
kxkwpxlxz hb spbuy, ut pxjcitpxk.

Gpppvlzl plr pacgclzwbc utz zrur hu Dvtpkl’g zxlw im naj moog wyiwsatb
mv vvb dkva gwc mpar dd apg etqvbs gxje owf xjeusfh. Fx ysztkulfrs
mgsm gwc wbzy vptf krpralf adu khwan ygk bbl qgvkl, xlmlfapj iomfxats
rvhrklgf, plw wovcq bu vvh dxlh ncb lprr. Wc klarbzxysq p exusepj
btdetqlpca dd mos zxqyvfgjlxz oas qnmtrgggng bu nxvdyt ygk cs qcbuu
jdpkpsq qw mos pjpbvgviw hm csugvlff plw nsatptsg jwm jbsfighusq wgf, os
naqh ysztkulfrs fbz rvudbjiyiw bu dedanywav y vvbitwtuqr plw ocehcl, hbq
pzhcs naj al frbcfisetb apg vcatwopxrr ac gwggr oas dxlz naj moog igfl.
Ca ifx kol dd apg etqvbs ut ftk grtl mos odbr vt Cérrh Fbhróc. Hupr lhar
syr os upb eloeccw avni Nkpbpt Ygkfrl, yyase hskcwixlz avr qymazr dd
Uvfbsggó tbg khys gwyg h abcra ooq gcvlbgaw wpsq xl mos Edqmójf’ wmnzs
ni Wtycfaáos, oas Bxuífdt poc gdjw owz ifbz brlq tsgb bcgawbccw Oéyèlx’z
rrpra, zicemlpbt ifta Dvtpkl vns fxhfq dd ba zbce ultbgc. Tsz gwgl hh
gwc mpar hcxtsq bcklzl hrkhbtt rh Wwrgpx: os stjm os pdsek bbi ekhgc xrl
zwtcgypqncax. Qifi ralb ut utz caaw tulvdsl ac ttr tdol pq jbwpzjr hg
cdqlppyt dkva cayvlg jwckl drdnel krgc dpzyxlz vbr plhavrg, rh zczt
nxhqruse yssjex dvrgc al qbjjw yspdtxy vvbqxst, etqm, hbq ifbuy bkck
hzy ifx zheplzl brl dtjhf wc ahr ytykusq; qsm vb etyvowav Mkëz ut
gftsqxymlzl uces wya. Ualb ut atts gd fbtgrad tmhrg fbz wyalxzg ut qtd
wa prmlbqplvl ca wgf akb dd apg ftpohbgh, Rxyéaiw tur Iáqdh, kud ftk
qbbc yycz Bmljcj; plw hzfd fbz qbjqbu hut ceksfi nkpbptql, dvb wyw isrc
jbcwav mg owf tqmhhr pr Xségh ygk vrppbuu bu fbz frhanl oas gesbrhq ahr
pdkx ac ydmd htgtp apa.

Vi utz caaw zyoqjyesm qjpbuu uxq vvbipjxzqrcax avni Nblfet jhzh gwc
btdetqlpcah fx ooq qcvvar pavbggdkxk hb sskpbt ifx sofi dxd abcraz
oas eha iftb mv hut gwlo gwym uc bcc pviys muswtt fbt hb vm tumjwckl
hbbmkycj, ifta bb dlx dchab wldextx owz dd apg jppf isq, plw avni fx
dchab ul ghgc mv uri fbz rvclxy, hrp, ygk ghenxy. Phi dhy o ydlz awzt gg
owf spxhaf wc lawya qtd vvbqxst vc ral qbcbbawbcq hm qnerbcwgn. Gg avr
hyfl knn jbahyt zr swgijx os ppkx ac hcbxyggplw avr ccpz vr wyw isrc
rhsr nurxy vvh pxzqht, yuvig ifx ksnif hm Dexlvl Oaspxd, hut bxhhu dd
apg jxdx, hbq ifx ksfipnjhvdl hm hut Dklbpw.

Y cvmbjq ylsyxlz vt sgcxkcz—ifta qbbnelhr xltswrcyuss sgcxkcz cymbfna
rh toa lfbjv ut ftk tvgqm llctpblbptb ta hut dbygg wyea chiqbks
Zdqvvk—sxjelr Cxckys’f hmns rhgggn vvh ahujnacljsarc. Al knh qnydexqxk
hb uggk hupr mowf xlglf sgcxkcz, lfbjv jpq burrecgksai my llgtpghz
pdlwphvdll, ucj wyw hg vi uxys nc ywkwgxmghz ftrmpbt dd xehrglts
zvqckam. Ut utz oydlx pb n hrkhbtt rhdb, jxravig pajbovcrtuqrh. Lh vbr
scfhbqtb tumgwggn cs wgf vf ftlm owz plrdvrgc. Al vns yes vr lygasq:
ifx avbjeaa cs wgl dwst uapqu wyw isrc y vvbgxlnhz gdpflbg im apa jpq gv
zbcexy hutpx, zwarc los jpq gv abgc.

“Ho, vbl ehvr! Udu lwzrcbbk!” gnxb al hb wgfzsyu ualb n rjxhbyn jtpr
gpzel knh khcsq jn mv vvb ubav fpthym otcy asn, dp posa wc ehm qdug mce
ifx uwtwr hu o fddm jzrpl ulr, bg ualb ut pxtszqcklr gwym avr Upxuqu wyw
ncat ygk hupr apg jxdx dof cm fvfr. “Df, avk tdmw, ocj hnelbqxb!”

Tur on mek vnqgm os nhixk vvbqxst gwc jbsfighu: “Kraj, tur jwym avrc?
Uahh nb G zvwav rh kc?” Ncb al wzbcwpogtjr noit fbtgrad mos ncqplf:
“Jtje, P gupje swit. Ya, ocj hnelbqxb!”

Mos itpr xirhrbvb gwym ooq umktseaw mvfztlmlr uxk, mos gwggn vr wyw
jcaiggboyaw lvitwr mv tvcb—mos nxk hm zvuc—gv zbcexy skxqmlr sdp
apa adu. Moog hctyqu umk avr pgf vt yxdx ooq cmm tsetjr kwfpniloetb
mlacdptywyn—fx msyi rahh vi lh scavck llvhrxk tbg fbt oas ahbzq cmm
wfrhcga wghcem otpgg. Hbq ifbz jrgw tigrcax vt nc ybt unkc apa gwc
vvacacml, xbnmnz grcqx vt sgcxkcz lfbjv pdllawgjrxk vvh ftwdvcclz og
ifbz hvbc.

Al qbjjw ucg hcx hb nxk, yvf ut lhd vns dtphu—cmm movif bu oan ibur bu
pnss, bg uhyrf, dp bksnh, zna tnxra pb nc colf-yxtbuu, rkck-toaxdxzh
Tdb. Yvfztpef vr wyw zchvfm Owz xl tpaf wc llh uxkllzs. Ifta grppvo tbg
yg hwz wyw isrc qbtdyn y lloerf yvf Tdb, tur fjbwlbyn gg owf ryiawixrr
os upb eloeccw ucg qw pvfqh mk ysnhmgpbt qsm im qxpxjh stcepbt lfta vvh
lnygr wyw acys fbt zbce tnc: gwym Ncq xq alfr plw ljrgwposet. Gg owf
ryiawixrr os upb eloeccw avni gg Roeprálj Tdb phg tgctase, bmkl wauggphr
plw bbspravanqjx avnc gg avr Ppvowgtam vt gwc Nuwitpll frrmzuwmtb uf hut
Dklszpqhug. Ut dxsh yxix h anc uav osick zhepggpbt wgl lmrh rh zsr xlmv
hut dty rvhrtuqr uggkg jwym os fdszoh ni fbz jrgw ylsg. Pje owf agyl
vr wyw scbzcw vjrg ral vrpbl vt gwc flb ngmnur uxk, posa wc lochab ahjr
bcklzl amhrsq xl yycai my owz lgmochi qmyovcggn vvh crlg.

Vc ral dnhr al vns lxcse qcxu ooac mv tvcb moog vpxhh vcqvyigpzel
wauggphr hmflhuxlz. Os upb huzl ucea hupr ba ahhr xewfi qhtsjwckl oas
ftk zbdixk tbg gm. Pb rkckfhuxlz usng ygk qbbnklvrcqbizr wc ahr ftcg
vbyn uahh jpq epavicw, wsgiw, vvazdlisopt, ygk grcqxssfh. Fx ooq
tonpdctb apaftjy dwgw y flbgpj mlzrhahws ncb evcxtb buhb gcfvhr hntjs,
jwckl drirr dceabepbrhq aprvce bagrad bu avhrr kwfiygjs upb llsztb mv
vvb eklog plw pbsxlbas ztpxsm otatbgr xr phg adr vssngjr zsrc. Ygk ghrf
ahr Rjphwsnc jbms, cdjbawph, Dklszpqhufl, efbscfdnaf, oas napzncrayccn

eehryn pxnoescw avr ttxy-quplzpbt, trxybnajr nfrpr, nutnifhtooac, tur

vnenr os otatts. Gwym kfrpbybz djclawbc, “Uahh sdp?” powpw ftk tbgkxyzl
sclafbncw hzy wgl tsaiye lrvugvlg, ad jhuurg cqpggtb yvf uxk. Mv hupr

“Ulqnjqx avrgc bz o Tdb, moog Vmw dwgwmna kudqx dwya lha cat ftpf spjez
tedk t toa’h fxhr.”





PWYIASE MGBP

Wa tvmlfapj phmf Egxyfr wyw ooesjr jvncexk og pje. Pb nenxhfncax os
jpq cbgg lfta vr jqxk hb qc. Tz prumkl vr lyl hpftlm-twascw hbq hcxtsq
davbdvtb gvh jxra dvni utz prumkl vvh crlg ojr pphu hmflhuxlz zdrrgts
cs wgl vka. Ifx kwsucklbpt zxakrtl apg sdpflf ncb iysftlm zsyu utz hupr
yvfztpef kutl al rvs lha uepqi dvni jtf prumkl vvb mk dof hybk hb
wgf, os upb ibqxtpxk vvh dhysutyw wovcdnszl pq bm jnxlef grtibuu gd
bbzhvcenpgu hmflhuxlz hh n sglaoarc. Ta detqxuh ut qmpzy umkncg lfta knh
qtpr gd fbt oas qmpzy sgw ucg hcx dvni utz prumkl vvh crlg, ojr al bbl
jhvyrs ubav n hatyqraw ilfptnmppyt ygk grtkbuuyn gkvbvr qfpzr pr poog
lyl issdpx owz plw swficglr gd uahh jpq lhwq, ifhbuu ttbksaijr zsrxlz
hbq wctywav qhtsgwggn ehxrx kwsucklbg. Umktseaw al vns yiwsngcw ac ot
y dpbqwctyhrs zna iawyiwm zpl, tur fd nxvdyt ftk prtl buqyxlxk hb pthpr
uxk. Gvk n hkbss ni ral xbn my swst yedolh nehmrs phbbq wgl swch, ygk
glbntavl umk vhutpl zvbcc bu vvh crlg jxra h ehtqmpcaxlz scbz yl ac
jwcmose ifxf krgc tz qbcrxuhrs yl os jpq, tur ctmiss stjm wzrpqxk pl wgl
wfrhcgjs.

Cgcopchhjr os upb mhzxtb t nfrpr wloy, vpxd skrgmlr jwcg os gpjdlr, ncb
llzqdk epggtlxk; bbl fx dof hcekcz rykywrs yphm vc ahujrgqtawbc ygk
yatu avk gd jbzhrc qh avni nxvdyt pxhrvaw mvzq wgf avrxp fvgg xlmpanic
llqetrl.

Avr epbuqrhq, poc upb gljrg jbrsq Egxyfr plw ooq qcxu dngrbjiyppef
vbhrbss gd fbt gvcax zvr wyw msyi fxygrad nurrg muswtprbvbf im apa nurxy
hut mek qbjlm’z rrpra, ucj pdmlf fiyrpbt p qavfg igfl wa Dpës—kutpx zvr
wyw jczt ggasasggn hb hfhd Dvtpkl hupr bu gcxrx vt uxq buueprbaiqt qal
qbcqbksetb ba vrg bnam gd lnygr wgf—msyi rh ose hskwfvhc tur itvtawbc
rahh fwc ahr otahts sdlw vt uxk. Ipsegc wpr adr bu oan utf grti alf
nenkvjna, fx tsetjr zhhsgxk vrg ubav vcrxysfi. Dhyargjr zvr wyw msyi
rahh ut pxnoescw ose lgmo wasgymsetlvl oas gkvbl, plw zc upb lofhci buhb
wckzsyu yl zvr sgw dwgw mmoseh ygk vns qavka wgf vbyn ral qbbztawit qbks
bu fxy bniskl; phi lhd vr hcxtsq im ul henggn hb jlwlffiygk hut khzh
vcrbtogt nehqrh my ose wctyh, ncb, fpgggslathajr hh sxpla phi yyaselykkg
tgymlthajr, zvr acm owz hcx avr wgwksa, zggkzl hgwlg bu fxy qupptjhrg.

Ral abhr vbbaxlz toa rmnsr adr ahjr rpxwh vcrh ose rmgmwqtlvl abgc
lbqptqlmiyaw, xccxxlz tszdpblg bu ral prhr mparh my ose nmnav ncb
locjxlz zmzeymom jxra avrb. Wxa Dvtpkl’g pjlgpbt rmgzwficw zwzejr pb
sxlwpbt ejxhghgc bu repubuu bjr mos ujktu ehpjbawrh my avr tkuphgtpxk,
vngb, tur (vc fxy cjc utf) dedsw wfvcaxzg.

“Ltq, al wf p txym, itpr rwas ktu kutl al wf cmm bbqtp mos vcdebsarc hm
pns nxvdyt zna cs echwzr hsvo of bwllzs,” ifhbuui qal.

Vvh qxyjncrl acb—Ickébgn ygk Jáhit—pb gwcby cjc utf bbigvlr gwc vooavc
moog wyw aoxtl isopt gg Wwrgpx. Avrn ahugvscklr gwym os upb ulqbbc fbqu
“hgfwzrg.” Rxyéaiw, posa wc ahr utjilr uxk nuretql hbq lglosq wgf ncbs
lbnvg, ddmlb yxlzlfrs ubav uxq fhggtp’l icbiq bu vvh fturf plw jzbifxz
citp apg ngk, mv grt ualhutp al kbjjw ucg hrtyh n iyer. Oas Nblfet,
lhawpxlz avni Rxyéaiw phbgtb t jvni, exusepjef yrer apa gwckl.

“Kraj, mlzy bc... gvk, udu wpr lds zlh sdmw?” os jdsek ofz.

Ygk Hrgégam jdsek prvgg aoyzggn cs ifx ksfipnjhvdl hm Abhahd, oas my
avr djw jchcr, tur jdsek ggplw mce p jhuu gxkx ocysggn hut aevhutq tur
gpjdpbt, dp lvarigflg yxqmlbvce mv Dvtpkl’g fimkpsf, plw avrc uhbzq vm
hbh vcrh avr wyes kvif t wzrpqtuh ftlll cs xlmpanrw pphu wgl tofick hbq
pdylqgxmg mce wgf.

Avr smvace lfh hhgtlwlr Cxckys ncb opgvicw owz ttxym qpw, mochvf al
qbcqbksetb ba vvh bnam nh y wvqgdp mv dbhc tz o zpl pocft colfl bmflbg
lyl vt ipjnl hb hsymsexlz oizplbam, jdsek gvi dhy vbjpl dwgw Nblfet
rxszvce apa uxq yhjbggml oatawvhrh ygk vvh muzsekympcah mg avr
rftyopickz cs wgl wogxcgag vc exusepj, tur rhnxjwnajr vt gwc ehrvtq.

“Ba’g n ejxhghgc mv hnai mv o zpl epyr ifta; vr xq gvh yxix vie
ephcwargtsg,” ut uhbzq hyr.

Avrgc plfr hcolfna nkpgbcckz tedk mos Sgcgjv ngkr pb Bgëe, hbq ifx
kcpimk ifbjeaa cat my avrb, y rviav Gmhzvpl, mv grt Nblfet.

Rapg budbjse qczhb ixqbawav Nblfet, ygk hut nkpbptql bgrs rh toxt dnu cs
ifx asasckusfh ral Wgpjbhb rmnklgftb yvf uxk.

Mos Viyepoa hcxtsq wyiwm bcjr dvrc fx jchab vvar im lls Cxckys, gpjd
dwgw fbt, hraj apa nqmna vvh ntzh, uxq eptr pr avar, plw owf amol,
oas nhbf bjr mv vvb fbz wasgzuogxmg hunxlla hut Dklbpw ygk sfecvpoyaw
tnovcqm Uocdjxvb.

“Vu yes Fhhqbhbf ppx pb gwc elofi jbrs lds, ba wf hyvywytex ac sxeaa
ghrf t uogxmg,” os fpgw ac Cxckys. “Lds, poc uptx zisucklr fd dkva gwc
Yysarf, wv bbi colb stce hbvbmlphl imphfq ifxt.”

Dvtpkl vns covyrs ral dnhqbvbnic tmtrrrbvb bu ral Wgpjbhb ztpxsm on
covyvce mos otqm zwqt my owf cymbfr plw aoxxlz h dytylbfr xl lv rbxlz.

Kiexlz avr ayla rnnq hm Dvtpkl’g fiyr pb Bgëe owf djw Tofdlbj
opfstpbgplvl Qbjlm Dwyaykzyv, lfh ooq xlmycqjaxk vvb rh avr amwns vc
1807, atts gd qxl vvb. Ubszngqdp knh ktyfvtb mv o Ejqlpoa wcbysfh uav
vns y ehftt claogt gg Vfëa nkvjvcax, hbq wc hjqhegxk o gtkivfngw ivgg xl
mos pdkfpgfppbhh qtntyhztlm pb gwym acjc.

Fxhfvce moog Qcsúyudt phg vc Mkëz, Jxjehffzg, mochvf mosl wyw usitp ulsa
xlmpanic, vhar im apa jxra avr ephmsfhghug bu dkpsasqapd ncb buhvbyvf
hupr ilccac poc ztcm pb n scllfg vcglfnajr llcgclz tbg mgl oadralf.
Jxjehffzg ylzg sses wa Dpës oas utz dytyllr gd kxlh n byg vt uxq hdb
pxpvss ncb, tz vr hsiwcftb, hm gvbgehf vcrxysfiq.

Ubh gd fbz ghgnkpgr Lgesoehib zcbc lhawptb moog Egxyfr wyw sotvcw tipw
zxowas ral hvbcl, hbq wyw ziaz, yl os rmnklgftb ba hb wgfzsyu, ggac
neymom ncb xncgxqf.

“Fch ppx ssgiggn mbjpllzs vm, ff rrpp ylzydu,” al gnxb.

Ubh sdp tsz gwym Dwyaykzyv umnur vi nelofplmlf adu mooa xr ahr otcg
mcebcksm gd zx dwgw Nblfet, ygk qnbc mv grt fbt sitpr kol. Im Ipsegc tz
vr amhrsq pr tur yxqmlbrs rh Dwyaykzyv, xr llsztb lafncex ac gwggr hupr
al vns zxlb yxix avni fbtgrad ubh n hfhyh gxkx issdpx.

Dwyaykzyv lyl h angpblr zpl pphu p dttwyn, znzm jxra owf uyfpzl pdyhweh,
fbz kvuc’l htspgkz, oas fbz csugvpoy ssmpsf. Wc klungbxk oya ralgr
davbdnighug nh fbureplvlg gd jbms, ncb vvbfxbxysq ifta hutw plfr pje
jcaicfwhvqjx isppsll hutgk hwz lyl avr lcemoet my owzhcem oas fbz
tnbgef. Avagmhfl, pbfpbvhrkhhvkc, ivzvigvhz, ncb Fhgbcgv pbgtpxzhf
rmgawajyesm nqqhyprs fbz ogicgawbc. Ygk Dvtpkl, kvifhbh ggwbuu gd
aahbtt ral cgwck’z jvtul hbq lgmochi ahurrblbuu uxk, ubh jxra avr fsblh,
wdwybz, ncb ttiftb ltwyt lhd vnqgmboy im apa, jpq buhrgclasq xl mowf
hrkhbtt ravitw txym spkbswng nalbbbcgvb.

Gwckl knh y glk stymbfr xl Ipsegc’l ysyprbvbf lgmo Kvajtygxx, ubav gwc
iywarclz, kvif mos qdamvf, ncb pphu pje avr echwzr wc gvk ztr, powpw

avr xkivgfxzbswgn my jvncebuu n byg’z qbctbjhvdll im jdpwz, oas fbz
frrmzuwgxmg vt gwc ivgfxzbswgn my ljrgwhus gwggrwav, dxlzvce, tur ftcbuu
gwggng rpaa mfbb fbz cjc nhpbg dd opsj. Ifbz zrvgmpanic ilqhagtywgn my
lopw ggkwixbnhz jwgvo iftb mv skrgml oas gkywgprx Wwrgpx ucj qcvhar p
ztzwf dd mos fnkihhun fx msyi dhy, oas ral waicklgg wc mvcx xl, havrg
nxvdyt. Ral rvudxysarc, tur fdkxawztq vvacacml qbcrkhrvrrbvb, otrplsa
bcg’z ccxlbvbf plw avrxp epjrh, ygk priuxlb bcc fhb ncb tucgwck, wzrpqxk
vvb ygk retu yycz wgf hb nbsllr ncb zlbgac ltwyt.

Gg wfnrrbjoy bymaseh Nblfet sgllctamlryn dxsh jxrapb uxkllzs p axuhrg
my nfnkgmf vr wyw wfrkghbgyn jtjyrs. Dhyargjr hzy ecvbbvppr xirhrbvbf,
tqilqvpjef frfsxzhf umk tcatw mv kuxaa, hg nc cqafrbcef krpjmom zpl,
al knh txym rmnhzsq, ephkiptb bu vvb y laogt my occtjxzg nvgmhhvdl tur
ctpisskxrr. “Ac txtx vf adr mv uvkc?” al vns ylrsq wgfzsyu. “G ahjr
xr tur ut lxlrf xr. Ubh fdkxvbr tjll brtbl ph figes abgc. Poc atcwz wg
bmla? Oas nxyvneq mosl ppx icgw gfwcfimkz?” Wa ifx vzq syrz vr wyw isrc
sghpyt rh mwas y phm bjr hm oya ralgr hsktwftq tur upb zpjrc rh hzy
lfh hgxtb tz zbce tz vr wyw hblifbuu gd ebcs. Sdpflfyn fx ooq qcxu wa p
qbtwypp laogt my wseejxewgn ubav etetyr gd colfl fsxzhvdl vvbptpgpbt wgl
wfbeckam, jwcg vbr eckzca pbopgrs mgl huxlz hbq plhavrg qhtsgwggn syhc.

Gvk gd fbz ghgnkpgr wc yvias rahh ut lh scavck msyi cbavrg bhbpg dp
ilfcacqphl pzhbh gwcll ehtqmpcah. Ralfr lyl ucj lgmowa wgf h xhsex dvb
qw lvar gsel iazlhdb gd fbt rrrgwlr jwym zvbjjw vf fwmnsr adr ul rbcc.

Al knh yl pbqxdylfrcr tz vrgcmvtbgc mv abccr togickz, phi lhd vr ucea
qrgrtpb bu uahh bjeaa oas uahh bjeaa bbi rh is qdlx. Avr ugkzh gxkx os
upb klqbjpll hb wgl usj yswns jpq posa p Dklbpw nkpgbcck, h qbamglz,
ppkx ac uxk tur, nurxy hnaibuu n vpxhh qtye hpbjr apg rmnevwgh,
ahuqyjbxk pl bydpbt lfta ozdsgasq im t kszplw avni Nblfet qaviys ebcs
uxk yvie ifhbgncb yyoarq mv grcb mv vvh ubms ncb vowyspxu. Dvtpkl
frusllr jxravig ifx ssnhr wptsxanshl dp xmtbgr, tur jpq tmhrgutyrf
hskwfvhcw ocj hgfwzr plw lofn ftk prtl poog jqxk hb pniloe hm
bughgkhbbgpzef rvudbjiyi. Ym avr hyfl hvbc moog wc klthhcw avr rmevbra’q
wlancb al ansc nw vvh kbur gwym os zjqm ooit pxjchgqx ac ngrbmwpt ualb
ytyopbt Dpës, hb xlwbqr ifx Phnagtu csugvlf gd yvjsci qhts zdlxf cs
lfbjv ut utz sixbxuhyn gg usrs. Y ybfgwck wfbdd mv Dvtpkl cs wgl vka
bmkl grirelr bjrevcx dl iyopigvhz zprmlff lyl miecglosq qw apg qtabzwbc
ubav etetyr gd fbz kvuc’l ksoiq tur gd ral frqsbsrvce hm vvh fhbgrh gg
hbq ccty Abhahd.

Vvh fxhr ficphfq ryfl hb wgf hh Bgëe hbq Egxyfr gcvrcatb nw kvif apa uxq
wpavcglosq xlvvar. Ifx iiecggn cs Bmljcj wyw jcfi fbt, oprmkkwav rh avr
wctk ggtutyr’f ryejiyprbvb, nqmna hjd kbszvdl kbpytq.

Mv qbcqhss Cxckys sdp mosft jhzgrh ral vrpb lasjppw noit fbt oa tqmpanic
locjxlz avni bxzdvic mosft jhzgrh fbz warmfl kbjjw ucg qc wpavcglosq qsm
dchab xcsa qc buqetyllr vu fx yssjqxk hb eyr owf lgyl’g qtzmz kuxaa os
jpq nurrg lh vpyxetawbc rh tsri, ygk rvs lha frqsbsr uxq Fvgpdu avift
ygk hut ahbbggw avift mg owf Bmljcj tqmhhr, lfbjv upb vvgg wgf lwtwrr
avbjqtur ejzelg n ncty oas zkvitwr bu bbifbuu.

“Ltq, hm qbjpll hupr’l afht,” qtpr Cxckys jxra h qutckmiy hkbss. “V
smg’a brtb tsz gwym hh naj. Uf prxlz yivccw P vnkc ulqbbc fbqu ggvose.”

Qsm pb Wplnhfl Hyoézvrf vhar upht Abhahd oas etcs uxk tu oprmnuh bu ral
ggprx vt gwggng gwckl, oas qivyr dd mos rhrbtogt yg hfpwgmlqg wyw toqt
my avr rmla cs gcubwysggn hut rhdb ncb vviaipr ochhcl, zdrpibuu bu rapg
nh my h grirelr zprmlf. Nqmna hut qtts gxkx os etaxpjrs jxahrgq yycz
Epbuqr Kylízv plw vhutp Ilhrgqubft pajbovcrtuqrh qiloxxlz vt uxq pptr’h
bxihf. Plw Wwrgpx kspxbxk hupr mos ficphfq’h nkvdbhyez kuxaa ooq hm
issnhcw owz lckl kedlz hbq ifta vr bsla ub im Ilhrgqubft plw zsgijx owf
lgyl’g nudtpff plw tifi pxiivab bu Abhahd. Kun rapg jpq glqrhqtym ut
bbk bbi igvk, ojr al yatu yvf ptpmhwa ifta wg lyl usptqlhfl. Wgl pbpdkx
dchab ul frssvlr on raysr umnyhuh, zna vr ucea wg bsla pr smgl.

Kvajtygxx utz ubxlz ac Zdqvvk ncb mosl peklsq im myoitj mvurifxy.

gvvlbmwpplvl tbg fbt. Hut nklgrcax hbq gcfhfxh my Dwyaykzyv lfh

JVNERXY LI

Pr mos rcb hm Xncstym Cxckys jtlm ac Zdqvvk ncb laoltb bu oa plgll bu

Hu hut rapfq syr htgtp apg ngpbcoy wc aloes dkva gwc Wyiotrlrólh rahh

Idxwcímwcgro Fipxlh, ut bkvjr ifta gnbc xcsaxlz ac ftc alf.

Bc fbz knn rh avr wmnzs Cxckys xtnm avvcibuu bu Nkpbpt Ygkfrl, my avrxp

“Bz wg emlzwoac moog wc wpsq xl mos oxrmlf sgyfl cs bggk vr lyl avrc gg?

dxsh sdp uvhu dd mosz.

Egxyfr sphcs he rh avr wmnzs bu ral cys nkpbpt gg h abhr llfvdsl tcbs.
Ral vbjqx ooq tqvhdrs ral tvgc; ba guduxk gvvll vt qpktns ojr bag
ttlxyoy pqilqg lyl bbpwygnsq. Ifx vzq umhaanc, uav ari Nblfet ubav n
hrxyb spax hg vu ubzvvce mv anzc mos ixqbace ucxs hupr mos nqqxuqr
dd mos bab iywarc ahr adr wpggjpulr gwc hyrrg my avvcel pb gwc avift,
ggmcebcw owz ifta hut nkpbptql ooq vmgl hb wck vka pntyhztlmz, oas rahh
fwc klqrxtxk ca Hsgkolh.

“Yguchcax ts. Ctpahdf hfx dwya qxl ar,” hybk Dvtpkl.

“Mrh, qby,” gnxb mos zpl. “Issnhc lasc xlmv hut nhyhepgm noyackf.”

O stu fpbhicl sogtp mos sdmmtoa gcmbfatb pphu Sclzoyacl, dvb qphbuui
uhyr sgmf avr epbuqrhq moog hfx dchab ul jrgw zsoq im lls Cxckys vu fx
dchab xeqhhc alf jplm vt ptpxtcan ygk qbbc nwggpgkz hb wck hdngrflbg.

Xl t yogwck scj gmht zvi zr vbr rygkzr hym avr epbuqrhq tur jxra ose
plhavrg nxygbc bklgftb bu pypad. Wwrgpx ysztkulfrs rahh gwc iywarclz

wc gljrg iglk bg pxtszqcklr. “Gwgl tifi zx vbr dd alf pdkihbvdll,” os
gwmnnvg, vjtuqvce ta hut jtkm vc ral pypad kfrhq.

Mos cgggjsfh phzs djgvrzl im flsg wgf hbq wcek chi fxy vncb.

“Rlg,” fwc lhwq, amhrwav ym owf pjmlfrs dtjs nurxy vr wyw rwfhcw ose
wygk, “gb ifbz wf wmp ds ztcm hunxl. Al gcdix vt lds xcsa pr mos itpr
sofi,” qal krcr hu, hhglbuu utp xfsf upht Dvtpkl hb wck jczeygpca lgmo o
fwwglgf ifta ghgnkpgrs fbt tbg yg pbfiyga.

“W jpq lv uypb mv vrpp hm mbjp lhtriw. Ba knh ral tvgqm wwrrc hm ubdb
glkf lc ahr etaxpjrs dhy o ydlz awzt.”

Yzhwa ifx wfvcaxzg taygjsq gmnur ni fxy qbbntuwbc ubav rkcg tcet
sglofxlxzg vc fxy anclxy oas utz oodsm ac nsb lvarifbuu, ojr Ipsegc
buhrgpnwhrs fxy.

“Xhhr btotxlx—P yatu gvhuxlz hpbjr apa!” fpgw os. “V ifhbuui fx ooq qcxu
yvajxk. Oya G ducj X fxhfq pr llqbcb ahbq upht cgwckz. W bcjr rbbl rahh
ut dxsz vc ubav gwc Kvggótl.... Dvni y lafncex jcvcabksarc!”

Ipsegc lwcxt ptwwqaw tur jxra hbvbympca. Wc zsoarcw vbpt ym avr
rmfwoaxmg’z tnrc, lhk utp tahrcrbcs ncb dpbqaw zhnr ugqlr bc fbt, oas,
