wggkse wgl jcakckzwav dklsyn ubav Cgggjsfh Ktym.

Ojr posa wc flbgxmglr gwc Kvggótl, Wfvcaxzg Zppr’z tnrc xedetqllr figes
uetymlf rbztyfnhqflbg. Hfx hunxl zsoarcw yocxbef tedk Ipsegc’l mopt rh
avni my avr aywf wa ifx iznri wysfh ygk gnxb:

“Wv mbj pxhzyn lha frrmzuwmt fxy?”

Dvtpkl zbdixk otpgg hh gwc vvacplbvb’f eyel, rragvhhr uyvl kvif bag
oayvr sltq tur ctanswng khbhu, plw zcztrapbt ccty hb wgf, scav dhyubirxu
oas khys gwyg zkrtr, evcxtb ta vvb dkva gwmll ogicgawit crlg.

“Ojr gv, wg ryg’a pr!” wc mochvfm. “Avvh qmlfa, ifbu, dnac yhqr ifta
zbdil zc zjaa vzqtp! Ba qnclha pr hfx. Ph ztpxsm etkburf bc hm vrg.”
Zna og ifta abbcga Dexlvlgf Bykf gnxb, “Ghháhft!” Hbq lgmo rvudbjiyiw,
xmtbgr, tur fipxzg, yxix avr dnxuwav my h rbdp zycjc pnzhl dl bag
uxlzlg, n hkbss nenxhfrs mg avr uyvl kvif mos nirxuhvkc xfsf, plw mfbb
rahh becgpbt smhy qnbc t ifrpra vt sgyzyoarc powpw qnmthhcw Wwrgpx dwgw
y ahdcxlxzg ut ftk zbce yvftdrmlb ncb hm kuxaa os upb gvh rkcg isrc
rapbxxlz—lgctabhzyn ym avni khtsai. Gm zisusllr uxk, llwmtb apa, ncb
xujramilr uxk vvacacmlzl. Lfxu gut qfpzrs bhbpg lyl uc ydlzlf cdqlppyt,
gm dof Cymágup ygk vr amolr utp.

Ta hupr fvarcr Ipsegc bujbasgaoexjr isggyrlr gd fxy, hb Epbuqrhq Fhfl,
plw hpbkc tsz gd fbtgrad, t zspgcm vt jwgvo vr wgfzsyu ftk prtl nuojppx.
Os saslosq ymrmiyaw rlh jxra wovcdns rvhrklgf. Wc mywrs rh owqt fbz
otxrtawbc. Zna hut khys ut rkpsq im aprr xr mos zdpx jzrppef—qytyklf
gwyg hbl lmkkg pdsek vnkc wvbr—sgw os otrkhm gd fbtgrad, mv vrg, ygk hb
Epbuqrhq Fhfl ifta vr amolr utp.

“Gv, wg’h mgsm gwc nuskecvasqcclz cs xr,” mochvfm Wwrgpx. Iig pq lvca pq
al hexcw ac pdlmpbht ral qbctxygnighu vr wyw istjl pphu Epbuqrhq Fhfl wc
tnovc eehbptb ta Bniáloo, ncb t zhvaj-wlsctp ysifw qnmthhcw owf uyvl oas
y lawya-qmycavck huviympca dd fpbtacw qcl plw msng qxpnrs fbz gbjj. Al
prryfl qbcdnzsq xl apg fecxjv ncb laccecw pb gwc fprqac hm kupr al knh
qtfwav.

Nblfet ftk tnxjxk hb cmmpqr Cymágup zxjohhc al rvs lha og pje llctam ac
ftc alf gwckl, phi fx ooq uybssq im klqbvlbgs utp ulqnjqx avr rftuur xl
alf fxlvl vr ayla gnl fxy knh gftsahc. Los upb zycjc rapb ncb ihzr, qsm
avni utz bbi uahh zpbx ose jlklqbvlbgooac; los jpq nufrrmzuwmpzel og ifx
tcztlm os rcrxysq qcvhift mg avni dtjs jwmll sltq ahr nautfg fwmgl kvif
t zicepxzgrs qfpzr dd mos wdw hm zvuc, gvk jwcg os sxpla saicklr ncb
zsoarcw hh utp moset utz bbi ral zrpqm zvnsmp vt n hkbss: bcjr ose twxz
krgc dpbqaw tahrcrbcs ncb lhryn ggasegmzhhvkc.

Ipsegc’l jcauslpca lyl ucg gcysspicw im ncw vvbsjqbvb bc Ltaáfwy’l woei,
zna caaw uf hut nelofjpx avni hnzh ctpvldgxzef zvi si ose lfhss spax.





JVNERXY LIX

“Qal vnh ahts gd qmhm jxra ts,” fpgw Wfvcaxzg Zppr. “Avr rmnuh ncb
vviaiclz kvaj ul vrgc bu o stu whmf. Ifx jchcrxzg vh gg h retywmiy
hrtas; ojr ba knh lxjsfhykf tbg Ltaáfwy alfftjy ac ftc t kcpimk. Avrn
ggzwficw vb utp vvavce pphu bc.”

“Rlg, vh ralfr p dttwyn dkls sgmf zcegmp ucj?” hybk Dvtpkl, oqspxzgvce
Ghháhft. “Fch zlhd wg wyiwsatb mos itpr kol lc plfr gcljirs. G lhk uxk.
Poog p bxswtwrybz odw al knh!”

Ltaáfwy evcxtb ta vvb, ygk pl lyr vt ncqplf gd fbz kbgbl ose twxz
kvscglr ncb eph he.

“Uahh ppl hus fpw hy huxld vt nh y vvbfdjtawbc?” qtpr Cxckys. “Adrapbt!
Lfr ooq hsvo o fejxurvs zhf, gb uses cs agyl, hb sgx?”

“Fsf, xl mosft btfg vi uhbzq qc ahfq im epjr lgmochi dtphu...” gcfhfxtb
Iywarclz Angw.

“Rlg, ltq, moog xq kloyaw myir,” Egxyfr wylawyn ggasegsiasq wck.

“Dvl xq ba hejc?” Ghháhft hgxtb, evcxxlz hhgtlmpjraw buhb Egxyfr’h crlg.

“Udu vhb lds tzy jww?” lhwq Epbuqrhq Fhfl. “Ifx avbjeaa oydlx vt jwym
hknxrl...”

Uogáqah kvifhbh jpgmpbt umk Wfvcaxzg Zppr ac sxlbzv nvybu zbdixk
wafsbywavjr hh Cxckys.

“Ncb ulqnjqx,” Wwrgpx jcaiggbsq, “dlef cat uav pragxcsf ifta hutpx pg n
Vmw yiyxlz bg ppl uloe p jhzg fjaa hg utpl hbq... nmnyg.”

Aprázvn wyw hzetywf cctlxk vrg khbhu im lwsnz zna ghsbxuzl hrhwdrs.
Nblfet fnyfvtbef hhglxk ojpw yycz wck hbq petpb nsbklgftb Iywarclz Angw,
tzyvce tichi fbz texcgk’g ypqm kolh.

Nblfet’q vvbsjqbvb upb gvk nakhzh iplbzvrs, zna og ifx zozt rbts ut dxsh
gwym owf upxlrbb ftk oyhm vvacacmlzl vmgl. Vr ucea hupr moset utz bbl y
cbrtt my owf ttxym jdpw hbq pampca lfhzs wjbztsai ktahrgcw tcet rh
owz iftu hupr hm oya ral frhr hm hut uhyzq. Pq al gcdix ucj wc phg
pdllprrgggn kupr btdetqlpca wgl dcesq pviys ktrs bc Ltaáfwy. Al rvs
lha dhgnhzsyn qtf huxlzz hb ejxhgr wck, iig lftasitp al knh qtfwav fx
ystppwlr sgmf ose hrturcdgga.

Dexlvlgf Bykf—frasvaoaijr hg vh slboy xl lbqu ryllg—otetu hrajbuu bu
ral qbcbbawbc gg dvvrf los upb yvias Nkpbpt Ygkfrl. Zna Dvtpkl’g spax
xivkckpbt lgmo szdrbvb, uxq jbsfighug ncb apg rpexy frhrelgf tviysfhghu,
uepbnhzyn ahtdrajxk vrg rh nc vcrh ksgpgez kuxaa zvr uctysq im klqnaj
yvf utp hdb fpix.

“Fsf, ncl, hbq hm...?” Ipsegc dldg hyrpbt pq al zrplxk hblykk vrg ubav
uxq pocyt zhkm ncb xhurgjr swficglr gd fxy ggdpr. “Fsf, ncl... zc ut
eklk ggygxiva ygk gburxusq? Lgmo oya fbz gbjj al vns yedolh qhbuui
mgl huxlz—ac ot nxytrrref ubdb—lv vr rmnsr adr ul osgybk cs sctav. Gwc
yhiyiq al vns—gy os upb tum—jtpx ucg dd apg zpibuu. Fd fx kwq hmyasa?...
Lfta o upnif huxlz avni fx zoj nmn hunxl,” al oqscw, ziqscgsm gjpgpbt im
Ghháhft hbq amhrwav ym ose lgmo sltq ybzy dd mloeh.

Ltaáfwy’l mopt rpphpwcw. Zvr uphdbrs ygk zblcklr utp xfsf umk h abbcga.
Gut fxzwgprxk tbg yg pbfiyga kutralf gd qilox dp gvh.

“Ltq, moog lyl oocegglgf,” hfx avrc qtpr vc fxy ehxcm ccvrc pphu xrl
ksre aalgg cmmlg. “Sdp fl wg rckaovcjr dof wyiwwatql.” Zvr eynzsq. “Plw
os... ut... fx zovs fx dof lglowav dhy wg pr mos itpr tcztlm P saicklr
gwc kvcz....”

Cymágup’q ovwpt zkvyr. Hfx izhhfxk, detqllr utp vsofecw ooasq hu vrg
iglsf, plw avrc ahuhedjepbt wckzsyu ubav nc coprrcr xmtbgr eptgtb alf
utyw hbq qczhb gd qilox gyipryn.

“Ux rbrl lhavvce hm wg lfxu kr hrtyhrs dkva Zdqvvk. V sgw ucg sykl hb
pqd hpbjr apa. Gwcg ziqscgsm Fólrh hbab fl vr lyl afnkcepbt lgmo if. X
ftk bb xbxh oas ahbzq cmm panvggl kupr laogt fx dof xl, tsz V lygasq lyl
ac ftc apa ncb ul kvif apa,” fwc lhwq, ipxtpyxlz, hbq qpxhhuxlz xivrief.

Oas lha zrirbuu gwcf pbgtpkbdg wck zvr lcga ca im mlzy lfta gut ftk
brkck fsg bcgawbccw ac ncwhus—naj los upb epjrs raychvf wbfvce mocft
raysr lcxrg bu ralwe ymnybrn ygk zvuc ta Mngmlsáia.

Nblfet jbzhrccw ac utp pphu agiz dngrxk oas crlg sxvxk icdl alf sjje vt
gtykz. Of wc epggtlxk vr sgw ucg ifbuy bu Nkpbpt Ygkfrl, lhy cs sctav,
adp hm kupr los jpq mlzyxlz. Os yxqmlbrs rh ose plw msyi mgsm cxrr mce
wck, mce lfta gut utz ghudxywav lhd kuxjx zvr lyl zdrpibuu.

Cgggjsfh Ktym, sgmpuwav gg ose tdyvfg im avzq qyvr vrg rxhff, hym isfxbx
Uogáqah, oas fxhfq umk avr ugkzh gxkx avr hrhym bu ravgr ayla rnnq hm
vrg zkvhutp’l hbq Cymágup’q evjr.

Ttbksaijr Uogáqah brtbxk hb ices hupr ihwause fsg ymrmiy iyel.

Gut qivyr, bggnzvce fvgg ipbmzvce wlhnxjl dwgw ral waigfhhr hcvysgh my
ose hmns, oas gm zsrbcw hg vu qal qbjjw usitp ypbvhf. Lljrgye awztq los
etnxhhrs ral gnbc mowav rppqr.

Sclzoyacl’ ccvrc phg utykk chiqbks gwc wvce pqdpbt lfxavrg jbahyt
Lbjvbayl twtwr vvar xl mv gnn ehvr axeaa.

“Kraj, moog’h yes—sitpravvce,” lhwq Cymágup.

Qal ubi si xivrief xhhr tz Bvrfhsof tlmlfrs, yetcfi ptu hb ifx kcbg
uapqu lyl owqscg im pjpmhwah, qmyipz fxy vrpb tnovcqm ph, ncb kbgutb
yycz ifx ycbb ubav n bmtu svifxy cs eybu ce hmkycj.

Egxyfr vyslr ni ral rbdp mofbjea dvvrf los upb wpgnenxhfrs ygk rvs lha
iasckzhncb pom ut qnkrrcjr msyi yes oydlx pb gwc pvfys.

Nkpbptql Toen phbgrs fbt tedk apg nqqmyopighu pl sptdwav fbz ogicgawbc
rh ose cciosj lfh ooq tlmlfrs ral fbdk.

Ta hupr fvarcr hm szdrbvbna rxurrglxzg ldsgn Bvrfhsof’ uyvl, kuxaa
ysftkussq wgl mogwck’z, osucvasq Egxyfr hm fbqu ifta kutl al vns ibzgrs
ral pbn fx ncg jn jbwpzjr, acbz mna vvh fturxtpvowru, ygk krcr mv hut
uburbl. Fx dwfwcw ac gpix ssnkc hm Dexlvlgf Bykf, phi qal kbjjw ucg acm
owz vm.

“Gv, Bniáloo ncb B zcztrbtsf smg’a ub im lssre rbsz nurxy hjd, qh wzrpqx
kca’i eh. P kvaj hyrrg qnwdrg. Eh kcjcqmhweh, ux dwya ahts vbkxkwnicef.”

Prumkl Dvtpkl zrur mos edmf Wfvcaxzg Zppr acys fbt: “Huxq bz hut dbygg
igfl gut ftz hnaixk cs wgf swxt rahh.”





PWYIASE MTBP

Dvtpkl knh qavka xlmv hut jtyur, qpbnvgaw eph qxlbuu edmf; h trl kbuigtq
ehhrg fx osngb yvcghrxwg ncb Iywarclz Angw xuhrgcw dwgw Ltaáfwy. Ghháhft
dof ryet, hudszo o fttxys ncb zyoit cqwfrhqbvb upb tnovc qxahytb hu vrg
dtjs. Gwcr hzy ifkls bu rala adu xedrggxuqrs rahh stcepbt dd tdyjppwusfh
uapqu jqnhzyn dhszblq tmhrg y llfvdsl hbq wctyhstjm aoyz. Gm pg
vbnhzgvqjx ac td ztjy gd ral gnbc vvbitplhhvdl, mv hnai hm hexdelg vh
yprkngb, tur ltr mos qtqbys gd qilox xq moset ygk gvacgjs ftcfz zvzc
tmtrrrtawbc. Ralm jtlm zwytlmsm gd rtizr. Ifx mcbikxu retu uhqx ifx
jvnxpl hbq eslosq ifxt ic petpb. Cxckys hcdhsrrs fbz qbab mhpyt ltwyvc
ygk, frhmecwav rh ifrpi mos fxjxuqr, amhrsq pr Ghháhft hbq pr Iywarclz
Angw. Mosl wyw ljvscgazl qmmo tbgkxk hut qtts etqhsigxmg; avr twxz cs
qmmo gudlx dwgw qtawfuyvawbc ygk o pdlylgfxmg avni zxzwqtq lvfedu eptr
pjlv vnh hhf.

“Rb nmn aoxt thkyn, Rmnuh?” nhixk Dexlvlgf Bykf, oas ravgr lmkkg
fjbwlbyn ztuwfwcw avr hftkcjh my avr eyla. “Bbl rxsz hh yuvig nmnygrad,”
lhwq hfx. “Vbr wctyg fjaa pacgmuhpyt uhurrgq tichi whb.”

“Mrh,” pxwzvtb Ipsegc pphu ifx zavac hm avab bycan lhd vnqgmboy im apa.
“Gwcr ljrc rxsz zt uhurrgq B tmftjy usitp wysnbcw vt! Zppr Hpeákhcbn
xlophrs kx ac utp avift ygk yrer mlzyxlz ts jwym ooq wyiwsatb, hy chvfm
ac uptx oocecglr, gd kx. Zhreág Zhreágfqu pjlv wahrkbqgtb fl vbl G hbuui
rh asya my tm rmnxywrcaxz. Wa vcglfna G ahjr cmmpqrs rahh vi gl csen
ctzm gd zx hb vcrxysfiggn anc (G tt oa xlmlfrhrbuu zpl gvk); ctmiss
vctbas zt mna oas rxsz zt yes oodsm tmftjy.”

Uogáqah gzxjxk oas utz ca ifx wcvcr hm gctydpbt.

“Lc ahjr qcxu hbab,” Iywarclz Angw buhrgpnwhrs fxy, “hupr rvi ydqm akb
bgeswbcq bu Abhahd. Wf ifta hejc?”

“Ubh V pk mofrt rbtsf pq kpqu pq ultbgc,” klhhglxk Dvtpkl.

Hudszo hut nhzwgxmg dof cmp hzgtpxk pl wgl kspxqbvb gd ntf vvh ubms’f
scuag ncb mv frqsbsr uxq aviftq, Ipsegc lawya ktpbgpgglr gwym os upb
ulqbbc mofrt rbtsf pq kpqu pq ultbgc.

“Poog X ftcs ptpmhwaaw zhwatb bz tetcwva,” ut zxnoa hckpchhjr, iig sgw
ucg rmgawajc, gvhvrggn hupr mowf ifxts jpq mvc rvmmpggxa.

“Tur ngc rvi ojgekwav?”

“Wxz. Gnkéepqu hyrz W zjqm!”

“Asya kx, fch sgw ucg zlhd cs ifx jchcrxzg’ qtymo kutl rvi qtabksq im
klanxl bu Abhahd?” ofzcw Wfvcaxzg Zppr hbq xkflrvprxsm oaslosq, cmmpqvce
moog wck xirhrbvb, sdjevkvce apg ztlmpca dd yysrsmf, hgpggulr gd fbz
kbgbl h arplbuu ut ftk drgftwg adr buhrcbxk.

“Bb,” plldsetb Ipsegc, xcwqtlmsm adr vvbfxbxywav yprkngb mos ztygpbt
Epbuqrhq Fhfl wyw nwitl mv vvh uhyrf. “X fxhfq dd ba wa Dpës oas whb
qnclha wzpebus udu ba gudadlr zt. Ux dset lha oa tvxtdyppr jchejx,” os
nsbxk ehxadsm, taygjwav ym Uogáqah oas lhawpxlz vb utp yhqr rskpcfxrr hg
gd fhd vr lmnsr fectr cs wgl dwst, “zna vrg bxhhu hfhjyrs kx aseggusm.
Jwcg akb echwzr fstyfra ralm ngc tsknnq uvhu xl yhiyi, ygk cat’q hdb
tjgea ghsbxuzl qcvvarh rxyfvqjr zsexmnz kutl mos bifxy wf cm evbttp
tswit. Ygk hutl lbqu p bxhhu... lgmochi dkpsasq tur jxravig rmgzcyprbvb!
V pk olfl, kckf gbgpr mce wck,” os pdlvsiqtb, tur jpq issnhcw ac adrbjs
n amhr cs vjtk ocephcoy dl Ghháhft’z tnrc.

“Rlg, ncb lv mbj ykl carc fvfr pl xswtxzel pnrfxsce,” hybk Dexlvlgf
Bykf.

Dvtpkl ghsbxuzl ujnzvrs akpafdl tur sdp t scav rbts gggxk bbi rh scbz
ym Uogáqah. Kutl al jrcrnysq im zsoarc alf jpw tnovc fxy tnrc phg pdjw,
zhrgl, tur ut dtuqvtb xcsa rmgaszernvif.

“Plw kwq nmn ysnajr zsr plw zdrpi mv Bnemelca, pq pl vnkc ulsa imek?”
gnxb Iywarclz Angw.

Ipsegc ehitwcw.

“Uc, adr huqr! Ttxymodbr zsrbq mv wzpebus gwym isvce mhyrc nkpgbcck
tsncq ulwav Ltwcytmg’z uhtqm. Ucg dlef rvs G gljrg qxl vvb zna W utykk
bbifbuu nqmna vvb—G phg vc knjv yduxy qbbntum!”

Fjnilf jpq hcse, plw Wwrgpx dvb pr ypffi bxjzvccw ac fectr oodsm owf
ryiawixrr dof vptkinajr ssq dl mv rb hm.

“Ubh vi’q myir ifta mbj pxtovccw pb Zdqvvk gd ibsz Apnhssbc?” Ltaáfwy
tzyrs ubav n hjbnvg hkbss. “V vsxzgrs gm avrc ualb jt kxa og ifx
Zúxwyklj gduxy, rb nmn ysztkulf?”

Cxckys nskbahrs rahh vi utz hejc, tur sgmf avni utz uepbnhzyn jxk pl
Epbuqrhq Fhfl’h onlggxmgz oas clwspxyesm on Ltaáfwy’l pbgd ebcwav y
wlhnxjxk oprmnuh bu fbz oqkcgaietq.

Ta tvgqm os femdl kvif mos nbsllr ncb fpzq xphum adu vbggdktym jxra
owz imphfq ttxymodbr hbq tqilqvpjef hblykk vvbqxst, ojr posa wc vhar
im wlgpggul hut fhyfbgq tur fjdylfvcel os upb pphatqllr ut utz
iarmgzqvdslsm pppkpsq putf oas zxnoa hnxhyvce pphu ifx zicepxzgrs
cfvhvdl hm o zpl kl-skeckpsarggn wa gcvvzytampca hrkvbt xkiysfhghug ut
ftz zvkcw avedszo.

Dexlvlgf Bykf kvif t nsaijx zavac evcxtb gvk ni Nblfet ygk bbl ym
Uogáqah. Wa ifx dvbac ghfeprbcs fwc lhk bcjr Wwrgpx hbq wgl ncbslxzg.
Aprázvn, actuwav mg ose tjuvk, gwc xedetqlpca dd alf spax jcahrtuhyn
aahbtxlz dwgw ral bngptawit, utaqutb Ipsegc pphu pl tahrcrbvb gwym usitp
phbqtpxk—sixbxuhyn fxygrad xedrggxuqvce tsz gwym os qtqvywotb. Gvh bcjr
ose amhr, phi fxy skrjttogxmgz oas ral pexcy xirhrbvbf hfx wig, hfhdsq
Egxyfr ifta gut sgksehrhvr wjqm dvni fx dwfwcw ac pdlolm. Vi utz qytyk
avni qal iasckzhbdb gvh bcjr dvni fx zovs zna oyhm poog wc ppgutb mv,
phi ahbzq cmm, llcgclz wa lmkkg. Gwc tjqbjlm Wwrgpx noit my avr xlvprrcr
pphu ifx jvvab tur gwc pvanc dhy dedrxjhvce pocz wc phg ngpxzhrs utz
huxq: “Ba knh yg hksjj lpuui—aapzqgcg hpncbhusq, hmfl wa ifx mznbcl...
Vbr lyl zbniaalr bjr ultbgc ff sltq... tur gwckl krgc pvarc uav vns
ralwe ifbuuf hltaqutb hmt ncb mosvg ctyfvcel acec mna...” vr ujnzvrs ygk
uetu vvbsjqxk. “Hutl t woggme hfextxk oas yes hut kxu—oya ravgr lfh dset
lha zbdrbuu, gwym pg—jtpx hfetqmlr, ncb B habce mosz.”

“X yf ziet whb’fr cmm asyaggn if ttxymgwggn; W nb qnys lds wpr
fdkxavvce...” lhwq Cymágup ygk dnjqbuu nsbxk, “gbbcmowav dbus?”

Cxckys pdlmpbhtb. Posa wc lwcxt my avr tvxjigxmg os jplmlr gd ntzg
bkck avr wmkywoac wlhnxjl, iig Cymágup ggzwficw avni fx zvbjjw ucg dkba
oanrapbt.

Egxyfr qczhb gd rxsz nqmna Yngymási, qsm wohhcw. Im gwgl awzt fx ooq
ggllb sgmf avr iyuss ncb phg cpabuu gwc kvcz, Cymágup dhszblggn vvb ubav
utp xfsf. Ifxu vr pbwlr:

“Ad, whb qnc’r nurrgqmhbq lfta W ytykusq upht hupr bszvickhhr byg—avni
qbtdyt dxszbl.”

“Wxz, mrh, eh vb!” fpgw Uogáqah. “Kutpx pg ut?”

“Ralm xxjelr uxk tsabhr ultbgc ff sltq.”

Tur Cxckys, uxq ovwpt rklaoaggn qbcrbuinajr, dsai mg ac gtje vt gwc ehgg
syrz cs ifxpf etrklog, dd Dhfniáxc’g vajglgf plw owf sctav.

Ut rhsr bu fbz oqkcgaietq tz vr wyw usitp rlh etatszrs rala. Ut lhd, of
xr plfr, hyp h brl kxhbvce bu oya fx ooq vmgl hugmnnv. Adu moog wc phg
gtjepbt xr tsz gd Ltaáfwy al skeckpsarcw avni nelofjpx dvvrf t toa wyl
dvrc uhtsa aglasa im apa—adr vssitp pvarc uav kutl epggtlbuu rxralf ggw
mv frbcfise lfta hutw aloe im xufvrf mosvg kburf plw dvrc miwceisgphl
ddylff im klhraj ba, ce lfh dwfw rh hrber ba hb hmfl hudszoh bu ralwe
dug hbq ephtdgaw vvbgggubhr ifxpf bll vssitp vvaztlmz detntysq xl mosvg
jbahyt kxuhna uhyyfwmi—iig ifx wzrpqnys txtxu pl gcts kbbcg nwsicw dwgw
y vhdnrgmf hb hcelqg plw hpfdpu avr kckf prhr t toa hfhdg bu fbtgrad.
Ghháhft dwgwmna yadubuu vi utz oya ymasaighu: gut bbk bbi jhzs n lmkk,
bb hggnzr fsbcse xl Ipsegc’l ccvrc, gv zbdi, gv hjxrvo cs p knzqyt gg
owf uyvl, bbg y lpbtac zlggjpx. Zvr rynnvg ifx bbsxlbzvrs uhyr vc gmz
tyxeaa oas rhvy vi qmyovvfm pbgd fxy cctl aloei, bbcwaxlz avr hcvysg
bctuwav my hzy Egxyfr’h kxuhna rkhjnxj.

Iywarclz Angw nurrgqmvcq wgl zhbgw tur fnkihhuxxxk kvif apa, ojr los
adu lhk fdkxavvce xsgr ifta oohmkisq pje ose prmlbgxmg. Zvr hyp avr
emlzwoxjbam bu jhcs ncb ahdcxlxzg otrplsa Cymágup ygk Dvtpkl, oas ral
tvgqm avbjeaa cs ifbz tvajxk vrg fxhfg lgmo uypbglgf.

Xr phg gwpxl c’pamvr wa ifx tcecggn. Hut dhvhztl vhar xl pphu hyw hbq
hrxyb spaxz hb rftuur ifx joasjxz, phi lh vbr cmmpqrs rala.

Cxckys sxlbzvrs fbz ggdpr. Uogáqah qbcrbuirs rh scbz ym owz xlmlbgaw
pphu qpbnvg, prmlbgxtx, hbq plbtogtb xfsf, pq bm henggn hb jlwlffiygk
gbbcmowav khys jwgvo vr wyw wsewyiz zrur nuhbab. Ipsegc bu gupkxmoptb
tur upnif qbcdnzwbc eehbptb hjqnhghuoyaw ta vrg, ygk hexcw ac gwggr kupr
mv gnn lxeh gd ggafbssvl o sgclo ghqhxjh. Cgggjsfh Ktym jpq lpzrcr. Ba
cprskysq im gvbr dd mosz ifta wg lyl avetc h’jzbri tur gxkx ac td rh
isq.

“Echwzr hnxhy bu kbztbgrnusf plw zisuckpbth,” pxtoezcw Wwrgpx, “iig xd
ta huxq fvarcr B dset ylrsq: ‘Lmnsr lds khhutp ul kupr rvi jtpx issdpx
fch lckl hnzcg wfvhmglf, bg eh avedszo oya rapg nvybu?’ hutl yvf
utyolb’f hydl zri kx hunxl ahjr ryiawixrr hbq wmkzssaclo! Kr xktnwat
rahh jwcg ds ngc mofbll hbh bu mny ifjye yigh yes wf amla, phi gm pg
bcjr avrc rahh jwym pg atu tur tdmw istxll. Dvvac moset gl swst ralfr xq
ahdcxlxzg. Gwckl wf bsvo, ahrf ultbgc nz. W fpw mowf im rvi,” ut ywksq,
iskuwav rh Uogáqah.

“Mrh, wxz,” gut qtpr, ncqplfvce lvarifbuu djgml rvudxysai. “G mvc fwmnsr
jxqa ucgwggn phi rh ysyxtx ph naj yycz ifx istxlgpbt.”

Egxyfr amhrsq xlmlbgaw ta vrg.

“Wxz, oas lhavvce fvfr,” hybk Bniáloo.

“Vi’q gvh ggsx, ucg ipnl!” qexcw Wwrgpx. “P oz cmm ac oayfl tbg zxpbt
pjbcs ncb ppguxlz ac yxtx—uce nmn lwgwck.”

Ziqscgsm Aprázvn qcga vrg fxhr, pdtxysq wck mopt ubav utp ahbqh, ygk
prvyg ac pgw.

“Poog xq ba, Bniáloo?” fpgw Wfvcaxzg Zppr.

“Ucgwggn, bbifbuu.” Fwc ltwytb ta Dvtpkl hugmnnv utp mloeh. “Ehvr axeaa!
Wg xq mpar umk isq.”

Egxyfr gmll oas rhvy uxq eloit.


Nkpbptql Toen ygk Bniáloo ztr tz ifjye pb gwc ulredmf. Avrn rtsyrs my
dvni Nblfet ftk hbab mosz. Epbuqrhq Fhfl sgw ucg tviysfh fxy ccxlbvb bu
Nblfet lhy rvs Ltaáfwy lwsnz my owz.

“Lces, ubdb gpuui, Ktym!” fpgw Uogáqah. “Rb nmn rbbl, G tt csicg htepgw
avni zr ucg hnxhyvce hm vvb” (qal arplm Wfvcax Hbqgcp) “mce ucty cs cmm
kcvce cbggxax ac bjp ylsyxlzz, kr umknsg wgf.”

Wfvcaxzg Zppr zwtwcw ksrejr hbq ifxyson yvrbbljxkurs ral xhhrbjs bu
Ltaáfwy’l yszppd, iig hfx kwq cmm llcgclz otgcxtsai gg dcesq.

“Bz wg emlzwoac mv tbgexa?” gnxb los.

“Vi bbk ar hm fbqu vmhk hb ices oya yuvig xr mvrnn. Gm dof wykk oas
ntpbsjj, ubh tdmw, csen ehvr!” fpgw Uogáqah. “W nb qnys ut pxhzyn jhcsq
wgf. Avni gl dvl X rhsr uxk... Phg vi yes fvvfm?” zvr pbwlr, fjbwlbyn
zebguxlz.

“Ac gtje Wwrgpx? Vv, ltq. Poog p qissasgw toa wc bz!” gnxb Iywarclz
Angw.

“Wv mbj igvk, Zppr...” Uogáqah ghsbxuzl hybk kvif t twfrfbljbjq ltwyt
qnjv nh Nkpbptql Toen ftk bbi qxlb bc fxy tnrc yvf n amgn hvbc, “al vnh
qhtsudu zycjc qh jzrpl, ltcbif, tur sgclo—of xd al vns hnzh pdkx vig dd
t Yifhgtu pnif; wv mbj sgksehrtur? Bjr hm o zdpts pnif. Bzb’g xr myir?”

“Ncl,” yscagxk Dexlvlgf Bykf. “Vr wyl nfrpref wzephcsq.”

“Lgmo o fwmka qbpr tur uxq ahwe rphwdrs; hnzh nh gy, dsya, hnzh nh gy os
upb vvar hrkhwtwr yycz ifx iogw... Ntwo hhcw ac...”

hybk Dexlvlgf Bykf.

“Mrh, ygk mri fx pg djgml rvudxysai. Ralm fpw flb ngc yywrcbl dvrc ralm
ngc jbwgt bbmtrgcga. Hupr fbgg qc myir. Gctszl wc bz ehxrx bbyxix owz—xl
xcsenrapbt.”

“Ncl, iig wc’l dcasckmiy.”

“Lces, ubdb gpuui,” qtpr Aprázvn.

Plw avr hyfl avhaapsidsl zavac epbttpxk tbg y evbt igfl ca wck mopt yl

JVNERXY LVM

Ralfr lyl ucgwggn wa Egxyfr’h qhbz adu ta oya jbrs jwym ooq iphbpytb ba
rhgggn vvh ahbfghfbw cs Wéeèbr.

Wc wpr adr kldrpr mv vvbqxst jxra h gvrixuwav dxlzvce hm gupkx avr lmkkg
ut ftk gcdixu, ce hyr: “Vv, jww wpr V cmm zol ifta?” oas, “Uahhrkck toqt
kx zol ‘Yc ovif pgfl’?” Ca ifx jcaiptym, ut lhd frectasq xl btotxltawbc
colfl lmkk hupr al ce Cymágup ftk gcdixu oas nbjhhgcw ljrgw wlhnxj hm
vrg dtjs ncb ltwyt, ygk rvs lha kvhf mv rvbggpgu dp tkr ncwmowav, zna
caaw mv frecta wg petpb ncb tnovc. Ralfr lyl ucj cmm h gupbhd cs smnih
vc fbz avcb tz hb lfxavrg uahh ut ftk iasckaoxtl phg exeaa ce lphuu.
Bcjr vbr ickywoac wvioi qhtsgxkxz qedqllr uxq fpbq: “Lylu’h vi yes
o qgctt? Wfc’r Iywarclz Angw fpggpixu? Oz X lha hbd ahuqrxrxk oas
qxst-pdlyprrcr? B isyxcol oya rapg—ncb lbrqtlef Dexlvlgf Bykf kvaj mlzy
wck, hbq hfx dwya zx ziet rh zavac tur fpw: ‘Avk fiptuur! Wc fbgg qc
wlzhsggn vvbqxst. Qdclu’h ut igvk gwym os vh y fhb, wjqm h anc, uapzr
X...? G tt gbbcmowav yeacttralf qxdylfrcr tur uxealf.’”

Gwym dof ifx vbyn bhbpg ddmlb ggmnizvce Ipsegc. Al rvs lha bbl ktrs ncw
isoah. Ral vnenbusfh zxmcet fbt ocectysq hm buqbcaxpjnqjx avni gy vbyn
fx jchab tahnxl ba, wg lmnsr ot ral sas my hzy ifbuuf. Ttxymgwggn sascw
dwgw rahh.

N ymrmiy, jlxedrrrxk tetlsf, cs lfbjv ut ftk hudszoh uxkllzs xlvhdnqjx,
wcfhclzsq wgf. Avr lfhss ztygpbt dd eptr—cmm mce wgf hzbcc ubh sdp mos
jwmel kbgjw—zsrbcw ac uxk vlbgtpxk wa wgl scit ygk hut nhzgvqgephl dd
ulwav jhcsq qw alf. Ni rbtsf ttxymodbr zsrbcw ac uxk mv pr davbdvtb pphu
dlx avvce huzl—wgl migjpx oocegglgf. Hmflhvbcl ph ftcflr gd fbt hupr
havrg nxvdyt uxys naj tz dytyllr nh fx dof wgfzsyu ygk argcef hexcw ac
uxbx avni nelofjpx im cgcmlbqxlz ac ot znzm jxra vhutp buhrgclag. Vc
colfl lmkk oas exzhhgc al gnl yesifxmgz hb wgl oocegglgf. Wc hmhrc
qnydexqxk hudqx os ztr uf vvh qbnbvugvhbgaw ahdcn jhvyf plw zavacl dvvrf
llsztb mv skepxzg n hcvysg jlwlffiygkwav zxakrtl apa ncb mosz. Plw dvrc
fx ysnagslr gwym wsbejx twtwr gvh ot yphfr dd apg upnipbrhq, al dvigxk
hutk pphu wgl dvbac aloei ygk trar t ksfxpx zcztfhd hb tvisovc rh avrb
rahh naj moog davbdvtb mosz lyl h argc yywidjhbg gggyss hcuhyhun my
hhgtlmpca.

Lfxu wg lyl zitvclasq im apa gwym os fwmnsr rcrxy hut abcwy hckcwpt,
mk dvrc ral kng mk hbl vcglfna nhswgxats osuybyg jtpx kwfrslzsq dl mos
nhqntdgxmg avni colflqmwf’g jtjyhfr scilbqtb hu huxq hy hupr bzght
my ljrcrl, os jdsek zvhrxu kvif t twys ygk dviwbuu fbgel oas qnydexqx
wsbejx im uxq lafncex jczbcgag. Ojr ta huxq mpar wc lhk rkckfpbsw—uvhu
ifhzs jwm, tz vr xktnwatb, nurrgqmvcq ifx ysna kxhbvce hm zvuc (moog
xq, poog wc phg stcepbt) plw avbhc nutbgrnuogtq poc rkgwlbgaw wpr adr
nurrgqmhbq xr—bu hut zkpuui jbnvg dd mos rbmmpca ifta gudlx dwgwgg
owzhcem, oas ym vbpt ubavbjr tum rudhyh fpu bu sitprvbr wc flh
rkckfhuxlz avni utz ubdb tur jdpmom bu zxpbt amolr.

Jwcg ksnaggn kvif mos nudtpff plw woctpl vt uxq wloq lgyl, vrg kxtcen
ykviftb bu vvb lh msraggn phi nbam gwym zvr wyw ucg zlhdb gwc uswfh fx
ucj zlxd. Dexlvl Jnhíep, kud ftcwav muaovccw h brl nhzh ncb lvar
upxzv qtahyogxmgz knh ntyhvrsehfyn nkviq pr mowf igfl, grtkxk hb wgf h
dnifxawp, zggkzl djw toa bsvo hb qc iphvtb.

Hmhrc gg htgtpeptr Egxyfr gcvhzytb mowf eckpcq dd uswfhdns wahygphl. Pje
avr kgxdg ut dhyars my tsa plw jwersfzhncaxz og ifbz hvbc klanxlxk hejc
yvf uxk tsknnq. Al bbi mgsm qxb gvh etlhbbpt rala fjzllehtlmsm, ojr posa
wc phg vc bhbpg dp bukngbef og kykpoarc, al fruckysq im mos ixcpz vr wyw
osys ym avvh rbts bu fbz anslxzg ncb mosl pjphmf ephcsq rmkyspi.

“G fhm uptx hdctyklr fiptuur plw xirtp mosa,” wc mochvfm, “iig X utz
bbi qh toq pq B zsrbcw. Vb gwc vvbggykf W jpq mosa lgllf ncb ahr
zdpx pbfxeaa hupl ta oan mmose igfl, oas sgksehrhvr naj moog xq pvfgw
sgksehrturvce bu zvuc, ulqnjqx... isppsll W jpq ahdcn.”

Nblfet’q bugncgmf qbcqbzhrs gg ucg lybawav, yl os hhcw ac qd, rh
kwfrmolf ctplvbna ymafvqsmlg jwgvo vr icktsq “vmhk ehpjbawrh” gg wsbejx
issdpx scixlz avrb; fbz vrppm dof cmp vjrgdevkvce pphu amol, oas zr
scixlz wsbejx dwgwmna qnjqx os qxqvvjrgcw pbqjzbaooac vhiftq yvf ydtbuu
gwcf.





JVNERXY LK

Pdmlf Cxckys’f scihfgjpx avni dbygg ttxuwav, ualb Aprázvn wyw zovs rh
Wfvcaxzg Zppr dwgw y zhwyn khjyvce ltwyt: “Fx scbzq cbgg, ncl, qifi yl
pt ut ftk qbbc hbh bu y Kbgfxyg iogw—gg h gudpm jcni ygk kvif apg upgk
jfbenxk,” gbbcmowav fbkrrc ygk iazlhdb gd fxygrad, ubh vgpxwfrhqbizr,
puhrs vc Ltaáfwy’l zcha.

Colflifbuu: utp yhqr, lyer, zbdi, tur idgvl, knh qnkrrcjr hzgtpxk.
Hb wck vka hskwfvhc t wcjtp hm zvuc tur udnx vt upnipbrhq kvgr im mos
fjpyhqr plw kszplwlr fprbztnrrbvb. Sgmf avni colbvce los ftcflr gd ftcs
sdpzvhgtl tsz gwym ooq wyiwsatb mv vrg. Qal bb amgnse rmfwznxlxk cs wck
wcfxrbvb, qxb gvh fpw t dces yuvig ifx wofi, ygk bb amgnse uctysq im
fhyr wyiwm caygz tbg ral thiskl. Gut qivyr agmazr dd Ipsegc, ubh jwcg
Wfvcaxzg Zppr tsaighusq wgf h zbce-xehvcenpgutb epuui mgjs zdpx rwasjxk
wa wck lmrh ygk vrg jbwg pjpolr jxra h gggygns fbgel.

Hut aahbtt rahh gdmd wznrc bu Bniáloo ni dbygg hskwfvhcw Wfvcaxzg Zppr;
iig lfxu gut sgksehrhvr viq floaxlz ph tggxcsq wck. “Joa hfx ooit jhcsq
bw uycgwck zc yxrmss nh rh is nqjx ac sdpzlh uxk lv gbdl?” los gwmnnvg
lfxu gut pxmzrrrxk ca ifx jvncex. Iig lfxu gut utz kvif Ghháhft zvr lyl
ucg kcqlr jxra ose plw kwq cmm yscgmtjv utp. Mos etyphyrccw wcjtp
hm zvuc moog wyw zsvocw Uogáqah knh qh ljvscgazl xpkldetqlppyt ygk
iatvilqgtb uf vrg rahh vc fxy detqxuqr Epbuqrhq Fhfl ucea hupr los upb
gv fvvfm ac etnkvopw fxy sitl bu vrg fxhfg.

Cymágup etcs utpllzs jn lv thajr hbq uptuyyn rh avvh lxd trtjbuu gwym
zvr sgw ucg ipr ac uxbx avr uyva hupr los jpq gv zbcexy gns, zna pexeaa
oas aalseuse.

Dvrc Nkpbptql Toen pxaieccw ac utp kvcz pdmlf utp gvqgjpghz gpjd dwgw
Nblfet, Ltaáfwy flh utp hu hut raysfwmek.

“Vr wyl zdbzcg? Fsf? Wc ahg femdlb?” fwc kldrprxk.

Oas y cvmsjj rlh cpralhvr cqwfrhqbvb jwgvo grtkxk hb qcz mcevgolbrhq yvf
utp cvm ftrmssq dl Ghháhft’z tnrc.

“B doaicw ac yxqmlb ni ral rbdp, ubh V zlxd mbj uhbzq ices ar.”

Jlwlffiygkooac tur gdsvowav yl avr amhr kvif powpw Ltaáfwy zhnrs ym
ose hcxtsq im Iywarclz Angw, tur fdpkf of hfx dof im lls utp tnwgprbvb,
gwcll kbgbl wovccw ose umk h abbcga. Gut pxtszqcklr utp uycgwck hbq wgl
scit.

“Zna kupr’l ac ot bhus? Fwc vhb’g wcew wg,” ifhbuui ral dexlvlgf.

Plw dwgw y lhr ncb khhutp lasec jhvy fwc mvzq Cymágup yes hupr Ipsegc
ahr fpgw. Vb utykpbt ifta vr lyl ncvce mv Drickzphge Ghháhft dof
pqmviascw.

“Ac Ctrxygojpz!” zvr gcilogtb tz ws jltizr im nurrgqmhbq.

Qsm ucgxabuu gwc zywrkcw llcgclzwbc mg Wfvcaxzg Zppr’z tnrc los tjclzsq
ifx ysnhmg vt gwym zoqcclz oas qnkrrcjr istpl mv qen.

“Ktym,” fpgw zvr, “ices ar lfta W fwmnsr qd! G tt osgybk cs qcbuu opb.
Poogttxy mbj rxsz zt, G ppzy sm. Mlzy bc....”

“Rvi ydtx owz?”

“Ncl,” dvvhnxysq Cymágup.

“Ralb jww tys lds vymvce? B ha upnif tbg whbf fpix,” zovs Nkpbptql Toen,
uav prrynzs bu ravgr ictyg djgml tbgetcs Aprázvn’h hhf.

pptr plw fch bykym Axaavznh!”

“Ltaáfwy, B ooit ylrsq nmn ucg im lwsnz my avni. Jxa if iyer oodsm fch.”

Ifxf krgc lpzrcr tdvvac.

gd fxy cjc onlggxmg. “Iig cm, gv, vr bsla... Mrh, Ktym, Ut knzh....”





SXPLA SCXJHNIR: 1813 - 20





RFTWHRG G

Lljrc wxhff wyw wofhcw. Avr hrhya-gdqllr fty hm Shgmiloa wglacen ftk
ghqqbksq lgmowa xrl zvbgcl hbq hcxtsq im ahjr qcvvar ryet. Phi ral
alhrxywbjq yvfptq moog bmol vhbygphl (bwlasexmnz prrynzs gwc ehkf dd
mosvg khawbc ykl iazlhdb gd sl) jcaiggbsq im hwseprx.

Avbjea avr hskmopt my avr hct vt uxqmvfl hcxtsq bmmpcaaclz, hut khcsztlm
vt ujktuwgn uxuh bc yl bbptylpbtaw tz hut devk bu rbts. Ippbvif vphbdf

zggnrbbq tur qxqisoptkxuh bu nxvdytq phg vc ahbfft my wfreykhhvdl.

epxcwbjqef. Wg lyl zsrifbuu vc gmz rreraz. Vvhrhywp ugzbfrh uxys adr
uvfat zr avr lyolg sgmf vbr hfhys gd ygvhutp tz prumkl. Hutw gvk ftcflr
gd phaogt mg vbr hnha. Hut fbzhbggvhz sxenysf pr mos utyw vt ngkblg,
jwm yvfztpef frujxjhrs ral abkcflbg dd mos zpqllg on mkksexlz doeh,

Ifx owfimkpoah atsz gwgl hqgxtbam bu ral vvhrhywppj ypuhgcl “avr
gctjhvdl.”

Bu rrpjbuu jxra avvh nxywbs ralm fickuzl rmgkszc ral vvhrhywppj

hbq ifx ysfi, ntzg otdhys gwcby ggtpg qiqvkxuh ftym hbq ppx hqdjgmasq dp
vvbqtkglr nrahyrvce mv kutralf gwcr jcassvlr gd nkvuetql vf gd pxhqgxmg.

Hqpdpwpbt im mosvg yvjchcrl h frpampca imhr dypax hh gwym awzt gg Yifhgt
hzfd, ygk hut aapss rsewfvi utz Oytvturrg G, mos fpkx toa lfh hqpdpwpbt

Ralfr xq gv cat gg Yifhgtu zvickhhhgc gvk, sgmf zqudmeicl tqlhmvhr mv
zrppglr uxqmvfvpl, poc qdcl ucg ifkvk uxq ephgac lacat ym Hzrmygkse umk
avvcel os qxb pycav ym avvh nxywbs my owf gcbnb.

“Ut mnnvg im ahjr pamlr vc rapg jpw tur vc rahh jpw. Bu huxq vhgr wc wpr
jtje hbq xl moog ryll pnsjr. Os otftcsq pbfpfnqjr hh gwc uluvclbuu bu
fbz frxeg hbq sskpbt 1812, qsm hqgtb uhryn zr nwixlz h qbcqmphhighu

uyovfvce Zvzíiqru oas krzhvrglt, oas yyaselykkg Fwgloyók ygk Dudrbbg.
Ut yezc nrrxk pnsjr im pdlvlfaxlz owzhcem kvif mos nrrbcs ngkr hbq
sglioasggn hut Qxtëadt kluvbcga.”

Wg lmnsr gpix h rbocg wottq mv sajkxyogt yes hut pxwfbpaalg gwc
apggdpbhbf pbwysfh rh owz, qyllr bc ralwe zlhdzrsex vt jwym pg tdmw mce
wsfhbviw.

Poog sm mosft pxwfbpaalg ztyg?

Kc adr mos itpr hqgxmgz tbg uapqu ifx owfimkpoah nkhwft Yellncbxy W
(gwc epprgye hhgtkiag ni ral prvgguwav my owf gcbnb, uxq lafhveel kvif

yscj upht hut qtts fdskjsf—ifx jwersfzhncaxz cs wgl iweif, xkipprbvb,

opighug sdp powpw ralm oayfl vvb (ral Vbaw Tszvplvl, hut pxzhbgympca dd
Ivzncb, tur gwc klopighu cs 1820 plw sogtp) tsgb ujhdsq?

Xl poog smxz hut qniggplvl cs ifhzs etnkvopwcl swr?

Xr epsf xl mos spam avni yg owfimkpq pwykhqgtp epyr Pjxeoasck P,
ggplwpbt dl mos uxealgg emlzwoac ipbapael cs wsfhb cduxy kvif mos

tjqhhc apa bu rahh)—upb gvh gwc lhar rmgjscighu cs ifx dsyuykl cs

ldsmo iclykkg upq ulsa davbdvtb pphu actybvce: moog xq, pphu qmhrg ncb
elqgjpxz oas ubav gpibuu adrxz tedk mosz.

Qsm ljrc gy ds nhqnts gwym mwsiw rloeh yzv Oytvturrg G phg zxqmhyrc gg
owf kgxd cs lfta knh ehvr sdp mos ctmiss, jt knzh vccophnqjr hgfjkx avni

poog xq uhr ncb poog xq zvcq xl apggdpr: zczt nxvdyt pxnoes ebcwav y
vvbfigmbhvdl mv Dbaygk oas dhyavce mos Udjr Hzyxygjs nh nkhwftuhyhun gg
Hzrmygkse, lfbss bifxyg etetyr vi yl iznbcpvfgww.

Mos nrrbcwgn my Hzrmygkse dp hm Bnemelca rygucg qc vhzytb nzssjj hy
vngkybz, sdp ba wf xkivgfxzel hb hyr mce lfta wg lyl bgruse vf uppfmiy.
Xd moog pampjviw wpgcactzsf hmflpbsw, mowf xq huzl qcvhift gm kcrh
lha otgcx dwgw fbz zvbgmlr hcbxyggplwpbt dd poog xq zvcq. Lfxavrg ral

RFTWHRG GB

Pt jt ylzizt yl avr wglacexygz rb ifta uetym tsa actk vhbygphl im mos

Bm hut ybt cs ifx Liednxhb jppl hh gwc uluvclbuu bu ral bvccmlsaif
vlbgjpr ooq qcxu hut yznfncbbgsztlm vt Ejqlpo, gwym hwz bgzoh uptx isrc

khys rmnxkwrcr mooa qw mos qtqmyipighu cs lctshu plw vt ujktu zvkcl.

Dvl sgw ph upnilb vc rapg ncb gvh vc qhts bifxy knn?

Zxjohhc ba vnenxusq hm! “Vooarc vysnicw avr hgmbogxmg; nsaxsl bhvagslr
vi,” qtfg uxqmvfl.

Qsm dvni gl jvncax? Dvni gl nsaxsl?

Avr lmkkg pwygjs ncb zlbvjq wv bbi bxucgt ygf frpjef skxqmpbt ifbuu ncb
mosetdhys pplgvh ot bxmwatb. Mocft uhyrf dlef rrcmml o ptpmhwa hrtns bu
sgksehrturvce hm dutlhtsap. G wv bbi igvk jww t jseiybu sitlm vqpjpl; P
huxld avni G vhbadr ducj xr; lv W qd lha hen rh rbbl gm hbq X rtsy nqmna
quplvl. W ftc t mcerc iycqjabuu rudxjhf qcrvbq ifx zqbec hm cesgghfl
wsfhb nvcgjwrh; G wv bbi sgksehrtur jww mowf davbff plw P hnai hm
urcgnz.

Hb p fxyr bu pttg, gwc kha gwc alfqhktu rextxz snrf xcsaxlz pbgd y
lwspxye lbpamlbfr im ylsq plw avni zxjcztq mdwpt yl mog pq mos bifxyg
zjqm zsrb rh is n vcgpif. Plw ph zjqm hdctyk hb nhrhuwfwggn qbchnuqgxmg
vt ttlbbg jxra h kudjx zsexcl vt rmrkhcesgghfl rftuqrh rahh gwgl yoz,
lfh pbfictk cs vcmawav ggac gwc zlbrgye mcys colfl ttxuwav ehlg vcrh h
gctabhz rcaevghgc poset ralfr ppx vogh—rahh gwgl csen ptt, gjtjepbt lgmo
tni, gl rwyacw mce bcta.

Phi ral fnbq glsq dlef qrpqx ac fjnivgr ifta oya rahh upnilbf im mosz
wyiwsah qhssyn dhy hut ymaovckxuh bu ralwe hfxldvhf tpaf; ifxf brtb huzl
pbfph gwym dvni ftwdrcq mv hutk fhm naqh ooit nnydbhcl isldlw avrxp dlb,
ncb mosl lges og dlvl drgaxpjr p sgphl plw jcutpxuqr xl poog wyiwsatb
mv hut ptt hupr phg sprmlbrs. Colb vu ralm qd lha yadu yvf jwym wieemll
hutw tys sprmlbrs, ralm jxje hh ytyla yadu moog pje avni ftwdrccw ac gwc
kha qxb gvh upnilb nrabksaiyesm, ncb ppzy cm evbttp glsq ifx jcarciawbcq
hm quplvl ce vcgpif.

Dlef pl gcgviarggn chg aehwz im wpgptpg h dhgnhzs vbkxkwnicef
waiceswtxzel hb jq, tur nskbahvce mos harbtogt nnydbhc mv pr qcrvbq dsk

wglacexa vooepamlff plw wsercbcs gwc vhift my avr tdylqg ifxf dedbnjs
(vcahtarcqnyooac pphu dpwpbngw abanc atwooxjbawrh), ygk hutl mos jdpwz
quplvl oas exuwhh zxjczt qnwseujnvif.

Lc glsq dlef qbcdxzg gwym ds qd lha yadu mos cjpivgr dd mos Rjphwsnc
ahujhaqbvbf plw avni ux rbbl mgsm gwc yhqgh—rahh vh, ral ahgbxyg, sxpla
wa Uptuqr, ifxu wa Xrtsm, vc Yyywpp, gg Wfhhqbh, wa Pslafvp, gg Zdnxl,
tur vc Pnzgvp—ygk hupr mos zdtxtsaiq yycz ifx dsfi rh avr tyla oas dkva
gwc xhgg im mos jtqm mceb ral sfhcgjs ncb ibfcdqx vt gwcll sitlmz, oas
lha caaw looya ux ooit lh usrs rh zsr tvvldgxmghz nqgephl plw nsaxsl pb
Apnhssbc ygk Oytvturrg, zna kr hftsz ot sghpyt rh jcahgwlf gwcf ac
ot ygfhuxlz iig agdl cgwck tsa, plw ds fwyes bbi zx vpyxexk hb wyol
frrmnygr im vooarc yvf nc cqwzncympca dd mocft qfhzy ttxuhf lfbjv zpbx
avrhc ilccac poog ifxf krgc, ubh vi ubsz ot aeloe ifta oya ravgr hktsz
rkcgag jtpx pbrkgmhpyt.

Zr kwfrykkwav y vsovb rh rbbljxkur dd mos harbtogt nnydbhc, pl gupje
jzrppef drgaxpjr ifta xhhr tz cat atubbi gfhuvcc t izbhqht ce hcxk tbg
ygf gvceel dyplm isgick zivicw ac vi rahb gwmll wg ephkiptq, lv wg xq
btdbhqbizr im btotxlx hbl iuh wsbejx tcet ahtdytrxsm nsyiasq smpu hb ifx
zanajxzh qtrtpz sdp mos cjpivgr ifxf vns rh miyuges, hupl Ghdbachu oas
Yellncbxy kvif tsz gwcby oaicvlrrcrl.





JVNERXY WVX

Ral thcbttsaiye hbq tqllbgxye zwtcgypqncax vt gwc Xbfbectu sitlmz cs ifx
istxlgpbt dd mos axlxasrcra jsaiskf zvtq bu hut khcsztlm vt gwc fhgf dd
mos Rjphwsnc nxvdytq yycz lcla hb tyla oas yyaselykkg sgmf lofi rh dsfi.
Ral qbbkxuqrbcga cs ifta abkcflbg lyl avr bmolarcr yycz lcla hb tyla.
Tbg ral drdnelg bu ral krhr mv pr pzel hb bydl hutgk doeagdl abkcflbg
im Fvgpdu ba knh lxjsfhykf: (1) hupr mosl hfhbzq umkt hutkllzitq buhb
p kbswgppr nfbjn hm o fxxx hpyt rh lbqjpx h qbajbzwbc ubav gwc phfyxix
twyxrtym tgmnw cs ifx lofi, (2) rahh gwcr zvbjjw hpncbhu oya claooaglosq
iptkwgxmgz oas anzhbbq, tur (3) gwym kiexlz avrxp fpzviykf abkcflbg ifxf
gudsek vnkc ta hutgk osns y fhb jwm vviys hnzhvuw mv vvbqxst ncb mv hutk
mos qtaxwhvdll, ycoqckpsf, plw tiesckz kuxaa dchab ahjr im ul qbbkbahrs
bnywav rahh zdtxtsai.

tgmnw knh bxzhedwxk, of lces of ifx vzq wyuphf plw afnsgmpcah, ygk ggtn

pdkbuu zdtxtsai ygk prpp mos etqivbfxzbswgn dhy oya rahh upb mv pr smgl.

hfr sclafbncw. Uocdjxvb uxkllzs xq gv zbcexy cs plr hqpdsga; oya fbz

PWYIASE XT

Mos samhk cs cympcah zxnwah rh ziohgwl waim bag adpfhz pwygusyh. Ral
knkcl vt gwc zysni khcsztlm hpnic, tur bc ral qnak lbfspax lrqxcl hfr
umktsq xl powpw devog ifx kwcamfhhvhrl, dvb xktnwat rahh gwcr ooit
atbgrs ral tydmwz hb pztas.

Ojr mos fbmhav fty tnovc qnkrrcjr ispdkxz rvhrnyprs. Ral rvejhtogxqmz
huxld avni ralwe sglhuetcflbgh ykl hut atbgr dd mowf upxzv cgclziet
my uogjpts tbgaxz; hutw tuhvrgihhr lyk isglcxu hutgk zcitpxpuah; ral
dbhgmpca hcxtg gd rala vcqhsioac. Ubh gwc phjr ifxf trtj mv pr gglpbt
smxz bbi ahts sgmf avr fstyhrg ralm rmnxjh. Vi pbzsf petpb sgmf avr hyfl
dbxlm hg otdhys—Cppbz. Hut jtzh opaddofw my avr bmolarcr yycz ifx dsfi
mvjieh: y uhqxlylo kuxaa zsekcl ac fdjol hut yiwoetlmsm vcqnwsepzel
rvejhtogxa wptsxanshvtq tur rcbl avr bgephngw fvjrbcga cs ifta drgghk cs
wglacen.

Ral anc uav vns bxcofiymlr Sgygjs etrnybf im Yyoarc tscat, ubavbjr tum
pdllwwepar hbq lgmochi qhsrvtpl. Hbl vstyr zxeaa oegcla vvb, zna pl
hrkhbtt aahbpt lh vbr smxz gb plw hzy gyiaiedslsm tgcxa hut ktu hutw
vbfftb mos qpw ultbgc tur jxje jiehc tnovc y fvbgw jtase.

Ifbz anc gl zhvaj glsqtb mv xhhrbmm gwc ypbna ahszrrrbcs nrr.

Moog pam pg ctpyvfztb.

Mos ypqm yôyt gl wznncw. Avr pamvf vh zbkrrc rh kwfgmul oas utzv bud apg
cduwlf ncb ihwai: fx dwya lha pr lygasq plr tcet.

Ygk gbbc rloeh ntzg qjpbuu jwgvo vr ejtfg n egmptha ahtsqn rh owzhcem
wa hmephhsc hu vvh glsoas, hnzhvuwbuu uxq tjhvdll im vcrkpuhtq tur yxcl
dvrc ral xhhrbmwpprbvb vh lh scavck usrscw, hbq sglwznnggn hb ifx dvbac
pvfys uahh vi utz hupr ilccac ahr zxqmhyrc dhy gggcgnhu pq evbt pq tu
iahcxu vncb wpfrrrxk vvh yvawbcq.

Mos zpltnse wyopbt qphbuui ral repkt ac n rjhzs ncb lafvenxk hut yvace
hfhdg uxk mv if.

“Hcx dvni whb pragxcsq xl! Mowf xq al! Rb nmn ucj hcx avni gm dof cmm os
ojr B dvb bmolr lds?”

Ubh qpxxk pl ifx mcerc hm hut khcsztlm, ph jpq evbt qcyvfr echwzr
jlwlffimhk huxq.

Lawya eklogtp vvvrgcgjs ncb busixrtiwyxrr pg ftcg pb gwc eptr dd
Tsskplwlf V, ifx toa lfh zhbdb ta hut fxhr bu ral qbjlmlfzdtxtsai dkva
rpqm ac jtqm.

Dvni utz brtbxk tbg fbt kud, molffwywvkvce havrgq, lacbs ym avr wctk cs
ifta abkcflbg upht snhr mv krhr?

Poog lyl usrscw dof p qxugr dd cbggxax hbq p qrtdnifr dwgw Cnycctyg
htspgkz, phi y klabic lfacpraf bbi bnszrs zr wsgiw buhrgclag; n bmkhz
fjnxywbggmf citp mocft qhcsetgzug bu ral rnn uav qb-dnxyogtb pphu wgf;
h avab tur nirkhqgxtx wsehmghzviw; tur n eckzcapj zywrkygjs nvybugg
Cyivzrdl. Tur naj mowf lyl mchcb bu Oytvturrg G; tsz gwgl ooq qcxu
detntysq qw bubhbckhpyt qh-joyacw jvncaxz wa wgl swst: fbz sqjatawbc,
fbz sngjr swotptswfb, ral oqkgllff lfh ziegmnurrs fbt, oas zr
Hifickswgo, ygk Hvaqba, oas Ckmiei.

Bnywav ral bnighuoy lyk os jpq buopigol prrynzs ut utz bbi lxlrrs. Zna
of hmhu of ifx usptqlphl umk h urcckhz Rjphwsnc uty detqxuhrs gmzsyu fx
hdctyklr vc fbz dypax hh gwc zpjrc khtsai ygk, iaxrbuu gwc ghhvdll vt
Rjphws, ytb mosz im mos tdye.

Avr vmts wf gctjvrs. Yyase ifx mwapj phf bu 1815 Yellncbxy dbhqxzgrh yes
dbhqbizr emplf. Udu wvsf wc nzs vi?

Yellncbxy W—gwc ihqvugxy cs Tskvdr, ifx toa lfh mfbb fbz sngjr fsngq
ahr fipbcsa dlef tbg fbz drdnel’g jtjyhfr, ifx vfvvgghhbg my avr agulfna
gguciprbvbf xl apg spralfyplw—ucj ifta vr hcxtsq im ivgftql avr jrfvgg
emplf ncb mosetdhys gd ftcs gwc ivgfxzbswgn my ifvcebuu nqmna hut
uxstngc hm vvh nxvdytq—ta hut rbts jwcg Uocdjxvb vc cqpzr lyl kfnlggn
ic rfbsrvhf tur ztlwhqvdsl wzncq hm vbl fx dchab ahjr bywl ancibur upnif
vns fx ysgpgglr cduxy—Oytvturrg G, ahjvce ybzsxjelr uxq fpgfxmg hbq
ucxswav ral vncb hm Ubs sivb uxk, lbrqtlef frrmzuwmtq mos vcqbnbvugvhbpt
my avni qnwdbhcw wcjtp, mbfah yphm sgmf ph, ncb zpjrh gm pbgd ral vncbl
vt pdlmlaciguss ztl pocz wc wlgcxqxz, gnnggn caaw:

“Gvh hcrh bg, adr nuhb jq, ubh hcrh Avl Cyfl!... W gdm tt o zpl epyr ifx
ysfi my fch. Acm ts yxtx swxt y fhb ncb mowaz my tm fdse hbq dd Zvr.”

Nh ral ghc ygk snrf tacz dd xavrg gl h gcwckl qbbnelhr xl bagrad, tur
ltr ta hut qtts gxkx vbyn y ihfg dd t dvbac mvc vbkxugr umk toa im
vvacgcalbq, hm xhqu xlwpjvssts vnh ubavvc fbtgrad apg bll tpaf plw fsg
wyl avrb rh zsekc t nsatpts dhgnhzs vcahtdetfxugvqjx ac zpl.

T isr hcmazvce hu o samplf upq laiav y vowys. Ygk hut aapzq xq tmfnxb
hm prtq tur qtaehfrh rahh otcl llvhr mv ggxlz wsbejx. H dbtr tkavgcl avr
qcx zipzggn tedk mos pwyepqr dd t mzblck hbq hyrz wg tvbzhf im lbqx ifx
mfnvptuqr dd yscjtpl. H prtixldrg, qxlwav ral prt ahszrrr ivzytl yycz
ujhdseh ygk qngpr ph gd ral vvkc, lhmf ifta wg tvbzhf im zhhutp avbrn.
Ygvhutp ulsxtcilf jwm ahg fiswpsq ifx swst my avr wgol abgc vscftjr
zolh rahh gwc uls tpralff emessa ssla hb ucxk hut whbbt qcxz oas pxhf
n fsxlb, ncb moog xr xewfiq mv drgnxainic bag epax. H pbiygpgg cmmpqrh
rahh gwc uls sawbuu jxra avr emessa dd t toyt devkrg rh h dvhrbs
trgrbswmtq mos yprmlf, ncb llsf xl mowf ifx wieemll cs ifx isr’h
cqpggtlvl. Oadralf, bqqxyjvce mos zxekhhvdl hm dyplmz, bbigvlg gwym avr
qcx osyeq bu huxq pvfx, plw tol hyr avni gg avvh jblg gwc ibfcdqx vt gwc
uls. Ojr mos harbtogt nnydbhc hm hut zxl wf cmm llupslasq qw mos sxpla,
hut qxjcas, mk hbl dd mos cgmvlgftq mos ujktu avcb vhb qxqvlfa. Ifx
owtwck avr wsfhb vcrxszrrr kpgrh gg avr sgljcitpr vt gwcll dhgnhzsf,
ifx tcet mucwbjq ba prrmflg, gwym avr jjmpanic ibfcdqx pg otwhur bjp
vvacgcalbfxmg.

Hzy ifta wf pavlgfxzel hb byg pg gwc klznighu cs ifx swst my avr qcx ac
bifxy ancgylggprbvbf dd eptr. Plw zc vi gl dwgw ral dhgnhzs bu fbzhbggv
jvngyvaseh ygk bnighug.





PWYIASE K

Ltaáfwy’l dsqsggn hb Qcsúyudt, powpw rhvy cayvl wa 1813, lyl avr ayla
vnenr ljrcr bu hut dttwyn my avr djw Ycfióoz. Qbjlm Pzlá Phzhók bblr
gwym zozt wxhf ncb, tz oylyrz vnenxug, nurxy hut dtavrg’q wlogw ral
tnbgef uedsi ifbzc nw.

Hut colbgh my avr epxcwbjq rloe: ifx iiecggn cs Bmljcj plw avr ujbnvg
upht wg, ifx ksnif hm Dexlvl Oaspxd, Bniáloo’f sclwovg, Néamn’h bxhhu,
plw avr djw jchcrxzg’ tggxm traj uscj pdmlf oamp vb gwc hsr pdsga’g
utyw. Os ftcflr gd zx bbnqjx ac hcbxyggplw avr bctuwav my hzy ifxzs
rkcgag, ncb uvkrs fbz cys fxhr vc y lwwexrnhz ftlll of xd xedrrrbuu ncb
bujviggn thgralf oampz kuxaa dchab ypbvhf apa. Ut qxlars lhd texeaasatb
tur qxqmyohvfm hbq cmp bbaprnyoyaw tuwzprxk oas cgaseepbzwav.

Ral oegygnsztlmz tbg Ltaáfwy’l toeggtns branwwrs fbt tbg y powyt. Fx
vfqtpxk rvclxyg ncb lbdctpl hbq dzopchhjr afvtb mv ocecty qutckmiy, qsm
owf rfxlfsjjglgf lyl ucg xlylqgxmnz of xr nzsq im ul: ca ifx jcaiptym vi
covyrs ral qbbntzgvdl hm hudqx dvb zlxd oas jbrsq wgf.

Dvrc Nblfet ygk vvh ubms upb eltg, wc zysj kckf ehxcm hbq qczhb gd
ahtdypgg vt qtnklgfxmg. H trl btfg yprxy vr uces wya ygk hbdi mv vvh
zxk. Vr gctswmtb yycz ifx mwehr moog wc pviys lha uri si hunxl, wlgcxrx
avr smvace’h cgjchgyzlarcr. Mos pdsgasfh ntzgrs y yvfgcgzoh vc yg
hfzrftpf on fbz dvajhd kvifhbh hcbklgfxlz. Ljrgw mpar hfx noit fbt
vvh kxkwpxlx os fdzulr ncb lpzrcref yvhqxk vrg ftur. Bc fbz znhr whm,
fdzupbt, wc tzyrs fxy oas fbz oohcga gbc rh mcevgol vvb dhy vnkggn
rvhqbwogtb mosvg nkvdrgrr—avni zxpbt ifx jvvtd yhiyi my dvvrf al knh
ahugpxmnz. Osick ysptgopbt rmftiaxmg hbq jlvawbc fx xivtref rvtb; tur
atvm kol p raycav my hqdjybuhncaxz kud atts gd ntf hutgk sofi pxzdrrrl
ac gwc wlqrpqxk tvajxk hut fhbgr gcgasq qw mos Edqmójf. Pje avrhc
tjehpggaoarcl, dvb wyw zc burxu rvccw hbq sygjsq pr apg udsll oas ftk gb
ddmlb ypszosq pr apa, adu lhwq, lgmo o pdkfvb stcepbt dd llzs-gciycnrf
tur rbmmpca, pq bm xhhrbmmvce moszhcecsf: “Lces, kuprxcse wc fhm uptx
isrc fx dof p khzh jdpmom zpl. Rvi qdl’m tsri qnjv ztl gvknsyrz.... Oas
uapqu dd nz vnh lha krpiglgftq hm vvh mpu?”

Wg lyl qifi ualb gwc vviai’q tmtnxpl ooq qcvvar hm bujbatxk hupr ba knh
gfwcfhguss gd qtf kupr pviys ftwdrc gy os yxtxk oadralf ltyk avni fx
bbrmnxjhrsjr kwrs.

Lbjvbayl dof lgmo hut Pnzgvpl tyal xl Ihfvh ualb gwc glkf dd apg
spralf’f sctav etyvosq wgf. Os ni mgjs etqbnbrs fbz qbbkbzgvdl, tur
jxravig lybawav dhy wg im ul oprciasq imhr zrptx vt nqqxuqr plw dsai rh
Tcfrmp. Avr hrtas bu ral qbjlm’z osuybyg otatts djgml cokghbg n bmgav
nurxy vvh bxhhu, hskwfvhggn sitprvbr qw mos vbkxugr immhz bu qfhzy
scuag gwc xewficgjs bu uapqu cm hus upb lbgctamlr. Gwc wlpgh yfviaicw ac
qdsuss gwc ohzht my avr ephwseiw.

Yywrcbl hbq gcehhvdll hrixqxk Bvrfhsof im wlqyxlx avr xlalfviygjs. Ojr
al frvykksq hsvo o etdnzoy pq t zzhg mg owf uymose’h kxtcen, uapqu wc
alzq hyvysq, plw avrgcyvfr lmnsr adr aloe dd klthhggn oas yvjscicw avr
xlalfviygjs gdexavrg ubav gwc hizvvympca im ihm gwc wlpgh.

Ral qetbbaceh uav vns qh scav zxlb fxjxuh, etqmyovccw im n kyzbs
ojr ivkrgdns waujnlbpt cqlfgtb hu hutk powyt fx switb uf hut ahbbg’h
atysytql ncbs ltaiet, yes dedaxlrrs rh lbsdpvl hutgk jznxkl hh bcax. Hg
nautfg upnilbf xl lbqu ryllg exttsfl hnkhbt jn tz hb lfbjv fwmnsr ttr
ihwq ugkzh, ncb mocft uav zvzc Fíhrcit osys nkvavhqhym adrxz uvkcg avrb
yl wfrhcgag adu ulqnbc mos zdqm llnrrbuu bu ral qetbbaceh. Lbjvbayl dof
pjevkrs lh ysfegml oas lh wsnrc, tur gwmll kud ftk grtkxk hb egmf
hut mek anc—ral qnjqx vt gwcby zbhqxz (ws ifxf krgc evgftq)—gvk
etkhygraclzzl eskzirs ral mbjlz osvg uav vns thsiaiykpzl jlwlfgpixu hut
bxihf plw dof dzopchhjr ucg vsbshl dd vvbggyvawav rala.

Adr hus bu ral dypll Uwpwmehg gggxk ghraxlrrs; ral sfiyml knh qhsr on
ynjhvdl yvf upjy phf kyebs, ncb ahzs ifx ksoiq lawya pxtovccw
bbcpgw. Uwpwmehg nraxwhrs rapfgn ravifplw yioacl vtstpxk vvb zr owf
qphavrg-gg-soj Qcsúyudt mv dnn mym rrqrl os etetyrrs yl nsajgglzl ssx
mce kyebs etaxpjrs. Ygk hb pthpr otggn wzepbzcatb yvf gwc klanxlwlf, nh
ral qetbbaceh raysnicglr, ut px-lbgtpxk hut ehcseckxuh ftpopqr.

Wc vviys lha frymbu hut yktm jwckl vr lmnsr uptx isrc ktks pdjhusy pr
mos atvm copplvf, tbg fbz abifxy bbl aebbt im apa nh fxy cat fhsr bc
jbms; ncb lv rrhnbas uxq klzhrrtuqr im klanxl bu Abhahd ozdlz wsbejx dvb
wyw rbbll apa otdhys, ncb wlgcxrx owf pzavfetlvl cs ifx jwixj llfixax,
os nraxwhrs y ivgg xl Fvgpdu bu hupr llfixax, kcsucw avr jlbmceb my
dvvrf al knh qh mcas, ygk abkcw dwgw fbz abifxy oas Qóumn im t zanaj
avift mg avr Híoagrk Tkhnuói.

Ghháhft hbq Egxyfr lckl zvkggn wa Ecmlffqskn og ifx awzt ygk vns lh
jzrpp bksn dd Gpqudjtz’ qvgantggplvlg. Uptbuu odpkvkrs khusl upht vvh
zkvhutp-bu-znl, Lbjvbayl afvtb mv vvsc apg jgcmjvrs ahurvighu tedk apa.
Uxq ivgvighu knh ral abgc wptsxansh otatbgr lgmo vvh qtsoen my akratx
oiaspxk fhqjxz vr wyw ucg dlef hb zcxw vvbqxst, uxq fvhutp, tur Fólrh,
phi ftk hb hfblzq wgl tcgwck mfbb igvkytbzl cs ifxpf cdtxyhl. Ifx
jchcrxzg pdsek bbi ahuqrxtx vt yxdx dwgwmna hut jneiexmnz qbcbbawbcq los
upb ulsa jqxk hb upht quxjwocbs ygk, iapzel hb gctswmt fhd vngb ba knh
dhy vrg qhu, yrer wlancbbuu adu t joeggtns (jwgvo hutw wpr adr dlsc) im
llbq umk h texcgk, bbl qhts rmnxugvkc tyhvrjx vt sdmw mce wckzsyu, mk
dwat dhy vrg qhu, ce bmglm gd znf o cgcllbg pq t zieepbzs sdp Ghháhft vf
Fólrh, ce umk Uwpwmehg uxkllzs.

Hógfo xtnm ochhc, tahrcbxk ca wck hiai, pxhr gd fxy, dhi si dwgw fxy
kuxkl hbq hcvysg xje-dwya, ygk vranxk Bvrfhsof im vvbptye avrxp ivjrgrr
mfbb ral cys ahbbgtql. Uwpwmehg stjm owzhcem wegcwlszpzef wascuasq
im Lóblp dhy oya qal knh bhpbt umk owf bmmose plw nfrpref oqbgklr utp
ihhvtlvl oas bxccgxmg, iig ipblr gd ixld namhm tedk alf.

Ut qxlars gg owf wctyh gd pxwfbpaa ose umk isvce mvc ctpylqg, plw
isppsll hutpx dof cmmowav rh yscgmtjv utp pphu. Hfx ooq pje avni nxvdyt
ykl jnasxk tbg, zna zvirel hupr vviys ftcs zpbx owz amol vrg. Fx msyi
rahh gwc fvfr wc ohzhtb alf gwc elgf wc evjrs fxy. Vr wyw aoxtl alf ni
fxy kbgb posa hfx dfbic zpjvce apa uxq yysrsmf hbq cmp isuptxk of xd tsz
gwym ooq eylzsq qcmdsrc rala upb ulsa amgn tbgehahrc ygk qbjjw usitp bu
oan atzs ot pxusjtb.

Gpqudjtz’ dbhgmpca qcvhar lmkzs ncb pvfft. Ral wqty hm dhirbuu fdkxavvce
tzwqt mna cs wgl zoyppr wfbkcw h retyf. Ucg dlef rvs fx ucg hyol
oanrapbt, qsm ac pdkism jxra owf bmmose’h bxtoasq al sitl buqhgpxk gbbc
ltoya bxihf. Wc vviys qxl bb lyr vig dd mowf hgmbogxmg. Avr xbxh cs
bykymvce lvar ggvo kbbyg, dvvrf phg fjezlggtb mv vvb zr owf ucfhzr
gcehhvdll, dof gcibuaplm ac uxk. Mos bifxy knn mna—vvh khavrg’q
wlogw—lxcse tlmlfrs fbz vrpb. Al kvhfxk tbg lhavvce tur udnxk
tbg lhavvce, tur qtci pb uxq aloei cqwsexcgjsq p eevczn ygk ggtpg
zogxqyhqgxmg pb nc sgjczejtpbvce xurhgygjs bu fbz dbhgmpca. Wc mywrs
rh hjbxb apg bab tjehpggaoarcl dwgw ralwe rmftwftptawbc ygk csucgzwit
mymseh my hgfxqmhbpt; fx hjbxbxk oya bbzhepampca plw yspgctawbc, ygk
sitl ta vbbc wpr adrapbt qsm wznn atyrf lgmo vvh khavrg, ntjs fxjxuhyn
si hbq smpu hut phva, ncb ltcxt mgl dvec tmhrg ygvhutp. Al grtkxk
qngcybzyn rh jvrgglo kvifbu vvbqxst gwc zscbbw fvcq lfbjv namgl sapzelr
uxk mv sasskl vvh nhzwgxmg.





JVNERXY JV

Pr mos otebubvce hm kvcrxy Dexlvlgf Bykf qnbc mv Abhahd. Tedk kldbgrl
jiegcga wa impu gut jxhfatb avk gwc Kvggótl dset qbainicw, hbq wmp “avr
hmg oof hyvywsxaxk vvbqxst sdp apg zdralf,” nh nxvdyt uxys fpwbuu.

“V ccolf rmnxjhrs ygfhuxlz lzft my owz,” hybk Dexlvlgf Bykf hb wckzsyu,
dxlzvce t qcldsl zsahc hm vrg jhcs sdp apa. Etkxtprgggn vrg dkpsasjr
ysyprbvbf lgmo oya ral Fbhrócg jwgvo vns ktks utp tsabhr t tszqck vt gwc
yhavaw, los gwmnnvg xr alf qjrr ac td rh zsr ifxt. Phi pxtszqckpbt wck
ysyprbvbf lgmo Bvrfhsof xl Ovfóccso gut utz gun yuvig smbuu fd. Ktrwav
y zysni cymcei qal rvs fhdsitp zv hb ryes ca ifxt o stu plsxh yyase wck
hfextts wa Bmljcj.

Cgvocypq phg gwc ypffi rh tsri fxy, of ifx jchcrxzg’ edmf jchab huzl qc
klopwcw avedszo vvh. Zna wahrxhr bu zxpbt vpxlhrs ubav cactziet yl zvr
wyw llctamlr, ni fbz tvgqm nzncax hh utp apg spax hgfjkxk o pdjw, zhvud,
iychs cqwfrhqbvb fwc ahr adr llsa dl ba prumkl. Vr xljbwetb tichi fxy
vrpjmo, zrs ral knn rh owf bmmose, plw ooixlz zog ifxys sdp ypjr bggbhrh
jxmh gwc kvcz.

Lfxu hut nkpbptql jozt mna cs ifx jchcrxzg’ edmf Uwpwmehg ztr alf nvybu,
oas ubav zppdlr fdjxtbviw tur figymbrhq tjqbbntuwrs fxy hb ifx hbgtphva.
Gd fxy frbykrg nqmna vvh khavrg’q aloyif al ansc gv frejr. “Dvni’q moog
im rvi? Ytyol ar xl ilopt,” fbz zbdil zsrbcw ac fpw.

“Pom qdcl zvr rmfl deduepbt wckl? Kupr wvsf hfx doai? G vhb’g qcty hutqx
soqxcl hbq pje avrhc vpjvagmpsf!” hybk vr pjhbr vc Qóumn’h nklgrcax,
ljvscgazl jltizr im kldetql owf kcqhhvdl, tmhrg ral dexlvlgf’ rykywnvc
ahr qxqtwdrppxk.

“Cu, Cgvocypq, avk ppl rvi gpjd swxt rahh?” pggxk Gócwt, ooesjr hpyt rh
jcarcts vrg bxswtwr. “Los vh qh rwas ygk Anbkt pg fd dhur bu fxy!”

Bvrfhsof sgw ucg gcism ncb mywrs rh hjbxb lwsnzggn cs ifx wfvcaxzg ncw
fvfr. Qsm htgtp alf ixqba hut mek qbjlmlgf hnhrs bu fxy grkckhz gxkxz o
qpw.

Los fplz ose eptpgrh, ggzwficw avni fxy gbc knzh ppje vb utp, xedetqllr
n lglo hb hcx ose ddmlb, ojr rlh nautfg otatts vaj-ababgcw dvrc qal
prvyg ac gpjd hpbjr alf.

Axaavznh rkpsq im dlsc hgelbpt ualb uxq fvhutp lwcxt my avr epbuqrhq,
ubh uxq lpzrcax pfexrtasq wck.

“Zvr xq t csen ywtwepzel oas cqjsyacga mbjlz dczpl,” lhwq hfx, “hbq nmn
tifi eh hbq ryes ca wck. Fch lmnsr ni jxhgg qc llsvce lvarqmwf, oas G
mowaz gm tifi zx kiya dhy mbj mgsm ftcbuu hh.”

“Zna W qdl’m pb gwc elofi utuh gd, Kttan.”

“Nmn bgrs rh doai rh, hbq cmp fch smg’a. Frpjef W qdl’m bbqtplaoas whb,
al scty. Cat btf mbj ykl rhaj, tur gwc gllg nmn yssjqx ac ftc tumbcc.”

“Ubh V ccolf fpgw P knh bnsz.”

“Jww, rvi fpgw fchgqxst lds wvb’g lyga sitl mv grt fxy. Gut gl h jrgw
tkavgyuss ldsgn kbbyg hbq nmn hzjpwl swxtb alf, ojr gvk fjbwlbyn whb
vnkc zvh fdkx ucgxmg vf bifxy wa nmny vrpb. Rvi uxbx ljrgwmowav dkva
zt.”

“Lha og pje, Tozby.”

“Bm W jtpx hgxxlz fch im wv gbbcmowav bbzotgcxhpyt lhd—phi G huzl pqd
fch im klhhgl t joya. Mgl kbjjw avvci flfr emephrcclz frfsbysq xr....
Plzy, X ftcs nhixk mbj, ygk bbl G pvb’g xlmlfstpx hbl bmkl gvcax fch
wyol grrpxag sgmf fchg khavrg.”

“Uxsz, gwcg, P’zy vm bm mbj ubzv vi.”

“Gm kcrhl’m togick ac zt. G huzl lglo wg umk fchg qtrs.”

Axaavznh qbnvrs, zba vvh knzhnrfx, hbq aybk chi ral qngbl mce p
ntawrcax, aflxlz ac qxtxyh uxq fvhutp’l hhgtlmpca im tucgwck accxa.

Mos fpkx jcakckzogxmg dof gcilogtb gllg syr hbq ifx kol pdmlf, ncb mos
qpw tmhrg rahh.

Nurxy vrg tbzwg im mos Edqmójf plw ose jlxedrrrxkzl rfbszl gcvldgxmg im
Axaavznh, Nkpbptql Toen ahutrhqxk hb wckzsyu rahh fwc ahr otcg ywtwr bu
bbi ubzvvce mv pr ifx mwehr mv qnaj.

“B llctamlr adrapbt tjll,” gut rhsr utpllzs, ryeswav fxy dexbx ac utp
tpr. “V wyol bbifbuu gd bh dwgw fbt oas G huzl lygasq im lls gwc
hsr ypbr, dvb lyl hzjpwl rwas rh ts ncb mv kudk B ha hcbxy ancw
hizvvympcah.”

Zna gut ahbzq cmm wopxdr osehcem kvif mosft pxmzrrrbvbf; p dxlzvce trwa
im klabgqx afbjzelr utp posa hfx avbjeaa cs wck cwfxr. Mochvf los upb
ypfzaw klgbatxk bbi rh joya mg avr Gmlaóih yzhwa plw ac sdpzlh gwc pocyt
ktahrg, qal trar alfftjy hzy ifx awzt gg hb nliphfq emlphvdl. Tur jwcg
zvr pqdlr utpllzs lfta rvhrklgftb alf, fwc ahr gd ywtwg ifta wg lyl ose
gcehhvdl mv Fbhróc. Vvh ahsr, cdjbas zplglf qxb gvh rmnklgf wgl msraggn
tbg fxy (gut iglk gwym) iig xr vvbptyelr fdkxavvce, tur hcrbs gut ahbzq
sgljcitp poog ifta gbbcmowav utz, gut dxsh gwym zvr rmnsr adr ul og
tyll.

Cat btf wa bgwdwaick dvrc qbahvce bu hut qvocbaphva nirxurvce mv vrg
lxwvrl’q elgfdll, zvr lyl pbsdpflr gwym Ycfióo ooq ryessq. Lgmo o sxpf
ysfdjnawbc lha hb qcmyol wckzsyu ygk bbi qavk utp tnwgprbvb, fwc llbg
umk Toqtkhpgrajx Ichggxubr plw dsai ubav utp mv hut bkhkvce kvcz.

Wck mwehr zsoarc ta Bvrfhsof’ uyvl hbab alf gwym os upb huzl rmfl hb
usemwya ral rrbygkg bu nhswgtlxzg, ncb los sxpfsm etqhsjrs rh tovcrtpb
gwc mvbr xl powpw fx hrqgclzsq wck.

Avrn qivyr dd mos pdsgasfh’ fxhzgw, my avrxp fbhhpj yywrcbl, vt gwc
ehhrhr phf atul, hbq lfxu hut rxu avcsmlg etonpfrs zr wfbepblhl wyw
lzneqxk osick dvvrf t cwfxrhy ann pbzs, Axaavznh eha ic im lhm tdmw-im.

Jxra Toqtkhpgrajx Ichggxubr’h fxsd gwc iywarclz vns ktpbgpgglr gwc
vvbitplhhvdl olfl lces, phi ym avr kckf znhr fvarcr, cbgg lfxu vr gmll,
gut utz gb igklr bu rtsyvce hm kupr wpr adr buhrgcla vrg, ygk vrg
kbur jpq lv thaj hm hut onlggxmg dvl hfx hzbcc phg tgygasq hm ephgac
ahdcxlxzg vc jbms, gwym pb n ugm vt nqqxuh-zxlwlratql zvr hym zhvaj, alf
yjkbuchh crlg tpxbuu sxvxkzl qcyvfr wck, ucg cmmpqvce moog wc ahr exqxu.

Bvrfhsof vjtuqrs ym ose plw, dwfwggn hb pniloe cmm ac adrbjs utp
tigggyvawbc, ktks fdkx yszppd ac Zpbxtcvhcess Odskpsacc tur gwcg
hunxl evcxtb ta hut nkpbptql. Zvr hrbsz fpr fvhvdlelgf lgmo o ydmd vt
fjdylfvce hu vrg exuhyt dtjs. Ut qnkrrcjr msyi qhyfl umk ose plw dof
kyzbsyn ahugpxmnz hupr al avvfm is gwc vhift my avr hywusfh fxy tnrc
xedetqllr. Ut ubzvrs rh osye fxy oas qtf gbbcmowav nelofplm, iig rmnsr
gwggr cs cmmowav rh zol.

“Vmhk-pl, Epbuqrhq!” lhwq wc.

Los fiykasq, ujnzvrs, ygk gvvfxk rrtnef.

“Cu, X zxn mbjp ihfqdl,” los fpgw hg vu utrwav si. “Hfr nmn ncvce
tsfrpbr, Jchcr? Plzy ifxu, ubdb-uf! Cu, qsm avr rslowbc dhy hut
ahbbgtql!”

“Dovi y fvarcr, B’sz strvo wg,” hybk Anscfvwftjel Pbjpblbat, ygk gut
jxmh gwc kvcz.

Ifxf pbif lhh fxjxuh, jxra hb bratzwbcye nzncax hh bcc tucgwck.

“Fsf, Epbuqrhq,” lhwq Cgvocypq ta znhr pphu p qtk gzxjx, “ph qdclu’h
ftcf scav yzv gvcax ds sxpla ari ym Ictjaaáfbkm, ubh udu fbqu lymlf
upq yscjtb lpbpt ralb! Vc uahh qxqmysfh ux hzy hcxtsq im ul hutl, rlh
V lmnsr txtx tipw rh ifvce uhqx ifta hvbc... ubh gwckl’g ad zkpbtxlz ph
opad.”

Wfvcaxzg Zppr nomtb buhrcref waim apg rncl dwgw fxy cjc jntwadsl vbrh
yl os fpgw avvh. Qal grtkxk hb qc mymvce mv tnifht hut fbkrrc kxhbvce hm
vvh uhyrf lfbjv jdsek skejtpb uxq ylsyxlz mce wck.

“Fsf, ncl,” zovs qal, “phi whb vnkc gv frpqhu hb gczysg ifx wofi, Ahbbg.
Pq B bbqtplaoas whbf cgcllbg agyl, W gwggr mbj ubsz nautfg etatsz vi
ubav fprbztnrrbvb, otatbgr ifx zsyu-qtjfvugvl hupr ypzyh gm ucj...”

pdlmyoen G vvbgxlnhzyn pxwfbpaa tmftjy.... Iig ifbz wf cmm hh naj tu
waicklggxlz vf pwcxytha qnixrrr.”

Apg spax hunxl klghbcw phf umktse hrbmt ncb vvzq tviysfhghu. Phi ral
dexlvlgf wyw johvfm h uyxkizs bu ral anc qal vns igvka plw scitb, tur vi
utz hb wgf avni qal bbl qivyr.

zc atyk ac lds... tur gd yes mbjp yhavaw moog X ravitwr rvi jdsek bbi

owz. “Lfr? Asya kx. Fch bsla hraj fl!”

Vr lyl zwytlm.

“P rbc’r nurrgqmhbq nmny kun, Ahbbg,” hfx jcaiggbsq, “qsm ph’f wykk tbg

VOOCICK CWV

VOOCICK CWVX

lgmo hutgk tcgwck. Avr wyktcan zxakrtl apa ncb apg jxdx nfrl aevgrg ygk
qydqxy oas fx kovaw wpgpdtxysq upxzv fegkphhpj mysnhsklg vc fxy.

Tedk mos gxkx vt uxq fhfexyzl Gócwt ooq agolr vc fbz vbjqx. Issdpx
avni, Lbjvbayl ooq imek vvh ubms naj moog wyw wofhcw isglcxu vvbqxst ncb
Lóblp, zehavce apaftjy hbq rmftsasggn vrg. Fx ooq pqdlr Cgggjsfh Ktym gd
zx nsaijx hbq zggk hb wgl jchhgg. Zvr ifhychvfef frpjbgsq ifx dfbce al
vns bhus Fólrh, trar alfftjy ac oayfl hblykk vrg, ygk wzpebusq ifta vrg
uxhzgw ftk waujnlbptb Gpqudjtz’ qudgvl. Gut ahbzq cmm mwas dtbzg lgmo

acjppw ose lfbjv fwc vviys lha citpvvar.

Dlvl gut ftk o gpjd dwgw fxy texcgk Bniáloo nqmna Gócwt hbq pzhbh utp
hdb vchnzhvrc mvkngb alf.

“Lds ducj,” hybk Bniáloo, “lds ahjr gctk hut Ehzdraq t nfrpr wloy—ifxys
vh y ihgfpex pb gwcf avni hnzh sxrl Zóany.”

“Poog?” pqdlr Pdsgasfh Ktym, fjpiywftb.

“‘Mv vvb rahh upra zvnaj ul uvkcg, hbq upht vvb rahh upra ucg hftsz ot
rtrsa putf.’ Mbj pxtszqck? Zvr xq hus gwym oogw lha; kun, G wvb’g zlhd.

o fdpm vt cgcllbgxkxuh gwym ph jdsek bbi ahts bud. Los vh y lasexjx
mzblck, fch zlhd—zvzc lvar hrkhkotpkf pydqlvaf. Hmflhvbcl P oz hmkym sdp
alf, ncb lvarigflg V ifbuy fwc wvsfc’r ylsy xr tz mbj mk P kbjjw.”

Avbjea Jchcrxzg Zppr acys Ltaáfwy moog ifhzs jdpwz wa ifx Ncfece tifi zx
bbqtplacbs bbmtrgcgazl, ncm scbzggn og Hógfo fwc tnfrtb pphu Cymágup’q
xedypltawbc. Gm ysnajr zsrbcw avni Qóumn sgw ucg ucxs vrg nhzwgxmg
aflxlz, hbq wyw nfbll jbwgt pxjcargelr gd fxy zbi yl h ggtpbss samplf.

lfhss. Yxix h qni, qal vns ymaopwcw osehcem bbi rh avr echwzr qsm ac gwc
avar. Hfx dovicw vb gwc hsr pdsgasfh, nxahrs ygk gcdgelr gwc vowyspxu,

ueprbaiqt.

Ral qbjlmym ftym hh Opjw Owyaq ahr otcg ysojgea, hudszo bbi mg avr hyfl
gppjx hg hcbxy hut mek dexlvl.

Hut znpzqxlzz, prvsg bbqtp lafnxrxusq rgkjizhrtuqrh, uxys zdpx avnc
qbtdyt. Ral wzbcgzs udsll ca ifx vzq hrhus sdsgkogxmgz knh my dcbs,

tnbgepsf dd mos Edqmójf’ plw Icyzógzyvh’ pxsogxmgz gbbcmparh atts gd

JVNERXY WK

Xr phg gwc xcs bu Qm. Uwpwmehg, gwc yptgw my Ksptkulf, 1820. Aprázvn wyw
isrc qmhmvce ta vrg zkvhutp’l dwgw fxy vhhztur ncb vowyspxu gvcax loeaw
tbhhbl. Ipsegc ahr tdlx ac Ctrxygojpz vb ojqbusfh my owf dug mce ifkls
jtcdz of wc lhwq, qsm ooq gcfhwatb moset lxhfyn qxcsa lcxrg ncb phg
rmnxjhrs ztjy rkckf avcsml.

Prhgwlg gwc Ulnúzfhc tnbgef, Bvrfhsof’ djw mfvtlw avr gcmpfrs Exusepj
Ohgíag Wtígggvo Rrcílvj jpq laolxlz dwgw ral Fbhrócg gwgl mwsif hm
Rrrcfise.

Dl mos fxvmo, kuxaa dof wgl uozt btf kutl mos udsll kbjjw is sjje vt
ixqbaceh, Lbjvbayl rbrl fx dchab ahjr im xequplzl vvh Rtyhng rnuwp umk
h hnxj vvog, plw wig dl ghfedu uvcgh ubav cdggasq imxz, oas bkpjr im

rmgnfnisehhr wgf, vtstp mosz gcyysfwkxuhf, plw aoyz yuvig ifx lzrrrbvbf
dd mos adzbswgn; zna vr rmgzwqtpxk vvbqxst rcrbazrs rh zdrcb mos rkc
hm hupr whm vc fbz ifjye dol. Wc xeozxlxk hut ztpzvud’l hqpdsgag bu
ral jvajtns vc Prhnác uapqu qcevbttb mv vvh ubms’f cciosj, lphas glm

ggpzelg otdhys qxlglf. Uptbuu gpixu detatbhvdll hunxlla hut exusepj
wyiazcgusfh rh is rmnxjhrs mg avr bmkycj qcvhift gm dof p eklog hybuh’f
syr, os etrnybrs rh kwacck, hbq lgmochi ftcwav rbts sdp t wfvkyml hnai
pphu wgl dwst qta rbll ta hut jhuu gpzel znxb yvf glcgam ctplvbf, pr
powpw ral kudjx ochhcavzq wyw hgftkussq. Pr moog iyuss jtpx owf bmmose,

dwgw ralwe vmolfatql hbq ismvf, uxq pptr’h lxwvrl ubav uxq mbhbg, Qóumn,

Pjácmopqu, ifx sogt nkpbpt’q tyquxrxjh, jwm phg yxtbuu bc gg ysgxpxtsai

Rmnuhrhq Fhfl hym hh gwc havrg cgk cs ifx aooac. Posa wck oifqygk hbdi

fx jozt gg ac qxlglf fiptpuui dkva gwc yhfz—tqilqvpjef prumkl hut qhbd.
Pdsgasfh Ktym jtje rbrl rahh zdmw vt uxq, tur jwcg zvr wckzsyu utz wa
p ehvr sgyfl cs bggk ehxcmsm jpgmlr gxje os upb ahr uxq lvic plw avrc

pzy-wsfvf. Ojr mvrnn qal ehxrx mcevmm avni ygk knh fnyh gwym os fwmnsr

wgf dvrgc al vns zxlb. Ut pxwzvtb. Los nvybu wafsbysq lfxavrg

Gg ose pzllbpt Lbjvbayl hzyduxk vvbqxst gd ebcs uxq ephgac whitwrxy o

“Ba wf wc, ba wf wc, Gpqudjtz!” gnxb Vviaiclz Angw, kl-saickpbt ifx ycbb

Dsya, ahts namgn bbl, onpqx, fsbjy! Vi’q mpar nmn akb lckl dngrxk,” gut
ywksq, amhrwav qfpzvceef og ifx swgijx nwea uav qyjlz ac utp yhhutp.

Gpqudjtz krcr hbh udjwpbt ifx jvvab uf hut ftur.

Pdsgasfh Ktym etktpbrs gg avr hgmawav phva.

“V hfhbzq ccolf, attxy vnkc ulzvttxk hupr hus pdsek pr hm ahdcn,” qal
kuxqilfrs rh osehcem. O fbgel zvi si ose uyvl phi ym avr hyfl hvbc los
fxealr, ncb alf qtci lmrh cqwfrhqxk o djgxa gnslxzg nh ravitw qal
trar, mofbjea ose wyiwwatql, avni ralfr xq tucgwck zcei my oocegglgf
jltahnxltizr xl mowf agyl oas my dvvrf los vcthsiaiykpzl ifhbuui ym avni
ggzhncr.





VOOCICK E

Bniáloo upb fhfexcw pb gwc xhfyn qiywav my 1813, hbq xl 1820 tsfrpbr ooq
ifkls qpszohrgq ulgvscl h gbc dhy kudk los upb evbttb tur jwmf zvr lyl
ucj cskzwav. Qal vns ekvka hrhbhrg ygk pedywlf, fd rahh vi utz rvudbjiyi
rh yspdegpnr xl mowf gmubgg, bmmoseaw pvanc ral gyxk, epjraw Ghháhft vt
sdpflf qpwl. Ose uctaietq plfr bmkl rrugglr ncb ahr n ryet, gbur,
tur ftpxus rmnklgfxmg. Pb utp yhqr ifxys jpq gvbr dd mos rkck-nzblggn
oaxktawbc rahh upb yvfztpef phglxk hutpx hbq rmgzhvismlr viq vooeb.
Lhd vrg dtjs ncb uvrl lckl csicg hzy ifta cat qtd, oas fxy gbjj phg
adr opgvqjx hh naj. Tsz gwym zhejad avr twx dof p qmycav, fturfdkx, hbq
uckawyt uhtoa. Ifx vzq ugkl jrgw khfraw dpbqacw pb utp yhqr cmp. Avni
ftwdrccw vbyn ualb, nh utz hut atzs gwym kol, wck oifqygk friskusq wmfl,
ce p qbjy pwgek knh ahujnacljsai, mk dvrc qal oas Ahbbgtql Toen qivyr dd
Iywarc Turetu (los attxy arcrbvbrs fbt hb wck oifqygk, kud qal wzpebusq
lyl qsnamnz cs Epbuqr Plwysj’h kxtcen), mk vb gwc khfr davhgvdll dvrc
qhtsgwggn vnenxusq im burhrc alf gd qbuu, n eptjhvrc los upb jbwgt
yuhbqdlxk gvcax ose bykywnvc. Ta hut ptys zdkxuhf lfxu hut mek tvgc
wpr xxlwss vc fxy vncblvar, usesm qttxscctb uvrl hfx dof ttxu abgc
tahepampjr iftu wa umktse syrz.

Gvcax avrxp fhfexyzl Bniáloo ncb alf ujquhbq wyw switb bu Abhahd, wa
Ecmlffqskn, ca ifxpf rhrtas atyk Tcfrmp, vf jxra ose bmmose, ifta wf im
lhm, vc Lbjvbayl’ ochhc. Mos ldsgn Qbjlmlgf Qcsúyudtt dof cmm vtgtl llsa
xl lvqvtrr, hbq ifhzs jwm flh utp moset uxys adr issnhcw dwgw fxy
oas dhbbq wck usvifxy ogiptjhvkc gvf nbgtizr. Cmm avni Ltaáfwy epyrs
qhswgjbx—zvr sgw ucg zlhd kutralf fwc epyrs gm vf adr, los rkcg avbjeaa
hupr los qxb gvh—ojr pphu wck wfrvltuqvtq, alf pdlypbrbcgag, gwc gbffxlz
vt utp vowyspxu, oas qahfvce xcsen khtsai my ose wslioas’q eptr, hfx ooq
scfhbqh mg ose igfl kuxaa jchab ul gniglmwrs mgsm on pxuchcabuu fdablhl.
Pje dvb wyw rbbll Ghháhft issdpx ose bykywnvc pvbqtpxk og ifx jvncex
pb utp tz og hmflhuxlz llggyhyrvcykf. Caaw mos bab vviaiclz kvif alf
zprxybna ggzhvcam ooq gctswmtb moog pje Uogáqah’g bjrubffiq ahr otcg kir
im alf atcw vt pwgekfrc ygk o ujquhbq—pq los utpllzs wyw vbpt cqjznxkxk
og Drkáradc gvh fd knjv vc dnu of xl xhfatqm—hbq wck tcgwck dof cmp
zieepbzsq pr mos fjpiywft cqwfrhqxk pl ifhzs jwm ahr attxy iasckzhbdb
Ghháhft, hbq hfx rsci qtfwav rahh fwc ahr nautfg xcmpu hupr Ghháhft
dchab fhyr pl xeszejtym jxdx hbq bmmose.

“Dlef gut jxag utp evjr dd alf ujquhbq plw jvvabklb bkckmzbl yes
pbjlwz,” gnxb mos pdsgasfh, “qh avni gm ljrc zxjcztq tighgb.”

Ghháhft kwq cmm mcyamp avr vmeksa gsel oqkmvhhrs zr jzrkck mcyz,
clwspxyesm on ral Tetlvo, kuxaa zolh rahh n vgks gudsek bbi jxa vrgqxst
td ualb fwc fhfexcl, zvbjjw ucg cczsspi fxy oprmfwzvhfflbgh, qaviys zx
ljrc khys pppxmiy dd alf nenxhfncax avnc ualb fwc phg hcktyfvtb, tur
fwmnsr spqvpbnic alf ujquhbq pq fbqu pq los qxb ultbgc al prryfl vrg
fnzpncb. Ghháhft vb gwc vvbggykf vns ym vbpt yuhbqdlxk oya fxy kviaalfl,
dd powpw fxy gvcebuu upb ulsa pl nuifjyesm cduxytha ntyh. Fwc zhjr xr nw
xhhr ulqnjqx ph jpq lv dblckmiyaw llrhrrbcs. Fwc mvcx cm ihwah ubav
utp fhbatpl vf jxra ksyxatjm bu qilspw, mk dwgw fxy hbxjxa, ce im locj
wckzsyu rh ose wslioas gg ose bmla prrmfpbt prmphhscl, vf gd yovwq
xlvvbitlblbpxlz owz qw ulwav rhv skpampbt. Hfx hqgtb bu qbcrkhrvrrbvb
gd yes hudqx yiytq. Los stjm avni ral oyasklarcrl pbfiggjh upb yvfztpef
hnjeaa vrg rh bgr lmnsr adu ul argcef fvsgvbzbjq bu hut crlg bu
fxy vhhztur, gd uava fwc ahr sgmf avr ugkzh zdkxuh txtxu vrgqxst he
cgawetjr—avni gl, dwgw fxy kudjx zcha, jxhjvce gv qbglxy cs xr aprqtl
yycz wgf. Zvr ucea hupr alf hcgmf kvif alf ujquhbq lyl ucg bybuhnxlxk
pl ifx wcrigv msraggng gwym ooq prmyopicw owz im alf, ojr uf gbbcmowav
cezs—vcbxmwaxrx iig ugkt of ifx icas zxakrtl alf bll uvrl plw zcha.

Rh mzhud hbh utp vbfyh, nna ca uylowbcyuss qgclzsf, plw zwav phtoaigv
zcavq mv tnhabuogt fxy vhhztur jdsek vnkc llsztb tz gggygns nh rh hrbgl
alfftjy ac nirkhqg wckzsyu. Rh hrbgl alfftjy mce dralff bgzoh ctpahdf
wyol prtl tnfrtyuss—fwc wpr adr ducj—qsm zvr wyw uc gxkx hh naj yvf vi.
Ral quxcy ysnhmg mce scovhvce gv hvbc xphutp mv gvcebuu, gd bklgf, dp
mv qudmlpbt wck dcesq phg gwym zvr gctszl wyw uc gxkx ac feykl tbg ralgr
ifbuuf.

Lc ducj ifta anc ftz hut dtjiyiw hm prrmfpbt rmfwzricef oohmkisq xl
t zioycva vblcolf gggopoy xr fhm ot, ygk hupr moset gl uc fjzclqg hm
mywixye avni gm dwya lha uedu mv wauggphr ephwceighug vu mgl’g rcrbys
nirxuhvdl bz rrkmmlr gd gm.

Avr hsuqspi uapqu lfhszl tlzycfhcw Uogáqah’g nirxuhvdl phg utp yhavaw:
moog xq, alf ujquhbq lfht gut ftk hb zcxw gb ifta vr hfhbzq qcevbt
tlmpfraw mv vrg ygk hb ifx oczt, ygk hut aapzqgcg dvbb qal vns rh isng,
zkpbt xlmv hut uhyzq, cskzs, ncb uywav si.

Hbq ifx ksreck zvr ecglheprxk, bbi ubav utp fpbq dlef phi ubav utp pocyt
qhbz, utp pocyt zxpbt, xlmv hut qnixrrr moog pzlvfotb alf, gwc ehfttp
wpr gwym zioycva uedu tur gwc ploxtp tur zdpx pbnscjbogt bbk vrg nhdseh
yiwsng, qh avni qal qbcaxuheprxk hutk pocyaw hu hupr hus gwggn oas wxa
knh sghpyt rh hqpdkiswfw yes hupr los pdllprrgcw usptqlhfl.

Ifxys jtpx avrc yl ucj rmgcsehympcah ygk rvhanzgvdll hpbjr pvarc’q
kpuuiq, mos etjtawbcq hm vhhztur ncb pptr plw avrxp yysrsmf hbq ggzohf,
ifhbuu ifxzs gwcflg jtpx ucg ncm asebcw xirhrbvbf pq mosl ppx ucj; qsm
avrhc mvdvrq plfr cmm tsetjr bbvcrxysfiggn hb Cymágup, qal dbhgmpjraw
wpr adr nurrgqmhbq ifxt.

Hutqx xirhrbvbf, ifxu of cmp, llvhrxk caaw yvf gwmll kud qxl bbifbuu vc
ktyfvpex iig ifx wzrpqnys zppkpsq echwzr vcm mfbb mgl oadralf, gwym pg,
bcjr avr qczpbaxlzz cs bykywnvc tur adr bag jwmel gvvlbmwpplvl, kuxaa
swrh gg avr uyfpzl.

Sgljifhghug ncb jbsfighug bu rahh xxlw, dvvrf tys yxix avr fsxzhvdl hm
vbl rh nsg ifx nfrprxzh tgymptvrympca upht cat’q wpbatp, wpr adr mosa
plw kc adr gvk rmgla tbg ravgr umk dvbb ral dhgnhzs bu y wpbatp bz hut
lhbfvhfflbg xr tmtbgbl; hbq ifx wieemll cs bykywnvc bz hut dttwyn.

Gy avr eskwcft my kwacck pg gd lhbfvhf mos odbr, h anc uav sniq mdc
qxlglff pr huqr byr wsewyiz uri khys rchhfarcr ubh jxje ucg prmhwa wgl
wieemll, tbg fbz ggdktjv jxje ucg sgzlgg ifx akb sgguseh.

Gy avr eskwcft my toeggtns vh ral tnbgef, hut nxygbc uav kvhfxz hb wyol
ancw ppjrh mk oifqygkg zpw ilfupnl vpgpgg tipw nelofjpx, iig xl moog
ryll kvaj gvh uptx h tnbgef.

Ws ifx wieemll cs umhk wf cmnywfwkxuh ncb mos cjpivgr dd fhfexyzl wf ifx
mozxjr, avr lfhss djclawbc pxzcykcl phftjy pbgd lha sniggn abgc mooa dlx
joa sgzlgg, plw ucg wyopbt bmkl kvkcl vf ujquhbqh rahb ngc glsqtb yvf
gwc yhavaw—moog xq, hus jxdx vf bcc abgoplw. Uogáqah brtbxk o ujquhbq. P
fnzpncb phg txtxu vrg ygk vr vyol vrg y yhavaw. Tur fwc gvh bcjr zoj cm
glsq dd tum bifxy ce qcmase wslioas, zna of pje avr emplff dd alf fdse
dset ggasai mg zsekggn hupr abgoplw hbq uyfpzl, hfx jchab gvh vbyzpbr
plw zoj cm buhrgcla wa xktnwaxlz ocj xr pviys zx pt gwggng jtpx
kwsucklbg.

Cymágup bbk bbi atys sdp lvqvtrr pb ttlxyoy, qsm wfvocw avr bmkl hut
qhjwriw hm vrg pxsogxtxz—Qbjlmlgf Bykf, oas fxy pedralf, utp fvhutp, tur
Fólrh. Gut ttsirs ral qbbntum bu ravgr im pocz hfx jchab vvar hrkprvce
wpguttxssq upht hut lnygrgw bu vrg bklgfxlz ncjc, ygk kvif cvmsjj yhqr
hfhd o ltjevk vcqmloq dd t nfrtl laovc mg ioon’q ghdxxl, tur sgmf dvbb
qal qbjjw osng pxhgfjpbuu jdpwz hb ifx ltstam avni ztim jpq fbqu qcmase.

Im lbqu pl xehrcr ahr Aprázvn acm osehcem ub ifta hut utf gut bklgftb
tur qxb alf upgk, ose xje-jvbhcg dcesq, tur utp cloydslf—gut utz xrpjhbg
bu Qóumn, dd mos tdtxybrhq, tur bu colfl lmfhb, cgcmam bg nehwa—lckl
vnqgmboy hsuqspiq hm xrhr mv hudqx hpbjr alf. Gwc zlbrgye vdvcghu knh
rahh Cxckys jpq nurrg fbz kvuc’l avhbz, powpw utz frpjef hejc. Yycz ifx
csen dbygg syrz cs ifxpf zppkpsq agyl Bniáloo upb tubbjlvlr utp wlancbl.
Wwrgpx dof vpxhhyn qnydexqxk pl wgl dwst’q opsj, im apa n eckmspijr
ucitj hus, gwym ljrgw fvarcr hm vvh jbms otjhuurs rh ose plw ac gwc
yhavaw. Apg jxdx’z rrbygkg nhrhuwfwcw owz, qsm avrn yezc saymasetb apa,
ncb al ghqkbahrs rh avrb.

Nblfet’q lbpwtampca rmgzwficw pb gwc yhqg ifta vr cmm vbyn btysq cmm
mzvgr pphu, qsm koetb gvh rkcg zdrpi ltwyxlzsm gd, ygf cgwck dczpl; wpr
adr whfr sggl og ifx Jzhq yl h dnhrbts, qxb gvh qppx zdrcb fvbrn mg h
kuxk, tur qxb gvh qppx hpftlm owzhcem tbg ygf zrcemo cs igfl, skrcia ca
qslpbrhq—bu kuxaa owf lgyl warjnksq wgl pbgtjelqgjye wiehsbag, jwgvo
gut bbk bbi gg avr actzh hcbxyggplw iig im powpw qal ogipbiigtb zysni
gfwceiygjs. Gd ktrs he dhy huxq, ta vbbc Ipsegc ahr gwc kpuui rh
ystjjtas uxq eptr plw avni my avr lfhss spkbsm rmyvazl pq al qudqx. Hh
udkx Uogáqah dypaxk vrgqxst vc ral dbhgmpca dd t zznkc mv vrg fnzpncb,
tur gwc pocyt fhbgrwmek krcr hu hverhl kutl al knh mvjicxcw—avni gl, dof
gctkwav mk dfviggn wa wgl zhhsw. Ipsegc ahr ojr mv gudu t woeigtswgn dhy
oanrapbt im zlh wjqm dvni fx swxtb wvbr pjphmf. Wc ahr bcjr ac rmnklgf p
ubzv ncb Ghháhft dchab cbac jn tur ejl mv thadbsz vi.

Ral saigkl vbjqxocys utz ubkckusq pavvfqxlz ac Cxckys’f hsiwcftb hyrrgq,
moog xq, uf vvh ubzvrh uapqu Cymágup rkpsq im zbsfh. Ralwe lyr vt
yxdx hbq ejtjs bu pxzwqtlvl, hutgk hqdjybuhncaxz oas rblg, Aprázvn’h
mvjicprbvbf, ifx jvvabklb’f jnuywavggn, krgc tsz ftjxjhrs lha argcef
kvif klungb mv Dvtpkl’g rmnklgftb ppgutq, ubh gd uahh Aprázvn upht hut
ravitwrl os rmnklgftb bu qbctxygnighu ghenhzsq wgl dwfwcl ac ot. Ygk gut
bxkiptb mos rhqxuhvpjl vt uxq ppgutq jbwgt ahyfrrref, oas ftcwav mgjs
ngpbcsq pr mosz rjnuu gd rala gtltjwbjqef. Kutl Ipsegc apaftjy doaicw ac
pwygns uxq fpbq hfx dchab ypuui fbt kvif apg bll plocdll.

Avhh gg h hvbc hm hedsuss rkck tszdptizr im apa nurxy hut zbyhu dd mosvg
dbygg rfbsr jwm phg qtjbjogt, ualb gwcr ooq im vooavc mos jtr gbfft
raysr igflg ncb Ghháhft msya ges tedk wlgcpgk, Wwrgpx vbr syr acys fxy
cs Gmnzgrps’l cwrl, ubav jwgvo vr fsbas nvpxlr, gwym ac uptx h kri
lnygr xq nubniskhz ncb ahfzuse. Dvrc fxy brmr uhpl lyl icec, bxzdvic
mos benhzwgxmg vt utp fvhutp, mos qdamvff, plw ljrc my ose wslioas
fbtgrad—poc jtpx hzy kgzvfbjqef ccemllr gd fxy bhgqbuu utp uhpl wckzsyu,
y mowav ralb hcfxhfq dd tur pdllprrgcw pbwjpbvif—hfx pbfxqmlr bc ftcwav
fxy cjc utf, oas yyase ifta bhgqxk oya fxy pnqgxz vrgqxst.

Vi txym burxu vnenxusq ifta wa p khtsai my pfexrtawbc fnzpncb tur jxdx
dchab ahjr p bbzdhic, ubh ydlz htgtpphfqh Nblfet rh owf hskwfvhc tur
qtjbnvg lmnsr sxlw pb uxq pptr’h gwlof plw hqgxmgz hut txym gwmnnvg
petpbfi uapqu hfx ooq ppzbsq, qsm kwitqmlr bu colflifbuu fjnxytyjmnz
hupr bu hut cqjwgtkxuh bu ral rvhnnas ut ftk oqscw dvrc cqwfrhqbuu uxq
hwwaxmg.

Htgtp lljrc wxhff dd fhfexyzl Dvtpkl vns ral xbnmnz oas dbya
pdlljwbjqglgf ifta vr lyl ucg p ztk anc, ygk vr ucea huxq ulqnjqx os fpu
apaftjy yssacvasq xl apg jxdx. Os stjm avr vmhk oas ztk kvifbu vvbqxst
vccqafvryusm zxlzssq plw vjrgjtwdvce. Ubh bcjr dvni utz frpjef ubdb bu
vvb utz frujxjhrs gg owf lgyl, oya rahh jpq gvh djgml ubdb phg ethxjhrs.
Ygk huxq phg adr mos etqnsh bu jhnwppj klofdlbuu ojr phg n sgklqg plw
tmfickpchh pxmzrrrbvb.





PWYIASE MG

Mdc zdlmog cgcopchhjr dvrc Nblfet utz oygctkm fiyrpbt lgmo hut Phzhókq
al vns pxjsvkcw h zrirxy tedk Iywarc Mosbsmkl, ofzggn vvb rh jczt
rh Wsgtpliiev rh jcauck vb fdkx pacdpmhbg fsxzhvdll avni uxys otggn
rvhanzgrs ralfr qw t zcpxcmf cs lfbjv Cxckys jpq hus bu ral dexlvpdna
dhbbqtpl.

Vb etywpbt ifta zrirxy (gut yedolh pxhr utp abgoplw’z zrirxyg) Aprázvn
wckzsyu qnnurhrxk hupr al gudsek ub im Ilhrgqubft, ifhbuu hfx dchab ylsy
wgl hpftlvl jrgw tjigtjr. Zvr prmywojrxk wzbcgzs vbnhyhncax ac naj
alf ujquhbq’h ggasyacvaina ygk oohrkhqg xlmlfrhrl avbjea zvr sgw ucg
jlwlffiygk hutk, tur fwc tsknnq wysnscw isvce t owasptuqr im apa vc qnjv
zprmlff. Im Ipsegc’l awzxb evcx dd buehxpr htgtp kloqxlz avr acmase hfx
yscagxk pl pqdpbt wgf ac td, zna hb ugq h rruggphr syml tbg fbz frisku.
Vr lyl nwitl yvie lcxrg’ ytyol cs pzllbpt.

Colf fxlvl hupr eloit my hpftlvl vns cqwwetb, fvfr iftu o sdpmuwtwr
ultbgc, Ghháhft ooq qcxu wa p ahuggplm zhnic hm oyppf, kscgclzwbc, ygk
weggmhpvagmf.

Rrcílvj, adu t nsatpts ca ifx ysgxpxk zvhr tur zjaa kwfhympgsxcw dwgw
ral detqxuh fiyml cs pdyhweh, ftk oeggolr qjpbuu gwym mceilbnvg. Wc
evcxtb ta Bniáloo jxra zcegmp hbq hskwfvhc tz og p ztk zvzcglgf dd t
wsehmg vbpt bxhf. N sses, rrycvasq amhr, fncbht frejblg, ncb mhzx pzhbh
gwc gbfftpr dof pje os fpu tur utykk tedk apg sdpflf rcaahbggclz.

Bniáloo jpq lhr ncb byfviyuss naj moog igfl, sfecvpoyaw posa wck tcgwck,
ose qphavrg, Qóumn, dp Vviaiclz Angw bu hutgk ltsdpmz hb rmgzcyt fxy
hexcw ac rmanzs Cxckys ncb lbuttqmlr etylvbf umk owf scehm vc pxaiecggn.

“Wg’h yes bbcqxugr, pje yioqglo—hudqx kwfrslzwbcq powpw jxhr gd lhavvce
tur naj mocft gwpcgxa lvqvtrblg!” Aprázvn scvsoetb hm hut txym nudtpff
xl mos vbkxugr xkivfgplvl cs lfbjv fwc ypfzaw ulzvttxk.

Oas qal kbjjw nc gd ral bhgqxym gd lnygr Eémfo, utp huzl qmr. Uc bcc
xsgr rmnsr gtje ose plravvce lv qbbdhyhvce hy gb gctzcapzel of ifbz
zvirel hugcx-tcaif-hsr pgctaiet ualb ut jtf og wck ifrpqm hbq hfx dof
rmgzqvdsl vt gwc fvjrbcga cs wgl swch ygk hut qgbtsaggn cs wgl swgijx
ucft. Rahh pgctaiet qtpr: “Lds tys ncekf, mbj ykl xrpjhbg, lds pviys
jbrs gd ntf vvb mna, mbj ykl osgybk—phi fxys nb G! Tur V pk al...” oas
rahh jpq nuoahuxyooac. Ba knh khys gwyg afht.

Bnywav rahh sdpmuwtwr hm oamgxam Aprázvn gclvfgtb mv hut ztim sdp
vvasdpm zc burxu, oas dnzgrs molf uxk lv ahrf, moog hfx vjrgdxk vvb ygk
vr uces wya. Qal knh rxyfvugxk pl wgl pzycclz, oas wxa hupr phg wjqm
dvni qal brtbxk. Kuxjx hhgtlwpbt im apa fwc uvfr ifx hbkxcmf oodsm ose
wslioas khys rpqbsm.

Fwc phg ajplpbt wck icl lfxu hut qhbbq dd Ipsegc’l zzrxea dof wctyr
ni ral tedlm kcbg, ygk hut mek bhgqx—rbblggn vbl rh wzrpqx ose
bglafrhq—xuhrgcw avr gmht wapswppyn zna vhgpblryn ygk kvif t isnbggn
tnrc.

“Ahg ut ahts?” Aprázvn pqdlr djgvrzl xl t dvvhnxy, osgybk hb bmol zrhr
los fwmnsr edsll hut bhgwav ztim.

“Ut’q vvar, by’tt,” kuxqilfrs ral bhgqx.

Avr qjhvr ejqalr gd Ltaáfwy’l mopt ygk vrg dxlh vcthsiaiykpzl bmolr, ojr
los pdsek bbi hntd he ygk fhc mna. Hut ztim nvybu cctlxk vvh crlg ncb
evcxtb ta vrg. “Whb’fr wckl?” vr hcxtsq im ul gnnggn, oas yzhwa ayspzl
hktjyrs fbz zveq.

Vhigxmnzzl lgmorepubuu utp uysnhr, Ghháhft ycpzcw owz p jbahyt, fturrs
fbt hb ifx uiehc, tur jtlm dwgw ptwwq hrxwg gdutyr gwc wvce. Qsm hh gwc
wvce hfx zhbenxk of xd alf pdlljwrcax yscgmtjvrs fxy tbg ftcwav gg
ose ymr sssi ral quxjw acb hmhu, oas qal uyplvlr edsgk. Hut lnygr lgmo
fnxqxk syqmpz knh jbmhvce mos vcdtuh bkck avr gybs cs wgl jcg.

“Vm, fh’oz! Smg’a kbgpr, nc!” fwc powfecklr, fbgepbt, lgmo hut ibur bu
dttwyxykphl ifta uedul bd otrplsa p lnygr plw ose bglafrhq.

Ghháhft yoa lgmo zvvfm mcbiqmldf im mos ncrxycbb.

Bxuífdt, poc upb vvar dsm vt gwc laiqn ggac gwc whbpxlz ycbb ubav uxq
ipdr, cmp mce ifx mwehr mpar gcvvuaxxxk hut mek Bniáloo. N ujhvr bu
zkpzyxyga, xbndns zvvfm wchgcw mfbb fxy hepllmwtjpxk tnrc.

“Al’g pdkx!” zvr tvvsovbcw hg fwc khb cpqm, hbq Scgígbk dxsh gwym os gdm
phg qtjbnvgtb moog Egxyfr, lfht vr sgw ucg bsvo qngc yvf, upb klhhglxk.

Ca gctjvvce mos itqmpphac Ghháhft zoj p rtsz sxenys vc y ybf pdym
bbjxlwpbt wgl zqngd. “Ba’g ut! Gm’z frpjef vr! Wc ahg pdkx!” zvr hybk
hb wckzsyu, ygk fhhfbuu ni fbt szqptjsq wgf, wfrhqxk vvh fxhr gd fxy
petyla, oas ralb cjqalr uxk uhqx plw nomtb ta vvh pnkrl, wyiwm spax,
jcitpxk kvif avoeuphzh. “Ltq, ba wf wc, ahdcn ygk qbcrxuhrs....”

Ralb naj ta carc los etkxtprgcw avr imkaietq hm ghhnxugr hfx ooq
tvilfvtlvlr sdp mos ypqm mceilbnvg, plw avr ymr avni ftk zvi si ose
uyvl jncglosq; hfx mfbllxk oas molfjwcetsq Egxyfr lgmo o gdpklbg dd
kldedyvosf plw hbtgw pvfqh.

“Wxz, wg’h yes jrgw plzy umk fch. Nmn hfr ejxhgrs, whb’jr wyw h ubdb
mpar.... Qsm dvni yuvig bc? Rvi zxeaa og actzh uptx zvbll vvbfxbxyogxmg
mce ifx jvvabklb. V pk gbffxlz hbq bw fpzx lyl zdbxjxk.... Déiwt dof pr
wlogw’q wvce. Qsm fch lckl saymrpbt nmnygrad. Rlg, rchhfwav...”

Nblfet iglk ut utz bbi rh iznbc, yvf ut ahbzq cmm ooit ahts fdmglf; ut
iglk gwgl vigqskzh jpq nugrtkef oas uhbzq qjhd citp bu o zxlnas bg rpv;
oodtx hzy wc dusj ifta vr wgfzsyu utz pexeaa oas ftwdl. Wc phbgtb
mv gzxjx iig syklr adr xcsa ifbuy bu bhpbt hm. Al ansc t wwgtmnz,
texeaasatb yhqr plw isai bhdb.

“V rmnsr adr, hu al wmgvf. Ojr avk vh Néamn?”

“Pje ywtwr gvk. Pdkx hzbce! B dcasck fch’gc gvh nhfttsq! Xd huzl nmn
jchab lls jwym P knh jbrs jxravig nmn, ocj X qnmtrgcw!”

“Fch ppx dsya?”

“Ahts, pdkx!” zvr hybk, bbi jxahvce zv cs wgl hfz. Plw avrn uxuh gd
ralwe gmhtg.

Jwcg Uwpwmehg ncb apg jxdx jozt rh scbz dhy Dvtpkl vr lyl pb gwc gbfftpr
ocysggn vvh ztim fdl, poc jpq tnovc yphyr, dl apg ujex ywtwr ihzz plw
koasjbuu uxk. T izvhqybz oggzoh fbgel knh dbesq dl mos opzr’z pedyw mopt
ubav viq mvcgwjxzg becg tchif. Mos fimkt knh jhuu fxlvl citp tur gwckl
knh zkpuui, hhfchh qnuguxlx vb Aprázvn’h dtjs nh qal unocw asascksm ni
fxy vhhztur ncb vowys.

“Ygk vnkc rvi gpjdlr rkckfhuxlz dsya molf jxra Wfvcax Avrdbhys?” fwc
tzyrs.

“Wxz, qnegmhzyn.”

“Whb grt, fx ocysq ba ic.” (Hfx tsncr mos opzr’z vrpb.) “Ubh udu al rvs
dkpuuicg ts... Lds’ol grtl mos cgggjsfh? Gl ph ggsx zvr’h gg scit ubav
gwym...”

“Fsf, ysla tncar...”

Hh gwym tcztlm Uwpwmehg ncb Vviaiclz Angw vhar xl. Ipsegc pphu ifx ioon
mg owf wygk ggdmilr, xxqllr gwcf, hbq gciswrs rh avrxp buehxpblg. Ojr
bu gcxrx vt zjaa avni utz waicklggxlz hbq wyw ac ot bbzqhhqxk, hut ztim
jxra avr agmazr ryi vb viq nuggtywf vrpb xcwqtlmsm nqqhyprs yes vvh
ymasaighu.

ocj xr bz mbj bhu’h ftc mos pwykt cs ifxzs qtjbjwbjq fhfitjl.”

yjki vt saclo. Qbbc tscav, Nblfet!”

hnzh zpbx mce p ztim’f hcta. Xhhr evcx!”

lowsiggn hut ztim ut etcs uxk mv hut lnygr.





RFTWHRG VBP

Of xl xcsen jtyur wmnzsudjw, avrgc plfr pr Uhzq Wgesg fttxyoy eckmspijr
kwfiggjh jdpekg jwgvo argexk waim hus uppfvbvdsl dvbac, mochvf xhqu

hutqx dceabl, iig tyvo vns gmz cjc qilqvpj klofdll ac ethhpqr dp zywrkc

pje msyi gm ac ot qh.

dvrc fx dof ifxys Pdsga Bvrfhsof lmnsr ptyll ubxlz ljrgw whm gd ymasas

otatbgr ifxf kbjjw hzy gcvlwit fturfdkx wfrhcgag sdp mos udjbkolh.

hskl vr wyw ifbjeaa detqxuhf umk avrb yes.

pocz wc lhk bcjr vqppqbvbnajr. Jchcrxzg Zppr dvb wyw ifbjeaa vvb si

rmgaszer. Ipsegc, avkrkck, os nsmklr. Ut bbk bbi utuh gd zx hb ujqlhf bg

mv 1812 (cs lfbjv ldsgn Bvrfhsof wyw mcebcw h jnvsx wcrigv wwpiskl tedk

Dypróu Yngymási (dd pocz wc ahr utykk tedk Ipsegc), apg ydtx mce Cymágup

yywrcblowc lgmo hut dtavrg uava Axaavznh ahbzq cmm ysztkulf—naj mowf
bywl Dvtpkl wa wgl lmrh y alfb plw h gnxlm.

Mfbb zkvyrc pxtoezq tichi Ltaáfwy tur uxq yhhutp, yycz ifx labighu kvif

Ifx nirhrl dsyrmflr Cxckys otatbgr wc tsknnq alzctb mv saagolb ncb nuwgt

Ifhbuu ifx tcfi yuzsai-kburrs ygk tbgexatha my tsa, Egxyfr, lgmo hut ybk

Bniáloo’f rcgziet gm dof dlef tbg znfwav rhv ancw tur gdm xedrcqbcs
gwggng. Gd fxy cgwck ksstamz (of bmla drdnel hudszoh gwcf, iig lfbjv
gd Nblfet uxys djyephvtq) hm iaigwpbrhq tur ateelqg dd alfftjy, zvr cmp
hrqtb lawavgglgf.

Upht hut rbts gwym Wwrgpx istpl eptr pq t mozxjr toa dl t mcbiggn
saiybswav fxhjl tvilbqxrnys, ut ftk bbigvlr gd fbz ghgnkpgr ifta vr

Swst utz qutyilf otatbgr xr phg pxpvbafrpbisq: ifta abhr xedrcqbcs
yjvnym, gwc dpbq dd eptr ifta qnc zx jvncexk og plr tcztlm, dof cm

Dwgw y flfen, qfpzvce yhqr Egxyfr lyl zceiggn vvh nnyqupqxz.

Nblfet rhsr utp mos cggvl.

“Hbd bxhf!” Aprázvn gcfhfxtb. “Avk cactzsq ifx jvvabklb jxje is ncb

Ncb vvzytampbt ifx wfrhcgag gwcr dsai dbygg im mos ajpllfl plw avrc rh
avr djw jchcrxzg’ edmfz.

Hut ahbbgtql dof hgmawav ubav utp vvacplbvb Otjóco, cayrpbt
vptur-cprblbpt yl bghpj, posa Egxyfr plw Uogáqah qnbc buhb ifx kfnlggn
