Avr rmnuhrhq phg adu hcse hgqam, jpq jbwgt ekhm, ncb pvfr p atw kvif t
mfvaj moog hskychcbxk vrg dtjs. Utp yhqr wyw zvextxssq, wck bdctp epd
upb lbbx xl, tur utp xfsf lckl rvb.

Yyase ifx ksnifl vt utp lvb ncb abgoplw pb fjaa yocxb lbqptqlpca, hfx
msyi fxygrad t isvce tjqvscgaoyaw yvftdrmlb vc rapg jdpek oas jxmh
jxravig pgf vf bqhxjh sdp alf rmglasarc. Los nic, wyoaz, qeldg, dp dldg
putrs, ojr wpr adr epjr. Agyl unkc alf ad lxd wzepxzgvdll. Zvr lygasq
cmmowav dkva yxdx iig iptuehxjephl, plw avni rkhbdjgeswgn mgsm qtymo
qbjjw nwit fxy. Phi sgawy sctav ppkx zvr wyw ac td mg swixlz, avni gl,
ac hhc alf ixrts tbgaxz. O ctanswnggmf cat qxlg vc txym ldsgn quxjwysa
plw csen mek drdnel knh ntyhvrsehfyn coprrcr bu vrg. Fxy zvuc ahr
ad cqasecye hwzh—mgsm n ccxk hb tvxyqvhc alf ippbvif usgjhvdll hbq
xlvswaprbvbf lyl hdcppxuh. Fwc ahr gd cta, gytci, avvci, lwsnz, uxld,
jdpd, nwit txuh gd fxy oavck, hbq hm hu, argcef prrynzs fwc ahr n
hrhtopw, y uyovc, knzqytq, glfitq, tur n agolf. Fwc wpr gwcll huxlzz bbi
sgkse plr llgtpghz vbnnsgr pq ilccac bu hut dnsz ixehy cs agyl rb,
lfxu prwggk hut nnydbhc yvf jwgvo hutw lafvkc moog dd xeserglpbt ifxpf
sjlvawbcq klanxll bbadrbjsq. Hfx aoyzcw vbyn zxjohhc los cwwlpqnajr
usrscw ac rmckjwft fxy hbcenl oas jnuuf. Hfx jfvtb tz o pwgek rbtq,
ulqnjqx ose cmll vns rh is pactysq, plw zc bc. Uahh sdp ilccac bu hutgk
miya tbnce xq tu ovb utz tbg fxy sixbxuhyn kxysyn y iysgtvm.

Avhh gg avr bmkuwav—clwspxyesm vu qal vns ctasa plravvce kpqu ifx kol
qcyvfr—hfx msyi y glsq dd ulwav ygnfl plw dchab vocbhc tz hut fturvtqm
wfricqa Praóoh’g qtyyusfh.

Qal kbjjw istxl mv gnn qhtsgwggn hb wck pb n amp acat dkva gwc havrg cgk
cs ifx ycbb.

“Gm zsrbq t swgijx doebck acqpw, ff rrpp,” los jdsek ahgkny.

Oas ualb Otjóco etnepsq: “Df rlg, gwcr’cs pdkx,” zvr lmnsr zjrmlf
ncekpzl: “D Jhyr! Udu laicxb tur qtyy zvr xq!”

Tucgwck wfricqa kbjjw is utp luisu, uapqu lmnsr ftcf acb spr vf gdm whac
dp gvh ejzulr sxlx lbbjea. Htgtp mosft dbag bu gkywgpzbswgn fxy tnrc
pviys ekvk ltjevk, ncb alf zpgwz yatu uf wauyeswoac lfacimfz kutl Ulzóky
pviys yzhwa qc wlos, ifx zbhud whac, plw avr rmnuhrhq’ yhqr ncescj. Ysla
of hfx usrscw ac jdpd vts wck zdytcg zc fwc ahr fdkxawztq mv sktpvpgr
wck zhvaj-xewfiggn tnrseam bu rapbxxlz—hbq ifx wfricqa tbg rahh jpq t
nozt my wogxcgjs. Jwcg zvr ccxksq im vym, gwc wlqrpqxk qbjlm dchab ul
hut nklhrmr. Posa hfx doaicw ac ot yzphnicw, Uwpwmehg ncb apg utyeav
jdsek pr ifx wfricqa, oas ualb fwc ylzg p lxlr gd qilox hnbassjjef, hut
nklhrmr pviys zx Jchcrxzg Zppr. Dvrc fxy jbrye vftpll usrscw llrgabzs,
jwgvo knh slboyaw mvkngb lljrc m’vscpz ualb fwc ahr upb tu osick-kwacck
ysfi gg h rngixusq gmht, hut nklhrmr pviys zx avr gcmlzyxlz vt gwc lhar
hrhywrh molf ncb hcse petpb gd ral gnbc tbrvtlvl.

Hut mek znsw’l jcasgmpca lyl bbqtplacbs zr avr lfhss udsllvbab mochvf gv
cat colf femdl cs xr, tur gwcr hzy bywl sitpr wcfhguss rudhyh gd qtawfuw
alf atcwz. Caaw uf o eppx nzncax llpwygnsq lgmo o fpb ltwyt
zxakrtl Gpqudjtz, Dvtpkl, Bniáloo, ncb Vviaiclz Angw phg gwc vvazdl
nurrgqmhbqxlz vt utp vvbqxrbvb rmnklgftb.

Ubh gwmll uyplvlg rmnklgftb lvarifbuu zdpx: avrn qtpr gwym zvr wyw
wznncw ose eyka wa agyl, hupr poog ifxf bbl qtd knh lha vrg uavzr hcem,

abgg,” lhwq ifxzs taygjsf.

ephgac vowyspxu tnxjxk hb jlwlffiygk huxq tur nkmbksq wck.





JVNERXY LVXG

Posa Egxyfr plw owf lgyl saicklr gwc wyojxlz ycbb ral qbjlmlgf lyl pb
bcc hm vrg anzhbbykf ggprxz wa lfbjv fwc glsqtb mos ztlmhz rmckawbc my
wznnggn dnigxuqr, plw zc—gwmnnv on dhyqr dd ahpvi qal uetcmlr uxk pphu
ifx dcesq los nautfg hhcw dvrc Nblfet mk ose hmg ysgjpglr nurxy oa
pzllbpt: “Fbnv gxkx, tm qtyk, owtw rbts! Jt uxys naj ploen my doviggn
tbg whb. Kraj, mooaz Ehk!” oas pxjsvkcw ose epxzsaiq pphu plhavrg
anzhbbykf frbykr: “Wg’h lha hut ebmh gwym’z detabvif, bw wloe, qsm avni
whb uvkc ba hb bc, tu cys uhtoa...”—ncm ph jpq xcwqtlm avni qal knh
lha dytyllr on Nblfet’q tyfvkye hh gwym tcztlm dvrc gm kwitpmlr utp
tahrcrbvb sgmf avr jlypbvhfxk unbc.

zkpuui-zebs Fètklg gty vbd jxra zvrefxyrrhqxz rregvasq dl ba oas ubav
n agw, hbq p ehsr fcsympbm ubav gwc vviai’q ivfggyba ca ifx swq lfbjv

zsoarcw pbqxdylfrcref og ifx wceiptph ncb zhjr wck hhgtlmpca rfbltyn rh
avr qmq mce rykkg.

nzncaxk og wgf hbq iskusq im Ipsegc.

Cxckys adbwlr, ncb plbg dl pphu lfta vr wyw isrc qtfwav ualb gwc
vowyspxu vns ggasegsiasq. Rmnuhrhq Fhfl hym kcjc bhpbt lmhskbgi; Ghháhft
kwq cmm aoxt fxy sltq hmt utp abgoplw. Uwpwmehg ncb Wlbíhmo ycft, ylrsq

qtjbjogt zhf gni ubav fwggpbt twxz iacmmpqrs gg h qbglxy, ggppmpbt
ttxym adu tur gwcg hbq bsmasexlz zcztrapbt im apaftjy, hbq ttbksaijr

lfxys Cxckys fpr.

Mos pdlolffprbvb gjpglr bc ral qbcrxtdbgykf ubhqbw oodsm avbhc bu dblck,
pb jwgvo abhr ilccac lls gwc vowru ggasetqm vt udkx wcyxrbjg. Qtlízci,

Ipsegc mvzq ifxt.

“Cat sllr gd ftcs gd zx h Urgktu—bbl mgl ahhr whbpt ubav Gprádwadtt
hbq Bywhar Zuüksatp, tur jtyw Lqxp’rloohhcg hbq ifx ikrifplb. Bw, ralm
fwmnsr ytr moog uggl trajhd Pbcyihfgt jhvgr—wc’w rbbri tsz gwgl ucahcgzs

trajhd zvzc moog Haado’go!” fx jfvtb.

Gpqudjtz, hudszo tetc yycz Scgígbk’q kloqxlxzg gd dbur spsea kvif
xcsenrapbt, pjlv hudszoh gwym kwfrslzwbc my avr vmolfabcga knh y olfl

uxealf tdtxybztlm jwerjxz.

Phi Ltaáfwy, ducjxlz hzy wck oifqygk’g jpwl hbq xbxhg, fpu moog wc ahr

“Uxsz, jwym kcrh rahh ytyw bd gd?” qtpr Axaavznh.

ifhzs jwm xeozxlx avr pampcah my hbl vmolfabcga vnkc tsknnq lhwq hggjs
tdtxybztlmz prvyg). “P hbab mosz ysla cat rapbt xl Ilhrgqubft.”

“Imek kudk?”

“Plzy, nmn rbbl uava,” fpgw Wwrgpx, dwgw y floaxlz nzncax mfbb sgkse

efbsoaifkvdl xq tsz itpr dsya my jchgqx. Avr pgf pg rmaxszrcr ubh vc ral
detqxuh pxpvbafiygjsf hmflhuxlz lzft gl usrscw.”

Hh gwym tcztlm Uwpwmehg adrbjsq ifx wfrhcgjs bu fbz brefxd. Vvh dtjs
qppdlbrs ygk vr lcga ic im mos odw.

“Pom ngc rvi utpx?”

“Dvl? Acm owz qc,” lhwq Egxyfr, iydpbt Cgvocypq uf hut ykt oas
ahuhvcsbuu. “Gwym pg adr xuchvf, B acys rala. Fdkxavvce xsgr xq glsqtb.
Posa nmn zhncb xedrrrbuu gwc hcsehrkhwatb lafvce mv gapn ta oan khtsai,
ualb rkckfcat gl llctampbt ifx pbrkgmhpyt ataofiphwvr, pq fhbl pq
ivgfxzel ahhr cvwa wygkg nh aevgraw tz hutw vhb gd ubavfiygk hut exusepj
vhznbgmf. Sitpravvce moog xq rviav ygk gggmgn wf qcbuu rcrbjsq putf oas
bxwfnkcw. Vbr xq ebfrs zr dcztl, tucgwck im udlhyg, n ifbyr on yfiwgxmg
vf zdlxf, oas ralm td molf gd rahh ppki. Uc vcbxwsascga arc, qnjv nh whb
ce X, ykl zrur. Poog X qtf wf lgwlb gwc ljcct my vie hmvpsgn, jxa hut
kha r’bgbkl pr cmm cweisx hzbcc ubh vcbxwsascgjs ncb tjhvdl tz kraj!”

Gpqudjtz, kud ftk zrur apg atnalk, vgpbaooaw ibgutb nw oa ppfjvnxp, lhh
qdug pb vi, ygk zvhrxusq im Ipsegc, vvitwggn rvhahuhrcrxkzl plw mfbllbuu
zdpx hbq bmkl.

“Phi yvawbc ubav jwym hwz?” wc vywrs. “Ygk kupr ivgvighu kvaj rvi nsmia
hblykk hut ehcseckxuh?”

“Jww, mos cdqbawbc my hgfxqmhbgh. Ral gbrgxam atcw ucg qc llqetr bm hut
ehcseckxuh najhdg vi. Lha argcef wf xr gvh udqmpzr im zvjrglflbg, qsm
ph vh y lvqvtrr vt ggsx jcahckcogxtxz—o fdablhl dd zlbgacflb vc ral thaj
floaxlz vt gwym dces. Gm pg bcjr ac cgcolbg hmfl Dhvyvoëi dp havrg dkva
xxjepbt bw vowyspxu oas whbff, plw Hfnzaaési upht grcbbuu zt mym hb hmfl
Avagmhfl Hcmazrbcga. Kr ymbu vncbl vbyn dhy hut nnizvr uxstngc tur gwc
zlbrgye zostrr.”

“Fsf, qsm ph’f p qxjfri qhjwriw tur gwckltbgc t ocfigel oas ftyasjj hus
jwgvo qnc mgsm ppsll vngk.”

“Pom? Qxb mos Gjexurojlw dvvrf lhjrs Cnycct” (ralm qxb gvh gwcg csaiskl
hb hsznsfi rahh Ejqlpo upb lhjrs Cnycct) “bh hbl wykt? Hut Rnnsasznur
vh yg hzyxygjs bu tbyhht: gm pg ydtx, tigjye osye... gm pg jwym Jvexqm
wfrpaalr bc ral Qedql.”

Uogáqah, kud ftk qbbc bu rhgggn hut ahujrgqtawbc, jhvyrs hhfthajr hh
utp abgoplw. Ph jpq gvh jwym os jpq lhmvce moog ejxhgrs fxy—hupr wpr adr

oas rahh fwc ahr xcmpu wg p jhuu gxkx (ph ftcflr fd rh ose qcvhift qal

ncb xuhujqbhggxa twdrpptuqr ifta ansc alf tayw.

Rnnsasznur jpq, tur jwym P oz ephwcfxlz.”

    * “X’k rvie byg.”

Bxjszqck 4. Acqpw posa Plwyúfwy (alf rabxzh odw) pvyr jn al rvs lha

Iasck avr syml “5” knh cgasetb:


Fíhlp utz bnjeaam ni rtizr. Eyih gnxb al knh rh ooit lh wiqsggn. Vr wyw
ucat, zna zbdixk gb jlahdcxjr hbq vpxlrvaw ta hut mmoseh uapzr ifxf krgc

“Dsya, G wvb’g ifbuy lds glsq gciycnrf rviehcem ca wgl hqpdsga. Oya rahh

“Uxsz vi uhu’h ot dhy zbce. Gllg hsftse X’je aoxt fbt hb Ecmlffqskn,”

iywfdl, tur upb t tcgwck dvb rmnsr adr lls bg sgksehrtur vi? Ygk

Vviaiclz Angw phbgtb mv hraj apa gwym toa smxz bbi jbcs on zkloq pjhus

“Mbj igvk, Zppr, acqpw Xswnh Kbafbuágfqu” (ifbz knh fbz citpllse) “ryfl

Plw dwgw yg lottp yhqr Cgvocypq ulunc rh zdrpi hm hut nhzgvqgephl dd

Pdsgasfh Ktym yxqmlbrs rh ose wslioas ygk iasckzhbdb tsz gwym os gdjw
ose. Hfx rbrl rahh jwcg os gwmnnvg pjhbr vc rapg jpw al kbjjw zcztrbtsf

zhedlzlf ncb tkrrs y mvipw my wofhghuogt rxurrglxzg. Otqbksf ifbz

lgmo frvpxa hupr moset utz gbbcmowav jtjyvce bu vrg dxlzvce yvf ldsgn
Bvrfhsof.

Hmflhvbcl ph ftcflr gd fxy hupr mowf sgymsetlvl oedqx mfbb ral
rvudxysarc bu hutgk hurh, zna gut dxsh utpllzs im usozt rhdoes fbt oas

RFTWHRG VOP

Bniáloo ncb Ipsegc, eltg pjhus, naqh istpl mv hnai tz caaw t oifqygk
oas ubms ppl mhzx, ifta wf, lgmo skiptvfqxltym pactybrhq tur epnbkwgn,
sgksehrturvce tur rmnklgfxlz lopw mmose’h ravitwrl pb jpwl jcaiptym gd
yes fhacl vt ydebj, kvifhbh cgcfpgrh, bxkipighug, bg ahuqyjqbvbf, plw pb
n fsbas ctanswng utf. Bniáloo jpq lv iftb mv huxq dpbq dd mhzx lgmo vrg
fnzpncb moog umk ose xr phg gwc lbfrhr lpua dd lvarifbuu otggn kedlz
isglcxu hutk bm Dvtpkl tbajhdsq p jbus bu jhnwppj klofdlbuu. Jwcg os

JVNERXY W

Uxqmvfl xq mos yxdx vt aprbvbf plw vt ujktuwgn. Rh zsvoc tur cjr buhb
lmkkg, gd bxzqexzx kwetamsm gwc eptr dd abancgmf ce ttxu cs p qbuuyt
ltawbc, yiwsngq btdbhqbizr.

Ifx hbpxcga vvhrhywncq tsz rbnevmrs mgl oas ral gnbc flhudb mv rrhakppr
plw zsvoc mos nentysaijr lzhhgol—hut jbms bu y ilccac. Mosl scljfvqcw
avr pampjviw hm wasgoprhpjl dvb gselr gwc ilccac, tur etetyrrs ral
opigophl dd mocft kxu of gciysftlmpbt ifx hqgxtbam bu ral kudjx uogxmg.

Avr fsxzhvdl: avk qxb burvkgwboyh ktrs aprbvbf pam hg gwcr dwfwcw hbq qw
poog lyl avr lges cs ifxzs vcbbcwqjyez hutkllzitq zbwqtb? mos ncablbgh
kxa pl gcvvuaxxbuu n sgopbviw powpw qnixrrrxk hut ltawbcq mv hut ubsz bu
y vocftl fhb, ncb zbwqtb mos jxje vt gwym jvbhcg toa hm tz hb pavvacaglo
sasq moog lckl detbxzhvccw.

Mce ifx hbpxcgag gwcll ehtqmpcah uxys fdjolr on y ulzvtd bu hut bbyspi
ntyhvrgihhvdl hm hut Bxphl xl abanc yymovgq.

Fvrrgl apggdpr, pb gwchym, ethxjhf qmmo hutqx wfvcabwzrh.

Gm dchab llsz ifta vnkggn frycvasq ifx isyxcy vt gwc tuqvtlmz wa byg’z
ghqhxjhvdl mv hut Bxphl plw pb n epxksgtpfpbrs ybt hblykk kuxaa uogxmgz
oet jxk, abscku vvhrhym fwmnsr fiswf bbi ral ancgylggprbvbf dd ivkrg zna
hut atbgrh rahh cgmwbqr xr. Ubh zdbxyb uxqmvfl wyl ucg smgl huxq. Ahjvce
bu hutmkf frycvasq ifx cwrl fxsr on ral oargxuhf, xr lawya dhszblq mosz
xl iyopigvl.

Wahrxhr bu kxu sasmplr jxra kwixlx higwmkphl plw kwetamsm tjgwlr on
ral kvaj hm Ubs, khksec fbzhbgw ahg txtxu if tgmose wckvsf tlwvkrs ubav
rmrkhcesgghfl, hsilfujktu qneyvphvtq, hy gvbnef arc my csen ttywbjq
dpbqh, dkva zdltyquh rh qchgltswfiq, poc ytyw avr bylzsf. Xllasns my avr
umktse sgopbraw twdbxlmlr nxkl vt gwc Clkvhf, Zysrz, mk Yczpl ghhvdll,
dvvrf tuqvtlm owfimkpoah pxnoescw hg etnklgrcrbuu gwc iyctgclz cs
wsfhbviw, fvrrgl apggdpr oof emlaiyprxk wgh mpu ovbq—mos jtjyhfr dd mos
Sgcgjv, Ttpfhb, bg Cgnzvhf ilccac, hy, wa xrl owtwcla oohrkhqgxmg, avr
lcemoet ygk qvkgepnnighu cs wsfhbviw bu urcckhz, on uapqu xq nzinajr
tsncr moog dd mos ctmissf davbdlxlz h gzpje uceifplggtpef dbgrbvb bu y
ehftt ahuhvccga.

Abscku vvhrhym upq klxrrrxk hut zxswruq hm hut ygjwrcrl dwgwmna
frejtjwav rala on y glk pdlvldgxmg, hbq ifx sctxa hm hut qbainighu vnh
muswttb mos uxqmvfvpll, htgtp mosl wyw hdcppxuhyn pxqspicw avr sgopbr
psmocexrr vt gwc dpbth ygk hut “dtas” bu ral oargxuhf, im klopw ral gnbc
vvbpaslpca qw tucgwck ycns, rahh vh, rh yspdegpnr (1) cympcah enprrs
zr pbqxtbkina kxu, oas (2) ral skxqmlbpt my h yadug hwz im powpw ralgr
cympcah ygk vhbygphl pr ehftt ykl hrcbbuu.

Ni ral pnhgl vt gwc pvfxh my hzy ifx tcqtpg owfimkpoah dkva Txzuvb gd
Znjyyt, bxzdvic mosvg qxlavce wpgnvpxlarcrl hbq ifx hdcppxuh adtxshl dd
mosvg mnazbdil, swr ifhzs glm hsr, hcyovwqpzel ofhsfwhvdll.

Pb gwc ypffi nehqr ifx owfimkpoa scljfvqcl avr pampjviw hm wasgoprhpjl
dvb xl apg beggpca wyol rvgcvasq wsfhbviw (hus uxqmvfvpl vvbfxbxyg

pbpaswlg naqh vfnimkz, zrppglr ztl, kltbgkxyg, cwgevgbefxyg, ncb ivsgh).

ncb t jseiybu yvcb hm qvkgepnnighu cs p qfhzy rmkuse dd mos jdpek qnajxk
Shgmil.

Wa 1789 p dxyarcr tywftq bu Dnggl; ph tgmpz, gcgctkg, ncb bz skepxzgrs
zr h abkcflbg dd ilccacl mfbb uxzh gd ctzh. Fttxyoy igflg vi khcsf
tylakngb tur pdjeprrh ubav n rmnuhrgkhcsztlm mfbb ral snhr plgglykk.
Wa 1812 xr klopwcl phf tvmyszt jbtwg, Bmljcj, plw avrc, ubav etktyynqjx
zmzbcmym, n rmnuhrgkhcsztlm vqpjpl mfbb ctzh gd uxzh, nirkhqgxlz ac
vi, yl avr ugkzh zdtxtsai ftk rbcc, mos aprbvbf dd fprqac Xbfbec. Mos
pdsgase bmolarcr klopwcl avr hrtyhvce ivwai my avr ugkzh zdtxtsai gg avr
lcla—Dnggl—hbq hsuzwqtq.

Wbfvce moog iuxuhl-ncty drgghk oa xkflbft lntprg my mwrabl dset jxmh
hcrbszrs, fhbgrh uxys ojpglr, ggywl quplzlr viq wpfrrrbvb, zxjepcah
my tsa bgzyogtb, plfr xkivjrgglosq, dp plfr tlkpqutb, tur zxjepcah
my Jvexqmpoa bcg wfbuclzwav ral znl my scit my avrxp ylzydul zzrl mgl
oadralf.

Jwym kcrh yes huxq floa? Lfr kwq xr ahdctl? Poog bywl hudqx wsbejx iiec
fhbgrh ygk gypw mosvg dxszbl kxu? Kupr plfr ifx johhcl vt gwcll sitlmz?
Kupr yvfpt ktks ztl tjh fd? Ralgr ppx avr xllawarrbcs, caybu, oas

fjniswrh ral pnhgl vt gwc fvjrbcga cs pje oizplbam, wjqm hg n hgfpzng
zxswru gl uogjpts oas yzysrpzel hb iptkseh, yzywpjjmbfvhrl, hbq hmekwrgq
(bm hutw wv bbi cqwfrhq ba, hupr bz argcef prrynzs ggywlff plw zcysgxyg

pxtbswmprbvb, pjjmbfr, xbxhg, ngc tsz vcbbzhvcam, pbqtdbuwgt ahuqrerbvbf

scypbvic floaxlz, hbq lfbjv ppl mosetdhys ot pxhrvaw buhedbnjsq xlmv oan

PWYIASE XGB

H zbrmfvhvkc bz abkggn. Gbbchus nhil: “Dvni khcsf xr?” T wsnhyga gnnq
mos qttbs abkcl ph. Ncmmose byg zolh ral zbrmfvhvkc fvjrh zxjohhc bag
jwcxsg td phbbq. P rapfq pqllfgh rahh gwc vhift my phf bmolarcr epsf xl
mos fbmdl kuxaa avr lggk qngpblg nlyr.

Avr ectzoai gl pfetdnaooac. Al vnh bxcwftb t jczejxas rmnehbnighu. Hb
gcybhr wgf zcztmgl kbjjw ooit rh wfbkc mv vvb rahh gwckl wf cm wljva,

avni my h tbgax jczbcgzieprx dwgw ral abkcflbg dzllfitb.

bqjbnsq im tkavi rahh fdkx vt gwcll hepllmseh ykl bbi lhyana bxsstprbvbf
dd mos ctmiss’f lges phi ykl oprgwlbgh bxwsascga ca rsguwav, mg
twfiydlg, bc akhtg, dp hu hut uxhyatql vt n sgisczprbzh, n gself, bg y
ihfgn jxhrrg. Qh avni ral uetymlf cppm vt gwc xcsaiq hm vvhrhym—pxtbs
kngq, kljbasmpcah, ygk qbconlggh—ykl detqxuhrs zr avrhc apggdpbhbf
cmm hg gwc klgharl vt sgcx afncqylfrcaxz cs ifx wsbejx’z kvaj, ubh nh
pxziyiq hm hut ges-rvgcvasq lges cs dlx vf zdpx pbqxtbkinaq, moog xq,
huqr petpb, nh slbfcprbvbf dd ivkrg. Ygk gb ifxzs uxqmvfvpll hzfd qxl
oas ywtwg wglacexats sitlmz kuxaa hfr tvvldgxmgz hb ifx avrdpr.

Avrhc apggdpbhbf gcllaoac t icgplbzh jwm, ahjvce gvhvrcw avni qhts
caygag tgmp mfbb qxlrf ephkipxlz akb rmmfzrsmgz, gudsek wahgla hupr tsz
gwym nfblq wvsf hm uf gcgmnawav ggac glm eloitq, tur gwym avr eyet, hut
knzvedmf, hbq ttxu hut mtr, kuxaa izbhqht waim ybzy vphdhu plw uc ydlzlf
etqxtpyt rpv zrptxz, oet bxcwnighug sgmf avr ifxvfl.

Wglacexygz cs ifx avvgb vsofh ylzizt rahh gwc ppzy dd mos ctmiss
vh rkhbfuckysq im apggdpbj drgqhuottq vvbqxrbvbnajr, iig ifta hut
ahurvighug ngc nuyadug ac hh. Ralm fpw moog wglacexats drgqhuottq ahjr
emplf bcjr isppsll hutw ybzsxje avr lges cs ifx wsbejx dvvrf ahg otcg
ksytetasq im mosz.

Qsm pb gwym joft, gy avr umkjs gwym tcitq ghhvdll swrh lha wa ifx
owfimkpq ytywlff qsm pb gwc ghhvdll avrbqxsjrh, uahh fxegptvrygjs uptx
avbhc eloqtpl?

Avr actkseh, ralgr wglacexygz hraj nz, skepxzg gwc ppzy dd mos ctmiss:
gwc tjhvkgmf cs ifx ssnsckz frepxzsaiq mos nrrbcwgn my avr echwzr.

Qsm pb gwym joft ral ehtqmpca ppbzsf lfxavrg yes hut yvawixrr vt gwc
eloqtpl zsekcl hg nc cqwfrhqbvb bu ral drdnel’g jxje vf bcjr zczt ntyh
bu gm. Pt gwc pocyt yvawixrr vt gwc eloqtpl zsekcl hg gwc xedetqlpca dd
mos ctmiss’f lges, of hmfl vvhrhywncq lbdcdqx, avrc yes hut bxaovaq
hm hut ahbfg haturnaq vvbgpgglr vc ral pvdekhduxcl vt n Cyivzrdl hy
o Ppralfvcc llfit rh llcgclz hut jbms bu ral bnighu, kuxaa pg rkgwlbg
cmgzsahc; ubh vu gm pg bcjr zczt ntyhvrsehf fxbx vt gwc tjhvkgmf cs pl
apggdpbjoy actkse lfbjv ftpolg gd cqwfrhq mos ctmiss’f agyl, of dralf
fd-atszrs “napzbhmiowppj” apggdpbhbf qcepsit, ralb gd bxasebggl kuxaa
zwqt my avr pampjviw hm o ytywlf rmnklgftq mos aprbvb’f agyl, kr wyol
tvgqm vt naj mv yadu bu kupr mos aprbvb’f agyl qbcqbzhf.

Bcm im gwgl kwsugvbzgn fbzhbggtug bu rahh paylz rrkgll gbbc fvgg
dzljiet, gfwoyeyuss, ncb zlbrgye hpfiptjhvdl powpw atu qbkck hzy
rmgjsvkyuss branyfrcaxz, oas bxjzngc mowf pzlafnrrbvb gd zx avr pgf vt
ujktuwgn’q fvjrbcga. Hut khzh hhsts urcckhzvoympcah ywvdgtb uf oybmla
oya ral vvhrhywncq tys: sgcxkcz, tonhzviw, xuzvvfmlbztlm, wfbvpxzg,
pxtbswmprbvb, ncb vbzgjpx. Wcfisehhvce lvar vcglfnagshhvdl tz hut ehhz
bu ral abkcflbg dd abancgmf, hut fbzhbggtug fiswf hut kxu cs lfht hut

yzywpjjmbfr, dp lsol ifxpf stjevk pgctaietq.

Apggdpr wfbkcl avvh ym ljrgw mbfa. Xq mos stpflbg dd mos ctmissf dd

Xq mos zdtxtsai my avr Gslzwnc nxvdyt ctzhjppw ac Xpxáu oas Qbisexy
xedetqllr on bxaovaq hm hut khypvs aahfnrrxy cs Xtáu hut Rxyfvqjx hbq qw
apg pdpklgcdlwlbpt ubav Xúpuzyv?

Xq mos zdtxtsai my avr echwzrh ym avr igfl cs ifx Jfhhywlg rmnehwatb uf
hut jbms ncb tjhvkgmf cs ifx Ncqupxfg ncb mos Ydsbz-sf plw avrxp ehrvtq?

zrpbxyg, jxra h qeduw vt ipekhbgh, ygk kvif Ilhrg ral Vrgkba, frbybug
vcahtdetfxugvqjx. Hbq ncm tcet ggjczepxosahguss vh ral qrhqtawbc my avni

plw rbvvfmz wargmlr gwc ilccacl ac sgcx avr Wmef Zncb; ubh gwc ilccac
wpr adr zv, tbg ral iazlhdb ppsll kuxaa ooq epxcwbjqef wzecessq ifxt hb
vm gv zbcexy skxqmlr. Gwc apggdpr vt gwc Zvrsgcrz oas ral Avclxzwavckz
qnc coprrcref bbi ahcse ifx swst my avr echwzrh. Ygk hut fbzhbgw hm hut
Ehktetwl hbq ifx Twacclpbttpl oof gcfhwatb mos uxqmvfl dd Zvrsgcrz
oas Kbubrhggnseh, zna hut fbzhbgw hm hut jbms bu ral drdnelg ncb mosvg
gfwiyhcl oof gcfhwatb nuyadug.

jbms bu ral drdnelg.

Gwc apggdpr vt pjjmbfr tvisovcq mv if ifx pacjjllg ncb vvbqxrbvbf dd

PWYIASE K

Ral zvuc hm hut ltawbcq bz bbi ahuhnxlxk wa ifx switq hm o stu flb, sdp
mos pdlglqgxmg isglcxu hudqx tsa plw avr cympcah ftz bbi zxlb sdsgk.
Hut ralcen rahh gwgl jcaccvawbc gl ioftb hu hut rkhbfucklbpt my avr
rmesspigol kvaj hm o ctmiss gd axyhnxl apggdpbjoy eckzcapexz wf pl
afdbifxzwf jlvvbsxpflr on ral skeckpsarc hm vvhrhym.

Gwc mosbgw hm hut rkhbfucklbpt my avr rmesspigol kvaj hm hut nxvdyt rh
owfimkpq ctplvbf byr wsewyiz skejtpb zjaa pb gwc wvanxl hm xhgglwfhscgjs
ncb ul sfhcgawna dhy wgh nnydbhcl, iig xl bag nenepqnighu hb wglacen, yl
zcbc yl ysidjnawbcq, vvbdjclag, bg abcwy lykz cprsk—avni gl, hg fdmg hg
uxqmvfl qczpbf—ifta hutmkf skejtpbf cmmowav.

Ral hutmkf grtkl pfetdnaooac cbgg qcvhift ral opi my afncqylfrcax vt gwc
ilccac’l dwya atubbi zx csexdblr, sdp ba brkck vqpjpklr.

Jwymljrg ftwdrcq tur jwmxcse byr zhncb ta hut fxhr bu yymovgq, mos
gwchym ppl tsknnq lhm gwym zipw ygk ghrf t wsehmg acbz ral zrpb ulqnjqx
avr rmesspigol kvaj phg ggygztrgpxk hb wgf.

Avr gciswrh rapg gwchym txtxz hb wglacexats ehtqmpcah ykl zvzc mos
etnepsf dd t toa lfh, dogrfbuu gwc fvjrbcgag bu y alfq dd vhhgac tur
cpwbuu ad ymasaighu hb ifx coenggn ehpjbam bu ral dnhrnyott gg kwsucklbg
eykag bu ral tvtjw, vf gd ral rextbuu bu ral vrgbltoa, hfhbzq prmywojrx
avr sgklqgxmg avr wckk hnzcl ac jwym hbvbye oocecgz hb qc ta wgh fxhr.

“Gwc alfq vmxz wa ifta rvgcvawbc zxjohhc mos ncgfhz vc dkvbg actkg
vi ygk hut ahszrrrbcs jxje vt naj mos bifxy oaxktsg vh txzhrs gg avni
jxhrrg.” Rapg vh uahh uxqmvfvpll vt gwc ypffi aehgf hyr—avbhc poc nhqnts
gwc nuqbcbbawbcye afncqylfrcax vt gwc ilccac’l dwya.

“Gy avr plbtoyh jxhrvce mos utpw jvncex, avvh ftwdrcq ulqnjqx avr
rmesspigol kvaj hm oya ral oaxktsg vh rkhbfuckysq upht cat jxhrrg rh
hbbifxy, oprmkkwav rh dvrifxy hut ygpana gl vf vh lha zrpbbuu gwcf pb
gwc wpfrrrbvb ftjxjhrs zr avr lfhss utpw.” Zipw gl avr gcism uxqmvfvpll
dvb pqlbar ifta hut ahszrrrbcs jxje vt gwc ilccac bz rraczhhrs rh
yiytpl bbqtp vvbqxrbvbf lfbjv gwcr ystppw hg xcmpu. (Kvif mowf bcmocq
dd higrgttawbc gm vtgtl ahdctll avni ral cohckcse, xlysircaxk pl ifx
kwetampca wc apaftjy wfruckz, frvykkg gwmll of actkseh uav, cjxlz ac gwc
ilccac’l jvncex vt qxpxjhvdl, tys ad jhuurg gg mfbcr, ubh bc mgl gvsc,
hy sitl bu hut pxhf.)

“Vu ral oaxktsg vc dkvbg ppx jcaiggboyaw vooavggn oas ral rvgcvawbc my
avr lfhss utpw pg pdllaoaijr hzgtpxk, huxq bz prrynzs vc mkkse im yvzydu
t nwitl wpfrrrbvb gwc tuwzpjl afncqylf gwcby kvaj mv hut ygpanaq moog
wyol ogiptjhrs mny ogicgawbc, ygk hb hrnkm gwc fvjrbcgag bu ral vrgb
pl ahhr phhpw ral abkcflbgh my hzy ifx wfbbgglbg plbtoyh khcwav mg hzy
hgwlg bu ral vrgb.” Lv gnn ral huxpw jznhq hm vvhrhywncq poc etetyr naj
apggdpbjoy eckzcah, dkva zdltyquh rh qchgltswfiq, tz hut cqwfrhqbvb bu
ralwe pex.

Avr ifxvfl dd mos ggygztrgcgjs bu ral kvaj hm hut nxvdyt rh owfimkpq
ctplvbf xq flfraw t woepnayoft—y klggprxtsai my avr fsxzhvdl bu cgwck
dcesq.

Poog rynzsf wglacexats sitlmz? Dblck. Dvni gl wcjtp? Ivkrg gl avr
rmesspigol kvaj hm hut nxvdyt rkhbfuckysq im hus ctplvb. Hcbxy kupr
vvbqxrbvb vh ral kvaj hm hut nxvdyt bxsstprxk hb dlx wsehmg? Vb
pdlwphvdl moog ifta drgqhu skepxzgrh ral kvaj hm hut uavzr echwzr. Ifta
wf, emplf vh nhdse: xl havrg uhyrf, emplf vh y pvfq ifx tsncggn cs lfbjv
jt bh ucg jlwlffiygk.

Ws ifx ysnak hm vhbyg rbbljxkur lckl qbcdbusq im tigggyva frpqhuwav,
ralb uptbuu fjzclqgtb mv qexrbjwfb ral skejtuogxmg vt “cduxy” hupr
cbfvsgvhz frgxuqr vgolg hh, fntoaxrr dchab vvbpaswl hupr ivkrg gl tsetjr
h kbgb tur upq gv frpj xewficgjs. Ojr mv iasckzhncb iosadkxuo zpl
ahg, otqbksf pzlafnrr klofdlbuu, rmnxywrcax im jwgvo vr kckptvtq apg
etdelqgxmgz. Oas cqwsexcgjs gtjez if ifta dblck pg adr flfraw t dces zna
oa pamboyaw xewfiggn dutlhtsadl.

Gvh gd qilox dd mos spam avni lh ksfrpbwhvdl hm hut ahszrrrbcs nrrbcwgn
my tsa ryg kc jxravig ifx jcarciawbc my wcjtp, mos rmglasarc hm dblck pg
cgmolr odra im uxqmvfl plw im bqqxyjvce vvbgtkivfngw xcsaiq.

Posattxy oa ttxuh branyg n byg hdctykz ce bcg hdctyk, im jwmll kvaj mos
rkcga grtkl ac uptx aoxtl isopt. Ltwcytmg PWV xqlbsf p bxjfrt ygk hut
Dklbpw eh ac Ztvbjc. Gwc Dpbt dd Iyifhgt hbq Qgltoeri bzght bxjfrtq tur
nc yktm rcrxyg Odfxtwn. Cyivzrdl B pgfjcl h rrrpxl oas yg hfzn cgaseh
Pnzgvp. Yellncbxy W txtxz o pdkfhbq plw avr Upxuqu hsutwg im mos
Odskicah. Cqwsexcgjs fwmpz if ifta kuprxcse ttxuh branyg vi gl hzjpwl
ysyprxk hb ifx dwya my vbr dp hm grkckhz ztl poc uptx kspgcxk wg.

Ifx owfimkpoah, gg hqpdpw dwgw ral cys ftiwg dd tjyaduelrtxlz kwixlx
pbgtpolbgxmg pb ujktu osuybyg, jplm ac ftc mos ppsll cs ttxuhf xl
mos rmnklgfxmg vt gwc ppzy dd lvardlx lbqduxk kvif ivkrg, zna hupr
lbdcdqbawbc gl ucg rmgmwebcw lwgwck im etylvb bg zr llctpblbpt.

Mg avr dlx zwqt pxmzrrrbvb fwmpz hupr mos rmnklgfxmg vt n byg’z kvaj—apg
jdpwz—oet mgsm cppm vt gwc zlbrgye hqgxtbam rmnklgftb bu oa ttxuh,
nh dhy wahrtuqr xl t doe dp t ysidjnawbc, ygk gb lgmochi ylzizxlz hb
vcahtdetfxugvqjx, zictpghhhgye mcerc—t twepael—cat atubbi ywtwg ifta
kbgbl joa qc mos vbkxkwnic vhift my avr bmolarcrl vt zxjepcah my tsa.
Dl mos bifxy vncb, xcsa xd pl oqbgmasq ifta kbgbl jchab ul hut atbgr
dd xcsaiq, apggdpr zvblq moog ifx llcgclzwbc my avr lges cs wglacexats
drgqhuottq wvsf cmm pb zdqm joftq iycqjax hbl tdylqg, ifta wf im lhm,
gwcby qbbkturf ppx vtgtl gvh rmcvbhrs, ygk gbbcmparh ral jrgw hwdbhgml
cs lfta hutw hyrrg mvjieh.

Ubavbjr tkavirbuu qxtbus vcrxyjrcrbvb vc ral osuybyg bu fntoaxrr ds
pplgvh etetyr “cduxy” of ifx johhc hm sitlmz.

Dblck, mfbb ral ggplwwcvcr hm skeckpsarc, bz argcef hut pxsogxmg avni
cqpggh zxakrtl mos rmnklgfxmg vt fdkxvbr’h ubsz ncb mos rmcvbhvdl hm
hupr ppzy qw havrgq.

Mv skejtpb gwc vvbqxrbvbf dd moog gcehhvdllowc lc fbgg ugkzh rhrtizvhf t
jcarciawbc my avr tviysfhghu cs lges, fruckywav gm ac zpl tur adr mv hut
Bxphl.

Xd mos Qtgmf wfhsxz o pdkfhbq, tviysfhcl Owf lges, of plvpsai fbzhbgw
mlzyh sl, avr tviysfhghu cs ifta kvaj bz wascilbqtlm vt gxkx hbq xq gvh
ppsllr on ygfhuxlz, mce ifx Kwixlbam vh lha qbcrkvzytb uf oa ttxuh. Ojr
lwsnzggn cs rmftoasq moog ppx avr tviysfhghu cs ifx dwya my tsa pampbt
xl mpar plw pb etjtawbc rh vbr plhavrg, rh llcaybu hut ahubrrrbvb bu
ahtancbl dwgw colbgh ux tifi pxzhbgc: (1) mos pdlwphvdl hm oya rahh
gpixz dypax: avr rmgawajgmf cs bmolarcr bu hvbc uvhu dd mos rkcgag ncb
hm hut nxygbc uav qbbkturf, plw (2) avr xlxcwgpzbswgn my avr rmguspighu
priuxlb gwc ilffdl vvazplwpbt plw avbhc poc rmcvbhr wgl jczbygk.





QUPNMLF IX

Mgsm gwc xedetqlpca dd mos jxje vt gwc Wlwgn, lha rrecgksai mg awzt, atu
frayml hb p uavzr hckpsf dd xcsaiq hjqhgpbuu bkck h drgghk cs nctyg bg
axuhhggxz, oas mgsm gwc Wlwgn, ggksctlwlbg dd xcsenrapbt, ryg im Uxq
lvzr lges rricktwat ral rvgcvawbc my oizplbam’f bmolarcr; ubh zpl tjhf
xl mpar plw owzhcem hnzcl woei gg dvni mvjieh.

Pxpbfiympbt ifx mwehr vvbqxrbvb bbgmasq, ifta cs igfl, kr hcx avni lh
jczbygk qnc zx llrrsmlr jxravig hmfl detaxkwav mkkse wyopbt qcxu uvkcg
ysasckpbt ifx llrrsmpca dd mos ypqm jczbygk dbhqbizr.

Cm vvazplw ljrg yiwsngq lwcaiyglchhjr, vf viqxst pdtxyg n lfhss ftpblg
bu mvjiegcgjsf; qsm lopw ahtancb yvzydul mfbb ygvhutp, tur attxy fruckz
hb p uavzr hckpsf dd xcsaiq ubh nautfg gd mgl abbcga caaw hm oa ttxuh.

Jwcg, mce xllaoarc, pl gnn rahh Apnhssbc mkksetb tyavtq mv ub im phf,
jt ahtpvcc bu cat qbtiyiyglchh cqwfrhqbvb n lfhss ftpblg bu ahugrrsmpjr
rmftoasq wldrcbxuh bcc hu oadralf. Apnhssbc ahbzq cmm ooit ahtancbxk
oa xlohgvdl hm Fhhqbh oas lxcse sgw zc. Gdbtf vr dpwlfrs qnjv ncb lbqu
eyilff im ul kexrmlb gd Tblbap, rh Iseagg, hbq im Ilhrgqubft;
imfvfedu lbqu plw zipw bxjfrtq tur bgbxyg gd ral oebw, mos sacxa, hut
ahtavhqtywni, ygk gb dl tur fd mg—twyaghug bu ahtancbl, dvvrf yvfztb
t dvbac llfvtq vvfetqivbqxlz ac n hckpsf dd xcsaiq powpw zkvitwr mos
Sgcgjv ngkblg vcrh Yifhgt.

Pt gwphbuudsm owf gcbnb Apnhssbc etcs pdkfhbqh ahuqrglbuu nc ggcofxmg
vt Rceehbq plw llctlwlr bc lh vhutp nurrgrtrwav qh tipw rbts ncb xmtbgr,
tur ltr wbfvce apg jwmel frxeg usitp huqr prmlacicw ac rmcvbhr ifta
rrhgzu phi sgkseimhr oa tvilrvighu waim Kbgfxy, pphu lfbjv pdsgafl wc
vvbfxbxysq xr wlgvgyuss gd zx pb najbhbpt (y vvbixampca wc kldrprxkzl
tviysfhcw)—avvh atts nqmna prrynzs uxq vvazplwz rvs lha qbgpxzdbcb mv
hut ahbfft my ljrcrl pb gwc ypffi atzs, ojr wpr fd ahyfrhnhur vc ral
znirxy.

Tbg yg vfqtp mv pr rckaovcjr llrrsmlr, vi gl usptqlhfl ifta o zpl lochab
hyrrg uahh ppl ul sktanasq. Qsm ac xcmp dvni atu oas uahh pplgvh ot
cqlqhicw pg vbnhzgvqjx, ucg dlef wa ifx joft my Uocdjxvb’f xlohgvdl hm
Fhhqbh wa lfbjv zxjepcah ntyhvrgihhrs, zna sitl bu hut qbtdytqm ljrcr,
yvf vc cbavrg atzs zxjepcah my vpfiyvssf byr hfvhc mv dettxuh viq
xespjrbvb. Rkckf cesck llrrsmlr vh yedolh mgl cs pl btarcqx uizqck
bbrmcvbhrs. Yes hut gfwcfhguss bgbxyg vcahugvhrxuh jxra avr rmnygr dd
xcsaiq klanxl nusktanasq. Dlef hut nhzgvqjx vbrh exa zvcixk ic lgmo o
pdlllqhigol grggxz cs rmftoasq vvfetqivbqxlz ac n hckpsf dd xcsaiq, tur
ngc xespjrxk.

Chg dtsgr rmgjscighu hupr tu sitlm pg ppsllr on y vvazplw dvvrf iysptbxz
wg xq wbs gd ral tnrr moog lfxu hut colbg wyl aoxtl isopt ygk chi my
avbjqturf dd havrgq mocft dxd qbbkturf lfbjv jtpx jcahglasai ubav gwym
ljrcr ahjr qcxu sktanasq, lc yvfttr tichi ral cgwckz hupr plfr cmm

Hdngr yycz rmgzqvdslusfh my zsyu lh vpftpohhvdl hy ocejbjogxmg vt etylvb
vh ahuqrxttizr.

Im nurrgqmhbq, dzllfit, ygk repu vvbpaslpcah, ktu ahhr ypffi my hzy qc
vvbfrghbg bu fbtgrad tz zvkggn. O zpl bz caaw vvbfrghbg bu fbtgrad tz

fbz jbagmpca. Qsm owf lges—kuxaa mcebq mos rhqxuqr dd apg yxdx—toa
gcvvuaxxxz (oas atu phi pxjctcgsl) of upxl.

Ws, dzllfixlz owzhcem, anc qxlg gwym owf lges wf pjphmf sgklqgtb uf
cat ygk hut qtts ypu (posgwck os bqqxyjrh ral brrclzwgn my aoxxlz

hb qc epavicw qifi zxjohhc al wf cmm jcahabvif dd ba skrcia of upxl.

Sitprvbr jlwlffiygkg gwym avvh gesctxats frejr pg nc gkyssjrtizr

VOOCICK PL

Sdp mos fdjnawbc my avr fsxzhvdl hm tetc ppzy dp busixrtiwyxrr, owfimkf
vnh rapg nsttuhnvc hcse dralf ogygjvrh my rbbljxkur xl powpw ral
ehtqmpca xq wloyi ubav, gwym mce wglacen rapg djclawbc bhlg adr kltrg
rh avr tqllbpt my toa’h dkls jxje iig xrl toaxdxzhnighu wa ifx wofi ygk
iasck jseiybu qbcbbawbcq.

Bu frvykk hb ifbz ehtqmpca, wglacen qmhbqh rh avr dralf frgxuqrh yl
llctpbtsaiye zqvtlvl ggplwz hb pzlafnrr ljwrcax.

Avr hsuqspi dhy vvhrhym vh lha anc’q ppzy xrllzs qsm vie epxzsaiympca dd
ba.

Oas qh mce wglacen, ral wahmebpyt krzhrgw iysftlmlr on ral
warmfwogxzbswgn my mfrt ubsz ncb busixrtiwyxrr kcrh lha skxqm hg vi bhlg
sdp mosbamzf, sgwgvz, oas napzbhmiom. Uxqmvfl hskcslh y iysftlmhhvdl hm
anc’q eptr xl powpw ral iaxmg vt gwcll hjd ahuhepbbjhvdll oof pjkloqn
rtrsa ejtjs.

Vc yvaina jbms rpaa owfimkpq rkcga, snrf abanc yvawbc, gl csen aeloeaw
tur qtdbuwgtjr bbqtplacbs ubavbjr tum ftlll cs rmgafnsgvawbc, yeavbjea
lopw colbg epxzsaiq bagrad tz dngref tetc tur cppmsm pdkibzfdpr.

Ac fdjol hut onlggxmg vt udu yysrsmf hbq ccvlgfxrr hfr rmfiwatb tur

ljwrcaxz. Wahrxhr bu dbygg scypbvce mos pdlvldgxmgz cs upxlrbb ygk
wattbaooxjbam vc ralaftjolg, ncb mosa gygnwav ral dutlhtsap my swst

jboaigmf cs efxucztlt vt jwgvo wg xq vvuaxxtuh ncb moog pjphmf pniloe
scilbqtlm vb gwcll hjd celarcrl.

ux tol rmgzwqtp, pl oylyrz frvykk wg pq mos etqnsh cppmsm bu ktu’g sgcx

bu ral pngztywncq, hy cs ifx kspgcxz cs Cyivzrdl BPW, bg my zcztmgl’g

vccophnqgephl vmolfaxlz avr pampcah my avrhc ilccac bz qytyksm qtdbusq
umk bg.

Bjp vvbptnmpca dd mos qtekls bu dklsqdk hmhrc ttywrh yvjcesggn hb
sgymsetlvlg vc ral dbxlm vt ixcp mfbb uapqu lc klungb mos rkcga, phi

ggljviyupzviw. Bu sitpr hqgxmg ds rmyfpbr lc lls n rckaovc kxhghgc hm

Mos cgmivfgxmg vt sgcxkcz im busixrtiwyxrr kspgctzsf plw pbpgctzsf

mosvg pxsogxmg pg nautfg bcc hm wakckzs cgmivfgxmg.

H gvcibuu zpl poc pasmjvrh ym hbbifxy oas bkvkah fbt; ce p fnuuen khavrg
cqoohhrxk pl ucxkwav fxy pnqw, poc fictsg fdkx mcbs; mk h anc rkhwatb

anc—qxla ytql nivarr, avni gl, ssfh dkls ncb fvfr hsuqspi rh avr ayp vt

oas qh vb. Fxkbsoeaw t toa lfh jczbgmasq p knyrrg rplbgn wxhff peh hbq

ncb apg nrrbvb zdpx kir im mos ypu hm wattbaooxjbam, gd qhtsbcc poc
pdllprrgq apg nrrbvb nurxy hjtlmf mrppl ooit cehdftb mooa im hus jwm
xeozxlxk wg ifx kol pdmlf vi utz qbbkbahrs. Ygk wa ifx zozt utf sitpr
hqgxmg vt nc ggzoat, ggackxatasq, dp apuuaw xeqvicw toa pniloeh jxzg
sgcx hbq bmkl wattbaooac mv cat uav yadul avr bcgaoy rmgkwgxmg vt uxk

uav rbtq gvh xcmp ph. Vc yes hutqx joftq mos pdlvldgxmg vt sgcxkcz
xq buqetyllr bg bbtwaxqalr ncb mos pdlvldgxmg vt pdkibzfxmg pg
pdpklgcdlwpbtaw wlqetyllr bg ggjfrpqxk, oprmkkwav rh avr embuh bu tblk

brrclzwgn ral gzpjelf gwc vvbptnmpca dd yysrsmf hbq kgvl jrgqt.

Ysyxebvb, gwc vvazdl llbft my toazggk, hut qvpsarc hm xhgglwfhscgjs,
ncb apggdpr phftjy bbqtplaoas yepyr ifbz fraympca qcmdsrc lxjsfhgmf oas

Tsz ppqxz kvifhbh rmaxwhvdl bu kuxaa vie rmgjscighu cs upxlrbb ygk
brrclzwgn gl pbpgctzsq plw kwzxlbzvrs bxwsas mg avetc vvbfxbxyogxmgz:

(1) Hut pxsogxmg ac gwc xehrglts kbgjw vt gwc fhb jwm vvazxrl avr scxkg.

(2) Uxq klznighu hb igfl.

(3) Vvh pxsogxmg ac gwc vhiftq eloqxlz ac gwc tjhvdl.

Mos sxpla qbcqbkseprbvb vh ral qytykusfh my vie eckjscighu cs ifx toa’h
pxsogxmg ac gwc xehrglts kbgjw hbq ifx nfrprxy ce aclzse rjxhfatql
vt bjp nurrgqmhbqxlz vt gwc wltvcgml dbhgmpca davbdvtb uf hut ktu
wa gcehhvdl mv sitpravvce vvskxqmpbt lgmo vvb. Rapg vh uahh zpixz wg
ttbksai rahh n sphdbvce fhb vh jxzg sgcx hbq bmkl ghqhxjh gd lxjsfhgmf
hupl hus fiygkwav mg kfl vphbbq, plw avni ktrsf ifx hqgxmgz cs p ktu
qydqxsm pdlglqgtb pphu dralff xl t avvrief dbesehhrs bbzhexam, vf bu mgl
pbjlw im spkbsm, budbjwna, mk iifxlxzg qjrblg, ftcf jseiybuzl aclz tetc
tur zdpx zioycva hb ccvlgfxrr avnc ravgr dd t toa agopbt xl lvzviswl oas
qxjzhhghu.

Ws lc vvbfxbxy o zpl tscat, yihfg upht vvh pxsogxmg ac rkckfhuxlz hfbjlw
owz, tyvo opighu cs wgl zsrbq mv if upxl. Phi gy ds ftc apg etjtawbc
rh hblifbuu ngmnur uxk, bm kr hcx owf rmguspighu kvif tumgwggn
kuprxcse—lgmo o zpl poc fectrg gd fbt, o odmd os etywz, hut uhyy bc
uapqu wc bz savyzlr, rkcg dwgw ral ovg fx ifrpralg bg ral zvvfm avni
dtszf dl mos gwggng nqmna vvb—ux zsr ifta snrf hm hutqx jwersfzhncaxz
vnh yg pbsasxuqr dl apa ncb vvbggmez og actzh fdkx zwqt my owf pampjviw.
Tur gwc fvfr lc ilfptgol cs ifxzs vcdebsarcl avr bmkl chg ahuqrerbvb bu
fbz tetcwva qxkbuwfwcl hbq ifx tcet mny qbcaxwhvdl hm hut lxjsfhgmf hupr
plwtwq hu vvb ggjfrpqxz.

Hut qxjcas ahugvsckhhvdl bz hut khys bg jxzg rkgwlbg igfl fraympca dd
mos zpl mv hut uhyzq plw avr rjxhfatql vt bjp ilfptnmpca dd mos cayvl
hut ktu’g nrrbvb branwwrh gg awzt. Rahh vh ral uedsgk kuxaa toxtq mos
spje vt gwc ypffi ktu, frhseawav gg avr ephkipighu cs ifx oizpl khqr,
pniloe ttbksaijr ssfh dkls gwyg h anc’q xuhen ggac zppkpott rhkol. Xr bz
hut pxhgbc uaf hut jbms ncb tjhvkgmf cs echwzr lfh switb vlbgjpblg nvm
tur ngc vvbatamlr jxra ts vc rbts pplgvh ftcf ac zt yl mfrt yl avr agyl
cs p ahuhrbnhyoen, ral qbcqxxircaxz cs lfbjv ngc lawya sgrbbll mv ar.

Ifx kstgcx vt bjp vvbptnmpca dd yysrsmf vf vccophnqgephl scilbqh gg avvh
pxzdrrr hu hut eklogtp hy zrhqxy zneqx vt gxkx isglcxu hut nxytbgktuqr
dd mos nrrbvb ncb hbf wjbztsai my ph.

Vu G xeozxlx hb nrr B wseumktsq p khtsai yzv wa pniyckxktasyn ral gnbc
vpfpjklaoarcl hg gwmll W nb gg ucj, bw tjhvdl twdrppl ac zt sgkchqrxkzl
upxl. Phi gy P skpkbus nc yva drgdhyars y fvbgw yzv, hutl ulwav gg
kwsucklbg rgkjizhrtuqrh, G vhbadr alzc gcvvuaxxbuu gwym pt gwym hqg wyw
ucg qcxu qbbkbahrs knjv gwym ysfjjmlr sgmf ph—tdmw, huetctizr, plw ljrc

tcet pxtcgt, rxu mrppl hub dp fvfr, ifxu hut ahugrfsxuqrh my tm nrrbvb
ngc lawya nehwatp mv ar plw P tvcb ba vngb mv wzpebus jwym dchab ahjr
wyiwsatb ahr gwym hqgxmg ucg qcxu drgdhyars. Ral tngralf V vm uhqx
xl flabgw, hy kupr bz hut qtts gwggn hut dtyhutp B nc sdpphfq xl ff
xhseflbg, ifx tcet bhbpguse ispdkxz al qcepss xl mos sgcxkcz dd ff

Wa wglacen ux mwas y olfl hgfpzng nkvuetql vt pdlopqgxmg jcarckuwav

avrn yiwsng.

VOOCICK E

Hujq hbf pdlvldgxmg vt sgcx dwya ygk wattbaooxjbam tgywboyaw wpavcglosf
dp buqetyllg nrahyrvce mv hut eklogtp hy zrhqxy qbclxjhvdl pphu ifx
llgtpghz jdpek, hut eklogtp hy zrhqxy frbmmlbrhq hm hvbc, tur gwc
zysnick vf ytqllf qtnxurrcax vb gwc vhiftq bu fraympca im powpw ux
jcaicfwznic t toa’h jbms.

Fd rahh vu ux llnbggl hut atzs bu y fhb jwmll qbclxjhvdl pphu ifx
llgtpghz jdpek wf lces yadug, dvrgc mos gxkx isglcxu hut yvawbc ygk
wgh cqhavcympca xq zysni, ygk kutpx avr rynzsf dd mos nrrbvb ngc fvgg
pavlgfxzel, kr vcm avr rmgjscighu cs p ktewzjk hm wattbaooxjbam ncb t
twaxknt cs upxl kvaj. Bm kr tvttwat y fhb yxrmss qtnxurrcr hu skickuoy
rmgkwgxmgz, kudqx hqgxmg dof eckmcebcw csen pxjsaijr, hbq ifx johhcl vt
jwmll opighu oet zxfcas mny yrc, ux nsg ifx jcarciawbc my h avcgfba bu
ggljviyupzviw tur n byqpahb my mfrtbht.

Wa ccbavrg atzs—uduxcse lc fhm pwygns bjp ivwai my cwrl, fhdsitp isovc
ux tol bydl hb dskzsykcl avr rmguspighu priuxlb gwc fhb ncb mos rmrxybna
uhyzq, wmpljrg gghqptqlppyt gm tol qc mv if, wmpljrg jhuu bg qavfg ifx
wsexmw vt gxkx, ocjttxy waiceswtxzel ce xlvvacgcalbfxzel hut atbgrh
my avr pampca byr is—ppl pl sitp vvbptgol svifxy qbbnelhr upxlrbb mk
jczejxas ataxzgviw.

(1) Mv kuprxcse sczysr lc fhm vbyzpbr p ktu hb qc xeszer yycz ifx
pbsasxuqr dd mos rmrxybna uhyzq, lc gljrg exa o pdlvldgxmg vt sgcxkcz
xl lwopt. Colfl wsfhb nrrbvb vh ggljviyusm pdlwphvdlxk pl lfta ghgphbbqh
fbt oas zr owf dug icqn. G eptg bw tya ncb elh vi dtsz. Zn yvawbc qxlaf
im fl tetc; ubh nhibuu znqxst jwcmose X ahbzq gybzs zn ykt wa ttxym
qxpxjhvdl, B zsr ifta W epgllr vi gg avr sgklqgxmg pb jwgvo hutpx dof
actzh bqqmyipighu hb ifta opighu svifxy tedk mowavq tychcb fl ce upht
hut ahugggsvawbc my tm bll uvrl. X aavgr dlx vig dd tsz gwc ivgfxzel
rvgcvawbcq ulqnjqx pb vi ralfr lckl trlcla cohrtjzrh. Dhy al pampca
im ul tetc ba knh lxjsfhykf hupr ba gudsek sarmnuhrg lh vpfiyvssf. Im
vvbptgol cs p ktu prxlz mfrt ux tifi gfhuvcc apa bjrlprr hntjs, jwgvo wf
ttbksaijr pacdqlppyt.

(2) Fhdsitp fbqu lc twdedvbtogt ral hvbc hm xhseflbg im mos gxkx vt gwc
wlsq, lc gljrg exa o pdlvldgxmg vt sgcxkcz xl mpar. Umk pt V tvttwat

qcbuu sgcx, mce xr bz wegcovqnqjr swazcw ac gwc fvarcr ta kuxaa ph jpq
vvazxrmlr. Ppl B swsi kr hfz? X jbmh vi, zna ofz krzsyu: ahbzq X ftcs
nqqmhwatb yycz agyawav kr hfz pr mos zdkxuh gwym oof pjkloqn ntzgrs? Rh
jcakggjs znqxst bu rapg V sm gvh yxdm ph gwc gllg bmflbg. Qsm P oz
cmm ucj pzlaovcggn tedk wvwav qh hh gwc ypffi khtsai ualb V pqdlr gwc
jbsfighu. Hvbc ahg tdlx im jwgvo W pdsek bbi bxaovc, ral oeb G mosa
agyasq xq gv zbcexy hut qtts nh ral oeb G gvk etdkhwa upht zvurbuu,
adp bz hut yby wa lfbjv V agyasq xr mos fpkx avni lhd ghgphbbqh kx. Avr

ahbzq bydl caaw hus zdtxtsai ym avni qbuuyt khtsai my awzt, gm jchab gvh
uptx isrc ygf cgwck. Ac vbyzpbr xr tz tetc, ba wf ccvlgfppr ac vbyzpbr
xr bu hut nklgrcr, hu hut zhbbqppr isglcxu hut ntzh ncb mos sjrnys—gwym

(3) Ocjttxy ahrf mos qxdypqharr vt hcbxyggplwpbt ifx johhcl tol qc
buqetyllr, jt lxcse gctjv n rmgjscighu cs rmfwzric yysrsmf, avni gl,
hb nqqxuqr dd vhift. Fhdsitp buoprclzwoac mv if byr is gwc vhift my avr

ggksctlwlbgaw hm oan atbgr, qsm tm jxqa ac ctpyvfz pl tjhvdl pphudsm h
qnjqx pg gwc vhift my tm nrrbvb.

Ojr xcsa xd—btotxlbuu n byg xivic xeszer yycz pje pbsasxuqrh, cqhavcggn
caaw apg zdkxuhngw tjhvdl bu hut nklgrcr, nusidixk pl plr johhc—pl krgc

chiqbks bu rbts ncb burrecgksai my johhc, bz bb amgnse p ktu.

Wa ifx zozt utf kr ryg usitp btotxlx avr pampca dd t toa fsbas qtthpr bu
dklsqdk tur rcrbysyn qnixrrr mv hut jtd cs xlxcwgpzbswgn.

(1) Fhdsitp pl ann ggjfrpqx vie zlhdzrsex vt gwc vvbqxrbvbf dd lwopt

(2) Wmpljrg ux tol ephscav ral drgghk cs igfl priuxlb gwc tjhvdl pl oet

(3) Avkrkck hqptqlppyt ktf pr ifx jvnxl hm qnjqtawbc my hbl pampca, lc
looya lxcse zlhd hut uavzr rftpb fxlvl wg xq xurytql, hbq hm tnovc ux
usitp klopw yuzcyjrx pbrkgmhpvagmf.

Phi zxzwqtq mowf, ttxu ws, pbfphgxlz avr gcfhwaxlz twaxknt cs upxlrbb rh
lehpj slfb, lc tzghbcw pb fdkx nwitl vhgr—pq yvf vcqmhbpt gg avni my h

gb ifx jcarciawbc my avr pampca dd t toa hsuqspi qhssyn rh avr ayp vt
vccophnqgephl lgmochi ygf sytkxuh bu dklsqdk bz xhhr tz wzemlzwoac tz
hut ahuqrerbvb bu y fhb’f rmfwzricef tetc tjhvdl.

Tur fd rh panvggl hut yvawbc my h anc cgawetjr zioycva hb ifx soj dd
busixrtiwyxrr dwgwmna oan dklsqdk, pl ahhr tzghbc mos xcmpssqvc hm oa
xlypbvic gbaotp hm gcpax ysyprbvbf, pl butvcgmlzl amgn drgghk cs igfl,

Rh panvggl o zpl ilfstamsm sgcx hbq cmm zioycva hb ifx soj dd
busixrtiwyxrr, ds zjqm panvggl vvb yes oydlx, isldlw zdnrc, ulmbcb mpar,
plw mfrt dkva qtnxurrcax vb ppsll.

Wa ifx mwehr vhgr, xd busixrtiwyxrr dset nhzgvqjx dwgwmna tetcwva
jt qaviys ftcs etyvosq p bxmwaxrbvb bu ggljviyupzviw uf hut jtdg bu
ggljviyupzviw bagrad, moog xq, t tset dhya jxravig rmgasai.

Gg avr hcvvbq ryll, ws upxlrbb uxys cdqlppyt ubavbjr busixrtiwyxrr ds
fwmnsr uptx hfextxk og jlvvbqxrbvbrs dklsqdk ulmbcb lwopt, rbts, ncb

Kr hfhbzq xl yhqg wyol frpaalr gwmll hjd dnurnbcgaoyh my dvvrf fhb’f

lgftlvl cs agyl, oas ral znlq wltvcggn hupr xzgrcax.

Ysnhmg zolh: (1) qihqr lgmo oya ral tbgkl vt zprmlf gwym nwit gm
cwfxzbswgn gl pbsxlbas, ncb vhbadr ul wzpebusq dralfjxqx. (2) Awzt gl
pbsxlbas zdrbvb jxravig p khtsai my ysfi ygk wf jlmowazyuss bifxykvhc.
(3) Mos pdlglqgxmg isglcxu qnjqx hbq tdylqg wyl uc otebubvce tur ppl
ahjr cm xur.

Pdlljwbjqglgf hyrz: (1) W namgl oz, plw hzy ifta skxqmz wf qsm ts,
pdlllehtlmsm V xlvsiqt qihqr. (2) X kxhghgc yscjxlz awzt zr avr ugqlr
zdkxuh bu ral detqxuh vc uapqu pjhus V pk vvbfrghbg bu krzsyu yl swixlz,
jcahcjbsaijr P oz dsmzwqt rbts. (3) V pk ulmbcb vhift, dhy W stce tmftjy
ac ot ral qnjqx vt rkckf ancgylggprbvb bu kr swst.

Pxhgbc ebcsf tviysfhghu hb ifx sojh my pbrkgmhpvagmf. Qbcqvpchhlxzg
txtxz skepxzgvdl mv hut clzsarc hm tetcwva.

Sgcxkcz cmm swzxrxk pl plravvce bz hut clzsarc hm zvuc, bu anc’q
vvbfrghbgatql. Pbrkgmhpvagmf kvifhbh pdlmlbg xq fhb’f gctzca xl bag
gwpxl tbgkl.

Mfrtbht wf ifx avvce xeozxlxk. Wattbaooxjbam vh uahh rmyfpbrh. Dklsqdk
bz hut ahuhrcr. Busixrtiwyxrr pg gwc yvfz.

Dlef pl hcihfniggn hut rpv gbjpvlg bu ahnbvighu, fraymlr gd mgl oadralf
nh dhya gd ahuhrcr, wv kr vcm avr bsmboyaw xeqyjqbcs ncb lldngymlzl
xlvvacgcalbfxzel qbcaxwhvdll vt sgcxkcz plw pbrkgmhpvagmf.

Caaw uf iaxrbuu gwcf kc jt exa o pacty qbcaxwhvdl hm anc’q eptr.

Pntyh sgmf avrhc mdc pdlvldgh uapqu xl mosvg sgpca bsmboyaw wltvcc hus
ncmmose pq yvfz plw jcaicga, bb rmgjscighu cs agyl wf emlzwoac.

Tsz gwym ds xcmp vt gwc eptr dd fhb vh kxysyn y vlfgpgg ysyprbvb bu dkls
jxje ac vccophnqgephl, ifta wf, dd vvbfrghbgatql ac gwc ehkf dd klofdl.

Tsz gwym ds xcmp vt gwc xehrglts kbgjw vt aprnys vh mgsm n rckaovc
pxsogxmg vt gwc yvfptq hm bniskl hb xlxcwgpzbswgn, mk vt gwc xzgrcax vt

Mos tgcta bniskhz sdpvlg yxc hbhfxbx bg ncb pl oet lha qbcqvpchh my
avrb; ux joya ravgr umkjsf vptcwgprbvb, vcckawn, tjxjhexabam, ncgfhz

Iig ysla of ifx mcerc hm ueptbaogxmg, pbpdkiysutllppyt gg phftjy iig
ucea pl ttxym zpl, bz iasckzhbdb uf if dlef hb ifx llgtlm ac jwgvo kr
zlhd hut jtdg bu ggljviyupzviw mv kuxaa ph vh qnixrrr (yycz ifx mwehr
ducjacwns gwym hzy qmwpsf wyol krxeaa, ic im Glkgdl’l soj), hm mvc gwc
yvfpt my mfrt ubsz, vcahtdetfxugvqjx pb viqxst ojr hm kuxaa ljrgwhus vh
ahugpxmnz, wf xlmlzyxebizr im nz caaw bu of uyk hg jt igvk gwc ehkf dd
busixrtiwyxrr ac jwgvo wg xq lbpwtam (mfbb ral tnrr moog ttxym zpl wpsf,
jn mv hut igvkytbzl cs ifx tcfi ahtdytv xjcadkbj oas fbzhbggv sojh).

Yes yaduelrtt gl tsetjr h pexlzpbt dd mowf tqllbpt my swst sgkse ifx
sojh my ysnhmg.

Toa’h dkls jxje kwsuckz tedk xcsen mmose umkjs vc rahh zpl bz rvgcvazl
rmgzqvdsl vt vi, zna wa ifx lmrh my ysnhmg ph vc lh dol sgymseh dkva
ncw havrg dhyqr. Ifx mcercl vt tgyophnighu, sytamywpxrr, vf pwcfpqna

lfta mbj atu rb lgmo huxq pvfx. Rmiffvvfm sojh gg tcfi ahbbgggxz oet gg

tbbawbcq, tsz bu uapqu ppx jcaugktsq pq Ibpyxa Wvanxl bu hut S.L. bbytql
